GV01rvh1-10u:1: RV_1,001.01a agnim īḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3: RV_1,001.02a agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5: RV_1,001.03a agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:7: RV_1,001.04a agne yaṃ yajñam adhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9: RV_1,001.05a agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11: RV_1,001.06a yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13: RV_1,001.07a upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15: RV_1,001.08a rājantam adhvarāṇāṃ gopām ṛtasya dīdivim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17: RV_1,001.09a sa naḥ piteva sūnave 'gne sūpāyano bhava /
GV01rvh1-10u:19: RV_1,002.01a vāyav ā yāhi darśateme somā araṅkṛtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21: RV_1,002.02a vāya ukthebhir jarante tvām acchā jaritāraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:23: RV_1,002.03a vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:25: RV_1,002.04a indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhir ā gatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:27: RV_1,002.05a vāyav indraś ca cetathaḥ sutānāṃ vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:28: RV_1,002.05c tāv ā yātam upa dravat //
GV01rvh1-10u:29: RV_1,002.06a vāyav indraś ca sunvata ā yātam upa niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:31: RV_1,002.07a mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:35: RV_1,002.09a kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:37: RV_1,003.01a aśvinā yajvarīr iṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:39: RV_1,003.02a aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:41: RV_1,003.03a dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:43: RV_1,003.04a indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:45: RV_1,003.05a indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:47: RV_1,003.06a indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:49: RV_1,003.07a omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā gata /
GV01rvh1-10u:51: RV_1,003.08a viśve devāso apturaḥ sutam ā ganta tūrṇayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:53: RV_1,003.09a viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:55: RV_1,003.10a pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:59: RV_1,003.12a maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:61: RV_1,004.01a surūpakṛtnum ūtaye sudughām iva goduhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:63: RV_1,004.02a upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba /
GV01rvh1-10u:65: RV_1,004.03a athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:66: RV_1,004.03c mā no ati khya ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:67: RV_1,004.04a parehi vigram astṛtam indram pṛcchā vipaścitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:68: RV_1,004.04c yas te sakhibhya ā varam //
GV01rvh1-10u:69: RV_1,004.05a uta bruvantu no nido nir anyataś cid ārata /
GV01rvh1-10u:71: RV_1,004.06a uta naḥ subhagāṃ arir voceyur dasma kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:73: RV_1,004.07a em āśum āśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:75: RV_1,004.08a asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇām abhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:77: RV_1,004.09a taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:79: RV_1,004.10a yo rāyo 'vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:81: RV_1,005.01a ā tv etā ni ṣīdatendram abhi pra gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:85: RV_1,005.03a sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:86: RV_1,005.03c gamad vājebhir ā sa naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:87: RV_1,005.04a yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:89: RV_1,005.05a sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:91: RV_1,005.06a tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:93: RV_1,005.07a ā tvā viśantv āśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:95: RV_1,005.08a tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvām ukthā śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:97: RV_1,005.09a akṣitotiḥ saned imaṃ vājam indraḥ sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:99: RV_1,005.10a mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnām indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:101: RV_1,006.01a yuñjanti bradhnam aruṣaṃ carantam pari tasthuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:103: RV_1,006.02a yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe /
GV01rvh1-10u:105: RV_1,006.03a ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase /
GV01rvh1-10u:107: RV_1,006.04a ād aha svadhām anu punar garbhatvam erire /
GV01rvh1-10u:109: RV_1,006.05a vīḷu cid ārujatnubhir guhā cid indra vahnibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:111: RV_1,006.06a devayanto yathā matim acchā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:113: RV_1,006.07a indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:115: RV_1,006.08a anavadyair abhidyubhir makhaḥ sahasvad arcati /
GV01rvh1-10u:117: RV_1,006.09a ataḥ parijmann ā gahi divo vā rocanād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:119: RV_1,006.10a ito vā sātim īmahe divo vā pārthivād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:121: RV_1,007.01a indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:123: RV_1,007.02a indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:125: RV_1,007.03a indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:127: RV_1,007.04a indra vājeṣu no 'va sahasrapradhaneṣu ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:129: RV_1,007.05a indraṃ vayam mahādhana indram arbhe havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:131: RV_1,007.06a sa no vṛṣann amuṃ caruṃ satrādāvann apā vṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:133: RV_1,007.07a tuñje-tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:135: RV_1,007.08a vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭīr iyarty ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:137: RV_1,007.09a ya ekaś carṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnām irajyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:139: RV_1,007.10a indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:141: RV_1,008.01a endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham /
GV01rvh1-10u:143: RV_1,008.02a ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai /
GV01rvh1-10u:145: RV_1,008.03a indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:147: RV_1,008.04a vayaṃ śūrebhir astṛbhir indra tvayā yujā vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:149: RV_1,008.05a mahāṃ indraḥ paraś ca nu mahitvam astu vajriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:151: RV_1,008.06a samohe vā ya āśata naras tokasya sanitau /
GV01rvh1-10u:153: RV_1,008.07a yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:155: RV_1,008.08a evā hy asya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī /
GV01rvh1-10u:157: RV_1,008.09a evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:159: RV_1,008.10a evā hy asya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:161: RV_1,009.01a indrehi matsy andhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:163: RV_1,009.02a em enaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine /
GV01rvh1-10u:165: RV_1,009.03a matsvā suśipra mandibhi stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:167: RV_1,009.04a asṛgram indra te giraḥ prati tvām ud ahāsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:169: RV_1,009.05a saṃ codaya citram arvāg rādha indra vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:170: RV_1,009.05c asad it te vibhu prabhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:171: RV_1,009.06a asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:173: RV_1,009.07a saṃ gomad indra vājavad asme pṛthu śravo bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:175: RV_1,009.08a asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:177: RV_1,009.09a vasor indraṃ vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:179: RV_1,009.10a sute-sute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata ed ariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:181: RV_1,010.01a gāyanti tvā gāyatriṇo 'rcanty arkam arkiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:182: RV_1,010.01c brahmāṇas tvā śatakrata ud vaṃśam iva yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:183: RV_1,010.02a yat sānoḥ sānum āruhad bhūry aspaṣṭa kartvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:184: RV_1,010.02c tad indro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇir ejati //
GV01rvh1-10u:185: RV_1,010.03a yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā /
GV01rvh1-10u:186: RV_1,010.03c athā na indra somapā girām upaśrutiṃ cara //
GV01rvh1-10u:187: RV_1,010.04a ehi stomāṃ abhi svarābhi gṛṇīhy ā ruva /
GV01rvh1-10u:188: RV_1,010.04c brahma ca no vaso sacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:189: RV_1,010.05a uktham indrāya śaṃsyaṃ vardhanam puruniṣṣidhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:190: RV_1,010.05c śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:191: RV_1,010.06a tam it sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye /
GV01rvh1-10u:192: RV_1,010.06c sa śakra uta naḥ śakad indro vasu dayamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:193: RV_1,010.07a suvivṛtaṃ sunirajam indra tvādātam id yaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:194: RV_1,010.07c gavām apa vrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:195: RV_1,010.08a nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇam invataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:196: RV_1,010.08c jeṣaḥ svarvatīr apaḥ saṃ gā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:197: RV_1,010.09a āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:198: RV_1,010.09c indra stomam imam mama kṛṣvā yujaś cid antaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:199: RV_1,010.10a vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:201: RV_1,010.11a ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutam piba /
GV01rvh1-10u:202: RV_1,010.11c navyam āyuḥ pra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim //
GV01rvh1-10u:203: RV_1,010.12a pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:204: RV_1,010.12c vṛddhāyum anu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:205: RV_1,011.01a indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:206: RV_1,011.01c rathītamaṃ rathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatim patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:207: RV_1,011.02a sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:208: RV_1,011.02c tvām abhi pra ṇonumo jetāram aparājitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:209: RV_1,011.03a pūrvīr indrasya rātayo na vi dasyanty ūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:210: RV_1,011.03c yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham //
GV01rvh1-10u:211: RV_1,011.04a purām bhindur yuvā kavir amitaujā ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:212: RV_1,011.04c indro viśvasya karmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:213: RV_1,011.05a tvaṃ valasya gomato 'pāvar adrivo bilam /
GV01rvh1-10u:214: RV_1,011.05c tvāṃ devā abibhyuṣas tujyamānāsa āviṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:215: RV_1,011.06a tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ praty āyaṃ sindhum āvadan /
GV01rvh1-10u:216: RV_1,011.06c upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:217: RV_1,011.07a māyābhir indra māyinaṃ tvaṃ śuṣṇam avātiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:218: RV_1,011.07c viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirās teṣāṃ śravāṃsy ut tira //
GV01rvh1-10u:219: RV_1,011.08a indram īśānam ojasābhi stomā anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:220: RV_1,011.08c sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:221: RV_1,012.01a agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:223: RV_1,012.02a agnim-agniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:225: RV_1,012.03a agne devāṃ ihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:227: RV_1,012.04a tāṃ uśato vi bodhaya yad agne yāsi dūtyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:229: RV_1,012.05a ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha /
GV01rvh1-10u:231: RV_1,012.06a agnināgniḥ sam idhyate kavir gṛhapatir yuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:233: RV_1,012.07a kavim agnim upa stuhi satyadharmāṇam adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:235: RV_1,012.08a yas tvām agne haviṣpatir dūtaṃ deva saparyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:237: RV_1,012.09a yo agniṃ devavītaye haviṣmāṃ āvivāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:239: RV_1,012.10a sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devāṃ ihā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:240: RV_1,012.10c upa yajñaṃ haviś ca naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:241: RV_1,012.11a sa na stavāna ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:243: RV_1,012.12a agne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhir devahūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:245: RV_1,013.01a susamiddho na ā vaha devāṃ agne haviṣmate /
GV01rvh1-10u:247: RV_1,013.02a madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:249: RV_1,013.03a narāśaṃsam iha priyam asmin yajña upa hvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:251: RV_1,013.04a agne sukhatame rathe devāṃ īḷita ā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:253: RV_1,013.05a stṛṇīta barhir ānuṣag ghṛtapṛṣṭham manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:255: RV_1,013.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:257: RV_1,013.07a naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:259: RV_1,013.08a tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī /
GV01rvh1-10u:261: RV_1,013.09a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:263: RV_1,013.10a iha tvaṣṭāram agriyaṃ viśvarūpam upa hvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:265: RV_1,013.11a ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:267: RV_1,013.12a svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano gṛhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:269: RV_1,014.01a aibhir agne duvo giro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:271: RV_1,014.02a ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:273: RV_1,014.03a indravāyū bṛhaspatim mitrāgnim pūṣaṇam bhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:275: RV_1,014.04a pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:277: RV_1,014.05a īḷate tvām avasyavaḥ kaṇvāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:279: RV_1,014.06a ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:281: RV_1,014.07a tān yajatrāṃ ṛtāvṛdho 'gne patnīvatas kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:283: RV_1,014.08a ye yajatrā ya īḍyās te te pibantu jihvayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:285: RV_1,014.09a ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:287: RV_1,014.10a viśvebhiḥ somyam madhv agna indreṇa vāyunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:289: RV_1,014.11a tvaṃ hotā manurhito 'gne yajñeṣu sīdasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:291: RV_1,014.12a yukṣvā hy aruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:293: RV_1,015.01a indra somam piba ṛtunā tvā viśantv indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:295: RV_1,015.02a marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñam punītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:297: RV_1,015.03a abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:299: RV_1,015.04a agne devāṃ ihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:301: RV_1,015.05a brāhmaṇād indra rādhasaḥ pibā somam ṛtūṃr anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:303: RV_1,015.06a yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham /
GV01rvh1-10u:307: RV_1,015.08a draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:309: RV_1,015.09a draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:311: RV_1,015.10a yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhir draviṇodo yajāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:312: RV_1,015.10c adha smā no dadir bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:313: RV_1,015.11a aśvinā pibatam madhu dīdyagnī śucivratā /
GV01rvh1-10u:315: RV_1,015.12a gārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīr asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:317: RV_1,016.01a ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:319: RV_1,016.02a imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:321: RV_1,016.03a indram prātar havāmaha indram prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:323: RV_1,016.04a upa naḥ sutam ā gahi haribhir indra keśibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:325: RV_1,016.05a semaṃ na stomam ā gahy upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:327: RV_1,016.06a ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:329: RV_1,016.07a ayaṃ te stomo agriyo hṛdispṛg astu śantamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:331: RV_1,016.08a viśvam it savanaṃ sutam indro madāya gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:333: RV_1,016.09a semaṃ naḥ kāmam ā pṛṇa gobhir aśvaiḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:335: RV_1,017.01a indrāvaruṇayor ahaṃ samrājor ava ā vṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:337: RV_1,017.02a gantārā hi stho 'vase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:339: RV_1,017.03a anukāmaṃ tarpayethām indrāvaruṇa rāya ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:341: RV_1,017.04a yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:345: RV_1,017.06a tayor id avasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:347: RV_1,017.07a indrāvaruṇa vām ahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:349: RV_1,017.08a indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:351: RV_1,017.09a pra vām aśnotu suṣṭutir indrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:353: RV_1,018.01a somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:355: RV_1,018.02a yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:356: RV_1,018.02c sa naḥ siṣaktu yas turaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:357: RV_1,018.03a mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:359: RV_1,018.04a sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yam indro brahmaṇas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:361: RV_1,018.05a tvaṃ tam brahmaṇas pate soma indraś ca martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:363: RV_1,018.06a sadasas patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:365: RV_1,018.07a yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaś cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:367: RV_1,018.08a ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtim prāñcaṃ kṛṇoty adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:371: RV_1,019.01a prati tyaṃ cārum adhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:373: RV_1,019.02a nahi devo na martyo mahas tava kratum paraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:375: RV_1,019.03a ye maho rajaso vidur viśve devāso adruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:377: RV_1,019.04a ya ugrā arkam ānṛcur anādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:379: RV_1,019.05a ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:381: RV_1,019.06a ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:383: RV_1,019.07a ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudram arṇavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:385: RV_1,019.08a ā ye tanvanti raśmibhis tiraḥ samudram ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:387: RV_1,019.09a abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyam madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:389: RV_1,020.01a ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhir āsayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:391: RV_1,020.02a ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣur manasā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:393: RV_1,020.03a takṣan nāsatyābhyām parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:395: RV_1,020.04a yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:397: RV_1,020.05a saṃ vo madāso agmatendreṇa ca marutvatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:399: RV_1,020.06a uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭur devasya niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:401: RV_1,020.07a te no ratnāni dhattana trir ā sāptāni sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:405: RV_1,021.01a ihendrāgnī upa hvaye tayor it stomam uśmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:407: RV_1,021.02a tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:409: RV_1,021.03a tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāgnī tā havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:411: RV_1,021.04a ugrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:413: RV_1,021.05a tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāgnī rakṣa ubjatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:415: RV_1,021.06a tena satyena jāgṛtam adhi pracetune pade /
GV01rvh1-10u:417: RV_1,022.01a prātaryujā vi bodhayāśvināv eha gacchatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:419: RV_1,022.02a yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā /
GV01rvh1-10u:421: RV_1,022.03a yā vāṃ kaśā madhumaty aśvinā sūnṛtāvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:423: RV_1,022.04a nahi vām asti dūrake yatrā rathena gacchathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:425: RV_1,022.05a hiraṇyapāṇim ūtaye savitāram upa hvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:427: RV_1,022.06a apāṃ napātam avase savitāram upa stuhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:429: RV_1,022.07a vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasoś citrasya rādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:431: RV_1,022.08a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:433: RV_1,022.09a agne patnīr ihā vaha devānām uśatīr upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:435: RV_1,022.10a ā gnā agna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:437: RV_1,022.11a abhi no devīr avasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:439: RV_1,022.12a ihendrāṇīm upa hvaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:441: RV_1,022.13a mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñam mimikṣatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:443: RV_1,022.14a tayor id ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:447: RV_1,022.16a ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇur vicakrame /
GV01rvh1-10u:449: RV_1,022.17a idaṃ viṣṇur vi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam /
GV01rvh1-10u:451: RV_1,022.18a trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:453: RV_1,022.19a viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:455: RV_1,022.20a tad viṣṇoḥ paramam padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:457: RV_1,022.21a tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:459: RV_1,023.01a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahy āśīrvantaḥ sutā ime /
GV01rvh1-10u:463: RV_1,023.03a indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:465: RV_1,023.04a mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:467: RV_1,023.05a ṛtena yāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtasya jyotiṣas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:469: RV_1,023.06a varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:471: RV_1,023.07a marutvantaṃ havāmaha indram ā somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:475: RV_1,023.09a hata vṛtraṃ sudānava indreṇa sahasā yujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:477: RV_1,023.10a viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:479: RV_1,023.11a jayatām iva tanyatur marutām eti dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:481: RV_1,023.12a haskārād vidyutas pary ato jātā avantu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:483: RV_1,023.13a ā pūṣañ citrabarhiṣam āghṛṇe dharuṇaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:485: RV_1,023.14a pūṣā rājānam āghṛṇir apagūḷhaṃ guhā hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:487: RV_1,023.15a uto sa mahyam indubhiḥ ṣaḍ yuktāṃ anuseṣidhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:489: RV_1,023.16a ambayo yanty adhvabhir jāmayo adhvarīyatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:491: RV_1,023.17a amūr yā upa sūrye yābhir vā sūryaḥ saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:493: RV_1,023.18a apo devīr upa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:495: RV_1,023.19a apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:497: RV_1,023.20a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
GV01rvh1-10u:498: RV_1,023.20c agniṃ ca viśvaśambhuvam āpaś ca viśvabheṣajīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:499: RV_1,023.21a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama /
GV01rvh1-10u:501: RV_1,023.22a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi /
GV01rvh1-10u:502: RV_1,023.22c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:503: RV_1,023.23a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:504: RV_1,023.23c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:505: RV_1,023.24a sam māgne varcasā sṛja sam prajayā sam āyuṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:506: RV_1,023.24c vidyur me asya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:507: RV_1,024.01a kasya nūnaṃ katamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:508: RV_1,024.01c ko no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:509: RV_1,024.02a agner vayam prathamasyāmṛtānām manāmahe cāru devasya nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:510: RV_1,024.02c sa no mahyā aditaye punar dāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyam mātaraṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:511: RV_1,024.03a abhi tvā deva savitar īśānaṃ vāryāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:513: RV_1,024.04a yaś cid dhi ta itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:515: RV_1,024.05a bhagabhaktasya te vayam ud aśema tavāvasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:517: RV_1,024.06a nahi te kṣatraṃ na saho na manyuṃ vayaś canāmī patayanta āpuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:518: RV_1,024.06c nemā āpo animiṣaṃ carantīr na ye vātasya praminanty abhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:519: RV_1,024.07a abudhne rājā varuṇo vanasyordhvaṃ stūpaṃ dadate pūtadakṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:520: RV_1,024.07c nīcīnā sthur upari budhna eṣām asme antar nihitāḥ ketavaḥ syuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:521: RV_1,024.08a uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:522: RV_1,024.08c apade pādā pratidhātave 'kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:523: RV_1,024.09a śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasram urvī gabhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:524: RV_1,024.09c bādhasva dūre nirṛtim parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ pra mumugdhy asmat //
GV01rvh1-10u:525: RV_1,024.10a amī ya ṛkṣā nihitāsa uccā naktaṃ dadṛśre kuha cid diveyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:526: RV_1,024.10c adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśac candramā naktam eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:527: RV_1,024.11a tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad ā śāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:528: RV_1,024.11c aheḷamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:529: RV_1,024.12a tad in naktaṃ tad divā mahyam āhus tad ayaṃ keto hṛda ā vi caṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:530: RV_1,024.12c śunaḥśepo yam ahvad gṛbhītaḥ so asmān rājā varuṇo mumoktu //
GV01rvh1-10u:531: RV_1,024.13a śunaḥśepo hy ahvad gṛbhītas triṣv ādityaṃ drupadeṣu baddhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:532: RV_1,024.13c avainaṃ rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyād vidvāṃ adabdho vi mumoktu pāśān //
GV01rvh1-10u:533: RV_1,024.14a ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:534: RV_1,024.14c kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:535: RV_1,024.15a ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:536: RV_1,024.15c athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:537: RV_1,025.01a yac cid dhi te viśo yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:539: RV_1,025.02a mā no vadhāya hatnave jihīḷānasya rīradhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:541: RV_1,025.03a vi mṛḷīkāya te mano rathīr aśvaṃ na saṃditam /
GV01rvh1-10u:543: RV_1,025.04a parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:545: RV_1,025.05a kadā kṣatraśriyaṃ naram ā varuṇaṃ karāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:547: RV_1,025.06a tad it samānam āśāte venantā na pra yucchataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:549: RV_1,025.07a vedā yo vīnām padam antarikṣeṇa patatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:551: RV_1,025.08a veda māso dhṛtavrato dvādaśa prajāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:553: RV_1,025.09a veda vātasya vartanim uror ṛṣvasya bṛhataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:555: RV_1,025.10a ni ṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:557: RV_1,025.11a ato viśvāny adbhutā cikitvāṃ abhi paśyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:559: RV_1,025.12a sa no viśvāhā sukratur ādityaḥ supathā karat /
GV01rvh1-10u:561: RV_1,025.13a bibhrad drāpiṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇo vasta nirṇijam /
GV01rvh1-10u:563: RV_1,025.14a na yaṃ dipsanti dipsavo na druhvāṇo janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:565: RV_1,025.15a uta yo mānuṣeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:567: RV_1,025.16a parā me yanti dhītayo gāvo na gavyūtīr anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:569: RV_1,025.17a saṃ nu vocāvahai punar yato me madhv ābhṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:571: RV_1,025.18a darśaṃ nu viśvadarśataṃ darśaṃ ratham adhi kṣami /
GV01rvh1-10u:573: RV_1,025.19a imam me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḷaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:575: RV_1,025.20a tvaṃ viśvasya medhira divaś ca gmaś ca rājasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:577: RV_1,025.21a ud uttamam mumugdhi no vi pāśam madhyamaṃ cṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:579: RV_1,026.01a vasiṣvā hi miyedhya vastrāṇy ūrjām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:581: RV_1,026.02a ni no hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:583: RV_1,026.03a ā hi ṣmā sūnave pitāpir yajaty āpaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:585: RV_1,026.04a ā no barhī riśādaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:587: RV_1,026.05a pūrvya hotar asya no mandasva sakhyasya ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:588: RV_1,026.05c imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:589: RV_1,026.06a yac cid dhi śaśvatā tanā devaṃ-devaṃ yajāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:591: RV_1,026.07a priyo no astu viśpatir hotā mandro vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:593: RV_1,026.08a svagnayo hi vāryaṃ devāso dadhire ca naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:595: RV_1,026.09a athā na ubhayeṣām amṛta martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:597: RV_1,026.10a viśvebhir agne agnibhir imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:599: RV_1,027.01a aśvaṃ na tvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā agniṃ namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:601: RV_1,027.02a sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:603: RV_1,027.03a sa no dūrāc cāsāc ca ni martyād aghāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:605: RV_1,027.04a imam ū ṣu tvam asmākaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navyāṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:607: RV_1,027.05a ā no bhaja parameṣv ā vājeṣu madhyameṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:609: RV_1,027.06a vibhaktāsi citrabhāno sindhor ūrmā upāka ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:611: RV_1,027.07a yam agne pṛtsu martyam avā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:613: RV_1,027.08a nakir asya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:615: RV_1,027.09a sa vājaṃ viśvacarṣaṇir arvadbhir astu tarutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:617: RV_1,027.10a jarābodha tad viviḍḍhi viśe-viśe yajñiyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:619: RV_1,027.11a sa no mahāṃ animāno dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:621: RV_1,027.12a sa revāṃ iva viśpatir daivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:623: RV_1,027.13a namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:624: RV_1,027.13c yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsam ā vṛkṣi devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:625: RV_1,028.01a yatra grāvā pṛthubudhna ūrdhvo bhavati sotave /
GV01rvh1-10u:626: RV_1,028.01c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:627: RV_1,028.02a yatra dvāv iva jaghanādhiṣavaṇyā kṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:628: RV_1,028.02c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:629: RV_1,028.03a yatra nāry apacyavam upacyavaṃ ca śikṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:630: RV_1,028.03c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:631: RV_1,028.04a yatra manthāṃ vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:632: RV_1,028.04c ulūkhalasutānām aved v indra jalgulaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:633: RV_1,028.05a yac cid dhi tvaṃ gṛhe-gṛha ulūkhalaka yujyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:634: RV_1,028.05c iha dyumattamaṃ vada jayatām iva dundubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:635: RV_1,028.06a uta sma te vanaspate vāto vi vāty agram it /
GV01rvh1-10u:636: RV_1,028.06c atho indrāya pātave sunu somam ulūkhala //
GV01rvh1-10u:637: RV_1,028.07a āyajī vājasātamā tā hy uccā vijarbhṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:639: RV_1,028.08a tā no adya vanaspatī ṛṣvāv ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:641: RV_1,028.09a uc chiṣṭaṃ camvor bhara somam pavitra ā sṛja /
GV01rvh1-10u:642: RV_1,028.09c ni dhehi gor adhi tvaci //
GV01rvh1-10u:643: RV_1,029.01a yac cid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:644: RV_1,029.01c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:645: RV_1,029.02a śiprin vājānām pate śacīvas tava daṃsanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:646: RV_1,029.02c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:647: RV_1,029.03a ni ṣvāpayā mithūdṛśā sastām abudhyamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:648: RV_1,029.03c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:649: RV_1,029.04a sasantu tyā arātayo bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:650: RV_1,029.04c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:651: RV_1,029.05a sam indra gardabham mṛṇa nuvantam pāpayāmuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:652: RV_1,029.05c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:653: RV_1,029.06a patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūraṃ vāto vanād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:654: RV_1,029.06c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:655: RV_1,029.07a sarvam parikrośaṃ jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:656: RV_1,029.07c ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣv aśveṣu śubhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:657: RV_1,030.01a ā va indraṃ kriviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:659: RV_1,030.02a śataṃ vā yaḥ śucīnāṃ sahasraṃ vā samāśirām /
GV01rvh1-10u:660: RV_1,030.02c ed u nimnaṃ na rīyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:661: RV_1,030.03a saṃ yan madāya śuṣmiṇa enā hy asyodare /
GV01rvh1-10u:663: RV_1,030.04a ayam u te sam atasi kapota iva garbhadhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:664: RV_1,030.04c vacas tac cin na ohase //
GV01rvh1-10u:665: RV_1,030.05a stotraṃ rādhānām pate girvāho vīra yasya te /
GV01rvh1-10u:667: RV_1,030.06a ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā na ūtaye 'smin vāje śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:671: RV_1,030.08a ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:673: RV_1,030.09a anu pratnasyaukaso huve tuvipratiṃ naram /
GV01rvh1-10u:674: RV_1,030.09c yaṃ te pūrvam pitā huve //
GV01rvh1-10u:675: RV_1,030.10a taṃ tvā vayaṃ viśvavārā śāsmahe puruhūta /
GV01rvh1-10u:679: RV_1,030.12a tathā tad astu somapāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu /
GV01rvh1-10u:681: RV_1,030.13a revatīr naḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:683: RV_1,030.14a ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇav iyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:685: RV_1,030.15a ā yad duvaḥ śatakratav ā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:687: RV_1,030.16a śaśvad indraḥ popruthadbhir jigāya nānadadbhiḥ śāśvasadbhir dhanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:688: RV_1,030.16c sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no 'dāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:691: RV_1,030.18a samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāv amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:693: RV_1,030.19a ny aghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:695: RV_1,030.20a kas ta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye /
GV01rvh1-10u:697: RV_1,030.21a vayaṃ hi te amanmahy āntād ā parākāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:699: RV_1,030.22a tvaṃ tyebhir ā gahi vājebhir duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:701: RV_1,031.01a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣir devo devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:702: RV_1,031.01c tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso 'jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:703: RV_1,031.02a tvam agne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavir devānām pari bhūṣasi vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:704: RV_1,031.02c vibhur viśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cid āyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:705: RV_1,031.03a tvam agne prathamo mātariśvana āvir bhava sukratūyā vivasvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:706: RV_1,031.03c arejetāṃ rodasī hotṛvūrye 'saghnor bhāram ayajo maho vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:707: RV_1,031.04a tvam agne manave dyām avāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:708: RV_1,031.04c śvātreṇa yat pitror mucyase pary ā tvā pūrvam anayann āparam punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:709: RV_1,031.05a tvam agne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭivardhana udyatasruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:710: RV_1,031.05c ya āhutim pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtim ekāyur agre viśa āvivāsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:711: RV_1,031.06a tvam agne vṛjinavartaniṃ naraṃ sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:712: RV_1,031.06c yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiś cit samṛtā haṃsi bhūyasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:713: RV_1,031.07a tvaṃ tam agne amṛtatva uttame martaṃ dadhāsi śravase dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:714: RV_1,031.07c yas tātṛṣāṇa ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi praya ā ca sūraye //
GV01rvh1-10u:715: RV_1,031.08a tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:716: RV_1,031.08c ṛdhyāma karmāpasā navena devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:717: RV_1,031.09a tvaṃ no agne pitror upastha ā devo deveṣv anavadya jāgṛviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:718: RV_1,031.09c tanūkṛd bodhi pramatiś ca kārave tvaṃ kalyāṇa vasu viśvam opiṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:719: RV_1,031.10a tvam agne pramatis tvam pitāsi nas tvaṃ vayaskṛt tava jāmayo vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:720: RV_1,031.10c saṃ tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ saṃ sahasriṇaḥ suvīraṃ yanti vratapām adābhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:721: RV_1,031.11a tvām agne prathamam āyum āyave devā akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:722: RV_1,031.11c iḷām akṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīm pitur yat putro mamakasya jāyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:723: RV_1,031.12a tvaṃ no agne tava deva pāyubhir maghono rakṣa tanvaś ca vandya /
GV01rvh1-10u:724: RV_1,031.12c trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asy animeṣaṃ rakṣamāṇas tava vrate //
GV01rvh1-10u:725: RV_1,031.13a tvam agne yajyave pāyur antaro 'niṣaṅgāya caturakṣa idhyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:726: RV_1,031.13c yo rātahavyo 'vṛkāya dhāyase kīreś cin mantram manasā vanoṣi tam //
GV01rvh1-10u:727: RV_1,031.14a tvam agna uruśaṃsāya vāghate spārhaṃ yad rekṇaḥ paramaṃ vanoṣi tat /
GV01rvh1-10u:728: RV_1,031.14c ādhrasya cit pramatir ucyase pitā pra pākaṃ śāssi pra diśo viduṣṭaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:729: RV_1,031.15a tvam agne prayatadakṣiṇaṃ naraṃ varmeva syūtam pari pāsi viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:730: RV_1,031.15c svādukṣadmā yo vasatau syonakṛj jīvayājaṃ yajate sopamā divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:731: RV_1,031.16a imām agne śaraṇim mīmṛṣo na imam adhvānaṃ yam agāma dūrāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:732: RV_1,031.16c āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānām bhṛmir asy ṛṣikṛn martyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:733: RV_1,031.17a manuṣvad agne aṅgirasvad aṅgiro yayātivat sadane pūrvavac chuce /
GV01rvh1-10u:734: RV_1,031.17c accha yāhy ā vahā daivyaṃ janam ā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:735: RV_1,031.18a etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:736: RV_1,031.18c uta pra ṇeṣy abhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:737: RV_1,032.01a indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī /
GV01rvh1-10u:738: RV_1,032.01c ahann ahim anv apas tatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:739: RV_1,032.02a ahann ahim parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:740: RV_1,032.02c vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudram ava jagmur āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:741: RV_1,032.03a vṛṣāyamāṇo 'vṛṇīta somaṃ trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:742: RV_1,032.03c ā sāyakam maghavādatta vajram ahann enam prathamajām ahīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:743: RV_1,032.04a yad indrāhan prathamajām ahīnām ān māyinām amināḥ prota māyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:744: RV_1,032.04c āt sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsaṃ tādītnā śatruṃ na kilā vivitse //
GV01rvh1-10u:745: RV_1,032.05a ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsam indro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena /
GV01rvh1-10u:746: RV_1,032.05c skandhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇāhiḥ śayata upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:747: RV_1,032.06a ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tuvibādham ṛjīṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:748: RV_1,032.06c nātārīd asya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣa indraśatruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:749: RV_1,032.07a apād ahasto apṛtanyad indram āsya vajram adhi sānau jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:750: RV_1,032.07c vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānam bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:751: RV_1,032.08a nadaṃ na bhinnam amuyā śayānam mano ruhāṇā ati yanty āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:752: RV_1,032.08c yāś cid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsām ahiḥ patsutaḥśīr babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:753: RV_1,032.09a nīcāvayā abhavad vṛtraputrendro asyā ava vadhar jabhāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:754: RV_1,032.09c uttarā sūr adharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:755: RV_1,032.10a atiṣṭhantīnām aniveśanānāṃ kāṣṭhānām madhye nihitaṃ śarīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:756: RV_1,032.10c vṛtrasya niṇyaṃ vi caranty āpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayad indraśatruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:757: RV_1,032.11a dāsapatnīr ahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:758: RV_1,032.11c apām bilam apihitaṃ yad āsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ apa tad vavāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:759: RV_1,032.12a aśvyo vāro abhavas tad indra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:760: RV_1,032.12c ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somam avāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:761: RV_1,032.13a nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yām miham akirad dhrāduniṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:762: RV_1,032.13c indraś ca yad yuyudhāte ahiś cotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye //
GV01rvh1-10u:763: RV_1,032.14a aher yātāraṃ kam apaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīr agacchat /
GV01rvh1-10u:764: RV_1,032.14c nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhīto ataro rajāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:765: RV_1,032.15a indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:766: RV_1,032.15c sed u rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnām arān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:767: RV_1,033.01a etāyāmopa gavyanta indram asmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:768: RV_1,033.01c anāmṛṇaḥ kuvid ād asya rāyo gavāṃ ketam param āvarjate naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:769: RV_1,033.02a uped ahaṃ dhanadām apratītaṃ juṣṭāṃ na śyeno vasatim patāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:770: RV_1,033.02c indraṃ namasyann upamebhir arkair ya stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman //
GV01rvh1-10u:771: RV_1,033.03a ni sarvasena iṣudhīṃr asakta sam aryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi /
GV01rvh1-10u:772: RV_1,033.03c coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmam mā paṇir bhūr asmad adhi pravṛddha //
GV01rvh1-10u:773: RV_1,033.04a vadhīr hi dasyuṃ dhaninaṃ ghanenaṃ ekaś carann upaśākebhir indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:774: RV_1,033.04c dhanor adhi viṣuṇak te vy āyann ayajvānaḥ sanakāḥ pretim īyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:775: RV_1,033.05a parā cic chīrṣā vavṛjus ta indrāyajvāno yajvabhi spardhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:776: RV_1,033.05c pra yad divo hariva sthātar ugra nir avratāṃ adhamo rodasyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:777: RV_1,033.06a ayuyutsann anavadyasya senām ayātayanta kṣitayo navagvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:778: RV_1,033.06c vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhir indrāc citayanta āyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:779: RV_1,033.07a tvam etān rudato jakṣataś cāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre /
GV01rvh1-10u:780: RV_1,033.07c avādaho diva ā dasyum uccā pra sunvata stuvataḥ śaṃsam āvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:781: RV_1,033.08a cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇaham pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:782: RV_1,033.08c na hinvānāsas titirus ta indram pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:783: RV_1,033.09a pari yad indra rodasī ubhe abubhojīr mahinā viśvataḥ sīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:784: RV_1,033.09c amanyamānāṃ abhi manyamānair nir brahmabhir adhamo dasyum indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:785: RV_1,033.10a na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antam āpur na māyābhir dhanadām paryabhūvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:786: RV_1,033.10c yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaś cakra indro nir jyotiṣā tamaso gā adukṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:787: RV_1,033.11a anu svadhām akṣarann āpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:788: RV_1,033.11c sadhrīcīnena manasā tam indra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhann abhi dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:789: RV_1,033.12a ny āvidhyad ilībiśasya dṛḷhā vi śṛṅgiṇam abhinac chuṣṇam indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:790: RV_1,033.12c yāvat taro maghavan yāvad ojo vajreṇa śatrum avadhīḥ pṛtanyum //
GV01rvh1-10u:791: RV_1,033.13a abhi sidhmo ajigād asya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇā puro 'bhet /
GV01rvh1-10u:792: RV_1,033.13c saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtram indraḥ pra svām matim atirac chāśadānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:793: RV_1,033.14a āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
GV01rvh1-10u:794: RV_1,033.14c śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau //
GV01rvh1-10u:795: RV_1,033.15a āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañ chvitryaṃ gām /
GV01rvh1-10u:796: RV_1,033.15c jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañ chatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:797: RV_1,034.01a triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:798: RV_1,034.01c yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso 'bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:799: RV_1,034.02a trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id viduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:800: RV_1,034.02c traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v aśvinā divā //
GV01rvh1-10u:801: RV_1,034.03a samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:802: RV_1,034.03c trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca pinvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:803: RV_1,034.04a trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvye tredheva śikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:804: RV_1,034.04c trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva pinvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:805: RV_1,034.05a trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir utāvataṃ dhiyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:806: RV_1,034.05c triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre duhitā ruhad ratham //
GV01rvh1-10u:807: RV_1,034.06a trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:808: RV_1,034.06c omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:809: RV_1,034.07a trir no aśvinā yajatā dive-dive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:810: RV_1,034.07c tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:811: RV_1,034.08a trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:812: RV_1,034.08c tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:813: RV_1,034.09a kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:814: RV_1,034.09c kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:815: RV_1,034.10a ā nāsatyā gacchataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:816: RV_1,034.10c yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:817: RV_1,034.11a ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:818: RV_1,034.11c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:819: RV_1,034.12a ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:820: RV_1,034.12c śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:821: RV_1,035.01a hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:822: RV_1,035.01c hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:823: RV_1,035.02a ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:824: RV_1,035.02c hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:825: RV_1,035.03a yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:826: RV_1,035.03c ā devo yāti savitā parāvato 'pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:827: RV_1,035.04a abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:828: RV_1,035.04c āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:829: RV_1,035.05a vi janāñ chyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraugaṃ vahantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:830: RV_1,035.05c śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:831: RV_1,035.06a tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:832: RV_1,035.06c āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat //
GV01rvh1-10u:833: RV_1,035.07a vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:834: RV_1,035.07c kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:835: RV_1,035.08a aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:836: RV_1,035.08c hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:837: RV_1,035.09a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:838: RV_1,035.09c apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti //
GV01rvh1-10u:839: RV_1,035.10a hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ /
GV01rvh1-10u:840: RV_1,035.10c apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānān asthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:841: RV_1,035.11a ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:842: RV_1,035.11c tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva //
GV01rvh1-10u:843: RV_1,036.01a pra vo yahvam purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:844: RV_1,036.01c agniṃ sūktebhir vacobhir īmahe yaṃ sīm id anya īḷate //
GV01rvh1-10u:845: RV_1,036.02a janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te /
GV01rvh1-10u:846: RV_1,036.02c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya //
GV01rvh1-10u:847: RV_1,036.03a pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:848: RV_1,036.03c mahas te sato vi caranty arcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:849: RV_1,036.04a devāsas tvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtam pratnam indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:850: RV_1,036.04c viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yas te dadāśa martyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:851: RV_1,036.05a mandro hotā gṛhapatir agne dūto viśām asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:852: RV_1,036.05c tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata //
GV01rvh1-10u:853: RV_1,036.06a tve id agne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvam ā hūyate haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:854: RV_1,036.06c sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā //
GV01rvh1-10u:855: RV_1,036.07a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:856: RV_1,036.07c hotrābhir agnim manuṣaḥ sam indhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:857: RV_1,036.08a ghnanto vṛtram ataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire /
GV01rvh1-10u:858: RV_1,036.08c bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumny āhutaḥ krandad aśvo gaviṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:859: RV_1,036.09a saṃ sīdasva mahāṃ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:860: RV_1,036.09c vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:861: RV_1,036.10a yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhur iha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana /
GV01rvh1-10u:862: RV_1,036.10c yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithir dhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yam upastutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:863: RV_1,036.11a yam agnim medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:864: RV_1,036.11c tasya preṣo dīdiyus tam imā ṛcas tam agniṃ vardhayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:865: RV_1,036.12a rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo 'sti hi te 'gne deveṣv āpyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:866: RV_1,036.12c tvaṃ vājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahāṃ asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:867: RV_1,036.13a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:868: RV_1,036.13c ūrdhvo vājasya sanitā yad añjibhir vāghadbhir vihvayāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:869: RV_1,036.14a ūrdhvo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha /
GV01rvh1-10u:870: RV_1,036.14c kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñ carathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:871: RV_1,036.15a pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrter arāvṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:872: RV_1,036.15c pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:873: RV_1,036.16a ghaneva viṣvag vi jahy arāvṇas tapurjambha yo asmadhruk /
GV01rvh1-10u:874: RV_1,036.16c yo martyaḥ śiśīte aty aktubhir mā naḥ sa ripur īśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:875: RV_1,036.17a agnir vavne suvīryam agniḥ kaṇvāya saubhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:876: RV_1,036.17c agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithim agniḥ sātā upastutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:877: RV_1,036.18a agninā turvaśaṃ yadum parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:878: RV_1,036.18c agnir nayan navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:879: RV_1,036.19a ni tvām agne manur dadhe jyotir janāya śaśvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:880: RV_1,036.19c dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:881: RV_1,036.20a tveṣāso agner amavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:882: RV_1,036.20c rakṣasvinaḥ sadam id yātumāvato viśvaṃ sam atriṇaṃ daha //
GV01rvh1-10u:883: RV_1,037.01a krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutam anarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham /
GV01rvh1-10u:885: RV_1,037.02a ye pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sākaṃ vāśībhir añjibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:887: RV_1,037.03a iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān /
GV01rvh1-10u:889: RV_1,037.04a pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:891: RV_1,037.05a pra śaṃsā goṣv aghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yac chardho mārutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:893: RV_1,037.06a ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaś ca gmaś ca dhūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:894: RV_1,037.06c yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha //
GV01rvh1-10u:895: RV_1,037.07a ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:897: RV_1,037.08a yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:899: RV_1,037.09a sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave /
GV01rvh1-10u:900: RV_1,037.09c yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:901: RV_1,037.10a ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata /
GV01rvh1-10u:903: RV_1,037.11a tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram /
GV01rvh1-10u:905: RV_1,037.12a maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:907: RV_1,037.13a yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate 'dhvann ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:909: RV_1,037.14a pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:911: RV_1,037.15a asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:913: RV_1,038.01a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:915: RV_1,038.02a kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:916: RV_1,038.02c kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:917: RV_1,038.03a kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:919: RV_1,038.04a yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:921: RV_1,038.05a mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:923: RV_1,038.06a mo ṣu ṇaḥ parā-parā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:925: RV_1,038.07a satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:927: RV_1,038.08a vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti /
GV01rvh1-10u:929: RV_1,038.09a divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena /
GV01rvh1-10u:931: RV_1,038.10a adha svanān marutāṃ viśvam ā sadma pārthivam /
GV01rvh1-10u:933: RV_1,038.11a maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:935: RV_1,038.12a sthirā vaḥ santu nemayo rathā aśvāsa eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:937: RV_1,038.13a acchā vadā tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:939: RV_1,038.14a mimīhi ślokam āsye parjanya iva tatanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:941: RV_1,038.15a vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:943: RV_1,039.01a pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:944: RV_1,039.01c kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kaṃ yātha kaṃ ha dhūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:945: RV_1,039.02a sthirā vaḥ santv āyudhā parāṇude vīḷū uta pratiṣkabhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:946: RV_1,039.02c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:947: RV_1,039.03a parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru /
GV01rvh1-10u:948: RV_1,039.03c vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:949: RV_1,039.04a nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:950: RV_1,039.04c yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:951: RV_1,039.05a pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn /
GV01rvh1-10u:952: RV_1,039.05c pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā //
GV01rvh1-10u:953: RV_1,039.06a upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:954: RV_1,039.06c ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:955: RV_1,039.07a ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:956: RV_1,039.07c gantā nūnaṃ no 'vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:957: RV_1,039.08a yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:958: RV_1,039.08c vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:959: RV_1,039.09a asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:960: RV_1,039.09c asāmibhir maruta ā na ūtibhir gantā vṛṣṭiṃ na vidyutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:961: RV_1,039.10a asāmy ojo bibhṛthā sudānavo 'sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:962: RV_1,039.10c ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:963: RV_1,040.01a ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantas tvemahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:964: RV_1,040.01c upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūr bhavā sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:965: RV_1,040.02a tvām id dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite /
GV01rvh1-10u:966: RV_1,040.02c suvīryam maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake //
GV01rvh1-10u:967: RV_1,040.03a praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devy etu sūnṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:968: RV_1,040.03c acchā vīraṃ naryam paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:969: RV_1,040.04a yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:970: RV_1,040.04c tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrām ā yajāmahe supratūrtim anehasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:971: RV_1,040.05a pra nūnam brahmaṇas patir mantraṃ vadaty ukthyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:972: RV_1,040.05c yasminn indro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire //
GV01rvh1-10u:973: RV_1,040.06a tam id vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvam mantraṃ devā anehasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:974: RV_1,040.06c imāṃ ca vācam pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:975: RV_1,040.07a ko devayantam aśnavaj janaṃ ko vṛktabarhiṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:976: RV_1,040.07c pra-pra dāśvān pastyābhir asthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:977: RV_1,040.08a upa kṣatram pṛñcīta hanti rājabhir bhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:978: RV_1,040.08c nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:979: RV_1,041.01a yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:980: RV_1,041.01c nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:981: RV_1,041.02a yam bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:983: RV_1,041.03a vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:985: RV_1,041.04a sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate /
GV01rvh1-10u:987: RV_1,041.05a yaṃ yajñaṃ nayathā nara ādityā ṛjunā pathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:988: RV_1,041.05c pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:989: RV_1,041.06a sa ratnam martyo vasu viśvaṃ tokam uta tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:991: RV_1,041.07a kathā rādhāma sakhāya stomam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:993: RV_1,041.08a mā vo ghnantam mā śapantam prati voce devayantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:994: RV_1,041.08c sumnair id va ā vivāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:995: RV_1,041.09a caturaś cid dadamānād bibhīyād ā nidhātoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:997: RV_1,042.01a sam pūṣann adhvanas tira vy aṃho vimuco napāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:998: RV_1,042.01c sakṣvā deva pra ṇas puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:999: RV_1,042.02a yo naḥ pūṣann agho vṛko duḥśeva ādideśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1000: RV_1,042.02c apa sma tam patho jahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1001: RV_1,042.03a apa tyam paripanthinam muṣīvāṇaṃ huraścitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1003: RV_1,042.04a tvaṃ tasya dvayāvino 'ghaśaṃsasya kasya cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:1005: RV_1,042.05a ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ pūṣann avo vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1009: RV_1,042.07a ati naḥ saścato naya sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1011: RV_1,042.08a abhi sūyavasaṃ naya na navajvāro adhvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:1013: RV_1,042.09a śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsy udaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:1015: RV_1,042.10a na pūṣaṇam methāmasi sūktair abhi gṛṇīmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1017: RV_1,043.01a kad rudrāya pracetase mīḷhuṣṭamāya tavyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:1019: RV_1,043.02a yathā no aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyo yathā gave /
GV01rvh1-10u:1021: RV_1,043.03a yathā no mitro varuṇo yathā rudraś ciketati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1025: RV_1,043.05a yaḥ śukra iva sūryo hiraṇyam iva rocate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1027: RV_1,043.06a śaṃ naḥ karaty arvate sugam meṣāya meṣye /
GV01rvh1-10u:1029: RV_1,043.07a asme soma śriyam adhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1031: RV_1,043.08a mā naḥ somaparibādho mārātayo juhuranta /
GV01rvh1-10u:1032: RV_1,043.08c ā na indo vāje bhaja //
GV01rvh1-10u:1033: RV_1,043.09a yās te prajā amṛtasya parasmin dhāmann ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1034: RV_1,043.09c mūrdhā nābhā soma vena ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1035: RV_1,044.01a agne vivasvad uṣasaś citraṃ rādho amartya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1036: RV_1,044.01c ā dāśuṣe jātavedo vahā tvam adyā devāṃ uṣarbudhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1037: RV_1,044.02a juṣṭo hi dūto asi havyavāhano 'gne rathīr adhvarāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1038: RV_1,044.02c sajūr aśvibhyām uṣasā suvīryam asme dhehi śravo bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1039: RV_1,044.03a adyā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe vasum agnim purupriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1040: RV_1,044.03c dhūmaketum bhāṛjīkaṃ vyuṣṭiṣu yajñānām adhvaraśriyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1041: RV_1,044.04a śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭham atithiṃ svāhutaṃ juṣṭaṃ janāya dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1042: RV_1,044.04c devāṃ acchā yātave jātavedasam agnim īḷe vyuṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1043: RV_1,044.05a staviṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ viśvasyāmṛta bhojana /
GV01rvh1-10u:1044: RV_1,044.05c agne trātāram amṛtam miyedhya yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana //
GV01rvh1-10u:1045: RV_1,044.06a suśaṃso bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1046: RV_1,044.06c praskaṇvasya pratirann āyur jīvase namasyā daivyaṃ janam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1047: RV_1,044.07a hotāraṃ viśvavedasaṃ saṃ hi tvā viśa indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1048: RV_1,044.07c sa ā vaha puruhūta pracetaso 'gne devāṃ iha dravat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1049: RV_1,044.08a savitāram uṣasam aśvinā bhagam agniṃ vyuṣṭiṣu kṣapaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1050: RV_1,044.08c kaṇvāsas tvā sutasomāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ svadhvara //
GV01rvh1-10u:1051: RV_1,044.09a patir hy adhvarāṇām agne dūto viśām asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1052: RV_1,044.09c uṣarbudha ā vaha somapītaye devāṃ adya svardṛśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1053: RV_1,044.10a agne pūrvā anūṣaso vibhāvaso dīdetha viśvadarśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1054: RV_1,044.10c asi grāmeṣv avitā purohito 'si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1055: RV_1,044.11a ni tvā yajñasya sādhanam agne hotāram ṛtvijam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1056: RV_1,044.11c manuṣvad deva dhīmahi pracetasaṃ jīraṃ dūtam amartyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1057: RV_1,044.12a yad devānām mitramahaḥ purohito 'ntaro yāsi dūtyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1058: RV_1,044.12c sindhor iva prasvanitāsa ūrmayo 'gner bhrājante arcayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1059: RV_1,044.13a śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhir devair agne sayāvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1060: RV_1,044.13c ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:1061: RV_1,044.14a śṛṇvantu stomam marutaḥ sudānavo 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1062: RV_1,044.14c pibatu somaṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrato 'śvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1063: RV_1,045.01a tvam agne vasūṃr iha rudrāṃ ādityāṃ uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:1064: RV_1,045.01c yajā svadhvaraṃ janam manujātaṃ ghṛtapruṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1065: RV_1,045.02a śruṣṭīvāno hi dāśuṣe devā agne vicetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1066: RV_1,045.02c tān rohidaśva girvaṇas trayastriṃśatam ā vaha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1068: RV_1,045.03c aṅgirasvan mahivrata praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1070: RV_1,045.04c rājantam adhvarāṇām agniṃ śukreṇa śociṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1071: RV_1,045.05a ghṛtāhavana santyemā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1072: RV_1,045.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavo havante 'vase tvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1073: RV_1,045.06a tvāṃ citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1075: RV_1,045.07a ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijaṃ dadhire vasuvittamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1076: RV_1,045.07c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ viprā agne diviṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1077: RV_1,045.08a ā tvā viprā acucyavuḥ sutasomā abhi prayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1078: RV_1,045.08c bṛhad bhā bibhrato havir agne martāya dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1080: RV_1,045.09c ihādya daivyaṃ janam barhir ā sādayā vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:1081: RV_1,045.10a arvāñcaṃ daivyaṃ janam agne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1082: RV_1,045.10c ayaṃ somaḥ sudānavas tam pāta tiroahnyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1083: RV_1,046.01a eṣo uṣā apūrvyā vy ucchati priyā divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1085: RV_1,046.02a yā dasrā sindhumātarā manotarā rayīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1087: RV_1,046.03a vacyante vāṃ kakuhāso jūrṇāyām adhi viṣṭapi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1088: RV_1,046.03c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1089: RV_1,046.04a haviṣā jāro apām piparti papurir narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1091: RV_1,046.05a ādāro vām matīnāṃ nāsatyā matavacasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1093: RV_1,046.06a yā naḥ pīparad aśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamas tiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1095: RV_1,046.07a ā no nāvā matīnāṃ yātam pārāya gantave /
GV01rvh1-10u:1097: RV_1,046.08a aritraṃ vāṃ divas pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnāṃ rathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1099: RV_1,046.09a divas kaṇvāsa indavo vasu sindhūnām pade /
GV01rvh1-10u:1101: RV_1,046.10a abhūd u bhā u aṃśave hiraṇyam prati sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1103: RV_1,046.11a abhūd u pāram etave panthā ṛtasya sādhuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1105: RV_1,046.12a tat-tad id aśvinor avo jaritā prati bhūṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1107: RV_1,046.13a vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1109: RV_1,046.14a yuvor uṣā anu śriyam parijmanor upācarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1111: RV_1,046.15a ubhā pibatam aśvinobhā naḥ śarma yacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1113: RV_1,047.01a ayaṃ vām madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1114: RV_1,047.01c tam aśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1115: RV_1,047.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1116: RV_1,047.02c kaṇvāso vām brahma kṛṇvanty adhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1117: RV_1,047.03a aśvinā madhumattamam pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1118: RV_1,047.03c athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1119: RV_1,047.04a triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñam mimikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1120: RV_1,047.04c kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1121: RV_1,047.05a yābhiḥ kaṇvam abhiṣṭibhiḥ prāvataṃ yuvam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1122: RV_1,047.05c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ avataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1123: RV_1,047.06a sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1124: RV_1,047.06c rayiṃ samudrād uta vā divas pary asme dhattam puruspṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:1125: RV_1,047.07a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1126: RV_1,047.07c ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1127: RV_1,047.08a arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:1128: RV_1,047.08c iṣam pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1129: RV_1,047.09a tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1130: RV_1,047.09c yena śaśvad ūhathur dāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:1131: RV_1,047.10a ukthebhir arvāg avase purūvasū arkaiś ca ni hvayāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1132: RV_1,047.10c śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somam papathur aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1133: RV_1,048.01a saha vāmena na uṣo vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1134: RV_1,048.01c saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1135: RV_1,048.02a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvasuvido bhūri cyavanta vastave /
GV01rvh1-10u:1136: RV_1,048.02c ud īraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaś coda rādho maghonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1137: RV_1,048.03a uvāsoṣā ucchāc ca nu devī jīrā rathānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1138: RV_1,048.03c ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1139: RV_1,048.04a uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1140: RV_1,048.04c atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1141: RV_1,048.05a ā ghā yoṣeva sūnary uṣā yāti prabhuñjatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1142: RV_1,048.05c jarayantī vṛjanam padvad īyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1143: RV_1,048.06a vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vy arthinaḥ padaṃ na vety odatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1144: RV_1,048.06c vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1146: RV_1,048.07c śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yāty abhi mānuṣān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1147: RV_1,048.08a viśvam asyā nānāma cakṣase jagaj jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1148: RV_1,048.08c apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1149: RV_1,048.09a uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1150: RV_1,048.09c āvahantī bhūry asmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyucchantī diviṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1151: RV_1,048.10a viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yad ucchasi sūnari /
GV01rvh1-10u:1152: RV_1,048.10c sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1153: RV_1,048.11a uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaś citro mānuṣe jane /
GV01rvh1-10u:1154: RV_1,048.11c tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarāṃ upa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1155: RV_1,048.12a viśvān devāṃ ā vaha somapītaye 'ntarikṣād uṣas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1156: RV_1,048.12c sāsmāsu dhā gomad aśvāvad ukthyam uṣo vājaṃ suvīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1157: RV_1,048.13a yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1158: RV_1,048.13c sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasam uṣā dadātu sugmyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1159: RV_1,048.14a ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre 'vase mahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1160: RV_1,048.14c sā na stomāṃ abhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1161: RV_1,048.15a uṣo yad adya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1162: RV_1,048.15c pra no yacchatād avṛkam pṛthu cchardiḥ pra devi gomatīr iṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1163: RV_1,048.16a saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā sam iḷābhir ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1164: RV_1,048.16c saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājair vājinīvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1165: RV_1,049.01a uṣo bhadrebhir ā gahi divaś cid rocanād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1166: RV_1,049.01c vahantv aruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:1167: RV_1,049.02a supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yam adhyasthā uṣas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1168: RV_1,049.02c tenā suśravasaṃ janam prāvādya duhitar divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1169: RV_1,049.03a vayaś cit te patatriṇo dvipac catuṣpad arjuni /
GV01rvh1-10u:1170: RV_1,049.03c uṣaḥ prārann ṛtūṃr anu divo antebhyas pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:1171: RV_1,049.04a vyucchantī hi raśmibhir viśvam ābhāsi rocanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1172: RV_1,049.04c tāṃ tvām uṣar vasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:1173: RV_1,050.01a ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1175: RV_1,050.02a apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yanty aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1177: RV_1,050.03a adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1179: RV_1,050.04a taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1181: RV_1,050.05a pratyaṅ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ ud eṣi mānuṣān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1183: RV_1,050.06a yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1185: RV_1,050.07a vi dyām eṣi rajas pṛthv ahā mimāno aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1187: RV_1,050.08a sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1189: RV_1,050.09a ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1191: RV_1,050.10a ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:1192: RV_1,050.10c devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1193: RV_1,050.11a udyann adya mitramaha ārohann uttarāṃ divam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1194: RV_1,050.11c hṛdrogam mama sūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1195: RV_1,050.12a śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1196: RV_1,050.12c atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1197: RV_1,050.13a ud agād ayam ādityo viśvena sahasā saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:1198: RV_1,050.13c dviṣantam mahyaṃ randhayan mo ahaṃ dviṣate radham //
GV01rvh1-10u:1199: RV_1,051.01a abhi tyam meṣam puruhūtam ṛgmiyam indraṃ gīrbhir madatā vasvo arṇavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1200: RV_1,051.01c yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭham abhi vipram arcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:1201: RV_1,051.02a abhīm avanvan svabhiṣṭim ūtayo 'ntarikṣaprāṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1202: RV_1,051.02c indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī sūnṛtāruhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1203: RV_1,051.03a tvaṃ gotram aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apotātraye śatadureṣu gātuvit /
GV01rvh1-10u:1204: RV_1,051.03c sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasv ājāv adriṃ vāvasānasya nartayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1205: RV_1,051.04a tvam apām apidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1206: RV_1,051.04c vṛtraṃ yad indra śavasāvadhīr ahim ād it sūryaṃ divy ārohayo dṛśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1207: RV_1,051.05a tvam māyābhir apa māyino 'dhamaḥ svadhābhir ye adhi śuptāv ajuhvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1208: RV_1,051.05c tvam pipror nṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣv āvitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1209: RV_1,051.06a tvaṃ kutsaṃ śuṣṇahatyeṣv āvithārandhayo 'tithigvāya śambaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:1210: RV_1,051.06c mahāntaṃ cid arbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanād eva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1211: RV_1,051.07a tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1212: RV_1,051.07c tava vajraś cikite bāhvor hito vṛścā śatror ava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1213: RV_1,051.08a vi jānīhy āryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsad avratān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1214: RV_1,051.08c śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana //
GV01rvh1-10u:1215: RV_1,051.09a anuvratāya randhayann apavratān ābhūbhir indraḥ śnathayann anābhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1216: RV_1,051.09c vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyām inakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna saṃdihaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1217: RV_1,051.10a takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1218: RV_1,051.10c ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇam avahann abhi śravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1219: RV_1,051.11a mandiṣṭa yad uśane kāvye sacāṃ indro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1220: RV_1,051.11c ugro yayiṃ nir apaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1221: RV_1,051.12a ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtā yeṣu mandase /
GV01rvh1-10u:1222: RV_1,051.12c indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano 'narvāṇaṃ ślokam ā rohase divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1223: RV_1,051.13a adadā arbhām mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayām indra sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1224: RV_1,051.13c menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1225: RV_1,051.14a indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1226: RV_1,051.14c aśvayur gavyū rathayur vasūyur indra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1227: RV_1,051.15a idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci /
GV01rvh1-10u:1228: RV_1,051.15c asminn indra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhis tava śarman syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1229: RV_1,052.01a tyaṃ su meṣam mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākam īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1230: RV_1,052.01c atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ ratham endraṃ vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1231: RV_1,052.02a sa parvato na dharuṇeṣv acyutaḥ sahasramūtis taviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1232: RV_1,052.02c indro yad vṛtram avadhīn nadīvṛtam ubjann arṇāṃsi jarhṛṣāṇo andhasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1233: RV_1,052.03a sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1234: RV_1,052.03c indraṃ tam ahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprir andhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1235: RV_1,052.04a ā yam pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā abhiṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1236: RV_1,052.04c taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthur ūtayaḥ śuṣmā indram avātā ahrutapsavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1237: RV_1,052.05a abhi svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyato raghvīr iva pravaṇe sasrur ūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1238: RV_1,052.05c indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīṃr iva tritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1239: RV_1,052.06a parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo 'po vṛtvī rajaso budhnam āśayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1240: RV_1,052.06c vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvor indra tanyatum //
GV01rvh1-10u:1241: RV_1,052.07a hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣanty ūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni vardhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1242: RV_1,052.07c tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavas tatakṣa vajram abhibhūtyojasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1243: RV_1,052.08a jaghanvāṃ u haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratav indra vṛtram manuṣe gātuyann apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1244: RV_1,052.08c ayacchathā bāhvor vajram āyasam adhārayo divy ā sūryaṃ dṛśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1245: RV_1,052.09a bṛhat svaścandram amavad yad ukthyam akṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1246: RV_1,052.09c yan mānuṣapradhanā indram ūtayaḥ svar nṛṣāco maruto 'madann anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1247: RV_1,052.10a dyauś cid asyāmavāṃ aheḥ svanād ayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra te /
GV01rvh1-10u:1248: RV_1,052.10c vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinac chiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1249: RV_1,052.11a yad in nv indra pṛthivī daśabhujir ahāni viśvā tatananta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1250: RV_1,052.11c atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyām anu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1251: RV_1,052.12a tvam asya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1252: RV_1,052.12c cakṛṣe bhūmim pratimānam ojaso 'paḥ svaḥ paribhūr eṣy ā divam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1253: RV_1,052.13a tvam bhuvaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patir bhūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1254: RV_1,052.13c viśvam āprā antarikṣam mahitvā satyam addhā nakir anyas tvāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1255: RV_1,052.14a na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1256: RV_1,052.14c nota svavṛṣṭim made asya yudhyata eko anyac cakṛṣe viśvam ānuṣak //
GV01rvh1-10u:1257: RV_1,052.15a ārcann atra marutaḥ sasminn ājau viśve devāso amadann anu tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1258: RV_1,052.15c vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvam indra praty ānaṃ jaghantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1259: RV_1,053.01a ny ū ṣu vācam pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1260: RV_1,053.01c nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatām ivāvidan na duṣṭutir draviṇodeṣu śasyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1261: RV_1,053.02a duro aśvasya dura indra gor asi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1262: RV_1,053.02c śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyas tam idaṃ gṛṇīmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1263: RV_1,053.03a śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama taved idam abhitaś cekite vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1264: RV_1,053.03c ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmam ūnayīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1265: RV_1,053.04a ebhir dyubhiḥ sumanā ebhir indubhir nirundhāno amatiṃ gobhir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1266: RV_1,053.04c indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhir yutadveṣasaḥ sam iṣā rabhemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1267: RV_1,053.05a sam indra rāyā sam iṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrair abhidyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1268: RV_1,053.05c saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1269: RV_1,053.06a te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1270: RV_1,053.06c yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇy aprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1271: RV_1,053.07a yudhā yudham upa ghed eṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ sam idaṃ haṃsy ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1272: RV_1,053.07c namyā yad indra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1273: RV_1,053.08a tvaṃ karañjam uta parṇayaṃ vadhīs tejiṣṭhayātithigvasya vartanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1274: RV_1,053.08c tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1275: RV_1,053.09a tvam etāñ janarājño dvir daśābandhunā suśravasopajagmuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1276: RV_1,053.09c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak //
GV01rvh1-10u:1277: RV_1,053.10a tvam āvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhis tava trāmabhir indra tūrvayāṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1278: RV_1,053.10c tvam asmai kutsam atithigvam āyum mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1279: RV_1,053.11a ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyas te śivatamā asāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:1280: RV_1,053.11c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1281: RV_1,054.01a mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsv aṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1282: RV_1,054.01c akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīr bhiyasā sam ārata //
GV01rvh1-10u:1283: RV_1,054.02a arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantam indram mahayann abhi ṣṭuhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1284: RV_1,054.02c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1285: RV_1,054.03a arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan manaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1286: RV_1,054.03c bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1287: RV_1,054.04a tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo 'va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaram bhinat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1288: RV_1,054.04c yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣac chitāṃ gabhastim aśanim pṛtanyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1289: RV_1,054.05a ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandino roruvad vanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1290: RV_1,054.05c prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yad adyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kas tvā pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:1291: RV_1,054.06a tvam āvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:1292: RV_1,054.06c tvaṃ ratham etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvam puro navatiṃ dambhayo nava //
GV01rvh1-10u:1293: RV_1,054.07a sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvaj jano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsam invati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1294: RV_1,054.07c ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānur asmā uparā pinvate divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1295: RV_1,054.08a asamaṃ kṣatram asamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme /
GV01rvh1-10u:1296: RV_1,054.08c ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:1297: RV_1,054.09a tubhyed ete bahulā adridugdhāś camūṣadaś camasā indrapānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1298: RV_1,054.09c vy aśnuhi tarpayā kāmam eṣām athā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva //
GV01rvh1-10u:1299: RV_1,054.10a apām atiṣṭhad dharuṇahvaraṃ tamo 'ntar vṛtrasya jaṭhareṣu parvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1300: RV_1,054.10c abhīm indro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1301: RV_1,054.11a sa śevṛdham adhi dhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷ indra tavyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1302: RV_1,054.11c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1303: RV_1,055.01a divaś cid asya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivī cana prati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1304: RV_1,055.01c bhīmas tuviṣmāñ carṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1305: RV_1,055.02a so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1306: RV_1,055.02c indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1307: RV_1,055.03a tvaṃ tam indra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇām irajyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1308: RV_1,055.03c pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1309: RV_1,055.04a sa id vane namasyubhir vacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1310: RV_1,055.04c vṛṣā chandur bhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenām maghavā yad invati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1311: RV_1,055.05a sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1312: RV_1,055.05c adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham //
GV01rvh1-10u:1313: RV_1,055.06a sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā vināśayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:1314: RV_1,055.06c jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvann avṛkāṇi yajyave 'va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ sṛjat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1315: RV_1,055.07a dānāya manaḥ somapāvann astu te 'rvāñcā harī vandanaśrud ā kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1316: RV_1,055.07c yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketā ā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1317: RV_1,055.08a aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayor aṣāḷhaṃ sahas tanvi śruto dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1318: RV_1,055.08c āvṛtāso 'vatāso na kartṛbhis tanūṣu te kratava indra bhūrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1319: RV_1,056.01a eṣa pra pūrvīr ava tasya camriṣo 'tyo na yoṣām ud ayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1320: RV_1,056.01c dakṣam mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ ratham āvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1321: RV_1,056.02a taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1322: RV_1,056.02c patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1323: RV_1,056.03a sa turvaṇir mahāṃ areṇu pauṃsye girer bhṛṣṭir na bhrājate tujā śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1324: RV_1,056.03c yena śuṣṇam māyinam āyaso made dudhra ābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani //
GV01rvh1-10u:1325: RV_1,056.04a devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1326: RV_1,056.04c yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇum bṛhad arhariṣvaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1327: RV_1,056.05a vi yat tiro dharuṇam acyutaṃ rajo 'tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsu barhaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1328: RV_1,056.05c svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjo arṇavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1329: RV_1,056.06a tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1330: RV_1,056.06c tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ //
