GV01rvh1-10u:1331: RV_1,057.01a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matim bhare /
GV01rvh1-10u:1332: RV_1,057.01c apām iva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyu śavase apāvṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1333: RV_1,057.02a adha te viśvam anu hāsad iṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1334: RV_1,057.02c yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1335: RV_1,057.03a asmai bhīmāya namasā sam adhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharā panīyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:1336: RV_1,057.03c yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotir akāri harito nāyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:1337: RV_1,057.04a ime ta indra te vayam puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:1338: RV_1,057.04c nahi tvad anyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīr iva prati no harya tad vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1339: RV_1,057.05a bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasy asya stotur maghavan kāmam ā pṛṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:1340: RV_1,057.05c anu te dyaur bṛhatī vīryam mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase //
GV01rvh1-10u:1341: RV_1,057.06a tvaṃ tam indra parvatam mahām uruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaś cakartitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:1342: RV_1,057.06c avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1343: RV_1,058.01a nū cit sahojā amṛto ni tundate hotā yad dūto abhavad vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1344: RV_1,058.01c vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhī rajo mama ā devatātā haviṣā vivāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1345: RV_1,058.02a ā svam adma yuvamāno ajaras tṛṣv aviṣyann ataseṣu tiṣṭhati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1346: RV_1,058.02c atyo na pṛṣṭham pruṣitasya rocate divo na sānu stanayann acikradat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1347: RV_1,058.03a krāṇā rudrebhir vasubhiḥ purohito hotā niṣatto rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1348: RV_1,058.03c ratho na vikṣv ṛñjasāna āyuṣu vy ānuṣag vāryā deva ṛṇvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1349: RV_1,058.04a vi vātajūto ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1350: RV_1,058.04c tṛṣu yad agne vanino vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśadūrme ajara //
GV01rvh1-10u:1351: RV_1,058.05a tapurjambho vana ā vātacodito yūthe na sāhvāṃ ava vāti vaṃsagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1352: RV_1,058.05c abhivrajann akṣitam pājasā raja sthātuś caratham bhayate patatriṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1353: RV_1,058.06a dadhuṣ ṭvā bhṛgavo mānuṣeṣv ā rayiṃ na cāruṃ suhavaṃ janebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1354: RV_1,058.06c hotāram agne atithiṃ vareṇyam mitraṃ na śevaṃ divyāya janmane //
GV01rvh1-10u:1355: RV_1,058.07a hotāraṃ sapta juhvo yajiṣṭhaṃ yaṃ vāghato vṛṇate adhvareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1356: RV_1,058.07c agniṃ viśveṣām aratiṃ vasūnāṃ saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1357: RV_1,058.08a acchidrā sūno sahaso no adya stotṛbhyo mitramahaḥ śarma yaccha /
GV01rvh1-10u:1358: RV_1,058.08c agne gṛṇantam aṃhasa uruṣyorjo napāt pūrbhir āyasībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1359: RV_1,058.09a bhavā varūthaṃ gṛṇate vibhāvo bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥ śarma /
GV01rvh1-10u:1360: RV_1,058.09c uruṣyāgne aṃhaso gṛṇantam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1361: RV_1,059.01a vayā id agne agnayas te anye tve viśve amṛtā mādayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:1362: RV_1,059.01c vaiśvānara nābhir asi kṣitīnāṃ sthūṇeva janāṃ upamid yayantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1363: RV_1,059.02a mūrdhā divo nābhir agniḥ pṛthivyā athābhavad aratī rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1364: RV_1,059.02c taṃ tvā devāso 'janayanta devaṃ vaiśvānara jyotir id āryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1365: RV_1,059.03a ā sūrye na raśmayo dhruvāso vaiśvānare dadhire 'gnā vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:1366: RV_1,059.03c yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu yā mānuṣeṣv asi tasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1367: RV_1,059.04a bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giro hotā manuṣyo na dakṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1368: RV_1,059.04c svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīr vaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1369: RV_1,059.05a divaś cit te bṛhato jātavedo vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1370: RV_1,059.05c rājā kṛṣṭīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1371: RV_1,059.06a pra nū mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya vocaṃ yam pūravo vṛtrahaṇaṃ sacante /
GV01rvh1-10u:1372: RV_1,059.06c vaiśvānaro dasyum agnir jaghanvāṃ adhūnot kāṣṭhā ava śambaram bhet //
GV01rvh1-10u:1373: RV_1,059.07a vaiśvānaro mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭir bharadvājeṣu yajato vibhāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1374: RV_1,059.07c śātavaneye śatinībhir agniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1375: RV_1,060.01a vahniṃ yaśasaṃ vidathasya ketuṃ suprāvyaṃ dūtaṃ sadyoartham /
GV01rvh1-10u:1376: RV_1,060.01c dvijanmānaṃ rayim iva praśastaṃ rātim bharad bhṛgave mātariśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1377: RV_1,060.02a asya śāsur ubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmanta uśijo ye ca martāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1378: RV_1,060.02c divaś cit pūrvo ny asādi hotāpṛcchyo viśpatir vikṣu vedhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1379: RV_1,060.03a taṃ navyasī hṛda ā jāyamānam asmat sukīrtir madhujihvam aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1380: RV_1,060.03c yam ṛtvijo vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvanta āyavo jījananta //
GV01rvh1-10u:1381: RV_1,060.04a uśik pāvako vasur mānuṣeṣu vareṇyo hotādhāyi vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1382: RV_1,060.04c damūnā gṛhapatir dama āṃ agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1383: RV_1,060.05a taṃ tvā vayam patim agne rayīṇām pra śaṃsāmo matibhir gotamāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1384: RV_1,060.05c āśuṃ na vājambharam marjayantaḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1385: RV_1,061.01a asmā id u pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomam māhināya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1386: RV_1,061.01c ṛcīṣamāyādhrigava oham indrāya brahmāṇi rātatamā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1387: RV_1,061.02a asmā id u praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmy āṅgūṣam bādhe suvṛkti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1388: RV_1,061.02c indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyo marjayanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:1389: RV_1,061.03a asmā id u tyam upamaṃ svarṣām bharāmy āṅgūṣam āsyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:1390: RV_1,061.03c maṃhiṣṭham acchoktibhir matīnāṃ suvṛktibhiḥ sūriṃ vāvṛdhadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1391: RV_1,061.04a asmā id u stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1392: RV_1,061.04c giraś ca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvam medhirāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1393: RV_1,061.05a asmā id u saptim iva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā sam añje /
GV01rvh1-10u:1394: RV_1,061.05c vīraṃ dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1395: RV_1,061.06a asmā id u tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1396: RV_1,061.06c vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujann īśānas tujatā kiyedhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1397: RV_1,061.07a asyed u mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pitum papivāñ cārv annā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1398: RV_1,061.07c muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhaṃ tiro adrim astā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1399: RV_1,061.08a asmā id u gnāś cid devapatnīr indrāyārkam ahihatya ūvuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1400: RV_1,061.08c pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānam pari ṣṭaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1401: RV_1,061.09a asyed eva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ pary antarikṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:1402: RV_1,061.09c svarāḷ indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svarir amatro vavakṣe raṇāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1403: RV_1,061.10a asyed eva śavasā śuṣantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtram indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1404: RV_1,061.10c gā na vrāṇā avanīr amuñcad abhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1405: RV_1,061.11a asyed u tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīm ayacchat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1406: RV_1,061.11c īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1407: RV_1,061.12a asmā id u pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajram īśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1408: RV_1,061.12c gor na parva vi radā tiraśceṣyann arṇāṃsy apāṃ caradhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1409: RV_1,061.13a asyed u pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1410: RV_1,061.13c yudhe yad iṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:1411: RV_1,061.14a asyed u bhiyā girayaś ca dṛḷhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣas tujete /
GV01rvh1-10u:1412: RV_1,061.14c upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1413: RV_1,061.15a asmā id u tyad anu dāyy eṣām eko yad vavne bhūrer īśānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1414: RV_1,061.15c praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvim āvad indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1415: RV_1,061.16a evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran /
GV01rvh1-10u:1416: RV_1,061.16c aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1417: RV_1,062.01a pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1418: RV_1,062.01c suvṛktibhi stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1419: RV_1,062.02a pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvam āṅgūṣyaṃ śavasānāya sāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:1420: RV_1,062.02c yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1421: RV_1,062.03a indrasyāṅgirasāṃ ceṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim /
GV01rvh1-10u:1422: RV_1,062.03c bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ sam usriyābhir vāvaśanta naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1423: RV_1,062.04a sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇādriṃ svaryo navagvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1424: RV_1,062.04c saraṇyubhiḥ phaligam indra śakra valaṃ raveṇa darayo daśagvaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1425: RV_1,062.05a gṛṇāno aṅgirobhir dasma vi var uṣasā sūryeṇa gobhir andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1426: RV_1,062.05c vi bhūmyā aprathaya indra sānu divo raja uparam astabhāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1427: RV_1,062.06a tad u prayakṣatamam asya karma dasmasya cārutamam asti daṃsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1428: RV_1,062.06c upahvare yad uparā apinvan madhvarṇaso nadyaś catasraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1429: RV_1,062.07a dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhir arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1430: RV_1,062.07c bhago na mene parame vyomann adhārayad rodasī sudaṃsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1431: RV_1,062.08a sanād divam pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhir evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1432: RV_1,062.08c kṛṣṇebhir aktoṣā ruśadbhir vapurbhir ā carato anyānyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1433: RV_1,062.09a sanemi sakhyaṃ svapasyamānaḥ sūnur dādhāra śavasā sudaṃsāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1434: RV_1,062.09c āmāsu cid dadhiṣe pakvam antaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśad rohiṇīṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1435: RV_1,062.10a sanāt sanīḷā avanīr avātā vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1436: RV_1,062.10c purū sahasrā janayo na patnīr duvasyanti svasāro ahrayāṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1437: RV_1,062.11a sanāyuvo namasā navyo arkair vasūyavo matayo dasma dadruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1438: RV_1,062.11c patiṃ na patnīr uśatīr uśantaṃ spṛśanti tvā śavasāvan manīṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1439: RV_1,062.12a sanād eva tava rāyo gabhastau na kṣīyante nopa dasyanti dasma /
GV01rvh1-10u:1440: RV_1,062.12c dyumāṃ asi kratumāṃ indra dhīraḥ śikṣā śacīvas tava naḥ śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1441: RV_1,062.13a sanāyate gotama indra navyam atakṣad brahma hariyojanāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1442: RV_1,062.13c sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1443: RV_1,063.01a tvam mahāṃ indra yo ha śuṣmair dyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivī ame dhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1444: RV_1,063.01c yad dha te viśvā girayaś cid abhvā bhiyā dṛḷhāsaḥ kiraṇā naijan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1445: RV_1,063.02a ā yad dharī indra vivratā ver ā te vajraṃ jaritā bāhvor dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:1446: RV_1,063.02c yenāviharyatakrato amitrān pura iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1447: RV_1,063.03a tvaṃ satya indra dhṛṣṇur etān tvam ṛbhukṣā naryas tvaṃ ṣāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1448: RV_1,063.03c tvaṃ śuṣṇaṃ vṛjane pṛkṣa āṇau yūne kutsāya dyumate sacāhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1449: RV_1,063.04a tvaṃ ha tyad indra codīḥ sakhā vṛtraṃ yad vajrin vṛṣakarmann ubhnāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1450: RV_1,063.04c yad dha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācair vi dasyūṃr yonāv akṛto vṛthāṣāṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1451: RV_1,063.05a tvaṃ ha tyad indrāriṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cin martānām ajuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:1452: RV_1,063.05c vy asmad ā kāṣṭhā arvate var ghaneva vajriñ chnathihy amitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1453: RV_1,063.06a tvāṃ ha tyad indrārṇasātau svarmīḷhe nara ājā havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:1454: RV_1,063.06c tava svadhāva iyam ā samarya ūtir vājeṣv atasāyyā bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1455: RV_1,063.07a tvaṃ ha tyad indra sapta yudhyan puro vajrin purukutsāya dardaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1456: RV_1,063.07c barhir na yat sudāse vṛthā varg aṃho rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1457: RV_1,063.08a tvaṃ tyāṃ na indra deva citrām iṣam āpo na pīpayaḥ parijman /
GV01rvh1-10u:1458: RV_1,063.08c yayā śūra praty asmabhyaṃ yaṃsi tmanam ūrjaṃ na viśvadha kṣaradhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1459: RV_1,063.09a akāri ta indra gotamebhir brahmāṇy oktā namasā haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1460: RV_1,063.09c supeśasaṃ vājam ā bharā naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1461: RV_1,064.01a vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktim pra bharā marudbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1462: RV_1,064.01c apo na dhīro manasā suhastyo giraḥ sam añje vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1463: RV_1,064.02a te jajñire diva ṛṣvāsa ukṣaṇo rudrasya maryā asurā arepasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1464: RV_1,064.02c pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryā iva satvāno na drapsino ghoravarpasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1465: RV_1,064.03a yuvāno rudrā ajarā abhogghano vavakṣur adhrigāvaḥ parvatā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:1466: RV_1,064.03c dṛḷhā cid viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayanti divyāni majmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1467: RV_1,064.04a citrair añjibhir vapuṣe vy añjate vakṣassu rukmāṃ adhi yetire śubhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1468: RV_1,064.04c aṃseṣv eṣāṃ ni mimṛkṣur ṛṣṭayaḥ sākaṃ jajñire svadhayā divo naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1469: RV_1,064.05a īśānakṛto dhunayo riśādaso vātān vidyutas taviṣībhir akrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1470: RV_1,064.05c duhanty ūdhar divyāni dhūtayo bhūmim pinvanti payasā parijrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1471: RV_1,064.06a pinvanty apo marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payo ghṛtavad vidatheṣv ābhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1472: RV_1,064.06c atyaṃ na mihe vi nayanti vājinam utsaṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1473: RV_1,064.07a mahiṣāso māyinaś citrabhānavo girayo na svatavaso raghuṣyadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1474: RV_1,064.07c mṛgā iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā yad āruṇīṣu taviṣīr ayugdhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1475: RV_1,064.08a siṃhā iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśā iva supiśo viśvavedasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1476: RV_1,064.08c kṣapo jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ sam it sabādhaḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1477: RV_1,064.09a rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyo nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1478: RV_1,064.09c ā vandhureṣv amatir na darśatā vidyun na tasthau maruto ratheṣu vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1479: RV_1,064.10a viśvavedaso rayibhiḥ samokasaḥ sammiślāsas taviṣībhir virapśinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1480: RV_1,064.10c astāra iṣuṃ dadhire gabhastyor anantaśuṣmā vṛṣakhādayo naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1481: RV_1,064.11a hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdha ujjighnanta āpathyo na parvatān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1482: RV_1,064.11c makhā ayāsaḥ svasṛto dhruvacyuto dudhrakṛto maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1483: RV_1,064.12a ghṛṣum pāvakaṃ vaninaṃ vicarṣaṇiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā gṛṇīmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1484: RV_1,064.12c rajasturaṃ tavasam mārutaṃ gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ saścata śriye //
GV01rvh1-10u:1485: RV_1,064.13a pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janāṃ ati tasthau va ūtī maruto yam āvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1486: RV_1,064.13c arvadbhir vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhir āpṛcchyaṃ kratum ā kṣeti puṣyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1487: RV_1,064.14a carkṛtyam marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ dyumantaṃ śuṣmam maghavatsu dhattana /
GV01rvh1-10u:1488: RV_1,064.14c dhanaspṛtam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ tokam puṣyema tanayaṃ śataṃ himāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1489: RV_1,064.15a nū ṣṭhiram maruto vīravantam ṛtīṣāhaṃ rayim asmāsu dhatta /
GV01rvh1-10u:1490: RV_1,064.15c sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ śūśuvāṃsam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1491: RV_1,065.01 paśvā na tāyuṃ guhā catantaṃ namo yujānaṃ namo vahantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1492: RV_1,065.02 sajoṣā dhīrāḥ padair anu gmann upa tvā sīdan viśve yajatrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1493: RV_1,065.03 ṛtasya devā anu vratā gur bhuvat pariṣṭir dyaur na bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1494: RV_1,065.04 vardhantīm āpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1495: RV_1,065.05 puṣṭir na raṇvā kṣitir na pṛthvī girir na bhujma kṣodo na śambhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1496: RV_1,065.06 atyo nājman sargaprataktaḥ sindhur na kṣodaḥ ka īṃ varāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:1497: RV_1,065.07 jāmiḥ sindhūnām bhrāteva svasrām ibhyān na rājā vanāny atti //
GV01rvh1-10u:1498: RV_1,065.08 yad vātajūto vanā vy asthād agnir ha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1499: RV_1,065.09 śvasity apsu haṃso na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭho viśām uṣarbhut //
GV01rvh1-10u:1500: RV_1,065.10 somo na vedhā ṛtaprajātaḥ paśur na śiśvā vibhur dūrebhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1501: RV_1,066.01 rayir na citrā sūro na saṃdṛg āyur na prāṇo nityo na sūnuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1502: RV_1,066.02 takvā na bhūrṇir vanā siṣakti payo na dhenuḥ śucir vibhāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1503: RV_1,066.03 dādhāra kṣemam oko na raṇvo yavo na pakvo jetā janānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1504: RV_1,066.04 ṛṣir na stubhvā vikṣu praśasto vājī na prīto vayo dadhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:1505: RV_1,066.05 durokaśociḥ kratur na nityo jāyeva yonāv araṃ viśvasmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1506: RV_1,066.06 citro yad abhrāṭ chveto na vikṣu ratho na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1507: RV_1,066.07 seneva sṛṣṭāmaṃ dadhāty astur na didyut tveṣapratīkā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1508: RV_1,066.08 yamo ha jāto yamo janitvaṃ jāraḥ kanīnām patir janīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1509: RV_1,066.09 taṃ vaś carāthā vayaṃ vasatyāstaṃ na gāvo nakṣanta iddham //
GV01rvh1-10u:1510: RV_1,066.10 sindhur na kṣodaḥ pra nīcīr ainon navanta gāvaḥ svar dṛśīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:1511: RV_1,067.01 vaneṣu jāyur marteṣu mitro vṛṇīte śruṣṭiṃ rājevājuryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1512: RV_1,067.02 kṣemo na sādhuḥ kratur na bhadro bhuvat svādhīr hotā havyavāṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1513: RV_1,067.03 haste dadhāno nṛmṇā viśvāny ame devān dhād guhā niṣīdan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1514: RV_1,067.04 vidantīm atra naro dhiyandhā hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrāṃ aśaṃsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1515: RV_1,067.05 ajo na kṣāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ tastambha dyām mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1516: RV_1,067.06 priyā padāni paśvo ni pāhi viśvāyur agne guhā guhaṃ gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1517: RV_1,067.07 ya īṃ ciketa guhā bhavantam ā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1518: RV_1,067.08 vi ye cṛtanty ṛtā sapanta ād id vasūni pra vavācāsmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1519: RV_1,067.09 vi yo vīrutsu rodhan mahitvota prajā uta prasūṣv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1520: RV_1,067.10 cittir apāṃ dame viśvāyuḥ sadmeva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1521: RV_1,068.01 śrīṇann upa sthād divam bhuraṇyu sthātuś caratham aktūn vy ūrṇot //
GV01rvh1-10u:1522: RV_1,068.02 pari yad eṣām eko viśveṣām bhuvad devo devānām mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1523: RV_1,068.03 ād it te viśve kratuṃ juṣanta śuṣkād yad deva jīvo janiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1524: RV_1,068.04 bhajanta viśve devatvaṃ nāma ṛtaṃ sapanto amṛtam evaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1525: RV_1,068.05 ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītir viśvāyur viśve apāṃsi cakruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1526: RV_1,068.06 yas tubhyaṃ dāśād yo vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvān rayiṃ dayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:1527: RV_1,068.07 hotā niṣatto manor apatye sa cin nv āsām patī rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1528: RV_1,068.08 icchanta reto mithas tanūṣu saṃ jānata svair dakṣair amūrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1529: RV_1,068.09 pitur na putrāḥ kratuṃ juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsaṃ turāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1530: RV_1,068.10 vi rāya aurṇod duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākaṃ stṛbhir damūnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1531: RV_1,069.01 śukraḥ śuśukvāṃ uṣo na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divo na jyotiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1532: RV_1,069.02 pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvo devānām pitā putraḥ san //
GV01rvh1-10u:1533: RV_1,069.03 vedhā adṛpto agnir vijānann ūdhar na gonāṃ svādmā pitūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1534: RV_1,069.04 jane na śeva āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣatto raṇvo duroṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1535: RV_1,069.05 putro na jāto raṇvo duroṇe vājī na prīto viśo vi tārīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1536: RV_1,069.06 viśo yad ahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷā agnir devatvā viśvāny aśyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1537: RV_1,069.07 nakiṣ ṭa etā vratā minanti nṛbhyo yad ebhyaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1538: RV_1,069.08 tat tu te daṃso yad ahan samānair nṛbhir yad yukto vive rapāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1539: RV_1,069.09 uṣo na jāro vibhāvosraḥ saṃjñātarūpaś ciketad asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1540: RV_1,069.10 tmanā vahanto duro vy ṛṇvan navanta viśve svar dṛśīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:1541: RV_1,070.01 vanema pūrvīr aryo manīṣā agniḥ suśoko viśvāny aśyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1542: RV_1,070.02 ā daivyāni vratā cikitvān ā mānuṣasya janasya janma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1543: RV_1,070.03 garbho yo apāṃ garbho vanānāṃ garbhaś ca sthātāṃ garbhaś carathām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1544: RV_1,070.04 adrau cid asmā antar duroṇe viśāṃ na viśvo amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1545: RV_1,070.05 sa hi kṣapāvāṃ agnī rayīṇāṃ dāśad yo asmā araṃ sūktaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1546: RV_1,070.06 etā cikitvo bhūmā ni pāhi devānāṃ janma martāṃś ca vidvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1547: RV_1,070.07 vardhān yam pūrvīḥ kṣapo virūpā sthātuś ca ratham ṛtapravītam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1548: RV_1,070.08 arādhi hotā svar niṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvāny apāṃsi satyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1549: RV_1,070.09 goṣu praśastiṃ vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve baliṃ svar ṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1550: RV_1,070.10 vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan pitur na jivrer vi vedo bharanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:1551: RV_1,070.11 sādhur na gṛdhnur asteva śūro yāteva bhīmas tveṣaḥ samatsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1552: RV_1,071.01a upa pra jinvann uśatīr uśantam patiṃ na nityaṃ janayaḥ sanīḷāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1553: RV_1,071.01c svasāraḥ śyāvīm aruṣīm ajuṣrañ citram ucchantīm uṣasaṃ na gāvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1554: RV_1,071.02a vīḷu cid dṛḷhā pitaro na ukthair adriṃ rujann aṅgiraso raveṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:1555: RV_1,071.02c cakrur divo bṛhato gātum asme ahaḥ svar vividuḥ ketum usrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1556: RV_1,071.03a dadhann ṛtaṃ dhanayann asya dhītim ād id aryo didhiṣvo vibhṛtrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1557: RV_1,071.03c atṛṣyantīr apaso yanty acchā devāñ janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1558: RV_1,071.04a mathīd yad īṃ vibhṛto mātariśvā gṛhe-gṛhe śyeto jenyo bhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:1559: RV_1,071.04c ād īṃ rājñe na sahīyase sacā sann ā dūtyam bhṛgavāṇo vivāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1560: RV_1,071.05a mahe yat pitra īṃ rasaṃ dive kar ava tsarat pṛśanyaś cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1561: RV_1,071.05c sṛjad astā dhṛṣatā didyum asmai svāyāṃ devo duhitari tviṣiṃ dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1562: RV_1,071.06a sva ā yas tubhyaṃ dama ā vibhāti namo vā dāśād uśato anu dyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:1563: RV_1,071.06c vardho agne vayo asya dvibarhā yāsad rāyā sarathaṃ yaṃ junāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1564: RV_1,071.07a agniṃ viśvā abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudraṃ na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1565: RV_1,071.07c na jāmibhir vi cikite vayo no vidā deveṣu pramatiṃ cikitvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1566: RV_1,071.08a ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ chuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaur abhīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:1567: RV_1,071.08c agniḥ śardham anavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayac ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:1568: RV_1,071.09a mano na yo 'dhvanaḥ sadya ety ekaḥ satrā sūro vasva īśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1569: RV_1,071.09c rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī goṣu priyam amṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1570: RV_1,071.10a mā no agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhā abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san /
GV01rvh1-10u:1571: RV_1,071.10c nabho na rūpaṃ jarimā mināti purā tasyā abhiśaster adhīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1572: RV_1,072.01a ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvatas kar haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1573: RV_1,072.01c agnir bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇāṃ satrā cakrāṇo amṛtāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1574: RV_1,072.02a asme vatsam pari ṣantaṃ na vindann icchanto viśve amṛtā amūrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1575: RV_1,072.02c śramayuvaḥ padavyo dhiyandhās tasthuḥ pade parame cārv agneḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1576: RV_1,072.03a tisro yad agne śaradas tvām ic chuciṃ ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1577: RV_1,072.03c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāny asūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1578: RV_1,072.04a ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1579: RV_1,072.04c vidan marto nemadhitā cikitvān agnim pade parame tasthivāṃsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1580: RV_1,072.05a saṃjānānā upa sīdann abhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:1581: RV_1,072.05c ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyur nimiṣi rakṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1582: RV_1,072.06a triḥ sapta yad guhyāni tve it padāvidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1583: RV_1,072.06c tebhī rakṣante amṛtaṃ sajoṣāḥ paśūñ ca sthātṝñ carathaṃ ca pāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:1584: RV_1,072.07a vidvāṃ agne vayunāni kṣitīnāṃ vy ānuṣak churudho jīvase dhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1585: RV_1,072.07c antarvidvāṃ adhvano devayānān atandro dūto abhavo havirvāṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1586: RV_1,072.08a svādhyo diva ā sapta yahvī rāyo duro vy ṛtajñā ajānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:1587: RV_1,072.08c vidad gavyaṃ saramā dṛḷham ūrvaṃ yenā nu kam mānuṣī bhojate viṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1588: RV_1,072.09a ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum /
GV01rvh1-10u:1589: RV_1,072.09c mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putrair aditir dhāyase veḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1590: RV_1,072.10a adhi śriyaṃ ni dadhuś cārum asmin divo yad akṣī amṛtā akṛṇvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:1591: RV_1,072.10c adha kṣaranti sindhavo na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nīcīr agne aruṣīr ajānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:1592: RV_1,073.01a rayir na yaḥ pitṛvitto vayodhāḥ supraṇītiś cikituṣo na śāsuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1593: RV_1,073.01c syonaśīr atithir na prīṇāno hoteva sadma vidhato vi tārīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1594: RV_1,073.02a devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1595: RV_1,073.02c purupraśasto amatir na satya ātmeva śevo didhiṣāyyo bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1596: RV_1,073.03a devo na yaḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upakṣeti hitamitro na rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1597: RV_1,073.03c puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā anavadyā patijuṣṭeva nārī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1598: RV_1,073.04a taṃ tvā naro dama ā nityam iddham agne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1599: RV_1,073.04c adhi dyumnaṃ ni dadhur bhūry asmin bhavā viśvāyur dharuṇo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1600: RV_1,073.05a vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyur vi sūrayo dadato viśvam āyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1601: RV_1,073.05c sanema vājaṃ samitheṣv aryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravase dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1602: RV_1,073.06a ṛtasya hi dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1603: RV_1,073.06c parāvataḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇā vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasrur adrim //
GV01rvh1-10u:1604: RV_1,073.07a tve agne sumatim bhikṣamāṇā divi śravo dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1605: RV_1,073.07c naktā ca cakrur uṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇam aruṇaṃ ca saṃ dhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1606: RV_1,073.08a yān rāye martān suṣūdo agne te syāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:1607: RV_1,073.08c chāyeva viśvam bhuvanaṃ sisakṣy āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1608: RV_1,073.09a arvadbhir agne arvato nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1609: RV_1,073.09c īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyo vi sūrayaḥ śatahimā no aśyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1610: RV_1,073.10a etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:1611: RV_1,073.10c śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1614: RV_1,074.02a yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1616: RV_1,074.03a uta bruvantu jantava ud agnir vṛtrahājani /
GV01rvh1-10u:1618: RV_1,074.04a yasya dūto asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:1620: RV_1,074.05a tam it suhavyam aṅgiraḥ sudevaṃ sahaso yaho /
GV01rvh1-10u:1622: RV_1,074.06a ā ca vahāsi tāṃ iha devāṃ upa praśastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:1624: RV_1,074.07a na yor upabdir aśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kac cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:1626: RV_1,074.08a tvoto vājy ahrayo 'bhi pūrvasmād aparaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1628: RV_1,074.09a uta dyumat suvīryam bṛhad agne vivāsasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1632: RV_1,075.02a athā te aṅgirastamāgne vedhastama priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1634: RV_1,075.03a kas te jāmir janānām agne ko dāśvadhvaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1635: RV_1,075.03c ko ha kasminn asi śritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1636: RV_1,075.04a tvaṃ jāmir janānām agne mitro asi priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1638: RV_1,075.05a yajā no mitrāvaruṇā yajā devāṃ ṛtam bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1640: RV_1,076.01a kā ta upetir manaso varāya bhuvad agne śantamā kā manīṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1641: RV_1,076.01c ko vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣaṃ ta āpa kena vā te manasā dāśema //
GV01rvh1-10u:1642: RV_1,076.02a ehy agna iha hotā ni ṣīdādabdhaḥ su puraetā bhavā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1643: RV_1,076.02c avatāṃ tvā rodasī viśvaminve yajā mahe saumanasāya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1644: RV_1,076.03a pra su viśvān rakṣaso dhakṣy agne bhavā yajñānām abhiśastipāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1645: RV_1,076.03c athā vaha somapatiṃ haribhyām ātithyam asmai cakṛmā sudāvne //
GV01rvh1-10u:1646: RV_1,076.04a prajāvatā vacasā vahnir āsā ca huve ni ca satsīha devaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1647: RV_1,076.04c veṣi hotram uta potraṃ yajatra bodhi prayantar janitar vasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1648: RV_1,076.05a yathā viprasya manuṣo havirbhir devāṃ ayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san /
GV01rvh1-10u:1649: RV_1,076.05c evā hotaḥ satyatara tvam adyāgne mandrayā juhvā yajasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:1650: RV_1,077.01a kathā dāśemāgnaye kāsmai devajuṣṭocyate bhāmine gīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1651: RV_1,077.01c yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭha it kṛṇoti devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1652: RV_1,077.02a yo adhvareṣu śantama ṛtāvā hotā tam ū namobhir ā kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1653: RV_1,077.02c agnir yad ver martāya devān sa cā bodhāti manasā yajāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:1654: RV_1,077.03a sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhur mitro na bhūd adbhutasya rathīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1655: RV_1,077.03c tam medheṣu prathamaṃ devayantīr viśa upa bruvate dasmam ārīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1656: RV_1,077.04a sa no nṛṇāṃ nṛtamo riśādā agnir giro 'vasā vetu dhītim /
GV01rvh1-10u:1657: RV_1,077.04c tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭhā vājaprasūtā iṣayanta manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1658: RV_1,077.05a evāgnir gotamebhir ṛtāvā viprebhir astoṣṭa jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1659: RV_1,077.05c sa eṣu dyumnam pīpayat sa vājaṃ sa puṣṭiṃ yāti joṣam ā cikitvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1660: RV_1,078.01a abhi tvā gotamā girā jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1662: RV_1,078.02a tam u tvā gotamo girā rāyaskāmo duvasyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1664: RV_1,078.03a tam u tvā vājasātamam aṅgirasvad dhavāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1666: RV_1,078.04a tam u tvā vṛtrahantamaṃ yo dasyūṃr avadhūnuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1668: RV_1,078.05a avocāma rahūgaṇā agnaye madhumad vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1670: RV_1,079.01a hiraṇyakeśo rajaso visāre 'hir dhunir vāta iva dhrajīmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1671: RV_1,079.01c śucibhrājā uṣaso navedā yaśasvatīr apasyuvo na satyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1672: RV_1,079.02a ā te suparṇā aminantaṃ evaiḥ kṛṣṇo nonāva vṛṣabho yadīdam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1673: RV_1,079.02c śivābhir na smayamānābhir āgāt patanti miha stanayanty abhrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1674: RV_1,079.03a yad īm ṛtasya payasā piyāno nayann ṛtasya pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1675: RV_1,079.03c aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ parijmā tvacam pṛñcanty uparasya yonau //
GV01rvh1-10u:1676: RV_1,079.04a agne vājasya gomata īśānaḥ sahaso yaho /
GV01rvh1-10u:1677: RV_1,079.04c asme dhehi jātavedo mahi śravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1678: RV_1,079.05a sa idhāno vasuṣ kavir agnir īḷenyo girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1680: RV_1,079.06a kṣapo rājann uta tmanāgne vastor utoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1681: RV_1,079.06c sa tigmajambha rakṣaso daha prati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1682: RV_1,079.07a avā no agna ūtibhir gāyatrasya prabharmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1684: RV_1,079.08a ā no agne rayim bhara satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1686: RV_1,079.09a ā no agne sucetunā rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1688: RV_1,079.10a pra pūtās tigmaśociṣe vāco gotamāgnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:1690: RV_1,079.11a yo no agne 'bhidāsaty anti dūre padīṣṭa saḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1692: RV_1,079.12a sahasrākṣo vicarṣaṇir agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1694: RV_1,080.01a itthā hi soma in made brahmā cakāra vardhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1695: RV_1,080.01c śaviṣṭha vajrinn ojasā pṛthivyā niḥ śaśā ahim arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1696: RV_1,080.02a sa tvāmadad vṛṣā madaḥ somaḥ śyenābhṛtaḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1697: RV_1,080.02c yenā vṛtraṃ nir adbhyo jaghantha vajrinn ojasārcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1698: RV_1,080.03a prehy abhīhi dhṛṣṇuhi na te vajro ni yaṃsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1699: RV_1,080.03c indra nṛmṇaṃ hi te śavo hano vṛtraṃ jayā apo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1700: RV_1,080.04a nir indra bhūmyā adhi vṛtraṃ jaghantha nir divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1701: RV_1,080.04c sṛjā marutvatīr ava jīvadhanyā imā apo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1702: RV_1,080.05a indro vṛtrasya dodhataḥ sānuṃ vajreṇa hīḷitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1703: RV_1,080.05c abhikramyāva jighnate 'paḥ sarmāya codayann arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1704: RV_1,080.06a adhi sānau ni jighnate vajreṇa śataparvaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1705: RV_1,080.06c mandāna indro andhasaḥ sakhibhyo gātum icchaty arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1706: RV_1,080.07a indra tubhyam id adrivo 'nuttaṃ vajrin vīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1707: RV_1,080.07c yad dha tyam māyinam mṛgaṃ tam u tvam māyayāvadhīr arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1708: RV_1,080.08a vi te vajrāso asthiran navatiṃ nāvyā anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1709: RV_1,080.08c mahat ta indra vīryam bāhvos te balaṃ hitam arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1710: RV_1,080.09a sahasraṃ sākam arcata pari ṣṭobhata viṃśatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1711: RV_1,080.09c śatainam anv anonavur indrāya brahmodyatam arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1712: RV_1,080.10a indro vṛtrasya taviṣīṃ nir ahan sahasā sahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1713: RV_1,080.10c mahat tad asya pauṃsyaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1714: RV_1,080.11a ime cit tava manyave vepete bhiyasā mahī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1715: RV_1,080.11c yad indra vajrinn ojasā vṛtram marutvāṃ avadhīr arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1716: RV_1,080.12a na vepasā na tanyatendraṃ vṛtro vi bībhayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1717: RV_1,080.12c abhy enaṃ vajra āyasaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭir āyatārcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1718: RV_1,080.13a yad vṛtraṃ tava cāśaniṃ vajreṇa samayodhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1719: RV_1,080.13c ahim indra jighāṃsato divi te badbadhe śavo 'rcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1720: RV_1,080.14a abhiṣṭane te adrivo yat sthā jagac ca rejate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1721: RV_1,080.14c tvaṣṭā cit tava manyava indra vevijyate bhiyārcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1722: RV_1,080.15a nahi nu yād adhīmasīndraṃ ko vīryā paraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1723: RV_1,080.15c tasmin nṛmṇam uta kratuṃ devā ojāṃsi saṃ dadhur arcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1724: RV_1,080.16a yām atharvā manuṣ pitā dadhyaṅ dhiyam atnata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1725: RV_1,080.16c tasmin brahmāṇi pūrvathendra ukthā sam agmatārcann anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1726: RV_1,081.01a indro madāya vāvṛdhe śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1727: RV_1,081.01c tam in mahatsv ājiṣūtem arbhe havāmahe sa vājeṣu pra no 'viṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1728: RV_1,081.02a asi hi vīra senyo 'si bhūri parādadiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1729: RV_1,081.02c asi dabhrasya cid vṛdho yajamānāya śikṣasi sunvate bhūri te vasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1730: RV_1,081.03a yad udīrata ājayo dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1731: RV_1,081.03c yukṣvā madacyutā harī kaṃ hanaḥ kaṃ vasau dadho 'smāṃ indra vasau dadhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1732: RV_1,081.04a kratvā mahāṃ anuṣvadham bhīma ā vāvṛdhe śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1733: RV_1,081.04c śriya ṛṣva upākayor ni śiprī harivān dadhe hastayor vajram āyasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1734: RV_1,081.05a ā paprau pārthivaṃ rajo badbadhe rocanā divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1735: RV_1,081.05c na tvāvāṃ indra kaś cana na jāto na janiṣyate 'ti viśvaṃ vavakṣitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1736: RV_1,081.06a yo aryo martabhojanam parādadāti dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1737: RV_1,081.06c indro asmabhyaṃ śikṣatu vi bhajā bhūri te vasu bhakṣīya tava rādhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1738: RV_1,081.07a made-made hi no dadir yūthā gavām ṛjukratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1739: RV_1,081.07c saṃ gṛbhāya purū śatobhayāhastyā vasu śiśīhi rāya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:1740: RV_1,081.08a mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:1741: RV_1,081.08c vidmā hi tvā purūvasum upa kāmān sasṛjmahe 'thā no 'vitā bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:1742: RV_1,081.09a ete ta indra jantavo viśvam puṣyanti vāryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1743: RV_1,081.09c antar hi khyo janānām aryo vedo adāśuṣāṃ teṣāṃ no veda ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:1744: RV_1,082.01a upo ṣu śṛṇuhī giro maghavan mātathā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:1745: RV_1,082.01c yadā naḥ sūnṛtāvataḥ kara ād arthayāsa id yojā nv indra te harī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1746: RV_1,082.02a akṣann amīmadanta hy ava priyā adhūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1747: RV_1,082.02c astoṣata svabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayā matī yojā nv indra te harī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1748: RV_1,082.03a susaṃdṛśaṃ tvā vayam maghavan vandiṣīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1749: RV_1,082.03c pra nūnam pūrṇavandhura stuto yāhi vaśāṃ anu yojā nv indra te harī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1750: RV_1,082.04a sa ghā taṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ ratham adhi tiṣṭhāti govidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1751: RV_1,082.04c yaḥ pātraṃ hāriyojanam pūrṇam indra ciketati yojā nv indra te harī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1752: RV_1,082.05a yuktas te astu dakṣiṇa uta savyaḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:1753: RV_1,082.05c tena jāyām upa priyām mandāno yāhy andhaso yojā nv indra te harī //
GV01rvh1-10u:1754: RV_1,082.06a yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1755: RV_1,082.06c ut tvā sutāso rabhasā amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin sam u patnyāmadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1756: RV_1,083.01a aśvāvati prathamo goṣu gacchati suprāvīr indra martyas tavotibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1757: RV_1,083.01c tam it pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhum āpo yathābhito vicetasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1758: RV_1,083.02a āpo na devīr upa yanti hotriyam avaḥ paśyanti vitataṃ yathā rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1759: RV_1,083.02c prācair devāsaḥ pra ṇayanti devayum brahmapriyaṃ joṣayante varā iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:1760: RV_1,083.03a adhi dvayor adadhā ukthyaṃ vaco yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1761: RV_1,083.03c asaṃyatto vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktir yajamānāya sunvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1762: RV_1,083.04a ād aṅgirāḥ prathamaṃ dadhire vaya iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā ye sukṛtyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1763: RV_1,083.04c sarvam paṇeḥ sam avindanta bhojanam aśvāvantaṃ gomantam ā paśuṃ naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1764: RV_1,083.05a yajñair atharvā prathamaḥ pathas tate tataḥ sūryo vratapā vena ājani /
GV01rvh1-10u:1765: RV_1,083.05c ā gā ājad uśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātam amṛtaṃ yajāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1766: RV_1,083.06a barhir vā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate 'rko vā ślokam āghoṣate divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1767: RV_1,083.06c grāvā yatra vadati kārur ukthyas tasyed indro abhipitveṣu raṇyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1768: RV_1,084.01a asāvi soma indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇav ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1769: RV_1,084.01c ā tvā pṛṇaktv indriyaṃ rajaḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1771: RV_1,084.02c ṛṣīṇāṃ ca stutīr upa yajñaṃ ca mānuṣāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:1772: RV_1,084.03a ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan rathaṃ yuktā te brahmaṇā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1773: RV_1,084.03c arvācīnaṃ su te mano grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1774: RV_1,084.04a imam indra sutam piba jyeṣṭham amartyam madam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1775: RV_1,084.04c śukrasya tvābhy akṣaran dhārā ṛtasya sādane //
GV01rvh1-10u:1776: RV_1,084.05a indrāya nūnam arcatokthāni ca bravītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:1777: RV_1,084.05c sutā amatsur indavo jyeṣṭhaṃ namasyatā sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1778: RV_1,084.06a nakiṣ ṭvad rathītaro harī yad indra yacchase /
GV01rvh1-10u:1779: RV_1,084.06c nakiṣ ṭvānu majmanā nakiḥ svaśva ānaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1780: RV_1,084.07a ya eka id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1782: RV_1,084.08a kadā martam arādhasam padā kṣumpam iva sphurat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1783: RV_1,084.08c kadā naḥ śuśravad gira indro aṅga //
GV01rvh1-10u:1784: RV_1,084.09a yaś cid dhi tvā bahubhya ā sutāvāṃ āvivāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1785: RV_1,084.09c ugraṃ tat patyate śava indro aṅga //
GV01rvh1-10u:1786: RV_1,084.10a svādor itthā viṣūvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1787: RV_1,084.10c yā indreṇa sayāvarīr vṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīr anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1788: RV_1,084.11a tā asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1789: RV_1,084.11c priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1790: RV_1,084.12a tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1791: RV_1,084.12c vratāny asya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīr anu svarājyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1792: RV_1,084.13a indro dadhīco asthabhir vṛtrāṇy apratiṣkutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1794: RV_1,084.14a icchann aśvasya yac chiraḥ parvateṣv apaśritam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1796: RV_1,084.15a atrāha gor amanvata nāma tvaṣṭur apīcyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1798: RV_1,084.16a ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāmino durhṛṇāyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:1799: RV_1,084.16c āsanniṣūn hṛtsvaso mayobhūn ya eṣām bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:1800: RV_1,084.17a ka īṣate tujyate ko bibhāya ko maṃsate santam indraṃ ko anti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1801: RV_1,084.17c kas tokāya ka ibhāyota rāye 'dhi bravat tanve ko janāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1802: RV_1,084.18a ko agnim īṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātā ṛtubhir dhruvebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1803: RV_1,084.18c kasmai devā ā vahān āśu homa ko maṃsate vītihotraḥ sudevaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1804: RV_1,084.19a tvam aṅga pra śaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1805: RV_1,084.19c na tvad anyo maghavann asti marḍitendra bravīmi te vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1806: RV_1,084.20a mā te rādhāṃsi mā ta ūtayo vaso 'smān kadā canā dabhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:1807: RV_1,084.20c viśvā ca na upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhya ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1808: RV_1,085.01a pra ye śumbhante janayo na saptayo yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥ sudaṃsasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1809: RV_1,085.01c rodasī hi marutaś cakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1810: RV_1,085.02a ta ukṣitāso mahimānam āśata divi rudrāso adhi cakrire sadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1811: RV_1,085.02c arcanto arkaṃ janayanta indriyam adhi śriyo dadhire pṛśnimātaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1812: RV_1,085.03a gomātaro yac chubhayante añjibhis tanūṣu śubhrā dadhire virukmataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1813: RV_1,085.03c bādhante viśvam abhimātinam apa vartmāny eṣām anu rīyate ghṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1814: RV_1,085.04a vi ye bhrājante sumakhāsa ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayanto acyutā cid ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1815: RV_1,085.04c manojuvo yan maruto ratheṣv ā vṛṣavrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1816: RV_1,085.05a pra yad ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ vāje adrim maruto raṃhayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1817: RV_1,085.05c utāruṣasya vi ṣyanti dhārāś carmevodabhir vy undanti bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1818: RV_1,085.06a ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1819: RV_1,085.06c sīdatā barhir uru vaḥ sadas kṛtam mādayadhvam maruto madhvo andhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1820: RV_1,085.07a te 'vardhanta svatavaso mahitvanā nākaṃ tasthur uru cakrire sadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1821: RV_1,085.07c viṣṇur yad dhāvad vṛṣaṇam madacyutaṃ vayo na sīdann adhi barhiṣi priye //
GV01rvh1-10u:1822: RV_1,085.08a śūrā ived yuyudhayo na jagmayaḥ śravasyavo na pṛtanāsu yetire /
GV01rvh1-10u:1823: RV_1,085.08c bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyo rājāna iva tveṣasaṃdṛśo naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1824: RV_1,085.09a tvaṣṭā yad vajraṃ sukṛtaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ svapā avartayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1825: RV_1,085.09c dhatta indro nary apāṃsi kartave 'han vṛtraṃ nir apām aubjad arṇavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1826: RV_1,085.10a ūrdhvaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ ta ojasā dādṛhāṇaṃ cid bibhidur vi parvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1827: RV_1,085.10c dhamanto vāṇam marutaḥ sudānavo made somasya raṇyāni cakrire //
GV01rvh1-10u:1828: RV_1,085.11a jihmaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ tayā diśāsiñcann utsaṃ gotamāya tṛṣṇaje /
GV01rvh1-10u:1829: RV_1,085.11c ā gacchantīm avasā citrabhānavaḥ kāmaṃ viprasya tarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1830: RV_1,085.12a yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tridhātūni dāśuṣe yacchatādhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1831: RV_1,085.12c asmabhyaṃ tāni maruto vi yanta rayiṃ no dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:1832: RV_1,086.01a maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1834: RV_1,086.02a yajñair vā yajñavāhaso viprasya vā matīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1836: RV_1,086.03a uta vā yasya vājino 'nu vipram atakṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1838: RV_1,086.04a asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somo diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1840: RV_1,086.05a asya śroṣantv ā bhuvo viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1842: RV_1,086.06a pūrvībhir hi dadāśima śaradbhir maruto vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1844: RV_1,086.07a subhagaḥ sa prayajyavo maruto astu martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1846: RV_1,086.08a śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satyaśavasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1848: RV_1,086.09a yūyaṃ tat satyaśavasa āviṣ karta mahitvanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1850: RV_1,086.10a gūhatā guhyaṃ tamo vi yāta viśvam atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1852: RV_1,087.01a pratvakṣasaḥ pratavaso virapśino 'nānatā avithurā ṛjīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1853: RV_1,087.01c juṣṭatamāso nṛtamāso añjibhir vy ānajre ke cid usrā iva stṛbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1854: RV_1,087.02a upahvareṣu yad acidhvaṃ yayiṃ vaya iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1855: RV_1,087.02c ścotanti kośā upa vo ratheṣv ā ghṛtam ukṣatā madhuvarṇam arcate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1856: RV_1,087.03a praiṣām ajmeṣu vithureva rejate bhūmir yāmeṣu yad dha yuñjate śubhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1857: RV_1,087.03c te krīḷayo dhunayo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ svayam mahitvam panayanta dhūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1858: RV_1,087.04a sa hi svasṛt pṛṣadaśvo yuvā gaṇo 'yā īśānas taviṣībhir āvṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1859: RV_1,087.04c asi satya ṛṇayāvānedyo 'syā dhiyaḥ prāvitāthā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1860: RV_1,087.05a pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1861: RV_1,087.05c yad īm indraṃ śamy ṛkvāṇa āśatād in nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:1862: RV_1,087.06a śriyase kam bhānubhiḥ sam mimikṣire te raśmibhis ta ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1863: RV_1,087.06c te vāśīmanta iṣmiṇo abhīravo vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1864: RV_1,088.01a ā vidyunmadbhir marutaḥ svarkai rathebhir yāta ṛṣṭimadbhir aśvaparṇaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1865: RV_1,088.01c ā varṣiṣṭhayā na iṣā vayo na paptatā sumāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1866: RV_1,088.02a te 'ruṇebhir varam ā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kaṃ yānti rathatūrbhir aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1867: RV_1,088.02c rukmo na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1868: RV_1,088.03a śriye kaṃ vo adhi tanūṣu vāśīr medhā vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1869: RV_1,088.03c yuṣmabhyaṃ kam marutaḥ sujātās tuvidyumnāso dhanayante adrim //
GV01rvh1-10u:1870: RV_1,088.04a ahāni gṛdhrāḥ pary ā va āgur imāṃ dhiyaṃ vārkāryāṃ ca devīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:1871: RV_1,088.04c brahma kṛṇvanto gotamāso arkair ūrdhvaṃ nunudra utsadhim pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1872: RV_1,088.05a etat tyan na yojanam aceti sasvar ha yan maruto gotamo vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1873: RV_1,088.05c paśyan hiraṇyacakrān ayodaṃṣṭrān vidhāvato varāhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:1874: RV_1,088.06a eṣā syā vo maruto 'nubhartrī prati ṣṭobhati vāghato na vāṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1875: RV_1,088.06c astobhayad vṛthāsām anu svadhāṃ gabhastyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1876: RV_1,089.01a ā no bhadrāḥ kratavo yantu viśvato 'dabdhāso aparītāsa udbhidaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1877: RV_1,089.01c devā no yathā sadam id vṛdhe asann aprāyuvo rakṣitāro dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:1878: RV_1,089.02a devānām bhadrā sumatir ṛjūyatāṃ devānāṃ rātir abhi no ni vartatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1879: RV_1,089.02c devānāṃ sakhyam upa sedimā vayaṃ devā na āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:1880: RV_1,089.03a tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayam bhagam mitram aditiṃ dakṣam asridham /
GV01rvh1-10u:1881: RV_1,089.03c aryamaṇaṃ varuṇaṃ somam aśvinā sarasvatī naḥ subhagā mayas karat //
GV01rvh1-10u:1882: RV_1,089.04a tan no vāto mayobhu vātu bheṣajaṃ tan mātā pṛthivī tat pitā dyauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1883: RV_1,089.04c tad grāvāṇaḥ somasuto mayobhuvas tad aśvinā śṛṇutaṃ dhiṣṇyā yuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1884: RV_1,089.05a tam īśānaṃ jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ dhiyañjinvam avase hūmahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1885: RV_1,089.05c pūṣā no yathā vedasām asad vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyur adabdhaḥ svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:1886: RV_1,089.06a svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1887: RV_1,089.06c svasti nas tārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:1888: RV_1,089.07a pṛṣadaśvā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvāno vidatheṣu jagmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1889: RV_1,089.07c agnijihvā manavaḥ sūracakṣaso viśve no devā avasā gamann iha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1890: RV_1,089.08a bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadram paśyemākṣabhir yajatrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1891: RV_1,089.08c sthirair aṅgais tuṣṭuvāṃsas tanūbhir vy aśema devahitaṃ yad āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1892: RV_1,089.09a śatam in nu śarado anti devā yatrā naś cakrā jarasaṃ tanūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1893: RV_1,089.09c putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyur gantoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1894: RV_1,089.10a aditir dyaur aditir antarikṣam aditir mātā sa pitā sa putraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1895: RV_1,089.10c viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditir jātam aditir janitvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1896: RV_1,090.01a ṛjunītī no varuṇo mitro nayatu vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:1898: RV_1,090.02a te hi vasvo vasavānās te apramūrā mahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1900: RV_1,090.03a te asmabhyaṃ śarma yaṃsann amṛtā martyebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1902: RV_1,090.04a vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantv indro marutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1904: RV_1,090.05a uta no dhiyo goagrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇav evayāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1906: RV_1,090.06a madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1908: RV_1,090.07a madhu naktam utoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1909: RV_1,090.07c madhu dyaur astu naḥ pitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1910: RV_1,090.08a madhumān no vanaspatir madhumāṃ astu sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1912: RV_1,090.09a śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1913: RV_1,090.09c śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1914: RV_1,091.01a tvaṃ soma pra cikito manīṣā tvaṃ rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1915: RV_1,091.01c tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1916: RV_1,091.02a tvaṃ soma kratubhiḥ sukratur bhūs tvaṃ dakṣaiḥ sudakṣo viśvavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1917: RV_1,091.02c tvaṃ vṛṣā vṛṣatvebhir mahitvā dyumnebhir dyumny abhavo nṛcakṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1918: RV_1,091.03a rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:1919: RV_1,091.03c śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1920: RV_1,091.04a yā te dhāmāni divi yā pṛthivyāṃ yā parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:1921: RV_1,091.04c tebhir no viśvaiḥ sumanā aheḷan rājan soma prati havyā gṛbhāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:1922: RV_1,091.05a tvaṃ somāsi satpatis tvaṃ rājota vṛtrahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1924: RV_1,091.06a tvaṃ ca soma no vaśo jīvātuṃ na marāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1926: RV_1,091.07a tvaṃ soma mahe bhagaṃ tvaṃ yūna ṛtāyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1928: RV_1,091.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato rakṣā rājann aghāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1930: RV_1,091.09a soma yās te mayobhuva ūtayaḥ santi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:1932: RV_1,091.10a imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:1933: RV_1,091.10c soma tvaṃ no vṛdhe bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:1934: RV_1,091.11a soma gīrbhiṣ ṭvā vayaṃ vardhayāmo vacovidaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1938: RV_1,091.13a soma rārandhi no hṛdi gāvo na yavaseṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1940: RV_1,091.14a yaḥ soma sakhye tava rāraṇad deva martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1942: RV_1,091.15a uruṣyā ṇo abhiśasteḥ soma ni pāhy aṃhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1944: RV_1,091.16a ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1946: RV_1,091.17a ā pyāyasva madintama soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1947: RV_1,091.17c bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1948: RV_1,091.18a saṃ te payāṃsi sam u yantu vājāḥ saṃ vṛṣṇyāny abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1949: RV_1,091.18c āpyāyamāno amṛtāya soma divi śravāṃsy uttamāni dhiṣva //
GV01rvh1-10u:1950: RV_1,091.19a yā te dhāmāni haviṣā yajanti tā te viśvā paribhūr astu yajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1951: RV_1,091.19c gayasphānaḥ prataraṇaḥ suvīro 'vīrahā pra carā soma duryān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1952: RV_1,091.20a somo dhenuṃ somo arvantam āśuṃ somo vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ dadāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1953: RV_1,091.20c sādanyaṃ vidathyaṃ sabheyam pitṛśravaṇaṃ yo dadāśad asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:1954: RV_1,091.21a aṣāḷhaṃ yutsu pṛtanāsu papriṃ svarṣām apsāṃ vṛjanasya gopām /
GV01rvh1-10u:1955: RV_1,091.21c bhareṣujāṃ sukṣitiṃ suśravasaṃ jayantaṃ tvām anu madema soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:1956: RV_1,091.22a tvam imā oṣadhīḥ soma viśvās tvam apo ajanayas tvaṃ gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1957: RV_1,091.22c tvam ā tatanthorv antarikṣaṃ tvaṃ jyotiṣā vi tamo vavartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1958: RV_1,091.23a devena no manasā deva soma rāyo bhāgaṃ sahasāvann abhi yudhya /
GV01rvh1-10u:1959: RV_1,091.23c mā tvā tanad īśiṣe vīryasyobhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsā gaviṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:1960: RV_1,092.01a etā u tyā uṣasaḥ ketum akrata pūrve ardhe rajaso bhānum añjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:1961: RV_1,092.01c niṣkṛṇvānā āyudhānīva dhṛṣṇavaḥ prati gāvo 'ruṣīr yanti mātaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1962: RV_1,092.02a ud apaptann aruṇā bhānavo vṛthā svāyujo aruṣīr gā ayukṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:1963: RV_1,092.02c akrann uṣāso vayunāni pūrvathā ruśantam bhānum aruṣīr aśiśrayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1964: RV_1,092.03a arcanti nārīr apaso na viṣṭibhiḥ samānena yojanenā parāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1965: RV_1,092.03c iṣaṃ vahantīḥ sukṛte sudānave viśved aha yajamānāya sunvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:1966: RV_1,092.04a adhi peśāṃsi vapate nṛtūr ivāporṇute vakṣa usreva barjaham /
GV01rvh1-10u:1967: RV_1,092.04c jyotir viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvatī gāvo na vrajaṃ vy uṣā āvar tamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1968: RV_1,092.05a praty arcī ruśad asyā adarśi vi tiṣṭhate bādhate kṛṣṇam abhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1969: RV_1,092.05c svaruṃ na peśo vidatheṣv añjañ citraṃ divo duhitā bhānum aśret //
GV01rvh1-10u:1970: RV_1,092.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asyoṣā ucchantī vayunā kṛṇoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1971: RV_1,092.06c śriye chando na smayate vibhātī supratīkā saumanasāyājīgaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1972: RV_1,092.07a bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānāṃ diva stave duhitā gotamebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1973: RV_1,092.07c prajāvato nṛvato aśvabudhyān uṣo goagrāṃ upa māsi vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:1974: RV_1,092.08a uṣas tam aśyāṃ yaśasaṃ suvīraṃ dāsapravargaṃ rayim aśvabudhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1975: RV_1,092.08c sudaṃsasā śravasā yā vibhāsi vājaprasūtā subhage bṛhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1976: RV_1,092.09a viśvāni devī bhuvanābhicakṣyā pratīcī cakṣur urviyā vi bhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1977: RV_1,092.09c viśvaṃ jīvaṃ carase bodhayantī viśvasya vācam avidan manāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1978: RV_1,092.10a punaḥ-punar jāyamānā purāṇī samānaṃ varṇam abhi śumbhamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:1979: RV_1,092.10c śvaghnīva kṛtnur vija āminānā martasya devī jarayanty āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1980: RV_1,092.11a vyūrṇvatī divo antāṃ abodhy apa svasāraṃ sanutar yuyoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:1981: RV_1,092.11c praminatī manuṣyā yugāni yoṣā jārasya cakṣasā vi bhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:1982: RV_1,092.12a paśūn na citrā subhagā prathānā sindhur na kṣoda urviyā vy aśvait /
GV01rvh1-10u:1983: RV_1,092.12c aminatī daivyāni vratāni sūryasya ceti raśmibhir dṛśānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:1984: RV_1,092.13a uṣas tac citram ā bharāsmabhyaṃ vājinīvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1985: RV_1,092.13c yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:1986: RV_1,092.14a uṣo adyeha gomaty aśvāvati vibhāvari /
GV01rvh1-10u:1987: RV_1,092.14c revad asme vy uccha sūnṛtāvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:1988: RV_1,092.15a yukṣvā hi vājinīvaty aśvāṃ adyāruṇāṃ uṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1989: RV_1,092.15c athā no viśvā saubhagāny ā vaha //
GV01rvh1-10u:1990: RV_1,092.16a aśvinā vartir asmad ā gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:1991: RV_1,092.16c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1992: RV_1,092.17a yāv itthā ślokam ā divo jyotir janāya cakrathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:1993: RV_1,092.17c ā na ūrjaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:1994: RV_1,092.18a eha devā mayobhuvā dasrā hiraṇyavartanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:1996: RV_1,093.01a agnīṣomāv imaṃ su me śṛṇutaṃ vṛṣaṇā havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:1997: RV_1,093.01c prati sūktāni haryatam bhavataṃ dāśuṣe mayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:1998: RV_1,093.02a agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ vacaḥ saparyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:1999: RV_1,093.02c tasmai dhattaṃ suvīryaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2000: RV_1,093.03a agnīṣomā ya āhutiṃ yo vāṃ dāśād dhaviṣkṛtim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2001: RV_1,093.03c sa prajayā suvīryaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2002: RV_1,093.04a agnīṣomā ceti tad vīryaṃ vāṃ yad amuṣṇītam avasam paṇiṃ gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2003: RV_1,093.04c avātiratam bṛsayasya śeṣo 'vindataṃ jyotir ekam bahubhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2004: RV_1,093.05a yuvam etāni divi rocanāny agniś ca soma sakratū adhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2005: RV_1,093.05c yuvaṃ sindhūṃr abhiśaster avadyād agnīṣomāv amuñcataṃ gṛbhītān //
GV01rvh1-10u:2006: RV_1,093.06a ānyaṃ divo mātariśvā jabhārāmathnād anyam pari śyeno adreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2007: RV_1,093.06c agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānoruṃ yajñāya cakrathur u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2008: RV_1,093.07a agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītaṃ haryataṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2009: RV_1,093.07c suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam athā dhattaṃ yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2010: RV_1,093.08a yo agnīṣomā haviṣā saparyād devadrīcā manasā yo ghṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:2011: RV_1,093.08c tasya vrataṃ rakṣatam pātam aṃhaso viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2012: RV_1,093.09a agnīṣomā savedasā sahūtī vanataṃ giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2014: RV_1,093.10a agnīṣomāv anena vāṃ yo vāṃ ghṛtena dāśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2016: RV_1,093.11a agnīṣomāv imāni no yuvaṃ havyā jujoṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2017: RV_1,093.11c ā yātam upa naḥ sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2018: RV_1,093.12a agnīṣomā pipṛtam arvato na ā pyāyantām usriyā havyasūdaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2019: RV_1,093.12c asme balāni maghavatsu dhattaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no adhvaraṃ śruṣṭimantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2020: RV_1,094.01a imaṃ stomam arhate jātavedase ratham iva sam mahemā manīṣayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2021: RV_1,094.01c bhadrā hi naḥ pramatir asya saṃsady agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2022: RV_1,094.02a yasmai tvam āyajase sa sādhaty anarvā kṣeti dadhate suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2023: RV_1,094.02c sa tūtāva nainam aśnoty aṃhatir agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2024: RV_1,094.03a śakema tvā samidhaṃ sādhayā dhiyas tve devā havir adanty āhutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2025: RV_1,094.03c tvam ādityāṃ ā vaha tān hy uśmasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2026: RV_1,094.04a bharāmedhmaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi te citayantaḥ parvaṇā-parvaṇā vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2027: RV_1,094.04c jīvātave prataraṃ sādhayā dhiyo 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2028: RV_1,094.05a viśāṃ gopā asya caranti jantavo dvipac ca yad uta catuṣpad aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2029: RV_1,094.05c citraḥ praketa uṣaso mahāṃ asy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2030: RV_1,094.06a tvam adhvaryur uta hotāsi pūrvyaḥ praśāstā potā januṣā purohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2031: RV_1,094.06c viśvā vidvāṃ ārtvijyā dhīra puṣyasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2032: RV_1,094.07a yo viśvataḥ supratīkaḥ sadṛṅṅ asi dūre cit san taḷid ivāti rocase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2033: RV_1,094.07c rātryāś cid andho ati deva paśyasy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2034: RV_1,094.08a pūrvo devā bhavatu sunvato ratho 'smākaṃ śaṃso abhy astu dūḍhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2035: RV_1,094.08c tad ā jānītota puṣyatā vaco 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2036: RV_1,094.09a vadhair duḥśaṃsāṃ apa dūḍhyo jahi dūre vā ye anti vā ke cid atriṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2037: RV_1,094.09c athā yajñāya gṛṇate sugaṃ kṛdhy agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2038: RV_1,094.10a yad ayukthā aruṣā rohitā rathe vātajūtā vṛṣabhasyeva te ravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2039: RV_1,094.10c ād invasi vanino dhūmaketunāgne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2040: RV_1,094.11a adha svanād uta bibhyuḥ patatriṇo drapsā yat te yavasādo vy asthiran /
GV01rvh1-10u:2041: RV_1,094.11c sugaṃ tat te tāvakebhyo rathebhyo 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2042: RV_1,094.12a ayam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāyase 'vayātām marutāṃ heḷo adbhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2043: RV_1,094.12c mṛḷā su no bhūtv eṣām manaḥ punar agne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2044: RV_1,094.13a devo devānām asi mitro adbhuto vasur vasūnām asi cārur adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:2045: RV_1,094.13c śarman syāma tava saprathastame 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2046: RV_1,094.14a tat te bhadraṃ yat samiddhaḥ sve dame somāhuto jarase mṛḷayattamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2047: RV_1,094.14c dadhāsi ratnaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dāśuṣe 'gne sakhye mā riṣāmā vayaṃ tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2048: RV_1,094.15a yasmai tvaṃ sudraviṇo dadāśo 'nāgāstvam adite sarvatātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2049: RV_1,094.15c yam bhadreṇa śavasā codayāsi prajāvatā rādhasā te syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:2050: RV_1,094.16a sa tvam agne saubhagatvasya vidvān asmākam āyuḥ pra tireha deva /
GV01rvh1-10u:2051: RV_1,094.16c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2052: RV_1,095.01a dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete /
GV01rvh1-10u:2053: RV_1,095.01c harir anyasyām bhavati svadhāvāñ chukro anyasyāṃ dadṛśe suvarcāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2054: RV_1,095.02a daśemaṃ tvaṣṭur janayanta garbham atandrāso yuvatayo vibhṛtram /
GV01rvh1-10u:2055: RV_1,095.02c tigmānīkaṃ svayaśasaṃ janeṣu virocamānam pari ṣīṃ nayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2056: RV_1,095.03a trīṇi jānā pari bhūṣanty asya samudra ekaṃ divy ekam apsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2057: RV_1,095.03c pūrvām anu pra diśam pārthivānām ṛtūn praśāsad vi dadhāv anuṣṭhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2058: RV_1,095.04a ka imaṃ vo niṇyam ā ciketa vatso mātṝr janayata svadhābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2059: RV_1,095.04c bahvīnāṃ garbho apasām upasthān mahān kavir niś carati svadhāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:2060: RV_1,095.05a āviṣṭyo vardhate cārur āsu jihmānām ūrdhvaḥ svayaśā upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2061: RV_1,095.05c ubhe tvaṣṭur bibhyatur jāyamānāt pratīcī siṃham prati joṣayete //
GV01rvh1-10u:2062: RV_1,095.06a ubhe bhadre joṣayete na mene gāvo na vāśrā upa tasthur evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2063: RV_1,095.06c sa dakṣāṇāṃ dakṣapatir babhūvāñjanti yaṃ dakṣiṇato havirbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2064: RV_1,095.07a ud yaṃyamīti saviteva bāhū ubhe sicau yatate bhīma ṛñjan /
GV01rvh1-10u:2065: RV_1,095.07c uc chukram atkam ajate simasmān navā mātṛbhyo vasanā jahāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2066: RV_1,095.08a tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇuta uttaraṃ yat sampṛñcānaḥ sadane gobhir adbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2067: RV_1,095.08c kavir budhnam pari marmṛjyate dhīḥ sā devatātā samitir babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:2068: RV_1,095.09a uru te jrayaḥ pary eti budhnaṃ virocamānam mahiṣasya dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:2069: RV_1,095.09c viśvebhir agne svayaśobhir iddho 'dabdhebhiḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhy asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:2070: RV_1,095.10a dhanvan srotaḥ kṛṇute gātum ūrmiṃ śukrair ūrmibhir abhi nakṣati kṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2071: RV_1,095.10c viśvā sanāni jaṭhareṣu dhatte 'ntar navāsu carati prasūṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2072: RV_1,095.11a evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2073: RV_1,095.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2074: RV_1,096.01a sa pratnathā sahasā jāyamānaḥ sadyaḥ kāvyāni baḷ adhatta viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2075: RV_1,096.01c āpaś ca mitraṃ dhiṣaṇā ca sādhan devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2076: RV_1,096.02a sa pūrvayā nividā kavyatāyor imāḥ prajā ajanayan manūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2077: RV_1,096.02c vivasvatā cakṣasā dyām apaś ca devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2078: RV_1,096.03a tam īḷata prathamaṃ yajñasādhaṃ viśa ārīr āhutam ṛñjasānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2079: RV_1,096.03c ūrjaḥ putram bharataṃ sṛpradānuṃ devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2080: RV_1,096.04a sa mātariśvā puruvārapuṣṭir vidad gātuṃ tanayāya svarvit /
GV01rvh1-10u:2081: RV_1,096.04c viśāṃ gopā janitā rodasyor devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2082: RV_1,096.05a naktoṣāsā varṇam āmemyāne dhāpayete śiśum ekaṃ samīcī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2083: RV_1,096.05c dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antar vi bhāti devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2084: RV_1,096.06a rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ yajñasya ketur manmasādhano veḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2085: RV_1,096.06c amṛtatvaṃ rakṣamāṇāsa enaṃ devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2086: RV_1,096.07a nū ca purā ca sadanaṃ rayīṇāṃ jātasya ca jāyamānasya ca kṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2087: RV_1,096.07c sataś ca gopām bhavataś ca bhūrer devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2088: RV_1,096.08a draviṇodā draviṇasas turasya draviṇodāḥ sanarasya pra yaṃsat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2089: RV_1,096.08c draviṇodā vīravatīm iṣaṃ no draviṇodā rāsate dīrgham āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2090: RV_1,096.09a evā no agne samidhā vṛdhāno revat pāvaka śravase vi bhāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2091: RV_1,096.09c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2092: RV_1,097.01a apa naḥ śośucad agham agne śuśugdhy ā rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2094: RV_1,097.02a sukṣetriyā sugātuyā vasūyā ca yajāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2096: RV_1,097.03a pra yad bhandiṣṭha eṣām prāsmākāsaś ca sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2098: RV_1,097.04a pra yat te agne sūrayo jāyemahi pra te vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2100: RV_1,097.05a pra yad agneḥ sahasvato viśvato yanti bhānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2102: RV_1,097.06a tvaṃ hi viśvatomukha viśvataḥ paribhūr asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2104: RV_1,097.07a dviṣo no viśvatomukhāti nāveva pāraya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2106: RV_1,097.08a sa naḥ sindhum iva nāvayāti parṣā svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2108: RV_1,098.01a vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2109: RV_1,098.01c ito jāto viśvam idaṃ vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaro yatate sūryeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:2110: RV_1,098.02a pṛṣṭo divi pṛṣṭo agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭo viśvā oṣadhīr ā viveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:2111: RV_1,098.02c vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭo agniḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2112: RV_1,098.03a vaiśvānara tava tat satyam astv asmān rāyo maghavānaḥ sacantām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2113: RV_1,098.03c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2114: RV_1,099.01a jātavedase sunavāma somam arātīyato ni dahāti vedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2115: RV_1,099.01c sa naḥ parṣad ati durgāṇi viśvā nāveva sindhuṃ duritāty agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2116: RV_1,100.01a sa yo vṛṣā vṛṣṇyebhiḥ samokā maho divaḥ pṛthivyāś ca samrāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2117: RV_1,100.01c satīnasatvā havyo bhareṣu marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2118: RV_1,100.02a yasyānāptaḥ sūryasyeva yāmo bhare-bhare vṛtrahā śuṣmo asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2119: RV_1,100.02c vṛṣantamaḥ sakhibhiḥ svebhir evair marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2120: RV_1,100.03a divo na yasya retaso dughānāḥ panthāso yanti śavasāparītāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2121: RV_1,100.03c taraddveṣāḥ sāsahiḥ pauṃsyebhir marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2122: RV_1,100.04a so aṅgirobhir aṅgirastamo bhūd vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sakhā san /
GV01rvh1-10u:2123: RV_1,100.04c ṛgmibhir ṛgmī gātubhir jyeṣṭho marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2124: RV_1,100.05a sa sūnubhir na rudrebhir ṛbhvā nṛṣāhye sāsahvāṃ amitrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2125: RV_1,100.05c sanīḷebhiḥ śravasyāni tūrvan marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2126: RV_1,100.06a sa manyumīḥ samadanasya kartāsmākebhir nṛbhiḥ sūryaṃ sanat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2127: RV_1,100.06c asminn ahan satpatiḥ puruhūto marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2128: RV_1,100.07a tam ūtayo raṇayañ chūrasātau taṃ kṣemasya kṣitayaḥ kṛṇvata trām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2129: RV_1,100.07c sa viśvasya karuṇasyeśa eko marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2130: RV_1,100.08a tam apsanta śavasa utsaveṣu naro naram avase taṃ dhanāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2131: RV_1,100.08c so andhe cit tamasi jyotir vidan marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2132: RV_1,100.09a sa savyena yamati vrādhataś cit sa dakṣiṇe saṃgṛbhītā kṛtāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:2133: RV_1,100.09c sa kīriṇā cit sanitā dhanāni marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2134: RV_1,100.10a sa grāmebhiḥ sanitā sa rathebhir vide viśvābhiḥ kṛṣṭibhir nv adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2135: RV_1,100.10c sa pauṃsyebhir abhibhūr aśastīr marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2136: RV_1,100.11a sa jāmibhir yat samajāti mīḷhe 'jāmibhir vā puruhūta evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2137: RV_1,100.11c apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣe marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2138: RV_1,100.12a sa vajrabhṛd dasyuhā bhīma ugraḥ sahasracetāḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2139: RV_1,100.12c camrīṣo na śavasā pāñcajanyo marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2140: RV_1,100.13a tasya vajraḥ krandati smat svarṣā divo na tveṣo ravathaḥ śimīvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2141: RV_1,100.13c taṃ sacante sanayas taṃ dhanāni marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2142: RV_1,100.14a yasyājasraṃ śavasā mānam uktham paribhujad rodasī viśvataḥ sīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:2143: RV_1,100.14c sa pāriṣat kratubhir mandasāno marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2144: RV_1,100.15a na yasya devā devatā na martā āpaś cana śavaso antam āpuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2145: RV_1,100.15c sa prarikvā tvakṣasā kṣmo divaś ca marutvān no bhavatv indra ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2146: RV_1,100.16a rohic chyāvā sumadaṃśur lalāmīr dyukṣā rāya ṛjrāśvasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2147: RV_1,100.16c vṛṣaṇvantam bibhratī dhūrṣu ratham mandrā ciketa nāhuṣīṣu vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2148: RV_1,100.17a etat tyat ta indra vṛṣṇa ukthaṃ vārṣāgirā abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2149: RV_1,100.17c ṛjrāśvaḥ praṣṭibhir ambarīṣaḥ sahadevo bhayamānaḥ surādhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2150: RV_1,100.18a dasyūñ chimyūṃś ca puruhūta evair hatvā pṛthivyāṃ śarvā ni barhīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2151: RV_1,100.18c sanat kṣetraṃ sakhibhiḥ śvitnyebhiḥ sanat sūryaṃ sanad apaḥ suvajraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2152: RV_1,100.19a viśvāhendro adhivaktā no astv aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2153: RV_1,100.19c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2154: RV_1,101.01a pra mandine pitumad arcatā vaco yaḥ kṛṣṇagarbhā nirahann ṛjiśvanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2155: RV_1,101.01c avasyavo vṛṣaṇaṃ vajradakṣiṇam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2156: RV_1,101.02a yo vyaṃsaṃ jāhṛṣāṇena manyunā yaḥ śambaraṃ yo ahan piprum avratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2157: RV_1,101.02c indro yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ ny āvṛṇaṅ marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2158: RV_1,101.03a yasya dyāvāpṛthivī pauṃsyam mahad yasya vrate varuṇo yasya sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2159: RV_1,101.03c yasyendrasya sindhavaḥ saścati vratam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2160: RV_1,101.04a yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ gopatir vaśī ya āritaḥ karmaṇi-karmaṇi sthiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2161: RV_1,101.04c vīḷoś cid indro yo asunvato vadho marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2162: RV_1,101.05a yo viśvasya jagataḥ prāṇatas patir yo brahmaṇe prathamo gā avindat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2163: RV_1,101.05c indro yo dasyūṃr adharāṃ avātiran marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2164: RV_1,101.06a yaḥ śūrebhir havyo yaś ca bhīrubhir yo dhāvadbhir hūyate yaś ca jigyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2165: RV_1,101.06c indraṃ yaṃ viśvā bhuvanābhi saṃdadhur marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2166: RV_1,101.07a rudrāṇām eti pradiśā vicakṣaṇo rudrebhir yoṣā tanute pṛthu jrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2167: RV_1,101.07c indram manīṣā abhy arcati śrutam marutvantaṃ sakhyāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2168: RV_1,101.08a yad vā marutvaḥ parame sadhasthe yad vāvame vṛjane mādayāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:2169: RV_1,101.08c ata ā yāhy adhvaraṃ no acchā tvāyā haviś cakṛmā satyarādhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2170: RV_1,101.09a tvāyendra somaṃ suṣumā sudakṣa tvāyā haviś cakṛmā brahmavāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2171: RV_1,101.09c adhā niyutvaḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmin yajñe barhiṣi mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:2172: RV_1,101.10a mādayasva haribhir ye ta indra vi ṣyasva śipre vi sṛjasva dhene /
GV01rvh1-10u:2173: RV_1,101.10c ā tvā suśipra harayo vahantūśan havyāni prati no juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:2174: RV_1,101.11a marutstotrasya vṛjanasya gopā vayam indreṇa sanuyāma vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2175: RV_1,101.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2176: RV_1,102.01a imāṃ te dhiyam pra bhare maho mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat ta ānaje /
GV01rvh1-10u:2177: RV_1,102.01c tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indraṃ devāsaḥ śavasāmadann anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2178: RV_1,102.02a asya śravo nadyaḥ sapta bibhrati dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī darśataṃ vapuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2179: RV_1,102.02c asme sūryācandramasābhicakṣe śraddhe kam indra carato vitarturam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2180: RV_1,102.03a taṃ smā ratham maghavan prāva sātaye jaitraṃ yaṃ te anumadāma saṃgame /
GV01rvh1-10u:2181: RV_1,102.03c ājā na indra manasā puruṣṭuta tvāyadbhyo maghavañ charma yaccha naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2182: RV_1,102.04a vayaṃ jayema tvayā yujā vṛtam asmākam aṃśam ud avā bhare-bhare /
GV01rvh1-10u:2183: RV_1,102.04c asmabhyam indra varivaḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi pra śatrūṇām maghavan vṛṣṇyā ruja //
GV01rvh1-10u:2184: RV_1,102.05a nānā hi tvā havamānā janā ime dhanānāṃ dhartar avasā vipanyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2185: RV_1,102.05c asmākaṃ smā ratham ā tiṣṭha sātaye jaitraṃ hīndra nibhṛtam manas tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:2186: RV_1,102.06a gojitā bāhū amitakratuḥ simaḥ karman-karmañ chatamūtiḥ khajaṅkaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2187: RV_1,102.06c akalpa indraḥ pratimānam ojasāthā janā vi hvayante siṣāsavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2188: RV_1,102.07a ut te śatān maghavann uc ca bhūyasa ut sahasrād ririce kṛṣṭiṣu śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2189: RV_1,102.07c amātraṃ tvā dhiṣaṇā titviṣe mahy adhā vṛtrāṇi jighnase purandara //
GV01rvh1-10u:2190: RV_1,102.08a triviṣṭidhātu pratimānam ojasas tisro bhūmīr nṛpate trīṇi rocanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2191: RV_1,102.08c atīdaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vavakṣithāśatrur indra januṣā sanād asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:2192: RV_1,102.09a tvāṃ deveṣu prathamaṃ havāmahe tvam babhūtha pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2193: RV_1,102.09c semaṃ naḥ kārum upamanyum udbhidam indraḥ kṛṇotu prasave ratham puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2194: RV_1,102.10a tvaṃ jigetha na dhanā rurodhithārbheṣv ājā maghavan mahatsu ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:2195: RV_1,102.10c tvām ugram avase saṃ śiśīmasy athā na indra havaneṣu codaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2196: RV_1,102.11a viśvāhendro adhivaktā no astv aparihvṛtāḥ sanuyāma vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2197: RV_1,102.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2198: RV_1,103.01a tat ta indriyam paramam parācair adhārayanta kavayaḥ puredam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2199: RV_1,103.01c kṣamedam anyad divy anyad asya sam ī pṛcyate samaneva ketuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2200: RV_1,103.02a sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathac ca vajreṇa hatvā nir apaḥ sasarja /
GV01rvh1-10u:2201: RV_1,103.02c ahann ahim abhinad rauhiṇaṃ vy ahan vyaṃsam maghavā śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2202: RV_1,103.03a sa jātūbharmā śraddadhāna ojaḥ puro vibhindann acarad vi dāsīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2203: RV_1,103.03c vidvān vajrin dasyave hetim asyāryaṃ saho vardhayā dyumnam indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:2204: RV_1,103.04a tad ūcuṣe mānuṣemā yugāni kīrtenyam maghavā nāma bibhrat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2205: RV_1,103.04c upaprayan dasyuhatyāya vajrī yad dha sūnuḥ śravase nāma dadhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2206: RV_1,103.05a tad asyedam paśyatā bhūri puṣṭaṃ śrad indrasya dhattana vīryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2207: RV_1,103.05c sa gā avindat so avindad aśvān sa oṣadhīḥ so apaḥ sa vanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:2208: RV_1,103.06a bhūrikarmaṇe vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe satyaśuṣmāya sunavāma somam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2209: RV_1,103.06c ya ādṛtyā paripanthīva śūro 'yajvano vibhajann eti vedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2210: RV_1,103.07a tad indra preva vīryaṃ cakartha yat sasantaṃ vajreṇābodhayo 'him /
GV01rvh1-10u:2211: RV_1,103.07c anu tvā patnīr hṛṣitaṃ vayaś ca viśve devāso amadann anu tvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2212: RV_1,103.08a śuṣṇam pipruṃ kuyavaṃ vṛtram indra yadāvadhīr vi puraḥ śambarasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2213: RV_1,103.08c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2214: RV_1,104.01a yoniṣ ṭa indra niṣade akāri tam ā ni ṣīda svāno nārvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2215: RV_1,104.01c vimucyā vayo 'vasāyāśvān doṣā vastor vahīyasaḥ prapitve //
GV01rvh1-10u:2216: RV_1,104.02a o tye nara indram ūtaye gur nū cit tān sadyo adhvano jagamyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2217: RV_1,104.02c devāso manyuṃ dāsasya ścamnan te na ā vakṣan suvitāya varṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2218: RV_1,104.03a ava tmanā bharate ketavedā ava tmanā bharate phenam udan /
GV01rvh1-10u:2219: RV_1,104.03c kṣīreṇa snātaḥ kuyavasya yoṣe hate te syātām pravaṇe śiphāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2220: RV_1,104.04a yuyopa nābhir uparasyāyoḥ pra pūrvābhis tirate rāṣṭi śūraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2221: RV_1,104.04c añjasī kuliśī vīrapatnī payo hinvānā udabhir bharante //
GV01rvh1-10u:2222: RV_1,104.05a prati yat syā nīthādarśi dasyor oko nācchā sadanaṃ jānatī gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2223: RV_1,104.05c adha smā no maghavañ carkṛtād in mā no magheva niṣṣapī parā dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2224: RV_1,104.06a sa tvaṃ na indra sūrye so apsv anāgāstva ā bhaja jīvaśaṃse /
GV01rvh1-10u:2225: RV_1,104.06c māntarām bhujam ā rīriṣo naḥ śraddhitaṃ te mahata indriyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2226: RV_1,104.07a adhā manye śrat te asmā adhāyi vṛṣā codasva mahate dhanāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2227: RV_1,104.07c mā no akṛte puruhūta yonāv indra kṣudhyadbhyo vaya āsutiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2228: RV_1,104.08a mā no vadhīr indra mā parā dā mā naḥ priyā bhojanāni pra moṣīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2229: RV_1,104.08c āṇḍā mā no maghavañ chakra nir bhen mā naḥ pātrā bhet sahajānuṣāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:2230: RV_1,104.09a arvāṅ ehi somakāmaṃ tvāhur ayaṃ sutas tasya pibā madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2231: RV_1,104.09c uruvyacā jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva piteva naḥ śṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2232: RV_1,105.01a candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2233: RV_1,105.01c na vo hiraṇyanemayaḥ padaṃ vindanti vidyuto vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2234: RV_1,105.02a artham id vā u arthina ā jāyā yuvate patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2235: RV_1,105.02c tuñjāte vṛṣṇyam payaḥ paridāya rasaṃ duhe vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2236: RV_1,105.03a mo ṣu devā adaḥ svar ava pādi divas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:2237: RV_1,105.03c mā somyasya śambhuvaḥ śūne bhūma kadā cana vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2238: RV_1,105.04a yajñam pṛcchāmy avamaṃ sa tad dūto vi vocati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2239: RV_1,105.04c kva ṛtam pūrvyaṃ gataṃ kas tad bibharti nūtano vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2240: RV_1,105.05a amī ye devā sthana triṣv ā rocane divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2241: RV_1,105.05c kad va ṛtaṃ kad anṛtaṃ kva pratnā va āhutir vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2242: RV_1,105.06a kad va ṛtasya dharṇasi kad varuṇasya cakṣaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2243: RV_1,105.06c kad aryamṇo mahas pathāti krāmema dūḍhyo vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2244: RV_1,105.07a ahaṃ so asmi yaḥ purā sute vadāmi kāni cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:2245: RV_1,105.07c tam mā vyanty ādhyo vṛko na tṛṣṇajam mṛgaṃ vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2246: RV_1,105.08a sam mā tapanty abhitaḥ sapatnīr iva parśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2247: RV_1,105.08c mūṣo na śiśnā vy adanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2248: RV_1,105.09a amī ye sapta raśmayas tatrā me nābhir ātatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2249: RV_1,105.09c tritas tad vedāptyaḥ sa jāmitvāya rebhati vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2250: RV_1,105.10a amī ye pañcokṣaṇo madhye tasthur maho divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2251: RV_1,105.10c devatrā nu pravācyaṃ sadhrīcīnā ni vāvṛtur vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2252: RV_1,105.11a suparṇā eta āsate madhya ārodhane divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2253: RV_1,105.11c te sedhanti patho vṛkaṃ tarantaṃ yahvatīr apo vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2254: RV_1,105.12a navyaṃ tad ukthyaṃ hitaṃ devāsaḥ supravācanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2255: RV_1,105.12c ṛtam arṣanti sindhavaḥ satyaṃ tātāna sūryo vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2256: RV_1,105.13a agne tava tyad ukthyaṃ deveṣv asty āpyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2257: RV_1,105.13c sa naḥ satto manuṣvad ā devān yakṣi viduṣṭaro vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2258: RV_1,105.14a satto hotā manuṣvad ā devāṃ acchā viduṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2259: RV_1,105.14c agnir havyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiro vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2260: RV_1,105.15a brahmā kṛṇoti varuṇo gātuvidaṃ tam īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2261: RV_1,105.15c vy ūrṇoti hṛdā matiṃ navyo jāyatām ṛtaṃ vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2262: RV_1,105.16a asau yaḥ panthā ādityo divi pravācyaṃ kṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2263: RV_1,105.16c na sa devā atikrame tam martāso na paśyatha vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2264: RV_1,105.17a tritaḥ kūpe 'vahito devān havata ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2265: RV_1,105.17c tac chuśrāva bṛhaspatiḥ kṛṇvann aṃhūraṇād uru vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2266: RV_1,105.18a aruṇo mā sakṛd vṛkaḥ pathā yantaṃ dadarśa hi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2267: RV_1,105.18c uj jihīte nicāyyā taṣṭeva pṛṣṭyāmayī vittam me asya rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2268: RV_1,105.19a enāṅgūṣeṇa vayam indravanto 'bhi ṣyāma vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2269: RV_1,105.19c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
