GV01rvh1-10u:2270: RV_1,106.01a indram mitraṃ varuṇam agnim ūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃ havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2271: RV_1,106.01c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2272: RV_1,106.02a ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye bhūta devā vṛtratūryeṣu śambhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2273: RV_1,106.02c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2274: RV_1,106.03a avantu naḥ pitaraḥ supravācanā uta devī devaputre ṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2275: RV_1,106.03c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2276: RV_1,106.04a narāśaṃsaṃ vājinaṃ vājayann iha kṣayadvīram pūṣaṇaṃ sumnair īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2277: RV_1,106.04c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2278: RV_1,106.05a bṛhaspate sadam in naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi śaṃ yor yat te manurhitaṃ tad īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2279: RV_1,106.05c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2280: RV_1,106.06a indraṃ kutso vṛtrahaṇaṃ śacīpatiṃ kāṭe nibāḷha ṛṣir ahvad ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2281: RV_1,106.06c rathaṃ na durgād vasavaḥ sudānavo viśvasmān no aṃhaso niṣ pipartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2282: RV_1,106.07a devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:2283: RV_1,106.07c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2284: RV_1,107.01a yajño devānām praty eti sumnam ādityāso bhavatā mṛḷayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2285: RV_1,107.01c ā vo 'rvācī sumatir vavṛtyād aṃhoś cid yā varivovittarāsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2286: RV_1,107.02a upa no devā avasā gamantv aṅgirasāṃ sāmabhi stūyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2287: RV_1,107.02c indra indriyair maruto marudbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2288: RV_1,107.03a tan na indras tad varuṇas tad agnis tad aryamā tat savitā cano dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2289: RV_1,107.03c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2290: RV_1,108.01a ya indrāgnī citratamo ratho vām abhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2291: RV_1,108.01c tenā yātaṃ sarathaṃ tasthivāṃsāthā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2292: RV_1,108.02a yāvad idam bhuvanaṃ viśvam asty uruvyacā varimatā gabhīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:2293: RV_1,108.02c tāvāṃ ayam pātave somo astv aram indrāgnī manase yuvabhyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2294: RV_1,108.03a cakrāthe hi sadhryaṅ nāma bhadraṃ sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇā uta sthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2295: RV_1,108.03c tāv indrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2296: RV_1,108.04a samiddheṣv agniṣv ānajānā yatasrucā barhir u tistirāṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2297: RV_1,108.04c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhir arvāg endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2298: RV_1,108.05a yānīndrāgnī cakrathur vīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇy uta vṛṣṇyāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:2299: RV_1,108.05c yā vām pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2300: RV_1,108.06a yad abravam prathamaṃ vāṃ vṛṇāno 'yaṃ somo asurair no vihavyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2301: RV_1,108.06c tāṃ satyāṃ śraddhām abhy ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2302: RV_1,108.07a yad indrāgnī madathaḥ sve duroṇe yad brahmaṇi rājani vā yajatrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2303: RV_1,108.07c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2304: RV_1,108.08a yad indrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yad druhyuṣv anuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2305: RV_1,108.08c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2306: RV_1,108.09a yad indrāgnī avamasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām paramasyām uta sthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2307: RV_1,108.09c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2308: RV_1,108.10a yad indrāgnī paramasyām pṛthivyām madhyamasyām avamasyām uta sthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2309: RV_1,108.10c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2310: RV_1,108.11a yad indrāgnī divi ṣṭho yat pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣv oṣadhīṣv apsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2311: RV_1,108.11c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2312: RV_1,108.12a yad indrāgnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2313: RV_1,108.12c ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāv ā hi yātam athā somasya pibataṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2314: RV_1,108.13a evendrāgnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvāsmabhyaṃ saṃ jayataṃ dhanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:2315: RV_1,108.13c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2316: RV_1,109.01a vi hy akhyam manasā vasya icchann indrāgnī jñāsa uta vā sajātān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2317: RV_1,109.01c nānyā yuvat pramatir asti mahyaṃ sa vāṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantīm atakṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2318: RV_1,109.02a aśravaṃ hi bhūridāvattarā vāṃ vijāmātur uta vā ghā syālāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2319: RV_1,109.02c athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyām indrāgnī stomaṃ janayāmi navyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2320: RV_1,109.03a mā cchedma raśmīṃr iti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇāṃ śaktīr anuyacchamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2321: RV_1,109.03c indrāgnibhyāṃ kaṃ vṛṣaṇo madanti tā hy adrī dhiṣaṇāyā upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2322: RV_1,109.04a yuvābhyāṃ devī dhiṣaṇā madāyendrāgnī somam uśatī sunoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2323: RV_1,109.04c tāv aśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī ā dhāvatam madhunā pṛṅktam apsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2324: RV_1,109.05a yuvām indrāgnī vasuno vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2325: RV_1,109.05c tāv āsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethāṃ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2326: RV_1,109.06a pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:2327: RV_1,109.06c pra sindhubhyaḥ pra giribhyo mahitvā prendrāgnī viśvā bhuvanāty anyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2328: RV_1,109.07a ā bharataṃ śikṣataṃ vajrabāhū asmāṃ indrāgnī avataṃ śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2329: RV_1,109.07c ime nu te raśmayaḥ sūryasya yebhiḥ sapitvam pitaro na āsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:2330: RV_1,109.08a purandarā śikṣataṃ vajrahastāsmāṃ indrāgnī avatam bhareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2331: RV_1,109.08c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2332: RV_1,110.01a tatam me apas tad u tāyate punaḥ svādiṣṭhā dhītir ucathāya śasyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2333: RV_1,110.01c ayaṃ samudra iha viśvadevyaḥ svāhākṛtasya sam u tṛpṇuta ṛbhavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2334: RV_1,110.02a ābhogayam pra yad icchanta aitanāpākāḥ prāñco mama ke cid āpayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2335: RV_1,110.02c saudhanvanāsaś caritasya bhūmanāgacchata savitur dāśuṣo gṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:2336: RV_1,110.03a tat savitā vo 'mṛtatvam āsuvad agohyaṃ yac chravayanta aitana /
GV01rvh1-10u:2337: RV_1,110.03c tyaṃ cic camasam asurasya bhakṣaṇam ekaṃ santam akṛṇutā caturvayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2338: RV_1,110.04a viṣṭvī śamī taraṇitvena vāghato martāsaḥ santo amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2339: RV_1,110.04c saudhanvanā ṛbhavaḥ sūracakṣasaḥ saṃvatsare sam apṛcyanta dhītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2340: RV_1,110.05a kṣetram iva vi mamus tejanenaṃ ekam pātram ṛbhavo jehamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2341: RV_1,110.05c upastutā upamaṃ nādhamānā amartyeṣu śrava icchamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2342: RV_1,110.06a ā manīṣām antarikṣasya nṛbhyaḥ sruceva ghṛtaṃ juhavāma vidmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2343: RV_1,110.06c taraṇitvā ye pitur asya saścira ṛbhavo vājam aruhan divo rajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2344: RV_1,110.07a ṛbhur na indraḥ śavasā navīyān ṛbhur vājebhir vasubhir vasur dadiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2345: RV_1,110.07c yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priye 'bhi tiṣṭhema pṛtsutīr asunvatām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2346: RV_1,110.08a niś carmaṇa ṛbhavo gām apiṃśata saṃ vatsenāsṛjatā mātaram punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2347: RV_1,110.08c saudhanvanāsaḥ svapasyayā naro jivrī yuvānā pitarākṛṇotana //
GV01rvh1-10u:2348: RV_1,110.09a vājebhir no vājasātāv aviḍḍhy ṛbhumāṃ indra citram ā darṣi rādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2349: RV_1,110.09c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2350: RV_1,111.01a takṣan rathaṃ suvṛtaṃ vidmanāpasas takṣan harī indravāhā vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:2351: RV_1,111.01c takṣan pitṛbhyām ṛbhavo yuvad vayas takṣan vatsāya mātaraṃ sacābhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2352: RV_1,111.02a ā no yajñāya takṣata ṛbhumad vayaḥ kratve dakṣāya suprajāvatīm iṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2353: RV_1,111.02c yathā kṣayāma sarvavīrayā viśā tan naḥ śardhāya dhāsathā sv indriyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2354: RV_1,111.03a ā takṣata sātim asmabhyam ṛbhavaḥ sātiṃ rathāya sātim arvate naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2355: RV_1,111.03c sātiṃ no jaitrīṃ sam maheta viśvahā jāmim ajāmim pṛtanāsu sakṣaṇim //
GV01rvh1-10u:2356: RV_1,111.04a ṛbhukṣaṇam indram ā huva ūtaya ṛbhūn vājān marutaḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2357: RV_1,111.04c ubhā mitrāvaruṇā nūnam aśvinā te no hinvantu sātaye dhiye jiṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2358: RV_1,111.05a ṛbhur bharāya saṃ śiśātu sātiṃ samaryajid vājo asmāṃ aviṣṭu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2359: RV_1,111.05c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2360: RV_1,112.01a īḷe dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvacittaye 'gniṃ gharmaṃ surucaṃ yāmann iṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2361: RV_1,112.01c yābhir bhare kāram aṃśāya jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2362: RV_1,112.02a yuvor dānāya subharā asaścato ratham ā tasthur vacasaṃ na mantave /
GV01rvh1-10u:2363: RV_1,112.02c yābhir dhiyo 'vathaḥ karmann iṣṭaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2364: RV_1,112.03a yuvaṃ tāsāṃ divyasya praśāsane viśāṃ kṣayatho amṛtasya majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2365: RV_1,112.03c yābhir dhenum asvam pinvatho narā tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2366: RV_1,112.04a yābhiḥ parijmā tanayasya majmanā dvimātā tūrṣu taraṇir vibhūṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2367: RV_1,112.04c yābhis trimantur abhavad vicakṣaṇas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2368: RV_1,112.05a yābhī rebhaṃ nivṛtaṃ sitam adbhya ud vandanam airayataṃ svar dṛśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2369: RV_1,112.05c yābhiḥ kaṇvam pra siṣāsantam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2370: RV_1,112.06a yābhir antakaṃ jasamānam āraṇe bhujyuṃ yābhir avyathibhir jijinvathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2371: RV_1,112.06c yābhiḥ karkandhuṃ vayyaṃ ca jinvathas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2372: RV_1,112.07a yābhiḥ śucantiṃ dhanasāṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ taptaṃ gharmam omyāvantam atraye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2373: RV_1,112.07c yābhiḥ pṛśnigum purukutsam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2374: RV_1,112.08a yābhiḥ śacībhir vṛṣaṇā parāvṛjam prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ cakṣasa etave kṛthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2375: RV_1,112.08c yābhir vartikāṃ grasitām amuñcataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2376: RV_1,112.09a yābhiḥ sindhum madhumantam asaścataṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ yābhir ajarāv ajinvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2377: RV_1,112.09c yābhiḥ kutsaṃ śrutaryaṃ naryam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2378: RV_1,112.10a yābhir viśpalāṃ dhanasām atharvyaṃ sahasramīḷha ājāv ajinvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2379: RV_1,112.10c yābhir vaśam aśvyam preṇim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2380: RV_1,112.11a yābhiḥ sudānū auśijāya vaṇije dīrghaśravase madhu kośo akṣarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2381: RV_1,112.11c kakṣīvantaṃ stotāraṃ yābhir āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2382: RV_1,112.12a yābhī rasāṃ kṣodasodnaḥ pipinvathur anaśvaṃ yābhī ratham āvataṃ jiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2383: RV_1,112.12c yābhis triśoka usriyā udājata tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2384: RV_1,112.13a yābhiḥ sūryam pariyāthaḥ parāvati mandhātāraṃ kṣaitrapatyeṣv āvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2385: RV_1,112.13c yābhir vipram pra bharadvājam āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2386: RV_1,112.14a yābhir mahām atithigvaṃ kaśojuvaṃ divodāsaṃ śambarahatya āvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2387: RV_1,112.14c yābhiḥ pūrbhidye trasadasyum āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2388: RV_1,112.15a yābhir vamraṃ vipipānam upastutaṃ kaliṃ yābhir vittajāniṃ duvasyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2389: RV_1,112.15c yābhir vyaśvam uta pṛthim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2390: RV_1,112.16a yābhir narā śayave yābhir atraye yābhiḥ purā manave gātum īṣathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2391: RV_1,112.16c yābhiḥ śārīr ājataṃ syūmaraśmaye tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2392: RV_1,112.17a yābhiḥ paṭharvā jaṭharasya majmanāgnir nādīdec cita iddho ajmann ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2393: RV_1,112.17c yābhiḥ śaryātam avatho mahādhane tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2394: RV_1,112.18a yābhir aṅgiro manasā niraṇyatho 'graṃ gacchatho vivare goarṇasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2395: RV_1,112.18c yābhir manuṃ śūram iṣā samāvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2396: RV_1,112.19a yābhiḥ patnīr vimadāya nyūhathur ā gha vā yābhir aruṇīr aśikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2397: RV_1,112.19c yābhiḥ sudāsa ūhathuḥ sudevyaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2398: RV_1,112.20a yābhiḥ śantātī bhavatho dadāśuṣe bhujyuṃ yābhir avatho yābhir adhrigum /
GV01rvh1-10u:2399: RV_1,112.20c omyāvatīṃ subharām ṛtastubhaṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2400: RV_1,112.21a yābhiḥ kṛśānum asane duvasyatho jave yābhir yūno arvantam āvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2401: RV_1,112.21c madhu priyam bharatho yat saraḍbhyas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2402: RV_1,112.22a yābhir naraṃ goṣuyudhaṃ nṛṣāhye kṣetrasya sātā tanayasya jinvathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2403: RV_1,112.22c yābhī rathāṃ avatho yābhir arvatas tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2404: RV_1,112.23a yābhiḥ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ śatakratū pra turvītim pra ca dabhītim āvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2405: RV_1,112.23c yābhir dhvasantim puruṣantim āvataṃ tābhir ū ṣu ūtibhir aśvinā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2406: RV_1,112.24a apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtaṃ no dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2407: RV_1,112.24c adyūtye 'vase ni hvaye vāṃ vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:2408: RV_1,112.25a dyubhir aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhir aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2409: RV_1,112.25c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2410: RV_1,113.01a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir āgāc citraḥ praketo ajaniṣṭa vibhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2411: RV_1,113.01c yathā prasūtā savituḥ savāyaṃ evā rātry uṣase yonim āraik //
GV01rvh1-10u:2412: RV_1,113.02a ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyāgād āraig u kṛṣṇā sadanāny asyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2413: RV_1,113.02c samānabandhū amṛte anūcī dyāvā varṇaṃ carata āmināne //
GV01rvh1-10u:2414: RV_1,113.03a samāno adhvā svasror anantas tam anyānyā carato devaśiṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2415: RV_1,113.03c na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2416: RV_1,113.04a bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānām aceti citrā vi duro na āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2417: RV_1,113.04c prārpyā jagad vy u no rāyo akhyad uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2418: RV_1,113.05a jihmaśye caritave maghony ābhogaya iṣṭaye rāya u tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2419: RV_1,113.05c dabhram paśyadbhya urviyā vicakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2420: RV_1,113.06a kṣatrāya tvaṃ śravase tvam mahīyā iṣṭaye tvam artham iva tvam ityai /
GV01rvh1-10u:2421: RV_1,113.06c visadṛśā jīvitābhipracakṣa uṣā ajīgar bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2422: RV_1,113.07a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi vyucchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2423: RV_1,113.07c viśvasyeśānā pārthivasya vasva uṣo adyeha subhage vy uccha //
GV01rvh1-10u:2424: RV_1,113.08a parāyatīnām anv eti pātha āyatīnām prathamā śaśvatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2425: RV_1,113.08c vyucchantī jīvam udīrayanty uṣā mṛtaṃ kaṃ cana bodhayantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2426: RV_1,113.09a uṣo yad agniṃ samidhe cakartha vi yad āvaś cakṣasā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2427: RV_1,113.09c yan mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇāṃ ajīgas tad deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadram apnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2428: RV_1,113.10a kiyāty ā yat samayā bhavāti yā vyūṣur yāś ca nūnaṃ vyucchān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2429: RV_1,113.10c anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣam anyābhir eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2430: RV_1,113.11a īyuṣ ṭe ye pūrvatarām apaśyan vyucchantīm uṣasam martyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2431: RV_1,113.11c asmābhir ū nu praticakṣyābhūd o te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:2432: RV_1,113.12a yāvayaddveṣā ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtā īrayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2433: RV_1,113.12c sumaṅgalīr bibhratī devavītim ihādyoṣaḥ śreṣṭhatamā vy uccha //
GV01rvh1-10u:2434: RV_1,113.13a śaśvat puroṣā vy uvāsa devy atho adyedaṃ vy āvo maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2435: RV_1,113.13c atho vy ucchād uttarāṃ anu dyūn ajarāmṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2436: RV_1,113.14a vy añjibhir diva ātāsv adyaud apa kṛṣṇāṃ nirṇijaṃ devy āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2437: RV_1,113.14c prabodhayanty aruṇebhir aśvair oṣā yāti suyujā rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:2438: RV_1,113.15a āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citraṃ ketuṃ kṛṇute cekitānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2439: RV_1,113.15c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnāṃ vibhātīnām prathamoṣā vy aśvait //
GV01rvh1-10u:2440: RV_1,113.16a ud īrdhvaṃ jīvo asur na āgād apa prāgāt tama ā jyotir eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2441: RV_1,113.16c āraik panthāṃ yātave sūryāyāganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2442: RV_1,113.17a syūmanā vāca ud iyarti vahni stavāno rebha uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2443: RV_1,113.17c adyā tad uccha gṛṇate maghony asme āyur ni didīhi prajāvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2444: RV_1,113.18a yā gomatīr uṣasaḥ sarvavīrā vyucchanti dāśuṣe martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2445: RV_1,113.18c vāyor iva sūnṛtānām udarke tā aśvadā aśnavat somasutvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2446: RV_1,113.19a mātā devānām aditer anīkaṃ yajñasya ketur bṛhatī vi bhāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2447: RV_1,113.19c praśastikṛd brahmaṇe no vy ucchā no jane janaya viśvavāre //
GV01rvh1-10u:2448: RV_1,113.20a yac citram apna uṣaso vahantījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram /
GV01rvh1-10u:2449: RV_1,113.20c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2450: RV_1,114.01a imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2451: RV_1,114.01c yathā śam asad dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭaṃ grāme asminn anāturam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2452: RV_1,114.02a mṛḷā no rudrota no mayas kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhema te /
GV01rvh1-10u:2453: RV_1,114.02c yac chaṃ ca yoś ca manur āyeje pitā tad aśyāma tava rudra praṇītiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2454: RV_1,114.03a aśyāma te sumatiṃ devayajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2455: RV_1,114.03c sumnāyann id viśo asmākam ā carāriṣṭavīrā juhavāma te haviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2456: RV_1,114.04a tveṣaṃ vayaṃ rudraṃ yajñasādhaṃ vaṅkuṃ kavim avase ni hvayāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2457: RV_1,114.04c āre asmad daivyaṃ heḷo asyatu sumatim id vayam asyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2458: RV_1,114.05a divo varāham aruṣaṃ kapardinaṃ tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ namasā ni hvayāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2459: RV_1,114.05c haste bibhrad bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma cchardir asmabhyaṃ yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2460: RV_1,114.06a idam pitre marutām ucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyo rudrāya vardhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2461: RV_1,114.06c rāsvā ca no amṛta martabhojanaṃ tmane tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa //
GV01rvh1-10u:2462: RV_1,114.07a mā no mahāntam uta mā no arbhakam mā na ukṣantam uta mā na ukṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2463: RV_1,114.07c mā no vadhīḥ pitaram mota mātaram mā naḥ priyās tanvo rudra rīriṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2464: RV_1,114.08a mā nas toke tanaye mā na āyau mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣu rīriṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2465: RV_1,114.08c vīrān mā no rudra bhāmito vadhīr haviṣmantaḥ sadam it tvā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2466: RV_1,114.09a upa te stomān paśupā ivākaraṃ rāsvā pitar marutāṃ sumnam asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:2467: RV_1,114.09c bhadrā hi te sumatir mṛḷayattamāthā vayam ava it te vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2468: RV_1,114.10a āre te goghnam uta pūruṣaghnaṃ kṣayadvīra sumnam asme te astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2469: RV_1,114.10c mṛḷā ca no adhi ca brūhi devādhā ca naḥ śarma yaccha dvibarhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2470: RV_1,114.11a avocāma namo asmā avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu no havaṃ rudro marutvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2471: RV_1,114.11c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2472: RV_1,115.01a citraṃ devānām ud agād anīkaṃ cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasyāgneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2473: RV_1,115.01c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:2474: RV_1,115.02a sūryo devīm uṣasaṃ rocamānām maryo na yoṣām abhy eti paścāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2475: RV_1,115.02c yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram //
GV01rvh1-10u:2476: RV_1,115.03a bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2477: RV_1,115.03c namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭham asthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2478: RV_1,115.04a tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvam madhyā kartor vitataṃ saṃ jabhāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:2479: RV_1,115.04c yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:2480: RV_1,115.05a tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyor upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2481: RV_1,115.05c anantam anyad ruśad asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ sam bharanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2482: RV_1,115.06a adyā devā uditā sūryasya nir aṃhasaḥ pipṛtā nir avadyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2483: RV_1,115.06c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2484: RV_1,116.01a nāsatyābhyām barhir iva pra vṛñje stomāṃ iyarmy abhriyeva vātaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2485: RV_1,116.01c yāv arbhagāya vimadāya jāyāṃ senājuvā nyūhatū rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:2486: RV_1,116.02a vīḷupatmabhir āśuhemabhir vā devānāṃ vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2487: RV_1,116.02c tad rāsabho nāsatyā sahasram ājā yamasya pradhane jigāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2488: RV_1,116.03a tugro ha bhujyum aśvinodameghe rayiṃ na kaś cin mamṛvāṃ avāhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2489: RV_1,116.03c tam ūhathur naubhir ātmanvatībhir antarikṣaprudbhir apodakābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2490: RV_1,116.04a tisraḥ kṣapas trir ahātivrajadbhir nāsatyā bhujyum ūhathuḥ pataṅgaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2491: RV_1,116.04c samudrasya dhanvann ārdrasya pāre tribhī rathaiḥ śatapadbhiḥ ṣaḷaśvaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2492: RV_1,116.05a anārambhaṇe tad avīrayethām anāsthāne agrabhaṇe samudre /
GV01rvh1-10u:2493: RV_1,116.05c yad aśvinā ūhathur bhujyum astaṃ śatāritrāṃ nāvam ātasthivāṃsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2494: RV_1,116.06a yam aśvinā dadathuḥ śvetam aśvam aghāśvāya śaśvad it svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2495: RV_1,116.06c tad vāṃ dātram mahi kīrtenyam bhūt paidvo vājī sadam id dhavyo aryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2496: RV_1,116.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradatam purandhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2497: RV_1,116.07c kārotarāc chaphād aśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcataṃ surāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2498: RV_1,116.08a himenāgniṃ ghraṃsam avārayethām pitumatīm ūrjam asmā adhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2499: RV_1,116.08c ṛbīse atrim aśvināvanītam un ninyathuḥ sarvagaṇaṃ svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2500: RV_1,116.09a parāvataṃ nāsatyānudethām uccābudhnaṃ cakrathur jihmabāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:2501: RV_1,116.09c kṣarann āpo na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2502: RV_1,116.10a jujuruṣo nāsatyota vavrim prāmuñcataṃ drāpim iva cyavānāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2503: RV_1,116.10c prātirataṃ jahitasyāyur dasrād it patim akṛṇutaṃ kanīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2504: RV_1,116.11a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ rādhyaṃ cābhiṣṭiman nāsatyā varūtham /
GV01rvh1-10u:2505: RV_1,116.11c yad vidvāṃsā nidhim ivāpagūḷham ud darśatād ūpathur vandanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2506: RV_1,116.12a tad vāṃ narā sanaye daṃsa ugram āviṣ kṛṇomi tanyatur na vṛṣṭim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2507: RV_1,116.12c dadhyaṅ ha yan madhv ātharvaṇo vām aśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yad īm uvāca //
GV01rvh1-10u:2508: RV_1,116.13a ajohavīn nāsatyā karā vām mahe yāman purubhujā purandhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2509: RV_1,116.13c śrutaṃ tac chāsur iva vadhrimatyā hiraṇyahastam aśvināv adattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2510: RV_1,116.14a āsno vṛkasya vartikām abhīke yuvaṃ narā nāsatyāmumuktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2511: RV_1,116.14c uto kavim purubhujā yuvaṃ ha kṛpamāṇam akṛṇutaṃ vicakṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2512: RV_1,116.15a caritraṃ hi ver ivācchedi parṇam ājā khelasya paritakmyāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2513: RV_1,116.15c sadyo jaṅghām āyasīṃ viśpalāyai dhane hite sartave praty adhattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2514: RV_1,116.16a śatam meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvaṃ tam pitāndhaṃ cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:2515: RV_1,116.16c tasmā akṣī nāsatyā vicakṣa ādhattaṃ dasrā bhiṣajāv anarvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:2516: RV_1,116.17a ā vāṃ rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya kārṣmevātiṣṭhad arvatā jayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2517: RV_1,116.17c viśve devā anv amanyanta hṛdbhiḥ sam u śriyā nāsatyā sacethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2518: RV_1,116.18a yad ayātaṃ divodāsāya vartir bharadvājāyāśvinā hayantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2519: RV_1,116.18c revad uvāha sacano ratho vāṃ vṛṣabhaś ca śiṃśumāraś ca yuktā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2520: RV_1,116.19a rayiṃ sukṣatraṃ svapatyam āyuḥ suvīryaṃ nāsatyā vahantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2521: RV_1,116.19c ā jahnāvīṃ samanasopa vājais trir ahno bhāgaṃ dadhatīm ayātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2522: RV_1,116.20a pariviṣṭaṃ jāhuṣaṃ viśvataḥ sīṃ sugebhir naktam ūhathū rajobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2523: RV_1,116.20c vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatāṃ ajarayū ayātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2524: RV_1,116.21a ekasyā vastor āvataṃ raṇāya vaśam aśvinā sanaye sahasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2525: RV_1,116.21c nir ahataṃ ducchunā indravantā pṛthuśravaso vṛṣaṇāv arātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2526: RV_1,116.22a śarasya cid ārcatkasyāvatād ā nīcād uccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2527: RV_1,116.22c śayave cin nāsatyā śacībhir jasuraye staryam pipyathur gām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2528: RV_1,116.23a avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2529: RV_1,116.23c paśuṃ na naṣṭam iva darśanāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2530: RV_1,116.24a daśa rātrīr aśivenā nava dyūn avanaddhaṃ śnathitam apsv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2531: RV_1,116.24c viprutaṃ rebham udani pravṛktam un ninyathuḥ somam iva sruveṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:2532: RV_1,116.25a pra vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvināv avocam asya patiḥ syāṃ sugavaḥ suvīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2533: RV_1,116.25c uta paśyann aśnuvan dīrgham āyur astam ivej jarimāṇaṃ jagamyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2534: RV_1,117.01a madhvaḥ somasyāśvinā madāya pratno hotā vivāsate vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2535: RV_1,117.01c barhiṣmatī rātir viśritā gīr iṣā yātaṃ nāsatyopa vājaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2536: RV_1,117.02a yo vām aśvinā manaso javīyān rathaḥ svaśvo viśa ājigāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2537: RV_1,117.02c yena gacchathaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tena narā vartir asmabhyaṃ yātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2538: RV_1,117.03a ṛṣiṃ narāv aṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsād atrim muñcatho gaṇena /
GV01rvh1-10u:2539: RV_1,117.03c minantā dasyor aśivasya māyā anupūrvaṃ vṛṣaṇā codayantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2540: RV_1,117.04a aśvaṃ na gūḷham aśvinā durevair ṛṣiṃ narā vṛṣaṇā rebham apsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2541: RV_1,117.04c saṃ taṃ riṇītho viprutaṃ daṃsobhir na vāṃ jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:2542: RV_1,117.05a suṣupvāṃsaṃ na nirṛter upasthe sūryaṃ na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2543: RV_1,117.05c śubhe rukmaṃ na darśataṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur aśvinā vandanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2544: RV_1,117.06a tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyam pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman /
GV01rvh1-10u:2545: RV_1,117.06c śaphād aśvasya vājino janāya śataṃ kumbhāṃ asiñcatam madhūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2546: RV_1,117.07a yuvaṃ narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathur viśvakāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2547: RV_1,117.07c ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade duroṇe patiṃ jūryantyā aśvināv adattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2548: RV_1,117.08a yuvaṃ śyāvāya ruśatīm adattam mahaḥ kṣoṇasyāśvinā kaṇvāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2549: RV_1,117.08c pravācyaṃ tad vṛṣaṇā kṛtaṃ vāṃ yan nārṣadāya śravo adhyadhattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2550: RV_1,117.09a purū varpāṃsy aśvinā dadhānā ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2551: RV_1,117.09c sahasrasāṃ vājinam apratītam ahihanaṃ śravasyaṃ tarutram //
GV01rvh1-10u:2552: RV_1,117.10a etāni vāṃ śravasyā sudānū brahmāṅgūṣaṃ sadanaṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2553: RV_1,117.10c yad vām pajrāso aśvinā havante yātam iṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2554: RV_1,117.11a sūnor mānenāśvinā gṛṇānā vājaṃ viprāya bhuraṇā radantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2555: RV_1,117.11c agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā saṃ viśpalāṃ nāsatyāriṇītam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2556: RV_1,117.12a kuha yāntā suṣṭutiṃ kāvyasya divo napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2557: RV_1,117.12c hiraṇyasyeva kalaśaṃ nikhātam ud ūpathur daśame aśvināhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:2558: RV_1,117.13a yuvaṃ cyavānam aśvinā jarantam punar yuvānaṃ cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2559: RV_1,117.13c yuvo rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyāvṛṇīta //
GV01rvh1-10u:2560: RV_1,117.14a yuvaṃ tugrāya pūrvyebhir evaiḥ punarmanyāv abhavataṃ yuvānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2561: RV_1,117.14c yuvam bhujyum arṇaso niḥ samudrād vibhir ūhathur ṛjrebhir aśvaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2562: RV_1,117.15a ajohavīd aśvinā taugryo vām proḷhaḥ samudram avyathir jaganvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2563: RV_1,117.15c niṣ ṭam ūhathuḥ suyujā rathena manojavasā vṛṣaṇā svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2564: RV_1,117.16a ajohavīd aśvinā vartikā vām āsno yat sīm amuñcataṃ vṛkasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2565: RV_1,117.16c vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānv adrer jātaṃ viṣvāco ahataṃ viṣeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:2566: RV_1,117.17a śatam meṣān vṛkye māmahānaṃ tamaḥ praṇītam aśivena pitrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2567: RV_1,117.17c ākṣī ṛjrāśve aśvināv adhattaṃ jyotir andhāya cakrathur vicakṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:2568: RV_1,117.18a śunam andhāya bharam ahvayat sā vṛkīr aśvinā vṛṣaṇā nareti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2569: RV_1,117.18c jāraḥ kanīna iva cakṣadāna ṛjrāśvaḥ śatam ekaṃ ca meṣān //
GV01rvh1-10u:2570: RV_1,117.19a mahī vām ūtir aśvinā mayobhūr uta srāmaṃ dhiṣṇyā saṃ riṇīthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2571: RV_1,117.19c athā yuvām id ahvayat purandhir āgacchataṃ sīṃ vṛṣaṇāv avobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2572: RV_1,117.20a adhenuṃ dasrā staryaṃ viṣaktām apinvataṃ śayave aśvinā gām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2573: RV_1,117.20c yuvaṃ śacībhir vimadāya jāyāṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2574: RV_1,117.21a yavaṃ vṛkeṇāśvinā vapanteṣaṃ duhantā manuṣāya dasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2575: RV_1,117.21c abhi dasyum bakureṇā dhamantoru jyotiś cakrathur āryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2576: RV_1,117.22a ātharvaṇāyāśvinā dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ praty airayatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2577: RV_1,117.22c sa vām madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāv apikakṣyaṃ vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2578: RV_1,117.23a sadā kavī sumatim ā cake vāṃ viśvā dhiyo aśvinā prāvatam me /
GV01rvh1-10u:2579: RV_1,117.23c asme rayiṃ nāsatyā bṛhantam apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2580: RV_1,117.24a hiraṇyahastam aśvinā rarāṇā putraṃ narā vadhrimatyā adattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2581: RV_1,117.24c tridhā ha śyāvam aśvinā vikastam uj jīvasa airayataṃ sudānū //
GV01rvh1-10u:2582: RV_1,117.25a etāni vām aśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇy āyavo 'vocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:2583: RV_1,117.25c brahma kṛṇvanto vṛṣaṇā yuvabhyāṃ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
GV01rvh1-10u:2584: RV_1,118.01a ā vāṃ ratho aśvinā śyenapatvā sumṛḷīkaḥ svavāṃ yātv arvāṅ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2585: RV_1,118.01c yo martyasya manaso javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā vātaraṃhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2586: RV_1,118.02a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena tricakreṇa suvṛtā yātam arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:2587: RV_1,118.02c pinvataṃ gā jinvatam arvato no vardhayatam aśvinā vīram asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:2588: RV_1,118.03a pravadyāmanā suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2589: RV_1,118.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2590: RV_1,118.04a ā vāṃ śyenāso aśvinā vahantu rathe yuktāsa āśavaḥ pataṅgāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2591: RV_1,118.04c ye apturo divyāso na gṛdhrā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2592: RV_1,118.05a ā vāṃ rathaṃ yuvatis tiṣṭhad atra juṣṭvī narā duhitā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2593: RV_1,118.05c pari vām aśvā vapuṣaḥ pataṅgā vayo vahantv aruṣā abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:2594: RV_1,118.06a ud vandanam airataṃ daṃsanābhir ud rebhaṃ dasrā vṛṣaṇā śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2595: RV_1,118.06c niṣ ṭaugryam pārayathaḥ samudrāt punaś cyavānaṃ cakrathur yuvānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2596: RV_1,118.07a yuvam atraye 'vanītāya taptam ūrjam omānam aśvināv adhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2597: RV_1,118.07c yuvaṃ kaṇvāyāpiriptāya cakṣuḥ praty adhattaṃ suṣṭutiṃ jujuṣāṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2598: RV_1,118.08a yuvaṃ dhenuṃ śayave nādhitāyāpinvatam aśvinā pūrvyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2599: RV_1,118.08c amuñcataṃ vartikām aṃhaso niḥ prati jaṅghāṃ viśpalāyā adhattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2600: RV_1,118.09a yuvaṃ śvetam pedava indrajūtam ahihanam aśvinādattam aśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2601: RV_1,118.09c johūtram aryo abhibhūtim ugraṃ sahasrasāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vīḍvaṅgam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2602: RV_1,118.10a tā vāṃ narā sv avase sujātā havāmahe aśvinā nādhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2603: RV_1,118.10c ā na upa vasumatā rathena giro juṣāṇā suvitāya yātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2604: RV_1,118.11a ā śyenasya javasā nūtanenāsme yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2605: RV_1,118.11c have hi vām aśvinā rātahavyaḥ śaśvattamāyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:2606: RV_1,119.01a ā vāṃ ratham purumāyam manojuvaṃ jīrāśvaṃ yajñiyaṃ jīvase huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:2607: RV_1,119.01c sahasraketuṃ vaninaṃ śatadvasuṃ śruṣṭīvānaṃ varivodhām abhi prayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2608: RV_1,119.02a ūrdhvā dhītiḥ praty asya prayāmany adhāyi śasman sam ayanta ā diśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2609: RV_1,119.02c svadāmi gharmam prati yanty ūtaya ā vām ūrjānī ratham aśvināruhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2610: RV_1,119.03a saṃ yan mithaḥ paspṛdhānāso agmata śubhe makhā amitā jāyavo raṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2611: RV_1,119.03c yuvor aha pravaṇe cekite ratho yad aśvinā vahathaḥ sūrim ā varam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2612: RV_1,119.04a yuvam bhujyum bhuramāṇaṃ vibhir gataṃ svayuktibhir nivahantā pitṛbhya ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2613: RV_1,119.04c yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir vṛṣaṇā vijenyaṃ divodāsāya mahi ceti vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2614: RV_1,119.05a yuvor aśvinā vapuṣe yuvāyujaṃ rathaṃ vāṇī yematur asya śardhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2615: RV_1,119.05c ā vām patitvaṃ sakhyāya jagmuṣī yoṣāvṛṇīta jenyā yuvām patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2616: RV_1,119.06a yuvaṃ rebham pariṣūter uruṣyatho himena gharmam paritaptam atraye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2617: RV_1,119.06c yuvaṃ śayor avasam pipyathur gavi pra dīrgheṇa vandanas tāry āyuṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2618: RV_1,119.07a yuvaṃ vandanaṃ nirṛtaṃ jaraṇyayā rathaṃ na dasrā karaṇā sam invathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2619: RV_1,119.07c kṣetrād ā vipraṃ janatho vipanyayā pra vām atra vidhate daṃsanā bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2620: RV_1,119.08a agacchataṃ kṛpamāṇam parāvati pituḥ svasya tyajasā nibādhitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2621: RV_1,119.08c svarvatīr ita ūtīr yuvor aha citrā abhīke abhavann abhiṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2622: RV_1,119.09a uta syā vām madhuman makṣikārapan made somasyauśijo huvanyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2623: RV_1,119.09c yuvaṃ dadhīco mana ā vivāsatho 'thā śiraḥ prati vām aśvyaṃ vadat //
GV01rvh1-10u:2624: RV_1,119.10a yuvam pedave puruvāram aśvinā spṛdhāṃ śvetaṃ tarutāraṃ duvasyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2625: RV_1,119.10c śaryair abhidyum pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraṃ carkṛtyam indram iva carṣaṇīsaham //
GV01rvh1-10u:2626: RV_1,120.01a kā rādhad dhotrāśvinā vāṃ ko vāṃ joṣa ubhayoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2628: RV_1,120.02a vidvāṃsāv id duraḥ pṛcched avidvān itthāparo acetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2629: RV_1,120.02c nū cin nu marte akrau //
GV01rvh1-10u:2630: RV_1,120.03a tā vidvāṃsā havāmahe vāṃ tā no vidvāṃsā manma vocetam adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2632: RV_1,120.04a vi pṛcchāmi pākyā na devān vaṣaṭkṛtasyādbhutasya dasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2633: RV_1,120.04c pātaṃ ca sahyaso yuvaṃ ca rabhyaso naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2634: RV_1,120.05a pra yā ghoṣe bhṛgavāṇe na śobhe yayā vācā yajati pajriyo vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2636: RV_1,120.06a śrutaṃ gāyatraṃ takavānasyāhaṃ cid dhi rirebhāśvinā vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2638: RV_1,120.07a yuvaṃ hy āstam maho ran yuvaṃ vā yan niratataṃsatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2639: RV_1,120.07c tā no vasū sugopā syātam pātaṃ no vṛkād aghāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2640: RV_1,120.08a mā kasmai dhātam abhy amitriṇe no mākutrā no gṛhebhyo dhenavo guḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2642: RV_1,120.09a duhīyan mitradhitaye yuvāku rāye ca no mimītaṃ vājavatyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:2643: RV_1,120.09c iṣe ca no mimītaṃ dhenumatyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:2644: RV_1,120.10a aśvinor asanaṃ ratham anaśvaṃ vājinīvatoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2646: RV_1,120.11a ayaṃ samaha mā tanūhyāte janāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2648: RV_1,120.12a adha svapnasya nir vide 'bhuñjataś ca revataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2650: RV_1,121.01a kad itthā nṝṃḥ pātraṃ devayatāṃ śravad giro aṅgirasāṃ turaṇyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:2651: RV_1,121.01c pra yad ānaḍ viśa ā harmyasyoru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2652: RV_1,121.02a stambhīd dha dyāṃ sa dharuṇam pruṣāyad ṛbhur vājāya draviṇaṃ naro goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2653: RV_1,121.02c anu svajām mahiṣaś cakṣata vrām menām aśvasya pari mātaraṃ goḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2654: RV_1,121.03a nakṣad dhavam aruṇīḥ pūrvyaṃ rāṭ turo viśām aṅgirasām anu dyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:2655: RV_1,121.03c takṣad vajraṃ niyutaṃ tastambhad dyāṃ catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde //
GV01rvh1-10u:2656: RV_1,121.04a asya made svaryaṃ dā ṛtāyāpīvṛtam usriyāṇām anīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2657: RV_1,121.04c yad dha prasarge trikakum nivartad apa druho mānuṣasya duro vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2658: RV_1,121.05a tubhyam payo yat pitarāv anītāṃ rādhaḥ suretas turaṇe bhuraṇyū /
GV01rvh1-10u:2659: RV_1,121.05c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2660: RV_1,121.06a adha pra jajñe taraṇir mamattu pra rocy asyā uṣaso na sūraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2661: RV_1,121.06c indur yebhir āṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcañ jaraṇābhi dhāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:2662: RV_1,121.07a svidhmā yad vanadhitir apasyāt sūro adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2663: RV_1,121.07c yad dha prabhāsi kṛtvyāṃ anu dyūn anarviśe paśviṣe turāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2664: RV_1,121.08a aṣṭā maho diva ādo harī iha dyumnāsāham abhi yodhāna utsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2665: RV_1,121.08c hariṃ yat te mandinaṃ dukṣan vṛdhe gorabhasam adribhir vātāpyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2666: RV_1,121.09a tvam āyasam prati vartayo gor divo aśmānam upanītam ṛbhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2667: RV_1,121.09c kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvañ chuṣṇam anantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2668: RV_1,121.10a purā yat sūras tamaso apītes tam adrivaḥ phaligaṃ hetim asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2669: RV_1,121.10c śuṣṇasya cit parihitaṃ yad ojo divas pari sugrathitaṃ tad ādaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2670: RV_1,121.11a anu tvā mahī pājasī acakre dyāvākṣāmā madatām indra karman /
GV01rvh1-10u:2671: RV_1,121.11c tvaṃ vṛtram āśayānaṃ sirāsu maho vajreṇa siṣvapo varāhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:2672: RV_1,121.12a tvam indra naryo yāṃ avo nṝn tiṣṭhā vātasya suyujo vahiṣṭhān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2673: RV_1,121.12c yaṃ te kāvya uśanā mandinaṃ dād vṛtrahaṇam pāryaṃ tatakṣa vajram //
GV01rvh1-10u:2674: RV_1,121.13a tvaṃ sūro harito rāmayo nṝn bharac cakram etaśo nāyam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:2675: RV_1,121.13c prāsya pāraṃ navatiṃ nāvyānām api kartam avartayo 'yajyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:2676: RV_1,121.14a tvaṃ no asyā indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivo duritād abhīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:2677: RV_1,121.14c pra no vājān rathyo aśvabudhyān iṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:2678: RV_1,121.15a mā sā te asmat sumatir vi dasad vājapramahaḥ sam iṣo varanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:2679: RV_1,121.15c ā no bhaja maghavan goṣv aryo maṃhiṣṭhās te sadhamādaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:2680: RV_1,122.01a pra vaḥ pāntaṃ raghumanyavo 'ndho yajñaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe bharadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2681: RV_1,122.01c divo astoṣy asurasya vīrair iṣudhyeva maruto rodasyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2682: RV_1,122.02a patnīva pūrvahūtiṃ vāvṛdhadhyā uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:2683: RV_1,122.02c starīr nātkaṃ vyutaṃ vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2684: RV_1,122.03a mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vāto apāṃ vṛṣaṇvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:2685: RV_1,122.03c śiśītam indrāparvatā yuvaṃ nas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2686: RV_1,122.04a uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā pāntauśijo huvadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:2687: RV_1,122.04c pra vo napātam apāṃ kṛṇudhvam pra mātarā rāspinasyāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2688: RV_1,122.05a ā vo ruvaṇyum auśijo huvadhyai ghoṣeva śaṃsam arjunasya naṃśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2689: RV_1,122.05c pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvana āṃ acchā voceya vasutātim agneḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2690: RV_1,122.06a śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemota śrutaṃ sadane viśvataḥ sīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:2691: RV_1,122.06c śrotu naḥ śroturātiḥ suśrotuḥ sukṣetrā sindhur adbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2692: RV_1,122.07a stuṣe sā vāṃ varuṇa mitra rātir gavāṃ śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre /
GV01rvh1-10u:2693: RV_1,122.07c śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃ nirundhānāso agman //
GV01rvh1-10u:2694: RV_1,122.08a asya stuṣe mahimaghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ suvīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2695: RV_1,122.08c jano yaḥ pajrebhyo vājinīvān aśvāvato rathino mahyaṃ sūriḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2696: RV_1,122.09a jano yo mitrāvaruṇāv abhidhrug apo na vāṃ sunoty akṣṇayādhruk /
GV01rvh1-10u:2697: RV_1,122.09c svayaṃ sa yakṣmaṃ hṛdaye ni dhatta āpa yad īṃ hotrābhir ṛtāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2698: RV_1,122.10a sa vrādhato nahuṣo daṃsujūtaḥ śardhastaro narāṃ gūrtaśravāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2699: RV_1,122.10c visṛṣṭarātir yāti bāḷhasṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadam ic chūraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2700: RV_1,122.11a adha gmantā nahuṣo havaṃ sūreḥ śrotā rājāno amṛtasya mandrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2701: RV_1,122.11c nabhojuvo yan niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinā rathavate //
GV01rvh1-10u:2702: RV_1,122.12a etaṃ śardhaṃ dhāma yasya sūrer ity avocan daśatayasya naṃśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2703: RV_1,122.12c dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātī rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2704: RV_1,122.13a mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāser dvir yat pañca bibhrato yanty annā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2705: RV_1,122.13c kim iṣṭāśva iṣṭaraśmir eta īśānāsas taruṣa ṛñjate nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:2706: RV_1,122.14a hiraṇyakarṇam maṇigrīvam arṇas tan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2707: RV_1,122.14c aryo giraḥ sadya ā jagmuṣīr osrāś cākantūbhayeṣv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:2708: RV_1,122.15a catvāro mā maśarśārasya śiśvas trayo rājña āyavasasya jiṣṇoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2709: RV_1,122.15c ratho vām mitrāvaruṇā dīrghāpsāḥ syūmagabhastiḥ sūro nādyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:2710: RV_1,123.01a pṛthū ratho dakṣiṇāyā ayojy ainaṃ devāso amṛtāso asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2711: RV_1,123.01c kṛṣṇād ud asthād aryā vihāyāś cikitsantī mānuṣāya kṣayāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2712: RV_1,123.02a pūrvā viśvasmād bhuvanād abodhi jayantī vājam bṛhatī sanutrī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2713: RV_1,123.02c uccā vy akhyad yuvatiḥ punarbhūr oṣā agan prathamā pūrvahūtau //
GV01rvh1-10u:2714: RV_1,123.03a yad adya bhāgaṃ vibhajāsi nṛbhya uṣo devi martyatrā sujāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:2715: RV_1,123.03c devo no atra savitā damūnā anāgaso vocati sūryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2716: RV_1,123.04a gṛhaṃ-gṛham ahanā yāty acchā dive-dive adhi nāmā dadhānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2717: RV_1,123.04c siṣāsantī dyotanā śaśvad āgād agram-agram id bhajate vasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2718: RV_1,123.05a bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmir uṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:2719: RV_1,123.05c paścā sa daghyā yo aghasya dhātā jayema taṃ dakṣiṇayā rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:2720: RV_1,123.06a ud īratāṃ sūnṛtā ut purandhīr ud agnayaḥ śuśucānāso asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2721: RV_1,123.06c spārhā vasūni tamasāpagūḷhāviṣ kṛṇvanty uṣaso vibhātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2722: RV_1,123.07a apānyad ety abhy anyad eti viṣurūpe ahanī saṃ carete /
GV01rvh1-10u:2723: RV_1,123.07c parikṣitos tamo anyā guhākar adyaud uṣāḥ śośucatā rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:2724: RV_1,123.08a sadṛśīr adya sadṛśīr id u śvo dīrghaṃ sacante varuṇasya dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:2725: RV_1,123.08c anavadyās triṃśataṃ yojanāny ekaikā kratum pari yanti sadyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2726: RV_1,123.09a jānaty ahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇād ajaniṣṭa śvitīcī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2727: RV_1,123.09c ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāmāhar-ahar niṣkṛtam ācarantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2728: RV_1,123.10a kanyeva tanvā śāśadānāṃ eṣi devi devam iyakṣamāṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2729: RV_1,123.10c saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastād āvir vakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2730: RV_1,123.11a susaṃkāśā mātṛmṛṣṭeva yoṣāvis tanvaṃ kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2731: RV_1,123.11c bhadrā tvam uṣo vitaraṃ vy uccha na tat te anyā uṣaso naśanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:2732: RV_1,123.12a aśvāvatīr gomatīr viśvavārā yatamānā raśmibhiḥ sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2733: RV_1,123.12c parā ca yanti punar ā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānā uṣāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2734: RV_1,123.13a ṛtasya raśmim anuyacchamānā bhadram-bhadraṃ kratum asmāsu dhehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2735: RV_1,123.13c uṣo no adya suhavā vy ucchāsmāsu rāyo maghavatsu ca syuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2736: RV_1,124.01a uṣā ucchantī samidhāne agnā udyan sūrya urviyā jyotir aśret /
GV01rvh1-10u:2737: RV_1,124.01c devo no atra savitā nv artham prāsāvīd dvipat pra catuṣpad ityai //
GV01rvh1-10u:2738: RV_1,124.02a aminatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:2739: RV_1,124.02c īyuṣīṇām upamā śaśvatīnām āyatīnām prathamoṣā vy adyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:2740: RV_1,124.03a eṣā divo duhitā praty adarśi jyotir vasānā samanā purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2741: RV_1,124.03c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2742: RV_1,124.04a upo adarśi śundhyuvo na vakṣo nodhā ivāvir akṛta priyāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2743: RV_1,124.04c admasan na sasato bodhayantī śaśvattamāgāt punar eyuṣīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2744: RV_1,124.05a pūrve ardhe rajaso aptyasya gavāṃ janitry akṛta pra ketum /
GV01rvh1-10u:2745: RV_1,124.05c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīya obhā pṛṇantī pitror upasthā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2746: RV_1,124.06a eved eṣā purutamā dṛśe kaṃ nājāmiṃ na pari vṛṇakti jāmim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2747: RV_1,124.06c arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nārbhād īṣate na maho vibhātī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2748: RV_1,124.07a abhrāteva puṃsa eti pratīcī gartārug iva sanaye dhanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2749: RV_1,124.07c jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsā uṣā hasreva ni riṇīte apsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2750: RV_1,124.08a svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonim āraig apaity asyāḥ praticakṣyeva /
GV01rvh1-10u:2751: RV_1,124.08c vyucchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasyāñjy aṅkte samanagā iva vrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2752: RV_1,124.09a āsām pūrvāsām ahasu svasṝṇām aparā pūrvām abhy eti paścāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2753: RV_1,124.09c tāḥ pratnavan navyasīr nūnam asme revad ucchantu sudinā uṣāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2754: RV_1,124.10a pra bodhayoṣaḥ pṛṇato maghony abudhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2755: RV_1,124.10c revad uccha maghavadbhyo maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:2756: RV_1,124.11a aveyam aśvaid yuvatiḥ purastād yuṅkte gavām aruṇānām anīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2757: RV_1,124.11c vi nūnam ucchād asati pra ketur gṛhaṃ-gṛham upa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2758: RV_1,124.12a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:2759: RV_1,124.12c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:2760: RV_1,124.13a astoḍhvaṃ stomyā brahmaṇā me 'vīvṛdhadhvam uśatīr uṣāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2761: RV_1,124.13c yuṣmākaṃ devīr avasā sanema sahasriṇaṃ ca śatinaṃ ca vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2762: RV_1,125.01a prātā ratnam prātaritvā dadhāti taṃ cikitvān pratigṛhyā ni dhatte /
GV01rvh1-10u:2763: RV_1,125.01c tena prajāṃ vardhayamāna āyū rāyas poṣeṇa sacate suvīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2764: RV_1,125.02a sugur asat suhiraṇyaḥ svaśvo bṛhad asmai vaya indro dadhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2765: RV_1,125.02c yas tvāyantaṃ vasunā prātaritvo mukṣījayeva padim utsināti //
GV01rvh1-10u:2766: RV_1,125.03a āyam adya sukṛtam prātar icchann iṣṭeḥ putraṃ vasumatā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:2767: RV_1,125.03c aṃśoḥ sutam pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīraṃ vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2768: RV_1,125.04a upa kṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2769: RV_1,125.04c pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upa yanti viśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2770: RV_1,125.05a nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śrito yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2771: RV_1,125.05c tasmā āpo ghṛtam arṣanti sindhavas tasmā iyaṃ dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2772: RV_1,125.06a dakṣiṇāvatām id imāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatāṃ divi sūryāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2773: RV_1,125.06c dakṣiṇāvanto amṛtam bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2774: RV_1,125.07a mā pṛṇanto duritam ena āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2775: RV_1,125.07c anyas teṣām paridhir astu kaś cid apṛṇantam abhi saṃ yantu śokāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2776: RV_1,126.01a amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhāv adhi kṣiyato bhāvyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2777: RV_1,126.01c yo me sahasram amimīta savān atūrto rājā śrava icchamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2778: RV_1,126.02a śataṃ rājño nādhamānasya niṣkāñ chatam aśvān prayatān sadya ādam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2779: RV_1,126.02c śataṃ kakṣīvāṃ asurasya gonāṃ divi śravo 'jaram ā tatāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:2780: RV_1,126.03a upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattā vadhūmanto daśa rathāso asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2781: RV_1,126.03c ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasram anu gavyam āgāt sanat kakṣīvāṃ abhipitve ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2782: RV_1,126.04a catvāriṃśad daśarathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasyāgre śreṇiṃ nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:2783: RV_1,126.04c madacyutaḥ kṛśanāvato atyān kakṣīvanta ud amṛkṣanta pajrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2784: RV_1,126.05a pūrvām anu prayatim ā dade vas trīn yuktāṃ aṣṭāv aridhāyaso gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2785: RV_1,126.05c subandhavo ye viśyā iva vrā anasvantaḥ śrava aiṣanta pajrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2786: RV_1,126.06a āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkeva jaṅgahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2787: RV_1,126.06c dadāti mahyaṃ yādurī yāśūnām bhojyā śatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2788: RV_1,126.07a upopa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2789: RV_1,126.07c sarvāham asmi romaśā gandhārīṇām ivāvikā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2790: RV_1,127.01a agniṃ hotāram manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2791: RV_1,127.01d ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2792: RV_1,127.01f ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭim anu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2793: RV_1,127.02a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā yajamānā huvema jyeṣṭham aṅgirasāṃ vipra manmabhir viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2794: RV_1,127.02d parijmānam iva dyāṃ hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2795: RV_1,127.02f śociṣkeśaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ yam imā viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2796: RV_1,127.03a sa hi purū cid ojasā virukmatā dīdyāno bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśur na druhantaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2797: RV_1,127.03d vīḷu cid yasya samṛtau śruvad vaneva yat sthiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:2798: RV_1,127.03f niḥṣahamāṇo yamate nāyate dhanvāsahā nāyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:2799: RV_1,127.04a dṛḷhā cid asmā anu dur yathā vide tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir dāṣṭy avase 'gnaye dāṣṭy avase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2800: RV_1,127.04d pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣad vaneva śociṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2801: RV_1,127.04f sthirā cid annā ni riṇāty ojasā ni sthirāṇi cid ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2802: RV_1,127.05a tam asya pṛkṣam uparāsu dhīmahi naktaṃ yaḥ sudarśataro divātarād aprāyuṣe divātarāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:2803: RV_1,127.05d ād asyāyur grabhaṇavad vīḷu śarma na sūnave /
GV01rvh1-10u:2804: RV_1,127.05f bhaktam abhaktam avo vyanto ajarā agnayo vyanto ajarāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2805: RV_1,127.06a sa hi śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇir apnasvatīṣūrvarāsv iṣṭanir ārtanāsv iṣṭaniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2806: RV_1,127.06d ādad dhavyāny ādadir yajñasya ketur arhaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2807: RV_1,127.06f adha smāsya harṣato hṛṣīvato viśve juṣanta panthāṃ naraḥ śubhe na panthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2808: RV_1,127.07a dvitā yad īṃ kīstāso abhidyavo namasyanta upavocanta bhṛgavo mathnanto dāśā bhṛgavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2809: RV_1,127.07d agnir īśe vasūnāṃ śucir yo dharṇir eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2810: RV_1,127.07f priyāṃ apidhīṃr vaniṣīṣṭa medhira ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2811: RV_1,127.08a viśvāsāṃ tvā viśām patiṃ havāmahe sarvāsāṃ samānaṃ dampatim bhuje satyagirvāhasam bhuje /
GV01rvh1-10u:2812: RV_1,127.08d atithim mānuṣāṇām pitur na yasyāsayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2813: RV_1,127.08f amī ca viśve amṛtāsa ā vayo havyā deveṣv ā vayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2814: RV_1,127.09a tvam agne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamo jāyase devatātaye rayir na devatātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2815: RV_1,127.09d śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2816: RV_1,127.09f adha smā te pari caranty ajara śruṣṭīvāno nājara //
GV01rvh1-10u:2817: RV_1,127.10a pra vo mahe sahasā sahasvata uṣarbudhe paśuṣe nāgnaye stomo babhūtv agnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2818: RV_1,127.10d prati yad īṃ haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve /
GV01rvh1-10u:2819: RV_1,127.10f agre rebho na jarata ṛṣūṇāṃ jūrṇir hota ṛṣūṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2820: RV_1,127.11a sa no nediṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāna ā bharāgne devebhiḥ sacanāḥ sucetunā maho rāyaḥ sucetunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2821: RV_1,127.11d mahi śaviṣṭha nas kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:2822: RV_1,127.11f mahi stotṛbhyo maghavan suvīryam mathīr ugro na śavasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2823: RV_1,128.01a ayaṃ jāyata manuṣo dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭha uśijām anu vratam agniḥ svam anu vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2824: RV_1,128.01d viśvaśruṣṭiḥ sakhīyate rayir iva śravasyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2825: RV_1,128.01f adabdho hotā ni ṣadad iḷas pade parivīta iḷas pade //
GV01rvh1-10u:2826: RV_1,128.02a taṃ yajñasādham api vātayāmasy ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2827: RV_1,128.02d sa na ūrjām upābhṛty ayā kṛpā na jūryati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2828: RV_1,128.02f yam mātariśvā manave parāvato devam bhāḥ parāvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2829: RV_1,128.03a evena sadyaḥ pary eti pārthivam muhurgī reto vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradad dadhad retaḥ kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2830: RV_1,128.03d śataṃ cakṣāṇo akṣabhir devo vaneṣu turvaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2831: RV_1,128.03f sado dadhāna upareṣu sānuṣv agniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:2832: RV_1,128.04a sa sukratuḥ purohito dame-dame 'gnir yajñasyādhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2833: RV_1,128.04d kratvā vedhā iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2834: RV_1,128.04f yato ghṛtaśrīr atithir ajāyata vahnir vedhā ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:2835: RV_1,128.05a kratvā yad asya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate 'gner aveṇa marutāṃ na bhojyeṣirāya na bhojyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2836: RV_1,128.05d sa hi ṣmā dānam invati vasūnāṃ ca majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2837: RV_1,128.05f sa nas trāsate duritād abhihrutaḥ śaṃsād aghād abhihrutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2838: RV_1,128.06a viśvo vihāyā aratir vasur dadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇir na śiśrathac chravasyayā na śiśrathat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2839: RV_1,128.06d viśvasmā id iṣudhyate devatrā havyam ohiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:2840: RV_1,128.06f viśvasmā it sukṛte vāram ṛṇvaty agnir dvārā vy ṛṇvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:2841: RV_1,128.07a sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamo hito 'gnir yajñeṣu jenyo na viśpatiḥ priyo yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2842: RV_1,128.07d sa havyā mānuṣāṇām iḷā kṛtāni patyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2843: RV_1,128.07f sa nas trāsate varuṇasya dhūrter maho devasya dhūrteḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2844: RV_1,128.08a agniṃ hotāram īḷate vasudhitim priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ ny erire havyavāhaṃ ny erire /
GV01rvh1-10u:2845: RV_1,128.08d viśvāyuṃ viśvavedasaṃ hotāraṃ yajataṃ kavim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2846: RV_1,128.08f devāso raṇvam avase vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃ vasūyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2847: RV_1,129.01a yaṃ tvaṃ ratham indra medhasātaye 'pākā santam iṣira praṇayasi prānavadya nayasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2848: RV_1,129.01d sadyaś cit tam abhiṣṭaye karo vaśaś ca vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2849: RV_1,129.01f sāsmākam anavadya tūtujāna vedhasām imāṃ vācaṃ na vedhasām //
GV01rvh1-10u:2850: RV_1,129.02a sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cid dakṣāyya indra bharahūtaye nṛbhir asi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2851: RV_1,129.02d yaḥ śūraiḥ svaḥ sanitā yo viprair vājaṃ tarutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2852: RV_1,129.02f tam īśānāsa iradhanta vājinam pṛkṣam atyaṃ na vājinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2853: RV_1,129.03a dasmo hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇam pinvasi tvacaṃ kaṃ cid yāvīr araruṃ śūra martyam parivṛṇakṣi martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2854: RV_1,129.03d indrota tubhyaṃ tad dive tad rudrāya svayaśase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2855: RV_1,129.03f mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya saprathaḥ sumṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2856: RV_1,129.04a asmākaṃ va indram uśmasīṣṭaye sakhāyaṃ viśvāyum prāsahaṃ yujaṃ vājeṣu prāsahaṃ yujam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2857: RV_1,129.04d asmākam brahmotaye 'vā pṛtsuṣu kāsu cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:2858: RV_1,129.04f nahi tvā śatru starate stṛṇoṣi yaṃ viśvaṃ śatruṃ stṛṇoṣi yam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2859: RV_1,129.05a ni ṣū namātimatiṃ kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhir araṇibhir notibhir ugrābhir ugrotibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2860: RV_1,129.05d neṣi ṇo yathā purānenāḥ śūra manyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2861: RV_1,129.05f viśvāni pūror apa parṣi vahnir āsā vahnir no accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:2862: RV_1,129.06a pra tad voceyam bhavyāyendave havyo na ya iṣavān manma rejati rakṣohā manma rejati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2863: RV_1,129.06d svayaṃ so asmad ā nido vadhair ajeta durmatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:2864: RV_1,129.06f ava sraved aghaśaṃso 'vataram ava kṣudram iva sravet //
GV01rvh1-10u:2865: RV_1,129.07a vanema tad dhotrayā citantyā vanema rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīryaṃ raṇvaṃ santaṃ suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2866: RV_1,129.07d durmanmānaṃ sumantubhir em iṣā pṛcīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2867: RV_1,129.07f ā satyābhir indraṃ dyumnahūtibhir yajatraṃ dyumnahūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2868: RV_1,129.08a pra-prā vo asme svayaśobhir ūtī parivarga indro durmatīnāṃ darīman durmatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2869: RV_1,129.08d svayaṃ sā riṣayadhyai yā na upeṣe atraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2870: RV_1,129.08f hatem asan na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇir na vakṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:2871: RV_1,129.09a tvaṃ na indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi pathāṃ anehasā puro yāhy arakṣasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2872: RV_1,129.09d sacasva naḥ parāka ā sacasvāstamīka ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2873: RV_1,129.09f pāhi no dūrād ārād abhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhy abhiṣṭibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2874: RV_1,129.10a tvaṃ na indra rāyā tarūṣasograṃ cit tvā mahimā sakṣad avase mahe mitraṃ nāvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2875: RV_1,129.10d ojiṣṭha trātar avitā rathaṃ kaṃ cid amartya /
GV01rvh1-10u:2876: RV_1,129.10f anyam asmad ririṣeḥ kaṃ cid adrivo ririkṣantaṃ cid adrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2877: RV_1,129.11a pāhi na indra suṣṭuta sridho 'vayātā sadam id durmatīnāṃ devaḥ san durmatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2878: RV_1,129.11d hantā pāpasya rakṣasas trātā viprasya māvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2879: RV_1,129.11f adhā hi tvā janitā jījanad vaso rakṣohaṇaṃ tvā jījanad vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:2880: RV_1,130.01a endra yāhy upa naḥ parāvato nāyam acchā vidathānīva satpatir astaṃ rājeva satpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2881: RV_1,130.01d havāmahe tvā vayam prayasvantaḥ sute sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2882: RV_1,130.01f putrāso na pitaraṃ vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:2883: RV_1,130.02a pibā somam indra suvānam adribhiḥ kośena siktam avataṃ na vaṃsagas tātṛṣāṇo na vaṃsagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2884: RV_1,130.02d madāya haryatāya te tuviṣṭamāya dhāyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2885: RV_1,130.02f ā tvā yacchantu harito na sūryam ahā viśveva sūryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2886: RV_1,130.03a avindad divo nihitaṃ guhā nidhiṃ ver na garbham parivītam aśmany anante antar aśmani /
GV01rvh1-10u:2887: RV_1,130.03d vrajaṃ vajrī gavām iva siṣāsann aṅgirastamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2888: RV_1,130.03f apāvṛṇod iṣa indraḥ parīvṛtā dvāra iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2889: RV_1,130.04a dādṛhāṇo vajram indro gabhastyoḥ kṣadmeva tigmam asanāya saṃ śyad ahihatyāya saṃ śyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2890: RV_1,130.04d saṃvivyāna ojasā śavobhir indra majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2891: RV_1,130.04f taṣṭeva vṛkṣaṃ vanino ni vṛścasi paraśveva ni vṛścasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:2892: RV_1,130.05a tvaṃ vṛthā nadya indra sartave 'cchā samudram asṛjo rathāṃ iva vājayato rathāṃ iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:2893: RV_1,130.05d ita ūtīr ayuñjata samānam artham akṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2894: RV_1,130.05f dhenūr iva manave viśvadohaso janāya viśvadohasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2895: RV_1,130.06a imāṃ te vācaṃ vasūyanta āyavo rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvām atakṣiṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2896: RV_1,130.06d śumbhanto jenyaṃ yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2897: RV_1,130.06f atyam iva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:2898: RV_1,130.07a bhinat puro navatim indra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto /
GV01rvh1-10u:2899: RV_1,130.07d atithigvāya śambaraṃ girer ugro avābharat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2900: RV_1,130.07f maho dhanāni dayamāna ojasā viśvā dhanāny ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2901: RV_1,130.08a indraḥ samatsu yajamānam āryam prāvad viśveṣu śatamūtir ājiṣu svarmīḷheṣv ājiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2902: RV_1,130.08d manave śāsad avratān tvacaṃ kṛṣṇām arandhayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2903: RV_1,130.08f dakṣan na viśvaṃ tatṛṣāṇam oṣati ny arśasānam oṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:2904: RV_1,130.09a sūraś cakram pra vṛhaj jāta ojasā prapitve vācam aruṇo muṣāyatīśāna ā muṣāyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2905: RV_1,130.09d uśanā yat parāvato 'jagann ūtaye kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:2906: RV_1,130.09f sumnāni viśvā manuṣeva turvaṇir ahā viśveva turvaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2907: RV_1,130.10a sa no navyebhir vṛṣakarmann ukthaiḥ purāṃ dartaḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2908: RV_1,130.10b divodāsebhir indra stavāno vāvṛdhīthā ahobhir iva dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2909: RV_1,131.01a indrāya hi dyaur asuro anamnatendrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhir dyumnasātā varīmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2910: RV_1,131.01d indraṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dadhire puraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2911: RV_1,131.01f indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2912: RV_1,131.02a viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānam ekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak /
GV01rvh1-10u:2913: RV_1,131.02d taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2914: RV_1,131.02f indraṃ na yajñaiś citayanta āyava stomebhir indram āyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2915: RV_1,131.03a vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2916: RV_1,131.03d yad gavyantā dvā janā svar yantā samūhasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2917: RV_1,131.03f āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajram indra sacābhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2918: RV_1,131.04a viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yad indra śāradīr avātiraḥ sāsahāno avātiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2919: RV_1,131.04d śāsas tam indra martyam ayajyuṃ śavasas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2920: RV_1,131.04f mahīm amuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīm imā apo mandasāna imā apaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2921: RV_1,131.05a ād it te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣann uśijo yad āvitha sakhīyato yad āvitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:2922: RV_1,131.05d cakartha kāram ebhyaḥ pṛtanāsu pravantave /
GV01rvh1-10u:2923: RV_1,131.05f te anyām-anyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata //
GV01rvh1-10u:2924: RV_1,131.06a uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hy arkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2925: RV_1,131.06d yad indra hantave mṛdho vṛṣā vajriñ ciketasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2926: RV_1,131.06f ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2927: RV_1,131.07a tvaṃ tam indra vāvṛdhāno asmayur amitrayantaṃ tuvijāta martyaṃ vajreṇa śūra martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2928: RV_1,131.07d jahi yo no aghāyati śṛṇuṣva suśravastamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2929: RV_1,131.07f riṣṭaṃ na yāmann apa bhūtu durmatir viśvāpa bhūtu durmatiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2930: RV_1,132.01a tvayā vayam maghavan pūrvye dhana indratvotāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2931: RV_1,132.01d nediṣṭhe asminn ahany adhi vocā nu sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2932: RV_1,132.01f asmin yajñe vi cayemā bhare kṛtaṃ vājayanto bhare kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2933: RV_1,132.02a svarjeṣe bhara āprasya vakmany uṣarbudhaḥ svasminn añjasi krāṇasya svasminn añjasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2934: RV_1,132.02d ahann indro yathā vide śīrṣṇā-śīrṣṇopavācyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2935: RV_1,132.02f asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayo bhadrā bhadrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2936: RV_1,132.03a tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanaṃ yasmin yajñe vāram akṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vār asi kṣayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2937: RV_1,132.03d vi tad vocer adha dvitāntaḥ paśyanti raśmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2938: RV_1,132.03f sa ghā vide anv indro gaveṣaṇo bandhukṣidbhyo gaveṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2939: RV_1,132.04a nū itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyaṃ yad aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apa vrajam indra śikṣann apa vrajam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2940: RV_1,132.04d aibhyaḥ samānyā diśāsmabhyaṃ jeṣi yotsi ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:2941: RV_1,132.04f sunvadbhyo randhayā kaṃ cid avrataṃ hṛṇāyantaṃ cid avratam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2942: RV_1,132.05a saṃ yaj janān kratubhiḥ śūra īkṣayad dhane hite taruṣanta śravasyavaḥ pra yakṣanta śravasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2943: RV_1,132.05d tasmā āyuḥ prajāvad id bādhe arcanty ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2944: RV_1,132.05f indra okyaṃ didhiṣanta dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2945: RV_1,132.06a yuvaṃ tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yo naḥ pṛtanyād apa taṃ-tam id dhataṃ vajreṇa taṃ-tam id dhatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2946: RV_1,132.06d dūre cattāya cchantsad gahanaṃ yad inakṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:2947: RV_1,132.06f asmākaṃ śatrūn pari śūra viśvato darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2948: RV_1,133.01a ubhe punāmi rodasī ṛtena druho dahāmi sam mahīr anindrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2949: RV_1,133.01c abhivlagya yatra hatā amitrā vailasthānam pari tṛḷhā aśeran //
GV01rvh1-10u:2950: RV_1,133.02a abhivlagyā cid adrivaḥ śīrṣā yātumatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2951: RV_1,133.02c chindhi vaṭūriṇā padā mahāvaṭūriṇā padā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2952: RV_1,133.03a avāsām maghavañ jahi śardho yātumatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:2955: RV_1,133.04c tat su te manāyati takat su te manāyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:2956: RV_1,133.05a piśaṅgabhṛṣṭim ambhṛṇam piśācim indra sam mṛṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:2958: RV_1,133.06a avar maha indra dādṛhi śrudhī naḥ śuśoca hi dyauḥ kṣā na bhīṣāṃ adrivo ghṛṇān na bhīṣāṃ adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2959: RV_1,133.06d śuṣmintamo hi śuṣmibhir vadhair ugrebhir īyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:2960: RV_1,133.06f apūruṣaghno apratīta śūra satvabhis trisaptaiḥ śūra satvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2961: RV_1,133.07a vanoti hi sunvan kṣayam parīṇasaḥ sunvāno hi ṣmā yajaty ava dviṣo devānām ava dviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2962: RV_1,133.07d sunvāna it siṣāsati sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2963: RV_1,133.07f sunvānāyendro dadāty ābhuvaṃ rayiṃ dadāty ābhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2964: RV_1,134.01a ā tvā juvo rārahāṇā abhi prayo vāyo vahantv iha pūrvapītaye somasya pūrvapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2965: RV_1,134.01d ūrdhvā te anu sūnṛtā manas tiṣṭhatu jānatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:2966: RV_1,134.01f niyutvatā rathenā yāhi dāvane vāyo makhasya dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:2967: RV_1,134.02a mandantu tvā mandino vāyav indavo 'smat krāṇāsaḥ sukṛtā abhidyavo gobhiḥ krāṇā abhidyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2968: RV_1,134.02d yad dha krāṇā iradhyai dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2969: RV_1,134.02f sadhrīcīnā niyuto dāvane dhiya upa bruvata īṃ dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2970: RV_1,134.03a vāyur yuṅkte rohitā vāyur aruṇā vāyū rathe ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave /
GV01rvh1-10u:2971: RV_1,134.03d pra bodhayā purandhiṃ jāra ā sasatīm iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:2972: RV_1,134.03f pra cakṣaya rodasī vāsayoṣasaḥ śravase vāsayoṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2973: RV_1,134.04a tubhyam uṣāsaḥ śucayaḥ parāvati bhadrā vastrā tanvate daṃsu raśmiṣu citrā navyeṣu raśmiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:2974: RV_1,134.04d tubhyaṃ dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2975: RV_1,134.04f ajanayo maruto vakṣaṇābhyo diva ā vakṣaṇābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2976: RV_1,134.05a tubhyaṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayas turaṇyavo madeṣūgrā iṣaṇanta bhurvaṇy apām iṣanta bhurvaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2977: RV_1,134.05d tvāṃ tsārī dasamāno bhagam īṭṭe takvavīye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2978: RV_1,134.05f tvaṃ viśvasmād bhuvanāt pāsi dharmaṇāsuryāt pāsi dharmaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:2979: RV_1,134.06a tvaṃ no vāyav eṣām apūrvyaḥ somānām prathamaḥ pītim arhasi sutānām pītim arhasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:2981: RV_1,134.06f viśvā it te dhenavo duhra āśiraṃ ghṛtaṃ duhrata āśiram //
GV01rvh1-10u:2982: RV_1,135.01a stīrṇam barhir upa no yāhi vītaye sahasreṇa niyutā niyutvate śatinībhir niyutvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2983: RV_1,135.01d tubhyaṃ hi pūrvapītaye devā devāya yemire /
GV01rvh1-10u:2984: RV_1,135.01f pra te sutāso madhumanto asthiran madāya kratve asthiran //
GV01rvh1-10u:2985: RV_1,135.02a tubhyāyaṃ somaḥ paripūto adribhi spārhā vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣati śukrā vasāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:2986: RV_1,135.02d tavāyam bhāga āyuṣu somo deveṣu hūyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:2987: RV_1,135.02f vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy asmayur juṣāṇo yāhy asmayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:2988: RV_1,135.03a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2989: RV_1,135.03d tavāyam bhāga ṛtviyaḥ saraśmiḥ sūrye sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2990: RV_1,135.03f adhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:2991: RV_1,135.04a ā vāṃ ratho niyutvān vakṣad avase 'bhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:2992: RV_1,135.04d pibatam madhvo andhasaḥ pūrvapeyaṃ hi vāṃ hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2993: RV_1,135.04f vāyav ā candreṇa rādhasā gatam indraś ca rādhasā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2994: RV_1,135.05a ā vāṃ dhiyo vavṛtyur adhvarāṃ upemam indum marmṛjanta vājinam āśum atyaṃ na vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:2995: RV_1,135.05d teṣām pibatam asmayū ā no gantam ihotyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:2996: RV_1,135.05f indravāyū sutānām adribhir yuvam madāya vājadā yuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:2997: RV_1,135.06a ime vāṃ somā apsv ā sutā ihādhvaryubhir bharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:2998: RV_1,135.06d ete vām abhy asṛkṣata tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:2999: RV_1,135.06f yuvāyavo 'ti romāṇy avyayā somāso aty avyayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3000: RV_1,135.07a ati vāyo sasato yāhi śaśvato yatra grāvā vadati tatra gacchataṃ gṛham indraś ca gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3001: RV_1,135.07d vi sūnṛtā dadṛśe rīyate ghṛtam ā pūrṇayā niyutā yātho adhvaram indraś ca yātho adhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:3002: RV_1,135.08a atrāha tad vahethe madhva āhutiṃ yam aśvattham upatiṣṭhanta jāyavo 'sme te santu jāyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3003: RV_1,135.08d sākaṃ gāvaḥ suvate pacyate yavo na te vāya upa dasyanti dhenavo nāpa dasyanti dhenavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3004: RV_1,135.09a ime ye te su vāyo bāhvojaso 'ntar nadī te patayanty ukṣaṇo mahi vrādhanta ukṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3005: RV_1,135.09d dhanvañ cid ye anāśavo jīrāś cid agiraukasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3006: RV_1,135.09f sūryasyeva raśmayo durniyantavo hastayor durniyantavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3007: RV_1,136.01a pra su jyeṣṭhaṃ nicirābhyām bṛhan namo havyam matim bharatā mṛḷayadbhyāṃ svādiṣṭham mṛḷayadbhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3008: RV_1,136.01d tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī yajñe-yajña upastutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3009: RV_1,136.01f athainoḥ kṣatraṃ na kutaś canādhṛṣe devatvaṃ nū cid ādhṛṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3010: RV_1,136.02a adarśi gātur urave varīyasī panthā ṛtasya sam ayaṃsta raśmibhiś cakṣur bhagasya raśmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3011: RV_1,136.02d dyukṣam mitrasya sādanam aryamṇo varuṇasya ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:3012: RV_1,136.02f athā dadhāte bṛhad ukthyaṃ vaya upastutyam bṛhad vayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3013: RV_1,136.03a jyotiṣmatīm aditiṃ dhārayatkṣitiṃ svarvatīm ā sacete dive-dive jāgṛvāṃsā dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:3014: RV_1,136.03d jyotiṣmat kṣatram āśāte ādityā dānunas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3015: RV_1,136.03f mitras tayor varuṇo yātayajjano 'ryamā yātayajjanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3016: RV_1,136.04a ayam mitrāya varuṇāya śantamaḥ somo bhūtv avapāneṣv ābhago devo deveṣv ābhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3017: RV_1,136.04d taṃ devāso juṣerata viśve adya sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3018: RV_1,136.04f tathā rājānā karatho yad īmaha ṛtāvānā yad īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3019: RV_1,136.05a yo mitrāya varuṇāyāvidhaj jano 'narvāṇaṃ tam pari pāto aṃhaso dāśvāṃsam martam aṃhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3020: RV_1,136.05d tam aryamābhi rakṣaty ṛjūyantam anu vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3021: RV_1,136.05f ukthair ya enoḥ paribhūṣati vrataṃ stomair ābhūṣati vratam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3022: RV_1,136.06a namo dive bṛhate rodasībhyām mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya mīḷhuṣe sumṛḷīkāya mīḷhuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3023: RV_1,136.06d indram agnim upa stuhi dyukṣam aryamaṇam bhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3024: RV_1,136.06f jyog jīvantaḥ prajayā sacemahi somasyotī sacemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3025: RV_1,136.07a ūtī devānāṃ vayam indravanto maṃsīmahi svayaśaso marudbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3026: RV_1,136.07c agnir mitro varuṇaḥ śarma yaṃsan tad aśyāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:3027: RV_1,137.01a suṣumā yātam adribhir gośrītā matsarā ime somāso matsarā ime /
GV01rvh1-10u:3028: RV_1,137.01d ā rājānā divispṛśāsmatrā gantam upa naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3029: RV_1,137.01f ime vām mitrāvaruṇā gavāśiraḥ somāḥ śukrā gavāśiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3030: RV_1,137.02a ima ā yātam indavaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ sutāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3031: RV_1,137.02d uta vām uṣaso budhi sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3032: RV_1,137.02f suto mitrāya varuṇāya pītaye cārur ṛtāya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:3033: RV_1,137.03a tāṃ vāṃ dhenuṃ na vāsarīm aṃśuṃ duhanty adribhiḥ somaṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3034: RV_1,137.03d asmatrā gantam upa no 'rvāñcā somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3035: RV_1,137.03f ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ soma ā pītaye sutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3036: RV_1,138.01a pra-pra pūṣṇas tuvijātasya śasyate mahitvam asya tavaso na tandate stotram asya na tandate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3037: RV_1,138.01d arcāmi sumnayann aham antyūtim mayobhuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3038: RV_1,138.01f viśvasya yo mana āyuyuve makho deva āyuyuve makhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3039: RV_1,138.02a pra hi tvā pūṣann ajiraṃ na yāmani stomebhiḥ kṛṇva ṛṇavo yathā mṛdha uṣṭro na pīparo mṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3040: RV_1,138.02d huve yat tvā mayobhuvaṃ devaṃ sakhyāya martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3041: RV_1,138.02f asmākam āṅgūṣān dyumninas kṛdhi vājeṣu dyumninas kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3042: RV_1,138.03a yasya te pūṣan sakhye vipanyavaḥ kratvā cit santo 'vasā bubhujrira iti kratvā bubhujrire /
GV01rvh1-10u:3043: RV_1,138.03d tām anu tvā navīyasīṃ niyutaṃ rāya īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3044: RV_1,138.03f aheḷamāna uruśaṃsa sarī bhava vāje-vāje sarī bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:3045: RV_1,138.04a asyā ū ṣu ṇa upa sātaye bhuvo 'heḷamāno rarivāṃ ajāśva śravasyatām ajāśva /
GV01rvh1-10u:3046: RV_1,138.04d o ṣu tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhir dasma sādhubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3047: RV_1,138.04f nahi tvā pūṣann atimanya āghṛṇe na te sakhyam apahnuve //
GV01rvh1-10u:3048: RV_1,139.01a astu śrauṣaṭ puro agnīṃ dhiyā dadha ā nu tac chardho divyaṃ vṛṇīmaha indravāyū vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3049: RV_1,139.01d yad dha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3050: RV_1,139.01f adha pra sū na upa yantu dhītayo devāṃ acchā na dhītayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3051: RV_1,139.02a yad dha tyan mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtād adhy ādadāthe anṛtaṃ svena manyunā dakṣasya svena manyunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3052: RV_1,139.02d yuvor itthādhi sadmasv apaśyāma hiraṇyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3053: RV_1,139.02f dhībhiś cana manasā svebhir akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhir akṣabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3054: RV_1,139.03a yuvāṃ stomebhir devayanto aśvināśrāvayanta iva ślokam āyavo yuvāṃ havyābhy āyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3055: RV_1,139.03d yuvor viśvā adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaś ca viśvavedasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3056: RV_1,139.03f pruṣāyante vām pavayo hiraṇyaye rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:3057: RV_1,139.04a aceti dasrā vy u nākam ṛṇvatho yuñjate vāṃ rathayujo diviṣṭiṣv adhvasmāno diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3058: RV_1,139.04d adhi vāṃ sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3059: RV_1,139.04f patheva yantāv anuśāsatā rajo 'ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3060: RV_1,139.05a śacībhir naḥ śacīvasū divā naktaṃ daśasyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3061: RV_1,139.05c mā vāṃ rātir upa dasat kadā canāsmad rātiḥ kadā cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3062: RV_1,139.06a vṛṣann indra vṛṣapāṇāsa indava ime sutā adriṣutāsa udbhidas tubhyaṃ sutāsa udbhidaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3063: RV_1,139.06d te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:3064: RV_1,139.06f gīrbhir girvāha stavamāna ā gahi sumṛḷīko na ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3065: RV_1,139.07a o ṣū ṇo agne śṛṇuhi tvam īḷito devebhyo bravasi yajñiyebhyo rājabhyo yajñiyebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3066: RV_1,139.07d yad dha tyām aṅgirobhyo dhenuṃ devā adattana /
GV01rvh1-10u:3067: RV_1,139.07f vi tāṃ duhre aryamā kartarī sacāṃ eṣa tāṃ veda me sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3068: RV_1,139.08a mo ṣu vo asmad abhi tāni pauṃsyā sanā bhūvan dyumnāni mota jāriṣur asmat purota jāriṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3069: RV_1,139.08d yad vaś citraṃ yuge-yuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3070: RV_1,139.08f asmāsu tan maruto yac ca duṣṭaraṃ didhṛtā yac ca duṣṭaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:3071: RV_1,139.09a dadhyaṅ ha me januṣam pūrvo aṅgirāḥ priyamedhaḥ kaṇvo atrir manur vidus te me pūrve manur viduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3072: RV_1,139.09d teṣāṃ deveṣv āyatir asmākaṃ teṣu nābhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3073: RV_1,139.09f teṣām padena mahy ā name girendrāgnī ā name girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3074: RV_1,139.10a hotā yakṣad vanino vanta vāryam bṛhaspatir yajati vena ukṣabhiḥ puruvārebhir ukṣabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3075: RV_1,139.10d jagṛbhmā dūraādiśaṃ ślokam adrer adha tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3076: RV_1,139.10f adhārayad ararindāni sukratuḥ purū sadmāni sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3077: RV_1,139.11a ye devāso divy ekādaśa stha pṛthivyām adhy ekādaśa stha /
GV01rvh1-10u:3078: RV_1,139.11c apsukṣito mahinaikādaśa stha te devāso yajñam imaṃ juṣadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3079: RV_1,140.01a vediṣade priyadhāmāya sudyute dhāsim iva pra bharā yonim agnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3080: RV_1,140.01c vastreṇeva vāsayā manmanā śuciṃ jyotīrathaṃ śukravarṇaṃ tamohanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3081: RV_1,140.02a abhi dvijanmā trivṛd annam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdham ī punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3082: RV_1,140.02c anyasyāsā jihvayā jenyo vṛṣā ny anyena vanino mṛṣṭa vāraṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3083: RV_1,140.03a kṛṣṇaprutau vevije asya sakṣitā ubhā tarete abhi mātarā śiśum /
GV01rvh1-10u:3084: RV_1,140.03c prācājihvaṃ dhvasayantaṃ tṛṣucyutam ā sācyaṃ kupayaṃ vardhanam pituḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3085: RV_1,140.04a mumukṣvo manave mānavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇasītāsa ū juvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3086: RV_1,140.04c asamanā ajirāso raghuṣyado vātajūtā upa yujyanta āśavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3087: RV_1,140.05a ād asya te dhvasayanto vṛtherate kṛṣṇam abhvam mahi varpaḥ karikrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3088: RV_1,140.05c yat sīm mahīm avanim prābhi marmṛśad abhiśvasan stanayann eti nānadat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3089: RV_1,140.06a bhūṣan na yo 'dhi babhrūṣu namnate vṛṣeva patnīr abhy eti roruvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3090: RV_1,140.06c ojāyamānas tanvaś ca śumbhate bhīmo na śṛṅgā davidhāva durgṛbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3091: RV_1,140.07a sa saṃstiro viṣṭiraḥ saṃ gṛbhāyati jānann eva jānatīr nitya ā śaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3092: RV_1,140.07c punar vardhante api yanti devyam anyad varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3093: RV_1,140.08a tam agruvaḥ keśinīḥ saṃ hi rebhira ūrdhvās tasthur mamruṣīḥ prāyave punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3094: RV_1,140.08c tāsāṃ jarām pramuñcann eti nānadad asum paraṃ janayañ jīvam astṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3095: RV_1,140.09a adhīvāsam pari mātū rihann aha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhir yāti vi jrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3096: RV_1,140.09c vayo dadhat padvate rerihat sadānu śyenī sacate vartanīr aha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3097: RV_1,140.10a asmākam agne maghavatsu dīdihy adha śvasīvān vṛṣabho damūnāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3098: RV_1,140.10c avāsyā śiśumatīr adīder varmeva yutsu parijarbhurāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3099: RV_1,140.11a idam agne sudhitaṃ durdhitād adhi priyād u cin manmanaḥ preyo astu te /
GV01rvh1-10u:3100: RV_1,140.11c yat te śukraṃ tanvo rocate śuci tenāsmabhyaṃ vanase ratnam ā tvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3101: RV_1,140.12a rathāya nāvam uta no gṛhāya nityāritrām padvatīṃ rāsy agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:3102: RV_1,140.12c asmākaṃ vīrāṃ uta no maghono janāṃś ca yā pārayāc charma yā ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:3103: RV_1,140.13a abhī no agna uktham ij juguryā dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaś ca svagūrtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3104: RV_1,140.13c gavyaṃ yavyaṃ yanto dīrghāheṣaṃ varam aruṇyo varanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:3105: RV_1,141.01a baḷ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso yato jani /
GV01rvh1-10u:3106: RV_1,141.01c yad īm upa hvarate sādhate matir ṛtasya dhenā anayanta sasrutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3107: RV_1,141.02a pṛkṣo vapuḥ pitumān nitya ā śaye dvitīyam ā saptaśivāsu mātṛṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3108: RV_1,141.02c tṛtīyam asya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatiṃ janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3109: RV_1,141.03a nir yad īm budhnān mahiṣasya varpasa īśānāsaḥ śavasā kranta sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3110: RV_1,141.03c yad īm anu pradivo madhva ādhave guhā santam mātariśvā mathāyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:3111: RV_1,141.04a pra yat pituḥ paramān nīyate pary ā pṛkṣudho vīrudho daṃsu rohati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3112: RV_1,141.04c ubhā yad asya januṣaṃ yad invata ād id yaviṣṭho abhavad ghṛṇā śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3113: RV_1,141.05a ād in mātṝr āviśad yāsv ā śucir ahiṃsyamāna urviyā vi vāvṛdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3114: RV_1,141.05c anu yat pūrvā aruhat sanājuvo ni navyasīṣv avarāsu dhāvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3115: RV_1,141.06a ād id dhotāraṃ vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagam iva papṛcānāsa ṛñjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3116: RV_1,141.06c devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭuto martaṃ śaṃsaṃ viśvadhā veti dhāyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:3117: RV_1,141.07a vi yad asthād yajato vātacodito hvāro na vakvā jaraṇā anākṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3118: RV_1,141.07c tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṃhasaḥ śucijanmano raja ā vyadhvanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3119: RV_1,141.08a ratho na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛto dyām aṅgebhir aruṣebhir īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3120: RV_1,141.08c ād asya te kṛṣṇāso dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasyeva tveṣathād īṣate vayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3121: RV_1,141.09a tvayā hy agne varuṇo dhṛtavrato mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ /
