GV01rvh1-10u:3122: RV_1,141.09c yat sīm anu kratunā viśvathā vibhur arān na nemiḥ paribhūr ajāyathāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3123: RV_1,141.10a tvam agne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnaṃ yaviṣṭha devatātim invasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3124: RV_1,141.10c taṃ tvā nu navyaṃ sahaso yuvan vayam bhagaṃ na kāre mahiratna dhīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3125: RV_1,141.11a asme rayiṃ na svarthaṃ damūnasam bhagaṃ dakṣaṃ na papṛcāsi dharṇasim /
GV01rvh1-10u:3126: RV_1,141.11c raśmīṃr iva yo yamati janmanī ubhe devānāṃ śaṃsam ṛta ā ca sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3127: RV_1,141.12a uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvo hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavac candrarathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3128: RV_1,141.12c sa no neṣan neṣatamair amūro 'gnir vāmaṃ suvitaṃ vasyo accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3129: RV_1,141.13a astāvy agniḥ śimīvadbhir arkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataraṃ dadhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3130: RV_1,141.13c amī ca ye maghavāno vayaṃ ca mihaṃ na sūro ati niṣ ṭatanyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3131: RV_1,142.01a samiddho agna ā vaha devāṃ adya yatasruce /
GV01rvh1-10u:3132: RV_1,142.01c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ sutasomāya dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3133: RV_1,142.02a ghṛtavantam upa māsi madhumantaṃ tanūnapāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3134: RV_1,142.02c yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3135: RV_1,142.03a śuciḥ pāvako adbhuto madhvā yajñam mimikṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3136: RV_1,142.03c narāśaṃsas trir ā divo devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3137: RV_1,142.04a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3138: RV_1,142.04c iyaṃ hi tvā matir mamācchā sujihva vacyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3139: RV_1,142.05a stṛṇānāso yatasruco barhir yajñe svadhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:3140: RV_1,142.05c vṛñje devavyacastamam indrāya śarma saprathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3141: RV_1,142.06a vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyo mahīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3142: RV_1,142.06c pāvakāsaḥ puruspṛho dvāro devīr asaścataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3143: RV_1,142.07a ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3144: RV_1,142.07c yahvī ṛtasya mātarā sīdatām barhir ā sumat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3145: RV_1,142.08a mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3146: RV_1,142.08c yajñaṃ no yakṣatām imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3147: RV_1,142.09a śucir deveṣv arpitā hotrā marutsu bhāratī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3148: RV_1,142.09c iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3149: RV_1,142.10a tan nas turīpam adbhutam puru vāram puru tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3150: RV_1,142.10c tvaṣṭā poṣāya vi ṣyatu rāye nābhā no asmayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3151: RV_1,142.11a avasṛjann upa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3152: RV_1,142.11c agnir havyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3154: RV_1,142.12c svāhā gāyatravepase havyam indrāya kartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3155: RV_1,142.13a svāhākṛtāny ā gahy upa havyāni vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3156: RV_1,142.13c indrā gahi śrudhī havaṃ tvāṃ havante adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:3157: RV_1,143.01a pra tavyasīṃ navyasīṃ dhītim agnaye vāco matiṃ sahasaḥ sūnave bhare /
GV01rvh1-10u:3158: RV_1,143.01c apāṃ napād yo vasubhiḥ saha priyo hotā pṛthivyāṃ ny asīdad ṛtviyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3159: RV_1,143.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomany āvir agnir abhavan mātariśvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:3160: RV_1,143.02c asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3161: RV_1,143.03a asya tveṣā ajarā asya bhānavaḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ supratīkasya sudyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3162: RV_1,143.03c bhātvakṣaso aty aktur na sindhavo 'gne rejante asasanto ajarāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3163: RV_1,143.04a yam erire bhṛgavo viśvavedasaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā bhuvanasya majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3164: RV_1,143.04c agniṃ taṃ gīrbhir hinuhi sva ā dame ya eko vasvo varuṇo na rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:3165: RV_1,143.05a na yo varāya marutām iva svanaḥ seneva sṛṣṭā divyā yathāśaniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3166: RV_1,143.05c agnir jambhais tigitair atti bharvati yodho na śatrūn sa vanā ny ṛñjate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3167: RV_1,143.06a kuvin no agnir ucathasya vīr asad vasuṣ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmam āvarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3168: RV_1,143.06c codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śucipratīkaṃ tam ayā dhiyā gṛṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3169: RV_1,143.07a ghṛtapratīkaṃ va ṛtasya dhūrṣadam agnim mitraṃ na samidhāna ṛñjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3170: RV_1,143.07c indhāno akro vidatheṣu dīdyac chukravarṇām ud u no yaṃsate dhiyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3171: RV_1,143.08a aprayucchann aprayucchadbhir agne śivebhir naḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3172: RV_1,143.08c adabdhebhir adṛpitebhir iṣṭe 'nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi no jāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3173: RV_1,144.01a eti pra hotā vratam asya māyayordhvāṃ dadhānaḥ śucipeśasaṃ dhiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3174: RV_1,144.01c abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛto yā asya dhāma prathamaṃ ha niṃsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3175: RV_1,144.02a abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3176: RV_1,144.02c apām upasthe vibhṛto yad āvasad adha svadhā adhayad yābhir īyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3177: RV_1,144.03a yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tad id vapuḥ samānam arthaṃ vitaritratā mithaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3178: RV_1,144.03c ād īm bhago na havyaḥ sam asmad ā voḷhur na raśmīn sam ayaṃsta sārathiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3179: RV_1,144.04a yam īṃ dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3180: RV_1,144.04c divā na naktam palito yuvājani purū carann ajaro mānuṣā yugā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3181: RV_1,144.05a tam īṃ hinvanti dhītayo daśa vriśo devam martāsa ūtaye havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3182: RV_1,144.05c dhanor adhi pravata ā sa ṛṇvaty abhivrajadbhir vayunā navādhita //
GV01rvh1-10u:3183: RV_1,144.06a tvaṃ hy agne divyasya rājasi tvam pārthivasya paśupā iva tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3184: RV_1,144.06c enī ta ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhir āśāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:3185: RV_1,144.07a agne juṣasva prati harya tad vaco mandra svadhāva ṛtajāta sukrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:3186: RV_1,144.07c yo viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi darśato raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva kṣayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3187: RV_1,145.01a tam pṛcchatā sa jagāmā sa veda sa cikitvāṃ īyate sā nv īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3188: RV_1,145.01c tasmin santi praśiṣas tasminn iṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3189: RV_1,145.02a tam it pṛcchanti na simo vi pṛcchati sveneva dhīro manasā yad agrabhīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3190: RV_1,145.02c na mṛṣyate prathamaṃ nāparaṃ vaco 'sya kratvā sacate apradṛpitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3191: RV_1,145.03a tam id gacchanti juhvas tam arvatīr viśvāny ekaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me /
GV01rvh1-10u:3192: RV_1,145.03c purupraiṣas taturir yajñasādhano 'cchidrotiḥ śiśur ādatta saṃ rabhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3193: RV_1,145.04a upasthāyaṃ carati yat samārata sadyo jātas tatsāra yujyebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3194: RV_1,145.04c abhi śvāntam mṛśate nāndye mude yad īṃ gacchanty uśatīr apiṣṭhitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3195: RV_1,145.05a sa īm mṛgo apyo vanargur upa tvacy upamasyāṃ ni dhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3196: RV_1,145.05c vy abravīd vayunā martyebhyo 'gnir vidvāṃ ṛtacid dhi satyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3197: RV_1,146.01a trimūrdhānaṃ saptaraśmiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nūnam agnim pitror upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3198: RV_1,146.01c niṣattam asya carato dhruvasya viśvā divo rocanāpaprivāṃsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3199: RV_1,146.02a ukṣā mahāṃ abhi vavakṣa ene ajaras tasthāv itaūtir ṛṣvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3200: RV_1,146.02c urvyāḥ pado ni dadhāti sānau rihanty ūdho aruṣāso asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:3201: RV_1,146.03a samānaṃ vatsam abhi saṃcarantī viṣvag dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke /
GV01rvh1-10u:3202: RV_1,146.03c anapavṛjyāṃ adhvano mimāne viśvān ketāṃ adhi maho dadhāne //
GV01rvh1-10u:3203: RV_1,146.04a dhīrāsaḥ padaṃ kavayo nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇā ajuryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3204: RV_1,146.04c siṣāsantaḥ pary apaśyanta sindhum āvir ebhyo abhavat sūryo nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:3205: RV_1,146.05a didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenya īḷenyo maho arbhāya jīvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:3206: RV_1,146.05c purutrā yad abhavat sūr ahaibhyo garbhebhyo maghavā viśvadarśataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3207: RV_1,147.01a kathā te agne śucayanta āyor dadāśur vājebhir āśuṣāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3208: RV_1,147.01c ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānā ṛtasya sāman raṇayanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3209: RV_1,147.02a bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3210: RV_1,147.02c pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandārus te tanvaṃ vande agne //
GV01rvh1-10u:3211: RV_1,147.03a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3212: RV_1,147.03c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3213: RV_1,147.04a yo no agne ararivāṃ aghāyur arātīvā marcayati dvayena /
GV01rvh1-10u:3214: RV_1,147.04c mantro guruḥ punar astu so asmā anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvaṃ duruktaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3215: RV_1,147.05a uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān marto martam marcayati dvayena /
GV01rvh1-10u:3216: RV_1,147.05c ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantam agne mākir no duritāya dhāyīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3217: RV_1,148.01a mathīd yad īṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3218: RV_1,148.01c ni yaṃ dadhur manuṣyāsu vikṣu svar ṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3219: RV_1,148.02a dadānam in na dadabhanta manmāgnir varūtham mama tasya cākan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3220: RV_1,148.02c juṣanta viśvāny asya karmopastutim bharamāṇasya kāroḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3221: RV_1,148.03a nitye cin nu yaṃ sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhir dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3222: RV_1,148.03c pra sū nayanta gṛbhayanta iṣṭāv aśvāso na rathyo rārahāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3223: RV_1,148.04a purūṇi dasmo ni riṇāti jambhair ād rocate vana ā vibhāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3224: RV_1,148.04c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir astur na śaryām asanām anu dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:3225: RV_1,148.05a na yaṃ ripavo na riṣaṇyavo garbhe santaṃ reṣaṇā reṣayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3226: RV_1,148.05c andhā apaśyā na dabhann abhikhyā nityāsa īm pretāro arakṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3227: RV_1,149.01a mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate patir dann ina inasya vasunaḥ pada ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3228: RV_1,149.01c upa dhrajantam adrayo vidhann it //
GV01rvh1-10u:3229: RV_1,149.02a sa yo vṛṣā narāṃ na rodasyoḥ śravobhir asti jīvapītasargaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3230: RV_1,149.02c pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau //
GV01rvh1-10u:3231: RV_1,149.03a ā yaḥ puraṃ nārmiṇīm adīded atyaḥ kavir nabhanyo nārvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3233: RV_1,149.04a abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni viśvā rajāṃsi śuśucāno asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3235: RV_1,149.05a ayaṃ sa hotā yo dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3236: RV_1,149.05c marto yo asmai sutuko dadāśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:3237: RV_1,150.01a puru tvā dāśvān voce 'rir agne tava svid ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3239: RV_1,150.02a vy aninasya dhaninaḥ prahoṣe cid araruṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3241: RV_1,150.03a sa candro vipra martyo maho vrādhantamo divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3242: RV_1,150.03c pra-pret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3243: RV_1,151.01a mitraṃ na yaṃ śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ svādhyo vidathe apsu jījanan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3244: RV_1,151.01c arejetāṃ rodasī pājasā girā prati priyaṃ yajataṃ januṣām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3245: RV_1,151.02a yad dha tyad vām purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāso na dadhire svābhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3246: RV_1,151.02c adha kratuṃ vidataṃ gātum arcata uta śrutaṃ vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3247: RV_1,151.03a ā vām bhūṣan kṣitayo janma rodasyoḥ pravācyaṃ vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3248: RV_1,151.03c yad īm ṛtāya bharatho yad arvate pra hotrayā śimyā vītho adhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:3249: RV_1,151.04a pra sā kṣitir asura yā mahi priya ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣatho bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3250: RV_1,151.04c yuvaṃ divo bṛhato dakṣam ābhuvaṃ gāṃ na dhury upa yuñjāthe apaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3251: RV_1,151.05a mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvatho 'reṇavas tuja ā sadman dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3252: RV_1,151.05c svaranti tā uparatāti sūryam ā nimruca uṣasas takvavīr iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:3253: RV_1,151.06a ā vām ṛtāya keśinīr anūṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātum arcathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3254: RV_1,151.06c ava tmanā sṛjatam pinvataṃ dhiyo yuvaṃ viprasya manmanām irajyathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3255: RV_1,151.07a yo vāṃ yajñaiḥ śaśamāno ha dāśati kavir hotā yajati manmasādhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3256: RV_1,151.07c upāha taṃ gacchatho vītho adhvaram acchā giraḥ sumatiṃ gantam asmayū //
GV01rvh1-10u:3257: RV_1,151.08a yuvāṃ yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhir añjata ṛtāvānā manaso na prayuktiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3258: RV_1,151.08c bharanti vām manmanā saṃyatā giro 'dṛpyatā manasā revad āśāthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3259: RV_1,151.09a revad vayo dadhāthe revad āśāthe narā māyābhir itaūti māhinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3260: RV_1,151.09c na vāṃ dyāvo 'habhir nota sindhavo na devatvam paṇayo nānaśur magham //
GV01rvh1-10u:3261: RV_1,152.01a yuvaṃ vastrāṇi pīvasā vasāthe yuvor acchidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3262: RV_1,152.01c avātiratam anṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3263: RV_1,152.02a etac cana tvo vi ciketad eṣāṃ satyo mantraḥ kaviśasta ṛghāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3264: RV_1,152.02c triraśriṃ hanti caturaśrir ugro devanido ha prathamā ajūryan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3265: RV_1,152.03a apād eti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kas tad vām mitrāvaruṇā ciketa /
GV01rvh1-10u:3266: RV_1,152.03c garbho bhāram bharaty ā cid asya ṛtam piparty anṛtaṃ ni tārīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3267: RV_1,152.04a prayantam it pari jāraṃ kanīnām paśyāmasi nopanipadyamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3268: RV_1,152.04c anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānam priyam mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3269: RV_1,152.05a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur arvā kanikradat patayad ūrdhvasānuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3270: RV_1,152.05c acittam brahma jujuṣur yuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇe gṛṇantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3271: RV_1,152.06a ā dhenavo māmateyam avantīr brahmapriyam pīpayan sasminn ūdhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3272: RV_1,152.06c pitvo bhikṣeta vayunāni vidvān āsāvivāsann aditim uruṣyet //
GV01rvh1-10u:3273: RV_1,152.07a ā vām mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ namasā devāv avasā vavṛtyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3274: RV_1,152.07c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭir divyā supārā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3275: RV_1,153.01a yajāmahe vām mahaḥ sajoṣā havyebhir mitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3276: RV_1,153.01c ghṛtair ghṛtasnū adha yad vām asme adhvaryavo na dhītibhir bharanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3277: RV_1,153.02a prastutir vāṃ dhāma na prayuktir ayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3278: RV_1,153.02c anakti yad vāṃ vidatheṣu hotā sumnaṃ vāṃ sūrir vṛṣaṇāv iyakṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3279: RV_1,153.03a pīpāya dhenur aditir ṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde /
GV01rvh1-10u:3280: RV_1,153.03c hinoti yad vāṃ vidathe saparyan sa rātahavyo mānuṣo na hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3281: RV_1,153.04a uta vāṃ vikṣu madyāsv andho gāva āpaś ca pīpayanta devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3282: RV_1,153.04c uto no asya pūrvyaḥ patir dan vītam pātam payasa usriyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3283: RV_1,154.01a viṣṇor nu kaṃ vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yaḥ pārthivāni vimame rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3284: RV_1,154.01c yo askabhāyad uttaraṃ sadhasthaṃ vicakramāṇas tredhorugāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3285: RV_1,154.02a pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryeṇa mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3286: RV_1,154.02c yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣv adhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3287: RV_1,154.03a pra viṣṇave śūṣam etu manma girikṣita urugāyāya vṛṣṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3288: RV_1,154.03c ya idaṃ dīrgham prayataṃ sadhastham eko vimame tribhir it padebhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3289: RV_1,154.04a yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padāny akṣīyamāṇā svadhayā madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3290: RV_1,154.04c ya u tridhātu pṛthivīm uta dyām eko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3291: RV_1,154.05a tad asya priyam abhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3292: RV_1,154.05c urukramasya sa hi bandhur itthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva utsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3293: RV_1,154.06a tā vāṃ vāstūny uśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgā ayāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3294: RV_1,154.06c atrāha tad urugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramam padam ava bhāti bhūri //
GV01rvh1-10u:3295: RV_1,155.01a pra vaḥ pāntam andhaso dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave cārcata /
GV01rvh1-10u:3296: RV_1,155.01c yā sānuni parvatānām adābhyā mahas tasthatur arvateva sādhunā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3297: RV_1,155.02a tveṣam itthā samaraṇaṃ śimīvator indrāviṣṇū sutapā vām uruṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3298: RV_1,155.02c yā martyāya pratidhīyamānam it kṛśānor astur asanām uruṣyathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3299: RV_1,155.03a tā īṃ vardhanti mahy asya pauṃsyaṃ ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje /
GV01rvh1-10u:3300: RV_1,155.03c dadhāti putro 'varam param pitur nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3301: RV_1,155.04a tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasīnasya trātur avṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3302: RV_1,155.04c yaḥ pārthivāni tribhir id vigāmabhir uru kramiṣṭorugāyāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:3303: RV_1,155.05a dve id asya kramaṇe svardṛśo 'bhikhyāya martyo bhuraṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3304: RV_1,155.05c tṛtīyam asya nakir ā dadharṣati vayaś cana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3305: RV_1,155.06a caturbhiḥ sākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiś cakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīṃr avīvipat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3306: RV_1,155.06c bṛhaccharīro vimimāna ṛkvabhir yuvākumāraḥ praty ety āhavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3307: RV_1,156.01a bhavā mitro na śevyo ghṛtāsutir vibhūtadyumna evayā u saprathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3308: RV_1,156.01c adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cid ardhya stomo yajñaś ca rādhyo haviṣmatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3309: RV_1,156.02a yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3310: RV_1,156.02c yo jātam asya mahato mahi bravat sed u śravobhir yujyaṃ cid abhy asat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3311: RV_1,156.03a tam u stotāraḥ pūrvyaṃ yathā vida ṛtasya garbhaṃ januṣā pipartana /
GV01rvh1-10u:3312: RV_1,156.03c āsya jānanto nāma cid vivaktana mahas te viṣṇo sumatim bhajāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3313: RV_1,156.04a tam asya rājā varuṇas tam aśvinā kratuṃ sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3314: RV_1,156.04c dādhāra dakṣam uttamam aharvidaṃ vrajaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivāṃ aporṇute //
GV01rvh1-10u:3315: RV_1,156.05a ā yo vivāya sacathāya daivya indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3316: RV_1,156.05c vedhā ajinvat triṣadhastha āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānam ābhajat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3317: RV_1,157.01a abodhy agnir jma ud eti sūryo vy uṣāś candrā mahy āvo arciṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3318: RV_1,157.01c āyukṣātām aśvinā yātave ratham prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak //
GV01rvh1-10u:3319: RV_1,157.02a yad yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇam aśvinā rathaṃ ghṛtena no madhunā kṣatram ukṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3320: RV_1,157.02c asmākam brahma pṛtanāsu jinvataṃ vayaṃ dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3321: RV_1,157.03a arvāṅ tricakro madhuvāhano ratho jīrāśvo aśvinor yātu suṣṭutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3322: RV_1,157.03c trivandhuro maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ śaṃ na ā vakṣad dvipade catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:3323: RV_1,157.04a ā na ūrjaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvam madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3324: RV_1,157.04c prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3325: RV_1,157.05a yuvaṃ ha garbhaṃ jagatīṣu dhattho yuvaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3326: RV_1,157.05c yuvam agniṃ ca vṛṣaṇāv apaś ca vanaspatīṃr aśvināv airayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3327: RV_1,157.06a yuvaṃ ha stho bhiṣajā bheṣajebhir atho ha stho rathyā rāthyebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3328: RV_1,157.06c atho ha kṣatram adhi dhattha ugrā yo vāṃ haviṣmān manasā dadāśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:3329: RV_1,158.01a vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā daśasyataṃ no vṛṣaṇāv abhiṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:3330: RV_1,158.01c dasrā ha yad rekṇa aucathyo vām pra yat sasrāthe akavābhir ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:3331: RV_1,158.02a ko vāṃ dāśat sumataye cid asyai vasū yad dhethe namasā pade goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3332: RV_1,158.02c jigṛtam asme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇeva manasā carantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3333: RV_1,158.03a yukto ha yad vāṃ taugryāya perur vi madhye arṇaso dhāyi pajraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3334: RV_1,158.03c upa vām avaḥ śaraṇaṃ gameyaṃ śūro nājma patayadbhir evaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3335: RV_1,158.04a upastutir aucathyam uruṣyen mā mām ime patatriṇī vi dugdhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3336: RV_1,158.04c mā mām edho daśatayaś cito dhāk pra yad vām baddhas tmani khādati kṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3337: RV_1,158.05a na mā garan nadyo mātṛtamā dāsā yad īṃ susamubdham avādhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3338: RV_1,158.05c śiro yad asya traitano vitakṣat svayaṃ dāsa uro aṃsāv api gdha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3339: RV_1,158.06a dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuge /
GV01rvh1-10u:3340: RV_1,158.06c apām arthaṃ yatīnām brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3341: RV_1,159.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3342: RV_1,159.01c devebhir ye devaputre sudaṃsasetthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3343: RV_1,159.02a uta manye pitur adruho mano mātur mahi svatavas tad dhavīmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3344: RV_1,159.02c suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratur uru prajāyā amṛtaṃ varīmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3345: RV_1,159.03a te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṃsaso mahī jajñur mātarā pūrvacittaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3346: RV_1,159.03c sthātuś ca satyaṃ jagataś ca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padam advayāvinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3347: RV_1,159.04a te māyino mamire supracetaso jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3348: RV_1,159.04c navyaṃ-navyaṃ tantum ā tanvate divi samudre antaḥ kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3349: RV_1,159.05a tad rādho adya savitur vareṇyaṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave manāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3350: RV_1,159.05c asmabhyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ śatagvinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3351: RV_1,160.01a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuva ṛtāvarī rajaso dhārayatkavī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3352: RV_1,160.01c sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antar īyate devo devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3353: RV_1,160.02a uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3354: RV_1,160.02c sudhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīm abhi rūpair avāsayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3355: RV_1,160.03a sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīro bhuvanāni māyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3356: RV_1,160.03c dhenuṃ ca pṛśniṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suretasaṃ viśvāhā śukram payo asya dukṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:3357: RV_1,160.04a ayaṃ devānām apasām apastamo yo jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3358: RV_1,160.04c vi yo mame rajasī sukratūyayājarebhi skambhanebhiḥ sam ānṛce //
GV01rvh1-10u:3359: RV_1,160.05a te no gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatraṃ dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsatho bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3360: RV_1,160.05c yenābhi kṛṣṭīs tatanāma viśvahā panāyyam ojo asme sam invatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3361: RV_1,161.01a kim u śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagan kim īyate dūtyaṃ kad yad ūcima /
GV01rvh1-10u:3362: RV_1,161.01c na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākulo 'gne bhrātar druṇa id bhūtim ūdima //
GV01rvh1-10u:3363: RV_1,161.02a ekaṃ camasaṃ caturaḥ kṛṇotana tad vo devā abruvan tad va āgamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3364: RV_1,161.02c saudhanvanā yady evā kariṣyatha sākaṃ devair yajñiyāso bhaviṣyatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3365: RV_1,161.03a agniṃ dūtam prati yad abravītanāśvaḥ kartvo ratha uteha kartvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3366: RV_1,161.03c dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātar anu vaḥ kṛtvy emasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3367: RV_1,161.04a cakṛvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchata kved abhūd yaḥ sya dūto na ājagan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3368: RV_1,161.04c yadāvākhyac camasāñ caturaḥ kṛtān ād it tvaṣṭā gnāsv antar ny ānaje //
GV01rvh1-10u:3369: RV_1,161.05a hanāmaināṃ iti tvaṣṭā yad abravīc camasaṃ ye devapānam anindiṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3370: RV_1,161.05c anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacāṃ anyair enān kanyā nāmabhi sparat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3371: RV_1,161.06a indro harī yuyuje aśvinā ratham bṛhaspatir viśvarūpām upājata /
GV01rvh1-10u:3372: RV_1,161.06c ṛbhur vibhvā vājo devāṃ agacchata svapaso yajñiyam bhāgam aitana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3373: RV_1,161.07a niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhir yā jarantā yuvaśā tākṛṇotana /
GV01rvh1-10u:3374: RV_1,161.07c saudhanvanā aśvād aśvam atakṣata yuktvā ratham upa devāṃ ayātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3375: RV_1,161.08a idam udakam pibatety abravītanedaṃ vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3376: RV_1,161.08c saudhanvanā yadi tan neva haryatha tṛtīye ghā savane mādayādhvai //
GV01rvh1-10u:3377: RV_1,161.09a āpo bhūyiṣṭhā ity eko abravīd agnir bhūyiṣṭha ity anyo abravīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3378: RV_1,161.09c vadharyantīm bahubhyaḥ praiko abravīd ṛtā vadantaś camasāṃ apiṃśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:3379: RV_1,161.10a śroṇām eka udakaṃ gām avājati māṃsam ekaḥ piṃśati sūnayābhṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3380: RV_1,161.10c ā nimrucaḥ śakṛd eko apābharat kiṃ svit putrebhyaḥ pitarā upāvatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3381: RV_1,161.11a udvatsv asmā akṛṇotanā tṛṇaṃ nivatsv apaḥ svapasyayā naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3382: RV_1,161.11c agohyasya yad asastanā gṛhe tad adyedam ṛbhavo nānu gacchatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3383: RV_1,161.12a sammīlya yad bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svit tātyā pitarā va āsatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3384: RV_1,161.12c aśapata yaḥ karasnaṃ va ādade yaḥ prābravīt pro tasmā abravītana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3385: RV_1,161.13a suṣupvāṃsa ṛbhavas tad apṛcchatāgohya ka idaṃ no abūbudhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3386: RV_1,161.13c śvānam basto bodhayitāram abravīt saṃvatsara idam adyā vy akhyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:3387: RV_1,161.14a divā yānti maruto bhūmyāgnir ayaṃ vāto antarikṣeṇa yāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3388: RV_1,161.14c adbhir yāti varuṇaḥ samudrair yuṣmāṃ icchantaḥ śavaso napātaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3389: RV_1,162.01a mā no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā marutaḥ pari khyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3390: RV_1,162.01c yad vājino devajātasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmo vidathe vīryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3391: RV_1,162.02a yan nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya rātiṃ gṛbhītām mukhato nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3392: RV_1,162.02c suprāṅ ajo memyad viśvarūpa indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyam apy eti pāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3393: RV_1,162.03a eṣa cchāgaḥ puro aśvena vājinā pūṣṇo bhāgo nīyate viśvadevyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3394: RV_1,162.03c abhipriyaṃ yat puroḷāśam arvatā tvaṣṭed enaṃ sauśravasāya jinvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:3395: RV_1,162.04a yad dhaviṣyam ṛtuśo devayānaṃ trir mānuṣāḥ pary aśvaṃ nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3396: RV_1,162.04c atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamo bhāga eti yajñaṃ devebhyaḥ prativedayann ajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3397: RV_1,162.05a hotādhvaryur āvayā agnimindho grāvagrābha uta śaṃstā suvipraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3398: RV_1,162.05c tena yajñena svaraṅkṛtena sviṣṭena vakṣaṇā ā pṛṇadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3399: RV_1,162.06a yūpavraskā uta ye yūpavāhāś caṣālaṃ ye aśvayūpāya takṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3400: RV_1,162.06c ye cārvate pacanaṃ sambharanty uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3401: RV_1,162.07a upa prāgāt suman me 'dhāyi manma devānām āśā upa vītapṛṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3402: RV_1,162.07c anv enaṃ viprā ṛṣayo madanti devānām puṣṭe cakṛmā subandhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3403: RV_1,162.08a yad vājino dāma saṃdānam arvato yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanā rajjur asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:3404: RV_1,162.08c yad vā ghāsya prabhṛtam āsye tṛṇaṃ sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3405: RV_1,162.09a yad aśvasya kraviṣo makṣikāśa yad vā svarau svadhitau riptam asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3406: RV_1,162.09c yad dhastayoḥ śamitur yan nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3407: RV_1,162.10a yad ūvadhyam udarasyāpavāti ya āmasya kraviṣo gandho asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3408: RV_1,162.10c sukṛtā tac chamitāraḥ kṛṇvantūta medhaṃ śṛtapākam pacantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3409: RV_1,162.11a yat te gātrād agninā pacyamānād abhi śūlaṃ nihatasyāvadhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:3410: RV_1,162.11c mā tad bhūmyām ā śriṣan mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyas tad uśadbhyo rātam astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3411: RV_1,162.12a ye vājinam paripaśyanti pakvaṃ ya īm āhuḥ surabhir nir hareti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3412: RV_1,162.12c ye cārvato māṃsabhikṣām upāsata uto teṣām abhigūrtir na invatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3413: RV_1,162.13a yan nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyā ukhāyā yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇa āsecanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:3414: RV_1,162.13c ūṣmaṇyāpidhānā carūṇām aṅkāḥ sūnāḥ pari bhūṣanty aśvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3415: RV_1,162.14a nikramaṇaṃ niṣadanaṃ vivartanaṃ yac ca paḍbīśam arvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3416: RV_1,162.14c yac ca papau yac ca ghāsiṃ jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣv astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3417: RV_1,162.15a mā tvāgnir dhvanayīd dhūmagandhir mokhā bhrājanty abhi vikta jaghriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3418: RV_1,162.15c iṣṭaṃ vītam abhigūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ taṃ devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇanty aśvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3419: RV_1,162.16a yad aśvāya vāsa upastṛṇanty adhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyāny asmai /
GV01rvh1-10u:3420: RV_1,162.16c saṃdānam arvantam paḍbīśam priyā deveṣv ā yāmayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3421: RV_1,162.17a yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda /
GV01rvh1-10u:3422: RV_1,162.17c sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3423: RV_1,162.18a catustriṃśad vājino devabandhor vaṅkrīr aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3424: RV_1,162.18c acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-parur anughuṣyā vi śasta //
GV01rvh1-10u:3425: RV_1,162.19a ekas tvaṣṭur aśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatas tatha ṛtuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3426: RV_1,162.19c yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍānām pra juhomy agnau //
GV01rvh1-10u:3427: RV_1,162.20a mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantam mā svadhitis tanva ā tiṣṭhipat te /
GV01rvh1-10u:3428: RV_1,162.20c mā te gṛdhnur aviśastātihāya chidrā gātrāṇy asinā mithū kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3429: RV_1,162.21a na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devāṃ id eṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3430: RV_1,162.21c harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:3431: RV_1,162.22a sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyam puṃsaḥ putrāṃ uta viśvāpuṣaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:3432: RV_1,162.22c anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatāṃ haviṣmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3433: RV_1,163.01a yad akrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyan samudrād uta vā purīṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3434: RV_1,163.01c śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātaṃ te arvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3435: RV_1,163.02a yamena dattaṃ trita enam āyunag indra eṇam prathamo adhy atiṣṭhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3436: RV_1,163.02c gandharvo asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrād aśvaṃ vasavo nir ataṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:3437: RV_1,163.03a asi yamo asy ādityo arvann asi trito guhyena vratena /
GV01rvh1-10u:3438: RV_1,163.03c asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhus te trīṇi divi bandhanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:3439: RV_1,163.04a trīṇi ta āhur divi bandhanāni trīṇy apsu trīṇy antaḥ samudre /
GV01rvh1-10u:3440: RV_1,163.04c uteva me varuṇaś chantsy arvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram //
GV01rvh1-10u:3441: RV_1,163.05a imā te vājinn avamārjanānīmā śaphānāṃ sanitur nidhānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3442: RV_1,163.05c atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣanti gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3443: RV_1,163.06a ātmānaṃ te manasārād ajānām avo divā patayantam pataṅgam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3444: RV_1,163.06c śiro apaśyam pathibhiḥ sugebhir areṇubhir jehamānam patatri //
GV01rvh1-10u:3445: RV_1,163.07a atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇam iṣa ā pade goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3446: RV_1,163.07c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḷ ād id grasiṣṭha oṣadhīr ajīgaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3447: RV_1,163.08a anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvann anu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3448: RV_1,163.08c anu vrātāsas tava sakhyam īyur anu devā mamire vīryaṃ te //
GV01rvh1-10u:3449: RV_1,163.09a hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3450: RV_1,163.09c devā id asya haviradyam āyan yo arvantam prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3451: RV_1,163.10a īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ saṃ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3452: RV_1,163.10c haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatante yad ākṣiṣur divyam ajmam aśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3453: RV_1,163.11a tava śarīram patayiṣṇv arvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3454: RV_1,163.11c tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3455: RV_1,163.12a upa prāgāc chasanaṃ vājy arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3456: RV_1,163.12c ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhir asyānu paścāt kavayo yanti rebhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3457: RV_1,163.13a upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhastham arvāṃ acchā pitaram mātaraṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:3458: RV_1,163.13c adyā devāñ juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3459: RV_1,164.01a asya vāmasya palitasya hotus tasya bhrātā madhyamo asty aśnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3460: RV_1,164.01c tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asyātrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram //
GV01rvh1-10u:3461: RV_1,164.02a sapta yuñjanti ratham ekacakram eko aśvo vahati saptanāmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3462: RV_1,164.02c trinābhi cakram ajaram anarvaṃ yatremā viśvā bhuvanādhi tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3463: RV_1,164.03a imaṃ ratham adhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahanty aśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3464: RV_1,164.03c sapta svasāro abhi saṃ navante yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3465: RV_1,164.04a ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānam asthanvantaṃ yad anasthā bibharti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3466: RV_1,164.04c bhūmyā asur asṛg ātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsam upa gāt praṣṭum etat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3467: RV_1,164.05a pākaḥ pṛcchāmi manasāvijānan devānām enā nihitā padāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:3468: RV_1,164.05c vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavā u //
GV01rvh1-10u:3469: RV_1,164.06a acikitvāñ cikituṣaś cid atra kavīn pṛcchāmi vidmane na vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3470: RV_1,164.06c vi yas tastambha ṣaḷ imā rajāṃsy ajasya rūpe kim api svid ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3471: RV_1,164.07a iha bravītu ya īm aṅga vedāsya vāmasya nihitam padaṃ veḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3472: RV_1,164.07c śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakam padāpuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3473: RV_1,164.08a mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhīty agre manasā saṃ hi jagme /
GV01rvh1-10u:3474: RV_1,164.08c sā bībhatsur garbharasā nividdhā namasvanta id upavākam īyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3475: RV_1,164.09a yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3476: RV_1,164.09c amīmed vatso anu gām apaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3477: RV_1,164.10a tisro mātṝs trīn pitṝn bibhrad eka ūrdhvas tasthau nem ava glāpayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3478: RV_1,164.10c mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācam aviśvaminvām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3479: RV_1,164.11a dvādaśāraṃ nahi taj jarāya varvarti cakram pari dyām ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:3480: RV_1,164.11c ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiś ca tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3481: RV_1,164.12a pañcapādam pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3482: RV_1,164.12c atheme anya upare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḷara āhur arpitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3483: RV_1,164.13a pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminn ā tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3484: RV_1,164.13c tasya nākṣas tapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanād eva na śīryate sanābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3485: RV_1,164.14a sanemi cakram ajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3486: RV_1,164.14c sūryasya cakṣū rajasaity āvṛtaṃ tasminn ārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3487: RV_1,164.15a sākañjānāṃ saptatham āhur ekajaṃ ṣaḷ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3488: RV_1,164.15c teṣām iṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśa sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3489: RV_1,164.16a striyaḥ satīs tāṃ u me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyad akṣaṇvān na vi cetad andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3490: RV_1,164.16c kavir yaḥ putraḥ sa īm ā ciketa yas tā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3491: RV_1,164.17a avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsam bibhratī gaur ud asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3492: RV_1,164.17c sā kadrīcī kaṃ svid ardham parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3493: RV_1,164.18a avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asyānuveda para enāvareṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:3494: RV_1,164.18c kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devam manaḥ kuto adhi prajātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3495: RV_1,164.19a ye arvāñcas tāṃ u parāca āhur ye parāñcas tāṃ u arvāca āhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3496: RV_1,164.19c indraś ca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajaso vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3497: RV_1,164.20a dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣam pari ṣasvajāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:3498: RV_1,164.20c tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo abhi cākaśīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3499: RV_1,164.21a yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhāgam animeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3500: RV_1,164.21c ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākam atrā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:3501: RV_1,164.22a yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:3502: RV_1,164.22c tasyed āhuḥ pippalaṃ svādv agre tan non naśad yaḥ pitaraṃ na veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:3503: RV_1,164.23a yad gāyatre adhi gāyatram āhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:3504: RV_1,164.23c yad vā jagaj jagaty āhitam padaṃ ya it tad vidus te amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3505: RV_1,164.24a gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkam arkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3506: RV_1,164.24c vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadākṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3507: RV_1,164.25a jagatā sindhuṃ divy astabhāyad rathantare sūryam pary apaśyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3508: RV_1,164.25c gāyatrasya samidhas tisra āhus tato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3509: RV_1,164.26a upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenum etāṃ suhasto godhug uta dohad enām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3510: RV_1,164.26c śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmas tad u ṣu pra vocam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3511: RV_1,164.27a hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsam icchantī manasābhy āgāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3512: RV_1,164.27c duhām aśvibhyām payo aghnyeyaṃ sā vardhatām mahate saubhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:3513: RV_1,164.28a gaur amīmed anu vatsam miṣantam mūrdhānaṃ hiṅṅ akṛṇon mātavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:3514: RV_1,164.28c sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmam abhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyum payate payobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3515: RV_1,164.29a ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaur abhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāv adhi śritā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3516: RV_1,164.29c sā cittibhir ni hi cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrim auhata //
GV01rvh1-10u:3517: RV_1,164.30a anac chaye turagātu jīvam ejad dhruvam madhya ā pastyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3518: RV_1,164.30c jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhir amartyo martyenā sayoniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3519: RV_1,164.31a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3520: RV_1,164.31c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3521: RV_1,164.32a ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirug in nu tasmāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3522: RV_1,164.32c sa mātur yonā parivīto antar bahuprajā nirṛtim ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:3523: RV_1,164.33a dyaur me pitā janitā nābhir atra bandhur me mātā pṛthivī mahīyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3524: RV_1,164.33c uttānayoś camvor yonir antar atrā pitā duhitur garbham ādhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3525: RV_1,164.34a pṛcchāmi tvā param antam pṛthivyāḥ pṛcchāmi yatra bhuvanasya nābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3526: RV_1,164.34c pṛcchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛcchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3527: RV_1,164.35a iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3528: RV_1,164.35c ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyaṃ vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3529: RV_1,164.36a saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇos tiṣṭhanti pradiśā vidharmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3530: RV_1,164.36c te dhītibhir manasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3531: RV_1,164.37a na vi jānāmi yad ivedam asmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3532: RV_1,164.37c yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyād id vāco aśnuve bhāgam asyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3533: RV_1,164.38a apāṅ prāṅ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3534: RV_1,164.38c tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā ny anyaṃ cikyur na ni cikyur anyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3535: RV_1,164.39a ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3536: RV_1,164.39c yas tan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidus ta ime sam āsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3537: RV_1,164.40a sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:3538: RV_1,164.40c addhi tṛṇam aghnye viśvadānīm piba śuddham udakam ācarantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:3539: RV_1,164.41a gaurīr mimāya salilāni takṣaty ekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3540: RV_1,164.41c aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman //
GV01rvh1-10u:3541: RV_1,164.42a tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaś catasraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3542: RV_1,164.42c tataḥ kṣaraty akṣaraṃ tad viśvam upa jīvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:3543: RV_1,164.43a śakamayaṃ dhūmam ārād apaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:3544: RV_1,164.43c ukṣāṇam pṛśnim apacanta vīrās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3545: RV_1,164.44a trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3546: RV_1,164.44c viśvam eko abhi caṣṭe śacībhir dhrājir ekasya dadṛśe na rūpam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3547: RV_1,164.45a catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidur brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3548: RV_1,164.45c guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3549: RV_1,164.46a indram mitraṃ varuṇam agnim āhur atho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3550: RV_1,164.46c ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadanty agniṃ yamam mātariśvānam āhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3551: RV_1,164.47a kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divam ut patanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3552: RV_1,164.47c ta āvavṛtran sadanād ṛtasyād id ghṛtena pṛthivī vy udyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3553: RV_1,164.48a dvādaśa pradhayaś cakram ekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tac ciketa /
GV01rvh1-10u:3554: RV_1,164.48c tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭir na calācalāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3555: RV_1,164.49a yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3556: RV_1,164.49c yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tam iha dhātave kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3557: RV_1,164.50a yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3558: RV_1,164.50c te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3559: RV_1,164.51a samānam etad udakam uc caity ava cāhabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3560: RV_1,164.51c bhūmim parjanyā jinvanti divaṃ jinvanty agnayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3561: RV_1,164.52a divyaṃ suparṇaṃ vāyasam bṛhantam apāṃ garbhaṃ darśatam oṣadhīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3562: RV_1,164.52c abhīpato vṛṣṭibhis tarpayantaṃ sarasvantam avase johavīmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3563: RV_1,165.01a kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3564: RV_1,165.01c kayā matī kuta etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3565: RV_1,165.02a kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣur yuvānaḥ ko adhvare maruta ā vavarta /
GV01rvh1-10u:3566: RV_1,165.02c śyenāṃ iva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3567: RV_1,165.03a kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ sann eko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3568: RV_1,165.03c sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānair voces tan no harivo yat te asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:3569: RV_1,165.04a brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3570: RV_1,165.04c ā śāsate prati haryanty ukthemā harī vahatas tā no accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3571: RV_1,165.05a ato vayam antamebhir yujānāḥ svakṣatrebhis tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3572: RV_1,165.05c mahobhir etāṃ upa yujmahe nv indra svadhām anu hi no babhūtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3573: RV_1,165.06a kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan mām ekaṃ samadhattāhihatye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3574: RV_1,165.06c ahaṃ hy ugras taviṣas tuviṣmān viśvasya śatror anamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3575: RV_1,165.07a bhūri cakartha yujyebhir asme samānebhir vṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3576: RV_1,165.07c bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendra kratvā maruto yad vaśāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3577: RV_1,165.08a vadhīṃ vṛtram maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3578: RV_1,165.08c aham etā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaś cakara vajrabāhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3579: RV_1,165.09a anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na tvāvāṃ asti devatā vidānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3580: RV_1,165.09c na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3581: RV_1,165.10a ekasya cin me vibhv astv ojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3582: RV_1,165.10c ahaṃ hy ugro maruto vidāno yāni cyavam indra id īśa eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3583: RV_1,165.11a amandan mā maruta stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra /
GV01rvh1-10u:3584: RV_1,165.11c indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyas tanve tanūbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3585: RV_1,165.12a eved ete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śrava eṣo dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3586: RV_1,165.12c saṃcakṣyā marutaś candravarṇā acchānta me chadayāthā ca nūnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3587: RV_1,165.13a ko nv atra maruto māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīṃr acchā sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3588: RV_1,165.13c manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣām bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3589: RV_1,165.14a ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārur asmāñ cakre mānyasya medhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3590: RV_1,165.14c o ṣu vartta maruto vipram acchemā brahmāṇi jaritā vo arcat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3591: RV_1,165.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3592: RV_1,165.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3593: RV_1,166.01a tan nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvam mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya ketave /
GV01rvh1-10u:3594: RV_1,166.01c aidheva yāman marutas tuviṣvaṇo yudheva śakrās taviṣāṇi kartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:3595: RV_1,166.02a nityaṃ na sūnum madhu bibhrata upa krīḷanti krīḷā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3596: RV_1,166.02c nakṣanti rudrā avasā namasvinaṃ na mardhanti svatavaso haviṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3597: RV_1,166.03a yasmā ūmāso amṛtā arāsata rāyas poṣaṃ ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3598: RV_1,166.03c ukṣanty asmai maruto hitā iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3599: RV_1,166.04a ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhir avyata pra va evāsaḥ svayatāso adhrajan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3600: RV_1,166.04c bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citro vo yāmaḥ prayatāsv ṛṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3601: RV_1,166.05a yat tveṣayāmā nadayanta parvatān divo vā pṛṣṭhaṃ naryā acucyavuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3602: RV_1,166.05c viśvo vo ajman bhayate vanaspatī rathīyantīva pra jihīta oṣadhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3603: RV_1,166.06a yūyaṃ na ugrā marutaḥ sucetunāriṣṭagrāmāḥ sumatim pipartana /
GV01rvh1-10u:3604: RV_1,166.06c yatrā vo didyud radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhiteva barhaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3605: RV_1,166.07a pra skambhadeṣṇā anavabhrarādhaso 'lātṛṇāso vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3606: RV_1,166.07c arcanty arkam madirasya pītaye vidur vīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3607: RV_1,166.08a śatabhujibhis tam abhihruter aghāt pūrbhī rakṣatā maruto yam āvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:3608: RV_1,166.08c janaṃ yam ugrās tavaso virapśinaḥ pāthanā śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3609: RV_1,166.09a viśvāni bhadrā maruto ratheṣu vo mithaspṛdhyeva taviṣāṇy āhitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3610: RV_1,166.09c aṃseṣv ā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayo 'kṣo vaś cakrā samayā vi vāvṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:3611: RV_1,166.10a bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāso añjayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3612: RV_1,166.10c aṃseṣv etāḥ paviṣu kṣurā adhi vayo na pakṣān vy anu śriyo dhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:3613: RV_1,166.11a mahānto mahnā vibhvo vibhūtayo dūredṛśo ye divyā iva stṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3614: RV_1,166.11c mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāra āsabhiḥ sammiślā indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3615: RV_1,166.12a tad vaḥ sujātā maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ vo dātram aditer iva vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3616: RV_1,166.12c indraś cana tyajasā vi hruṇāti taj janāya yasmai sukṛte arādhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3617: RV_1,166.13a tad vo jāmitvam marutaḥ pare yuge purū yac chaṃsam amṛtāsa āvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:3618: RV_1,166.13c ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭim āvyā sākaṃ naro daṃsanair ā cikitrire //
GV01rvh1-10u:3619: RV_1,166.14a yena dīrgham marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3620: RV_1,166.14c ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsa ebhir yajñebhis tad abhīṣṭim aśyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3621: RV_1,166.15a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3622: RV_1,166.15c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3623: RV_1,167.01a sahasraṃ ta indrotayo naḥ sahasram iṣo harivo gūrtatamāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3624: RV_1,167.01c sahasraṃ rāyo mādayadhyai sahasriṇa upa no yantu vājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3625: RV_1,167.02a ā no 'vobhir maruto yāntv acchā jyeṣṭhebhir vā bṛhaddivaiḥ sumāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3626: RV_1,167.02c adha yad eṣāṃ niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya cid dhanayanta pāre //
GV01rvh1-10u:3627: RV_1,167.03a mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇyanirṇig uparā na ṛṣṭiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3628: RV_1,167.03c guhā carantī manuṣo na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyeva saṃ vāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:3629: RV_1,167.04a parā śubhrā ayāso yavyā sādhāraṇyeva maruto mimikṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3630: RV_1,167.04c na rodasī apa nudanta ghorā juṣanta vṛdhaṃ sakhyāya devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3631: RV_1,167.05a joṣad yad īm asuryā sacadhyai viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3632: RV_1,167.05c ā sūryeva vidhato rathaṃ gāt tveṣapratīkā nabhaso netyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3633: RV_1,167.06a āsthāpayanta yuvatiṃ yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiślāṃ vidatheṣu pajrām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3634: RV_1,167.06c arko yad vo maruto haviṣmān gāyad gāthaṃ sutasomo duvasyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3635: RV_1,167.07a pra taṃ vivakmi vakmyo ya eṣām marutām mahimā satyo asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3636: RV_1,167.07c sacā yad īṃ vṛṣamaṇā ahaṃyu sthirā cij janīr vahate subhāgāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3637: RV_1,167.08a pānti mitrāvaruṇāv avadyāc cayata īm aryamo apraśastān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3638: RV_1,167.08c uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdha īm maruto dātivāraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3639: RV_1,167.09a nahī nu vo maruto anty asme ārāttāc cic chavaso antam āpuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3640: RV_1,167.09c te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃso 'rṇo na dveṣo dhṛṣatā pari ṣṭhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3641: RV_1,167.10a vayam adyendrasya preṣṭhā vayaṃ śvo vocemahi samarye /
GV01rvh1-10u:3642: RV_1,167.10c vayam purā mahi ca no anu dyūn tan na ṛbhukṣā narām anu ṣyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3643: RV_1,167.11a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3644: RV_1,167.11c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3645: RV_1,168.01a yajñā-yajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇir dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ vo devayā u dadhidhve /
GV01rvh1-10u:3646: RV_1,168.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyor mahe vavṛtyām avase suvṛktibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3647: RV_1,168.02a vavrāso na ye svajāḥ svatavasa iṣaṃ svar abhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3648: RV_1,168.02c sahasriyāso apāṃ normaya āsā gāvo vandyāso nokṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3649: RV_1,168.03a somāso na ye sutās tṛptāṃśavo hṛtsu pītāso duvaso nāsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3650: RV_1,168.03c aiṣām aṃseṣu rambhiṇīva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiś ca kṛtiś ca saṃ dadhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3651: RV_1,168.04a ava svayuktā diva ā vṛthā yayur amartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3652: RV_1,168.04c areṇavas tuvijātā acucyavur dṛḷhāni cin maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3653: RV_1,168.05a ko vo 'ntar maruta ṛṣṭividyuto rejati tmanā hanveva jihvayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3654: RV_1,168.05c dhanvacyuta iṣāṃ na yāmani purupraiṣā ahanyo naitaśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3655: RV_1,168.06a kva svid asya rajaso mahas paraṃ kvāvaram maruto yasminn āyaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:3656: RV_1,168.06c yac cyāvayatha vithureva saṃhitaṃ vy adriṇā patatha tveṣam arṇavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3657: RV_1,168.07a sātir na vo 'mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3658: RV_1,168.07c bhadrā vo rātiḥ pṛṇato na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryeva jañjatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:3659: RV_1,168.08a prati ṣṭobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyo yad abhriyāṃ vācam udīrayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3660: RV_1,168.08c ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadī ghṛtam marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3661: RV_1,168.09a asūta pṛśnir mahate raṇāya tveṣam ayāsām marutām anīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3662: RV_1,168.09c te sapsarāso 'janayantābhvam ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3663: RV_1,168.10a eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3664: RV_1,168.10c eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3665: RV_1,169.01a mahaś cit tvam indra yata etān mahaś cid asi tyajaso varūtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3666: RV_1,169.01c sa no vedho marutāṃ cikitvān sumnā vanuṣva tava hi preṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3667: RV_1,169.02a ayujran ta indra viśvakṛṣṭīr vidānāso niṣṣidho martyatrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3668: RV_1,169.02c marutām pṛtsutir hāsamānā svarmīḷhasya pradhanasya sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:3669: RV_1,169.03a amyak sā ta indra ṛṣṭir asme sanemy abhvam maruto junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3670: RV_1,169.03c agniś cid dhi ṣmātase śuśukvān āpo na dvīpaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3671: RV_1,169.04a tvaṃ tū na indra taṃ rayiṃ dā ojiṣṭhayā dakṣiṇayeva rātim /
GV01rvh1-10u:3672: RV_1,169.04c stutaś ca yās te cakananta vāyo stanaṃ na madhvaḥ pīpayanta vājaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3673: RV_1,169.05a tve rāya indra tośatamāḥ praṇetāraḥ kasya cid ṛtāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3674: RV_1,169.05c te ṣu ṇo maruto mṛḷayantu ye smā purā gātūyantīva devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3675: RV_1,169.06a prati pra yāhīndra mīḷhuṣo nṝn mahaḥ pārthive sadane yatasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:3676: RV_1,169.06c adha yad eṣām pṛthubudhnāsa etās tīrthe nāryaḥ pauṃsyāni tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3677: RV_1,169.07a prati ghorāṇām etānām ayāsām marutāṃ śṛṇva āyatām upabdiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3678: RV_1,169.07c ye martyam pṛtanāyantam ūmair ṛṇāvānaṃ na patayanta sargaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3679: RV_1,169.08a tvam mānebhya indra viśvajanyā radā marudbhiḥ śurudho goagrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3680: RV_1,169.08c stavānebhi stavase deva devair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3681: RV_1,170.01a na nūnam asti no śvaḥ kas tad veda yad adbhutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3682: RV_1,170.01c anyasya cittam abhi saṃcareṇyam utādhītaṃ vi naśyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:3683: RV_1,170.02a kiṃ na indra jighāṃsasi bhrātaro marutas tava /
GV01rvh1-10u:3684: RV_1,170.02c tebhiḥ kalpasva sādhuyā mā naḥ samaraṇe vadhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3685: RV_1,170.03a kiṃ no bhrātar agastya sakhā sann ati manyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:3686: RV_1,170.03c vidmā hi te yathā mano 'smabhyam in na ditsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3687: RV_1,170.04a araṃ kṛṇvantu vediṃ sam agnim indhatām puraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3688: RV_1,170.04c tatrāmṛtasya cetanaṃ yajñaṃ te tanavāvahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:3689: RV_1,170.05a tvam īśiṣe vasupate vasūnāṃ tvam mitrāṇām mitrapate dheṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3690: RV_1,170.05c indra tvam marudbhiḥ saṃ vadasvādha prāśāna ṛtuthā havīṃṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3691: RV_1,171.01a prati va enā namasāham emi sūktena bhikṣe sumatiṃ turāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3692: RV_1,171.01c rarāṇatā maruto vedyābhir ni heḷo dhatta vi mucadhvam aśvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3693: RV_1,171.02a eṣa va stomo maruto namasvān hṛdā taṣṭo manasā dhāyi devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3694: RV_1,171.02c upem ā yāta manasā juṣāṇā yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā namasa id vṛdhāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3695: RV_1,171.03a stutāso no maruto mṛḷayantūta stuto maghavā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3696: RV_1,171.03c ūrdhvā naḥ santu komyā vanāny ahāni viśvā maruto jigīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3697: RV_1,171.04a asmād ahaṃ taviṣād īṣamāṇa indrād bhiyā maruto rejamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3698: RV_1,171.04c yuṣmabhyaṃ havyā niśitāny āsan tāny āre cakṛmā mṛḷatā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3699: RV_1,171.05a yena mānāsaś citayanta usrā vyuṣṭiṣu śavasā śaśvatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3700: RV_1,171.05c sa no marudbhir vṛṣabha śravo dhā ugra ugrebhi sthaviraḥ sahodāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3701: RV_1,171.06a tvam pāhīndra sahīyaso nṝn bhavā marudbhir avayātaheḷāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3702: RV_1,171.06c supraketebhiḥ sāsahir dadhāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3703: RV_1,172.01a citro vo 'stu yāmaś citra ūtī sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3705: RV_1,172.02a āre sā vaḥ sudānavo maruta ṛñjatī śaruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3707: RV_1,172.03a tṛṇaskandasya nu viśaḥ pari vṛṅkta sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3709: RV_1,173.01a gāyat sāma nabhanyaṃ yathā ver arcāma tad vāvṛdhānaṃ svarvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3710: RV_1,173.01c gāvo dhenavo barhiṣy adabdhā ā yat sadmānaṃ divyaṃ vivāsān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3711: RV_1,173.02a arcad vṛṣā vṛṣabhiḥ sveduhavyair mṛgo nāśno ati yaj juguryāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3712: RV_1,173.02c pra mandayur manāṃ gūrta hotā bharate maryo mithunā yajatraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3713: RV_1,173.03a nakṣad dhotā pari sadma mitā yan bharad garbham ā śaradaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3714: RV_1,173.03c krandad aśvo nayamāno ruvad gaur antar dūto na rodasī carad vāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:3715: RV_1,173.04a tā karmāṣatarāsmai pra cyautnāni devayanto bharante /
GV01rvh1-10u:3716: RV_1,173.04c jujoṣad indro dasmavarcā nāsatyeva sugmyo ratheṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3717: RV_1,173.05a tam u ṣṭuhīndraṃ yo ha satvā yaḥ śūro maghavā yo ratheṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3718: RV_1,173.05c pratīcaś cid yodhīyān vṛṣaṇvān vavavruṣaś cit tamaso vihantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3719: RV_1,173.06a pra yad itthā mahinā nṛbhyo asty araṃ rodasī kakṣye nāsmai /
GV01rvh1-10u:3720: RV_1,173.06c saṃ vivya indro vṛjanaṃ na bhūmā bharti svadhāvāṃ opaśam iva dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3721: RV_1,173.07a samatsu tvā śūra satām urāṇam prapathintamam paritaṃsayadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:3722: RV_1,173.07c sajoṣasa indram made kṣoṇīḥ sūriṃ cid ye anumadanti vājaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3723: RV_1,173.08a evā hi te śaṃ savanā samudra āpo yat ta āsu madanti devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3724: RV_1,173.08c viśvā te anu joṣyā bhūd gauḥ sūrīṃś cid yadi dhiṣā veṣi janān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3725: RV_1,173.09a asāma yathā suṣakhāya ena svabhiṣṭayo narāṃ na śaṃsaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3726: RV_1,173.09c asad yathā na indro vandaneṣṭhās turo na karma nayamāna ukthā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3727: RV_1,173.10a viṣpardhaso narāṃ na śaṃsair asmākāsad indro vajrahastaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3728: RV_1,173.10c mitrāyuvo na pūrpatiṃ suśiṣṭau madhyāyuva upa śikṣanti yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3729: RV_1,173.11a yajño hi ṣmendraṃ kaś cid ṛndhañ juhurāṇaś cin manasā pariyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3730: RV_1,173.11c tīrthe nācchā tātṛṣāṇam oko dīrgho na sidhram ā kṛṇoty adhvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3731: RV_1,173.12a mo ṣū ṇa indrātra pṛtsu devair asti hi ṣmā te śuṣminn avayāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3732: RV_1,173.12c mahaś cid yasya mīḷhuṣo yavyā haviṣmato maruto vandate gīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3733: RV_1,173.13a eṣa stoma indra tubhyam asme etena gātuṃ harivo vido naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3734: RV_1,173.13c ā no vavṛtyāḥ suvitāya deva vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3735: RV_1,174.01a tvaṃ rājendra ye ca devā rakṣā nṝn pāhy asura tvam asmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3736: RV_1,174.01c tvaṃ satpatir maghavā nas tarutras tvaṃ satyo vasavānaḥ sahodāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3737: RV_1,174.02a dano viśa indra mṛdhravācaḥ sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr dart /
GV01rvh1-10u:3738: RV_1,174.02c ṛṇor apo anavadyārṇā yūne vṛtram purukutsāya randhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3739: RV_1,174.03a ajā vṛta indra śūrapatnīr dyāṃ ca yebhiḥ puruhūta nūnam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3740: RV_1,174.03c rakṣo agnim aśuṣaṃ tūrvayāṇaṃ siṃho na dame apāṃsi vastoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3741: RV_1,174.04a śeṣan nu ta indra sasmin yonau praśastaye pavīravasya mahnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3742: RV_1,174.04c sṛjad arṇāṃsy ava yad yudhā gās tiṣṭhad dharī dhṛṣatā mṛṣṭa vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3743: RV_1,174.05a vaha kutsam indra yasmiñ cākan syūmanyū ṛjrā vātasyāśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3744: RV_1,174.05c pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād abhīke 'bhi spṛdho yāsiṣad vajrabāhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3745: RV_1,174.06a jaghanvāṃ indra mitrerūñ codapravṛddho harivo adāśūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:3746: RV_1,174.06c pra ye paśyann aryamaṇaṃ sacāyos tvayā śūrtā vahamānā apatyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3747: RV_1,174.07a rapat kavir indrārkasātau kṣāṃ dāsāyopabarhaṇīṃ kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3748: RV_1,174.07c karat tisro maghavā dānucitrā ni duryoṇe kuyavācam mṛdhi śret //
GV01rvh1-10u:3749: RV_1,174.08a sanā tā ta indra navyā āguḥ saho nabho 'viraṇāya pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3750: RV_1,174.08c bhinat puro na bhido adevīr nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3751: RV_1,174.09a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3752: RV_1,174.09c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3753: RV_1,174.10a tvam asmākam indra viśvadha syā avṛkatamo narāṃ nṛpātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3754: RV_1,174.10c sa no viśvāsāṃ spṛdhāṃ sahodā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3755: RV_1,175.01a matsy apāyi te mahaḥ pātrasyeva harivo matsaro madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3756: RV_1,175.01c vṛṣā te vṛṣṇa indur vājī sahasrasātamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3757: RV_1,175.02a ā nas te gantu matsaro vṛṣā mado vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3758: RV_1,175.02c sahāvāṃ indra sānasiḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amartyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3759: RV_1,175.03a tvaṃ hi śūraḥ sanitā codayo manuṣo ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:3760: RV_1,175.03c sahāvān dasyum avratam oṣaḥ pātraṃ na śociṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3761: RV_1,175.04a muṣāya sūryaṃ kave cakram īśāna ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3762: RV_1,175.04c vaha śuṣṇāya vadhaṃ kutsaṃ vātasyāśvaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3763: RV_1,175.05a śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3765: RV_1,175.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha /
GV01rvh1-10u:3766: RV_1,175.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3767: RV_1,176.01a matsi no vasyaiṣṭaya indram indo vṛṣā viśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:3768: RV_1,176.01c ṛghāyamāṇa invasi śatrum anti na vindasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3769: RV_1,176.02a tasminn ā veśayā giro ya ekaś carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3770: RV_1,176.02c anu svadhā yam upyate yavaṃ na carkṛṣad vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3771: RV_1,176.03a yasya viśvāni hastayoḥ pañca kṣitīnāṃ vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3772: RV_1,176.03c spāśayasva yo asmadhrug divyevāśanir jahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:3773: RV_1,176.04a asunvantaṃ samaṃ jahi dūṇāśaṃ yo na te mayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3774: RV_1,176.04c asmabhyam asya vedanaṃ daddhi sūriś cid ohate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3775: RV_1,176.05a āvo yasya dvibarhaso 'rkeṣu sānuṣag asat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3776: RV_1,176.05c ājāv indrasyendo prāvo vājeṣu vājinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3777: RV_1,176.06a yathā pūrvebhyo jaritṛbhya indra maya ivāpo na tṛṣyate babhūtha /
GV01rvh1-10u:3778: RV_1,176.06c tām anu tvā nividaṃ johavīmi vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3779: RV_1,177.01a ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3780: RV_1,177.01c stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇā yāhy arvāṅ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3781: RV_1,177.02a ye te vṛṣaṇo vṛṣabhāsa indra brahmayujo vṛṣarathāso atyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3782: RV_1,177.02c tāṃ ā tiṣṭha tebhir ā yāhy arvāṅ havāmahe tvā suta indra some //
GV01rvh1-10u:3783: RV_1,177.03a ā tiṣṭha rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vṛṣā te sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:3784: RV_1,177.03c yuktvā vṛṣabhyāṃ vṛṣabha kṣitīnāṃ haribhyāṃ yāhi pravatopa madrik //
GV01rvh1-10u:3785: RV_1,177.04a ayaṃ yajño devayā ayam miyedha imā brahmāṇy ayam indra somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3786: RV_1,177.04c stīrṇam barhir ā tu śakra pra yāhi pibā niṣadya vi mucā harī iha //
GV01rvh1-10u:3787: RV_1,177.05a o suṣṭuta indra yāhy arvāṅ upa brahmāṇi mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3788: RV_1,177.05c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3789: RV_1,178.01a yad dha syā ta indra śruṣṭir asti yayā babhūtha jaritṛbhya ūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3790: RV_1,178.01c mā naḥ kāmam mahayantam ā dhag viśvā te aśyām pary āpa āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3791: RV_1,178.02a na ghā rājendra ā dabhan no yā nu svasārā kṛṇavanta yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:3792: RV_1,178.02c āpaś cid asmai sutukā aveṣan gaman na indraḥ sakhyā vayaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:3793: RV_1,178.03a jetā nṛbhir indraḥ pṛtsu śūraḥ śrotā havaṃ nādhamānasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3794: RV_1,178.03c prabhartā rathaṃ dāśuṣa upāka udyantā giro yadi ca tmanā bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3795: RV_1,178.04a evā nṛbhir indraḥ suśravasyā prakhādaḥ pṛkṣo abhi mitriṇo bhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:3796: RV_1,178.04c samarya iṣa stavate vivāci satrākaro yajamānasya śaṃsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3797: RV_1,178.05a tvayā vayam maghavann indra śatrūn abhi ṣyāma mahato manyamānān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3798: RV_1,178.05c tvaṃ trātā tvam u no vṛdhe bhūr vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3799: RV_1,179.01a pūrvīr ahaṃ śaradaḥ śaśramāṇā doṣā vastor uṣaso jarayantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3800: RV_1,179.01c mināti śriyaṃ jarimā tanūnām apy ū nu patnīr vṛṣaṇo jagamyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3801: RV_1,179.02a ye cid dhi pūrva ṛtasāpa āsan sākaṃ devebhir avadann ṛtāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:3802: RV_1,179.02c te cid avāsur nahy antam āpuḥ sam ū nu patnīr vṛṣabhir jagamyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3803: RV_1,179.03a na mṛṣā śrāntaṃ yad avanti devā viśvā it spṛdho abhy aśnavāva /
GV01rvh1-10u:3804: RV_1,179.03c jayāved atra śatanītham ājiṃ yat samyañcā mithunāv abhy ajāva //
GV01rvh1-10u:3805: RV_1,179.04a nadasya mā rudhataḥ kāma āgann ita ājāto amutaḥ kutaś cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:3806: RV_1,179.04c lopāmudrā vṛṣaṇaṃ nī riṇāti dhīram adhīrā dhayati śvasantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3807: RV_1,179.05a imaṃ nu somam antito hṛtsu pītam upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:3808: RV_1,179.05c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷatu pulukāmo hi martyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3809: RV_1,179.06a agastyaḥ khanamānaḥ khanitraiḥ prajām apatyam balam icchamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3810: RV_1,179.06c ubhau varṇāv ṛṣir ugraḥ pupoṣa satyā deveṣv āśiṣo jagāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3811: RV_1,180.01a yuvo rajāṃsi suyamāso aśvā ratho yad vām pary arṇāṃsi dīyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3812: RV_1,180.01c hiraṇyayā vām pavayaḥ pruṣāyan madhvaḥ pibantā uṣasaḥ sacethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3813: RV_1,180.02a yuvam atyasyāva nakṣatho yad vipatmano naryasya prayajyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3814: RV_1,180.02c svasā yad vāṃ viśvagūrtī bharāti vājāyeṭṭe madhupāv iṣe ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:3815: RV_1,180.03a yuvam paya usriyāyām adhattam pakvam āmāyām ava pūrvyaṃ goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3816: RV_1,180.03c antar yad vanino vām ṛtapsū hvāro na śucir yajate haviṣmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3817: RV_1,180.04a yuvaṃ ha gharmam madhumantam atraye 'po na kṣodo 'vṛṇītam eṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3818: RV_1,180.04c tad vāṃ narāv aśvinā paśvaiṣṭī rathyeva cakrā prati yanti madhvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3819: RV_1,180.05a ā vāṃ dānāya vavṛtīya dasrā gor oheṇa taugryo na jivriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3820: RV_1,180.05c apaḥ kṣoṇī sacate māhinā vāṃ jūrṇo vām akṣur aṃhaso yajatrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3821: RV_1,180.06a ni yad yuvethe niyutaḥ sudānū upa svadhābhiḥ sṛjathaḥ purandhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:3822: RV_1,180.06c preṣad veṣad vāto na sūrir ā mahe dade suvrato na vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3823: RV_1,180.07a vayaṃ cid dhi vāṃ jaritāraḥ satyā vipanyāmahe vi paṇir hitāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3824: RV_1,180.07c adhā cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anindyā pātho hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇāv antidevam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3825: RV_1,180.08a yuvāṃ cid dhi ṣmāśvināv anu dyūn virudrasya prasravaṇasya sātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:3826: RV_1,180.08c agastyo narāṃ nṛṣu praśastaḥ kārādhunīva citayat sahasraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3827: RV_1,180.09a pra yad vahethe mahinā rathasya pra syandrā yātho manuṣo na hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3828: RV_1,180.09c dhattaṃ sūribhya uta vā svaśvyaṃ nāsatyā rayiṣācaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:3829: RV_1,180.10a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema stomair aśvinā suvitāya navyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3830: RV_1,180.10c ariṣṭanemim pari dyām iyānaṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3831: RV_1,181.01a kad u preṣṭāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām adhvaryantā yad unninītho apām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3832: RV_1,181.01c ayaṃ vāṃ yajño akṛta praśastiṃ vasudhitī avitārā janānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3833: RV_1,181.02a ā vām aśvāsaḥ śucayaḥ payaspā vātaraṃhaso divyāso atyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3834: RV_1,181.02c manojuvo vṛṣaṇo vītapṛṣṭhā eha svarājo aśvinā vahantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:3835: RV_1,181.03a ā vāṃ ratho 'vanir na pravatvān sṛpravandhuraḥ suvitāya gamyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3836: RV_1,181.03c vṛṣṇa sthātārā manaso javīyān ahampūrvo yajato dhiṣṇyā yaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3837: RV_1,181.04a iheha jātā sam avāvaśītām arepasā tanvā nāmabhiḥ svaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3838: RV_1,181.04c jiṣṇur vām anyaḥ sumakhasya sūrir divo anyaḥ subhagaḥ putra ūhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3839: RV_1,181.05a pra vāṃ niceruḥ kakuho vaśāṃ anu piśaṅgarūpaḥ sadanāni gamyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3840: RV_1,181.05c harī anyasya pīpayanta vājair mathrā rajāṃsy aśvinā vi ghoṣaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3841: RV_1,181.06a pra vāṃ śaradvān vṛṣabho na niṣṣāṭ pūrvīr iṣaś carati madhva iṣṇan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3842: RV_1,181.06c evair anyasya pīpayanta vājair veṣantīr ūrdhvā nadyo na āguḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3843: RV_1,181.07a asarji vāṃ sthavirā vedhasā gīr bāḷhe aśvinā tredhā kṣarantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3844: RV_1,181.07c upastutāv avataṃ nādhamānaṃ yāmann ayāmañ chṛṇutaṃ havam me //
GV01rvh1-10u:3845: RV_1,181.08a uta syā vāṃ ruśato vapsaso gīs tribarhiṣi sadasi pinvate nṝn /
GV01rvh1-10u:3846: RV_1,181.08c vṛṣā vām megho vṛṣaṇā pīpāya gor na seke manuṣo daśasyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3847: RV_1,181.09a yuvām pūṣevāśvinā purandhir agnim uṣāṃ na jarate haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3848: RV_1,181.09c huve yad vāṃ varivasyā gṛṇāno vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3849: RV_1,182.01a abhūd idaṃ vayunam o ṣu bhūṣatā ratho vṛṣaṇvān madatā manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3850: RV_1,182.01c dhiyañjinvā dhiṣṇyā viśpalāvasū divo napātā sukṛte śucivratā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3851: RV_1,182.02a indratamā hi dhiṣṇyā maruttamā dasrā daṃsiṣṭhā rathyā rathītamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3852: RV_1,182.02c pūrṇaṃ rathaṃ vahethe madhva ācitaṃ tena dāśvāṃsam upa yātho aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3853: RV_1,182.03a kim atra dasrā kṛṇuthaḥ kim āsāthe jano yaḥ kaś cid ahavir mahīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3854: RV_1,182.03c ati kramiṣṭaṃ juratam paṇer asuṃ jyotir viprāya kṛṇutaṃ vacasyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:3855: RV_1,182.04a jambhayatam abhito rāyataḥ śuno hatam mṛdho vidathus tāny aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3856: RV_1,182.04c vācaṃ-vācaṃ jaritū ratninīṃ kṛtam ubhā śaṃsaṃ nāsatyāvatam mama //
GV01rvh1-10u:3857: RV_1,182.05a yuvam etaṃ cakrathuḥ sindhuṣu plavam ātmanvantam pakṣiṇaṃ taugryāya kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3858: RV_1,182.05c yena devatrā manasā nirūhathuḥ supaptanī petathuḥ kṣodaso mahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3859: RV_1,182.06a avaviddhaṃ taugryam apsv antar anārambhaṇe tamasi praviddham /
GV01rvh1-10u:3860: RV_1,182.06c catasro nāvo jaṭhalasya juṣṭā ud aśvibhyām iṣitāḥ pārayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3861: RV_1,182.07a kaḥ svid vṛkṣo niṣṭhito madhye arṇaso yaṃ taugryo nādhitaḥ paryaṣasvajat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3862: RV_1,182.07c parṇā mṛgasya pataror ivārabha ud aśvinā ūhathuḥ śromatāya kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3863: RV_1,182.08a tad vāṃ narā nāsatyāv anu ṣyād yad vām mānāsa ucatham avocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3864: RV_1,182.08c asmād adya sadasaḥ somyād ā vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3865: RV_1,183.01a taṃ yuñjāthām manaso yo javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā yas tricakraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3866: RV_1,183.01c yenopayāthaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tridhātunā patatho vir na parṇaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3867: RV_1,183.02a suvṛd ratho vartate yann abhi kṣāṃ yat tiṣṭhathaḥ kratumantānu pṛkṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3868: RV_1,183.02c vapur vapuṣyā sacatām iyaṃ gīr divo duhitroṣasā sacethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:3869: RV_1,183.03a ā tiṣṭhataṃ suvṛtaṃ yo ratho vām anu vratāni vartate haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3870: RV_1,183.03c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:3871: RV_1,183.04a mā vāṃ vṛko mā vṛkīr ā dadharṣīn mā pari varktam uta māti dhaktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3872: RV_1,183.04c ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihita iyaṃ gīr dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:3873: RV_1,183.05a yuvāṃ gotamaḥ purumīḷho atrir dasrā havate 'vase haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3874: RV_1,183.05c diśaṃ na diṣṭām ṛjūyeva yantā me havaṃ nāsatyopa yātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3875: RV_1,183.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3876: RV_1,183.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3877: RV_1,184.01a tā vām adya tāv aparaṃ huvemocchantyām uṣasi vahnir ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3878: RV_1,184.01c nāsatyā kuha cit santāv aryo divo napātā sudāstarāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:3879: RV_1,184.02a asme ū ṣu vṛṣaṇā mādayethām ut paṇīṃr hatam ūrmyā madantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3880: RV_1,184.02c śrutam me acchoktibhir matīnām eṣṭā narā nicetārā ca karṇaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3881: RV_1,184.03a śriye pūṣann iṣukṛteva devā nāsatyā vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3882: RV_1,184.03c vacyante vāṃ kakuhā apsu jātā yugā jūrṇeva varuṇasya bhūreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3883: RV_1,184.04a asme sā vām mādhvī rātir astu stomaṃ hinotam mānyasya kāroḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3884: RV_1,184.04c anu yad vāṃ śravasyā sudānū suvīryāya carṣaṇayo madanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3885: RV_1,184.05a eṣa vāṃ stomo aśvināv akāri mānebhir maghavānā suvṛkti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3886: RV_1,184.05c yātaṃ vartis tanayāya tmane cāgastye nāsatyā madantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3887: RV_1,184.06a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati vāṃ stomo aśvināv adhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3888: RV_1,184.06c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3889: RV_1,185.01a katarā pūrvā katarāparāyoḥ kathā jāte kavayaḥ ko vi veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:3890: RV_1,185.01c viśvaṃ tmanā bibhṛto yad dha nāma vi vartete ahanī cakriyeva //
GV01rvh1-10u:3891: RV_1,185.02a bhūriṃ dve acarantī carantam padvantaṃ garbham apadī dadhāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:3892: RV_1,185.02c nityaṃ na sūnum pitror upasthe dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3893: RV_1,185.03a aneho dātram aditer anarvaṃ huve svarvad avadhaṃ namasvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:3894: RV_1,185.03c tad rodasī janayataṃ jaritre dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3895: RV_1,185.04a atapyamāne avasāvantī anu ṣyāma rodasī devaputre /
GV01rvh1-10u:3896: RV_1,185.04c ubhe devānām ubhayebhir ahnāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3897: RV_1,185.05a saṃgacchamāne yuvatī samante svasārā jāmī pitror upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3898: RV_1,185.05c abhijighrantī bhuvanasya nābhiṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3899: RV_1,185.06a urvī sadmanī bṛhatī ṛtena huve devānām avasā janitrī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3900: RV_1,185.06c dadhāte ye amṛtaṃ supratīke dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3901: RV_1,185.07a urvī pṛthvī bahule dūreante upa bruve namasā yajñe asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:3902: RV_1,185.07c dadhāte ye subhage supratūrtī dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3903: RV_1,185.08a devān vā yac cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ sakhāyaṃ vā sadam ij jāspatiṃ vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3904: RV_1,185.08c iyaṃ dhīr bhūyā avayānam eṣāṃ dyāvā rakṣatam pṛthivī no abhvāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3905: RV_1,185.09a ubhā śaṃsā naryā mām aviṣṭām ubhe mām ūtī avasā sacetām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3906: RV_1,185.09c bhūri cid aryaḥ sudāstarāyeṣā madanta iṣayema devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3907: RV_1,185.10a ṛtaṃ dive tad avocam pṛthivyā abhiśrāvāya prathamaṃ sumedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3908: RV_1,185.10c pātām avadyād duritād abhīke pitā mātā ca rakṣatām avobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3909: RV_1,185.11a idaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī satyam astu pitar mātar yad ihopabruve vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3910: RV_1,185.11c bhūtaṃ devānām avame avobhir vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3911: RV_1,186.01a ā na iḷābhir vidathe suśasti viśvānaraḥ savitā deva etu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3912: RV_1,186.01c api yathā yuvāno matsathā no viśvaṃ jagad abhipitve manīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3913: RV_1,186.02a ā no viśva āskrā gamantu devā mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3914: RV_1,186.02c bhuvan yathā no viśve vṛdhāsaḥ karan suṣāhā vithuraṃ na śavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3915: RV_1,186.03a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣe 'gniṃ śastibhis turvaṇiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3916: RV_1,186.03c asad yathā no varuṇaḥ sukīrtir iṣaś ca parṣad arigūrtaḥ sūriḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3917: RV_1,186.04a upa va eṣe namasā jigīṣoṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3918: RV_1,186.04c samāne ahan vimimāno arkaṃ viṣurūpe payasi sasminn ūdhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:3919: RV_1,186.05a uta no 'hir budhnyo mayas kaḥ śiśuṃ na pipyuṣīva veti sindhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3920: RV_1,186.05c yena napātam apāṃ junāma manojuvo vṛṣaṇo yaṃ vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:3921: RV_1,186.06a uta na īṃ tvaṣṭā gantv acchā smat sūribhir abhipitve sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3922: RV_1,186.06c ā vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇiprās tuviṣṭamo narāṃ na iha gamyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3923: RV_1,186.07a uta na īm matayo 'śvayogāḥ śiśuṃ na gāvas taruṇaṃ rihanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3924: RV_1,186.07c tam īṃ giro janayo na patnīḥ surabhiṣṭamaṃ narāṃ nasanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:3925: RV_1,186.08a uta na īm maruto vṛddhasenāḥ smad rodasī samanasaḥ sadantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:3926: RV_1,186.08c pṛṣadaśvāso 'vanayo na rathā riśādaso mitrayujo na devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3927: RV_1,186.09a pra nu yad eṣām mahinā cikitre pra yuñjate prayujas te suvṛkti /
GV01rvh1-10u:3928: RV_1,186.09c adha yad eṣāṃ sudine na śarur viśvam eriṇam pruṣāyanta senāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3929: RV_1,186.10a pro aśvināv avase kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ svatavaso hi santi /
GV01rvh1-10u:3930: RV_1,186.10c adveṣo viṣṇur vāta ṛbhukṣā acchā sumnāya vavṛtīya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3931: RV_1,186.11a iyaṃ sā vo asme dīdhitir yajatrā apiprāṇī ca sadanī ca bhūyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3932: RV_1,186.11c ni yā deveṣu yatate vasūyur vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3933: RV_1,187.01a pituṃ nu stoṣam maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:3934: RV_1,187.01c yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃ viparvam ardayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:3935: RV_1,187.02a svādo pito madho pito vayaṃ tvā vavṛmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3937: RV_1,187.03a upa naḥ pitav ā cara śivaḥ śivābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3938: RV_1,187.03c mayobhur adviṣeṇyaḥ sakhā suśevo advayāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3939: RV_1,187.04a tava tye pito rasā rajāṃsy anu viṣṭhitāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3941: RV_1,187.05a tava tye pito dadatas tava svādiṣṭha te pito /
GV01rvh1-10u:3942: RV_1,187.05c pra svādmāno rasānāṃ tuvigrīvā iverate //
GV01rvh1-10u:3943: RV_1,187.06a tve pito mahānāṃ devānām mano hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:3944: RV_1,187.06c akāri cāru ketunā tavāhim avasāvadhīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:3945: RV_1,187.07a yad ado pito ajagan vivasva parvatānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:3946: RV_1,187.07c atrā cin no madho pito 'ram bhakṣāya gamyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3947: RV_1,187.08a yad apām oṣadhīnām pariṃśam āriśāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3949: RV_1,187.09a yat te soma gavāśiro yavāśiro bhajāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:3951: RV_1,187.10a karambha oṣadhe bhava pīvo vṛkka udārathiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3953: RV_1,187.11a taṃ tvā vayam pito vacobhir gāvo na havyā suṣūdima /
GV01rvh1-10u:3954: RV_1,187.11c devebhyas tvā sadhamādam asmabhyaṃ tvā sadhamādam //
GV01rvh1-10u:3955: RV_1,188.01a samiddho adya rājasi devo devaiḥ sahasrajit /
GV01rvh1-10u:3957: RV_1,188.02a tanūnapād ṛtaṃ yate madhvā yajñaḥ sam ajyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3959: RV_1,188.03a ājuhvāno na īḍyo devāṃ ā vakṣi yajñiyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3961: RV_1,188.04a prācīnam barhir ojasā sahasravīram astṛṇan /
GV01rvh1-10u:3963: RV_1,188.05a virāṭ samrāḍ vibhvīḥ prabhvīr bahvīś ca bhūyasīś ca yāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3965: RV_1,188.06a surukme hi supeśasādhi śriyā virājataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3967: RV_1,188.07a prathamā hi suvācasā hotārā daivyā kavī /
GV01rvh1-10u:3969: RV_1,188.08a bhāratīḷe sarasvati yā vaḥ sarvā upabruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:3971: RV_1,188.09a tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi hi prabhuḥ paśūn viśvān samānaje /
GV01rvh1-10u:3972: RV_1,188.09c teṣāṃ na sphātim ā yaja //
GV01rvh1-10u:3973: RV_1,188.10a upa tmanyā vanaspate pātho devebhyaḥ sṛja /
GV01rvh1-10u:3975: RV_1,188.11a purogā agnir devānāṃ gāyatreṇa sam ajyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:3977: RV_1,189.01a agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3978: RV_1,189.01c yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhūyiṣṭhāṃ te namauktiṃ vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:3979: RV_1,189.02a agne tvam pārayā navyo asmān svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:3980: RV_1,189.02c pūś ca pṛthvī bahulā na urvī bhavā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3981: RV_1,189.03a agne tvam asmad yuyodhy amīvā anagnitrā abhy amanta kṛṣṭīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3982: RV_1,189.03c punar asmabhyaṃ suvitāya deva kṣāṃ viśvebhir amṛtebhir yajatra //
GV01rvh1-10u:3983: RV_1,189.04a pāhi no agne pāyubhir ajasrair uta priye sadana ā śuśukvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:3984: RV_1,189.04c mā te bhayaṃ jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha nūnaṃ vidan māparaṃ sahasvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3985: RV_1,189.05a mā no agne 'va sṛjo aghāyāviṣyave ripave ducchunāyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:3986: RV_1,189.05c mā datvate daśate mādate no mā rīṣate sahasāvan parā dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3987: RV_1,189.06a vi gha tvāvāṃ ṛtajāta yaṃsad gṛṇāno agne tanve varūtham /
GV01rvh1-10u:3988: RV_1,189.06c viśvād ririkṣor uta vā ninitsor abhihrutām asi hi deva viṣpaṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3989: RV_1,189.07a tvaṃ tāṃ agna ubhayān vi vidvān veṣi prapitve manuṣo yajatra /
GV01rvh1-10u:3990: RV_1,189.07c abhipitve manave śāsyo bhūr marmṛjenya uśigbhir nākraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3991: RV_1,189.08a avocāma nivacanāny asmin mānasya sūnuḥ sahasāne agnau /
GV01rvh1-10u:3992: RV_1,189.08c vayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sanema vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:3993: RV_1,190.01a anarvāṇaṃ vṛṣabham mandrajihvam bṛhaspatiṃ vardhayā navyam arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:3994: RV_1,190.01c gāthānyaḥ suruco yasya devā āśṛṇvanti navamānasya martāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:3995: RV_1,190.02a tam ṛtviyā upa vācaḥ sacante sargo na yo devayatām asarji /
GV01rvh1-10u:3996: RV_1,190.02c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hy añjo varāṃsi vibhvābhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:3997: RV_1,190.03a upastutiṃ namasa udyatiṃ ca ślokaṃ yaṃsat saviteva pra bāhū /
GV01rvh1-10u:3998: RV_1,190.03c asya kratvāhanyo yo asti mṛgo na bhīmo arakṣasas tuviṣmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:3999: RV_1,190.04a asya śloko divīyate pṛthivyām atyo na yaṃsad yakṣabhṛd vicetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4000: RV_1,190.04c mṛgāṇāṃ na hetayo yanti cemā bṛhaspater ahimāyāṃ abhi dyūn //
