GV01rvh1-10u:4001: RV_1,190.05a ye tvā devosrikam manyamānāḥ pāpā bhadram upajīvanti pajrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4002: RV_1,190.05c na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmam bṛhaspate cayasa it piyārum //
GV01rvh1-10u:4003: RV_1,190.06a supraituḥ sūyavaso na panthā durniyantuḥ pariprīto na mitraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4004: RV_1,190.06c anarvāṇo abhi ye cakṣate no 'pīvṛtā aporṇuvanto asthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4005: RV_1,190.07a saṃ yaṃ stubho 'vanayo na yanti samudraṃ na sravato rodhacakrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4006: RV_1,190.07c sa vidvāṃ ubhayaṃ caṣṭe antar bṛhaspatis tara āpaś ca gṛdhraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4007: RV_1,190.08a evā mahas tuvijātas tuviṣmān bṛhaspatir vṛṣabho dhāyi devaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4008: RV_1,190.08c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:4010: RV_1,191.01c dvāv iti pluṣī iti ny adṛṣṭā alipsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4011: RV_1,191.02a adṛṣṭān hanty āyaty atho hanti parāyatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4012: RV_1,191.02c atho avaghnatī hanty atho pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4013: RV_1,191.03a śarāsaḥ kuśarāso darbhāsaḥ sairyā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4014: RV_1,191.03c mauñjā adṛṣṭā vairiṇāḥ sarve sākaṃ ny alipsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4015: RV_1,191.04a ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:4016: RV_1,191.04c ni ketavo janānāṃ ny adṛṣṭā alipsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4017: RV_1,191.05a eta u tye praty adṛśran pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:4019: RV_1,191.06a dyaur vaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somo bhrātāditiḥ svasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4020: RV_1,191.06c adṛṣṭā viśvadṛṣṭās tiṣṭhatelayatā su kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4021: RV_1,191.07a ye aṃsyā ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkā ye prakaṅkatāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4022: RV_1,191.07c adṛṣṭāḥ kiṃ caneha vaḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4023: RV_1,191.08a ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4024: RV_1,191.08c adṛṣṭān sarvāñ jambhayan sarvāś ca yātudhānyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4025: RV_1,191.09a ud apaptad asau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4027: RV_1,191.10a sūrye viṣam ā sajāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4028: RV_1,191.10c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4029: RV_1,191.11a iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4030: RV_1,191.11c so cin nu na marāti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4031: RV_1,191.12a triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyam akṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4032: RV_1,191.12c tāś cin nu na maranti no vayam marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4034: RV_1,191.13c sarvāsām agrabhaṃ nāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvā madhulā cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4035: RV_1,191.14a triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4036: RV_1,191.14c tās te viṣaṃ vi jabhrira udakaṃ kumbhinīr iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4037: RV_1,191.15a iyattakaḥ kuṣumbhakas takam bhinadmy aśmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4038: RV_1,191.15c tato viṣam pra vāvṛte parācīr anu saṃvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4039: RV_1,191.16a kuṣumbhakas tad abravīd gireḥ pravartamānakaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4040: RV_1,191.16c vṛścikasyārasaṃ viṣam arasaṃ vṛścika te viṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4043: RV_2,001.01a tvam agne dyubhis tvam āśuśukṣaṇis tvam adbhyas tvam aśmanas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:4044: RV_2,001.01c tvaṃ vanebhyas tvam oṣadhībhyas tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4045: RV_2,001.02a tavāgne hotraṃ tava potram ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvam agnid ṛtāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4046: RV_2,001.02c tava praśāstraṃ tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā cāsi gṛhapatiś ca no dame //
GV01rvh1-10u:4047: RV_2,001.03a tvam agna indro vṛṣabhaḥ satām asi tvaṃ viṣṇur urugāyo namasyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4048: RV_2,001.03c tvam brahmā rayivid brahmaṇas pate tvaṃ vidhartaḥ sacase purandhyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4049: RV_2,001.04a tvam agne rājā varuṇo dhṛtavratas tvam mitro bhavasi dasma īḍyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4050: RV_2,001.04c tvam aryamā satpatir yasya sambhujaṃ tvam aṃśo vidathe deva bhājayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4051: RV_2,001.05a tvam agne tvaṣṭā vidhate suvīryaṃ tava gnāvo mitramahaḥ sajātyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4052: RV_2,001.05c tvam āśuhemā rariṣe svaśvyaṃ tvaṃ narāṃ śardho asi purūvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4053: RV_2,001.06a tvam agne rudro asuro maho divas tvaṃ śardho mārutam pṛkṣa īśiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4054: RV_2,001.06c tvaṃ vātair aruṇair yāsi śaṅgayas tvam pūṣā vidhataḥ pāsi nu tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4055: RV_2,001.07a tvam agne draviṇodā araṅkṛte tvaṃ devaḥ savitā ratnadhā asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4056: RV_2,001.07c tvam bhago nṛpate vasva īśiṣe tvam pāyur dame yas te 'vidhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4057: RV_2,001.08a tvām agne dama ā viśpatiṃ viśas tvāṃ rājānaṃ suvidatram ṛñjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4058: RV_2,001.08c tvaṃ viśvāni svanīka patyase tvaṃ sahasrāṇi śatā daśa prati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4059: RV_2,001.09a tvām agne pitaram iṣṭibhir naras tvām bhrātrāya śamyā tanūrucam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4060: RV_2,001.09c tvam putro bhavasi yas te 'vidhat tvaṃ sakhā suśevaḥ pāsy ādhṛṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4061: RV_2,001.10a tvam agna ṛbhur āke namasyas tvaṃ vājasya kṣumato rāya īśiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4062: RV_2,001.10c tvaṃ vi bhāsy anu dakṣi dāvane tvaṃ viśikṣur asi yajñam ātaniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4063: RV_2,001.11a tvam agne aditir deva dāśuṣe tvaṃ hotrā bhāratī vardhase girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4064: RV_2,001.11c tvam iḷā śatahimāsi dakṣase tvaṃ vṛtrahā vasupate sarasvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4065: RV_2,001.12a tvam agne subhṛta uttamaṃ vayas tava spārhe varṇa ā saṃdṛśi śriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4066: RV_2,001.12c tvaṃ vājaḥ prataraṇo bṛhann asi tvaṃ rayir bahulo viśvatas pṛthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4067: RV_2,001.13a tvām agna ādityāsa āsyaṃ tvāṃ jihvāṃ śucayaś cakrire kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:4068: RV_2,001.13c tvāṃ rātiṣāco adhvareṣu saścire tve devā havir adanty āhutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4069: RV_2,001.14a tve agne viśve amṛtāso adruha āsā devā havir adanty āhutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4070: RV_2,001.14c tvayā martāsaḥ svadanta āsutiṃ tvaṃ garbho vīrudhāṃ jajñiṣe śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4071: RV_2,001.15a tvaṃ tān saṃ ca prati cāsi majmanāgne sujāta pra ca deva ricyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:4072: RV_2,001.15c pṛkṣo yad atra mahinā vi te bhuvad anu dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī ubhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4073: RV_2,001.16a ye stotṛbhyo goagrām aśvapeśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4074: RV_2,001.16c asmāñ ca tāṃś ca pra hi neṣi vasya ā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4075: RV_2,002.01a yajñena vardhata jātavedasam agniṃ yajadhvaṃ haviṣā tanā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4076: RV_2,002.01c samidhānaṃ suprayasaṃ svarṇaraṃ dyukṣaṃ hotāraṃ vṛjaneṣu dhūrṣadam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4077: RV_2,002.02a abhi tvā naktīr uṣaso vavāśire 'gne vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4078: RV_2,002.02c diva ived aratir mānuṣā yugā kṣapo bhāsi puruvāra saṃyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4079: RV_2,002.03a taṃ devā budhne rajasaḥ sudaṃsasaṃ divaspṛthivyor aratiṃ ny erire /
GV01rvh1-10u:4080: RV_2,002.03c ratham iva vedyaṃ śukraśociṣam agnim mitraṃ na kṣitiṣu praśaṃsyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4081: RV_2,002.04a tam ukṣamāṇaṃ rajasi sva ā dame candram iva surucaṃ hvāra ā dadhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4082: RV_2,002.04c pṛśnyāḥ pataraṃ citayantam akṣabhiḥ pātho na pāyuṃ janasī ubhe anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4083: RV_2,002.05a sa hotā viśvam pari bhūtv adhvaraṃ tam u havyair manuṣa ṛñjate girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4084: RV_2,002.05c hiriśipro vṛdhasānāsu jarbhurad dyaur na stṛbhiś citayad rodasī anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4085: RV_2,002.06a sa no revat samidhānaḥ svastaye saṃdadasvān rayim asmāsu dīdihi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4086: RV_2,002.06c ā naḥ kṛṇuṣva suvitāya rodasī agne havyā manuṣo deva vītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:4087: RV_2,002.07a dā no agne bṛhato dāḥ sahasriṇo duro na vājaṃ śrutyā apā vṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4088: RV_2,002.07c prācī dyāvāpṛthivī brahmaṇā kṛdhi svar ṇa śukram uṣaso vi didyutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4089: RV_2,002.08a sa idhāna uṣaso rāmyā anu svar ṇa dīded aruṣeṇa bhānunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4090: RV_2,002.08c hotrābhir agnir manuṣaḥ svadhvaro rājā viśām atithiś cārur āyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:4091: RV_2,002.09a evā no agne amṛteṣu pūrvya dhīṣ pīpāya bṛhaddiveṣu mānuṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4092: RV_2,002.09c duhānā dhenur vṛjaneṣu kārave tmanā śatinam pururūpam iṣaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4093: RV_2,002.10a vayam agne arvatā vā suvīryam brahmaṇā vā citayemā janāṃ ati /
GV01rvh1-10u:4094: RV_2,002.10c asmākaṃ dyumnam adhi pañca kṛṣṭiṣūccā svar ṇa śuśucīta duṣṭaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:4095: RV_2,002.11a sa no bodhi sahasya praśaṃsyo yasmin sujātā iṣayanta sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4096: RV_2,002.11c yam agne yajñam upayanti vājino nitye toke dīdivāṃsaṃ sve dame //
GV01rvh1-10u:4097: RV_2,002.12a ubhayāso jātavedaḥ syāma te stotāro agne sūrayaś ca śarmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4098: RV_2,002.12c vasvo rāyaḥ puruścandrasya bhūyasaḥ prajāvataḥ svapatyasya śagdhi naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4099: RV_2,002.13a ye stotṛbhyo goagrām aśvapeśasam agne rātim upasṛjanti sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4100: RV_2,002.13c asmāñ ca tāṃś ca pra hi neṣi vasya ā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4101: RV_2,003.01a samiddho agnir nihitaḥ pṛthivyām pratyaṅ viśvāni bhuvanāny asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4102: RV_2,003.01c hotā pāvakaḥ pradivaḥ sumedhā devo devān yajatv agnir arhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4103: RV_2,003.02a narāśaṃsaḥ prati dhāmāny añjan tisro divaḥ prati mahnā svarciḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4104: RV_2,003.02c ghṛtapruṣā manasā havyam undan mūrdhan yajñasya sam anaktu devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4105: RV_2,003.03a īḷito agne manasā no arhan devān yakṣi mānuṣāt pūrvo adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4106: RV_2,003.03c sa ā vaha marutāṃ śardho acyutam indraṃ naro barhiṣadaṃ yajadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4107: RV_2,003.04a deva barhir vardhamānaṃ suvīraṃ stīrṇaṃ rāye subharaṃ vedy asyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4108: RV_2,003.04c ghṛtenāktaṃ vasavaḥ sīdatedaṃ viśve devā ādityā yajñiyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4109: RV_2,003.05a vi śrayantām urviyā hūyamānā dvāro devīḥ suprāyaṇā namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4110: RV_2,003.05c vyacasvatīr vi prathantām ajuryā varṇam punānā yaśasaṃ suvīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:4111: RV_2,003.06a sādhv apāṃsi sanatā na ukṣite uṣāsānaktā vayyeva raṇvite /
GV01rvh1-10u:4112: RV_2,003.06c tantuṃ tataṃ saṃvayantī samīcī yajñasya peśaḥ sudughe payasvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4113: RV_2,003.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā viduṣṭara ṛju yakṣataḥ sam ṛcā vapuṣṭarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4114: RV_2,003.07c devān yajantāv ṛtuthā sam añjato nābhā pṛthivyā adhi sānuṣu triṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4115: RV_2,003.08a sarasvatī sādhayantī dhiyaṃ na iḷā devī bhāratī viśvatūrtiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4116: RV_2,003.08c tisro devīḥ svadhayā barhir edam acchidram pāntu śaraṇaṃ niṣadya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4117: RV_2,003.09a piśaṅgarūpaḥ subharo vayodhāḥ śruṣṭī vīro jāyate devakāmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4118: RV_2,003.09c prajāṃ tvaṣṭā vi ṣyatu nābhim asme athā devānām apy etu pāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4119: RV_2,003.10a vanaspatir avasṛjann upa sthād agnir haviḥ sūdayāti pra dhībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4120: RV_2,003.10c tridhā samaktaṃ nayatu prajānan devebhyo daivyaḥ śamitopa havyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4121: RV_2,003.11a ghṛtam mimikṣe ghṛtam asya yonir ghṛte śrito ghṛtam v asya dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:4122: RV_2,003.11c anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva svāhākṛtaṃ vṛṣabha vakṣi havyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4123: RV_2,004.01a huve vaḥ sudyotmānaṃ suvṛktiṃ viśām agnim atithiṃ suprayasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4124: RV_2,004.01c mitra iva yo didhiṣāyyo bhūd deva ādeve jane jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4125: RV_2,004.02a imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe dvitādadhur bhṛgavo vikṣv āyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4126: RV_2,004.02c eṣa viśvāny abhy astu bhūmā devānām agnir aratir jīrāśvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4127: RV_2,004.03a agniṃ devāso mānuṣīṣu vikṣu priyaṃ dhuḥ kṣeṣyanto na mitram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4128: RV_2,004.03c sa dīdayad uśatīr ūrmyā ā dakṣāyyo yo dāsvate dama ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4129: RV_2,004.04a asya raṇvā svasyeva puṣṭiḥ saṃdṛṣṭir asya hiyānasya dakṣoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4130: RV_2,004.04c vi yo bharibhrad oṣadhīṣu jihvām atyo na rathyo dodhavīti vārān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4131: RV_2,004.05a ā yan me abhvaṃ vanadaḥ panantośigbhyo nāmimīta varṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4132: RV_2,004.05c sa citreṇa cikite raṃsu bhāsā jujurvāṃ yo muhur ā yuvā bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4133: RV_2,004.06a ā yo vanā tātṛṣāṇo na bhāti vār ṇa pathā rathyeva svānīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4134: RV_2,004.06c kṛṣṇādhvā tapū raṇvaś ciketa dyaur iva smayamāno nabhobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4135: RV_2,004.07a sa yo vy asthād abhi dakṣad urvīm paśur naiti svayur agopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4136: RV_2,004.07c agniḥ śociṣmāṃ atasāny uṣṇan kṛṣṇavyathir asvadayan na bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4137: RV_2,004.08a nū te pūrvasyāvaso adhītau tṛtīye vidathe manma śaṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4138: RV_2,004.08c asme agne saṃyadvīram bṛhantaṃ kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ svapatyaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4139: RV_2,004.09a tvayā yathā gṛtsamadāso agne guhā vanvanta uparāṃ abhi ṣyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4140: RV_2,004.09c suvīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ smat sūribhyo gṛṇate tad vayo dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4141: RV_2,005.01a hotājaniṣṭa cetanaḥ pitā pitṛbhya ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:4142: RV_2,005.01c prayakṣañ jenyaṃ vasu śakema vājino yamam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4143: RV_2,005.02a ā yasmin sapta raśmayas tatā yajñasya netari /
GV01rvh1-10u:4144: RV_2,005.02c manuṣvad daivyam aṣṭamam potā viśvaṃ tad invati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4145: RV_2,005.03a dadhanve vā yad īm anu vocad brahmāṇi ver u tat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4146: RV_2,005.03c pari viśvāni kāvyā nemiś cakram ivābhavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4147: RV_2,005.04a sākaṃ hi śucinā śuciḥ praśāstā kratunājani /
GV01rvh1-10u:4148: RV_2,005.04c vidvāṃ asya vratā dhruvā vayā ivānu rohate //
GV01rvh1-10u:4149: RV_2,005.05a tā asya varṇam āyuvo neṣṭuḥ sacanta dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4150: RV_2,005.05c kuvit tisṛbhya ā varaṃ svasāro yā idaṃ yayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4151: RV_2,005.06a yadī mātur upa svasā ghṛtam bharanty asthita /
GV01rvh1-10u:4152: RV_2,005.06c tāsām adhvaryur āgatau yavo vṛṣṭīva modate //
GV01rvh1-10u:4153: RV_2,005.07a svaḥ svāya dhāyase kṛṇutām ṛtvig ṛtvijam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4154: RV_2,005.07c stomaṃ yajñaṃ cād araṃ vanemā rarimā vayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4155: RV_2,005.08a yathā vidvāṃ araṃ karad viśvebhyo yajatebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4156: RV_2,005.08c ayam agne tve api yaṃ yajñaṃ cakṛmā vayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4157: RV_2,006.01a imām me agne samidham imām upasadaṃ vaneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4158: RV_2,006.01c imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4159: RV_2,006.02a ayā te agne vidhemorjo napād aśvamiṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4161: RV_2,006.03a taṃ tvā gīrbhir girvaṇasaṃ draviṇasyuṃ draviṇodaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4163: RV_2,006.04a sa bodhi sūrir maghavā vasupate vasudāvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4165: RV_2,006.05a sa no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari sa no vājam anarvāṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4167: RV_2,006.06a īḷānāyāvasyave yaviṣṭha dūta no girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4169: RV_2,006.07a antar hy agna īyase vidvāñ janmobhayā kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:4171: RV_2,006.08a sa vidvāṃ ā ca piprayo yakṣi cikitva ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:4173: RV_2,007.01a śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratāgne dyumantam ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:4175: RV_2,007.02a mā no arātir īśata devasya martyasya ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:4177: RV_2,007.03a viśvā uta tvayā vayaṃ dhārā udanyā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:4179: RV_2,007.04a śuciḥ pāvaka vandyo 'gne bṛhad vi rocase /
GV01rvh1-10u:4181: RV_2,007.05a tvaṃ no asi bhāratāgne vaśābhir ukṣabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4183: RV_2,007.06a drvannaḥ sarpirāsutiḥ pratno hotā vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4185: RV_2,008.01a vājayann iva nū rathān yogāṃ agner upa stuhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4187: RV_2,008.02a yaḥ sunītho dadāśuṣe 'juryo jarayann arim /
GV01rvh1-10u:4189: RV_2,008.03a ya u śriyā dameṣv ā doṣoṣasi praśasyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4191: RV_2,008.04a ā yaḥ svar ṇa bhānunā citro vibhāty arciṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4193: RV_2,008.05a atrim anu svarājyam agnim ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4195: RV_2,008.06a agner indrasya somasya devānām ūtibhir vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4196: RV_2,008.06c ariṣyantaḥ sacemahy abhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4197: RV_2,009.01a ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānas tveṣo dīdivāṃ asadat sudakṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4198: RV_2,009.01c adabdhavratapramatir vasiṣṭhaḥ sahasrambharaḥ śucijihvo agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4199: RV_2,009.02a tvaṃ dūtas tvam u naḥ paraspās tvaṃ vasya ā vṛṣabha praṇetā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4200: RV_2,009.02c agne tokasya nas tane tanūnām aprayucchan dīdyad bodhi gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4201: RV_2,009.03a vidhema te parame janmann agne vidhema stomair avare sadhasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4202: RV_2,009.03c yasmād yoner udārithā yaje tam pra tve havīṃṣi juhure samiddhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4203: RV_2,009.04a agne yajasva haviṣā yajīyāñ chruṣṭī deṣṇam abhi gṛṇīhi rādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4204: RV_2,009.04c tvaṃ hy asi rayipatī rayīṇāṃ tvaṃ śukrasya vacaso manotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4205: RV_2,009.05a ubhayaṃ te na kṣīyate vasavyaṃ dive-dive jāyamānasya dasma /
GV01rvh1-10u:4206: RV_2,009.05c kṛdhi kṣumantaṃ jaritāram agne kṛdhi patiṃ svapatyasya rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4207: RV_2,009.06a sainānīkena suvidatro asme yaṣṭā devāṃ āyajiṣṭhaḥ svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4208: RV_2,009.06c adabdho gopā uta naḥ paraspā agne dyumad uta revad didīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4209: RV_2,010.01a johūtro agniḥ prathamaḥ piteveḷas pade manuṣā yat samiddhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4210: RV_2,010.01c śriyaṃ vasāno amṛto vicetā marmṛjenyaḥ śravasyaḥ sa vājī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4211: RV_2,010.02a śrūyā agniś citrabhānur havam me viśvābhir gīrbhir amṛto vicetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4212: RV_2,010.02c śyāvā rathaṃ vahato rohitā votāruṣāha cakre vibhṛtraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4213: RV_2,010.03a uttānāyām ajanayan suṣūtam bhuvad agniḥ purupeśāsu garbhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4214: RV_2,010.03c śiriṇāyāṃ cid aktunā mahobhir aparīvṛto vasati pracetāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4215: RV_2,010.04a jigharmy agniṃ haviṣā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantam bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4216: RV_2,010.04c pṛthuṃ tiraścā vayasā bṛhantaṃ vyaciṣṭham annai rabhasaṃ dṛśānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4217: RV_2,010.05a ā viśvataḥ pratyañcaṃ jigharmy arakṣasā manasā taj juṣeta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4218: RV_2,010.05c maryaśrī spṛhayadvarṇo agnir nābhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4219: RV_2,010.06a jñeyā bhāgaṃ sahasāno vareṇa tvādūtāso manuvad vadema /
GV01rvh1-10u:4220: RV_2,010.06c anūnam agniṃ juhvā vacasyā madhupṛcaṃ dhanasā johavīmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4221: RV_2,011.01a śrudhī havam indra mā riṣaṇyaḥ syāma te dāvane vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4222: RV_2,011.01c imā hi tvām ūrjo vardhayanti vasūyavaḥ sindhavo na kṣarantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4223: RV_2,011.02a sṛjo mahīr indra yā apinvaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4224: RV_2,011.02c amartyaṃ cid dāsam manyamānam avābhinad ukthair vāvṛdhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4225: RV_2,011.03a uktheṣv in nu śūra yeṣu cākan stomeṣv indra rudriyeṣu ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:4226: RV_2,011.03c tubhyed etā yāsu mandasānaḥ pra vāyave sisrate na śubhrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4227: RV_2,011.04a śubhraṃ nu te śuṣmaṃ vardhayantaḥ śubhraṃ vajram bāhvor dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4228: RV_2,011.04c śubhras tvam indra vāvṛdhāno asme dāsīr viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4229: RV_2,011.05a guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsv apīvṛtam māyinaṃ kṣiyantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4230: RV_2,011.05c uto apo dyāṃ tastabhvāṃsam ahann ahiṃ śūra vīryeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:4231: RV_2,011.06a stavā nu ta indra pūrvyā mahāny uta stavāma nūtanā kṛtāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:4232: RV_2,011.06c stavā vajram bāhvor uśantaṃ stavā harī sūryasya ketū //
GV01rvh1-10u:4233: RV_2,011.07a harī nu ta indra vājayantā ghṛtaścutaṃ svāram asvārṣṭām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4234: RV_2,011.07c vi samanā bhūmir aprathiṣṭāraṃsta parvataś cit sariṣyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4235: RV_2,011.08a ni parvataḥ sādy aprayucchan sam mātṛbhir vāvaśāno akrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4236: RV_2,011.08c dūre pāre vāṇīṃ vardhayanta indreṣitāṃ dhamanim paprathan ni //
GV01rvh1-10u:4237: RV_2,011.09a indro mahāṃ sindhum āśayānam māyāvinaṃ vṛtram asphuran niḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4238: RV_2,011.09c arejetāṃ rodasī bhiyāne kanikradato vṛṣṇo asya vajrāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4239: RV_2,011.10a aroravīd vṛṣṇo asya vajro 'mānuṣaṃ yan mānuṣo nijūrvāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4240: RV_2,011.10c ni māyino dānavasya māyā apādayat papivān sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4241: RV_2,011.11a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mandantu tvā mandinaḥ sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4242: RV_2,011.11c pṛṇantas te kukṣī vardhayantv itthā sutaḥ paura indram āva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4243: RV_2,011.12a tve indrāpy abhūma viprā dhiyaṃ vanema ṛtayā sapantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4244: RV_2,011.12c avasyavo dhīmahi praśastiṃ sadyas te rāyo dāvane syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4245: RV_2,011.13a syāma te ta indra ye ta ūtī avasyava ūrjaṃ vardhayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4246: RV_2,011.13c śuṣmintamaṃ yaṃ cākanāma devāsme rayiṃ rāsi vīravantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4247: RV_2,011.14a rāsi kṣayaṃ rāsi mitram asme rāsi śardha indra mārutaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4248: RV_2,011.14c sajoṣaso ye ca mandasānāḥ pra vāyavaḥ pānty agraṇītim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4249: RV_2,011.15a vyantv in nu yeṣu mandasānas tṛpat somam pāhi drahyad indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:4250: RV_2,011.15c asmān su pṛtsv ā tarutrāvardhayo dyām bṛhadbhir arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4251: RV_2,011.16a bṛhanta in nu ye te tarutrokthebhir vā sumnam āvivāsān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4252: RV_2,011.16c stṛṇānāso barhiḥ pastyāvat tvotā id indra vājam agman //
GV01rvh1-10u:4253: RV_2,011.17a ugreṣv in nu śūra mandasānas trikadrukeṣu pāhi somam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:4254: RV_2,011.17c pradodhuvac chmaśruṣu prīṇāno yāhi haribhyāṃ sutasya pītim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4255: RV_2,011.18a dhiṣvā śavaḥ śūra yena vṛtram avābhinad dānum aurṇavābham /
GV01rvh1-10u:4256: RV_2,011.18c apāvṛṇor jyotir āryāya ni savyataḥ sādi dasyur indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4257: RV_2,011.19a sanema ye ta ūtibhis taranto viśvā spṛdha āryeṇa dasyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:4258: RV_2,011.19c asmabhyaṃ tat tvāṣṭraṃ viśvarūpam arandhayaḥ sākhyasya tritāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4259: RV_2,011.20a asya suvānasya mandinas tritasya ny arbudaṃ vāvṛdhāno astaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4260: RV_2,011.20c avartayat sūryo na cakram bhinad valam indro aṅgirasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4261: RV_2,011.21a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4262: RV_2,011.21c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4263: RV_2,012.01a yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān devo devān kratunā paryabhūṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4264: RV_2,012.01c yasya śuṣmād rodasī abhyasetāṃ nṛmṇasya mahnā sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4265: RV_2,012.02a yaḥ pṛthivīṃ vyathamānām adṛṃhad yaḥ parvatān prakupitāṃ aramṇāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4266: RV_2,012.02c yo antarikṣaṃ vimame varīyo yo dyām astabhnāt sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4267: RV_2,012.03a yo hatvāhim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn yo gā udājad apadhā valasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4268: RV_2,012.03c yo aśmanor antar agniṃ jajāna saṃvṛk samatsu sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4269: RV_2,012.04a yenemā viśvā cyavanā kṛtāni yo dāsaṃ varṇam adharaṃ guhākaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4270: RV_2,012.04c śvaghnīva yo jigīvāṃl lakṣam ādad aryaḥ puṣṭāni sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4271: RV_2,012.05a yaṃ smā pṛcchanti kuha seti ghoram utem āhur naiṣo astīty enam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4272: RV_2,012.05c so aryaḥ puṣṭīr vija ivā mināti śrad asmai dhatta sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4273: RV_2,012.06a yo radhrasya coditā yaḥ kṛśasya yo brahmaṇo nādhamānasya kīreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4274: RV_2,012.06c yuktagrāvṇo yo 'vitā suśipraḥ sutasomasya sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4275: RV_2,012.07a yasyāśvāsaḥ pradiśi yasya gāvo yasya grāmā yasya viśve rathāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4276: RV_2,012.07c yaḥ sūryaṃ ya uṣasaṃ jajāna yo apāṃ netā sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4277: RV_2,012.08a yaṃ krandasī saṃyatī vihvayete pare 'vara ubhayā amitrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4278: RV_2,012.08c samānaṃ cid ratham ātasthivāṃsā nānā havete sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4279: RV_2,012.09a yasmān na ṛte vijayante janāso yaṃ yudhyamānā avase havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:4280: RV_2,012.09c yo viśvasya pratimānam babhūva yo acyutacyut sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4281: RV_2,012.10a yaḥ śaśvato mahy eno dadhānān amanyamānāñ charvā jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:4282: RV_2,012.10c yaḥ śardhate nānudadāti śṛdhyāṃ yo dasyor hantā sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4283: RV_2,012.11a yaḥ śambaram parvateṣu kṣiyantaṃ catvāriṃśyāṃ śarady anvavindat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4284: RV_2,012.11c ojāyamānaṃ yo ahiṃ jaghāna dānuṃ śayānaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4285: RV_2,012.12a yaḥ saptaraśmir vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān avāsṛjat sartave sapta sindhūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:4286: RV_2,012.12c yo rauhiṇam asphurad vajrabāhur dyām ārohantaṃ sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4287: RV_2,012.13a dyāvā cid asmai pṛthivī namete śuṣmāc cid asya parvatā bhayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:4288: RV_2,012.13c yaḥ somapā nicito vajrabāhur yo vajrahastaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4289: RV_2,012.14a yaḥ sunvantam avati yaḥ pacantaṃ yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4290: RV_2,012.14c yasya brahma vardhanaṃ yasya somo yasyedaṃ rādhaḥ sa janāsa indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4291: RV_2,012.15a yaḥ sunvate pacate dudhra ā cid vājaṃ dardarṣi sa kilāsi satyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4292: RV_2,012.15c vayaṃ ta indra viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
GV01rvh1-10u:4293: RV_2,013.01a ṛtur janitrī tasyā apas pari makṣū jāta āviśad yāsu vardhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4294: RV_2,013.01c tad āhanā abhavat pipyuṣī payo 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamaṃ tad ukthyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4295: RV_2,013.02a sadhrīm ā yanti pari bibhratīḥ payo viśvapsnyāya pra bharanta bhojanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4296: RV_2,013.02c samāno adhvā pravatām anuṣyade yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4297: RV_2,013.03a anv eko vadati yad dadāti tad rūpā minan tadapā eka īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4298: RV_2,013.03c viśvā ekasya vinudas titikṣate yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4299: RV_2,013.04a prajābhyaḥ puṣṭiṃ vibhajanta āsate rayim iva pṛṣṭham prabhavantam āyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4300: RV_2,013.04c asinvan daṃṣṭraiḥ pitur atti bhojanaṃ yas tākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4301: RV_2,013.05a adhākṛṇoḥ pṛthivīṃ saṃdṛśe dive yo dhautīnām ahihann āriṇak pathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4302: RV_2,013.05c taṃ tvā stomebhir udabhir na vājinaṃ devaṃ devā ajanan sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4303: RV_2,013.06a yo bhojanaṃ ca dayase ca vardhanam ārdrād ā śuṣkam madhumad dudohitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4304: RV_2,013.06c sa śevadhiṃ ni dadhiṣe vivasvati viśvasyaika īśiṣe sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4305: RV_2,013.07a yaḥ puṣpiṇīś ca prasvaś ca dharmaṇādhi dāne vy avanīr adhārayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4306: RV_2,013.07c yaś cāsamā ajano didyuto diva urur ūrvāṃ abhitaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4307: RV_2,013.08a yo nārmaraṃ sahavasuṃ nihantave pṛkṣāya ca dāsaveśāya cāvahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4308: RV_2,013.08c ūrjayantyā apariviṣṭam āsyam utaivādya purukṛt sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4309: RV_2,013.09a śataṃ vā yasya daśa sākam ādya ekasya śruṣṭau yad dha codam āvitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4310: RV_2,013.09c arajjau dasyūn sam unab dabhītaye suprāvyo abhavaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4311: RV_2,013.10a viśved anu rodhanā asya pauṃsyaṃ dadur asmai dadhire kṛtnave dhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4312: RV_2,013.10c ṣaḷ astabhnā viṣṭiraḥ pañca saṃdṛśaḥ pari paro abhavaḥ sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4313: RV_2,013.11a supravācanaṃ tava vīra vīryaṃ yad ekena kratunā vindase vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4314: RV_2,013.11c jātūṣṭhirasya pra vayaḥ sahasvato yā cakartha sendra viśvāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4315: RV_2,013.12a aramayaḥ sarapasas tarāya kaṃ turvītaye ca vayyāya ca srutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:4316: RV_2,013.12c nīcā santam ud anayaḥ parāvṛjam prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ śravayan sāsy ukthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4317: RV_2,013.13a asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4318: RV_2,013.13c indra yac citraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4319: RV_2,014.01a adhvaryavo bharatendrāya somam āmatrebhiḥ siñcatā madyam andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4320: RV_2,014.01c kāmī hi vīraḥ sadam asya pītiṃ juhota vṛṣṇe tad id eṣa vaṣṭi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4321: RV_2,014.02a adhvaryavo yo apo vavrivāṃsaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghānāśanyeva vṛkṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4322: RV_2,014.02c tasmā etam bharata tadvaśāyaṃ eṣa indro arhati pītim asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4323: RV_2,014.03a adhvaryavo yo dṛbhīkaṃ jaghāna yo gā udājad apa hi valaṃ vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4324: RV_2,014.03c tasmā etam antarikṣe na vātam indraṃ somair orṇuta jūr na vastraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4325: RV_2,014.04a adhvaryavo ya uraṇaṃ jaghāna nava cakhvāṃsaṃ navatiṃ ca bāhūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:4326: RV_2,014.04c yo arbudam ava nīcā babādhe tam indraṃ somasya bhṛthe hinota //
GV01rvh1-10u:4327: RV_2,014.05a adhvaryavo yaḥ sv aśnaṃ jaghāna yaḥ śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ yo vyaṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4328: RV_2,014.05c yaḥ pipruṃ namuciṃ yo rudhikrāṃ tasmā indrāyāndhaso juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:4329: RV_2,014.06a adhvaryavo yaḥ śataṃ śambarasya puro bibhedāśmaneva pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4330: RV_2,014.06c yo varcinaḥ śatam indraḥ sahasram apāvapad bharatā somam asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:4331: RV_2,014.07a adhvaryavo yaḥ śatam ā sahasram bhūmyā upasthe 'vapaj jaghanvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4332: RV_2,014.07c kutsasyāyor atithigvasya vīrān ny āvṛṇag bharatā somam asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:4333: RV_2,014.08a adhvaryavo yan naraḥ kāmayādhve śruṣṭī vahanto naśathā tad indre /
GV01rvh1-10u:4334: RV_2,014.08c gabhastipūtam bharata śrutāyendrāya somaṃ yajyavo juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:4335: RV_2,014.09a adhvaryavaḥ kartanā śruṣṭim asmai vane nipūtaṃ vana un nayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4336: RV_2,014.09c juṣāṇo hastyam abhi vāvaśe va indrāya somam madiraṃ juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:4337: RV_2,014.10a adhvaryavaḥ payasodhar yathā goḥ somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4338: RV_2,014.10c vedāham asya nibhṛtam ma etad ditsantam bhūyo yajataś ciketa //
GV01rvh1-10u:4339: RV_2,014.11a adhvaryavo yo divyasya vasvo yaḥ pārthivasya kṣamyasya rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4340: RV_2,014.11c tam ūrdaraṃ na pṛṇatā yavenendraṃ somebhis tad apo vo astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4341: RV_2,014.12a asmabhyaṃ tad vaso dānāya rādhaḥ sam arthayasva bahu te vasavyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4342: RV_2,014.12c indra yac citraṃ śravasyā anu dyūn bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4343: RV_2,015.01a pra ghā nv asya mahato mahāni satyā satyasya karaṇāni vocam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4344: RV_2,015.01c trikadrukeṣv apibat sutasyāsya made ahim indro jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:4345: RV_2,015.02a avaṃśe dyām astabhāyad bṛhantam ā rodasī apṛṇad antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4346: RV_2,015.02c sa dhārayat pṛthivīm paprathac ca somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4347: RV_2,015.03a sadmeva prāco vi mimāya mānair vajreṇa khāny atṛṇan nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4348: RV_2,015.03c vṛthāsṛjat pathibhir dīrghayāthaiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4349: RV_2,015.04a sa pravoḷhṝn parigatyā dabhīter viśvam adhāg āyudham iddhe agnau /
GV01rvh1-10u:4350: RV_2,015.04c saṃ gobhir aśvair asṛjad rathebhiḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4351: RV_2,015.05a sa īm mahīṃ dhunim etor aramṇāt so asnātṝn apārayat svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4352: RV_2,015.05c ta utsnāya rayim abhi pra tasthuḥ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4353: RV_2,015.06a sodañcaṃ sindhum ariṇān mahitvā vajreṇāna uṣasaḥ sam pipeṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:4354: RV_2,015.06c ajavaso javinībhir vivṛścan somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4355: RV_2,015.07a sa vidvāṃ apagohaṃ kanīnām āvir bhavann ud atiṣṭhat parāvṛk /
GV01rvh1-10u:4356: RV_2,015.07c prati śroṇa sthād vy anag acaṣṭa somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4357: RV_2,015.08a bhinad valam aṅgirobhir gṛṇāno vi parvatasya dṛṃhitāny airat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4358: RV_2,015.08c riṇag rodhāṃsi kṛtrimāṇy eṣāṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4359: RV_2,015.09a svapnenābhyupyā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca jaghantha dasyum pra dabhītim āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4360: RV_2,015.09c rambhī cid atra vivide hiraṇyaṃ somasya tā mada indraś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4361: RV_2,015.10a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4362: RV_2,015.10c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4363: RV_2,016.01a pra vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamāya suṣṭutim agnāv iva samidhāne havir bhare /
GV01rvh1-10u:4364: RV_2,016.01c indram ajuryaṃ jarayantam ukṣitaṃ sanād yuvānam avase havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4365: RV_2,016.02a yasmād indrād bṛhataḥ kiṃ canem ṛte viśvāny asmin sambhṛtādhi vīryā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4366: RV_2,016.02c jaṭhare somaṃ tanvī saho maho haste vajram bharati śīrṣaṇi kratum //
GV01rvh1-10u:4367: RV_2,016.03a na kṣoṇībhyām paribhve ta indriyaṃ na samudraiḥ parvatair indra te rathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4368: RV_2,016.03c na te vajram anv aśnoti kaś cana yad āśubhiḥ patasi yojanā puru //
GV01rvh1-10u:4369: RV_2,016.04a viśve hy asmai yajatāya dhṛṣṇave kratum bharanti vṛṣabhāya saścate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4370: RV_2,016.04c vṛṣā yajasva haviṣā viduṣṭaraḥ pibendra somaṃ vṛṣabheṇa bhānunā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4371: RV_2,016.05a vṛṣṇaḥ kośaḥ pavate madhva ūrmir vṛṣabhānnāya vṛṣabhāya pātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:4372: RV_2,016.05c vṛṣaṇādhvaryū vṛṣabhāso adrayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somaṃ vṛṣabhāya suṣvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4373: RV_2,016.06a vṛṣā te vajra uta te vṛṣā ratho vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣabhāṇy āyudhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4374: RV_2,016.06c vṛṣṇo madasya vṛṣabha tvam īśiṣa indra somasya vṛṣabhasya tṛpṇuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4375: RV_2,016.07a pra te nāvaṃ na samane vacasyuvam brahmaṇā yāmi savaneṣu dādhṛṣiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4376: RV_2,016.07c kuvin no asya vacaso nibodhiṣad indram utsaṃ na vasunaḥ sicāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4377: RV_2,016.08a purā sambādhād abhy ā vavṛtsva no dhenur na vatsaṃ yavasasya pipyuṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4378: RV_2,016.08c sakṛt su te sumatibhiḥ śatakrato sam patnībhir na vṛṣaṇo nasīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4379: RV_2,016.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4380: RV_2,016.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4381: RV_2,017.01a tad asmai navyam aṅgirasvad arcata śuṣmā yad asya pratnathodīrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4382: RV_2,017.01c viśvā yad gotrā sahasā parīvṛtā made somasya dṛṃhitāny airayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4383: RV_2,017.02a sa bhūtu yo ha prathamāya dhāyasa ojo mimāno mahimānam ātirat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4384: RV_2,017.02c śūro yo yutsu tanvam parivyata śīrṣaṇi dyām mahinā praty amuñcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4385: RV_2,017.03a adhākṛṇoḥ prathamaṃ vīryam mahad yad asyāgre brahmaṇā śuṣmam airayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4386: RV_2,017.03c ratheṣṭhena haryaśvena vicyutāḥ pra jīrayaḥ sisrate sadhryak pṛthak //
GV01rvh1-10u:4387: RV_2,017.04a adhā yo viśvā bhuvanābhi majmaneśānakṛt pravayā abhy avardhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:4388: RV_2,017.04c ād rodasī jyotiṣā vahnir ātanot sīvyan tamāṃsi dudhitā sam avyayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4389: RV_2,017.05a sa prācīnān parvatān dṛṃhad ojasādharācīnam akṛṇod apām apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4390: RV_2,017.05c adhārayat pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyasam astabhnān māyayā dyām avasrasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4391: RV_2,017.06a sāsmā aram bāhubhyāṃ yam pitākṛṇod viśvasmād ā januṣo vedasas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:4392: RV_2,017.06c yenā pṛthivyāṃ ni kriviṃ śayadhyai vajreṇa hatvy avṛṇak tuviṣvaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4393: RV_2,017.07a amājūr iva pitroḥ sacā satī samānād ā sadasas tvām iye bhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4394: RV_2,017.07c kṛdhi praketam upa māsy ā bhara daddhi bhāgaṃ tanvo yena māmahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4395: RV_2,017.08a bhojaṃ tvām indra vayaṃ huvema dadiṣ ṭvam indrāpāṃsi vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4396: RV_2,017.08c aviḍḍhīndra citrayā na ūtī kṛdhi vṛṣann indra vasyaso naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4397: RV_2,017.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4398: RV_2,017.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4399: RV_2,018.01a prātā ratho navo yoji sasniś caturyugas trikaśaḥ saptaraśmiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4400: RV_2,018.01c daśāritro manuṣyaḥ svarṣāḥ sa iṣṭibhir matibhī raṃhyo bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4401: RV_2,018.02a sāsmā aram prathamaṃ sa dvitīyam uto tṛtīyam manuṣaḥ sa hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4402: RV_2,018.02c anyasyā garbham anya ū jananta so anyebhiḥ sacate jenyo vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4403: RV_2,018.03a harī nu kaṃ ratha indrasya yojam āyai sūktena vacasā navena /
GV01rvh1-10u:4404: RV_2,018.03c mo ṣu tvām atra bahavo hi viprā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye //
GV01rvh1-10u:4405: RV_2,018.04a ā dvābhyāṃ haribhyām indra yāhy ā caturbhir ā ṣaḍbhir hūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4406: RV_2,018.04c āṣṭābhir daśabhiḥ somapeyam ayaṃ sutaḥ sumakha mā mṛdhas kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4407: RV_2,018.05a ā viṃśatyā triṃśatā yāhy arvāṅ ā catvāriṃśatā haribhir yujānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4408: RV_2,018.05c ā pañcāśatā surathebhir indrā ṣaṣṭyā saptatyā somapeyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4409: RV_2,018.06a āśītyā navatyā yāhy arvāṅ ā śatena haribhir uhyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4410: RV_2,018.06c ayaṃ hi te śunahotreṣu soma indra tvāyā pariṣikto madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4411: RV_2,018.07a mama brahmendra yāhy acchā viśvā harī dhuri dhiṣvā rathasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4412: RV_2,018.07c purutrā hi vihavyo babhūthāsmiñ chūra savane mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4413: RV_2,018.08a na ma indreṇa sakhyaṃ vi yoṣad asmabhyam asya dakṣiṇā duhīta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4414: RV_2,018.08c upa jyeṣṭhe varūthe gabhastau prāye-prāye jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4415: RV_2,018.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4416: RV_2,018.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4417: RV_2,019.01a apāyy asyāndhaso madāya manīṣiṇaḥ suvānasya prayasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4418: RV_2,019.01c yasminn indraḥ pradivi vāvṛdhāna oko dadhe brahmaṇyantaś ca naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4419: RV_2,019.02a asya mandāno madhvo vajrahasto 'him indro arṇovṛtaṃ vi vṛścat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4420: RV_2,019.02c pra yad vayo na svasarāṇy acchā prayāṃsi ca nadīnāṃ cakramanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:4421: RV_2,019.03a sa māhina indro arṇo apām prairayad ahihācchā samudram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4422: RV_2,019.03c ajanayat sūryaṃ vidad gā aktunāhnāṃ vayunāni sādhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4423: RV_2,019.04a so apratīni manave purūṇīndro dāśad dāśuṣe hanti vṛtram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4424: RV_2,019.04c sadyo yo nṛbhyo atasāyyo bhūt paspṛdhānebhyaḥ sūryasya sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:4425: RV_2,019.05a sa sunvata indraḥ sūryam ā devo riṇaṅ martyāya stavān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4426: RV_2,019.05c ā yad rayiṃ guhadavadyam asmai bharad aṃśaṃ naitaśo daśasyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4427: RV_2,019.06a sa randhayat sadivaḥ sārathaye śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ kuyavaṃ kutsāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4428: RV_2,019.06c divodāsāya navatiṃ ca navendraḥ puro vy airac chambarasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4429: RV_2,019.07a evā ta indrocatham ahema śravasyā na tmanā vājayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4430: RV_2,019.07c aśyāma tat sāptam āśuṣāṇā nanamo vadhar adevasya pīyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4431: RV_2,019.08a evā te gṛtsamadāḥ śūra manmāvasyavo na vayunāni takṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4432: RV_2,019.08c brahmaṇyanta indra te navīya iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ sumnam aśyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4433: RV_2,019.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4434: RV_2,019.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4435: RV_2,020.01a vayaṃ te vaya indra viddhi ṣu ṇaḥ pra bharāmahe vājayur na ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:4436: RV_2,020.01c vipanyavo dīdhyato manīṣā sumnam iyakṣantas tvāvato nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:4437: RV_2,020.02a tvaṃ na indra tvābhir ūtī tvāyato abhiṣṭipāsi janān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4438: RV_2,020.02c tvam ino dāśuṣo varūtetthādhīr abhi yo nakṣati tvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4439: RV_2,020.03a sa no yuvendro johūtraḥ sakhā śivo narām astu pātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4440: RV_2,020.03c yaḥ śaṃsantaṃ yaḥ śaśamānam ūtī pacantaṃ ca stuvantaṃ ca praṇeṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4441: RV_2,020.04a tam u stuṣa indraṃ taṃ gṛṇīṣe yasmin purā vāvṛdhuḥ śāśaduś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:4442: RV_2,020.04c sa vasvaḥ kāmam pīparad iyāno brahmaṇyato nūtanasyāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4443: RV_2,020.05a so aṅgirasām ucathā jujuṣvān brahmā tūtod indro gātum iṣṇan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4444: RV_2,020.05c muṣṇann uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa stavān aśnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4445: RV_2,020.06a sa ha śruta indro nāma deva ūrdhvo bhuvan manuṣe dasmatamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4446: RV_2,020.06c ava priyam arśasānasya sāhvāñ chiro bharad dāsasya svadhāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4447: RV_2,020.07a sa vṛtrahendraḥ kṛṣṇayonīḥ purandaro dāsīr airayad vi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4448: RV_2,020.07c ajanayan manave kṣām apaś ca satrā śaṃsaṃ yajamānasya tūtot //
GV01rvh1-10u:4449: RV_2,020.08a tasmai tavasyam anu dāyi satrendrāya devebhir arṇasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:4450: RV_2,020.08c prati yad asya vajram bāhvor dhur hatvī dasyūn pura āyasīr ni tārīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4451: RV_2,020.09a nūnaṃ sā te prati varaṃ jaritre duhīyad indra dakṣiṇā maghonī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4452: RV_2,020.09c śikṣā stotṛbhyo māti dhag bhago no bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4453: RV_2,021.01a viśvajite dhanajite svarjite satrājite nṛjita urvarājite /
GV01rvh1-10u:4454: RV_2,021.01c aśvajite gojite abjite bharendrāya somaṃ yajatāya haryatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4456: RV_2,021.02c tuvigraye vahnaye duṣṭarītave satrāsāhe nama indrāya vocata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4457: RV_2,021.03a satrāsāho janabhakṣo janaṃsahaś cyavano yudhmo anu joṣam ukṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4458: RV_2,021.03c vṛtañcayaḥ sahurir vikṣv ārita indrasya vocam pra kṛtāni vīryā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4459: RV_2,021.04a anānudo vṛṣabho dodhato vadho gambhīra ṛṣvo asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4460: RV_2,021.04c radhracodaḥ śnathano vīḷitas pṛthur indraḥ suyajña uṣasaḥ svar janat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4461: RV_2,021.05a yajñena gātum apturo vividrire dhiyo hinvānā uśijo manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4462: RV_2,021.05c abhisvarā niṣadā gā avasyava indre hinvānā draviṇāny āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4463: RV_2,021.06a indra śreṣṭhāni draviṇāni dhehi cittiṃ dakṣasya subhagatvam asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:4464: RV_2,021.06c poṣaṃ rayīṇām ariṣṭiṃ tanūnāṃ svādmānaṃ vācaḥ sudinatvam ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4465: RV_2,022.01a trikadrukeṣu mahiṣo yavāśiraṃ tuviśuṣmas tṛpat somam apibad viṣṇunā sutaṃ yathāvaśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4466: RV_2,022.01e sa īm mamāda mahi karma kartave mahām uruṃ sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4467: RV_2,022.02a adha tviṣīmāṃ abhy ojasā kriviṃ yudhābhavad ā rodasī apṛṇad asya majmanā pra vāvṛdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4468: RV_2,022.02e adhattānyaṃ jaṭhare prem aricyata sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4469: RV_2,022.03a sākaṃ jātaḥ kratunā sākam ojasā vavakṣitha sākaṃ vṛddho vīryaiḥ sāsahir mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4470: RV_2,022.03e dātā rādha stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sainaṃ saścad devo devaṃ satyam indraṃ satya induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4471: RV_2,022.04a tava tyan naryaṃ nṛto 'pa indra prathamam pūrvyaṃ divi pravācyaṃ kṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4472: RV_2,022.04c yad devasya śavasā prāriṇā asuṃ riṇann apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4473: RV_2,022.04e bhuvad viśvam abhy ādevam ojasā vidād ūrjaṃ śatakratur vidād iṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4474: RV_2,023.01a gaṇānāṃ tvā gaṇapatiṃ havāmahe kaviṃ kavīnām upamaśravastamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4475: RV_2,023.01c jyeṣṭharājam brahmaṇām brahmaṇas pata ā naḥ śṛṇvann ūtibhiḥ sīda sādanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4476: RV_2,023.02a devāś cit te asurya pracetaso bṛhaspate yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4477: RV_2,023.02c usrā iva sūryo jyotiṣā maho viśveṣām ij janitā brahmaṇām asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4478: RV_2,023.03a ā vibādhyā parirāpas tamāṃsi ca jyotiṣmantaṃ ratham ṛtasya tiṣṭhasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4479: RV_2,023.03c bṛhaspate bhīmam amitradambhanaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ gotrabhidaṃ svarvidam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4480: RV_2,023.04a sunītibhir nayasi trāyase janaṃ yas tubhyaṃ dāśān na tam aṃho aśnavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4481: RV_2,023.04c brahmadviṣas tapano manyumīr asi bṛhaspate mahi tat te mahitvanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4482: RV_2,023.05a na tam aṃho na duritaṃ kutaś cana nārātayas titirur na dvayāvinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4483: RV_2,023.05c viśvā id asmād dhvaraso vi bādhase yaṃ sugopā rakṣasi brahmaṇas pate //
GV01rvh1-10u:4484: RV_2,023.06a tvaṃ no gopāḥ pathikṛd vicakṣaṇas tava vratāya matibhir jarāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4485: RV_2,023.06c bṛhaspate yo no abhi hvaro dadhe svā tam marmartu ducchunā harasvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4486: RV_2,023.07a uta vā yo no marcayād anāgaso 'rātīvā martaḥ sānuko vṛkaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4487: RV_2,023.07c bṛhaspate apa taṃ vartayā pathaḥ sugaṃ no asyai devavītaye kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4488: RV_2,023.08a trātāraṃ tvā tanūnāṃ havāmahe 'vaspartar adhivaktāram asmayum /
GV01rvh1-10u:4489: RV_2,023.08c bṛhaspate devanido ni barhaya mā durevā uttaraṃ sumnam un naśan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4490: RV_2,023.09a tvayā vayaṃ suvṛdhā brahmaṇas pate spārhā vasu manuṣyā dadīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4491: RV_2,023.09c yā no dūre taḷito yā arātayo 'bhi santi jambhayā tā anapnasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4492: RV_2,023.10a tvayā vayam uttamaṃ dhīmahe vayo bṛhaspate papriṇā sasninā yujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4493: RV_2,023.10c mā no duḥśaṃso abhidipsur īśata pra suśaṃsā matibhis tāriṣīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4494: RV_2,023.11a anānudo vṛṣabho jagmir āhavaṃ niṣṭaptā śatrum pṛtanāsu sāsahiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4495: RV_2,023.11c asi satya ṛṇayā brahmaṇas pata ugrasya cid damitā vīḷuharṣiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4496: RV_2,023.12a adevena manasā yo riṣaṇyati śāsām ugro manyamāno jighāṃsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:4497: RV_2,023.12c bṛhaspate mā praṇak tasya no vadho ni karma manyuṃ durevasya śardhataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4498: RV_2,023.13a bhareṣu havyo namasopasadyo gantā vājeṣu sanitā dhanaṃ-dhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4499: RV_2,023.13c viśvā id aryo abhidipsvo mṛdho bṛhaspatir vi vavarhā rathāṃ iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4500: RV_2,023.14a tejiṣṭhayā tapanī rakṣasas tapa ye tvā nide dadhire dṛṣṭavīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4501: RV_2,023.14c āvis tat kṛṣva yad asat ta ukthyam bṛhaspate vi parirāpo ardaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4502: RV_2,023.15a bṛhaspate ati yad aryo arhād dyumad vibhāti kratumaj janeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4503: RV_2,023.15c yad dīdayac chavasa ṛtaprajāta tad asmāsu draviṇaṃ dhehi citram //
GV01rvh1-10u:4504: RV_2,023.16a mā na stenebhyo ye abhi druhas pade nirāmiṇo ripavo 'nneṣu jāgṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4505: RV_2,023.16c ā devānām ohate vi vrayo hṛdi bṛhaspate na paraḥ sāmno viduḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4506: RV_2,023.17a viśvebhyo hi tvā bhuvanebhyas pari tvaṣṭājanat sāmnaḥ-sāmnaḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4507: RV_2,023.17c sa ṛṇacid ṛṇayā brahmaṇas patir druho hantā maha ṛtasya dhartari //
GV01rvh1-10u:4508: RV_2,023.18a tava śriye vy ajihīta parvato gavāṃ gotram udasṛjo yad aṅgiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4509: RV_2,023.18c indreṇa yujā tamasā parīvṛtam bṛhaspate nir apām aubjo arṇavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4510: RV_2,023.19a brahmaṇas pate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva /
GV01rvh1-10u:4511: RV_2,023.19c viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4512: RV_2,024.01a semām aviḍḍhi prabhṛtiṃ ya īśiṣe 'yā vidhema navayā mahā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4513: RV_2,024.01c yathā no mīḍhvān stavate sakhā tava bṛhaspate sīṣadhaḥ sota no matim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4514: RV_2,024.02a yo nantvāny anaman ny ojasotādardar manyunā śambarāṇi vi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4515: RV_2,024.02c prācyāvayad acyutā brahmaṇas patir ā cāviśad vasumantaṃ vi parvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4516: RV_2,024.03a tad devānāṃ devatamāya kartvam aśrathnan dṛḷhāvradanta vīḷitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4517: RV_2,024.03c ud gā ājad abhinad brahmaṇā valam agūhat tamo vy acakṣayat svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4518: RV_2,024.04a aśmāsyam avatam brahmaṇas patir madhudhāram abhi yam ojasātṛṇat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4519: RV_2,024.04c tam eva viśve papire svardṛśo bahu sākaṃ sisicur utsam udriṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4520: RV_2,024.05a sanā tā kā cid bhuvanā bhavītvā mādbhiḥ śaradbhir duro varanta vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4521: RV_2,024.05c ayatantā carato anyad-anyad id yā cakāra vayunā brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4522: RV_2,024.06a abhinakṣanto abhi ye tam ānaśur nidhim paṇīnām paramaṃ guhā hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4523: RV_2,024.06c te vidvāṃsaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punar yata u āyan tad ud īyur āviśam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4524: RV_2,024.07a ṛtāvānaḥ praticakṣyānṛtā punar āta ā tasthuḥ kavayo mahas pathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4525: RV_2,024.07c te bāhubhyāṃ dhamitam agnim aśmani nakiḥ ṣo asty araṇo jahur hi tam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4526: RV_2,024.08a ṛtajyena kṣipreṇa brahmaṇas patir yatra vaṣṭi pra tad aśnoti dhanvanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4527: RV_2,024.08c tasya sādhvīr iṣavo yābhir asyati nṛcakṣaso dṛśaye karṇayonayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4528: RV_2,024.09a sa saṃnayaḥ sa vinayaḥ purohitaḥ sa suṣṭutaḥ sa yudhi brahmaṇas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4529: RV_2,024.09c cākṣmo yad vājam bharate matī dhanād it sūryas tapati tapyatur vṛthā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4530: RV_2,024.10a vibhu prabhu prathamam mehanāvato bṛhaspateḥ suvidatrāṇi rādhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4531: RV_2,024.10c imā sātāni venyasya vājino yena janā ubhaye bhuñjate viśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4532: RV_2,024.11a yo 'vare vṛjane viśvathā vibhur mahām u raṇvaḥ śavasā vavakṣitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4533: RV_2,024.11c sa devo devān prati paprathe pṛthu viśved u tā paribhūr brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4534: RV_2,024.12a viśvaṃ satyam maghavānā yuvor id āpaś cana pra minanti vrataṃ vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4535: RV_2,024.12c acchendrābrahmaṇaspatī havir no 'nnaṃ yujeva vājinā jigātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4536: RV_2,024.13a utāśiṣṭhā anu śṛṇvanti vahnayaḥ sabheyo vipro bharate matī dhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4537: RV_2,024.13c vīḷudveṣā anu vaśa ṛṇam ādadiḥ sa ha vājī samithe brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4538: RV_2,024.14a brahmaṇas pater abhavad yathāvaśaṃ satyo manyur mahi karmā kariṣyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4539: RV_2,024.14c yo gā udājat sa dive vi cābhajan mahīva rītiḥ śavasāsarat pṛthak //
GV01rvh1-10u:4540: RV_2,024.15a brahmaṇas pate suyamasya viśvahā rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4541: RV_2,024.15c vīreṣu vīrāṃ upa pṛṅdhi nas tvaṃ yad īśāno brahmaṇā veṣi me havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4542: RV_2,024.16a brahmaṇas pate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva /
GV01rvh1-10u:4543: RV_2,024.16c viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4544: RV_2,025.01a indhāno agniṃ vanavad vanuṣyataḥ kṛtabrahmā śūśuvad rātahavya it /
GV01rvh1-10u:4545: RV_2,025.01c jātena jātam ati sa pra sarsṛte yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4546: RV_2,025.02a vīrebhir vīrān vanavad vanuṣyato gobhī rayim paprathad bodhati tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4547: RV_2,025.02c tokaṃ ca tasya tanayaṃ ca vardhate yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4548: RV_2,025.03a sindhur na kṣodaḥ śimīvāṃ ṛghāyato vṛṣeva vadhrīṃr abhi vaṣṭy ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4549: RV_2,025.03c agner iva prasitir nāha vartave yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4550: RV_2,025.04a tasmā arṣanti divyā asaścataḥ sa satvabhiḥ prathamo goṣu gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:4551: RV_2,025.04c anibhṛṣṭataviṣir hanty ojasā yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4552: RV_2,025.05a tasmā id viśve dhunayanta sindhavo 'cchidrā śarma dadhire purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4553: RV_2,025.05c devānāṃ sumne subhagaḥ sa edhate yaṃ-yaṃ yujaṃ kṛṇute brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4554: RV_2,026.01a ṛjur ic chaṃso vanavad vanuṣyato devayann id adevayantam abhy asat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4555: RV_2,026.01c suprāvīr id vanavat pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ yajved ayajyor vi bhajāti bhojanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4556: RV_2,026.02a yajasva vīra pra vihi manāyato bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye /
GV01rvh1-10u:4557: RV_2,026.02c haviṣ kṛṇuṣva subhago yathāsasi brahmaṇas pater ava ā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4558: RV_2,026.03a sa ij janena sa viśā sa janmanā sa putrair vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4559: RV_2,026.03c devānāṃ yaḥ pitaram āvivāsati śraddhāmanā haviṣā brahmaṇas patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4560: RV_2,026.04a yo asmai havyair ghṛtavadbhir avidhat pra tam prācā nayati brahmaṇas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4561: RV_2,026.04c uruṣyatīm aṃhaso rakṣatī riṣo 'ṃhoś cid asmā urucakrir adbhutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4562: RV_2,027.01a imā gira ādityebhyo ghṛtasnūḥ sanād rājabhyo juhvā juhomi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4563: RV_2,027.01c śṛṇotu mitro aryamā bhago nas tuvijāto varuṇo dakṣo aṃśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4564: RV_2,027.02a imaṃ stomaṃ sakratavo me adya mitro aryamā varuṇo juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4565: RV_2,027.02c ādityāsaḥ śucayo dhārapūtā avṛjinā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4566: RV_2,027.03a ta ādityāsa uravo gabhīrā adabdhāso dipsanto bhūryakṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4567: RV_2,027.03c antaḥ paśyanti vṛjinota sādhu sarvaṃ rājabhyaḥ paramā cid anti //
GV01rvh1-10u:4568: RV_2,027.04a dhārayanta ādityāso jagat sthā devā viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4569: RV_2,027.04c dīrghādhiyo rakṣamāṇā asuryam ṛtāvānaś cayamānā ṛṇāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:4570: RV_2,027.05a vidyām ādityā avaso vo asya yad aryaman bhaya ā cin mayobhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4571: RV_2,027.05c yuṣmākam mitrāvaruṇā praṇītau pari śvabhreva duritāni vṛjyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4572: RV_2,027.06a sugo hi vo aryaman mitra panthā anṛkṣaro varuṇa sādhur asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4573: RV_2,027.06c tenādityā adhi vocatā no yacchatā no duṣparihantu śarma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4574: RV_2,027.07a pipartu no aditī rājaputrāti dveṣāṃsy aryamā sugebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4575: RV_2,027.07c bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya śarmopa syāma puruvīrā ariṣṭāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4576: RV_2,027.08a tisro bhūmīr dhārayan trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi vratā vidathe antar eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4577: RV_2,027.08c ṛtenādityā mahi vo mahitvaṃ tad aryaman varuṇa mitra cāru //
GV01rvh1-10u:4578: RV_2,027.09a trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta hiraṇyayāḥ śucayo dhārapūtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4579: RV_2,027.09c asvapnajo animiṣā adabdhā uruśaṃsā ṛjave martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4580: RV_2,027.10a tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā ye ca devā asura ye ca martāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4581: RV_2,027.10c śataṃ no rāsva śarado vicakṣe 'śyāmāyūṃṣi sudhitāni pūrvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4582: RV_2,027.11a na dakṣiṇā vi cikite na savyā na prācīnam ādityā nota paścā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4583: RV_2,027.11c pākyā cid vasavo dhīryā cid yuṣmānīto abhayaṃ jyotir aśyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4584: RV_2,027.12a yo rājabhya ṛtanibhyo dadāśa yaṃ vardhayanti puṣṭayaś ca nityāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4585: RV_2,027.12c sa revān yāti prathamo rathena vasudāvā vidatheṣu praśastaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4586: RV_2,027.13a śucir apaḥ sūyavasā adabdha upa kṣeti vṛddhavayāḥ suvīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4587: RV_2,027.13c nakiṣ ṭaṃ ghnanty antito na dūrād ya ādityānām bhavati praṇītau //
GV01rvh1-10u:4588: RV_2,027.14a adite mitra varuṇota mṛḷa yad vo vayaṃ cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4589: RV_2,027.14c urv aśyām abhayaṃ jyotir indra mā no dīrghā abhi naśan tamisrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4590: RV_2,027.15a ubhe asmai pīpayataḥ samīcī divo vṛṣṭiṃ subhago nāma puṣyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4591: RV_2,027.15c ubhā kṣayāv ājayan yāti pṛtsūbhāv ardhau bhavataḥ sādhū asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:4592: RV_2,027.16a yā vo māyā abhidruhe yajatrāḥ pāśā ādityā ripave vicṛttāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4593: RV_2,027.16c aśvīva tāṃ ati yeṣaṃ rathenāriṣṭā urāv ā śarman syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4594: RV_2,027.17a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4595: RV_2,027.17c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4596: RV_2,028.01a idaṃ kaver ādityasya svarājo viśvāni sānty abhy astu mahnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4597: RV_2,028.01c ati yo mandro yajathāya devaḥ sukīrtim bhikṣe varuṇasya bhūreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4598: RV_2,028.02a tava vrate subhagāsaḥ syāma svādhyo varuṇa tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4599: RV_2,028.02c upāyana uṣasāṃ gomatīnām agnayo na jaramāṇā anu dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:4600: RV_2,028.03a tava syāma puruvīrasya śarmann uruśaṃsasya varuṇa praṇetaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4601: RV_2,028.03c yūyaṃ naḥ putrā aditer adabdhā abhi kṣamadhvaṃ yujyāya devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4602: RV_2,028.04a pra sīm ādityo asṛjad vidhartāṃ ṛtaṃ sindhavo varuṇasya yanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4603: RV_2,028.04c na śrāmyanti na vi mucanty ete vayo na paptū raghuyā parijman //
GV01rvh1-10u:4604: RV_2,028.05a vi mac chrathāya raśanām ivāga ṛdhyāma te varuṇa khām ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4605: RV_2,028.05c mā tantuś chedi vayato dhiyam me mā mātrā śāry apasaḥ pura ṛtoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4606: RV_2,028.06a apo su myakṣa varuṇa bhiyasam mat samrāḷ ṛtāvo 'nu mā gṛbhāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4607: RV_2,028.06c dāmeva vatsād vi mumugdhy aṃho nahi tvad āre nimiṣaś caneśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4608: RV_2,028.07a mā no vadhair varuṇa ye ta iṣṭāv enaḥ kṛṇvantam asura bhrīṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4609: RV_2,028.07c mā jyotiṣaḥ pravasathāni ganma vi ṣū mṛdhaḥ śiśratho jīvase naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4610: RV_2,028.08a namaḥ purā te varuṇota nūnam utāparaṃ tuvijāta bravāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:4611: RV_2,028.08c tve hi kam parvate na śritāny apracyutāni dūḷabha vratāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:4612: RV_2,028.09a para ṛṇā sāvīr adha matkṛtāni māhaṃ rājann anyakṛtena bhojam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4613: RV_2,028.09c avyuṣṭā in nu bhūyasīr uṣāsa ā no jīvān varuṇa tāsu śādhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4614: RV_2,028.10a yo me rājan yujyo vā sakhā vā svapne bhayam bhīrave mahyam āha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4615: RV_2,028.10c steno vā yo dipsati no vṛko vā tvaṃ tasmād varuṇa pāhy asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4616: RV_2,028.11a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4617: RV_2,028.11c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4618: RV_2,029.01a dhṛtavratā ādityā iṣirā āre mat karta rahasūr ivāgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4619: RV_2,029.01c śṛṇvato vo varuṇa mitra devā bhadrasya vidvāṃ avase huve vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4620: RV_2,029.02a yūyaṃ devāḥ pramatir yūyam ojo yūyaṃ dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota /
GV01rvh1-10u:4621: RV_2,029.02c abhikṣattāro abhi ca kṣamadhvam adyā ca no mṛḷayatāparaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:4622: RV_2,029.03a kim ū nu vaḥ kṛṇavāmāpareṇa kiṃ sanena vasava āpyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:4623: RV_2,029.03c yūyaṃ no mitrāvaruṇādite ca svastim indrāmaruto dadhāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:4624: RV_2,029.04a haye devā yūyam id āpaya stha te mṛḷata nādhamānāya mahyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4625: RV_2,029.04c mā vo ratho madhyamavāḷ ṛte bhūn mā yuṣmāvatsv āpiṣu śramiṣma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4626: RV_2,029.05a pra va eko mimaya bhūry āgo yan mā piteva kitavaṃ śaśāsa /
GV01rvh1-10u:4627: RV_2,029.05c āre pāśā āre aghāni devā mā mādhi putre vim iva grabhīṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:4628: RV_2,029.06a arvāñco adyā bhavatā yajatrā ā vo hārdi bhayamāno vyayeyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4629: RV_2,029.06c trādhvaṃ no devā nijuro vṛkasya trādhvaṃ kartād avapado yajatrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4630: RV_2,029.07a māham maghono varuṇa priyasya bhūridāvna ā vidaṃ śūnam āpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4631: RV_2,029.07c mā rāyo rājan suyamād ava sthām bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4632: RV_2,030.01a ṛtaṃ devāya kṛṇvate savitra indrāyāhighne na ramanta āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4633: RV_2,030.01c ahar-ahar yāty aktur apāṃ kiyāty ā prathamaḥ sarga āsām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4634: RV_2,030.02a yo vṛtrāya sinam atrābhariṣyat pra taṃ janitrī viduṣa uvāca /
GV01rvh1-10u:4635: RV_2,030.02c patho radantīr anu joṣam asmai dive-dive dhunayo yanty artham //
GV01rvh1-10u:4636: RV_2,030.03a ūrdhvo hy asthād adhy antarikṣe 'dhā vṛtrāya pra vadhaṃ jabhāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:4637: RV_2,030.03c mihaṃ vasāna upa hīm adudrot tigmāyudho ajayac chatrum indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4638: RV_2,030.04a bṛhaspate tapuṣāśneva vidhya vṛkadvaraso asurasya vīrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4639: RV_2,030.04c yathā jaghantha dhṛṣatā purā cid evā jahi śatrum asmākam indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:4640: RV_2,030.05a ava kṣipa divo aśmānam uccā yena śatrum mandasāno nijūrvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4641: RV_2,030.05c tokasya sātau tanayasya bhūrer asmāṃ ardhaṃ kṛṇutād indra gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4642: RV_2,030.06a pra hi kratuṃ vṛhatho yaṃ vanutho radhrasya stho yajamānasya codau /
GV01rvh1-10u:4643: RV_2,030.06c indrāsomā yuvam asmāṃ aviṣṭam asmin bhayasthe kṛṇutam u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4644: RV_2,030.07a na mā taman na śraman nota tandran na vocāma mā sunoteti somam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4645: RV_2,030.07c yo me pṛṇād yo dadad yo nibodhād yo mā sunvantam upa gobhir āyat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4646: RV_2,030.08a sarasvati tvam asmāṃ aviḍḍhi marutvatī dhṛṣatī jeṣi śatrūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:4647: RV_2,030.08c tyaṃ cic chardhantaṃ taviṣīyamāṇam indro hanti vṛṣabhaṃ śaṇḍikānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4648: RV_2,030.09a yo naḥ sanutya uta vā jighatnur abhikhyāya taṃ tigitena vidhya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4649: RV_2,030.09c bṛhaspata āyudhair jeṣi śatrūn druhe rīṣantam pari dhehi rājan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4650: RV_2,030.10a asmākebhiḥ satvabhiḥ śūra śūrair vīryā kṛdhi yāni te kartvāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:4651: RV_2,030.10c jyog abhūvann anudhūpitāso hatvī teṣām ā bharā no vasūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:4652: RV_2,030.11a taṃ vaḥ śardham mārutaṃ sumnayur giropa bruve namasā daivyaṃ janam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4653: RV_2,030.11c yathā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ naśāmahā apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:4654: RV_2,031.01a asmākam mitrāvaruṇāvataṃ ratham ādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4655: RV_2,031.01c pra yad vayo na paptan vasmanas pari śravasyavo hṛṣīvanto vanarṣadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4656: RV_2,031.02a adha smā na ud avatā sajoṣaso rathaṃ devāso abhi vikṣu vājayum /
GV01rvh1-10u:4657: RV_2,031.02c yad āśavaḥ padyābhis titrato rajaḥ pṛthivyāḥ sānau jaṅghananta pāṇibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4658: RV_2,031.03a uta sya na indro viśvacarṣaṇir divaḥ śardhena mārutena sukratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4659: RV_2,031.03c anu nu sthāty avṛkābhir ūtibhī ratham mahe sanaye vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:4660: RV_2,031.04a uta sya devo bhuvanasya sakṣaṇis tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ sajoṣā jūjuvad ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:4661: RV_2,031.04c iḷā bhago bṛhaddivota rodasī pūṣā purandhir aśvināv adhā patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4662: RV_2,031.05a uta tye devī subhage mithūdṛśoṣāsānaktā jagatām apījuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4663: RV_2,031.05c stuṣe yad vām pṛthivi navyasā vaca sthātuś ca vayas trivayā upastire //
GV01rvh1-10u:4664: RV_2,031.06a uta vaḥ śaṃsam uśijām iva śmasy ahir budhnyo 'ja ekapād uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4665: RV_2,031.06c trita ṛbhukṣāḥ savitā cano dadhe 'pāṃ napād āśuhemā dhiyā śami //
GV01rvh1-10u:4666: RV_2,031.07a etā vo vaśmy udyatā yajatrā atakṣann āyavo navyase sam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4667: RV_2,031.07c śravasyavo vājaṃ cakānāḥ saptir na rathyo aha dhītim aśyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4668: RV_2,032.01a asya me dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāyato bhūtam avitrī vacasaḥ siṣāsataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4669: RV_2,032.01c yayor āyuḥ prataraṃ te idam pura upastute vasūyur vām maho dadhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4670: RV_2,032.02a mā no guhyā ripa āyor ahan dabhan mā na ābhyo rīradho ducchunābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4671: RV_2,032.02c mā no vi yauḥ sakhyā viddhi tasya naḥ sumnāyatā manasā tat tvemahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4672: RV_2,032.03a aheḷatā manasā śruṣṭim ā vaha duhānāṃ dhenum pipyuṣīm asaścatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4673: RV_2,032.03c padyābhir āśuṃ vacasā ca vājinaṃ tvāṃ hinomi puruhūta viśvahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4674: RV_2,032.04a rākām ahaṃ suhavāṃ suṣṭutī huve śṛṇotu naḥ subhagā bodhatu tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4675: RV_2,032.04c sīvyatv apaḥ sūcyācchidyamānayā dadātu vīraṃ śatadāyam ukthyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4676: RV_2,032.05a yās te rāke sumatayaḥ supeśaso yābhir dadāsi dāśuṣe vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:4677: RV_2,032.05c tābhir no adya sumanā upāgahi sahasrapoṣaṃ subhage rarāṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4678: RV_2,032.06a sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4679: RV_2,032.06c juṣasva havyam āhutam prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4680: RV_2,032.07a yā subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ suṣūmā bahusūvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4681: RV_2,032.07c tasyai viśpatnyai haviḥ sinīvālyai juhotana //
GV01rvh1-10u:4682: RV_2,032.08a yā guṅgūr yā sinīvālī yā rākā yā sarasvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4683: RV_2,032.08c indrāṇīm ahva ūtaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:4684: RV_2,033.01a ā te pitar marutāṃ sumnam etu mā naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśo yuyothāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4685: RV_2,033.01c abhi no vīro arvati kṣameta pra jāyemahi rudra prajābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4686: RV_2,033.02a tvādattebhī rudra śantamebhiḥ śataṃ himā aśīya bheṣajebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4687: RV_2,033.02c vy asmad dveṣo vitaraṃ vy aṃho vy amīvāś cātayasvā viṣūcīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4688: RV_2,033.03a śreṣṭho jātasya rudra śriyāsi tavastamas tavasāṃ vajrabāho /
GV01rvh1-10u:4689: RV_2,033.03c parṣi ṇaḥ pāram aṃhasaḥ svasti viśvā abhītī rapaso yuyodhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4690: RV_2,033.04a mā tvā rudra cukrudhāmā namobhir mā duṣṭutī vṛṣabha mā sahūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4691: RV_2,033.04c un no vīrāṃ arpaya bheṣajebhir bhiṣaktamaṃ tvā bhiṣajāṃ śṛṇomi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4692: RV_2,033.05a havīmabhir havate yo havirbhir ava stomebhī rudraṃ diṣīya /
GV01rvh1-10u:4693: RV_2,033.05c ṛdūdaraḥ suhavo mā no asyai babhruḥ suśipro rīradhan manāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:4694: RV_2,033.06a un mā mamanda vṛṣabho marutvān tvakṣīyasā vayasā nādhamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4695: RV_2,033.06c ghṛṇīva cchāyām arapā aśīyā vivāseyaṃ rudrasya sumnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4696: RV_2,033.07a kva sya te rudra mṛḷayākur hasto yo asti bheṣajo jalāṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4697: RV_2,033.07c apabhartā rapaso daivyasyābhī nu mā vṛṣabha cakṣamīthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4698: RV_2,033.08a pra babhrave vṛṣabhāya śvitīce maho mahīṃ suṣṭutim īrayāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4699: RV_2,033.08c namasyā kalmalīkinaṃ namobhir gṛṇīmasi tveṣaṃ rudrasya nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4700: RV_2,033.09a sthirebhir aṅgaiḥ pururūpa ugro babhruḥ śukrebhiḥ pipiśe hiraṇyaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4701: RV_2,033.09c īśānād asya bhuvanasya bhūrer na vā u yoṣad rudrād asuryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4702: RV_2,033.10a arhan bibharṣi sāyakāni dhanvārhan niṣkaṃ yajataṃ viśvarūpam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4703: RV_2,033.10c arhann idaṃ dayase viśvam abhvaṃ na vā ojīyo rudra tvad asti //
GV01rvh1-10u:4704: RV_2,033.11a stuhi śrutaṃ gartasadaṃ yuvānam mṛgaṃ na bhīmam upahatnum ugram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4705: RV_2,033.11c mṛḷā jaritre rudra stavāno 'nyaṃ te asman ni vapantu senāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4706: RV_2,033.12a kumāraś cit pitaraṃ vandamānam prati nānāma rudropayantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4707: RV_2,033.12c bhūrer dātāraṃ satpatiṃ gṛṇīṣe stutas tvam bheṣajā rāsy asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:4708: RV_2,033.13a yā vo bheṣajā marutaḥ śucīni yā śantamā vṛṣaṇo yā mayobhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4709: RV_2,033.13c yāni manur avṛṇītā pitā nas tā śaṃ ca yoś ca rudrasya vaśmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4710: RV_2,033.14a pari ṇo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ pari tveṣasya durmatir mahī gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4711: RV_2,033.14c ava sthirā maghavadbhyas tanuṣva mīḍhvas tokāya tanayāya mṛḷa //
GV01rvh1-10u:4712: RV_2,033.15a evā babhro vṛṣabha cekitāna yathā deva na hṛṇīṣe na haṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4713: RV_2,033.15c havanaśrun no rudreha bodhi bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4714: RV_2,034.01a dhārāvarā maruto dhṛṣṇvojaso mṛgā na bhīmās taviṣībhir arcinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4715: RV_2,034.01c agnayo na śuśucānā ṛjīṣiṇo bhṛmiṃ dhamanto apa gā avṛṇvata //
GV01rvh1-10u:4716: RV_2,034.02a dyāvo na stṛbhiś citayanta khādino vy abhriyā na dyutayanta vṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4717: RV_2,034.02c rudro yad vo maruto rukmavakṣaso vṛṣājani pṛśnyāḥ śukra ūdhani //
GV01rvh1-10u:4718: RV_2,034.03a ukṣante aśvāṃ atyāṃ ivājiṣu nadasya karṇais turayanta āśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4719: RV_2,034.03c hiraṇyaśiprā maruto davidhvataḥ pṛkṣaṃ yātha pṛṣatībhiḥ samanyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4720: RV_2,034.04a pṛkṣe tā viśvā bhuvanā vavakṣire mitrāya vā sadam ā jīradānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4721: RV_2,034.04c pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhasa ṛjipyāso na vayuneṣu dhūrṣadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4722: RV_2,034.05a indhanvabhir dhenubhī rapśadūdhabhir adhvasmabhiḥ pathibhir bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4723: RV_2,034.05c ā haṃsāso na svasarāṇi gantana madhor madāya marutaḥ samanyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4724: RV_2,034.06a ā no brahmāṇi marutaḥ samanyavo narāṃ na śaṃsaḥ savanāni gantana /
GV01rvh1-10u:4725: RV_2,034.06c aśvām iva pipyata dhenum ūdhani kartā dhiyaṃ jaritre vājapeśasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4726: RV_2,034.07a taṃ no dāta maruto vājinaṃ ratha āpānam brahma citayad dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:4727: RV_2,034.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo vṛjaneṣu kārave sanim medhām ariṣṭaṃ duṣṭaraṃ sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4728: RV_2,034.08a yad yuñjate maruto rukmavakṣaso 'śvān ratheṣu bhaga ā sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4729: RV_2,034.08c dhenur na śiśve svasareṣu pinvate janāya rātahaviṣe mahīm iṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4730: RV_2,034.09a yo no maruto vṛkatāti martyo ripur dadhe vasavo rakṣatā riṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4731: RV_2,034.09c vartayata tapuṣā cakriyābhi tam ava rudrā aśaso hantanā vadhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4732: RV_2,034.10a citraṃ tad vo maruto yāma cekite pṛśnyā yad ūdhar apy āpayo duhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4733: RV_2,034.10c yad vā nide navamānasya rudriyās tritaṃ jarāya juratām adābhyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4734: RV_2,034.11a tān vo maho maruta evayāvno viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4735: RV_2,034.11c hiraṇyavarṇān kakuhān yatasruco brahmaṇyantaḥ śaṃsyaṃ rādha īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4736: RV_2,034.12a te daśagvāḥ prathamā yajñam ūhire te no hinvantūṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4737: RV_2,034.12c uṣā na rāmīr aruṇair aporṇute maho jyotiṣā śucatā goarṇasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4738: RV_2,034.13a te kṣoṇībhir aruṇebhir nāñjibhī rudrā ṛtasya sadaneṣu vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4739: RV_2,034.13c nimeghamānā atyena pājasā suścandraṃ varṇaṃ dadhire supeśasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4740: RV_2,034.14a tāṃ iyāno mahi varūtham ūtaya upa ghed enā namasā gṛṇīmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4741: RV_2,034.14c trito na yān pañca hotṝn abhiṣṭaya āvavartad avarāñ cakriyāvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:4742: RV_2,034.15a yayā radhram pārayathāty aṃho yayā nido muñcatha vanditāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:4743: RV_2,034.15c arvācī sā maruto yā va ūtir o ṣu vāśreva sumatir jigātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4744: RV_2,035.01a upem asṛkṣi vājayur vacasyāṃ cano dadhīta nādyo giro me /
GV01rvh1-10u:4745: RV_2,035.01c apāṃ napād āśuhemā kuvit sa supeśasas karati joṣiṣad dhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4746: RV_2,035.02a imaṃ sv asmai hṛda ā sutaṣṭam mantraṃ vocema kuvid asya vedat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4747: RV_2,035.02c apāṃ napād asuryasya mahnā viśvāny aryo bhuvanā jajāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:4748: RV_2,035.03a sam anyā yanty upa yanty anyāḥ samānam ūrvaṃ nadyaḥ pṛṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4749: RV_2,035.03c tam ū śuciṃ śucayo dīdivāṃsam apāṃ napātam pari tasthur āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4750: RV_2,035.04a tam asmerā yuvatayo yuvānam marmṛjyamānāḥ pari yanty āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4751: RV_2,035.04c sa śukrebhiḥ śikvabhī revad asme dīdāyānidhmo ghṛtanirṇig apsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4752: RV_2,035.05a asmai tisro avyathyāya nārīr devāya devīr didhiṣanty annam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4753: RV_2,035.05c kṛtā ivopa hi prasarsre apsu sa pīyūṣaṃ dhayati pūrvasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4754: RV_2,035.06a aśvasyātra janimāsya ca svar druho riṣaḥ sampṛcaḥ pāhi sūrīn /
GV01rvh1-10u:4755: RV_2,035.06c āmāsu pūrṣu paro apramṛṣyaṃ nārātayo vi naśan nānṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:4756: RV_2,035.07a sva ā dame sudughā yasya dhenuḥ svadhām pīpāya subhv annam atti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4757: RV_2,035.07c so apāṃ napād ūrjayann apsv antar vasudeyāya vidhate vi bhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:4758: RV_2,035.08a yo apsv ā śucinā daivyena ṛtāvājasra urviyā vibhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4759: RV_2,035.08c vayā id anyā bhuvanāny asya pra jāyante vīrudhaś ca prajābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4760: RV_2,035.09a apāṃ napād ā hy asthād upasthaṃ jihmānām ūrdhvo vidyutaṃ vasānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4761: RV_2,035.09c tasya jyeṣṭham mahimānaṃ vahantīr hiraṇyavarṇāḥ pari yanti yahvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4762: RV_2,035.10a hiraṇyarūpaḥ sa hiraṇyasaṃdṛg apāṃ napāt sed u hiraṇyavarṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4763: RV_2,035.10c hiraṇyayāt pari yoner niṣadyā hiraṇyadā dadaty annam asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:4764: RV_2,035.11a tad asyānīkam uta cāru nāmāpīcyaṃ vardhate naptur apām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4765: RV_2,035.11c yam indhate yuvatayaḥ sam itthā hiraṇyavarṇaṃ ghṛtam annam asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4766: RV_2,035.12a asmai bahūnām avamāya sakhye yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4767: RV_2,035.12c saṃ sānu mārjmi didhiṣāmi bilmair dadhāmy annaiḥ pari vanda ṛgbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4768: RV_2,035.13a sa īṃ vṛṣājanayat tāsu garbhaṃ sa īṃ śiśur dhayati taṃ rihanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4769: RV_2,035.13c so apāṃ napād anabhimlātavarṇo 'nyasyeveha tanvā viveṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:4770: RV_2,035.14a asmin pade parame tasthivāṃsam adhvasmabhir viśvahā dīdivāṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4771: RV_2,035.14c āpo naptre ghṛtam annaṃ vahantīḥ svayam atkaiḥ pari dīyanti yahvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4772: RV_2,035.15a ayāṃsam agne sukṣitiṃ janāyāyāṃsam u maghavadbhyaḥ suvṛktim /
GV01rvh1-10u:4773: RV_2,035.15c viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4774: RV_2,036.01a tubhyaṃ hinvāno vasiṣṭa gā apo 'dhukṣan sīm avibhir adribhir naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4775: RV_2,036.01c pibendra svāhā prahutaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ hotrād ā somam prathamo ya īśiṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4776: RV_2,036.02a yajñaiḥ sammiślāḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhir yāmañ chubhrāso añjiṣu priyā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:4777: RV_2,036.02c āsadyā barhir bharatasya sūnavaḥ potrād ā somam pibatā divo naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4778: RV_2,036.03a ameva naḥ suhavā ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana /
GV01rvh1-10u:4779: RV_2,036.03c athā mandasva jujuṣāṇo andhasas tvaṣṭar devebhir janibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4780: RV_2,036.04a ā vakṣi devāṃ iha vipra yakṣi cośan hotar ni ṣadā yoniṣu triṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4781: RV_2,036.04c prati vīhi prasthitaṃ somyam madhu pibāgnīdhrāt tava bhāgasya tṛpṇuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4782: RV_2,036.05a eṣa sya te tanvo nṛmṇavardhanaḥ saha ojaḥ pradivi bāhvor hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4783: RV_2,036.05c tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam ābhṛtas tvam asya brāhmaṇād ā tṛpat piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:4784: RV_2,036.06a juṣethāṃ yajñam bodhataṃ havasya me satto hotā nividaḥ pūrvyā anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4785: RV_2,036.06c acchā rājānā nama ety āvṛtam praśāstrād ā pibataṃ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4786: RV_2,037.01a mandasva hotrād anu joṣam andhaso 'dhvaryavaḥ sa pūrṇāṃ vaṣṭy āsicam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4787: RV_2,037.01c tasmā etam bharata tadvaśo dadir hotrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4788: RV_2,037.02a yam u pūrvam ahuve tam idaṃ huve sed u havyo dadir yo nāma patyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4789: RV_2,037.02c adhvaryubhiḥ prasthitaṃ somyam madhu potrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4790: RV_2,037.03a medyantu te vahnayo yebhir īyase 'riṣaṇyan vīḷayasvā vanaspate /
GV01rvh1-10u:4791: RV_2,037.03c āyūyā dhṛṣṇo abhigūryā tvaṃ neṣṭrāt somaṃ draviṇodaḥ piba ṛtubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4792: RV_2,037.04a apād dhotrād uta potrād amattota neṣṭrād ajuṣata prayo hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4793: RV_2,037.04c turīyam pātram amṛktam amartyaṃ draviṇodāḥ pibatu drāviṇodasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4794: RV_2,037.05a arvāñcam adya yayyaṃ nṛvāhaṇaṃ rathaṃ yuñjāthām iha vāṃ vimocanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4795: RV_2,037.05c pṛṅktaṃ havīṃṣi madhunā hi kaṃ gatam athā somam pibataṃ vājinīvasū //
GV01rvh1-10u:4796: RV_2,037.06a joṣy agne samidhaṃ joṣy āhutiṃ joṣi brahma janyaṃ joṣi suṣṭutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:4797: RV_2,037.06c viśvebhir viśvāṃ ṛtunā vaso maha uśan devāṃ uśataḥ pāyayā haviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4798: RV_2,038.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā savāya śaśvattamaṃ tadapā vahnir asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4799: RV_2,038.01c nūnaṃ devebhyo vi hi dhāti ratnam athābhajad vītihotraṃ svastau //
GV01rvh1-10u:4800: RV_2,038.02a viśvasya hi śruṣṭaye deva ūrdhvaḥ pra bāhavā pṛthupāṇiḥ sisarti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4801: RV_2,038.02c āpaś cid asya vrata ā nimṛgrā ayaṃ cid vāto ramate parijman //
GV01rvh1-10u:4802: RV_2,038.03a āśubhiś cid yān vi mucāti nūnam arīramad atamānaṃ cid etoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4803: RV_2,038.03c ahyarṣūṇāṃ cin ny ayāṃ aviṣyām anu vrataṃ savitur moky āgāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4804: RV_2,038.04a punaḥ sam avyad vitataṃ vayantī madhyā kartor ny adhāc chakma dhīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4805: RV_2,038.04c ut saṃhāyāsthād vy ṛtūṃr adardhar aramatiḥ savitā deva āgāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:4806: RV_2,038.05a nānaukāṃsi duryo viśvam āyur vi tiṣṭhate prabhavaḥ śoko agneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4807: RV_2,038.05c jyeṣṭham mātā sūnave bhāgam ādhād anv asya ketam iṣitaṃ savitrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4808: RV_2,038.06a samāvavarti viṣṭhito jigīṣur viśveṣāṃ kāmaś caratām amābhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4809: RV_2,038.06c śaśvāṃ apo vikṛtaṃ hitvy āgād anu vrataṃ savitur daivyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:4810: RV_2,038.07a tvayā hitam apyam apsu bhāgaṃ dhanvānv ā mṛgayaso vi tasthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4811: RV_2,038.07c vanāni vibhyo nakir asya tāni vratā devasya savitur minanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:4812: RV_2,038.08a yādrādhyaṃ varuṇo yonim apyam aniśitaṃ nimiṣi jarbhurāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4813: RV_2,038.08c viśvo mārtāṇḍo vrajam ā paśur gāt sthaśo janmāni savitā vy ākaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4814: RV_2,038.09a na yasyendro varuṇo na mitro vratam aryamā na minanti rudraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4815: RV_2,038.09c nārātayas tam idaṃ svasti huve devaṃ savitāraṃ namobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4816: RV_2,038.10a bhagaṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhiṃ narāśaṃso gnāspatir no avyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4817: RV_2,038.10c āye vāmasya saṃgathe rayīṇām priyā devasya savituḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4818: RV_2,038.11a asmabhyaṃ tad divo adbhyaḥ pṛthivyās tvayā dattaṃ kāmyaṃ rādha ā gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:4819: RV_2,038.11c śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāty uruśaṃsāya savitar jaritre //
GV01rvh1-10u:4820: RV_2,039.01a grāvāṇeva tad id arthaṃ jarethe gṛdhreva vṛkṣaṃ nidhimantam accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4821: RV_2,039.01c brahmāṇeva vidatha ukthaśāsā dūteva havyā janyā purutrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4822: RV_2,039.02a prātaryāvāṇā rathyeva vīrājeva yamā varam ā sacethe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4823: RV_2,039.02c mene iva tanvā śumbhamāne dampatīva kratuvidā janeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4824: RV_2,039.03a śṛṅgeva naḥ prathamā gantam arvāk chaphāv iva jarbhurāṇā tarobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4825: RV_2,039.03c cakravākeva prati vastor usrārvāñcā yātaṃ rathyeva śakrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4826: RV_2,039.04a nāveva naḥ pārayataṃ yugeva nabhyeva na upadhīva pradhīva /
GV01rvh1-10u:4827: RV_2,039.04c śvāneva no ariṣaṇyā tanūnāṃ khṛgaleva visrasaḥ pātam asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4828: RV_2,039.05a vātevājuryā nadyeva rītir akṣī iva cakṣuṣā yātam arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:4829: RV_2,039.05c hastāv iva tanve śambhaviṣṭhā pādeva no nayataṃ vasyo accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:4830: RV_2,039.06a oṣṭhāv iva madhv āsne vadantā stanāv iva pipyataṃ jīvase naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4831: RV_2,039.06c nāseva nas tanvo rakṣitārā karṇāv iva suśrutā bhūtam asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:4832: RV_2,039.07a hasteva śaktim abhi saṃdadī naḥ kṣāmeva naḥ sam ajataṃ rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4833: RV_2,039.07c imā giro aśvinā yuṣmayantīḥ kṣṇotreṇeva svadhitiṃ saṃ śiśītam //
GV01rvh1-10u:4834: RV_2,039.08a etāni vām aśvinā vardhanāni brahma stomaṃ gṛtsamadāso akran /
GV01rvh1-10u:4835: RV_2,039.08c tāni narā jujuṣāṇopa yātam bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4836: RV_2,040.01a somāpūṣaṇā jananā rayīṇāṃ jananā divo jananā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4837: RV_2,040.01c jātau viśvasya bhuvanasya gopau devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4838: RV_2,040.02a imau devau jāyamānau juṣantemau tamāṃsi gūhatām ajuṣṭā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4839: RV_2,040.02c ābhyām indraḥ pakvam āmāsv antaḥ somāpūṣabhyāṃ janad usriyāsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:4840: RV_2,040.03a somāpūṣaṇā rajaso vimānaṃ saptacakraṃ ratham aviśvaminvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4841: RV_2,040.03c viṣūvṛtam manasā yujyamānaṃ taṃ jinvatho vṛṣaṇā pañcaraśmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:4842: RV_2,040.04a divy anyaḥ sadanaṃ cakra uccā pṛthivyām anyo adhy antarikṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4843: RV_2,040.04c tāv asmabhyam puruvāram purukṣuṃ rāyas poṣaṃ vi ṣyatāṃ nābhim asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:4844: RV_2,040.05a viśvāny anyo bhuvanā jajāna viśvam anyo abhicakṣāṇa eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:4845: RV_2,040.05c somāpūṣaṇāv avataṃ dhiyam me yuvābhyāṃ viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:4846: RV_2,040.06a dhiyam pūṣā jinvatu viśvaminvo rayiṃ somo rayipatir dadhātu /
GV01rvh1-10u:4847: RV_2,040.06c avatu devy aditir anarvā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4848: RV_2,041.01a vāyo ye te sahasriṇo rathāsas tebhir ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4850: RV_2,041.02a niyutvān vāyav ā gahy ayaṃ śukro ayāmi te /
GV01rvh1-10u:4854: RV_2,041.04a ayaṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4856: RV_2,041.05a rājānāv anabhidruhā dhruve sadasy uttame /
GV01rvh1-10u:4858: RV_2,041.06a tā samrājā ghṛtāsutī ādityā dānunas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:4860: RV_2,041.07a gomad ū ṣu nāsatyāśvāvad yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4862: RV_2,041.08a na yat paro nāntara ādadharṣad vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:4864: RV_2,041.09a tā na ā voḷham aśvinā rayim piśaṅgasaṃdṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4866: RV_2,041.10a indro aṅga mahad bhayam abhī ṣad apa cucyavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4868: RV_2,041.11a indraś ca mṛḷayāti no na naḥ paścād aghaṃ naśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4870: RV_2,041.12a indra āśābhyas pari sarvābhyo abhayaṃ karat /
GV01rvh1-10u:4872: RV_2,041.13a viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4874: RV_2,041.14a tīvro vo madhumāṃ ayaṃ śunahotreṣu matsaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4879: RV_2,041.16c apraśastā iva smasi praśastim amba nas kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4880: RV_2,041.17a tve viśvā sarasvati śritāyūṃṣi devyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4881: RV_2,041.17c śunahotreṣu matsva prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4882: RV_2,041.18a imā brahma sarasvati juṣasva vājinīvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:4883: RV_2,041.18c yā te manma gṛtsamadā ṛtāvari priyā deveṣu juhvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4884: RV_2,041.19a pretāṃ yajñasya śambhuvā yuvām id ā vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:4886: RV_2,041.20a dyāvā naḥ pṛthivī imaṃ sidhram adya divispṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4888: RV_2,041.21a ā vām upastham adruhā devāḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4890: RV_2,042.01a kanikradaj januṣam prabruvāṇa iyarti vācam ariteva nāvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4891: RV_2,042.01c sumaṅgalaś ca śakune bhavāsi mā tvā kā cid abhibhā viśvyā vidat //
