GV01rvh1-10u:4892: RV_2,042.02a mā tvā śyena ud vadhīn mā suparṇo mā tvā vidad iṣumān vīro astā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4893: RV_2,042.02c pitryām anu pradiśaṃ kanikradat sumaṅgalo bhadravādī vadeha //
GV01rvh1-10u:4894: RV_2,042.03a ava kranda dakṣiṇato gṛhāṇāṃ sumaṅgalo bhadravādī śakunte /
GV01rvh1-10u:4895: RV_2,042.03c mā na stena īśata māghaśaṃso bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4896: RV_2,043.01a pradakṣiṇid abhi gṛṇanti kāravo vayo vadanta ṛtuthā śakuntayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4897: RV_2,043.01c ubhe vācau vadati sāmagā iva gāyatraṃ ca traiṣṭubhaṃ cānu rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4898: RV_2,043.02a udgāteva śakune sāma gāyasi brahmaputra iva savaneṣu śaṃsasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4899: RV_2,043.02c vṛṣeva vājī śiśumatīr apītyā sarvato naḥ śakune bhadram ā vada viśvato naḥ śakune puṇyam ā vada //
GV01rvh1-10u:4900: RV_2,043.03a āvadaṃs tvaṃ śakune bhadram ā vada tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ sumatiṃ cikiddhi naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4901: RV_2,043.03c yad utpatan vadasi karkarir yathā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4904: RV_3,001.01a somasya mā tavasaṃ vakṣy agne vahniṃ cakartha vidathe yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:4905: RV_3,001.01c devāṃ acchā dīdyad yuñje adriṃ śamāye agne tanvaṃ juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4906: RV_3,001.02a prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ cakṛma vardhatāṃ gīḥ samidbhir agniṃ namasā duvasyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4907: RV_3,001.02c divaḥ śaśāsur vidathā kavīnāṃ gṛtsāya cit tavase gātum īṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4908: RV_3,001.03a mayo dadhe medhiraḥ pūtadakṣo divaḥ subandhur januṣā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4909: RV_3,001.03c avindann u darśatam apsv antar devāso agnim apasi svasṝṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4910: RV_3,001.04a avardhayan subhagaṃ sapta yahvīḥ śvetaṃ jajñānam aruṣam mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4911: RV_3,001.04c śiśuṃ na jātam abhy ārur aśvā devāso agniṃ janiman vapuṣyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4912: RV_3,001.05a śukrebhir aṅgai raja ātatanvān kratum punānaḥ kavibhiḥ pavitraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4913: RV_3,001.05c śocir vasānaḥ pary āyur apāṃ śriyo mimīte bṛhatīr anūnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4914: RV_3,001.06a vavrājā sīm anadatīr adabdhā divo yahvīr avasānā anagnāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4915: RV_3,001.06c sanā atra yuvatayaḥ sayonīr ekaṃ garbhaṃ dadhire sapta vāṇīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4916: RV_3,001.07a stīrṇā asya saṃhato viśvarūpā ghṛtasya yonau sravathe madhūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4917: RV_3,001.07c asthur atra dhenavaḥ pinvamānā mahī dasmasya mātarā samīcī //
GV01rvh1-10u:4918: RV_3,001.08a babhrāṇaḥ sūno sahaso vy adyaud dadhānaḥ śukrā rabhasā vapūṃṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4919: RV_3,001.08c ścotanti dhārā madhuno ghṛtasya vṛṣā yatra vāvṛdhe kāvyena //
GV01rvh1-10u:4920: RV_3,001.09a pituś cid ūdhar januṣā viveda vy asya dhārā asṛjad vi dhenāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4921: RV_3,001.09c guhā carantaṃ sakhibhiḥ śivebhir divo yahvībhir na guhā babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4922: RV_3,001.10a pituś ca garbhaṃ janituś ca babhre pūrvīr eko adhayat pīpyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4923: RV_3,001.10c vṛṣṇe sapatnī śucaye sabandhū ubhe asmai manuṣye ni pāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:4924: RV_3,001.11a urau mahāṃ anibādhe vavardhāpo agniṃ yaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4925: RV_3,001.11c ṛtasya yonāv aśayad damūnā jāmīnām agnir apasi svasṝṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4926: RV_3,001.12a akro na babhriḥ samithe mahīnāṃ didṛkṣeyaḥ sūnave bhāṛjīkaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4927: RV_3,001.12c ud usriyā janitā yo jajānāpāṃ garbho nṛtamo yahvo agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4928: RV_3,001.13a apāṃ garbhaṃ darśatam oṣadhīnāṃ vanā jajāna subhagā virūpam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4929: RV_3,001.13c devāsaś cin manasā saṃ hi jagmuḥ paniṣṭhaṃ jātaṃ tavasaṃ duvasyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4930: RV_3,001.14a bṛhanta id bhānavo bhāṛjīkam agniṃ sacanta vidyuto na śukrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4931: RV_3,001.14c guheva vṛddhaṃ sadasi sve antar apāra ūrve amṛtaṃ duhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4932: RV_3,001.15a īḷe ca tvā yajamāno havirbhir īḷe sakhitvaṃ sumatiṃ nikāmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4933: RV_3,001.15c devair avo mimīhi saṃ jaritre rakṣā ca no damyebhir anīkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4934: RV_3,001.16a upakṣetāras tava supraṇīte 'gne viśvāni dhanyā dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4935: RV_3,001.16c suretasā śravasā tuñjamānā abhi ṣyāma pṛtanāyūṃr adevān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4936: RV_3,001.17a ā devānām abhavaḥ ketur agne mandro viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:4937: RV_3,001.17c prati martāṃ avāsayo damūnā anu devān rathiro yāsi sādhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:4938: RV_3,001.18a ni duroṇe amṛto martyānāṃ rājā sasāda vidathāni sādhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4939: RV_3,001.18c ghṛtapratīka urviyā vy adyaud agnir viśvāni kāvyāni vidvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:4940: RV_3,001.19a ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4941: RV_3,001.19c asme rayim bahulaṃ saṃtarutraṃ suvācam bhāgaṃ yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4942: RV_3,001.20a etā te agne janimā sanāni pra pūrvyāya nūtanāni vocam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4943: RV_3,001.20c mahānti vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā janmañ-janman nihito jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4944: RV_3,001.21a janmañ-janman nihito jātavedā viśvāmitrebhir idhyate ajasraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4945: RV_3,001.21c tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:4946: RV_3,001.22a imaṃ yajñaṃ sahasāvan tvaṃ no devatrā dhehi sukrato rarāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4947: RV_3,001.22c pra yaṃsi hotar bṛhatīr iṣo no 'gne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:4948: RV_3,001.23a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:4949: RV_3,001.23c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:4950: RV_3,002.01a vaiśvānarāya dhiṣaṇām ṛtāvṛdhe ghṛtaṃ na pūtam agnaye janāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:4951: RV_3,002.01c dvitā hotāram manuṣaś ca vāghato dhiyā rathaṃ na kuliśaḥ sam ṛṇvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:4952: RV_3,002.02a sa rocayaj januṣā rodasī ubhe sa mātror abhavat putra īḍyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4953: RV_3,002.02c havyavāḷ agnir ajaraś canohito dūḷabho viśām atithir vibhāvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4954: RV_3,002.03a kratvā dakṣasya taruṣo vidharmaṇi devāso agniṃ janayanta cittibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4955: RV_3,002.03c rurucānam bhānunā jyotiṣā mahām atyaṃ na vājaṃ saniṣyann upa bruve //
GV01rvh1-10u:4956: RV_3,002.04a ā mandrasya saniṣyanto vareṇyaṃ vṛṇīmahe ahrayaṃ vājam ṛgmiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4957: RV_3,002.04c rātim bhṛgūṇām uśijaṃ kavikratum agniṃ rājantaṃ divyena śociṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:4958: RV_3,002.05a agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā vājaśravasam iha vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4959: RV_3,002.05c yatasrucaḥ surucaṃ viśvadevyaṃ rudraṃ yajñānāṃ sādhadiṣṭim apasām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4960: RV_3,002.06a pāvakaśoce tava hi kṣayam pari hotar yajñeṣu vṛktabarhiṣo naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4961: RV_3,002.06c agne duva icchamānāsa āpyam upāsate draviṇaṃ dhehi tebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4962: RV_3,002.07a ā rodasī apṛṇad ā svar mahaj jātaṃ yad enam apaso adhārayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:4963: RV_3,002.07c so adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kavir atyo na vājasātaye canohitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4964: RV_3,002.08a namasyata havyadātiṃ svadhvaraṃ duvasyata damyaṃ jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4965: RV_3,002.08c rathīr ṛtasya bṛhato vicarṣaṇir agnir devānām abhavat purohitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4966: RV_3,002.09a tisro yahvasya samidhaḥ parijmano 'gner apunann uśijo amṛtyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4967: RV_3,002.09c tāsām ekām adadhur martye bhujam u lokam u dve upa jāmim īyatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4968: RV_3,002.10a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīr iṣaḥ saṃ sīm akṛṇvan svadhitiṃ na tejase /
GV01rvh1-10u:4969: RV_3,002.10c sa udvato nivato yāti veviṣat sa garbham eṣu bhuvaneṣu dīdharat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4970: RV_3,002.11a sa jinvate jaṭhareṣu prajajñivān vṛṣā citreṣu nānadan na siṃhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4971: RV_3,002.11c vaiśvānaraḥ pṛthupājā amartyo vasu ratnā dayamāno vi dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4972: RV_3,002.12a vaiśvānaraḥ pratnathā nākam āruhad divas pṛṣṭham bhandamānaḥ sumanmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4973: RV_3,002.12c sa pūrvavaj janayañ jantave dhanaṃ samānam ajmam pary eti jāgṛviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4974: RV_3,002.13a ṛtāvānaṃ yajñiyaṃ vipram ukthyam ā yaṃ dadhe mātariśvā divi kṣayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4975: RV_3,002.13c taṃ citrayāmaṃ harikeśam īmahe sudītim agniṃ suvitāya navyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:4976: RV_3,002.14a śuciṃ na yāmann iṣiraṃ svardṛśaṃ ketuṃ divo rocanasthām uṣarbudham /
GV01rvh1-10u:4977: RV_3,002.14c agnim mūrdhānaṃ divo apratiṣkutaṃ tam īmahe namasā vājinam bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4978: RV_3,002.15a mandraṃ hotāraṃ śucim advayāvinaṃ damūnasam ukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:4979: RV_3,002.15c rathaṃ na citraṃ vapuṣāya darśatam manurhitaṃ sadam id rāya īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4980: RV_3,003.01a vaiśvānarāya pṛthupājase vipo ratnā vidhanta dharuṇeṣu gātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:4981: RV_3,003.01c agnir hi devāṃ amṛto duvasyaty athā dharmāṇi sanatā na dūduṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:4982: RV_3,003.02a antar dūto rodasī dasma īyate hotā niṣatto manuṣaḥ purohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4983: RV_3,003.02c kṣayam bṛhantam pari bhūṣati dyubhir devebhir agnir iṣito dhiyāvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4984: RV_3,003.03a ketuṃ yajñānāṃ vidathasya sādhanaṃ viprāso agnim mahayanta cittibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4985: RV_3,003.03c apāṃsi yasminn adhi saṃdadhur giras tasmin sumnāni yajamāna ā cake //
GV01rvh1-10u:4986: RV_3,003.04a pitā yajñānām asuro vipaścitāṃ vimānam agnir vayunaṃ ca vāghatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4987: RV_3,003.04c ā viveśa rodasī bhūrivarpasā purupriyo bhandate dhāmabhiḥ kaviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4988: RV_3,003.05a candram agniṃ candrarathaṃ harivrataṃ vaiśvānaram apsuṣadaṃ svarvidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:4989: RV_3,003.05c vigāhaṃ tūrṇiṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtam bhūrṇiṃ devāsa iha suśriyaṃ dadhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4990: RV_3,003.06a agnir devebhir manuṣaś ca jantubhis tanvāno yajñam purupeśasaṃ dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:4991: RV_3,003.06c rathīr antar īyate sādhadiṣṭibhir jīro damūnā abhiśasticātanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4992: RV_3,003.07a agne jarasva svapatya āyuny ūrjā pinvasva sam iṣo didīhi naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4993: RV_3,003.07c vayāṃsi jinva bṛhataś ca jāgṛva uśig devānām asi sukratur vipām //
GV01rvh1-10u:4994: RV_3,003.08a viśpatiṃ yahvam atithiṃ naraḥ sadā yantāraṃ dhīnām uśijaṃ ca vāghatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:4995: RV_3,003.08c adhvarāṇāṃ cetanaṃ jātavedasam pra śaṃsanti namasā jūtibhir vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:4996: RV_3,003.09a vibhāvā devaḥ suraṇaḥ pari kṣitīr agnir babhūva śavasā sumadrathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:4997: RV_3,003.09c tasya vratāni bhūripoṣiṇo vayam upa bhūṣema dama ā suvṛktibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:4998: RV_3,003.10a vaiśvānara tava dhāmāny ā cake yebhiḥ svarvid abhavo vicakṣaṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:4999: RV_3,003.10c jāta āpṛṇo bhuvanāni rodasī agne tā viśvā paribhūr asi tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5000: RV_3,003.11a vaiśvānarasya daṃsanābhyo bṛhad ariṇād ekaḥ svapasyayā kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5001: RV_3,003.11c ubhā pitarā mahayann ajāyatāgnir dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5002: RV_3,004.01a samit-samit sumanā bodhy asme śucā-śucā sumatiṃ rāsi vasvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5003: RV_3,004.01c ā deva devān yajathāya vakṣi sakhā sakhīn sumanā yakṣy agne //
GV01rvh1-10u:5004: RV_3,004.02a yaṃ devāsas trir ahann āyajante dive-dive varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5005: RV_3,004.02c semaṃ yajñam madhumantaṃ kṛdhī nas tanūnapād ghṛtayoniṃ vidhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5006: RV_3,004.03a pra dīdhitir viśvavārā jigāti hotāram iḷaḥ prathamaṃ yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:5007: RV_3,004.03c acchā namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ vandadhyai sa devān yakṣad iṣito yajīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5008: RV_3,004.04a ūrdhvo vāṃ gātur adhvare akāry ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi prasthitā rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5009: RV_3,004.04c divo vā nābhā ny asādi hotā stṛṇīmahi devavyacā vi barhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5010: RV_3,004.05a sapta hotrāṇi manasā vṛṇānā invanto viśvam prati yann ṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5011: RV_3,004.05c nṛpeśaso vidatheṣu pra jātā abhīmaṃ yajñaṃ vi caranta pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5012: RV_3,004.06a ā bhandamāne uṣasā upāke uta smayete tanvā virūpe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5013: RV_3,004.06c yathā no mitro varuṇo jujoṣad indro marutvāṃ uta vā mahobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5014: RV_3,004.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā ny ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5015: RV_3,004.07c ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛtam it ta āhur anu vrataṃ vratapā dīdhyānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5016: RV_3,004.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5017: RV_3,004.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5018: RV_3,004.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5019: RV_3,004.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5020: RV_3,004.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5021: RV_3,004.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:5022: RV_3,004.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5023: RV_3,004.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5024: RV_3,005.01a praty agnir uṣasaś cekitāno 'bodhi vipraḥ padavīḥ kavīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5025: RV_3,005.01c pṛthupājā devayadbhiḥ samiddho 'pa dvārā tamaso vahnir āvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5026: RV_3,005.02a pred v agnir vāvṛdhe stomebhir gīrbhi stotṝṇāṃ namasya ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5027: RV_3,005.02c pūrvīr ṛtasya saṃdṛśaś cakānaḥ saṃ dūto adyaud uṣaso viroke //
GV01rvh1-10u:5028: RV_3,005.03a adhāyy agnir mānuṣīṣu vikṣv apāṃ garbho mitra ṛtena sādhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5029: RV_3,005.03c ā haryato yajataḥ sānv asthād abhūd u vipro havyo matīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5030: RV_3,005.04a mitro agnir bhavati yat samiddho mitro hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5031: RV_3,005.04c mitro adhvaryur iṣiro damūnā mitraḥ sindhūnām uta parvatānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5032: RV_3,005.05a pāti priyaṃ ripo agram padaṃ veḥ pāti yahvaś caraṇaṃ sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5033: RV_3,005.05c pāti nābhā saptaśīrṣāṇam agniḥ pāti devānām upamādam ṛṣvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5034: RV_3,005.06a ṛbhuś cakra īḍyaṃ cāru nāma viśvāni devo vayunāni vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5035: RV_3,005.06c sasasya carma ghṛtavat padaṃ ves tad id agnī rakṣaty aprayucchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5036: RV_3,005.07a ā yonim agnir ghṛtavantam asthāt pṛthupragāṇam uśantam uśānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5037: RV_3,005.07c dīdyānaḥ śucir ṛṣvaḥ pāvakaḥ punaḥ-punar mātarā navyasī kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5038: RV_3,005.08a sadyo jāta oṣadhībhir vavakṣe yadī vardhanti prasvo ghṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5039: RV_3,005.08c āpa iva pravatā śumbhamānā uruṣyad agniḥ pitror upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5040: RV_3,005.09a ud u ṣṭutaḥ samidhā yahvo adyaud varṣman divo adhi nābhā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5041: RV_3,005.09c mitro agnir īḍyo mātariśvā dūto vakṣad yajathāya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5042: RV_3,005.10a ud astambhīt samidhā nākam ṛṣvo 'gnir bhavann uttamo rocanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5043: RV_3,005.10c yadī bhṛgubhyaḥ pari mātariśvā guhā santaṃ havyavāhaṃ samīdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5044: RV_3,005.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5045: RV_3,005.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5046: RV_3,006.01a pra kāravo mananā vacyamānā devadrīcīṃ nayata devayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5047: RV_3,006.01c dakṣiṇāvāḍ vājinī prācy eti havir bharanty agnaye ghṛtācī //
GV01rvh1-10u:5048: RV_3,006.02a ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamāna uta pra rikthā adha nu prayajyo /
GV01rvh1-10u:5049: RV_3,006.02c divaś cid agne mahinā pṛthivyā vacyantāṃ te vahnayaḥ saptajihvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5050: RV_3,006.03a dyauś ca tvā pṛthivī yajñiyāso ni hotāraṃ sādayante damāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5051: RV_3,006.03c yadī viśo mānuṣīr devayantīḥ prayasvatīr īḷate śukram arciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5052: RV_3,006.04a mahān sadhasthe dhruva ā niṣatto 'ntar dyāvā māhine haryamāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5053: RV_3,006.04c āskre sapatnī ajare amṛkte sabardughe urugāyasya dhenū //
GV01rvh1-10u:5054: RV_3,006.05a vratā te agne mahato mahāni tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5055: RV_3,006.05c tvaṃ dūto abhavo jāyamānas tvaṃ netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5056: RV_3,006.06a ṛtasya vā keśinā yogyābhir ghṛtasnuvā rohitā dhuri dhiṣva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5057: RV_3,006.06c athā vaha devān deva viśvān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5058: RV_3,006.07a divaś cid ā te rucayanta rokā uṣo vibhātīr anu bhāsi pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5059: RV_3,006.07c apo yad agna uśadhag vaneṣu hotur mandrasya panayanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5060: RV_3,006.08a urau vā ye antarikṣe madanti divo vā ye rocane santi devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5061: RV_3,006.08c ūmā vā ye suhavāso yajatrā āyemire rathyo agne aśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5062: RV_3,006.09a aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo hy aśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5063: RV_3,006.09c patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5064: RV_3,006.10a sa hotā yasya rodasī cid urvī yajñaṃ-yajñam abhi vṛdhe gṛṇītaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5065: RV_3,006.10c prācī adhvareva tasthatuḥ sumeke ṛtāvarī ṛtajātasya satye //
GV01rvh1-10u:5066: RV_3,006.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5067: RV_3,006.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5068: RV_3,007.01a pra ya āruḥ śitipṛṣṭhasya dhāser ā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta vāṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5069: RV_3,007.01c parikṣitā pitarā saṃ carete pra sarsrāte dīrgham āyuḥ prayakṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5070: RV_3,007.02a divakṣaso dhenavo vṛṣṇo aśvā devīr ā tasthau madhumad vahantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5071: RV_3,007.02c ṛtasya tvā sadasi kṣemayantam pary ekā carati vartaniṃ gauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5072: RV_3,007.03a ā sīm arohat suyamā bhavantīḥ patiś cikitvān rayivid rayīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5073: RV_3,007.03c pra nīlapṛṣṭho atasasya dhāses tā avāsayat purudhapratīkaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5074: RV_3,007.04a mahi tvāṣṭram ūrjayantīr ajuryaṃ stabhūyamānaṃ vahato vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5075: RV_3,007.04c vy aṅgebhir didyutānaḥ sadhastha ekām iva rodasī ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:5076: RV_3,007.05a jānanti vṛṣṇo aruṣasya śevam uta bradhnasya śāsane raṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5077: RV_3,007.05c divorucaḥ suruco rocamānā iḷā yeṣāṃ gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5078: RV_3,007.06a uto pitṛbhyām pravidānu ghoṣam maho mahadbhyām anayanta śūṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5079: RV_3,007.06c ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānam aktor anu svaṃ dhāma jaritur vavakṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:5080: RV_3,007.07a adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sapta viprāḥ priyaṃ rakṣante nihitam padaṃ veḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5081: RV_3,007.07c prāñco madanty ukṣaṇo ajuryā devā devānām anu hi vratā guḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5082: RV_3,007.08a daivyā hotārā prathamā ny ṛñje sapta pṛkṣāsaḥ svadhayā madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5083: RV_3,007.08c ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛtam it ta āhur anu vrataṃ vratapā dīdhyānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5084: RV_3,007.09a vṛṣāyante mahe atyāya pūrvīr vṛṣṇe citrāya raśmayaḥ suyāmāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5085: RV_3,007.09c deva hotar mandrataraś cikitvān maho devān rodasī eha vakṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5086: RV_3,007.10a pṛkṣaprayajo draviṇaḥ suvācaḥ suketava uṣaso revad ūṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5087: RV_3,007.10c uto cid agne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ kṛtaṃ cid enaḥ sam mahe daśasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5088: RV_3,007.11a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5089: RV_3,007.11c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5090: RV_3,008.01a añjanti tvām adhvare devayanto vanaspate madhunā daivyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5091: RV_3,008.01c yad ūrdhvas tiṣṭhā draviṇeha dhattād yad vā kṣayo mātur asyā upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5092: RV_3,008.02a samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastād brahma vanvāno ajaraṃ suvīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:5093: RV_3,008.02c āre asmad amatim bādhamāna uc chrayasva mahate saubhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5094: RV_3,008.03a uc chrayasva vanaspate varṣman pṛthivyā adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5095: RV_3,008.03c sumitī mīyamāno varco dhā yajñavāhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:5096: RV_3,008.04a yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5097: RV_3,008.04c taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya un nayanti svādhyo manasā devayantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5098: RV_3,008.05a jāto jāyate sudinatve ahnāṃ samarya ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5099: RV_3,008.05c punanti dhīrā apaso manīṣā devayā vipra ud iyarti vācam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5100: RV_3,008.06a yān vo naro devayanto nimimyur vanaspate svadhitir vā tatakṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:5101: RV_3,008.06c te devāsaḥ svaravas tasthivāṃsaḥ prajāvad asme didhiṣantu ratnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5102: RV_3,008.07a ye vṛkṇāso adhi kṣami nimitāso yatasrucaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5103: RV_3,008.07c te no vyantu vāryaṃ devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5104: RV_3,008.08a ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sunīthā dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5105: RV_3,008.08c sajoṣaso yajñam avantu devā ūrdhvaṃ kṛṇvantv adhvarasya ketum //
GV01rvh1-10u:5106: RV_3,008.09a haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatānāḥ śukrā vasānāḥ svaravo na āguḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5107: RV_3,008.09c unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastād devā devānām api yanti pāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5108: RV_3,008.10a śṛṅgāṇīvec chṛṅgiṇāṃ saṃ dadṛśre caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5109: RV_3,008.10c vāghadbhir vā vihave śroṣamāṇā asmāṃ avantu pṛtanājyeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5110: RV_3,008.11a vanaspate śatavalśo vi roha sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhema /
GV01rvh1-10u:5111: RV_3,008.11c yaṃ tvām ayaṃ svadhitis tejamānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5112: RV_3,009.01a sakhāyas tvā vavṛmahe devam martāsa ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:5113: RV_3,009.01c apāṃ napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditiṃ supratūrtim anehasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5114: RV_3,009.02a kāyamāno vanā tvaṃ yan mātṝr ajagann apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5115: RV_3,009.02c na tat te agne pramṛṣe nivartanaṃ yad dūre sann ihābhavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5116: RV_3,009.03a ati tṛṣṭaṃ vavakṣithāthaiva sumanā asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5117: RV_3,009.03c pra-prānye yanti pary anya āsate yeṣāṃ sakhye asi śritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5118: RV_3,009.04a īyivāṃsam ati sridhaḥ śaśvatīr ati saścataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5119: RV_3,009.04c anv īm avindan nicirāso adruho 'psu siṃham iva śritam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5120: RV_3,009.05a sasṛvāṃsam iva tmanāgnim itthā tirohitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5121: RV_3,009.05c ainaṃ nayan mātariśvā parāvato devebhyo mathitam pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:5122: RV_3,009.06a taṃ tvā martā agṛbhṇata devebhyo havyavāhana /
GV01rvh1-10u:5123: RV_3,009.06c viśvān yad yajñāṃ abhipāsi mānuṣa tava kratvā yaviṣṭhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5124: RV_3,009.07a tad bhadraṃ tava daṃsanā pākāya cic chadayati /
GV01rvh1-10u:5125: RV_3,009.07c tvāṃ yad agne paśavaḥ samāsate samiddham apiśarvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:5126: RV_3,009.08a ā juhotā svadhvaraṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5127: RV_3,009.08c āśuṃ dūtam ajiram pratnam īḍyaṃ śruṣṭī devaṃ saparyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:5128: RV_3,009.09a trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5129: RV_3,009.09c aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:5130: RV_3,010.01a tvām agne manīṣiṇaḥ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5131: RV_3,010.01c devam martāsa indhate sam adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:5132: RV_3,010.02a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijam agne hotāram īḷate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5133: RV_3,010.02c gopā ṛtasya dīdihi sve dame //
GV01rvh1-10u:5134: RV_3,010.03a sa ghā yas te dadāśati samidhā jātavedase /
GV01rvh1-10u:5135: RV_3,010.03c so agne dhatte suvīryaṃ sa puṣyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:5136: RV_3,010.04a sa ketur adhvarāṇām agnir devebhir ā gamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5138: RV_3,010.05a pra hotre pūrvyaṃ vaco 'gnaye bharatā bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5139: RV_3,010.05c vipāṃ jyotīṃṣi bibhrate na vedhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:5140: RV_3,010.06a agniṃ vardhantu no giro yato jāyata ukthyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5142: RV_3,010.07a agne yajiṣṭho adhvare devān devayate yaja /
GV01rvh1-10u:5143: RV_3,010.07c hotā mandro vi rājasy ati sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5144: RV_3,010.08a sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi dyumad asme suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5146: RV_3,010.09a taṃ tvā viprā vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ sam indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5150: RV_3,011.02a sa havyavāḷ amartya uśig dūtaś canohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5152: RV_3,011.03a agnir dhiyā sa cetati ketur yajñasya pūrvyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5154: RV_3,011.04a agniṃ sūnuṃ sanaśrutaṃ sahaso jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5156: RV_3,011.05a adābhyaḥ puraetā viśām agnir mānuṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5158: RV_3,011.06a sāhvān viśvā abhiyujaḥ kratur devānām amṛktaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5160: RV_3,011.07a abhi prayāṃsi vāhasā dāśvāṃ aśnoti martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5162: RV_3,011.08a pari viśvāni sudhitāgner aśyāma manmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5164: RV_3,011.09a agne viśvāni vāryā vājeṣu saniṣāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5166: RV_3,012.01a indrāgnī ā gataṃ sutaṃ gīrbhir nabho vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5168: RV_3,012.02a indrāgnī jarituḥ sacā yajño jigāti cetanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5170: RV_3,012.03a indram agniṃ kavicchadā yajñasya jūtyā vṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5174: RV_3,012.05a pra vām arcanty ukthino nīthāvido jaritāraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5176: RV_3,012.06a indrāgnī navatim puro dāsapatnīr adhūnutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5178: RV_3,012.07a indrāgnī apasas pary upa pra yanti dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5180: RV_3,012.08a indrāgnī taviṣāṇi vāṃ sadhasthāni prayāṃsi ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:5182: RV_3,012.09a indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5183: RV_3,012.09c tad vāṃ ceti pra vīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5184: RV_3,013.01a pra vo devāyāgnaye barhiṣṭham arcāsmai /
GV01rvh1-10u:5185: RV_3,013.01c gamad devebhir ā sa no yajiṣṭho barhir ā sadat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5186: RV_3,013.02a ṛtāvā yasya rodasī dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5187: RV_3,013.02c haviṣmantas tam īḷate taṃ saniṣyanto 'vase //
GV01rvh1-10u:5188: RV_3,013.03a sa yantā vipra eṣāṃ sa yajñānām athā hi ṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5189: RV_3,013.03c agniṃ taṃ vo duvasyata dātā yo vanitā magham //
GV01rvh1-10u:5190: RV_3,013.04a sa naḥ śarmāṇi vītaye 'gnir yacchatu śantamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5191: RV_3,013.04c yato naḥ pruṣṇavad vasu divi kṣitibhyo apsv ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5192: RV_3,013.05a dīdivāṃsam apūrvyaṃ vasvībhir asya dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5193: RV_3,013.05c ṛkvāṇo agnim indhate hotāraṃ viśpatiṃ viśām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5194: RV_3,013.06a uta no brahmann aviṣa uktheṣu devahūtamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5195: RV_3,013.06c śaṃ naḥ śocā marudvṛdho 'gne sahasrasātamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5196: RV_3,013.07a nū no rāsva sahasravat tokavat puṣṭimad vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5197: RV_3,013.07c dyumad agne suvīryaṃ varṣiṣṭham anupakṣitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5198: RV_3,014.01a ā hotā mandro vidathāny asthāt satyo yajvā kavitamaḥ sa vedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5199: RV_3,014.01c vidyudrathaḥ sahasas putro agniḥ śociṣkeśaḥ pṛthivyām pājo aśret //
GV01rvh1-10u:5200: RV_3,014.02a ayāmi te namauktiṃ juṣasva ṛtāvas tubhyaṃ cetate sahasvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5201: RV_3,014.02c vidvāṃ ā vakṣi viduṣo ni ṣatsi madhya ā barhir ūtaye yajatra //
GV01rvh1-10u:5202: RV_3,014.03a dravatāṃ ta uṣasā vājayantī agne vātasya pathyābhir accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5203: RV_3,014.03c yat sīm añjanti pūrvyaṃ havirbhir ā vandhureva tasthatur duroṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5204: RV_3,014.04a mitraś ca tubhyaṃ varuṇaḥ sahasvo 'gne viśve marutaḥ sumnam arcan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5205: RV_3,014.04c yac chociṣā sahasas putra tiṣṭhā abhi kṣitīḥ prathayan sūryo nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:5206: RV_3,014.05a vayaṃ te adya rarimā hi kāmam uttānahastā namasopasadya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5207: RV_3,014.05c yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devān asredhatā manmanā vipro agne //
GV01rvh1-10u:5208: RV_3,014.06a tvad dhi putra sahaso vi pūrvīr devasya yanty ūtayo vi vājāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5209: RV_3,014.06c tvaṃ dehi sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ no 'drogheṇa vacasā satyam agne //
GV01rvh1-10u:5210: RV_3,014.07a tubhyaṃ dakṣa kavikrato yānīmā deva martāso adhvare akarma /
GV01rvh1-10u:5211: RV_3,014.07c tvaṃ viśvasya surathasya bodhi sarvaṃ tad agne amṛta svadeha //
GV01rvh1-10u:5212: RV_3,015.01a vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāno bādhasva dviṣo rakṣaso amīvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5213: RV_3,015.01c suśarmaṇo bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām agner ahaṃ suhavasya praṇītau //
GV01rvh1-10u:5214: RV_3,015.02a tvaṃ no asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau tvaṃ sūra udite bodhi gopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5215: RV_3,015.02c janmeva nityaṃ tanayaṃ juṣasva stomam me agne tanvā sujāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:5216: RV_3,015.03a tvaṃ nṛcakṣā vṛṣabhānu pūrvīḥ kṛṣṇāsv agne aruṣo vi bhāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5217: RV_3,015.03c vaso neṣi ca parṣi cāty aṃhaḥ kṛdhī no rāya uśijo yaviṣṭha //
GV01rvh1-10u:5218: RV_3,015.04a aṣāḷho agne vṛṣabho didīhi puro viśvāḥ saubhagā saṃjigīvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5219: RV_3,015.04c yajñasya netā prathamasya pāyor jātavedo bṛhataḥ supraṇīte //
GV01rvh1-10u:5220: RV_3,015.05a acchidrā śarma jaritaḥ purūṇi devāṃ acchā dīdyānaḥ sumedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5221: RV_3,015.05c ratho na sasnir abhi vakṣi vājam agne tvaṃ rodasī naḥ sumeke //
GV01rvh1-10u:5222: RV_3,015.06a pra pīpaya vṛṣabha jinva vājān agne tvaṃ rodasī naḥ sudoghe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5223: RV_3,015.06c devebhir deva surucā rucāno mā no martasya durmatiḥ pari ṣṭhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:5224: RV_3,015.07a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5225: RV_3,015.07c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5226: RV_3,016.01a ayam agniḥ suvīryasyeśe mahaḥ saubhagasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5227: RV_3,016.01c rāya īśe svapatyasya gomata īśe vṛtrahathānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5228: RV_3,016.02a imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatā vṛdhaṃ yasmin rāyaḥ śevṛdhāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5229: RV_3,016.02c abhi ye santi pṛtanāsu dūḍhyo viśvāhā śatrum ādabhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5230: RV_3,016.03a sa tvaṃ no rāyaḥ śiśīhi mīḍhvo agne suvīryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5232: RV_3,016.04a cakrir yo viśvā bhuvanābhi sāsahiś cakrir deveṣv ā duvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5233: RV_3,016.04c ā deveṣu yatata ā suvīrya ā śaṃsa uta nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5234: RV_3,016.05a mā no agne 'mataye māvīratāyai rīradhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5235: RV_3,016.05c māgotāyai sahasas putra mā nide 'pa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5236: RV_3,016.06a śagdhi vājasya subhaga prajāvato 'gne bṛhato adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:5237: RV_3,016.06c saṃ rāyā bhūyasā sṛja mayobhunā tuvidyumna yaśasvatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5238: RV_3,017.01a samidhyamānaḥ prathamānu dharmā sam aktubhir ajyate viśvavāraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5239: RV_3,017.01c śociṣkeśo ghṛtanirṇik pāvakaḥ suyajño agnir yajathāya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5240: RV_3,017.02a yathāyajo hotram agne pṛthivyā yathā divo jātavedaś cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5241: RV_3,017.02c evānena haviṣā yakṣi devān manuṣvad yajñam pra tiremam adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5242: RV_3,017.03a trīṇy āyūṃṣi tava jātavedas tisra ājānīr uṣasas te agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:5243: RV_3,017.03c tābhir devānām avo yakṣi vidvān athā bhava yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5244: RV_3,017.04a agniṃ sudītiṃ sudṛśaṃ gṛṇanto namasyāmas tveḍyaṃ jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5245: RV_3,017.04c tvāṃ dūtam aratiṃ havyavāhaṃ devā akṛṇvann amṛtasya nābhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:5246: RV_3,017.05a yas tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān dvitā ca sattā svadhayā ca śambhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5247: RV_3,017.05c tasyānu dharma pra yajā cikitvo 'tha no dhā adhvaraṃ devavītau //
GV01rvh1-10u:5248: RV_3,018.01a bhavā no agne sumanā upetau sakheva sakhye pitareva sādhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5249: RV_3,018.01c purudruho hi kṣitayo janānām prati pratīcīr dahatād arātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5250: RV_3,018.02a tapo ṣv agne antarāṃ amitrān tapā śaṃsam araruṣaḥ parasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5251: RV_3,018.02c tapo vaso cikitāno acittān vi te tiṣṭhantām ajarā ayāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5252: RV_3,018.03a idhmenāgna icchamāno ghṛtena juhomi havyaṃ tarase balāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5253: RV_3,018.03c yāvad īśe brahmaṇā vandamāna imāṃ dhiyaṃ śataseyāya devīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:5254: RV_3,018.04a uc chociṣā sahasas putra stuto bṛhad vayaḥ śaśamāneṣu dhehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5255: RV_3,018.04c revad agne viśvāmitreṣu śaṃ yor marmṛjmā te tanvam bhūri kṛtvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5256: RV_3,018.05a kṛdhi ratnaṃ susanitar dhanānāṃ sa ghed agne bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5257: RV_3,018.05c stotur duroṇe subhagasya revat sṛprā karasnā dadhiṣe vapūṃṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5258: RV_3,019.01a agniṃ hotāram pra vṛṇe miyedhe gṛtsaṃ kaviṃ viśvavidam amūram /
GV01rvh1-10u:5259: RV_3,019.01c sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān rāye vājāya vanate maghāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:5260: RV_3,019.02a pra te agne haviṣmatīm iyarmy acchā sudyumnāṃ rātinīṃ ghṛtācīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:5261: RV_3,019.02c pradakṣiṇid devatātim urāṇaḥ saṃ rātibhir vasubhir yajñam aśret //
GV01rvh1-10u:5262: RV_3,019.03a sa tejīyasā manasā tvota uta śikṣa svapatyasya śikṣoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5263: RV_3,019.03c agne rāyo nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaś ca vasvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5264: RV_3,019.04a bhūrīṇi hi tve dadhire anīkāgne devasya yajyavo janāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5265: RV_3,019.04c sa ā vaha devatātiṃ yaviṣṭha śardho yad adya divyaṃ yajāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5266: RV_3,019.05a yat tvā hotāram anajan miyedhe niṣādayanto yajathāya devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5267: RV_3,019.05c sa tvaṃ no agne 'viteha bodhy adhi śravāṃsi dhehi nas tanūṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5268: RV_3,020.01a agnim uṣasam aśvinā dadhikrāṃ vyuṣṭiṣu havate vahnir ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5269: RV_3,020.01c sujyotiṣo naḥ śṛṇvantu devāḥ sajoṣaso adhvaraṃ vāvaśānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5270: RV_3,020.02a agne trī te vājinā trī ṣadhasthā tisras te jihvā ṛtajāta pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5271: RV_3,020.02c tisra u te tanvo devavātās tābhir naḥ pāhi giro aprayucchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5272: RV_3,020.03a agne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedo deva svadhāvo 'mṛtasya nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:5273: RV_3,020.03c yāś ca māyā māyināṃ viśvaminva tve pūrvīḥ saṃdadhuḥ pṛṣṭabandho //
GV01rvh1-10u:5274: RV_3,020.04a agnir netā bhaga iva kṣitīnāṃ daivīnāṃ deva ṛtupā ṛtāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5275: RV_3,020.04c sa vṛtrahā sanayo viśvavedāḥ parṣad viśvāti duritā gṛṇantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5276: RV_3,020.05a dadhikrām agnim uṣasaṃ ca devīm bṛhaspatiṃ savitāraṃ ca devam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5277: RV_3,020.05c aśvinā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaṃ ca vasūn rudrāṃ ādityāṃ iha huve //
GV01rvh1-10u:5278: RV_3,021.01a imaṃ no yajñam amṛteṣu dhehīmā havyā jātavedo juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5279: RV_3,021.01c stokānām agne medaso ghṛtasya hotaḥ prāśāna prathamo niṣadya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5280: RV_3,021.02a ghṛtavantaḥ pāvaka te stokā ścotanti medasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5281: RV_3,021.02c svadharman devavītaye śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5282: RV_3,021.03a tubhyaṃ stokā ghṛtaścuto 'gne viprāya santya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5283: RV_3,021.03c ṛṣiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sam idhyase yajñasya prāvitā bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:5284: RV_3,021.04a tubhyaṃ ścotanty adhrigo śacīva stokāso agne medaso ghṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5285: RV_3,021.04c kaviśasto bṛhatā bhānunāgā havyā juṣasva medhira //
GV01rvh1-10u:5286: RV_3,021.05a ojiṣṭhaṃ te madhyato meda udbhṛtam pra te vayaṃ dadāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5287: RV_3,021.05c ścotanti te vaso stokā adhi tvaci prati tān devaśo vihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5288: RV_3,022.01a ayaṃ so agnir yasmin somam indraḥ sutaṃ dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5289: RV_3,022.01c sahasriṇaṃ vājam atyaṃ na saptiṃ sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5290: RV_3,022.02a agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yad oṣadhīṣv apsv ā yajatra /
GV01rvh1-10u:5291: RV_3,022.02c yenāntarikṣam urv ātatantha tveṣaḥ sa bhānur arṇavo nṛcakṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5292: RV_3,022.03a agne divo arṇam acchā jigāsy acchā devāṃ ūciṣe dhiṣṇyā ye /
GV01rvh1-10u:5293: RV_3,022.03c yā rocane parastāt sūryasya yāś cāvastād upatiṣṭhanta āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5295: RV_3,022.04c juṣantāṃ yajñam adruho 'namīvā iṣo mahīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5296: RV_3,022.05a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5297: RV_3,022.05c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5298: RV_3,023.01a nirmathitaḥ sudhita ā sadhasthe yuvā kavir adhvarasya praṇetā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5299: RV_3,023.01c jūryatsv agnir ajaro vaneṣv atrā dadhe amṛtaṃ jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5300: RV_3,023.02a amanthiṣṭām bhāratā revad agniṃ devaśravā devavātaḥ sudakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5301: RV_3,023.02c agne vi paśya bṛhatābhi rāyeṣāṃ no netā bhavatād anu dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:5302: RV_3,023.03a daśa kṣipaḥ pūrvyaṃ sīm ajījanan sujātam mātṛṣu priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5303: RV_3,023.03c agniṃ stuhi daivavātaṃ devaśravo yo janānām asad vaśī //
GV01rvh1-10u:5304: RV_3,023.04a ni tvā dadhe vara ā pṛthivyā iḷāyās pade sudinatve ahnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5305: RV_3,023.04c dṛṣadvatyām mānuṣa āpayāyāṃ sarasvatyāṃ revad agne didīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5306: RV_3,023.05a iḷām agne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goḥ śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5307: RV_3,023.05c syān naḥ sūnus tanayo vijāvāgne sā te sumatir bhūtv asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:5308: RV_3,024.01a agne sahasva pṛtanā abhimātīr apāsya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5309: RV_3,024.01c duṣṭaras tarann arātīr varco dhā yajñavāhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:5310: RV_3,024.02a agna iḷā sam idhyase vītihotro amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5312: RV_3,024.03a agne dyumnena jāgṛve sahasaḥ sūnav āhuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5314: RV_3,024.04a agne viśvebhir agnibhir devebhir mahayā giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5316: RV_3,024.05a agne dā dāśuṣe rayiṃ vīravantam parīṇasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5318: RV_3,025.01a agne divaḥ sūnur asi pracetās tanā pṛthivyā uta viśvavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5319: RV_3,025.01c ṛdhag devāṃ iha yajā cikitvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5320: RV_3,025.02a agniḥ sanoti vīryāṇi vidvān sanoti vājam amṛtāya bhūṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5321: RV_3,025.02c sa no devāṃ eha vahā purukṣo //
GV01rvh1-10u:5322: RV_3,025.03a agnir dyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanye ā bhāti devī amṛte amūraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5324: RV_3,025.04a agna indraś ca dāśuṣo duroṇe sutāvato yajñam ihopa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5326: RV_3,025.05a agne apāṃ sam idhyase duroṇe nityaḥ sūno sahaso jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5328: RV_3,026.01a vaiśvānaram manasāgniṃ nicāyyā haviṣmanto anuṣatyaṃ svarvidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5329: RV_3,026.01c sudānuṃ devaṃ rathiraṃ vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃ kuśikāso havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5330: RV_3,026.02a taṃ śubhram agnim avase havāmahe vaiśvānaram mātariśvānam ukthyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5331: RV_3,026.02c bṛhaspatim manuṣo devatātaye vipraṃ śrotāram atithiṃ raghuṣyadam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5332: RV_3,026.03a aśvo na krandañ janibhiḥ sam idhyate vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhir yuge-yuge /
GV01rvh1-10u:5333: RV_3,026.03c sa no agniḥ suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ dadhātu ratnam amṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5334: RV_3,026.04a pra yantu vājās taviṣībhir agnayaḥ śubhe sammiślāḥ pṛṣatīr ayukṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:5335: RV_3,026.04c bṛhadukṣo maruto viśvavedasaḥ pra vepayanti parvatāṃ adābhyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5336: RV_3,026.05a agniśriyo maruto viśvakṛṣṭaya ā tveṣam ugram ava īmahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5337: RV_3,026.05c te svānino rudriyā varṣanirṇijaḥ siṃhā na heṣakratavaḥ sudānavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5338: RV_3,026.06a vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhir agner bhāmam marutām oja īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5339: RV_3,026.06c pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhaso gantāro yajñaṃ vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5340: RV_3,026.07a agnir asmi janmanā jātavedā ghṛtam me cakṣur amṛtam ma āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5341: RV_3,026.07c arkas tridhātū rajaso vimāno 'jasro gharmo havir asmi nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:5342: RV_3,026.08a tribhiḥ pavitrair apupod dhy arkaṃ hṛdā matiṃ jyotir anu prajānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5343: RV_3,026.08c varṣiṣṭhaṃ ratnam akṛta svadhābhir ād id dyāvāpṛthivī pary apaśyat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5344: RV_3,026.09a śatadhāram utsam akṣīyamāṇaṃ vipaścitam pitaraṃ vaktvānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5345: RV_3,026.09c meḷim madantam pitror upasthe taṃ rodasī pipṛtaṃ satyavācam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5346: RV_3,027.01a pra vo vājā abhidyavo haviṣmanto ghṛtācyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5348: RV_3,027.02a īḷe agniṃ vipaścitaṃ girā yajñasya sādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5350: RV_3,027.03a agne śakema te vayaṃ yamaṃ devasya vājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5356: RV_3,027.06a taṃ sabādho yatasruca itthā dhiyā yajñavantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5358: RV_3,027.07a hotā devo amartyaḥ purastād eti māyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5360: RV_3,027.08a vājī vājeṣu dhīyate 'dhvareṣu pra ṇīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5362: RV_3,027.09a dhiyā cakre vareṇyo bhūtānāṃ garbham ā dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5364: RV_3,027.10a ni tvā dadhe vareṇyaṃ dakṣasyeḷā sahaskṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5366: RV_3,027.11a agniṃ yanturam apturam ṛtasya yoge vanuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5368: RV_3,027.12a ūrjo napātam adhvare dīdivāṃsam upa dyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5370: RV_3,027.13a īḷenyo namasyas tiras tamāṃsi darśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5372: RV_3,027.14a vṛṣo agniḥ sam idhyate 'śvo na devavāhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5374: RV_3,027.15a vṛṣaṇaṃ tvā vayaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ sam idhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5376: RV_3,028.01a agne juṣasva no haviḥ puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5378: RV_3,028.02a puroḷā agne pacatas tubhyaṃ vā ghā pariṣkṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5380: RV_3,028.03a agne vīhi puroḷāśam āhutaṃ tiroahnyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5381: RV_3,028.03c sahasaḥ sūnur asy adhvare hitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5382: RV_3,028.04a mādhyandine savane jātavedaḥ puroḷāśam iha kave juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5383: RV_3,028.04c agne yahvasya tava bhāgadheyaṃ na pra minanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5384: RV_3,028.05a agne tṛtīye savane hi kāniṣaḥ puroḷāśaṃ sahasaḥ sūnav āhutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5385: RV_3,028.05c athā deveṣv adhvaraṃ vipanyayā dhā ratnavantam amṛteṣu jāgṛvim //
GV01rvh1-10u:5386: RV_3,028.06a agne vṛdhāna āhutim puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5388: RV_3,029.01a astīdam adhimanthanam asti prajananaṃ kṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5389: RV_3,029.01c etāṃ viśpatnīm ā bharāgnim manthāma pūrvathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5390: RV_3,029.02a araṇyor nihito jātavedā garbha iva sudhito garbhiṇīṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5391: RV_3,029.02c dive-diva īḍyo jāgṛvadbhir haviṣmadbhir manuṣyebhir agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5392: RV_3,029.03a uttānāyām ava bharā cikitvān sadyaḥ pravītā vṛṣaṇaṃ jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:5393: RV_3,029.03c aruṣastūpo ruśad asya pāja iḷāyās putro vayune 'janiṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:5394: RV_3,029.04a iḷāyās tvā pade vayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5395: RV_3,029.04c jātavedo ni dhīmahy agne havyāya voḷhave //
GV01rvh1-10u:5396: RV_3,029.05a manthatā naraḥ kavim advayantam pracetasam amṛtaṃ supratīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5397: RV_3,029.05c yajñasya ketum prathamam purastād agniṃ naro janayatā suśevam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5398: RV_3,029.06a yadī manthanti bāhubhir vi rocate 'śvo na vājy aruṣo vaneṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5399: RV_3,029.06c citro na yāmann aśvinor anivṛtaḥ pari vṛṇakty aśmanas tṛṇā dahan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5400: RV_3,029.07a jāto agnī rocate cekitāno vājī vipraḥ kaviśastaḥ sudānuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5401: RV_3,029.07c yaṃ devāsa īḍyaṃ viśvavidaṃ havyavāham adadhur adhvareṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5402: RV_3,029.08a sīda hotaḥ sva u loke cikitvān sādayā yajñaṃ sukṛtasya yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5403: RV_3,029.08c devāvīr devān haviṣā yajāsy agne bṛhad yajamāne vayo dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5404: RV_3,029.09a kṛṇota dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sakhāyo 'sredhanta itana vājam accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5405: RV_3,029.09c ayam agniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devāso asahanta dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:5406: RV_3,029.10a ayaṃ te yonir ṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5407: RV_3,029.10c taṃ jānann agna ā sīdāthā no vardhayā giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5408: RV_3,029.11a tanūnapād ucyate garbha āsuro narāśaṃso bhavati yad vijāyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5409: RV_3,029.11c mātariśvā yad amimīta mātari vātasya sargo abhavat sarīmaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5410: RV_3,029.12a sunirmathā nirmathitaḥ sunidhā nihitaḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5411: RV_3,029.12c agne svadhvarā kṛṇu devān devayate yaja //
GV01rvh1-10u:5412: RV_3,029.13a ajījanann amṛtam martyāso 'sremāṇaṃ taraṇiṃ vīḷujambham /
GV01rvh1-10u:5413: RV_3,029.13c daśa svasāro agruvaḥ samīcīḥ pumāṃsaṃ jātam abhi saṃ rabhante //
GV01rvh1-10u:5414: RV_3,029.14a pra saptahotā sanakād arocata mātur upasthe yad aśocad ūdhani /
GV01rvh1-10u:5415: RV_3,029.14c na ni miṣati suraṇo dive-dive yad asurasya jaṭharād ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:5416: RV_3,029.15a amitrāyudho marutām iva prayāḥ prathamajā brahmaṇo viśvam id viduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5417: RV_3,029.15c dyumnavad brahma kuśikāsa erira eka-eko dame agniṃ sam īdhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:5418: RV_3,029.16a yad adya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaś cikitvo 'vṛṇīmahīha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5419: RV_3,029.16c dhruvam ayā dhruvam utāśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5420: RV_3,030.01a icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5421: RV_3,030.01c titikṣante abhiśastiṃ janānām indra tvad ā kaś cana hi praketaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5422: RV_3,030.02a na te dūre paramā cid rajāṃsy ā tu pra yāhi harivo haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5423: RV_3,030.02c sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā yuktā grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau //
GV01rvh1-10u:5424: RV_3,030.03a indraḥ suśipro maghavā tarutro mahāvrātas tuvikūrmir ṛghāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5425: RV_3,030.03c yad ugro dhā bādhito martyeṣu kva tyā te vṛṣabha vīryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5426: RV_3,030.04a tvaṃ hi ṣmā cyāvayann acyutāny eko vṛtrā carasi jighnamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5427: RV_3,030.04c tava dyāvāpṛthivī parvatāso 'nu vratāya nimiteva tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5428: RV_3,030.05a utābhaye puruhūta śravobhir eko dṛḷham avado vṛtrahā san /
GV01rvh1-10u:5429: RV_3,030.05c ime cid indra rodasī apāre yat saṃgṛbhṇā maghavan kāśir it te //
GV01rvh1-10u:5430: RV_3,030.06a pra sū ta indra pravatā haribhyām pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇann etu śatrūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:5431: RV_3,030.06c jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viśvaṃ satyaṃ kṛṇuhi viṣṭam astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5432: RV_3,030.07a yasmai dhāyur adadhā martyāyābhaktaṃ cid bhajate gehyaṃ saḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5433: RV_3,030.07c bhadrā ta indra sumatir ghṛtācī sahasradānā puruhūta rātiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5434: RV_3,030.08a sahadānum puruhūta kṣiyantam ahastam indra sam piṇak kuṇārum /
GV01rvh1-10u:5435: RV_3,030.08c abhi vṛtraṃ vardhamānam piyārum apādam indra tavasā jaghantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:5436: RV_3,030.09a ni sāmanām iṣirām indra bhūmim mahīm apārāṃ sadane sasattha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5437: RV_3,030.09c astabhnād dyāṃ vṛṣabho antarikṣam arṣantv āpas tvayeha prasūtāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5438: RV_3,030.10a alātṛṇo vala indra vrajo goḥ purā hantor bhayamāno vy āra /
GV01rvh1-10u:5439: RV_3,030.10c sugān patho akṛṇon niraje gāḥ prāvan vāṇīḥ puruhūtaṃ dhamantīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5440: RV_3,030.11a eko dve vasumatī samīcī indra ā paprau pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5441: RV_3,030.11c utāntarikṣād abhi naḥ samīka iṣo rathīḥ sayujaḥ śūra vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5442: RV_3,030.12a diśaḥ sūryo na mināti pradiṣṭā dive-dive haryaśvaprasūtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5443: RV_3,030.12c saṃ yad ānaḷ adhvana ād id aśvair vimocanaṃ kṛṇute tat tv asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5444: RV_3,030.13a didṛkṣanta uṣaso yāmann aktor vivasvatyā mahi citram anīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5445: RV_3,030.13c viśve jānanti mahinā yad āgād indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5446: RV_3,030.14a mahi jyotir nihitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv āmā pakvaṃ carati bibhratī gauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5447: RV_3,030.14c viśvaṃ svādma sambhṛtam usriyāyāṃ yat sīm indro adadhād bhojanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5448: RV_3,030.15a indra dṛhya yāmakośā abhūvan yajñāya śikṣa gṛṇate sakhibhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5449: RV_3,030.15c durmāyavo durevā martyāso niṣaṅgiṇo ripavo hantvāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5450: RV_3,030.16a saṃ ghoṣaḥ śṛṇve 'vamair amitrair jahī ny eṣv aśaniṃ tapiṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5451: RV_3,030.16c vṛścem adhastād vi rujā sahasva jahi rakṣo maghavan randhayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5452: RV_3,030.17a ud vṛha rakṣaḥ sahamūlam indra vṛścā madhyam praty agraṃ śṛṇīhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5453: RV_3,030.17c ā kīvataḥ salalūkaṃ cakartha brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetim asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5454: RV_3,030.18a svastaye vājibhiś ca praṇetaḥ saṃ yan mahīr iṣa āsatsi pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5455: RV_3,030.18c rāyo vantāro bṛhataḥ syāmāsme astu bhaga indra prajāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5456: RV_3,030.19a ā no bhara bhagam indra dyumantaṃ ni te deṣṇasya dhīmahi prareke /
GV01rvh1-10u:5457: RV_3,030.19c ūrva iva paprathe kāmo asme tam ā pṛṇa vasupate vasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5458: RV_3,030.20a imaṃ kāmam mandayā gobhir aśvaiś candravatā rādhasā paprathaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:5459: RV_3,030.20c svaryavo matibhis tubhyaṃ viprā indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāso akran //
GV01rvh1-10u:5460: RV_3,030.21a ā no gotrā dardṛhi gopate gāḥ sam asmabhyaṃ sanayo yantu vājāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5461: RV_3,030.21c divakṣā asi vṛṣabha satyaśuṣmo 'smabhyaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5462: RV_3,030.22a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5463: RV_3,030.22c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5464: RV_3,031.01a śāsad vahnir duhitur naptyaṃ gād vidvāṃ ṛtasya dīdhitiṃ saparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5465: RV_3,031.01c pitā yatra duhituḥ sekam ṛñjan saṃ śagmyena manasā dadhanve //
GV01rvh1-10u:5466: RV_3,031.02a na jāmaye tānvo riktham āraik cakāra garbhaṃ sanitur nidhānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5467: RV_3,031.02c yadī mātaro janayanta vahnim anyaḥ kartā sukṛtor anya ṛndhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5468: RV_3,031.03a agnir jajñe juhvā rejamāno mahas putrāṃ aruṣasya prayakṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5469: RV_3,031.03c mahān garbho mahy ā jātam eṣām mahī pravṛd dharyaśvasya yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5470: RV_3,031.04a abhi jaitrīr asacanta spṛdhānam mahi jyotis tamaso nir ajānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5471: RV_3,031.04c taṃ jānatīḥ praty ud āyann uṣāsaḥ patir gavām abhavad eka indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5472: RV_3,031.05a vīḷau satīr abhi dhīrā atṛndan prācāhinvan manasā sapta viprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5473: RV_3,031.05c viśvām avindan pathyām ṛtasya prajānann it tā namasā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:5474: RV_3,031.06a vidad yadī saramā rugṇam adrer mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyaṃ sadhryak kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5475: RV_3,031.06c agraṃ nayat supady akṣarāṇām acchā ravam prathamā jānatī gāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:5476: RV_3,031.07a agacchad u vipratamaḥ sakhīyann asūdayat sukṛte garbham adriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5477: RV_3,031.07c sasāna maryo yuvabhir makhasyann athābhavad aṅgirāḥ sadyo arcan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5478: RV_3,031.08a sataḥ-sataḥ pratimānam purobhūr viśvā veda janimā hanti śuṣṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5479: RV_3,031.08c pra ṇo divaḥ padavīr gavyur arcan sakhā sakhīṃr amuñcan nir avadyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:5480: RV_3,031.09a ni gavyatā manasā sedur arkaiḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum /
GV01rvh1-10u:5481: RV_3,031.09c idaṃ cin nu sadanam bhūry eṣāṃ yena māsāṃ asiṣāsann ṛtena //
GV01rvh1-10u:5482: RV_3,031.10a sampaśyamānā amadann abhi svam payaḥ pratnasya retaso dughānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5483: RV_3,031.10c vi rodasī atapad ghoṣa eṣāṃ jāte niṣṭhām adadhur goṣu vīrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5484: RV_3,031.11a sa jātebhir vṛtrahā sed u havyair ud usriyā asṛjad indro arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5485: RV_3,031.11c urūcy asmai ghṛtavad bharantī madhu svādma duduhe jenyā gauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5486: RV_3,031.12a pitre cic cakruḥ sadanaṃ sam asmai mahi tviṣīmat sukṛto vi hi khyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5487: RV_3,031.12c viṣkabhnanta skambhanenā janitrī āsīnā ūrdhvaṃ rabhasaṃ vi minvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5488: RV_3,031.13a mahī yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnathe dhāt sadyovṛdhaṃ vibhvaṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5489: RV_3,031.13c giro yasminn anavadyāḥ samīcīr viśvā indrāya taviṣīr anuttāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5490: RV_3,031.14a mahy ā te sakhyaṃ vaśmi śaktīr ā vṛtraghne niyuto yanti pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5491: RV_3,031.14c mahi stotram ava āganma sūrer asmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5492: RV_3,031.15a mahi kṣetram puru ścandraṃ vividvān ād it sakhibhyaś carathaṃ sam airat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5493: RV_3,031.15c indro nṛbhir ajanad dīdyānaḥ sākaṃ sūryam uṣasaṃ gātum agnim //
GV01rvh1-10u:5494: RV_3,031.16a apaś cid eṣa vibhvo damūnāḥ pra sadhrīcīr asṛjad viśvaścandrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5495: RV_3,031.16c madhvaḥ punānāḥ kavibhiḥ pavitrair dyubhir hinvanty aktubhir dhanutrīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5496: RV_3,031.17a anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī jihāte ubhe sūryasya maṃhanā yajatre /
GV01rvh1-10u:5497: RV_3,031.17c pari yat te mahimānaṃ vṛjadhyai sakhāya indra kāmyā ṛjipyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5498: RV_3,031.18a patir bhava vṛtrahan sūnṛtānāṃ girāṃ viśvāyur vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5499: RV_3,031.18c ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhir mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ saraṇyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5500: RV_3,031.19a tam aṅgirasvan namasā saparyan navyaṃ kṛṇomi sanyase purājām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5501: RV_3,031.19c druho vi yāhi bahulā adevīḥ svaś ca no maghavan sātaye dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5502: RV_3,031.20a mihaḥ pāvakāḥ pratatā abhūvan svasti naḥ pipṛhi pāram āsām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5503: RV_3,031.20c indra tvaṃ rathiraḥ pāhi no riṣo makṣū-makṣū kṛṇuhi gojito naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5504: RV_3,031.21a adediṣṭa vṛtrahā gopatir gā antaḥ kṛṣṇāṃ aruṣair dhāmabhir gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:5505: RV_3,031.21c pra sūnṛtā diśamāna ṛtena duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5506: RV_3,031.22a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5507: RV_3,031.22c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5508: RV_3,032.01a indra somaṃ somapate pibemam mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ cāru yat te /
GV01rvh1-10u:5509: RV_3,032.01c prapruthyā śipre maghavann ṛjīṣin vimucyā harī iha mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5510: RV_3,032.02a gavāśiram manthinam indra śukram pibā somaṃ rarimā te madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5511: RV_3,032.02c brahmakṛtā mārutenā gaṇena sajoṣā rudrais tṛpad ā vṛṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5512: RV_3,032.03a ye te śuṣmaṃ ye taviṣīm avardhann arcanta indra marutas ta ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5513: RV_3,032.03c mādhyandine savane vajrahasta pibā rudrebhiḥ sagaṇaḥ suśipra //
GV01rvh1-10u:5514: RV_3,032.04a ta in nv asya madhumad vivipra indrasya śardho maruto ya āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5515: RV_3,032.04c yebhir vṛtrasyeṣito vivedāmarmaṇo manyamānasya marma //
GV01rvh1-10u:5516: RV_3,032.05a manuṣvad indra savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ pibā somaṃ śaśvate vīryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5517: RV_3,032.05c sa ā vavṛtsva haryaśva yajñaiḥ saraṇyubhir apo arṇā sisarṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5518: RV_3,032.06a tvam apo yad dha vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ atyāṃ iva prāsṛjaḥ sartavājau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5519: RV_3,032.06c śayānam indra caratā vadhena vavrivāṃsam pari devīr adevam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5520: RV_3,032.07a yajāma in namasā vṛddham indram bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ yuvānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5521: RV_3,032.07c yasya priye mamatur yajñiyasya na rodasī mahimānam mamāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:5522: RV_3,032.08a indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi vratāni devā na minanti viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:5523: RV_3,032.08c dādhāra yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ jajāna sūryam uṣasaṃ sudaṃsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5524: RV_3,032.09a adrogha satyaṃ tava tan mahitvaṃ sadyo yaj jāto apibo ha somam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5525: RV_3,032.09c na dyāva indra tavasas ta ojo nāhā na māsāḥ śarado varanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:5526: RV_3,032.10a tvaṃ sadyo apibo jāta indra madāya somam parame vyoman /
GV01rvh1-10u:5527: RV_3,032.10c yad dha dyāvāpṛthivī āviveśīr athābhavaḥ pūrvyaḥ kārudhāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5528: RV_3,032.11a ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇa ojāyamānaṃ tuvijāta tavyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5529: RV_3,032.11c na te mahitvam anu bhūd adha dyaur yad anyayā sphigyā kṣām avasthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5530: RV_3,032.12a yajño hi ta indra vardhano bhūd uta priyaḥ sutasomo miyedhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5531: RV_3,032.12c yajñena yajñam ava yajñiyaḥ san yajñas te vajram ahihatya āvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5532: RV_3,032.13a yajñenendram avasā cakre arvāg ainaṃ sumnāya navyase vavṛtyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5533: RV_3,032.13c ya stomebhir vāvṛdhe pūrvyebhir yo madhyamebhir uta nūtanebhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5534: RV_3,032.14a viveṣa yan mā dhiṣaṇā jajāna stavai purā pāryād indram ahnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5535: RV_3,032.14c aṃhaso yatra pīparad yathā no nāveva yāntam ubhaye havante //
GV01rvh1-10u:5536: RV_3,032.15a āpūrṇo asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sekteva kośaṃ sisice pibadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:5537: RV_3,032.15c sam u priyā āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇid abhi somāsa indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:5538: RV_3,032.16a na tvā gabhīraḥ puruhūta sindhur nādrayaḥ pari ṣanto varanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5539: RV_3,032.16c itthā sakhibhya iṣito yad indrā dṛḷhaṃ cid arujo gavyam ūrvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5540: RV_3,032.17a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5541: RV_3,032.17c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5542: RV_3,033.01a pra parvatānām uśatī upasthād aśve iva viṣite hāsamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:5543: RV_3,033.01c gāveva śubhre mātarā rihāṇe vipāṭ chutudrī payasā javete //
GV01rvh1-10u:5544: RV_3,033.02a indreṣite prasavam bhikṣamāṇe acchā samudraṃ rathyeva yāthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5545: RV_3,033.02c samārāṇe ūrmibhiḥ pinvamāne anyā vām anyām apy eti śubhre //
GV01rvh1-10u:5546: RV_3,033.03a acchā sindhum mātṛtamām ayāsaṃ vipāśam urvīṃ subhagām aganma /
GV01rvh1-10u:5547: RV_3,033.03c vatsam iva mātarā saṃrihāṇe samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:5548: RV_3,033.04a enā vayam payasā pinvamānā anu yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ carantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5549: RV_3,033.04c na vartave prasavaḥ sargataktaḥ kiṃyur vipro nadyo johavīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:5550: RV_3,033.05a ramadhvam me vacase somyāya ṛtāvarīr upa muhūrtam evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5551: RV_3,033.05c pra sindhum acchā bṛhatī manīṣāvasyur ahve kuśikasya sūnuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5552: RV_3,033.06a indro asmāṃ aradad vajrabāhur apāhan vṛtram paridhiṃ nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5553: RV_3,033.06c devo 'nayat savitā supāṇis tasya vayam prasave yāma urvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5554: RV_3,033.07a pravācyaṃ śaśvadhā vīryaṃ tad indrasya karma yad ahiṃ vivṛścat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5555: RV_3,033.07c vi vajreṇa pariṣado jaghānāyann āpo 'yanam icchamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5556: RV_3,033.08a etad vaco jaritar māpi mṛṣṭhā ā yat te ghoṣān uttarā yugāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:5557: RV_3,033.08c uktheṣu kāro prati no juṣasva mā no ni kaḥ puruṣatrā namas te //
GV01rvh1-10u:5558: RV_3,033.09a o ṣu svasāraḥ kārave śṛṇota yayau vo dūrād anasā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5559: RV_3,033.09c ni ṣū namadhvam bhavatā supārā adhoakṣāḥ sindhavaḥ srotyābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5560: RV_3,033.10a ā te kāro śṛṇavāmā vacāṃsi yayātha dūrād anasā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5561: RV_3,033.10c ni te naṃsai pīpyāneva yoṣā maryāyeva kanyā śaśvacai te //
GV01rvh1-10u:5562: RV_3,033.11a yad aṅga tvā bharatāḥ saṃtareyur gavyan grāma iṣita indrajūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5563: RV_3,033.11c arṣād aha prasavaḥ sargatakta ā vo vṛṇe sumatiṃ yajñiyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5564: RV_3,033.12a atāriṣur bharatā gavyavaḥ sam abhakta vipraḥ sumatiṃ nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5565: RV_3,033.12c pra pinvadhvam iṣayantīḥ surādhā ā vakṣaṇāḥ pṛṇadhvaṃ yāta śībham //
GV01rvh1-10u:5566: RV_3,033.13a ud va ūrmiḥ śamyā hantv āpo yoktrāṇi muñcata /
GV01rvh1-10u:5568: RV_3,034.01a indraḥ pūrbhid ātirad dāsam arkair vidadvasur dayamāno vi śatrūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:5569: RV_3,034.01c brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhāno bhūridātra āpṛṇad rodasī ubhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5570: RV_3,034.02a makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtim iyarmi vācam amṛtāya bhūṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5571: RV_3,034.02c indra kṣitīnām asi mānuṣīṇāṃ viśāṃ daivīnām uta pūrvayāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5572: RV_3,034.03a indro vṛtram avṛṇoc chardhanītiḥ pra māyinām aminād varpaṇītiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5573: RV_3,034.03c ahan vyaṃsam uśadhag vaneṣv āvir dhenā akṛṇod rāmyāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5574: RV_3,034.04a indraḥ svarṣā janayann ahāni jigāyośigbhiḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5575: RV_3,034.04c prārocayan manave ketum ahnām avindaj jyotir bṛhate raṇāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5576: RV_3,034.05a indras tujo barhaṇā ā viveśa nṛvad dadhāno naryā purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5577: RV_3,034.05c acetayad dhiya imā jaritre premaṃ varṇam atirac chukram āsām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5578: RV_3,034.06a maho mahāni panayanty asyendrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5579: RV_3,034.06c vṛjanena vṛjinān sam pipeṣa māyābhir dasyūṃr abhibhūtyojāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5580: RV_3,034.07a yudhendro mahnā varivaś cakāra devebhyaḥ satpatiś carṣaṇiprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5581: RV_3,034.07c vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprā ukthebhiḥ kavayo gṛṇanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:5582: RV_3,034.08a satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyaṃ sahodāṃ sasavāṃsaṃ svar apaś ca devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5583: RV_3,034.08c sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām indram madanty anu dhīraṇāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5584: RV_3,034.09a sasānātyāṃ uta sūryaṃ sasānendraḥ sasāna purubhojasaṃ gām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5585: RV_3,034.09c hiraṇyayam uta bhogaṃ sasāna hatvī dasyūn prāryaṃ varṇam āvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5586: RV_3,034.10a indra oṣadhīr asanod ahāni vanaspatīṃr asanod antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5587: RV_3,034.10c bibheda valaṃ nunude vivāco 'thābhavad damitābhikratūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5588: RV_3,034.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5589: RV_3,034.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5590: RV_3,035.01a tiṣṭhā harī ratha ā yujyamānā yāhi vāyur na niyuto no accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:5591: RV_3,035.01c pibāsy andho abhisṛṣṭo asme indra svāhā rarimā te madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5592: RV_3,035.02a upājirā puruhūtāya saptī harī rathasya dhūrṣv ā yunajmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5593: RV_3,035.02c dravad yathā sambhṛtaṃ viśvataś cid upemaṃ yajñam ā vahāta indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:5594: RV_3,035.03a upo nayasva vṛṣaṇā tapuṣpotem ava tvaṃ vṛṣabha svadhāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5595: RV_3,035.03c grasetām aśvā vi muceha śoṇā dive-dive sadṛśīr addhi dhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5596: RV_3,035.04a brahmaṇā te brahmayujā yunajmi harī sakhāyā sadhamāda āśū /
GV01rvh1-10u:5597: RV_3,035.04c sthiraṃ rathaṃ sukham indrādhitiṣṭhan prajānan vidvāṃ upa yāhi somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5598: RV_3,035.05a mā te harī vṛṣaṇā vītapṛṣṭhā ni rīraman yajamānāso anye /
GV01rvh1-10u:5599: RV_3,035.05c atyāyāhi śaśvato vayaṃ te 'raṃ sutebhiḥ kṛṇavāma somaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5600: RV_3,035.06a tavāyaṃ somas tvam ehy arvāṅ chaśvattamaṃ sumanā asya pāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5601: RV_3,035.06c asmin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadyā dadhiṣvemaṃ jaṭhara indum indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:5602: RV_3,035.07a stīrṇaṃ te barhiḥ suta indra somaḥ kṛtā dhānā attave te haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5603: RV_3,035.07c tadokase puruśākāya vṛṣṇe marutvate tubhyaṃ rātā havīṃṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5604: RV_3,035.08a imaṃ naraḥ parvatās tubhyam āpaḥ sam indra gobhir madhumantam akran /
GV01rvh1-10u:5605: RV_3,035.08c tasyāgatyā sumanā ṛṣva pāhi prajānan vidvān pathyā anu svāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5606: RV_3,035.09a yāṃ ābhajo maruta indra some ye tvām avardhann abhavan gaṇas te /
GV01rvh1-10u:5607: RV_3,035.09c tebhir etaṃ sajoṣā vāvaśāno 'gneḥ piba jihvayā somam indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:5608: RV_3,035.10a indra piba svadhayā cit sutasyāgner vā pāhi jihvayā yajatra /
GV01rvh1-10u:5609: RV_3,035.10c adhvaryor vā prayataṃ śakra hastād dhotur vā yajñaṃ haviṣo juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5610: RV_3,035.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5611: RV_3,035.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5612: RV_3,036.01a imām ū ṣu prabhṛtiṃ sātaye dhāḥ śaśvac-chaśvad ūtibhir yādamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5613: RV_3,036.01c sute-sute vāvṛdhe vardhanebhir yaḥ karmabhir mahadbhiḥ suśruto bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:5614: RV_3,036.02a indrāya somāḥ pradivo vidānā ṛbhur yebhir vṛṣaparvā vihāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5615: RV_3,036.02c prayamyamānān prati ṣū gṛbhāyendra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5616: RV_3,036.03a pibā vardhasva tava ghā sutāsa indra somāsaḥ prathamā uteme /
GV01rvh1-10u:5617: RV_3,036.03c yathāpibaḥ pūrvyāṃ indra somāṃ evā pāhi panyo adyā navīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5618: RV_3,036.04a mahāṃ amatro vṛjane virapśy ugraṃ śavaḥ patyate dhṛṣṇv ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5619: RV_3,036.04c nāha vivyāca pṛthivī canainaṃ yat somāso haryaśvam amandan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5620: RV_3,036.05a mahāṃ ugro vāvṛdhe vīryāya samācakre vṛṣabhaḥ kāvyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5621: RV_3,036.05c indro bhago vājadā asya gāvaḥ pra jāyante dakṣiṇā asya pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5622: RV_3,036.06a pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavaṃ yathāyann āpaḥ samudraṃ rathyeva jagmuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5623: RV_3,036.06c ataś cid indraḥ sadaso varīyān yad īṃ somaḥ pṛṇati dugdho aṃśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5624: RV_3,036.07a samudreṇa sindhavo yādamānā indrāya somaṃ suṣutam bharantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5625: RV_3,036.07c aṃśuṃ duhanti hastino bharitrair madhvaḥ punanti dhārayā pavitraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5626: RV_3,036.08a hradā iva kukṣayaḥ somadhānāḥ sam ī vivyāca savanā purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5627: RV_3,036.08c annā yad indraḥ prathamā vy āśa vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ avṛṇīta somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5628: RV_3,036.09a ā tū bhara mākir etat pari ṣṭhād vidmā hi tvā vasupatiṃ vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5629: RV_3,036.09c indra yat te māhinaṃ datram asty asmabhyaṃ tad dharyaśva pra yandhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5630: RV_3,036.10a asme pra yandhi maghavann ṛjīṣinn indra rāyo viśvavārasya bhūreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5631: RV_3,036.10c asme śataṃ śarado jīvase dhā asme vīrāñ chaśvata indra śiprin //
GV01rvh1-10u:5632: RV_3,036.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5633: RV_3,036.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5636: RV_3,037.02a arvācīnaṃ su te mana uta cakṣuḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:5638: RV_3,037.03a nāmāni te śatakrato viśvābhir gīrbhir īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5642: RV_3,037.05a indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave puruhūtam upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:5644: RV_3,037.06a vājeṣu sāsahir bhava tvām īmahe śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:5646: RV_3,037.07a dyumneṣu pṛtanājye pṛtsutūrṣu śravassu ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:5648: RV_3,037.08a śuṣmintamaṃ na ūtaye dyumninam pāhi jāgṛvim /
GV01rvh1-10u:5650: RV_3,037.09a indriyāṇi śatakrato yā te janeṣu pañcasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5651: RV_3,037.09c indra tāni ta ā vṛṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5652: RV_3,037.10a agann indra śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ dadhiṣva duṣṭaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:5654: RV_3,037.11a arvāvato na ā gahy atho śakra parāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5655: RV_3,037.11c u loko yas te adriva indreha tata ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5656: RV_3,038.01a abhi taṣṭeva dīdhayā manīṣām atyo na vājī sudhuro jihānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5657: RV_3,038.01c abhi priyāṇi marmṛśat parāṇi kavīṃr icchāmi saṃdṛśe sumedhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5658: RV_3,038.02a inota pṛccha janimā kavīnām manodhṛtaḥ sukṛtas takṣata dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5659: RV_3,038.02c imā u te praṇyo vardhamānā manovātā adha nu dharmaṇi gman //
GV01rvh1-10u:5660: RV_3,038.03a ni ṣīm id atra guhyā dadhānā uta kṣatrāya rodasī sam añjan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5661: RV_3,038.03c sam mātrābhir mamire yemur urvī antar mahī samṛte dhāyase dhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5662: RV_3,038.04a ātiṣṭhantam pari viśve abhūṣañ chriyo vasānaś carati svarociḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5663: RV_3,038.04c mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau //
GV01rvh1-10u:5664: RV_3,038.05a asūta pūrvo vṛṣabho jyāyān imā asya śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5665: RV_3,038.05c divo napātā vidathasya dhībhiḥ kṣatraṃ rājānā pradivo dadhāthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5666: RV_3,038.06a trīṇi rājānā vidathe purūṇi pari viśvāni bhūṣathaḥ sadāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5667: RV_3,038.06c apaśyam atra manasā jaganvān vrate gandharvāṃ api vāyukeśān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5668: RV_3,038.07a tad in nv asya vṛṣabhasya dhenor ā nāmabhir mamire sakmyaṃ goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5669: RV_3,038.07c anyad-anyad asuryaṃ vasānā ni māyino mamire rūpam asmin //
GV01rvh1-10u:5670: RV_3,038.08a tad in nv asya savitur nakir me hiraṇyayīm amatiṃ yām aśiśret /
GV01rvh1-10u:5671: RV_3,038.08c ā suṣṭutī rodasī viśvaminve apīva yoṣā janimāni vavre //
GV01rvh1-10u:5672: RV_3,038.09a yuvam pratnasya sādhatho maho yad daivī svastiḥ pari ṇaḥ syātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5673: RV_3,038.09c gopājihvasya tasthuṣo virūpā viśve paśyanti māyinaḥ kṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:5674: RV_3,038.10a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5675: RV_3,038.10c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5676: RV_3,039.01a indram matir hṛda ā vacyamānācchā patiṃ stomataṣṭā jigāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5677: RV_3,039.01c yā jāgṛvir vidathe śasyamānendra yat te jāyate viddhi tasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5678: RV_3,039.02a divaś cid ā pūrvyā jāyamānā vi jāgṛvir vidathe śasyamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5679: RV_3,039.02c bhadrā vastrāṇy arjunā vasānā seyam asme sanajā pitryā dhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5680: RV_3,039.03a yamā cid atra yamasūr asūta jihvāyā agram patad ā hy asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:5681: RV_3,039.03c vapūṃṣi jātā mithunā sacete tamohanā tapuṣo budhna etā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5682: RV_3,039.04a nakir eṣāṃ ninditā martyeṣu ye asmākam pitaro goṣu yodhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5683: RV_3,039.04c indra eṣāṃ dṛṃhitā māhināvān ud gotrāṇi sasṛje daṃsanāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5684: RV_3,039.05a sakhā ha yatra sakhibhir navagvair abhijñv ā satvabhir gā anugman /
GV01rvh1-10u:5685: RV_3,039.05c satyaṃ tad indro daśabhir daśagvaiḥ sūryaṃ viveda tamasi kṣiyantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5686: RV_3,039.06a indro madhu sambhṛtam usriyāyām padvad viveda śaphavan name goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5687: RV_3,039.06c guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsu haste dadhe dakṣiṇe dakṣiṇāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5688: RV_3,039.07a jyotir vṛṇīta tamaso vijānann āre syāma duritād abhīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:5689: RV_3,039.07c imā giraḥ somapāḥ somavṛddha juṣasvendra purutamasya kāroḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5690: RV_3,039.08a jyotir yajñāya rodasī anu ṣyād āre syāma duritasya bhūreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5691: RV_3,039.08c bhūri cid dhi tujato martyasya supārāso vasavo barhaṇāvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5692: RV_3,039.09a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5693: RV_3,039.09c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5694: RV_3,040.01a indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5696: RV_3,040.02a indra kratuvidaṃ sutaṃ somaṃ harya puruṣṭuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5698: RV_3,040.03a indra pra ṇo dhitāvānaṃ yajñaṃ viśvebhir devebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5700: RV_3,040.04a indra somāḥ sutā ime tava pra yanti satpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5702: RV_3,040.05a dadhiṣvā jaṭhare sutaṃ somam indra vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5704: RV_3,040.06a girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutam madhor dhārābhir ajyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:5706: RV_3,040.07a abhi dyumnāni vanina indraṃ sacante akṣitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5708: RV_3,040.08a arvāvato na ā gahi parāvataś ca vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5710: RV_3,040.09a yad antarā parāvatam arvāvataṃ ca hūyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:5712: RV_3,041.01a ā tū na indra madryag ghuvānaḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:5714: RV_3,041.02a satto hotā na ṛtviyas tistire barhir ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:5716: RV_3,041.03a imā brahma brahmavāhaḥ kriyanta ā barhiḥ sīda /
GV01rvh1-10u:5718: RV_3,041.04a rārandhi savaneṣu ṇa eṣu stomeṣu vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5720: RV_3,041.05a matayaḥ somapām uruṃ rihanti śavasas patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:5722: RV_3,041.06a sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5724: RV_3,041.07a vayam indra tvāyavo haviṣmanto jarāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5726: RV_3,041.08a māre asmad vi mumuco haripriyārvāṅ yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5728: RV_3,041.09a arvāñcaṃ tvā sukhe rathe vahatām indra keśinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5730: RV_3,042.01a upa naḥ sutam ā gahi somam indra gavāśiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:5732: RV_3,042.02a tam indra madam ā gahi barhiṣṭhāṃ grāvabhiḥ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5734: RV_3,042.03a indram itthā giro mamācchāgur iṣitā itaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5736: RV_3,042.04a indraṃ somasya pītaye stomair iha havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5738: RV_3,042.05a indra somāḥ sutā ime tān dadhiṣva śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:5740: RV_3,042.06a vidmā hi tvā dhanañjayaṃ vājeṣu dadhṛṣaṃ kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:5742: RV_3,042.07a imam indra gavāśiraṃ yavāśiraṃ ca naḥ piba /
GV01rvh1-10u:5744: RV_3,042.08a tubhyed indra sva okye somaṃ codāmi pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:5746: RV_3,042.09a tvāṃ sutasya pītaye pratnam indra havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:5748: RV_3,043.01a ā yāhy arvāṅ upa vandhureṣṭhās taved anu pradivaḥ somapeyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5749: RV_3,043.01c priyā sakhāyā vi mucopa barhis tvām ime havyavāho havante //
GV01rvh1-10u:5750: RV_3,043.02a ā yāhi pūrvīr ati carṣaṇīr āṃ arya āśiṣa upa no haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5751: RV_3,043.02c imā hi tvā mataya stomataṣṭā indra havante sakhyaṃ juṣāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5752: RV_3,043.03a ā no yajñaṃ namovṛdhaṃ sajoṣā indra deva haribhir yāhi tūyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5753: RV_3,043.03c ahaṃ hi tvā matibhir johavīmi ghṛtaprayāḥ sadhamāde madhūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5754: RV_3,043.04a ā ca tvām etā vṛṣaṇā vahāto harī sakhāyā sudhurā svaṅgā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5755: RV_3,043.04c dhānāvad indraḥ savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ śṛṇavad vandanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:5756: RV_3,043.05a kuvin mā gopāṃ karase janasya kuvid rājānam maghavann ṛjīṣin /
GV01rvh1-10u:5757: RV_3,043.05c kuvin ma ṛṣim papivāṃsaṃ sutasya kuvin me vasvo amṛtasya śikṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5758: RV_3,043.06a ā tvā bṛhanto harayo yujānā arvāg indra sadhamādo vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5759: RV_3,043.06c pra ye dvitā diva ṛñjanty ātāḥ susammṛṣṭāso vṛṣabhasya mūrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5760: RV_3,043.07a indra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇa ā yaṃ te śyena uśate jabhāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:5761: RV_3,043.07c yasya made cyāvayasi pra kṛṣṭīr yasya made apa gotrā vavartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:5762: RV_3,043.08a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5763: RV_3,043.08c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5764: RV_3,044.01a ayaṃ te astu haryataḥ soma ā haribhiḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5765: RV_3,044.01c juṣāṇa indra haribhir na ā gahy ā tiṣṭha haritaṃ ratham //
GV01rvh1-10u:5766: RV_3,044.02a haryann uṣasam arcayaḥ sūryaṃ haryann arocayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5767: RV_3,044.02c vidvāṃś cikitvān haryaśva vardhasa indra viśvā abhi śriyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5768: RV_3,044.03a dyām indro haridhāyasam pṛthivīṃ harivarpasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5769: RV_3,044.03c adhārayad dharitor bhūri bhojanaṃ yayor antar hariś carat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5770: RV_3,044.04a jajñāno harito vṛṣā viśvam ā bhāti rocanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5771: RV_3,044.04c haryaśvo haritaṃ dhatta āyudham ā vajram bāhvor harim //
GV01rvh1-10u:5772: RV_3,044.05a indro haryantam arjunaṃ vajraṃ śukrair abhīvṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5773: RV_3,044.05c apāvṛṇod dharibhir adribhiḥ sutam ud gā haribhir ājata //
GV01rvh1-10u:5774: RV_3,045.01a ā mandrair indra haribhir yāhi mayūraromabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5775: RV_3,045.01c mā tvā ke cin ni yaman viṃ na pāśino 'ti dhanveva tāṃ ihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5776: RV_3,045.02a vṛtrakhādo valaṃrujaḥ purāṃ darmo apām ajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5777: RV_3,045.02c sthātā rathasya haryor abhisvara indro dṛḷhā cid ārujaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5778: RV_3,045.03a gambhīrāṃ udadhīṃr iva kratum puṣyasi gā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5779: RV_3,045.03c pra sugopā yavasaṃ dhenavo yathā hradaṃ kulyā ivāśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:5780: RV_3,045.04a ā nas tujaṃ rayim bharāṃśaṃ na pratijānate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5781: RV_3,045.04c vṛkṣam pakvam phalam aṅkīva dhūnuhīndra sampāraṇaṃ vasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5782: RV_3,045.05a svayur indra svarāḷ asi smaddiṣṭiḥ svayaśastaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5783: RV_3,045.05c sa vāvṛdhāna ojasā puruṣṭuta bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5784: RV_3,046.01a yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarāja ugrasya yūna sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5785: RV_3,046.01c ajūryato vajriṇo vīryāṇīndra śrutasya mahato mahāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:5786: RV_3,046.02a mahāṃ asi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhir dhanaspṛd ugra sahamāno anyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5787: RV_3,046.02c eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā sa yodhayā ca kṣayayā ca janān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5788: RV_3,046.03a pra mātrābhī ririce rocamānaḥ pra devebhir viśvato apratītaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5789: RV_3,046.03c pra majmanā diva indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ proror maho antarikṣād ṛjīṣī //
GV01rvh1-10u:5790: RV_3,046.04a uruṃ gabhīraṃ januṣābhy ugraṃ viśvavyacasam avatam matīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5791: RV_3,046.04c indraṃ somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ samudraṃ na sravata ā viśanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:5792: RV_3,046.05a yaṃ somam indra pṛthivīdyāvā garbhaṃ na mātā bibhṛtas tvāyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5793: RV_3,046.05c taṃ te hinvanti tam u te mṛjanty adhvaryavo vṛṣabha pātavā u //
GV01rvh1-10u:5794: RV_3,047.01a marutvāṃ indra vṛṣabho raṇāya pibā somam anuṣvadham madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5795: RV_3,047.01c ā siñcasva jaṭhare madhva ūrmiṃ tvaṃ rājāsi pradivaḥ sutānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5796: RV_3,047.02a sajoṣā indra sagaṇo marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5797: RV_3,047.02c jahi śatrūṃr apa mṛdho nudasvāthābhayaṃ kṛṇuhi viśvato naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5798: RV_3,047.03a uta ṛtubhir ṛtupāḥ pāhi somam indra devebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ sutaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5799: RV_3,047.03c yāṃ ābhajo maruto ye tvānv ahan vṛtram adadhus tubhyam ojaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5800: RV_3,047.04a ye tvāhihatye maghavann avardhan ye śāmbare harivo ye gaviṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5801: RV_3,047.04c ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ pibendra somaṃ sagaṇo marudbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5802: RV_3,047.05a marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam akavāriṃ divyaṃ śāsam indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:5803: RV_3,047.05c viśvāsāham avase nūtanāyograṃ sahodām iha taṃ huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:5804: RV_3,048.01a sadyo ha jāto vṛṣabhaḥ kanīnaḥ prabhartum āvad andhasaḥ sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5805: RV_3,048.01c sādhoḥ piba pratikāmaṃ yathā te rasāśiraḥ prathamaṃ somyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5806: RV_3,048.02a yaj jāyathās tad ahar asya kāme 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam apibo giriṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5807: RV_3,048.02c taṃ te mātā pari yoṣā janitrī mahaḥ pitur dama āsiñcad agre //
GV01rvh1-10u:5808: RV_3,048.03a upasthāya mātaram annam aiṭṭa tigmam apaśyad abhi somam ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5809: RV_3,048.03c prayāvayann acarad gṛtso anyān mahāni cakre purudhapratīkaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5810: RV_3,048.04a ugras turāṣāḷ abhibhūtyojā yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5811: RV_3,048.04c tvaṣṭāram indro januṣābhibhūyāmuṣyā somam apibac camūṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5812: RV_3,048.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5813: RV_3,048.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5814: RV_3,049.01a śaṃsā mahām indraṃ yasmin viśvā ā kṛṣṭayaḥ somapāḥ kāmam avyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5815: RV_3,049.01c yaṃ sukratuṃ dhiṣaṇe vibhvataṣṭaṃ ghanaṃ vṛtrāṇāṃ janayanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5816: RV_3,049.02a yaṃ nu nakiḥ pṛtanāsu svarājaṃ dvitā tarati nṛtamaṃ hariṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5817: RV_3,049.02c inatamaḥ satvabhir yo ha śūṣaiḥ pṛthujrayā aminād āyur dasyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5818: RV_3,049.03a sahāvā pṛtsu taraṇir nārvā vyānaśī rodasī mehanāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5819: RV_3,049.03c bhago na kāre havyo matīnām piteva cāruḥ suhavo vayodhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5820: RV_3,049.04a dhartā divo rajasas pṛṣṭa ūrdhvo ratho na vāyur vasubhir niyutvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5821: RV_3,049.04c kṣapāṃ vastā janitā sūryasya vibhaktā bhāgaṃ dhiṣaṇeva vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5822: RV_3,049.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5823: RV_3,049.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5824: RV_3,050.01a indraḥ svāhā pibatu yasya soma āgatyā tumro vṛṣabho marutvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:5825: RV_3,050.01c oruvyacāḥ pṛṇatām ebhir annair āsya havis tanvaḥ kāmam ṛdhyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5826: RV_3,050.02a ā te saparyū javase yunajmi yayor anu pradivaḥ śruṣṭim āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5827: RV_3,050.02c iha tvā dheyur harayaḥ suśipra pibā tv asya suṣutasya cāroḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5828: RV_3,050.03a gobhir mimikṣuṃ dadhire supāram indraṃ jyaiṣṭhyāya dhāyase gṛṇānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5829: RV_3,050.03c mandānaḥ somam papivāṃ ṛjīṣin sam asmabhyam purudhā gā iṣaṇya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5830: RV_3,050.04a imaṃ kāmam mandayā gobhir aśvaiś candravatā rādhasā paprathaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:5831: RV_3,050.04c svaryavo matibhis tubhyaṃ viprā indrāya vāhaḥ kuśikāso akran //
GV01rvh1-10u:5832: RV_3,050.05a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:5833: RV_3,050.05c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:5834: RV_3,051.01a carṣaṇīdhṛtam maghavānam ukthyam indraṃ giro bṛhatīr abhy anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:5835: RV_3,051.01c vāvṛdhānam puruhūtaṃ suvṛktibhir amartyaṃ jaramāṇaṃ dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:5836: RV_3,051.02a śatakratum arṇavaṃ śākinaṃ naraṃ giro ma indram upa yanti viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5837: RV_3,051.02c vājasanim pūrbhidaṃ tūrṇim apturaṃ dhāmasācam abhiṣācaṃ svarvidam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5838: RV_3,051.03a ākare vasor jaritā panasyate 'nehasa stubha indro duvasyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:5839: RV_3,051.03c vivasvataḥ sadana ā hi pipriye satrāsāham abhimātihanaṃ stuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5840: RV_3,051.04a nṛṇām u tvā nṛtamaṃ gīrbhir ukthair abhi pra vīram arcatā sabādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5841: RV_3,051.04c saṃ sahase purumāyo jihīte namo asya pradiva eka īśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5842: RV_3,051.05a pūrvīr asya niṣṣidho martyeṣu purū vasūni pṛthivī bibharti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5843: RV_3,051.05c indrāya dyāva oṣadhīr utāpo rayiṃ rakṣanti jīrayo vanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:5844: RV_3,051.06a tubhyam brahmāṇi gira indra tubhyaṃ satrā dadhire harivo juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5845: RV_3,051.06c bodhy āpir avaso nūtanasya sakhe vaso jaritṛbhyo vayo dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5846: RV_3,051.07a indra marutva iha pāhi somaṃ yathā śāryāte apibaḥ sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:5847: RV_3,051.07c tava praṇītī tava śūra śarmann ā vivāsanti kavayaḥ suyajñāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5848: RV_3,051.08a sa vāvaśāna iha pāhi somam marudbhir indra sakhibhiḥ sutaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5849: RV_3,051.08c jātaṃ yat tvā pari devā abhūṣan mahe bharāya puruhūta viśve //
GV01rvh1-10u:5850: RV_3,051.09a aptūrye maruta āpir eṣo 'mandann indram anu dātivārāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5851: RV_3,051.09c tebhiḥ sākam pibatu vṛtrakhādaḥ sutaṃ somaṃ dāśuṣaḥ sve sadhasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5852: RV_3,051.10a idaṃ hy anv ojasā sutaṃ rādhānām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:5854: RV_3,051.11a yas te anu svadhām asat sute ni yaccha tanvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5856: RV_3,051.12a pra te aśnotu kukṣyoḥ prendra brahmaṇā śiraḥ /
