GV01rvh1-10u:5860: RV_3,052.02a puroḷāśam pacatyaṃ juṣasvendrā gurasva ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:5862: RV_3,052.03a puroḷāśaṃ ca no ghaso joṣayāse giraś ca naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5864: RV_3,052.04a puroḷāśaṃ sanaśruta prātaḥsāve juṣasva naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5865: RV_3,052.04c indra kratur hi te bṛhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:5866: RV_3,052.05a mādhyandinasya savanasya dhānāḥ puroḷāśam indra kṛṣveha cārum /
GV01rvh1-10u:5867: RV_3,052.05c pra yat stotā jaritā tūrṇyartho vṛṣāyamāṇa upa gīrbhir īṭṭe //
GV01rvh1-10u:5868: RV_3,052.06a tṛtīye dhānāḥ savane puruṣṭuta puroḷāśam āhutam māmahasva naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5869: RV_3,052.06c ṛbhumantaṃ vājavantaṃ tvā kave prayasvanta upa śikṣema dhītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5870: RV_3,052.07a pūṣaṇvate te cakṛmā karambhaṃ harivate haryaśvāya dhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5871: RV_3,052.07c apūpam addhi sagaṇo marudbhiḥ somam piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:5872: RV_3,052.08a prati dhānā bharata tūyam asmai puroḷāśaṃ vīratamāya nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5873: RV_3,052.08c dive-dive sadṛśīr indra tubhyaṃ vardhantu tvā somapeyāya dhṛṣṇo //
GV01rvh1-10u:5874: RV_3,053.01a indrāparvatā bṛhatā rathena vāmīr iṣa ā vahataṃ suvīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5875: RV_3,053.01c vītaṃ havyāny adhvareṣu devā vardhethāṃ gīrbhir iḷayā madantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5876: RV_3,053.02a tiṣṭhā su kam maghavan mā parā gāḥ somasya nu tvā suṣutasya yakṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5877: RV_3,053.02c pitur na putraḥ sicam ā rabhe ta indra svādiṣṭhayā girā śacīvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5878: RV_3,053.03a śaṃsāvādhvaryo prati me gṛṇīhīndrāya vāhaḥ kṛṇavāva juṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5879: RV_3,053.03c edam barhir yajamānasya sīdāthā ca bhūd uktham indrāya śastam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5880: RV_3,053.04a jāyed astam maghavan sed u yonis tad it tvā yuktā harayo vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5881: RV_3,053.04c yadā kadā ca sunavāma somam agniṣ ṭvā dūto dhanvāty accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:5882: RV_3,053.05a parā yāhi maghavann ā ca yāhīndra bhrātar ubhayatrā te artham /
GV01rvh1-10u:5883: RV_3,053.05c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino rāsabhasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:5884: RV_3,053.06a apāḥ somam astam indra pra yāhi kalyāṇīr jāyā suraṇaṃ gṛhe te /
GV01rvh1-10u:5885: RV_3,053.06c yatrā rathasya bṛhato nidhānaṃ vimocanaṃ vājino dakṣiṇāvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:5886: RV_3,053.07a ime bhojā aṅgiraso virūpā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5887: RV_3,053.07c viśvāmitrāya dadato maghāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5888: RV_3,053.08a rūpaṃ-rūpam maghavā bobhavīti māyāḥ kṛṇvānas tanvam pari svām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5889: RV_3,053.08c trir yad divaḥ pari muhūrtam āgāt svair mantrair anṛtupā ṛtāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5890: RV_3,053.09a mahāṃ ṛṣir devajā devajūto 'stabhnāt sindhum arṇavaṃ nṛcakṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5891: RV_3,053.09c viśvāmitro yad avahat sudāsam apriyāyata kuśikebhir indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5892: RV_3,053.10a haṃsā iva kṛṇutha ślokam adribhir madanto gīrbhir adhvare sute sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5893: RV_3,053.10c devebhir viprā ṛṣayo nṛcakṣaso vi pibadhvaṃ kuśikāḥ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5894: RV_3,053.11a upa preta kuśikāś cetayadhvam aśvaṃ rāye pra muñcatā sudāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5895: RV_3,053.11c rājā vṛtraṃ jaṅghanat prāg apāg udag athā yajāte vara ā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5896: RV_3,053.12a ya ime rodasī ubhe aham indram atuṣṭavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5897: RV_3,053.12c viśvāmitrasya rakṣati brahmedam bhārataṃ janam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5900: RV_3,053.14a kiṃ te kṛṇvanti kīkaṭeṣu gāvo nāśiraṃ duhre na tapanti gharmam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5901: RV_3,053.14c ā no bhara pramagandasya vedo naicāśākham maghavan randhayā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5902: RV_3,053.15a sasarparīr amatim bādhamānā bṛhan mimāya jamadagnidattā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5903: RV_3,053.15c ā sūryasya duhitā tatāna śravo deveṣv amṛtam ajuryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5904: RV_3,053.16a sasarparīr abharat tūyam ebhyo 'dhi śravaḥ pāñcajanyāsu kṛṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5905: RV_3,053.16c sā pakṣyā navyam āyur dadhānā yām me palastijamadagnayo daduḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5906: RV_3,053.17a sthirau gāvau bhavatāṃ vīḷur akṣo meṣā vi varhi mā yugaṃ vi śāri /
GV01rvh1-10u:5907: RV_3,053.17c indraḥ pātalye dadatāṃ śarītor ariṣṭaneme abhi naḥ sacasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:5908: RV_3,053.18a balaṃ dhehi tanūṣu no balam indrānaḷutsu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5909: RV_3,053.18c balaṃ tokāya tanayāya jīvase tvaṃ hi baladā asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:5910: RV_3,053.19a abhi vyayasva khadirasya sāram ojo dhehi spandane śiṃśapāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:5911: RV_3,053.19c akṣa vīḷo vīḷita vīḷayasva mā yāmād asmād ava jīhipo naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5912: RV_3,053.20a ayam asmān vanaspatir mā ca hā mā ca rīriṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5913: RV_3,053.20c svasty ā gṛhebhya āvasā ā vimocanāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:5914: RV_3,053.21a indrotibhir bahulābhir no adya yācchreṣṭhābhir maghavañ chūra jinva /
GV01rvh1-10u:5915: RV_3,053.21c yo no dveṣṭy adharaḥ sas padīṣṭa yam u dviṣmas tam u prāṇo jahātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5916: RV_3,053.22a paraśuṃ cid vi tapati śimbalaṃ cid vi vṛścati /
GV01rvh1-10u:5917: RV_3,053.22c ukhā cid indra yeṣantī prayastā phenam asyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:5918: RV_3,053.23a na sāyakasya cikite janāso lodhaṃ nayanti paśu manyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5919: RV_3,053.23c nāvājinaṃ vājinā hāsayanti na gardabham puro aśvān nayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:5920: RV_3,053.24a ima indra bharatasya putrā apapitvaṃ cikitur na prapitvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5921: RV_3,053.24c hinvanty aśvam araṇaṃ na nityaṃ jyāvājam pari ṇayanty ājau //
GV01rvh1-10u:5922: RV_3,054.01a imam mahe vidathyāya śūṣaṃ śaśvat kṛtva īḍyāya pra jabhruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5923: RV_3,054.01c śṛṇotu no damyebhir anīkaiḥ śṛṇotv agnir divyair ajasraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5924: RV_3,054.02a mahi mahe dive arcā pṛthivyai kāmo ma icchañ carati prajānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:5925: RV_3,054.02c yayor ha stome vidatheṣu devāḥ saparyavo mādayante sacāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5926: RV_3,054.03a yuvor ṛtaṃ rodasī satyam astu mahe ṣu ṇaḥ suvitāya pra bhūtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:5927: RV_3,054.03c idaṃ dive namo agne pṛthivyai saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5928: RV_3,054.04a uto hi vām pūrvyā āvividra ṛtāvarī rodasī satyavācaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5929: RV_3,054.04c naraś cid vāṃ samithe śūrasātau vavandire pṛthivi vevidānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5930: RV_3,054.05a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocad devāṃ acchā pathyā kā sam eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:5931: RV_3,054.05c dadṛśra eṣām avamā sadāṃsi pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:5932: RV_3,054.06a kavir nṛcakṣā abhi ṣīm acaṣṭa ṛtasya yonā vighṛte madantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:5933: RV_3,054.06c nānā cakrāte sadanaṃ yathā veḥ samānena kratunā saṃvidāne //
GV01rvh1-10u:5934: RV_3,054.07a samānyā viyute dūreante dhruve pade tasthatur jāgarūke /
GV01rvh1-10u:5935: RV_3,054.07c uta svasārā yuvatī bhavantī ād u bruvāte mithunāni nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:5936: RV_3,054.08a viśved ete janimā saṃ vivikto maho devān bibhratī na vyathete /
GV01rvh1-10u:5937: RV_3,054.08c ejad dhruvam patyate viśvam ekaṃ carat patatri viṣuṇaṃ vi jātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5938: RV_3,054.09a sanā purāṇam adhy emy ārān mahaḥ pitur janitur jāmi tan naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5939: RV_3,054.09c devāso yatra panitāra evair urau pathi vyute tasthur antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5940: RV_3,054.10a imaṃ stomaṃ rodasī pra bravīmy ṛdūdarāḥ śṛṇavann agnijihvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5941: RV_3,054.10c mitraḥ samrājo varuṇo yuvāna ādityāsaḥ kavayaḥ paprathānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5942: RV_3,054.11a hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā sujihvas trir ā divo vidathe patyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5943: RV_3,054.11c deveṣu ca savitaḥ ślokam aśrer ād asmabhyam ā suva sarvatātim //
GV01rvh1-10u:5944: RV_3,054.12a sukṛt supāṇiḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvā devas tvaṣṭāvase tāni no dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:5945: RV_3,054.12c pūṣaṇvanta ṛbhavo mādayadhvam ūrdhvagrāvāṇo adhvaram ataṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:5946: RV_3,054.13a vidyudrathā maruta ṛṣṭimanto divo maryā ṛtajātā ayāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5947: RV_3,054.13c sarasvatī śṛṇavan yajñiyāso dhātā rayiṃ sahavīraṃ turāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5948: RV_3,054.14a viṣṇuṃ stomāsaḥ purudasmam arkā bhagasyeva kāriṇo yāmani gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:5949: RV_3,054.14c urukramaḥ kakuho yasya pūrvīr na mardhanti yuvatayo janitrīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5950: RV_3,054.15a indro viśvair vīryaiḥ patyamāna ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5951: RV_3,054.15c purandaro vṛtrahā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇaḥ saṃgṛbhyā na ā bharā bhūri paśvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5952: RV_3,054.16a nāsatyā me pitarā bandhupṛcchā sajātyam aśvinoś cāru nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:5953: RV_3,054.16c yuvaṃ hi stho rayidau no rayīṇāṃ dātraṃ rakṣethe akavair adabdhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:5954: RV_3,054.17a mahat tad vaḥ kavayaś cāru nāma yad dha devā bhavatha viśva indre /
GV01rvh1-10u:5955: RV_3,054.17c sakha ṛbhubhiḥ puruhūta priyebhir imāṃ dhiyaṃ sātaye takṣatā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5956: RV_3,054.18a aryamā ṇo aditir yajñiyāso 'dabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:5957: RV_3,054.18c yuyota no anapatyāni gantoḥ prajāvān naḥ paśumāṃ astu gātuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5958: RV_3,054.19a devānāṃ dūtaḥ purudha prasūto 'nāgān no vocatu sarvatātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5959: RV_3,054.19c śṛṇotu naḥ pṛthivī dyaur utāpaḥ sūryo nakṣatrair urv antarikṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5960: RV_3,054.20a śṛṇvantu no vṛṣaṇaḥ parvatāso dhruvakṣemāsa iḷayā madantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5961: RV_3,054.20c ādityair no aditiḥ śṛṇotu yacchantu no marutaḥ śarma bhadram //
GV01rvh1-10u:5962: RV_3,054.21a sadā sugaḥ pitumāṃ astu panthā madhvā devā oṣadhīḥ sam pipṛkta /
GV01rvh1-10u:5963: RV_3,054.21c bhago me agne sakhye na mṛdhyā ud rāyo aśyāṃ sadanam purukṣoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5964: RV_3,054.22a svadasva havyā sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5965: RV_3,054.22c viśvāṃ agne pṛtsu tāñ jeṣi śatrūn ahā viśvā sumanā dīdihī naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:5966: RV_3,055.01a uṣasaḥ pūrvā adha yad vyūṣur mahad vi jajñe akṣaram pade goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5967: RV_3,055.01c vratā devānām upa nu prabhūṣan mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5968: RV_3,055.02a mo ṣū ṇo atra juhuranta devā mā pūrve agne pitaraḥ padajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5969: RV_3,055.02c purāṇyoḥ sadmanoḥ ketur antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5970: RV_3,055.03a vi me purutrā patayanti kāmāḥ śamy acchā dīdye pūrvyāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:5971: RV_3,055.03c samiddhe agnāv ṛtam id vadema mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5972: RV_3,055.04a samāno rājā vibhṛtaḥ purutrā śaye śayāsu prayuto vanānu /
GV01rvh1-10u:5973: RV_3,055.04c anyā vatsam bharati kṣeti mātā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5974: RV_3,055.05a ākṣit pūrvāsv aparā anūrut sadyo jātāsu taruṇīṣv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5975: RV_3,055.05c antarvatīḥ suvate apravītā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5976: RV_3,055.06a śayuḥ parastād adha nu dvimātābandhanaś carati vatsa ekaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5977: RV_3,055.06c mitrasya tā varuṇasya vratāni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5978: RV_3,055.07a dvimātā hotā vidatheṣu samrāḷ anv agraṃ carati kṣeti budhnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5979: RV_3,055.07c pra raṇyāni raṇyavāco bharante mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5980: RV_3,055.08a śūrasyeva yudhyato antamasya pratīcīnaṃ dadṛśe viśvam āyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5981: RV_3,055.08c antar matiś carati niṣṣidhaṃ gor mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5982: RV_3,055.09a ni veveti palito dūta āsv antar mahāṃś carati rocanena /
GV01rvh1-10u:5983: RV_3,055.09c vapūṃṣi bibhrad abhi no vi caṣṭe mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5984: RV_3,055.10a viṣṇur gopāḥ paramam pāti pāthaḥ priyā dhāmāny amṛtā dadhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5985: RV_3,055.10c agniṣ ṭā viśvā bhuvanāni veda mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5986: RV_3,055.11a nānā cakrāte yamyā vapūṃṣi tayor anyad rocate kṛṣṇam anyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5987: RV_3,055.11c śyāvī ca yad aruṣī ca svasārau mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5988: RV_3,055.12a mātā ca yatra duhitā ca dhenū sabardughe dhāpayete samīcī /
GV01rvh1-10u:5989: RV_3,055.12c ṛtasya te sadasīḷe antar mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5990: RV_3,055.13a anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5991: RV_3,055.13c ṛtasya sā payasāpinvateḷā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5992: RV_3,055.14a padyā vaste pururūpā vapūṃṣy ūrdhvā tasthau tryaviṃ rerihāṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:5993: RV_3,055.14c ṛtasya sadma vi carāmi vidvān mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5994: RV_3,055.15a pade iva nihite dasme antas tayor anyad guhyam āvir anyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:5995: RV_3,055.15c sadhrīcīnā pathyā sā viṣūcī mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5996: RV_3,055.16a ā dhenavo dhunayantām aśiśvīḥ sabardughāḥ śaśayā apradugdhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5997: RV_3,055.16c navyā-navyā yuvatayo bhavantīr mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:5998: RV_3,055.17a yad anyāsu vṛṣabho roravīti so anyasmin yūthe ni dadhāti retaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:5999: RV_3,055.17c sa hi kṣapāvān sa bhagaḥ sa rājā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6000: RV_3,055.18a vīrasya nu svaśvyaṃ janāsaḥ pra nu vocāma vidur asya devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6001: RV_3,055.18c ṣoḷhā yuktāḥ pañca-pañcā vahanti mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6002: RV_3,055.19a devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ pupoṣa prajāḥ purudhā jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:6003: RV_3,055.19c imā ca viśvā bhuvanāny asya mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6004: RV_3,055.20a mahī sam airac camvā samīcī ubhe te asya vasunā nyṛṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6005: RV_3,055.20c śṛṇve vīro vindamāno vasūni mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6006: RV_3,055.21a imāṃ ca naḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upa kṣeti hitamitro na rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6007: RV_3,055.21c puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6008: RV_3,055.22a niṣṣidhvarīs ta oṣadhīr utāpo rayiṃ ta indra pṛthivī bibharti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6009: RV_3,055.22c sakhāyas te vāmabhājaḥ syāma mahad devānām asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6010: RV_3,056.01a na tā minanti māyino na dhīrā vratā devānām prathamā dhruvāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6011: RV_3,056.01c na rodasī adruhā vedyābhir na parvatā niname tasthivāṃsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6012: RV_3,056.02a ṣaḍ bhārāṃ eko acaran bibharty ṛtaṃ varṣiṣṭham upa gāva āguḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6013: RV_3,056.02c tisro mahīr uparās tasthur atyā guhā dve nihite darśy ekā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6014: RV_3,056.03a tripājasyo vṛṣabho viśvarūpa uta tryudhā purudha prajāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6015: RV_3,056.03c tryanīkaḥ patyate māhināvān sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6016: RV_3,056.04a abhīka āsām padavīr abodhy ādityānām ahve cāru nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:6017: RV_3,056.04c āpaś cid asmā aramanta devīḥ pṛthag vrajantīḥ pari ṣīm avṛñjan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6018: RV_3,056.05a trī ṣadhasthā sindhavas triḥ kavīnām uta trimātā vidatheṣu samrāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6019: RV_3,056.05c ṛtāvarīr yoṣaṇās tisro apyās trir ā divo vidathe patyamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6020: RV_3,056.06a trir ā divaḥ savitar vāryāṇi dive-diva ā suva trir no ahnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6021: RV_3,056.06c tridhātu rāya ā suvā vasūni bhaga trātar dhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6022: RV_3,056.07a trir ā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:6023: RV_3,056.07c āpaś cid asya rodasī cid urvī ratnam bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6024: RV_3,056.08a trir uttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni trayo rājanty asurasya vīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6025: RV_3,056.08c ṛtāvāna iṣirā dūḷabhāsas trir ā divo vidathe santu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6026: RV_3,057.01a pra me vivikvāṃ avidan manīṣāṃ dhenuṃ carantīm prayutām agopām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6027: RV_3,057.01c sadyaś cid yā duduhe bhūri dhāser indras tad agniḥ panitāro asyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6028: RV_3,057.02a indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā suhastā divo na prītāḥ śaśayaṃ duduhre /
GV01rvh1-10u:6029: RV_3,057.02c viśve yad asyāṃ raṇayanta devāḥ pra vo 'tra vasavaḥ sumnam aśyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6030: RV_3,057.03a yā jāmayo vṛṣṇa icchanti śaktiṃ namasyantīr jānate garbham asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:6031: RV_3,057.03c acchā putraṃ dhenavo vāvaśānā mahaś caranti bibhrataṃ vapūṃṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6032: RV_3,057.04a acchā vivakmi rodasī sumeke grāvṇo yujāno adhvare manīṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6033: RV_3,057.04c imā u te manave bhūrivārā ūrdhvā bhavanti darśatā yajatrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6034: RV_3,057.05a yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhā agne deveṣūcyata urūcī /
GV01rvh1-10u:6035: RV_3,057.05c tayeha viśvāṃ avase yajatrān ā sādaya pāyayā cā madhūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:6036: RV_3,057.06a yā te agne parvatasyeva dhārāsaścantī pīpayad deva citrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6037: RV_3,057.06c tām asmabhyam pramatiṃ jātavedo vaso rāsva sumatiṃ viśvajanyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6038: RV_3,058.01a dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyaṃ duhānāntaḥ putraś carati dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6039: RV_3,058.01c ā dyotaniṃ vahati śubhrayāmoṣasa stomo aśvināv ajīgaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6040: RV_3,058.02a suyug vahanti prati vām ṛtenordhvā bhavanti pitareva medhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6041: RV_3,058.02c jarethām asmad vi paṇer manīṣāṃ yuvor avaś cakṛmā yātam arvāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:6042: RV_3,058.03a suyugbhir aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena dasrāv imaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokam adreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6043: RV_3,058.03c kim aṅga vām praty avartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhur viprāso aśvinā purājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6044: RV_3,058.04a ā manyethām ā gataṃ kac cid evair viśve janāso aśvinā havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:6045: RV_3,058.04c imā hi vāṃ goṛjīkā madhūni pra mitrāso na dadur usro agre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6046: RV_3,058.05a tiraḥ purū cid aśvinā rajāṃsy āṅgūṣo vām maghavānā janeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6047: RV_3,058.05c eha yātam pathibhir devayānair dasrāv ime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6048: RV_3,058.06a purāṇam okaḥ sakhyaṃ śivaṃ vāṃ yuvor narā draviṇaṃ jahnāvyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6049: RV_3,058.06c punaḥ kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni madhvā madema saha nū samānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6050: RV_3,058.07a aśvinā vāyunā yuvaṃ sudakṣā niyudbhiṣ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6051: RV_3,058.07c nāsatyā tiroahnyaṃ juṣāṇā somam pibatam asridhā sudānū //
GV01rvh1-10u:6052: RV_3,058.08a aśvinā pari vām iṣaḥ purūcīr īyur gīrbhir yatamānā amṛdhrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6053: RV_3,058.08c ratho ha vām ṛtajā adrijūtaḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6054: RV_3,058.09a aśvinā madhuṣuttamo yuvākuḥ somas tam pātam ā gataṃ duroṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6055: RV_3,058.09c ratho ha vām bhūri varpaḥ karikrat sutāvato niṣkṛtam āgamiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6056: RV_3,059.01a mitro janān yātayati bruvāṇo mitro dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6057: RV_3,059.01c mitraḥ kṛṣṭīr animiṣābhi caṣṭe mitrāya havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:6058: RV_3,059.02a pra sa mitra marto astu prayasvān yas ta āditya śikṣati vratena /
GV01rvh1-10u:6059: RV_3,059.02c na hanyate na jīyate tvoto nainam aṃho aśnoty antito na dūrāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6060: RV_3,059.03a anamīvāsa iḷayā madanto mitajñavo varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6061: RV_3,059.03c ādityasya vratam upakṣiyanto vayam mitrasya sumatau syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6062: RV_3,059.04a ayam mitro namasyaḥ suśevo rājā sukṣatro ajaniṣṭa vedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6063: RV_3,059.04c tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6064: RV_3,059.05a mahāṃ ādityo namasopasadyo yātayajjano gṛṇate suśevaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6065: RV_3,059.05c tasmā etat panyatamāya juṣṭam agnau mitrāya havir ā juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:6068: RV_3,059.07a abhi yo mahinā divam mitro babhūva saprathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6070: RV_3,059.08a mitrāya pañca yemire janā abhiṣṭiśavase /
GV01rvh1-10u:6072: RV_3,059.09a mitro deveṣv āyuṣu janāya vṛktabarhiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6074: RV_3,060.01a iheha vo manasā bandhutā nara uśijo jagmur abhi tāni vedasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6075: RV_3,060.01c yābhir māyābhiḥ pratijūtivarpasaḥ saudhanvanā yajñiyam bhāgam ānaśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:6076: RV_3,060.02a yābhiḥ śacībhiś camasāṃ apiṃśata yayā dhiyā gām ariṇīta carmaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6077: RV_3,060.02c yena harī manasā niratakṣata tena devatvam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:6078: RV_3,060.03a indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ sam ānaśur manor napāto apaso dadhanvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:6079: RV_3,060.03c saudhanvanāso amṛtatvam erire viṣṭvī śamībhiḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6080: RV_3,060.04a indreṇa yātha sarathaṃ sute sacāṃ atho vaśānām bhavathā saha śriyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6081: RV_3,060.04c na vaḥ pratimai sukṛtāni vāghataḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo vīryāṇi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:6082: RV_3,060.05a indra ṛbhubhir vājavadbhiḥ samukṣitaṃ sutaṃ somam ā vṛṣasvā gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6083: RV_3,060.05c dhiyeṣito maghavan dāśuṣo gṛhe saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsvā nṛbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6084: RV_3,060.06a indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsveha no 'smin savane śacyā puruṣṭuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:6085: RV_3,060.06c imāni tubhyaṃ svasarāṇi yemire vratā devānām manuṣaś ca dharmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6086: RV_3,060.07a indra ṛbhubhir vājibhir vājayann iha stomaṃ jaritur upa yāhi yajñiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6087: RV_3,060.07c śataṃ ketebhir iṣirebhir āyave sahasraṇītho adhvarasya homani //
GV01rvh1-10u:6088: RV_3,061.01a uṣo vājena vājini pracetā stomaṃ juṣasva gṛṇato maghoni /
GV01rvh1-10u:6089: RV_3,061.01c purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ purandhir anu vrataṃ carasi viśvavāre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6090: RV_3,061.02a uṣo devy amartyā vi bhāhi candrarathā sūnṛtā īrayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:6091: RV_3,061.02c ā tvā vahantu suyamāso aśvā hiraṇyavarṇām pṛthupājaso ye //
GV01rvh1-10u:6092: RV_3,061.03a uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvordhvā tiṣṭhasy amṛtasya ketuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6093: RV_3,061.03c samānam arthaṃ caraṇīyamānā cakram iva navyasy ā vavṛtsva //
GV01rvh1-10u:6094: RV_3,061.04a ava syūmeva cinvatī maghony uṣā yāti svasarasya patnī /
GV01rvh1-10u:6095: RV_3,061.04c svar janantī subhagā sudaṃsā āntād divaḥ papratha ā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6096: RV_3,061.05a acchā vo devīm uṣasaṃ vibhātīm pra vo bharadhvaṃ namasā suvṛktim /
GV01rvh1-10u:6097: RV_3,061.05c ūrdhvam madhudhā divi pājo aśret pra rocanā ruruce raṇvasaṃdṛk //
GV01rvh1-10u:6098: RV_3,061.06a ṛtāvarī divo arkair abodhy ā revatī rodasī citram asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6099: RV_3,061.06c āyatīm agna uṣasaṃ vibhātīṃ vāmam eṣi draviṇam bhikṣamāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6100: RV_3,061.07a ṛtasya budhna uṣasām iṣaṇyan vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:6101: RV_3,061.07c mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā candreva bhānuṃ vi dadhe purutrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6102: RV_3,062.01a imā u vām bhṛmayo manyamānā yuvāvate na tujyā abhūvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6103: RV_3,062.01c kva tyad indrāvaruṇā yaśo vāṃ yena smā sinam bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6104: RV_3,062.02a ayam u vām purutamo rayīyañ chaśvattamam avase johavīti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6105: RV_3,062.02c sajoṣāv indrāvaruṇā marudbhir divā pṛthivyā śṛṇutaṃ havam me //
GV01rvh1-10u:6106: RV_3,062.03a asme tad indrāvaruṇā vasu ṣyād asme rayir marutaḥ sarvavīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6107: RV_3,062.03c asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇair avantv asmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6108: RV_3,062.04a bṛhaspate juṣasva no havyāni viśvadevya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6110: RV_3,062.05a śucim arkair bṛhaspatim adhvareṣu namasyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:6114: RV_3,062.07a iyaṃ te pūṣann āghṛṇe suṣṭutir deva navyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:6116: RV_3,062.08a tāṃ juṣasva giram mama vājayantīm avā dhiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6118: RV_3,062.09a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:6120: RV_3,062.10a tat savitur vareṇyam bhargo devasya dhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6122: RV_3,062.11a devasya savitur vayaṃ vājayantaḥ purandhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6124: RV_3,062.12a devaṃ naraḥ savitāraṃ viprā yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6126: RV_3,062.13a somo jigāti gātuvid devānām eti niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6128: RV_3,062.14a somo asmabhyaṃ dvipade catuṣpade ca paśave /
GV01rvh1-10u:6130: RV_3,062.15a asmākam āyur vardhayann abhimātīḥ sahamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6132: RV_3,062.16a ā no mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6134: RV_3,062.17a uruśaṃsā namovṛdhā mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6136: RV_3,062.18a gṛṇānā jamadagninā yonāv ṛtasya sīdatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6140: RV_4,001.01a tvāṃ hy agne sadam it samanyavo devāso devam aratiṃ nyerira iti kratvā nyerire /
GV01rvh1-10u:6141: RV_4,001.01c amartyaṃ yajata martyeṣv ā devam ādevaṃ janata pracetasaṃ viśvam ādevaṃ janata pracetasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6142: RV_4,001.02a sa bhrātaraṃ varuṇam agna ā vavṛtsva devāṃ acchā sumatī yajñavanasaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ yajñavanasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6143: RV_4,001.02c ṛtāvānam ādityaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtaṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīdhṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6144: RV_4,001.03a sakhe sakhāyam abhy ā vavṛtsvāśuṃ na cakraṃ rathyeva raṃhyāsmabhyaṃ dasma raṃhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6145: RV_4,001.03c agne mṛḷīkaṃ varuṇe sacā vido marutsu viśvabhānuṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6146: RV_4,001.03d tokāya tuje śuśucāna śaṃ kṛdhy asmabhyaṃ dasma śaṃ kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6147: RV_4,001.04a tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḷo 'va yāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6148: RV_4,001.04c yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pra mumugdhy asmat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6149: RV_4,001.05a sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6150: RV_4,001.05c ava yakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḷīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6151: RV_4,001.06a asya śreṣṭhā subhagasya saṃdṛg devasya citratamā martyeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6152: RV_4,001.06c śuci ghṛtaṃ na taptam aghnyāyā spārhā devasya maṃhaneva dhenoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6153: RV_4,001.07a trir asya tā paramā santi satyā spārhā devasya janimāny agneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6154: RV_4,001.07c anante antaḥ parivīta āgāc chuciḥ śukro aryo rorucānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6155: RV_4,001.08a sa dūto viśved abhi vaṣṭi sadmā hotā hiraṇyaratho raṃsujihvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6156: RV_4,001.08c rohidaśvo vapuṣyo vibhāvā sadā raṇvaḥ pitumatīva saṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6157: RV_4,001.09a sa cetayan manuṣo yajñabandhuḥ pra tam mahyā raśanayā nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6158: RV_4,001.09c sa kṣety asya duryāsu sādhan devo martasya sadhanitvam āpa //
GV01rvh1-10u:6159: RV_4,001.10a sa tū no agnir nayatu prajānann acchā ratnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yad asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6160: RV_4,001.10c dhiyā yad viśve amṛtā akṛṇvan dyauṣ pitā janitā satyam ukṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6161: RV_4,001.11a sa jāyata prathamaḥ pastyāsu maho budhne rajaso asya yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6162: RV_4,001.11b apād aśīrṣā guhamāno antāyoyuvāno vṛṣabhasya nīḷe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6163: RV_4,001.12a pra śardha ārta prathamaṃ vipanyāṃ ṛtasya yonā vṛṣabhasya nīḷe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6164: RV_4,001.12c spārho yuvā vapuṣyo vibhāvā sapta priyāso 'janayanta vṛṣṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6165: RV_4,001.13a asmākam atra pitaro manuṣyā abhi pra sedur ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6166: RV_4,001.13c aśmavrajāḥ sudughā vavre antar ud usrā ājann uṣaso huvānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6167: RV_4,001.14a te marmṛjata dadṛvāṃso adriṃ tad eṣām anye abhito vi vocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6168: RV_4,001.14c paśvayantrāso abhi kāram arcan vidanta jyotiś cakṛpanta dhībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6169: RV_4,001.15a te gavyatā manasā dṛdhram ubdhaṃ gā yemānam pari ṣantam adrim /
GV01rvh1-10u:6170: RV_4,001.15c dṛḷhaṃ naro vacasā daivyena vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6171: RV_4,001.16a te manvata prathamaṃ nāma dhenos triḥ sapta mātuḥ paramāṇi vindan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6172: RV_4,001.16c taj jānatīr abhy anūṣata vrā āvir bhuvad aruṇīr yaśasā goḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6173: RV_4,001.17a neśat tamo dudhitaṃ rocata dyaur ud devyā uṣaso bhānur arta /
GV01rvh1-10u:6174: RV_4,001.17c ā sūryo bṛhatas tiṣṭhad ajrāṃ ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6175: RV_4,001.18a ād it paścā bubudhānā vy akhyann ād id ratnaṃ dhārayanta dyubhaktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6176: RV_4,001.18c viśve viśvāsu duryāsu devā mitra dhiye varuṇa satyam astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:6177: RV_4,001.19a acchā voceya śuśucānam agniṃ hotāraṃ viśvabharasaṃ yajiṣṭham /
GV01rvh1-10u:6178: RV_4,001.19c śucy ūdho atṛṇan na gavām andho na pūtam pariṣiktam aṃśoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6179: RV_4,001.20a viśveṣām aditir yajñiyānāṃ viśveṣām atithir mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6180: RV_4,001.20c agnir devānām ava āvṛṇānaḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6181: RV_4,002.01a yo martyeṣv amṛta ṛtāvā devo deveṣv aratir nidhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6182: RV_4,002.01c hotā yajiṣṭho mahnā śucadhyai havyair agnir manuṣa īrayadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6183: RV_4,002.02a iha tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adya jāto jātāṃ ubhayāṃ antar agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:6184: RV_4,002.02c dūta īyase yuyujāna ṛṣva ṛjumuṣkān vṛṣaṇaḥ śukrāṃś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:6185: RV_4,002.03a atyā vṛdhasnū rohitā ghṛtasnū ṛtasya manye manasā javiṣṭhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6186: RV_4,002.03c antar īyase aruṣā yujāno yuṣmāṃś ca devān viśa ā ca martān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6187: RV_4,002.04a aryamaṇaṃ varuṇam mitram eṣām indrāviṣṇū maruto aśvinota /
GV01rvh1-10u:6188: RV_4,002.04c svaśvo agne surathaḥ surādhā ed u vaha suhaviṣe janāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6189: RV_4,002.05a gomāṃ agne 'vimāṃ aśvī yajño nṛvatsakhā sadam id apramṛṣyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6190: RV_4,002.05c iḷāvāṃ eṣo asura prajāvān dīrgho rayiḥ pṛthubudhnaḥ sabhāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6191: RV_4,002.06a yas ta idhmaṃ jabharat siṣvidāno mūrdhānaṃ vā tatapate tvāyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6192: RV_4,002.06c bhuvas tasya svatavāṃḥ pāyur agne viśvasmāt sīm aghāyata uruṣya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6193: RV_4,002.07a yas te bharād anniyate cid annaṃ niśiṣan mandram atithim udīrat /
GV01rvh1-10u:6194: RV_4,002.07c ā devayur inadhate duroṇe tasmin rayir dhruvo astu dāsvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6195: RV_4,002.08a yas tvā doṣā ya uṣasi praśaṃsāt priyaṃ vā tvā kṛṇavate haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6196: RV_4,002.08c aśvo na sve dama ā hemyāvān tam aṃhasaḥ pīparo dāśvāṃsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6197: RV_4,002.09a yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya dāśad duvas tve kṛṇavate yatasruk /
GV01rvh1-10u:6198: RV_4,002.09c na sa rāyā śaśamāno vi yoṣan nainam aṃhaḥ pari varad aghāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6199: RV_4,002.10a yasya tvam agne adhvaraṃ jujoṣo devo martasya sudhitaṃ rarāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6200: RV_4,002.10c prīted asad dhotrā sā yaviṣṭhāsāma yasya vidhato vṛdhāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6201: RV_4,002.11a cittim acittiṃ cinavad vi vidvān pṛṣṭheva vītā vṛjinā ca martān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6202: RV_4,002.11c rāye ca naḥ svapatyāya deva ditiṃ ca rāsvāditim uruṣya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6203: RV_4,002.12a kaviṃ śaśāsuḥ kavayo 'dabdhā nidhārayanto duryāsv āyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6204: RV_4,002.12c atas tvaṃ dṛśyāṃ agna etān paḍbhiḥ paśyer adbhutāṃ arya evaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6205: RV_4,002.13a tvam agne vāghate supraṇītiḥ sutasomāya vidhate yaviṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:6206: RV_4,002.13c ratnam bhara śaśamānāya ghṛṣve pṛthu ścandram avase carṣaṇiprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6207: RV_4,002.14a adhā ha yad vayam agne tvāyā paḍbhir hastebhiś cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6208: RV_4,002.14c rathaṃ na kranto apasā bhurijor ṛtaṃ yemuḥ sudhya āśuṣāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6209: RV_4,002.15a adhā mātur uṣasaḥ sapta viprā jāyemahi prathamā vedhaso nṝn /
GV01rvh1-10u:6210: RV_4,002.15c divas putrā aṅgiraso bhavemādriṃ rujema dhaninaṃ śucantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6211: RV_4,002.16a adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6212: RV_4,002.16c śucīd ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr apa vran //
GV01rvh1-10u:6213: RV_4,002.17a sukarmāṇaḥ suruco devayanto 'yo na devā janimā dhamantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6214: RV_4,002.17c śucanto agniṃ vavṛdhanta indram ūrvaṃ gavyam pariṣadanto agman //
GV01rvh1-10u:6215: RV_4,002.18a ā yūtheva kṣumati paśvo akhyad devānāṃ yaj janimānty ugra /
GV01rvh1-10u:6216: RV_4,002.18c martānāṃ cid urvaśīr akṛpran vṛdhe cid arya uparasyāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6217: RV_4,002.19a akarma te svapaso abhūma ṛtam avasrann uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6218: RV_4,002.19c anūnam agnim purudhā suścandraṃ devasya marmṛjataś cāru cakṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6219: RV_4,002.20a etā te agna ucathāni vedho 'vocāma kavaye tā juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:6220: RV_4,002.20c uc chocasva kṛṇuhi vasyaso no maho rāyaḥ puruvāra pra yandhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6221: RV_4,003.01a ā vo rājānam adhvarasya rudraṃ hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6222: RV_4,003.01c agnim purā tanayitnor acittād dhiraṇyarūpam avase kṛṇudhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6223: RV_4,003.02a ayaṃ yoniś cakṛmā yaṃ vayaṃ te jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6224: RV_4,003.02c arvācīnaḥ parivīto ni ṣīdemā u te svapāka pratīcīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6225: RV_4,003.03a āśṛṇvate adṛpitāya manma nṛcakṣase sumṛḷīkāya vedhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6226: RV_4,003.03c devāya śastim amṛtāya śaṃsa grāveva sotā madhuṣud yam īḷe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6227: RV_4,003.04a tvaṃ cin naḥ śamyā agne asyā ṛtasya bodhy ṛtacit svādhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6228: RV_4,003.04c kadā ta ukthā sadhamādyāni kadā bhavanti sakhyā gṛhe te //
GV01rvh1-10u:6229: RV_4,003.05a kathā ha tad varuṇāya tvam agne kathā dive garhase kan na āgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6230: RV_4,003.05c kathā mitrāya mīḷhuṣe pṛthivyai bravaḥ kad aryamṇe kad bhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6231: RV_4,003.06a kad dhiṣṇyāsu vṛdhasāno agne kad vātāya pratavase śubhaṃye /
GV01rvh1-10u:6232: RV_4,003.06c parijmane nāsatyāya kṣe bravaḥ kad agne rudrāya nṛghne //
GV01rvh1-10u:6233: RV_4,003.07a kathā mahe puṣṭimbharāya pūṣṇe kad rudrāya sumakhāya havirde /
GV01rvh1-10u:6234: RV_4,003.07c kad viṣṇava urugāyāya reto bravaḥ kad agne śarave bṛhatyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6235: RV_4,003.08a kathā śardhāya marutām ṛtāya kathā sūre bṛhate pṛcchyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6236: RV_4,003.08c prati bravo 'ditaye turāya sādhā divo jātavedaś cikitvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6237: RV_4,003.09a ṛtena ṛtaṃ niyatam īḷa ā gor āmā sacā madhumat pakvam agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:6238: RV_4,003.09c kṛṣṇā satī ruśatā dhāsinaiṣā jāmaryeṇa payasā pīpāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6239: RV_4,003.10a ṛtena hi ṣmā vṛṣabhaś cid aktaḥ pumāṃ agniḥ payasā pṛṣṭhyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:6240: RV_4,003.10c aspandamāno acarad vayodhā vṛṣā śukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6241: RV_4,003.11a ṛtenādriṃ vy asan bhidantaḥ sam aṅgiraso navanta gobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6242: RV_4,003.11c śunaṃ naraḥ pari ṣadann uṣāsam āviḥ svar abhavaj jāte agnau //
GV01rvh1-10u:6243: RV_4,003.12a ṛtena devīr amṛtā amṛktā arṇobhir āpo madhumadbhir agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:6244: RV_4,003.12c vājī na sargeṣu prastubhānaḥ pra sadam it sravitave dadhanyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6245: RV_4,003.13a mā kasya yakṣaṃ sadam id dhuro gā mā veśasya praminato māpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6246: RV_4,003.13c mā bhrātur agne anṛjor ṛṇaṃ ver mā sakhyur dakṣaṃ ripor bhujema //
GV01rvh1-10u:6247: RV_4,003.14a rakṣā ṇo agne tava rakṣaṇebhī rārakṣāṇaḥ sumakha prīṇānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6248: RV_4,003.14c prati ṣphura vi ruja vīḍv aṃho jahi rakṣo mahi cid vāvṛdhānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6249: RV_4,003.15a ebhir bhava sumanā agne arkair imān spṛśa manmabhiḥ śūra vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6250: RV_4,003.15c uta brahmāṇy aṅgiro juṣasva saṃ te śastir devavātā jareta //
GV01rvh1-10u:6251: RV_4,003.16a etā viśvā viduṣe tubhyaṃ vedho nīthāny agne niṇyā vacāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6252: RV_4,003.16c nivacanā kavaye kāvyāny aśaṃsiṣam matibhir vipra ukthaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6253: RV_4,004.01a kṛṇuṣva pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīṃ yāhi rājevāmavāṃ ibhena /
GV01rvh1-10u:6254: RV_4,004.01c tṛṣvīm anu prasitiṃ drūṇāno 'stāsi vidhya rakṣasas tapiṣṭhaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6255: RV_4,004.02a tava bhramāsa āśuyā patanty anu spṛśa dhṛṣatā śośucānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6256: RV_4,004.02c tapūṃṣy agne juhvā pataṅgān asaṃdito vi sṛja viṣvag ulkāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6257: RV_4,004.03a prati spaśo vi sṛja tūrṇitamo bhavā pāyur viśo asyā adabdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6258: RV_4,004.03c yo no dūre aghaśaṃso yo anty agne mākiṣ ṭe vyathir ā dadharṣīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6259: RV_4,004.04a ud agne tiṣṭha praty ā tanuṣva ny amitrāṃ oṣatāt tigmahete /
GV01rvh1-10u:6260: RV_4,004.04c yo no arātiṃ samidhāna cakre nīcā taṃ dhakṣy atasaṃ na śuṣkam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6261: RV_4,004.05a ūrdhvo bhava prati vidhyādhy asmad āviṣ kṛṇuṣva daivyāny agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:6262: RV_4,004.05c ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnāṃ jāmim ajāmim pra mṛṇīhi śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6263: RV_4,004.06a sa te jānāti sumatiṃ yaviṣṭha ya īvate brahmaṇe gātum airat /
GV01rvh1-10u:6264: RV_4,004.06c viśvāny asmai sudināni rāyo dyumnāny aryo vi duro abhi dyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:6265: RV_4,004.07a sed agne astu subhagaḥ sudānur yas tvā nityena haviṣā ya ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6266: RV_4,004.07c piprīṣati sva āyuṣi duroṇe viśved asmai sudinā sāsad iṣṭiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6267: RV_4,004.08a arcāmi te sumatiṃ ghoṣy arvāk saṃ te vāvātā jaratām iyaṃ gīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6268: RV_4,004.08c svaśvās tvā surathā marjayemāsme kṣatrāṇi dhārayer anu dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6269: RV_4,004.09a iha tvā bhūry ā cared upa tman doṣāvastar dīdivāṃsam anu dyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:6270: RV_4,004.09c krīḷantas tvā sumanasaḥ sapemābhi dyumnā tasthivāṃso janānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6271: RV_4,004.10a yas tvā svaśvaḥ suhiraṇyo agna upayāti vasumatā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:6272: RV_4,004.10c tasya trātā bhavasi tasya sakhā yas ta ātithyam ānuṣag jujoṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6273: RV_4,004.11a maho rujāmi bandhutā vacobhis tan mā pitur gotamād anv iyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6274: RV_4,004.11c tvaṃ no asya vacasaś cikiddhi hotar yaviṣṭha sukrato damūnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6275: RV_4,004.12a asvapnajas taraṇayaḥ suśevā atandrāso 'vṛkā aśramiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6276: RV_4,004.12c te pāyavaḥ sadhryañco niṣadyāgne tava naḥ pāntv amūra //
GV01rvh1-10u:6277: RV_4,004.13a ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritād arakṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6278: RV_4,004.13c rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6279: RV_4,004.14a tvayā vayaṃ sadhanyas tvotās tava praṇīty aśyāma vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6280: RV_4,004.14c ubhā śaṃsā sūdaya satyatāte 'nuṣṭhuyā kṛṇuhy ahrayāṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:6281: RV_4,004.15a ayā te agne samidhā vidhema prati stomaṃ śasyamānaṃ gṛbhāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6282: RV_4,004.15c dahāśaso rakṣasaḥ pāhy asmān druho nido mitramaho avadyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6283: RV_4,005.01a vaiśvānarāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ kathā dāśemāgnaye bṛhad bhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6284: RV_4,005.01c anūnena bṛhatā vakṣathenopa stabhāyad upamin na rodhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6285: RV_4,005.02a mā nindata ya imām mahyaṃ rātiṃ devo dadau martyāya svadhāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6286: RV_4,005.02c pākāya gṛtso amṛto vicetā vaiśvānaro nṛtamo yahvo agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6287: RV_4,005.03a sāma dvibarhā mahi tigmabhṛṣṭiḥ sahasraretā vṛṣabhas tuviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6288: RV_4,005.03c padaṃ na gor apagūḷhaṃ vividvān agnir mahyam pred u vocan manīṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6289: RV_4,005.04a pra tāṃ agnir babhasat tigmajambhas tapiṣṭhena śociṣā yaḥ surādhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6290: RV_4,005.04c pra ye minanti varuṇasya dhāma priyā mitrasya cetato dhruvāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6291: RV_4,005.05a abhrātaro na yoṣaṇo vyantaḥ patiripo na janayo durevāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6292: RV_4,005.05c pāpāsaḥ santo anṛtā asatyā idam padam ajanatā gabhīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6293: RV_4,005.06a idam me agne kiyate pāvakāminate gurum bhāraṃ na manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:6294: RV_4,005.06c bṛhad dadhātha dhṛṣatā gabhīraṃ yahvam pṛṣṭham prayasā saptadhātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:6295: RV_4,005.07a tam in nv eva samanā samānam abhi kratvā punatī dhītir aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6296: RV_4,005.07c sasasya carmann adhi cāru pṛśner agre rupa ārupitaṃ jabāru //
GV01rvh1-10u:6297: RV_4,005.08a pravācyaṃ vacasaḥ kim me asya guhā hitam upa niṇig vadanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6298: RV_4,005.08c yad usriyāṇām apa vār iva vran pāti priyaṃ rupo agram padaṃ veḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6299: RV_4,005.09a idam u tyan mahi mahām anīkaṃ yad usriyā sacata pūrvyaṃ gauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6300: RV_4,005.09c ṛtasya pade adhi dīdyānaṃ guhā raghuṣyad raghuyad viveda //
GV01rvh1-10u:6301: RV_4,005.10a adha dyutānaḥ pitroḥ sacāsāmanuta guhyaṃ cāru pṛśneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6302: RV_4,005.10c mātuṣ pade parame anti ṣad gor vṛṣṇaḥ śociṣaḥ prayatasya jihvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6303: RV_4,005.11a ṛtaṃ voce namasā pṛcchyamānas tavāśasā jātavedo yadīdam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6304: RV_4,005.11c tvam asya kṣayasi yad dha viśvaṃ divi yad u draviṇaṃ yat pṛthivyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6305: RV_4,005.12a kiṃ no asya draviṇaṃ kad dha ratnaṃ vi no voco jātavedaś cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6306: RV_4,005.12c guhādhvanaḥ paramaṃ yan no asya reku padaṃ na nidānā aganma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6307: RV_4,005.13a kā maryādā vayunā kad dha vāmam acchā gamema raghavo na vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6308: RV_4,005.13c kadā no devīr amṛtasya patnīḥ sūro varṇena tatanann uṣāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6309: RV_4,005.14a anireṇa vacasā phalgvena pratītyena kṛdhunātṛpāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6310: RV_4,005.14c adhā te agne kim ihā vadanty anāyudhāsa āsatā sacantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6311: RV_4,005.15a asya śriye samidhānasya vṛṣṇo vasor anīkaṃ dama ā ruroca /
GV01rvh1-10u:6312: RV_4,005.15c ruśad vasānaḥ sudṛśīkarūpaḥ kṣitir na rāyā puruvāro adyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:6313: RV_4,006.01a ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇo adhvarasya hotar agne tiṣṭha devatātā yajīyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6314: RV_4,006.01c tvaṃ hi viśvam abhy asi manma pra vedhasaś cit tirasi manīṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6315: RV_4,006.02a amūro hotā ny asādi vikṣv agnir mandro vidatheṣu pracetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6316: RV_4,006.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitevāśren meteva dhūmaṃ stabhāyad upa dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6317: RV_4,006.03a yatā sujūrṇī rātinī ghṛtācī pradakṣiṇid devatātim urāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6318: RV_4,006.03c ud u svarur navajā nākraḥ paśvo anakti sudhitaḥ sumekaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6319: RV_4,006.04a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnā ūrdhvo adhvaryur jujuṣāṇo asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6320: RV_4,006.04c pary agniḥ paśupā na hotā triviṣṭy eti pradiva urāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6321: RV_4,006.05a pari tmanā mitadrur eti hotāgnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6322: RV_4,006.05c dravanty asya vājino na śokā bhayante viśvā bhuvanā yad abhrāṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6323: RV_4,006.06a bhadrā te agne svanīka saṃdṛg ghorasya sato viṣuṇasya cāruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6324: RV_4,006.06c na yat te śocis tamasā varanta na dhvasmānas tanvī repa ā dhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6325: RV_4,006.07a na yasya sātur janitor avāri na mātarāpitarā nū cid iṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6326: RV_4,006.07c adhā mitro na sudhitaḥ pāvako 'gnir dīdāya mānuṣīṣu vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:6327: RV_4,006.08a dvir yam pañca jījanan saṃvasānāḥ svasāro agnim mānuṣīṣu vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6328: RV_4,006.08c uṣarbudham atharyo na dantaṃ śukraṃ svāsam paraśuṃ na tigmam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6329: RV_4,006.09a tava tye agne harito ghṛtasnā rohitāsa ṛjvañcaḥ svañcaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6330: RV_4,006.09c aruṣāso vṛṣaṇa ṛjumuṣkā ā devatātim ahvanta dasmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6331: RV_4,006.10a ye ha tye te sahamānā ayāsas tveṣāso agne arcayaś caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6332: RV_4,006.10c śyenāso na duvasanāso arthaṃ tuviṣvaṇaso mārutaṃ na śardhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6333: RV_4,006.11a akāri brahma samidhāna tubhyaṃ śaṃsāty ukthaṃ yajate vy ū dhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6334: RV_4,006.11c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur namasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6335: RV_4,007.01a ayam iha prathamo dhāyi dhātṛbhir hotā yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6336: RV_4,007.01c yam apnavāno bhṛgavo virurucur vaneṣu citraṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6337: RV_4,007.02a agne kadā ta ānuṣag bhuvad devasya cetanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6338: RV_4,007.02c adhā hi tvā jagṛbhrire martāso vikṣv īḍyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6339: RV_4,007.03a ṛtāvānaṃ vicetasam paśyanto dyām iva stṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6341: RV_4,007.04a āśuṃ dūtaṃ vivasvato viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6342: RV_4,007.04c ā jabhruḥ ketum āyavo bhṛgavāṇaṃ viśe-viśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6343: RV_4,007.05a tam īṃ hotāram ānuṣak cikitvāṃsaṃ ni ṣedire /
GV01rvh1-10u:6344: RV_4,007.05c raṇvam pāvakaśociṣaṃ yajiṣṭhaṃ sapta dhāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6345: RV_4,007.06a taṃ śaśvatīṣu mātṛṣu vana ā vītam aśritam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6346: RV_4,007.06c citraṃ santaṃ guhā hitaṃ suvedaṃ kūcidarthinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6347: RV_4,007.07a sasasya yad viyutā sasminn ūdhann ṛtasya dhāman raṇayanta devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6348: RV_4,007.07c mahāṃ agnir namasā rātahavyo ver adhvarāya sadam id ṛtāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6349: RV_4,007.08a ver adhvarasya dūtyāni vidvān ubhe antā rodasī saṃcikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6350: RV_4,007.08c dūta īyase pradiva urāṇo viduṣṭaro diva ārodhanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:6351: RV_4,007.09a kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśataḥ puro bhāś cariṣṇv arcir vapuṣām id ekam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6352: RV_4,007.09c yad apravītā dadhate ha garbhaṃ sadyaś cij jāto bhavasīd u dūtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6353: RV_4,007.10a sadyo jātasya dadṛśānam ojo yad asya vāto anuvāti śociḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6354: RV_4,007.10c vṛṇakti tigmām ataseṣu jihvāṃ sthirā cid annā dayate vi jambhaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6355: RV_4,007.11a tṛṣu yad annā tṛṣuṇā vavakṣa tṛṣuṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇute yahvo agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6356: RV_4,007.11c vātasya meḷiṃ sacate nijūrvann āśuṃ na vājayate hinve arvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6357: RV_4,008.01a dūtaṃ vo viśvavedasaṃ havyavāham amartyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6359: RV_4,008.02a sa hi vedā vasudhitim mahāṃ ārodhanaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6361: RV_4,008.03a sa veda deva ānamaṃ devāṃ ṛtāyate dame /
GV01rvh1-10u:6363: RV_4,008.04a sa hotā sed u dūtyaṃ cikitvāṃ antar īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6365: RV_4,008.05a te syāma ye agnaye dadāśur havyadātibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6367: RV_4,008.06a te rāyā te suvīryaiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:6369: RV_4,008.07a asme rāyo dive-dive saṃ carantu puruspṛhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6371: RV_4,008.08a sa vipraś carṣaṇīnāṃ śavasā mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6373: RV_4,009.01a agne mṛḷa mahāṃ asi ya īm ā devayuṃ janam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6375: RV_4,009.02a sa mānuṣīṣu dūḷabho vikṣu prāvīr amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6377: RV_4,009.03a sa sadma pari ṇīyate hotā mandro diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6379: RV_4,009.04a uta gnā agnir adhvara uto gṛhapatir dame /
GV01rvh1-10u:6381: RV_4,009.05a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām upavaktā janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6383: RV_4,009.06a veṣīd v asya dūtyaṃ yasya jujoṣo adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6385: RV_4,009.07a asmākaṃ joṣy adhvaram asmākaṃ yajñam aṅgiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6387: RV_4,009.08a pari te dūḷabho ratho 'smāṃ aśnotu viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6389: RV_4,010.01a agne tam adyāśvaṃ na stomaiḥ kratuṃ na bhadraṃ hṛdispṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6391: RV_4,010.02a adhā hy agne krator bhadrasya dakṣasya sādhoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6393: RV_4,010.03a ebhir no arkair bhavā no arvāṅ svar ṇa jyotiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6395: RV_4,010.04a ābhiṣ ṭe adya gīrbhir gṛṇanto 'gne dāśema /
GV01rvh1-10u:6396: RV_4,010.04c pra te divo na stanayanti śuṣmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6397: RV_4,010.05a tava svādiṣṭhāgne saṃdṛṣṭir idā cid ahna idā cid aktoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6398: RV_4,010.05c śriye rukmo na rocata upāke //
GV01rvh1-10u:6399: RV_4,010.06a ghṛtaṃ na pūtaṃ tanūr arepāḥ śuci hiraṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6400: RV_4,010.06c tat te rukmo na rocata svadhāvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6401: RV_4,010.07a kṛtaṃ cid dhi ṣmā sanemi dveṣo 'gna inoṣi martāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6403: RV_4,010.08a śivā naḥ sakhyā santu bhrātrāgne deveṣu yuṣme /
GV01rvh1-10u:6404: RV_4,010.08c sā no nābhiḥ sadane sasminn ūdhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6405: RV_4,011.01a bhadraṃ te agne sahasinn anīkam upāka ā rocate sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6406: RV_4,011.01c ruśad dṛśe dadṛśe naktayā cid arūkṣitaṃ dṛśa ā rūpe annam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6407: RV_4,011.02a vi ṣāhy agne gṛṇate manīṣāṃ khaṃ vepasā tuvijāta stavānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6408: RV_4,011.02c viśvebhir yad vāvanaḥ śukra devais tan no rāsva sumaho bhūri manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6409: RV_4,011.03a tvad agne kāvyā tvan manīṣās tvad ukthā jāyante rādhyāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:6410: RV_4,011.03c tvad eti draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā itthādhiye dāśuṣe martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6411: RV_4,011.04a tvad vājī vājambharo vihāyā abhiṣṭikṛj jāyate satyaśuṣmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6412: RV_4,011.04c tvad rayir devajūto mayobhus tvad āśur jūjuvāṃ agne arvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6413: RV_4,011.05a tvām agne prathamaṃ devayanto devam martā amṛta mandrajihvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6414: RV_4,011.05c dveṣoyutam ā vivāsanti dhībhir damūnasaṃ gṛhapatim amūram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6415: RV_4,011.06a āre asmad amatim āre aṃha āre viśvāṃ durmatiṃ yan nipāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6416: RV_4,011.06c doṣā śivaḥ sahasaḥ sūno agne yaṃ deva ā cit sacase svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6417: RV_4,012.01a yas tvām agna inadhate yatasruk tris te annaṃ kṛṇavat sasminn ahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6418: RV_4,012.01c sa su dyumnair abhy astu prasakṣat tava kratvā jātavedaś cikitvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6419: RV_4,012.02a idhmaṃ yas te jabharac chaśramāṇo maho agne anīkam ā saparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6420: RV_4,012.02c sa idhānaḥ prati doṣām uṣāsam puṣyan rayiṃ sacate ghnann amitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6421: RV_4,012.03a agnir īśe bṛhataḥ kṣatriyasyāgnir vājasya paramasya rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6422: RV_4,012.03c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate yaviṣṭho vy ānuṣaṅ martyāya svadhāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6423: RV_4,012.04a yac cid dhi te puruṣatrā yaviṣṭhācittibhiś cakṛmā kac cid āgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6424: RV_4,012.04c kṛdhī ṣv asmāṃ aditer anāgān vy enāṃsi śiśratho viṣvag agne //
GV01rvh1-10u:6425: RV_4,012.05a mahaś cid agna enaso abhīka ūrvād devānām uta martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6426: RV_4,012.05c mā te sakhāyaḥ sadam id riṣāma yacchā tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6427: RV_4,012.06a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6428: RV_4,012.06c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6429: RV_4,013.01a praty agnir uṣasām agram akhyad vibhātīnāṃ sumanā ratnadheyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6430: RV_4,013.01c yātam aśvinā sukṛto duroṇam ut sūryo jyotiṣā deva eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6431: RV_4,013.02a ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred drapsaṃ davidhvad gaviṣo na satvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6432: RV_4,013.02c anu vrataṃ varuṇo yanti mitro yat sūryaṃ divy ārohayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6433: RV_4,013.03a yaṃ sīm akṛṇvan tamase vipṛce dhruvakṣemā anavasyanto artham /
GV01rvh1-10u:6434: RV_4,013.03c taṃ sūryaṃ haritaḥ sapta yahvī spaśaṃ viśvasya jagato vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6435: RV_4,013.04a vahiṣṭhebhir viharan yāsi tantum avavyayann asitaṃ deva vasma /
GV01rvh1-10u:6436: RV_4,013.04c davidhvato raśmayaḥ sūryasya carmevāvādhus tamo apsv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6437: RV_4,013.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na /
GV01rvh1-10u:6438: RV_4,013.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6439: RV_4,014.01a praty agnir uṣaso jātavedā akhyad devo rocamānā mahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6440: RV_4,014.01c ā nāsatyorugāyā rathenemaṃ yajñam upa no yātam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:6441: RV_4,014.02a ūrdhvaṃ ketuṃ savitā devo aśrej jyotir viśvasmai bhuvanāya kṛṇvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6442: RV_4,014.02c āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ vi sūryo raśmibhiś cekitānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6443: RV_4,014.03a āvahanty aruṇīr jyotiṣāgān mahī citrā raśmibhiś cekitānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6444: RV_4,014.03c prabodhayantī suvitāya devy uṣā īyate suyujā rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:6445: RV_4,014.04a ā vāṃ vahiṣṭhā iha te vahantu rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6446: RV_4,014.04c ime hi vām madhupeyāya somā asmin yajñe vṛṣaṇā mādayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6447: RV_4,014.05a anāyato anibaddhaḥ kathāyaṃ nyaṅṅ uttāno 'va padyate na /
GV01rvh1-10u:6448: RV_4,014.05c kayā yāti svadhayā ko dadarśa diva skambhaḥ samṛtaḥ pāti nākam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6449: RV_4,015.01a agnir hotā no adhvare vājī san pari ṇīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6451: RV_4,015.02a pari triviṣṭy adhvaraṃ yāty agnī rathīr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:6453: RV_4,015.03a pari vājapatiḥ kavir agnir havyāny akramīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6455: RV_4,015.04a ayaṃ yaḥ sṛñjaye puro daivavāte samidhyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6457: RV_4,015.05a asya ghā vīra īvato 'gner īśīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6459: RV_4,015.06a tam arvantaṃ na sānasim aruṣaṃ na divaḥ śiśum /
GV01rvh1-10u:6461: RV_4,015.07a bodhad yan mā haribhyāṃ kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6462: RV_4,015.07c acchā na hūta ud aram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6463: RV_4,015.08a uta tyā yajatā harī kumārāt sāhadevyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6465: RV_4,015.09a eṣa vāṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraḥ sāhadevyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6467: RV_4,015.10a taṃ yuvaṃ devāv aśvinā kumāraṃ sāhadevyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6469: RV_4,016.01a ā satyo yātu maghavāṃ ṛjīṣī dravantv asya haraya upa naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6470: RV_4,016.01c tasmā id andhaḥ suṣumā sudakṣam ihābhipitvaṃ karate gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6471: RV_4,016.02a ava sya śūrādhvano nānte 'smin no adya savane mandadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:6472: RV_4,016.02c śaṃsāty uktham uśaneva vedhāś cikituṣe asuryāya manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6473: RV_4,016.03a kavir na niṇyaṃ vidathāni sādhan vṛṣā yat sekaṃ vipipāno arcāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6474: RV_4,016.03c diva itthā jījanat sapta kārūn ahnā cic cakrur vayunā gṛṇantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6475: RV_4,016.04a svar yad vedi sudṛśīkam arkair mahi jyotī rurucur yad dha vastoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6476: RV_4,016.04c andhā tamāṃsi dudhitā vicakṣe nṛbhyaś cakāra nṛtamo abhiṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:6477: RV_4,016.05a vavakṣa indro amitam ṛjīṣy ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6478: RV_4,016.05c ataś cid asya mahimā vi recy abhi yo viśvā bhuvanā babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:6479: RV_4,016.06a viśvāni śakro naryāṇi vidvān apo rireca sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6480: RV_4,016.06c aśmānaṃ cid ye bibhidur vacobhir vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6481: RV_4,016.07a apo vṛtraṃ vavrivāṃsam parāhan prāvat te vajram pṛthivī sacetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6482: RV_4,016.07c prārṇāṃsi samudriyāṇy ainoḥ patir bhavañ chavasā śūra dhṛṣṇo //
GV01rvh1-10u:6483: RV_4,016.08a apo yad adrim puruhūta dardar āvir bhuvat saramā pūrvyaṃ te /
GV01rvh1-10u:6484: RV_4,016.08c sa no netā vājam ā darṣi bhūriṃ gotrā rujann aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6485: RV_4,016.09a acchā kaviṃ nṛmaṇo gā abhiṣṭau svarṣātā maghavan nādhamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6486: RV_4,016.09c ūtibhis tam iṣaṇo dyumnahūtau ni māyāvān abrahmā dasyur arta //
GV01rvh1-10u:6487: RV_4,016.10a ā dasyughnā manasā yāhy astam bhuvat te kutsaḥ sakhye nikāmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6488: RV_4,016.10c sve yonau ni ṣadataṃ sarūpā vi vāṃ cikitsad ṛtacid dha nārī //
GV01rvh1-10u:6489: RV_4,016.11a yāsi kutsena saratham avasyus todo vātasya haryor īśānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6490: RV_4,016.11c ṛjrā vājaṃ na gadhyaṃ yuyūṣan kavir yad ahan pāryāya bhūṣāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6491: RV_4,016.12a kutsāya śuṣṇam aśuṣaṃ ni barhīḥ prapitve ahnaḥ kuyavaṃ sahasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6492: RV_4,016.12c sadyo dasyūn pra mṛṇa kutsyena pra sūraś cakraṃ vṛhatād abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:6493: RV_4,016.13a tvam piprum mṛgayaṃ śūśuvāṃsam ṛjiśvane vaidathināya randhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6494: RV_4,016.13c pañcāśat kṛṣṇā ni vapaḥ sahasrātkaṃ na puro jarimā vi dardaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6495: RV_4,016.14a sūra upāke tanvaṃ dadhāno vi yat te cety amṛtasya varpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6496: RV_4,016.14c mṛgo na hastī taviṣīm uṣāṇaḥ siṃho na bhīma āyudhāni bibhrat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6497: RV_4,016.15a indraṃ kāmā vasūyanto agman svarmīḷhe na savane cakānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6498: RV_4,016.15c śravasyavaḥ śaśamānāsa ukthair oko na raṇvā sudṛśīva puṣṭiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6499: RV_4,016.16a tam id va indraṃ suhavaṃ huvema yas tā cakāra naryā purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6500: RV_4,016.16c yo māvate jaritre gadhyaṃ cin makṣū vājam bharati spārharādhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6501: RV_4,016.17a tigmā yad antar aśaniḥ patāti kasmiñ cic chūra muhuke janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6502: RV_4,016.17c ghorā yad arya samṛtir bhavāty adha smā nas tanvo bodhi gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6503: RV_4,016.18a bhuvo 'vitā vāmadevasya dhīnām bhuvaḥ sakhāvṛko vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6504: RV_4,016.18c tvām anu pramatim ā jaganmoruśaṃso jaritre viśvadha syāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6505: RV_4,016.19a ebhir nṛbhir indra tvāyubhiṣ ṭvā maghavadbhir maghavan viśva ājau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6506: RV_4,016.19c dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santo aryaḥ kṣapo madema śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6507: RV_4,016.20a eved indrāya vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe brahmākarma bhṛgavo na ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:6508: RV_4,016.20c nū cid yathā naḥ sakhyā viyoṣad asan na ugro 'vitā tanūpāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6509: RV_4,016.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6510: RV_4,016.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6511: RV_4,017.01a tvam mahāṃ indra tubhyaṃ ha kṣā anu kṣatram maṃhanā manyata dyauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6512: RV_4,017.01c tvaṃ vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghanvān sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6513: RV_4,017.02a tava tviṣo janiman rejata dyau rejad bhūmir bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6514: RV_4,017.02c ṛghāyanta subhvaḥ parvatāsa ārdan dhanvāni sarayanta āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6515: RV_4,017.03a bhinad giriṃ śavasā vajram iṣṇann āviṣkṛṇvānaḥ sahasāna ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6516: RV_4,017.03c vadhīd vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ sarann āpo javasā hatavṛṣṇīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6517: RV_4,017.04a suvīras te janitā manyata dyaur indrasya kartā svapastamo bhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6518: RV_4,017.04c ya īṃ jajāna svaryaṃ suvajram anapacyutaṃ sadaso na bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6519: RV_4,017.05a ya eka ic cyāvayati pra bhūmā rājā kṛṣṭīnām puruhūta indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6520: RV_4,017.05c satyam enam anu viśve madanti rātiṃ devasya gṛṇato maghonaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6521: RV_4,017.06a satrā somā abhavann asya viśve satrā madāso bṛhato madiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6522: RV_4,017.06c satrābhavo vasupatir vasūnāṃ datre viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6523: RV_4,017.07a tvam adha prathamaṃ jāyamāno 'me viśvā adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6524: RV_4,017.07c tvam prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa maghavan vi vṛścaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6525: RV_4,017.08a satrāhaṇaṃ dādhṛṣiṃ tumram indram mahām apāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suvajram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6526: RV_4,017.08c hantā yo vṛtraṃ sanitota vājaṃ dātā maghāni maghavā surādhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6527: RV_4,017.09a ayaṃ vṛtaś cātayate samīcīr ya ājiṣu maghavā śṛṇva ekaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6528: RV_4,017.09c ayaṃ vājam bharati yaṃ sanoty asya priyāsaḥ sakhye syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6529: RV_4,017.10a ayaṃ śṛṇve adha jayann uta ghnann ayam uta pra kṛṇute yudhā gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6530: RV_4,017.10c yadā satyaṃ kṛṇute manyum indro viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayata ejad asmāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6531: RV_4,017.11a sam indro gā ajayat saṃ hiraṇyā sam aśviyā maghavā yo ha pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6532: RV_4,017.11c ebhir nṛbhir nṛtamo asya śākai rāyo vibhaktā sambharaś ca vasvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6533: RV_4,017.12a kiyat svid indro adhy eti mātuḥ kiyat pitur janitur yo jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:6534: RV_4,017.12c yo asya śuṣmam muhukair iyarti vāto na jūta stanayadbhir abhraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6535: RV_4,017.13a kṣiyantaṃ tvam akṣiyantaṃ kṛṇotīyarti reṇum maghavā samoham /
GV01rvh1-10u:6536: RV_4,017.13c vibhañjanur aśanimāṃ iva dyaur uta stotāram maghavā vasau dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6537: RV_4,017.14a ayaṃ cakram iṣaṇat sūryasya ny etaśaṃ rīramat sasṛmāṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6538: RV_4,017.14b ā kṛṣṇa īṃ juhurāṇo jigharti tvaco budhne rajaso asya yonau //
GV01rvh1-10u:6540: RV_4,017.16a gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6541: RV_4,017.16c janīyanto janidām akṣitotim ā cyāvayāmo 'vate na kośam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6542: RV_4,017.17a trātā no bodhi dadṛśāna āpir abhikhyātā marḍitā somyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6543: RV_4,017.17c sakhā pitā pitṛtamaḥ pitṝṇāṃ kartem u lokam uśate vayodhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6544: RV_4,017.18a sakhīyatām avitā bodhi sakhā gṛṇāna indra stuvate vayo dhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6545: RV_4,017.18c vayaṃ hy ā te cakṛmā sabādha ābhiḥ śamībhir mahayanta indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:6546: RV_4,017.19a stuta indro maghavā yad dha vṛtrā bhūrīṇy eko apratīni hanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6547: RV_4,017.19c asya priyo jaritā yasya śarman nakir devā vārayante na martāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6548: RV_4,017.20a evā na indro maghavā virapśī karat satyā carṣaṇīdhṛd anarvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6549: RV_4,017.20c tvaṃ rājā januṣāṃ dhehy asme adhi śravo māhinaṃ yaj jaritre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6550: RV_4,017.21a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6551: RV_4,017.21c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6552: RV_4,018.01a ayam panthā anuvittaḥ purāṇo yato devā udajāyanta viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:6553: RV_4,018.01c ataś cid ā janiṣīṣṭa pravṛddho mā mātaram amuyā pattave kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6554: RV_4,018.02a nāham ato nir ayā durgahaitat tiraścatā pārśvān nir gamāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6555: RV_4,018.02c bahūni me akṛtā kartvāni yudhyai tvena saṃ tvena pṛcchai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6556: RV_4,018.03a parāyatīm mātaram anv acaṣṭa na nānu gāny anu nū gamāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:6557: RV_4,018.03c tvaṣṭur gṛhe apibat somam indraḥ śatadhanyaṃ camvoḥ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6558: RV_4,018.04a kiṃ sa ṛdhak kṛṇavad yaṃ sahasram māso jabhāra śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6559: RV_4,018.04c nahī nv asya pratimānam asty antar jāteṣūta ye janitvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6560: RV_4,018.05a avadyam iva manyamānā guhākar indram mātā vīryeṇā nyṛṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6561: RV_4,018.05c athod asthāt svayam atkaṃ vasāna ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6562: RV_4,018.06a etā arṣanty alalābhavantīr ṛtāvarīr iva saṃkrośamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6563: RV_4,018.06c etā vi pṛccha kim idam bhananti kam āpo adrim paridhiṃ rujanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6564: RV_4,018.07a kim u ṣvid asmai nivido bhanantendrasyāvadyaṃ didhiṣanta āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6565: RV_4,018.07c mamaitān putro mahatā vadhena vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi sindhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6566: RV_4,018.08a mamac cana tvā yuvatiḥ parāsa mamac cana tvā kuṣavā jagāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:6567: RV_4,018.08c mamac cid āpaḥ śiśave mamṛḍyur mamac cid indraḥ sahasod atiṣṭhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6568: RV_4,018.09a mamac cana te maghavan vyaṃso nivividhvāṃ apa hanū jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:6569: RV_4,018.09c adhā nividdha uttaro babhūvāñ chiro dāsasya sam piṇag vadhena //
GV01rvh1-10u:6570: RV_4,018.10a gṛṣṭiḥ sasūva sthaviraṃ tavāgām anādhṛṣyaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tumram indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6571: RV_4,018.10c arīḷhaṃ vatsaṃ carathāya mātā svayaṃ gātuṃ tanva icchamānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6572: RV_4,018.11a uta mātā mahiṣam anv avenad amī tvā jahati putra devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6573: RV_4,018.11c athābravīd vṛtram indro haniṣyan sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:6574: RV_4,018.12a kas te mātaraṃ vidhavām acakrac chayuṃ kas tvām ajighāṃsac carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6575: RV_4,018.12c kas te devo adhi mārḍīka āsīd yat prākṣiṇāḥ pitaram pādagṛhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6576: RV_4,018.13a avartyā śuna āntrāṇi pece na deveṣu vivide marḍitāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6577: RV_4,018.13c apaśyaṃ jāyām amahīyamānām adhā me śyeno madhv ā jabhāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:6578: RV_4,019.01a evā tvām indra vajrinn atra viśve devāsaḥ suhavāsa ūmāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6579: RV_4,019.01c mahām ubhe rodasī vṛddham ṛṣvaṃ nir ekam id vṛṇate vṛtrahatye //
GV01rvh1-10u:6580: RV_4,019.02a avāsṛjanta jivrayo na devā bhuvaḥ samrāḷ indra satyayoniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6581: RV_4,019.02c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇaḥ pra vartanīr arado viśvadhenāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6582: RV_4,019.03a atṛpṇuvantaṃ viyatam abudhyam abudhyamānaṃ suṣupāṇam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:6583: RV_4,019.03c sapta prati pravata āśayānam ahiṃ vajreṇa vi riṇā aparvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6584: RV_4,019.04a akṣodayac chavasā kṣāma budhnaṃ vār ṇa vātas taviṣībhir indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6585: RV_4,019.04c dṛḷhāny aubhnād uśamāna ojo 'vābhinat kakubhaḥ parvatānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6586: RV_4,019.05a abhi pra dadrur janayo na garbhaṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sākam adrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6587: RV_4,019.05c atarpayo visṛta ubja ūrmīn tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6588: RV_4,019.06a tvam mahīm avaniṃ viśvadhenāṃ turvītaye vayyāya kṣarantīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:6589: RV_4,019.06c aramayo namasaijad arṇaḥ sutaraṇāṃ akṛṇor indra sindhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6590: RV_4,019.07a prāgruvo nabhanvo na vakvā dhvasrā apinvad yuvatīr ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6591: RV_4,019.07c dhanvāny ajrāṃ apṛṇak tṛṣāṇāṃ adhog indra staryo daṃsupatnīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6592: RV_4,019.08a pūrvīr uṣasaḥ śaradaś ca gūrtā vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ asṛjad vi sindhūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:6593: RV_4,019.08c pariṣṭhitā atṛṇad badbadhānāḥ sīrā indraḥ sravitave pṛthivyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6594: RV_4,019.09a vamrībhiḥ putram agruvo adānaṃ niveśanād dhariva ā jabhartha /
GV01rvh1-10u:6595: RV_4,019.09c vy andho akhyad ahim ādadāno nir bhūd ukhacchit sam aranta parva //
GV01rvh1-10u:6596: RV_4,019.10a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni viprāvidvāṃ āha viduṣe karāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6597: RV_4,019.10c yathā-yathā vṛṣṇyāni svagūrtāpāṃsi rājan naryāviveṣīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6598: RV_4,019.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6599: RV_4,019.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6600: RV_4,020.01a ā na indro dūrād ā na āsād abhiṣṭikṛd avase yāsad ugraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6601: RV_4,020.01c ojiṣṭhebhir nṛpatir vajrabāhuḥ saṃge samatsu turvaṇiḥ pṛtanyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:6602: RV_4,020.02a ā na indro haribhir yātv acchārvācīno 'vase rādhase ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:6603: RV_4,020.02c tiṣṭhāti vajrī maghavā virapśīmaṃ yajñam anu no vājasātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:6604: RV_4,020.03a imaṃ yajñaṃ tvam asmākam indra puro dadhat saniṣyasi kratuṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6605: RV_4,020.03c śvaghnīva vajrin sanaye dhanānāṃ tvayā vayam arya ājiṃ jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:6606: RV_4,020.04a uśann u ṣu ṇaḥ sumanā upāke somasya nu suṣutasya svadhāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6607: RV_4,020.04c pā indra pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ sam andhasā mamadaḥ pṛṣṭhyena //
GV01rvh1-10u:6608: RV_4,020.05a vi yo rarapśa ṛṣibhir navebhir vṛkṣo na pakvaḥ sṛṇyo na jetā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6609: RV_4,020.05c maryo na yoṣām abhi manyamāno 'cchā vivakmi puruhūtam indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6610: RV_4,020.06a girir na yaḥ svatavāṃ ṛṣva indraḥ sanād eva sahase jāta ugraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6611: RV_4,020.06c ādartā vajraṃ sthaviraṃ na bhīma udneva kośaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6612: RV_4,020.07a na yasya vartā januṣā nv asti na rādhasa āmarītā maghasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6613: RV_4,020.07c udvāvṛṣāṇas taviṣīva ugrāsmabhyaṃ daddhi puruhūta rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6614: RV_4,020.08a īkṣe rāyaḥ kṣayasya carṣaṇīnām uta vrajam apavartāsi gonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6615: RV_4,020.08c śikṣānaraḥ samitheṣu prahāvān vasvo rāśim abhinetāsi bhūrim //
GV01rvh1-10u:6616: RV_4,020.09a kayā tac chṛṇve śacyā śaciṣṭho yayā kṛṇoti muhu kā cid ṛṣvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6617: RV_4,020.09c puru dāśuṣe vicayiṣṭho aṃho 'thā dadhāti draviṇaṃ jaritre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6618: RV_4,020.10a mā no mardhīr ā bharā daddhi tan naḥ pra dāśuṣe dātave bhūri yat te /
GV01rvh1-10u:6619: RV_4,020.10c navye deṣṇe śaste asmin ta ukthe pra bravāma vayam indra stuvantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6620: RV_4,020.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6621: RV_4,020.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6622: RV_4,021.01a ā yātv indro 'vasa upa na iha stutaḥ sadhamād astu śūraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6623: RV_4,021.01c vāvṛdhānas taviṣīr yasya pūrvīr dyaur na kṣatram abhibhūti puṣyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6624: RV_4,021.02a tasyed iha stavatha vṛṣṇyāni tuvidyumnasya tuvirādhaso nṝn /
GV01rvh1-10u:6625: RV_4,021.02c yasya kratur vidathyo na samrāṭ sāhvān tarutro abhy asti kṛṣṭīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6626: RV_4,021.03a ā yātv indro diva ā pṛthivyā makṣū samudrād uta vā purīṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6627: RV_4,021.03c svarṇarād avase no marutvān parāvato vā sadanād ṛtasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6628: RV_4,021.04a sthūrasya rāyo bṛhato ya īśe tam u ṣṭavāma vidatheṣv indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6629: RV_4,021.04c yo vāyunā jayati gomatīṣu pra dhṛṣṇuyā nayati vasyo accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:6630: RV_4,021.05a upa yo namo namasi stabhāyann iyarti vācaṃ janayan yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:6631: RV_4,021.05c ṛñjasānaḥ puruvāra ukthair endraṃ kṛṇvīta sadaneṣu hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6632: RV_4,021.06a dhiṣā yadi dhiṣaṇyantaḥ saraṇyān sadanto adrim auśijasya gohe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6633: RV_4,021.06c ā duroṣāḥ pāstyasya hotā yo no mahān saṃvaraṇeṣu vahniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6634: RV_4,021.07a satrā yad īm bhārvarasya vṛṣṇaḥ siṣakti śuṣma stuvate bharāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6635: RV_4,021.07c guhā yad īm auśijasya gohe pra yad dhiye prāyase madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6636: RV_4,021.08a vi yad varāṃsi parvatasya vṛṇve payobhir jinve apāṃ javāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6637: RV_4,021.08c vidad gaurasya gavayasya gohe yadī vājāya sudhyo vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6638: RV_4,021.09a bhadrā te hastā sukṛtota pāṇī prayantārā stuvate rādha indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:6639: RV_4,021.09c kā te niṣattiḥ kim u no mamatsi kiṃ nod-ud u harṣase dātavā u //
GV01rvh1-10u:6640: RV_4,021.10a evā vasva indraḥ satyaḥ samrāḍ ḍhantā vṛtraṃ varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6641: RV_4,021.10c puruṣṭuta kratvā naḥ śagdhi rāyo bhakṣīya te 'vaso daivyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6642: RV_4,021.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6643: RV_4,021.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6644: RV_4,022.01a yan na indro jujuṣe yac ca vaṣṭi tan no mahān karati śuṣmy ā cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:6645: RV_4,022.01c brahma stomam maghavā somam ukthā yo aśmānaṃ śavasā bibhrad eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6646: RV_4,022.02a vṛṣā vṛṣandhiṃ caturaśrim asyann ugro bāhubhyāṃ nṛtamaḥ śacīvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6647: RV_4,022.02c śriye paruṣṇīm uṣamāṇa ūrṇāṃ yasyāḥ parvāṇi sakhyāya vivye //
GV01rvh1-10u:6648: RV_4,022.03a yo devo devatamo jāyamāno maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6649: RV_4,022.03c dadhāno vajram bāhvor uśantaṃ dyām amena rejayat pra bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:6650: RV_4,022.04a viśvā rodhāṃsi pravataś ca pūrvīr dyaur ṛṣvāj janiman rejata kṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6651: RV_4,022.04c ā mātarā bharati śuṣmy ā gor nṛvat parijman nonuvanta vātāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6652: RV_4,022.05a tā tū ta indra mahato mahāni viśveṣv it savaneṣu pravācyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6653: RV_4,022.05c yac chūra dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā dadhṛṣvān ahiṃ vajreṇa śavasāviveṣīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6654: RV_4,022.06a tā tū te satyā tuvinṛmṇa viśvā pra dhenavaḥ sisrate vṛṣṇa ūdhnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6655: RV_4,022.06c adhā ha tvad vṛṣamaṇo bhiyānāḥ pra sindhavo javasā cakramanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:6656: RV_4,022.07a atrāha te harivas tā u devīr avobhir indra stavanta svasāraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6657: RV_4,022.07c yat sīm anu pra muco badbadhānā dīrghām anu prasitiṃ syandayadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6658: RV_4,022.08a pipīḷe aṃśur madyo na sindhur ā tvā śamī śaśamānasya śaktiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6659: RV_4,022.08c asmadryak chuśucānasya yamyā āśur na raśmiṃ tuvyojasaṃ goḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6660: RV_4,022.09a asme varṣiṣṭhā kṛṇuhi jyeṣṭhā nṛmṇāni satrā sahure sahāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6661: RV_4,022.09c asmabhyaṃ vṛtrā suhanāni randhi jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6662: RV_4,022.10a asmākam it su śṛṇuhi tvam indrāsmabhyaṃ citrāṃ upa māhi vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:6663: RV_4,022.10c asmabhyaṃ viśvā iṣaṇaḥ purandhīr asmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6664: RV_4,022.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6665: RV_4,022.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6666: RV_4,023.01a kathā mahām avṛdhat kasya hotur yajñaṃ juṣāṇo abhi somam ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6667: RV_4,023.01c pibann uśāno juṣamāṇo andho vavakṣa ṛṣvaḥ śucate dhanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6668: RV_4,023.02a ko asya vīraḥ sadhamādam āpa sam ānaṃśa sumatibhiḥ ko asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6669: RV_4,023.02c kad asya citraṃ cikite kad ūtī vṛdhe bhuvac chaśamānasya yajyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6670: RV_4,023.03a kathā śṛṇoti hūyamānam indraḥ kathā śṛṇvann avasām asya veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:6671: RV_4,023.03c kā asya pūrvīr upamātayo ha kathainam āhuḥ papuriṃ jaritre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6672: RV_4,023.04a kathā sabādhaḥ śaśamāno asya naśad abhi draviṇaṃ dīdhyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6673: RV_4,023.04c devo bhuvan navedā ma ṛtānāṃ namo jagṛbhvāṃ abhi yaj jujoṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6674: RV_4,023.05a kathā kad asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau devo martasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:6675: RV_4,023.05c kathā kad asya sakhyaṃ sakhibhyo ye asmin kāmaṃ suyujaṃ tatasre //
GV01rvh1-10u:6676: RV_4,023.06a kim ād amatraṃ sakhyaṃ sakhibhyaḥ kadā nu te bhrātram pra bravāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:6677: RV_4,023.06c śriye sudṛśo vapur asya sargāḥ svar ṇa citratamam iṣa ā goḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6678: RV_4,023.07a druhaṃ jighāṃsan dhvarasam anindrāṃ tetikte tigmā tujase anīkā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6679: RV_4,023.07c ṛṇā cid yatra ṛṇayā na ugro dūre ajñātā uṣaso babādhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6680: RV_4,023.08a ṛtasya hi śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīr ṛtasya dhītir vṛjināni hanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6681: RV_4,023.08c ṛtasya śloko badhirā tatarda karṇā budhānaḥ śucamāna āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6682: RV_4,023.09a ṛtasya dṛḷhā dharuṇāni santi purūṇi candrā vapuṣe vapūṃṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6683: RV_4,023.09c ṛtena dīrgham iṣaṇanta pṛkṣa ṛtena gāva ṛtam ā viveśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6684: RV_4,023.10a ṛtaṃ yemāna ṛtam id vanoty ṛtasya śuṣmas turayā u gavyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6685: RV_4,023.10c ṛtāya pṛthvī bahule gabhīre ṛtāya dhenū parame duhāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:6686: RV_4,023.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6687: RV_4,023.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6688: RV_4,024.01a kā suṣṭutiḥ śavasaḥ sūnum indram arvācīnaṃ rādhasa ā vavartat /
GV01rvh1-10u:6689: RV_4,024.01c dadir hi vīro gṛṇate vasūni sa gopatir niṣṣidhāṃ no janāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6690: RV_4,024.02a sa vṛtrahatye havyaḥ sa īḍyaḥ sa suṣṭuta indraḥ satyarādhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6691: RV_4,024.02c sa yāmann ā maghavā martyāya brahmaṇyate suṣvaye varivo dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6692: RV_4,024.03a tam in naro vi hvayante samīke ririkvāṃsas tanvaḥ kṛṇvata trām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6693: RV_4,024.03c mitho yat tyāgam ubhayāso agman naras tokasya tanayasya sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:6694: RV_4,024.04a kratūyanti kṣitayo yoga ugrāśuṣāṇāso mitho arṇasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:6695: RV_4,024.04c saṃ yad viśo 'vavṛtranta yudhmā ād in nema indrayante abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:6696: RV_4,024.05a ād id dha nema indriyaṃ yajanta ād it paktiḥ puroḷāśaṃ riricyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6697: RV_4,024.05c ād it somo vi papṛcyād asuṣvīn ād ij jujoṣa vṛṣabhaṃ yajadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6698: RV_4,024.06a kṛṇoty asmai varivo ya itthendrāya somam uśate sunoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:6699: RV_4,024.06c sadhrīcīnena manasāvivenan tam it sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute samatsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:6700: RV_4,024.07a ya indrāya sunavat somam adya pacāt paktīr uta bhṛjjāti dhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6701: RV_4,024.07c prati manāyor ucathāni haryan tasmin dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6702: RV_4,024.08a yadā samaryaṃ vy aced ṛghāvā dīrghaṃ yad ājim abhy akhyad aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6703: RV_4,024.08c acikradad vṛṣaṇam patny acchā duroṇa ā niśitaṃ somasudbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6704: RV_4,024.09a bhūyasā vasnam acarat kanīyo 'vikrīto akāniṣam punar yan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6705: RV_4,024.09c sa bhūyasā kanīyo nārirecīd dīnā dakṣā vi duhanti pra vāṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6706: RV_4,024.10a ka imaṃ daśabhir mamendraṃ krīṇāti dhenubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6707: RV_4,024.10c yadā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad athainam me punar dadat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6708: RV_4,024.11a nū ṣṭuta indra nū gṛṇāna iṣaṃ jaritre nadyo na pīpeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6709: RV_4,024.11c akāri te harivo brahma navyaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6710: RV_4,025.01a ko adya naryo devakāma uśann indrasya sakhyaṃ jujoṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:6711: RV_4,025.01c ko vā mahe 'vase pāryāya samiddhe agnau sutasoma īṭṭe //
GV01rvh1-10u:6712: RV_4,025.02a ko nānāma vacasā somyāya manāyur vā bhavati vasta usrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6713: RV_4,025.02c ka indrasya yujyaṃ kaḥ sakhitvaṃ ko bhrātraṃ vaṣṭi kavaye ka ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:6714: RV_4,025.03a ko devānām avo adyā vṛṇīte ka ādityāṃ aditiṃ jyotir īṭṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6715: RV_4,025.03c kasyāśvināv indro agniḥ sutasyāṃśoḥ pibanti manasāvivenam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6716: RV_4,025.04a tasmā agnir bhārataḥ śarma yaṃsaj jyok paśyāt sūryam uccarantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6717: RV_4,025.04c ya indrāya sunavāmety āha nare naryāya nṛtamāya nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6718: RV_4,025.05a na taṃ jinanti bahavo na dabhrā urv asmā aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat /
GV01rvh1-10u:6719: RV_4,025.05c priyaḥ sukṛt priya indre manāyuḥ priyaḥ suprāvīḥ priyo asya somī //
GV01rvh1-10u:6720: RV_4,025.06a suprāvyaḥ prāśuṣāḷ eṣa vīraḥ suṣveḥ paktiṃ kṛṇute kevalendraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6721: RV_4,025.06c nāsuṣver āpir na sakhā na jāmir duṣprāvyo 'vahanted avācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6722: RV_4,025.07a na revatā paṇinā sakhyam indro 'sunvatā sutapāḥ saṃ gṛṇīte /
GV01rvh1-10u:6723: RV_4,025.07c āsya vedaḥ khidati hanti nagnaṃ vi suṣvaye paktaye kevalo bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6724: RV_4,025.08a indram pare 'vare madhyamāsa indraṃ yānto 'vasitāsa indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:6725: RV_4,025.08c indraṃ kṣiyanta uta yudhyamānā indraṃ naro vājayanto havante //
GV01rvh1-10u:6726: RV_4,026.01a aham manur abhavaṃ sūryaś cāhaṃ kakṣīvāṃ ṛṣir asmi vipraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6727: RV_4,026.01c ahaṃ kutsam ārjuneyaṃ ny ṛñje 'haṃ kavir uśanā paśyatā mā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6728: RV_4,026.02a aham bhūmim adadām āryāyāhaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ dāśuṣe martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6729: RV_4,026.02c aham apo anayaṃ vāvaśānā mama devāso anu ketam āyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6730: RV_4,026.03a aham puro mandasāno vy airaṃ nava sākaṃ navatīḥ śambarasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6731: RV_4,026.03c śatatamaṃ veśyaṃ sarvatātā divodāsam atithigvaṃ yad āvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6732: RV_4,026.04a pra su ṣa vibhyo maruto vir astu pra śyenaḥ śyenebhya āśupatvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6733: RV_4,026.04c acakrayā yat svadhayā suparṇo havyam bharan manave devajuṣṭam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6734: RV_4,026.05a bharad yadi vir ato vevijānaḥ pathoruṇā manojavā asarji /
GV01rvh1-10u:6735: RV_4,026.05c tūyaṃ yayau madhunā somyenota śravo vivide śyeno atra //
GV01rvh1-10u:6736: RV_4,026.06a ṛjīpī śyeno dadamāno aṃśum parāvataḥ śakuno mandram madam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6737: RV_4,026.06c somam bharad dādṛhāṇo devāvān divo amuṣmād uttarād ādāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6738: RV_4,026.07a ādāya śyeno abharat somaṃ sahasraṃ savāṃ ayutaṃ ca sākam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6739: RV_4,026.07c atrā purandhir ajahād arātīr made somasya mūrā amūraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6740: RV_4,027.01a garbhe nu sann anv eṣām avedam ahaṃ devānāṃ janimāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6741: RV_4,027.01c śatam mā pura āyasīr arakṣann adha śyeno javasā nir adīyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6742: RV_4,027.02a na ghā sa mām apa joṣaṃ jabhārābhīm āsa tvakṣasā vīryeṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:6743: RV_4,027.02c īrmā purandhir ajahād arātīr uta vātāṃ atarac chūśuvānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6744: RV_4,027.03a ava yac chyeno asvanīd adha dyor vi yad yadi vāta ūhuḥ purandhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:6745: RV_4,027.03c sṛjad yad asmā ava ha kṣipaj jyāṃ kṛśānur astā manasā bhuraṇyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:6746: RV_4,027.04a ṛjipya īm indrāvato na bhujyuṃ śyeno jabhāra bṛhato adhi ṣṇoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6747: RV_4,027.04c antaḥ patat patatry asya parṇam adha yāmani prasitasya tad veḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6748: RV_4,027.05a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktam āpipyānam maghavā śukram andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6749: RV_4,027.05c adhvaryubhiḥ prayatam madhvo agram indro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai śūro madāya prati dhat pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6750: RV_4,028.01a tvā yujā tava tat soma sakhya indro apo manave sasrutas kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6751: RV_4,028.01c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn apāvṛṇod apihiteva khāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:6752: RV_4,028.02a tvā yujā ni khidat sūryasyendraś cakraṃ sahasā sadya indo /
GV01rvh1-10u:6753: RV_4,028.02c adhi ṣṇunā bṛhatā vartamānam maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6754: RV_4,028.03a ahann indro adahad agnir indo purā dasyūn madhyandinād abhīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:6755: RV_4,028.03c durge duroṇe kratvā na yātām purū sahasrā śarvā ni barhīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:6756: RV_4,028.04a viśvasmāt sīm adhamāṃ indra dasyūn viśo dāsīr akṛṇor apraśastāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6757: RV_4,028.04c abādhethām amṛṇataṃ ni śatrūn avindethām apacitiṃ vadhatraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6758: RV_4,028.05a evā satyam maghavānā yuvaṃ tad indraś ca somorvam aśvyaṃ goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6759: RV_4,028.05c ādardṛtam apihitāny aśnā riricathuḥ kṣāś cit tatṛdānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6760: RV_4,029.01a ā na stuta upa vājebhir ūtī indra yāhi haribhir mandasānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6761: RV_4,029.01c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā purūṇy āṅgūṣebhir gṛṇānaḥ satyarādhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6762: RV_4,029.02a ā hi ṣmā yāti naryaś cikitvān hūyamānaḥ sotṛbhir upa yajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6763: RV_4,029.02c svaśvo yo abhīrur manyamānaḥ suṣvāṇebhir madati saṃ ha vīraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6764: RV_4,029.03a śrāvayed asya karṇā vājayadhyai juṣṭām anu pra diśam mandayadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:6765: RV_4,029.03c udvāvṛṣāṇo rādhase tuviṣmān karan na indraḥ sutīrthābhayaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:6766: RV_4,029.04a acchā yo gantā nādhamānam ūtī itthā vipraṃ havamānaṃ gṛṇantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6767: RV_4,029.04c upa tmani dadhāno dhury āśūn sahasrāṇi śatāni vajrabāhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6768: RV_4,029.05a tvotāso maghavann indra viprā vayaṃ te syāma sūrayo gṛṇantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6769: RV_4,029.05c bhejānāso bṛhaddivasya rāya ākāyyasya dāvane purukṣoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6770: RV_4,030.01a nakir indra tvad uttaro na jyāyāṃ asti vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6772: RV_4,030.02a satrā te anu kṛṣṭayo viśvā cakreva vāvṛtuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6774: RV_4,030.03a viśve caned anā tvā devāsa indra yuyudhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6776: RV_4,030.04a yatrota bādhitebhyaś cakraṃ kutsāya yudhyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6778: RV_4,030.05a yatra devāṃ ṛghāyato viśvāṃ ayudhya eka it /
GV01rvh1-10u:6780: RV_4,030.06a yatrota martyāya kam ariṇā indra sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6782: RV_4,030.07a kim ād utāsi vṛtrahan maghavan manyumattamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6784: RV_4,030.08a etad ghed uta vīryam indra cakartha pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6785: RV_4,030.08c striyaṃ yad durhaṇāyuvaṃ vadhīr duhitaraṃ divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6786: RV_4,030.09a divaś cid ghā duhitaram mahān mahīyamānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6788: RV_4,030.10a apoṣā anasaḥ sarat sampiṣṭād aha bibhyuṣī /
