GV01rvh1-10u:6789: RV_4,030.10c ni yat sīṃ śiśnathad vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6790: RV_4,030.11a etad asyā anaḥ śaye susampiṣṭaṃ vipāśy ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6792: RV_4,030.12a uta sindhuṃ vibālyaṃ vitasthānām adhi kṣami /
GV01rvh1-10u:6794: RV_4,030.13a uta śuṣṇasya dhṛṣṇuyā pra mṛkṣo abhi vedanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6796: RV_4,030.14a uta dāsaṃ kaulitaram bṛhataḥ parvatād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6798: RV_4,030.15a uta dāsasya varcinaḥ sahasrāṇi śatāvadhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6800: RV_4,030.16a uta tyam putram agruvaḥ parāvṛktaṃ śatakratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6802: RV_4,030.17a uta tyā turvaśāyadū asnātārā śacīpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6804: RV_4,030.18a uta tyā sadya āryā sarayor indra pārataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6806: RV_4,030.19a anu dvā jahitā nayo 'ndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6807: RV_4,030.19c na tat te sumnam aṣṭave //
GV01rvh1-10u:6808: RV_4,030.20a śatam aśmanmayīnām purām indro vy āsyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:6810: RV_4,030.21a asvāpayad dabhītaye sahasrā triṃśataṃ hathaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6812: RV_4,030.22a sa ghed utāsi vṛtrahan samāna indra gopatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6814: RV_4,030.23a uta nūnaṃ yad indriyaṃ kariṣyā indra pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6815: RV_4,030.23c adyā nakiṣ ṭad ā minat //
GV01rvh1-10u:6816: RV_4,030.24a vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ ta ādure devo dadātv aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6817: RV_4,030.24c vāmam pūṣā vāmam bhago vāmaṃ devaḥ karūḷatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:6818: RV_4,031.01a kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6820: RV_4,031.02a kas tvā satyo madānām maṃhiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6822: RV_4,031.03a abhī ṣu ṇaḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6824: RV_4,031.04a abhī na ā vavṛtsva cakraṃ na vṛttam arvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6826: RV_4,031.05a pravatā hi kratūnām ā hā padeva gacchasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6828: RV_4,031.06a saṃ yat ta indra manyavaḥ saṃ cakrāṇi dadhanvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:6830: RV_4,031.07a uta smā hi tvām āhur in maghavānaṃ śacīpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6832: RV_4,031.08a uta smā sadya it pari śaśamānāya sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:6834: RV_4,031.09a nahi ṣmā te śataṃ cana rādho varanta āmuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6836: RV_4,031.10a asmāṃ avantu te śatam asmān sahasram ūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6838: RV_4,031.11a asmāṃ ihā vṛṇīṣva sakhyāya svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:6840: RV_4,031.12a asmāṃ aviḍḍhi viśvahendra rāyā parīṇasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6842: RV_4,031.13a asmabhyaṃ tāṃ apā vṛdhi vrajāṃ asteva gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6844: RV_4,031.14a asmākaṃ dhṛṣṇuyā ratho dyumāṃ indrānapacyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6846: RV_4,031.15a asmākam uttamaṃ kṛdhi śravo deveṣu sūrya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6848: RV_4,032.01a ā tū na indra vṛtrahann asmākam ardham ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6850: RV_4,032.02a bhṛmiś cid ghāsi tūtujir ā citra citriṇīṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6852: RV_4,032.03a dabhrebhiś cic chaśīyāṃsaṃ haṃsi vrādhantam ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6854: RV_4,032.04a vayam indra tve sacā vayaṃ tvābhi nonumaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6856: RV_4,032.05a sa naś citrābhir adrivo 'navadyābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6858: RV_4,032.06a bhūyāmo ṣu tvāvataḥ sakhāya indra gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6860: RV_4,032.07a tvaṃ hy eka īśiṣa indra vājasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6861: RV_4,032.07c sa no yandhi mahīm iṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6862: RV_4,032.08a na tvā varante anyathā yad ditsasi stuto magham /
GV01rvh1-10u:6864: RV_4,032.09a abhi tvā gotamā girānūṣata pra dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:6866: RV_4,032.10a pra te vocāma vīryā yā mandasāna ārujaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6868: RV_4,032.11a tā te gṛṇanti vedhaso yāni cakartha pauṃsyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6870: RV_4,032.12a avīvṛdhanta gotamā indra tve stomavāhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6872: RV_4,032.13a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6874: RV_4,032.14a arvācīno vaso bhavāsme su matsvāndhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6876: RV_4,032.15a asmākaṃ tvā matīnām ā stoma indra yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:6878: RV_4,032.16a puroḷāśaṃ ca no ghaso joṣayāse giraś ca naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6880: RV_4,032.17a sahasraṃ vyatīnāṃ yuktānām indram īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6882: RV_4,032.18a sahasrā te śatā vayaṃ gavām ā cyāvayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6884: RV_4,032.19a daśa te kalaśānāṃ hiraṇyānām adhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:6886: RV_4,032.20a bhūridā bhūri dehi no mā dabhram bhūry ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:6888: RV_4,032.21a bhūridā hy asi śrutaḥ purutrā śūra vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6890: RV_4,032.22a pra te babhrū vicakṣaṇa śaṃsāmi goṣaṇo napāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:6892: RV_4,032.23a kanīnakeva vidradhe nave drupade arbhake /
GV01rvh1-10u:6896: RV_4,033.01a pra ṛbhubhyo dūtam iva vācam iṣya upastire śvaitarīṃ dhenum īḷe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6897: RV_4,033.01c ye vātajūtās taraṇibhir evaiḥ pari dyāṃ sadyo apaso babhūvuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6898: RV_4,033.02a yadāram akrann ṛbhavaḥ pitṛbhyām pariviṣṭī veṣaṇā daṃsanābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6899: RV_4,033.02c ād id devānām upa sakhyam āyan dhīrāsaḥ puṣṭim avahan manāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:6900: RV_4,033.03a punar ye cakruḥ pitarā yuvānā sanā yūpeva jaraṇā śayānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6901: RV_4,033.03c te vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhur indravanto madhupsaraso no 'vantu yajñam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6902: RV_4,033.04a yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo gām arakṣan yat saṃvatsam ṛbhavo mā apiṃśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6903: RV_4,033.04c yat saṃvatsam abharan bhāso asyās tābhiḥ śamībhir amṛtatvam āśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6904: RV_4,033.05a jyeṣṭha āha camasā dvā kareti kanīyān trīn kṛṇavāmety āha /
GV01rvh1-10u:6905: RV_4,033.05c kaniṣṭha āha caturas kareti tvaṣṭa ṛbhavas tat panayad vaco vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6906: RV_4,033.06a satyam ūcur nara evā hi cakrur anu svadhām ṛbhavo jagmur etām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6907: RV_4,033.06c vibhrājamānāṃś camasāṃ ahevāvenat tvaṣṭā caturo dadṛśvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:6908: RV_4,033.07a dvādaśa dyūn yad agohyasyātithye raṇann ṛbhavaḥ sasantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6909: RV_4,033.07c sukṣetrākṛṇvann anayanta sindhūn dhanvātiṣṭhann oṣadhīr nimnam āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6910: RV_4,033.08a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ nareṣṭhāṃ ye dhenuṃ viśvajuvaṃ viśvarūpām /
GV01rvh1-10u:6911: RV_4,033.08c ta ā takṣantv ṛbhavo rayiṃ naḥ svavasaḥ svapasaḥ suhastāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6912: RV_4,033.09a apo hy eṣām ajuṣanta devā abhi kratvā manasā dīdhyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6913: RV_4,033.09c vājo devānām abhavat sukarmendrasya ṛbhukṣā varuṇasya vibhvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6914: RV_4,033.10a ye harī medhayokthā madanta indrāya cakruḥ suyujā ye aśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6915: RV_4,033.10c te rāyas poṣaṃ draviṇāny asme dhatta ṛbhavaḥ kṣemayanto na mitram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6916: RV_4,033.11a idāhnaḥ pītim uta vo madaṃ dhur na ṛte śrāntasya sakhyāya devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6917: RV_4,033.11c te nūnam asme ṛbhavo vasūni tṛtīye asmin savane dadhāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:6918: RV_4,034.01a ṛbhur vibhvā vāja indro no acchemaṃ yajñaṃ ratnadheyopa yāta /
GV01rvh1-10u:6919: RV_4,034.01c idā hi vo dhiṣaṇā devy ahnām adhāt pītiṃ sam madā agmatā vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6920: RV_4,034.02a vidānāso janmano vājaratnā uta ṛtubhir ṛbhavo mādayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6921: RV_4,034.02c saṃ vo madā agmata sam purandhiḥ suvīrām asme rayim erayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6922: RV_4,034.03a ayaṃ vo yajña ṛbhavo 'kāri yam ā manuṣvat pradivo dadhidhve /
GV01rvh1-10u:6923: RV_4,034.03c pra vo 'cchā jujuṣāṇāso asthur abhūta viśve agriyota vājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6924: RV_4,034.04a abhūd u vo vidhate ratnadheyam idā naro dāśuṣe martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6925: RV_4,034.04c pibata vājā ṛbhavo dade vo mahi tṛtīyaṃ savanam madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6926: RV_4,034.05a ā vājā yātopa na ṛbhukṣā maho naro draviṇaso gṛṇānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6927: RV_4,034.05c ā vaḥ pītayo 'bhipitve ahnām imā astaṃ navasva iva gman //
GV01rvh1-10u:6928: RV_4,034.06a ā napātaḥ śavaso yātanopemaṃ yajñaṃ namasā hūyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6929: RV_4,034.06c sajoṣasaḥ sūrayo yasya ca stha madhvaḥ pāta ratnadhā indravantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6930: RV_4,034.07a sajoṣā indra varuṇena somaṃ sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6931: RV_4,034.07c agrepābhir ṛtupābhiḥ sajoṣā gnāspatnībhī ratnadhābhiḥ sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6932: RV_4,034.08a sajoṣasa ādityair mādayadhvaṃ sajoṣasa ṛbhavaḥ parvatebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6933: RV_4,034.08c sajoṣaso daivyenā savitrā sajoṣasaḥ sindhubhī ratnadhebhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6934: RV_4,034.09a ye aśvinā ye pitarā ya ūtī dhenuṃ tatakṣur ṛbhavo ye aśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6935: RV_4,034.09c ye aṃsatrā ya ṛdhag rodasī ye vibhvo naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6936: RV_4,034.10a ye gomantaṃ vājavantaṃ suvīraṃ rayiṃ dhattha vasumantam purukṣum /
GV01rvh1-10u:6937: RV_4,034.10c te agrepā ṛbhavo mandasānā asme dhatta ye ca rātiṃ gṛṇanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:6938: RV_4,034.11a nāpābhūta na vo 'tītṛṣāmāniḥśastā ṛbhavo yajñe asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:6939: RV_4,034.11c sam indreṇa madatha sam marudbhiḥ saṃ rājabhī ratnadheyāya devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6940: RV_4,035.01a ihopa yāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo māpa bhūta /
GV01rvh1-10u:6941: RV_4,035.01c asmin hi vaḥ savane ratnadheyaṃ gamantv indram anu vo madāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6942: RV_4,035.02a āgann ṛbhūṇām iha ratnadheyam abhūt somasya suṣutasya pītiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6943: RV_4,035.02c sukṛtyayā yat svapasyayā caṃ ekaṃ vicakra camasaṃ caturdhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6944: RV_4,035.03a vy akṛṇota camasaṃ caturdhā sakhe vi śikṣety abravīta /
GV01rvh1-10u:6945: RV_4,035.03c athaita vājā amṛtasya panthāṃ gaṇaṃ devānām ṛbhavaḥ suhastāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6946: RV_4,035.04a kimmayaḥ svic camasa eṣa āsa yaṃ kāvyena caturo vicakra /
GV01rvh1-10u:6947: RV_4,035.04c athā sunudhvaṃ savanam madāya pāta ṛbhavo madhunaḥ somyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6948: RV_4,035.05a śacyākarta pitarā yuvānā śacyākarta camasaṃ devapānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6949: RV_4,035.05c śacyā harī dhanutarāv ataṣṭendravāhāv ṛbhavo vājaratnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6950: RV_4,035.06a yo vaḥ sunoty abhipitve ahnāṃ tīvraṃ vājāsaḥ savanam madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:6951: RV_4,035.06c tasmai rayim ṛbhavaḥ sarvavīram ā takṣata vṛṣaṇo mandasānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6952: RV_4,035.07a prātaḥ sutam apibo haryaśva mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te /
GV01rvh1-10u:6953: RV_4,035.07c sam ṛbhubhiḥ pibasva ratnadhebhiḥ sakhīṃr yāṃ indra cakṛṣe sukṛtyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6954: RV_4,035.08a ye devāso abhavatā sukṛtyā śyenā ived adhi divi niṣeda /
GV01rvh1-10u:6955: RV_4,035.08c te ratnaṃ dhāta śavaso napātaḥ saudhanvanā abhavatāmṛtāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6956: RV_4,035.09a yat tṛtīyaṃ savanaṃ ratnadheyam akṛṇudhvaṃ svapasyā suhastāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6957: RV_4,035.09c tad ṛbhavaḥ pariṣiktaṃ va etat sam madebhir indriyebhiḥ pibadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6958: RV_4,036.01a anaśvo jāto anabhīśur ukthyo rathas tricakraḥ pari vartate rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6959: RV_4,036.01c mahat tad vo devyasya pravācanaṃ dyām ṛbhavaḥ pṛthivīṃ yac ca puṣyatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:6960: RV_4,036.02a rathaṃ ye cakruḥ suvṛtaṃ sucetaso 'vihvarantam manasas pari dhyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6961: RV_4,036.02c tāṃ ū nv asya savanasya pītaya ā vo vājā ṛbhavo vedayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6962: RV_4,036.03a tad vo vājā ṛbhavaḥ supravācanaṃ deveṣu vibhvo abhavan mahitvanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6963: RV_4,036.03c jivrī yat santā pitarā sanājurā punar yuvānā carathāya takṣatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:6964: RV_4,036.04a ekaṃ vi cakra camasaṃ caturvayaṃ niś carmaṇo gām ariṇīta dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6965: RV_4,036.04c athā deveṣv amṛtatvam ānaśa śruṣṭī vājā ṛbhavas tad va ukthyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6966: RV_4,036.05a ṛbhuto rayiḥ prathamaśravastamo vājaśrutāso yam ajījanan naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6967: RV_4,036.05c vibhvataṣṭo vidatheṣu pravācyo yaṃ devāso 'vathā sa vicarṣaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6968: RV_4,036.06a sa vājy arvā sa ṛṣir vacasyayā sa śūro astā pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6969: RV_4,036.06c sa rāyas poṣaṃ sa suvīryaṃ dadhe yaṃ vājo vibhvāṃ ṛbhavo yam āviṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6970: RV_4,036.07a śreṣṭhaṃ vaḥ peśo adhi dhāyi darśataṃ stomo vājā ṛbhavas taṃ jujuṣṭana /
GV01rvh1-10u:6971: RV_4,036.07c dhīrāso hi ṣṭhā kavayo vipaścitas tān va enā brahmaṇā vedayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6972: RV_4,036.08a yūyam asmabhyaṃ dhiṣaṇābhyas pari vidvāṃso viśvā naryāṇi bhojanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:6973: RV_4,036.08c dyumantaṃ vājaṃ vṛṣaśuṣmam uttamam ā no rayim ṛbhavas takṣatā vayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6974: RV_4,036.09a iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇā iha śravo vīravat takṣatā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6975: RV_4,036.09c yena vayaṃ citayemāty anyān taṃ vājaṃ citram ṛbhavo dadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6976: RV_4,037.01a upa no vājā adhvaram ṛbhukṣā devā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6977: RV_4,037.01c yathā yajñam manuṣo vikṣv āsu dadhidhve raṇvāḥ sudineṣv ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:6978: RV_4,037.02a te vo hṛde manase santu yajñā juṣṭāso adya ghṛtanirṇijo guḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6979: RV_4,037.02c pra vaḥ sutāso harayanta pūrṇāḥ kratve dakṣāya harṣayanta pītāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:6980: RV_4,037.03a tryudāyaṃ devahitaṃ yathā va stomo vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo dade vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6981: RV_4,037.03c juhve manuṣvad uparāsu vikṣu yuṣme sacā bṛhaddiveṣu somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6982: RV_4,037.04a pīvoaśvāḥ śucadrathā hi bhūtāyaḥśiprā vājinaḥ suniṣkāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6983: RV_4,037.04c indrasya sūno śavaso napāto 'nu vaś cety agriyam madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:6984: RV_4,037.05a ṛbhum ṛbhukṣaṇo rayiṃ vāje vājintamaṃ yujam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6986: RV_4,037.06a sed ṛbhavo yam avatha yūyam indraś ca martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:6987: RV_4,037.06c sa dhībhir astu sanitā medhasātā so arvatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:6988: RV_4,037.07a vi no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pathaś citana yaṣṭave /
GV01rvh1-10u:6989: RV_4,037.07c asmabhyaṃ sūraya stutā viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:6990: RV_4,037.08a taṃ no vājā ṛbhukṣaṇa indra nāsatyā rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:6991: RV_4,037.08c sam aśvaṃ carṣaṇibhya ā puru śasta maghattaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:6992: RV_4,038.01a uto hi vāṃ dātrā santi pūrvā yā pūrubhyas trasadasyur nitośe /
GV01rvh1-10u:6993: RV_4,038.01c kṣetrāsāṃ dadathur urvarāsāṃ ghanaṃ dasyubhyo abhibhūtim ugram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6994: RV_4,038.02a uta vājinam puruniṣṣidhvānaṃ dadhikrām u dadathur viśvakṛṣṭim /
GV01rvh1-10u:6995: RV_4,038.02c ṛjipyaṃ śyenam pruṣitapsum āśuṃ carkṛtyam aryo nṛpatiṃ na śūram //
GV01rvh1-10u:6996: RV_4,038.03a yaṃ sīm anu pravateva dravantaṃ viśvaḥ pūrur madati harṣamāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:6997: RV_4,038.03c paḍbhir gṛdhyantam medhayuṃ na śūraṃ rathaturaṃ vātam iva dhrajantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:6998: RV_4,038.04a yaḥ smārundhāno gadhyā samatsu sanutaraś carati goṣu gacchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:6999: RV_4,038.04c āvirṛjīko vidathā nicikyat tiro aratim pary āpa āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7000: RV_4,038.05a uta smainaṃ vastramathiṃ na tāyum anu krośanti kṣitayo bhareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7001: RV_4,038.05c nīcāyamānaṃ jasuriṃ na śyenaṃ śravaś cācchā paśumac ca yūtham //
GV01rvh1-10u:7002: RV_4,038.06a uta smāsu prathamaḥ sariṣyan ni veveti śreṇibhī rathānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7003: RV_4,038.06c srajaṃ kṛṇvāno janyo na śubhvā reṇuṃ rerihat kiraṇaṃ dadaśvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7004: RV_4,038.07a uta sya vājī sahurir ṛtāvā śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7005: RV_4,038.07c turaṃ yatīṣu turayann ṛjipyo 'dhi bhruvoḥ kirate reṇum ṛñjan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7006: RV_4,038.08a uta smāsya tanyator iva dyor ṛghāyato abhiyujo bhayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:7007: RV_4,038.08c yadā sahasram abhi ṣīm ayodhīd durvartuḥ smā bhavati bhīma ṛñjan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7008: RV_4,038.09a uta smāsya panayanti janā jūtiṃ kṛṣṭipro abhibhūtim āśoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7009: RV_4,038.09c utainam āhuḥ samithe viyantaḥ parā dadhikrā asarat sahasraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7010: RV_4,038.10a ā dadhikrāḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:7011: RV_4,038.10c sahasrasāḥ śatasā vājy arvā pṛṇaktu madhvā sam imā vacāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7012: RV_4,039.01a āśuṃ dadhikrāṃ tam u nu ṣṭavāma divas pṛthivyā uta carkirāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:7013: RV_4,039.01c ucchantīr mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantv ati viśvāni duritāni parṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7014: RV_4,039.02a mahaś carkarmy arvataḥ kratuprā dadhikrāvṇaḥ puruvārasya vṛṣṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7015: RV_4,039.02c yam pūrubhyo dīdivāṃsaṃ nāgniṃ dadathur mitrāvaruṇā taturim //
GV01rvh1-10u:7016: RV_4,039.03a yo aśvasya dadhikrāvṇo akārīt samiddhe agnā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:7017: RV_4,039.03c anāgasaṃ tam aditiḥ kṛṇotu sa mitreṇa varuṇenā sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7018: RV_4,039.04a dadhikrāvṇa iṣa ūrjo maho yad amanmahi marutāṃ nāma bhadram /
GV01rvh1-10u:7019: RV_4,039.04c svastaye varuṇam mitram agniṃ havāmaha indraṃ vajrabāhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7020: RV_4,039.05a indram ived ubhaye vi hvayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7021: RV_4,039.05c dadhikrām u sūdanam martyāya dadathur mitrāvaruṇā no aśvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7022: RV_4,039.06a dadhikrāvṇo akāriṣaṃ jiṣṇor aśvasya vājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7023: RV_4,039.06c surabhi no mukhā karat pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tāriṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7024: RV_4,040.01a dadhikrāvṇa id u nu carkirāma viśvā in mām uṣasaḥ sūdayantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7025: RV_4,040.01c apām agner uṣasaḥ sūryasya bṛhaspater āṅgirasasya jiṣṇoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7026: RV_4,040.02a satvā bhariṣo gaviṣo duvanyasac chravasyād iṣa uṣasas turaṇyasat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7027: RV_4,040.02c satyo dravo dravaraḥ pataṅgaro dadhikrāveṣam ūrjaṃ svar janat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7028: RV_4,040.03a uta smāsya dravatas turaṇyataḥ parṇaṃ na ver anu vāti pragardhinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7029: RV_4,040.03c śyenasyeva dhrajato aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā taritrataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7030: RV_4,040.04a uta sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyām baddho apikakṣa āsani /
GV01rvh1-10u:7031: RV_4,040.04c kratuṃ dadhikrā anu saṃtavītvat pathām aṅkāṃsy anv āpanīphaṇat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7032: RV_4,040.05a haṃsaḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7033: RV_4,040.05c nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7034: RV_4,041.01a indrā ko vāṃ varuṇā sumnam āpa stomo haviṣmāṃ amṛto na hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7035: RV_4,041.01c yo vāṃ hṛdi kratumāṃ asmad uktaḥ pasparśad indrāvaruṇā namasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7036: RV_4,041.02a indrā ha yo varuṇā cakra āpī devau martaḥ sakhyāya prayasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:7037: RV_4,041.02c sa hanti vṛtrā samitheṣu śatrūn avobhir vā mahadbhiḥ sa pra śṛṇve //
GV01rvh1-10u:7038: RV_4,041.03a indrā ha ratnaṃ varuṇā dheṣṭhetthā nṛbhyaḥ śaśamānebhyas tā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7039: RV_4,041.03c yadī sakhāyā sakhyāya somaiḥ sutebhiḥ suprayasā mādayaite //
GV01rvh1-10u:7040: RV_4,041.04a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā didyum asminn ojiṣṭham ugrā ni vadhiṣṭaṃ vajram /
GV01rvh1-10u:7041: RV_4,041.04c yo no durevo vṛkatir dabhītis tasmin mimāthām abhibhūty ojaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7042: RV_4,041.05a indrā yuvaṃ varuṇā bhūtam asyā dhiyaḥ pretārā vṛṣabheva dhenoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7043: RV_4,041.05c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7044: RV_4,041.06a toke hite tanaya urvarāsu sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7045: RV_4,041.06c indrā no atra varuṇā syātām avobhir dasmā paritakmyāyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7046: RV_4,041.07a yuvām id dhy avase pūrvyāya pari prabhūtī gaviṣaḥ svāpī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7047: RV_4,041.07c vṛṇīmahe sakhyāya priyāya śūrā maṃhiṣṭhā pitareva śambhū //
GV01rvh1-10u:7048: RV_4,041.08a tā vāṃ dhiyo 'vase vājayantīr ājiṃ na jagmur yuvayūḥ sudānū /
GV01rvh1-10u:7049: RV_4,041.08c śriye na gāva upa somam asthur indraṃ giro varuṇam me manīṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7050: RV_4,041.09a imā indraṃ varuṇam me manīṣā agmann upa draviṇam icchamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7051: RV_4,041.09c upem asthur joṣṭāra iva vasvo raghvīr iva śravaso bhikṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7052: RV_4,041.10a aśvyasya tmanā rathyasya puṣṭer nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:7053: RV_4,041.10c tā cakrāṇā ūtibhir navyasībhir asmatrā rāyo niyutaḥ sacantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7054: RV_4,041.11a ā no bṛhantā bṛhatībhir ūtī indra yātaṃ varuṇa vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:7055: RV_4,041.11c yad didyavaḥ pṛtanāsu prakrīḷān tasya vāṃ syāma sanitāra ājeḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7056: RV_4,042.01a mama dvitā rāṣṭraṃ kṣatriyasya viśvāyor viśve amṛtā yathā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7057: RV_4,042.01c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7058: RV_4,042.02a ahaṃ rājā varuṇo mahyaṃ tāny asuryāṇi prathamā dhārayanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7059: RV_4,042.02c kratuṃ sacante varuṇasya devā rājāmi kṛṣṭer upamasya vavreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7060: RV_4,042.03a aham indro varuṇas te mahitvorvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke /
GV01rvh1-10u:7061: RV_4,042.03c tvaṣṭeva viśvā bhuvanāni vidvān sam airayaṃ rodasī dhārayaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:7062: RV_4,042.04a aham apo apinvam ukṣamāṇā dhārayaṃ divaṃ sadana ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7063: RV_4,042.04c ṛtena putro aditer ṛtāvota tridhātu prathayad vi bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:7064: RV_4,042.05a māṃ naraḥ svaśvā vājayanto māṃ vṛtāḥ samaraṇe havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:7065: RV_4,042.05c kṛṇomy ājim maghavāham indra iyarmi reṇum abhibhūtyojāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7066: RV_4,042.06a ahaṃ tā viśvā cakaraṃ nakir mā daivyaṃ saho varate apratītam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7067: RV_4,042.06c yan mā somāso mamadan yad ukthobhe bhayete rajasī apāre //
GV01rvh1-10u:7068: RV_4,042.07a viduṣ ṭe viśvā bhuvanāni tasya tā pra bravīṣi varuṇāya vedhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7069: RV_4,042.07c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi śṛṇviṣe jaghanvān tvaṃ vṛtāṃ ariṇā indra sindhūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:7070: RV_4,042.08a asmākam atra pitaras ta āsan sapta ṛṣayo daurgahe badhyamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:7071: RV_4,042.08c ta āyajanta trasadasyum asyā indraṃ na vṛtraturam ardhadevam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7072: RV_4,042.09a purukutsānī hi vām adāśad dhavyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7073: RV_4,042.09c athā rājānaṃ trasadasyum asyā vṛtrahaṇaṃ dadathur ardhadevam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7074: RV_4,042.10a rāyā vayaṃ sasavāṃso madema havyena devā yavasena gāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7075: RV_4,042.10c tāṃ dhenum indrāvaruṇā yuvaṃ no viśvāhā dhattam anapasphurantīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:7076: RV_4,043.01a ka u śravat katamo yajñiyānāṃ vandāru devaḥ katamo juṣāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:7077: RV_4,043.01c kasyemāṃ devīm amṛteṣu preṣṭhāṃ hṛdi śreṣāma suṣṭutiṃ suhavyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7078: RV_4,043.02a ko mṛḷāti katama āgamiṣṭho devānām u katamaḥ śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7079: RV_4,043.02c rathaṃ kam āhur dravadaśvam āśuṃ yaṃ sūryasya duhitāvṛṇīta //
GV01rvh1-10u:7080: RV_4,043.03a makṣū hi ṣmā gacchatha īvato dyūn indro na śaktim paritakmyāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7081: RV_4,043.03c diva ājātā divyā suparṇā kayā śacīnām bhavathaḥ śaciṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7082: RV_4,043.04a kā vām bhūd upamātiḥ kayā na āśvinā gamatho hūyamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7083: RV_4,043.04c ko vām mahaś cit tyajaso abhīka uruṣyatam mādhvī dasrā na ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:7084: RV_4,043.05a uru vāṃ rathaḥ pari nakṣati dyām ā yat samudrād abhi vartate vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7085: RV_4,043.05c madhvā mādhvī madhu vām pruṣāyan yat sīṃ vām pṛkṣo bhurajanta pakvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7086: RV_4,043.06a sindhur ha vāṃ rasayā siñcad aśvān ghṛṇā vayo 'ruṣāsaḥ pari gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:7087: RV_4,043.06c tad ū ṣu vām ajiraṃ ceti yānaṃ yena patī bhavathaḥ sūryāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7088: RV_4,043.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7089: RV_4,043.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik //
GV01rvh1-10u:7090: RV_4,044.01a taṃ vāṃ rathaṃ vayam adyā huvema pṛthujrayam aśvinā saṃgatiṃ goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7091: RV_4,044.01c yaḥ sūryāṃ vahati vandhurāyur girvāhasam purutamaṃ vasūyum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7092: RV_4,044.02a yuvaṃ śriyam aśvinā devatā tāṃ divo napātā vanathaḥ śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7093: RV_4,044.02c yuvor vapur abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante vahanti yat kakuhāso rathe vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7094: RV_4,044.03a ko vām adyā karate rātahavya ūtaye vā sutapeyāya vārkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7095: RV_4,044.03c ṛtasya vā vanuṣe pūrvyāya namo yemāno aśvinā vavartat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7096: RV_4,044.04a hiraṇyayena purubhū rathenemaṃ yajñaṃ nāsatyopa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7097: RV_4,044.04c pibātha in madhunaḥ somyasya dadhatho ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7098: RV_4,044.05a ā no yātaṃ divo acchā pṛthivyā hiraṇyayena suvṛtā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:7099: RV_4,044.05c mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ saṃ yad dade nābhiḥ pūrvyā vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7100: RV_4,044.06a nū no rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ dasrā mimāthām ubhayeṣv asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:7101: RV_4,044.06c naro yad vām aśvinā stomam āvan sadhastutim ājamīḷhāso agman //
GV01rvh1-10u:7102: RV_4,044.07a iheha yad vāṃ samanā papṛkṣe seyam asme sumatir vājaratnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7103: RV_4,044.07c uruṣyataṃ jaritāraṃ yuvaṃ ha śritaḥ kāmo nāsatyā yuvadrik //
GV01rvh1-10u:7104: RV_4,045.01a eṣa sya bhānur ud iyarti yujyate rathaḥ parijmā divo asya sānavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7105: RV_4,045.01c pṛkṣāso asmin mithunā adhi trayo dṛtis turīyo madhuno vi rapśate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7106: RV_4,045.02a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanta īrate rathā aśvāsa uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7107: RV_4,045.02c aporṇuvantas tama ā parīvṛtaṃ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7108: RV_4,045.03a madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhir uta priyam madhune yuñjāthāṃ ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:7109: RV_4,045.03c ā vartanim madhunā jinvathas patho dṛtiṃ vahethe madhumantam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7110: RV_4,045.04a haṃsāso ye vām madhumanto asridho hiraṇyaparṇā uhuva uṣarbudhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7111: RV_4,045.04c udapruto mandino mandinispṛśo madhvo na makṣaḥ savanāni gacchathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7112: RV_4,045.05a svadhvarāso madhumanto agnaya usrā jarante prati vastor aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7113: RV_4,045.05c yan niktahastas taraṇir vicakṣaṇaḥ somaṃ suṣāva madhumantam adribhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7114: RV_4,045.06a ākenipāso ahabhir davidhvataḥ svar ṇa śukraṃ tanvanta ā rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7115: RV_4,045.06c sūraś cid aśvān yuyujāna īyate viśvāṃ anu svadhayā cetathas pathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7116: RV_4,045.07a pra vām avocam aśvinā dhiyandhā rathaḥ svaśvo ajaro yo asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7117: RV_4,045.07c yena sadyaḥ pari rajāṃsi yātho haviṣmantaṃ taraṇim bhojam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:7118: RV_4,046.01a agram pibā madhūnāṃ sutaṃ vāyo diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7120: RV_4,046.02a śatenā no abhiṣṭibhir niyutvāṃ indrasārathiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7122: RV_4,046.03a ā vāṃ sahasraṃ haraya indravāyū abhi prayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7126: RV_4,046.05a rathena pṛthupājasā dāśvāṃsam upa gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7128: RV_4,046.06a indravāyū ayaṃ sutas taṃ devebhiḥ sajoṣasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7130: RV_4,046.07a iha prayāṇam astu vām indravāyū vimocanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7132: RV_4,047.01a vāyo śukro ayāmi te madhvo agraṃ diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7133: RV_4,047.01c ā yāhi somapītaye spārho deva niyutvatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7134: RV_4,047.02a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ somānām pītim arhathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7135: RV_4,047.02c yuvāṃ hi yantīndavo nimnam āpo na sadhryak //
GV01rvh1-10u:7136: RV_4,047.03a vāyav indraś ca śuṣmiṇā sarathaṃ śavasas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7137: RV_4,047.03c niyutvantā na ūtaya ā yātaṃ somapītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7138: RV_4,047.04a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7139: RV_4,047.04c asme tā yajñavāhasendravāyū ni yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7140: RV_4,048.01a vihi hotrā avītā vipo na rāyo aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7141: RV_4,048.01c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7143: RV_4,048.02c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7144: RV_4,048.03a anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī yemāte viśvapeśasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7145: RV_4,048.03c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7146: RV_4,048.04a vahantu tvā manoyujo yuktāso navatir nava /
GV01rvh1-10u:7147: RV_4,048.04c vāyav ā candreṇa rathena yāhi sutasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7148: RV_4,048.05a vāyo śataṃ harīṇāṃ yuvasva poṣyāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7149: RV_4,048.05c uta vā te sahasriṇo ratha ā yātu pājasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7150: RV_4,049.01a idaṃ vām āsye haviḥ priyam indrābṛhaspatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7152: RV_4,049.02a ayaṃ vām pari ṣicyate soma indrābṛhaspatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7154: RV_4,049.03a ā na indrābṛhaspatī gṛham indraś ca gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7156: RV_4,049.04a asme indrābṛhaspatī rayiṃ dhattaṃ śatagvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7158: RV_4,049.05a indrābṛhaspatī vayaṃ sute gīrbhir havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7160: RV_4,049.06a somam indrābṛhaspatī pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7162: RV_4,050.01a yas tastambha sahasā vi jmo antān bṛhaspatis triṣadhastho raveṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7163: RV_4,050.01c tam pratnāsa ṛṣayo dīdhyānāḥ puro viprā dadhire mandrajihvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7164: RV_4,050.02a dhunetayaḥ supraketam madanto bṛhaspate abhi ye nas tatasre /
GV01rvh1-10u:7165: RV_4,050.02c pṛṣantaṃ sṛpram adabdham ūrvam bṛhaspate rakṣatād asya yonim //
GV01rvh1-10u:7166: RV_4,050.03a bṛhaspate yā paramā parāvad ata ā ta ṛtaspṛśo ni ṣeduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7167: RV_4,050.03c tubhyaṃ khātā avatā adridugdhā madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7168: RV_4,050.04a bṛhaspatiḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāno maho jyotiṣaḥ parame vyoman /
GV01rvh1-10u:7169: RV_4,050.04c saptāsyas tuvijāto raveṇa vi saptaraśmir adhamat tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7170: RV_4,050.05a sa suṣṭubhā sa ṛkvatā gaṇena valaṃ ruroja phaligaṃ raveṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7171: RV_4,050.05c bṛhaspatir usriyā havyasūdaḥ kanikradad vāvaśatīr ud ājat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7172: RV_4,050.06a evā pitre viśvadevāya vṛṣṇe yajñair vidhema namasā havirbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7173: RV_4,050.06c bṛhaspate suprajā vīravanto vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7174: RV_4,050.07a sa id rājā pratijanyāni viśvā śuṣmeṇa tasthāv abhi vīryeṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7175: RV_4,050.07c bṛhaspatiṃ yaḥ subhṛtam bibharti valgūyati vandate pūrvabhājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7176: RV_4,050.08a sa it kṣeti sudhita okasi sve tasmā iḷā pinvate viśvadānīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:7177: RV_4,050.08c tasmai viśaḥ svayam evā namante yasmin brahmā rājani pūrva eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7178: RV_4,050.09a apratīto jayati saṃ dhanāni pratijanyāny uta yā sajanyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7179: RV_4,050.09c avasyave yo varivaḥ kṛṇoti brahmaṇe rājā tam avanti devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7180: RV_4,050.10a indraś ca somam pibatam bṛhaspate 'smin yajñe mandasānā vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:7181: RV_4,050.10c ā vāṃ viśantv indavaḥ svābhuvo 'sme rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7182: RV_4,050.11a bṛhaspata indra vardhataṃ naḥ sacā sā vāṃ sumatir bhūtv asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:7183: RV_4,050.11c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7184: RV_4,051.01a idam u tyat purutamam purastāj jyotis tamaso vayunāvad asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:7185: RV_4,051.01c nūnaṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīr gātuṃ kṛṇavann uṣaso janāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7186: RV_4,051.02a asthur u citrā uṣasaḥ purastān mitā iva svaravo 'dhvareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7187: RV_4,051.02c vy ū vrajasya tamaso dvārocchantīr avrañ chucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7188: RV_4,051.03a ucchantīr adya citayanta bhojān rādhodeyāyoṣaso maghonīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7189: RV_4,051.03c acitre antaḥ paṇayaḥ sasantv abudhyamānās tamaso vimadhye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7190: RV_4,051.04a kuvit sa devīḥ sanayo navo vā yāmo babhūyād uṣaso vo adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7191: RV_4,051.04c yenā navagve aṅgire daśagve saptāsye revatī revad ūṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7192: RV_4,051.05a yūyaṃ hi devīr ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ pariprayātha bhuvanāni sadyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7193: RV_4,051.05c prabodhayantīr uṣasaḥ sasantaṃ dvipāc catuṣpāc carathāya jīvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7194: RV_4,051.06a kva svid āsāṃ katamā purāṇī yayā vidhānā vidadhur ṛbhūṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7195: RV_4,051.06c śubhaṃ yac chubhrā uṣasaś caranti na vi jñāyante sadṛśīr ajuryāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7196: RV_4,051.07a tā ghā tā bhadrā uṣasaḥ purāsur abhiṣṭidyumnā ṛtajātasatyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7197: RV_4,051.07c yāsv ījānaḥ śaśamāna ukthai stuvañ chaṃsan draviṇaṃ sadya āpa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7198: RV_4,051.08a tā ā caranti samanā purastāt samānataḥ samanā paprathānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7199: RV_4,051.08c ṛtasya devīḥ sadaso budhānā gavāṃ na sargā uṣaso jarante //
GV01rvh1-10u:7200: RV_4,051.09a tā in nv eva samanā samānīr amītavarṇā uṣasaś caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7201: RV_4,051.09c gūhantīr abhvam asitaṃ ruśadbhiḥ śukrās tanūbhiḥ śucayo rucānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7202: RV_4,051.10a rayiṃ divo duhitaro vibhātīḥ prajāvantaṃ yacchatāsmāsu devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7203: RV_4,051.10c syonād ā vaḥ pratibudhyamānāḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:7204: RV_4,051.11a tad vo divo duhitaro vibhātīr upa bruva uṣaso yajñaketuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7205: RV_4,051.11c vayaṃ syāma yaśaso janeṣu tad dyauś ca dhattām pṛthivī ca devī //
GV01rvh1-10u:7206: RV_4,052.01a prati ṣyā sūnarī janī vyucchantī pari svasuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7208: RV_4,052.02a aśveva citrāruṣī mātā gavām ṛtāvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7210: RV_4,052.03a uta sakhāsy aśvinor uta mātā gavām asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7214: RV_4,052.05a prati bhadrā adṛkṣata gavāṃ sargā na raśmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7216: RV_4,052.06a āpapruṣī vibhāvari vy āvar jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7218: RV_4,052.07a ā dyāṃ tanoṣi raśmibhir āntarikṣam uru priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7220: RV_4,053.01a tad devasya savitur vāryam mahad vṛṇīmahe asurasya pracetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7221: RV_4,053.01c chardir yena dāśuṣe yacchati tmanā tan no mahāṃ ud ayān devo aktubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7222: RV_4,053.02a divo dhartā bhuvanasya prajāpatiḥ piśaṅgaṃ drāpim prati muñcate kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7223: RV_4,053.02c vicakṣaṇaḥ prathayann āpṛṇann urv ajījanat savitā sumnam ukthyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7224: RV_4,053.03a āprā rajāṃsi divyāni pārthivā ślokaṃ devaḥ kṛṇute svāya dharmaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7225: RV_4,053.03c pra bāhū asrāk savitā savīmani niveśayan prasuvann aktubhir jagat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7226: RV_4,053.04a adābhyo bhuvanāni pracākaśad vratāni devaḥ savitābhi rakṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7227: RV_4,053.04c prāsrāg bāhū bhuvanasya prajābhyo dhṛtavrato maho ajmasya rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:7228: RV_4,053.05a trir antarikṣaṃ savitā mahitvanā trī rajāṃsi paribhus trīṇi rocanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7229: RV_4,053.05c tisro divaḥ pṛthivīs tisra invati tribhir vratair abhi no rakṣati tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7230: RV_4,053.06a bṛhatsumnaḥ prasavītā niveśano jagata sthātur ubhayasya yo vaśī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7231: RV_4,053.06c sa no devaḥ savitā śarma yacchatv asme kṣayāya trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7232: RV_4,053.07a āgan deva ṛtubhir vardhatu kṣayaṃ dadhātu naḥ savitā suprajām iṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7233: RV_4,053.07c sa naḥ kṣapābhir ahabhiś ca jinvatu prajāvantaṃ rayim asme sam invatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:7234: RV_4,054.01a abhūd devaḥ savitā vandyo nu na idānīm ahna upavācyo nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7235: RV_4,054.01c vi yo ratnā bhajati mānavebhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ no atra draviṇaṃ yathā dadhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7236: RV_4,054.02a devebhyo hi prathamaṃ yajñiyebhyo 'mṛtatvaṃ suvasi bhāgam uttamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7237: RV_4,054.02c ād id dāmānaṃ savitar vy ūrṇuṣe 'nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7238: RV_4,054.03a acittī yac cakṛmā daivye jane dīnair dakṣaiḥ prabhūtī pūruṣatvatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7239: RV_4,054.03c deveṣu ca savitar mānuṣeṣu ca tvaṃ no atra suvatād anāgasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7240: RV_4,054.04a na pramiye savitur daivyasya tad yathā viśvam bhuvanaṃ dhārayiṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:7241: RV_4,054.04c yat pṛthivyā varimann ā svaṅgurir varṣman divaḥ suvati satyam asya tat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7242: RV_4,054.05a indrajyeṣṭhān bṛhadbhyaḥ parvatebhyaḥ kṣayāṃ ebhyaḥ suvasi pastyāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7243: RV_4,054.05c yathā-yathā patayanto viyemira evaiva tasthuḥ savitaḥ savāya te //
GV01rvh1-10u:7244: RV_4,054.06a ye te trir ahan savitaḥ savāso dive-dive saubhagam āsuvanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7245: RV_4,054.06c indro dyāvāpṛthivī sindhur adbhir ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7246: RV_4,055.01a ko vas trātā vasavaḥ ko varūtā dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7247: RV_4,055.01c sahīyaso varuṇa mitra martāt ko vo 'dhvare varivo dhāti devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7248: RV_4,055.02a pra ye dhāmāni pūrvyāṇy arcān vi yad ucchān viyotāro amūrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7249: RV_4,055.02c vidhātāro vi te dadhur ajasrā ṛtadhītayo rurucanta dasmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7250: RV_4,055.03a pra pastyām aditiṃ sindhum arkaiḥ svastim īḷe sakhyāya devīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:7251: RV_4,055.03c ubhe yathā no ahanī nipāta uṣāsānaktā karatām adabdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7252: RV_4,055.04a vy aryamā varuṇaś ceti panthām iṣas patiḥ suvitaṃ gātum agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7253: RV_4,055.04c indrāviṣṇū nṛvad u ṣu stavānā śarma no yantam amavad varūtham //
GV01rvh1-10u:7254: RV_4,055.05a ā parvatasya marutām avāṃsi devasya trātur avri bhagasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7255: RV_4,055.05c pāt patir janyād aṃhaso no mitro mitriyād uta na uruṣyet //
GV01rvh1-10u:7256: RV_4,055.06a nū rodasī ahinā budhnyena stuvīta devī apyebhir iṣṭaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7257: RV_4,055.06c samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavo gharmasvaraso nadyo apa vran //
GV01rvh1-10u:7258: RV_4,055.07a devair no devy aditir ni pātu devas trātā trāyatām aprayucchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7259: RV_4,055.07c nahi mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim arhāmasi pramiyaṃ sānv agneḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7260: RV_4,055.08a agnir īśe vasavyasyāgnir mahaḥ saubhagasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7262: RV_4,055.09a uṣo maghony ā vaha sūnṛte vāryā puru /
GV01rvh1-10u:7264: RV_4,055.10a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7266: RV_4,056.01a mahī dyāvāpṛthivī iha jyeṣṭhe rucā bhavatāṃ śucayadbhir arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7267: RV_4,056.01c yat sīṃ variṣṭhe bṛhatī viminvan ruvad dhokṣā paprathānebhir evaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7268: RV_4,056.02a devī devebhir yajate yajatrair aminatī tasthatur ukṣamāṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7269: RV_4,056.02c ṛtāvarī adruhā devaputre yajñasya netrī śucayadbhir arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7270: RV_4,056.03a sa it svapā bhuvaneṣv āsa ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:7271: RV_4,056.03c urvī gabhīre rajasī sumeke avaṃśe dhīraḥ śacyā sam airat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7272: RV_4,056.04a nū rodasī bṛhadbhir no varūthaiḥ patnīvadbhir iṣayantī sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7273: RV_4,056.04c urūcī viśve yajate ni pātaṃ dhiyā syāma rathyaḥ sadāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7274: RV_4,056.05a pra vām mahi dyavī abhy upastutim bharāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7276: RV_4,056.06a punāne tanvā mithaḥ svena dakṣeṇa rājathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7278: RV_4,056.07a mahī mitrasya sādhathas tarantī pipratī ṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7280: RV_4,057.01a kṣetrasya patinā vayaṃ hiteneva jayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7281: RV_4,057.01c gām aśvam poṣayitnv ā sa no mṛḷātīdṛśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7282: RV_4,057.02a kṣetrasya pate madhumantam ūrmiṃ dhenur iva payo asmāsu dhukṣva /
GV01rvh1-10u:7283: RV_4,057.02c madhuścutaṃ ghṛtam iva supūtam ṛtasya naḥ patayo mṛḷayantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:7284: RV_4,057.03a madhumatīr oṣadhīr dyāva āpo madhuman no bhavatv antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7285: RV_4,057.03c kṣetrasya patir madhumān no astv ariṣyanto anv enaṃ carema //
GV01rvh1-10u:7286: RV_4,057.04a śunaṃ vāhāḥ śunaṃ naraḥ śunaṃ kṛṣatu lāṅgalam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7287: RV_4,057.04c śunaṃ varatrā badhyantāṃ śunam aṣṭrām ud iṅgaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7288: RV_4,057.05a śunāsīrāv imāṃ vācaṃ juṣethāṃ yad divi cakrathuḥ payaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7290: RV_4,057.06a arvācī subhage bhava sīte vandāmahe tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7291: RV_4,057.06c yathā naḥ subhagāsasi yathā naḥ suphalāsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7292: RV_4,057.07a indraḥ sītāṃ ni gṛhṇātu tām pūṣānu yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7293: RV_4,057.07c sā naḥ payasvatī duhām uttarām-uttarāṃ samām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7294: RV_4,057.08a śunaṃ naḥ phālā vi kṛṣantu bhūmiṃ śunaṃ kīnāśā abhi yantu vāhaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7295: RV_4,057.08c śunam parjanyo madhunā payobhiḥ śunāsīrā śunam asmāsu dhattam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7296: RV_4,058.01a samudrād ūrmir madhumāṃ ud ārad upāṃśunā sam amṛtatvam ānaṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7297: RV_4,058.01c ghṛtasya nāma guhyaṃ yad asti jihvā devānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7298: RV_4,058.02a vayaṃ nāma pra bravāmā ghṛtasyāsmin yajñe dhārayāmā namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7299: RV_4,058.02c upa brahmā śṛṇavac chasyamānaṃ catuḥśṛṅgo 'vamīd gaura etat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7300: RV_4,058.03a catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7301: RV_4,058.03c tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7302: RV_4,058.04a tridhā hitam paṇibhir guhyamānaṃ gavi devāso ghṛtam anv avindan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7303: RV_4,058.04c indra ekaṃ sūrya ekaṃ jajāna venād ekaṃ svadhayā niṣ ṭatakṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7304: RV_4,058.05a etā arṣanti hṛdyāt samudrāc chatavrajā ripuṇā nāvacakṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7305: RV_4,058.05c ghṛtasya dhārā abhi cākaśīmi hiraṇyayo vetaso madhya āsām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7306: RV_4,058.06a samyak sravanti sarito na dhenā antar hṛdā manasā pūyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7307: RV_4,058.06c ete arṣanty ūrmayo ghṛtasya mṛgā iva kṣipaṇor īṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7308: RV_4,058.07a sindhor iva prādhvane śūghanāso vātapramiyaḥ patayanti yahvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7309: RV_4,058.07c ghṛtasya dhārā aruṣo na vājī kāṣṭhā bhindann ūrmibhiḥ pinvamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7310: RV_4,058.08a abhi pravanta samaneva yoṣāḥ kalyāṇyaḥ smayamānāso agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:7311: RV_4,058.08c ghṛtasya dhārāḥ samidho nasanta tā juṣāṇo haryati jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7312: RV_4,058.09a kanyā iva vahatum etavā u añjy añjānā abhi cākaśīmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7313: RV_4,058.09c yatra somaḥ sūyate yatra yajño ghṛtasya dhārā abhi tat pavante //
GV01rvh1-10u:7314: RV_4,058.10a abhy arṣata suṣṭutiṃ gavyam ājim asmāsu bhadrā draviṇāni dhatta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7315: RV_4,058.10c imaṃ yajñaṃ nayata devatā no ghṛtasya dhārā madhumat pavante //
GV01rvh1-10u:7316: RV_4,058.11a dhāman te viśvam bhuvanam adhi śritam antaḥ samudre hṛdy antar āyuṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7317: RV_4,058.11c apām anīke samithe ya ābhṛtas tam aśyāma madhumantaṃ ta ūrmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:7320: RV_5,001.01a abodhy agniḥ samidhā janānām prati dhenum ivāyatīm uṣāsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7321: RV_5,001.01c yahvā iva pra vayām ujjihānāḥ pra bhānavaḥ sisrate nākam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:7322: RV_5,001.02a abodhi hotā yajathāya devān ūrdhvo agniḥ sumanāḥ prātar asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:7323: RV_5,001.02c samiddhasya ruśad adarśi pājo mahān devas tamaso nir amoci //
GV01rvh1-10u:7324: RV_5,001.03a yad īṃ gaṇasya raśanām ajīgaḥ śucir aṅkte śucibhir gobhir agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7325: RV_5,001.03c ād dakṣiṇā yujyate vājayanty uttānām ūrdhvo adhayaj juhūbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7326: RV_5,001.04a agnim acchā devayatām manāṃsi cakṣūṃṣīva sūrye saṃ caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7327: RV_5,001.04c yad īṃ suvāte uṣasā virūpe śveto vājī jāyate agre ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7328: RV_5,001.05a janiṣṭa hi jenyo agre ahnāṃ hito hiteṣv aruṣo vaneṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7329: RV_5,001.05c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhāno 'gnir hotā ni ṣasādā yajīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7330: RV_5,001.06a agnir hotā ny asīdad yajīyān upasthe mātuḥ surabhā u loke /
GV01rvh1-10u:7331: RV_5,001.06c yuvā kaviḥ puruniṣṭha ṛtāvā dhartā kṛṣṭīnām uta madhya iddhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7332: RV_5,001.07a pra ṇu tyaṃ vipram adhvareṣu sādhum agniṃ hotāram īḷate namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7333: RV_5,001.07c ā yas tatāna rodasī ṛtena nityam mṛjanti vājinaṃ ghṛtena //
GV01rvh1-10u:7334: RV_5,001.08a mārjālyo mṛjyate sve damūnāḥ kavipraśasto atithiḥ śivo naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7335: RV_5,001.08c sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabhas tadojā viśvāṃ agne sahasā prāsy anyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7336: RV_5,001.09a pra sadyo agne aty eṣy anyān āvir yasmai cārutamo babhūtha /
GV01rvh1-10u:7337: RV_5,001.09c īḷenyo vapuṣyo vibhāvā priyo viśām atithir mānuṣīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7338: RV_5,001.10a tubhyam bharanti kṣitayo yaviṣṭha balim agne antita ota dūrāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:7339: RV_5,001.10c ā bhandiṣṭhasya sumatiṃ cikiddhi bṛhat te agne mahi śarma bhadram //
GV01rvh1-10u:7340: RV_5,001.11a ādya ratham bhānumo bhānumantam agne tiṣṭha yajatebhiḥ samantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7341: RV_5,001.11c vidvān pathīnām urv antarikṣam eha devān haviradyāya vakṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7342: RV_5,001.12a avocāma kavaye medhyāya vaco vandāru vṛṣabhāya vṛṣṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7343: RV_5,001.12c gaviṣṭhiro namasā stomam agnau divīva rukmam uruvyañcam aśret //
GV01rvh1-10u:7344: RV_5,002.01a kumāram mātā yuvatiḥ samubdhaṃ guhā bibharti na dadāti pitre /
GV01rvh1-10u:7345: RV_5,002.01c anīkam asya na minaj janāsaḥ puraḥ paśyanti nihitam aratau //
GV01rvh1-10u:7346: RV_5,002.02a kam etaṃ tvaṃ yuvate kumāram peṣī bibharṣi mahiṣī jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:7347: RV_5,002.02c pūrvīr hi garbhaḥ śarado vavardhāpaśyaṃ jātaṃ yad asūta mātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7348: RV_5,002.03a hiraṇyadantaṃ śucivarṇam ārāt kṣetrād apaśyam āyudhā mimānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7349: RV_5,002.03c dadāno asmā amṛtaṃ vipṛkvat kim mām anindrāḥ kṛṇavann anukthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7350: RV_5,002.04a kṣetrād apaśyaṃ sanutaś carantaṃ sumad yūthaṃ na puru śobhamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7351: RV_5,002.04c na tā agṛbhrann ajaniṣṭa hi ṣaḥ paliknīr id yuvatayo bhavanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7352: RV_5,002.05a ke me maryakaṃ vi yavanta gobhir na yeṣāṃ gopā araṇaś cid āsa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7353: RV_5,002.05c ya īṃ jagṛbhur ava te sṛjantv ājāti paśva upa naś cikitvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7354: RV_5,002.06a vasāṃ rājānaṃ vasatiṃ janānām arātayo ni dadhur martyeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7355: RV_5,002.06c brahmāṇy atrer ava taṃ sṛjantu ninditāro nindyāso bhavantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:7356: RV_5,002.07a śunaś cic chepaṃ niditaṃ sahasrād yūpād amuñco aśamiṣṭa hi ṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7357: RV_5,002.07c evāsmad agne vi mumugdhi pāśān hotaś cikitva iha tū niṣadya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7358: RV_5,002.08a hṛṇīyamāno apa hi mad aiyeḥ pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca /
GV01rvh1-10u:7359: RV_5,002.08c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7360: RV_5,002.09a vi jyotiṣā bṛhatā bhāty agnir āvir viśvāni kṛṇute mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7361: RV_5,002.09c prādevīr māyāḥ sahate durevāḥ śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7362: RV_5,002.10a uta svānāso divi ṣantv agnes tigmāyudhā rakṣase hantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:7363: RV_5,002.10c made cid asya pra rujanti bhāmā na varante paribādho adevīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7364: RV_5,002.11a etaṃ te stomaṃ tuvijāta vipro rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7365: RV_5,002.11c yadīd agne prati tvaṃ deva haryāḥ svarvatīr apa enā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:7366: RV_5,002.12a tuvigrīvo vṛṣabho vāvṛdhāno 'śatrv aryaḥ sam ajāti vedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7367: RV_5,002.12c itīmam agnim amṛtā avocan barhiṣmate manave śarma yaṃsad dhaviṣmate manave śarma yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7368: RV_5,003.01a tvam agne varuṇo jāyase yat tvam mitro bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7369: RV_5,003.01c tve viśve sahasas putra devās tvam indro dāśuṣe martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7370: RV_5,003.02a tvam aryamā bhavasi yat kanīnāṃ nāma svadhāvan guhyam bibharṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7371: RV_5,003.02c añjanti mitraṃ sudhitaṃ na gobhir yad dampatī samanasā kṛṇoṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7372: RV_5,003.03a tava śriye maruto marjayanta rudra yat te janima cāru citram /
GV01rvh1-10u:7373: RV_5,003.03c padaṃ yad viṣṇor upamaṃ nidhāyi tena pāsi guhyaṃ nāma gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7374: RV_5,003.04a tava śriyā sudṛśo deva devāḥ purū dadhānā amṛtaṃ sapanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7375: RV_5,003.04c hotāram agnim manuṣo ni ṣedur daśasyanta uśijaḥ śaṃsam āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7376: RV_5,003.05a na tvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān na kāvyaiḥ paro asti svadhāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7377: RV_5,003.05c viśaś ca yasyā atithir bhavāsi sa yajñena vanavad deva martān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7378: RV_5,003.06a vayam agne vanuyāma tvotā vasūyavo haviṣā budhyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7379: RV_5,003.06c vayaṃ samarye vidatheṣv ahnāṃ vayaṃ rāyā sahasas putra martān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7380: RV_5,003.07a yo na āgo abhy eno bharāty adhīd agham aghaśaṃse dadhāta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7381: RV_5,003.07c jahī cikitvo abhiśastim etām agne yo no marcayati dvayena //
GV01rvh1-10u:7382: RV_5,003.08a tvām asyā vyuṣi deva pūrve dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta havyaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7383: RV_5,003.08c saṃsthe yad agna īyase rayīṇāṃ devo martair vasubhir idhyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7384: RV_5,003.09a ava spṛdhi pitaraṃ yodhi vidvān putro yas te sahasaḥ sūna ūhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7385: RV_5,003.09c kadā cikitvo abhi cakṣase no 'gne kadāṃ ṛtacid yātayāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:7386: RV_5,003.10a bhūri nāma vandamāno dadhāti pitā vaso yadi taj joṣayāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:7387: RV_5,003.10c kuvid devasya sahasā cakānaḥ sumnam agnir vanate vāvṛdhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7388: RV_5,003.11a tvam aṅga jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭha viśvāny agne duritāti parṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7389: RV_5,003.11c stenā adṛśran ripavo janāso 'jñātaketā vṛjinā abhūvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7390: RV_5,003.12a ime yāmāsas tvadrig abhūvan vasave vā tad id āgo avāci /
GV01rvh1-10u:7391: RV_5,003.12c nāhāyam agnir abhiśastaye no na rīṣate vāvṛdhānaḥ parā dāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:7392: RV_5,004.01a tvām agne vasupatiṃ vasūnām abhi pra mande adhvareṣu rājan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7393: RV_5,004.01c tvayā vājaṃ vājayanto jayemābhi ṣyāma pṛtsutīr martyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7394: RV_5,004.02a havyavāḷ agnir ajaraḥ pitā no vibhur vibhāvā sudṛśīko asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:7395: RV_5,004.02c sugārhapatyāḥ sam iṣo didīhy asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7396: RV_5,004.03a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatim mānuṣīṇāṃ śucim pāvakaṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:7397: RV_5,004.03c ni hotāraṃ viśvavidaṃ dadhidhve sa deveṣu vanate vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7398: RV_5,004.04a juṣasvāgna iḷayā sajoṣā yatamāno raśmibhiḥ sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7399: RV_5,004.04c juṣasva naḥ samidhaṃ jātaveda ā ca devān haviradyāya vakṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7400: RV_5,004.05a juṣṭo damūnā atithir duroṇa imaṃ no yajñam upa yāhi vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:7401: RV_5,004.05c viśvā agne abhiyujo vihatyā śatrūyatām ā bharā bhojanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:7402: RV_5,004.06a vadhena dasyum pra hi cātayasva vayaḥ kṛṇvānas tanve svāyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:7403: RV_5,004.06c piparṣi yat sahasas putra devānt so agne pāhi nṛtama vāje asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7404: RV_5,004.07a vayaṃ te agna ukthair vidhema vayaṃ havyaiḥ pāvaka bhadraśoce /
GV01rvh1-10u:7405: RV_5,004.07c asme rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ sam invāsme viśvāni draviṇāni dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7406: RV_5,004.08a asmākam agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva sahasaḥ sūno triṣadhastha havyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7407: RV_5,004.08c vayaṃ deveṣu sukṛtaḥ syāma śarmaṇā nas trivarūthena pāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7408: RV_5,004.09a viśvāni no durgahā jātavedaḥ sindhuṃ na nāvā duritāti parṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7409: RV_5,004.09c agne atrivan namasā gṛṇāno 'smākam bodhy avitā tanūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7410: RV_5,004.10a yas tvā hṛdā kīriṇā manyamāno 'martyam martyo johavīmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7411: RV_5,004.10c jātavedo yaśo asmāsu dhehi prajābhir agne amṛtatvam aśyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7412: RV_5,004.11a yasmai tvaṃ sukṛte jātaveda u lokam agne kṛṇavaḥ syonam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7413: RV_5,004.11c aśvinaṃ sa putriṇaṃ vīravantaṃ gomantaṃ rayiṃ naśate svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7414: RV_5,005.01a susamiddhāya śociṣe ghṛtaṃ tīvraṃ juhotana /
GV01rvh1-10u:7418: RV_5,005.03a īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citram iha priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7420: RV_5,005.04a ūrṇamradā vi prathasvābhy arkā anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:7422: RV_5,005.05a devīr dvāro vi śrayadhvaṃ suprāyaṇā na ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7424: RV_5,005.06a supratīke vayovṛdhā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7426: RV_5,005.07a vātasya patmann īḷitā daivyā hotārā manuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7427: RV_5,005.07c imaṃ no yajñam ā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7428: RV_5,005.08a iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīr mayobhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7430: RV_5,005.09a śivas tvaṣṭar ihā gahi vibhuḥ poṣa uta tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7432: RV_5,005.10a yatra vettha vanaspate devānāṃ guhyā nāmāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:7436: RV_5,006.01a agniṃ tam manye yo vasur astaṃ yaṃ yanti dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7437: RV_5,006.01c astam arvanta āśavo 'staṃ nityāso vājina iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7438: RV_5,006.02a so agnir yo vasur gṛṇe saṃ yam āyanti dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7439: RV_5,006.02c sam arvanto raghudruvaḥ saṃ sujātāsaḥ sūraya iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7440: RV_5,006.03a agnir hi vājinaṃ viśe dadāti viśvacarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7441: RV_5,006.03c agnī rāye svābhuvaṃ sa prīto yāti vāryam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7442: RV_5,006.04a ā te agna idhīmahi dyumantaṃ devājaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:7443: RV_5,006.04c yad dha syā te panīyasī samid dīdayati dyavīṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7444: RV_5,006.05a ā te agna ṛcā haviḥ śukrasya śociṣas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7445: RV_5,006.05c suścandra dasma viśpate havyavāṭ tubhyaṃ hūyata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7446: RV_5,006.06a pro tye agnayo 'gniṣu viśvam puṣyanti vāryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7447: RV_5,006.06c te hinvire ta invire ta iṣaṇyanty ānuṣag iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7448: RV_5,006.07a tava tye agne arcayo mahi vrādhanta vājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7449: RV_5,006.07c ye patvabhiḥ śaphānāṃ vrajā bhuranta gonām iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7450: RV_5,006.08a navā no agna ā bhara stotṛbhyaḥ sukṣitīr iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7451: RV_5,006.08c te syāma ya ānṛcus tvādūtāso dame-dama iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7452: RV_5,006.09a ubhe suścandra sarpiṣo darvī śrīṇīṣa āsani /
GV01rvh1-10u:7453: RV_5,006.09c uto na ut pupūryā uktheṣu śavasas pata iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7454: RV_5,006.10a evāṃ agnim ajuryamur gīrbhir yajñebhir ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:7455: RV_5,006.10c dadhad asme suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam iṣaṃ stotṛbhya ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7456: RV_5,007.01a sakhāyaḥ saṃ vaḥ samyañcam iṣaṃ stomaṃ cāgnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7457: RV_5,007.01c varṣiṣṭhāya kṣitīnām ūrjo naptre sahasvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7458: RV_5,007.02a kutrā cid yasya samṛtau raṇvā naro nṛṣadane /
GV01rvh1-10u:7459: RV_5,007.02c arhantaś cid yam indhate saṃjanayanti jantavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7460: RV_5,007.03a saṃ yad iṣo vanāmahe saṃ havyā mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7461: RV_5,007.03c uta dyumnasya śavasa ṛtasya raśmim ā dade //
GV01rvh1-10u:7462: RV_5,007.04a sa smā kṛṇoti ketum ā naktaṃ cid dūra ā sate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7463: RV_5,007.04c pāvako yad vanaspatīn pra smā mināty ajaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7464: RV_5,007.05a ava sma yasya veṣaṇe svedam pathiṣu juhvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:7465: RV_5,007.05c abhīm aha svajenyam bhūmā pṛṣṭheva ruruhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7466: RV_5,007.06a yam martyaḥ puruspṛhaṃ vidad viśvasya dhāyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:7467: RV_5,007.06c pra svādanam pitūnām astatātiṃ cid āyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:7468: RV_5,007.07a sa hi ṣmā dhanvākṣitaṃ dātā na dāty ā paśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7470: RV_5,007.08a śuciḥ ṣma yasmā atrivat pra svadhitīva rīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7471: RV_5,007.08c suṣūr asūta mātā krāṇā yad ānaśe bhagam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7472: RV_5,007.09a ā yas te sarpirāsute 'gne śam asti dhāyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:7473: RV_5,007.09c aiṣu dyumnam uta śrava ā cittam martyeṣu dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7474: RV_5,007.10a iti cin manyum adhrijas tvādātam ā paśuṃ dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:7475: RV_5,007.10c ād agne apṛṇato 'triḥ sāsahyād dasyūn iṣaḥ sāsahyān nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:7476: RV_5,008.01a tvām agna ṛtāyavaḥ sam īdhire pratnam pratnāsa ūtaye sahaskṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7477: RV_5,008.01c puruścandraṃ yajataṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ damūnasaṃ gṛhapatiṃ vareṇyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7478: RV_5,008.02a tvām agne atithim pūrvyaṃ viśaḥ śociṣkeśaṃ gṛhapatiṃ ni ṣedire /
GV01rvh1-10u:7479: RV_5,008.02c bṛhatketum pururūpaṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ suśarmāṇaṃ svavasaṃ jaradviṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7480: RV_5,008.03a tvām agne mānuṣīr īḷate viśo hotrāvidaṃ viviciṃ ratnadhātamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7481: RV_5,008.03c guhā santaṃ subhaga viśvadarśataṃ tuviṣvaṇasaṃ suyajaṃ ghṛtaśriyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7482: RV_5,008.04a tvām agne dharṇasiṃ viśvadhā vayaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanto namasopa sedima /
GV01rvh1-10u:7483: RV_5,008.04c sa no juṣasva samidhāno aṅgiro devo martasya yaśasā sudītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7484: RV_5,008.05a tvam agne pururūpo viśe-viśe vayo dadhāsi pratnathā puruṣṭuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7485: RV_5,008.05c purūṇy annā sahasā vi rājasi tviṣiḥ sā te titviṣāṇasya nādhṛṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7486: RV_5,008.06a tvām agne samidhānaṃ yaviṣṭhya devā dūtaṃ cakrire havyavāhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7487: RV_5,008.06c urujrayasaṃ ghṛtayonim āhutaṃ tveṣaṃ cakṣur dadhire codayanmati //
GV01rvh1-10u:7488: RV_5,008.07a tvām agne pradiva āhutaṃ ghṛtaiḥ sumnāyavaḥ suṣamidhā sam īdhire /
GV01rvh1-10u:7489: RV_5,008.07c sa vāvṛdhāna oṣadhībhir ukṣito 'bhi jrayāṃsi pārthivā vi tiṣṭhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:7490: RV_5,009.01a tvām agne haviṣmanto devam martāsa īḷate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7491: RV_5,009.01c manye tvā jātavedasaṃ sa havyā vakṣy ānuṣak //
GV01rvh1-10u:7492: RV_5,009.02a agnir hotā dāsvataḥ kṣayasya vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7493: RV_5,009.02c saṃ yajñāsaś caranti yaṃ saṃ vājāsaḥ śravasyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7494: RV_5,009.03a uta sma yaṃ śiśuṃ yathā navaṃ janiṣṭāraṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:7495: RV_5,009.03c dhartāram mānuṣīṇāṃ viśām agniṃ svadhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:7496: RV_5,009.04a uta sma durgṛbhīyase putro na hvāryāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7497: RV_5,009.04c purū yo dagdhāsi vanāgne paśur na yavase //
GV01rvh1-10u:7498: RV_5,009.05a adha sma yasyārcayaḥ samyak saṃyanti dhūminaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7499: RV_5,009.05c yad īm aha trito divy upa dhmāteva dhamati śiśīte dhmātarī yathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7500: RV_5,009.06a tavāham agna ūtibhir mitrasya ca praśastibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7501: RV_5,009.06c dveṣoyuto na duritā turyāma martyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7502: RV_5,009.07a taṃ no agne abhī naro rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7503: RV_5,009.07c sa kṣepayat sa poṣayad bhuvad vājasya sātaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7504: RV_5,010.01a agna ojiṣṭham ā bhara dyumnam asmabhyam adhrigo /
GV01rvh1-10u:7505: RV_5,010.01c pra no rāyā parīṇasā ratsi vājāya panthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7506: RV_5,010.02a tvaṃ no agne adbhuta kratvā dakṣasya maṃhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7507: RV_5,010.02c tve asuryam āruhat krāṇā mitro na yajñiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7508: RV_5,010.03a tvaṃ no agna eṣāṃ gayam puṣṭiṃ ca vardhaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7509: RV_5,010.03c ye stomebhiḥ pra sūrayo naro maghāny ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7510: RV_5,010.04a ye agne candra te giraḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7511: RV_5,010.04c śuṣmebhiḥ śuṣmiṇo naro divaś cid yeṣām bṛhat sukīrtir bodhati tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7512: RV_5,010.05a tava tye agne arcayo bhrājanto yanti dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7513: RV_5,010.05c parijmāno na vidyutaḥ svāno ratho na vājayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7514: RV_5,010.06a nū no agna ūtaye sabādhasaś ca rātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7515: RV_5,010.06c asmākāsaś ca sūrayo viśvā āśās tarīṣaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7516: RV_5,010.07a tvaṃ no agne aṅgira stuta stavāna ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7517: RV_5,010.07c hotar vibhvāsahaṃ rayiṃ stotṛbhya stavase ca na utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7518: RV_5,011.01a janasya gopā ajaniṣṭa jāgṛvir agniḥ sudakṣaḥ suvitāya navyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:7519: RV_5,011.01c ghṛtapratīko bṛhatā divispṛśā dyumad vi bhāti bharatebhyaḥ śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7520: RV_5,011.02a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitam agniṃ naras triṣadhasthe sam īdhire /
GV01rvh1-10u:7521: RV_5,011.02c indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ sa barhiṣi sīdan ni hotā yajathāya sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7522: RV_5,011.03a asammṛṣṭo jāyase mātroḥ śucir mandraḥ kavir ud atiṣṭho vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7523: RV_5,011.03c ghṛtena tvāvardhayann agna āhuta dhūmas te ketur abhavad divi śritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7524: RV_5,011.04a agnir no yajñam upa vetu sādhuyāgniṃ naro vi bharante gṛhe-gṛhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7525: RV_5,011.04c agnir dūto abhavad dhavyavāhano 'gniṃ vṛṇānā vṛṇate kavikratum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7526: RV_5,011.05a tubhyedam agne madhumattamaṃ vacas tubhyam manīṣā iyam astu śaṃ hṛde /
GV01rvh1-10u:7527: RV_5,011.05c tvāṃ giraḥ sindhum ivāvanīr mahīr ā pṛṇanti śavasā vardhayanti ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:7528: RV_5,011.06a tvām agne aṅgiraso guhā hitam anv avindañ chiśriyāṇaṃ vane-vane /
GV01rvh1-10u:7529: RV_5,011.06c sa jāyase mathyamānaḥ saho mahat tvām āhuḥ sahasas putram aṅgiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7530: RV_5,012.01a prāgnaye bṛhate yajñiyāya ṛtasya vṛṣṇe asurāya manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:7531: RV_5,012.01c ghṛtaṃ na yajña āsye supūtaṃ giram bhare vṛṣabhāya pratīcīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:7532: RV_5,012.02a ṛtaṃ cikitva ṛtam ic cikiddhy ṛtasya dhārā anu tṛndhi pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7533: RV_5,012.02c nāhaṃ yātuṃ sahasā na dvayena ṛtaṃ sapāmy aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7534: RV_5,012.03a kayā no agna ṛtayann ṛtena bhuvo navedā ucathasya navyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7535: RV_5,012.03c vedā me deva ṛtupā ṛtūnāṃ nāham patiṃ sanitur asya rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7536: RV_5,012.04a ke te agne ripave bandhanāsaḥ ke pāyavaḥ saniṣanta dyumantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7537: RV_5,012.04c ke dhāsim agne anṛtasya pānti ka āsato vacasaḥ santi gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7538: RV_5,012.05a sakhāyas te viṣuṇā agna ete śivāsaḥ santo aśivā abhūvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7539: RV_5,012.05c adhūrṣata svayam ete vacobhir ṛjūyate vṛjināni bruvantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7540: RV_5,012.06a yas te agne namasā yajñam īṭṭa ṛtaṃ sa pāty aruṣasya vṛṣṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7541: RV_5,012.06c tasya kṣayaḥ pṛthur ā sādhur etu prasarsrāṇasya nahuṣasya śeṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7542: RV_5,013.01a arcantas tvā havāmahe 'rcantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7544: RV_5,013.02a agne stomam manāmahe sidhram adya divispṛśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7546: RV_5,013.03a agnir juṣata no giro hotā yo mānuṣeṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7548: RV_5,013.04a tvam agne saprathā asi juṣṭo hotā vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7550: RV_5,013.05a tvām agne vājasātamaṃ viprā vardhanti suṣṭutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7552: RV_5,013.06a agne nemir arāṃ iva devāṃs tvam paribhūr asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7554: RV_5,014.01a agniṃ stomena bodhaya samidhāno amartyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7556: RV_5,014.02a tam adhvareṣv īḷate devam martā amartyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7558: RV_5,014.03a taṃ hi śaśvanta īḷate srucā devaṃ ghṛtaścutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7560: RV_5,014.04a agnir jāto arocata ghnan dasyūñ jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7562: RV_5,014.05a agnim īḷenyaṃ kaviṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ saparyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:7564: RV_5,014.06a agniṃ ghṛtena vāvṛdhu stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:7566: RV_5,015.01a pra vedhase kavaye vedyāya giram bhare yaśase pūrvyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7567: RV_5,015.01c ghṛtaprasatto asuraḥ suśevo rāyo dhartā dharuṇo vasvo agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7568: RV_5,015.02a ṛtena ṛtaṃ dharuṇaṃ dhārayanta yajñasya śāke parame vyoman /
GV01rvh1-10u:7569: RV_5,015.02c divo dharman dharuṇe seduṣo nṝñ jātair ajātāṃ abhi ye nanakṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7570: RV_5,015.03a aṅhoyuvas tanvas tanvate vi vayo mahad duṣṭaram pūrvyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7571: RV_5,015.03c sa saṃvato navajātas tuturyāt siṅhaṃ na kruddham abhitaḥ pari ṣṭhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7572: RV_5,015.04a māteva yad bharase paprathāno janaṃ-janaṃ dhāyase cakṣase ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:7573: RV_5,015.04c vayo-vayo jarase yad dadhānaḥ pari tmanā viṣurūpo jigāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7574: RV_5,015.05a vājo nu te śavasas pātv antam uruṃ doghaṃ dharuṇaṃ deva rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7575: RV_5,015.05c padaṃ na tāyur guhā dadhāno maho rāye citayann atrim aspaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7576: RV_5,016.01a bṛhad vayo hi bhānave 'rcā devāyāgnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7577: RV_5,016.01c yam mitraṃ na praśastibhir martāso dadhire puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7578: RV_5,016.02a sa hi dyubhir janānāṃ hotā dakṣasya bāhvoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7579: RV_5,016.02c vi havyam agnir ānuṣag bhago na vāram ṛṇvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:7580: RV_5,016.03a asya stome maghonaḥ sakhye vṛddhaśociṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7581: RV_5,016.03c viśvā yasmin tuviṣvaṇi sam arye śuṣmam ādadhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7582: RV_5,016.04a adhā hy agna eṣāṃ suvīryasya maṃhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7583: RV_5,016.04c tam id yahvaṃ na rodasī pari śravo babhūvatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7584: RV_5,016.05a nū na ehi vāryam agne gṛṇāna ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7585: RV_5,016.05c ye vayaṃ ye ca sūrayaḥ svasti dhāmahe sacotaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7586: RV_5,017.01a ā yajñair deva martya itthā tavyāṃsam ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7587: RV_5,017.01c agniṃ kṛte svadhvare pūrur īḷītāvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:7588: RV_5,017.02a asya hi svayaśastara āsā vidharman manyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:7589: RV_5,017.02c taṃ nākaṃ citraśociṣam mandram paro manīṣayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7590: RV_5,017.03a asya vāsā u arciṣā ya āyukta tujā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7591: RV_5,017.03c divo na yasya retasā bṛhac chocanty arcayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7592: RV_5,017.04a asya kratvā vicetaso dasmasya vasu ratha ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7593: RV_5,017.04c adhā viśvāsu havyo 'gnir vikṣu pra śasyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7594: RV_5,017.05a nū na id dhi vāryam āsā sacanta sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7595: RV_5,017.05c ūrjo napād abhiṣṭaye pāhi śagdhi svastaya utaidhi pṛtsu no vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7596: RV_5,018.01a prātar agniḥ purupriyo viśa stavetātithiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7597: RV_5,018.01c viśvāni yo amartyo havyā marteṣu raṇyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:7598: RV_5,018.02a dvitāya mṛktavāhase svasya dakṣasya maṃhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7599: RV_5,018.02c induṃ sa dhatta ānuṣak stotā cit te amartya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7600: RV_5,018.03a taṃ vo dīrghāyuśociṣaṃ girā huve maghonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7601: RV_5,018.03c ariṣṭo yeṣāṃ ratho vy aśvadāvann īyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7602: RV_5,018.04a citrā vā yeṣu dīdhitir āsann ukthā pānti ye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7603: RV_5,018.04b stīrṇam barhiḥ svarṇare śravāṃsi dadhire pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:7604: RV_5,018.05a ye me pañcāśataṃ dadur aśvānāṃ sadhastuti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7605: RV_5,018.05b dyumad agne mahi śravo bṛhat kṛdhi maghonāṃ nṛvad amṛta nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7606: RV_5,019.01a abhy avasthāḥ pra jāyante pra vavrer vavriś ciketa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7608: RV_5,019.02a juhure vi citayanto 'nimiṣaṃ nṛmṇam pānti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7610: RV_5,019.03a ā śvaitreyasya jantavo dyumad vardhanta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7611: RV_5,019.03b niṣkagrīvo bṛhaduktha enā madhvā na vājayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7612: RV_5,019.04a priyaṃ dugdhaṃ na kāmyam ajāmi jāmyoḥ sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7613: RV_5,019.04c gharmo na vājajaṭharo 'dabdhaḥ śaśvato dabhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7614: RV_5,019.05a krīḷan no raśma ā bhuvaḥ sam bhasmanā vāyunā vevidānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7615: RV_5,019.05b tā asya san dhṛṣajo na tigmāḥ susaṃśitā vakṣyo vakṣaṇesthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7616: RV_5,020.01a yam agne vājasātama tvaṃ cin manyase rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:7617: RV_5,020.01c taṃ no gīrbhiḥ śravāyyaṃ devatrā panayā yujam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7618: RV_5,020.02a ye agne nerayanti te vṛddhā ugrasya śavasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7619: RV_5,020.02b apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyavratasya saścire //
GV01rvh1-10u:7620: RV_5,020.03a hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe 'gne dakṣasya sādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7621: RV_5,020.03b yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ girā prayasvanto havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7622: RV_5,020.04a itthā yathā ta ūtaye sahasāvan dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:7623: RV_5,020.04b rāya ṛtāya sukrato gobhiḥ ṣyāma sadhamādo vīraiḥ syāma sadhamādaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7624: RV_5,021.01a manuṣvat tvā ni dhīmahi manuṣvat sam idhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7625: RV_5,021.01c agne manuṣvad aṅgiro devān devayate yaja //
GV01rvh1-10u:7626: RV_5,021.02a tvaṃ hi mānuṣe jane 'gne suprīta idhyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:7627: RV_5,021.02c srucas tvā yanty ānuṣak sujāta sarpirāsute //
GV01rvh1-10u:7628: RV_5,021.03a tvāṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:7629: RV_5,021.03b saparyantas tvā kave yajñeṣu devam īḷate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7630: RV_5,021.04a devaṃ vo devayajyayāgnim īḷīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7631: RV_5,021.04b samiddhaḥ śukra dīdihy ṛtasya yonim āsadaḥ sasasya yonim āsadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7632: RV_5,022.01a pra viśvasāmann atrivad arcā pāvakaśociṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7633: RV_5,022.01c yo adhvareṣv īḍyo hotā mandratamo viśi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7634: RV_5,022.02a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ dadhātā devam ṛtvijam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7635: RV_5,022.02c pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7636: RV_5,022.03a cikitvinmanasaṃ tvā devam martāsa ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7638: RV_5,022.04a agne cikiddhy asya na idaṃ vacaḥ sahasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7639: RV_5,022.04c taṃ tvā suśipra dampate stomair vardhanty atrayo gīrbhiḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7640: RV_5,023.01a agne sahantam ā bhara dyumnasya prāsahā rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:7641: RV_5,023.01c viśvā yaś carṣaṇīr abhy āsā vājeṣu sāsahat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7642: RV_5,023.02a tam agne pṛtanāṣahaṃ rayiṃ sahasva ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7643: RV_5,023.02b tvaṃ hi satyo adbhuto dātā vājasya gomataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7644: RV_5,023.03a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7645: RV_5,023.03c hotāraṃ sadmasu priyaṃ vyanti vāryā puru //
GV01rvh1-10u:7646: RV_5,023.04a sa hi ṣmā viśvacarṣaṇir abhimāti saho dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7647: RV_5,023.04b agna eṣu kṣayeṣv ā revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7648: RV_5,024.01a agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhavā varūthyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7649: RV_5,024.02a vasur agnir vasuśravā acchā nakṣi dyumattamaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7650: RV_5,024.03a sa no bodhi śrudhī havam uruṣyā ṇo aghāyataḥ samasmāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:7651: RV_5,024.04a taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7652: RV_5,025.01a acchā vo agnim avase devaṃ gāsi sa no vasuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7653: RV_5,025.01c rāsat putra ṛṣūṇām ṛtāvā parṣati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7654: RV_5,025.02a sa hi satyo yam pūrve cid devāsaś cid yam īdhire /
GV01rvh1-10u:7655: RV_5,025.02c hotāram mandrajihvam it sudītibhir vibhāvasum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7656: RV_5,025.03a sa no dhītī variṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā ca sumatyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7657: RV_5,025.03c agne rāyo didīhi naḥ suvṛktibhir vareṇya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7658: RV_5,025.04a agnir deveṣu rājaty agnir marteṣv āviśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7659: RV_5,025.04c agnir no havyavāhano 'gniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:7661: RV_5,025.05c atūrtaṃ śrāvayatpatim putraṃ dadāti dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7662: RV_5,025.06a agnir dadāti satpatiṃ sāsāha yo yudhā nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7663: RV_5,025.06c agnir atyaṃ raghuṣyadaṃ jetāram aparājitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7664: RV_5,025.07a yad vāhiṣṭhaṃ tad agnaye bṛhad arca vibhāvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:7665: RV_5,025.07c mahiṣīva tvad rayis tvad vājā ud īrate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7666: RV_5,025.08a tava dyumanto arcayo grāvevocyate bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7667: RV_5,025.08c uto te tanyatur yathā svāno arta tmanā divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7668: RV_5,025.09a evāṃ agniṃ vasūyavaḥ sahasānaṃ vavandima /
GV01rvh1-10u:7669: RV_5,025.09c sa no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ parṣan nāveva sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7670: RV_5,026.01a agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7671: RV_5,026.01c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:7672: RV_5,026.02a taṃ tvā ghṛtasnav īmahe citrabhāno svardṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7674: RV_5,026.03a vītihotraṃ tvā kave dyumantaṃ sam idhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7676: RV_5,026.04a agne viśvebhir ā gahi devebhir havyadātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7678: RV_5,026.05a yajamānāya sunvata āgne suvīryaṃ vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:7680: RV_5,026.06a samidhānaḥ sahasrajid agne dharmāṇi puṣyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7682: RV_5,026.07a ny agniṃ jātavedasaṃ hotravāhaṃ yaviṣṭhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7684: RV_5,026.08a pra yajña etv ānuṣag adyā devavyacastamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7686: RV_5,026.09a edam maruto aśvinā mitraḥ sīdantu varuṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7688: RV_5,027.01a anasvantā satpatir māmahe me gāvā cetiṣṭho asuro maghonaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7689: RV_5,027.01c traivṛṣṇo agne daśabhiḥ sahasrair vaiśvānara tryaruṇaś ciketa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7690: RV_5,027.02a yo me śatā ca viṃśatiṃ ca gonāṃ harī ca yuktā sudhurā dadāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7691: RV_5,027.02c vaiśvānara suṣṭuto vāvṛdhāno 'gne yaccha tryaruṇāya śarma //
GV01rvh1-10u:7692: RV_5,027.03a evā te agne sumatiṃ cakāno naviṣṭhāya navamaṃ trasadasyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7693: RV_5,027.03c yo me giras tuvijātasya pūrvīr yuktenābhi tryaruṇo gṛṇāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7694: RV_5,027.04a yo ma iti pravocaty aśvamedhāya sūraye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7695: RV_5,027.04b dadad ṛcā saniṃ yate dadan medhām ṛtāyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7696: RV_5,027.05a yasya mā paruṣāḥ śatam uddharṣayanty ukṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7697: RV_5,027.05c aśvamedhasya dānāḥ somā iva tryāśiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7699: RV_5,027.06c kṣatraṃ dhārayatam bṛhad divi sūryam ivājaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:7700: RV_5,028.01a samiddho agnir divi śocir aśret pratyaṅṅ uṣasam urviyā vi bhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7701: RV_5,028.01c eti prācī viśvavārā namobhir devāṃ īḷānā haviṣā ghṛtācī //
GV01rvh1-10u:7702: RV_5,028.02a samidhyamāno amṛtasya rājasi haviṣ kṛṇvantaṃ sacase svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:7703: RV_5,028.02c viśvaṃ sa dhatte draviṇaṃ yam invasy ātithyam agne ni ca dhatta it puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7704: RV_5,028.03a agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7705: RV_5,028.03c saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7706: RV_5,028.04a samiddhasya pramahaso 'gne vande tava śriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7707: RV_5,028.04c vṛṣabho dyumnavāṃ asi sam adhvareṣv idhyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:7708: RV_5,028.05a samiddho agna āhuta devān yakṣi svadhvara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7710: RV_5,028.06a ā juhotā duvasyatāgnim prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:7712: RV_5,029.01a try aryamā manuṣo devatātā trī rocanā divyā dhārayanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7713: RV_5,029.01c arcanti tvā marutaḥ pūtadakṣās tvam eṣām ṛṣir indrāsi dhīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7714: RV_5,029.02a anu yad īm maruto mandasānam ārcann indram papivāṃsaṃ sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7715: RV_5,029.02c ādatta vajram abhi yad ahiṃ hann apo yahvīr asṛjat sartavā u //
GV01rvh1-10u:7716: RV_5,029.03a uta brahmāṇo maruto me asyendraḥ somasya suṣutasya peyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7717: RV_5,029.03c tad dhi havyam manuṣe gā avindad ahann ahim papivāṃ indro asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7718: RV_5,029.04a ād rodasī vitaraṃ vi ṣkabhāyat saṃvivyānaś cid bhiyase mṛgaṃ kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7719: RV_5,029.04c jigartim indro apajargurāṇaḥ prati śvasantam ava dānavaṃ han //
GV01rvh1-10u:7720: RV_5,029.05a adha kratvā maghavan tubhyaṃ devā anu viśve adaduḥ somapeyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7721: RV_5,029.05c yat sūryasya haritaḥ patantīḥ puraḥ satīr uparā etaśe kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7722: RV_5,029.06a nava yad asya navatiṃ ca bhogān sākaṃ vajreṇa maghavā vivṛścat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7723: RV_5,029.06c arcantīndram marutaḥ sadhasthe traiṣṭubhena vacasā bādhata dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7724: RV_5,029.07a sakhā sakhye apacat tūyam agnir asya kratvā mahiṣā trī śatāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:7725: RV_5,029.07c trī sākam indro manuṣaḥ sarāṃsi sutam pibad vṛtrahatyāya somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7726: RV_5,029.08a trī yac chatā mahiṣāṇām agho mās trī sarāṃsi maghavā somyāpāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7727: RV_5,029.08c kāraṃ na viśve ahvanta devā bharam indrāya yad ahiṃ jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:7728: RV_5,029.09a uśanā yat sahasyair ayātaṃ gṛham indra jūjuvānebhir aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7729: RV_5,029.09c vanvāno atra sarathaṃ yayātha kutsena devair avanor ha śuṣṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7730: RV_5,029.10a prānyac cakram avṛhaḥ sūryasya kutsāyānyad varivo yātave 'kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7731: RV_5,029.10c anāso dasyūṃr amṛṇo vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7732: RV_5,029.11a stomāsas tvā gaurivīter avardhann arandhayo vaidathināya piprum /
GV01rvh1-10u:7733: RV_5,029.11c ā tvām ṛjiśvā sakhyāya cakre pacan paktīr apibaḥ somam asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7734: RV_5,029.12a navagvāsaḥ sutasomāsa indraṃ daśagvāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7735: RV_5,029.12c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam apidhānavantaṃ taṃ cin naraḥ śaśamānā apa vran //
GV01rvh1-10u:7736: RV_5,029.13a katho nu te pari carāṇi vidvān vīryā maghavan yā cakartha /
GV01rvh1-10u:7737: RV_5,029.13c yā co nu navyā kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha pred u tā te vidatheṣu bravāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:7738: RV_5,029.14a etā viśvā cakṛvāṃ indra bhūry aparīto januṣā vīryeṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7739: RV_5,029.14c yā cin nu vajrin kṛṇavo dadhṛṣvān na te vartā taviṣyā asti tasyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7740: RV_5,029.15a indra brahma kriyamāṇā juṣasva yā te śaviṣṭha navyā akarma /
GV01rvh1-10u:7741: RV_5,029.15c vastreva bhadrā sukṛtā vasūyū rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapā atakṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7742: RV_5,030.01a kva sya vīraḥ ko apaśyad indraṃ sukharatham īyamānaṃ haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7743: RV_5,030.01c yo rāyā vajrī sutasomam icchan tad oko gantā puruhūta ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:7744: RV_5,030.02a avācacakṣam padam asya sasvar ugraṃ nidhātur anv āyam icchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7745: RV_5,030.02c apṛccham anyāṃ uta te ma āhur indraṃ naro bubudhānā aśema //
GV01rvh1-10u:7746: RV_5,030.03a pra nu vayaṃ sute yā te kṛtānīndra bravāma yāni no jujoṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7747: RV_5,030.03b vedad avidvāñ chṛṇavac ca vidvān vahate 'yam maghavā sarvasenaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7748: RV_5,030.04a sthiram manaś cakṛṣe jāta indra veṣīd eko yudhaye bhūyasaś cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:7749: RV_5,030.04b aśmānaṃ cic chavasā didyuto vi vido gavām ūrvam usriyāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7750: RV_5,030.05a paro yat tvam parama ājaniṣṭhāḥ parāvati śrutyaṃ nāma bibhrat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7751: RV_5,030.05c ataś cid indrād abhayanta devā viśvā apo ajayad dāsapatnīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7752: RV_5,030.06a tubhyed ete marutaḥ suśevā arcanty arkaṃ sunvanty andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7753: RV_5,030.06c ahim ohānam apa āśayānam pra māyābhir māyinaṃ sakṣad indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7754: RV_5,030.07a vi ṣū mṛdho januṣā dānam invann ahan gavā maghavan saṃcakānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7755: RV_5,030.07c atrā dāsasya namuceḥ śiro yad avartayo manave gātum icchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7756: RV_5,030.08a yujaṃ hi mām akṛthā ād id indra śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7757: RV_5,030.08c aśmānaṃ cit svaryaṃ vartamānam pra cakriyeva rodasī marudbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7758: RV_5,030.09a striyo hi dāsa āyudhāni cakre kim mā karann abalā asya senāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7759: RV_5,030.09c antar hy akhyad ubhe asya dhene athopa praid yudhaye dasyum indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7760: RV_5,030.10a sam atra gāvo 'bhito 'navanteheha vatsair viyutā yad āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7761: RV_5,030.10c saṃ tā indro asṛjad asya śākair yad īṃ somāsaḥ suṣutā amandan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7762: RV_5,030.11a yad īṃ somā babhrudhūtā amandann aroravīd vṛṣabhaḥ sādaneṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7763: RV_5,030.11c purandaraḥ papivāṃ indro asya punar gavām adadād usriyāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7764: RV_5,030.12a bhadram idaṃ ruśamā agne akran gavāṃ catvāri dadataḥ sahasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7765: RV_5,030.12c ṛṇañcayasya prayatā maghāni praty agrabhīṣma nṛtamasya nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7766: RV_5,030.13a supeśasam māva sṛjanty astaṃ gavāṃ sahasrai ruśamāso agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:7767: RV_5,030.13c tīvrā indram amamanduḥ sutāso 'ktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7768: RV_5,030.14a aucchat sā rātrī paritakmyā yāṃ ṛṇañcaye rājani ruśamānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7769: RV_5,030.14c atyo na vājī raghur ajyamāno babhruś catvāry asanat sahasrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7770: RV_5,030.15a catuḥsahasraṃ gavyasya paśvaḥ praty agrabhīṣma ruśameṣv agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:7771: RV_5,030.15c gharmaś cit taptaḥ pravṛje ya āsīd ayasmayas tam v ādāma viprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7772: RV_5,031.01a indro rathāya pravataṃ kṛṇoti yam adhyasthān maghavā vājayantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7773: RV_5,031.01c yūtheva paśvo vy unoti gopā ariṣṭo yāti prathamaḥ siṣāsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7774: RV_5,031.02a ā pra drava harivo mā vi venaḥ piśaṅgarāte abhi naḥ sacasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:7775: RV_5,031.02c nahi tvad indra vasyo anyad asty amenāṃś cij janivataś cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:7776: RV_5,031.03a ud yat sahaḥ sahasa ājaniṣṭa dediṣṭa indra indriyāṇi viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7777: RV_5,031.03c prācodayat sudughā vavre antar vi jyotiṣā saṃvavṛtvat tamo 'vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7778: RV_5,031.04a anavas te ratham aśvāya takṣan tvaṣṭā vajram puruhūta dyumantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7779: RV_5,031.04c brahmāṇa indram mahayanto arkair avardhayann ahaye hantavā u //
GV01rvh1-10u:7780: RV_5,031.05a vṛṣṇe yat te vṛṣaṇo arkam arcān indra grāvāṇo aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7781: RV_5,031.05c anaśvāso ye pavayo 'rathā indreṣitā abhy avartanta dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:7782: RV_5,031.06a pra te pūrvāṇi karaṇāni vocam pra nūtanā maghavan yā cakartha /
GV01rvh1-10u:7783: RV_5,031.06c śaktīvo yad vibharā rodasī ubhe jayann apo manave dānucitrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7784: RV_5,031.07a tad in nu te karaṇaṃ dasma viprāhiṃ yad ghnann ojo atrāmimīthāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7785: RV_5,031.07c śuṣṇasya cit pari māyā agṛbhṇāḥ prapitvaṃ yann apa dasyūṃr asedhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7786: RV_5,031.08a tvam apo yadave turvaśāyāramayaḥ sudughāḥ pāra indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:7787: RV_5,031.08c ugram ayātam avaho ha kutsaṃ saṃ ha yad vām uśanāranta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7788: RV_5,031.09a indrākutsā vahamānā rathenā vām atyā api karṇe vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7789: RV_5,031.09c niḥ ṣīm adbhyo dhamatho niḥ ṣadhasthān maghono hṛdo varathas tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:7790: RV_5,031.10a vātasya yuktān suyujaś cid aśvān kaviś cid eṣo ajagann avasyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7791: RV_5,031.10c viśve te atra marutaḥ sakhāya indra brahmāṇi taviṣīm avardhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7792: RV_5,031.11a sūraś cid ratham paritakmyāyām pūrvaṃ karad uparaṃ jūjuvāṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7793: RV_5,031.11c bharac cakram etaśaḥ saṃ riṇāti puro dadhat saniṣyati kratuṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7794: RV_5,031.12a āyaṃ janā abhicakṣe jagāmendraḥ sakhāyaṃ sutasomam icchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7795: RV_5,031.12c vadan grāvāva vedim bhriyāte yasya jīram adhvaryavaś caranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7796: RV_5,031.13a ye cākananta cākananta nū te martā amṛta mo te aṃha āran /
GV01rvh1-10u:7797: RV_5,031.13c vāvandhi yajyūṃr uta teṣu dhehy ojo janeṣu yeṣu te syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:7798: RV_5,032.01a adardar utsam asṛjo vi khāni tvam arṇavān badbadhānāṃ aramṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7799: RV_5,032.01c mahāntam indra parvataṃ vi yad vaḥ sṛjo vi dhārā ava dānavaṃ han //
GV01rvh1-10u:7800: RV_5,032.02a tvam utsāṃ ṛtubhir badbadhānāṃ araṃha ūdhaḥ parvatasya vajrin /
GV01rvh1-10u:7801: RV_5,032.02c ahiṃ cid ugra prayutaṃ śayānaṃ jaghanvāṃ indra taviṣīm adhatthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7802: RV_5,032.03a tyasya cin mahato nir mṛgasya vadhar jaghāna taviṣībhir indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7803: RV_5,032.03c ya eka id apratir manyamāna ād asmād anyo ajaniṣṭa tavyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7804: RV_5,032.04a tyaṃ cid eṣāṃ svadhayā madantam miho napātaṃ suvṛdhaṃ tamogām /
