GV01rvh1-10u:7805: RV_5,032.04c vṛṣaprabharmā dānavasya bhāmaṃ vajreṇa vajrī ni jaghāna śuṣṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7806: RV_5,032.05a tyaṃ cid asya kratubhir niṣattam amarmaṇo vidad id asya marma /
GV01rvh1-10u:7807: RV_5,032.05c yad īṃ sukṣatra prabhṛtā madasya yuyutsantaṃ tamasi harmye dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7808: RV_5,032.06a tyaṃ cid itthā katpayaṃ śayānam asūrye tamasi vāvṛdhānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7809: RV_5,032.06c taṃ cin mandāno vṛṣabhaḥ sutasyoccair indro apagūryā jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:7810: RV_5,032.07a ud yad indro mahate dānavāya vadhar yamiṣṭa saho apratītam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7811: RV_5,032.07c yad īṃ vajrasya prabhṛtau dadābha viśvasya jantor adhamaṃ cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:7812: RV_5,032.08a tyaṃ cid arṇam madhupaṃ śayānam asinvaṃ vavram mahy ādad ugraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7813: RV_5,032.08c apādam atram mahatā vadhena ni duryoṇa āvṛṇaṅ mṛdhravācam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7814: RV_5,032.09a ko asya śuṣmaṃ taviṣīṃ varāta eko dhanā bharate apratītaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7815: RV_5,032.09c ime cid asya jrayaso nu devī indrasyaujaso bhiyasā jihāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:7816: RV_5,032.10a ny asmai devī svadhitir jihīta indrāya gātur uśatīva yeme /
GV01rvh1-10u:7817: RV_5,032.10c saṃ yad ojo yuvate viśvam ābhir anu svadhāvne kṣitayo namanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:7818: RV_5,032.11a ekaṃ nu tvā satpatim pāñcajanyaṃ jātaṃ śṛṇomi yaśasaṃ janeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7819: RV_5,032.11c tam me jagṛbhra āśaso naviṣṭhaṃ doṣā vastor havamānāsa indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:7820: RV_5,032.12a evā hi tvām ṛtuthā yātayantam maghā viprebhyo dadataṃ śṛṇomi /
GV01rvh1-10u:7821: RV_5,032.12c kiṃ te brahmāṇo gṛhate sakhāyo ye tvāyā nidadhuḥ kāmam indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:7822: RV_5,033.01a mahi mahe tavase dīdhye nṝn indrāyetthā tavase atavyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:7823: RV_5,033.01c yo asmai sumatiṃ vājasātau stuto jane samaryaś ciketa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7824: RV_5,033.02a sa tvaṃ na indra dhiyasāno arkair harīṇāṃ vṛṣan yoktram aśreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7825: RV_5,033.02c yā itthā maghavann anu joṣaṃ vakṣo abhi prāryaḥ sakṣi janān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7826: RV_5,033.03a na te ta indrābhy asmad ṛṣvāyuktāso abrahmatā yad asan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7827: RV_5,033.03c tiṣṭhā ratham adhi taṃ vajrahastā raśmiṃ deva yamase svaśvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7828: RV_5,033.04a purū yat ta indra santy ukthā gave cakarthorvarāsu yudhyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7829: RV_5,033.04c tatakṣe sūryāya cid okasi sve vṛṣā samatsu dāsasya nāma cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:7830: RV_5,033.05a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca naraḥ śardho jajñānā yātāś ca rathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7831: RV_5,033.05c āsmāñ jagamyād ahiśuṣma satvā bhago na havyaḥ prabhṛtheṣu cāruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7832: RV_5,033.06a papṛkṣeṇyam indra tve hy ojo nṛmṇāni ca nṛtamāno amartaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7833: RV_5,033.06c sa na enīṃ vasavāno rayiṃ dāḥ prārya stuṣe tuvimaghasya dānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7834: RV_5,033.07a evā na indrotibhir ava pāhi gṛṇataḥ śūra kārūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:7835: RV_5,033.07c uta tvacaṃ dadato vājasātau piprīhi madhvaḥ suṣutasya cāroḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7836: RV_5,033.08a uta tye mā paurukutsyasya sūres trasadasyor hiraṇino rarāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7837: RV_5,033.08c vahantu mā daśa śyetāso asya gairikṣitasya kratubhir nu saśce //
GV01rvh1-10u:7838: RV_5,033.09a uta tye mā mārutāśvasya śoṇāḥ kratvāmaghāso vidathasya rātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:7839: RV_5,033.09c sahasrā me cyavatāno dadāna ānūkam aryo vapuṣe nārcat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7840: RV_5,033.10a uta tye mā dhvanyasya juṣṭā lakṣmaṇyasya suruco yatānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7841: RV_5,033.10c mahnā rāyaḥ saṃvaraṇasya ṛṣer vrajaṃ na gāvaḥ prayatā api gman //
GV01rvh1-10u:7842: RV_5,034.01a ajātaśatrum ajarā svarvaty anu svadhāmitā dasmam īyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7843: RV_5,034.01c sunotana pacata brahmavāhase puruṣṭutāya prataraṃ dadhātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:7844: RV_5,034.02a ā yaḥ somena jaṭharam apipratāmandata maghavā madhvo andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7845: RV_5,034.02c yad īm mṛgāya hantave mahāvadhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭim uśanā vadhaṃ yamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7846: RV_5,034.03a yo asmai ghraṃsa uta vā ya ūdhani somaṃ sunoti bhavati dyumāṃ aha /
GV01rvh1-10u:7847: RV_5,034.03c apāpa śakras tatanuṣṭim ūhati tanūśubhram maghavā yaḥ kavāsakhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7848: RV_5,034.04a yasyāvadhīt pitaraṃ yasya mātaraṃ yasya śakro bhrātaraṃ nāta īṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:7849: RV_5,034.04c vetīd v asya prayatā yataṅkaro na kilbiṣād īṣate vasva ākaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7850: RV_5,034.05a na pañcabhir daśabhir vaṣṭy ārabhaṃ nāsunvatā sacate puṣyatā cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:7851: RV_5,034.05c jināti ved amuyā hanti vā dhunir ā devayum bhajati gomati vraje //
GV01rvh1-10u:7852: RV_5,034.06a vitvakṣaṇaḥ samṛtau cakramāsajo 'sunvato viṣuṇaḥ sunvato vṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7853: RV_5,034.06c indro viśvasya damitā vibhīṣaṇo yathāvaśaṃ nayati dāsam āryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7854: RV_5,034.07a sam īm paṇer ajati bhojanam muṣe vi dāśuṣe bhajati sūnaraṃ vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7855: RV_5,034.07c durge cana dhriyate viśva ā puru jano yo asya taviṣīm acukrudhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7856: RV_5,034.08a saṃ yaj janau sudhanau viśvaśardhasāv aved indro maghavā goṣu śubhriṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7857: RV_5,034.08c yujaṃ hy anyam akṛta pravepany ud īṃ gavyaṃ sṛjate satvabhir dhuniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7858: RV_5,034.09a sahasrasām āgniveśiṃ gṛṇīṣe śatrim agna upamāṃ ketum aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7859: RV_5,034.09c tasmā āpaḥ saṃyataḥ pīpayanta tasmin kṣatram amavat tveṣam astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:7860: RV_5,035.01a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vasa indra kratuṣ ṭam ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7861: RV_5,035.01c asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sasniṃ vājeṣu duṣṭaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:7862: RV_5,035.02a yad indra te catasro yac chūra santi tisraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7863: RV_5,035.02c yad vā pañca kṣitīnām avas tat su na ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7864: RV_5,035.03a ā te 'vo vareṇyaṃ vṛṣantamasya hūmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7865: RV_5,035.03c vṛṣajūtir hi jajñiṣa ābhūbhir indra turvaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7866: RV_5,035.04a vṛṣā hy asi rādhase jajñiṣe vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7867: RV_5,035.04c svakṣatraṃ te dhṛṣan manaḥ satrāham indra pauṃsyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7868: RV_5,035.05a tvaṃ tam indra martyam amitrayantam adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7869: RV_5,035.05c sarvarathā śatakrato ni yāhi śavasas pate //
GV01rvh1-10u:7870: RV_5,035.06a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7871: RV_5,035.06c ugram pūrvīṣu pūrvyaṃ havante vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7872: RV_5,035.07a asmākam indra duṣṭaram puroyāvānam ājiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7873: RV_5,035.07c sayāvānaṃ dhane-dhane vājayantam avā ratham //
GV01rvh1-10u:7874: RV_5,035.08a asmākam indrehi no ratham avā purandhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7875: RV_5,035.08c vayaṃ śaviṣṭha vāryaṃ divi śravo dadhīmahi divi stomam manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7876: RV_5,036.01a sa ā gamad indro yo vasūnāṃ ciketad dātuṃ dāmano rayīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7877: RV_5,036.01c dhanvacaro na vaṃsagas tṛṣāṇaś cakamānaḥ pibatu dugdham aṃśum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7878: RV_5,036.02a ā te hanū harivaḥ śūra śipre ruhat somo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7879: RV_5,036.02c anu tvā rājann arvato na hinvan gīrbhir madema puruhūta viśve //
GV01rvh1-10u:7880: RV_5,036.03a cakraṃ na vṛttam puruhūta vepate mano bhiyā me amater id adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7881: RV_5,036.03c rathād adhi tvā jaritā sadāvṛdha kuvin nu stoṣan maghavan purūvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7882: RV_5,036.04a eṣa grāveva jaritā ta indreyarti vācam bṛhad āśuṣāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7883: RV_5,036.04c pra savyena maghavan yaṃsi rāyaḥ pra dakṣiṇid dharivo mā vi venaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7884: RV_5,036.05a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhatu dyaur vṛṣā vṛṣabhyāṃ vahase haribhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7885: RV_5,036.05c sa no vṛṣā vṛṣarathaḥ suśipra vṛṣakrato vṛṣā vajrin bhare dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7886: RV_5,036.06a yo rohitau vājinau vājinīvān tribhiḥ śataiḥ sacamānāv adiṣṭa /
GV01rvh1-10u:7887: RV_5,036.06c yūne sam asmai kṣitayo namantāṃ śrutarathāya maruto duvoyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7888: RV_5,037.01a sam bhānunā yatate sūryasyājuhvāno ghṛtapṛṣṭhaḥ svañcāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7889: RV_5,037.01c tasmā amṛdhrā uṣaso vy ucchān ya indrāya sunavāmety āha //
GV01rvh1-10u:7890: RV_5,037.02a samiddhāgnir vanavat stīrṇabarhir yuktagrāvā sutasomo jarāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:7891: RV_5,037.02c grāvāṇo yasyeṣiraṃ vadanty ayad adhvaryur haviṣāva sindhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:7892: RV_5,037.03a vadhūr iyam patim icchanty eti ya īṃ vahāte mahiṣīm iṣirām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7893: RV_5,037.03c āsya śravasyād ratha ā ca ghoṣāt purū sahasrā pari vartayāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:7894: RV_5,037.04a na sa rājā vyathate yasminn indras tīvraṃ somam pibati gosakhāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7895: RV_5,037.04c ā satvanair ajati hanti vṛtraṃ kṣeti kṣitīḥ subhago nāma puṣyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7896: RV_5,037.05a puṣyāt kṣeme abhi yoge bhavāty ubhe vṛtau saṃyatī saṃ jayāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7897: RV_5,037.05c priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāti ya indrāya sutasomo dadāśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7898: RV_5,038.01a uroṣ ṭa indra rādhaso vibhvī rātiḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:7899: RV_5,038.01c adhā no viśvacarṣaṇe dyumnā sukṣatra maṃhaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7900: RV_5,038.02a yad īm indra śravāyyam iṣaṃ śaviṣṭha dadhiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:7902: RV_5,038.03a śuṣmāso ye te adrivo mehanā ketasāpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7903: RV_5,038.03c ubhā devāv abhiṣṭaye divaś ca gmaś ca rājathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7904: RV_5,038.04a uto no asya kasya cid dakṣasya tava vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7905: RV_5,038.04c asmabhyaṃ nṛmṇam ā bharāsmabhyaṃ nṛmaṇasyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:7906: RV_5,038.05a nū ta ābhir abhiṣṭibhis tava śarmañ chatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:7907: RV_5,038.05c indra syāma sugopāḥ śūra syāma sugopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7908: RV_5,039.01a yad indra citra mehanāsti tvādātam adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7909: RV_5,039.01c rādhas tan no vidadvasa ubhayāhasty ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:7910: RV_5,039.02a yan manyase vareṇyam indra dyukṣaṃ tad ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:7911: RV_5,039.02c vidyāma tasya te vayam akūpārasya dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:7912: RV_5,039.03a yat te ditsu prarādhyam mano asti śrutam bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:7913: RV_5,039.03c tena dṛḷhā cid adriva ā vājaṃ darṣi sātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:7914: RV_5,039.04a maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vo maghonāṃ rājānaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7915: RV_5,039.04c indram upa praśastaye pūrvībhir jujuṣe giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7916: RV_5,039.05a asmā it kāvyaṃ vaca uktham indrāya śaṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7917: RV_5,039.05c tasmā u brahmavāhase giro vardhanty atrayo giraḥ śumbhanty atrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7918: RV_5,040.01a ā yāhy adribhiḥ sutaṃ somaṃ somapate piba /
GV01rvh1-10u:7920: RV_5,040.02a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7922: RV_5,040.03a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7924: RV_5,040.04a ṛjīṣī vajrī vṛṣabhas turāṣāṭ chuṣmī rājā vṛtrahā somapāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7925: RV_5,040.04c yuktvā haribhyām upa yāsad arvāṅ mādhyandine savane matsad indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7926: RV_5,040.05a yat tvā sūrya svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7927: RV_5,040.05c akṣetravid yathā mugdho bhuvanāny adīdhayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7928: RV_5,040.06a svarbhānor adha yad indra māyā avo divo vartamānā avāhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7929: RV_5,040.06c gūḷhaṃ sūryaṃ tamasāpavratena turīyeṇa brahmaṇāvindad atriḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7930: RV_5,040.07a mā mām imaṃ tava santam atra irasyā drugdho bhiyasā ni gārīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:7931: RV_5,040.07c tvam mitro asi satyarādhās tau mehāvataṃ varuṇaś ca rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7932: RV_5,040.08a grāvṇo brahmā yuyujānaḥ saparyan kīriṇā devān namasopaśikṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:7933: RV_5,040.08c atriḥ sūryasya divi cakṣur ādhāt svarbhānor apa māyā aghukṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:7934: RV_5,040.09a yaṃ vai sūryaṃ svarbhānus tamasāvidhyad āsuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7935: RV_5,040.09c atrayas tam anv avindan nahy anye aśaknuvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:7936: RV_5,041.01a ko nu vām mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāyan divo vā mahaḥ pārthivasya vā de /
GV01rvh1-10u:7937: RV_5,041.01c ṛtasya vā sadasi trāsīthāṃ no yajñāyate vā paśuṣo na vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:7938: RV_5,041.02a te no mitro varuṇo aryamāyur indra ṛbhukṣā maruto juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7939: RV_5,041.02c namobhir vā ye dadhate suvṛktiṃ stomaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7940: RV_5,041.03a ā vāṃ yeṣṭhāśvinā huvadhyai vātasya patman rathyasya puṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:7941: RV_5,041.03c uta vā divo asurāya manma prāndhāṃsīva yajyave bharadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7942: RV_5,041.04a pra sakṣaṇo divyaḥ kaṇvahotā trito divaḥ sajoṣā vāto agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7943: RV_5,041.04c pūṣā bhagaḥ prabhṛthe viśvabhojā ājiṃ na jagmur āśvaśvatamāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7944: RV_5,041.05a pra vo rayiṃ yuktāśvam bharadhvaṃ rāya eṣe 'vase dadhīta dhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7945: RV_5,041.05c suśeva evair auśijasya hotā ye va evā marutas turāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7946: RV_5,041.06a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujaṃ kṛṇudhvam pra devaṃ vipram panitāram arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7947: RV_5,041.06c iṣudhyava ṛtasāpaḥ purandhīr vasvīr no atra patnīr ā dhiye dhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7948: RV_5,041.07a upa va eṣe vandyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ pra yahvī divaś citayadbhir arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7949: RV_5,041.07c uṣāsānaktā viduṣīva viśvam ā hā vahato martyāya yajñam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7950: RV_5,041.08a abhi vo arce poṣyāvato nṝn vāstoṣ patiṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ rarāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7951: RV_5,041.08c dhanyā sajoṣā dhiṣaṇā namobhir vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāya eṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:7952: RV_5,041.09a tuje nas tane parvatāḥ santu svaitavo ye vasavo na vīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7953: RV_5,041.09c panita āptyo yajataḥ sadā no vardhān naḥ śaṃsaṃ naryo abhiṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:7954: RV_5,041.10a vṛṣṇo astoṣi bhūmyasya garbhaṃ trito napātam apāṃ suvṛkti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7955: RV_5,041.10c gṛṇīte agnir etarī na śūṣaiḥ śociṣkeśo ni riṇāti vanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:7956: RV_5,041.11a kathā mahe rudriyāya bravāma kad rāye cikituṣe bhagāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7957: RV_5,041.11c āpa oṣadhīr uta no 'vantu dyaur vanā girayo vṛkṣakeśāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7958: RV_5,041.12a śṛṇotu na ūrjām patir giraḥ sa nabhas tarīyāṃ iṣiraḥ parijmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:7959: RV_5,041.12c śṛṇvantv āpaḥ puro na śubhrāḥ pari sruco babṛhāṇasyādreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7960: RV_5,041.13a vidā cin nu mahānto ye va evā bravāma dasmā vāryaṃ dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7961: RV_5,041.13c vayaś cana subhva āva yanti kṣubhā martam anuyataṃ vadhasnaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7962: RV_5,041.14a ā daivyāni pārthivāni janmāpaś cācchā sumakhāya vocam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7963: RV_5,041.14c vardhantāṃ dyāvo giraś candrāgrā udā vardhantām abhiṣātā arṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7964: RV_5,041.15a pade-pade me jarimā ni dhāyi varūtrī vā śakrā yā pāyubhiś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:7965: RV_5,041.15c siṣaktu mātā mahī rasā naḥ smat sūribhir ṛjuhasta ṛjuvaniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7966: RV_5,041.16a kathā dāśema namasā sudānūn evayā maruto acchoktau praśravaso maruto acchoktau /
GV01rvh1-10u:7967: RV_5,041.16c mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhād asmākam bhūd upamātivaniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7968: RV_5,041.17a iti cin nu prajāyai paśumatyai devāso vanate martyo va ā devāso vanate martyo vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7969: RV_5,041.17c atrā śivāṃ tanvo dhāsim asyā jarāṃ cin me nirṛtir jagrasīta //
GV01rvh1-10u:7970: RV_5,041.18a tāṃ vo devāḥ sumatim ūrjayantīm iṣam aśyāma vasavaḥ śasā goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7971: RV_5,041.18c sā naḥ sudānur mṛḷayantī devī prati dravantī suvitāya gamyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7972: RV_5,041.19a abhi na iḷā yūthasya mātā sman nadībhir urvaśī vā gṛṇātu /
GV01rvh1-10u:7973: RV_5,041.19c urvaśī vā bṛhaddivā gṛṇānābhyūrṇvānā prabhṛthasyāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7975: RV_5,042.01a pra śantamā varuṇaṃ dīdhitī gīr mitram bhagam aditiṃ nūnam aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7976: RV_5,042.01c pṛṣadyoniḥ pañcahotā śṛṇotv atūrtapanthā asuro mayobhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7977: RV_5,042.02a prati me stomam aditir jagṛbhyāt sūnuṃ na mātā hṛdyaṃ suśevam /
GV01rvh1-10u:7978: RV_5,042.02c brahma priyaṃ devahitaṃ yad asty aham mitre varuṇe yan mayobhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:7979: RV_5,042.03a ud īraya kavitamaṃ kavīnām unattainam abhi madhvā ghṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:7980: RV_5,042.03c sa no vasūni prayatā hitāni candrāṇi devaḥ savitā suvāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:7981: RV_5,042.04a sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ saṃ sūribhir harivaḥ saṃ svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:7982: RV_5,042.04c sam brahmaṇā devahitaṃ yad asti saṃ devānāṃ sumatyā yajñiyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:7983: RV_5,042.05a devo bhagaḥ savitā rāyo aṃśa indro vṛtrasya saṃjito dhanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7984: RV_5,042.05c ṛbhukṣā vāja uta vā purandhir avantu no amṛtāsas turāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7985: RV_5,042.06a marutvato apratītasya jiṣṇor ajūryataḥ pra bravāmā kṛtāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:7986: RV_5,042.06c na te pūrve maghavan nāparāso na vīryaṃ nūtanaḥ kaś canāpa //
GV01rvh1-10u:7987: RV_5,042.07a upa stuhi prathamaṃ ratnadheyam bṛhaspatiṃ sanitāraṃ dhanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:7988: RV_5,042.07c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhaḥ purūvasur āgamaj johuvānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:7989: RV_5,042.08a tavotibhiḥ sacamānā ariṣṭā bṛhaspate maghavānaḥ suvīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7990: RV_5,042.08c ye aśvadā uta vā santi godā ye vastradāḥ subhagās teṣu rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7991: RV_5,042.09a visarmāṇaṃ kṛṇuhi vittam eṣāṃ ye bhuñjate apṛṇanto na ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7992: RV_5,042.09c apavratān prasave vāvṛdhānān brahmadviṣaḥ sūryād yāvayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:7993: RV_5,042.10a ya ohate rakṣaso devavītāv acakrebhis tam maruto ni yāta /
GV01rvh1-10u:7994: RV_5,042.10c yo vaḥ śamīṃ śaśamānasya nindāt tucchyān kāmān karate siṣvidānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7995: RV_5,042.11a tam u ṣṭuhi yaḥ sviṣuḥ sudhanvā yo viśvasya kṣayati bheṣajasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:7996: RV_5,042.11c yakṣvā mahe saumanasāya rudraṃ namobhir devam asuraṃ duvasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:7997: RV_5,042.12a damūnaso apaso ye suhastā vṛṣṇaḥ patnīr nadyo vibhvataṣṭāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:7998: RV_5,042.12c sarasvatī bṛhaddivota rākā daśasyantīr varivasyantu śubhrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:7999: RV_5,042.13a pra sū mahe suśaraṇāya medhāṃ giram bhare navyasīṃ jāyamānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8000: RV_5,042.13c ya āhanā duhitur vakṣaṇāsu rūpā mināno akṛṇod idaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8001: RV_5,042.14a pra suṣṭuti stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiṃ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8002: RV_5,042.14c yo abdimāṃ udanimāṃ iyarti pra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8003: RV_5,042.15a eṣa stomo mārutaṃ śardho acchā rudrasya sūnūṃr yuvanyūṃr ud aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8004: RV_5,042.15c kāmo rāye havate mā svasty upa stuhi pṛṣadaśvāṃ ayāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8005: RV_5,042.16a praiṣa stomaḥ pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ vanaspatīṃr oṣadhī rāye aśyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8006: RV_5,042.16c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:8008: RV_5,042.18a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
GV01rvh1-10u:8009: RV_5,042.18c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8010: RV_5,043.01a ā dhenavaḥ payasā tūrṇyarthā amardhantīr upa no yantu madhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8011: RV_5,043.01c maho rāye bṛhatīḥ sapta vipro mayobhuvo jaritā johavīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8012: RV_5,043.02a ā suṣṭutī namasā vartayadhyai dyāvā vājāya pṛthivī amṛdhre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8013: RV_5,043.02c pitā mātā madhuvacāḥ suhastā bhare-bhare no yaśasāv aviṣṭām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8014: RV_5,043.03a adhvaryavaś cakṛvāṃso madhūni pra vāyave bharata cāru śukram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8015: RV_5,043.03c hoteva naḥ prathamaḥ pāhy asya deva madhvo rarimā te madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:8016: RV_5,043.04a daśa kṣipo yuñjate bāhū adriṃ somasya yā śamitārā suhastā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8017: RV_5,043.04c madhvo rasaṃ sugabhastir giriṣṭhāṃ caniścadad duduhe śukram aṃśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8018: RV_5,043.05a asāvi te jujuṣāṇāya somaḥ kratve dakṣāya bṛhate madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8019: RV_5,043.05c harī rathe sudhurā yoge arvāg indra priyā kṛṇuhi hūyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8020: RV_5,043.06a ā no mahīm aramatiṃ sajoṣā gnāṃ devīṃ namasā rātahavyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8021: RV_5,043.06c madhor madāya bṛhatīm ṛtajñām āgne vaha pathibhir devayānaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8022: RV_5,043.07a añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā vapāvantaṃ nāgninā tapantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8023: RV_5,043.07c pitur na putra upasi preṣṭha ā gharmo agnim ṛtayann asādi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8024: RV_5,043.08a acchā mahī bṛhatī śantamā gīr dūto na gantv aśvinā huvadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:8025: RV_5,043.08c mayobhuvā sarathā yātam arvāg gantaṃ nidhiṃ dhuram āṇir na nābhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:8026: RV_5,043.09a pra tavyaso namauktiṃ turasyāham pūṣṇa uta vāyor adikṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8027: RV_5,043.09c yā rādhasā coditārā matīnāṃ yā vājasya draviṇodā uta tman //
GV01rvh1-10u:8028: RV_5,043.10a ā nāmabhir maruto vakṣi viśvān ā rūpebhir jātavedo huvānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8029: RV_5,043.10c yajñaṃ giro jarituḥ suṣṭutiṃ ca viśve ganta maruto viśva ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8030: RV_5,043.11a ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ā sarasvatī yajatā gantu yajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8031: RV_5,043.11c havaṃ devī jujuṣāṇā ghṛtācī śagmāṃ no vācam uśatī śṛṇotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:8032: RV_5,043.12a ā vedhasaṃ nīlapṛṣṭham bṛhantam bṛhaspatiṃ sadane sādayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8033: RV_5,043.12c sādadyoniṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsaṃ hiraṇyavarṇam aruṣaṃ sapema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8034: RV_5,043.13a ā dharṇasir bṛhaddivo rarāṇo viśvebhir gantv omabhir huvānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8035: RV_5,043.13c gnā vasāna oṣadhīr amṛdhras tridhātuśṛṅgo vṛṣabho vayodhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8036: RV_5,043.14a mātuṣ pade parame śukra āyor vipanyavo rāspirāso agman /
GV01rvh1-10u:8037: RV_5,043.14c suśevyaṃ namasā rātahavyāḥ śiśum mṛjanty āyavo na vāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:8038: RV_5,043.15a bṛhad vayo bṛhate tubhyam agne dhiyājuro mithunāsaḥ sacanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:8039: RV_5,043.15c devo-devaḥ suhavo bhūtu mahyam mā no mātā pṛthivī durmatau dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:8041: RV_5,043.17a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
GV01rvh1-10u:8042: RV_5,043.17c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8043: RV_5,044.01a tam pratnathā pūrvathā viśvathemathā jyeṣṭhatātim barhiṣadaṃ svarvidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8044: RV_5,044.01c pratīcīnaṃ vṛjanaṃ dohase girāśuṃ jayantam anu yāsu vardhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8045: RV_5,044.02a śriye sudṛśīr uparasya yāḥ svar virocamānaḥ kakubhām acodate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8046: RV_5,044.02c sugopā asi na dabhāya sukrato paro māyābhir ṛta āsa nāma te //
GV01rvh1-10u:8047: RV_5,044.03a atyaṃ haviḥ sacate sac ca dhātu cāriṣṭagātuḥ sa hotā sahobhariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8048: RV_5,044.03c prasarsrāṇo anu barhir vṛṣā śiśur madhye yuvājaro visruhā hitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8049: RV_5,044.04a pra va ete suyujo yāmann iṣṭaye nīcīr amuṣmai yamya ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8050: RV_5,044.04c suyantubhiḥ sarvaśāsair abhīśubhiḥ krivir nāmāni pravaṇe muṣāyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8051: RV_5,044.05a saṃjarbhurāṇas tarubhiḥ sutegṛbhaṃ vayākinaṃ cittagarbhāsu susvaruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8052: RV_5,044.05c dhāravākeṣv ṛjugātha śobhase vardhasva patnīr abhi jīvo adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:8053: RV_5,044.06a yādṛg eva dadṛśe tādṛg ucyate saṃ chāyayā dadhire sidhrayāpsv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8054: RV_5,044.06c mahīm asmabhyam uruṣām uru jrayo bṛhat suvīram anapacyutaṃ sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8055: RV_5,044.07a vety agrur janivān vā ati spṛdhaḥ samaryatā manasā sūryaḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8056: RV_5,044.07c ghraṃsaṃ rakṣantam pari viśvato gayam asmākaṃ śarma vanavat svāvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8057: RV_5,044.08a jyāyāṃsam asya yatunasya ketuna ṛṣisvaraṃ carati yāsu nāma te /
GV01rvh1-10u:8058: RV_5,044.08c yādṛśmin dhāyi tam apasyayā vidad ya u svayaṃ vahate so araṃ karat //
GV01rvh1-10u:8059: RV_5,044.09a samudram āsām ava tasthe agrimā na riṣyati savanaṃ yasminn āyatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8060: RV_5,044.09c atrā na hārdi kravaṇasya rejate yatrā matir vidyate pūtabandhanī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8061: RV_5,044.10a sa hi kṣatrasya manasasya cittibhir evāvadasya yajatasya sadhreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8062: RV_5,044.10c avatsārasya spṛṇavāma raṇvabhiḥ śaviṣṭhaṃ vājaṃ viduṣā cid ardhyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8063: RV_5,044.11a śyena āsām aditiḥ kakṣyo mado viśvavārasya yajatasya māyinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8064: RV_5,044.11c sam anyam-anyam arthayanty etave vidur viṣāṇam paripānam anti te //
GV01rvh1-10u:8065: RV_5,044.12a sadāpṛṇo yajato vi dviṣo vadhīd bāhuvṛktaḥ śrutavit taryo vaḥ sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8066: RV_5,044.12c ubhā sa varā praty eti bhāti ca yad īṃ gaṇam bhajate suprayāvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8067: RV_5,044.13a sutambharo yajamānasya satpatir viśvāsām ūdhaḥ sa dhiyām udañcanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8068: RV_5,044.13c bharad dhenū rasavac chiśriye payo 'nubruvāṇo adhy eti na svapan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8069: RV_5,044.14a yo jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante yo jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8070: RV_5,044.14c yo jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8071: RV_5,044.15a agnir jāgāra tam ṛcaḥ kāmayante 'gnir jāgāra tam u sāmāni yanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8072: RV_5,044.15c agnir jāgāra tam ayaṃ soma āha tavāham asmi sakhye nyokāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8073: RV_5,045.01a vidā divo viṣyann adrim ukthair āyatyā uṣaso arcino guḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8074: RV_5,045.01c apāvṛta vrajinīr ut svar gād vi duro mānuṣīr deva āvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8075: RV_5,045.02a vi sūryo amatiṃ na śriyaṃ sād orvād gavām mātā jānatī gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8076: RV_5,045.02c dhanvarṇaso nadyaḥ khādoarṇā sthūṇeva sumitā dṛṃhata dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8077: RV_5,045.03a asmā ukthāya parvatasya garbho mahīnāṃ januṣe pūrvyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8078: RV_5,045.03c vi parvato jihīta sādhata dyaur āvivāsanto dasayanta bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:8079: RV_5,045.04a sūktebhir vo vacobhir devajuṣṭair indrā nv agnī avase huvadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:8080: RV_5,045.04c ukthebhir hi ṣmā kavayaḥ suyajñā āvivāsanto maruto yajanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8081: RV_5,045.05a eto nv adya sudhyo bhavāma pra ducchunā minavāmā varīyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8082: RV_5,045.05c āre dveṣāṃsi sanutar dadhāmāyāma prāñco yajamānam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8083: RV_5,045.06a etā dhiyaṃ kṛṇavāmā sakhāyo 'pa yā mātāṃ ṛṇuta vrajaṃ goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8084: RV_5,045.06c yayā manur viśiśipraṃ jigāya yayā vaṇig vaṅkur āpā purīṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8085: RV_5,045.07a anūnod atra hastayato adrir ārcan yena daśa māso navagvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8086: RV_5,045.07c ṛtaṃ yatī saramā gā avindad viśvāni satyāṅgirāś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:8087: RV_5,045.08a viśve asyā vyuṣi māhināyāḥ saṃ yad gobhir aṅgiraso navanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:8088: RV_5,045.08c utsa āsām parame sadhastha ṛtasya pathā saramā vidad gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8089: RV_5,045.09a ā sūryo yātu saptāśvaḥ kṣetraṃ yad asyorviyā dīrghayāthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8090: RV_5,045.09c raghuḥ śyenaḥ patayad andho acchā yuvā kavir dīdayad goṣu gacchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8091: RV_5,045.10a ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇo 'yukta yad dharito vītapṛṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8092: RV_5,045.10c udnā na nāvam anayanta dhīrā āśṛṇvatīr āpo arvāg atiṣṭhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8093: RV_5,045.11a dhiyaṃ vo apsu dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ yayātaran daśa māso navagvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8094: RV_5,045.11c ayā dhiyā syāma devagopā ayā dhiyā tuturyāmāty aṃhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8095: RV_5,046.01a hayo na vidvāṃ ayuji svayaṃ dhuri tāṃ vahāmi prataraṇīm avasyuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8096: RV_5,046.01c nāsyā vaśmi vimucaṃ nāvṛtam punar vidvān pathaḥ puraeta ṛju neṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8097: RV_5,046.02a agna indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta mārutota viṣṇo /
GV01rvh1-10u:8098: RV_5,046.02c ubhā nāsatyā rudro adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:8099: RV_5,046.03a indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāditiṃ svaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām marutaḥ parvatāṃ apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8100: RV_5,046.03c huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim bhagaṃ nu śaṃsaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8101: RV_5,046.04a uta no viṣṇur uta vāto asridho draviṇodā uta somo mayas karat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8102: RV_5,046.04c uta ṛbhava uta rāye no aśvinota tvaṣṭota vibhvānu maṃsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8103: RV_5,046.05a uta tyan no mārutaṃ śardha ā gamad divikṣayaṃ yajatam barhir āsade /
GV01rvh1-10u:8104: RV_5,046.05c bṛhaspatiḥ śarma pūṣota no yamad varūthyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8105: RV_5,046.06a uta tye naḥ parvatāsaḥ suśastayaḥ sudītayo nadyas trāmaṇe bhuvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:8106: RV_5,046.06c bhago vibhaktā śavasāvasā gamad uruvyacā aditiḥ śrotu me havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8107: RV_5,046.07a devānām patnīr uśatīr avantu naḥ prāvantu nas tujaye vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8108: RV_5,046.07c yāḥ pārthivāso yā apām api vrate tā no devīḥ suhavāḥ śarma yacchata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8109: RV_5,046.08a uta gnā vyantu devapatnīr indrāṇy agnāyy aśvinī rāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8110: RV_5,046.08c ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu vyantu devīr ya ṛtur janīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8111: RV_5,047.01a prayuñjatī diva eti bruvāṇā mahī mātā duhitur bodhayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8112: RV_5,047.01c āvivāsantī yuvatir manīṣā pitṛbhya ā sadane johuvānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8113: RV_5,047.02a ajirāsas tadapa īyamānā ātasthivāṃso amṛtasya nābhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8114: RV_5,047.02c anantāsa uravo viśvataḥ sīm pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti panthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8115: RV_5,047.03a ukṣā samudro aruṣaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pitur ā viveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8116: RV_5,047.03c madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmā vi cakrame rajasas pāty antau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8117: RV_5,047.04a catvāra īm bibhrati kṣemayanto daśa garbhaṃ carase dhāpayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:8118: RV_5,047.04c tridhātavaḥ paramā asya gāvo divaś caranti pari sadyo antān //
GV01rvh1-10u:8119: RV_5,047.05a idaṃ vapur nivacanaṃ janāsaś caranti yan nadyas tasthur āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8120: RV_5,047.05c dve yad īm bibhṛto mātur anye iheha jāte yamyā sabandhū //
GV01rvh1-10u:8121: RV_5,047.06a vi tanvate dhiyo asmā apāṃsi vastrā putrāya mātaro vayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8122: RV_5,047.06c upaprakṣe vṛṣaṇo modamānā divas pathā vadhvo yanty accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8123: RV_5,047.07a tad astu mitrāvaruṇā tad agne śaṃ yor asmabhyam idam astu śastam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8124: RV_5,047.07c aśīmahi gādham uta pratiṣṭhāṃ namo dive bṛhate sādanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:8125: RV_5,048.01a kad u priyāya dhāmne manāmahe svakṣatrāya svayaśase mahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8126: RV_5,048.01c āmenyasya rajaso yad abhra āṃ apo vṛṇānā vitanoti māyinī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8127: RV_5,048.02a tā atnata vayunaṃ vīravakṣaṇaṃ samānyā vṛtayā viśvam ā rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8128: RV_5,048.02c apo apācīr aparā apejate pra pūrvābhis tirate devayur janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8129: RV_5,048.03a ā grāvabhir ahanyebhir aktubhir variṣṭhaṃ vajram ā jigharti māyini /
GV01rvh1-10u:8130: RV_5,048.03c śataṃ vā yasya pracaran sve dame saṃvartayanto vi ca vartayann ahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8131: RV_5,048.04a tām asya rītim paraśor iva praty anīkam akhyam bhuje asya varpasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8132: RV_5,048.04c sacā yadi pitumantam iva kṣayaṃ ratnaṃ dadhāti bharahūtaye viśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8133: RV_5,048.05a sa jihvayā caturanīka ṛñjate cāru vasāno varuṇo yatann arim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8134: RV_5,048.05c na tasya vidma puruṣatvatā vayaṃ yato bhagaḥ savitā dāti vāryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8135: RV_5,049.01a devaṃ vo adya savitāram eṣe bhagaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8136: RV_5,049.01c ā vāṃ narā purubhujā vavṛtyāṃ dive-dive cid aśvinā sakhīyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8137: RV_5,049.02a prati prayāṇam asurasya vidvān sūktair devaṃ savitāraṃ duvasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8138: RV_5,049.02c upa bruvīta namasā vijānañ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca ratnaṃ vibhajantam āyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8139: RV_5,049.03a adatrayā dayate vāryāṇi pūṣā bhago aditir vasta usraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8140: RV_5,049.03c indro viṣṇur varuṇo mitro agnir ahāni bhadrā janayanta dasmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8141: RV_5,049.04a tan no anarvā savitā varūthaṃ tat sindhava iṣayanto anu gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:8142: RV_5,049.04c upa yad voce adhvarasya hotā rāyaḥ syāma patayo vājaratnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8143: RV_5,049.05a pra ye vasubhya īvad ā namo dur ye mitre varuṇe sūktavācaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8144: RV_5,049.05c avaitv abhvaṃ kṛṇutā varīyo divaspṛthivyor avasā madema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8145: RV_5,050.01a viśvo devasya netur marto vurīta sakhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8146: RV_5,050.01c viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8147: RV_5,050.02a te te deva netar ye cemāṃ anuśase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8148: RV_5,050.02c te rāyā te hy āpṛce sacemahi sacathyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8149: RV_5,050.03a ato na ā nṝn atithīn ataḥ patnīr daśasyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:8150: RV_5,050.03c āre viśvam patheṣṭhāṃ dviṣo yuyotu yūyuviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8151: RV_5,050.04a yatra vahnir abhihito dudravad droṇyaḥ paśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8153: RV_5,050.05a eṣa te deva netā rathaspatiḥ śaṃ rayiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8154: RV_5,050.05c śaṃ rāye śaṃ svastaya iṣastuto manāmahe devastuto manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8155: RV_5,051.01a agne sutasya pītaye viśvair ūmebhir ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8157: RV_5,051.02a ṛtadhītaya ā gata satyadharmāṇo adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8159: RV_5,051.03a viprebhir vipra santya prātaryāvabhir ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8161: RV_5,051.04a ayaṃ somaś camū suto 'matre pari ṣicyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8163: RV_5,051.05a vāyav ā yāhi vītaye juṣāṇo havyadātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8165: RV_5,051.06a indraś ca vāyav eṣāṃ sutānām pītim arhathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8166: RV_5,051.06c tāñ juṣethām arepasāv abhi prayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8167: RV_5,051.07a sutā indrāya vāyave somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8168: RV_5,051.07c nimnaṃ na yanti sindhavo 'bhi prayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8169: RV_5,051.08a sajūr viśvebhir devebhir aśvibhyām uṣasā sajūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8170: RV_5,051.08c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8171: RV_5,051.09a sajūr mitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ sajūḥ somena viṣṇunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8172: RV_5,051.09c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8173: RV_5,051.10a sajūr ādityair vasubhiḥ sajūr indreṇa vāyunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8174: RV_5,051.10c ā yāhy agne atrivat sute raṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8175: RV_5,051.11a svasti no mimītām aśvinā bhagaḥ svasti devy aditir anarvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8176: RV_5,051.11c svasti pūṣā asuro dadhātu naḥ svasti dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8177: RV_5,051.12a svastaye vāyum upa bravāmahai somaṃ svasti bhuvanasya yas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8178: RV_5,051.12c bṛhaspatiṃ sarvagaṇaṃ svastaye svastaya ādityāso bhavantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8179: RV_5,051.13a viśve devā no adyā svastaye vaiśvānaro vasur agniḥ svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8180: RV_5,051.13c devā avantv ṛbhavaḥ svastaye svasti no rudraḥ pātv aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8181: RV_5,051.14a svasti mitrāvaruṇā svasti pathye revati /
GV01rvh1-10u:8182: RV_5,051.14c svasti na indraś cāgniś ca svasti no adite kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8183: RV_5,051.15a svasti panthām anu carema sūryācandramasāv iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:8184: RV_5,051.15c punar dadatāghnatā jānatā saṃ gamemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8185: RV_5,052.01a pra śyāvāśva dhṛṣṇuyārcā marudbhir ṛkvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8186: RV_5,052.01c ye adrogham anuṣvadhaṃ śravo madanti yajñiyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8187: RV_5,052.02a te hi sthirasya śavasaḥ sakhāyaḥ santi dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8188: RV_5,052.02c te yāmann ā dhṛṣadvinas tmanā pānti śaśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8189: RV_5,052.03a te syandrāso nokṣaṇo 'ti ṣkandanti śarvarīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8190: RV_5,052.03c marutām adhā maho divi kṣamā ca manmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8191: RV_5,052.04a marutsu vo dadhīmahi stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8192: RV_5,052.04c viśve ye mānuṣā yugā pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8193: RV_5,052.05a arhanto ye sudānavo naro asāmiśavasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8194: RV_5,052.05c pra yajñaṃ yajñiyebhyo divo arcā marudbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8195: RV_5,052.06a ā rukmair ā yudhā nara ṛṣvā ṛṣṭīr asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:8196: RV_5,052.06c anv enāṃ aha vidyuto maruto jajjhatīr iva bhānur arta tmanā divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8197: RV_5,052.07a ye vāvṛdhanta pārthivā ya urāv antarikṣa ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8198: RV_5,052.07c vṛjane vā nadīnāṃ sadhasthe vā maho divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8199: RV_5,052.08a śardho mārutam uc chaṃsa satyaśavasam ṛbhvasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8200: RV_5,052.08c uta sma te śubhe naraḥ pra syandrā yujata tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8201: RV_5,052.09a uta sma te paruṣṇyām ūrṇā vasata śundhyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8202: RV_5,052.09c uta pavyā rathānām adrim bhindanty ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8204: RV_5,052.10c etebhir mahyaṃ nāmabhir yajñaṃ viṣṭāra ohate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8205: RV_5,052.11a adhā naro ny ohate 'dhā niyuta ohate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8206: RV_5,052.11c adhā pārāvatā iti citrā rūpāṇi darśyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8207: RV_5,052.12a chandastubhaḥ kubhanyava utsam ā kīriṇo nṛtuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8208: RV_5,052.12c te me ke cin na tāyava ūmā āsan dṛśi tviṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8209: RV_5,052.13a ya ṛṣvā ṛṣṭividyutaḥ kavayaḥ santi vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8210: RV_5,052.13c tam ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ namasyā ramayā girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8211: RV_5,052.14a accha ṛṣe mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ dānā mitraṃ na yoṣaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8212: RV_5,052.14c divo vā dhṛṣṇava ojasā stutā dhībhir iṣaṇyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8213: RV_5,052.15a nū manvāna eṣāṃ devāṃ acchā na vakṣaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8214: RV_5,052.15c dānā saceta sūribhir yāmaśrutebhir añjibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8215: RV_5,052.16a pra ye me bandhveṣe gāṃ vocanta sūrayaḥ pṛśniṃ vocanta mātaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8216: RV_5,052.16c adhā pitaram iṣmiṇaṃ rudraṃ vocanta śikvasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8217: RV_5,052.17a sapta me sapta śākina ekam-ekā śatā daduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8218: RV_5,052.17c yamunāyām adhi śrutam ud rādho gavyam mṛje ni rādho aśvyam mṛje //
GV01rvh1-10u:8219: RV_5,053.01a ko veda jānam eṣāṃ ko vā purā sumneṣv āsa marutām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8221: RV_5,053.02a aitān ratheṣu tasthuṣaḥ kaḥ śuśrāva kathā yayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8222: RV_5,053.02c kasmai sasruḥ sudāse anv āpaya iḷābhir vṛṣṭayaḥ saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8223: RV_5,053.03a te ma āhur ya āyayur upa dyubhir vibhir made /
GV01rvh1-10u:8224: RV_5,053.03c naro maryā arepasa imān paśyann iti ṣṭuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8225: RV_5,053.04a ye añjiṣu ye vāśīṣu svabhānavaḥ srakṣu rukmeṣu khādiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8227: RV_5,053.05a yuṣmākaṃ smā rathāṃ anu mude dadhe maruto jīradānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8229: RV_5,053.06a ā yaṃ naraḥ sudānavo dadāśuṣe divaḥ kośam acucyavuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8230: RV_5,053.06c vi parjanyaṃ sṛjanti rodasī anu dhanvanā yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8231: RV_5,053.07a tatṛdānāḥ sindhavaḥ kṣodasā rajaḥ pra sasrur dhenavo yathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8232: RV_5,053.07c syannā aśvā ivādhvano vimocane vi yad vartanta enyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8233: RV_5,053.08a ā yāta maruto diva āntarikṣād amād uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:8235: RV_5,053.09a mā vo rasānitabhā kubhā krumur mā vaḥ sindhur ni rīramat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8236: RV_5,053.09c mā vaḥ pari ṣṭhāt sarayuḥ purīṣiṇy asme it sumnam astu vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8237: RV_5,053.10a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ rathānāṃ tveṣaṃ gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8239: RV_5,053.11a śardhaṃ-śardhaṃ va eṣāṃ vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8241: RV_5,053.12a kasmā adya sujātāya rātahavyāya pra yayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8243: RV_5,053.13a yena tokāya tanayāya dhānyam bījaṃ vahadhve akṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8244: RV_5,053.13c asmabhyaṃ tad dhattana yad va īmahe rādho viśvāyu saubhagam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8245: RV_5,053.14a atīyāma nidas tiraḥ svastibhir hitvāvadyam arātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8246: RV_5,053.14c vṛṣṭvī śaṃ yor āpa usri bheṣajaṃ syāma marutaḥ saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8247: RV_5,053.15a sudevaḥ samahāsati suvīro naro marutaḥ sa martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8249: RV_5,053.16a stuhi bhojān stuvato asya yāmani raṇan gāvo na yavase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8250: RV_5,053.16c yataḥ pūrvāṃ iva sakhīṃr anu hvaya girā gṛṇīhi kāminaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8251: RV_5,054.01a pra śardhāya mārutāya svabhānava imāṃ vācam anajā parvatacyute /
GV01rvh1-10u:8252: RV_5,054.01c gharmastubhe diva ā pṛṣṭhayajvane dyumnaśravase mahi nṛmṇam arcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8253: RV_5,054.02a pra vo marutas taviṣā udanyavo vayovṛdho aśvayujaḥ parijrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8254: RV_5,054.02c saṃ vidyutā dadhati vāśati tritaḥ svaranty āpo 'vanā parijrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8255: RV_5,054.03a vidyunmahaso naro aśmadidyavo vātatviṣo marutaḥ parvatacyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8256: RV_5,054.03c abdayā cin muhur ā hrādunīvṛta stanayadamā rabhasā udojasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8257: RV_5,054.04a vy aktūn rudrā vy ahāni śikvaso vy antarikṣaṃ vi rajāṃsi dhūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8258: RV_5,054.04c vi yad ajrāṃ ajatha nāva īṃ yathā vi durgāṇi maruto nāha riṣyatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8259: RV_5,054.05a tad vīryaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ tatāna sūryo na yojanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8260: RV_5,054.05c etā na yāme agṛbhītaśociṣo 'naśvadāṃ yan ny ayātanā girim //
GV01rvh1-10u:8261: RV_5,054.06a abhrāji śardho maruto yad arṇasam moṣathā vṛkṣaṃ kapaneva vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8262: RV_5,054.06c adha smā no aramatiṃ sajoṣasaś cakṣur iva yantam anu neṣathā sugam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8263: RV_5,054.07a na sa jīyate maruto na hanyate na sredhati na vyathate na riṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:8264: RV_5,054.07c nāsya rāya upa dasyanti notaya ṛṣiṃ vā yaṃ rājānaṃ vā suṣūdatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8265: RV_5,054.08a niyutvanto grāmajito yathā naro 'ryamaṇo na marutaḥ kabandhinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8266: RV_5,054.08c pinvanty utsaṃ yad ināso asvaran vy undanti pṛthivīm madhvo andhasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8267: RV_5,054.09a pravatvatīyam pṛthivī marudbhyaḥ pravatvatī dyaur bhavati prayadbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8268: RV_5,054.09c pravatvatīḥ pathyā antarikṣyāḥ pravatvantaḥ parvatā jīradānavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8269: RV_5,054.10a yan marutaḥ sabharasaḥ svarṇaraḥ sūrya udite madathā divo naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8270: RV_5,054.10c na vo 'śvāḥ śrathayantāha sisrataḥ sadyo asyādhvanaḥ pāram aśnutha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8271: RV_5,054.11a aṃseṣu va ṛṣṭayaḥ patsu khādayo vakṣassu rukmā maruto rathe śubhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8272: RV_5,054.11c agnibhrājaso vidyuto gabhastyoḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣasu vitatā hiraṇyayīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8273: RV_5,054.12a taṃ nākam aryo agṛbhītaśociṣaṃ ruśat pippalam maruto vi dhūnutha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8274: RV_5,054.12c sam acyanta vṛjanātitviṣanta yat svaranti ghoṣaṃ vitatam ṛtāyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8275: RV_5,054.13a yuṣmādattasya maruto vicetaso rāyaḥ syāma rathyo vayasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8276: RV_5,054.13c na yo yucchati tiṣyo yathā divo 'sme rāranta marutaḥ sahasriṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8277: RV_5,054.14a yūyaṃ rayim maruta spārhavīraṃ yūyam ṛṣim avatha sāmavipram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8278: RV_5,054.14c yūyam arvantam bharatāya vājaṃ yūyaṃ dhattha rājānaṃ śruṣṭimantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8279: RV_5,054.15a tad vo yāmi draviṇaṃ sadyaūtayo yenā svar ṇa tatanāma nṝṃr abhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8280: RV_5,054.15c idaṃ su me maruto haryatā vaco yasya tarema tarasā śataṃ himāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8281: RV_5,055.01a prayajyavo maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayo bṛhad vayo dadhire rukmavakṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8282: RV_5,055.01c īyante aśvaiḥ suyamebhir āśubhiḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8283: RV_5,055.02a svayaṃ dadhidhve taviṣīṃ yathā vida bṛhan mahānta urviyā vi rājatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8284: RV_5,055.02c utāntarikṣam mamire vy ojasā śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8285: RV_5,055.03a sākaṃ jātāḥ subhvaḥ sākam ukṣitāḥ śriye cid ā prataraṃ vāvṛdhur naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8286: RV_5,055.03c virokiṇaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8287: RV_5,055.04a ābhūṣeṇyaṃ vo maruto mahitvanaṃ didṛkṣeṇyaṃ sūryasyeva cakṣaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8288: RV_5,055.04c uto asmāṃ amṛtatve dadhātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8289: RV_5,055.05a ud īrayathā marutaḥ samudrato yūyaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ varṣayathā purīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8290: RV_5,055.05c na vo dasrā upa dasyanti dhenavaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8291: RV_5,055.06a yad aśvān dhūrṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvaṃ hiraṇyayān praty atkāṃ amugdhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8292: RV_5,055.06c viśvā it spṛdho maruto vy asyatha śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8293: RV_5,055.07a na parvatā na nadyo varanta vo yatrācidhvam maruto gacchathed u tat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8294: RV_5,055.07c uta dyāvāpṛthivī yāthanā pari śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8295: RV_5,055.08a yat pūrvyam maruto yac ca nūtanaṃ yad udyate vasavo yac ca śasyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8296: RV_5,055.08c viśvasya tasya bhavathā navedasaḥ śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8297: RV_5,055.09a mṛḷata no maruto mā vadhiṣṭanāsmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yantana /
GV01rvh1-10u:8298: RV_5,055.09c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gātana śubhaṃ yātām anu rathā avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8299: RV_5,055.10a yūyam asmān nayata vasyo acchā nir aṃhatibhyo maruto gṛṇānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8300: RV_5,055.10c juṣadhvaṃ no havyadātiṃ yajatrā vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8301: RV_5,056.01a agne śardhantam ā gaṇam piṣṭaṃ rukmebhir añjibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8302: RV_5,056.01c viśo adya marutām ava hvaye divaś cid rocanād adhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8303: RV_5,056.02a yathā cin manyase hṛdā tad in me jagmur āśasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8304: RV_5,056.02c ye te nediṣṭhaṃ havanāny āgaman tān vardha bhīmasaṃdṛśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8305: RV_5,056.03a mīḷhuṣmatīva pṛthivī parāhatā madanty ety asmad ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8306: RV_5,056.03c ṛkṣo na vo marutaḥ śimīvāṃ amo dudhro gaur iva bhīmayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8307: RV_5,056.04a ni ye riṇanty ojasā vṛthā gāvo na durdhuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8308: RV_5,056.04c aśmānaṃ cit svaryam parvataṃ girim pra cyāvayanti yāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8309: RV_5,056.05a ut tiṣṭha nūnam eṣāṃ stomaiḥ samukṣitānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8310: RV_5,056.05c marutām purutamam apūrvyaṃ gavāṃ sargam iva hvaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8311: RV_5,056.06a yuṅgdhvaṃ hy aruṣī rathe yuṅgdhvaṃ ratheṣu rohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8312: RV_5,056.06c yuṅgdhvaṃ harī ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave //
GV01rvh1-10u:8313: RV_5,056.07a uta sya vājy aruṣas tuviṣvaṇir iha sma dhāyi darśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8314: RV_5,056.07c mā vo yāmeṣu marutaś ciraṃ karat pra taṃ ratheṣu codata //
GV01rvh1-10u:8315: RV_5,056.08a rathaṃ nu mārutaṃ vayaṃ śravasyum ā huvāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8316: RV_5,056.08c ā yasmin tasthau suraṇāni bibhratī sacā marutsu rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8317: RV_5,056.09a taṃ vaḥ śardhaṃ ratheśubhaṃ tveṣam panasyum ā huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:8318: RV_5,056.09c yasmin sujātā subhagā mahīyate sacā marutsu mīḷhuṣī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8319: RV_5,057.01a ā rudrāsa indravantaḥ sajoṣaso hiraṇyarathāḥ suvitāya gantana /
GV01rvh1-10u:8320: RV_5,057.01c iyaṃ vo asmat prati haryate matis tṛṣṇaje na diva utsā udanyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:8321: RV_5,057.02a vāśīmanta ṛṣṭimanto manīṣiṇaḥ sudhanvāna iṣumanto niṣaṅgiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8322: RV_5,057.02c svaśvā stha surathāḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ svāyudhā maruto yāthanā śubham //
GV01rvh1-10u:8323: RV_5,057.03a dhūnutha dyām parvatān dāśuṣe vasu ni vo vanā jihate yāmano bhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8324: RV_5,057.03c kopayatha pṛthivīm pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhe yad ugrāḥ pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8325: RV_5,057.04a vātatviṣo maruto varṣanirṇijo yamā iva susadṛśaḥ supeśasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8326: RV_5,057.04c piśaṅgāśvā aruṇāśvā arepasaḥ pratvakṣaso mahinā dyaur ivoravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8327: RV_5,057.05a purudrapsā añjimantaḥ sudānavas tveṣasaṃdṛśo anavabhrarādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8328: RV_5,057.05c sujātāso januṣā rukmavakṣaso divo arkā amṛtaṃ nāma bhejire //
GV01rvh1-10u:8329: RV_5,057.06a ṛṣṭayo vo maruto aṃsayor adhi saha ojo bāhvor vo balaṃ hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8330: RV_5,057.06c nṛmṇā śīrṣasv āyudhā ratheṣu vo viśvā vaḥ śrīr adhi tanūṣu pipiśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8331: RV_5,057.07a gomad aśvāvad rathavat suvīraṃ candravad rādho maruto dadā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8332: RV_5,057.07c praśastiṃ naḥ kṛṇuta rudriyāso bhakṣīya vo 'vaso daivyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:8333: RV_5,057.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8334: RV_5,057.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8335: RV_5,058.01a tam u nūnaṃ taviṣīmantam eṣāṃ stuṣe gaṇam mārutaṃ navyasīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8336: RV_5,058.01c ya āśvaśvā amavad vahanta uteśire amṛtasya svarājaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8337: RV_5,058.02a tveṣaṃ gaṇaṃ tavasaṃ khādihastaṃ dhunivratam māyinaṃ dātivāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8338: RV_5,058.02c mayobhuvo ye amitā mahitvā vandasva vipra tuvirādhaso nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:8339: RV_5,058.03a ā vo yantūdavāhāso adya vṛṣṭiṃ ye viśve maruto junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8340: RV_5,058.03c ayaṃ yo agnir marutaḥ samiddha etaṃ juṣadhvaṃ kavayo yuvānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8341: RV_5,058.04a yūyaṃ rājānam iryaṃ janāya vibhvataṣṭaṃ janayathā yajatrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8342: RV_5,058.04c yuṣmad eti muṣṭihā bāhujūto yuṣmat sadaśvo marutaḥ suvīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8343: RV_5,058.05a arā ived acaramā aheva pra-pra jāyante akavā mahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8344: RV_5,058.05c pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ sam mimikṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8345: RV_5,058.06a yat prāyāsiṣṭa pṛṣatībhir aśvair vīḷupavibhir maruto rathebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8346: RV_5,058.06c kṣodanta āpo riṇate vanāny avosriyo vṛṣabhaḥ krandatu dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8347: RV_5,058.07a prathiṣṭa yāman pṛthivī cid eṣām bharteva garbhaṃ svam ic chavo dhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8348: RV_5,058.07c vātān hy aśvān dhury āyuyujre varṣaṃ svedaṃ cakrire rudriyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8349: RV_5,058.08a haye naro maruto mṛḷatā nas tuvīmaghāso amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8350: RV_5,058.08c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yuvāno bṛhadgirayo bṛhad ukṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8351: RV_5,059.01a pra va spaḷ akran suvitāya dāvane 'rcā dive pra pṛthivyā ṛtam bhare /
GV01rvh1-10u:8352: RV_5,059.01c ukṣante aśvān taruṣanta ā rajo 'nu svam bhānuṃ śrathayante arṇavaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8353: RV_5,059.02a amād eṣām bhiyasā bhūmir ejati naur na pūrṇā kṣarati vyathir yatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8354: RV_5,059.02c dūredṛśo ye citayanta emabhir antar mahe vidathe yetire naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8355: RV_5,059.03a gavām iva śriyase śṛṅgam uttamaṃ sūryo na cakṣū rajaso visarjane /
GV01rvh1-10u:8356: RV_5,059.03c atyā iva subhvaś cārava sthana maryā iva śriyase cetathā naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8357: RV_5,059.04a ko vo mahānti mahatām ud aśnavat kas kāvyā marutaḥ ko ha pauṃsyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8358: RV_5,059.04c yūyaṃ ha bhūmiṃ kiraṇaṃ na rejatha pra yad bharadhve suvitāya dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:8359: RV_5,059.05a aśvā ived aruṣāsaḥ sabandhavaḥ śūrā iva prayudhaḥ prota yuyudhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8360: RV_5,059.05c maryā iva suvṛdho vāvṛdhur naraḥ sūryasya cakṣuḥ pra minanti vṛṣṭibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8361: RV_5,059.06a te ajyeṣṭhā akaniṣṭhāsa udbhido 'madhyamāso mahasā vi vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8362: RV_5,059.06c sujātāso januṣā pṛśnimātaro divo maryā ā no acchā jigātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:8363: RV_5,059.07a vayo na ye śreṇīḥ paptur ojasāntān divo bṛhataḥ sānunas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:8364: RV_5,059.07c aśvāsa eṣām ubhaye yathā viduḥ pra parvatasya nabhanūṃr acucyavuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8365: RV_5,059.08a mimātu dyaur aditir vītaye naḥ saṃ dānucitrā uṣaso yatantām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8366: RV_5,059.08c ācucyavur divyaṃ kośam eta ṛṣe rudrasya maruto gṛṇānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8367: RV_5,060.01a īḷe agniṃ svavasaṃ namobhir iha prasatto vi cayat kṛtaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8368: RV_5,060.01c rathair iva pra bhare vājayadbhiḥ pradakṣiṇin marutāṃ stomam ṛdhyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8369: RV_5,060.02a ā ye tasthuḥ pṛṣatīṣu śrutāsu sukheṣu rudrā maruto ratheṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8370: RV_5,060.02c vanā cid ugrā jihate ni vo bhiyā pṛthivī cid rejate parvataś cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:8371: RV_5,060.03a parvataś cin mahi vṛddho bibhāya divaś cit sānu rejata svane vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8372: RV_5,060.03c yat krīḷatha maruta ṛṣṭimanta āpa iva sadhryañco dhavadhve //
GV01rvh1-10u:8373: RV_5,060.04a varā ived raivatāso hiraṇyair abhi svadhābhis tanvaḥ pipiśre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8374: RV_5,060.04c śriye śreyāṃsas tavaso ratheṣu satrā mahāṃsi cakrire tanūṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:8375: RV_5,060.05a ajyeṣṭhāso akaniṣṭhāsa ete sam bhrātaro vāvṛdhuḥ saubhagāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8376: RV_5,060.05c yuvā pitā svapā rudra eṣāṃ sudughā pṛśniḥ sudinā marudbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8377: RV_5,060.06a yad uttame maruto madhyame vā yad vāvame subhagāso divi ṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8378: RV_5,060.06c ato no rudrā uta vā nv asyāgne vittād dhaviṣo yad yajāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:8379: RV_5,060.07a agniś ca yan maruto viśvavedaso divo vahadhva uttarād adhi ṣṇubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8380: RV_5,060.07c te mandasānā dhunayo riśādaso vāmaṃ dhatta yajamānāya sunvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8381: RV_5,060.08a agne marudbhiḥ śubhayadbhir ṛkvabhiḥ somam piba mandasāno gaṇaśribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8382: RV_5,060.08c pāvakebhir viśvaminvebhir āyubhir vaiśvānara pradivā ketunā sajūḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8383: RV_5,061.01a ke ṣṭhā naraḥ śreṣṭhatamā ya eka-eka āyaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8385: RV_5,061.02a kva vo 'śvāḥ kvābhīśavaḥ kathaṃ śeka kathā yaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8387: RV_5,061.03a jaghane coda eṣāṃ vi sakthāni naro yamuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8389: RV_5,061.04a parā vīrāsa etana maryāso bhadrajānayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8391: RV_5,061.05a sanat sāśvyam paśum uta gavyaṃ śatāvayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8393: RV_5,061.06a uta tvā strī śaśīyasī puṃso bhavati vasyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8395: RV_5,061.07a vi yā jānāti jasuriṃ vi tṛṣyantaṃ vi kāminam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8397: RV_5,061.08a uta ghā nemo astutaḥ pumāṃ iti bruve paṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8399: RV_5,061.09a uta me 'rapad yuvatir mamanduṣī prati śyāvāya vartanim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8400: RV_5,061.09c vi rohitā purumīḷhāya yematur viprāya dīrghayaśase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8401: RV_5,061.10a yo me dhenūnāṃ śataṃ vaidadaśvir yathā dadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8403: RV_5,061.11a ya īṃ vahanta āśubhiḥ pibanto madiram madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8405: RV_5,061.12a yeṣāṃ śriyādhi rodasī vibhrājante ratheṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8407: RV_5,061.13a yuvā sa māruto gaṇas tveṣaratho anedyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8409: RV_5,061.14a ko veda nūnam eṣāṃ yatrā madanti dhūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8411: RV_5,061.15a yūyam martaṃ vipanyavaḥ praṇetāra itthā dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8413: RV_5,061.16a te no vasūni kāmyā puruścandrā riśādasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8415: RV_5,061.17a etam me stomam ūrmye dārbhyāya parā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8417: RV_5,061.18a uta me vocatād iti sutasome rathavītau /
GV01rvh1-10u:8418: RV_5,061.18c na kāmo apa veti me //
GV01rvh1-10u:8419: RV_5,061.19a eṣa kṣeti rathavītir maghavā gomatīr anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8421: RV_5,062.01a ṛtena ṛtam apihitaṃ dhruvaṃ vāṃ sūryasya yatra vimucanty aśvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:8422: RV_5,062.01c daśa śatā saha tasthus tad ekaṃ devānāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vapuṣām apaśyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8423: RV_5,062.02a tat su vām mitrāvaruṇā mahitvam īrmā tasthuṣīr ahabhir duduhre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8424: RV_5,062.02c viśvāḥ pinvathaḥ svasarasya dhenā anu vām ekaḥ pavir ā vavarta //
GV01rvh1-10u:8425: RV_5,062.03a adhārayatam pṛthivīm uta dyām mitrarājānā varuṇā mahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8426: RV_5,062.03c vardhayatam oṣadhīḥ pinvataṃ gā ava vṛṣṭiṃ sṛjataṃ jīradānū //
GV01rvh1-10u:8427: RV_5,062.04a ā vām aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahantu yataraśmaya upa yantv arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:8428: RV_5,062.04c ghṛtasya nirṇig anu vartate vām upa sindhavaḥ pradivi kṣaranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8429: RV_5,062.05a anu śrutām amatiṃ vardhad urvīm barhir iva yajuṣā rakṣamāṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8430: RV_5,062.05c namasvantā dhṛtadakṣādhi garte mitrāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8431: RV_5,062.06a akravihastā sukṛte paraspā yaṃ trāsāthe varuṇeḷāsv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8432: RV_5,062.06c rājānā kṣatram ahṛṇīyamānā sahasrasthūṇam bibhṛthaḥ saha dvau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8433: RV_5,062.07a hiraṇyanirṇig ayo asya sthūṇā vi bhrājate divy aśvājanīva /
GV01rvh1-10u:8434: RV_5,062.07c bhadre kṣetre nimitā tilvile vā sanema madhvo adhigartyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:8435: RV_5,062.08a hiraṇyarūpam uṣaso vyuṣṭāv ayasthūṇam uditā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8436: RV_5,062.08c ā rohatho varuṇa mitra gartam ataś cakṣāthe aditiṃ ditiṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:8437: RV_5,062.09a yad baṃhiṣṭhaṃ nātividhe sudānū acchidraṃ śarma bhuvanasya gopā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8438: RV_5,062.09c tena no mitrāvaruṇāv aviṣṭaṃ siṣāsanto jigīvāṃsaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:8439: RV_5,063.01a ṛtasya gopāv adhi tiṣṭhatho rathaṃ satyadharmāṇā parame vyomani /
GV01rvh1-10u:8440: RV_5,063.01c yam atra mitrāvaruṇāvatho yuvaṃ tasmai vṛṣṭir madhumat pinvate divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8441: RV_5,063.02a samrājāv asya bhuvanasya rājatho mitrāvaruṇā vidathe svardṛśā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8442: RV_5,063.02c vṛṣṭiṃ vāṃ rādho amṛtatvam īmahe dyāvāpṛthivī vi caranti tanyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8443: RV_5,063.03a samrājā ugrā vṛṣabhā divas patī pṛthivyā mitrāvaruṇā vicarṣaṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8444: RV_5,063.03c citrebhir abhrair upa tiṣṭhatho ravaṃ dyāṃ varṣayatho asurasya māyayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8445: RV_5,063.04a māyā vām mitrāvaruṇā divi śritā sūryo jyotiś carati citram āyudham /
GV01rvh1-10u:8446: RV_5,063.04c tam abhreṇa vṛṣṭyā gūhatho divi parjanya drapsā madhumanta īrate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8447: RV_5,063.05a rathaṃ yuñjate marutaḥ śubhe sukhaṃ śūro na mitrāvaruṇā gaviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8448: RV_5,063.05c rajāṃsi citrā vi caranti tanyavo divaḥ samrājā payasā na ukṣatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8449: RV_5,063.06a vācaṃ su mitrāvaruṇāv irāvatīm parjanyaś citrāṃ vadati tviṣīmatīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:8450: RV_5,063.06c abhrā vasata marutaḥ su māyayā dyāṃ varṣayatam aruṇām arepasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8451: RV_5,063.07a dharmaṇā mitrāvaruṇā vipaścitā vratā rakṣethe asurasya māyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8452: RV_5,063.07c ṛtena viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājathaḥ sūryam ā dhattho divi citryaṃ ratham //
GV01rvh1-10u:8453: RV_5,064.01a varuṇaṃ vo riśādasam ṛcā mitraṃ havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8454: RV_5,064.01c pari vrajeva bāhvor jaganvāṃsā svarṇaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:8455: RV_5,064.02a tā bāhavā sucetunā pra yantam asmā arcate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8456: RV_5,064.02c śevaṃ hi jāryaṃ vāṃ viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve //
GV01rvh1-10u:8457: RV_5,064.03a yan nūnam aśyāṃ gatim mitrasya yāyām pathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8458: RV_5,064.03c asya priyasya śarmaṇy ahiṃsānasya saścire //
GV01rvh1-10u:8460: RV_5,064.04c yad dha kṣaye maghonāṃ stotṝṇāṃ ca spūrdhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8461: RV_5,064.05a ā no mitra sudītibhir varuṇaś ca sadhastha ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8462: RV_5,064.05c sve kṣaye maghonāṃ sakhīnāṃ ca vṛdhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8463: RV_5,064.06a yuvaṃ no yeṣu varuṇa kṣatram bṛhac ca bibhṛthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8464: RV_5,064.06c uru ṇo vājasātaye kṛtaṃ rāye svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8465: RV_5,064.07a ucchantyām me yajatā devakṣatre ruśadgavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8466: RV_5,064.07c sutaṃ somaṃ na hastibhir ā paḍbhir dhāvataṃ narā bibhratāv arcanānasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8467: RV_5,065.01a yaś ciketa sa sukratur devatrā sa bravītu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8468: RV_5,065.01c varuṇo yasya darśato mitro vā vanate giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8469: RV_5,065.02a tā hi śreṣṭhavarcasā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8470: RV_5,065.02c tā satpatī ṛtāvṛdha ṛtāvānā jane-jane //
GV01rvh1-10u:8471: RV_5,065.03a tā vām iyāno 'vase pūrvā upa bruve sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8472: RV_5,065.03c svaśvāsaḥ su cetunā vājāṃ abhi pra dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:8473: RV_5,065.04a mitro aṃhoś cid ād uru kṣayāya gātuṃ vanate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8474: RV_5,065.04c mitrasya hi pratūrvataḥ sumatir asti vidhataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8477: RV_5,065.06a yuvam mitremaṃ janaṃ yatathaḥ saṃ ca nayathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8478: RV_5,065.06c mā maghonaḥ pari khyatam mo asmākam ṛṣīṇāṃ gopīthe na uruṣyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8479: RV_5,066.01a ā cikitāna sukratū devau marta riśādasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8480: RV_5,066.01c varuṇāya ṛtapeśase dadhīta prayase mahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8481: RV_5,066.02a tā hi kṣatram avihrutaṃ samyag asuryam āśāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:8482: RV_5,066.02c adha vrateva mānuṣaṃ svar ṇa dhāyi darśatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8483: RV_5,066.03a tā vām eṣe rathānām urvīṃ gavyūtim eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8484: RV_5,066.03c rātahavyasya suṣṭutiṃ dadhṛk stomair manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8485: RV_5,066.04a adhā hi kāvyā yuvaṃ dakṣasya pūrbhir adbhutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8486: RV_5,066.04c ni ketunā janānāṃ cikethe pūtadakṣasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8487: RV_5,066.05a tad ṛtam pṛthivi bṛhac chravaeṣa ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8488: RV_5,066.05c jrayasānāv aram pṛthv ati kṣaranti yāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8489: RV_5,066.06a ā yad vām īyacakṣasā mitra vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8491: RV_5,067.01a baḷ itthā deva niṣkṛtam ādityā yajatam bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8492: RV_5,067.01c varuṇa mitrāryaman varṣiṣṭhaṃ kṣatram āśāthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8493: RV_5,067.02a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇa mitra sadathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8494: RV_5,067.02c dhartārā carṣaṇīnāṃ yantaṃ sumnaṃ riśādasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8495: RV_5,067.03a viśve hi viśvavedaso varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8496: RV_5,067.03c vratā padeva saścire pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8497: RV_5,067.04a te hi satyā ṛtaspṛśa ṛtāvāno jane-jane /
GV01rvh1-10u:8499: RV_5,067.05a ko nu vām mitrāstuto varuṇo vā tanūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8500: RV_5,067.05c tat su vām eṣate matir atribhya eṣate matiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8501: RV_5,068.01a pra vo mitrāya gāyata varuṇāya vipā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8503: RV_5,068.02a samrājā yā ghṛtayonī mitraś cobhā varuṇaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:8505: RV_5,068.03a tā naḥ śaktam pārthivasya maho rāyo divyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8507: RV_5,068.04a ṛtam ṛtena sapanteṣiraṃ dakṣam āśāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:8511: RV_5,069.01a trī rocanā varuṇa trīṃr uta dyūn trīṇi mitra dhārayatho rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8512: RV_5,069.01c vāvṛdhānāv amatiṃ kṣatriyasyānu vrataṃ rakṣamāṇāv ajuryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8513: RV_5,069.02a irāvatīr varuṇa dhenavo vām madhumad vāṃ sindhavo mitra duhre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8514: RV_5,069.02c trayas tasthur vṛṣabhāsas tisṛṇāṃ dhiṣaṇānāṃ retodhā vi dyumantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8515: RV_5,069.03a prātar devīm aditiṃ johavīmi madhyandina uditā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8516: RV_5,069.03c rāye mitrāvaruṇā sarvatāteḷe tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8517: RV_5,069.04a yā dhartārā rajaso rocanasyotādityā divyā pārthivasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8518: RV_5,069.04c na vāṃ devā amṛtā ā minanti vratāni mitrāvaruṇā dhruvāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8519: RV_5,070.01a purūruṇā cid dhy asty avo nūnaṃ vāṃ varuṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8521: RV_5,070.02a tā vāṃ samyag adruhvāṇeṣam aśyāma dhāyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8523: RV_5,070.03a pātaṃ no rudrā pāyubhir uta trāyethāṃ sutrātrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8525: RV_5,070.04a mā kasyādbhutakratū yakṣam bhujemā tanūbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8527: RV_5,071.01a ā no gantaṃ riśādasā varuṇa mitra barhaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8529: RV_5,071.02a viśvasya hi pracetasā varuṇa mitra rājathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8531: RV_5,071.03a upa naḥ sutam ā gataṃ varuṇa mitra dāśuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8533: RV_5,072.01a ā mitre varuṇe vayaṃ gīrbhir juhumo atrivat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8535: RV_5,072.02a vratena stho dhruvakṣemā dharmaṇā yātayajjanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8537: RV_5,072.03a mitraś ca no varuṇaś ca juṣetāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8539: RV_5,073.01a yad adya sthaḥ parāvati yad arvāvaty aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8540: RV_5,073.01c yad vā purū purubhujā yad antarikṣa ā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8541: RV_5,073.02a iha tyā purubhūtamā purū daṃsāṃsi bibhratā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8542: RV_5,073.02c varasyā yāmy adhrigū huve tuviṣṭamā bhuje //
GV01rvh1-10u:8543: RV_5,073.03a īrmānyad vapuṣe vapuś cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8544: RV_5,073.03c pary anyā nāhuṣā yugā mahnā rajāṃsi dīyathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8545: RV_5,073.04a tad ū ṣu vām enā kṛtaṃ viśvā yad vām anu ṣṭave /
GV01rvh1-10u:8546: RV_5,073.04c nānā jātāv arepasā sam asme bandhum eyathuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8547: RV_5,073.05a ā yad vāṃ sūryā rathaṃ tiṣṭhad raghuṣyadaṃ sadā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8548: RV_5,073.05c pari vām aruṣā vayo ghṛṇā varanta ātapaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8549: RV_5,073.06a yuvor atriś ciketati narā sumnena cetasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8550: RV_5,073.06c gharmaṃ yad vām arepasaṃ nāsatyāsnā bhuraṇyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8551: RV_5,073.07a ugro vāṃ kakuho yayiḥ śṛṇve yāmeṣu saṃtaniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8552: RV_5,073.07c yad vāṃ daṃsobhir aśvinātrir narāvavartati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8553: RV_5,073.08a madhva ū ṣu madhūyuvā rudrā siṣakti pipyuṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8554: RV_5,073.08c yat samudrāti parṣathaḥ pakvāḥ pṛkṣo bharanta vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8555: RV_5,073.09a satyam id vā u aśvinā yuvām āhur mayobhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8556: RV_5,073.09c tā yāman yāmahūtamā yāmann ā mṛḷayattamā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8557: RV_5,073.10a imā brahmāṇi vardhanāśvibhyāṃ santu śantamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8558: RV_5,073.10c yā takṣāma rathāṃ ivāvocāma bṛhan namaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8559: RV_5,074.01a kūṣṭho devāv aśvinādyā divo manāvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:8560: RV_5,074.01c tac chravatho vṛṣaṇvasū atrir vām ā vivāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8561: RV_5,074.02a kuha tyā kuha nu śrutā divi devā nāsatyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8562: RV_5,074.02c kasminn ā yatatho jane ko vāṃ nadīnāṃ sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8563: RV_5,074.03a kaṃ yāthaḥ kaṃ ha gacchathaḥ kam acchā yuñjāthe ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:8564: RV_5,074.03c kasya brahmāṇi raṇyatho vayaṃ vām uśmasīṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8565: RV_5,074.04a pauraṃ cid dhy udaprutam paura paurāya jinvathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8566: RV_5,074.04c yad īṃ gṛbhītatātaye siṃham iva druhas pade //
GV01rvh1-10u:8567: RV_5,074.05a pra cyavānāj jujuruṣo vavrim atkaṃ na muñcathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8568: RV_5,074.05c yuvā yadī kṛthaḥ punar ā kāmam ṛṇve vadhvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8569: RV_5,074.06a asti hi vām iha stotā smasi vāṃ saṃdṛśi śriye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8570: RV_5,074.06c nū śrutam ma ā gatam avobhir vājinīvasū //
GV01rvh1-10u:8571: RV_5,074.07a ko vām adya purūṇām ā vavne martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8572: RV_5,074.07c ko vipro vipravāhasā ko yajñair vājinīvasū //
GV01rvh1-10u:8573: RV_5,074.08a ā vāṃ ratho rathānāṃ yeṣṭho yātv aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8574: RV_5,074.08c purū cid asmayus tira āṅgūṣo martyeṣv ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8575: RV_5,074.09a śam ū ṣu vām madhūyuvāsmākam astu carkṛtiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8576: RV_5,074.09c arvācīnā vicetasā vibhiḥ śyeneva dīyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8577: RV_5,074.10a aśvinā yad dha karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8578: RV_5,074.10c vasvīr ū ṣu vām bhujaḥ pṛñcanti su vām pṛcaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8579: RV_5,075.01a prati priyatamaṃ rathaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vasuvāhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8580: RV_5,075.01c stotā vām aśvināv ṛṣi stomena prati bhūṣati mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8581: RV_5,075.02a atyāyātam aśvinā tiro viśvā ahaṃ sanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8582: RV_5,075.02c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī suṣumnā sindhuvāhasā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8583: RV_5,075.03a ā no ratnāni bibhratāv aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8584: RV_5,075.03c rudrā hiraṇyavartanī juṣāṇā vājinīvasū mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8585: RV_5,075.04a suṣṭubho vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū rathe vāṇīcy āhitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8586: RV_5,075.04c uta vāṃ kakuho mṛgaḥ pṛkṣaḥ kṛṇoti vāpuṣo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8588: RV_5,075.05c vibhiś cyavānam aśvinā ni yātho advayāvinam mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8589: RV_5,075.06a ā vāṃ narā manoyujo 'śvāsaḥ pruṣitapsavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8590: RV_5,075.06c vayo vahantu pītaye saha sumnebhir aśvinā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8591: RV_5,075.07a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8592: RV_5,075.07c tiraś cid aryayā pari vartir yātam adābhyā mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8593: RV_5,075.08a asmin yajñe adābhyā jaritāraṃ śubhas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8594: RV_5,075.08c avasyum aśvinā yuvaṃ gṛṇantam upa bhūṣatho mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8595: RV_5,075.09a abhūd uṣā ruśatpaśur āgnir adhāyy ṛtviyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8596: RV_5,075.09c ayoji vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ratho dasrāv amartyo mādhvī mama śrutaṃ havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8597: RV_5,076.01a ā bhāty agnir uṣasām anīkam ud viprāṇāṃ devayā vāco asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8598: RV_5,076.01c arvāñcā nūnaṃ rathyeha yātam pīpivāṃsam aśvinā gharmam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8599: RV_5,076.02a na saṃskṛtam pra mimīto gamiṣṭhānti nūnam aśvinopastuteha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8600: RV_5,076.02c divābhipitve 'vasāgamiṣṭhā praty avartiṃ dāśuṣe śambhaviṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8601: RV_5,076.03a utā yātaṃ saṃgave prātar ahno madhyandina uditā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8602: RV_5,076.03c divā naktam avasā śantamena nedānīm pītir aśvinā tatāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:8603: RV_5,076.04a idaṃ hi vām pradivi sthānam oka ime gṛhā aśvinedaṃ duroṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8604: RV_5,076.04c ā no divo bṛhataḥ parvatād ādbhyo yātam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8605: RV_5,076.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
GV01rvh1-10u:8606: RV_5,076.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8607: RV_5,077.01a prātaryāvāṇā prathamā yajadhvam purā gṛdhrād araruṣaḥ pibātaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8608: RV_5,077.01c prātar hi yajñam aśvinā dadhāte pra śaṃsanti kavayaḥ pūrvabhājaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8609: RV_5,077.02a prātar yajadhvam aśvinā hinota na sāyam asti devayā ajuṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8610: RV_5,077.02c utānyo asmad yajate vi cāvaḥ pūrvaḥ-pūrvo yajamāno vanīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:8611: RV_5,077.03a hiraṇyatvaṅ madhuvarṇo ghṛtasnuḥ pṛkṣo vahann ā ratho vartate vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8612: RV_5,077.03c manojavā aśvinā vātaraṃhā yenātiyātho duritāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8613: RV_5,077.04a yo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ nāsatyābhyāṃ viveṣa caniṣṭham pitvo rarate vibhāge /
GV01rvh1-10u:8614: RV_5,077.04c sa tokam asya pīparac chamībhir anūrdhvabhāsaḥ sadam it tuturyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:8615: RV_5,077.05a sam aśvinor avasā nūtanena mayobhuvā supraṇītī gamema /
GV01rvh1-10u:8616: RV_5,077.05c ā no rayiṃ vahatam ota vīrān ā viśvāny amṛtā saubhagāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8617: RV_5,078.01a aśvināv eha gacchataṃ nāsatyā mā vi venatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8618: RV_5,078.01c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8619: RV_5,078.02a aśvinā hariṇāv iva gaurāv ivānu yavasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8620: RV_5,078.02c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8621: RV_5,078.03a aśvinā vājinīvasū juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8622: RV_5,078.03c haṃsāv iva patatam ā sutāṃ upa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8623: RV_5,078.04a atrir yad vām avarohann ṛbīsam ajohavīn nādhamāneva yoṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8624: RV_5,078.04c śyenasya cij javasā nūtanenāgacchatam aśvinā śantamena //
GV01rvh1-10u:8625: RV_5,078.05a vi jihīṣva vanaspate yoniḥ sūṣyantyā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:8626: RV_5,078.05c śrutam me aśvinā havaṃ saptavadhriṃ ca muñcatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8628: RV_5,078.06c māyābhir aśvinā yuvaṃ vṛkṣaṃ saṃ ca vi cācathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8629: RV_5,078.07a yathā vātaḥ puṣkariṇīṃ samiṅgayati sarvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8630: RV_5,078.07c evā te garbha ejatu niraitu daśamāsyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8631: RV_5,078.08a yathā vāto yathā vanaṃ yathā samudra ejati /
GV01rvh1-10u:8632: RV_5,078.08c evā tvaṃ daśamāsya sahāvehi jarāyuṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8633: RV_5,078.09a daśa māsāñ chaśayānaḥ kumāro adhi mātari /
GV01rvh1-10u:8634: RV_5,078.09c niraitu jīvo akṣato jīvo jīvantyā adhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8635: RV_5,079.01a mahe no adya bodhayoṣo rāye divitmatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8636: RV_5,079.01c yathā cin no abodhayaḥ satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8637: RV_5,079.02a yā sunīthe śaucadrathe vy auccho duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8638: RV_5,079.02c sā vy uccha sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8639: RV_5,079.03a sā no adyābharadvasur vy ucchā duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8640: RV_5,079.03c yo vy aucchaḥ sahīyasi satyaśravasi vāyye sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8641: RV_5,079.04a abhi ye tvā vibhāvari stomair gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8642: RV_5,079.04c maghair maghoni suśriyo dāmanvantaḥ surātayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8643: RV_5,079.05a yac cid dhi te gaṇā ime chadayanti maghattaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:8644: RV_5,079.05c pari cid vaṣṭayo dadhur dadato rādho ahrayaṃ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8645: RV_5,079.06a aiṣu dhā vīravad yaśa uṣo maghoni sūriṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8646: RV_5,079.06c ye no rādhāṃsy ahrayā maghavāno arāsata sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8647: RV_5,079.07a tebhyo dyumnam bṛhad yaśa uṣo maghony ā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8648: RV_5,079.07c ye no rādhāṃsy aśvyā gavyā bhajanta sūrayaḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8649: RV_5,079.08a uta no gomatīr iṣa ā vahā duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8650: RV_5,079.08c sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ śukraiḥ śocadbhir arcibhiḥ sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8651: RV_5,079.09a vy ucchā duhitar divo mā ciraṃ tanuthā apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8652: RV_5,079.09c net tvā stenaṃ yathā ripuṃ tapāti sūro arciṣā sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8653: RV_5,079.10a etāvad ved uṣas tvam bhūyo vā dātum arhasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8654: RV_5,079.10c yā stotṛbhyo vibhāvary ucchantī na pramīyase sujāte aśvasūnṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:8655: RV_5,080.01a dyutadyāmānam bṛhatīm ṛtena ṛtāvarīm aruṇapsuṃ vibhātīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:8656: RV_5,080.01c devīm uṣasaṃ svar āvahantīm prati viprāso matibhir jarante //
GV01rvh1-10u:8657: RV_5,080.02a eṣā janaṃ darśatā bodhayantī sugān pathaḥ kṛṇvatī yāty agre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8658: RV_5,080.02c bṛhadrathā bṛhatī viśvaminvoṣā jyotir yacchaty agre ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8659: RV_5,080.03a eṣā gobhir aruṇebhir yujānāsredhantī rayim aprāyu cakre /
GV01rvh1-10u:8660: RV_5,080.03c patho radantī suvitāya devī puruṣṭutā viśvavārā vi bhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8661: RV_5,080.04a eṣā vyenī bhavati dvibarhā āviṣkṛṇvānā tanvam purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8662: RV_5,080.04c ṛtasya panthām anv eti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8663: RV_5,080.05a eṣā śubhrā na tanvo vidānordhveva snātī dṛśaye no asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8664: RV_5,080.05c apa dveṣo bādhamānā tamāṃsy uṣā divo duhitā jyotiṣāgāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:8665: RV_5,080.06a eṣā pratīcī duhitā divo nṝn yoṣeva bhadrā ni riṇīte apsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8666: RV_5,080.06c vyūrṇvatī dāśuṣe vāryāṇi punar jyotir yuvatiḥ pūrvathākaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8667: RV_5,081.01a yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8668: RV_5,081.01c vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8669: RV_5,081.02a viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade catuṣpade /
GV01rvh1-10u:8670: RV_5,081.02c vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso vi rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8671: RV_5,081.03a yasya prayāṇam anv anya id yayur devā devasya mahimānam ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8672: RV_5,081.03c yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśo rajāṃsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8673: RV_5,081.04a uta yāsi savitas trīṇi rocanota sūryasya raśmibhiḥ sam ucyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8674: RV_5,081.04c uta rātrīm ubhayataḥ parīyasa uta mitro bhavasi deva dharmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8675: RV_5,081.05a uteśiṣe prasavasya tvam eka id uta pūṣā bhavasi deva yāmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8676: RV_5,081.05c utedaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi rājasi śyāvāśvas te savita stomam ānaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8677: RV_5,082.01a tat savitur vṛṇīmahe vayaṃ devasya bhojanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8678: RV_5,082.01c śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadhātamaṃ turam bhagasya dhīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8679: RV_5,082.02a asya hi svayaśastaraṃ savituḥ kac cana priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8681: RV_5,082.03a sa hi ratnāni dāśuṣe suvāti savitā bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8683: RV_5,082.04a adyā no deva savitaḥ prajāvat sāvīḥ saubhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8685: RV_5,082.05a viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva /
GV01rvh1-10u:8686: RV_5,082.05c yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva //
GV01rvh1-10u:8687: RV_5,082.06a anāgaso aditaye devasya savituḥ save /
GV01rvh1-10u:8689: RV_5,082.07a ā viśvadevaṃ satpatiṃ sūktair adyā vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8691: RV_5,082.08a ya ime ubhe ahanī pura ety aprayucchan /
GV01rvh1-10u:8693: RV_5,082.09a ya imā viśvā jātāny āśrāvayati ślokena /
GV01rvh1-10u:8695: RV_5,083.01a acchā vada tavasaṃ gīrbhir ābhi stuhi parjanyaṃ namasā vivāsa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8696: RV_5,083.01c kanikradad vṛṣabho jīradānū reto dadhāty oṣadhīṣu garbham //
GV01rvh1-10u:8697: RV_5,083.02a vi vṛkṣān hanty uta hanti rakṣaso viśvam bibhāya bhuvanam mahāvadhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8698: RV_5,083.02c utānāgā īṣate vṛṣṇyāvato yat parjanya stanayan hanti duṣkṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8699: RV_5,083.03a rathīva kaśayāśvāṃ abhikṣipann āvir dūtān kṛṇute varṣyāṃ aha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8700: RV_5,083.03c dūrāt siṃhasya stanathā ud īrate yat parjanyaḥ kṛṇute varṣyaṃ nabhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8701: RV_5,083.04a pra vātā vānti patayanti vidyuta ud oṣadhīr jihate pinvate svaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8702: RV_5,083.04c irā viśvasmai bhuvanāya jāyate yat parjanyaḥ pṛthivīṃ retasāvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8703: RV_5,083.05a yasya vrate pṛthivī nannamīti yasya vrate śaphavaj jarbhurīti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8704: RV_5,083.05c yasya vrata oṣadhīr viśvarūpāḥ sa naḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha //
GV01rvh1-10u:8705: RV_5,083.06a divo no vṛṣṭim maruto rarīdhvam pra pinvata vṛṣṇo aśvasya dhārāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8706: RV_5,083.06c arvāṅ etena stanayitnunehy apo niṣiñcann asuraḥ pitā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8707: RV_5,083.07a abhi kranda stanaya garbham ā dhā udanvatā pari dīyā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:8708: RV_5,083.07c dṛtiṃ su karṣa viṣitaṃ nyañcaṃ samā bhavantūdvato nipādāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8709: RV_5,083.08a mahāntaṃ kośam ud acā ni ṣiñca syandantāṃ kulyā viṣitāḥ purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8710: RV_5,083.08c ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī vy undhi suprapāṇam bhavatv aghnyābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8711: RV_5,083.09a yat parjanya kanikradat stanayan haṃsi duṣkṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8712: RV_5,083.09c pratīdaṃ viśvam modate yat kiṃ ca pṛthivyām adhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8713: RV_5,083.10a avarṣīr varṣam ud u ṣū gṛbhāyākar dhanvāny atyetavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:8714: RV_5,083.10c ajījana oṣadhīr bhojanāya kam uta prajābhyo 'vido manīṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8715: RV_5,084.01a baḷ itthā parvatānāṃ khidram bibharṣi pṛthivi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8716: RV_5,084.01c pra yā bhūmim pravatvati mahnā jinoṣi mahini //
GV01rvh1-10u:8717: RV_5,084.02a stomāsas tvā vicāriṇi prati ṣṭobhanty aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8718: RV_5,084.02c pra yā vājaṃ na heṣantam perum asyasy arjuni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8719: RV_5,084.03a dṛḷhā cid yā vanaspatīn kṣmayā dardharṣy ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8720: RV_5,084.03c yat te abhrasya vidyuto divo varṣanti vṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8721: RV_5,085.01a pra samrāje bṛhad arcā gabhīram brahma priyaṃ varuṇāya śrutāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:8722: RV_5,085.01c vi yo jaghāna śamiteva carmopastire pṛthivīṃ sūryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:8723: RV_5,085.02a vaneṣu vy antarikṣaṃ tatāna vājam arvatsu paya usriyāsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8724: RV_5,085.02c hṛtsu kratuṃ varuṇo apsv agniṃ divi sūryam adadhāt somam adrau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8725: RV_5,085.03a nīcīnabāraṃ varuṇaḥ kavandham pra sasarja rodasī antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8726: RV_5,085.03c tena viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir vy unatti bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:8727: RV_5,085.04a unatti bhūmim pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ yadā dugdhaṃ varuṇo vaṣṭy ād it /
GV01rvh1-10u:8728: RV_5,085.04c sam abhreṇa vasata parvatāsas taviṣīyantaḥ śrathayanta vīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8729: RV_5,085.05a imām ū ṣv āsurasya śrutasya mahīm māyāṃ varuṇasya pra vocam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8730: RV_5,085.05c māneneva tasthivāṃ antarikṣe vi yo mame pṛthivīṃ sūryeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:8731: RV_5,085.06a imām ū nu kavitamasya māyām mahīṃ devasya nakir ā dadharṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8732: RV_5,085.06c ekaṃ yad udnā na pṛṇanty enīr āsiñcantīr avanayaḥ samudram //
GV01rvh1-10u:8733: RV_5,085.07a aryamyaṃ varuṇa mitryaṃ vā sakhāyaṃ vā sadam id bhrātaraṃ vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8734: RV_5,085.07c veśaṃ vā nityaṃ varuṇāraṇaṃ vā yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā śiśrathas tat //
GV01rvh1-10u:8735: RV_5,085.08a kitavāso yad riripur na dīvi yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma /
GV01rvh1-10u:8736: RV_5,085.08c sarvā tā vi ṣya śithireva devādhā te syāma varuṇa priyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8737: RV_5,086.01a indrāgnī yam avatha ubhā vājeṣu martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8738: RV_5,086.01c dṛḷhā cit sa pra bhedati dyumnā vāṇīr iva tritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8739: RV_5,086.02a yā pṛtanāsu duṣṭarā yā vājeṣu śravāyyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8740: RV_5,086.02c yā pañca carṣaṇīr abhīndrāgnī tā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:8741: RV_5,086.03a tayor id amavac chavas tigmā didyun maghonoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8742: RV_5,086.03c prati druṇā gabhastyor gavāṃ vṛtraghna eṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8743: RV_5,086.04a tā vām eṣe rathānām indrāgnī havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8744: RV_5,086.04c patī turasya rādhaso vidvāṃsā girvaṇastamā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8745: RV_5,086.05a tā vṛdhantāv anu dyūn martāya devāv adabhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8746: RV_5,086.05c arhantā cit puro dadhe 'ṃśeva devāv arvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:8747: RV_5,086.06a evendrāgnibhyām ahāvi havyaṃ śūṣyaṃ ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8748: RV_5,086.06c tā sūriṣu śravo bṛhad rayiṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam iṣaṃ gṛṇatsu didhṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8749: RV_5,087.01a pra vo mahe matayo yantu viṣṇave marutvate girijā evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8750: RV_5,087.01c pra śardhāya prayajyave sukhādaye tavase bhandadiṣṭaye dhunivratāya śavase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8751: RV_5,087.02a pra ye jātā mahinā ye ca nu svayam pra vidmanā bruvata evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8752: RV_5,087.02c kratvā tad vo maruto nādhṛṣe śavo dānā mahnā tad eṣām adhṛṣṭāso nādrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8753: RV_5,087.03a pra ye divo bṛhataḥ śṛṇvire girā suśukvānaḥ subhva evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8754: RV_5,087.03c na yeṣām irī sadhastha īṣṭa āṃ agnayo na svavidyutaḥ pra syandrāso dhunīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8755: RV_5,087.04a sa cakrame mahato nir urukramaḥ samānasmāt sadasa evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8756: RV_5,087.04c yadāyukta tmanā svād adhi ṣṇubhir viṣpardhaso vimahaso jigāti śevṛdho nṛbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8757: RV_5,087.05a svano na vo 'mavān rejayad vṛṣā tveṣo yayis taviṣa evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8758: RV_5,087.05c yenā sahanta ṛñjata svarociṣa sthāraśmāno hiraṇyayāḥ svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8759: RV_5,087.06a apāro vo mahimā vṛddhaśavasas tveṣaṃ śavo 'vatv evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8760: RV_5,087.06c sthātāro hi prasitau saṃdṛśi sthana te na uruṣyatā nidaḥ śuśukvāṃso nāgnayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8761: RV_5,087.07a te rudrāsaḥ sumakhā agnayo yathā tuvidyumnā avantv evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8762: RV_5,087.07c dīrgham pṛthu paprathe sadma pārthivaṃ yeṣām ajmeṣv ā mahaḥ śardhāṃsy adbhutainasām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8763: RV_5,087.08a adveṣo no maruto gātum etana śrotā havaṃ jaritur evayāmarut /
