GV01rvh1-10u:8764: RV_5,087.08c viṣṇor mahaḥ samanyavo yuyotana smad rathyo na daṃsanāpa dveṣāṃsi sanutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8765: RV_5,087.09a gantā no yajñaṃ yajñiyāḥ suśami śrotā havam arakṣa evayāmarut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8766: RV_5,087.09c jyeṣṭhāso na parvatāso vyomani yūyaṃ tasya pracetasaḥ syāta durdhartavo nidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8769: RV_6,001.01a tvaṃ hy agne prathamo manotāsyā dhiyo abhavo dasma hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8770: RV_6,001.01c tvaṃ sīṃ vṛṣann akṛṇor duṣṭarītu saho viśvasmai sahase sahadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:8771: RV_6,001.02a adhā hotā ny asīdo yajīyān iḷas pada iṣayann īḍyaḥ san /
GV01rvh1-10u:8772: RV_6,001.02c taṃ tvā naraḥ prathamaṃ devayanto maho rāye citayanto anu gman //
GV01rvh1-10u:8773: RV_6,001.03a vṛteva yantam bahubhir vasavyais tve rayiṃ jāgṛvāṃso anu gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:8774: RV_6,001.03c ruśantam agniṃ darśatam bṛhantaṃ vapāvantaṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8775: RV_6,001.04a padaṃ devasya namasā vyantaḥ śravasyavaḥ śrava āpann amṛktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8776: RV_6,001.04c nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyāni bhadrāyāṃ te raṇayanta saṃdṛṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8777: RV_6,001.05a tvāṃ vardhanti kṣitayaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tvāṃ rāya ubhayāso janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8778: RV_6,001.05c tvaṃ trātā taraṇe cetyo bhūḥ pitā mātā sadam in mānuṣāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8779: RV_6,001.06a saparyeṇyaḥ sa priyo vikṣv agnir hotā mandro ni ṣasādā yajīyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:8780: RV_6,001.06c taṃ tvā vayaṃ dama ā dīdivāṃsam upa jñubādho namasā sadema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8781: RV_6,001.07a taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudhyo navyam agne sumnāyava īmahe devayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8782: RV_6,001.07c tvaṃ viśo anayo dīdyāno divo agne bṛhatā rocanena //
GV01rvh1-10u:8783: RV_6,001.08a viśāṃ kaviṃ viśpatiṃ śaśvatīnāṃ nitośanaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8784: RV_6,001.08c pretīṣaṇim iṣayantam pāvakaṃ rājantam agniṃ yajataṃ rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8785: RV_6,001.09a so agna īje śaśame ca marto yas ta ānaṭ samidhā havyadātim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8786: RV_6,001.09c ya āhutim pari vedā namobhir viśvet sa vāmā dadhate tvotaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8787: RV_6,001.10a asmā u te mahi mahe vidhema namobhir agne samidhota havyaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8788: RV_6,001.10c vedī sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair ā te bhadrāyāṃ sumatau yatema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8789: RV_6,001.11a ā yas tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā śravobhiś ca śravasyas tarutraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8790: RV_6,001.11c bṛhadbhir vājai sthavirebhir asme revadbhir agne vitaraṃ vi bhāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8791: RV_6,001.12a nṛvad vaso sadam id dhehy asme bhūri tokāya tanayāya paśvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8792: RV_6,001.12c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr āre-aghā asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu //
GV01rvh1-10u:8793: RV_6,001.13a purūṇy agne purudhā tvāyā vasūni rājan vasutā te aśyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8794: RV_6,001.13c purūṇi hi tve puruvāra santy agne vasu vidhate rājani tve //
GV01rvh1-10u:8795: RV_6,002.01a tvaṃ hi kṣaitavad yaśo 'gne mitro na patyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8796: RV_6,002.01c tvaṃ vicarṣaṇe śravo vaso puṣṭiṃ na puṣyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8797: RV_6,002.02a tvāṃ hi ṣmā carṣaṇayo yajñebhir gīrbhir īḷate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8798: RV_6,002.02c tvāṃ vājī yāty avṛko rajastūr viśvacarṣaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8799: RV_6,002.03a sajoṣas tvā divo naro yajñasya ketum indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8800: RV_6,002.03c yad dha sya mānuṣo janaḥ sumnāyur juhve adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:8801: RV_6,002.04a ṛdhad yas te sudānave dhiyā martaḥ śaśamate /
GV01rvh1-10u:8802: RV_6,002.04c ūtī ṣa bṛhato divo dviṣo aṃho na tarati //
GV01rvh1-10u:8803: RV_6,002.05a samidhā yas ta āhutiṃ niśitim martyo naśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8804: RV_6,002.05c vayāvantaṃ sa puṣyati kṣayam agne śatāyuṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8805: RV_6,002.06a tveṣas te dhūma ṛṇvati divi ṣañ chukra ātataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8806: RV_6,002.06c sūro na hi dyutā tvaṃ kṛpā pāvaka rocase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8807: RV_6,002.07a adhā hi vikṣv īḍyo 'si priyo no atithiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8808: RV_6,002.07c raṇvaḥ purīva jūryaḥ sūnur na trayayāyyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8809: RV_6,002.08a kratvā hi droṇe ajyase 'gne vājī na kṛtvyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8810: RV_6,002.08c parijmeva svadhā gayo 'tyo na hvāryaḥ śiśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8811: RV_6,002.09a tvaṃ tyā cid acyutāgne paśur na yavase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8812: RV_6,002.09c dhāmā ha yat te ajara vanā vṛścanti śikvasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8813: RV_6,002.10a veṣi hy adhvarīyatām agne hotā dame viśām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8814: RV_6,002.10c samṛdho viśpate kṛṇu juṣasva havyam aṅgiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8815: RV_6,002.11a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8816: RV_6,002.11c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8817: RV_6,003.01a agne sa kṣeṣad ṛtapā ṛtejā uru jyotir naśate devayuṣ ṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:8818: RV_6,003.01c yaṃ tvam mitreṇa varuṇaḥ sajoṣā deva pāsi tyajasā martam aṃhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8819: RV_6,003.02a īje yajñebhiḥ śaśame śamībhir ṛdhadvārāyāgnaye dadāśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8820: RV_6,003.02c evā cana taṃ yaśasām ajuṣṭir nāṃho martaṃ naśate na pradṛptiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8821: RV_6,003.03a sūro na yasya dṛśatir arepā bhīmā yad eti śucatas ta ā dhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8822: RV_6,003.03c heṣasvataḥ śurudho nāyam aktoḥ kutrā cid raṇvo vasatir vanejāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8823: RV_6,003.04a tigmaṃ cid ema mahi varpo asya bhasad aśvo na yamasāna āsā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8824: RV_6,003.04c vijehamānaḥ paraśur na jihvāṃ dravir na drāvayati dāru dhakṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:8825: RV_6,003.05a sa id asteva prati dhād asiṣyañ chiśīta tejo 'yaso na dhārām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8826: RV_6,003.05c citradhrajatir aratir yo aktor ver na druṣadvā raghupatmajaṃhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8827: RV_6,003.06a sa īṃ rebho na prati vasta usrāḥ śociṣā rārapīti mitramahāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8828: RV_6,003.06c naktaṃ ya īm aruṣo yo divā nṝn amartyo aruṣo yo divā nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:8829: RV_6,003.07a divo na yasya vidhato navīnod vṛṣā rukṣa oṣadhīṣu nūnot /
GV01rvh1-10u:8830: RV_6,003.07c ghṛṇā na yo dhrajasā patmanā yann ā rodasī vasunā daṃ supatnī //
GV01rvh1-10u:8831: RV_6,003.08a dhāyobhir vā yo yujyebhir arkair vidyun na davidyot svebhiḥ śuṣmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8832: RV_6,003.08c śardho vā yo marutāṃ tatakṣa ṛbhur na tveṣo rabhasāno adyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:8833: RV_6,004.01a yathā hotar manuṣo devatātā yajñebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8834: RV_6,004.01c evā no adya samanā samānān uśann agna uśato yakṣi devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:8835: RV_6,004.02a sa no vibhāvā cakṣaṇir na vastor agnir vandāru vedyaś cano dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8836: RV_6,004.02c viśvāyur yo amṛto martyeṣūṣarbhud bhūd atithir jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8837: RV_6,004.03a dyāvo na yasya panayanty abhvam bhāsāṃsi vaste sūryo na śukraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8838: RV_6,004.03c vi ya inoty ajaraḥ pāvako 'śnasya cic chiśnathat pūrvyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8839: RV_6,004.04a vadmā hi sūno asy admasadvā cakre agnir januṣājmānnam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8840: RV_6,004.04c sa tvaṃ na ūrjasana ūrjaṃ dhā rājeva jer avṛke kṣeṣy antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8841: RV_6,004.05a nitikti yo vāraṇam annam atti vāyur na rāṣṭry aty ety aktūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:8842: RV_6,004.05c turyāma yas ta ādiśām arātīr atyo na hrutaḥ patataḥ parihrut //
GV01rvh1-10u:8843: RV_6,004.06a ā sūryo na bhānumadbhir arkair agne tatantha rodasī vi bhāsā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8844: RV_6,004.06c citro nayat pari tamāṃsy aktaḥ śociṣā patmann auśijo na dīyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8845: RV_6,004.07a tvāṃ hi mandratamam arkaśokair vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣy agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:8846: RV_6,004.07c indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8847: RV_6,004.08a nū no agne 'vṛkebhiḥ svasti veṣi rāyaḥ pathibhiḥ parṣy aṃhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8848: RV_6,004.08c tā sūribhyo gṛṇate rāsi sumnam madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8849: RV_6,005.01a huve vaḥ sūnuṃ sahaso yuvānam adroghavācam matibhir yaviṣṭham /
GV01rvh1-10u:8850: RV_6,005.01c ya invati draviṇāni pracetā viśvavārāṇi puruvāro adhruk //
GV01rvh1-10u:8851: RV_6,005.02a tve vasūni purvaṇīka hotar doṣā vastor erire yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8852: RV_6,005.02c kṣāmeva viśvā bhuvanāni yasmin saṃ saubhagāni dadhire pāvake //
GV01rvh1-10u:8853: RV_6,005.03a tvaṃ vikṣu pradivaḥ sīda āsu kratvā rathīr abhavo vāryāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8854: RV_6,005.03c ata inoṣi vidhate cikitvo vy ānuṣag jātavedo vasūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8855: RV_6,005.04a yo naḥ sanutyo abhidāsad agne yo antaro mitramaho vanuṣyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:8856: RV_6,005.04c tam ajarebhir vṛṣabhis tava svais tapā tapiṣṭha tapasā tapasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:8857: RV_6,005.05a yas te yajñena samidhā ya ukthair arkebhiḥ sūno sahaso dadāśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8858: RV_6,005.05c sa martyeṣv amṛta pracetā rāyā dyumnena śravasā vi bhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8859: RV_6,005.06a sa tat kṛdhīṣitas tūyam agne spṛdho bādhasva sahasā sahasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:8860: RV_6,005.06c yac chasyase dyubhir akto vacobhis taj juṣasva jaritur ghoṣi manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:8861: RV_6,005.07a aśyāma taṃ kāmam agne tavotī aśyāma rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8862: RV_6,005.07c aśyāma vājam abhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnam ajarājaraṃ te //
GV01rvh1-10u:8863: RV_6,006.01a pra navyasā sahasaḥ sūnum acchā yajñena gātum ava icchamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8864: RV_6,006.01c vṛścadvanaṃ kṛṣṇayāmaṃ ruśantaṃ vītī hotāraṃ divyaṃ jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8865: RV_6,006.02a sa śvitānas tanyatū rocanasthā ajarebhir nānadadbhir yaviṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8866: RV_6,006.02c yaḥ pāvakaḥ purutamaḥ purūṇi pṛthūny agnir anuyāti bharvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8867: RV_6,006.03a vi te viṣvag vātajūtāso agne bhāmāsaḥ śuce śucayaś caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8868: RV_6,006.03c tuvimrakṣāso divyā navagvā vanā vananti dhṛṣatā rujantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8869: RV_6,006.04a ye te śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ śuciṣmaḥ kṣāṃ vapanti viṣitāso aśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8870: RV_6,006.04c adha bhramas ta urviyā vi bhāti yātayamāno adhi sānu pṛśneḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8871: RV_6,006.05a adha jihvā pāpatīti pra vṛṣṇo goṣuyudho nāśaniḥ sṛjānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8872: RV_6,006.05c śūrasyeva prasitiḥ kṣātir agner durvartur bhīmo dayate vanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:8873: RV_6,006.06a ā bhānunā pārthivāni jrayāṃsi mahas todasya dhṛṣatā tatantha /
GV01rvh1-10u:8874: RV_6,006.06c sa bādhasvāpa bhayā sahobhi spṛdho vanuṣyan vanuṣo ni jūrva //
GV01rvh1-10u:8875: RV_6,006.07a sa citra citraṃ citayantam asme citrakṣatra citratamaṃ vayodhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:8876: RV_6,006.07c candraṃ rayim puruvīram bṛhantaṃ candra candrābhir gṛṇate yuvasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:8877: RV_6,007.01a mūrdhānaṃ divo aratim pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātam agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8878: RV_6,007.01c kaviṃ samrājam atithiṃ janānām āsann ā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8879: RV_6,007.02a nābhiṃ yajñānāṃ sadanaṃ rayīṇām mahām āhāvam abhi saṃ navanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:8880: RV_6,007.02c vaiśvānaraṃ rathyam adhvarāṇāṃ yajñasya ketuṃ janayanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8881: RV_6,007.03a tvad vipro jāyate vājy agne tvad vīrāso abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8882: RV_6,007.03c vaiśvānara tvam asmāsu dhehi vasūni rājan spṛhayāyyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8883: RV_6,007.04a tvāṃ viśve amṛta jāyamānaṃ śiśuṃ na devā abhi saṃ navante /
GV01rvh1-10u:8884: RV_6,007.04c tava kratubhir amṛtatvam āyan vaiśvānara yat pitror adīdeḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8885: RV_6,007.05a vaiśvānara tava tāni vratāni mahāny agne nakir ā dadharṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:8886: RV_6,007.05c yaj jāyamānaḥ pitror upasthe 'vindaḥ ketuṃ vayuneṣv ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8887: RV_6,007.06a vaiśvānarasya vimitāni cakṣasā sānūni divo amṛtasya ketunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8888: RV_6,007.06c tasyed u viśvā bhuvanādhi mūrdhani vayā iva ruruhuḥ sapta visruhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8889: RV_6,007.07a vi yo rajāṃsy amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro vi divo rocanā kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8890: RV_6,007.07c pari yo viśvā bhuvanāni paprathe 'dabdho gopā amṛtasya rakṣitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8891: RV_6,008.01a pṛkṣasya vṛṣṇo aruṣasya nū sahaḥ pra nu vocaṃ vidathā jātavedasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8892: RV_6,008.01c vaiśvānarāya matir navyasī śuciḥ soma iva pavate cārur agnaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8893: RV_6,008.02a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomani vratāny agnir vratapā arakṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:8894: RV_6,008.02c vy antarikṣam amimīta sukratur vaiśvānaro mahinā nākam aspṛśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:8895: RV_6,008.03a vy astabhnād rodasī mitro adbhuto 'ntarvāvad akṛṇoj jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8896: RV_6,008.03c vi carmaṇīva dhiṣaṇe avartayad vaiśvānaro viśvam adhatta vṛṣṇyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8897: RV_6,008.04a apām upasthe mahiṣā agṛbhṇata viśo rājānam upa tasthur ṛgmiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8898: RV_6,008.04c ā dūto agnim abharad vivasvato vaiśvānaram mātariśvā parāvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8899: RV_6,008.05a yuge-yuge vidathyaṃ gṛṇadbhyo 'gne rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehi navyasīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:8900: RV_6,008.05c pavyeva rājann aghaśaṃsam ajara nīcā ni vṛśca vaninaṃ na tejasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8901: RV_6,008.06a asmākam agne maghavatsu dhārayānāmi kṣatram ajaraṃ suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8902: RV_6,008.06c vayaṃ jayema śatinaṃ sahasriṇaṃ vaiśvānara vājam agne tavotibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8903: RV_6,008.07a adabdhebhis tava gopābhir iṣṭe 'smākam pāhi triṣadhastha sūrīn /
GV01rvh1-10u:8904: RV_6,008.07c rakṣā ca no daduṣāṃ śardho agne vaiśvānara pra ca tārī stavānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8905: RV_6,009.01a ahaś ca kṛṣṇam ahar arjunaṃ ca vi vartete rajasī vedyābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8906: RV_6,009.01c vaiśvānaro jāyamāno na rājāvātiraj jyotiṣāgnis tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8907: RV_6,009.02a nāhaṃ tantuṃ na vi jānāmy otuṃ na yaṃ vayanti samare 'tamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8908: RV_6,009.02c kasya svit putra iha vaktvāni paro vadāty avareṇa pitrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8909: RV_6,009.03a sa it tantuṃ sa vi jānāty otuṃ sa vaktvāny ṛtuthā vadāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8910: RV_6,009.03c ya īṃ ciketad amṛtasya gopā avaś caran paro anyena paśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:8911: RV_6,009.04a ayaṃ hotā prathamaḥ paśyatemam idaṃ jyotir amṛtam martyeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8912: RV_6,009.04c ayaṃ sa jajñe dhruva ā niṣatto 'martyas tanvā vardhamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8913: RV_6,009.05a dhruvaṃ jyotir nihitaṃ dṛśaye kam mano javiṣṭham patayatsv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8914: RV_6,009.05c viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ saketā ekaṃ kratum abhi vi yanti sādhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:8915: RV_6,009.06a vi me karṇā patayato vi cakṣur vīdaṃ jyotir hṛdaya āhitaṃ yat /
GV01rvh1-10u:8916: RV_6,009.06c vi me manaś carati dūraādhīḥ kiṃ svid vakṣyāmi kim u nū maniṣye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8917: RV_6,009.07a viśve devā anamasyan bhiyānās tvām agne tamasi tasthivāṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8919: RV_6,010.01a puro vo mandraṃ divyaṃ suvṛktim prayati yajñe agnim adhvare dadhidhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8920: RV_6,010.01c pura ukthebhiḥ sa hi no vibhāvā svadhvarā karati jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8921: RV_6,010.02a tam u dyumaḥ purvaṇīka hotar agne agnibhir manuṣa idhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8922: RV_6,010.02c stomaṃ yam asmai mamateva śūṣaṃ ghṛtaṃ na śuci matayaḥ pavante //
GV01rvh1-10u:8923: RV_6,010.03a pīpāya sa śravasā martyeṣu yo agnaye dadāśa vipra ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8924: RV_6,010.03c citrābhis tam ūtibhiś citraśocir vrajasya sātā gomato dadhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:8925: RV_6,010.04a ā yaḥ paprau jāyamāna urvī dūredṛśā bhāsā kṛṣṇādhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8926: RV_6,010.04c adha bahu cit tama ūrmyāyās tiraḥ śociṣā dadṛśe pāvakaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8927: RV_6,010.05a nū naś citram puruvājābhir ūtī agne rayim maghavadbhyaś ca dhehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8928: RV_6,010.05c ye rādhasā śravasā cāty anyān suvīryebhiś cābhi santi janān //
GV01rvh1-10u:8929: RV_6,010.06a imaṃ yajñaṃ cano dhā agna uśan yaṃ ta āsāno juhute haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:8930: RV_6,010.06c bharadvājeṣu dadhiṣe suvṛktim avīr vājasya gadhyasya sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8931: RV_6,010.07a vi dveṣāṃsīnuhi vardhayeḷām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8932: RV_6,011.01a yajasva hotar iṣito yajīyān agne bādho marutāṃ na prayukti /
GV01rvh1-10u:8933: RV_6,011.01c ā no mitrāvaruṇā nāsatyā dyāvā hotrāya pṛthivī vavṛtyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8934: RV_6,011.02a tvaṃ hotā mandratamo no adhrug antar devo vidathā martyeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:8935: RV_6,011.02c pāvakayā juhvā vahnir āsāgne yajasva tanvaṃ tava svām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8936: RV_6,011.03a dhanyā cid dhi tve dhiṣaṇā vaṣṭi pra devāñ janma gṛṇate yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:8937: RV_6,011.03c vepiṣṭho aṅgirasāṃ yad dha vipro madhu cchando bhanati rebha iṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:8938: RV_6,011.04a adidyutat sv apāko vibhāvāgne yajasva rodasī urūcī /
GV01rvh1-10u:8939: RV_6,011.04c āyuṃ na yaṃ namasā rātahavyā añjanti suprayasam pañca janāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8940: RV_6,011.05a vṛñje ha yan namasā barhir agnāv ayāmi srug ghṛtavatī suvṛktiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8941: RV_6,011.05c amyakṣi sadma sadane pṛthivyā aśrāyi yajñaḥ sūrye na cakṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8942: RV_6,011.06a daśasyā naḥ purvaṇīka hotar devebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8943: RV_6,011.06c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso vāvasānā ati srasema vṛjanaṃ nāṃhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8944: RV_6,012.01a madhye hotā duroṇe barhiṣo rāḷ agnis todasya rodasī yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:8945: RV_6,012.01c ayaṃ sa sūnuḥ sahasa ṛtāvā dūrāt sūryo na śociṣā tatāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:8946: RV_6,012.02a ā yasmin tve sv apāke yajatra yakṣad rājan sarvatāteva nu dyauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8947: RV_6,012.02c triṣadhasthas tataruṣo na jaṃho havyā maghāni mānuṣā yajadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:8948: RV_6,012.03a tejiṣṭhā yasyāratir vanerāṭ todo adhvan na vṛdhasāno adyaut /
GV01rvh1-10u:8949: RV_6,012.03c adrogho na dravitā cetati tmann amartyo 'vartra oṣadhīṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:8950: RV_6,012.04a sāsmākebhir etarī na śūṣair agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8951: RV_6,012.04c drvanno vanvan kratvā nārvosraḥ piteva jārayāyi yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8952: RV_6,012.05a adha smāsya panayanti bhāso vṛthā yat takṣad anuyāti pṛthvīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:8953: RV_6,012.05c sadyo yaḥ syandro viṣito dhavīyān ṛṇo na tāyur ati dhanvā rāṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8954: RV_6,012.06a sa tvaṃ no arvan nidāyā viśvebhir agne agnibhir idhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8955: RV_6,012.06c veṣi rāyo vi yāsi ducchunā madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8956: RV_6,013.01a tvad viśvā subhaga saubhagāny agne vi yanti vanino na vayāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8957: RV_6,013.01c śruṣṭī rayir vājo vṛtratūrye divo vṛṣṭir īḍyo rītir apām //
GV01rvh1-10u:8958: RV_6,013.02a tvam bhago na ā hi ratnam iṣe parijmeva kṣayasi dasmavarcāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8959: RV_6,013.02c agne mitro na bṛhata ṛtasyāsi kṣattā vāmasya deva bhūreḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8960: RV_6,013.03a sa satpatiḥ śavasā hanti vṛtram agne vipro vi paṇer bharti vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8961: RV_6,013.03c yaṃ tvam praceta ṛtajāta rāyā sajoṣā naptrāpāṃ hinoṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:8962: RV_6,013.04a yas te sūno sahaso gīrbhir ukthair yajñair marto niśitiṃ vedyānaṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8963: RV_6,013.04c viśvaṃ sa deva prati vāram agne dhatte dhānyam patyate vasavyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8964: RV_6,013.05a tā nṛbhya ā sauśravasā suvīrāgne sūno sahasaḥ puṣyase dhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8965: RV_6,013.05c kṛṇoṣi yac chavasā bhūri paśvo vayo vṛkāyāraye jasuraye //
GV01rvh1-10u:8966: RV_6,013.06a vadmā sūno sahaso no vihāyā agne tokaṃ tanayaṃ vāji no dāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8967: RV_6,013.06c viśvābhir gīrbhir abhi pūrtim aśyām madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8968: RV_6,014.01a agnā yo martyo duvo dhiyaṃ jujoṣa dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8969: RV_6,014.01c bhasan nu ṣa pra pūrvya iṣaṃ vurītāvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8970: RV_6,014.02a agnir id dhi pracetā agnir vedhastama ṛṣiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8971: RV_6,014.02c agniṃ hotāram īḷate yajñeṣu manuṣo viśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8972: RV_6,014.03a nānā hy agne 'vase spardhante rāyo aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8973: RV_6,014.03c tūrvanto dasyum āyavo vrataiḥ sīkṣanto avratam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8974: RV_6,014.04a agnir apsām ṛtīṣahaṃ vīraṃ dadāti satpatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:8975: RV_6,014.04c yasya trasanti śavasaḥ saṃcakṣi śatravo bhiyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:8976: RV_6,014.05a agnir hi vidmanā nido devo martam uruṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:8977: RV_6,014.05c sahāvā yasyāvṛto rayir vājeṣv avṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8978: RV_6,014.06a acchā no mitramaho deva devān agne vocaḥ sumatiṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8979: RV_6,014.06c vīhi svastiṃ sukṣitiṃ divo nṝn dviṣo aṃhāṃsi duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
GV01rvh1-10u:8980: RV_6,015.01a imam ū ṣu vo atithim uṣarbudhaṃ viśvāsāṃ viśām patim ṛñjase girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8981: RV_6,015.01c vetīd divo januṣā kac cid ā śucir jyok cid atti garbho yad acyutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8982: RV_6,015.02a mitraṃ na yaṃ sudhitam bhṛgavo dadhur vanaspatāv īḍyam ūrdhvaśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8983: RV_6,015.02c sa tvaṃ suprīto vītahavye adbhuta praśastibhir mahayase dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:8984: RV_6,015.03a sa tvaṃ dakṣasyāvṛko vṛdho bhūr aryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:8985: RV_6,015.03c rāyaḥ sūno sahaso martyeṣv ā chardir yaccha vītahavyāya sapratho bharadvājāya saprathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8986: RV_6,015.04a dyutānaṃ vo atithiṃ svarṇaram agniṃ hotāram manuṣaḥ svadhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:8987: RV_6,015.04c vipraṃ na dyukṣavacasaṃ suvṛktibhir havyavāham aratiṃ devam ṛñjase //
GV01rvh1-10u:8988: RV_6,015.05a pāvakayā yaś citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na bhānunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:8989: RV_6,015.05c tūrvan na yāmann etaśasya nū raṇa ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8990: RV_6,015.06a agnim-agniṃ vaḥ samidhā duvasyata priyam-priyaṃ vo atithiṃ gṛṇīṣaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:8991: RV_6,015.06c upa vo gīrbhir amṛtaṃ vivāsata devo deveṣu vanate hi vāryaṃ devo deveṣu vanate hi no duvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:8992: RV_6,015.07a samiddham agniṃ samidhā girā gṛṇe śucim pāvakam puro adhvare dhruvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8993: RV_6,015.07c vipraṃ hotāram puruvāram adruhaṃ kaviṃ sumnair īmahe jātavedasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:8994: RV_6,015.08a tvāṃ dūtam agne amṛtaṃ yuge-yuge havyavāhaṃ dadhire pāyum īḍyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:8995: RV_6,015.08c devāsaś ca martāsaś ca jāgṛviṃ vibhuṃ viśpatiṃ namasā ni ṣedire //
GV01rvh1-10u:8996: RV_6,015.09a vibhūṣann agna ubhayāṃ anu vratā dūto devānāṃ rajasī sam īyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:8997: RV_6,015.09c yat te dhītiṃ sumatim āvṛṇīmahe 'dha smā nas trivarūthaḥ śivo bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:8998: RV_6,015.10a taṃ supratīkaṃ sudṛśaṃ svañcam avidvāṃso viduṣṭaraṃ sapema /
GV01rvh1-10u:8999: RV_6,015.10c sa yakṣad viśvā vayunāni vidvān pra havyam agnir amṛteṣu vocat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9000: RV_6,015.11a tam agne pāsy uta tam piparṣi yas ta ānaṭ kavaye śūra dhītim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9001: RV_6,015.11c yajñasya vā niśitiṃ voditiṃ vā tam it pṛṇakṣi śavasota rāyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9002: RV_6,015.12a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9003: RV_6,015.12c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī //
GV01rvh1-10u:9004: RV_6,015.13a agnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ sa rājā viśvā veda janimā jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9005: RV_6,015.13c devānām uta yo martyānāṃ yajiṣṭhaḥ sa pra yajatām ṛtāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9006: RV_6,015.14a agne yad adya viśo adhvarasya hotaḥ pāvakaśoce veṣ ṭvaṃ hi yajvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9007: RV_6,015.14c ṛtā yajāsi mahinā vi yad bhūr havyā vaha yaviṣṭha yā te adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9008: RV_6,015.15a abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyo ni tvā dadhīta rodasī yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:9009: RV_6,015.15c avā no maghavan vājasātāv agne viśvāni duritā tarema tā tarema tavāvasā tarema //
GV01rvh1-10u:9010: RV_6,015.16a agne viśvebhiḥ svanīka devair ūrṇāvantam prathamaḥ sīda yonim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9011: RV_6,015.16c kulāyinaṃ ghṛtavantaṃ savitre yajñaṃ naya yajamānāya sādhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9012: RV_6,015.17a imam u tyam atharvavad agnim manthanti vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9013: RV_6,015.17c yam aṅkūyantam ānayann amūraṃ śyāvyābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9015: RV_6,015.18c ā devān vakṣy amṛtāṃ ṛtāvṛdho yajñaṃ deveṣu pispṛśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9016: RV_6,015.19a vayam u tvā gṛhapate janānām agne akarma samidhā bṛhantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9017: RV_6,015.19c asthūri no gārhapatyāni santu tigmena nas tejasā saṃ śiśādhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9018: RV_6,016.01a tvam agne yajñānāṃ hotā viśveṣāṃ hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9020: RV_6,016.02a sa no mandrābhir adhvare jihvābhir yajā mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9021: RV_6,016.02c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9022: RV_6,016.03a vetthā hi vedho adhvanaḥ pathaś ca devāñjasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9024: RV_6,016.04a tvām īḷe adha dvitā bharato vājibhiḥ śunam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9026: RV_6,016.05a tvam imā vāryā puru divodāsāya sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9028: RV_6,016.06a tvaṃ dūto amartya ā vahā daivyaṃ janam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9030: RV_6,016.07a tvām agne svādhyo martāso devavītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9032: RV_6,016.08a tava pra yakṣi saṃdṛśam uta kratuṃ sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9034: RV_6,016.09a tvaṃ hotā manurhito vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9036: RV_6,016.10a agna ā yāhi vītaye gṛṇāno havyadātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9038: RV_6,016.11a taṃ tvā samidbhir aṅgiro ghṛtena vardhayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9040: RV_6,016.12a sa naḥ pṛthu śravāyyam acchā deva vivāsasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9042: RV_6,016.13a tvām agne puṣkarād adhy atharvā nir amanthata /
GV01rvh1-10u:9044: RV_6,016.14a tam u tvā dadhyaṅṅ ṛṣiḥ putra īdhe atharvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9046: RV_6,016.15a tam u tvā pāthyo vṛṣā sam īdhe dasyuhantamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9048: RV_6,016.16a ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9050: RV_6,016.17a yatra kva ca te mano dakṣaṃ dadhasa uttaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9052: RV_6,016.18a nahi te pūrtam akṣipad bhuvan nemānāṃ vaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:9054: RV_6,016.19a āgnir agāmi bhārato vṛtrahā purucetanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9056: RV_6,016.20a sa hi viśvāti pārthivā rayiṃ dāśan mahitvanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9058: RV_6,016.21a sa pratnavan navīyasāgne dyumnena saṃyatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9060: RV_6,016.22a pra vaḥ sakhāyo agnaye stomaṃ yajñaṃ ca dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9062: RV_6,016.23a sa hi yo mānuṣā yugā sīdad dhotā kavikratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9064: RV_6,016.24a tā rājānā śucivratādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9066: RV_6,016.25a vasvī te agne saṃdṛṣṭir iṣayate martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9068: RV_6,016.26a kratvā dā astu śreṣṭho 'dya tvā vanvan surekṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9070: RV_6,016.27a te te agne tvotā iṣayanto viśvam āyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9071: RV_6,016.27c taranto aryo arātīr vanvanto aryo arātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9072: RV_6,016.28a agnis tigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ ny atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9074: RV_6,016.29a suvīraṃ rayim ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9076: RV_6,016.30a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso jātavedo aghāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9078: RV_6,016.31a yo no agne dureva ā marto vadhāya dāśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9080: RV_6,016.32a tvaṃ taṃ deva jihvayā pari bādhasva duṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9082: RV_6,016.33a bharadvājāya saprathaḥ śarma yaccha sahantya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9084: RV_6,016.34a agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur vipanyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9086: RV_6,016.35a garbhe mātuḥ pituṣ pitā vididyutāno akṣare /
GV01rvh1-10u:9088: RV_6,016.36a brahma prajāvad ā bhara jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9090: RV_6,016.37a upa tvā raṇvasaṃdṛśam prayasvantaḥ sahaskṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:9092: RV_6,016.38a upa cchāyām iva ghṛṇer aganma śarma te vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9094: RV_6,016.39a ya ugra iva śaryahā tigmaśṛṅgo na vaṃsagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9096: RV_6,016.40a ā yaṃ haste na khādinaṃ śiśuṃ jātaṃ na bibhrati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9098: RV_6,016.41a pra devaṃ devavītaye bharatā vasuvittamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9099: RV_6,016.41c ā sve yonau ni ṣīdatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9100: RV_6,016.42a ā jātaṃ jātavedasi priyaṃ śiśītātithim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9102: RV_6,016.43a agne yukṣvā hi ye tavāśvāso deva sādhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9104: RV_6,016.44a acchā no yāhy ā vahābhi prayāṃsi vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9106: RV_6,016.45a ud agne bhārata dyumad ajasreṇa davidyutat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9108: RV_6,016.46a vītī yo devam marto duvasyed agnim īḷītādhvare haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9109: RV_6,016.46c hotāraṃ satyayajaṃ rodasyor uttānahasto namasā vivāset //
GV01rvh1-10u:9110: RV_6,016.47a ā te agna ṛcā havir hṛdā taṣṭam bharāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9111: RV_6,016.47c te te bhavantūkṣaṇa ṛṣabhāso vaśā uta //
GV01rvh1-10u:9112: RV_6,016.48a agniṃ devāso agriyam indhate vṛtrahantamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9113: RV_6,016.48c yenā vasūny ābhṛtā tṛḷhā rakṣāṃsi vājinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9114: RV_6,017.01a pibā somam abhi yam ugra tarda ūrvaṃ gavyam mahi gṛṇāna indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9115: RV_6,017.01c vi yo dhṛṣṇo vadhiṣo vajrahasta viśvā vṛtram amitriyā śavobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9116: RV_6,017.02a sa īm pāhi ya ṛjīṣī tarutro yaḥ śipravān vṛṣabho yo matīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9117: RV_6,017.02c yo gotrabhid vajrabhṛd yo hariṣṭhāḥ sa indra citrāṃ abhi tṛndhi vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9118: RV_6,017.03a evā pāhi pratnathā mandatu tvā śrudhi brahma vāvṛdhasvota gīrbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9119: RV_6,017.03c āviḥ sūryaṃ kṛṇuhi pīpihīṣo jahi śatrūṃr abhi gā indra tṛndhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9120: RV_6,017.04a te tvā madā bṛhad indra svadhāva ime pītā ukṣayanta dyumantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9121: RV_6,017.04c mahām anūnaṃ tavasaṃ vibhūtim matsarāso jarhṛṣanta prasāham //
GV01rvh1-10u:9122: RV_6,017.05a yebhiḥ sūryam uṣasam mandasāno 'vāsayo 'pa dṛḷhāni dardrat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9123: RV_6,017.05c mahām adrim pari gā indra santaṃ nutthā acyutaṃ sadasas pari svāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9124: RV_6,017.06a tava kratvā tava tad daṃsanābhir āmāsu pakvaṃ śacyā ni dīdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9125: RV_6,017.06c aurṇor dura usriyābhyo vi dṛḷhod ūrvād gā asṛjo aṅgirasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9126: RV_6,017.07a paprātha kṣām mahi daṃso vy urvīm upa dyām ṛṣvo bṛhad indra stabhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9127: RV_6,017.07c adhārayo rodasī devaputre pratne mātarā yahvī ṛtasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9128: RV_6,017.08a adha tvā viśve pura indra devā ekaṃ tavasaṃ dadhire bharāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9129: RV_6,017.08c adevo yad abhy auhiṣṭa devān svarṣātā vṛṇata indram atra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9130: RV_6,017.09a adha dyauś cit te apa sā nu vajrād dvitānamad bhiyasā svasya manyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9131: RV_6,017.09c ahiṃ yad indro abhy ohasānaṃ ni cid viśvāyuḥ śayathe jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:9132: RV_6,017.10a adha tvaṣṭā te maha ugra vajraṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ vavṛtac chatāśrim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9133: RV_6,017.10c nikāmam aramaṇasaṃ yena navantam ahiṃ sam piṇag ṛjīṣin //
GV01rvh1-10u:9134: RV_6,017.11a vardhān yaṃ viśve marutaḥ sajoṣāḥ pacac chatam mahiṣāṃ indra tubhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9135: RV_6,017.11c pūṣā viṣṇus trīṇi sarāṃsi dhāvan vṛtrahaṇam madiram aṃśum asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9136: RV_6,017.12a ā kṣodo mahi vṛtaṃ nadīnām pariṣṭhitam asṛja ūrmim apām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9137: RV_6,017.12c tāsām anu pravata indra panthām prārdayo nīcīr apasaḥ samudram //
GV01rvh1-10u:9138: RV_6,017.13a evā tā viśvā cakṛvāṃsam indram mahām ugram ajuryaṃ sahodām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9139: RV_6,017.13c suvīraṃ tvā svāyudhaṃ suvajram ā brahma navyam avase vavṛtyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9140: RV_6,017.14a sa no vājāya śravasa iṣe ca rāye dhehi dyumata indra viprān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9141: RV_6,017.14c bharadvāje nṛvata indra sūrīn divi ca smaidhi pārye na indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9142: RV_6,017.15a ayā vājaṃ devahitaṃ sanema madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9143: RV_6,018.01a tam u ṣṭuhi yo abhibhūtyojā vanvann avātaḥ puruhūta indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9144: RV_6,018.01c aṣāḷham ugraṃ sahamānam ābhir gīrbhir vardha vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9145: RV_6,018.02a sa yudhmaḥ satvā khajakṛt samadvā tuvimrakṣo nadanumāṃ ṛjīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:9146: RV_6,018.02c bṛhadreṇuś cyavano mānuṣīṇām ekaḥ kṛṣṭīnām abhavat sahāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9147: RV_6,018.03a tvaṃ ha nu tyad adamāyo dasyūṃr ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr avanor āryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9148: RV_6,018.03c asti svin nu vīryaṃ tat ta indra na svid asti tad ṛtuthā vi vocaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9149: RV_6,018.04a sad id dhi te tuvijātasya manye sahaḥ sahiṣṭha turatas turasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9150: RV_6,018.04c ugram ugrasya tavasas tavīyo 'radhrasya radhraturo babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9151: RV_6,018.05a tan naḥ pratnaṃ sakhyam astu yuṣme itthā vadadbhir valam aṅgirobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9152: RV_6,018.05c hann acyutacyud dasmeṣayantam ṛṇoḥ puro vi duro asya viśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9153: RV_6,018.06a sa hi dhībhir havyo asty ugra īśānakṛn mahati vṛtratūrye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9154: RV_6,018.06c sa tokasātā tanaye sa vajrī vitantasāyyo abhavat samatsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9155: RV_6,018.07a sa majmanā janima mānuṣāṇām amartyena nāmnāti pra sarsre /
GV01rvh1-10u:9156: RV_6,018.07c sa dyumnena sa śavasota rāyā sa vīryeṇa nṛtamaḥ samokāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9157: RV_6,018.08a sa yo na muhe na mithū jano bhūt sumantunāmā cumuriṃ dhuniṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:9158: RV_6,018.08c vṛṇak pipruṃ śambaraṃ śuṣṇam indraḥ purāṃ cyautnāya śayathāya nū cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:9159: RV_6,018.09a udāvatā tvakṣasā panyasā ca vṛtrahatyāya ratham indra tiṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9160: RV_6,018.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ hasta ā dakṣiṇatrābhi pra manda purudatra māyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9161: RV_6,018.10a agnir na śuṣkaṃ vanam indra hetī rakṣo ni dhakṣy aśanir na bhīmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9162: RV_6,018.10c gambhīraya ṛṣvayā yo rurojādhvānayad duritā dambhayac ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9163: RV_6,018.11a ā sahasram pathibhir indra rāyā tuvidyumna tuvivājebhir arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:9164: RV_6,018.11c yāhi sūno sahaso yasya nū cid adeva īśe puruhūta yotoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9165: RV_6,018.12a pra tuvidyumnasya sthavirasya ghṛṣver divo rarapśe mahimā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9166: RV_6,018.12c nāsya śatrur na pratimānam asti na pratiṣṭhiḥ purumāyasya sahyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9167: RV_6,018.13a pra tat te adyā karaṇaṃ kṛtam bhūt kutsaṃ yad āyum atithigvam asmai /
GV01rvh1-10u:9168: RV_6,018.13c purū sahasrā ni śiśā abhi kṣām ut tūrvayāṇaṃ dhṛṣatā ninetha //
GV01rvh1-10u:9169: RV_6,018.14a anu tvāhighne adha deva devā madan viśve kavitamaṃ kavīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9170: RV_6,018.14c karo yatra varivo bādhitāya dive janāya tanve gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9171: RV_6,018.15a anu dyāvāpṛthivī tat ta ojo 'martyā jihata indra devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9172: RV_6,018.15c kṛṣvā kṛtno akṛtaṃ yat te asty ukthaṃ navīyo janayasva yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9173: RV_6,019.01a mahāṃ indro nṛvad ā carṣaṇiprā uta dvibarhā aminaḥ sahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9174: RV_6,019.01c asmadryag vāvṛdhe vīryāyoruḥ pṛthuḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9175: RV_6,019.02a indram eva dhiṣaṇā sātaye dhād bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ yuvānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9176: RV_6,019.02c aṣāḷhena śavasā śūśuvāṃsaṃ sadyaś cid yo vāvṛdhe asāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9177: RV_6,019.03a pṛthū karasnā bahulā gabhastī asmadryak sam mimīhi śravāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9178: RV_6,019.03c yūtheva paśvaḥ paśupā damūnā asmāṃ indrābhy ā vavṛtsvājau //
GV01rvh1-10u:9179: RV_6,019.04a taṃ va indraṃ catinam asya śākair iha nūnaṃ vājayanto huvema /
GV01rvh1-10u:9180: RV_6,019.04c yathā cit pūrve jaritāra āsur anedyā anavadyā ariṣṭāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9181: RV_6,019.05a dhṛtavrato dhanadāḥ somavṛddhaḥ sa hi vāmasya vasunaḥ purukṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9182: RV_6,019.05c saṃ jagmire pathyā rāyo asmin samudre na sindhavo yādamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9183: RV_6,019.06a śaviṣṭhaṃ na ā bhara śūra śava ojiṣṭham ojo abhibhūta ugram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9184: RV_6,019.06c viśvā dyumnā vṛṣṇyā mānuṣāṇām asmabhyaṃ dā harivo mādayadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9185: RV_6,019.07a yas te madaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ amṛdhra indra taṃ na ā bhara śūśuvāṃsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9186: RV_6,019.07c yena tokasya tanayasya sātau maṃsīmahi jigīvāṃsas tvotāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9187: RV_6,019.08a ā no bhara vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9188: RV_6,019.08c yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śatrūn tavotibhir uta jāmīṃr ajāmīn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9189: RV_6,019.09a ā te śuṣmo vṛṣabha etu paścād ottarād adharād ā purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9190: RV_6,019.09c ā viśvato abhi sam etv arvāṅ indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:9191: RV_6,019.10a nṛvat ta indra nṛtamābhir ūtī vaṃsīmahi vāmaṃ śromatebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9192: RV_6,019.10c īkṣe hi vasva ubhayasya rājan dhā ratnam mahi sthūram bṛhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9193: RV_6,019.11a marutvantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vāvṛdhānam akavāriṃ divyaṃ śāsam indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9194: RV_6,019.11c viśvāsāham avase nūtanāyograṃ sahodām iha taṃ huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:9195: RV_6,019.12a janaṃ vajrin mahi cin manyamānam ebhyo nṛbhyo randhayā yeṣv asmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9196: RV_6,019.12c adhā hi tvā pṛthivyāṃ śūrasātau havāmahe tanaye goṣv apsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9197: RV_6,019.13a vayaṃ ta ebhiḥ puruhūta sakhyaiḥ śatroḥ-śatror uttara it syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9198: RV_6,019.13c ghnanto vṛtrāṇy ubhayāni śūra rāyā madema bṛhatā tvotāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9199: RV_6,020.01a dyaur na ya indrābhi bhūmāryas tasthau rayiḥ śavasā pṛtsu janān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9200: RV_6,020.01c taṃ naḥ sahasrabharam urvarāsāṃ daddhi sūno sahaso vṛtraturam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9201: RV_6,020.02a divo na tubhyam anv indra satrāsuryaṃ devebhir dhāyi viśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9202: RV_6,020.02c ahiṃ yad vṛtram apo vavrivāṃsaṃ hann ṛjīṣin viṣṇunā sacānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9203: RV_6,020.03a tūrvann ojīyān tavasas tavīyān kṛtabrahmendro vṛddhamahāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9204: RV_6,020.03c rājābhavan madhunaḥ somyasya viśvāsāṃ yat purāṃ dartnum āvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9205: RV_6,020.04a śatair apadran paṇaya indrātra daśoṇaye kavaye 'rkasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9206: RV_6,020.04c vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasyāśuṣasya māyāḥ pitvo nārirecīt kiṃ cana pra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9207: RV_6,020.05a maho druho apa viśvāyu dhāyi vajrasya yat patane pādi śuṣṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9208: RV_6,020.05c uru ṣa sarathaṃ sārathaye kar indraḥ kutsāya sūryasya sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:9209: RV_6,020.06a pra śyeno na madiram aṃśum asmai śiro dāsasya namucer mathāyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:9210: RV_6,020.06c prāvan namīṃ sāpyaṃ sasantam pṛṇag rāyā sam iṣā saṃ svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9211: RV_6,020.07a vi pipror ahimāyasya dṛḷhāḥ puro vajriñ chavasā na dardaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9212: RV_6,020.07c sudāman tad rekṇo apramṛṣyam ṛjiśvane dātraṃ dāśuṣe dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9213: RV_6,020.08a sa vetasuṃ daśamāyaṃ daśoṇiṃ tūtujim indraḥ svabhiṣṭisumnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9214: RV_6,020.08c ā tugraṃ śaśvad ibhaṃ dyotanāya mātur na sīm upa sṛjā iyadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9215: RV_6,020.09a sa īṃ spṛdho vanate apratīto bibhrad vajraṃ vṛtrahaṇaṃ gabhastau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9216: RV_6,020.09c tiṣṭhad dharī adhy asteva garte vacoyujā vahata indram ṛṣvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9217: RV_6,020.10a sanema te 'vasā navya indra pra pūrava stavanta enā yajñaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9218: RV_6,020.10c sapta yat puraḥ śarma śāradīr dard dhan dāsīḥ purukutsāya śikṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9219: RV_6,020.11a tvaṃ vṛdha indra pūrvyo bhūr varivasyann uśane kāvyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9220: RV_6,020.11c parā navavāstvam anudeyam mahe pitre dadātha svaṃ napātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9221: RV_6,020.12a tvaṃ dhunir indra dhunimatīr ṛṇor apaḥ sīrā na sravantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9222: RV_6,020.12c pra yat samudram ati śūra parṣi pārayā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9223: RV_6,020.13a tava ha tyad indra viśvam ājau sasto dhunīcumurī yā ha siṣvap /
GV01rvh1-10u:9224: RV_6,020.13c dīdayad it tubhyaṃ somebhiḥ sunvan dabhītir idhmabhṛtiḥ pakthy arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9225: RV_6,021.01a imā u tvā purutamasya kāror havyaṃ vīra havyā havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:9226: RV_6,021.01c dhiyo ratheṣṭhām ajaraṃ navīyo rayir vibhūtir īyate vacasyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9227: RV_6,021.02a tam u stuṣa indraṃ yo vidāno girvāhasaṃ gīrbhir yajñavṛddham /
GV01rvh1-10u:9228: RV_6,021.02c yasya divam ati mahnā pṛthivyāḥ purumāyasya ririce mahitvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9229: RV_6,021.03a sa it tamo 'vayunaṃ tatanvat sūryeṇa vayunavac cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9230: RV_6,021.03c kadā te martā amṛtasya dhāmeyakṣanto na minanti svadhāvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9231: RV_6,021.04a yas tā cakāra sa kuha svid indraḥ kam ā janaṃ carati kāsu vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:9232: RV_6,021.04c kas te yajño manase śaṃ varāya ko arka indra katamaḥ sa hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9233: RV_6,021.05a idā hi te veviṣataḥ purājāḥ pratnāsa āsuḥ purukṛt sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9234: RV_6,021.05c ye madhyamāsa uta nūtanāsa utāvamasya puruhūta bodhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9235: RV_6,021.06a tam pṛcchanto 'varāsaḥ parāṇi pratnā ta indra śrutyānu yemuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9236: RV_6,021.06c arcāmasi vīra brahmavāho yād eva vidma tāt tvā mahāntam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9237: RV_6,021.07a abhi tvā pājo rakṣaso vi tasthe mahi jajñānam abhi tat su tiṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9238: RV_6,021.07c tava pratnena yujyena sakhyā vajreṇa dhṛṣṇo apa tā nudasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9239: RV_6,021.08a sa tu śrudhīndra nūtanasya brahmaṇyato vīra kārudhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9240: RV_6,021.08c tvaṃ hy āpiḥ pradivi pitṝṇāṃ śaśvad babhūtha suhava eṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:9241: RV_6,021.09a protaye varuṇam mitram indram marutaḥ kṛṣvāvase no adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9242: RV_6,021.09c pra pūṣaṇaṃ viṣṇum agnim purandhiṃ savitāram oṣadhīḥ parvatāṃś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9243: RV_6,021.10a ima u tvā puruśāka prayajyo jaritāro abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9244: RV_6,021.10c śrudhī havam ā huvato huvāno na tvāvāṃ anyo amṛta tvad asti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9245: RV_6,021.11a nū ma ā vācam upa yāhi vidvān viśvebhiḥ sūno sahaso yajatraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9246: RV_6,021.11c ye agnijihvā ṛtasāpa āsur ye manuṃ cakrur uparaṃ dasāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9247: RV_6,021.12a sa no bodhi puraetā sugeṣūta durgeṣu pathikṛd vidānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9248: RV_6,021.12c ye aśramāsa uravo vahiṣṭhās tebhir na indrābhi vakṣi vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9249: RV_6,022.01a ya eka id dhavyaś carṣaṇīnām indraṃ taṃ gīrbhir abhy arca ābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9250: RV_6,022.01c yaḥ patyate vṛṣabho vṛṣṇyāvān satyaḥ satvā purumāyaḥ sahasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9251: RV_6,022.02a tam u naḥ pūrve pitaro navagvāḥ sapta viprāso abhi vājayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9252: RV_6,022.02c nakṣaddābhaṃ taturim parvateṣṭhām adroghavācam matibhiḥ śaviṣṭham //
GV01rvh1-10u:9253: RV_6,022.03a tam īmaha indram asya rāyaḥ puruvīrasya nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9254: RV_6,022.03c yo askṛdhoyur ajaraḥ svarvān tam ā bhara harivo mādayadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9255: RV_6,022.04a tan no vi voco yadi te purā cij jaritāra ānaśuḥ sumnam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9256: RV_6,022.04c kas te bhāgaḥ kiṃ vayo dudhra khidvaḥ puruhūta purūvaso 'suraghnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9257: RV_6,022.05a tam pṛcchantī vajrahastaṃ ratheṣṭhām indraṃ vepī vakvarī yasya nū gīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9258: RV_6,022.05c tuvigrābhaṃ tuvikūrmiṃ rabhodāṃ gātum iṣe nakṣate tumram accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:9259: RV_6,022.06a ayā ha tyam māyayā vāvṛdhānam manojuvā svatavaḥ parvatena /
GV01rvh1-10u:9260: RV_6,022.06c acyutā cid vīḷitā svojo rujo vi dṛḷhā dhṛṣatā virapśin //
GV01rvh1-10u:9261: RV_6,022.07a taṃ vo dhiyā navyasyā śaviṣṭham pratnam pratnavat paritaṃsayadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:9262: RV_6,022.07c sa no vakṣad animānaḥ suvahmendro viśvāny ati durgahāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9263: RV_6,022.08a ā janāya druhvaṇe pārthivāni divyāni dīpayo 'ntarikṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9264: RV_6,022.08c tapā vṛṣan viśvataḥ śociṣā tān brahmadviṣe śocaya kṣām apaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9265: RV_6,022.09a bhuvo janasya divyasya rājā pārthivasya jagatas tveṣasaṃdṛk /
GV01rvh1-10u:9266: RV_6,022.09c dhiṣva vajraṃ dakṣiṇa indra haste viśvā ajurya dayase vi māyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9267: RV_6,022.10a ā saṃyatam indra ṇaḥ svastiṃ śatrutūryāya bṛhatīm amṛdhrām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9268: RV_6,022.10c yayā dāsāny āryāṇi vṛtrā karo vajrin sutukā nāhuṣāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9269: RV_6,022.11a sa no niyudbhiḥ puruhūta vedho viśvavārābhir ā gahi prayajyo /
GV01rvh1-10u:9270: RV_6,022.11c na yā adevo varate na deva ābhir yāhi tūyam ā madryadrik //
GV01rvh1-10u:9271: RV_6,023.01a suta it tvaṃ nimiśla indra some stome brahmaṇi śasyamāna ukthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9272: RV_6,023.01c yad vā yuktābhyām maghavan haribhyām bibhrad vajram bāhvor indra yāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9273: RV_6,023.02a yad vā divi pārye suṣvim indra vṛtrahatye 'vasi śūrasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9274: RV_6,023.02c yad vā dakṣasya bibhyuṣo abibhyad arandhayaḥ śardhata indra dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9275: RV_6,023.03a pātā sutam indro astu somam praṇenīr ugro jaritāram ūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:9276: RV_6,023.03c kartā vīrāya suṣvaya u lokaṃ dātā vasu stuvate kīraye cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:9277: RV_6,023.04a ganteyānti savanā haribhyām babhrir vajram papiḥ somaṃ dadir gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9278: RV_6,023.04c kartā vīraṃ naryaṃ sarvavīraṃ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata stomavāhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9279: RV_6,023.05a asmai vayaṃ yad vāvāna tad viviṣma indrāya yo naḥ pradivo apas kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9280: RV_6,023.05c sute some stumasi śaṃsad ukthendrāya brahma vardhanaṃ yathāsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9281: RV_6,023.06a brahmāṇi hi cakṛṣe vardhanāni tāvat ta indra matibhir viviṣmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9282: RV_6,023.06c sute some sutapāḥ śantamāni rāṇḍyā kriyāsma vakṣaṇāni yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9283: RV_6,023.07a sa no bodhi puroḷāśaṃ rarāṇaḥ pibā tu somaṃ goṛjīkam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9284: RV_6,023.07c edam barhir yajamānasya sīdoruṃ kṛdhi tvāyata u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9285: RV_6,023.08a sa mandasvā hy anu joṣam ugra pra tvā yajñāsa ime aśnuvantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:9286: RV_6,023.08c preme havāsaḥ puruhūtam asme ā tveyaṃ dhīr avasa indra yamyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9287: RV_6,023.09a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyaḥ saṃ yathā suteṣu somebhir īm pṛṇatā bhojam indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9288: RV_6,023.09c kuvit tasmā asati no bharāya na suṣvim indro 'vase mṛdhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9289: RV_6,023.10a eved indraḥ sute astāvi some bharadvājeṣu kṣayad in maghonaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9290: RV_6,023.10c asad yathā jaritra uta sūrir indro rāyo viśvavārasya dātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9291: RV_6,024.01a vṛṣā mada indre śloka ukthā sacā someṣu sutapā ṛjīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:9292: RV_6,024.01c arcatryo maghavā nṛbhya ukthair dyukṣo rājā girām akṣitotiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9293: RV_6,024.02a taturir vīro naryo vicetāḥ śrotā havaṃ gṛṇata urvyūtiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9294: RV_6,024.02c vasuḥ śaṃso narāṃ kārudhāyā vājī stuto vidathe dāti vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9295: RV_6,024.03a akṣo na cakryoḥ śūra bṛhan pra te mahnā ririce rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9296: RV_6,024.03c vṛkṣasya nu te puruhūta vayā vy ūtayo ruruhur indra pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9297: RV_6,024.04a śacīvatas te puruśāka śākā gavām iva srutayaḥ saṃcaraṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9298: RV_6,024.04c vatsānāṃ na tantayas ta indra dāmanvanto adāmānaḥ sudāman //
GV01rvh1-10u:9299: RV_6,024.05a anyad adya karvaram anyad u śvo 'sac ca san muhur ācakrir indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9300: RV_6,024.05c mitro no atra varuṇaś ca pūṣāryo vaśasya paryetāsti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9301: RV_6,024.06a vi tvad āpo na parvatasya pṛṣṭhād ukthebhir indrānayanta yajñaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9302: RV_6,024.06c taṃ tvābhiḥ suṣṭutibhir vājayanta ājiṃ na jagmur girvāho aśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9303: RV_6,024.07a na yaṃ jaranti śarado na māsā na dyāva indram avakarśayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9304: RV_6,024.07c vṛddhasya cid vardhatām asya tanū stomebhir ukthaiś ca śasyamānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9305: RV_6,024.08a na vīḷave namate na sthirāya na śardhate dasyujūtāya stavān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9306: RV_6,024.08c ajrā indrasya girayaś cid ṛṣvā gambhīre cid bhavati gādham asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9307: RV_6,024.09a gambhīreṇa na uruṇāmatrin preṣo yandhi sutapāvan vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9308: RV_6,024.09c sthā ū ṣu ūrdhva ūtī ariṣaṇyann aktor vyuṣṭau paritakmyāyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9309: RV_6,024.10a sacasva nāyam avase abhīka ito vā tam indra pāhi riṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9310: RV_6,024.10c amā cainam araṇye pāhi riṣo madema śatahimāḥ suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9311: RV_6,025.01a yā ta ūtir avamā yā paramā yā madhyamendra śuṣminn asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9312: RV_6,025.01c tābhir ū ṣu vṛtrahatye 'vīr na ebhiś ca vājair mahān na ugra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9313: RV_6,025.02a ābhi spṛdho mithatīr ariṣaṇyann amitrasya vyathayā manyum indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9314: RV_6,025.02c ābhir viśvā abhiyujo viṣūcīr āryāya viśo 'va tārīr dāsīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9315: RV_6,025.03a indra jāmaya uta ye 'jāmayo 'rvācīnāso vanuṣo yuyujre /
GV01rvh1-10u:9316: RV_6,025.03c tvam eṣāṃ vithurā śavāṃsi jahi vṛṣṇyāni kṛṇuhī parācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9317: RV_6,025.04a śūro vā śūraṃ vanate śarīrais tanūrucā taruṣi yat kṛṇvaite /
GV01rvh1-10u:9318: RV_6,025.04c toke vā goṣu tanaye yad apsu vi krandasī urvarāsu bravaite //
GV01rvh1-10u:9319: RV_6,025.05a nahi tvā śūro na turo na dhṛṣṇur na tvā yodho manyamāno yuyodha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9320: RV_6,025.05c indra nakiṣ ṭvā praty asty eṣāṃ viśvā jātāny abhy asi tāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:9321: RV_6,025.06a sa patyata ubhayor nṛmṇam ayor yadī vedhasaḥ samithe havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:9322: RV_6,025.06c vṛtre vā maho nṛvati kṣaye vā vyacasvantā yadi vitantasaite //
GV01rvh1-10u:9323: RV_6,025.07a adha smā te carṣaṇayo yad ejān indra trātota bhavā varūtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9324: RV_6,025.07c asmākāso ye nṛtamāso arya indra sūrayo dadhire puro naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9325: RV_6,025.08a anu te dāyi maha indriyāya satrā te viśvam anu vṛtrahatye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9326: RV_6,025.08c anu kṣatram anu saho yajatrendra devebhir anu te nṛṣahye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9327: RV_6,025.09a evā na spṛdhaḥ sam ajā samatsv indra rārandhi mithatīr adevīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9328: RV_6,025.09c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto bharadvājā uta ta indra nūnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9329: RV_6,026.01a śrudhī na indra hvayāmasi tvā maho vājasya sātau vāvṛṣāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9330: RV_6,026.01c saṃ yad viśo 'yanta śūrasātā ugraṃ no 'vaḥ pārye ahan dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9331: RV_6,026.02a tvāṃ vājī havate vājineyo maho vājasya gadhyasya sātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9332: RV_6,026.02c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ tarutraṃ tvāṃ caṣṭe muṣṭihā goṣu yudhyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9333: RV_6,026.03a tvaṃ kaviṃ codayo 'rkasātau tvaṃ kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ dāśuṣe vark /
GV01rvh1-10u:9334: RV_6,026.03c tvaṃ śiro amarmaṇaḥ parāhann atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9335: RV_6,026.04a tvaṃ ratham pra bharo yodham ṛṣvam āvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
GV01rvh1-10u:9336: RV_6,026.04c tvaṃ tugraṃ vetasave sacāhan tvaṃ tujiṃ gṛṇantam indra tūtoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9337: RV_6,026.05a tvaṃ tad uktham indra barhaṇā kaḥ pra yac chatā sahasrā śūra darṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9338: RV_6,026.05c ava girer dāsaṃ śambaraṃ han prāvo divodāsaṃ citrābhir ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:9339: RV_6,026.06a tvaṃ śraddhābhir mandasānaḥ somair dabhītaye cumurim indra siṣvap /
GV01rvh1-10u:9340: RV_6,026.06c tvaṃ rajim piṭhīnase daśasyan ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā śacyā sacāhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9341: RV_6,026.07a ahaṃ cana tat sūribhir ānaśyāṃ tava jyāya indra sumnam ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9342: RV_6,026.07c tvayā yat stavante sadhavīra vīrās trivarūthena nahuṣā śaviṣṭha //
GV01rvh1-10u:9343: RV_6,026.08a vayaṃ te asyām indra dyumnahūtau sakhāyaḥ syāma mahina preṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9344: RV_6,026.08c prātardaniḥ kṣatraśrīr astu śreṣṭho ghane vṛtrāṇāṃ sanaye dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9345: RV_6,027.01a kim asya made kim v asya pītāv indraḥ kim asya sakhye cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9346: RV_6,027.01c raṇā vā ye niṣadi kiṃ te asya purā vividre kim u nūtanāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9347: RV_6,027.02a sad asya made sad v asya pītāv indraḥ sad asya sakhye cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9348: RV_6,027.02c raṇā vā ye niṣadi sat te asya purā vividre sad u nūtanāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9349: RV_6,027.03a nahi nu te mahimanaḥ samasya na maghavan maghavattvasya vidma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9350: RV_6,027.03c na rādhaso-rādhaso nūtanasyendra nakir dadṛśa indriyaṃ te //
GV01rvh1-10u:9351: RV_6,027.04a etat tyat ta indriyam aceti yenāvadhīr varaśikhasya śeṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9352: RV_6,027.04c vajrasya yat te nihatasya śuṣmāt svanāc cid indra paramo dadāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9353: RV_6,027.05a vadhīd indro varaśikhasya śeṣo 'bhyāvartine cāyamānāya śikṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:9354: RV_6,027.05c vṛcīvato yad dhariyūpīyāyāṃ han pūrve ardhe bhiyasāparo dart //
GV01rvh1-10u:9355: RV_6,027.06a triṃśacchataṃ varmiṇa indra sākaṃ yavyāvatyām puruhūta śravasyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9356: RV_6,027.06c vṛcīvantaḥ śarave patyamānāḥ pātrā bhindānā nyarthāny āyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9357: RV_6,027.07a yasya gāvāv aruṣā sūyavasyū antar ū ṣu carato rerihāṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9358: RV_6,027.07c sa sṛñjayāya turvaśam parādād vṛcīvato daivavātāya śikṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:9359: RV_6,027.08a dvayāṃ agne rathino viṃśatiṃ gā vadhūmato maghavā mahyaṃ samrāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9360: RV_6,027.08c abhyāvartī cāyamāno dadāti dūṇāśeyaṃ dakṣiṇā pārthavānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9361: RV_6,028.01a ā gāvo agmann uta bhadram akran sīdantu goṣṭhe raṇayantv asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:9362: RV_6,028.01c prajāvatīḥ pururūpā iha syur indrāya pūrvīr uṣaso duhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9363: RV_6,028.02a indro yajvane pṛṇate ca śikṣaty uped dadāti na svam muṣāyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9364: RV_6,028.02c bhūyo-bhūyo rayim id asya vardhayann abhinne khilye ni dadhāti devayum //
GV01rvh1-10u:9365: RV_6,028.03a na tā naśanti na dabhāti taskaro nāsām āmitro vyathir ā dadharṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9366: RV_6,028.03c devāṃś ca yābhir yajate dadāti ca jyog it tābhiḥ sacate gopatiḥ saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:9367: RV_6,028.04a na tā arvā reṇukakāṭo aśnute na saṃskṛtatram upa yanti tā abhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9368: RV_6,028.04c urugāyam abhayaṃ tasya tā anu gāvo martasya vi caranti yajvanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9369: RV_6,028.05a gāvo bhago gāva indro me acchān gāvaḥ somasya prathamasya bhakṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9370: RV_6,028.05c imā yā gāvaḥ sa janāsa indra icchāmīd dhṛdā manasā cid indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:9371: RV_6,028.06a yūyaṃ gāvo medayathā kṛśaṃ cid aśrīraṃ cit kṛṇuthā supratīkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9372: RV_6,028.06c bhadraṃ gṛhaṃ kṛṇutha bhadravāco bṛhad vo vaya ucyate sabhāsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9373: RV_6,028.07a prajāvatīḥ sūyavasaṃ riśantīḥ śuddhā apaḥ suprapāṇe pibantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9374: RV_6,028.07c mā va stena īśata māghaśaṃsaḥ pari vo hetī rudrasya vṛjyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9375: RV_6,028.08a upedam upaparcanam āsu goṣūpa pṛcyatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9376: RV_6,028.08c upa ṛṣabhasya retasy upendra tava vīrye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9377: RV_6,029.01a indraṃ vo naraḥ sakhyāya sepur maho yantaḥ sumataye cakānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9378: RV_6,029.01c maho hi dātā vajrahasto asti mahām u raṇvam avase yajadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9379: RV_6,029.02a ā yasmin haste naryā mimikṣur ā rathe hiraṇyaye ratheṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9380: RV_6,029.02c ā raśmayo gabhastyo sthūrayor ādhvann aśvāso vṛṣaṇo yujānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9381: RV_6,029.03a śriye te pādā duva ā mimikṣur dhṛṣṇur vajrī śavasā dakṣiṇāvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9382: RV_6,029.03c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nṛtav iṣiro babhūtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:9383: RV_6,029.04a sa soma āmiślatamaḥ suto bhūd yasmin paktiḥ pacyate santi dhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9384: RV_6,029.04c indraṃ nara stuvanto brahmakārā ukthā śaṃsanto devavātatamāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9385: RV_6,029.05a na te antaḥ śavaso dhāyy asya vi tu bābadhe rodasī mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9386: RV_6,029.05c ā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujāno yūthevāpsu samījamāna ūtī //
GV01rvh1-10u:9387: RV_6,029.06a eved indraḥ suhava ṛṣvo astūtī anūtī hiriśipraḥ satvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9388: RV_6,029.06c evā hi jāto asamātyojāḥ purū ca vṛtrā hanati ni dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9389: RV_6,030.01a bhūya id vāvṛdhe vīryāyaṃ eko ajuryo dayate vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:9390: RV_6,030.01c pra ririce diva indraḥ pṛthivyā ardham id asya prati rodasī ubhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9391: RV_6,030.02a adhā manye bṛhad asuryam asya yāni dādhāra nakir ā mināti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9392: RV_6,030.02c dive-dive sūryo darśato bhūd vi sadmāny urviyā sukratur dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9393: RV_6,030.03a adyā cin nū cit tad apo nadīnāṃ yad ābhyo arado gātum indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9394: RV_6,030.03c ni parvatā admasado na sedus tvayā dṛḷhāni sukrato rajāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9395: RV_6,030.04a satyam it tan na tvāvāṃ anyo astīndra devo na martyo jyāyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9396: RV_6,030.04c ahann ahim pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo acchā samudram //
GV01rvh1-10u:9397: RV_6,030.05a tvam apo vi duro viṣūcīr indra dṛḷham arujaḥ parvatasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9398: RV_6,030.05c rājābhavo jagataś carṣaṇīnāṃ sākaṃ sūryaṃ janayan dyām uṣāsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9399: RV_6,031.01a abhūr eko rayipate rayīṇām ā hastayor adhithā indra kṛṣṭīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9400: RV_6,031.01c vi toke apsu tanaye ca sūre 'vocanta carṣaṇayo vivācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9401: RV_6,031.02a tvad bhiyendra pārthivāni viśvācyutā cic cyāvayante rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9402: RV_6,031.02c dyāvākṣāmā parvatāso vanāni viśvaṃ dṛḷham bhayate ajmann ā te //
GV01rvh1-10u:9403: RV_6,031.03a tvaṃ kutsenābhi śuṣṇam indrāśuṣaṃ yudhya kuyavaṃ gaviṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9404: RV_6,031.03c daśa prapitve adha sūryasya muṣāyaś cakram avive rapāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9405: RV_6,031.04a tvaṃ śatāny ava śambarasya puro jaghanthāpratīni dasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9406: RV_6,031.04c aśikṣo yatra śacyā śacīvo divodāsāya sunvate sutakre bharadvājāya gṛṇate vasūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:9407: RV_6,031.05a sa satyasatvan mahate raṇāya ratham ā tiṣṭha tuvinṛmṇa bhīmam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9408: RV_6,031.05c yāhi prapathinn avasopa madrik pra ca śruta śrāvaya carṣaṇibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9409: RV_6,032.01a apūrvyā purutamāny asmai mahe vīrāya tavase turāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9410: RV_6,032.01c virapśine vajriṇe śantamāni vacāṃsy āsā sthavirāya takṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9411: RV_6,032.02a sa mātarā sūryeṇā kavīnām avāsayad rujad adriṃ gṛṇānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9412: RV_6,032.02c svādhībhir ṛkvabhir vāvaśāna ud usriyāṇām asṛjan nidānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9413: RV_6,032.03a sa vahnibhir ṛkvabhir goṣu śaśvan mitajñubhiḥ purukṛtvā jigāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9414: RV_6,032.03c puraḥ purohā sakhibhiḥ sakhīyan dṛḷhā ruroja kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san //
GV01rvh1-10u:9415: RV_6,032.04a sa nīvyābhir jaritāram acchā maho vājebhir mahadbhiś ca śuṣmaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9416: RV_6,032.04c puruvīrābhir vṛṣabha kṣitīnām ā girvaṇaḥ suvitāya pra yāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9417: RV_6,032.05a sa sargeṇa śavasā takto atyair apa indro dakṣiṇatas turāṣāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9418: RV_6,032.05c itthā sṛjānā anapāvṛd arthaṃ dive-dive viviṣur apramṛṣyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9419: RV_6,033.01a ya ojiṣṭha indra taṃ su no dā mado vṛṣan svabhiṣṭir dāsvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9420: RV_6,033.01c sauvaśvyaṃ yo vanavat svaśvo vṛtrā samatsu sāsahad amitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9421: RV_6,033.02a tvāṃ hīndrāvase vivāco havante carṣaṇayaḥ śūrasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9422: RV_6,033.02c tvaṃ viprebhir vi paṇīṃr aśāyas tvota it sanitā vājam arvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9423: RV_6,033.03a tvaṃ tāṃ indrobhayāṃ amitrān dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā ca śūra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9424: RV_6,033.03c vadhīr vaneva sudhitebhir atkair ā pṛtsu darṣi nṛṇāṃ nṛtama //
GV01rvh1-10u:9425: RV_6,033.04a sa tvaṃ na indrākavābhir ūtī sakhā viśvāyur avitā vṛdhe bhūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9426: RV_6,033.04c svarṣātā yad dhvayāmasi tvā yudhyanto nemadhitā pṛtsu śūra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9427: RV_6,033.05a nūnaṃ na indrāparāya ca syā bhavā mṛḷīka uta no abhiṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9428: RV_6,033.05c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śarman divi ṣyāma pārye goṣatamāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9429: RV_6,034.01a saṃ ca tve jagmur gira indra pūrvīr vi ca tvad yanti vibhvo manīṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9430: RV_6,034.01c purā nūnaṃ ca stutaya ṛṣīṇām paspṛdhra indre adhy ukthārkā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9431: RV_6,034.02a puruhūto yaḥ purugūrta ṛbhvāṃ ekaḥ purupraśasto asti yajñaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9432: RV_6,034.02c ratho na mahe śavase yujāno 'smābhir indro anumādyo bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9433: RV_6,034.03a na yaṃ hiṃsanti dhītayo na vāṇīr indraṃ nakṣantīd abhi vardhayantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9434: RV_6,034.03c yadi stotāraḥ śataṃ yat sahasraṃ gṛṇanti girvaṇasaṃ śaṃ tad asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9435: RV_6,034.04a asmā etad divy arceva māsā mimikṣa indre ny ayāmi somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9436: RV_6,034.04c janaṃ na dhanvann abhi saṃ yad āpaḥ satrā vāvṛdhur havanāni yajñaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9437: RV_6,034.05a asmā etan mahy āṅgūṣam asmā indrāya stotram matibhir avāci /
GV01rvh1-10u:9438: RV_6,034.05c asad yathā mahati vṛtratūrya indro viśvāyur avitā vṛdhaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9439: RV_6,035.01a kadā bhuvan rathakṣayāṇi brahma kadā stotre sahasrapoṣyaṃ dāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9440: RV_6,035.01c kadā stomaṃ vāsayo 'sya rāyā kadā dhiyaḥ karasi vājaratnāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9441: RV_6,035.02a karhi svit tad indra yan nṛbhir nṝn vīrair vīrān nīḷayāse jayājīn /
GV01rvh1-10u:9442: RV_6,035.02c tridhātu gā adhi jayāsi goṣv indra dyumnaṃ svarvad dhehy asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:9443: RV_6,035.03a karhi svit tad indra yaj jaritre viśvapsu brahma kṛṇavaḥ śaviṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9444: RV_6,035.03c kadā dhiyo na niyuto yuvāse kadā gomaghā havanāni gacchāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9445: RV_6,035.04a sa gomaghā jaritre aśvaścandrā vājaśravaso adhi dhehi pṛkṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9446: RV_6,035.04c pīpihīṣaḥ sudughām indra dhenum bharadvājeṣu suruco rurucyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9447: RV_6,035.05a tam ā nūnaṃ vṛjanam anyathā cic chūro yac chakra vi duro gṛṇīṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9448: RV_6,035.05c mā nir araṃ śukradughasya dhenor āṅgirasān brahmaṇā vipra jinva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9449: RV_6,036.01a satrā madāsas tava viśvajanyāḥ satrā rāyo 'dha ye pārthivāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9450: RV_6,036.01c satrā vājānām abhavo vibhaktā yad deveṣu dhārayathā asuryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9451: RV_6,036.02a anu pra yeje jana ojo asya satrā dadhire anu vīryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9452: RV_6,036.02c syūmagṛbhe dudhaye 'rvate ca kratuṃ vṛñjanty api vṛtrahatye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9453: RV_6,036.03a taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9454: RV_6,036.03c samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ gira ā viśanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9455: RV_6,036.04a sa rāyas khām upa sṛjā gṛṇānaḥ puruścandrasya tvam indra vasvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9456: RV_6,036.04c patir babhūthāsamo janānām eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9457: RV_6,036.05a sa tu śrudhi śrutyā yo duvoyur dyaur na bhūmābhi rāyo aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9458: RV_6,036.05c aso yathā naḥ śavasā cakāno yuge-yuge vayasā cekitānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9459: RV_6,037.01a arvāg rathaṃ viśvavāraṃ ta ugrendra yuktāso harayo vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:9460: RV_6,037.01c kīriś cid dhi tvā havate svarvān ṛdhīmahi sadhamādas te adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9461: RV_6,037.02a pro droṇe harayaḥ karmāgman punānāsa ṛjyanto abhūvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:9462: RV_6,037.02c indro no asya pūrvyaḥ papīyād dyukṣo madasya somyasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9463: RV_6,037.03a āsasrāṇāsaḥ śavasānam acchendraṃ sucakre rathyāso aśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9464: RV_6,037.03c abhi śrava ṛjyanto vaheyur nū cin nu vāyor amṛtaṃ vi dasyet //
GV01rvh1-10u:9465: RV_6,037.04a variṣṭho asya dakṣiṇām iyartīndro maghonāṃ tuvikūrmitamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9466: RV_6,037.04c yayā vajrivaḥ pariyāsy aṃho maghā ca dhṛṣṇo dayase vi sūrīn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9467: RV_6,037.05a indro vājasya sthavirasya dātendro gīrbhir vardhatāṃ vṛddhamahāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9468: RV_6,037.05c indro vṛtraṃ haniṣṭho astu satvā tā sūriḥ pṛṇati tūtujānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9469: RV_6,038.01a apād ita ud u naś citratamo mahīm bharṣad dyumatīm indrahūtim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9470: RV_6,038.01c panyasīṃ dhītiṃ daivyasya yāmañ janasya rātiṃ vanate sudānuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9471: RV_6,038.02a dūrāc cid ā vasato asya karṇā ghoṣād indrasya tanyati bruvāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9472: RV_6,038.02c eyam enaṃ devahūtir vavṛtyān madryag indram iyam ṛcyamānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9473: RV_6,038.03a taṃ vo dhiyā paramayā purājām ajaram indram abhy anūṣy arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9474: RV_6,038.03c brahmā ca giro dadhire sam asmin mahāṃś ca stomo adhi vardhad indre //
GV01rvh1-10u:9475: RV_6,038.04a vardhād yaṃ yajña uta soma indraṃ vardhād brahma gira ukthā ca manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9476: RV_6,038.04c vardhāhainam uṣaso yāmann aktor vardhān māsāḥ śarado dyāva indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:9477: RV_6,038.05a evā jajñānaṃ sahase asāmi vāvṛdhānaṃ rādhase ca śrutāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9478: RV_6,038.05c mahām ugram avase vipra nūnam ā vivāsema vṛtratūryeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9479: RV_6,039.01a mandrasya kaver divyasya vahner vipramanmano vacanasya madhvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9480: RV_6,039.01c apā nas tasya sacanasya deveṣo yuvasva gṛṇate goagrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9481: RV_6,039.02a ayam uśānaḥ pary adrim usrā ṛtadhītibhir ṛtayug yujānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9482: RV_6,039.02c rujad arugṇaṃ vi valasya sānum paṇīṃr vacobhir abhi yodhad indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9483: RV_6,039.03a ayaṃ dyotayad adyuto vy aktūn doṣā vastoḥ śarada indur indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:9484: RV_6,039.03c imaṃ ketum adadhur nū cid ahnāṃ śucijanmana uṣasaś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:9485: RV_6,039.04a ayaṃ rocayad aruco rucāno 'yaṃ vāsayad vy ṛtena pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9486: RV_6,039.04c ayam īyata ṛtayugbhir aśvaiḥ svarvidā nābhinā carṣaṇiprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9487: RV_6,039.05a nū gṛṇāno gṛṇate pratna rājann iṣaḥ pinva vasudeyāya pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9488: RV_6,039.05c apa oṣadhīr aviṣā vanāni gā arvato nṝn ṛcase rirīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9489: RV_6,040.01a indra piba tubhyaṃ suto madāyāva sya harī vi mucā sakhāyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9490: RV_6,040.01c uta pra gāya gaṇa ā niṣadyāthā yajñāya gṛṇate vayo dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9491: RV_6,040.02a asya piba yasya jajñāna indra madāya kratve apibo virapśin /
GV01rvh1-10u:9492: RV_6,040.02c tam u te gāvo nara āpo adrir induṃ sam ahyan pītaye sam asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9493: RV_6,040.03a samiddhe agnau suta indra soma ā tvā vahantu harayo vahiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9494: RV_6,040.03c tvāyatā manasā johavīmīndrā yāhi suvitāya mahe naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9495: RV_6,040.04a ā yāhi śaśvad uśatā yayāthendra mahā manasā somapeyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9496: RV_6,040.04c upa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā no 'thā te yajñas tanve vayo dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9497: RV_6,040.05a yad indra divi pārye yad ṛdhag yad vā sve sadane yatra vāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9498: RV_6,040.05c ato no yajñam avase niyutvān sajoṣāḥ pāhi girvaṇo marudbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9499: RV_6,041.01a aheḷamāna upa yāhi yajñaṃ tubhyam pavanta indavaḥ sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9500: RV_6,041.01c gāvo na vajrin svam oko acchendrā gahi prathamo yajñiyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9501: RV_6,041.02a yā te kākut sukṛtā yā variṣṭhā yayā śaśvat pibasi madhva ūrmim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9502: RV_6,041.02c tayā pāhi pra te adhvaryur asthāt saṃ te vajro vartatām indra gavyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9503: RV_6,041.03a eṣa drapso vṛṣabho viśvarūpa indrāya vṛṣṇe sam akāri somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9504: RV_6,041.03c etam piba hariva sthātar ugra yasyeśiṣe pradivi yas te annam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9505: RV_6,041.04a sutaḥ somo asutād indra vasyān ayaṃ śreyāñ cikituṣe raṇāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9506: RV_6,041.04c etaṃ titirva upa yāhi yajñaṃ tena viśvās taviṣīr ā pṛṇasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9507: RV_6,041.05a hvayāmasi tvendra yāhy arvāṅ araṃ te somas tanve bhavāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9508: RV_6,041.05c śatakrato mādayasvā suteṣu prāsmāṃ ava pṛtanāsu pra vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9509: RV_6,042.01a praty asmai pipīṣate viśvāni viduṣe bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:9511: RV_6,042.02a em enam pratyetana somebhiḥ somapātamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9512: RV_6,042.02c amatrebhir ṛjīṣiṇam indraṃ sutebhir indubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9513: RV_6,042.03a yadī sutebhir indubhiḥ somebhiḥ pratibhūṣatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9514: RV_6,042.03c vedā viśvasya medhiro dhṛṣat taṃ-tam id eṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:9515: RV_6,042.04a asmā-asmā id andhaso 'dhvaryo pra bharā sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9516: RV_6,042.04c kuvit samasya jenyasya śardhato 'bhiśaster avasparat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9517: RV_6,043.01a yasya tyac chambaram made divodāsāya randhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9518: RV_6,043.01c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:9519: RV_6,043.02a yasya tīvrasutam madam madhyam antaṃ ca rakṣase /
GV01rvh1-10u:9520: RV_6,043.02c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:9521: RV_6,043.03a yasya gā antar aśmano made dṛḷhā avāsṛjaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9522: RV_6,043.03c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:9523: RV_6,043.04a yasya mandāno andhaso māghonaṃ dadhiṣe śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9524: RV_6,043.04c ayaṃ sa soma indra te sutaḥ piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:9525: RV_6,044.01a yo rayivo rayintamo yo dyumnair dyumnavattamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9526: RV_6,044.01c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9527: RV_6,044.02a yaḥ śagmas tuviśagma te rāyo dāmā matīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9528: RV_6,044.02c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9529: RV_6,044.03a yena vṛddho na śavasā turo na svābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9530: RV_6,044.03c somaḥ sutaḥ sa indra te 'sti svadhāpate madaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9531: RV_6,044.04a tyam u vo aprahaṇaṃ gṛṇīṣe śavasas patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9532: RV_6,044.04c indraṃ viśvāsāhaṃ naram maṃhiṣṭhaṃ viśvacarṣaṇim //
GV01rvh1-10u:9533: RV_6,044.05a yaṃ vardhayantīd giraḥ patiṃ turasya rādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9534: RV_6,044.05c tam in nv asya rodasī devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9536: RV_6,044.06c vipo na yasyotayo vi yad rohanti sakṣitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9537: RV_6,044.07a avidad dakṣam mitro navīyān papāno devebhyo vasyo acait /
GV01rvh1-10u:9538: RV_6,044.07c sasavān staulābhir dhautarībhir uruṣyā pāyur abhavat sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9539: RV_6,044.08a ṛtasya pathi vedhā apāyi śriye manāṃsi devāso akran /
GV01rvh1-10u:9540: RV_6,044.08c dadhāno nāma maho vacobhir vapur dṛśaye venyo vy āvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9541: RV_6,044.09a dyumattamaṃ dakṣaṃ dhehy asme sedhā janānām pūrvīr arātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9542: RV_6,044.09c varṣīyo vayaḥ kṛṇuhi śacībhir dhanasya sātāv asmāṃ aviḍḍhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9543: RV_6,044.10a indra tubhyam in maghavann abhūma vayaṃ dātre harivo mā vi venaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9544: RV_6,044.10c nakir āpir dadṛśe martyatrā kim aṅga radhracodanaṃ tvāhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9545: RV_6,044.11a mā jasvane vṛṣabha no rarīthā mā te revataḥ sakhye riṣāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9546: RV_6,044.11c pūrvīṣ ṭa indra niṣṣidho janeṣu jahy asuṣvīn pra vṛhāpṛṇataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9547: RV_6,044.12a ud abhrāṇīva stanayann iyartīndro rādhāṃsy aśvyāni gavyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9548: RV_6,044.12c tvam asi pradivaḥ kārudhāyā mā tvādāmāna ā dabhan maghonaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9549: RV_6,044.13a adhvaryo vīra pra mahe sutānām indrāya bhara sa hy asya rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9550: RV_6,044.13c yaḥ pūrvyābhir uta nūtanābhir gīrbhir vāvṛdhe gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9551: RV_6,044.14a asya made puru varpāṃsi vidvān indro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:9552: RV_6,044.14c tam u pra hoṣi madhumantam asmai somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9553: RV_6,044.15a pātā sutam indro astu somaṃ hantā vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9554: RV_6,044.15c gantā yajñam parāvataś cid acchā vasur dhīnām avitā kārudhāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9555: RV_6,044.16a idaṃ tyat pātram indrapānam indrasya priyam amṛtam apāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9556: RV_6,044.16c matsad yathā saumanasāya devaṃ vy asmad dveṣo yuyavad vy aṃhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9557: RV_6,044.17a enā mandāno jahi śūra śatrūñ jāmim ajāmim maghavann amitrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9558: RV_6,044.17c abhiṣeṇāṃ abhy ādediśānān parāca indra pra mṛṇā jahī ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9559: RV_6,044.18a āsu ṣmā ṇo maghavann indra pṛtsv asmabhyam mahi varivaḥ sugaṃ kaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9560: RV_6,044.18c apāṃ tokasya tanayasya jeṣa indra sūrīn kṛṇuhi smā no ardham //
GV01rvh1-10u:9561: RV_6,044.19a ā tvā harayo vṛṣaṇo yujānā vṛṣarathāso vṛṣaraśmayo 'tyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9562: RV_6,044.19c asmatrāñco vṛṣaṇo vajravāho vṛṣṇe madāya suyujo vahantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9563: RV_6,044.20a ā te vṛṣan vṛṣaṇo droṇam asthur ghṛtapruṣo normayo madantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9564: RV_6,044.20c indra pra tubhyaṃ vṛṣabhiḥ sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe bharanti vṛṣabhāya somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9565: RV_6,044.21a vṛṣāsi divo vṛṣabhaḥ pṛthivyā vṛṣā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9566: RV_6,044.21c vṛṣṇe ta indur vṛṣabha pīpāya svādū raso madhupeyo varāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9567: RV_6,044.22a ayaṃ devaḥ sahasā jāyamāna indreṇa yujā paṇim astabhāyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9568: RV_6,044.22c ayaṃ svasya pitur āyudhānīndur amuṣṇād aśivasya māyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9569: RV_6,044.23a ayam akṛṇod uṣasaḥ supatnīr ayaṃ sūrye adadhāj jyotir antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9570: RV_6,044.23c ayaṃ tridhātu divi rocaneṣu triteṣu vindad amṛtaṃ nigūḷham //
GV01rvh1-10u:9571: RV_6,044.24a ayaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī vi ṣkabhāyad ayaṃ ratham ayunak saptaraśmim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9572: RV_6,044.24c ayaṃ goṣu śacyā pakvam antaḥ somo dādhāra daśayantram utsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9573: RV_6,045.01a ya ānayat parāvataḥ sunītī turvaśaṃ yadum /
GV01rvh1-10u:9574: RV_6,045.01c indraḥ sa no yuvā sakhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9575: RV_6,045.02a avipre cid vayo dadhad anāśunā cid arvatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9577: RV_6,045.03a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9579: RV_6,045.04a sakhāyo brahmavāhase 'rcata pra ca gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:9580: RV_6,045.04c sa hi naḥ pramatir mahī //
GV01rvh1-10u:9581: RV_6,045.05a tvam ekasya vṛtrahann avitā dvayor asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9583: RV_6,045.06a nayasīd v ati dviṣaḥ kṛṇoṣy ukthaśaṃsinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9585: RV_6,045.07a brahmāṇam brahmavāhasaṃ gīrbhiḥ sakhāyam ṛgmiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9587: RV_6,045.08a yasya viśvāni hastayor ūcur vasūni ni dvitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9589: RV_6,045.09a vi dṛḷhāni cid adrivo janānāṃ śacīpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9591: RV_6,045.10a tam u tvā satya somapā indra vājānām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9593: RV_6,045.11a tam u tvā yaḥ purāsitha yo vā nūnaṃ hite dhane /
GV01rvh1-10u:9595: RV_6,045.12a dhībhir arvadbhir arvato vājāṃ indra śravāyyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9597: RV_6,045.13a abhūr u vīra girvaṇo mahāṃ indra dhane hite /
GV01rvh1-10u:9599: RV_6,045.14a yā ta ūtir amitrahan makṣūjavastamāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9603: RV_6,045.16a ya eka it tam u ṣṭuhi kṛṣṭīnāṃ vicarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9605: RV_6,045.17a yo gṛṇatām id āsithāpir ūtī śivaḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9606: RV_6,045.17c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9607: RV_6,045.18a dhiṣva vajraṃ gabhastyo rakṣohatyāya vajrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9609: RV_6,045.19a pratnaṃ rayīṇāṃ yujaṃ sakhāyaṃ kīricodanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9611: RV_6,045.20a sa hi viśvāni pārthivāṃ eko vasūni patyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9613: RV_6,045.21a sa no niyudbhir ā pṛṇa kāmaṃ vājebhir aśvibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9615: RV_6,045.22a tad vo gāya sute sacā puruhūtāya satvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:9616: RV_6,045.22c śaṃ yad gave na śākine //
GV01rvh1-10u:9617: RV_6,045.23a na ghā vasur ni yamate dānaṃ vājasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9618: RV_6,045.23c yat sīm upa śravad giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9619: RV_6,045.24a kuvitsasya pra hi vrajaṃ gomantaṃ dasyuhā gamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9621: RV_6,045.25a imā u tvā śatakrato 'bhi pra ṇonuvur giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9623: RV_6,045.26a dūṇāśaṃ sakhyaṃ tava gaur asi vīra gavyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9625: RV_6,045.27a sa mandasvā hy andhaso rādhase tanvā mahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9627: RV_6,045.28a imā u tvā sute-sute nakṣante girvaṇo giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9631: RV_6,045.30a asmākam indra bhūtu te stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9633: RV_6,045.31a adhi bṛbuḥ paṇīnāṃ varṣiṣṭhe mūrdhann asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9635: RV_6,045.32a yasya vāyor iva dravad bhadrā rātiḥ sahasriṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:9637: RV_6,045.33a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9639: RV_6,046.01a tvām id dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9640: RV_6,046.01c tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ naras tvāṃ kāṣṭhāsv arvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9641: RV_6,046.02a sa tvaṃ naś citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9642: RV_6,046.02c gām aśvaṃ rathyam indra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9643: RV_6,046.03a yaḥ satrāhā vicarṣaṇir indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9644: RV_6,046.03c sahasramuṣka tuvinṛmṇa satpate bhavā samatsu no vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9645: RV_6,046.04a bādhase janān vṛṣabheva manyunā ghṛṣau mīḷha ṛcīṣama /
GV01rvh1-10u:9646: RV_6,046.04c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane tanūṣv apsu sūrye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9647: RV_6,046.05a indra jyeṣṭhaṃ na ā bharaṃ ojiṣṭham papuri śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9648: RV_6,046.05c yeneme citra vajrahasta rodasī obhe suśipra prāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9649: RV_6,046.06a tvām ugram avase carṣaṇīsahaṃ rājan deveṣu hūmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9650: RV_6,046.06c viśvā su no vithurā pibdanā vaso 'mitrān suṣahān kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9651: RV_6,046.07a yad indra nāhuṣīṣv āṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ ca kṛṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:9652: RV_6,046.07c yad vā pañca kṣitīnāṃ dyumnam ā bhara satrā viśvāni pauṃsyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9653: RV_6,046.08a yad vā tṛkṣau maghavan druhyāv ā jane yat pūrau kac ca vṛṣṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9654: RV_6,046.08c asmabhyaṃ tad rirīhi saṃ nṛṣāhye 'mitrān pṛtsu turvaṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9655: RV_6,046.09a indra tridhātu śaraṇaṃ trivarūthaṃ svastimat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9656: RV_6,046.09c chardir yaccha maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca yāvayā didyum ebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9657: RV_6,046.10a ye gavyatā manasā śatrum ādabhur abhipraghnanti dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9658: RV_6,046.10c adha smā no maghavann indra girvaṇas tanūpā antamo bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:9659: RV_6,046.11a adha smā no vṛdhe bhavendra nāyam avā yudhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9660: RV_6,046.11c yad antarikṣe patayanti parṇino didyavas tigmamūrdhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9661: RV_6,046.12a yatra śūrāsas tanvo vitanvate priyā śarma pitṝṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9662: RV_6,046.12c adha smā yaccha tanve tane ca chardir acittaṃ yāvaya dveṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9663: RV_6,046.13a yad indra sarge arvataś codayāse mahādhane /
GV01rvh1-10u:9664: RV_6,046.13c asamane adhvani vṛjine pathi śyenāṃ iva śravasyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9665: RV_6,046.14a sindhūṃr iva pravaṇa āśuyā yato yadi klośam anu ṣvaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9666: RV_6,046.14c ā ye vayo na varvṛtaty āmiṣi gṛbhītā bāhvor gavi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9667: RV_6,047.01a svāduṣ kilāyam madhumāṃ utāyaṃ tīvraḥ kilāyaṃ rasavāṃ utāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9668: RV_6,047.01c uto nv asya papivāṃsam indraṃ na kaś cana sahata āhaveṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9669: RV_6,047.02a ayaṃ svādur iha madiṣṭha āsa yasyendro vṛtrahatye mamāda /
GV01rvh1-10u:9670: RV_6,047.02c purūṇi yaś cyautnā śambarasya vi navatiṃ nava ca dehyo han //
GV01rvh1-10u:9671: RV_6,047.03a ayam me pīta ud iyarti vācam ayam manīṣām uśatīm ajīgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9672: RV_6,047.03c ayaṃ ṣaḷ urvīr amimīta dhīro na yābhyo bhuvanaṃ kac canāre //
GV01rvh1-10u:9673: RV_6,047.04a ayaṃ sa yo varimāṇam pṛthivyā varṣmāṇaṃ divo akṛṇod ayaṃ saḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9674: RV_6,047.04c ayam pīyūṣaṃ tisṛṣu pravatsu somo dādhārorv antarikṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9675: RV_6,047.05a ayaṃ vidac citradṛśīkam arṇaḥ śukrasadmanām uṣasām anīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:9676: RV_6,047.05c ayam mahān mahatā skambhanenod dyām astabhnād vṛṣabho marutvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9677: RV_6,047.06a dhṛṣat piba kalaśe somam indra vṛtrahā śūra samare vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9678: RV_6,047.06c mādhyandine savana ā vṛṣasva rayisthāno rayim asmāsu dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9679: RV_6,047.07a indra pra ṇaḥ puraeteva paśya pra no naya prataraṃ vasyo accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9680: RV_6,047.07c bhavā supāro atipārayo no bhavā sunītir uta vāmanītiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9681: RV_6,047.08a uruṃ no lokam anu neṣi vidvān svarvaj jyotir abhayaṃ svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9682: RV_6,047.08c ṛṣvā ta indra sthavirasya bāhū upa stheyāma śaraṇā bṛhantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9683: RV_6,047.09a variṣṭhe na indra vandhure dhā vahiṣṭhayoḥ śatāvann aśvayor ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9684: RV_6,047.09c iṣam ā vakṣīṣāṃ varṣiṣṭhām mā nas tārīn maghavan rāyo aryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9685: RV_6,047.10a indra mṛḷa mahyaṃ jīvātum iccha codaya dhiyam ayaso na dhārām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9686: RV_6,047.10c yat kiṃ cāhaṃ tvāyur idaṃ vadāmi taj juṣasva kṛdhi mā devavantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9687: RV_6,047.11a trātāram indram avitāram indraṃ have-have suhavaṃ śūram indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:9688: RV_6,047.11c hvayāmi śakram puruhūtam indraṃ svasti no maghavā dhātv indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9689: RV_6,047.12a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9690: RV_6,047.12c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:9691: RV_6,047.13a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9692: RV_6,047.13c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9693: RV_6,047.14a ava tve indra pravato normir giro brahmāṇi niyuto dhavante /
GV01rvh1-10u:9694: RV_6,047.14c urū na rādhaḥ savanā purūṇy apo gā vajrin yuvase sam indūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9695: RV_6,047.15a ka īṃ stavat kaḥ pṛṇāt ko yajāte yad ugram in maghavā viśvahāvet /
GV01rvh1-10u:9696: RV_6,047.15c pādāv iva praharann anyam-anyaṃ kṛṇoti pūrvam aparaṃ śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9697: RV_6,047.16a śṛṇve vīra ugram-ugraṃ damāyann anyam-anyam atinenīyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9698: RV_6,047.16c edhamānadviḷ ubhayasya rājā coṣkūyate viśa indro manuṣyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9699: RV_6,047.17a parā pūrveṣāṃ sakhyā vṛṇakti vitarturāṇo aparebhir eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9700: RV_6,047.17c anānubhūtīr avadhūnvānaḥ pūrvīr indraḥ śaradas tartarīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:9701: RV_6,047.18a rūpaṃ-rūpam pratirūpo babhūva tad asya rūpam praticakṣaṇāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9702: RV_6,047.18c indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hy asya harayaḥ śatā daśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:9703: RV_6,047.19a yujāno haritā rathe bhūri tvaṣṭeha rājati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9704: RV_6,047.19c ko viśvāhā dviṣataḥ pakṣa āsata utāsīneṣu sūriṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9705: RV_6,047.20a agavyūti kṣetram āganma devā urvī satī bhūmir aṃhūraṇābhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9706: RV_6,047.20c bṛhaspate pra cikitsā gaviṣṭāv itthā sate jaritra indra panthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9707: RV_6,047.21a dive-dive sadṛśīr anyam ardhaṃ kṛṣṇā asedhad apa sadmano jāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9708: RV_6,047.21c ahan dāsā vṛṣabho vasnayantodavraje varcinaṃ śambaraṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9709: RV_6,047.22a prastoka in nu rādhasas ta indra daśa kośayīr daśa vājino 'dāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9710: RV_6,047.22c divodāsād atithigvasya rādhaḥ śāmbaraṃ vasu praty agrabhīṣma //
GV01rvh1-10u:9711: RV_6,047.23a daśāśvān daśa kośān daśa vastrādhibhojanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9713: RV_6,047.24a daśa rathān praṣṭimataḥ śataṃ gā atharvabhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9715: RV_6,047.25a mahi rādho viśvajanyaṃ dadhānān bharadvājān sārñjayo abhy ayaṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:9716: RV_6,047.26a vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9717: RV_6,047.26c gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḷayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni //
