GV01rvh1-10u:9718: RV_6,047.27a divas pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtaṃ sahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9719: RV_6,047.27c apām ojmānam pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajraṃ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja //
GV01rvh1-10u:9720: RV_6,047.28a indrasya vajro marutām anīkam mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9721: RV_6,047.28c semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9722: RV_6,047.29a upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
GV01rvh1-10u:9723: RV_6,047.29c sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:9724: RV_6,047.30a ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9725: RV_6,047.30c apa protha dundubhe ducchunā ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḷayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9726: RV_6,047.31a āmūr aja pratyāvartayemāḥ ketumad dundubhir vāvadīti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9727: RV_6,047.31c sam aśvaparṇāś caranti no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9728: RV_6,048.01a yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase /
GV01rvh1-10u:9729: RV_6,048.01c pra-pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasam priyam mitraṃ na śaṃsiṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9730: RV_6,048.02a ūrjo napātaṃ sa hināyam asmayur dāśema havyadātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9731: RV_6,048.02c bhuvad vājeṣv avitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:9732: RV_6,048.03a vṛṣā hy agne ajaro mahān vibhāsy arciṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9733: RV_6,048.03c ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucac chuce sudītibhiḥ su dīdihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9734: RV_6,048.04a maho devān yajasi yakṣy ānuṣak tava kratvota daṃsanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9735: RV_6,048.04c arvācaḥ sīṃ kṛṇuhy agne 'vase rāsva vājota vaṃsva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9736: RV_6,048.05a yam āpo adrayo vanā garbham ṛtasya piprati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9737: RV_6,048.05c sahasā yo mathito jāyate nṛbhiḥ pṛthivyā adhi sānavi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9738: RV_6,048.06a ā yaḥ paprau bhānunā rodasī ubhe dhūmena dhāvate divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9739: RV_6,048.06c tiras tamo dadṛśa ūrmyāsv ā śyāvāsv aruṣo vṛṣā śyāvā aruṣo vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9740: RV_6,048.07a bṛhadbhir agne arcibhiḥ śukreṇa deva śociṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9741: RV_6,048.07c bharadvāje samidhāno yaviṣṭhya revan naḥ śukra dīdihi dyumat pāvaka dīdihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9742: RV_6,048.08a viśvāsāṃ gṛhapatir viśām asi tvam agne mānuṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9743: RV_6,048.08c śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭha pāhy aṃhasaḥ sameddhāraṃ śataṃ himā stotṛbhyo ye ca dadati //
GV01rvh1-10u:9744: RV_6,048.09a tvaṃ naś citra ūtyā vaso rādhāṃsi codaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9745: RV_6,048.09c asya rāyas tvam agne rathīr asi vidā gādhaṃ tuce tu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9746: RV_6,048.10a parṣi tokaṃ tanayam partṛbhiṣ ṭvam adabdhair aprayutvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9747: RV_6,048.10c agne heḷāṃsi daivyā yuyodhi no 'devāni hvarāṃsi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9748: RV_6,048.11a ā sakhāyaḥ sabardughāṃ dhenum ajadhvam upa navyasā vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9750: RV_6,048.12a yā śardhāya mārutāya svabhānave śravo 'mṛtyu dhukṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:9751: RV_6,048.12c yā mṛḷīke marutāṃ turāṇāṃ yā sumnair evayāvarī //
GV01rvh1-10u:9753: RV_6,048.13b dhenuṃ ca viśvadohasam iṣaṃ ca viśvabhojasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9754: RV_6,048.14a taṃ va indraṃ na sukratuṃ varuṇam iva māyinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9755: RV_6,048.14c aryamaṇaṃ na mandraṃ sṛprabhojasaṃ viṣṇuṃ na stuṣa ādiśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9756: RV_6,048.15a tveṣaṃ śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇy anarvāṇam pūṣaṇaṃ saṃ yathā śatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9757: RV_6,048.15c saṃ sahasrā kāriṣac carṣaṇibhya āṃ āvir gūḷhā vasū karat suvedā no vasū karat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9758: RV_6,048.16a ā mā pūṣann upa drava śaṃsiṣaṃ nu te apikarṇa āghṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9760: RV_6,048.17a mā kākambīram ud vṛho vanaspatim aśastīr vi hi nīnaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9761: RV_6,048.17c mota sūro aha evā cana grīvā ādadhate veḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9762: RV_6,048.18a dṛter iva te 'vṛkam astu sakhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9764: RV_6,048.19a paro hi martyair asi samo devair uta śriyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9765: RV_6,048.19c abhi khyaḥ pūṣan pṛtanāsu nas tvam avā nūnaṃ yathā purā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9766: RV_6,048.20a vāmī vāmasya dhūtayaḥ praṇītir astu sūnṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9767: RV_6,048.20c devasya vā maruto martyasya vejānasya prayajyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9768: RV_6,048.21a sadyaś cid yasya carkṛtiḥ pari dyāṃ devo naiti sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9769: RV_6,048.21c tveṣaṃ śavo dadhire nāma yajñiyam maruto vṛtrahaṃ śavo jyeṣṭhaṃ vṛtrahaṃ śavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9770: RV_6,048.22a sakṛd dha dyaur ajāyata sakṛd bhūmir ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:9771: RV_6,048.22c pṛśnyā dugdhaṃ sakṛt payas tad anyo nānu jāyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:9772: RV_6,049.01a stuṣe janaṃ suvrataṃ navyasībhir gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā sumnayantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9773: RV_6,049.01c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantu sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9774: RV_6,049.02a viśo-viśa īḍyam adhvareṣv adṛptakratum aratiṃ yuvatyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9775: RV_6,049.02c divaḥ śiśuṃ sahasaḥ sūnum agniṃ yajñasya ketum aruṣaṃ yajadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:9776: RV_6,049.03a aruṣasya duhitarā virūpe stṛbhir anyā pipiśe sūro anyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9777: RV_6,049.03c mithasturā vicarantī pāvake manma śrutaṃ nakṣata ṛcyamāne //
GV01rvh1-10u:9778: RV_6,049.04a pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāraṃ rathaprām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9779: RV_6,049.04c dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo //
GV01rvh1-10u:9780: RV_6,049.05a sa me vapuś chadayad aśvinor yo ratho virukmān manasā yujānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9781: RV_6,049.05c yena narā nāsatyeṣayadhyai vartir yāthas tanayāya tmane ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9782: RV_6,049.06a parjanyavātā vṛṣabhā pṛthivyāḥ purīṣāṇi jinvatam apyāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:9783: RV_6,049.06c satyaśrutaḥ kavayo yasya gīrbhir jagata sthātar jagad ā kṛṇudhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9784: RV_6,049.07a pāvīravī kanyā citrāyuḥ sarasvatī vīrapatnī dhiyaṃ dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9785: RV_6,049.07c gnābhir acchidraṃ śaraṇaṃ sajoṣā durādharṣaṃ gṛṇate śarma yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9786: RV_6,049.08a pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhy ānaḷ arkam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9787: RV_6,049.08c sa no rāsac churudhaś candrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9788: RV_6,049.09a prathamabhājaṃ yaśasaṃ vayodhāṃ supāṇiṃ devaṃ sugabhastim ṛbhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9789: RV_6,049.09c hotā yakṣad yajatam pastyānām agnis tvaṣṭāraṃ suhavaṃ vibhāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9790: RV_6,049.10a bhuvanasya pitaraṃ gīrbhir ābhī rudraṃ divā vardhayā rudram aktau /
GV01rvh1-10u:9791: RV_6,049.10c bṛhantam ṛṣvam ajaraṃ suṣumnam ṛdhag ghuvema kavineṣitāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9792: RV_6,049.11a ā yuvānaḥ kavayo yajñiyāso maruto ganta gṛṇato varasyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9793: RV_6,049.11c acitraṃ cid dhi jinvathā vṛdhanta itthā nakṣanto naro aṅgirasvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:9794: RV_6,049.12a pra vīrāya pra tavase turāyājā yūtheva paśurakṣir astam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9795: RV_6,049.12c sa pispṛśati tanvi śrutasya stṛbhir na nākaṃ vacanasya vipaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9796: RV_6,049.13a yo rajāṃsi vimame pārthivāni triś cid viṣṇur manave bādhitāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9797: RV_6,049.13c tasya te śarmann upadadyamāne rāyā madema tanvā tanā ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9798: RV_6,049.14a tan no 'hir budhnyo adbhir arkais tat parvatas tat savitā cano dhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9799: RV_6,049.14c tad oṣadhībhir abhi rātiṣāco bhagaḥ purandhir jinvatu pra rāye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9800: RV_6,049.15a nu no rayiṃ rathyaṃ carṣaṇiprām puruvīram maha ṛtasya gopām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9801: RV_6,049.15c kṣayaṃ dātājaraṃ yena janān spṛdho adevīr abhi ca kramāma viśa ādevīr abhy aśnavāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:9802: RV_6,050.01a huve vo devīm aditiṃ namobhir mṛḷīkāya varuṇam mitram agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:9803: RV_6,050.01c abhikṣadām aryamaṇaṃ suśevaṃ trātṝn devān savitāram bhagaṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:9804: RV_6,050.02a sujyotiṣaḥ sūrya dakṣapitṝn anāgāstve sumaho vīhi devān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9805: RV_6,050.02c dvijanmāno ya ṛtasāpaḥ satyāḥ svarvanto yajatā agnijihvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9806: RV_6,050.03a uta dyāvāpṛthivī kṣatram uru bṛhad rodasī śaraṇaṃ suṣumne /
GV01rvh1-10u:9807: RV_6,050.03c mahas karatho varivo yathā no 'sme kṣayāya dhiṣaṇe anehaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9808: RV_6,050.04a ā no rudrasya sūnavo namantām adyā hūtāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9809: RV_6,050.04c yad īm arbhe mahati vā hitāso bādhe maruto ahvāma devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9810: RV_6,050.05a mimyakṣa yeṣu rodasī nu devī siṣakti pūṣā abhyardhayajvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9811: RV_6,050.05c śrutvā havam maruto yad dha yātha bhūmā rejante adhvani pravikte //
GV01rvh1-10u:9812: RV_6,050.06a abhi tyaṃ vīraṃ girvaṇasam arcendram brahmaṇā jaritar navena /
GV01rvh1-10u:9813: RV_6,050.06c śravad id dhavam upa ca stavāno rāsad vājāṃ upa maho gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9814: RV_6,050.07a omānam āpo mānuṣīr amṛktaṃ dhāta tokāya tanayāya śaṃ yoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9815: RV_6,050.07c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā bhiṣajo mātṛtamā viśvasya sthātur jagato janitrīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9816: RV_6,050.08a ā no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇo hiraṇyapāṇir yajato jagamyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9817: RV_6,050.08c yo datravāṃ uṣaso na pratīkaṃ vyūrṇute dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9818: RV_6,050.09a uta tvaṃ sūno sahaso no adyā devāṃ asminn adhvare vavṛtyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9819: RV_6,050.09c syām ahaṃ te sadam id rātau tava syām agne 'vasā suvīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9820: RV_6,050.10a uta tyā me havam ā jagmyātaṃ nāsatyā dhībhir yuvam aṅga viprā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9821: RV_6,050.10c atriṃ na mahas tamaso 'mumuktaṃ tūrvataṃ narā duritād abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:9822: RV_6,050.11a te no rāyo dyumato vājavato dātāro bhūta nṛvataḥ purukṣoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9823: RV_6,050.11c daśasyanto divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā apyā mṛḷatā ca devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9824: RV_6,050.12a te no rudraḥ sarasvatī sajoṣā mīḷhuṣmanto viṣṇur mṛḷantu vāyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9825: RV_6,050.12c ṛbhukṣā vājo daivyo vidhātā parjanyāvātā pipyatām iṣaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9826: RV_6,050.13a uta sya devaḥ savitā bhago no 'pāṃ napād avatu dānu papriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9827: RV_6,050.13c tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ sajoṣā dyaur devebhiḥ pṛthivī samudraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9828: RV_6,050.14a uta no 'hir budhnyaḥ śṛṇotv aja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9829: RV_6,050.14c viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9830: RV_6,050.15a evā napāto mama tasya dhībhir bharadvājā abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9831: RV_6,050.15c gnā hutāso vasavo 'dhṛṣṭā viśve stutāso bhūtā yajatrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9832: RV_6,051.01a ud u tyac cakṣur mahi mitrayor āṃ eti priyaṃ varuṇayor adabdham /
GV01rvh1-10u:9833: RV_6,051.01c ṛtasya śuci darśatam anīkaṃ rukmo na diva uditā vy adyaut //
GV01rvh1-10u:9834: RV_6,051.02a veda yas trīṇi vidathāny eṣāṃ devānāṃ janma sanutar ā ca vipraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9835: RV_6,051.02c ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyann abhi caṣṭe sūro arya evān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9836: RV_6,051.03a stuṣa u vo maha ṛtasya gopān aditim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sujātān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9837: RV_6,051.03c aryamaṇam bhagam adabdhadhītīn acchā voce sadhanyaḥ pāvakān //
GV01rvh1-10u:9838: RV_6,051.04a riśādasaḥ satpatīṃr adabdhān maho rājñaḥ suvasanasya dātṝn /
GV01rvh1-10u:9839: RV_6,051.04c yūnaḥ sukṣatrān kṣayato divo nṝn ādityān yāmy aditiṃ duvoyu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9840: RV_6,051.05a dyauṣ pitaḥ pṛthivi mātar adhrug agne bhrātar vasavo mṛḷatā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9841: RV_6,051.05c viśva ādityā adite sajoṣā asmabhyaṃ śarma bahulaṃ vi yanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:9842: RV_6,051.06a mā no vṛkāya vṛkye samasmā aghāyate rīradhatā yajatrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9843: RV_6,051.06c yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā rathyo nas tanūnāṃ yūyaṃ dakṣasya vacaso babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9844: RV_6,051.07a mā va eno anyakṛtam bhujema mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve /
GV01rvh1-10u:9845: RV_6,051.07c viśvasya hi kṣayatha viśvadevāḥ svayaṃ ripus tanvaṃ rīriṣīṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:9846: RV_6,051.08a nama id ugraṃ nama ā vivāse namo dādhāra pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:9847: RV_6,051.08c namo devebhyo nama īśa eṣāṃ kṛtaṃ cid eno namasā vivāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:9848: RV_6,051.09a ṛtasya vo rathyaḥ pūtadakṣān ṛtasya pastyasado adabdhān /
GV01rvh1-10u:9849: RV_6,051.09c tāṃ ā namobhir urucakṣaso nṝn viśvān va ā name maho yajatrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9850: RV_6,051.10a te hi śreṣṭhavarcasas ta u nas tiro viśvāni duritā nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9851: RV_6,051.10c sukṣatrāso varuṇo mitro agnir ṛtadhītayo vakmarājasatyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9852: RV_6,051.11a te na indraḥ pṛthivī kṣāma vardhan pūṣā bhago aditiḥ pañca janāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9853: RV_6,051.11c suśarmāṇaḥ svavasaḥ sunīthā bhavantu naḥ sutrātrāsaḥ sugopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9854: RV_6,051.12a nū sadmānaṃ divyaṃ naṃśi devā bhāradvājaḥ sumatiṃ yāti hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9855: RV_6,051.12c āsānebhir yajamāno miyedhair devānāṃ janma vasūyur vavanda //
GV01rvh1-10u:9856: RV_6,051.13a apa tyaṃ vṛjinaṃ ripuṃ stenam agne durādhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9857: RV_6,051.13c daviṣṭham asya satpate kṛdhī sugam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9858: RV_6,051.14a grāvāṇaḥ soma no hi kaṃ sakhitvanāya vāvaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9859: RV_6,051.14c jahī ny atriṇam paṇiṃ vṛko hi ṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9860: RV_6,051.15a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9861: RV_6,051.15c kartā no adhvann ā sugaṃ gopā amā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9862: RV_6,051.16a api panthām aganmahi svastigām anehasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9863: RV_6,051.16c yena viśvāḥ pari dviṣo vṛṇakti vindate vasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9864: RV_6,052.01a na tad divā na pṛthivyānu manye na yajñena nota śamībhir ābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9865: RV_6,052.01c ubjantu taṃ subhvaḥ parvatāso ni hīyatām atiyājasya yaṣṭā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9866: RV_6,052.02a ati vā yo maruto manyate no brahma vā yaḥ kriyamāṇaṃ ninitsāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:9867: RV_6,052.02c tapūṃṣi tasmai vṛjināni santu brahmadviṣam abhi taṃ śocatu dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9868: RV_6,052.03a kim aṅga tvā brahmaṇaḥ soma gopāṃ kim aṅga tvāhur abhiśastipāṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9869: RV_6,052.03c kim aṅga naḥ paśyasi nidyamānān brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetim asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9870: RV_6,052.04a avantu mām uṣaso jāyamānā avantu mā sindhavaḥ pinvamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9871: RV_6,052.04c avantu mā parvatāso dhruvāso 'vantu mā pitaro devahūtau //
GV01rvh1-10u:9872: RV_6,052.05a viśvadānīṃ sumanasaḥ syāma paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9873: RV_6,052.05c tathā karad vasupatir vasūnāṃ devāṃ ohāno 'vasāgamiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9874: RV_6,052.06a indro nediṣṭham avasāgamiṣṭhaḥ sarasvatī sindhubhiḥ pinvamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9875: RV_6,052.06c parjanyo na oṣadhībhir mayobhur agniḥ suśaṃsaḥ suhavaḥ piteva //
GV01rvh1-10u:9876: RV_6,052.07a viśve devāsa ā gata śṛṇutā ma imaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9878: RV_6,052.08a yo vo devā ghṛtasnunā havyena pratibhūṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9880: RV_6,052.09a upa naḥ sūnavo giraḥ śṛṇvantv amṛtasya ye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9882: RV_6,052.10a viśve devā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtubhir havanaśrutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9884: RV_6,052.11a stotram indro marudgaṇas tvaṣṭṛmān mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9886: RV_6,052.12a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ hotar vayunaśo yaja /
GV01rvh1-10u:9888: RV_6,052.13a viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemaṃ havam me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:9889: RV_6,052.13c ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9890: RV_6,052.14a viśve devā mama śṛṇvantu yajñiyā ubhe rodasī apāṃ napāc ca manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:9891: RV_6,052.14c mā vo vacāṃsi paricakṣyāṇi vocaṃ sumneṣv id vo antamā madema //
GV01rvh1-10u:9892: RV_6,052.15a ye ke ca jmā mahino ahimāyā divo jajñire apāṃ sadhasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9893: RV_6,052.15c te asmabhyam iṣaye viśvam āyuḥ kṣapa usrā varivasyantu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9894: RV_6,052.16a agnīparjanyāv avataṃ dhiyam me 'smin have suhavā suṣṭutiṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9895: RV_6,052.16c iḷām anyo janayad garbham anyaḥ prajāvatīr iṣa ā dhattam asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:9896: RV_6,052.17a stīrṇe barhiṣi samidhāne agnau sūktena mahā namasā vivāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:9897: RV_6,052.17c asmin no adya vidathe yajatrā viśve devā haviṣi mādayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9898: RV_6,053.01a vayam u tvā pathas pate rathaṃ na vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9900: RV_6,053.02a abhi no naryaṃ vasu vīram prayatadakṣiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9902: RV_6,053.03a aditsantaṃ cid āghṛṇe pūṣan dānāya codaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:9903: RV_6,053.03c paṇeś cid vi mradā manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9904: RV_6,053.04a vi patho vājasātaye cinuhi vi mṛdho jahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9906: RV_6,053.05a pari tṛndhi paṇīnām ārayā hṛdayā kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:9908: RV_6,053.06a vi pūṣann ārayā tuda paṇer iccha hṛdi priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9910: RV_6,053.07a ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu paṇīnāṃ hṛdayā kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:9912: RV_6,053.08a yām pūṣan brahmacodanīm ārām bibharṣy āghṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9913: RV_6,053.08c tayā samasya hṛdayam ā rikha kikirā kṛṇu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9914: RV_6,053.09a yā te aṣṭrā goopaśāghṛṇe paśusādhanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:9916: RV_6,053.10a uta no goṣaṇiṃ dhiyam aśvasāṃ vājasām uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:9918: RV_6,054.01a sam pūṣan viduṣā naya yo añjasānuśāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9920: RV_6,054.02a sam u pūṣṇā gamemahi yo gṛhāṃ abhiśāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9922: RV_6,054.03a pūṣṇaś cakraṃ na riṣyati na kośo 'va padyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9924: RV_6,054.04a yo asmai haviṣāvidhan na tam pūṣāpi mṛṣyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:9926: RV_6,054.05a pūṣā gā anv etu naḥ pūṣā rakṣatv arvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9928: RV_6,054.06a pūṣann anu pra gā ihi yajamānasya sunvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9930: RV_6,054.07a mākir neśan mākīṃ riṣan mākīṃ saṃ śāri kevaṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:9932: RV_6,054.08a śṛṇvantam pūṣaṇaṃ vayam iryam anaṣṭavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9934: RV_6,054.09a pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:9936: RV_6,054.10a pari pūṣā parastād dhastaṃ dadhātu dakṣiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9938: RV_6,055.01a ehi vāṃ vimuco napād āghṛṇe saṃ sacāvahai /
GV01rvh1-10u:9940: RV_6,055.02a rathītamaṃ kapardinam īśānaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9942: RV_6,055.03a rāyo dhārāsy āghṛṇe vaso rāśir ajāśva /
GV01rvh1-10u:9944: RV_6,055.04a pūṣaṇaṃ nv ajāśvam upa stoṣāma vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9946: RV_6,055.05a mātur didhiṣum abravaṃ svasur jāraḥ śṛṇotu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9948: RV_6,055.06a ājāsaḥ pūṣaṇaṃ rathe niśṛmbhās te janaśriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9950: RV_6,056.01a ya enam ādideśati karambhād iti pūṣaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9952: RV_6,056.02a uta ghā sa rathītamaḥ sakhyā satpatir yujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9954: RV_6,056.03a utādaḥ paruṣe gavi sūraś cakraṃ hiraṇyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9956: RV_6,056.04a yad adya tvā puruṣṭuta bravāma dasra mantumaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9957: RV_6,056.04c tat su no manma sādhaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:9958: RV_6,056.05a imaṃ ca no gaveṣaṇaṃ sātaye sīṣadho gaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9960: RV_6,056.06a ā te svastim īmaha āreaghām upāvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:9961: RV_6,056.06c adyā ca sarvatātaye śvaś ca sarvatātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:9962: RV_6,057.01a indrā nu pūṣaṇā vayaṃ sakhyāya svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:9964: RV_6,057.02a somam anya upāsadat pātave camvoḥ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:9966: RV_6,057.03a ajā anyasya vahnayo harī anyasya sambhṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9968: RV_6,057.04a yad indro anayad rito mahīr apo vṛṣantamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9970: RV_6,057.05a tām pūṣṇaḥ sumatiṃ vayaṃ vṛkṣasya pra vayām iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:9972: RV_6,057.06a ut pūṣaṇaṃ yuvāmahe 'bhīśūṃr iva sārathiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9974: RV_6,058.01a śukraṃ te anyad yajataṃ te anyad viṣurūpe ahanī dyaur ivāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:9975: RV_6,058.01c viśvā hi māyā avasi svadhāvo bhadrā te pūṣann iha rātir astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9976: RV_6,058.02a ajāśvaḥ paśupā vājapastyo dhiyañjinvo bhuvane viśve arpitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9977: RV_6,058.02c aṣṭrām pūṣā śithirām udvarīvṛjat saṃcakṣāṇo bhuvanā deva īyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:9978: RV_6,058.03a yās te pūṣan nāvo antaḥ samudre hiraṇyayīr antarikṣe caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:9979: RV_6,058.03c tābhir yāsi dūtyāṃ sūryasya kāmena kṛta śrava icchamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:9980: RV_6,058.04a pūṣā subandhur diva ā pṛthivyā iḷas patir maghavā dasmavarcāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9981: RV_6,058.04c yaṃ devāso adaduḥ sūryāyai kāmena kṛtaṃ tavasaṃ svañcam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9982: RV_6,059.01a pra nu vocā suteṣu vāṃ vīryā yāni cakrathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9983: RV_6,059.01c hatāso vām pitaro devaśatrava indrāgnī jīvatho yuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:9984: RV_6,059.02a baḷ itthā mahimā vām indrāgnī paniṣṭha ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9985: RV_6,059.02c samāno vāṃ janitā bhrātarā yuvaṃ yamāv ihehamātarā //
GV01rvh1-10u:9986: RV_6,059.03a okivāṃsā sute sacāṃ aśvā saptī ivādane /
GV01rvh1-10u:9987: RV_6,059.03c indrā nv agnī avaseha vajriṇā vayaṃ devā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9988: RV_6,059.04a ya indrāgnī suteṣu vāṃ stavat teṣv ṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9989: RV_6,059.04c joṣavākaṃ vadataḥ pajrahoṣiṇā na devā bhasathaś cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:9990: RV_6,059.05a indrāgnī ko asya vāṃ devau martaś ciketati /
GV01rvh1-10u:9991: RV_6,059.05c viṣūco aśvān yuyujāna īyata ekaḥ samāna ā rathe //
GV01rvh1-10u:9992: RV_6,059.06a indrāgnī apād iyam pūrvāgāt padvatībhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9993: RV_6,059.06c hitvī śiro jihvayā vāvadac carat triṃśat padā ny akramīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:9994: RV_6,059.07a indrāgnī ā hi tanvate naro dhanvāni bāhvoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9995: RV_6,059.07c mā no asmin mahādhane parā varktaṃ gaviṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:9996: RV_6,059.08a indrāgnī tapanti māghā aryo arātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:9997: RV_6,059.08c apa dveṣāṃsy ā kṛtaṃ yuyutaṃ sūryād adhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:9998: RV_6,059.09a indrāgnī yuvor api vasu divyāni pārthivā /
GV01rvh1-10u:9999: RV_6,059.09c ā na iha pra yacchataṃ rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10001: RV_6,059.10c viśvābhir gīrbhir ā gatam asya somasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:10002: RV_6,060.01a śnathad vṛtram uta sanoti vājam indrā yo agnī sahurī saparyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10003: RV_6,060.01c irajyantā vasavyasya bhūreḥ sahastamā sahasā vājayantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10004: RV_6,060.02a tā yodhiṣṭam abhi gā indra nūnam apaḥ svar uṣaso agna ūḷhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10005: RV_6,060.02c diśaḥ svar uṣasa indra citrā apo gā agne yuvase niyutvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10006: RV_6,060.03a ā vṛtrahaṇā vṛtrahabhiḥ śuṣmair indra yātaṃ namobhir agne arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:10007: RV_6,060.03c yuvaṃ rādhobhir akavebhir indrāgne asme bhavatam uttamebhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10008: RV_6,060.04a tā huve yayor idam papne viśvam purā kṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10010: RV_6,060.05a ugrā vighaninā mṛdha indrāgnī havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10012: RV_6,060.06a hato vṛtrāṇy āryā hato dāsāni satpatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10014: RV_6,060.07a indrāgnī yuvām ime 'bhi stomā anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:10016: RV_6,060.08a yā vāṃ santi puruspṛho niyuto dāśuṣe narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10018: RV_6,060.09a tābhir ā gacchataṃ naropedaṃ savanaṃ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10020: RV_6,060.10a tam īḷiṣva yo arciṣā vanā viśvā pariṣvajat /
GV01rvh1-10u:10022: RV_6,060.11a ya iddha āvivāsati sumnam indrasya martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10024: RV_6,060.12a tā no vājavatīr iṣa āśūn pipṛtam arvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10026: RV_6,060.13a ubhā vām indrāgnī āhuvadhyā ubhā rādhasaḥ saha mādayadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10027: RV_6,060.13c ubhā dātārāv iṣāṃ rayīṇām ubhā vājasya sātaye huve vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10028: RV_6,060.14a ā no gavyebhir aśvyair vasavyair upa gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10029: RV_6,060.14c sakhāyau devau sakhyāya śambhuvendrāgnī tā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:10030: RV_6,060.15a indrāgnī śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yajamānasya sunvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10031: RV_6,060.15c vītaṃ havyāny ā gatam pibataṃ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10032: RV_6,061.01a iyam adadād rabhasam ṛṇacyutaṃ divodāsaṃ vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10033: RV_6,061.01c yā śaśvantam ācakhādāvasam paṇiṃ tā te dātrāṇi taviṣā sarasvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:10034: RV_6,061.02a iyaṃ śuṣmebhir bisakhā ivārujat sānu girīṇāṃ taviṣebhir ūrmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10035: RV_6,061.02c pārāvataghnīm avase suvṛktibhiḥ sarasvatīm ā vivāsema dhītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10036: RV_6,061.03a sarasvati devanido ni barhaya prajāṃ viśvasya bṛsayasya māyinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10037: RV_6,061.03c uta kṣitibhyo 'vanīr avindo viṣam ebhyo asravo vājinīvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:10038: RV_6,061.04a pra ṇo devī sarasvatī vājebhir vājinīvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10040: RV_6,061.05a yas tvā devi sarasvaty upabrūte dhane hite /
GV01rvh1-10u:10042: RV_6,061.06a tvaṃ devi sarasvaty avā vājeṣu vājini /
GV01rvh1-10u:10044: RV_6,061.07a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī ghorā hiraṇyavartaniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10046: RV_6,061.08a yasyā ananto ahrutas tveṣaś cariṣṇur arṇavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10048: RV_6,061.09a sā no viśvā ati dviṣaḥ svasṝr anyā ṛtāvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10050: RV_6,061.10a uta naḥ priyā priyāsu saptasvasā sujuṣṭā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10052: RV_6,061.11a āpapruṣī pārthivāny uru rajo antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10054: RV_6,061.12a triṣadhasthā saptadhātuḥ pañca jātā vardhayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10056: RV_6,061.13a pra yā mahimnā mahināsu cekite dyumnebhir anyā apasām apastamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10057: RV_6,061.13c ratha iva bṛhatī vibhvane kṛtopastutyā cikituṣā sarasvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10058: RV_6,061.14a sarasvaty abhi no neṣi vasyo māpa spharīḥ payasā mā na ā dhak /
GV01rvh1-10u:10059: RV_6,061.14c juṣasva naḥ sakhyā veśyā ca mā tvat kṣetrāṇy araṇāni ganma //
GV01rvh1-10u:10060: RV_6,062.01a stuṣe narā divo asya prasantāśvinā huve jaramāṇo arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10061: RV_6,062.01c yā sadya usrā vyuṣi jmo antān yuyūṣataḥ pary urū varāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10062: RV_6,062.02a tā yajñam ā śucibhiś cakramāṇā rathasya bhānuṃ rurucū rajobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10063: RV_6,062.02c purū varāṃsy amitā mimānāpo dhanvāny ati yātho ajrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10064: RV_6,062.03a tā ha tyad vartir yad aradhram ugretthā dhiya ūhathuḥ śaśvad aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10065: RV_6,062.03c manojavebhir iṣiraiḥ śayadhyai pari vyathir dāśuṣo martyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10066: RV_6,062.04a tā navyaso jaramāṇasya manmopa bhūṣato yuyujānasaptī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10067: RV_6,062.04c śubham pṛkṣam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantā hotā yakṣat pratno adhrug yuvānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10068: RV_6,062.05a tā valgū dasrā puruśākatamā pratnā navyasā vacasā vivāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:10069: RV_6,062.05c yā śaṃsate stuvate śambhaviṣṭhā babhūvatur gṛṇate citrarātī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10070: RV_6,062.06a tā bhujyuṃ vibhir adbhyaḥ samudrāt tugrasya sūnum ūhathū rajobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10071: RV_6,062.06c areṇubhir yojanebhir bhujantā patatribhir arṇaso nir upasthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10072: RV_6,062.07a vi jayuṣā rathyā yātam adriṃ śrutaṃ havaṃ vṛṣaṇā vadhrimatyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10073: RV_6,062.07c daśasyantā śayave pipyathur gām iti cyavānā sumatim bhuraṇyū //
GV01rvh1-10u:10074: RV_6,062.08a yad rodasī pradivo asti bhūmā heḷo devānām uta martyatrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10075: RV_6,062.08c tad ādityā vasavo rudriyāso rakṣoyuje tapur aghaṃ dadhāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10076: RV_6,062.09a ya īṃ rājānāv ṛtuthā vidadhad rajaso mitro varuṇaś ciketat /
GV01rvh1-10u:10077: RV_6,062.09c gambhīrāya rakṣase hetim asya droghāya cid vacasa ānavāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10078: RV_6,062.10a antaraiś cakrais tanayāya vartir dyumatā yātaṃ nṛvatā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:10079: RV_6,062.10c sanutyena tyajasā martyasya vanuṣyatām api śīrṣā vavṛktam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10080: RV_6,062.11a ā paramābhir uta madhyamābhir niyudbhir yātam avamābhir arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:10081: RV_6,062.11c dṛḷhasya cid gomato vi vrajasya duro vartaṃ gṛṇate citrarātī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10082: RV_6,063.01a kva tyā valgū puruhūtādya dūto na stomo 'vidan namasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10083: RV_6,063.01c ā yo arvāṅ nāsatyā vavarta preṣṭhā hy asatho asya manman //
GV01rvh1-10u:10084: RV_6,063.02a aram me gantaṃ havanāyāsmai gṛṇānā yathā pibātho andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10085: RV_6,063.02c pari ha tyad vartir yātho riṣo na yat paro nāntaras tuturyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10086: RV_6,063.03a akāri vām andhaso varīmann astāri barhiḥ suprāyaṇatamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10087: RV_6,063.03c uttānahasto yuvayur vavandā vāṃ nakṣanto adraya āñjan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10088: RV_6,063.04a ūrdhvo vām agnir adhvareṣv asthāt pra rātir eti jūrṇinī ghṛtācī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10089: RV_6,063.04c pra hotā gūrtamanā urāṇo 'yukta yo nāsatyā havīman //
GV01rvh1-10u:10090: RV_6,063.05a adhi śriye duhitā sūryasya rathaṃ tasthau purubhujā śatotim /
GV01rvh1-10u:10091: RV_6,063.05c pra māyābhir māyinā bhūtam atra narā nṛtū janiman yajñiyānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10092: RV_6,063.06a yuvaṃ śrībhir darśatābhir ābhiḥ śubhe puṣṭim ūhathuḥ sūryāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10093: RV_6,063.06c pra vāṃ vayo vapuṣe 'nu paptan nakṣad vāṇī suṣṭutā dhiṣṇyā vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10094: RV_6,063.07a ā vāṃ vayo 'śvāso vahiṣṭhā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10095: RV_6,063.07c pra vāṃ ratho manojavā asarjīṣaḥ pṛkṣa iṣidho anu pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10096: RV_6,063.08a puru hi vām purubhujā deṣṇaṃ dhenuṃ na iṣam pinvatam asakrām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10097: RV_6,063.08c stutaś ca vām mādhvī suṣṭutiś ca rasāś ca ye vām anu rātim agman //
GV01rvh1-10u:10098: RV_6,063.09a uta ma ṛjre purayasya raghvī sumīḷhe śatam peruke ca pakvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10099: RV_6,063.09c śāṇḍo dād dhiraṇinaḥ smaddiṣṭīn daśa vaśāso abhiṣāca ṛṣvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10100: RV_6,063.10a saṃ vāṃ śatā nāsatyā sahasrāśvānām purupanthā gire dāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10101: RV_6,063.10c bharadvājāya vīra nū gire dād dhatā rakṣāṃsi purudaṃsasā syuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10102: RV_6,063.11a ā vāṃ sumne variman sūribhiḥ ṣyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10103: RV_6,064.01a ud u śriya uṣaso rocamānā asthur apāṃ normayo ruśantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10104: RV_6,064.01c kṛṇoti viśvā supathā sugāny abhūd u vasvī dakṣiṇā maghonī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10105: RV_6,064.02a bhadrā dadṛkṣa urviyā vi bhāsy ut te śocir bhānavo dyām apaptan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10106: RV_6,064.02c āvir vakṣaḥ kṛṇuṣe śumbhamānoṣo devi rocamānā mahobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10107: RV_6,064.03a vahanti sīm aruṇāso ruśanto gāvaḥ subhagām urviyā prathānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10108: RV_6,064.03c apejate śūro asteva śatrūn bādhate tamo ajiro na voḷhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10109: RV_6,064.04a sugota te supathā parvateṣv avāte apas tarasi svabhāno /
GV01rvh1-10u:10110: RV_6,064.04c sā na ā vaha pṛthuyāmann ṛṣve rayiṃ divo duhitar iṣayadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:10111: RV_6,064.05a sā vaha yokṣabhir avātoṣo varaṃ vahasi joṣam anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10112: RV_6,064.05c tvaṃ divo duhitar yā ha devī pūrvahūtau maṃhanā darśatā bhūḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10113: RV_6,064.06a ut te vayaś cid vasater apaptan naraś ca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10114: RV_6,064.06c amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmam uṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10115: RV_6,065.01a eṣā syā no duhitā divojāḥ kṣitīr ucchantī mānuṣīr ajīgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10116: RV_6,065.01c yā bhānunā ruśatā rāmyāsv ajñāyi tiras tamasaś cid aktūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:10117: RV_6,065.02a vi tad yayur aruṇayugbhir aśvaiś citram bhānty uṣasaś candrarathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10118: RV_6,065.02c agraṃ yajñasya bṛhato nayantīr vi tā bādhante tama ūrmyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10119: RV_6,065.03a śravo vājam iṣam ūrjaṃ vahantīr ni dāśuṣa uṣaso martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10120: RV_6,065.03c maghonīr vīravat patyamānā avo dhāta vidhate ratnam adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10121: RV_6,065.04a idā hi vo vidhate ratnam astīdā vīrāya dāśuṣa uṣāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10122: RV_6,065.04c idā viprāya jarate yad ukthā ni ṣma māvate vahathā purā cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:10123: RV_6,065.05a idā hi ta uṣo adrisāno gotrā gavām aṅgiraso gṛṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10124: RV_6,065.05c vy arkeṇa bibhidur brahmaṇā ca satyā nṛṇām abhavad devahūtiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10125: RV_6,065.06a ucchā divo duhitaḥ pratnavan no bharadvājavad vidhate maghoni /
GV01rvh1-10u:10126: RV_6,065.06c suvīraṃ rayiṃ gṛṇate rirīhy urugāyam adhi dhehi śravo naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10127: RV_6,066.01a vapur nu tac cikituṣe cid astu samānaṃ nāma dhenu patyamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10128: RV_6,066.01c marteṣv anyad dohase pīpāya sakṛc chukraṃ duduhe pṛśnir ūdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10129: RV_6,066.02a ye agnayo na śośucann idhānā dvir yat trir maruto vāvṛdhanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:10130: RV_6,066.02c areṇavo hiraṇyayāsa eṣāṃ sākaṃ nṛmṇaiḥ pauṃsyebhiś ca bhūvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10131: RV_6,066.03a rudrasya ye mīḷhuṣaḥ santi putrā yāṃś co nu dādhṛvir bharadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10132: RV_6,066.03c vide hi mātā maho mahī ṣā set pṛśniḥ subhve garbham ādhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10133: RV_6,066.04a na ya īṣante januṣo 'yā nv antaḥ santo 'vadyāni punānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10134: RV_6,066.04c nir yad duhre śucayo 'nu joṣam anu śriyā tanvam ukṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10135: RV_6,066.05a makṣū na yeṣu dohase cid ayā ā nāma dhṛṣṇu mārutaṃ dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10136: RV_6,066.05c na ye staunā ayāso mahnā nū cit sudānur ava yāsad ugrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10137: RV_6,066.06a ta id ugrāḥ śavasā dhṛṣṇuṣeṇā ubhe yujanta rodasī sumeke /
GV01rvh1-10u:10138: RV_6,066.06c adha smaiṣu rodasī svaśocir āmavatsu tasthau na rokaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10139: RV_6,066.07a aneno vo maruto yāmo astv anaśvaś cid yam ajaty arathīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10140: RV_6,066.07c anavaso anabhīśū rajastūr vi rodasī pathyā yāti sādhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10141: RV_6,066.08a nāsya vartā na tarutā nv asti maruto yam avatha vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10142: RV_6,066.08c toke vā goṣu tanaye yam apsu sa vrajaṃ dartā pārye adha dyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10143: RV_6,066.09a pra citram arkaṃ gṛṇate turāya mārutāya svatavase bharadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10144: RV_6,066.09c ye sahāṃsi sahasā sahante rejate agne pṛthivī makhebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10145: RV_6,066.10a tviṣīmanto adhvarasyeva didyut tṛṣucyavaso juhvo nāgneḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10146: RV_6,066.10c arcatrayo dhunayo na vīrā bhrājajjanmāno maruto adhṛṣṭāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10147: RV_6,066.11a taṃ vṛdhantam mārutam bhrājadṛṣṭiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā vivāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:10148: RV_6,066.11c divaḥ śardhāya śucayo manīṣā girayo nāpa ugrā aspṛdhran //
GV01rvh1-10u:10149: RV_6,067.01a viśveṣāṃ vaḥ satāṃ jyeṣṭhatamā gīrbhir mitrāvaruṇā vāvṛdhadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10150: RV_6,067.01c saṃ yā raśmeva yamatur yamiṣṭhā dvā janāṃ asamā bāhubhiḥ svaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10151: RV_6,067.02a iyam mad vām pra stṛṇīte manīṣopa priyā namasā barhir accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10152: RV_6,067.02c yantaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv adhṛṣṭaṃ chardir yad vāṃ varūthyaṃ sudānū //
GV01rvh1-10u:10153: RV_6,067.03a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā suśasty upa priyā namasā hūyamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10154: RV_6,067.03c saṃ yāv apnastho apaseva janāñ chrudhīyataś cid yatatho mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10155: RV_6,067.04a aśvā na yā vājinā pūtabandhū ṛtā yad garbham aditir bharadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10156: RV_6,067.04c pra yā mahi mahāntā jāyamānā ghorā martāya ripave ni dīdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10157: RV_6,067.05a viśve yad vām maṃhanā mandamānāḥ kṣatraṃ devāso adadhuḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10158: RV_6,067.05c pari yad bhūtho rodasī cid urvī santi spaśo adabdhāso amūrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10159: RV_6,067.06a tā hi kṣatraṃ dhārayethe anu dyūn dṛṃhethe sānum upamād iva dyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10160: RV_6,067.06c dṛḷho nakṣatra uta viśvadevo bhūmim ātān dyāṃ dhāsināyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10161: RV_6,067.07a tā vigraṃ dhaithe jaṭharam pṛṇadhyā ā yat sadma sabhṛtayaḥ pṛṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10162: RV_6,067.07c na mṛṣyante yuvatayo 'vātā vi yat payo viśvajinvā bharante //
GV01rvh1-10u:10163: RV_6,067.08a tā jihvayā sadam edaṃ sumedhā ā yad vāṃ satyo aratir ṛte bhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10164: RV_6,067.08c tad vām mahitvaṃ ghṛtānnāv astu yuvaṃ dāśuṣe vi cayiṣṭam aṃhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10165: RV_6,067.09a pra yad vām mitrāvaruṇā spūrdhan priyā dhāma yuvadhitā minanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10166: RV_6,067.09c na ye devāsa ohasā na martā ayajñasāco apyo na putrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10167: RV_6,067.10a vi yad vācaṃ kīstāso bharante śaṃsanti ke cin nivido manānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10168: RV_6,067.10c ād vām bravāma satyāny ukthā nakir devebhir yatatho mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10169: RV_6,067.11a avor itthā vāṃ chardiṣo abhiṣṭau yuvor mitrāvaruṇāv askṛdhoyu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10170: RV_6,067.11c anu yad gāva sphurān ṛjipyaṃ dhṛṣṇuṃ yad raṇe vṛṣaṇaṃ yunajan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10171: RV_6,068.01a śruṣṭī vāṃ yajña udyataḥ sajoṣā manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣo yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10172: RV_6,068.01c ā ya indrāvaruṇāv iṣe adya mahe sumnāya maha āvavartat //
GV01rvh1-10u:10173: RV_6,068.02a tā hi śreṣṭhā devatātā tujā śūrāṇāṃ śaviṣṭhā tā hi bhūtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10174: RV_6,068.02c maghonām maṃhiṣṭhā tuviśuṣma ṛtena vṛtraturā sarvasenā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10175: RV_6,068.03a tā gṛṇīhi namasyebhiḥ śūṣaiḥ sumnebhir indrāvaruṇā cakānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10176: RV_6,068.03c vajreṇānyaḥ śavasā hanti vṛtraṃ siṣakty anyo vṛjaneṣu vipraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10177: RV_6,068.04a gnāś ca yan naraś ca vāvṛdhanta viśve devāso narāṃ svagūrtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10178: RV_6,068.04c praibhya indrāvaruṇā mahitvā dyauś ca pṛthivi bhūtam urvī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10179: RV_6,068.05a sa it sudānuḥ svavāṃ ṛtāvendrā yo vāṃ varuṇa dāśati tman /
GV01rvh1-10u:10180: RV_6,068.05c iṣā sa dviṣas tared dāsvān vaṃsad rayiṃ rayivataś ca janān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10181: RV_6,068.06a yaṃ yuvaṃ dāśvadhvarāya devā rayiṃ dhattho vasumantam purukṣum /
GV01rvh1-10u:10182: RV_6,068.06c asme sa indrāvaruṇāv api ṣyāt pra yo bhanakti vanuṣām aśastīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10183: RV_6,068.07a uta naḥ sutrātro devagopāḥ sūribhya indrāvaruṇā rayiḥ ṣyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10184: RV_6,068.07c yeṣāṃ śuṣmaḥ pṛtanāsu sāhvān pra sadyo dyumnā tirate taturiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10185: RV_6,068.08a nū na indrāvaruṇā gṛṇānā pṛṅktaṃ rayiṃ sauśravasāya devā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10186: RV_6,068.08c itthā gṛṇanto mahinasya śardho 'po na nāvā duritā tarema //
GV01rvh1-10u:10187: RV_6,068.09a pra samrāje bṛhate manma nu priyam arca devāya varuṇāya saprathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10188: RV_6,068.09c ayaṃ ya urvī mahinā mahivrataḥ kratvā vibhāty ajaro na śociṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10189: RV_6,068.10a indrāvaruṇā sutapāv imaṃ sutaṃ somam pibatam madyaṃ dhṛtavratā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10190: RV_6,068.10c yuvo ratho adhvaraṃ devavītaye prati svasaram upa yāti pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:10191: RV_6,068.11a indrāvaruṇā madhumattamasya vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10192: RV_6,068.11c idaṃ vām andhaḥ pariṣiktam asme āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10193: RV_6,069.01a saṃ vāṃ karmaṇā sam iṣā hinomīndrāviṣṇū apasas pāre asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10194: RV_6,069.01c juṣethāṃ yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam ariṣṭair naḥ pathibhiḥ pārayantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10195: RV_6,069.02a yā viśvāsāṃ janitārā matīnām indrāviṣṇū kalaśā somadhānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10196: RV_6,069.02c pra vāṃ giraḥ śasyamānā avantu pra stomāso gīyamānāso arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10197: RV_6,069.03a indrāviṣṇū madapatī madānām ā somaṃ yātaṃ draviṇo dadhānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10198: RV_6,069.03c saṃ vām añjantv aktubhir matīnāṃ saṃ stomāsaḥ śasyamānāsa ukthaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10199: RV_6,069.04a ā vām aśvāso abhimātiṣāha indrāviṣṇū sadhamādo vahantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10200: RV_6,069.04c juṣethāṃ viśvā havanā matīnām upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ giro me //
GV01rvh1-10u:10201: RV_6,069.05a indrāviṣṇū tat panayāyyaṃ vāṃ somasya mada uru cakramāthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10202: RV_6,069.05c akṛṇutam antarikṣaṃ varīyo 'prathataṃ jīvase no rajāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10203: RV_6,069.06a indrāviṣṇū haviṣā vāvṛdhānāgrādvānā namasā rātahavyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10204: RV_6,069.06c ghṛtāsutī draviṇaṃ dhattam asme samudra sthaḥ kalaśaḥ somadhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10205: RV_6,069.07a indrāviṣṇū pibatam madhvo asya somasya dasrā jaṭharam pṛṇethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10206: RV_6,069.07c ā vām andhāṃsi madirāṇy agmann upa brahmāṇi śṛṇutaṃ havam me //
GV01rvh1-10u:10207: RV_6,069.08a ubhā jigyathur na parā jayethe na parā jigye kataraś canainoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10208: RV_6,069.08c indraś ca viṣṇo yad apaspṛdhethāṃ tredhā sahasraṃ vi tad airayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10209: RV_6,070.01a ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10210: RV_6,070.01c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūriretasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10211: RV_6,070.02a asaścantī bhūridhāre payasvatī ghṛtaṃ duhāte sukṛte śucivrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:10212: RV_6,070.02c rājantī asya bhuvanasya rodasī asme retaḥ siñcataṃ yan manurhitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10213: RV_6,070.03a yo vām ṛjave kramaṇāya rodasī marto dadāśa dhiṣaṇe sa sādhati /
GV01rvh1-10u:10214: RV_6,070.03c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari yuvoḥ siktā viṣurūpāṇi savratā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10215: RV_6,070.04a ghṛtena dyāvāpṛthivī abhīvṛte ghṛtaśriyā ghṛtapṛcā ghṛtāvṛdhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10216: RV_6,070.04c urvī pṛthvī hotṛvūrye purohite te id viprā īḷate sumnam iṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:10217: RV_6,070.05a madhu no dyāvāpṛthivī mimikṣatām madhuścutā madhudughe madhuvrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:10218: RV_6,070.05c dadhāne yajñaṃ draviṇaṃ ca devatā mahi śravo vājam asme suvīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10219: RV_6,070.06a ūrjaṃ no dyauś ca pṛthivī ca pinvatām pitā mātā viśvavidā sudaṃsasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10220: RV_6,070.06c saṃrarāṇe rodasī viśvaśambhuvā saniṃ vājaṃ rayim asme sam invatām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10221: RV_6,071.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā hiraṇyayā bāhū ayaṃsta savanāya sukratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10222: RV_6,071.01c ghṛtena pāṇī abhi pruṣṇute makho yuvā sudakṣo rajaso vidharmaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10223: RV_6,071.02a devasya vayaṃ savituḥ savīmani śreṣṭhe syāma vasunaś ca dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:10224: RV_6,071.02c yo viśvasya dvipado yaś catuṣpado niveśane prasave cāsi bhūmanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10225: RV_6,071.03a adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvaṃ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10226: RV_6,071.03c hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:10227: RV_6,071.04a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā damūnā hiraṇyapāṇiḥ pratidoṣam asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10228: RV_6,071.04c ayohanur yajato mandrajihva ā dāśuṣe suvati bhūri vāmam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10229: RV_6,071.05a ud ū ayāṃ upavakteva bāhū hiraṇyayā savitā supratīkā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10230: RV_6,071.05c divo rohāṃsy aruhat pṛthivyā arīramat patayat kac cid abhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10231: RV_6,071.06a vāmam adya savitar vāmam u śvo dive-dive vāmam asmabhyaṃ sāvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10232: RV_6,071.06c vāmasya hi kṣayasya deva bhūrer ayā dhiyā vāmabhājaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:10233: RV_6,072.01a indrāsomā mahi tad vām mahitvaṃ yuvam mahāni prathamāni cakrathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10234: RV_6,072.01c yuvaṃ sūryaṃ vividathur yuvaṃ svar viśvā tamāṃsy ahataṃ nidaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10235: RV_6,072.02a indrāsomā vāsayatha uṣāsam ut sūryaṃ nayatho jyotiṣā saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10236: RV_6,072.02c upa dyāṃ skambhathu skambhanenāprathatam pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10237: RV_6,072.03a indrāsomāv ahim apaḥ pariṣṭhāṃ hatho vṛtram anu vāṃ dyaur amanyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:10238: RV_6,072.03c prārṇāṃsy airayataṃ nadīnām ā samudrāṇi paprathuḥ purūṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10239: RV_6,072.04a indrāsomā pakvam āmāsv antar ni gavām id dadhathur vakṣaṇāsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10240: RV_6,072.04c jagṛbhathur anapinaddham āsu ruśac citrāsu jagatīṣv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10241: RV_6,072.05a indrāsomā yuvam aṅga tarutram apatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10242: RV_6,072.05c yuvaṃ śuṣmaṃ naryaṃ carṣaṇibhyaḥ saṃ vivyathuḥ pṛtanāṣāham ugrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10243: RV_6,073.01a yo adribhit prathamajā ṛtāvā bṛhaspatir āṅgiraso haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10244: RV_6,073.01c dvibarhajmā prāgharmasat pitā na ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10245: RV_6,073.02a janāya cid ya īvata u lokam bṛhaspatir devahūtau cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10246: RV_6,073.02c ghnan vṛtrāṇi vi puro dardarīti jayañ chatrūṃr amitrān pṛtsu sāhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10247: RV_6,073.03a bṛhaspatiḥ sam ajayad vasūni maho vrajān gomato deva eṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10248: RV_6,073.03c apaḥ siṣāsan svar apratīto bṛhaspatir hanty amitram arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10249: RV_6,074.01a somārudrā dhārayethām asuryam pra vām iṣṭayo 'ram aśnuvantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10250: RV_6,074.01c dame-dame sapta ratnā dadhānā śaṃ no bhūtaṃ dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:10251: RV_6,074.02a somārudrā vi vṛhataṃ viṣūcīm amīvā yā no gayam āviveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:10252: RV_6,074.02c āre bādhethāṃ nirṛtim parācair asme bhadrā sauśravasāni santu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10253: RV_6,074.03a somārudrā yuvam etāny asme viśvā tanūṣu bheṣajāni dhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10254: RV_6,074.03c ava syatam muñcataṃ yan no asti tanūṣu baddhaṃ kṛtam eno asmat //
GV01rvh1-10u:10255: RV_6,074.04a tigmāyudhau tigmahetī suśevau somārudrāv iha su mṛḷataṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10256: RV_6,074.04c pra no muñcataṃ varuṇasya pāśād gopāyataṃ naḥ sumanasyamānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10257: RV_6,075.01a jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10258: RV_6,075.01c anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvaṃ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10259: RV_6,075.02a dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema /
GV01rvh1-10u:10260: RV_6,075.02c dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśo jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:10261: RV_6,075.03a vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇam priyaṃ sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10262: RV_6,075.03c yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvañ jyā iyaṃ samane pārayantī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10263: RV_6,075.04a te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putram bibhṛtām upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10264: RV_6,075.04c apa śatrūn vidhyatāṃ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10265: RV_6,075.05a bahvīnām pitā bahur asya putraś ciścā kṛṇoti samanāvagatya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10266: RV_6,075.05c iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10267: RV_6,075.06a rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatra-yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10268: RV_6,075.06c abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścād anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10269: RV_6,075.07a tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10270: RV_6,075.07c avakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūṃr anapavyayantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10271: RV_6,075.08a rathavāhanaṃ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10272: RV_6,075.08c tatrā ratham upa śagmaṃ sadema viśvāhā vayaṃ sumanasyamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10273: RV_6,075.09a svāduṣaṃsadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10274: RV_6,075.09c citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10275: RV_6,075.10a brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10276: RV_6,075.10c pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir no aghaśaṃsa īśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:10277: RV_6,075.11a suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10278: RV_6,075.11c yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yaṃsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10279: RV_6,075.12a ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nas tanūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10280: RV_6,075.12c somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yacchatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10281: RV_6,075.13a ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanāṃ upa jighnate /
GV01rvh1-10u:10283: RV_6,075.14a ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetim paribādhamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10284: RV_6,075.14c hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāṃsam pari pātu viśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10285: RV_6,075.15a ālāktā yā ruruśīrṣṇy atho yasyā ayo mukham /
GV01rvh1-10u:10286: RV_6,075.15c idam parjanyaretasa iṣvai devyai bṛhan namaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10287: RV_6,075.16a avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasaṃśite /
GV01rvh1-10u:10288: RV_6,075.16c gacchāmitrān pra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ canoc chiṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10289: RV_6,075.17a yatra bāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10290: RV_6,075.17c tatrā no brahmaṇas patir aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10291: RV_6,075.18a marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10292: RV_6,075.18c uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10293: RV_6,075.19a yo naḥ svo araṇo yaś ca niṣṭyo jighāṃsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:10294: RV_6,075.19c devās taṃ sarve dhūrvantu brahma varma mamāntaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:10297: RV_7,001.01a agniṃ naro dīdhitibhir araṇyor hastacyutī janayanta praśastam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10299: RV_7,001.02a tam agnim aste vasavo ny ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutaś cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:10300: RV_7,001.02c dakṣāyyo yo dama āsa nityaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10301: RV_7,001.03a preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10302: RV_7,001.03c tvāṃ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10303: RV_7,001.04a pra te agnayo 'gnibhyo varaṃ niḥ suvīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10305: RV_7,001.05a dā no agne dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ svapatyaṃ sahasya praśastam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10306: RV_7,001.05c na yaṃ yāvā tarati yātumāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10307: RV_7,001.06a upa yam eti yuvatiḥ sudakṣaṃ doṣā vastor haviṣmatī ghṛtācī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10309: RV_7,001.07a viśvā agne 'pa dahārātīr yebhis tapobhir adaho jarūtham /
GV01rvh1-10u:10311: RV_7,001.08a ā yas te agna idhate anīkaṃ vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivaḥ pāvaka /
GV01rvh1-10u:10312: RV_7,001.08c uto na ebhi stavathair iha syāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10313: RV_7,001.09a vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martā naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10314: RV_7,001.09c uto na ebhiḥ sumanā iha syāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10315: RV_7,001.10a ime naro vṛtrahatyeṣu śūrā viśvā adevīr abhi santu māyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10316: RV_7,001.10c ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10317: RV_7,001.11a mā śūne agne ni ṣadāma nṛṇām māśeṣaso 'vīratā pari tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10319: RV_7,001.12a yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantaṃ svapatyaṃ kṣayaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10321: RV_7,001.13a pāhi no agne rakṣaso ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrter araruṣo aghāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10322: RV_7,001.13c tvā yujā pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10323: RV_7,001.14a sed agnir agnīṃr aty astv anyān yatra vājī tanayo vīḷupāṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10325: RV_7,001.15a sed agnir yo vanuṣyato nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasa uruṣyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10327: RV_7,001.16a ayaṃ so agnir āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ sam id indhe haviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10328: RV_7,001.16c pari yam ety adhvareṣu hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10329: RV_7,001.17a tve agna āhavanāni bhūrīśānāsa ā juhuyāma nityā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10331: RV_7,001.18a imo agne vītatamāni havyājasro vakṣi devatātim accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10332: RV_7,001.18c prati na īṃ surabhīṇi vyantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10333: RV_7,001.19a mā no agne 'vīrate parā dā durvāsase 'mataye mā no asyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10334: RV_7,001.19c mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣasa ṛtāvo mā no dame mā vana ā juhūrthāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10335: RV_7,001.20a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10336: RV_7,001.20c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10337: RV_7,001.21a tvam agne suhavo raṇvasaṃdṛk sudītī sūno sahaso didīhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10338: RV_7,001.21c mā tve sacā tanaye nitya ā dhaṅ mā vīro asman naryo vi dāsīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10339: RV_7,001.22a mā no agne durbhṛtaye sacaiṣu deveddheṣv agniṣu pra vocaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10340: RV_7,001.22c mā te asmān durmatayo bhṛmāc cid devasya sūno sahaso naśanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10341: RV_7,001.23a sa marto agne svanīka revān amartye ya ājuhoti havyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10342: RV_7,001.23c sa devatā vasuvaniṃ dadhāti yaṃ sūrir arthī pṛcchamāna eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10343: RV_7,001.24a maho no agne suvitasya vidvān rayiṃ sūribhya ā vahā bṛhantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10344: RV_7,001.24c yena vayaṃ sahasāvan mademāvikṣitāsa āyuṣā suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10345: RV_7,001.25a nū me brahmāṇy agna uc chaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10346: RV_7,001.25c rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10347: RV_7,002.01a juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śocā bṛhad yajataṃ dhūmam ṛṇvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10348: RV_7,002.01c upa spṛśa divyaṃ sānu stūpaiḥ saṃ raśmibhis tatanaḥ sūryasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10349: RV_7,002.02a narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10350: RV_7,002.02c ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10351: RV_7,002.03a īḷenyaṃ vo asuraṃ sudakṣam antar dūtaṃ rodasī satyavācam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10352: RV_7,002.03c manuṣvad agnim manunā samiddhaṃ sam adhvarāya sadam in mahema //
GV01rvh1-10u:10353: RV_7,002.04a saparyavo bharamāṇā abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhir agnau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10354: RV_7,002.04c ājuhvānā ghṛtapṛṣṭham pṛṣadvad adhvaryavo haviṣā marjayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10355: RV_7,002.05a svādhyo vi duro devayanto 'śiśrayū rathayur devatātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10356: RV_7,002.05c pūrvī śiśuṃ na mātarā rihāṇe sam agruvo na samaneṣv añjan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10357: RV_7,002.06a uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī na uṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10358: RV_7,002.06c barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10359: RV_7,002.07a viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vāṃ jātavedasā yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10360: RV_7,002.07c ūrdhvaṃ no adhvaraṃ kṛtaṃ haveṣu tā deveṣu vanatho vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10361: RV_7,002.08a ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ sajoṣā iḷā devair manuṣyebhir agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10362: RV_7,002.08c sarasvatī sārasvatebhir arvāk tisro devīr barhir edaṃ sadantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10363: RV_7,002.09a tan nas turīpam adha poṣayitnu deva tvaṣṭar vi rarāṇaḥ syasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10364: RV_7,002.09c yato vīraḥ karmaṇyaḥ sudakṣo yuktagrāvā jāyate devakāmaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10365: RV_7,002.10a vanaspate 'va sṛjopa devān agnir haviḥ śamitā sūdayāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10366: RV_7,002.10c sed u hotā satyataro yajāti yathā devānāṃ janimāni veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:10367: RV_7,002.11a ā yāhy agne samidhāno arvāṅ indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ turebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10368: RV_7,002.11c barhir na āstām aditiḥ suputrā svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10369: RV_7,003.01a agniṃ vo devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣā yajiṣṭhaṃ dūtam adhvare kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10370: RV_7,003.01c yo martyeṣu nidhruvir ṛtāvā tapurmūrdhā ghṛtānnaḥ pāvakaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10371: RV_7,003.02a prothad aśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vy asthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10372: RV_7,003.02c ād asya vāto anu vāti śocir adha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇam asti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10373: RV_7,003.03a ud yasya te navajātasya vṛṣṇo 'gne caranty ajarā idhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10374: RV_7,003.03c acchā dyām aruṣo dhūma eti saṃ dūto agna īyase hi devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10375: RV_7,003.04a vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājo aśret tṛṣu yad annā samavṛkta jambhaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10376: RV_7,003.04c seneva sṛṣṭā prasitiṣ ṭa eti yavaṃ na dasma juhvā vivekṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10377: RV_7,003.05a tam id doṣā tam uṣasi yaviṣṭham agnim atyaṃ na marjayanta naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10378: RV_7,003.05c niśiśānā atithim asya yonau dīdāya śocir āhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10379: RV_7,003.06a susaṃdṛk te svanīka pratīkaṃ vi yad rukmo na rocasa upāke /
GV01rvh1-10u:10380: RV_7,003.06c divo na te tanyatur eti śuṣmaś citro na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum //
GV01rvh1-10u:10381: RV_7,003.07a yathā vaḥ svāhāgnaye dāśema parīḷābhir ghṛtavadbhiś ca havyaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10382: RV_7,003.07c tebhir no agne amitair mahobhiḥ śatam pūrbhir āyasībhir ni pāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10383: RV_7,003.08a yā vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭā giro vā yābhir nṛvatīr uruṣyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10384: RV_7,003.08c tābhir naḥ sūno sahaso ni pāhi smat sūrīñ jaritṝñ jātavedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10385: RV_7,003.09a nir yat pūteva svadhitiḥ śucir gāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10386: RV_7,003.09c ā yo mātror uśenyo janiṣṭa devayajyāya sukratuḥ pāvakaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10387: RV_7,003.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema /
GV01rvh1-10u:10388: RV_7,003.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10389: RV_7,004.01a pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvaṃ havyam matiṃ cāgnaye supūtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10390: RV_7,004.01c yo daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣy antar viśvāni vidmanā jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10391: RV_7,004.02a sa gṛtso agnis taruṇaś cid astu yato yaviṣṭho ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10392: RV_7,004.02c saṃ yo vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cid annā sam id atti sadyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10393: RV_7,004.03a asya devasya saṃsady anīke yam martāsaḥ śyetaṃ jagṛbhre /
GV01rvh1-10u:10394: RV_7,004.03c ni yo gṛbham pauruṣeyīm uvoca durokam agnir āyave śuśoca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10395: RV_7,004.04a ayaṃ kavir akaviṣu pracetā marteṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10396: RV_7,004.04c sa mā no atra juhuraḥ sahasvaḥ sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:10397: RV_7,004.05a ā yo yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ sasāda kratvā hy agnir amṛtāṃ atārīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10398: RV_7,004.05c tam oṣadhīś ca vaninaś ca garbham bhūmiś ca viśvadhāyasam bibharti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10399: RV_7,004.06a īśe hy agnir amṛtasya bhūrer īśe rāyaḥ suvīryasya dātoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10400: RV_7,004.06c mā tvā vayaṃ sahasāvann avīrā māpsavaḥ pari ṣadāma māduvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10401: RV_7,004.07a pariṣadyaṃ hy araṇasya rekṇo nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10402: RV_7,004.07c na śeṣo agne anyajātam asty acetānasya mā patho vi dukṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10403: RV_7,004.08a nahi grabhāyāraṇaḥ suśevo 'nyodaryo manasā mantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:10404: RV_7,004.08c adhā cid okaḥ punar it sa ety ā no vājy abhīṣāḷ etu navyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10405: RV_7,004.09a tvam agne vanuṣyato ni pāhi tvam u naḥ sahasāvann avadyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10406: RV_7,004.09c saṃ tvā dhvasmanvad abhy etu pāthaḥ saṃ rayi spṛhayāyyaḥ sahasrī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10407: RV_7,004.10a etā no agne saubhagā didīhy api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema /
GV01rvh1-10u:10408: RV_7,004.10c viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10409: RV_7,005.01a prāgnaye tavase bharadhvaṃ giraṃ divo arataye pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10410: RV_7,005.01c yo viśveṣām amṛtānām upasthe vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10411: RV_7,005.02a pṛṣṭo divi dhāyy agniḥ pṛthivyāṃ netā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10412: RV_7,005.02c sa mānuṣīr abhi viśo vi bhāti vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhāno vareṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:10413: RV_7,005.03a tvad bhiyā viśa āyann asiknīr asamanā jahatīr bhojanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:10414: RV_7,005.03c vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puro yad agne darayann adīdeḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10415: RV_7,005.04a tava tridhātu pṛthivī uta dyaur vaiśvānara vratam agne sacanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:10416: RV_7,005.04c tvam bhāsā rodasī ā tatanthājasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10417: RV_7,005.05a tvām agne harito vāvaśānā giraḥ sacante dhunayo ghṛtācīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10418: RV_7,005.05c patiṃ kṛṣṭīnāṃ rathyaṃ rayīṇāṃ vaiśvānaram uṣasāṃ ketum ahnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10419: RV_7,005.06a tve asuryaṃ vasavo ny ṛṇvan kratuṃ hi te mitramaho juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:10420: RV_7,005.06c tvaṃ dasyūṃr okaso agna āja uru jyotir janayann āryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10421: RV_7,005.07a sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyur na pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10422: RV_7,005.07c tvam bhuvanā janayann abhi krann apatyāya jātavedo daśasyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10423: RV_7,005.08a tām agne asme iṣam erayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīṃ jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10424: RV_7,005.08c yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśvavāra pṛthu śravo dāśuṣe martyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10425: RV_7,005.09a taṃ no agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣuṃ rayiṃ ni vājaṃ śrutyaṃ yuvasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10426: RV_7,005.09c vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yaccha rudrebhir agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10427: RV_7,006.01a pra samrājo asurasya praśastim puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnām anumādyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10428: RV_7,006.01c indrasyeva pra tavasas kṛtāni vande dāruṃ vandamāno vivakmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10429: RV_7,006.02a kaviṃ ketuṃ dhāsim bhānum adrer hinvanti śaṃ rājyaṃ rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10430: RV_7,006.02c purandarasya gīrbhir ā vivāse 'gner vratāni pūrvyā mahāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:10431: RV_7,006.03a ny akratūn grathino mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīṃr aśraddhāṃ avṛdhāṃ ayajñān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10432: RV_7,006.03c pra-pra tān dasyūṃr agnir vivāya pūrvaś cakārāparāṃ ayajyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:10433: RV_7,006.04a yo apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīś cakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10434: RV_7,006.04c tam īśānaṃ vasvo agniṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:10435: RV_7,006.05a yo dehyo anamayad vadhasnair yo aryapatnīr uṣasaś cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10436: RV_7,006.05c sa nirudhyā nahuṣo yahvo agnir viśaś cakre balihṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10437: RV_7,006.06a yasya śarmann upa viśve janāsa evais tasthuḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10438: RV_7,006.06c vaiśvānaro varam ā rodasyor āgniḥ sasāda pitror upastham //
GV01rvh1-10u:10439: RV_7,006.07a ā devo dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānara uditā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10440: RV_7,006.07c ā samudrād avarād ā parasmād āgnir dade diva ā pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10441: RV_7,007.01a pra vo devaṃ cit sahasānam agnim aśvaṃ na vājinaṃ hiṣe namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10442: RV_7,007.01c bhavā no dūto adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10443: RV_7,007.02a ā yāhy agne pathyā anu svā mandro devānāṃ sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10444: RV_7,007.02c ā sānu śuṣmair nadayan pṛthivyā jambhebhir viśvam uśadhag vanāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:10445: RV_7,007.03a prācīno yajñaḥ sudhitaṃ hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agnir īḷito na hotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10446: RV_7,007.03c ā mātarā viśvavāre huvāno yato yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe suśevaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10447: RV_7,007.04a sadyo adhvare rathiraṃ jananta mānuṣāso vicetaso ya eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10448: RV_7,007.04c viśām adhāyi viśpatir duroṇe 'gnir mandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10449: RV_7,007.05a asādi vṛto vahnir ājaganvān agnir brahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10450: RV_7,007.05c dyauś ca yam pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yaṃ hotā yajati viśvavāram //
GV01rvh1-10u:10451: RV_7,007.06a ete dyumnebhir viśvam ātiranta mantraṃ ye vāraṃ naryā atakṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10452: RV_7,007.06c pra ye viśas tiranta śroṣamāṇā ā ye me asya dīdhayann ṛtasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10453: RV_7,007.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10454: RV_7,007.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10455: RV_7,008.01a indhe rājā sam aryo namobhir yasya pratīkam āhutaṃ ghṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:10456: RV_7,008.01c naro havyebhir īḷate sabādha āgnir agra uṣasām aśoci //
GV01rvh1-10u:10457: RV_7,008.02a ayam u ṣya sumahāṃ avedi hotā mandro manuṣo yahvo agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10458: RV_7,008.02c vi bhā akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṛṣṇapavir oṣadhībhir vavakṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:10459: RV_7,008.03a kayā no agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktiṃ kām u svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10460: RV_7,008.03c kadā bhavema patayaḥ sudatra rāyo vantāro duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10461: RV_7,008.04a pra-prāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocate bṛhad bhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10462: RV_7,008.04c abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutāno daivyo atithiḥ śuśoca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10463: RV_7,008.05a asann it tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvo viśvebhiḥ sumanā anīkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10464: RV_7,008.05c stutaś cid agne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayaṃ vardhasva tanvaṃ sujāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10465: RV_7,008.06a idaṃ vacaḥ śatasāḥ saṃsahasram ud agnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10466: RV_7,008.06c śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāti dyumad amīvacātanaṃ rakṣohā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10467: RV_7,008.07a nū tvām agna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10468: RV_7,008.07c iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10469: RV_7,009.01a abodhi jāra uṣasām upasthād dhotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10470: RV_7,009.01c dadhāti ketum ubhayasya jantor havyā deveṣu draviṇaṃ sukṛtsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10471: RV_7,009.02a sa sukratur yo vi duraḥ paṇīnām punāno arkam purubhojasaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10472: RV_7,009.02c hotā mandro viśāṃ damūnās tiras tamo dadṛśe rāmyāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10473: RV_7,009.03a amūraḥ kavir aditir vivasvān susaṃsan mitro atithiḥ śivo naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10474: RV_7,009.03c citrabhānur uṣasām bhāty agre 'pāṃ garbhaḥ prasva ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:10475: RV_7,009.04a īḷenyo vo manuṣo yugeṣu samanagā aśucaj jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10476: RV_7,009.04c susaṃdṛśā bhānunā yo vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānam budhanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10477: RV_7,009.05a agne yāhi dūtyam mā riṣaṇyo devāṃ acchā brahmakṛtā gaṇena /
GV01rvh1-10u:10478: RV_7,009.05c sarasvatīm maruto aśvināpo yakṣi devān ratnadheyāya viśvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10479: RV_7,009.06a tvām agne samidhāno vasiṣṭho jarūthaṃ han yakṣi rāye purandhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:10480: RV_7,009.06c puruṇīthā jātavedo jarasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10481: RV_7,010.01a uṣo na jāraḥ pṛthu pājo aśred davidyutad dīdyac chośucānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10482: RV_7,010.01c vṛṣā hariḥ śucir ā bhāti bhāsā dhiyo hinvāna uśatīr ajīgaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10483: RV_7,010.02a svar ṇa vastor uṣasām aroci yajñaṃ tanvānā uśijo na manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10484: RV_7,010.02c agnir janmāni deva ā vi vidvān dravad dūto devayāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10485: RV_7,010.03a acchā giro matayo devayantīr agniṃ yanti draviṇam bhikṣamāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10486: RV_7,010.03c susaṃdṛśaṃ supratīkaṃ svañcaṃ havyavāham aratim mānuṣāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10487: RV_7,010.04a indraṃ no agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣā rudraṃ rudrebhir ā vahā bṛhantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10488: RV_7,010.04c ādityebhir aditiṃ viśvajanyām bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhir viśvavāram //
GV01rvh1-10u:10489: RV_7,010.05a mandraṃ hotāram uśijo yaviṣṭham agniṃ viśa īḷate adhvareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10490: RV_7,010.05c sa hi kṣapāvāṃ abhavad rayīṇām atandro dūto yajathāya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10491: RV_7,011.01a mahāṃ asy adhvarasya praketo na ṛte tvad amṛtā mādayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:10492: RV_7,011.01c ā viśvebhiḥ sarathaṃ yāhi devair ny agne hotā prathamaḥ sadeha //
GV01rvh1-10u:10493: RV_7,011.02a tvām īḷate ajiraṃ dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadam in mānuṣāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10494: RV_7,011.02c yasya devair āsado barhir agne 'hāny asmai sudinā bhavanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10495: RV_7,011.03a triś cid aktoḥ pra cikitur vasūni tve antar dāśuṣe martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10496: RV_7,011.03c manuṣvad agna iha yakṣi devān bhavā no dūto abhiśastipāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10497: RV_7,011.04a agnir īśe bṛhato adhvarasyāgnir viśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10498: RV_7,011.04c kratuṃ hy asya vasavo juṣantāthā devā dadhire havyavāham //
GV01rvh1-10u:10499: RV_7,011.05a āgne vaha haviradyāya devān indrajyeṣṭhāsa iha mādayantām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10500: RV_7,011.05c imaṃ yajñaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10501: RV_7,012.01a aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭhaṃ yo dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10502: RV_7,012.01c citrabhānuṃ rodasī antar urvī svāhutaṃ viśvataḥ pratyañcam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10503: RV_7,012.02a sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvān agni ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10504: RV_7,012.02c sa no rakṣiṣad duritād avadyād asmān gṛṇata uta no maghonaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10505: RV_7,012.03a tvaṃ varuṇa uta mitro agne tvāṃ vardhanti matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10506: RV_7,012.03c tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10507: RV_7,013.01a prāgnaye viśvaśuce dhiyandhe 'suraghne manma dhītim bharadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10508: RV_7,013.01c bhare havir na barhiṣi prīṇāno vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10509: RV_7,013.02a tvam agne śociṣā śośucāna ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10510: RV_7,013.02c tvaṃ devāṃ abhiśaster amuñco vaiśvānara jātavedo mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10511: RV_7,013.03a jāto yad agne bhuvanā vy akhyaḥ paśūn na gopā iryaḥ parijmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10512: RV_7,013.03c vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātuṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10514: RV_7,014.01c havirbhiḥ śukraśociṣe namasvino vayaṃ dāśemāgnaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:10515: RV_7,014.02a vayaṃ te agne samidhā vidhema vayaṃ dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10516: RV_7,014.02c vayaṃ ghṛtenādhvarasya hotar vayaṃ deva haviṣā bhadraśoce //
GV01rvh1-10u:10517: RV_7,014.03a ā no devebhir upa devahūtim agne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtiṃ juṣāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10518: RV_7,014.03c tubhyaṃ devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10519: RV_7,015.01a upasadyāya mīḷhuṣa āsye juhutā haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10521: RV_7,015.02a yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi niṣasāda dame-dame /
GV01rvh1-10u:10523: RV_7,015.03a sa no vedo amātyam agnī rakṣatu viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10525: RV_7,015.04a navaṃ nu stomam agnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10527: RV_7,015.05a spārhā yasya śriyo dṛśe rayir vīravato yathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10529: RV_7,015.06a semāṃ vetu vaṣaṭkṛtim agnir juṣata no giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10531: RV_7,015.07a ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantaṃ deva dhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10533: RV_7,015.08a kṣapa usraś ca dīdihi svagnayas tvayā vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10535: RV_7,015.09a upa tvā sātaye naro viprāso yanti dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10537: RV_7,015.10a agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśocir amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10539: RV_7,015.11a sa no rādhāṃsy ā bhareśānaḥ sahaso yaho /
GV01rvh1-10u:10541: RV_7,015.12a tvam agne vīravad yaśo devaś ca savitā bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10543: RV_7,015.13a agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10545: RV_7,015.14a adhā mahī na āyasy anādhṛṣṭo nṛpītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:10547: RV_7,015.15a tvaṃ naḥ pāhy aṃhaso doṣāvastar aghāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10549: RV_7,016.01a enā vo agniṃ namasorjo napātam ā huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:10550: RV_7,016.01c priyaṃ cetiṣṭham aratiṃ svadhvaraṃ viśvasya dūtam amṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10551: RV_7,016.02a sa yojate aruṣā viśvabhojasā sa dudravat svāhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10552: RV_7,016.02c subrahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnāṃ devaṃ rādho janānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10553: RV_7,016.03a ud asya śocir asthād ājuhvānasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10554: RV_7,016.03c ud dhūmāso aruṣāso divispṛśaḥ sam agnim indhate naraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10555: RV_7,016.04a taṃ tvā dūtaṃ kṛṇmahe yaśastamaṃ devāṃ ā vītaye vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10556: RV_7,016.04c viśvā sūno sahaso martabhojanā rāsva tad yat tvemahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:10557: RV_7,016.05a tvam agne gṛhapatis tvaṃ hotā no adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:10558: RV_7,016.05c tvam potā viśvavāra pracetā yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10559: RV_7,016.06a kṛdhi ratnaṃ yajamānāya sukrato tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10560: RV_7,016.06c ā na ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijaṃ suśaṃso yaś ca dakṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:10561: RV_7,016.07a tve agne svāhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10562: RV_7,016.07c yantāro ye maghavāno janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10563: RV_7,016.08a yeṣām iḷā ghṛtahastā duroṇa āṃ api prātā niṣīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:10564: RV_7,016.08c tāṃs trāyasva sahasya druho nido yacchā naḥ śarma dīrghaśrut //
GV01rvh1-10u:10565: RV_7,016.09a sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahnir āsā viduṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10566: RV_7,016.09c agne rayim maghavadbhyo na ā vaha havyadātiṃ ca sūdaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10567: RV_7,016.10a ye rādhāṃsi dadaty aśvyā maghā kāmena śravaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10568: RV_7,016.10c tāṃ aṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ śatam pūrbhir yaviṣṭhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10569: RV_7,016.11a devo vo draviṇodāḥ pūrṇāṃ vivaṣṭy āsicam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10570: RV_7,016.11c ud vā siñcadhvam upa vā pṛṇadhvam ād id vo deva ohate //
GV01rvh1-10u:10571: RV_7,016.12a taṃ hotāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ vahniṃ devā akṛṇvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:10572: RV_7,016.12c dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate suvīryam agnir janāya dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:10573: RV_7,017.01 agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddha uta barhir urviyā vi stṛṇītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10574: RV_7,017.02 uta dvāra uśatīr vi śrayantām uta devāṃ uśata ā vaheha //
GV01rvh1-10u:10575: RV_7,017.03 agne vīhi haviṣā yakṣi devān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10576: RV_7,017.04 svadhvarā karati jātavedā yakṣad devāṃ amṛtān piprayac ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10577: RV_7,017.05 vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyā bhavantv āśiṣo no adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10578: RV_7,017.06 tvām u te dadhire havyavāhaṃ devāso agna ūrja ā napātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10579: RV_7,017.07 te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma maho no ratnā vi dadha iyānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10580: RV_7,018.01a tve ha yat pitaraś cin na indra viśvā vāmā jaritāro asanvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10581: RV_7,018.01c tve gāvaḥ sudughās tve hy aśvās tvaṃ vasu devayate vaniṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10582: RV_7,018.02a rājeva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣy evāva dyubhir abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san /
GV01rvh1-10u:10583: RV_7,018.02c piśā giro maghavan gobhir aśvais tvāyataḥ śiśīhi rāye asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10584: RV_7,018.03a imā u tvā paspṛdhānāso atra mandrā giro devayantīr upa sthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10585: RV_7,018.03c arvācī te pathyā rāya etu syāma te sumatāv indra śarman //
GV01rvh1-10u:10586: RV_7,018.04a dhenuṃ na tvā sūyavase dudukṣann upa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10587: RV_7,018.04c tvām in me gopatiṃ viśva āhā na indraḥ sumatiṃ gantv accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:10588: RV_7,018.05a arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāsa indro gādhāny akṛṇot supārā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10589: RV_7,018.05c śardhantaṃ śimyum ucathasya navyaḥ śāpaṃ sindhūnām akṛṇod aśastīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10590: RV_7,018.06a puroḷā it turvaśo yakṣur āsīd rāye matsyāso niśitā apīva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10591: RV_7,018.06c śruṣṭiṃ cakrur bhṛgavo druhyavaś ca sakhā sakhāyam atarad viṣūcoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10592: RV_7,018.07a ā pakthāso bhalānaso bhanantālināso viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10593: RV_7,018.07c ā yo 'nayat sadhamā āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyo ajagan yudhā nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:10594: RV_7,018.08a durādhyo aditiṃ srevayanto 'cetaso vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:10595: RV_7,018.08c mahnāvivyak pṛthivīm patyamānaḥ paśuṣ kavir aśayac cāyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10596: RV_7,018.09a īyur arthaṃ na nyartham paruṣṇīm āśuś caned abhipitvaṃ jagāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10597: RV_7,018.09c sudāsa indraḥ sutukāṃ amitrān arandhayan mānuṣe vadhrivācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10598: RV_7,018.10a īyur gāvo na yavasād agopā yathākṛtam abhi mitraṃ citāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10599: RV_7,018.10c pṛśnigāvaḥ pṛśninipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakrur niyuto rantayaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10600: RV_7,018.11a ekaṃ ca yo viṃśatiṃ ca śravasyā vaikarṇayor janān rājā ny astaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10601: RV_7,018.11c dasmo na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargam akṛṇod indra eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10602: RV_7,018.12a adha śrutaṃ kavaṣaṃ vṛddham apsv anu druhyuṃ ni vṛṇag vajrabāhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10603: RV_7,018.12c vṛṇānā atra sakhyāya sakhyaṃ tvāyanto ye amadann anu tvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10604: RV_7,018.13a vi sadyo viśvā dṛṃhitāny eṣām indraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta dardaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10605: RV_7,018.13c vy ānavasya tṛtsave gayam bhāg jeṣma pūruṃ vidathe mṛdhravācam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10606: RV_7,018.14a ni gavyavo 'navo druhyavaś ca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaṭ sahasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10607: RV_7,018.14c ṣaṣṭir vīrāso adhi ṣaḍ duvoyu viśved indrasya vīryā kṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:10608: RV_7,018.15a indreṇaite tṛtsavo veviṣāṇā āpo na sṛṣṭā adhavanta nīcīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10609: RV_7,018.15c durmitrāsaḥ prakalavin mimānā jahur viśvāni bhojanā sudāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:10610: RV_7,018.16a ardhaṃ vīrasya śṛtapām anindram parā śardhantaṃ nunude abhi kṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10611: RV_7,018.16c indro manyum manyumyo mimāya bheje patho vartanim patyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10612: RV_7,018.17a ādhreṇa cit tad v ekaṃ cakāra siṃhyaṃ cit petvenā jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:10613: RV_7,018.17c ava sraktīr veśyāvṛścad indraḥ prāyacchad viśvā bhojanā sudāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:10614: RV_7,018.18a śaśvanto hi śatravo rāradhuṣ ṭe bhedasya cic chardhato vinda randhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:10615: RV_7,018.18c martāṃ ena stuvato yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmaṃ tasmin ni jahi vajram indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:10616: RV_7,018.19a āvad indraṃ yamunā tṛtsavaś ca prātra bhedaṃ sarvatātā muṣāyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:10617: RV_7,018.19c ajāsaś ca śigravo yakṣavaś ca baliṃ śīrṣāṇi jabhrur aśvyāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:10618: RV_7,018.20a na ta indra sumatayo na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvā uṣaso na nūtnāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10619: RV_7,018.20c devakaṃ cin mānyamānaṃ jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaram bhet //
GV01rvh1-10u:10620: RV_7,018.21a pra ye gṛhād amamadus tvāyā parāśaraḥ śatayātur vasiṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10621: RV_7,018.21c na te bhojasya sakhyam mṛṣantādhā sūribhyaḥ sudinā vy ucchān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10622: RV_7,018.22a dve naptur devavataḥ śate gor dvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10623: RV_7,018.22c arhann agne paijavanasya dānaṃ hoteva sadma pary emi rebhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10624: RV_7,018.23a catvāro mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smaddiṣṭayaḥ kṛśanino nireke /
GV01rvh1-10u:10625: RV_7,018.23c ṛjrāso mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsas tokaṃ tokāya śravase vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10626: RV_7,018.24a yasya śravo rodasī antar urvī śīrṣṇe-śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10627: RV_7,018.24c sapted indraṃ na sravato gṛṇanti ni yudhyāmadhim aśiśād abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:10628: RV_7,018.25a imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatānu divodāsaṃ na pitaraṃ sudāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10629: RV_7,018.25c aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketaṃ dūṇāśaṃ kṣatram ajaraṃ duvoyu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10630: RV_7,019.01a yas tigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīma ekaḥ kṛṣṭīś cyāvayati pra viśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10631: RV_7,019.01c yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10632: RV_7,019.02a tvaṃ ha tyad indra kutsam āvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇas tanvā samarye /
GV01rvh1-10u:10633: RV_7,019.02c dāsaṃ yac chuṣṇaṃ kuyavaṃ ny asmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10634: RV_7,019.03a tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvo viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sudāsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10635: RV_7,019.03c pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu pūrum //
GV01rvh1-10u:10636: RV_7,019.04a tvaṃ nṛbhir nṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10637: RV_7,019.04c tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10638: RV_7,019.05a tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca sadyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10639: RV_7,019.05c niveśane śatatamāviveṣīr ahañ ca vṛtraṃ namucim utāhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10640: RV_7,019.06a sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:10641: RV_7,019.06c vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10642: RV_7,019.07a mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāv aghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10643: RV_7,019.07c trāyasva no 'vṛkebhir varūthais tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:10644: RV_7,019.08a priyāsa it te maghavann abhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10645: RV_7,019.08c ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhy atithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10646: RV_7,019.09a sadyaś cin nu te maghavann abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanty ukthaśāsa ukthā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10647: RV_7,019.09c ye te havebhir vi paṇīṃr adāśann asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:10648: RV_7,019.10a ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañco dadato maghāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:10649: RV_7,019.10c teṣām indra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitā ca nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10650: RV_7,019.11a nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtas tanvā vāvṛdhasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10651: RV_7,019.11c upa no vājān mimīhy upa stīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10652: RV_7,020.01a ugro jajñe vīryāya svadhāvāñ cakrir apo naryo yat kariṣyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10653: RV_7,020.01c jagmir yuvā nṛṣadanam avobhis trātā na indra enaso mahaś cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:10654: RV_7,020.02a hantā vṛtram indraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīn nu vīro jaritāram ūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10655: RV_7,020.02c kartā sudāse aha vā u lokaṃ dātā vasu muhur ā dāśuṣe bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10656: RV_7,020.03a yudhmo anarvā khajakṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāḍ januṣem aṣāḷhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10657: RV_7,020.03c vy āsa indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā adhā viśvaṃ śatrūyantaṃ jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:10658: RV_7,020.04a ubhe cid indra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhis tuviṣmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10659: RV_7,020.04c ni vajram indro harivān mimikṣan sam andhasā madeṣu vā uvoca //
GV01rvh1-10u:10660: RV_7,020.05a vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇaṃ raṇāya tam u cin nārī naryaṃ sasūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:10661: RV_7,020.05c pra yaḥ senānīr adha nṛbhyo astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa dhṛṣṇuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10662: RV_7,020.06a nū cit sa bhreṣate jano na reṣan mano yo asya ghoram āvivāsāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:10663: RV_7,020.06c yajñair ya indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāya ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10664: RV_7,020.07a yad indra pūrvo aparāya śikṣann ayaj jyāyān kanīyaso deṣṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10665: RV_7,020.07c amṛta it pary āsīta dūram ā citra citryam bharā rayiṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10666: RV_7,020.08a yas ta indra priyo jano dadāśad asan nireke adrivaḥ sakhā te /
GV01rvh1-10u:10667: RV_7,020.08c vayaṃ te asyāṃ sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe aghnato nṛpītau //
GV01rvh1-10u:10668: RV_7,020.09a eṣa stomo acikradad vṛṣā ta uta stāmur maghavann akrapiṣṭa /
GV01rvh1-10u:10669: RV_7,020.09c rāyas kāmo jaritāraṃ ta āgan tvam aṅga śakra vasva ā śako naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10670: RV_7,020.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10671: RV_7,020.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10672: RV_7,021.01a asāvi devaṃ goṛjīkam andho ny asminn indro januṣem uvoca /
GV01rvh1-10u:10673: RV_7,021.01c bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñair bodhā na stomam andhaso madeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10674: RV_7,021.02a pra yanti yajñaṃ vipayanti barhiḥ somamādo vidathe dudhravācaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10675: RV_7,021.02c ny u bhriyante yaśaso gṛbhād ā dūraupabdo vṛṣaṇo nṛṣācaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10676: RV_7,021.03a tvam indra sravitavā apas kaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10677: RV_7,021.03c tvad vāvakre rathyo na dhenā rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10678: RV_7,021.04a bhīmo viveṣāyudhebhir eṣām apāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10679: RV_7,021.04c indraḥ puro jarhṛṣāṇo vi dūdhod vi vajrahasto mahinā jaghāna //
