GV01rvh1-10u:10680: RV_7,021.05a na yātava indra jūjuvur no na vandanā śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10681: RV_7,021.05c sa śardhad aryo viṣuṇasya jantor mā śiśnadevā api gur ṛtaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10682: RV_7,021.06a abhi kratvendra bhūr adha jman na te vivyaṅ mahimānaṃ rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10683: RV_7,021.06c svenā hi vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghantha na śatrur antaṃ vividad yudhā te //
GV01rvh1-10u:10684: RV_7,021.07a devāś cit te asuryāya pūrve 'nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10685: RV_7,021.07c indro maghāni dayate viṣahyendraṃ vājasya johuvanta sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:10686: RV_7,021.08a kīriś cid dhi tvām avase juhāveśānam indra saubhagasya bhūreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10687: RV_7,021.08c avo babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattus tvāvato varūtā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10688: RV_7,021.09a sakhāyas ta indra viśvaha syāma namovṛdhāso mahinā tarutra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10689: RV_7,021.09c vanvantu smā te 'vasā samīke 'bhītim aryo vanuṣāṃ śavāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10690: RV_7,021.10a sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhās tmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10691: RV_7,021.10c vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10692: RV_7,022.01a pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yaṃ te suṣāva haryaśvādriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10694: RV_7,022.02a yas te mado yujyaś cārur asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10695: RV_7,022.02c sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10696: RV_7,022.03a bodhā su me maghavan vācam emāṃ yāṃ te vasiṣṭho arcati praśastim /
GV01rvh1-10u:10698: RV_7,022.04a śrudhī havaṃ vipipānasyādrer bodhā viprasyārcato manīṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10700: RV_7,022.05a na te giro api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutim asuryasya vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:10701: RV_7,022.05c sadā te nāma svayaśo vivakmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10702: RV_7,022.06a bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvām it /
GV01rvh1-10u:10703: RV_7,022.06c māre asman maghavañ jyok kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10704: RV_7,022.07a tubhyed imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10706: RV_7,022.08a nū cin nu te manyamānasya dasmod aśnuvanti mahimānam ugra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10707: RV_7,022.08c na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10708: RV_7,022.09a ye ca pūrva ṛṣayo ye ca nūtnā indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10709: RV_7,022.09c asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10710: RV_7,023.01a ud u brahmāṇy airata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10711: RV_7,023.01c ā yo viśvāni śavasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10712: RV_7,023.02a ayāmi ghoṣa indra devajāmir irajyanta yac churudho vivāci /
GV01rvh1-10u:10713: RV_7,023.02c nahi svam āyuś cikite janeṣu tānīd aṃhāṃsy ati parṣy asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10714: RV_7,023.03a yuje rathaṃ gaveṣaṇaṃ haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10715: RV_7,023.03c vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇy apratī jaghanvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10716: RV_7,023.04a āpaś cit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣann ṛtaṃ jaritāras ta indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:10717: RV_7,023.04c yāhi vāyur na niyuto no acchā tvaṃ hi dhībhir dayase vi vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10718: RV_7,023.05a te tvā madā indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇaṃ tuvirādhasaṃ jaritre /
GV01rvh1-10u:10719: RV_7,023.05c eko devatrā dayase hi martān asmiñ chūra savane mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:10720: RV_7,023.06a eved indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhuṃ vasiṣṭhāso abhy arcanty arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10721: RV_7,023.06c sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10722: RV_7,024.01a yoniṣ ṭa indra sadane akāri tam ā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10723: RV_7,024.01c aso yathā no 'vitā vṛdhe ca dado vasūni mamadaś ca somaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10724: RV_7,024.02a gṛbhītaṃ te mana indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:10725: RV_7,024.02c visṛṣṭadhenā bharate suvṛktir iyam indraṃ johuvatī manīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10726: RV_7,024.03a ā no diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣinn idam barhiḥ somapeyāya yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10727: RV_7,024.03c vahantu tvā harayo madryañcam āṅgūṣam acchā tavasam madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10728: RV_7,024.04a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ sajoṣā brahma juṣāṇo haryaśva yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10729: RV_7,024.04c varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ suśiprāsme dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmam indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:10730: RV_7,024.05a eṣa stomo maha ugrāya vāhe dhurīvātyo na vājayann adhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10731: RV_7,024.05c indra tvāyam arka īṭṭe vasūnāṃ divīva dyām adhi naḥ śromataṃ dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10732: RV_7,024.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10733: RV_7,024.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10734: RV_7,025.01a ā te maha indroty ugra samanyavo yat samaranta senāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10735: RV_7,025.01c patāti didyun naryasya bāhvor mā te mano viṣvadryag vi cārīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10736: RV_7,025.02a ni durga indra śnathihy amitrāṃ abhi ye no martāso amanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10737: RV_7,025.02c āre taṃ śaṃsaṃ kṛṇuhi ninitsor ā no bhara sambharaṇaṃ vasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10738: RV_7,025.03a śataṃ te śiprinn ūtayaḥ sudāse sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta rātir astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10739: RV_7,025.03c jahi vadhar vanuṣo martyasyāsme dyumnam adhi ratnaṃ ca dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10740: RV_7,025.04a tvāvato hīndra kratve asmi tvāvato 'vituḥ śūra rātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10741: RV_7,025.04c viśved ahāni taviṣīva ugraṃ okaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivo na mardhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10742: RV_7,025.05a kutsā ete haryaśvāya śūṣam indre saho devajūtam iyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10743: RV_7,025.05c satrā kṛdhi suhanā śūra vṛtrā vayaṃ tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10744: RV_7,025.06a evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:10745: RV_7,025.06c iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10746: RV_7,026.01a na soma indram asuto mamāda nābrahmāṇo maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10747: RV_7,026.01c tasmā ukthaṃ janaye yaj jujoṣan nṛvan navīyaḥ śṛṇavad yathā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10748: RV_7,026.02a uktha-ukthe soma indram mamāda nīthe-nīthe maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10749: RV_7,026.02c yad īṃ sabādhaḥ pitaraṃ na putrāḥ samānadakṣā avase havante //
GV01rvh1-10u:10750: RV_7,026.03a cakāra tā kṛṇavan nūnam anyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10751: RV_7,026.03c janīr iva patir ekaḥ samāno ni māmṛje pura indraḥ su sarvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10752: RV_7,026.04a evā tam āhur uta śṛṇva indra eko vibhaktā taraṇir maghānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10753: RV_7,026.04c mithastura ūtayo yasya pūrvīr asme bhadrāṇi saścata priyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10754: RV_7,026.05a evā vasiṣṭha indram ūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sute gṛṇāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10755: RV_7,026.05c sahasriṇa upa no māhi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10756: RV_7,027.01a indraṃ naro nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyas tāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10757: RV_7,027.01c śūro nṛṣātā śavasaś cakāna ā gomati vraje bhajā tvaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10758: RV_7,027.02a ya indra śuṣmo maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūta nṛbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10759: RV_7,027.02c tvaṃ hi dṛḷhā maghavan vicetā apā vṛdhi parivṛtaṃ na rādhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10760: RV_7,027.03a indro rājā jagataś carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yad asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10761: RV_7,027.03c tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaś cid arvāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:10762: RV_7,027.04a nū cin na indro maghavā sahūtī dāno vājaṃ ni yamate na ūtī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10763: RV_7,027.04c anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmaṃ nṛbhyo abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10764: RV_7,027.05a nū indra rāye varivas kṛdhī na ā te mano vavṛtyāma maghāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10765: RV_7,027.05c gomad aśvāvad rathavad vyanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10766: RV_7,028.01a brahmā ṇa indropa yāhi vidvān arvāñcas te harayaḥ santu yuktāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10767: RV_7,028.01c viśve cid dhi tvā vihavanta martā asmākam ic chṛṇuhi viśvaminva //
GV01rvh1-10u:10768: RV_7,028.02a havaṃ ta indra mahimā vy ānaḍ brahma yat pāsi śavasinn ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10769: RV_7,028.02c ā yad vajraṃ dadhiṣe hasta ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhā aṣāḷhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10770: RV_7,028.03a tava praṇītīndra johuvānān saṃ yan nṝn na rodasī ninetha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10771: RV_7,028.03c mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe 'tūtujiṃ cit tūtujir aśiśnat //
GV01rvh1-10u:10772: RV_7,028.04a ebhir na indrāhabhir daśasya durmitrāso hi kṣitayaḥ pavante /
GV01rvh1-10u:10773: RV_7,028.04c prati yac caṣṭe anṛtam anenā ava dvitā varuṇo māyī naḥ sāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:10774: RV_7,028.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10775: RV_7,028.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10776: RV_7,029.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunva ā tu pra yāhi harivas tadokāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10777: RV_7,029.01c pibā tv asya suṣutasya cāror dado maghāni maghavann iyānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10778: RV_7,029.02a brahman vīra brahmakṛtiṃ juṣāṇo 'rvācīno haribhir yāhi tūyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10779: RV_7,029.02c asminn ū ṣu savane mādayasvopa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10780: RV_7,029.03a kā te asty araṅkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnaṃ te maghavan dāśema /
GV01rvh1-10u:10781: RV_7,029.03c viśvā matīr ā tatane tvāyādhā ma indra śṛṇavo havemā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10782: RV_7,029.04a uto ghā te puruṣyā id āsan yeṣām pūrveṣām aśṛṇor ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:10783: RV_7,029.04c adhāhaṃ tvā maghavañ johavīmi tvaṃ na indrāsi pramatiḥ piteva //
GV01rvh1-10u:10784: RV_7,029.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10785: RV_7,029.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10786: RV_7,030.01a ā no deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhavā vṛdha indra rāyo asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10787: RV_7,030.01c mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate suvajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra //
GV01rvh1-10u:10788: RV_7,030.02a havanta u tvā havyaṃ vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10789: RV_7,030.02c tvaṃ viśveṣu senyo janeṣu tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi randhayā suhantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10790: RV_7,030.03a ahā yad indra sudinā vyucchān dadho yat ketum upamaṃ samatsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10791: RV_7,030.03c ny agniḥ sīdad asuro na hotā huvāno atra subhagāya devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10792: RV_7,030.04a vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadato maghāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:10793: RV_7,030.04c yacchā sūribhya upamaṃ varūthaṃ svābhuvo jaraṇām aśnavanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10794: RV_7,030.05a vocemed indram maghavānam enam maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadan naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10795: RV_7,030.05c yo arcato brahmakṛtim aviṣṭho yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10796: RV_7,031.01a pra va indrāya mādanaṃ haryaśvāya gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:10798: RV_7,031.02a śaṃsed ukthaṃ sudānava uta dyukṣaṃ yathā naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10800: RV_7,031.03a tvaṃ na indra vājayus tvaṃ gavyuḥ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:10802: RV_7,031.04a vayam indra tvāyavo 'bhi pra ṇonumo vṛṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10803: RV_7,031.04c viddhī tv asya no vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:10804: RV_7,031.05a mā no nide ca vaktave 'ryo randhīr arāvṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10806: RV_7,031.06a tvaṃ varmāsi saprathaḥ puroyodhaś ca vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:10808: RV_7,031.07a mahāṃ utāsi yasya te 'nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10810: RV_7,031.08a taṃ tvā marutvatī pari bhuvad vāṇī sayāvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:10812: RV_7,031.09a ūrdhvāsas tvānv indavo bhuvan dasmam upa dyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10814: RV_7,031.10a pra vo mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10815: RV_7,031.10c viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra carā carṣaṇiprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10816: RV_7,031.11a uruvyacase mahine suvṛktim indrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10817: RV_7,031.11c tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10818: RV_7,031.12a indraṃ vāṇīr anuttamanyum eva satrā rājānaṃ dadhire sahadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:10820: RV_7,032.01a mo ṣu tvā vāghataś canāre asman ni rīraman /
GV01rvh1-10u:10821: RV_7,032.01c ārāttāc cit sadhamādaṃ na ā gahīha vā sann upa śrudhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10822: RV_7,032.02a ime hi te brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣa āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:10823: RV_7,032.02c indre kāmaṃ jaritāro vasūyavo rathe na pādam ā dadhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10824: RV_7,032.03 rāyaskāmo vajrahastaṃ sudakṣiṇam putro na pitaraṃ huve //
GV01rvh1-10u:10825: RV_7,032.04a ima indrāya sunvire somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10826: RV_7,032.04c tāṃ ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyāṃ yāhy oka ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10827: RV_7,032.05a śravac chrutkarṇa īyate vasūnāṃ nū cin no mardhiṣad giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10828: RV_7,032.05c sadyaś cid yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadan nakir ditsantam ā minat //
GV01rvh1-10u:10829: RV_7,032.06a sa vīro apratiṣkuta indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10830: RV_7,032.06c yas te gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunoty ā ca dhāvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:10831: RV_7,032.07a bhavā varūtham maghavan maghonāṃ yat samajāsi śardhataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10832: RV_7,032.07c vi tvāhatasya vedanam bhajemahy ā dūṇāśo bharā gayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10833: RV_7,032.08a sunotā somapāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:10834: RV_7,032.08c pacatā paktīr avase kṛṇudhvam it pṛṇann it pṛṇate mayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10835: RV_7,032.09a mā sredhata somino dakṣatā mahe kṛṇudhvaṃ rāya ātuje /
GV01rvh1-10u:10836: RV_7,032.09c taraṇir ij jayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave //
GV01rvh1-10u:10837: RV_7,032.10a nakiḥ sudāso ratham pary āsa na rīramat /
GV01rvh1-10u:10838: RV_7,032.10c indro yasyāvitā yasya maruto gamat sa gomati vraje //
GV01rvh1-10u:10839: RV_7,032.11a gamad vājaṃ vājayann indra martyo yasya tvam avitā bhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10840: RV_7,032.11c asmākam bodhy avitā rathānām asmākaṃ śūra nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10841: RV_7,032.12a ud in nv asya ricyate 'ṃśo dhanaṃ na jigyuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10842: RV_7,032.12c ya indro harivān na dabhanti taṃ ripo dakṣaṃ dadhāti somini //
GV01rvh1-10u:10843: RV_7,032.13a mantram akharvaṃ sudhitaṃ supeśasaṃ dadhāta yajñiyeṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10844: RV_7,032.13c pūrvīś cana prasitayas taranti taṃ ya indre karmaṇā bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:10845: RV_7,032.14a kas tam indra tvāvasum ā martyo dadharṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:10846: RV_7,032.14c śraddhā it te maghavan pārye divi vājī vājaṃ siṣāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:10847: RV_7,032.15a maghonaḥ sma vṛtrahatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10848: RV_7,032.15c tava praṇītī haryaśva sūribhir viśvā tarema duritā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10849: RV_7,032.16a taved indrāvamaṃ vasu tvam puṣyasi madhyamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10850: RV_7,032.16c satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakiṣ ṭvā goṣu vṛṇvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:10851: RV_7,032.17a tvaṃ viśvasya dhanadā asi śruto ya īm bhavanty ājayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10852: RV_7,032.17c tavāyaṃ viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivo 'vasyur nāma bhikṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:10853: RV_7,032.18a yad indra yāvatas tvam etāvad aham īśīya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10854: RV_7,032.18c stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya //
GV01rvh1-10u:10855: RV_7,032.19a śikṣeyam in mahayate dive-dive rāya ā kuhacidvide /
GV01rvh1-10u:10856: RV_7,032.19c nahi tvad anyan maghavan na āpyaṃ vasyo asti pitā cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:10857: RV_7,032.20a taraṇir it siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10858: RV_7,032.20c ā va indram puruhūtaṃ name girā nemiṃ taṣṭeva sudrvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10859: RV_7,032.21a na duṣṭutī martyo vindate vasu na sredhantaṃ rayir naśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:10860: RV_7,032.21c suśaktir in maghavan tubhyam māvate deṣṇaṃ yat pārye divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10861: RV_7,032.22a abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10862: RV_7,032.22c īśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10863: RV_7,032.23a na tvāvāṃ anyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:10864: RV_7,032.23c aśvāyanto maghavann indra vājino gavyantas tvā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:10865: RV_7,032.24a abhī ṣatas tad ā bharendra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10866: RV_7,032.24c purūvasur hi maghavan sanād asi bhare-bhare ca havyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10867: RV_7,032.25a parā ṇudasva maghavann amitrān suvedā no vasū kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:10868: RV_7,032.25c asmākam bodhy avitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10869: RV_7,032.26a indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10870: RV_7,032.26c śikṣā ṇo asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvā jyotir aśīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10871: RV_7,032.27a mā no ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso ava kramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10872: RV_7,032.27c tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīr apo 'ti śūra tarāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10873: RV_7,033.01a śvityañco mā dakṣiṇataskapardā dhiyañjinvāso abhi hi pramanduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10874: RV_7,033.01c uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣo nṝn na me dūrād avitave vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10875: RV_7,033.02a dūrād indram anayann ā sutena tiro vaiśantam ati pāntam ugram /
GV01rvh1-10u:10876: RV_7,033.02c pāśadyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutād indro 'vṛṇītā vasiṣṭhān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10877: RV_7,033.03a even nu kaṃ sindhum ebhis tatāreven nu kam bhedam ebhir jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:10878: RV_7,033.03c even nu kaṃ dāśarājñe sudāsam prāvad indro brahmaṇā vo vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10879: RV_7,033.04a juṣṭī naro brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇām akṣam avyayaṃ na kilā riṣātha /
GV01rvh1-10u:10880: RV_7,033.04c yac chakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇendre śuṣmam adadhātā vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10881: RV_7,033.05a ud dyām ivet tṛṣṇajo nāthitāso 'dīdhayur dāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10882: RV_7,033.05c vasiṣṭhasya stuvata indro aśrod uruṃ tṛtsubhyo akṛṇod u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10883: RV_7,033.06a daṇḍā ived goajanāsa āsan paricchinnā bharatā arbhakāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10884: RV_7,033.06c abhavac ca puraetā vasiṣṭha ād it tṛtsūnāṃ viśo aprathanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10885: RV_7,033.07a trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retas tisraḥ prajā āryā jyotiragrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10886: RV_7,033.07c trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante sarvāṃ it tāṃ anu vidur vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10887: RV_7,033.08a sūryasyeva vakṣatho jyotir eṣāṃ samudrasyeva mahimā gabhīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10888: RV_7,033.08c vātasyeva prajavo nānyena stomo vasiṣṭhā anvetave vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10889: RV_7,033.09a ta in niṇyaṃ hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasravalśam abhi saṃ caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10890: RV_7,033.09c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayanto 'psarasa upa sedur vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10891: RV_7,033.10a vidyuto jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānam mitrāvaruṇā yad apaśyatāṃ tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10892: RV_7,033.10c tat te janmotaikaṃ vasiṣṭhāgastyo yat tvā viśa ājabhāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:10893: RV_7,033.11a utāsi maitrāvaruṇo vasiṣṭhorvaśyā brahman manaso 'dhi jātaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10894: RV_7,033.11c drapsaṃ skannam brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvādadanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:10895: RV_7,033.12a sa praketa ubhayasya pravidvān sahasradāna uta vā sadānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10896: RV_7,033.12c yamena tatam paridhiṃ vayiṣyann apsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10897: RV_7,033.13a satre ha jātāv iṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10898: RV_7,033.13c tato ha māna ud iyāya madhyāt tato jātam ṛṣim āhur vasiṣṭham //
GV01rvh1-10u:10899: RV_7,033.14a ukthabhṛtaṃ sāmabhṛtam bibharti grāvāṇam bibhrat pra vadāty agre /
GV01rvh1-10u:10900: RV_7,033.14c upainam ādhvaṃ sumanasyamānā ā vo gacchāti pratṛdo vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10901: RV_7,034.01 pra śukraitu devī manīṣā asmat sutaṣṭo ratho na vājī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10902: RV_7,034.02 viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitraṃ śṛṇvanty āpo adha kṣarantīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10903: RV_7,034.03 āpaś cid asmai pinvanta pṛthvīr vṛtreṣu śūrā maṃsanta ugrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10904: RV_7,034.04 ā dhūrṣv asmai dadhātāśvān indro na vajrī hiraṇyabāhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10905: RV_7,034.05 abhi pra sthātāheva yajñaṃ yāteva patman tmanā hinota //
GV01rvh1-10u:10906: RV_7,034.06 tmanā samatsu hinota yajñaṃ dadhāta ketuṃ janāya vīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:10907: RV_7,034.07 ud asya śuṣmād bhānur nārta bibharti bhāram pṛthivī na bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:10908: RV_7,034.08 hvayāmi devāṃ ayātur agne sādhann ṛtena dhiyaṃ dadhāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:10909: RV_7,034.09 abhi vo devīṃ dhiyaṃ dadhidhvam pra vo devatrā vācaṃ kṛṇudhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10910: RV_7,034.10 ā caṣṭa āsām pātho nadīnāṃ varuṇa ugraḥ sahasracakṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10911: RV_7,034.11 rājā rāṣṭrānām peśo nadīnām anuttam asmai kṣatraṃ viśvāyu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10912: RV_7,034.12 aviṣṭo asmān viśvāsu vikṣv adyuṃ kṛṇota śaṃsaṃ ninitsoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10913: RV_7,034.13 vy etu didyud dviṣām aśevā yuyota viṣvag rapas tanūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10914: RV_7,034.14 avīn no agnir havyān namobhiḥ preṣṭho asmā adhāyi stomaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10915: RV_7,034.15 sajūr devebhir apāṃ napātaṃ sakhāyaṃ kṛdhvaṃ śivo no astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10916: RV_7,034.16 abjām ukthair ahiṃ gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnāṃ rajassu ṣīdan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10917: RV_7,034.17 mā no 'hir budhnyo riṣe dhān mā yajño asya sridhad ṛtāyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10918: RV_7,034.18 uta na eṣu nṛṣu śravo dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhanto aryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10919: RV_7,034.19 tapanti śatruṃ svar ṇa bhūmā mahāsenāso amebhir eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10920: RV_7,034.20 ā yan naḥ patnīr gamanty acchā tvaṣṭā supāṇir dadhātu vīrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:10921: RV_7,034.21 prati na stomaṃ tvaṣṭā juṣeta syād asme aramatir vasūyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10922: RV_7,034.22a tā no rāsan rātiṣāco vasūny ā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10923: RV_7,034.22c varūtrībhiḥ suśaraṇo no astu tvaṣṭā sudatro vi dadhātu rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10924: RV_7,034.23a tan no rāyaḥ parvatās tan na āpas tad rātiṣāca oṣadhīr uta dyauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10925: RV_7,034.23c vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣā ubhe rodasī pari pāsato naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10926: RV_7,034.24a anu tad urvī rodasī jihātām anu dyukṣo varuṇa indrasakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10927: RV_7,034.24c anu viśve maruto ye sahāso rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇaṃ dhiyadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:10928: RV_7,034.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:10929: RV_7,034.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10930: RV_7,035.01a śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10931: RV_7,035.01c śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:10932: RV_7,035.02a śaṃ no bhagaḥ śam u naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purandhiḥ śam u santu rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10933: RV_7,035.02c śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥ śaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10934: RV_7,035.03a śaṃ no dhātā śam u dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10935: RV_7,035.03c śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ no devānāṃ suhavāni santu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10936: RV_7,035.04a śaṃ no agnir jyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāv aśvinā śam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10937: RV_7,035.04c śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiro abhi vātu vātaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10938: RV_7,035.05a śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śam antarikṣaṃ dṛśaye no astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10939: RV_7,035.05c śaṃ na oṣadhīr vanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patir astu jiṣṇuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10940: RV_7,035.06a śaṃ na indro vasubhir devo astu śam ādityebhir varuṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10941: RV_7,035.06c śaṃ no rudro rudrebhir jalāṣaḥ śaṃ nas tvaṣṭā gnābhir iha śṛṇotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10942: RV_7,035.07a śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥ śam u santu yajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10943: RV_7,035.07c śaṃ naḥ svarūṇām mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śam v astu vediḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10944: RV_7,035.08a śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā ud etu śaṃ naś catasraḥ pradiśo bhavantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10945: RV_7,035.08c śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śam u santv āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10946: RV_7,035.09a śaṃ no aditir bhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10947: RV_7,035.09c śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śam v astu vāyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10948: RV_7,035.10a śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10949: RV_7,035.10c śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥ kṣetrasya patir astu śambhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10950: RV_7,035.11a śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhir astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10951: RV_7,035.11c śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10952: RV_7,035.12a śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śam u santu gāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10953: RV_7,035.12c śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:10954: RV_7,035.13a śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śaṃ no 'hir budhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10955: RV_7,035.13c śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perur astu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnir bhavatu devagopā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10956: RV_7,035.14a ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantedam brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10957: RV_7,035.14c śṛṇvantu no divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10958: RV_7,035.15a ye devānāṃ yajñiyā yajñiyānām manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10959: RV_7,035.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10960: RV_7,036.01a pra brahmaitu sadanād ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryo gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10961: RV_7,036.01c vi sānunā pṛthivī sasra urvī pṛthu pratīkam adhy edhe agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10962: RV_7,036.02a imāṃ vām mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktim iṣaṃ na kṛṇve asurā navīyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10963: RV_7,036.02c ino vām anyaḥ padavīr adabdho janaṃ ca mitro yatati bruvāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10964: RV_7,036.03a ā vātasya dhrajato ranta ityā apīpayanta dhenavo na sūdāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10965: RV_7,036.03c maho divaḥ sadane jāyamāno 'cikradad vṛṣabhaḥ sasminn ūdhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:10966: RV_7,036.04a girā ya etā yunajad dharī ta indra priyā surathā śūra dhāyū /
GV01rvh1-10u:10967: RV_7,036.04c pra yo manyuṃ ririkṣato mināty ā sukratum aryamaṇaṃ vavṛtyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:10968: RV_7,036.05a yajante asya sakhyaṃ vayaś ca namasvinaḥ sva ṛtasya dhāman /
GV01rvh1-10u:10969: RV_7,036.05c vi pṛkṣo bābadhe nṛbhi stavāna idaṃ namo rudrāya preṣṭham //
GV01rvh1-10u:10970: RV_7,036.06a ā yat sākaṃ yaśaso vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhumātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10971: RV_7,036.06c yāḥ suṣvayanta sudughāḥ sudhārā abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10972: RV_7,036.07a uta tye no maruto mandasānā dhiyaṃ tokaṃ ca vājino 'vantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:10973: RV_7,036.07c mā naḥ pari khyad akṣarā caranty avīvṛdhan yujyaṃ te rayiṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10974: RV_7,036.08a pra vo mahīm aramatiṃ kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇaṃ vidathyaṃ na vīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:10975: RV_7,036.08c bhagaṃ dhiyo 'vitāraṃ no asyāḥ sātau vājaṃ rātiṣācam purandhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:10976: RV_7,036.09a acchāyaṃ vo marutaḥ śloka etv acchā viṣṇuṃ niṣiktapām avobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10977: RV_7,036.09c uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayo dhur yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10978: RV_7,037.01a ā vo vāhiṣṭho vahatu stavadhyai ratho vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10979: RV_7,037.01c abhi tripṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somair made suśiprā mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10980: RV_7,037.02a yūyaṃ ha ratnam maghavatsu dhattha svardṛśa ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:10981: RV_7,037.02c saṃ yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvaṃ vi no rādhāṃsi matibhir dayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:10982: RV_7,037.03a uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇam maho arbhasya vasuno vibhāge /
GV01rvh1-10u:10983: RV_7,037.03c ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:10984: RV_7,037.04a tvam indra svayaśā ṛbhukṣā vājo na sādhur astam eṣy ṛkvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:10985: RV_7,037.04c vayaṃ nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvanto harivo vasiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10986: RV_7,037.05a sanitāsi pravato dāśuṣe cid yābhir viveṣo haryaśva dhībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10987: RV_7,037.05c vavanmā nu te yujyābhir ūtī kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyeḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10988: RV_7,037.06a vāsayasīva vedhasas tvaṃ naḥ kadā na indra vacaso bubodhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10989: RV_7,037.06c astaṃ tātyā dhiyā rayiṃ suvīram pṛkṣo no arvā ny uhīta vājī //
GV01rvh1-10u:10990: RV_7,037.07a abhi yaṃ devī nirṛtiś cid īśe nakṣanta indraṃ śaradaḥ supṛkṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:10991: RV_7,037.07c upa tribandhur jaradaṣṭim ety asvaveśaṃ yaṃ kṛṇavanta martāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10992: RV_7,037.08a ā no rādhāṃsi savita stavadhyā ā rāyo yantu parvatasya rātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:10993: RV_7,037.08c sadā no divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10994: RV_7,038.01a ud u ṣya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīm amatiṃ yām aśiśret /
GV01rvh1-10u:10995: RV_7,038.01c nūnam bhago havyo mānuṣebhir vi yo ratnā purūvasur dadhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:10996: RV_7,038.02a ud u tiṣṭha savitaḥ śrudhy asya hiraṇyapāṇe prabhṛtāv ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:10997: RV_7,038.02c vy urvīm pṛthvīm amatiṃ sṛjāna ā nṛbhyo martabhojanaṃ suvānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:10998: RV_7,038.03a api ṣṭutaḥ savitā devo astu yam ā cid viśve vasavo gṛṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:10999: RV_7,038.03c sa na stomān namasyaś cano dhād viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhir ni sūrīn //
GV01rvh1-10u:11000: RV_7,038.04a abhi yaṃ devy aditir gṛṇāti savaṃ devasya savitur juṣāṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11001: RV_7,038.04c abhi samrājo varuṇo gṛṇanty abhi mitrāso aryamā sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11002: RV_7,038.05a abhi ye mitho vanuṣaḥ sapante rātiṃ divo rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11003: RV_7,038.05c ahir budhnya uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtry ekadhenubhir ni pātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11004: RV_7,038.06a anu tan no jāspatir maṃsīṣṭa ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11005: RV_7,038.06c bhagam ugro 'vase johavīti bhagam anugro adha yāti ratnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11006: RV_7,038.07a śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11007: RV_7,038.07c jambhayanto 'hiṃ vṛkaṃ rakṣāṃsi sanemy asmad yuyavann amīvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11008: RV_7,038.08a vāje-vāje 'vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11009: RV_7,038.08c asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11010: RV_7,039.01a ūrdhvo agniḥ sumatiṃ vasvo aśret pratīcī jūrṇir devatātim eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11011: RV_7,039.01c bhejāte adrī rathyeva panthām ṛtaṃ hotā na iṣito yajāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11012: RV_7,039.02a pra vāvṛje suprayā barhir eṣām ā viśpatīva bīriṭa iyāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:11013: RV_7,039.02c viśām aktor uṣasaḥ pūrvahūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11014: RV_7,039.03a jmayā atra vasavo ranta devā urāv antarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11015: RV_7,039.03c arvāk patha urujrayaḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ śrotā dūtasya jagmuṣo no asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11016: RV_7,039.04a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmāḥ sadhasthaṃ viśve abhi santi devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11017: RV_7,039.04c tāṃ adhvara uśato yakṣy agne śruṣṭī bhagaṃ nāsatyā purandhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:11018: RV_7,039.05a āgne giro diva ā pṛthivyā mitraṃ vaha varuṇam indram agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:11019: RV_7,039.05c āryamaṇam aditiṃ viṣṇum eṣāṃ sarasvatī maruto mādayantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11020: RV_7,039.06a rare havyam matibhir yajñiyānāṃ nakṣat kāmam martyānām asinvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11021: RV_7,039.06c dhātā rayim avidasyaṃ sadāsāṃ sakṣīmahi yujyebhir nu devaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11022: RV_7,039.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11023: RV_7,039.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11024: RV_7,040.01a o śruṣṭir vidathyā sam etu prati stomaṃ dadhīmahi turāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11025: RV_7,040.01c yad adya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāmāsya ratnino vibhāge //
GV01rvh1-10u:11026: RV_7,040.02a mitras tan no varuṇo rodasī ca dyubhaktam indro aryamā dadātu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11027: RV_7,040.02c dideṣṭu devy aditī rekṇo vāyuś ca yan niyuvaite bhagaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:11028: RV_7,040.03a sed ugro astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yam martyam pṛṣadaśvā avātha /
GV01rvh1-10u:11029: RV_7,040.03c utem agniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetāsti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11030: RV_7,040.04a ayaṃ hi netā varuṇa ṛtasya mitro rājāno aryamāpo dhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11031: RV_7,040.04c suhavā devy aditir anarvā te no aṃho ati parṣann ariṣṭān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11032: RV_7,040.05a asya devasya mīḷhuṣo vayā viṣṇor eṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11033: RV_7,040.05c vide hi rudro rudriyam mahitvaṃ yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:11034: RV_7,040.06a mātra pūṣann āghṛṇa irasyo varūtrī yad rātiṣācaś ca rāsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11035: RV_7,040.06c mayobhuvo no arvanto ni pāntu vṛṣṭim parijmā vāto dadātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11036: RV_7,040.07a nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11037: RV_7,040.07c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11038: RV_7,041.01a prātar agnim prātar indraṃ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11039: RV_7,041.01c prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim prātaḥ somam uta rudraṃ huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11040: RV_7,041.02a prātarjitam bhagam ugraṃ huvema vayam putram aditer yo vidhartā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11041: RV_7,041.02c ādhraś cid yam manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yam bhagam bhakṣīty āha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11042: RV_7,041.03a bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11043: RV_7,041.03c bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11044: RV_7,041.04a utedānīm bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11045: RV_7,041.04c utoditā maghavan sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11046: RV_7,041.05a bhaga eva bhagavāṃ astu devās tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:11047: RV_7,041.05c taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11048: RV_7,041.06a sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11049: RV_7,041.06c arvācīnaṃ vasuvidam bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11050: RV_7,041.07a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11051: RV_7,041.07c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11052: RV_7,042.01a pra brahmāṇo aṅgiraso nakṣanta pra krandanur nabhanyasya vetu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11053: RV_7,042.01c pra dhenava udapruto navanta yujyātām adrī adhvarasya peśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11054: RV_7,042.02a sugas te agne sanavitto adhvā yukṣvā sute harito rohitaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11055: RV_7,042.02c ye vā sadmann aruṣā vīravāho huve devānāṃ janimāni sattaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11056: RV_7,042.03a sam u vo yajñam mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandro ririca upāke /
GV01rvh1-10u:11057: RV_7,042.03c yajasva su purvaṇīka devān ā yajñiyām aramatiṃ vavṛtyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11058: RV_7,042.04a yadā vīrasya revato duroṇe syonaśīr atithir āciketat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11059: RV_7,042.04c suprīto agniḥ sudhito dama ā sa viśe dāti vāryam iyatyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:11060: RV_7,042.05a imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva marutsv indre yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11061: RV_7,042.05c ā naktā barhiḥ sadatām uṣāsośantā mitrāvaruṇā yajeha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11062: RV_7,042.06a evāgniṃ sahasyaṃ vasiṣṭho rāyaskāmo viśvapsnyasya staut /
GV01rvh1-10u:11063: RV_7,042.06c iṣaṃ rayim paprathad vājam asme yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11064: RV_7,043.01a pra vo yajñeṣu devayanto arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ pṛthivī iṣadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:11065: RV_7,043.01c yeṣām brahmāṇy asamāni viprā viṣvag viyanti vanino na śākhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11066: RV_7,043.02a pra yajña etu hetvo na saptir ud yacchadhvaṃ samanaso ghṛtācīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11067: RV_7,043.02c stṛṇīta barhir adhvarāya sādhūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūny asthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11068: RV_7,043.03a ā putrāso na mātaraṃ vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāso barhiṣaḥ sadantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11069: RV_7,043.03c ā viśvācī vidathyām anaktv agne mā no devatātā mṛdhas kaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11070: RV_7,043.04a te sīṣapanta joṣam ā yajatrā ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughā duhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11071: RV_7,043.04c jyeṣṭhaṃ vo adya maha ā vasūnām ā gantana samanaso yati ṣṭha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11072: RV_7,043.05a evā no agne vikṣv ā daśasya tvayā vayaṃ sahasāvann āskrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11073: RV_7,043.05c rāyā yujā sadhamādo ariṣṭā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11074: RV_7,044.01a dadhikrāṃ vaḥ prathamam aśvinoṣasam agniṃ samiddham bhagam ūtaye huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:11075: RV_7,044.01c indraṃ viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇas patim ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11076: RV_7,044.02a dadhikrām u namasā bodhayanta udīrāṇā yajñam upaprayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11077: RV_7,044.02c iḷāṃ devīm barhiṣi sādayanto 'śvinā viprā suhavā huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11078: RV_7,044.03a dadhikrāvāṇam bubudhāno agnim upa bruva uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11079: RV_7,044.03c bradhnam māṃścator varuṇasya babhruṃ te viśvāsmad duritā yāvayantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11080: RV_7,044.04a dadhikrāvā prathamo vājy arvāgre rathānām bhavati prajānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11081: RV_7,044.04c saṃvidāna uṣasā sūryeṇādityebhir vasubhir aṅgirobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11082: RV_7,044.05a ā no dadhikrāḥ pathyām anaktv ṛtasya panthām anvetavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:11083: RV_7,044.05c śṛṇotu no daivyaṃ śardho agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣā amūrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11084: RV_7,045.01a ā devo yātu savitā suratno 'ntarikṣaprā vahamāno aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11085: RV_7,045.01c haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi niveśayañ ca prasuvañ ca bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11086: RV_7,045.02a ud asya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divo antāṃ anaṣṭām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11087: RV_7,045.02c nūnaṃ so asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraś cid asmā anu dād apasyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11088: RV_7,045.03a sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣad vasupatir vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:11089: RV_7,045.03c viśrayamāṇo amatim urūcīm martabhojanam adha rāsate naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11090: RV_7,045.04a imā giraḥ savitāraṃ sujihvam pūrṇagabhastim īḷate supāṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:11091: RV_7,045.04c citraṃ vayo bṛhad asme dadhātu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11092: RV_7,046.01a imā rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne /
GV01rvh1-10u:11093: RV_7,046.01c aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigmāyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11094: RV_7,046.02a sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati /
GV01rvh1-10u:11095: RV_7,046.02c avann avantīr upa no duraś carānamīvo rudra jāsu no bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:11096: RV_7,046.03a yā te didyud avasṛṣṭā divas pari kṣmayā carati pari sā vṛṇaktu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11097: RV_7,046.03c sahasraṃ te svapivāta bheṣajā mā nas tokeṣu tanayeṣu rīriṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11098: RV_7,046.04a mā no vadhī rudra mā parā dā mā te bhūma prasitau hīḷitasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11099: RV_7,046.04c ā no bhaja barhiṣi jīvaśaṃse yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11100: RV_7,047.01a āpo yaṃ vaḥ prathamaṃ devayanta indrapānam ūrmim akṛṇvateḷaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11101: RV_7,047.01c taṃ vo vayaṃ śucim aripram adya ghṛtapruṣam madhumantaṃ vanema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11102: RV_7,047.02a tam ūrmim āpo madhumattamaṃ vo 'pāṃ napād avatv āśuhemā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11103: RV_7,047.02c yasminn indro vasubhir mādayāte tam aśyāma devayanto vo adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11104: RV_7,047.03a śatapavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīr devīr devānām api yanti pāthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11105: RV_7,047.03c tā indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyo havyaṃ ghṛtavaj juhota //
GV01rvh1-10u:11106: RV_7,047.04a yāḥ sūryo raśmibhir ātatāna yābhya indro aradad gātum ūrmim /
GV01rvh1-10u:11107: RV_7,047.04c te sindhavo varivo dhātanā no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11108: RV_7,048.01a ṛbhukṣaṇo vājā mādayadhvam asme naro maghavānaḥ sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11109: RV_7,048.01c ā vo 'rvācaḥ kratavo na yātāṃ vibhvo rathaṃ naryaṃ vartayantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11110: RV_7,048.02a ṛbhur ṛbhubhir abhi vaḥ syāma vibhvo vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11111: RV_7,048.02c vājo asmāṃ avatu vājasātāv indreṇa yujā taruṣema vṛtram //
GV01rvh1-10u:11112: RV_7,048.03a te cid dhi pūrvīr abhi santi śāsā viśvāṃ arya uparatāti vanvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11113: RV_7,048.03c indro vibhvāṃ ṛbhukṣā vājo aryaḥ śatror mithatyā kṛṇavan vi nṛmṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11114: RV_7,048.04a nū devāso varivaḥ kartanā no bhūta no viśve 'vase sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11115: RV_7,048.04c sam asme iṣaṃ vasavo dadīran yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11116: RV_7,049.01a samudrajyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānā yanty aniviśamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11117: RV_7,049.01c indro yā vajrī vṛṣabho rarāda tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11118: RV_7,049.02a yā āpo divyā uta vā sravanti khanitrimā uta vā yāḥ svayañjāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11119: RV_7,049.02c samudrārthā yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11120: RV_7,049.03a yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyañ janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11121: RV_7,049.03c madhuścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakās tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11122: RV_7,049.04a yāsu rājā varuṇo yāsu somo viśve devā yāsūrjam madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11123: RV_7,049.04c vaiśvānaro yāsv agniḥ praviṣṭas tā āpo devīr iha mām avantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11124: RV_7,050.01a ā mām mitrāvaruṇeha rakṣataṃ kulāyayad viśvayan mā na ā gan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11125: RV_7,050.01c ajakāvaṃ durdṛśīkaṃ tiro dadhe mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11126: RV_7,050.02a yad vijāman paruṣi vandanam bhuvad aṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11127: RV_7,050.02c agniṣ ṭac chocann apa bādhatām ito mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11128: RV_7,050.03a yac chalmalau bhavati yan nadīṣu yad oṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate viṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11129: RV_7,050.03c viśve devā nir itas tat suvantu mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11130: RV_7,050.04a yāḥ pravato nivata udvata udanvatīr anudakāś ca yāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11131: RV_7,050.04c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ śivā devīr aśipadā bhavantu sarvā nadyo aśimidā bhavantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11132: RV_7,051.01a ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena /
GV01rvh1-10u:11133: RV_7,051.01c anāgāstve adititve turāsa imaṃ yajñaṃ dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11134: RV_7,051.02a ādityāso aditir mādayantām mitro aryamā varuṇo rajiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11135: RV_7,051.02c asmākaṃ santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somam avase no adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11136: RV_7,051.03a ādityā viśve marutaś ca viśve devāś ca viśva ṛbhavaś ca viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:11137: RV_7,051.03c indro agnir aśvinā tuṣṭuvānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11138: RV_7,052.01a ādityāso aditayaḥ syāma pūr devatrā vasavo martyatrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11139: RV_7,052.01c sanema mitrāvaruṇā sananto bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11140: RV_7,052.02a mitras tan no varuṇo māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11141: RV_7,052.02c mā vo bhujemānyajātam eno mā tat karma vasavo yac cayadhve //
GV01rvh1-10u:11142: RV_7,052.03a turaṇyavo 'ṅgiraso nakṣanta ratnaṃ devasya savitur iyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11143: RV_7,052.03c pitā ca tan no mahān yajatro viśve devāḥ samanaso juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:11144: RV_7,053.01a pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādha īḷe bṛhatī yajatre /
GV01rvh1-10u:11145: RV_7,053.01c te cid dhi pūrve kavayo gṛṇantaḥ puro mahī dadhire devaputre //
GV01rvh1-10u:11146: RV_7,053.02a pra pūrvaje pitarā navyasībhir gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sadane ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11147: RV_7,053.02c ā no dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātam mahi vāṃ varūtham //
GV01rvh1-10u:11148: RV_7,053.03a uto hi vāṃ ratnadheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:11149: RV_7,053.03c asme dhattaṃ yad asad askṛdhoyu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11150: RV_7,054.01a vāstoṣ pate prati jānīhy asmān svāveśo anamīvo bhavā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11151: RV_7,054.01c yat tvemahe prati tan no juṣasva śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:11152: RV_7,054.02a vāstoṣ pate prataraṇo na edhi gayasphāno gobhir aśvebhir indo /
GV01rvh1-10u:11153: RV_7,054.02c ajarāsas te sakhye syāma piteva putrān prati no juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:11154: RV_7,054.03a vāstoṣ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11155: RV_7,054.03c pāhi kṣema uta yoge varaṃ no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11156: RV_7,055.01a amīvahā vāstoṣ pate viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11158: RV_7,055.02a yad arjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yacchase /
GV01rvh1-10u:11159: RV_7,055.02c vīva bhrājanta ṛṣṭaya upa srakveṣu bapsato ni ṣu svapa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11160: RV_7,055.03a stenaṃ rāya sārameya taskaraṃ vā punaḥsara /
GV01rvh1-10u:11161: RV_7,055.03c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11162: RV_7,055.04a tvaṃ sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11163: RV_7,055.04c stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān ducchunāyase ni ṣu svapa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11164: RV_7,055.05a sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11165: RV_7,055.05c sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastv ayam abhito janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11166: RV_7,055.06a ya āste yaś ca carati yaś ca paśyati no janaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11167: RV_7,055.06c teṣāṃ saṃ hanmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11168: RV_7,055.07a sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrād udācarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11169: RV_7,055.07c tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janān svāpayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11170: RV_7,055.08a proṣṭheśayā vahyeśayā nārīr yās talpaśīvarīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11171: RV_7,055.08c striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhās tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11172: RV_7,056.01a ka īṃ vyaktā naraḥ sanīḷā rudrasya maryā adha svaśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11173: RV_7,056.02a nakir hy eṣāṃ janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mitho janitram //
GV01rvh1-10u:11174: RV_7,056.03a abhi svapūbhir mitho vapanta vātasvanasaḥ śyenā aspṛdhran //
GV01rvh1-10u:11175: RV_7,056.04a etāni dhīro niṇyā ciketa pṛśnir yad ūdho mahī jabhāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:11176: RV_7,056.05a sā viṭ suvīrā marudbhir astu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11177: RV_7,056.06a yāmaṃ yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślā ojobhir ugrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11178: RV_7,056.07a ugraṃ va oja sthirā śavāṃsy adhā marudbhir gaṇas tuviṣmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11179: RV_7,056.08a śubhro vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhunir munir iva śardhasya dhṛṣṇoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11180: RV_7,056.09a sanemy asmad yuyota didyum mā vo durmatir iha praṇaṅ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11181: RV_7,056.10a priyā vo nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpan maruto vāvaśānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11182: RV_7,056.11a svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ suniṣkā uta svayaṃ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11183: RV_7,056.12a śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11184: RV_7,056.12c ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ chucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11185: RV_7,056.13a aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣassu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11186: RV_7,056.13c vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yacchamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11187: RV_7,056.14a pra budhnyā va īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavas tiradhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11188: RV_7,056.14c sahasriyaṃ damyam bhāgam etaṃ gṛhamedhīyam maruto juṣadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11189: RV_7,056.15a yadi stutasya maruto adhīthetthā viprasya vājino havīman /
GV01rvh1-10u:11190: RV_7,056.15c makṣū rāyaḥ suvīryasya dāta nū cid yam anya ādabhad arāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11191: RV_7,056.16a atyāso na ye marutaḥ svañco yakṣadṛśo na śubhayanta maryāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11192: RV_7,056.16c te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavo na śubhrā vatsāso na prakrīḷinaḥ payodhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11193: RV_7,056.17a daśasyanto no maruto mṛḷantu varivasyanto rodasī sumeke /
GV01rvh1-10u:11194: RV_7,056.17c āre gohā nṛhā vadho vo astu sumnebhir asme vasavo namadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11195: RV_7,056.18a ā vo hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīṃ rātim maruto gṛṇānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11196: RV_7,056.18c ya īvato vṛṣaṇo asti gopāḥ so advayāvī havate va ukthaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11197: RV_7,056.19a ime turam maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasa ā namanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11198: RV_7,056.19c ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato ni pānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11199: RV_7,056.20a ime radhraṃ cin maruto junanti bhṛmiṃ cid yathā vasavo juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:11200: RV_7,056.20c apa bādhadhvaṃ vṛṣaṇas tamāṃsi dhatta viśvaṃ tanayaṃ tokam asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:11201: RV_7,056.21a mā vo dātrān maruto nir arāma mā paścād daghma rathyo vibhāge /
GV01rvh1-10u:11202: RV_7,056.21c ā na spārhe bhajatanā vasavye yad īṃ sujātaṃ vṛṣaṇo vo asti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11203: RV_7,056.22a saṃ yad dhananta manyubhir janāsaḥ śūrā yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11204: RV_7,056.22c adha smā no maruto rudriyāsas trātāro bhūta pṛtanāsv aryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11205: RV_7,056.23a bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇy ukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:11206: RV_7,056.23c marudbhir ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhir it sanitā vājam arvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11207: RV_7,056.24a asme vīro marutaḥ śuṣmy astu janānāṃ yo asuro vidhartā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11208: RV_7,056.24c apo yena sukṣitaye taremādha svam oko abhi vaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11209: RV_7,056.25a tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir āpa oṣadhīr vanino juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:11210: RV_7,056.25c śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11211: RV_7,057.01a madhvo vo nāma mārutaṃ yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11212: RV_7,057.01c ye rejayanti rodasī cid urvī pinvanty utsaṃ yad ayāsur ugrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11213: RV_7,057.02a nicetāro hi maruto gṛṇantam praṇetāro yajamānasya manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:11214: RV_7,057.02c asmākam adya vidatheṣu barhir ā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11215: RV_7,057.03a naitāvad anye maruto yatheme bhrājante rukmair āyudhais tanūbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11216: RV_7,057.03c ā rodasī viśvapiśaḥ piśānāḥ samānam añjy añjate śubhe kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11217: RV_7,057.04a ṛdhak sā vo maruto didyud astu yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:11218: RV_7,057.04c mā vas tasyām api bhūmā yajatrā asme vo astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11219: RV_7,057.05a kṛte cid atra maruto raṇantānavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11220: RV_7,057.05c pra ṇo 'vata sumatibhir yajatrāḥ pra vājebhis tirata puṣyase naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11221: RV_7,057.06a uta stutāso maruto vyantu viśvebhir nāmabhir naro havīṃṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11222: RV_7,057.06c dadāta no amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtā maghāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11223: RV_7,057.07a ā stutāso maruto viśva ūtī acchā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta /
GV01rvh1-10u:11224: RV_7,057.07c ye nas tmanā śatino vardhayanti yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11225: RV_7,058.01a pra sākamukṣe arcatā gaṇāya yo daivyasya dhāmnas tuviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11226: RV_7,058.01c uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākaṃ nirṛter avaṃśāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11227: RV_7,058.02a janūś cid vo marutas tveṣyeṇa bhīmāsas tuvimanyavo 'yāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11228: RV_7,058.02c pra ye mahobhir ojasota santi viśvo vo yāman bhayate svardṛk //
GV01rvh1-10u:11229: RV_7,058.03a bṛhad vayo maghavadbhyo dadhāta jujoṣann in marutaḥ suṣṭutiṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11230: RV_7,058.03c gato nādhvā vi tirāti jantum pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tireta //
GV01rvh1-10u:11231: RV_7,058.04a yuṣmoto vipro marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmoto arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11232: RV_7,058.04c yuṣmotaḥ samrāḷ uta hanti vṛtram pra tad vo astu dhūtayo deṣṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11233: RV_7,058.05a tāṃ ā rudrasya mīḷhuṣo vivāse kuvin naṃsante marutaḥ punar naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11234: RV_7,058.05c yat sasvartā jihīḷire yad āvir ava tad ena īmahe turāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11235: RV_7,058.06a pra sā vāci suṣṭutir maghonām idaṃ sūktam maruto juṣanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:11236: RV_7,058.06c ārāc cid dveṣo vṛṣaṇo yuyota yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11237: RV_7,059.01a yaṃ trāyadhva idam-idaṃ devāso yaṃ ca nayatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:11238: RV_7,059.01c tasmā agne varuṇa mitrāryaman marutaḥ śarma yacchata //
GV01rvh1-10u:11239: RV_7,059.02a yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priya ījānas tarati dviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11240: RV_7,059.02c pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati //
GV01rvh1-10u:11241: RV_7,059.03a nahi vaś caramaṃ cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:11242: RV_7,059.03c asmākam adya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11243: RV_7,059.04a nahi va ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmā arādhvaṃ naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11244: RV_7,059.04c abhi va āvart sumatir navīyasī tūyaṃ yāta pipīṣavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11245: RV_7,059.05a o ṣu ghṛṣvirādhaso yātanāndhāṃsi pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11246: RV_7,059.05c imā vo havyā maruto rare hi kam mo ṣv anyatra gantana //
GV01rvh1-10u:11247: RV_7,059.06a ā ca no barhiḥ sadatāvitā ca na spārhāṇi dātave vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11248: RV_7,059.06c asredhanto marutaḥ somye madhau svāheha mādayādhvai //
GV01rvh1-10u:11249: RV_7,059.07a sasvaś cid dhi tanvaḥ śumbhamānā ā haṃsāso nīlapṛṣṭhā apaptan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11250: RV_7,059.07c viśvaṃ śardho abhito mā ni ṣeda naro na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11251: RV_7,059.08a yo no maruto abhi durhṛṇāyus tiraś cittāni vasavo jighāṃsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:11252: RV_7,059.08c druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā hantanā tam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11253: RV_7,059.09a sāṃtapanā idaṃ havir marutas taj jujuṣṭana /
GV01rvh1-10u:11255: RV_7,059.10a gṛhamedhāsa ā gata maruto māpa bhūtana /
GV01rvh1-10u:11257: RV_7,059.11a iheha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūryatvacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11260: RV_7,059.12c urvārukam iva bandhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11261: RV_7,060.01a yad adya sūrya bravo 'nāgā udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11262: RV_7,060.01c vayaṃ devatrādite syāma tava priyāso aryaman gṛṇantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11263: RV_7,060.02a eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛcakṣā ubhe ud eti sūryo abhi jman /
GV01rvh1-10u:11264: RV_7,060.02c viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca gopā ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā ca paśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:11265: RV_7,060.03a ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthād yā īṃ vahanti sūryaṃ ghṛtācīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11266: RV_7,060.03c dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ saṃ yo yūtheva janimāni caṣṭe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11267: RV_7,060.04a ud vām pṛkṣāso madhumanto asthur ā sūryo aruhac chukram arṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11268: RV_7,060.04c yasmā ādityā adhvano radanti mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11269: RV_7,060.05a ime cetāro anṛtasya bhūrer mitro aryamā varuṇo hi santi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11270: RV_7,060.05c ima ṛtasya vāvṛdhur duroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrā aditer adabdhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11271: RV_7,060.06a ime mitro varuṇo dūḷabhāso 'cetasaṃ cic citayanti dakṣaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11272: RV_7,060.06c api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatantas tiraś cid aṃhaḥ supathā nayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11273: RV_7,060.07a ime divo animiṣā pṛthivyāś cikitvāṃso acetasaṃ nayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11274: RV_7,060.07c pravrāje cin nadyo gādham asti pāraṃ no asya viṣpitasya parṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:11275: RV_7,060.08a yad gopāvad aditiḥ śarma bhadram mitro yacchanti varuṇaḥ sudāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:11276: RV_7,060.08c tasminn ā tokaṃ tanayaṃ dadhānā mā karma devaheḷanaṃ turāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11277: RV_7,060.09a ava vediṃ hotrābhir yajeta ripaḥ kāś cid varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11278: RV_7,060.09c pari dveṣobhir aryamā vṛṇaktūruṃ sudāse vṛṣaṇā u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11279: RV_7,060.10a sasvaś cid dhi samṛtis tveṣy eṣām apīcyena sahasā sahante /
GV01rvh1-10u:11280: RV_7,060.10c yuṣmad bhiyā vṛṣaṇo rejamānā dakṣasya cin mahinā mṛḷatā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11281: RV_7,060.11a yo brahmaṇe sumatim āyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11282: RV_7,060.11c sīkṣanta manyum maghavāno arya uru kṣayāya cakrire sudhātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11283: RV_7,060.12a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri /
GV01rvh1-10u:11284: RV_7,060.12c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11285: RV_7,061.01a ud vāṃ cakṣur varuṇa supratīkaṃ devayor eti sūryas tatanvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11286: RV_7,061.01c abhi yo viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyum martyeṣv ā ciketa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11287: RV_7,061.02a pra vāṃ sa mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvā vipro manmāni dīrghaśrud iyarti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11288: RV_7,061.02c yasya brahmāṇi sukratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ pṛṇaithe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11289: RV_7,061.03a proror mitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra diva ṛṣvād bṛhataḥ sudānū /
GV01rvh1-10u:11290: RV_7,061.03c spaśo dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣv ṛdhag yato animiṣaṃ rakṣamāṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11291: RV_7,061.04a śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmo rodasī badbadhe mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11292: RV_7,061.04c ayan māsā ayajvanām avīrāḥ pra yajñamanmā vṛjanaṃ tirāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:11293: RV_7,061.05a amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇāv imā vāṃ na yāsu citraṃ dadṛśe na yakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11294: RV_7,061.05c druhaḥ sacante anṛtā janānāṃ na vāṃ niṇyāny acite abhūvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:11295: RV_7,061.06a sam u vāṃ yajñam mahayaṃ namobhir huve vām mitrāvaruṇā sabādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11296: RV_7,061.06c pra vām manmāny ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣann imāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11297: RV_7,061.07a iyaṃ deva purohitir yuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāv akāri /
GV01rvh1-10u:11298: RV_7,061.07c viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11299: RV_7,062.01a ut sūryo bṛhad arcīṃṣy aśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11300: RV_7,062.01c samo divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ sukṛtaḥ kartṛbhir bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11301: RV_7,062.02a sa sūrya prati puro na ud gā ebhi stomebhir etaśebhir evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11302: RV_7,062.02c pra no mitrāya varuṇāya voco 'nāgaso aryamṇe agnaye ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:11303: RV_7,062.03a vi naḥ sahasraṃ śurudho radantv ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11304: RV_7,062.03c yacchantu candrā upamaṃ no arkam ā naḥ kāmam pūpurantu stavānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11305: RV_7,062.04a dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ no ye vāṃ jajñuḥ sujanimāna ṛṣve /
GV01rvh1-10u:11306: RV_7,062.04c mā heḷe bhūma varuṇasya vāyor mā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11307: RV_7,062.05a pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase na ā no gavyūtim ukṣataṃ ghṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:11308: RV_7,062.05c ā no jane śravayataṃ yuvānā śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havemā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11309: RV_7,062.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11310: RV_7,062.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11311: RV_7,063.01a ud v eti subhago viśvacakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryo mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11312: RV_7,063.01c cakṣur mitrasya varuṇasya devaś carmeva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11313: RV_7,063.02a ud v eti prasavītā janānām mahān ketur arṇavaḥ sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11314: RV_7,063.02c samānaṃ cakram paryāvivṛtsan yad etaśo vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11315: RV_7,063.03a vibhrājamāna uṣasām upasthād rebhair ud ety anumadyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11316: RV_7,063.03c eṣa me devaḥ savitā cacchanda yaḥ samānaṃ na pramināti dhāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11317: RV_7,063.04a divo rukma urucakṣā ud eti dūrearthas taraṇir bhrājamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11318: RV_7,063.04c nūnaṃ janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtā ayann arthāni kṛṇavann apāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11319: RV_7,063.05a yatrā cakrur amṛtā gātum asmai śyeno na dīyann anv eti pāthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11320: RV_7,063.05c prati vāṃ sūra udite vidhema namobhir mitrāvaruṇota havyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11321: RV_7,063.06a nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nas tmane tokāya varivo dadhantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11322: RV_7,063.06c sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11323: RV_7,064.01a divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyām pra vāṃ ghṛtasya nirṇijo dadīran /
GV01rvh1-10u:11324: RV_7,064.01c havyaṃ no mitro aryamā sujāto rājā sukṣatro varuṇo juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:11325: RV_7,064.02a ā rājānā maha ṛtasya gopā sindhupatī kṣatriyā yātam arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:11326: RV_7,064.02c iḷāṃ no mitrāvaruṇota vṛṣṭim ava diva invataṃ jīradānū //
GV01rvh1-10u:11327: RV_7,064.03a mitras tan no varuṇo devo aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhir nayantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11328: RV_7,064.03c bravad yathā na ād ariḥ sudāsa iṣā madema saha devagopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11329: RV_7,064.04a yo vāṃ gartam manasā takṣad etam ūrdhvāṃ dhītiṃ kṛṇavad dhārayac ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11330: RV_7,064.04c ukṣethām mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tā rājānā sukṣitīs tarpayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11331: RV_7,064.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11332: RV_7,064.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11333: RV_7,065.01a prati vāṃ sūra udite sūktair mitraṃ huve varuṇam pūtadakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11334: RV_7,065.01c yayor asuryam akṣitaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ viśvasya yāmann ācitā jigatnu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11335: RV_7,065.02a tā hi devānām asurā tāv aryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatam ūrjayantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11336: RV_7,065.02c aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayaṃ vāṃ dyāvā ca yatra pīpayann ahā ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:11337: RV_7,065.03a tā bhūripāśāv anṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11338: RV_7,065.03c ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vām apo na nāvā duritā tarema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11339: RV_7,065.04a ā no mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ ghṛtair gavyūtim ukṣatam iḷābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11340: RV_7,065.04c prati vām atra varam ā janāya pṛṇītam udno divyasya cāroḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11341: RV_7,065.05a eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11342: RV_7,065.05c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11343: RV_7,066.01a pra mitrayor varuṇayo stomo na etu śūṣyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11345: RV_7,066.02a yā dhārayanta devāḥ sudakṣā dakṣapitarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11347: RV_7,066.03a tā na stipā tanūpā varuṇa jaritṝṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11349: RV_7,066.04a yad adya sūra udite 'nāgā mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11351: RV_7,066.05a suprāvīr astu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11353: RV_7,066.06a uta svarājo aditir adabdhasya vratasya ye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11355: RV_7,066.07a prati vāṃ sūra udite mitraṃ gṛṇīṣe varuṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11357: RV_7,066.08a rāyā hiraṇyayā matir iyam avṛkāya śavase /
GV01rvh1-10u:11359: RV_7,066.09a te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:11362: RV_7,066.10c trīṇi ye yemur vidathāni dhītibhir viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11363: RV_7,066.11a vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam ād ahar yajñam aktuṃ cād ṛcam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11364: RV_7,066.11c anāpyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā kṣatraṃ rājāna āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:11365: RV_7,066.12a tad vo adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūra udite /
GV01rvh1-10u:11366: RV_7,066.12c yad ohate varuṇo mitro aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11367: RV_7,066.13a ṛtāvāna ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdho ghorāso anṛtadviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11368: RV_7,066.13c teṣāṃ vaḥ sumne succhardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11369: RV_7,066.14a ud u tyad darśataṃ vapur diva eti pratihvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:11370: RV_7,066.14c yad īm āśur vahati deva etaśo viśvasmai cakṣase aram //
GV01rvh1-10u:11371: RV_7,066.15a śīrṣṇaḥ-śīrṣṇo jagatas tasthuṣas patiṃ samayā viśvam ā rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11372: RV_7,066.15c sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryaṃ vahanti harito rathe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11373: RV_7,066.16a tac cakṣur devahitaṃ śukram uccarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11374: RV_7,066.16b paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11375: RV_7,066.17a kāvyebhir adābhyā yātaṃ varuṇa dyumat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11377: RV_7,066.18a divo dhāmabhir varuṇa mitraś cā yātam adruhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11379: RV_7,066.19a ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇāv āhutiṃ narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11381: RV_7,067.01a prati vāṃ rathaṃ nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:11382: RV_7,067.01c yo vāṃ dūto na dhiṣṇyāv ajīgar acchā sūnur na pitarā vivakmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11383: RV_7,067.02a aśocy agniḥ samidhāno asme upo adṛśran tamasaś cid antāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11384: RV_7,067.02c aceti ketur uṣasaḥ purastāc chriye divo duhitur jāyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11385: RV_7,067.03a abhi vāṃ nūnam aśvinā suhotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyā vivakvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11386: RV_7,067.03c pūrvībhir yātam pathyābhir arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena //
GV01rvh1-10u:11387: RV_7,067.04a avor vāṃ nūnam aśvinā yuvākur huve yad vāṃ sute mādhvī vasūyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11388: RV_7,067.04c ā vāṃ vahantu sthavirāso aśvāḥ pibātho asme suṣutā madhūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11389: RV_7,067.05a prācīm u devāśvinā dhiyam me 'mṛdhrāṃ sātaye kṛtaṃ vasūyum /
GV01rvh1-10u:11390: RV_7,067.05c viśvā aviṣṭaṃ vāja ā purandhīs tā naḥ śaktaṃ śacīpatī śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11391: RV_7,067.06a aviṣṭaṃ dhīṣv aśvinā na āsu prajāvad reto ahrayaṃ no astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11392: RV_7,067.06c ā vāṃ toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11393: RV_7,067.07a eṣa sya vām pūrvagatveva sakhye nidhir hito mādhvī rāto asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:11394: RV_7,067.07c aheḷatā manasā yātam arvāg aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11395: RV_7,067.08a ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vāṃ sapta sravato ratho gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:11396: RV_7,067.08c na vāyanti subhvo devayuktā ye vāṃ dhūrṣu taraṇayo vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11397: RV_7,067.09a asaścatā maghavadbhyo hi bhūtaṃ ye rāyā maghadeyaṃ junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11398: RV_7,067.09c pra ye bandhuṃ sūnṛtābhis tirante gavyā pṛñcanto aśvyā maghāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11399: RV_7,067.10a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11400: RV_7,067.10c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11401: RV_7,068.01a ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā svaśvā giro dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11402: RV_7,068.01c havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11403: RV_7,068.02a pra vām andhāṃsi madyāny asthur araṃ gantaṃ haviṣo vītaye me /
GV01rvh1-10u:11404: RV_7,068.02c tiro aryo havanāni śrutaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11405: RV_7,068.03a pra vāṃ ratho manojavā iyarti tiro rajāṃsy aśvinā śatotiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11407: RV_7,068.04a ayaṃ ha yad vāṃ devayā u adrir ūrdhvo vivakti somasud yuvabhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11408: RV_7,068.04c ā valgū vipro vavṛtīta havyaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11409: RV_7,068.05a citraṃ ha yad vām bhojanaṃ nv asti ny atraye mahiṣvantaṃ yuyotam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11410: RV_7,068.05c yo vām omānaṃ dadhate priyaḥ san //
GV01rvh1-10u:11411: RV_7,068.06a uta tyad vāṃ jurate aśvinā bhūc cyavānāya pratītyaṃ havirde /
GV01rvh1-10u:11412: RV_7,068.06c adhi yad varpa itaūti dhatthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11413: RV_7,068.07a uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyo madhye jahur durevāsaḥ samudre /
GV01rvh1-10u:11414: RV_7,068.07c nir īm parṣad arāvā yo yuvākuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11415: RV_7,068.08a vṛkāya cij jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutaṃ śayave hūyamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11416: RV_7,068.08c yāv aghnyām apinvatam apo na staryaṃ cic chakty aśvinā śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11417: RV_7,068.09a eṣa sya kārur jarate sūktair agre budhāna uṣasāṃ sumanmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11418: RV_7,068.09c iṣā taṃ vardhad aghnyā payobhir yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11419: RV_7,069.01a ā vāṃ ratho rodasī badbadhāno hiraṇyayo vṛṣabhir yātv aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11420: RV_7,069.01c ghṛtavartaniḥ pavibhī rucāna iṣāṃ voḷhā nṛpatir vājinīvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11421: RV_7,069.02a sa paprathāno abhi pañca bhūmā trivandhuro manasā yātu yuktaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11422: RV_7,069.02c viśo yena gacchatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmam aśvinā dadhānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11423: RV_7,069.03a svaśvā yaśasā yātam arvāg dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11424: RV_7,069.03c vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11425: RV_7,069.04a yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11426: RV_7,069.04c yad devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vāṃ vayo gāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11427: RV_7,069.05a yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11428: RV_7,069.05c tena naḥ śaṃ yor uṣaso vyuṣṭau ny aśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin //
GV01rvh1-10u:11429: RV_7,069.06a narā gaureva vidyutaṃ tṛṣāṇāsmākam adya savanopa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11430: RV_7,069.06c purutrā hi vām matibhir havante mā vām anye ni yaman devayantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11431: RV_7,069.07a yuvam bhujyum avaviddhaṃ samudra ud ūhathur arṇaso asridhānaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11432: RV_7,069.07c patatribhir aśramair avyathibhir daṃsanābhir aśvinā pārayantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11433: RV_7,069.08a nū me havam ā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartir aśvināv irāvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11434: RV_7,069.08c dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11435: RV_7,070.01a ā viśvavārāśvinā gataṃ naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11436: RV_7,070.01c aśvo na vājī śunapṛṣṭho asthād ā yat sedathur dhruvase na yonim //
GV01rvh1-10u:11437: RV_7,070.02a siṣakti sā vāṃ sumatiś caniṣṭhātāpi gharmo manuṣo duroṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11438: RV_7,070.02c yo vāṃ samudrān saritaḥ piparty etagvā cin na suyujā yujānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11439: RV_7,070.03a yāni sthānāny aśvinā dadhāthe divo yahvīṣv oṣadhīṣu vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11440: RV_7,070.03c ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadanteṣaṃ janāya dāśuṣe vahantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11441: RV_7,070.04a caniṣṭaṃ devā oṣadhīṣv apsu yad yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11442: RV_7,070.04c purūṇi ratnā dadhatau ny asme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathur yugāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11443: RV_7,070.05a śuśruvāṃsā cid aśvinā purūṇy abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11444: RV_7,070.05c prati pra yātaṃ varam ā janāyāsme vām astu sumatiś caniṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11445: RV_7,070.06a yo vāṃ yajño nāsatyā haviṣmān kṛtabrahmā samaryo bhavāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11446: RV_7,070.06c upa pra yātaṃ varam ā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇy ṛcyante yuvabhyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11447: RV_7,070.07a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11448: RV_7,070.07c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11449: RV_7,071.01a apa svasur uṣaso nag jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīr aruṣāya panthām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11450: RV_7,071.01c aśvāmaghā gomaghā vāṃ huvema divā naktaṃ śarum asmad yuyotam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11451: RV_7,071.02a upāyātaṃ dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11452: RV_7,071.02c yuyutam asmad anirām amīvāṃ divā naktam mādhvī trāsīthāṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11453: RV_7,071.03a ā vāṃ ratham avamasyāṃ vyuṣṭau sumnāyavo vṛṣaṇo vartayantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11454: RV_7,071.03c syūmagabhastim ṛtayugbhir aśvair āśvinā vasumantaṃ vahethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11455: RV_7,071.04a yo vāṃ ratho nṛpatī asti voḷhā trivandhuro vasumāṃ usrayāmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11456: RV_7,071.04c ā na enā nāsatyopa yātam abhi yad vāṃ viśvapsnyo jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11457: RV_7,071.05a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ jaraso 'mumuktaṃ ni pedava ūhathur āśum aśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11458: RV_7,071.05c nir aṃhasas tamasa spartam atriṃ ni jāhuṣaṃ śithire dhātam antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11459: RV_7,071.06a iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīr imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11460: RV_7,071.06c imā brahmāṇi yuvayūny agman yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11461: RV_7,072.01a ā gomatā nāsatyā rathenāśvāvatā puruścandreṇa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11462: RV_7,072.01c abhi vāṃ viśvā niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11463: RV_7,072.02a ā no devebhir upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:11464: RV_7,072.02c yuvor hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samāno bandhur uta tasya vittam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11465: RV_7,072.03a ud u stomāso aśvinor abudhrañ jāmi brahmāṇy uṣasaś ca devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11466: RV_7,072.03c āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyeme acchā vipro nāsatyā vivakti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11467: RV_7,072.04a vi ced ucchanty aśvinā uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravo bharante /
GV01rvh1-10u:11468: RV_7,072.04c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred bṛhad agnayaḥ samidhā jarante //
GV01rvh1-10u:11469: RV_7,072.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:11470: RV_7,072.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11471: RV_7,073.01a atāriṣma tamasas pāram asya prati stomaṃ devayanto dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11472: RV_7,073.01c purudaṃsā purutamā purājāmartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11473: RV_7,073.02a ny u priyo manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yo yajate vandate ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11474: RV_7,073.02c aśnītam madhvo aśvinā upāka ā vāṃ voce vidatheṣu prayasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11475: RV_7,073.03a ahema yajñam pathām urāṇā imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11476: RV_7,073.03c śruṣṭīveva preṣito vām abodhi prati stomair jaramāṇo vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11477: RV_7,073.04a upa tyā vahnī gamato viśaṃ no rakṣohaṇā sambhṛtā vīḷupāṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11478: RV_7,073.04c sam andhāṃsy agmata matsarāṇi mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gataṃ śivena //
GV01rvh1-10u:11479: RV_7,073.05a ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād āśvinā yātam adharād udaktāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:11480: RV_7,073.05c ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11481: RV_7,074.01a imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11482: RV_7,074.01c ayaṃ vām ahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃ-viśaṃ hi gacchathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11483: RV_7,074.02a yuvaṃ citraṃ dadathur bhojanaṃ narā codethāṃ sūnṛtāvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:11484: RV_7,074.02c arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11485: RV_7,074.03a ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11486: RV_7,074.03c dugdham payo vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11487: RV_7,074.04a aśvāso ye vām upa dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ yuvāṃ dīyanti bibhrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11488: RV_7,074.04c makṣūyubhir narā hayebhir aśvinā devā yātam asmayū //
GV01rvh1-10u:11489: RV_7,074.05a adhā ha yanto aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11490: RV_7,074.05c tā yaṃsato maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ yaśaś chardir asmabhyaṃ nāsatyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11491: RV_7,074.06a pra ye yayur avṛkāso rathā iva nṛpātāro janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11492: RV_7,074.06c uta svena śavasā śūśuvur nara uta kṣiyanti sukṣitim //
GV01rvh1-10u:11493: RV_7,075.01a vy uṣā āvo divijā ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:11494: RV_7,075.01c apa druhas tama āvar ajuṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyā ajīgaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11495: RV_7,075.02a mahe no adya suvitāya bodhy uṣo mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11496: RV_7,075.02c citraṃ rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehy asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum //
GV01rvh1-10u:11497: RV_7,075.03a ete tye bhānavo darśatāyāś citrā uṣaso amṛtāsa āguḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11498: RV_7,075.03c janayanto daivyāni vratāny āpṛṇanto antarikṣā vy asthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11499: RV_7,075.04a eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyo jigāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11500: RV_7,075.04c abhipaśyantī vayunā janānāṃ divo duhitā bhuvanasya patnī //
GV01rvh1-10u:11501: RV_7,075.05a vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāya īśe vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11502: RV_7,075.05c ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghony uṣā ucchati vahnibhir gṛṇānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11503: RV_7,075.06a prati dyutānām aruṣāso aśvāś citrā adṛśrann uṣasaṃ vahantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11504: RV_7,075.06c yāti śubhrā viśvapiśā rathena dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate janāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11505: RV_7,075.07a satyā satyebhir mahatī mahadbhir devī devebhir yajatā yajatraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11506: RV_7,075.07c rujad dṛḷhāni dadad usriyāṇām prati gāva uṣasaṃ vāvaśanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:11507: RV_7,075.08a nū no gomad vīravad dhehi ratnam uṣo aśvāvat purubhojo asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:11508: RV_7,075.08c mā no barhiḥ puruṣatā nide kar yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11509: RV_7,076.01a ud u jyotir amṛtaṃ viśvajanyaṃ viśvānaraḥ savitā devo aśret /
GV01rvh1-10u:11510: RV_7,076.01c kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣur āvir akar bhuvanaṃ viśvam uṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11511: RV_7,076.02a pra me panthā devayānā adṛśrann amardhanto vasubhir iṣkṛtāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11512: RV_7,076.02c abhūd u ketur uṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcy āgād adhi harmyebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11513: RV_7,076.03a tānīd ahāni bahulāny āsan yā prācīnam uditā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11514: RV_7,076.03c yataḥ pari jāra ivācaranty uṣo dadṛkṣe na punar yatīva //
GV01rvh1-10u:11515: RV_7,076.04a ta id devānāṃ sadhamāda āsann ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11516: RV_7,076.04c gūḷhaṃ jyotiḥ pitaro anv avindan satyamantrā ajanayann uṣāsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11517: RV_7,076.05a samāna ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ saṃ jānate na yatante mithas te /
GV01rvh1-10u:11518: RV_7,076.05c te devānāṃ na minanti vratāny amardhanto vasubhir yādamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11519: RV_7,076.06a prati tvā stomair īḷate vasiṣṭhā uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11520: RV_7,076.06c gavāṃ netrī vājapatnī na ucchoṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:11521: RV_7,076.07a eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānām uṣā ucchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11522: RV_7,076.07c dīrghaśrutaṃ rayim asme dadhānā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11523: RV_7,077.01a upo ruruce yuvatir na yoṣā viśvaṃ jīvam prasuvantī carāyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:11524: RV_7,077.01c abhūd agniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇām akar jyotir bādhamānā tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11525: RV_7,077.02a viśvam pratīcī saprathā ud asthād ruśad vāso bibhratī śukram aśvait /
GV01rvh1-10u:11526: RV_7,077.02c hiraṇyavarṇā sudṛśīkasaṃdṛg gavām mātā netry ahnām aroci //
GV01rvh1-10u:11527: RV_7,077.03a devānāṃ cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetaṃ nayantī sudṛśīkam aśvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11528: RV_7,077.03c uṣā adarśi raśmibhir vyaktā citrāmaghā viśvam anu prabhūtā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11529: RV_7,077.04a antivāmā dūre amitram ucchorvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ kṛdhī naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11530: RV_7,077.04c yāvaya dveṣa ā bharā vasūni codaya rādho gṛṇate maghoni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11531: RV_7,077.05a asme śreṣṭhebhir bhānubhir vi bhāhy uṣo devi pratirantī na āyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11532: RV_7,077.05c iṣaṃ ca no dadhatī viśvavāre gomad aśvāvad rathavac ca rādhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11533: RV_7,077.06a yāṃ tvā divo duhitar vardhayanty uṣaḥ sujāte matibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11534: RV_7,077.06c sāsmāsu dhā rayim ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11535: RV_7,078.01a prati ketavaḥ prathamā adṛśrann ūrdhvā asyā añjayo vi śrayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:11536: RV_7,078.01c uṣo arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmam asmabhyaṃ vakṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11537: RV_7,078.02a prati ṣīm agnir jarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāso matibhir gṛṇantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11538: RV_7,078.02c uṣā yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritāpa devī //
GV01rvh1-10u:11539: RV_7,078.03a etā u tyāḥ praty adṛśran purastāj jyotir yacchantīr uṣaso vibhātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11540: RV_7,078.03c ajījanan sūryaṃ yajñam agnim apācīnaṃ tamo agād ajuṣṭam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11541: RV_7,078.04a aceti divo duhitā maghonī viśve paśyanty uṣasaṃ vibhātīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:11542: RV_7,078.04c āsthād rathaṃ svadhayā yujyamānam ā yam aśvāsaḥ suyujo vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11543: RV_7,078.05a prati tvādya sumanaso budhantāsmākāso maghavāno vayaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11544: RV_7,078.05c tilvilāyadhvam uṣaso vibhātīr yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11545: RV_7,079.01a vy uṣā āvaḥ pathyā janānām pañca kṣitīr mānuṣīr bodhayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11546: RV_7,079.01c susaṃdṛgbhir ukṣabhir bhānum aśred vi sūryo rodasī cakṣasāvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11547: RV_7,079.02a vy añjate divo anteṣv aktūn viśo na yuktā uṣaso yatante /
GV01rvh1-10u:11548: RV_7,079.02c saṃ te gāvas tama ā vartayanti jyotir yacchanti saviteva bāhū //
GV01rvh1-10u:11549: RV_7,079.03a abhūd uṣā indratamā maghony ajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11550: RV_7,079.03c vi divo devī duhitā dadhāty aṅgirastamā sukṛte vasūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11551: RV_7,079.04a tāvad uṣo rādho asmabhyaṃ rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyo arado gṛṇānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11552: RV_7,079.04c yāṃ tvā jajñur vṛṣabhasyā raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duro adrer aurṇoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11553: RV_7,079.05a devaṃ-devaṃ rādhase codayanty asmadryak sūnṛtā īrayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11554: RV_7,079.05c vyucchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11555: RV_7,080.01a prati stomebhir uṣasaṃ vasiṣṭhā gīrbhir viprāsaḥ prathamā abudhran /
GV01rvh1-10u:11556: RV_7,080.01c vivartayantīṃ rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīm bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11557: RV_7,080.02a eṣā syā navyam āyur dadhānā gūḍhvī tamo jyotiṣoṣā abodhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11558: RV_7,080.02c agra eti yuvatir ahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryaṃ yajñam agnim //
GV01rvh1-10u:11559: RV_7,080.03a aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11560: RV_7,080.03c ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11561: RV_7,081.01a praty u adarśy āyaty ucchantī duhitā divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11562: RV_7,081.01c apo mahi vyayati cakṣase tamo jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī //
GV01rvh1-10u:11563: RV_7,081.02a ud usriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacāṃ udyan nakṣatram arcivat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11564: RV_7,081.02c taved uṣo vyuṣi sūryasya ca sam bhaktena gamemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11565: RV_7,081.03a prati tvā duhitar diva uṣo jīrā abhutsmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11566: RV_7,081.03c yā vahasi puru spārhaṃ vananvati ratnaṃ na dāśuṣe mayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11567: RV_7,081.04a ucchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi prakhyai devi svar dṛśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11568: RV_7,081.04c tasyās te ratnabhāja īmahe vayaṃ syāma mātur na sūnavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11569: RV_7,081.05a tac citraṃ rādha ā bharoṣo yad dīrghaśruttamam /
