GV01rvh1-10u:11570: RV_7,081.05c yat te divo duhitar martabhojanaṃ tad rāsva bhunajāmahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:11571: RV_7,081.06a śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanaṃ vājāṃ asmabhyaṃ gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11572: RV_7,081.06c codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvaty uṣā ucchad apa sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11573: RV_7,082.01a indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya no viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11574: RV_7,082.01c dīrghaprayajyum ati yo vanuṣyati vayaṃ jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11575: RV_7,082.02a samrāḷ anyaḥ svarāḷ anya ucyate vām mahāntāv indrāvaruṇā mahāvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:11576: RV_7,082.02c viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani saṃ vām ojo vṛṣaṇā sam balaṃ dadhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11577: RV_7,082.03a anv apāṃ khāny atṛntam ojasā sūryam airayataṃ divi prabhum /
GV01rvh1-10u:11578: RV_7,082.03c indrāvaruṇā made asya māyino 'pinvatam apitaḥ pinvataṃ dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11579: RV_7,082.04a yuvām id yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayo yuvāṃ kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11580: RV_7,082.04c īśānā vasva ubhayasya kārava indrāvaruṇā suhavā havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11581: RV_7,082.05a indrāvaruṇā yad imāni cakrathur viśvā jātāni bhuvanasya majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11582: RV_7,082.05c kṣemeṇa mitro varuṇaṃ duvasyati marudbhir ugraḥ śubham anya īyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:11583: RV_7,082.06a mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣa ojo mimāte dhruvam asya yat svam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11584: RV_7,082.06c ajāmim anyaḥ śnathayantam ātirad dabhrebhir anyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11585: RV_7,082.07a na tam aṃho na duritāni martyam indrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutaś cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:11586: RV_7,082.07c yasya devā gacchatho vītho adhvaraṃ na tam martasya naśate parihvṛtiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11587: RV_7,082.08a arvāṅ narā daivyenāvasā gataṃ śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yadi me jujoṣathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11588: RV_7,082.08c yuvor hi sakhyam uta vā yad āpyam mārḍīkam indrāvaruṇā ni yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11589: RV_7,082.09a asmākam indrāvaruṇā bhare-bhare puroyodhā bhavataṃ kṛṣṭyojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11590: RV_7,082.09c yad vāṃ havanta ubhaye adha spṛdhi naras tokasya tanayasya sātiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11591: RV_7,082.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11592: RV_7,082.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11593: RV_7,083.01a yuvāṃ narā paśyamānāsa āpyam prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthuparśavo yayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11594: RV_7,083.01c dāsā ca vṛtrā hatam āryāṇi ca sudāsam indrāvaruṇāvasāvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11595: RV_7,083.02a yatrā naraḥ samayante kṛtadhvajo yasminn ājā bhavati kiṃ cana priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11596: RV_7,083.02c yatrā bhayante bhuvanā svardṛśas tatrā na indrāvaruṇādhi vocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11597: RV_7,083.03a sam bhūmyā antā dhvasirā adṛkṣatendrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣa āruhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11598: RV_7,083.03c asthur janānām upa mām arātayo 'rvāg avasā havanaśrutā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11599: RV_7,083.04a indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhir aprati bhedaṃ vanvantā pra sudāsam āvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11600: RV_7,083.04c brahmāṇy eṣāṃ śṛṇutaṃ havīmani satyā tṛtsūnām abhavat purohitiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11601: RV_7,083.05a indrāvaruṇāv abhy ā tapanti māghāny aryo vanuṣām arātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11602: RV_7,083.05c yuvaṃ hi vasva ubhayasya rājatho 'dha smā no 'vatam pārye divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11603: RV_7,083.06a yuvāṃ havanta ubhayāsa ājiṣv indraṃ ca vasvo varuṇaṃ ca sātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11604: RV_7,083.06c yatra rājabhir daśabhir nibādhitam pra sudāsam āvataṃ tṛtsubhiḥ saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11605: RV_7,083.07a daśa rājānaḥ samitā ayajyavaḥ sudāsam indrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11606: RV_7,083.07c satyā nṛṇām admasadām upastutir devā eṣām abhavan devahūtiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11607: RV_7,083.08a dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvataḥ sudāsa indrāvaruṇāv aśikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11608: RV_7,083.08c śvityañco yatra namasā kapardino dhiyā dhīvanto asapanta tṛtsavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11609: RV_7,083.09a vṛtrāṇy anyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratāny anyo abhi rakṣate sadā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11610: RV_7,083.09c havāmahe vāṃ vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhir asme indrāvaruṇā śarma yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11611: RV_7,083.10a asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11612: RV_7,083.10c avadhraṃ jyotir aditer ṛtāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ savitur manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11613: RV_7,084.01a ā vāṃ rājānāv adhvare vavṛtyāṃ havyebhir indrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11614: RV_7,084.01c pra vāṃ ghṛtācī bāhvor dadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11615: RV_7,084.02a yuvo rāṣṭram bṛhad invati dyaur yau setṛbhir arajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11616: RV_7,084.02c pari no heḷo varuṇasya vṛjyā uruṃ na indraḥ kṛṇavad u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11617: RV_7,084.03a kṛtaṃ no yajñaṃ vidatheṣu cāruṃ kṛtam brahmāṇi sūriṣu praśastā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11618: RV_7,084.03c upo rayir devajūto na etu pra ṇa spārhābhir ūtibhis tiretam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11619: RV_7,084.04a asme indrāvaruṇā viśvavāraṃ rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantam purukṣum /
GV01rvh1-10u:11620: RV_7,084.04c pra ya ādityo anṛtā mināty amitā śūro dayate vasūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:11621: RV_7,084.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11622: RV_7,084.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11623: RV_7,085.01a punīṣe vām arakṣasam manīṣāṃ somam indrāya varuṇāya juhvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11624: RV_7,085.01c ghṛtapratīkām uṣasaṃ na devīṃ tā no yāmann uruṣyatām abhīke //
GV01rvh1-10u:11625: RV_7,085.02a spardhante vā u devahūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11626: RV_7,085.02c yuvaṃ tāṃ indrāvaruṇāv amitrān hatam parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11627: RV_7,085.03a āpaś cid dhi svayaśasaḥ sadassu devīr indraṃ varuṇaṃ devatā dhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11628: RV_7,085.03c kṛṣṭīr anyo dhārayati praviktā vṛtrāṇy anyo apratīni hanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11629: RV_7,085.04a sa sukratur ṛtacid astu hotā ya āditya śavasā vāṃ namasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11630: RV_7,085.04c āvavartad avase vāṃ haviṣmān asad it sa suvitāya prayasvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11631: RV_7,085.05a iyam indraṃ varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11632: RV_7,085.05c suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11633: RV_7,086.01a dhīrā tv asya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yas tastambha rodasī cid urvī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11634: RV_7,086.01c pra nākam ṛṣvaṃ nunude bṛhantaṃ dvitā nakṣatram paprathac ca bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11635: RV_7,086.02a uta svayā tanvā saṃ vade tat kadā nv antar varuṇe bhuvāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:11636: RV_7,086.02c kim me havyam ahṛṇāno juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkaṃ sumanā abhi khyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11637: RV_7,086.03a pṛcche tad eno varuṇa didṛkṣūpo emi cikituṣo vipṛccham /
GV01rvh1-10u:11638: RV_7,086.03c samānam in me kavayaś cid āhur ayaṃ ha tubhyaṃ varuṇo hṛṇīte //
GV01rvh1-10u:11639: RV_7,086.04a kim āga āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ yat stotāraṃ jighāṃsasi sakhāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11640: RV_7,086.04c pra tan me voco dūḷabha svadhāvo 'va tvānenā namasā tura iyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11641: RV_7,086.05a ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛjā no 'va yā vayaṃ cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11642: RV_7,086.05c ava rājan paśutṛpaṃ na tāyuṃ sṛjā vatsaṃ na dāmno vasiṣṭham //
GV01rvh1-10u:11643: RV_7,086.06a na sa svo dakṣo varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyur vibhīdako acittiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11644: RV_7,086.06c asti jyāyān kanīyasa upāre svapnaś caned anṛtasya prayotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11645: RV_7,086.07a araṃ dāso na mīḷhuṣe karāṇy ahaṃ devāya bhūrṇaye 'nāgāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11646: RV_7,086.07c acetayad acito devo aryo gṛtsaṃ rāye kavitaro junāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11647: RV_7,086.08a ayaṃ su tubhyaṃ varuṇa svadhāvo hṛdi stoma upaśritaś cid astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11648: RV_7,086.08c śaṃ naḥ kṣeme śam u yoge no astu yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11649: RV_7,087.01a radat patho varuṇaḥ sūryāya prārṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11650: RV_7,087.01c sargo na sṛṣṭo arvatīr ṛtāyañ cakāra mahīr avanīr ahabhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11651: RV_7,087.02a ātmā te vāto raja ā navīnot paśur na bhūrṇir yavase sasavān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11652: RV_7,087.02c antar mahī bṛhatī rodasīme viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11653: RV_7,087.03a pari spaśo varuṇasya smadiṣṭā ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke /
GV01rvh1-10u:11654: RV_7,087.03c ṛtāvānaḥ kavayo yajñadhīrāḥ pracetaso ya iṣayanta manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11655: RV_7,087.04a uvāca me varuṇo medhirāya triḥ sapta nāmāghnyā bibharti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11656: RV_7,087.04c vidvān padasya guhyā na vocad yugāya vipra uparāya śikṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:11657: RV_7,087.05a tisro dyāvo nihitā antar asmin tisro bhūmīr uparāḥ ṣaḍvidhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11658: RV_7,087.05c gṛtso rājā varuṇaś cakra etaṃ divi preṅkhaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śubhe kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11659: RV_7,087.06a ava sindhuṃ varuṇo dyaur iva sthād drapso na śveto mṛgas tuviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11660: RV_7,087.06c gambhīraśaṃso rajaso vimānaḥ supārakṣatraḥ sato asya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11661: RV_7,087.07a yo mṛḷayāti cakruṣe cid āgo vayaṃ syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11662: RV_7,087.07c anu vratāny aditer ṛdhanto yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11663: RV_7,088.01a pra śundhyuvaṃ varuṇāya preṣṭhām matiṃ vasiṣṭha mīḷhuṣe bharasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:11664: RV_7,088.01c ya īm arvāñcaṃ karate yajatraṃ sahasrāmaghaṃ vṛṣaṇam bṛhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11665: RV_7,088.02a adhā nv asya saṃdṛśaṃ jaganvān agner anīkaṃ varuṇasya maṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11666: RV_7,088.02c svar yad aśmann adhipā u andho 'bhi mā vapur dṛśaye ninīyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11667: RV_7,088.03a ā yad ruhāva varuṇaś ca nāvam pra yat samudram īrayāva madhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11668: RV_7,088.03c adhi yad apāṃ snubhiś carāva pra preṅkha īṅkhayāvahai śubhe kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11669: RV_7,088.04a vasiṣṭhaṃ ha varuṇo nāvy ādhād ṛṣiṃ cakāra svapā mahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11670: RV_7,088.04c stotāraṃ vipraḥ sudinatve ahnāṃ yān nu dyāvas tatanan yād uṣāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11671: RV_7,088.05a kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yad avṛkam purā cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:11672: RV_7,088.05c bṛhantam mānaṃ varuṇa svadhāvaḥ sahasradvāraṃ jagamā gṛhaṃ te //
GV01rvh1-10u:11673: RV_7,088.06a ya āpir nityo varuṇa priyaḥ san tvām āgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te /
GV01rvh1-10u:11674: RV_7,088.06c mā ta enasvanto yakṣin bhujema yandhi ṣmā vipra stuvate varūtham //
GV01rvh1-10u:11675: RV_7,088.07a dhruvāsu tvāsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyanto vy asmat pāśaṃ varuṇo mumocat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11676: RV_7,088.07c avo vanvānā aditer upasthād yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11677: RV_7,089.01a mo ṣu varuṇa mṛnmayaṃ gṛhaṃ rājann ahaṃ gamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11679: RV_7,089.02a yad emi prasphurann iva dṛtir na dhmāto adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11681: RV_7,089.03a kratvaḥ samaha dīnatā pratīpaṃ jagamā śuce /
GV01rvh1-10u:11683: RV_7,089.04a apām madhye tasthivāṃsaṃ tṛṣṇāvidaj jaritāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:11685: RV_7,089.05a yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidroham manuṣyāś carāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11686: RV_7,089.05c acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā nas tasmād enaso deva rīriṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11687: RV_7,090.01a pra vīrayā śucayo dadrire vām adhvaryubhir madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11688: RV_7,090.01c vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy acchā pibā sutasyāndhaso madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11689: RV_7,090.02a īśānāya prahutiṃ yas ta ānaṭ chuciṃ somaṃ śucipās tubhyaṃ vāyo /
GV01rvh1-10u:11690: RV_7,090.02c kṛṇoṣi tam martyeṣu praśastaṃ jāto-jāto jāyate vājy asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11691: RV_7,090.03a rāye nu yaṃ jajñatū rodasīme rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11692: RV_7,090.03c adha vāyuṃ niyutaḥ saścata svā uta śvetaṃ vasudhitiṃ nireke //
GV01rvh1-10u:11693: RV_7,090.04a ucchann uṣasaḥ sudinā ariprā uru jyotir vividur dīdhyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11694: RV_7,090.04c gavyaṃ cid ūrvam uśijo vi vavrus teṣām anu pradivaḥ sasrur āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11695: RV_7,090.05a te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11696: RV_7,090.05c indravāyū vīravāhaṃ rathaṃ vām īśānayor abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante //
GV01rvh1-10u:11697: RV_7,090.06a īśānāso ye dadhate svar ṇo gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir hiraṇyaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11698: RV_7,090.06c indravāyū sūrayo viśvam āyur arvadbhir vīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11699: RV_7,090.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11700: RV_7,090.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11701: RV_7,091.01a kuvid aṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11702: RV_7,091.01c te vāyave manave bādhitāyāvāsayann uṣasaṃ sūryeṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11703: RV_7,091.02a uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaś ca pāthaḥ śaradaś ca pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11704: RV_7,091.02c indravāyū suṣṭutir vām iyānā mārḍīkam īṭṭe suvitaṃ ca navyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11705: RV_7,091.03a pīvoannāṃ rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11706: RV_7,091.03c te vāyave samanaso vi tasthur viśven naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11707: RV_7,091.04a yāvat taras tanvo yāvad ojo yāvan naraś cakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11708: RV_7,091.04c śuciṃ somaṃ śucipā pātam asme indravāyū sadatam barhir edam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11709: RV_7,091.05a niyuvānā niyuta spārhavīrā indravāyū sarathaṃ yātam arvāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:11710: RV_7,091.05c idaṃ hi vām prabhṛtam madhvo agram adha prīṇānā vi mumuktam asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:11711: RV_7,091.06a yā vāṃ śataṃ niyuto yāḥ sahasram indravāyū viśvavārāḥ sacante /
GV01rvh1-10u:11712: RV_7,091.06c ābhir yātaṃ suvidatrābhir arvāk pātaṃ narā pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11713: RV_7,091.07a arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhir vasiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11714: RV_7,091.07c vājayantaḥ sv avase huvema yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11715: RV_7,092.01a ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā upa naḥ sahasraṃ te niyuto viśvavāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:11716: RV_7,092.01c upo te andho madyam ayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11717: RV_7,092.02a pra sotā jīro adhvareṣv asthāt somam indrāya vāyave pibadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:11718: RV_7,092.02c pra yad vām madhvo agriyam bharanty adhvaryavo devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11719: RV_7,092.03a pra yābhir yāsi dāśvāṃsam acchā niyudbhir vāyav iṣṭaye duroṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11720: RV_7,092.03c ni no rayiṃ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyam aśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11721: RV_7,092.04a ye vāyava indramādanāsa ādevāso nitośanāso aryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11722: RV_7,092.04c ghnanto vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ ṣyāma sāsahvāṃso yudhā nṛbhir amitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11723: RV_7,092.05a ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi yajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11724: RV_7,092.05c vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11725: RV_7,093.01a śuciṃ nu stomaṃ navajātam adyendrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā juṣethām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11726: RV_7,093.01c ubhā hi vāṃ suhavā johavīmi tā vājaṃ sadya uśate dheṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11727: RV_7,093.02a tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtaṃ sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11728: RV_7,093.02c kṣayantau rāyo yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktaṃ vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11729: RV_7,093.03a upo ha yad vidathaṃ vājino gur dhībhir viprāḥ pramatim icchamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11730: RV_7,093.03c arvanto na kāṣṭhāṃ nakṣamāṇā indrāgnī johuvato naras te //
GV01rvh1-10u:11731: RV_7,093.04a gīrbhir vipraḥ pramatim icchamāna īṭṭe rayiṃ yaśasam pūrvabhājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11732: RV_7,093.04c indrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā suvajrā pra no navyebhis tirataṃ deṣṇaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11733: RV_7,093.05a saṃ yan mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite /
GV01rvh1-10u:11734: RV_7,093.05c adevayuṃ vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hataṃ somasutā janena //
GV01rvh1-10u:11735: RV_7,093.06a imām u ṣu somasutim upa na endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11736: RV_7,093.06c nū cid dhi parimamnāthe asmān ā vāṃ śaśvadbhir vavṛtīya vājaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11737: RV_7,093.07a so agna enā namasā samiddho 'cchā mitraṃ varuṇam indraṃ voceḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11738: RV_7,093.07c yat sīm āgaś cakṛmā tat su mṛḷa tad aryamāditiḥ śiśrathantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11739: RV_7,093.08a etā agna āśuṣāṇāsa iṣṭīr yuvoḥ sacābhy aśyāma vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11740: RV_7,093.08c mendro no viṣṇur marutaḥ pari khyan yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11741: RV_7,094.01a iyaṃ vām asya manmana indrāgnī pūrvyastutiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11743: RV_7,094.02a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havam indrāgnī vanataṃ giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11745: RV_7,094.03a mā pāpatvāya no narendrāgnī mābhiśastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11747: RV_7,094.04a indre agnā namo bṛhat suvṛktim erayāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11749: RV_7,094.05a tā hi śaśvanta īḷata itthā viprāsa ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11751: RV_7,094.06a tā vāṃ gīrbhir vipanyavaḥ prayasvanto havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11753: RV_7,094.07a indrāgnī avasā gatam asmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11755: RV_7,094.08a mā kasya no araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṅ martyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11757: RV_7,094.09a gomad dhiraṇyavad vasu yad vām aśvāvad īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11759: RV_7,094.10a yat soma ā sute nara indrāgnī ajohavuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11761: RV_7,094.11a ukthebhir vṛtrahantamā yā mandānā cid ā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11763: RV_7,094.12a tāv id duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ durvidvāṃsaṃ rakṣasvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11764: RV_7,094.12c ābhogaṃ hanmanā hatam udadhiṃ hanmanā hatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11765: RV_7,095.01a pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasra eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇam āyasī pūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11766: RV_7,095.01c prabābadhānā rathyeva yāti viśvā apo mahinā sindhur anyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11767: RV_7,095.02a ekācetat sarasvatī nadīnāṃ śucir yatī giribhya ā samudrāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:11768: RV_7,095.02c rāyaś cetantī bhuvanasya bhūrer ghṛtam payo duduhe nāhuṣāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11769: RV_7,095.03a sa vāvṛdhe naryo yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśur vṛṣabho yajñiyāsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:11770: RV_7,095.03c sa vājinam maghavadbhyo dadhāti vi sātaye tanvam māmṛjīta //
GV01rvh1-10u:11771: RV_7,095.04a uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇopa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:11772: RV_7,095.04c mitajñubhir namasyair iyānā rāyā yujā cid uttarā sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11773: RV_7,095.05a imā juhvānā yuṣmad ā namobhiḥ prati stomaṃ sarasvati juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:11774: RV_7,095.05c tava śarman priyatame dadhānā upa stheyāma śaraṇaṃ na vṛkṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11775: RV_7,095.06a ayam u te sarasvati vasiṣṭho dvārāv ṛtasya subhage vy āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11776: RV_7,095.06c vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11777: RV_7,096.01a bṛhad u gāyiṣe vaco 'suryā nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11778: RV_7,096.01c sarasvatīm in mahayā suvṛktibhi stomair vasiṣṭha rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:11779: RV_7,096.02a ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11780: RV_7,096.02c sā no bodhy avitrī marutsakhā coda rādho maghonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11781: RV_7,096.03a bhadram id bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvaty akavārī cetati vājinīvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11782: RV_7,096.03c gṛṇānā jamadagnivat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭhavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:11783: RV_7,096.04a janīyanto nv agravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11785: RV_7,096.05a ye te sarasva ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11787: RV_7,096.06a pīpivāṃsaṃ sarasvata stanaṃ yo viśvadarśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11789: RV_7,097.01a yajñe divo nṛṣadane pṛthivyā naro yatra devayavo madanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11790: RV_7,097.01c indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gaman madāya prathamaṃ vayaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:11791: RV_7,097.02a ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe 'vāṃsi bṛhaspatir no maha ā sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11792: RV_7,097.02c yathā bhavema mīḷhuṣe anāgā yo no dātā parāvataḥ piteva //
GV01rvh1-10u:11793: RV_7,097.03a tam u jyeṣṭhaṃ namasā havirbhiḥ suśevam brahmaṇas patiṃ gṛṇīṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11794: RV_7,097.03c indraṃ śloko mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yo brahmaṇo devakṛtasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11795: RV_7,097.04a sa ā no yoniṃ sadatu preṣṭho bṛhaspatir viśvavāro yo asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11796: RV_7,097.04c kāmo rāyaḥ suvīryasya taṃ dāt parṣan no ati saścato ariṣṭān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11797: RV_7,097.05a tam ā no arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsur amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11798: RV_7,097.05c śucikrandaṃ yajatam pastyānām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇaṃ huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11799: RV_7,097.06a taṃ śagmāso aruṣāso aśvā bṛhaspatiṃ sahavāho vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11800: RV_7,097.06c sahaś cid yasya nīlavat sadhasthaṃ nabho na rūpam aruṣaṃ vasānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11801: RV_7,097.07a sa hi śuciḥ śatapatraḥ sa śundhyur hiraṇyavāśīr iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11802: RV_7,097.07c bṛhaspatiḥ sa svāveśa ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhya āsutiṃ kariṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11803: RV_7,097.08a devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatiṃ vāvṛdhatur mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11804: RV_7,097.08c dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karad brahmaṇe sutarā sugādhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11805: RV_7,097.09a iyaṃ vām brahmaṇas pate suvṛktir brahmendrāya vajriṇe akāri /
GV01rvh1-10u:11806: RV_7,097.09c aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam purandhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11807: RV_7,097.10a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11808: RV_7,097.10c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11809: RV_7,098.01a adhvaryavo 'ruṇaṃ dugdham aṃśuṃ juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11810: RV_7,098.01c gaurād vedīyāṃ avapānam indro viśvāhed yāti sutasomam icchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:11811: RV_7,098.02a yad dadhiṣe pradivi cārv annaṃ dive-dive pītim id asya vakṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11812: RV_7,098.02c uta hṛdota manasā juṣāṇa uśann indra prasthitān pāhi somān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11813: RV_7,098.03a jajñānaḥ somaṃ sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11814: RV_7,098.03c endra paprāthorv antarikṣaṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11815: RV_7,098.04a yad yodhayā mahato manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11816: RV_7,098.04c yad vā nṛbhir vṛta indrābhiyudhyās taṃ tvayājiṃ sauśravasaṃ jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:11817: RV_7,098.05a prendrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:11818: RV_7,098.05c yaded adevīr asahiṣṭa māyā athābhavat kevalaḥ somo asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:11819: RV_7,098.06a tavedaṃ viśvam abhitaḥ paśavyaṃ yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11820: RV_7,098.06c gavām asi gopatir eka indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11821: RV_7,098.07a bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11822: RV_7,098.07c dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11823: RV_7,099.01a paro mātrayā tanvā vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anv aśnuvanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:11824: RV_7,099.01c ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse //
GV01rvh1-10u:11825: RV_7,099.02a na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa /
GV01rvh1-10u:11826: RV_7,099.02c ud astabhnā nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubham pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11827: RV_7,099.03a irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtaṃ sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11828: RV_7,099.03c vy astabhnā rodasī viṣṇav ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhito mayūkhaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11829: RV_7,099.04a uruṃ yajñāya cakrathur u lokaṃ janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:11830: RV_7,099.04c dāsasya cid vṛṣaśiprasya māyā jaghnathur narā pṛtanājyeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11831: RV_7,099.05a indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puro navatiṃ ca śnathiṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11832: RV_7,099.05c śataṃ varcinaḥ sahasraṃ ca sākaṃ hatho apraty asurasya vīrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11833: RV_7,099.06a iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantorukramā tavasā vardhayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:11834: RV_7,099.06c rare vāṃ stomaṃ vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣo vṛjaneṣv indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:11835: RV_7,099.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11836: RV_7,099.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11837: RV_7,100.01a nū marto dayate saniṣyan yo viṣṇava urugāyāya dāśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11838: RV_7,100.01c pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāta etāvantaṃ naryam āvivāsāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:11839: RV_7,100.02a tvaṃ viṣṇo sumatiṃ viśvajanyām aprayutām evayāvo matiṃ dāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11840: RV_7,100.02c parco yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūrer aśvāvataḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11841: RV_7,100.03a trir devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11842: RV_7,100.03c pra viṣṇur astu tavasas tavīyān tveṣaṃ hy asya sthavirasya nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:11843: RV_7,100.04a vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ kṣetrāya viṣṇur manuṣe daśasyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:11844: RV_7,100.04c dhruvāso asya kīrayo janāsa urukṣitiṃ sujanimā cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:11845: RV_7,100.05a pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāmāryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:11846: RV_7,100.05c taṃ tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam atavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke //
GV01rvh1-10u:11847: RV_7,100.06a kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yad vavakṣe śipiviṣṭo asmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11848: RV_7,100.06c mā varpo asmad apa gūha etad yad anyarūpaḥ samithe babhūtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11849: RV_7,100.07a vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11850: RV_7,100.07c vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11851: RV_7,101.01a tisro vācaḥ pra vada jyotiragrā yā etad duhre madhudogham ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11852: RV_7,101.01c sa vatsaṃ kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnāṃ sadyo jāto vṛṣabho roravīti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11853: RV_7,101.02a yo vardhana oṣadhīnāṃ yo apāṃ yo viśvasya jagato deva īśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11854: RV_7,101.02c sa tridhātu śaraṇaṃ śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ svabhiṣṭy asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:11855: RV_7,101.03a starīr u tvad bhavati sūta u tvad yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11856: RV_7,101.03c pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena putraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11857: RV_7,101.04a yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthus tisro dyāvas tredhā sasrur āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11858: RV_7,101.04c trayaḥ kośāsa upasecanāso madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11859: RV_7,101.05a idaṃ vacaḥ parjanyāya svarāje hṛdo astv antaraṃ taj jujoṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:11860: RV_7,101.05c mayobhuvo vṛṣṭayaḥ santv asme supippalā oṣadhīr devagopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11861: RV_7,101.06a sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnāṃ tasminn ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:11862: RV_7,101.06c tan ma ṛtam pātu śataśāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11863: RV_7,102.01a parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḷhuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11865: RV_7,102.02a yo garbham oṣadhīnāṃ gavāṃ kṛṇoty arvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11867: RV_7,102.03a tasmā id āsye havir juhotā madhumattamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11870: RV_7,103.01c vācam parjanyajinvitām pra maṇḍūkā avādiṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11871: RV_7,103.02a divyā āpo abhi yad enam āyan dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11872: RV_7,103.02c gavām aha na māyur vatsinīnām maṇḍūkānāṃ vagnur atrā sam eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11873: RV_7,103.03a yad īm enāṃ uśato abhy avarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣy āgatāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11874: RV_7,103.03c akhkhalīkṛtyā pitaraṃ na putro anyo anyam upa vadantam eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:11875: RV_7,103.04a anyo anyam anu gṛbhṇāty enor apām prasarge yad amandiṣātām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11876: RV_7,103.04c maṇḍūko yad abhivṛṣṭaḥ kaniṣkan pṛśniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11877: RV_7,103.05a yad eṣām anyo anyasya vācaṃ śāktasyeva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11878: RV_7,103.05c sarvaṃ tad eṣāṃ samṛdheva parva yat suvāco vadathanādhy apsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:11879: RV_7,103.06a gomāyur eko ajamāyur ekaḥ pṛśnir eko harita eka eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11880: RV_7,103.06c samānaṃ nāma bibhrato virūpāḥ purutrā vācam pipiśur vadantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11881: RV_7,103.07a brāhmaṇāso atirātre na some saro na pūrṇam abhito vadantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11882: RV_7,103.07c saṃvatsarasya tad ahaḥ pari ṣṭha yan maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇam babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:11883: RV_7,103.08a brāhmaṇāsaḥ somino vācam akrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11884: RV_7,103.08c adhvaryavo gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānā āvir bhavanti guhyā na ke cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:11885: RV_7,103.09a devahitiṃ jugupur dvādaśasya ṛtuṃ naro na pra minanty ete /
GV01rvh1-10u:11886: RV_7,103.09c saṃvatsare prāvṛṣy āgatāyāṃ taptā gharmā aśnuvate visargam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11887: RV_7,103.10a gomāyur adād ajamāyur adāt pṛśnir adād dharito no vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:11888: RV_7,103.10c gavām maṇḍūkā dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11889: RV_7,104.01a indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ ny arpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11890: RV_7,104.01c parā śṛṇītam acito ny oṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11891: RV_7,104.02a indrāsomā sam aghaśaṃsam abhy aghaṃ tapur yayastu carur agnivāṃ iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:11892: RV_7,104.02c brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattam anavāyaṃ kimīdine //
GV01rvh1-10u:11893: RV_7,104.03a indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antar anārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11894: RV_7,104.03c yathā nātaḥ punar ekaś canodayat tad vām astu sahase manyumac chavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11895: RV_7,104.04a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ sam pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11896: RV_7,104.04c ut takṣataṃ svaryam parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11897: RV_7,104.05a indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas pary agnitaptebhir yuvam aśmahanmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11898: RV_7,104.05c tapurvadhebhir ajarebhir atriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:11899: RV_7,104.06a indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvata iyam matiḥ kakṣyāśveva vājinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11900: RV_7,104.06c yāṃ vāṃ hotrām parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11901: RV_7,104.07a prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhir evair hataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11902: RV_7,104.07c indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūd yo naḥ kadā cid abhidāsati druhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11903: RV_7,104.08a yo mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhir vacobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11904: RV_7,104.08c āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asann astv āsata indra vaktā //
GV01rvh1-10u:11905: RV_7,104.09a ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evair ye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11906: RV_7,104.09c ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nirṛter upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:11907: RV_7,104.10a yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yas tanūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11908: RV_7,104.10c ripu stena steyakṛd dabhram etu ni ṣa hīyatāṃ tanvā tanā ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:11909: RV_7,104.11a paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīr adho astu viśvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11910: RV_7,104.11c prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo no divā dipsati yaś ca naktam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11911: RV_7,104.12a suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya sac cāsac ca vacasī paspṛdhāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:11912: RV_7,104.12c tayor yat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyas tad it somo 'vati hanty āsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:11913: RV_7,104.13a na vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11914: RV_7,104.13c hanti rakṣo hanty āsad vadantam ubhāv indrasya prasitau śayāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:11915: RV_7,104.14a yadi vāham anṛtadeva āsa moghaṃ vā devāṃ apyūhe agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:11916: RV_7,104.14c kim asmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācas te nirṛthaṃ sacantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:11917: RV_7,104.15a adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyus tatapa pūruṣasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:11918: RV_7,104.15c adhā sa vīrair daśabhir vi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānety āha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11919: RV_7,104.16a yo māyātuṃ yātudhānety āha yo vā rakṣāḥ śucir asmīty āha /
GV01rvh1-10u:11920: RV_7,104.16c indras taṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantor adhamas padīṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11921: RV_7,104.17a pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktam apa druhā tanvaṃ gūhamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11922: RV_7,104.17c vavrāṃ anantāṃ ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11923: RV_7,104.18a vi tiṣṭhadhvam maruto vikṣv icchata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭana /
GV01rvh1-10u:11924: RV_7,104.18c vayo ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhir ye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:11925: RV_7,104.19a pra vartaya divo aśmānam indra somaśitam maghavan saṃ śiśādhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11926: RV_7,104.19c prāktād apāktād adharād udaktād abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena //
GV01rvh1-10u:11927: RV_7,104.20a eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11928: RV_7,104.20c śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjad aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11929: RV_7,104.21a indro yātūnām abhavat parāśaro havirmathīnām abhy āvivāsatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11930: RV_7,104.21c abhīd u śakraḥ paraśur yathā vanam pātreva bhindan sata eti rakṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11931: RV_7,104.22a ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātum uta kokayātum /
GV01rvh1-10u:11932: RV_7,104.22c suparṇayātum uta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:11933: RV_7,104.23a mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatām apocchatu mithunā yā kimīdinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11934: RV_7,104.23c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:11935: RV_7,104.24a indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11936: RV_7,104.24c vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśan sūryam uccarantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11937: RV_7,104.25a prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraś ca soma jāgṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11938: RV_7,104.25c rakṣobhyo vadham asyatam aśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11941: RV_8,001.01a mā cid anyad vi śaṃsata sakhāyo mā riṣaṇyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:11942: RV_8,001.01c indram it stotā vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute muhur ukthā ca śaṃsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:11943: RV_8,001.02a avakrakṣiṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yathājuraṃ gāṃ na carṣaṇīsaham /
GV01rvh1-10u:11945: RV_8,001.03a yac cid dhi tvā janā ime nānā havanta ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11946: RV_8,001.03c asmākam brahmedam indra bhūtu te 'hā viśvā ca vardhanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11947: RV_8,001.04a vi tartūryante maghavan vipaścito 'ryo vipo janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11948: RV_8,001.04c upa kramasva pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:11949: RV_8,001.05a mahe cana tvām adrivaḥ parā śulkāya deyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:11950: RV_8,001.05c na sahasrāya nāyutāya vajrivo na śatāya śatāmagha //
GV01rvh1-10u:11951: RV_8,001.06a vasyāṃ indrāsi me pitur uta bhrātur abhuñjataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11952: RV_8,001.06c mātā ca me chadayathaḥ samā vaso vasutvanāya rādhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:11953: RV_8,001.07a kveyatha kved asi purutrā cid dhi te manaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11954: RV_8,001.07c alarṣi yudhma khajakṛt purandara pra gāyatrā agāsiṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11955: RV_8,001.08a prāsmai gāyatram arcata vāvātur yaḥ purandaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11956: RV_8,001.08c yābhiḥ kāṇvasyopa barhir āsadaṃ yāsad vajrī bhinat puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11957: RV_8,001.09a ye te santi daśagvinaḥ śatino ye sahasriṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11958: RV_8,001.09c aśvāso ye te vṛṣaṇo raghudruvas tebhir nas tūyam ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11959: RV_8,001.10a ā tv adya sabardughāṃ huve gāyatravepasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11960: RV_8,001.10c indraṃ dhenuṃ sudughām anyām iṣam urudhārām araṅkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11961: RV_8,001.11a yat tudat sūra etaśaṃ vaṅkū vātasya parṇinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11962: RV_8,001.11c vahat kutsam ārjuneyaṃ śatakratuḥ tsarad gandharvam astṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:11963: RV_8,001.12a ya ṛte cid abhiśriṣaḥ purā jatrubhya ātṛdaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11964: RV_8,001.12c saṃdhātā saṃdhim maghavā purūvasur iṣkartā vihrutam punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11965: RV_8,001.13a mā bhūma niṣṭyā ivendra tvad araṇā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:11966: RV_8,001.13c vanāni na prajahitāny adrivo duroṣāso amanmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11968: RV_8,001.14c sakṛt su te mahatā śūra rādhasā anu stomam mudīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:11969: RV_8,001.15a yadi stomam mama śravad asmākam indram indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11970: RV_8,001.15c tiraḥ pavitraṃ sasṛvāṃsa āśavo mandantu tugryāvṛdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11971: RV_8,001.16a ā tv adya sadhastutiṃ vāvātuḥ sakhyur ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11972: RV_8,001.16c upastutir maghonām pra tvāvatv adhā te vaśmi suṣṭutim //
GV01rvh1-10u:11973: RV_8,001.17a sotā hi somam adribhir em enam apsu dhāvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:11974: RV_8,001.17c gavyā vastreva vāsayanta in naro nir dhukṣan vakṣaṇābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11975: RV_8,001.18a adha jmo adha vā divo bṛhato rocanād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:11976: RV_8,001.18c ayā vardhasva tanvā girā mamā jātā sukrato pṛṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:11977: RV_8,001.19a indrāya su madintamaṃ somaṃ sotā vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:11978: RV_8,001.19c śakra eṇam pīpayad viśvayā dhiyā hinvānaṃ na vājayum //
GV01rvh1-10u:11979: RV_8,001.20a mā tvā somasya galdayā sadā yācann ahaṃ girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11980: RV_8,001.20c bhūrṇim mṛgaṃ na savaneṣu cukrudhaṃ ka īśānaṃ na yāciṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:11981: RV_8,001.21a madeneṣitam madam ugram ugreṇa śavasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11982: RV_8,001.21c viśveṣāṃ tarutāram madacyutam made hi ṣmā dadāti naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11983: RV_8,001.22a śevāre vāryā puru devo martāya dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:11984: RV_8,001.22c sa sunvate ca stuvate ca rāsate viśvagūrto ariṣṭutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11985: RV_8,001.23a endra yāhi matsva citreṇa deva rādhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11986: RV_8,001.23c saro na prāsy udaraṃ sapītibhir ā somebhir uru sphiram //
GV01rvh1-10u:11987: RV_8,001.24a ā tvā sahasram ā śataṃ yuktā rathe hiraṇyaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:11988: RV_8,001.24c brahmayujo haraya indra keśino vahantu somapītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:11989: RV_8,001.25a ā tvā rathe hiraṇyaye harī mayūraśepyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:11990: RV_8,001.25c śitipṛṣṭhā vahatām madhvo andhaso vivakṣaṇasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:11991: RV_8,001.26a pibā tv asya girvaṇaḥ sutasya pūrvapā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:11992: RV_8,001.26c pariṣkṛtasya rasina iyam āsutiś cārur madāya patyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:11993: RV_8,001.27a ya eko asti daṃsanā mahāṃ ugro abhi vrataiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11994: RV_8,001.27c gamat sa śiprī na sa yoṣad ā gamad dhavaṃ na pari varjati //
GV01rvh1-10u:11995: RV_8,001.28a tvam puraṃ cariṣṇvaṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇasya sam piṇak /
GV01rvh1-10u:11996: RV_8,001.28c tvam bhā anu caro adha dvitā yad indra havyo bhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:11997: RV_8,001.29a mama tvā sūra udite mama madhyandine divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:11998: RV_8,001.29c mama prapitve apiśarvare vasav ā stomāso avṛtsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:11999: RV_8,001.30a stuhi stuhīd ete ghā te maṃhiṣṭhāso maghonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12000: RV_8,001.30c ninditāśvaḥ prapathī paramajyā maghasya medhyātithe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12001: RV_8,001.31a ā yad aśvān vananvataḥ śraddhayāhaṃ rathe ruham /
GV01rvh1-10u:12002: RV_8,001.31c uta vāmasya vasunaś ciketati yo asti yādvaḥ paśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12003: RV_8,001.32a ya ṛjrā mahyam māmahe saha tvacā hiraṇyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12004: RV_8,001.32c eṣa viśvāny abhy astu saubhagāsaṅgasya svanadrathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12005: RV_8,001.33a adha plāyogir ati dāsad anyān āsaṅgo agne daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12006: RV_8,001.33c adhokṣaṇo daśa mahyaṃ ruśanto naḷā iva saraso nir atiṣṭhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:12007: RV_8,001.34a anv asya sthūraṃ dadṛśe purastād anastha ūrur avarambamāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12008: RV_8,001.34c śaśvatī nāry abhicakṣyāha subhadram arya bhojanam bibharṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12009: RV_8,002.01a idaṃ vaso sutam andhaḥ pibā supūrṇam udaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:12011: RV_8,002.02a nṛbhir dhūtaḥ suto aśnair avyo vāraiḥ paripūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12013: RV_8,002.03a taṃ te yavaṃ yathā gobhiḥ svādum akarma śrīṇantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12015: RV_8,002.04a indra it somapā eka indraḥ sutapā viśvāyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12017: RV_8,002.05a na yaṃ śukro na durāśīr na tṛprā uruvyacasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12019: RV_8,002.06a gobhir yad īm anye asman mṛgaṃ na vrā mṛgayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:12021: RV_8,002.07a traya indrasya somāḥ sutāsaḥ santu devasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12023: RV_8,002.08a trayaḥ kośāsa ścotanti tisraś camvaḥ supūrṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12025: RV_8,002.09a śucir asi puruniṣṭhāḥ kṣīrair madhyata āśīrtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12027: RV_8,002.10a ime ta indra somās tīvrā asme sutāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12029: RV_8,002.11a tāṃ āśiram puroḷāśam indremaṃ somaṃ śrīṇīhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12031: RV_8,002.12a hṛtsu pītāso yudhyante durmadāso na surāyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12033: RV_8,002.13a revāṃ id revata stotā syāt tvāvato maghonaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12035: RV_8,002.14a ukthaṃ cana śasyamānam agor arir ā ciketa /
GV01rvh1-10u:12037: RV_8,002.15a mā na indra pīyatnave mā śardhate parā dāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12039: RV_8,002.16a vayam u tvā tadidarthā indra tvāyantaḥ sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12041: RV_8,002.17a na ghem anyad ā papana vajrinn apaso naviṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:12043: RV_8,002.18a icchanti devāḥ sunvantaṃ na svapnāya spṛhayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:12045: RV_8,002.19a o ṣu pra yāhi vājebhir mā hṛṇīthā abhy asmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:12047: RV_8,002.20a mo ṣv adya durhaṇāvān sāyaṃ karad āre asmat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12049: RV_8,002.21a vidmā hy asya vīrasya bhūridāvarīṃ sumatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12051: RV_8,002.22a ā tū ṣiñca kaṇvamantaṃ na ghā vidma śavasānāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:12053: RV_8,002.23a jyeṣṭhena sotar indrāya somaṃ vīrāya śakrāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12055: RV_8,002.24a yo vediṣṭho avyathiṣv aśvāvantaṃ jaritṛbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12057: RV_8,002.25a panyam-panyam it sotāra ā dhāvata madyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12059: RV_8,002.26a pātā vṛtrahā sutam ā ghā gaman nāre asmat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12061: RV_8,002.27a eha harī brahmayujā śagmā vakṣataḥ sakhāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12063: RV_8,002.28a svādavaḥ somā ā yāhi śrītāḥ somā ā yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12064: RV_8,002.28c śiprinn ṛṣīvaḥ śacīvo nāyam acchā sadhamādam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12065: RV_8,002.29a stutaś ca yās tvā vardhanti mahe rādhase nṛmṇāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12067: RV_8,002.30a giraś ca yās te girvāha ukthā ca tubhyaṃ tāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:12069: RV_8,002.31a eved eṣa tuvikūrmir vājāṃ eko vajrahastaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12071: RV_8,002.32a hantā vṛtraṃ dakṣiṇenendraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12073: RV_8,002.33a yasmin viśvāś carṣaṇaya uta cyautnā jrayāṃsi ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:12075: RV_8,002.34a eṣa etāni cakārendro viśvā yo 'ti śṛṇve /
GV01rvh1-10u:12077: RV_8,002.35a prabhartā rathaṃ gavyantam apākāc cid yam avati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12078: RV_8,002.35c ino vasu sa hi voḷhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12079: RV_8,002.36a sanitā vipro arvadbhir hantā vṛtraṃ nṛbhiḥ śūraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12081: RV_8,002.37a yajadhvainam priyamedhā indraṃ satrācā manasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12085: RV_8,002.39a ya ṛte cid gās padebhyo dāt sakhā nṛbhyaḥ śacīvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:12087: RV_8,002.40a itthā dhīvantam adrivaḥ kāṇvam medhyātithim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12089: RV_8,002.41a śikṣā vibhindo asmai catvāry ayutā dadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12091: RV_8,002.42a uta su tye payovṛdhā mākī raṇasya naptyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12093: RV_8,003.01a pibā sutasya rasino matsvā na indra gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12094: RV_8,003.01c āpir no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe 'smāṃ avantu te dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12095: RV_8,003.02a bhūyāma te sumatau vājino vayam mā na star abhimātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12096: RV_8,003.02c asmāñ citrābhir avatād abhiṣṭibhir ā naḥ sumneṣu yāmaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:12097: RV_8,003.03a imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama /
GV01rvh1-10u:12098: RV_8,003.03c pāvakavarṇāḥ śucayo vipaścito 'bhi stomair anūṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:12099: RV_8,003.04a ayaṃ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12100: RV_8,003.04c satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12101: RV_8,003.05a indram id devatātaya indram prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:12102: RV_8,003.05c indraṃ samīke vanino havāmaha indraṃ dhanasya sātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12103: RV_8,003.06a indro mahnā rodasī paprathac chava indraḥ sūryam arocayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12104: RV_8,003.06c indre ha viśvā bhuvanāni yemira indre suvānāsa indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12105: RV_8,003.07a abhi tvā pūrvapītaya indra stomebhir āyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12106: RV_8,003.07c samīcīnāsa ṛbhavaḥ sam asvaran rudrā gṛṇanta pūrvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12107: RV_8,003.08a asyed indro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12108: RV_8,003.08c adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12109: RV_8,003.09a tat tvā yāmi suvīryaṃ tad brahma pūrvacittaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12110: RV_8,003.09c yenā yatibhyo bhṛgave dhane hite yena praskaṇvam āvitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:12111: RV_8,003.10a yenā samudram asṛjo mahīr apas tad indra vṛṣṇi te śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12112: RV_8,003.10c sadyaḥ so asya mahimā na saṃnaśe yaṃ kṣoṇīr anucakrade //
GV01rvh1-10u:12113: RV_8,003.11a śagdhī na indra yat tvā rayiṃ yāmi suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12114: RV_8,003.11c śagdhi vājāya prathamaṃ siṣāsate śagdhi stomāya pūrvya //
GV01rvh1-10u:12115: RV_8,003.12a śagdhī no asya yad dha pauram āvitha dhiya indra siṣāsataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12116: RV_8,003.12c śagdhi yathā ruśamaṃ śyāvakaṃ kṛpam indra prāvaḥ svarṇaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:12117: RV_8,003.13a kan navyo atasīnāṃ turo gṛṇīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12118: RV_8,003.13c nahī nv asya mahimānam indriyaṃ svar gṛṇanta ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12119: RV_8,003.14a kad u stuvanta ṛtayanta devata ṛṣiḥ ko vipra ohate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12120: RV_8,003.14c kadā havam maghavann indra sunvataḥ kad u stuvata ā gamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12121: RV_8,003.15a ud u tye madhumattamā gira stomāsa īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12122: RV_8,003.15c satrājito dhanasā akṣitotayo vājayanto rathā iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:12123: RV_8,003.16a kaṇvā iva bhṛgavaḥ sūryā iva viśvam id dhītam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12124: RV_8,003.16c indraṃ stomebhir mahayanta āyavaḥ priyamedhāso asvaran //
GV01rvh1-10u:12125: RV_8,003.17a yukṣvā hi vṛtrahantama harī indra parāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12126: RV_8,003.17c arvācīno maghavan somapītaya ugra ṛṣvebhir ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12127: RV_8,003.18a ime hi te kāravo vāvaśur dhiyā viprāso medhasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12128: RV_8,003.18c sa tvaṃ no maghavann indra girvaṇo veno na śṛṇudhī havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12129: RV_8,003.19a nir indra bṛhatībhyo vṛtraṃ dhanubhyo asphuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12130: RV_8,003.19c nir arbudasya mṛgayasya māyino niḥ parvatasya gā ājaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12131: RV_8,003.20a nir agnayo rurucur nir u sūryo niḥ soma indriyo rasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12132: RV_8,003.20c nir antarikṣād adhamo mahām ahiṃ kṛṣe tad indra pauṃsyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12133: RV_8,003.21a yam me dur indro marutaḥ pākasthāmā kaurayāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12134: RV_8,003.21c viśveṣāṃ tmanā śobhiṣṭham upeva divi dhāvamānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12135: RV_8,003.22a rohitam me pākasthāmā sudhuraṃ kakṣyaprām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12137: RV_8,003.23a yasmā anye daśa prati dhuraṃ vahanti vahnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12139: RV_8,003.24a ātmā pitus tanūr vāsa ojodā abhyañjanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12140: RV_8,003.24c turīyam id rohitasya pākasthāmānam bhojaṃ dātāram abravam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12141: RV_8,004.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12142: RV_8,004.01c simā purū nṛṣūto asy ānave 'si praśardha turvaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12143: RV_8,004.02a yad vā rume ruśame śyāvake kṛpa indra mādayase sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12144: RV_8,004.02c kaṇvāsas tvā brahmabhi stomavāhasa indrā yacchanty ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12145: RV_8,004.03a yathā gauro apā kṛtaṃ tṛṣyann ety averiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12146: RV_8,004.03c āpitve naḥ prapitve tūyam ā gahi kaṇveṣu su sacā piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:12147: RV_8,004.04a mandantu tvā maghavann indrendavo rādhodeyāya sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12148: RV_8,004.04c āmuṣyā somam apibaś camū sutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ tad dadhiṣe sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12149: RV_8,004.05a pra cakre sahasā saho babhañja manyum ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12150: RV_8,004.05c viśve ta indra pṛtanāyavo yaho ni vṛkṣā iva yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12151: RV_8,004.06a sahasreṇeva sacate yavīyudhā yas ta ānaḷ upastutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12152: RV_8,004.06c putram prāvargaṃ kṛṇute suvīrye dāśnoti namauktibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12153: RV_8,004.07a mā bhema mā śramiṣmograsya sakhye tava /
GV01rvh1-10u:12154: RV_8,004.07c mahat te vṛṣṇo abhicakṣyaṃ kṛtam paśyema turvaśaṃ yadum //
GV01rvh1-10u:12155: RV_8,004.08a savyām anu sphigyaṃ vāvase vṛṣā na dāno asya roṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12156: RV_8,004.08c madhvā sampṛktāḥ sāragheṇa dhenavas tūyam ehi dravā piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:12157: RV_8,004.09a aśvī rathī surūpa id gomāṃ id indra te sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12158: RV_8,004.09c śvātrabhājā vayasā sacate sadā candro yāti sabhām upa //
GV01rvh1-10u:12159: RV_8,004.10a ṛśyo na tṛṣyann avapānam ā gahi pibā somaṃ vaśāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12160: RV_8,004.10c nimeghamāno maghavan dive-diva ojiṣṭhaṃ dadhiṣe sahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12161: RV_8,004.11a adhvaryo drāvayā tvaṃ somam indraḥ pipāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12162: RV_8,004.11c upa nūnaṃ yuyuje vṛṣaṇā harī ā ca jagāma vṛtrahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12163: RV_8,004.12a svayaṃ cit sa manyate dāśurir jano yatrā somasya tṛmpasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12164: RV_8,004.12c idaṃ te annaṃ yujyaṃ samukṣitaṃ tasyehi pra dravā piba //
GV01rvh1-10u:12166: RV_8,004.13c adhi bradhnasyādrayo vi cakṣate sunvanto dāśvadhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:12167: RV_8,004.14a upa bradhnaṃ vāvātā vṛṣaṇā harī indram apasu vakṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12168: RV_8,004.14c arvāñcaṃ tvā saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savaned upa //
GV01rvh1-10u:12169: RV_8,004.15a pra pūṣaṇaṃ vṛṇīmahe yujyāya purūvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:12170: RV_8,004.15c sa śakra śikṣa puruhūta no dhiyā tuje rāye vimocana //
GV01rvh1-10u:12171: RV_8,004.16a saṃ naḥ śiśīhi bhurijor iva kṣuraṃ rāsva rāyo vimocana /
GV01rvh1-10u:12172: RV_8,004.16c tve tan naḥ suvedam usriyaṃ vasu yaṃ tvaṃ hinoṣi martyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12173: RV_8,004.17a vemi tvā pūṣann ṛñjase vemi stotava āghṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12174: RV_8,004.17c na tasya vemy araṇaṃ hi tad vaso stuṣe pajrāya sāmne //
GV01rvh1-10u:12175: RV_8,004.18a parā gāvo yavasaṃ kac cid āghṛṇe nityaṃ rekṇo amartya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12176: RV_8,004.18c asmākam pūṣann avitā śivo bhava maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12177: RV_8,004.19a sthūraṃ rādhaḥ śatāśvaṃ kuruṅgasya diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12178: RV_8,004.19c rājñas tveṣasya subhagasya rātiṣu turvaśeṣv amanmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12179: RV_8,004.20a dhībhiḥ sātāni kāṇvasya vājinaḥ priyamedhair abhidyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12180: RV_8,004.20c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrānu nirmajām aje nir yūthāni gavām ṛṣiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12181: RV_8,004.21a vṛkṣāś cin me abhipitve arāraṇuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12182: RV_8,004.21c gām bhajanta mehanāśvam bhajanta mehanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12183: RV_8,005.01a dūrād iheva yat saty aruṇapsur aśiśvitat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12185: RV_8,005.02a nṛvad dasrā manoyujā rathena pṛthupājasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12187: RV_8,005.03a yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū prati stomā adṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12189: RV_8,005.04a purupriyā ṇa ūtaye purumandrā purūvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:12193: RV_8,005.06a tā sudevāya dāśuṣe sumedhām avitāriṇīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:12195: RV_8,005.07a ā na stomam upa dravat tūyaṃ śyenebhir āśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12197: RV_8,005.08a yebhis tisraḥ parāvato divo viśvāni rocanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12199: RV_8,005.09a uta no gomatīr iṣa uta sātīr aharvidā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12201: RV_8,005.10a ā no gomantam aśvinā suvīraṃ surathaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12203: RV_8,005.11a vāvṛdhānā śubhas patī dasrā hiraṇyavartanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12205: RV_8,005.12a asmabhyaṃ vājinīvasū maghavadbhyaś ca saprathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12207: RV_8,005.13a ni ṣu brahma janānāṃ yāviṣṭaṃ tūyam ā gatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12209: RV_8,005.14a asya pibatam aśvinā yuvam madasya cāruṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12211: RV_8,005.15a asme ā vahataṃ rayiṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12213: RV_8,005.16a purutrā cid dhi vāṃ narā vihvayante manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12217: RV_8,005.18a asmākam adya vām ayaṃ stomo vāhiṣṭho antamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12219: RV_8,005.19a yo ha vām madhuno dṛtir āhito rathacarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12221: RV_8,005.20a tena no vājinīvasū paśve tokāya śaṃ gave /
GV01rvh1-10u:12223: RV_8,005.21a uta no divyā iṣa uta sindhūṃr aharvidā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12225: RV_8,005.22a kadā vāṃ taugryo vidhat samudre jahito narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12226: RV_8,005.22c yad vāṃ ratho vibhiṣ patāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:12227: RV_8,005.23a yuvaṃ kaṇvāya nāsatyā ṛpiriptāya harmye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12229: RV_8,005.24a tābhir ā yātam ūtibhir navyasībhiḥ suśastibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12231: RV_8,005.25a yathā cit kaṇvam āvatam priyamedham upastutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12233: RV_8,005.26a yathota kṛtvye dhane 'ṃśuṃ goṣv agastyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12235: RV_8,005.27a etāvad vāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū ato vā bhūyo aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12239: RV_8,005.29a hiraṇyayī vāṃ rabhir īṣā akṣo hiraṇyayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12241: RV_8,005.30a tena no vājinīvasū parāvataś cid ā gatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12243: RV_8,005.31a ā vahethe parākāt pūrvīr aśnantāv aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12245: RV_8,005.32a ā no dyumnair ā śravobhir ā rāyā yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12247: RV_8,005.33a eha vām pruṣitapsavo vayo vahantu parṇinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12249: RV_8,005.34a rathaṃ vām anugāyasaṃ ya iṣā vartate saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:12253: RV_8,005.36a yuvam mṛgaṃ jāgṛvāṃsaṃ svadatho vā vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:12254: RV_8,005.36c tā naḥ pṛṅktam iṣā rayim //
GV01rvh1-10u:12255: RV_8,005.37a tā me aśvinā sanīnāṃ vidyātaṃ navānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12256: RV_8,005.37c yathā cic caidyaḥ kaśuḥ śatam uṣṭrānāṃ dadat sahasrā daśa gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:12257: RV_8,005.38a yo me hiraṇyasaṃdṛśo daśa rājño amaṃhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12258: RV_8,005.38c adhaspadā ic caidyasya kṛṣṭayaś carmamnā abhito janāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12259: RV_8,005.39a mākir enā pathā gād yeneme yanti cedayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12260: RV_8,005.39c anyo net sūrir ohate bhūridāvattaro janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12261: RV_8,006.01a mahāṃ indro ya ojasā parjanyo vṛṣṭimāṃ iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:12263: RV_8,006.02a prajām ṛtasya piprataḥ pra yad bharanta vahnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12265: RV_8,006.03a kaṇvā indraṃ yad akrata stomair yajñasya sādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12267: RV_8,006.04a sam asya manyave viśo viśvā namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12269: RV_8,006.05a ojas tad asya titviṣa ubhe yat samavartayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12271: RV_8,006.06a vi cid vṛtrasya dodhato vajreṇa śataparvaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12273: RV_8,006.07a imā abhi pra ṇonumo vipām agreṣu dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12275: RV_8,006.08a guhā satīr upa tmanā pra yac chocanta dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12277: RV_8,006.09a pra tam indra naśīmahi rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12279: RV_8,006.10a aham id dhi pituṣ pari medhām ṛtasya jagrabha /
GV01rvh1-10u:12281: RV_8,006.11a aham pratnena manmanā giraḥ śumbhāmi kaṇvavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12283: RV_8,006.12a ye tvām indra na tuṣṭuvur ṛṣayo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12285: RV_8,006.13a yad asya manyur adhvanīd vi vṛtram parvaśo rujan /
GV01rvh1-10u:12287: RV_8,006.14a ni śuṣṇa indra dharṇasiṃ vajraṃ jaghantha dasyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12289: RV_8,006.15a na dyāva indram ojasā nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12291: RV_8,006.16a yas ta indra mahīr apa stabhūyamāna āśayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12293: RV_8,006.17a ya ime rodasī mahī samīcī samajagrabhīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:12295: RV_8,006.18a ya indra yatayas tvā bhṛgavo ye ca tuṣṭuvuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12297: RV_8,006.19a imās ta indra pṛśnayo ghṛtaṃ duhata āśiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:12299: RV_8,006.20a yā indra prasvas tvāsā garbham acakriran /
GV01rvh1-10u:12301: RV_8,006.21a tvām ic chavasas pate kaṇvā ukthena vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12303: RV_8,006.22a taved indra praṇītiṣūta praśastir adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12305: RV_8,006.23a ā na indra mahīm iṣam puraṃ na darṣi gomatīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:12307: RV_8,006.24a uta tyad āśvaśvyaṃ yad indra nāhuṣīṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12309: RV_8,006.25a abhi vrajaṃ na tatniṣe sūra upākacakṣasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12311: RV_8,006.26a yad aṅga taviṣīyasa indra prarājasi kṣitīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12313: RV_8,006.27a taṃ tvā haviṣmatīr viśa upa bruvata ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12315: RV_8,006.28a upahvare girīṇāṃ saṃgathe ca nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12317: RV_8,006.29a ataḥ samudram udvataś cikitvāṃ ava paśyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12319: RV_8,006.30a ād it pratnasya retaso jyotiṣ paśyanti vāsaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:12321: RV_8,006.31a kaṇvāsa indra te matiṃ viśve vardhanti pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12323: RV_8,006.32a imām ma indra suṣṭutiṃ juṣasva pra su mām ava /
GV01rvh1-10u:12325: RV_8,006.33a uta brahmaṇyā vayaṃ tubhyam pravṛddha vajrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12327: RV_8,006.34a abhi kaṇvā anūṣatāpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12329: RV_8,006.35a indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12331: RV_8,006.36a ā no yāhi parāvato haribhyāṃ haryatābhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12333: RV_8,006.37a tvām id vṛtrahantama janāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12335: RV_8,006.38a anu tvā rodasī ubhe cakraṃ na varty etaśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12337: RV_8,006.39a mandasvā su svarṇara utendra śaryaṇāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12339: RV_8,006.40a vāvṛdhāna upa dyavi vṛṣā vajry aroravīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:12341: RV_8,006.41a ṛṣir hi pūrvajā asy eka īśāna ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12343: RV_8,006.42a asmākaṃ tvā sutāṃ upa vītapṛṣṭhā abhi prayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12345: RV_8,006.43a imāṃ su pūrvyāṃ dhiyam madhor ghṛtasya pipyuṣīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:12347: RV_8,006.44a indram id vimahīnām medhe vṛṇīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12349: RV_8,006.45a arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12351: RV_8,006.46a śatam ahaṃ tirindire sahasram parśāv ā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:12353: RV_8,006.47a trīṇi śatāny arvatāṃ sahasrā daśa gonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12355: RV_8,006.48a ud ānaṭ kakuho divam uṣṭrāñ caturyujo dadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12357: RV_8,007.01a pra yad vas triṣṭubham iṣam maruto vipro akṣarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12359: RV_8,007.02a yad aṅga taviṣīyavo yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12361: RV_8,007.03a ud īrayanta vāyubhir vāśrāsaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12363: RV_8,007.04a vapanti maruto miham pra vepayanti parvatān /
GV01rvh1-10u:12365: RV_8,007.05a ni yad yāmāya vo girir ni sindhavo vidharmaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12367: RV_8,007.06a yuṣmāṃ u naktam ūtaye yuṣmān divā havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12369: RV_8,007.07a ud u tye aruṇapsavaś citrā yāmebhir īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12371: RV_8,007.08a sṛjanti raśmim ojasā panthāṃ sūryāya yātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:12373: RV_8,007.09a imām me maruto giram imaṃ stomam ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12375: RV_8,007.10a trīṇi sarāṃsi pṛśnayo duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12377: RV_8,007.11a maruto yad dha vo divaḥ sumnāyanto havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12378: RV_8,007.11c ā tū na upa gantana //
GV01rvh1-10u:12379: RV_8,007.12a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavo rudrā ṛbhukṣaṇo dame /
GV01rvh1-10u:12381: RV_8,007.13a ā no rayim madacyutam purukṣuṃ viśvadhāyasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12383: RV_8,007.14a adhīva yad girīṇāṃ yāmaṃ śubhrā acidhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12385: RV_8,007.15a etāvataś cid eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12387: RV_8,007.16a ye drapsā iva rodasī dhamanty anu vṛṣṭibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12389: RV_8,007.17a ud u svānebhir īrata ud rathair ud u vāyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12391: RV_8,007.18a yenāva turvaśaṃ yaduṃ yena kaṇvaṃ dhanaspṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12393: RV_8,007.19a imā u vaḥ sudānavo ghṛtaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12395: RV_8,007.20a kva nūnaṃ sudānavo madathā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12397: RV_8,007.21a nahi ṣma yad dha vaḥ purā stomebhir vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12399: RV_8,007.22a sam u tye mahatīr apaḥ saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12401: RV_8,007.23a vi vṛtram parvaśo yayur vi parvatāṃ arājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12403: RV_8,007.24a anu tritasya yudhyataḥ śuṣmam āvann uta kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:12405: RV_8,007.25a vidyuddhastā abhidyavaḥ śiprāḥ śīrṣan hiraṇyayīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12407: RV_8,007.26a uśanā yat parāvata ukṣṇo randhram ayātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:12409: RV_8,007.27a ā no makhasya dāvane 'śvair hiraṇyapāṇibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12411: RV_8,007.28a yad eṣām pṛṣatī rathe praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12415: RV_8,007.30a kadā gacchātha maruta itthā vipraṃ havamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12417: RV_8,007.31a kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyo yad indram ajahātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:12419: RV_8,007.32a saho ṣu ṇo vajrahastaiḥ kaṇvāso agnim marudbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12421: RV_8,007.33a o ṣu vṛṣṇaḥ prayajyūn ā navyase suvitāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12423: RV_8,007.34a girayaś cin ni jihate parśānāso manyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12427: RV_8,007.36a agnir hi jāni pūrvyaś chando na sūro arciṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12429: RV_8,008.01a ā no viśvābhir ūtibhir aśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12430: RV_8,008.01c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī pibataṃ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:12431: RV_8,008.02a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinā rathena sūryatvacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12433: RV_8,008.03a ā yātaṃ nahuṣas pary āntarikṣāt suvṛktibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12434: RV_8,008.03c pibātho aśvinā madhu kaṇvānāṃ savane sutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12435: RV_8,008.04a ā no yātaṃ divas pary āntarikṣād adhapriyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12436: RV_8,008.04c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām iha suṣāva somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:12437: RV_8,008.05a ā no yātam upaśruty aśvinā somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12438: RV_8,008.05c svāhā stomasya vardhanā pra kavī dhītibhir narā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12439: RV_8,008.06a yac cid dhi vām pura ṛṣayo juhūre 'vase narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12440: RV_8,008.06c ā yātam aśvinā gatam upemāṃ suṣṭutim mama //
GV01rvh1-10u:12441: RV_8,008.07a divaś cid rocanād adhy ā no gantaṃ svarvidā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12443: RV_8,008.08a kim anye pary āsate 'smat stomebhir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12444: RV_8,008.08c putraḥ kaṇvasya vām ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12445: RV_8,008.09a ā vāṃ vipra ihāvase 'hvat stomebhir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12446: RV_8,008.09c ariprā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam mayobhuvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12447: RV_8,008.10a ā yad vāṃ yoṣaṇā ratham atiṣṭhad vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:12448: RV_8,008.10c viśvāny aśvinā yuvam pra dhītāny agacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12449: RV_8,008.11a ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12450: RV_8,008.11c vatso vām madhumad vaco 'śaṃsīt kāvyaḥ kaviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12452: RV_8,008.12c stomam me aśvināv imam abhi vahnī anūṣātām //
GV01rvh1-10u:12453: RV_8,008.13a ā no viśvāny aśvinā dhattaṃ rādhāṃsy ahrayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12454: RV_8,008.13c kṛtaṃ na ṛtviyāvato mā no rīradhataṃ nide //
GV01rvh1-10u:12455: RV_8,008.14a yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhy ambare /
GV01rvh1-10u:12456: RV_8,008.14c ataḥ sahasranirṇijā rathenā yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12457: RV_8,008.15a yo vāṃ nāsatyāv ṛṣir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12458: RV_8,008.15c tasmai sahasranirṇijam iṣaṃ dhattaṃ ghṛtaścutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12459: RV_8,008.16a prāsmā ūrjaṃ ghṛtaścutam aśvinā yacchataṃ yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12460: RV_8,008.16c yo vāṃ sumnāya tuṣṭavad vasūyād dānunas patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:12461: RV_8,008.17a ā no gantaṃ riśādasemaṃ stomam purubhujā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12462: RV_8,008.17c kṛtaṃ naḥ suśriyo naremā dātam abhiṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12463: RV_8,008.18a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12465: RV_8,008.19a ā no gantam mayobhuvāśvinā śambhuvā yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12466: RV_8,008.19c yo vāṃ vipanyū dhītibhir gīrbhir vatso avīvṛdhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12467: RV_8,008.20a yābhiḥ kaṇvam medhātithiṃ yābhir vaśaṃ daśavrajam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12468: RV_8,008.20c yābhir gośaryam āvataṃ tābhir no 'vataṃ narā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12469: RV_8,008.21a yābhir narā trasadasyum āvataṃ kṛtvye dhane /
GV01rvh1-10u:12470: RV_8,008.21c tābhiḥ ṣv asmāṃ aśvinā prāvataṃ vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12471: RV_8,008.22a pra vāṃ stomāḥ suvṛktayo giro vardhantv aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12472: RV_8,008.22c purutrā vṛtrahantamā tā no bhūtam puruspṛhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12473: RV_8,008.23a trīṇi padāny aśvinor āviḥ sānti guhā paraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12474: RV_8,008.23c kavī ṛtasya patmabhir arvāg jīvebhyas pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:12475: RV_8,009.01a ā nūnam aśvinā yuvaṃ vatsasya gantam avase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12476: RV_8,009.01c prāsmai yacchatam avṛkam pṛthu cchardir yuyutaṃ yā arātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12477: RV_8,009.02a yad antarikṣe yad divi yat pañca mānuṣāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12479: RV_8,009.03a ye vāṃ daṃsāṃsy aśvinā viprāsaḥ parimāmṛśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12481: RV_8,009.04a ayaṃ vāṃ gharmo aśvinā stomena pari ṣicyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12482: RV_8,009.04c ayaṃ somo madhumān vājinīvasū yena vṛtraṃ ciketathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12483: RV_8,009.05a yad apsu yad vanaspatau yad oṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12485: RV_8,009.06a yan nāsatyā bhuraṇyatho yad vā deva bhiṣajyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12486: RV_8,009.06c ayaṃ vāṃ vatso matibhir na vindhate haviṣmantaṃ hi gacchathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12487: RV_8,009.07a ā nūnam aśvinor ṛṣi stomaṃ ciketa vāmayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12488: RV_8,009.07c ā somam madhumattamaṃ gharmaṃ siñcād atharvaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12489: RV_8,009.08a ā nūnaṃ raghuvartaniṃ rathaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12490: RV_8,009.08c ā vāṃ stomā ime mama nabho na cucyavīrata //
GV01rvh1-10u:12491: RV_8,009.09a yad adya vāṃ nāsatyokthair ācucyuvīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12492: RV_8,009.09c yad vā vāṇībhir aśvinevet kāṇvasya bodhatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12493: RV_8,009.10a yad vāṃ kakṣīvāṃ uta yad vyaśva ṛṣir yad vāṃ dīrghatamā juhāva /
GV01rvh1-10u:12494: RV_8,009.10c pṛthī yad vāṃ vainyaḥ sādaneṣv eved ato aśvinā cetayethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:12495: RV_8,009.11a yātaṃ chardiṣpā uta naḥ paraspā bhūtaṃ jagatpā uta nas tanūpā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12497: RV_8,009.12a yad indreṇa sarathaṃ yātho aśvinā yad vā vāyunā bhavathaḥ samokasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12498: RV_8,009.12c yad ādityebhir ṛbhubhiḥ sajoṣasā yad vā viṣṇor vikramaṇeṣu tiṣṭhathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12499: RV_8,009.13a yad adyāśvināv ahaṃ huveya vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12500: RV_8,009.13c yat pṛtsu turvaṇe sahas tac chreṣṭham aśvinor avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12501: RV_8,009.14a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvinemā havyāni vāṃ hitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12502: RV_8,009.14c ime somāso adhi turvaśe yadāv ime kaṇveṣu vām atha //
GV01rvh1-10u:12503: RV_8,009.15a yan nāsatyā parāke arvāke asti bheṣajam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12504: RV_8,009.15c tena nūnaṃ vimadāya pracetasā chardir vatsāya yacchatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12505: RV_8,009.16a abhutsy u pra devyā sākaṃ vācāham aśvinoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12506: RV_8,009.16c vy āvar devy ā matiṃ vi rātim martyebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12507: RV_8,009.17a pra bodhayoṣo aśvinā pra devi sūnṛte mahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12508: RV_8,009.17c pra yajñahotar ānuṣak pra madāya śravo bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12509: RV_8,009.18a yad uṣo yāsi bhānunā saṃ sūryeṇa rocase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12510: RV_8,009.18c ā hāyam aśvino ratho vartir yāti nṛpāyyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12511: RV_8,009.19a yad āpītāso aṃśavo gāvo na duhra ūdhabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12512: RV_8,009.19c yad vā vāṇīr anūṣata pra devayanto aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12513: RV_8,009.20a pra dyumnāya pra śavase pra nṛṣāhyāya śarmaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12515: RV_8,009.21a yan nūnaṃ dhībhir aśvinā pitur yonā niṣīdathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12517: RV_8,010.01a yat stho dīrghaprasadmani yad vādo rocane divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12518: RV_8,010.01c yad vā samudre adhy ākṛte gṛhe 'ta ā yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12519: RV_8,010.02a yad vā yajñam manave sammimikṣathur evet kāṇvasya bodhatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12520: RV_8,010.02c bṛhaspatiṃ viśvān devāṃ ahaṃ huva indrāviṣṇū aśvināv āśuheṣasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12521: RV_8,010.03a tyā nv aśvinā huve sudaṃsasā gṛbhe kṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12522: RV_8,010.03c yayor asti pra ṇaḥ sakhyaṃ deveṣv adhy āpyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12523: RV_8,010.04a yayor adhi pra yajñā asūre santi sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12524: RV_8,010.04c tā yajñasyādhvarasya pracetasā svadhābhir yā pibataḥ somyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:12525: RV_8,010.05a yad adyāśvināv apāg yat prāk stho vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:12526: RV_8,010.05c yad druhyavy anavi turvaśe yadau huve vām atha mā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12527: RV_8,010.06a yad antarikṣe patathaḥ purubhujā yad veme rodasī anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12528: RV_8,010.06c yad vā svadhābhir adhitiṣṭhatho ratham ata ā yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12529: RV_8,011.01a tvam agne vratapā asi deva ā martyeṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12531: RV_8,011.02a tvam asi praśasyo vidatheṣu sahantya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12533: RV_8,011.03a sa tvam asmad apa dviṣo yuyodhi jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12535: RV_8,011.04a anti cit santam aha yajñam martasya ripoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12537: RV_8,011.05a martā amartyasya te bhūri nāma manāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12539: RV_8,011.06a vipraṃ viprāso 'vase devam martāsa ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12541: RV_8,011.07a ā te vatso mano yamat paramāc cit sadhasthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:12543: RV_8,011.08a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12545: RV_8,011.09a samatsv agnim avase vājayanto havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12547: RV_8,011.10a pratno hi kam īḍyo adhvareṣu sanāc ca hotā navyaś ca satsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12548: RV_8,011.10c svāṃ cāgne tanvam piprayasvāsmabhyaṃ ca saubhagam ā yajasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:12549: RV_8,012.01a ya indra somapātamo madaḥ śaviṣṭha cetati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12550: RV_8,012.01c yenā haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ tam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12551: RV_8,012.02a yenā daśagvam adhriguṃ vepayantaṃ svarṇaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:12552: RV_8,012.02c yenā samudram āvithā tam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12553: RV_8,012.03a yena sindhum mahīr apo rathāṃ iva pracodayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12554: RV_8,012.03c panthām ṛtasya yātave tam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12555: RV_8,012.04a imaṃ stomam abhiṣṭaye ghṛtaṃ na pūtam adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12556: RV_8,012.04c yenā nu sadya ojasā vavakṣitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:12557: RV_8,012.05a imaṃ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ samudra iva pinvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12559: RV_8,012.06a yo no devaḥ parāvataḥ sakhitvanāya māmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12560: RV_8,012.06c divo na vṛṣṭim prathayan vavakṣitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:12561: RV_8,012.07a vavakṣur asya ketavo uta vajro gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12562: RV_8,012.07c yat sūryo na rodasī avardhayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12563: RV_8,012.08a yadi pravṛddha satpate sahasram mahiṣāṃ aghaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12564: RV_8,012.08c ād it ta indriyam mahi pra vāvṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12565: RV_8,012.09a indraḥ sūryasya raśmibhir ny arśasānam oṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12566: RV_8,012.09c agnir vaneva sāsahiḥ pra vāvṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12567: RV_8,012.10a iyaṃ ta ṛtviyāvatī dhītir eti navīyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12569: RV_8,012.11a garbho yajñasya devayuḥ kratum punīta ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:12570: RV_8,012.11c stomair indrasya vāvṛdhe mimīta it //
GV01rvh1-10u:12571: RV_8,012.12a sanir mitrasya papratha indraḥ somasya pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12572: RV_8,012.12c prācī vāśīva sunvate mimīta it //
GV01rvh1-10u:12574: RV_8,012.13c ghṛtaṃ na pipya āsany ṛtasya yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12575: RV_8,012.14a uta svarāje aditi stomam indrāya jījanat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12578: RV_8,012.15c na deva vivratā harī ṛtasya yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12579: RV_8,012.16a yat somam indra viṣṇavi yad vā gha trita āptye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12580: RV_8,012.16c yad vā marutsu mandase sam indubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12581: RV_8,012.17a yad vā śakra parāvati samudre adhi mandase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12582: RV_8,012.17c asmākam it sute raṇā sam indubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12583: RV_8,012.18a yad vāsi sunvato vṛdho yajamānasya satpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12584: RV_8,012.18c ukthe vā yasya raṇyasi sam indubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12586: RV_8,012.19c adhā yajñāya turvaṇe vy ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12588: RV_8,012.20c hotrābhir indraṃ vāvṛdhur vy ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12589: RV_8,012.21a mahīr asya praṇītayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12590: RV_8,012.21c viśvā vasūni dāśuṣe vy ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12591: RV_8,012.22a indraṃ vṛtrāya hantave devāso dadhire puraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12592: RV_8,012.22c indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣatā sam ojase //
GV01rvh1-10u:12593: RV_8,012.23a mahāntam mahinā vayaṃ stomebhir havanaśrutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12594: RV_8,012.23c arkair abhi pra ṇonumaḥ sam ojase //
GV01rvh1-10u:12595: RV_8,012.24a na yaṃ vivikto rodasī nāntarikṣāṇi vajriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12596: RV_8,012.24c amād id asya titviṣe sam ojasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12597: RV_8,012.25a yad indra pṛtanājye devās tvā dadhire puraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12598: RV_8,012.25c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12599: RV_8,012.26a yadā vṛtraṃ nadīvṛtaṃ śavasā vajrinn avadhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12600: RV_8,012.26c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12601: RV_8,012.27a yadā te viṣṇur ojasā trīṇi padā vicakrame /
GV01rvh1-10u:12602: RV_8,012.27c ād it te haryatā harī vavakṣatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12603: RV_8,012.28a yadā te haryatā harī vāvṛdhāte dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:12604: RV_8,012.28c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12605: RV_8,012.29a yadā te mārutīr viśas tubhyam indra niyemire /
GV01rvh1-10u:12606: RV_8,012.29c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12607: RV_8,012.30a yadā sūryam amuṃ divi śukraṃ jyotir adhārayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12608: RV_8,012.30c ād it te viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12609: RV_8,012.31a imāṃ ta indra suṣṭutiṃ vipra iyarti dhītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12611: RV_8,012.32a yad asya dhāmani priye samīcīnāso asvaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:12613: RV_8,012.33a suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ sugavyam indra daddhi naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12615: RV_8,013.01a indraḥ suteṣu someṣu kratum punīta ukthyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12616: RV_8,013.01c vide vṛdhasya dakṣaso mahān hi ṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12617: RV_8,013.02a sa prathame vyomani devānāṃ sadane vṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12619: RV_8,013.03a tam ahve vājasātaya indram bharāya śuṣmiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12620: RV_8,013.03c bhavā naḥ sumne antamaḥ sakhā vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12621: RV_8,013.04a iyaṃ ta indra girvaṇo rātiḥ kṣarati sunvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12622: RV_8,013.04c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12623: RV_8,013.05a nūnaṃ tad indra daddhi no yat tvā sunvanta īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12624: RV_8,013.05c rayiṃ naś citram ā bharā svarvidam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12625: RV_8,013.06a stotā yat te vicarṣaṇir atipraśardhayad giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12626: RV_8,013.06c vayā ivānu rohate juṣanta yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12627: RV_8,013.07a pratnavaj janayā giraḥ śṛṇudhī jaritur havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12629: RV_8,013.08a krīḷanty asya sūnṛtā āpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12630: RV_8,013.08c ayā dhiyā ya ucyate patir divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12631: RV_8,013.09a uto patir ya ucyate kṛṣṭīnām eka id vaśī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12633: RV_8,013.10a stuhi śrutaṃ vipaścitaṃ harī yasya prasakṣiṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12636: RV_8,013.11c ā yāhi yajñam āśubhiḥ śam id dhi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:12637: RV_8,013.12a indra śaviṣṭha satpate rayiṃ gṛṇatsu dhāraya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12639: RV_8,013.13a have tvā sūra udite have madhyandine divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12640: RV_8,013.13c juṣāṇa indra saptibhir na ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12641: RV_8,013.14a ā tū gahi pra tu drava matsvā sutasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12642: RV_8,013.14c tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ yathā vide //
GV01rvh1-10u:12643: RV_8,013.15a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:12644: RV_8,013.15c yad vā samudre andhaso 'vited asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12645: RV_8,013.16a indraṃ vardhantu no gira indraṃ sutāsa indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12647: RV_8,013.17a tam id viprā avasyavaḥ pravatvatībhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12648: RV_8,013.17c indraṃ kṣoṇīr avardhayan vayā iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:12649: RV_8,013.18a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12650: RV_8,013.18c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ sadāvṛdham //
GV01rvh1-10u:12651: RV_8,013.19a stotā yat te anuvrata ukthāny ṛtuthā dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12652: RV_8,013.19c śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate so adbhutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12653: RV_8,013.20a tad id rudrasya cetati yahvam pratneṣu dhāmasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12654: RV_8,013.20c mano yatrā vi tad dadhur vicetasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12655: RV_8,013.21a yadi me sakhyam āvara imasya pāhy andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12656: RV_8,013.21c yena viśvā ati dviṣo atārima //
GV01rvh1-10u:12657: RV_8,013.22a kadā ta indra girvaṇa stotā bhavāti śantamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12658: RV_8,013.22c kadā no gavye aśvye vasau dadhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12659: RV_8,013.23a uta te suṣṭutā harī vṛṣaṇā vahato ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:12661: RV_8,013.24a tam īmahe puruṣṭutaṃ yahvam pratnābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12662: RV_8,013.24c ni barhiṣi priye sadad adha dvitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12663: RV_8,013.25a vardhasvā su puruṣṭuta ṛṣiṣṭutābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12664: RV_8,013.25c dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam avā ca naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12665: RV_8,013.26a indra tvam avited asītthā stuvato adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12666: RV_8,013.26c ṛtād iyarmi te dhiyam manoyujam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12667: RV_8,013.27a iha tyā sadhamādyā yujānaḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12668: RV_8,013.27c harī indra pratadvasū abhi svara //
GV01rvh1-10u:12669: RV_8,013.28a abhi svarantu ye tava rudrāsaḥ sakṣata śriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12670: RV_8,013.28c uto marutvatīr viśo abhi prayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12671: RV_8,013.29a imā asya pratūrtayaḥ padaṃ juṣanta yad divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12672: RV_8,013.29c nābhā yajñasya saṃ dadhur yathā vide //
GV01rvh1-10u:12673: RV_8,013.30a ayaṃ dīrghāya cakṣase prāci prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:12675: RV_8,013.31a vṛṣāyam indra te ratha uto te vṛṣaṇā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12676: RV_8,013.31c vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato vṛṣā havaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12677: RV_8,013.32a vṛṣā grāvā vṛṣā mado vṛṣā somo ayaṃ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12678: RV_8,013.32c vṛṣā yajño yam invasi vṛṣā havaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12679: RV_8,013.33a vṛṣā tvā vṛṣaṇaṃ huve vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12680: RV_8,013.33c vāvantha hi pratiṣṭutiṃ vṛṣā havaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12681: RV_8,014.01a yad indrāhaṃ yathā tvam īśīya vasva eka it /
GV01rvh1-10u:12683: RV_8,014.02a śikṣeyam asmai ditseyaṃ śacīpate manīṣiṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12685: RV_8,014.03a dhenuṣ ṭa indra sūnṛtā yajamānāya sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12687: RV_8,014.04a na te vartāsti rādhasa indra devo na martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12689: RV_8,014.05a yajña indram avardhayad yad bhūmiṃ vy avartayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12691: RV_8,014.06a vāvṛdhānasya te vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12693: RV_8,014.07a vy antarikṣam atiran made somasya rocanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12695: RV_8,014.08a ud gā ājad aṅgirobhya āviṣ kṛṇvan guhā satīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12697: RV_8,014.09a indreṇa rocanā divo dṛḷhāni dṛṃhitāni ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:12699: RV_8,014.10a apām ūrmir madann iva stoma indrājirāyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12701: RV_8,014.11a tvaṃ hi stomavardhana indrāsy ukthavardhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12703: RV_8,014.12a indram it keśinā harī somapeyāya vakṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12705: RV_8,014.13a apām phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12707: RV_8,014.14a māyābhir utsisṛpsata indra dyām ārurukṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12709: RV_8,014.15a asunvām indra saṃsadaṃ viṣūcīṃ vy anāśayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12711: RV_8,015.01a tam v abhi pra gāyata puruhūtam puruṣṭutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12712: RV_8,015.01c indraṃ gīrbhis taviṣam ā vivāsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:12713: RV_8,015.02a yasya dvibarhaso bṛhat saho dādhāra rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12714: RV_8,015.02c girīṃr ajrāṃ apaḥ svar vṛṣatvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12715: RV_8,015.03a sa rājasi puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi jighnase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12716: RV_8,015.03c indra jaitrā śravasyā ca yantave //
GV01rvh1-10u:12717: RV_8,015.04a taṃ te madaṃ gṛṇīmasi vṛṣaṇam pṛtsu sāsahim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12719: RV_8,015.05a yena jyotīṃṣy āyave manave ca viveditha /
GV01rvh1-10u:12720: RV_8,015.05c mandāno asya barhiṣo vi rājasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12721: RV_8,015.06a tad adyā cit ta ukthino 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12723: RV_8,015.07a tava tyad indriyam bṛhat tava śuṣmam uta kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:12725: RV_8,015.08a tava dyaur indra pauṃsyam pṛthivī vardhati śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12726: RV_8,015.08c tvām āpaḥ parvatāsaś ca hinvire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12727: RV_8,015.09a tvāṃ viṣṇur bṛhan kṣayo mitro gṛṇāti varuṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12728: RV_8,015.09c tvāṃ śardho madaty anu mārutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12729: RV_8,015.10a tvaṃ vṛṣā janānām maṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12731: RV_8,015.11a satrā tvam puruṣṭutaṃ eko vṛtrāṇi tośase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12732: RV_8,015.11c nānya indrāt karaṇam bhūya invati //
GV01rvh1-10u:12733: RV_8,015.12a yad indra manmaśas tvā nānā havanta ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12734: RV_8,015.12c asmākebhir nṛbhir atrā svar jaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:12735: RV_8,015.13a araṃ kṣayāya no mahe viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:12737: RV_8,016.01a pra samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnām indraṃ stotā navyaṃ gīrbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12739: RV_8,016.02a yasminn ukthāni raṇyanti viśvāni ca śravasyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12741: RV_8,016.03a taṃ suṣṭutyā vivāse jyeṣṭharājam bhare kṛtnum /
GV01rvh1-10u:12743: RV_8,016.04a yasyānūnā gabhīrā madā uravas tarutrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12745: RV_8,016.05a tam id dhaneṣu hiteṣv adhivākāya havante /
GV01rvh1-10u:12747: RV_8,016.06a tam ic cyautnair āryanti taṃ kṛtebhiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12749: RV_8,016.07a indro brahmendra ṛṣir indraḥ purū puruhūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12751: RV_8,016.08a sa stomyaḥ sa havyaḥ satyaḥ satvā tuvikūrmiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12753: RV_8,016.09a tam arkebhis taṃ sāmabhis taṃ gāyatraiś carṣaṇayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12755: RV_8,016.10a praṇetāraṃ vasyo acchā kartāraṃ jyotiḥ samatsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12757: RV_8,016.11a sa naḥ papriḥ pārayāti svasti nāvā puruhūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12759: RV_8,016.12a sa tvaṃ na indra vājebhir daśasyā ca gātuyā ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:12760: RV_8,016.12c acchā ca naḥ sumnaṃ neṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12761: RV_8,017.01a ā yāhi suṣumā hi ta indra somam pibā imam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12763: RV_8,017.02a ā tvā brahmayujā harī vahatām indra keśinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12765: RV_8,017.03a brahmāṇas tvā vayaṃ yujā somapām indra sominaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12767: RV_8,017.04a ā no yāhi sutāvato 'smākaṃ suṣṭutīr upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:12769: RV_8,017.05a ā te siñcāmi kukṣyor anu gātrā vi dhāvatu /
