GV01rvh1-10u:12771: RV_8,017.06a svāduṣ ṭe astu saṃsude madhumān tanve tava /
GV01rvh1-10u:12772: RV_8,017.06c somaḥ śam astu te hṛde //
GV01rvh1-10u:12773: RV_8,017.07a ayam u tvā vicarṣaṇe janīr ivābhi saṃvṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12775: RV_8,017.08a tuvigrīvo vapodaraḥ subāhur andhaso made /
GV01rvh1-10u:12777: RV_8,017.09a indra prehi puras tvaṃ viśvasyeśāna ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12779: RV_8,017.10a dīrghas te astv aṅkuśo yenā vasu prayacchasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12781: RV_8,017.11a ayaṃ ta indra somo nipūto adhi barhiṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12783: RV_8,017.12a śācigo śācipūjanāyaṃ raṇāya te sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12785: RV_8,017.13a yas te śṛṅgavṛṣo napāt praṇapāt kuṇḍapāyyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12786: RV_8,017.13c ny asmin dadhra ā manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12787: RV_8,017.14a vāstoṣ pate dhruvā sthūṇāṃsatraṃ somyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12788: RV_8,017.14c drapso bhettā purāṃ śaśvatīnām indro munīnāṃ sakhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12789: RV_8,017.15a pṛdākusānur yajato gaveṣaṇa ekaḥ sann abhi bhūyasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12790: RV_8,017.15c bhūrṇim aśvaṃ nayat tujā puro gṛbhendraṃ somasya pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12791: RV_8,018.01a idaṃ ha nūnam eṣāṃ sumnam bhikṣeta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12793: RV_8,018.02a anarvāṇo hy eṣām panthā ādityānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12795: RV_8,018.03a tat su naḥ savitā bhago varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12796: RV_8,018.03c śarma yacchantu sapratho yad īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12797: RV_8,018.04a devebhir devy adite 'riṣṭabharmann ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12799: RV_8,018.05a te hi putrāso aditer vidur dveṣāṃsi yotave /
GV01rvh1-10u:12801: RV_8,018.06a aditir no divā paśum aditir naktam advayāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12803: RV_8,018.07a uta syā no divā matir aditir ūtyā gamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12804: RV_8,018.07c sā śantāti mayas karad apa sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12805: RV_8,018.08a uta tyā daivyā bhiṣajā śaṃ naḥ karato aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12806: RV_8,018.08c yuyuyātām ito rapo apa sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12807: RV_8,018.09a śam agnir agnibhiḥ karac chaṃ nas tapatu sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12808: RV_8,018.09c śaṃ vāto vātv arapā apa sridhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12809: RV_8,018.10a apāmīvām apa sridham apa sedhata durmatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12811: RV_8,018.11a yuyotā śarum asmad āṃ ādityāsa utāmatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12813: RV_8,018.12a tat su naḥ śarma yacchatādityā yan mumocati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12815: RV_8,018.13a yo naḥ kaś cid ririkṣati rakṣastvena martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12816: RV_8,018.13c svaiḥ ṣa evai ririṣīṣṭa yur janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12817: RV_8,018.14a sam it tam agham aśnavad duḥśaṃsam martyaṃ ripum /
GV01rvh1-10u:12818: RV_8,018.14c yo asmatrā durhaṇāvāṃ upa dvayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12819: RV_8,018.15a pākatrā sthana devā hṛtsu jānītha martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12820: RV_8,018.15c upa dvayuṃ cādvayuṃ ca vasavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12821: RV_8,018.16a ā śarma parvatānām otāpāṃ vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12823: RV_8,018.17a te no bhadreṇa śarmaṇā yuṣmākaṃ nāvā vasavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12825: RV_8,018.18a tuce tanāya tat su no drāghīya āyur jīvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12827: RV_8,018.19a yajño hīḷo vo antara ādityā asti mṛḷata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12828: RV_8,018.19c yuṣme id vo api ṣmasi sajātye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12829: RV_8,018.20a bṛhad varūtham marutāṃ devaṃ trātāram aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12831: RV_8,018.21a aneho mitrāryaman nṛvad varuṇa śaṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12832: RV_8,018.21c trivarūtham maruto yanta naś chardiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12833: RV_8,018.22a ye cid dhi mṛtyubandhava ādityā manavaḥ smasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12834: RV_8,018.22c pra sū na āyur jīvase tiretana //
GV01rvh1-10u:12835: RV_8,019.01a taṃ gūrdhayā svarṇaraṃ devāso devam aratiṃ dadhanvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:12837: RV_8,019.02a vibhūtarātiṃ vipra citraśociṣam agnim īḷiṣva yanturam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12838: RV_8,019.02c asya medhasya somyasya sobhare prem adhvarāya pūrvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12839: RV_8,019.03a yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā vavṛmahe devaṃ devatrā hotāram amartyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12841: RV_8,019.04a ūrjo napātaṃ subhagaṃ sudīditim agniṃ śreṣṭhaśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12842: RV_8,019.04c sa no mitrasya varuṇasya so apām ā sumnaṃ yakṣate divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12843: RV_8,019.05a yaḥ samidhā ya āhutī yo vedena dadāśa marto agnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12845: RV_8,019.06a tasyed arvanto raṃhayanta āśavas tasya dyumnitamaṃ yaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12846: RV_8,019.06c na tam aṃho devakṛtaṃ kutaś cana na martyakṛtaṃ naśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12847: RV_8,019.07a svagnayo vo agnibhiḥ syāma sūno sahasa ūrjām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12849: RV_8,019.08a praśaṃsamāno atithir na mitriyo 'gnī ratho na vedyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12850: RV_8,019.08c tve kṣemāso api santi sādhavas tvaṃ rājā rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:12851: RV_8,019.09a so addhā dāśvadhvaro 'gne martaḥ subhaga sa praśaṃsyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12853: RV_8,019.10a yasya tvam ūrdhvo adhvarāya tiṣṭhasi kṣayadvīraḥ sa sādhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12854: RV_8,019.10c so arvadbhiḥ sanitā sa vipanyubhiḥ sa śūraiḥ sanitā kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12855: RV_8,019.11a yasyāgnir vapur gṛhe stomaṃ cano dadhīta viśvavāryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12857: RV_8,019.12a viprasya vā stuvataḥ sahaso yaho makṣūtamasya rātiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12858: RV_8,019.12c avodevam uparimartyaṃ kṛdhi vaso vividuṣo vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12859: RV_8,019.13a yo agniṃ havyadātibhir namobhir vā sudakṣam āvivāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12861: RV_8,019.14a samidhā yo niśitī dāśad aditiṃ dhāmabhir asya martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12862: RV_8,019.14c viśvet sa dhībhiḥ subhago janāṃ ati dyumnair udna iva tāriṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12863: RV_8,019.15a tad agne dyumnam ā bhara yat sāsahat sadane kaṃ cid atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12865: RV_8,019.16a yena caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamā yena nāsatyā bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12866: RV_8,019.16c vayaṃ tat te śavasā gātuvittamā indratvotā vidhemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12867: RV_8,019.17a te ghed agne svādhyo ye tvā vipra nidadhire nṛcakṣasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12869: RV_8,019.18a ta id vediṃ subhaga ta āhutiṃ te sotuṃ cakrire divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12870: RV_8,019.18c ta id vājebhir jigyur mahad dhanaṃ ye tve kāmaṃ nyerire //
GV01rvh1-10u:12871: RV_8,019.19a bhadro no agnir āhuto bhadrā rātiḥ subhaga bhadro adhvaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12873: RV_8,019.20a bhadram manaḥ kṛṇuṣva vṛtratūrye yenā samatsu sāsahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12874: RV_8,019.20c ava sthirā tanuhi bhūri śardhatāṃ vanemā te abhiṣṭibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12875: RV_8,019.21a īḷe girā manurhitaṃ yaṃ devā dūtam aratiṃ nyerire /
GV01rvh1-10u:12877: RV_8,019.22a tigmajambhāya taruṇāya rājate prayo gāyasy agnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12878: RV_8,019.22c yaḥ piṃśate sūnṛtābhiḥ suvīryam agnir ghṛtebhir āhutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12879: RV_8,019.23a yadī ghṛtebhir āhuto vāśīm agnir bharata uc cāva ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:12881: RV_8,019.24a yo havyāny airayatā manurhito deva āsā sugandhinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12882: RV_8,019.24c vivāsate vāryāṇi svadhvaro hotā devo amartyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12883: RV_8,019.25a yad agne martyas tvaṃ syām aham mitramaho amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12885: RV_8,019.26a na tvā rāsīyābhiśastaye vaso na pāpatvāya santya /
GV01rvh1-10u:12886: RV_8,019.26c na me stotāmatīvā na durhitaḥ syād agne na pāpayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:12887: RV_8,019.27a pitur na putraḥ subhṛto duroṇa ā devāṃ etu pra ṇo haviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12888: RV_8,019.28a tavāham agna ūtibhir nediṣṭhābhiḥ saceya joṣam ā vaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:12890: RV_8,019.29a tava kratvā saneyaṃ tava rātibhir agne tava praśastibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12891: RV_8,019.29c tvām id āhuḥ pramatiṃ vaso mamāgne harṣasva dātave //
GV01rvh1-10u:12892: RV_8,019.30a pra so agne tavotibhiḥ suvīrābhis tirate vājabharmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12894: RV_8,019.31a tava drapso nīlavān vāśa ṛtviya indhānaḥ siṣṇav ā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:12895: RV_8,019.31c tvam mahīnām uṣasām asi priyaḥ kṣapo vastuṣu rājasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12896: RV_8,019.32a tam āganma sobharayaḥ sahasramuṣkaṃ svabhiṣṭim avase /
GV01rvh1-10u:12898: RV_8,019.33a yasya te agne anye agnaya upakṣito vayā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:12899: RV_8,019.33c vipo na dyumnā ni yuve janānāṃ tava kṣatrāṇi vardhayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:12900: RV_8,019.34a yam ādityāso adruhaḥ pāraṃ nayatha martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12902: RV_8,019.35a yūyaṃ rājānaḥ kaṃ cic carṣaṇīsahaḥ kṣayantam mānuṣāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12903: RV_8,019.35c vayaṃ te vo varuṇa mitrāryaman syāmed ṛtasya rathyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12904: RV_8,019.36a adān me paurukutsyaḥ pañcāśataṃ trasadasyur vadhūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12906: RV_8,019.37a uta me prayiyor vayiyoḥ suvāstvā adhi tugvani /
GV01rvh1-10u:12907: RV_8,019.37c tisṝṇāṃ saptatīnāṃ śyāvaḥ praṇetā bhuvad vasur diyānām patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12908: RV_8,020.01a ā gantā mā riṣaṇyata prasthāvāno māpa sthātā samanyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12910: RV_8,020.02a vīḷupavibhir maruta ṛbhukṣaṇa ā rudrāsaḥ sudītibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12911: RV_8,020.02c iṣā no adyā gatā puruspṛho yajñam ā sobharīyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12912: RV_8,020.03a vidmā hi rudriyāṇāṃ śuṣmam ugram marutāṃ śimīvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12914: RV_8,020.04a vi dvīpāni pāpatan tiṣṭhad ducchunobhe yujanta rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:12915: RV_8,020.04c pra dhanvāny airata śubhrakhādayo yad ejatha svabhānavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12916: RV_8,020.05a acyutā cid vo ajmann ā nānadati parvatāso vanaspatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12918: RV_8,020.06a amāya vo maruto yātave dyaur jihīta uttarā bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12919: RV_8,020.06c yatrā naro dediśate tanūṣv ā tvakṣāṃsi bāhvojasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12920: RV_8,020.07a svadhām anu śriyaṃ naro mahi tveṣā amavanto vṛṣapsavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12922: RV_8,020.08a gobhir vāṇo ajyate sobharīṇāṃ rathe kośe hiraṇyaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12923: RV_8,020.08c gobandhavaḥ sujātāsa iṣe bhuje mahānto na sparase nu //
GV01rvh1-10u:12924: RV_8,020.09a prati vo vṛṣadañjayo vṛṣṇe śardhāya mārutāya bharadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12926: RV_8,020.10a vṛṣaṇaśvena maruto vṛṣapsunā rathena vṛṣanābhinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12927: RV_8,020.10c ā śyenāso na pakṣiṇo vṛthā naro havyā no vītaye gata //
GV01rvh1-10u:12928: RV_8,020.11a samānam añjy eṣāṃ vi bhrājante rukmāso adhi bāhuṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12930: RV_8,020.12a ta ugrāso vṛṣaṇa ugrabāhavo nakiṣ ṭanūṣu yetire /
GV01rvh1-10u:12931: RV_8,020.12c sthirā dhanvāny āyudhā ratheṣu vo 'nīkeṣv adhi śriyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12932: RV_8,020.13a yeṣām arṇo na sapratho nāma tveṣaṃ śaśvatām ekam id bhuje /
GV01rvh1-10u:12934: RV_8,020.14a tān vandasva marutas tāṃ upa stuhi teṣāṃ hi dhunīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:12935: RV_8,020.14c arāṇāṃ na caramas tad eṣāṃ dānā mahnā tad eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:12936: RV_8,020.15a subhagaḥ sa va ūtiṣv āsa pūrvāsu maruto vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12938: RV_8,020.16a yasya vā yūyam prati vājino nara ā havyā vītaye gatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:12939: RV_8,020.16c abhi ṣa dyumnair uta vājasātibhiḥ sumnā vo dhūtayo naśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12940: RV_8,020.17a yathā rudrasya sūnavo divo vaśanty asurasya vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12942: RV_8,020.18a ye cārhanti marutaḥ sudānavaḥ sman mīḷhuṣaś caranti ye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12943: RV_8,020.18c ataś cid ā na upa vasyasā hṛdā yuvāna ā vavṛdhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12944: RV_8,020.19a yūna ū ṣu naviṣṭhayā vṛṣṇaḥ pāvakāṃ abhi sobhare girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:12946: RV_8,020.20a sāhā ye santi muṣṭiheva havyo viśvāsu pṛtsu hotṛṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12947: RV_8,020.20c vṛṣṇaś candrān na suśravastamān girā vandasva maruto aha //
GV01rvh1-10u:12948: RV_8,020.21a gāvaś cid ghā samanyavaḥ sajātyena marutaḥ sabandhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12950: RV_8,020.22a martaś cid vo nṛtavo rukmavakṣasa upa bhrātṛtvam āyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:12951: RV_8,020.22c adhi no gāta marutaḥ sadā hi va āpitvam asti nidhruvi //
GV01rvh1-10u:12952: RV_8,020.23a maruto mārutasya na ā bheṣajasya vahatā sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12954: RV_8,020.24a yābhiḥ sindhum avatha yābhis tūrvatha yābhir daśasyathā krivim /
GV01rvh1-10u:12955: RV_8,020.24c mayo no bhūtotibhir mayobhuvaḥ śivābhir asacadviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12956: RV_8,020.25a yat sindhau yad asiknyāṃ yat samudreṣu marutaḥ subarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12958: RV_8,020.26a viśvam paśyanto bibhṛthā tanūṣv ā tenā no adhi vocata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12959: RV_8,020.26c kṣamā rapo maruta āturasya na iṣkartā vihrutam punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12960: RV_8,021.01a vayam u tvām apūrvya sthūraṃ na kac cid bharanto 'vasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12962: RV_8,021.02a upa tvā karmann ūtaye sa no yuvograś cakrāma yo dhṛṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:12963: RV_8,021.02c tvām id dhy avitāraṃ vavṛmahe sakhāya indra sānasim //
GV01rvh1-10u:12964: RV_8,021.03a ā yāhīma indavo 'śvapate gopata urvarāpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:12966: RV_8,021.04a vayaṃ hi tvā bandhumantam abandhavo viprāsa indra yemima /
GV01rvh1-10u:12967: RV_8,021.04c yā te dhāmāni vṛṣabha tebhir ā gahi viśvebhiḥ somapītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:12968: RV_8,021.05a sīdantas te vayo yathā gośrīte madhau madire vivakṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12970: RV_8,021.06a acchā ca tvainā namasā vadāmasi kim muhuś cid vi dīdhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12971: RV_8,021.06c santi kāmāso harivo dadiṣ ṭvaṃ smo vayaṃ santi no dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12972: RV_8,021.07a nūtnā id indra te vayam ūtī abhūma nahi nū te adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12974: RV_8,021.08a vidmā sakhitvam uta śūra bhojyam ā te tā vajrinn īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12975: RV_8,021.08c uto samasminn ā śiśīhi no vaso vāje suśipra gomati //
GV01rvh1-10u:12976: RV_8,021.09a yo na idam-idam purā pra vasya ānināya tam u va stuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:12978: RV_8,021.10a haryaśvaṃ satpatiṃ carṣaṇīsahaṃ sa hi ṣmā yo amandata /
GV01rvh1-10u:12979: RV_8,021.10c ā tu naḥ sa vayati gavyam aśvyaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavā śatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:12980: RV_8,021.11a tvayā ha svid yujā vayam prati śvasantaṃ vṛṣabha bruvīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12982: RV_8,021.12a jayema kāre puruhūta kāriṇo 'bhi tiṣṭhema dūḍhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12983: RV_8,021.12c nṛbhir vṛtraṃ hanyāma śūśuyāma cāver indra pra ṇo dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12984: RV_8,021.13a abhrātṛvyo anā tvam anāpir indra januṣā sanād asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12986: RV_8,021.14a nakī revantaṃ sakhyāya vindase pīyanti te surāśvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12987: RV_8,021.14c yadā kṛṇoṣi nadanuṃ sam ūhasy ād it piteva hūyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:12988: RV_8,021.15a mā te amājuro yathā mūrāsa indra sakhye tvāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:12990: RV_8,021.16a mā te godatra nir arāma rādhasa indra mā te gṛhāmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:12991: RV_8,021.16c dṛḷhā cid aryaḥ pra mṛśābhy ā bhara na te dāmāna ādabhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:12992: RV_8,021.17a indro vā ghed iyan maghaṃ sarasvatī vā subhagā dadir vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12994: RV_8,021.18a citra id rājā rājakā id anyake yake sarasvatīm anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:12995: RV_8,021.18c parjanya iva tatanad dhi vṛṣṭyā sahasram ayutā dadat //
GV01rvh1-10u:12996: RV_8,022.01a o tyam ahva ā ratham adyā daṃsiṣṭham ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:12997: RV_8,022.01c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī ā sūryāyai tasthathuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:12998: RV_8,022.02a pūrvāyuṣaṃ suhavam puruspṛham bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:12999: RV_8,022.02c sacanāvantaṃ sumatibhiḥ sobhare vidveṣasam anehasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13000: RV_8,022.03a iha tyā purubhūtamā devā namobhir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13001: RV_8,022.03c arvācīnā sv avase karāmahe gantārā dāśuṣo gṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:13002: RV_8,022.04a yuvo rathasya pari cakram īyata īrmānyad vām iṣaṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13003: RV_8,022.04c asmāṃ acchā sumatir vāṃ śubhas patī ā dhenur iva dhāvatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:13004: RV_8,022.05a ratho yo vāṃ trivandhuro hiraṇyābhīśur aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13005: RV_8,022.05c pari dyāvāpṛthivī bhūṣati śrutas tena nāsatyā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13006: RV_8,022.06a daśasyantā manave pūrvyaṃ divi yavaṃ vṛkeṇa karṣathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13007: RV_8,022.06c tā vām adya sumatibhiḥ śubhas patī aśvinā pra stuvīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13008: RV_8,022.07a upa no vājinīvasū yātam ṛtasya pathibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13009: RV_8,022.07c yebhis tṛkṣiṃ vṛṣaṇā trāsadasyavam mahe kṣatrāya jinvathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13010: RV_8,022.08a ayaṃ vām adribhiḥ sutaḥ somo narā vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13011: RV_8,022.08c ā yātaṃ somapītaye pibataṃ dāśuṣo gṛhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13012: RV_8,022.09a ā hi ruhatam aśvinā rathe kośe hiraṇyaye vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13014: RV_8,022.10a yābhiḥ paktham avatho yābhir adhriguṃ yābhir babhruṃ vijoṣasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13015: RV_8,022.10c tābhir no makṣū tūyam aśvinā gatam bhiṣajyataṃ yad āturam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13016: RV_8,022.11a yad adhrigāvo adhrigū idā cid ahno aśvinā havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13018: RV_8,022.12a tābhir ā yātaṃ vṛṣaṇopa me havaṃ viśvapsuṃ viśvavāryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13019: RV_8,022.12c iṣā maṃhiṣṭhā purubhūtamā narā yābhiḥ kriviṃ vāvṛdhus tābhir ā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13020: RV_8,022.13a tāv idā cid ahānāṃ tāv aśvinā vandamāna upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:13022: RV_8,022.14a tāv id doṣā tā uṣasi śubhas patī tā yāman rudravartanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13023: RV_8,022.14c mā no martāya ripave vājinīvasū paro rudrāv ati khyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13024: RV_8,022.15a ā sugmyāya sugmyam prātā rathenāśvinā vā sakṣaṇī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13026: RV_8,022.16a manojavasā vṛṣaṇā madacyutā makṣuṅgamābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13027: RV_8,022.16c ārāttāc cid bhūtam asme avase pūrvībhiḥ purubhojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13028: RV_8,022.17a ā no aśvāvad aśvinā vartir yāsiṣṭam madhupātamā narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13030: RV_8,022.18a suprāvargaṃ suvīryaṃ suṣṭhu vāryam anādhṛṣṭaṃ rakṣasvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13031: RV_8,022.18c asminn ā vām āyāne vājinīvasū viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13032: RV_8,023.01a īḷiṣvā hi pratīvyaṃ yajasva jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13036: RV_8,023.03a yeṣām ābādha ṛgmiya iṣaḥ pṛkṣaś ca nigrabhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13038: RV_8,023.04a ud asya śocir asthād dīdiyuṣo vy ajaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13040: RV_8,023.05a ud u tiṣṭha svadhvara stavāno devyā kṛpā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13042: RV_8,023.06a agne yāhi suśastibhir havyā juhvāna ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13044: RV_8,023.07a agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ huve hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13045: RV_8,023.07c tam ayā vācā gṛṇe tam u va stuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13046: RV_8,023.08a yajñebhir adbhutakratuṃ yaṃ kṛpā sūdayanta it /
GV01rvh1-10u:13047: RV_8,023.08c mitraṃ na jane sudhitam ṛtāvani //
GV01rvh1-10u:13048: RV_8,023.09a ṛtāvānam ṛtāyavo yajñasya sādhanaṃ girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13049: RV_8,023.09c upo enaṃ jujuṣur namasas pade //
GV01rvh1-10u:13050: RV_8,023.10a acchā no aṅgirastamaṃ yajñāso yantu saṃyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13051: RV_8,023.10c hotā yo asti vikṣv ā yaśastamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13052: RV_8,023.11a agne tava tye ajarendhānāso bṛhad bhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13054: RV_8,023.12a sa tvaṃ na ūrjām pate rayiṃ rāsva suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13055: RV_8,023.12c prāva nas toke tanaye samatsv ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13056: RV_8,023.13a yad vā u viśpatiḥ śitaḥ suprīto manuṣo viśi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13057: RV_8,023.13c viśved agniḥ prati rakṣāṃsi sedhati //
GV01rvh1-10u:13058: RV_8,023.14a śruṣṭy agne navasya me stomasya vīra viśpate /
GV01rvh1-10u:13059: RV_8,023.14c ni māyinas tapuṣā rakṣaso daha //
GV01rvh1-10u:13060: RV_8,023.15a na tasya māyayā cana ripur īśīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13062: RV_8,023.16a vyaśvas tvā vasuvidam ukṣaṇyur aprīṇād ṛṣiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13063: RV_8,023.16c maho rāye tam u tvā sam idhīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13064: RV_8,023.17a uśanā kāvyas tvā ni hotāram asādayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13066: RV_8,023.18a viśve hi tvā sajoṣaso devāso dūtam akrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13067: RV_8,023.18c śruṣṭī deva prathamo yajñiyo bhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13068: RV_8,023.19a imaṃ ghā vīro amṛtaṃ dūtaṃ kṛṇvīta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13070: RV_8,023.20a taṃ huvema yatasrucaḥ subhāsaṃ śukraśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13071: RV_8,023.20c viśām agnim ajaram pratnam īḍyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13072: RV_8,023.21a yo asmai havyadātibhir āhutim marto 'vidhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13073: RV_8,023.21c bhūri poṣaṃ sa dhatte vīravad yaśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13074: RV_8,023.22a prathamaṃ jātavedasam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13075: RV_8,023.22c prati srug eti namasā haviṣmatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:13078: RV_8,023.24a nūnam arca vihāyase stomebhi sthūrayūpavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13081: RV_8,023.25c viprā agnim avase pratnam īḷate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13082: RV_8,023.26a maho viśvāṃ abhi ṣato 'bhi havyāni mānuṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13083: RV_8,023.26c agne ni ṣatsi namasādhi barhiṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13084: RV_8,023.27a vaṃsvā no vāryā puru vaṃsva rāyaḥ puruspṛhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13086: RV_8,023.28a tvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe 'gne janāya codaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:13087: RV_8,023.28c sadā vaso rātiṃ yaviṣṭha śaśvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13088: RV_8,023.29a tvaṃ hi supratūr asi tvaṃ no gomatīr iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13089: RV_8,023.29c maho rāyaḥ sātim agne apā vṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13090: RV_8,023.30a agne tvaṃ yaśā asy ā mitrāvaruṇā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13092: RV_8,024.01a sakhāya ā śiṣāmahi brahmendrāya vajriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13093: RV_8,024.01c stuṣa ū ṣu vo nṛtamāya dhṛṣṇave //
GV01rvh1-10u:13094: RV_8,024.02a śavasā hy asi śruto vṛtrahatyena vṛtrahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13095: RV_8,024.02c maghair maghono ati śūra dāśasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13096: RV_8,024.03a sa na stavāna ā bhara rayiṃ citraśravastamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13097: RV_8,024.03c nireke cid yo harivo vasur dadiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13098: RV_8,024.04a ā nirekam uta priyam indra darṣi janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13099: RV_8,024.04c dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo stavamāna ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:13100: RV_8,024.05a na te savyaṃ na dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ varanta āmuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13102: RV_8,024.06a ā tvā gobhir iva vrajaṃ gīrbhir ṛṇomy adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13103: RV_8,024.06c ā smā kāmaṃ jaritur ā manaḥ pṛṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:13104: RV_8,024.07a viśvāni viśvamanaso dhiyā no vṛtrahantama /
GV01rvh1-10u:13105: RV_8,024.07c ugra praṇetar adhi ṣū vaso gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13106: RV_8,024.08a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13108: RV_8,024.09a indra yathā hy asti te 'parītaṃ nṛto śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13110: RV_8,024.10a ā vṛṣasva mahāmaha mahe nṛtama rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13111: RV_8,024.10c dṛḷhaś cid dṛhya maghavan maghattaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:13112: RV_8,024.11a nū anyatrā cid adrivas tvan no jagmur āśasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13113: RV_8,024.11c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13114: RV_8,024.12a nahy aṅga nṛto tvad anyaṃ vindāmi rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13115: RV_8,024.12c rāye dyumnāya śavase ca girvaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13116: RV_8,024.13a endum indrāya siñcata pibāti somyam madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13118: RV_8,024.14a upo harīṇām patiṃ dakṣam pṛñcantam abravam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13120: RV_8,024.15a nahy aṅga purā cana jajñe vīrataras tvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13121: RV_8,024.15c nakī rāyā naivathā na bhandanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13122: RV_8,024.16a ed u madhvo madintaraṃ siñca vādhvaryo andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13123: RV_8,024.16c evā hi vīra stavate sadāvṛdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13124: RV_8,024.17a indra sthātar harīṇāṃ nakiṣ ṭe pūrvyastutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:13125: RV_8,024.17c ud ānaṃśa śavasā na bhandanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13126: RV_8,024.18a taṃ vo vājānām patim ahūmahi śravasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13128: RV_8,024.19a eto nv indraṃ stavāma sakhāya stomyaṃ naram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13129: RV_8,024.19c kṛṣṭīr yo viśvā abhy asty eka it //
GV01rvh1-10u:13130: RV_8,024.20a agorudhāya gaviṣe dyukṣāya dasmyaṃ vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13131: RV_8,024.20c ghṛtāt svādīyo madhunaś ca vocata //
GV01rvh1-10u:13132: RV_8,024.21a yasyāmitāni vīryā na rādhaḥ paryetave /
GV01rvh1-10u:13133: RV_8,024.21c jyotir na viśvam abhy asti dakṣiṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13134: RV_8,024.22a stuhīndraṃ vyaśvavad anūrmiṃ vājinaṃ yamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13135: RV_8,024.22c aryo gayam maṃhamānaṃ vi dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13136: RV_8,024.23a evā nūnam upa stuhi vaiyaśva daśamaṃ navam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13138: RV_8,024.24a vetthā hi nirṛtīnāṃ vajrahasta parivṛjam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13140: RV_8,024.25a tad indrāva ā bhara yenā daṃsiṣṭha kṛtvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:13141: RV_8,024.25c dvitā kutsāya śiśnatho ni codaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:13142: RV_8,024.26a tam u tvā nūnam īmahe navyaṃ daṃsiṣṭha sanyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13143: RV_8,024.26c sa tvaṃ no viśvā abhimātīḥ sakṣaṇiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13144: RV_8,024.27a ya ṛkṣād aṃhaso mucad yo vāryāt sapta sindhuṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13146: RV_8,024.28a yathā varo suṣāmṇe sanibhya āvaho rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:13148: RV_8,024.29a ā nāryasya dakṣiṇā vyaśvāṃ etu sominaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13149: RV_8,024.29c sthūraṃ ca rādhaḥ śatavat sahasravat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13150: RV_8,024.30a yat tvā pṛcchād ījānaḥ kuhayā kuhayākṛte /
GV01rvh1-10u:13151: RV_8,024.30c eṣo apaśrito valo gomatīm ava tiṣṭhati //
GV01rvh1-10u:13152: RV_8,025.01a tā vāṃ viśvasya gopā devā deveṣu yajñiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13154: RV_8,025.02a mitrā tanā na rathyā varuṇo yaś ca sukratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13158: RV_8,025.04a mahāntā mitrāvaruṇā samrājā devāv asurā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13159: RV_8,025.04c ṛtāvānāv ṛtam ā ghoṣato bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13160: RV_8,025.05a napātā śavaso mahaḥ sūnū dakṣasya sukratū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13161: RV_8,025.05c sṛpradānū iṣo vāstv adhi kṣitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13162: RV_8,025.06a saṃ yā dānūni yemathur divyāḥ pārthivīr iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13163: RV_8,025.06c nabhasvatīr ā vāṃ carantu vṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13164: RV_8,025.07a adhi yā bṛhato divo 'bhi yūtheva paśyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13166: RV_8,025.08a ṛtāvānā ni ṣedatuḥ sāmrājyāya sukratū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13169: RV_8,025.09c ni cin miṣantā nicirā ni cikyatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13170: RV_8,025.10a uta no devy aditir uruṣyatāṃ nāsatyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13172: RV_8,025.11a te no nāvam uruṣyata divā naktaṃ sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13174: RV_8,025.12a aghnate viṣṇave vayam ariṣyantaḥ sudānave /
GV01rvh1-10u:13176: RV_8,025.13a tad vāryaṃ vṛṇīmahe variṣṭhaṃ gopayatyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13177: RV_8,025.13c mitro yat pānti varuṇo yad aryamā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13178: RV_8,025.14a uta naḥ sindhur apāṃ tan marutas tad aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13180: RV_8,025.15a te hi ṣmā vanuṣo naro 'bhimātiṃ kayasya cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:13181: RV_8,025.15c tigmaṃ na kṣodaḥ pratighnanti bhūrṇayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13182: RV_8,025.16a ayam eka itthā purūru caṣṭe vi viśpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13183: RV_8,025.16c tasya vratāny anu vaś carāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13184: RV_8,025.17a anu pūrvāṇy okyā sāmrājyasya saścima /
GV01rvh1-10u:13186: RV_8,025.18a pari yo raśminā divo 'ntān mame pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13187: RV_8,025.18c ubhe ā paprau rodasī mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13188: RV_8,025.19a ud u ṣya śaraṇe divo jyotir ayaṃsta sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13189: RV_8,025.19c agnir na śukraḥ samidhāna āhutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13192: RV_8,025.21a tat sūryaṃ rodasī ubhe doṣā vastor upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:13193: RV_8,025.21c bhojeṣv asmāṃ abhy uc carā sadā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13196: RV_8,025.23a tā me aśvyānāṃ harīṇāṃ nitośanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13198: RV_8,025.24a smadabhīśū kaśāvantā viprā naviṣṭhayā matī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13200: RV_8,026.01a yuvor u ṣū rathaṃ huve sadhastutyāya sūriṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13202: RV_8,026.02a yuvaṃ varo suṣāmṇe mahe tane nāsatyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13204: RV_8,026.03a tā vām adya havāmahe havyebhir vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13205: RV_8,026.03c pūrvīr iṣa iṣayantāv ati kṣapaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13206: RV_8,026.04a ā vāṃ vāhiṣṭho aśvinā ratho yātu śruto narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13207: RV_8,026.04c upa stomān turasya darśathaḥ śriye //
GV01rvh1-10u:13208: RV_8,026.05a juhurāṇā cid aśvinā manyethāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13209: RV_8,026.05c yuvaṃ hi rudrā parṣatho ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13210: RV_8,026.06a dasrā hi viśvam ānuṣaṅ makṣūbhiḥ paridīyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13212: RV_8,026.07a upa no yātam aśvinā rāyā viśvapuṣā saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13214: RV_8,026.08a ā me asya pratīvyam indranāsatyā gatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13216: RV_8,026.09a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmaha ukṣaṇyanto vyaśvavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13217: RV_8,026.09c sumatibhir upa viprāv ihā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13218: RV_8,026.10a aśvinā sv ṛṣe stuhi kuvit te śravato havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13220: RV_8,026.11a vaiyaśvasya śrutaṃ naroto me asya vedathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13224: RV_8,026.13a yo vāṃ yajñebhir āvṛto 'dhivastrā vadhūr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:13226: RV_8,026.14a yo vām uruvyacastamaṃ ciketati nṛpāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13227: RV_8,026.14c vartir aśvinā pari yātam asmayū //
GV01rvh1-10u:13228: RV_8,026.15a asmabhyaṃ su vṛṣaṇvasū yātaṃ vartir nṛpāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13230: RV_8,026.16a vāhiṣṭho vāṃ havānāṃ stomo dūto huvan narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13232: RV_8,026.17a yad ado divo arṇava iṣo vā madatho gṛhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13234: RV_8,026.18a uta syā śvetayāvarī vāhiṣṭhā vāṃ nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13236: RV_8,026.19a smad etayā sukīrtyāśvinā śvetayā dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13238: RV_8,026.20a yukṣvā hi tvaṃ rathāsahā yuvasva poṣyā vaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:13239: RV_8,026.20c ān no vāyo madhu pibāsmākaṃ savanā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13240: RV_8,026.21a tava vāyav ṛtaspate tvaṣṭur jāmātar adbhuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13242: RV_8,026.22a tvaṣṭur jāmātaraṃ vayam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13244: RV_8,026.23a vāyo yāhi śivā divo vahasvā su svaśvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13246: RV_8,026.24a tvāṃ hi supsarastamaṃ nṛṣadaneṣu hūmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13248: RV_8,026.25a sa tvaṃ no deva manasā vāyo mandāno agriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13250: RV_8,027.01a agnir ukthe purohito grāvāṇo barhir adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:13251: RV_8,027.01c ṛcā yāmi maruto brahmaṇas patiṃ devāṃ avo vareṇyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13252: RV_8,027.02a ā paśuṃ gāsi pṛthivīṃ vanaspatīn uṣāsā naktam oṣadhīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13253: RV_8,027.02c viśve ca no vasavo viśvavedaso dhīnām bhūta prāvitāraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13254: RV_8,027.03a pra sū na etv adhvaro 'gnā deveṣu pūrvyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13255: RV_8,027.03c ādityeṣu pra varuṇe dhṛtavrate marutsu viśvabhānuṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:13256: RV_8,027.04a viśve hi ṣmā manave viśvavedaso bhuvan vṛdhe riśādasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13257: RV_8,027.04c ariṣṭebhiḥ pāyubhir viśvavedaso yantā no 'vṛkaṃ chardiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13258: RV_8,027.05a ā no adya samanaso gantā viśve sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13259: RV_8,027.05c ṛcā girā maruto devy adite sadane pastye mahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13260: RV_8,027.06a abhi priyā maruto yā vo aśvyā havyā mitra prayāthana /
GV01rvh1-10u:13261: RV_8,027.06c ā barhir indro varuṇas turā nara ādityāsaḥ sadantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13262: RV_8,027.07a vayaṃ vo vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13263: RV_8,027.07c sutasomāso varuṇa havāmahe manuṣvad iddhāgnayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13264: RV_8,027.08a ā pra yāta maruto viṣṇo aśvinā pūṣan mākīnayā dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13265: RV_8,027.08c indra ā yātu prathamaḥ saniṣyubhir vṛṣā yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13266: RV_8,027.09a vi no devāso adruho 'cchidraṃ śarma yacchata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13267: RV_8,027.09c na yad dūrād vasavo nū cid antito varūtham ādadharṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:13268: RV_8,027.10a asti hi vaḥ sajātyaṃ riśādaso devāso asty āpyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13269: RV_8,027.10c pra ṇaḥ pūrvasmai suvitāya vocata makṣū sumnāya navyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:13270: RV_8,027.11a idā hi va upastutim idā vāmasya bhaktaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13271: RV_8,027.11c upa vo viśvavedaso namasyur āṃ asṛkṣy anyām iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:13272: RV_8,027.12a ud u ṣya vaḥ savitā supraṇītayo 'sthād ūrdhvo vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13273: RV_8,027.12c ni dvipādaś catuṣpādo arthino 'viśran patayiṣṇavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13275: RV_8,027.13c devaṃ-devaṃ huvema vājasātaye gṛṇanto devyā dhiyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13276: RV_8,027.14a devāso hi ṣmā manave samanyavo viśve sākaṃ sarātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13277: RV_8,027.14c te no adya te aparaṃ tuce tu no bhavantu varivovidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13278: RV_8,027.15a pra vaḥ śaṃsāmy adruhaḥ saṃstha upastutīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13279: RV_8,027.15c na taṃ dhūrtir varuṇa mitra martyaṃ yo vo dhāmabhyo 'vidhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13280: RV_8,027.16a pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīr iṣo yo vo varāya dāśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13281: RV_8,027.16c pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pary ariṣṭaḥ sarva edhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13282: RV_8,027.17a ṛte sa vindate yudhaḥ sugebhir yāty adhvanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13283: RV_8,027.17c aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ sarātayo yaṃ trāyante sajoṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13284: RV_8,027.18a ajre cid asmai kṛṇuthā nyañcanaṃ durge cid ā susaraṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13285: RV_8,027.18c eṣā cid asmād aśaniḥ paro nu sāsredhantī vi naśyatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:13286: RV_8,027.19a yad adya sūrya udyati priyakṣatrā ṛtaṃ dadha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13287: RV_8,027.19c yan nimruci prabudhi viśvavedaso yad vā madhyandine divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13288: RV_8,027.20a yad vābhipitve asurā ṛtaṃ yate chardir yema vi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13289: RV_8,027.20c vayaṃ tad vo vasavo viśvavedasa upa stheyāma madhya ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13290: RV_8,027.21a yad adya sūra udite yan madhyandina ātuci /
GV01rvh1-10u:13291: RV_8,027.21c vāmaṃ dhattha manave viśvavedaso juhvānāya pracetase //
GV01rvh1-10u:13292: RV_8,027.22a vayaṃ tad vaḥ samrāja ā vṛṇīmahe putro na bahupāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13293: RV_8,027.22c aśyāma tad ādityā juhvato havir yena vasyo 'naśāmahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:13294: RV_8,028.01a ye triṃśati trayas paro devāso barhir āsadan /
GV01rvh1-10u:13296: RV_8,028.02a varuṇo mitro aryamā smadrātiṣāco agnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13298: RV_8,028.03a te no gopā apācyās ta udak ta itthā nyak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13300: RV_8,028.04a yathā vaśanti devās tathed asat tad eṣāṃ nakir ā minat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13302: RV_8,028.05a saptānāṃ sapta ṛṣṭayaḥ sapta dyumnāny eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13304: RV_8,029.01a babhrur eko viṣuṇaḥ sūnaro yuvāñjy aṅkte hiraṇyayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13305: RV_8,029.02a yonim eka ā sasāda dyotano 'ntar deveṣu medhiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13306: RV_8,029.03a vāśīm eko bibharti hasta āyasīm antar deveṣu nidhruviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13307: RV_8,029.04a vajram eko bibharti hasta āhitaṃ tena vṛtrāṇi jighnate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13308: RV_8,029.05a tigmam eko bibharti hasta āyudhaṃ śucir ugro jalāṣabheṣajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13309: RV_8,029.06a patha ekaḥ pīpāya taskaro yathāṃ eṣa veda nidhīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:13310: RV_8,029.07a trīṇy eka urugāyo vi cakrame yatra devāso madanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:13311: RV_8,029.08a vibhir dvā carata ekayā saha pra pravāseva vasataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13312: RV_8,029.09a sado dvā cakrāte upamā divi samrājā sarpirāsutī //
GV01rvh1-10u:13313: RV_8,029.10a arcanta eke mahi sāma manvata tena sūryam arocayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:13314: RV_8,030.01a nahi vo asty arbhako devāso na kumārakaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13316: RV_8,030.02a iti stutāso asathā riśādaso ye stha trayaś ca triṃśac ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:13318: RV_8,030.03a te nas trādhvaṃ te 'vata ta u no adhi vocata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13319: RV_8,030.03c mā naḥ pathaḥ pitryān mānavād adhi dūraṃ naiṣṭa parāvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13320: RV_8,030.04a ye devāsa iha sthana viśve vaiśvānarā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13321: RV_8,030.04c asmabhyaṃ śarma sapratho gave 'śvāya yacchata //
GV01rvh1-10u:13322: RV_8,031.01a yo yajāti yajāta it sunavac ca pacāti ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:13324: RV_8,031.02a puroḷāśaṃ yo asmai somaṃ rarata āśiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13325: RV_8,031.02c pād it taṃ śakro aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13326: RV_8,031.03a tasya dyumāṃ asad ratho devajūtaḥ sa śūśuvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13330: RV_8,031.05a yā dampatī samanasā sunuta ā ca dhāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13332: RV_8,031.06a prati prāśavyāṃ itaḥ samyañcā barhir āśāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:13334: RV_8,031.07a na devānām api hnutaḥ sumatiṃ na jugukṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13336: RV_8,031.08a putriṇā tā kumāriṇā viśvam āyur vy aśnutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13339: RV_8,031.09c sam ūdho romaśaṃ hato deveṣu kṛṇuto duvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13340: RV_8,031.10a ā śarma parvatānāṃ vṛṇīmahe nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13342: RV_8,031.11a aitu pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ svasti sarvadhātamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13344: RV_8,031.12a aramatir anarvaṇo viśvo devasya manasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13346: RV_8,031.13a yathā no mitro aryamā varuṇaḥ santi gopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13348: RV_8,031.14a agniṃ vaḥ pūrvyaṃ girā devam īḷe vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13349: RV_8,031.14c saparyantaḥ purupriyam mitraṃ na kṣetrasādhasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13350: RV_8,031.15a makṣū devavato rathaḥ śūro vā pṛtsu kāsu cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:13351: RV_8,031.15c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13352: RV_8,031.16a na yajamāna riṣyasi na sunvāna na devayo /
GV01rvh1-10u:13353: RV_8,031.16c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13354: RV_8,031.17a nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśan na pra yoṣan na yoṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13355: RV_8,031.17c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13356: RV_8,031.18a asad atra suvīryam uta tyad āśvaśvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13357: RV_8,031.18c devānāṃ ya in mano yajamāna iyakṣaty abhīd ayajvano bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13358: RV_8,032.01a pra kṛtāny ṛjīṣiṇaḥ kaṇvā indrasya gāthayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13360: RV_8,032.02a yaḥ sṛbindam anarśanim pipruṃ dāsam ahīśuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13362: RV_8,032.03a ny arbudasya viṣṭapaṃ varṣmāṇam bṛhatas tira /
GV01rvh1-10u:13364: RV_8,032.04a prati śrutāya vo dhṛṣat tūrṇāśaṃ na girer adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13366: RV_8,032.05a sa gor aśvasya vi vrajam mandānaḥ somyebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13368: RV_8,032.06a yadi me rāraṇaḥ suta ukthe vā dadhase canaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13370: RV_8,032.07a vayaṃ ghā te api ṣmasi stotāra indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13372: RV_8,032.08a uta naḥ pitum ā bhara saṃrarāṇo avikṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13374: RV_8,032.09a uta no gomatas kṛdhi hiraṇyavato aśvinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13378: RV_8,032.11a yaḥ saṃsthe cic chatakratur ād īṃ kṛṇoti vṛtrahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13380: RV_8,032.12a sa naḥ śakraś cid ā śakad dānavāṃ antarābharaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13382: RV_8,032.13a yo rāyo 'vanir mahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13384: RV_8,032.14a āyantāram mahi sthiram pṛtanāsu śravojitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13386: RV_8,032.15a nakir asya śacīnāṃ niyantā sūnṛtānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13387: RV_8,032.15c nakir vaktā na dād iti //
GV01rvh1-10u:13388: RV_8,032.16a na nūnam brahmaṇām ṛṇam prāśūnām asti sunvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13390: RV_8,032.17a panya id upa gāyata panya ukthāni śaṃsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13392: RV_8,032.18a panya ā dardirac chatā sahasrā vājy avṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13394: RV_8,032.19a vi ṣū cara svadhā anu kṛṣṭīnām anv āhuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13396: RV_8,032.20a piba svadhainavānām uta yas tugrye sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13400: RV_8,032.22a ihi tisraḥ parāvata ihi pañca janāṃ ati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13402: RV_8,032.23a sūryo raśmiṃ yathā sṛjā tvā yacchantu me giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13404: RV_8,032.24a adhvaryav ā tu hi ṣiñca somaṃ vīrāya śipriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13406: RV_8,032.25a ya udnaḥ phaligam bhinan nyak sindhūṃr avāsṛjat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13408: RV_8,032.26a ahan vṛtram ṛcīṣama aurṇavābham ahīśuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13410: RV_8,032.27a pra va ugrāya niṣṭure 'ṣāḷhāya prasakṣiṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13412: RV_8,032.28a yo viśvāny abhi vratā somasya made andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13414: RV_8,032.29a iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13416: RV_8,032.30a arvāñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta priyamedhastutā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13418: RV_8,033.01a vayaṃ gha tvā sutāvanta āpo na vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13419: RV_8,033.01c pavitrasya prasravaṇeṣu vṛtrahan pari stotāra āsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13420: RV_8,033.02a svaranti tvā sute naro vaso nireka ukthinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13421: RV_8,033.02c kadā sutaṃ tṛṣāṇa oka ā gama indra svabdīva vaṃsagaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13422: RV_8,033.03a kaṇvebhir dhṛṣṇav ā dhṛṣad vājaṃ darṣi sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13423: RV_8,033.03c piśaṅgarūpam maghavan vicarṣaṇe makṣū gomantam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13424: RV_8,033.04a pāhi gāyāndhaso mada indrāya medhyātithe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13425: RV_8,033.04c yaḥ sammiślo haryor yaḥ sute sacā vajrī ratho hiraṇyayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13426: RV_8,033.05a yaḥ suṣavyaḥ sudakṣiṇa ino yaḥ sukratur gṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13427: RV_8,033.05c ya ākaraḥ sahasrā yaḥ śatāmagha indro yaḥ pūrbhid āritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13428: RV_8,033.06a yo dhṛṣito yo 'vṛto yo asti śmaśruṣu śritaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13429: RV_8,033.06c vibhūtadyumnaś cyavanaḥ puruṣṭutaḥ kratvā gaur iva śākinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13430: RV_8,033.07a ka īṃ veda sute sacā pibantaṃ kad vayo dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13431: RV_8,033.07c ayaṃ yaḥ puro vibhinatty ojasā mandānaḥ śipry andhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13432: RV_8,033.08a dānā mṛgo na vāraṇaḥ purutrā carathaṃ dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13433: RV_8,033.08c nakiṣ ṭvā ni yamad ā sute gamo mahāṃś carasy ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13434: RV_8,033.09a ya ugraḥ sann aniṣṭṛta sthiro raṇāya saṃskṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13435: RV_8,033.09c yadi stotur maghavā śṛṇavad dhavaṃ nendro yoṣaty ā gamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13436: RV_8,033.10a satyam itthā vṛṣed asi vṛṣajūtir no 'vṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13437: RV_8,033.10c vṛṣā hy ugra śṛṇviṣe parāvati vṛṣo arvāvati śrutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13438: RV_8,033.11a vṛṣaṇas te abhīśavo vṛṣā kaśā hiraṇyayī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13439: RV_8,033.11c vṛṣā ratho maghavan vṛṣaṇā harī vṛṣā tvaṃ śatakrato //
GV01rvh1-10u:13440: RV_8,033.12a vṛṣā sotā sunotu te vṛṣann ṛjīpinn ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:13441: RV_8,033.12c vṛṣā dadhanve vṛṣaṇaṃ nadīṣv ā tubhyaṃ sthātar harīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:13442: RV_8,033.13a endra yāhi pītaye madhu śaviṣṭha somyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13443: RV_8,033.13c nāyam acchā maghavā śṛṇavad giro brahmokthā ca sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13444: RV_8,033.14a vahantu tvā ratheṣṭhām ā harayo rathayujaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13445: RV_8,033.14c tiraś cid aryaṃ savanāni vṛtrahann anyeṣāṃ yā śatakrato //
GV01rvh1-10u:13446: RV_8,033.15a asmākam adyāntamaṃ stomaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13447: RV_8,033.15c asmākaṃ te savanā santu śantamā madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13448: RV_8,033.16a nahi ṣas tava no mama śāstre anyasya raṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13450: RV_8,033.17a indraś cid ghā tad abravīt striyā aśāsyam manaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13452: RV_8,033.18a saptī cid ghā madacyutā mithunā vahato ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:13454: RV_8,033.19a adhaḥ paśyasva mopari saṃtarām pādakau hara /
GV01rvh1-10u:13455: RV_8,033.19c mā te kaśaplakau dṛśan strī hi brahmā babhūvitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:13456: RV_8,034.01a endra yāhi haribhir upa kaṇvasya suṣṭutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:13457: RV_8,034.01c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13458: RV_8,034.02a ā tvā grāvā vadann iha somī ghoṣeṇa yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13459: RV_8,034.02c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13460: RV_8,034.03a atrā vi nemir eṣām urāṃ na dhūnute vṛkaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13461: RV_8,034.03c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13462: RV_8,034.04a ā tvā kaṇvā ihāvase havante vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13463: RV_8,034.04c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13464: RV_8,034.05a dadhāmi te sutānāṃ vṛṣṇe na pūrvapāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13465: RV_8,034.05c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13466: RV_8,034.06a smatpurandhir na ā gahi viśvatodhīr na ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13467: RV_8,034.06c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13468: RV_8,034.07a ā no yāhi mahemate sahasrote śatāmagha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13469: RV_8,034.07c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13470: RV_8,034.08a ā tvā hotā manurhito devatrā vakṣad īḍyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13471: RV_8,034.08c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13472: RV_8,034.09a ā tvā madacyutā harī śyenam pakṣeva vakṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13473: RV_8,034.09c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13474: RV_8,034.10a ā yāhy arya ā pari svāhā somasya pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13475: RV_8,034.10c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13476: RV_8,034.11a ā no yāhy upaśruty uktheṣu raṇayā iha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13477: RV_8,034.11c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13478: RV_8,034.12a sarūpair ā su no gahi sambhṛtaiḥ sambhṛtāśvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13479: RV_8,034.12c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13480: RV_8,034.13a ā yāhi parvatebhyaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13481: RV_8,034.13c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13482: RV_8,034.14a ā no gavyāny aśvyā sahasrā śūra dardṛhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13483: RV_8,034.14c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13484: RV_8,034.15a ā naḥ sahasraśo bharāyutāni śatāni ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:13485: RV_8,034.15c divo amuṣya śāsato divaṃ yaya divāvaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:13486: RV_8,034.16a ā yad indraś ca dadvahe sahasraṃ vasurociṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13492: RV_8,035.01a agninendreṇa varuṇena viṣṇunādityai rudrair vasubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13493: RV_8,035.01c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13494: RV_8,035.02a viśvābhir dhībhir bhuvanena vājinā divā pṛthivyādribhiḥ sacābhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13495: RV_8,035.02c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13496: RV_8,035.03a viśvair devais tribhir ekādaśair ihādbhir marudbhir bhṛgubhiḥ sacābhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13497: RV_8,035.03c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somam pibatam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13498: RV_8,035.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam bodhataṃ havasya me viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13499: RV_8,035.04c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13500: RV_8,035.05a stomaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśeva kanyanāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13501: RV_8,035.05c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13502: RV_8,035.06a giro juṣethām adhvaraṃ juṣethāṃ viśveha devau savanāva gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13503: RV_8,035.06c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ceṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13504: RV_8,035.07a hāridraveva patatho vaned upa somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13505: RV_8,035.07c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13506: RV_8,035.08a haṃsāv iva patatho adhvagāv iva somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13507: RV_8,035.08c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13508: RV_8,035.09a śyenāv iva patatho havyadātaye somaṃ sutam mahiṣevāva gacchathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13509: RV_8,035.09c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca trir vartir yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13510: RV_8,035.10a pibataṃ ca tṛpṇutaṃ cā ca gacchatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13511: RV_8,035.10c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13512: RV_8,035.11a jayataṃ ca pra stutaṃ ca pra cāvatam prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13513: RV_8,035.11c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13514: RV_8,035.12a hataṃ ca śatrūn yatataṃ ca mitriṇaḥ prajāṃ ca dhattaṃ draviṇaṃ ca dhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13515: RV_8,035.12c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa corjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13516: RV_8,035.13a mitrāvaruṇavantā uta dharmavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13517: RV_8,035.13c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13518: RV_8,035.14a aṅgirasvantā uta viṣṇuvantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13519: RV_8,035.14c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13520: RV_8,035.15a ṛbhumantā vṛṣaṇā vājavantā marutvantā jaritur gacchatho havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13521: RV_8,035.15c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cādityair yātam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13522: RV_8,035.16a brahma jinvatam uta jinvataṃ dhiyo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13523: RV_8,035.16c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13524: RV_8,035.17a kṣatraṃ jinvatam uta jinvataṃ nṝn hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13525: RV_8,035.17c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13526: RV_8,035.18a dhenūr jinvatam uta jinvataṃ viśo hataṃ rakṣāṃsi sedhatam amīvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13527: RV_8,035.18c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa ca somaṃ sunvato aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13528: RV_8,035.19a atrer iva śṛṇutam pūrvyastutiṃ śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13529: RV_8,035.19c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13530: RV_8,035.20a sargāṃ iva sṛjataṃ suṣṭutīr upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13531: RV_8,035.20c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13532: RV_8,035.21a raśmīṃr iva yacchatam adhvarāṃ upa śyāvāśvasya sunvato madacyutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13533: RV_8,035.21c sajoṣasā uṣasā sūryeṇa cāśvinā tiroahnyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13534: RV_8,035.22a arvāg rathaṃ ni yacchatam pibataṃ somyam madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13535: RV_8,035.22c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13536: RV_8,035.23a namovāke prasthite adhvare narā vivakṣaṇasya pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13537: RV_8,035.23c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13538: RV_8,035.24a svāhākṛtasya tṛmpataṃ sutasya devāv andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13539: RV_8,035.24c ā yātam aśvinā gatam avasyur vām ahaṃ huve dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13540: RV_8,036.01a avitāsi sunvato vṛktabarhiṣaḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13541: RV_8,036.01c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13542: RV_8,036.02a prāva stotāram maghavann ava tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13543: RV_8,036.02c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13544: RV_8,036.03a ūrjā devāṃ avasy ojasā tvām pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13545: RV_8,036.03c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13546: RV_8,036.04a janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13547: RV_8,036.04c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13548: RV_8,036.05a janitāśvānāṃ janitā gavām asi pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13549: RV_8,036.05c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13550: RV_8,036.06a atrīṇāṃ stomam adrivo mahas kṛdhi pibā somam madāya kaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13551: RV_8,036.06c yaṃ te bhāgam adhārayan viśvāḥ sehānaḥ pṛtanā uru jrayaḥ sam apsujin marutvāṃ indra satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13552: RV_8,036.07a śyāvāśvasya sunvatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13553: RV_8,036.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra brahmāṇi vardhayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:13554: RV_8,037.01a predam brahma vṛtratūryeṣv āvitha pra sunvataḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13555: RV_8,037.01d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13556: RV_8,037.02a sehāna ugra pṛtanā abhi druhaḥ śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13557: RV_8,037.02d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13558: RV_8,037.03a ekarāḷ asya bhuvanasya rājasi śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13559: RV_8,037.03d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13560: RV_8,037.04a sasthāvānā yavayasi tvam eka ic chacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13561: RV_8,037.04d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13562: RV_8,037.05a kṣemasya ca prayujaś ca tvam īśiṣe śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13563: RV_8,037.05d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13564: RV_8,037.06a kṣatrāya tvam avasi na tvam āvitha śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13565: RV_8,037.06d mādhyandinasya savanasya vṛtrahann anedya pibā somasya vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13566: RV_8,037.07a śyāvāśvasya rebhatas tathā śṛṇu yathāśṛṇor atreḥ karmāṇi kṛṇvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13567: RV_8,037.07c pra trasadasyum āvitha tvam eka in nṛṣāhya indra kṣatrāṇi vardhayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:13568: RV_8,038.01a yajñasya hi stha ṛtvijā sasnī vājeṣu karmasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13572: RV_8,038.03a idaṃ vām madiram madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13574: RV_8,038.04a juṣethāṃ yajñam iṣṭaye sutaṃ somaṃ sadhastutī /
GV01rvh1-10u:13576: RV_8,038.05a imā juṣethāṃ savanā yebhir havyāny ūhathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13578: RV_8,038.06a imāṃ gāyatravartaniṃ juṣethāṃ suṣṭutim mama /
GV01rvh1-10u:13580: RV_8,038.07a prātaryāvabhir ā gataṃ devebhir jenyāvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:13584: RV_8,038.09a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13586: RV_8,038.10a āhaṃ sarasvatīvator indrāgnyor avo vṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13588: RV_8,039.01a agnim astoṣy ṛgmiyam agnim īḷā yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:13589: RV_8,039.01c agnir devāṃ anaktu na ubhe hi vidathe kavir antaś carati dūtyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13590: RV_8,039.02a ny agne navyasā vacas tanūṣu śaṃsam eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13591: RV_8,039.02c ny arātī rarāvṇāṃ viśvā aryo arātīr ito yucchantv āmuro nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13592: RV_8,039.03a agne manmāni tubhyaṃ kaṃ ghṛtaṃ na juhva āsani /
GV01rvh1-10u:13593: RV_8,039.03c sa deveṣu pra cikiddhi tvaṃ hy asi pūrvyaḥ śivo dūto vivasvato nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13594: RV_8,039.04a tat-tad agnir vayo dadhe yathā-yathā kṛpaṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13595: RV_8,039.04c ūrjāhutir vasūnāṃ śaṃ ca yoś ca mayo dadhe viśvasyai devahūtyai nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13596: RV_8,039.05a sa ciketa sahīyasāgniś citreṇa karmaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13597: RV_8,039.05c sa hotā śaśvatīnāṃ dakṣiṇābhir abhīvṛta inoti ca pratīvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13598: RV_8,039.06a agnir jātā devānām agnir veda martānām apīcyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13599: RV_8,039.06c agniḥ sa draviṇodā agnir dvārā vy ūrṇute svāhuto navīyasā nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13600: RV_8,039.07a agnir deveṣu saṃvasuḥ sa vikṣu yajñiyāsv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13601: RV_8,039.07c sa mudā kāvyā puru viśvam bhūmeva puṣyati devo deveṣu yajñiyo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13602: RV_8,039.08a yo agniḥ saptamānuṣaḥ śrito viśveṣu sindhuṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13603: RV_8,039.08c tam āganma tripastyam mandhātur dasyuhantamam agniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyaṃ nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13604: RV_8,039.09a agnis trīṇi tridhātūny ā kṣeti vidathā kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13605: RV_8,039.09c sa trīṃr ekādaśāṃ iha yakṣac ca piprayac ca no vipro dūtaḥ pariṣkṛto nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13606: RV_8,039.10a tvaṃ no agna āyuṣu tvaṃ deveṣu pūrvya vasva eka irajyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13607: RV_8,039.10d tvām āpaḥ parisrutaḥ pari yanti svasetavo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13608: RV_8,040.01a indrāgnī yuvaṃ su naḥ sahantā dāsatho rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:13609: RV_8,040.01c yena dṛḷhā samatsv ā vīḷu cit sāhiṣīmahy agnir vaneva vāta in nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13610: RV_8,040.02a nahi vāṃ vavrayāmahe 'thendram id yajāmahe śaviṣṭhaṃ nṛṇāṃ naram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13611: RV_8,040.02d sa naḥ kadā cid arvatā gamad ā vājasātaye gamad ā medhasātaye nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13612: RV_8,040.03a tā hi madhyam bharāṇām indrāgnī adhikṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13613: RV_8,040.03c tā u kavitvanā kavī pṛcchyamānā sakhīyate saṃ dhītam aśnutaṃ narā nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13614: RV_8,040.04a abhy arca nabhākavad indrāgnī yajasā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13615: RV_8,040.04c yayor viśvam idaṃ jagad iyaṃ dyauḥ pṛthivī mahy upasthe bibhṛto vasu nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13616: RV_8,040.05a pra brahmāṇi nabhākavad indrāgnibhyām irajyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13617: RV_8,040.05c yā saptabudhnam arṇavaṃ jihmabāram aporṇuta indra īśāna ojasā nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13618: RV_8,040.06a api vṛśca purāṇavad vratater iva guṣpitam ojo dāsasya dambhaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:13619: RV_8,040.06d vayaṃ tad asya sambhṛtaṃ vasv indreṇa vi bhajemahi nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13620: RV_8,040.07a yad indrāgnī janā ime vihvayante tanā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13621: RV_8,040.07c asmākebhir nṛbhir vayaṃ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyato nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13622: RV_8,040.08a yā nu śvetāv avo diva uccarāta upa dyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13623: RV_8,040.08c indrāgnyor anu vratam uhānā yanti sindhavo yān sīm bandhād amuñcatāṃ nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13624: RV_8,040.09a pūrvīṣ ṭa indropamātayaḥ pūrvīr uta praśastayaḥ sūno hinvasya harivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13625: RV_8,040.09d vasvo vīrasyāpṛco yā nu sādhanta no dhiyo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13626: RV_8,040.10a taṃ śiśītā suvṛktibhis tveṣaṃ satvānam ṛgmiyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13627: RV_8,040.10c uto nu cid ya ojasā śuṣṇasyāṇḍāni bhedati jeṣat svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13628: RV_8,040.11a taṃ śiśītā svadhvaraṃ satyaṃ satvānam ṛtviyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13629: RV_8,040.11c uto nu cid ya ohata āṇḍā śuṣṇasya bhedaty ajaiḥ svarvatīr apo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13630: RV_8,040.12a evendrāgnibhyām pitṛvan navīyo mandhātṛvad aṅgirasvad avāci /
GV01rvh1-10u:13631: RV_8,040.12c tridhātunā śarmaṇā pātam asmān vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:13632: RV_8,041.01a asmā ū ṣu prabhūtaye varuṇāya marudbhyo 'rcā viduṣṭarebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13633: RV_8,041.01d yo dhītā mānuṣāṇām paśvo gā iva rakṣati nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13634: RV_8,041.02a tam ū ṣu samanā girā pitṝṇāṃ ca manmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13635: RV_8,041.02c nābhākasya praśastibhir yaḥ sindhūnām upodaye saptasvasā sa madhyamo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13636: RV_8,041.03a sa kṣapaḥ pari ṣasvaje ny usro māyayā dadhe sa viśvam pari darśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13637: RV_8,041.03d tasya venīr anu vratam uṣas tisro avardhayan nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13638: RV_8,041.04a yaḥ kakubho nidhārayaḥ pṛthivyām adhi darśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13639: RV_8,041.04c sa mātā pūrvyam padaṃ tad varuṇasya saptyaṃ sa hi gopā iveryo nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13640: RV_8,041.05a yo dhartā bhuvanānāṃ ya usrāṇām apīcyā veda nāmāni guhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13641: RV_8,041.05d sa kaviḥ kāvyā puru rūpaṃ dyaur iva puṣyati nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13642: RV_8,041.06a yasmin viśvāni kāvyā cakre nābhir iva śritā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13643: RV_8,041.06c tritaṃ jūtī saparyata vraje gāvo na saṃyuje yuje aśvāṃ ayukṣata nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13644: RV_8,041.07a ya āsv atka āśaye viśvā jātāny eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13645: RV_8,041.07c pari dhāmāni marmṛśad varuṇasya puro gaye viśve devā anu vrataṃ nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13646: RV_8,041.08a sa samudro apīcyas turo dyām iva rohati ni yad āsu yajur dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13647: RV_8,041.08d sa māyā arcinā padāstṛṇān nākam āruhan nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13648: RV_8,041.09a yasya śvetā vicakṣaṇā tisro bhūmīr adhikṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13649: RV_8,041.09c trir uttarāṇi papratur varuṇasya dhruvaṃ sadaḥ sa saptānām irajyati nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13650: RV_8,041.10a yaḥ śvetāṃ adhinirṇijaś cakre kṛṣṇāṃ anu vratā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13651: RV_8,041.10c sa dhāma pūrvyam mame ya skambhena vi rodasī ajo na dyām adhārayan nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13652: RV_8,042.01a astabhnād dyām asuro viśvavedā amimīta varimāṇam pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13653: RV_8,042.01c āsīdad viśvā bhuvanāni samrāḍ viśvet tāni varuṇasya vratāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:13654: RV_8,042.02a evā vandasva varuṇam bṛhantaṃ namasyā dhīram amṛtasya gopām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13655: RV_8,042.02c sa naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsat pātaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13656: RV_8,042.03a imāṃ dhiyaṃ śikṣamāṇasya deva kratuṃ dakṣaṃ varuṇa saṃ śiśādhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13657: RV_8,042.03c yayāti viśvā duritā tarema sutarmāṇam adhi nāvaṃ ruhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:13658: RV_8,042.04a ā vāṃ grāvāṇo aśvinā dhībhir viprā acucyavuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13659: RV_8,042.04c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13660: RV_8,042.05a yathā vām atrir aśvinā gīrbhir vipro ajohavīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:13661: RV_8,042.05c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13662: RV_8,042.06a evā vām ahva ūtaye yathāhuvanta medhirāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13663: RV_8,042.06c nāsatyā somapītaye nabhantām anyake same //
GV01rvh1-10u:13666: RV_8,043.02a asmai te pratiharyate jātavedo vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13668: RV_8,043.03a ārokā iva ghed aha tigmā agne tava tviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13670: RV_8,043.04a harayo dhūmaketavo vātajūtā upa dyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13672: RV_8,043.05a ete tye vṛthag agnaya iddhāsaḥ sam adṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13674: RV_8,043.06a kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi patsutaḥ prayāṇe jātavedasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13676: RV_8,043.07a dhāsiṃ kṛṇvāna oṣadhīr bapsad agnir na vāyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13678: RV_8,043.08a jihvābhir aha nannamad arciṣā jañjaṇābhavan /
GV01rvh1-10u:13680: RV_8,043.09a apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava sauṣadhīr anu rudhyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13682: RV_8,043.10a ud agne tava tad ghṛtād arcī rocata āhutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13686: RV_8,043.12a uta tvā namasā vayaṃ hotar vareṇyakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13688: RV_8,043.13a uta tvā bhṛguvac chuce manuṣvad agna āhuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13690: RV_8,043.14a tvaṃ hy agne agninā vipro vipreṇa san satā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13692: RV_8,043.15a sa tvaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe rayiṃ dehi sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13694: RV_8,043.16a agne bhrātaḥ sahaskṛta rohidaśva śucivrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13696: RV_8,043.17a uta tvāgne mama stuto vāśrāya pratiharyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:13698: RV_8,043.18a tubhyaṃ tā aṅgirastama viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13700: RV_8,043.19a agniṃ dhībhir manīṣiṇo medhirāso vipaścitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13702: RV_8,043.20a taṃ tvām ajmeṣu vājinaṃ tanvānā agne adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13704: RV_8,043.21a purutrā hi sadṛṅṅ asi viśo viśvā anu prabhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13706: RV_8,043.22a tam īḷiṣva ya āhuto 'gnir vibhrājate ghṛtaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13708: RV_8,043.23a taṃ tvā vayaṃ havāmahe śṛṇvantaṃ jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13710: RV_8,043.24a viśāṃ rājānam adbhutam adhyakṣaṃ dharmaṇām imam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13711: RV_8,043.24c agnim īḷe sa u śravat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13712: RV_8,043.25a agniṃ viśvāyuvepasam maryaṃ na vājinaṃ hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13714: RV_8,043.26a ghnan mṛdhrāṇy apa dviṣo dahan rakṣāṃsi viśvahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13716: RV_8,043.27a yaṃ tvā janāsa indhate manuṣvad aṅgirastama /
GV01rvh1-10u:13717: RV_8,043.27c agne sa bodhi me vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13718: RV_8,043.28a yad agne divijā asy apsujā vā sahaskṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13720: RV_8,043.29a tubhyaṃ ghet te janā ime viśvāḥ sukṣitayaḥ pṛthak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13722: RV_8,043.30a te ghed agne svādhyo 'hā viśvā nṛcakṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13724: RV_8,043.31a agnim mandram purupriyaṃ śīram pāvakaśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13726: RV_8,043.32a sa tvam agne vibhāvasuḥ sṛjan sūryo na raśmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13728: RV_8,043.33a tat te sahasva īmahe dātraṃ yan nopadasyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13732: RV_8,044.02a agne stomaṃ juṣasva me vardhasvānena manmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13734: RV_8,044.03a agniṃ dūtam puro dadhe havyavāham upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:13736: RV_8,044.04a ut te bṛhanto arcayaḥ samidhānasya dīdivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13738: RV_8,044.05a upa tvā juhvo mama ghṛtācīr yantu haryata /
GV01rvh1-10u:13740: RV_8,044.06a mandraṃ hotāram ṛtvijaṃ citrabhānuṃ vibhāvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:13741: RV_8,044.06c agnim īḷe sa u śravat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13742: RV_8,044.07a pratnaṃ hotāram īḍyaṃ juṣṭam agniṃ kavikratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:13746: RV_8,044.09a samidhāna u santya śukraśoca ihā vaha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13748: RV_8,044.10a vipraṃ hotāram adruhaṃ dhūmaketuṃ vibhāvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:13750: RV_8,044.11a agne ni pāhi nas tvam prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13752: RV_8,044.12a agniḥ pratnena manmanā śumbhānas tanvaṃ svām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13754: RV_8,044.13a ūrjo napātam ā huve 'gnim pāvakaśociṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13756: RV_8,044.14a sa no mitramahas tvam agne śukreṇa śociṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13758: RV_8,044.15a yo agniṃ tanvo dame devam martaḥ saparyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13760: RV_8,044.16a agnir mūrdhā divaḥ kakut patiḥ pṛthivyā ayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13762: RV_8,044.17a ud agne śucayas tava śukrā bhrājanta īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:13764: RV_8,044.18a īśiṣe vāryasya hi dātrasyāgne svarpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13766: RV_8,044.19a tvām agne manīṣiṇas tvāṃ hinvanti cittibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13768: RV_8,044.20a adabdhasya svadhāvato dūtasya rebhataḥ sadā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13770: RV_8,044.21a agniḥ śucivratatamaḥ śucir vipraḥ śuciḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13772: RV_8,044.22a uta tvā dhītayo mama giro vardhantu viśvahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13774: RV_8,044.23a yad agne syām ahaṃ tvaṃ tvaṃ vā ghā syā aham /
GV01rvh1-10u:13776: RV_8,044.24a vasur vasupatir hi kam asy agne vibhāvasuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13778: RV_8,044.25a agne dhṛtavratāya te samudrāyeva sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13780: RV_8,044.26a yuvānaṃ viśpatiṃ kaviṃ viśvādam puruvepasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13782: RV_8,044.27a yajñānāṃ rathye vayaṃ tigmajambhāya vīḷave /
GV01rvh1-10u:13784: RV_8,044.28a ayam agne tve api jaritā bhūtu santya /
GV01rvh1-10u:13786: RV_8,044.29a dhīro hy asy admasad vipro na jāgṛviḥ sadā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13788: RV_8,044.30a purāgne duritebhyaḥ purā mṛdhrebhyaḥ kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:13789: RV_8,044.30c pra ṇa āyur vaso tira //
GV01rvh1-10u:13790: RV_8,045.01a ā ghā ye agnim indhate stṛṇanti barhir ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:13792: RV_8,045.02a bṛhann id idhma eṣām bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13794: RV_8,045.03a ayuddha id yudhā vṛtaṃ śūra ājati satvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13796: RV_8,045.04a ā bundaṃ vṛtrahā dade jātaḥ pṛcchad vi mātaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:13797: RV_8,045.04c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire //
GV01rvh1-10u:13798: RV_8,045.05a prati tvā śavasī vadad girāv apso na yodhiṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13800: RV_8,045.06a uta tvam maghavañ chṛṇu yas te vaṣṭi vavakṣi tat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13802: RV_8,045.07a yad ājiṃ yāty ājikṛd indraḥ svaśvayur upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:13804: RV_8,045.08a vi ṣu viśvā abhiyujo vajrin viṣvag yathā vṛha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13806: RV_8,045.09a asmākaṃ su ratham pura indraḥ kṛṇotu sātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13808: RV_8,045.10a vṛjyāma te pari dviṣo 'raṃ te śakra dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:13810: RV_8,045.11a śanaiś cid yanto adrivo 'śvāvantaḥ śatagvinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13812: RV_8,045.12a ūrdhvā hi te dive-dive sahasrā sūnṛtā śatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13814: RV_8,045.13a vidmā hi tvā dhanañjayam indra dṛḷhā cid ārujam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13816: RV_8,045.14a kakuhaṃ cit tvā kave mandantu dhṛṣṇav indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13817: RV_8,045.14c ā tvā paṇiṃ yad īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:13818: RV_8,045.15a yas te revāṃ adāśuriḥ pramamarṣa maghattaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13819: RV_8,045.15c tasya no veda ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:13820: RV_8,045.16a ima u tvā vi cakṣate sakhāya indra sominaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13822: RV_8,045.17a uta tvābadhiraṃ vayaṃ śrutkarṇaṃ santam ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13824: RV_8,045.18a yac chuśrūyā imaṃ havaṃ durmarṣaṃ cakriyā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13826: RV_8,045.19a yac cid dhi te api vyathir jaganvāṃso amanmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13827: RV_8,045.19c godā id indra bodhi naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13828: RV_8,045.20a ā tvā rambhaṃ na jivrayo rarabhmā śavasas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:13830: RV_8,045.21a stotram indrāya gāyata purunṛmṇāya satvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:13832: RV_8,045.22a abhi tvā vṛṣabhā sute sutaṃ sṛjāmi pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13834: RV_8,045.23a mā tvā mūrā aviṣyavo mopahasvāna ā dabhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:13836: RV_8,045.24a iha tvā goparīṇasā mahe mandantu rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13838: RV_8,045.25a yā vṛtrahā parāvati sanā navā ca cucyuve /
GV01rvh1-10u:13840: RV_8,045.26a apibat kadruvaḥ sutam indraḥ sahasrabāhve /
GV01rvh1-10u:13842: RV_8,045.27a satyaṃ tat turvaśe yadau vidāno ahnavāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13844: RV_8,045.28a taraṇiṃ vo janānāṃ tradaṃ vājasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13846: RV_8,045.29a ṛbhukṣaṇaṃ na vartava uktheṣu tugryāvṛdham /
GV01rvh1-10u:13848: RV_8,045.30a yaḥ kṛntad id vi yonyaṃ triśokāya girim pṛthum /
GV01rvh1-10u:13850: RV_8,045.31a yad dadhiṣe manasyasi mandānaḥ pred iyakṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13851: RV_8,045.31c mā tat kar indra mṛḷaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:13852: RV_8,045.32a dabhraṃ cid dhi tvāvataḥ kṛtaṃ śṛṇve adhi kṣami /
GV01rvh1-10u:13854: RV_8,045.33a taved u tāḥ sukīrtayo 'sann uta praśastayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13856: RV_8,045.34a mā na ekasminn āgasi mā dvayor uta triṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13858: RV_8,045.35a bibhayā hi tvāvata ugrād abhiprabhaṅgiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13860: RV_8,045.36a mā sakhyuḥ śūnam ā vide mā putrasya prabhūvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:13862: RV_8,045.37a ko nu maryā amithitaḥ sakhā sakhāyam abravīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:13864: RV_8,045.38a evāre vṛṣabhā sute 'sinvan bhūry āvayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13866: RV_8,045.39a ā ta etā vacoyujā harī gṛbhṇe sumadrathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13867: RV_8,045.39c yad īm brahmabhya id dadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13868: RV_8,045.40a bhindhi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ pari bādho jahī mṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13869: RV_8,045.40c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:13870: RV_8,045.41a yad vīḷāv indra yat sthire yat parśāne parābhṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13871: RV_8,045.41c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:13872: RV_8,045.42a yasya te viśvamānuṣo bhūrer dattasya vedati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13873: RV_8,045.42c vasu spārhaṃ tad ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:13874: RV_8,046.01a tvāvataḥ purūvaso vayam indra praṇetaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13876: RV_8,046.02a tvāṃ hi satyam adrivo vidma dātāram iṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13878: RV_8,046.03a ā yasya te mahimānaṃ śatamūte śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:13880: RV_8,046.04a sunītho ghā sa martyo yam maruto yam aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13882: RV_8,046.05a dadhāno gomad aśvavat suvīryam ādityajūta edhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:13884: RV_8,046.06a tam indraṃ dānam īmahe śavasānam abhīrvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13886: RV_8,046.07a tasmin hi santy ūtayo viśvā abhīravaḥ sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13887: RV_8,046.07c tam ā vahantu saptayaḥ purūvasum madāya harayaḥ sutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13888: RV_8,046.08a yas te mado vareṇyo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13889: RV_8,046.08c ya ādadiḥ svar nṛbhir yaḥ pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13890: RV_8,046.09a yo duṣṭaro viśvavāra śravāyyo vājeṣv asti tarutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13891: RV_8,046.09c sa naḥ śaviṣṭha savanā vaso gahi gamema gomati vraje //
GV01rvh1-10u:13892: RV_8,046.10a gavyo ṣu ṇo yathā purāśvayota rathayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13894: RV_8,046.11a nahi te śūra rādhaso 'ntaṃ vindāmi satrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13895: RV_8,046.11c daśasyā no maghavan nū cid adrivo dhiyo vājebhir āvitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:13896: RV_8,046.12a ya ṛṣvaḥ śrāvayatsakhā viśvet sa veda janimā puruṣṭutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13897: RV_8,046.12c taṃ viśve mānuṣā yugendraṃ havante taviṣaṃ yatasrucaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13898: RV_8,046.13a sa no vājeṣv avitā purūvasuḥ purasthātā maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13899: RV_8,046.14a abhi vo vīram andhaso madeṣu gāya girā mahā vicetasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13900: RV_8,046.14c indraṃ nāma śrutyaṃ śākinaṃ vaco yathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13901: RV_8,046.15a dadī rekṇas tanve dadir vasu dadir vājeṣu puruhūta vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13903: RV_8,046.16a viśveṣām irajyantaṃ vasūnāṃ sāsahvāṃsaṃ cid asya varpasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13905: RV_8,046.17a mahaḥ su vo aram iṣe stavāmahe mīḷhuṣe araṅgamāya jagmaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:13906: RV_8,046.17c yajñebhir gīrbhir viśvamanuṣām marutām iyakṣasi gāye tvā namasā girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13907: RV_8,046.18a ye pātayante ajmabhir girīṇāṃ snubhir eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13908: RV_8,046.18c yajñam mahiṣvaṇīnāṃ sumnaṃ tuviṣvaṇīnām prādhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:13909: RV_8,046.19a prabhaṅgaṃ durmatīnām indra śaviṣṭhā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:13910: RV_8,046.19c rayim asmabhyaṃ yujyaṃ codayanmate jyeṣṭhaṃ codayanmate //
GV01rvh1-10u:13911: RV_8,046.20a sanitaḥ susanitar ugra citra cetiṣṭha sūnṛta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13912: RV_8,046.20c prāsahā samrāṭ sahuriṃ sahantam bhujyuṃ vājeṣu pūrvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:13913: RV_8,046.21a ā sa etu ya īvad āṃ adevaḥ pūrtam ādade /
GV01rvh1-10u:13914: RV_8,046.21c yathā cid vaśo aśvyaḥ pṛthuśravasi kānīte 'syā vyuṣy ādade //
GV01rvh1-10u:13915: RV_8,046.22a ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāśvyasyāyutāsanam uṣṭrānāṃ viṃśatiṃ śatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13916: RV_8,046.22c daśa śyāvīnāṃ śatā daśa tryaruṣīṇāṃ daśa gavāṃ sahasrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:13917: RV_8,046.23a daśa śyāvā ṛdhadrayo vītavārāsa āśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13920: RV_8,046.24c rathaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ dadan maṃhiṣṭhaḥ sūrir abhūd varṣiṣṭham akṛta śravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13921: RV_8,046.25a ā no vāyo mahe tane yāhi makhāya pājase /
GV01rvh1-10u:13922: RV_8,046.25c vayaṃ hi te cakṛmā bhūri dāvane sadyaś cin mahi dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:13923: RV_8,046.26a yo aśvebhir vahate vasta usrās triḥ sapta saptatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:13924: RV_8,046.26c ebhiḥ somebhiḥ somasudbhiḥ somapā dānāya śukrapūtapāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13925: RV_8,046.27a yo ma imaṃ cid u tmanāmandac citraṃ dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:13926: RV_8,046.27c araṭve akṣe nahuṣe sukṛtvani sukṛttarāya sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13927: RV_8,046.28a ucathye vapuṣi yaḥ svarāḷ uta vāyo ghṛtasnāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13928: RV_8,046.28c aśveṣitaṃ rajeṣitaṃ śuneṣitam prājma tad idaṃ nu tat //
GV01rvh1-10u:13929: RV_8,046.29a adha priyam iṣirāya ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrāsanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13931: RV_8,046.30a gāvo na yūtham upa yanti vadhraya upa mā yanti vadhrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13932: RV_8,046.31a adha yac cārathe gaṇe śatam uṣṭrāṃ acikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:13934: RV_8,046.32a śataṃ dāse balbūthe vipras tarukṣa ā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:13935: RV_8,046.32c te te vāyav ime janā madantīndragopā madanti devagopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13936: RV_8,046.33a adha syā yoṣaṇā mahī pratīcī vaśam aśvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13938: RV_8,047.01a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitra dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13939: RV_8,047.01c yam ādityā abhi druho rakṣathā nem aghaṃ naśad anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13940: RV_8,047.02a vidā devā aghānām ādityāso apākṛtim /
GV01rvh1-10u:13941: RV_8,047.02c pakṣā vayo yathopari vy asme śarma yacchatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13942: RV_8,047.03a vy asme adhi śarma tat pakṣā vayo na yantana /
GV01rvh1-10u:13943: RV_8,047.03c viśvāni viśvavedaso varūthyā manāmahe 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13944: RV_8,047.04a yasmā arāsata kṣayaṃ jīvātuṃ ca pracetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13945: RV_8,047.04c manor viśvasya ghed ima ādityā rāya īśate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13946: RV_8,047.05a pari ṇo vṛṇajann aghā durgāṇi rathyo yathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:13947: RV_8,047.05c syāmed indrasya śarmaṇy ādityānām utāvasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13948: RV_8,047.06a parihvṛted anā jano yuṣmādattasya vāyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:13949: RV_8,047.06c devā adabhram āśa vo yam ādityā ahetanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13950: RV_8,047.07a na taṃ tigmaṃ cana tyajo na drāsad abhi taṃ guru /
GV01rvh1-10u:13951: RV_8,047.07c yasmā u śarma sapratha ādityāso arādhvam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13952: RV_8,047.08a yuṣme devā api ṣmasi yudhyanta iva varmasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13953: RV_8,047.08c yūyam maho na enaso yūyam arbhād uruṣyatānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13954: RV_8,047.09a aditir na uruṣyatv aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13955: RV_8,047.09c mātā mitrasya revato 'ryamṇo varuṇasya cānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13956: RV_8,047.10a yad devāḥ śarma śaraṇaṃ yad bhadraṃ yad anāturam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13957: RV_8,047.10c tridhātu yad varūthyaṃ tad asmāsu vi yantanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13958: RV_8,047.11a ādityā ava hi khyatādhi kūlād iva spaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13959: RV_8,047.11c sutīrtham arvato yathānu no neṣathā sugam anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13960: RV_8,047.12a neha bhadraṃ rakṣasvine nāvayai nopayā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:13961: RV_8,047.12c gave ca bhadraṃ dhenave vīrāya ca śravasyate 'nehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13962: RV_8,047.13a yad āvir yad apīcyaṃ devāso asti duṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:13963: RV_8,047.13c trite tad viśvam āptya āre asmad dadhātanānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13964: RV_8,047.14a yac ca goṣu duṣṣvapnyaṃ yac cāsme duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13965: RV_8,047.14c tritāya tad vibhāvary āptyāya parā vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13966: RV_8,047.15a niṣkaṃ vā ghā kṛṇavate srajaṃ vā duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13967: RV_8,047.15c trite duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye pari dadmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13968: RV_8,047.16a tadannāya tadapase tam bhāgam upaseduṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:13969: RV_8,047.16c tritāya ca dvitāya coṣo duṣṣvapnyaṃ vahānehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13970: RV_8,047.17a yathā kalāṃ yathā śaphaṃ yatha ṛṇaṃ saṃnayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13971: RV_8,047.17c evā duṣṣvapnyaṃ sarvam āptye saṃ nayāmasy anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13973: RV_8,047.18c uṣo yasmād duṣṣvapnyād abhaiṣmāpa tad ucchatv anehaso va ūtayaḥ suūtayo va ūtayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13974: RV_8,048.01a svādor abhakṣi vayasaḥ sumedhāḥ svādhyo varivovittarasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:13975: RV_8,048.01c viśve yaṃ devā uta martyāso madhu bruvanto abhi saṃcaranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:13976: RV_8,048.02a antaś ca prāgā aditir bhavāsy avayātā haraso daivyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:13977: RV_8,048.02c indav indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ śrauṣṭīva dhuram anu rāya ṛdhyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13978: RV_8,048.03a apāma somam amṛtā abhūmāganma jyotir avidāma devān /
GV01rvh1-10u:13979: RV_8,048.03c kiṃ nūnam asmān kṛṇavad arātiḥ kim u dhūrtir amṛta martyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:13980: RV_8,048.04a śaṃ no bhava hṛda ā pīta indo piteva soma sūnave suśevaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13981: RV_8,048.04c sakheva sakhya uruśaṃsa dhīraḥ pra ṇa āyur jīvase soma tārīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13982: RV_8,048.05a ime mā pītā yaśasa uruṣyavo rathaṃ na gāvaḥ sam anāha parvasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:13983: RV_8,048.05c te mā rakṣantu visrasaś caritrād uta mā srāmād yavayantv indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13984: RV_8,048.06a agniṃ na mā mathitaṃ saṃ didīpaḥ pra cakṣaya kṛṇuhi vasyaso naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13985: RV_8,048.06c athā hi te mada ā soma manye revāṃ iva pra carā puṣṭim accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:13986: RV_8,048.07a iṣireṇa te manasā sutasya bhakṣīmahi pitryasyeva rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13987: RV_8,048.07c soma rājan pra ṇa āyūṃṣi tārīr ahānīva sūryo vāsarāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:13988: RV_8,048.08a soma rājan mṛḷayā naḥ svasti tava smasi vratyās tasya viddhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:13989: RV_8,048.08c alarti dakṣa uta manyur indo mā no aryo anukāmam parā dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13990: RV_8,048.09a tvaṃ hi nas tanvaḥ soma gopā gātre-gātre niṣasatthā nṛcakṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13991: RV_8,048.09c yat te vayam pramināma vratāni sa no mṛḷa suṣakhā deva vasyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13992: RV_8,048.10a ṛdūdareṇa sakhyā saceya yo mā na riṣyed dharyaśva pītaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13993: RV_8,048.10c ayaṃ yaḥ somo ny adhāyy asme tasmā indram pratiram emy āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13994: RV_8,048.11a apa tyā asthur anirā amīvā nir atrasan tamiṣīcīr abhaiṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:13995: RV_8,048.11c ā somo asmāṃ aruhad vihāyā aganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:13996: RV_8,048.12a yo na induḥ pitaro hṛtsu pīto 'martyo martyāṃ āviveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:13997: RV_8,048.12c tasmai somāya haviṣā vidhema mṛḷīke asya sumatau syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:13998: RV_8,048.13a tvaṃ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha /
GV01rvh1-10u:13999: RV_8,048.13c tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14000: RV_8,048.14a trātāro devā adhi vocatā no mā no nidrā īśata mota jalpiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14001: RV_8,048.14c vayaṃ somasya viśvaha priyāsaḥ suvīrāso vidatham ā vadema //
GV01rvh1-10u:14002: RV_8,048.15a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato vayodhās tvaṃ svarvid ā viśā nṛcakṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14003: RV_8,048.15c tvaṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ pāhi paścātād uta vā purastāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:14004: RV_8,049.01a abhi pra vaḥ surādhasam indram arca yathā vide /
GV01rvh1-10u:14005: RV_8,049.01c yo jaritṛbhyo maghavā purūvasuḥ sahasreṇeva śikṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14006: RV_8,049.02a śatānīkeva pra jigāti dhṛṣṇuyā hanti vṛtrāṇi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14007: RV_8,049.02c girer iva pra rasā asya pinvire datrāṇi purubhojasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14008: RV_8,049.03a ā tvā sutāsa indavo madā ya indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14009: RV_8,049.03c āpo na vajrinn anv okyaṃ saraḥ pṛṇanti śūra rādhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14010: RV_8,049.04a anehasam prataraṇaṃ vivakṣaṇam madhvaḥ svādiṣṭham īm piba /
GV01rvh1-10u:14011: RV_8,049.04c ā yathā mandasānaḥ kirāsi naḥ pra kṣudreva tmanā dhṛṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14012: RV_8,049.05a ā na stomam upa dravad dhiyāno aśvo na sotṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14013: RV_8,049.05c yaṃ te svadhāvan svadayanti dhenava indra kaṇveṣu rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14014: RV_8,049.06a ugraṃ na vīraṃ namasopa sedima vibhūtim akṣitāvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:14015: RV_8,049.06c udrīva vajrinn avato na siñcate kṣarantīndra dhītayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14016: RV_8,049.07a yad dha nūnaṃ yad vā yajñe yad vā pṛthivyām adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14017: RV_8,049.07c ato no yajñam āśubhir mahemata ugra ugrebhir ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14018: RV_8,049.08a ajirāso harayo ye ta āśavo vātā iva prasakṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14019: RV_8,049.08c yebhir apatyam manuṣaḥ parīyase yebhir viśvaṃ svar dṛśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14020: RV_8,049.09a etāvatas ta īmaha indra sumnasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14021: RV_8,049.09c yathā prāvo maghavan medhyātithiṃ yathā nīpātithiṃ dhane //
GV01rvh1-10u:14022: RV_8,049.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan trasadasyavi yathā pakthe daśavraje /
GV01rvh1-10u:14023: RV_8,049.10c yathā gośarye asanor ṛjiśvanīndra gomad dhiraṇyavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14024: RV_8,050.01a pra su śrutaṃ surādhasam arcā śakram abhiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14025: RV_8,050.01c yaḥ sunvate stuvate kāmyaṃ vasu sahasreṇeva maṃhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14026: RV_8,050.02a śatānīkā hetayo asya duṣṭarā indrasya samiṣo mahīḥ /
