GV01rvh1-10u:14027: RV_8,050.02c girir na bhujmā maghavatsu pinvate yad īṃ sutā amandiṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14028: RV_8,050.03a yad īṃ sutāsa indavo 'bhi priyam amandiṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14029: RV_8,050.03c āpo na dhāyi savanam ma ā vaso dughā ivopa dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14030: RV_8,050.04a anehasaṃ vo havamānam ūtaye madhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14031: RV_8,050.04c ā tvā vaso havamānāsa indava upa stotreṣu dadhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:14032: RV_8,050.05a ā naḥ some svadhvara iyāno atyo na tośate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14033: RV_8,050.05c yaṃ te svadāvan svadanti gūrtayaḥ paure chandayase havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14034: RV_8,050.06a pra vīram ugraṃ viviciṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ vibhūtiṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14035: RV_8,050.06c udrīva vajrinn avato vasutvanā sadā pīpetha dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14036: RV_8,050.07a yad dha nūnam parāvati yad vā pṛthivyāṃ divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14037: RV_8,050.07c yujāna indra haribhir mahemata ṛṣva ṛṣvebhir ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14038: RV_8,050.08a rathirāso harayo ye te asridha ojo vātasya piprati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14039: RV_8,050.08c yebhir ni dasyum manuṣo nighoṣayo yebhiḥ svaḥ parīyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14040: RV_8,050.09a etāvatas te vaso vidyāma śūra navyasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14041: RV_8,050.09c yathā prāva etaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane yathā vaśaṃ daśavraje //
GV01rvh1-10u:14042: RV_8,050.10a yathā kaṇve maghavan medhe adhvare dīrghanīthe damūnasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14043: RV_8,050.10c yathā gośarye asiṣāso adrivo mayi gotraṃ hariśriyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14044: RV_8,051.01a yathā manau sāṃvaraṇau somam indrāpibaḥ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14045: RV_8,051.01c nīpātithau maghavan medhyātithau puṣṭigau śruṣṭigau sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14046: RV_8,051.02a pārṣadvāṇaḥ praskaṇvaṃ sam asādayac chayānaṃ jivrim uddhitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14047: RV_8,051.02c sahasrāṇy asiṣāsad gavām ṛṣis tvoto dasyave vṛkaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14048: RV_8,051.03a ya ukthebhir na vindhate cikid ya ṛṣicodanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14049: RV_8,051.03c indraṃ tam acchā vada navyasyā maty ariṣyantaṃ na bhojase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14050: RV_8,051.04a yasmā arkaṃ saptaśīrṣāṇam ānṛcus tridhātum uttame pade /
GV01rvh1-10u:14051: RV_8,051.04c sa tv imā viśvā bhuvanāni cikradad ād ij janiṣṭa pauṃsyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14052: RV_8,051.05a yo no dātā vasūnām indraṃ taṃ hūmahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14053: RV_8,051.05c vidmā hy asya sumatiṃ navīyasīṃ gamema gomati vraje //
GV01rvh1-10u:14054: RV_8,051.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya śikṣasi sa rāyas poṣam aśnute /
GV01rvh1-10u:14055: RV_8,051.06c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14056: RV_8,051.07a kadā cana starīr asi nendra saścasi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14057: RV_8,051.07c upopen nu maghavan bhūya in nu te dānaṃ devasya pṛcyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14058: RV_8,051.08a pra yo nanakṣe abhy ojasā kriviṃ vadhaiḥ śuṣṇaṃ nighoṣayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:14059: RV_8,051.08c yaded astambhīt prathayann amūṃ divam ād ij janiṣṭa pārthivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14060: RV_8,051.09a yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14061: RV_8,051.09c tiraś cid arye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14062: RV_8,051.10a turaṇyavo madhumantaṃ ghṛtaścutaṃ viprāso arkam ānṛcuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14063: RV_8,051.10c asme rayiḥ paprathe vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo 'sme suvānāsa indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14064: RV_8,052.01a yathā manau vivasvati somaṃ śakrāpibaḥ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14065: RV_8,052.01c yathā trite chanda indra jujoṣasy āyau mādayase sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14066: RV_8,052.02a pṛṣadhre medhye mātariśvanīndra suvāne amandathāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14067: RV_8,052.02c yathā somaṃ daśaśipre daśoṇye syūmaraśmāv ṛjūnasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14068: RV_8,052.03a ya ukthā kevalā dadhe yaḥ somaṃ dhṛṣitāpibat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14069: RV_8,052.03c yasmai viṣṇus trīṇi padā vicakrama upa mitrasya dharmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14070: RV_8,052.04a yasya tvam indra stomeṣu cākano vāje vājiñ chatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14071: RV_8,052.04c taṃ tvā vayaṃ sudughām iva goduho juhūmasi śravasyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14072: RV_8,052.05a yo no dātā sa naḥ pitā mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14073: RV_8,052.05c ayāmann ugro maghavā purūvasur gor aśvasya pra dātu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14074: RV_8,052.06a yasmai tvaṃ vaso dānāya maṃhase sa rāyas poṣam invati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14075: RV_8,052.06c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14076: RV_8,052.07a kadā cana pra yucchasy ubhe ni pāsi janmanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:14077: RV_8,052.07c turīyāditya havanaṃ ta indriyam ā tasthāv amṛtaṃ divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14078: RV_8,052.08a yasmai tvam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ śikṣo śikṣasi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14079: RV_8,052.08c asmākaṃ gira uta suṣṭutiṃ vaso kaṇvavac chṛṇudhī havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14080: RV_8,052.09a astāvi manma pūrvyam brahmendrāya vocata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14081: RV_8,052.09c pūrvīr ṛtasya bṛhatīr anūṣata stotur medhā asṛkṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:14082: RV_8,052.10a sam indro rāyo bṛhatīr adhūnuta saṃ kṣoṇī sam u sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14083: RV_8,052.10c saṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayaḥ saṃ gavāśiraḥ somā indram amandiṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14084: RV_8,053.01a upamaṃ tvā maghonāṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ ca vṛṣabhāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14085: RV_8,053.01c pūrbhittamam maghavann indra govidam īśānaṃ rāya īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14086: RV_8,053.02a ya āyuṃ kutsam atithigvam ardayo vāvṛdhāno dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:14087: RV_8,053.02c taṃ tvā vayaṃ haryaśvaṃ śatakratuṃ vājayanto havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14088: RV_8,053.03a ā no viśveṣāṃ rasam madhvaḥ siñcantv adrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14089: RV_8,053.03c ye parāvati sunvire janeṣv ā ye arvāvatīndavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14090: RV_8,053.04a viśvā dveṣāṃsi jahi cāva cā kṛdhi viśve sanvantv ā vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14091: RV_8,053.04c śīṣṭeṣu cit te madirāso aṃśavo yatrā somasya tṛmpasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14092: RV_8,053.05a indra nedīya ed ihi mitamedhābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14093: RV_8,053.05c ā śantama śantamābhir abhiṣṭibhir ā svāpe svāpibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14094: RV_8,053.06a ājituraṃ satpatiṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ kṛdhi prajāsv ābhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14095: RV_8,053.06c pra sū tirā śacībhir ye ta ukthinaḥ kratum punata ānuṣak //
GV01rvh1-10u:14096: RV_8,053.07a yas te sādhiṣṭho 'vase te syāma bhareṣu te /
GV01rvh1-10u:14097: RV_8,053.07c vayaṃ hotrābhir uta devahūtibhiḥ sasavāṃso manāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14098: RV_8,053.08a ahaṃ hi te harivo brahma vājayur ājiṃ yāmi sadotibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14099: RV_8,053.08c tvām id eva tam ame sam aśvayur gavyur agre mathīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14100: RV_8,054.01a etat ta indra vīryaṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14101: RV_8,054.01c te stobhanta ūrjam āvan ghṛtaścutam paurāso nakṣan dhītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14102: RV_8,054.02a nakṣanta indram avase sukṛtyayā yeṣāṃ suteṣu mandase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14103: RV_8,054.02c yathā saṃvarte amado yathā kṛśa evāsme indra matsva //
GV01rvh1-10u:14104: RV_8,054.03a ā no viśve sajoṣaso devāso gantanopa naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14105: RV_8,054.03c vasavo rudrā avase na ā gamañ chṛṇvantu maruto havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14106: RV_8,054.04a pūṣā viṣṇur havanam me sarasvaty avantu sapta sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14107: RV_8,054.04c āpo vātaḥ parvatāso vanaspatiḥ śṛṇotu pṛthivī havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14108: RV_8,054.05a yad indra rādho asti te māghonam maghavattama /
GV01rvh1-10u:14109: RV_8,054.05c tena no bodhi sadhamādyo vṛdhe bhago dānāya vṛtrahan //
GV01rvh1-10u:14110: RV_8,054.06a ājipate nṛpate tvam id dhi no vāja ā vakṣi sukrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14111: RV_8,054.06c vītī hotrābhir uta devavītibhiḥ sasavāṃso vi śṛṇvire //
GV01rvh1-10u:14112: RV_8,054.07a santi hy arya āśiṣa indra āyur janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14113: RV_8,054.07c asmān nakṣasva maghavann upāvase dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14114: RV_8,054.08a vayaṃ ta indra stomebhir vidhema tvam asmākaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14115: RV_8,054.08c mahi sthūraṃ śaśayaṃ rādho ahrayam praskaṇvāya ni tośaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:14116: RV_8,055.01a bhūrīd indrasya vīryaṃ vy akhyam abhy āyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14118: RV_8,055.02a śataṃ śvetāsa ukṣaṇo divi tāro na rocante /
GV01rvh1-10u:14120: RV_8,055.03a śataṃ veṇūñ chataṃ śunaḥ śataṃ carmāṇi mlātāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:14121: RV_8,055.03c śatam me balbajastukā aruṣīṇāṃ catuḥśatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14122: RV_8,055.04a sudevā stha kāṇvāyanā vayo-vayo vicarantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14124: RV_8,055.05a ād it sāptasya carkirann ānūnasya mahi śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14125: RV_8,055.05c śyāvīr atidhvasan pathaś cakṣuṣā cana saṃnaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14126: RV_8,056.01a prati te dasyave vṛka rādho adarśy ahrayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14128: RV_8,056.02a daśa mahyam pautakrataḥ sahasrā dasyave vṛkaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14130: RV_8,056.03a śatam me gardabhānāṃ śatam ūrṇāvatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14132: RV_8,056.04a tatro api prāṇīyata pūtakratāyai vyaktā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14134: RV_8,056.05a acety agniś cikitur havyavāṭ sa sumadrathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14135: RV_8,056.05c agniḥ śukreṇa śociṣā bṛhat sūro arocata divi sūryo arocata //
GV01rvh1-10u:14136: RV_8,057.01a yuvaṃ devā kratunā pūrvyeṇa yuktā rathena taviṣaṃ yajatrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14137: RV_8,057.01c āgacchataṃ nāsatyā śacībhir idaṃ tṛtīyaṃ savanam pibāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14138: RV_8,057.02a yuvāṃ devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ satyāḥ satyasya dadṛśe purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14139: RV_8,057.02c asmākaṃ yajñaṃ savanaṃ juṣāṇā pātaṃ somam aśvinā dīdyagnī //
GV01rvh1-10u:14140: RV_8,057.03a panāyyaṃ tad aśvinā kṛtaṃ vāṃ vṛṣabho divo rajasaḥ pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14141: RV_8,057.03c sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta ye gaviṣṭau sarvāṃ it tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:14142: RV_8,057.04a ayaṃ vām bhāgo nihito yajatremā giro nāsatyopa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14143: RV_8,057.04c pibataṃ somam madhumantam asme pra dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śacībhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14144: RV_8,058.01a yam ṛtvijo bahudhā kalpayantaḥ sacetaso yajñam imaṃ vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:14145: RV_8,058.01c yo anūcāno brāhmaṇo yukta āsīt kā svit tatra yajamānasya saṃvit //
GV01rvh1-10u:14146: RV_8,058.02a eka evāgnir bahudhā samiddha ekaḥ sūryo viśvam anu prabhūtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14147: RV_8,058.02c ekaivoṣāḥ sarvam idaṃ vi bhāty ekaṃ vā idaṃ vi babhūva sarvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14148: RV_8,058.03a jyotiṣmantaṃ ketumantaṃ tricakraṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ suṣadam bhūrivāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:14149: RV_8,058.03c citrāmaghā yasya yoge 'dhijajñe taṃ vāṃ huve ati riktam pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:14150: RV_8,059.01a imāni vām bhāgadheyāni sisrata indrāvaruṇā pra mahe suteṣu vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14151: RV_8,059.01c yajñe-yajñe ha savanā bhuraṇyatho yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14152: RV_8,059.02a niṣṣidhvarīr oṣadhīr āpa āstām indrāvaruṇā mahimānam āśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14153: RV_8,059.02c yā sisratū rajasaḥ pāre adhvano yayoḥ śatrur nakir ādeva ohate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14154: RV_8,059.03a satyaṃ tad indrāvaruṇā kṛśasya vām madhva ūrmiṃ duhate sapta vāṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14155: RV_8,059.03c tābhir dāśvāṃsam avataṃ śubhas patī yo vām adabdho abhi pāti cittibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14156: RV_8,059.04a ghṛtapruṣaḥ saumyā jīradānavaḥ sapta svasāraḥ sadana ṛtasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14157: RV_8,059.04c yā ha vām indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tābhir dhattaṃ yajamānāya śikṣatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14158: RV_8,059.05a avocāma mahate saubhagāya satyaṃ tveṣābhyām mahimānam indriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14159: RV_8,059.05c asmān sv indrāvaruṇā ghṛtaścutas tribhiḥ sāptebhir avataṃ śubhas patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:14160: RV_8,059.06a indrāvaruṇā yad ṛṣibhyo manīṣāṃ vāco matiṃ śrutam adattam agre /
GV01rvh1-10u:14161: RV_8,059.06c yāni sthānāny asṛjanta dhīrā yajñaṃ tanvānās tapasābhy apaśyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14162: RV_8,059.07a indrāvaruṇā saumanasam adṛptaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhattam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14163: RV_8,059.07c prajām puṣṭim bhūtim asmāsu dhattaṃ dīrghāyutvāya pra tirataṃ na āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14164: RV_8,060.01a agna ā yāhy agnibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14165: RV_8,060.01c ā tvām anaktu prayatā haviṣmatī yajiṣṭham barhir āsade //
GV01rvh1-10u:14166: RV_8,060.02a acchā hi tvā sahasaḥ sūno aṅgiraḥ srucaś caranty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:14167: RV_8,060.02c ūrjo napātaṃ ghṛtakeśam īmahe 'gniṃ yajñeṣu pūrvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14168: RV_8,060.03a agne kavir vedhā asi hotā pāvaka yakṣyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14169: RV_8,060.03c mandro yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyo viprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14170: RV_8,060.04a adrogham ā vahośato yaviṣṭhya devāṃ ajasra vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14171: RV_8,060.04c abhi prayāṃsi sudhitā vaso gahi mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14172: RV_8,060.05a tvam it saprathā asy agne trātar ṛtas kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14173: RV_8,060.05c tvāṃ viprāsaḥ samidhāna dīdiva ā vivāsanti vedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14174: RV_8,060.06a śocā śociṣṭha dīdihi viśe mayo rāsva stotre mahāṃ asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14175: RV_8,060.06c devānāṃ śarman mama santu sūrayaḥ śatrūṣāhaḥ svagnayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14176: RV_8,060.07a yathā cid vṛddham atasam agne saṃjūrvasi kṣami /
GV01rvh1-10u:14177: RV_8,060.07c evā daha mitramaho yo asmadhrug durmanmā kaś ca venati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14178: RV_8,060.08a mā no martāya ripave rakṣasvine māghaśaṃsāya rīradhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14179: RV_8,060.08c asredhadbhis taraṇibhir yaviṣṭhya śivebhiḥ pāhi pāyubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14180: RV_8,060.09a pāhi no agna ekayā pāhy uta dvitīyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14181: RV_8,060.09c pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:14182: RV_8,060.10a pāhi viśvasmād rakṣaso arāvṇaḥ pra sma vājeṣu no 'va /
GV01rvh1-10u:14183: RV_8,060.10c tvām id dhi nediṣṭhaṃ devatātaya āpiṃ nakṣāmahe vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14184: RV_8,060.11a ā no agne vayovṛdhaṃ rayim pāvaka śaṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14185: RV_8,060.11c rāsvā ca na upamāte puruspṛhaṃ sunītī svayaśastaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:14186: RV_8,060.12a yena vaṃsāma pṛtanāsu śardhatas taranto arya ādiśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14187: RV_8,060.12c sa tvaṃ no vardha prayasā śacīvaso jinvā dhiyo vasuvidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14188: RV_8,060.13a śiśāno vṛṣabho yathāgniḥ śṛṅge davidhvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14189: RV_8,060.13c tigmā asya hanavo na pratidhṛṣe sujambhaḥ sahaso yahuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14190: RV_8,060.14a nahi te agne vṛṣabha pratidhṛṣe jambhāso yad vitiṣṭhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14191: RV_8,060.14c sa tvaṃ no hotaḥ suhutaṃ haviṣ kṛdhi vaṃsvā no vāryā puru //
GV01rvh1-10u:14192: RV_8,060.15a śeṣe vaneṣu mātroḥ saṃ tvā martāsa indhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14193: RV_8,060.15c atandro havyā vahasi haviṣkṛta ād id deveṣu rājasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14194: RV_8,060.16a sapta hotāras tam id īḷate tvāgne sutyajam ahrayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14195: RV_8,060.16c bhinatsy adriṃ tapasā vi śociṣā prāgne tiṣṭha janāṃ ati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14196: RV_8,060.17a agnim-agniṃ vo adhriguṃ huvema vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14197: RV_8,060.17c agniṃ hitaprayasaḥ śaśvatīṣv ā hotāraṃ carṣaṇīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14198: RV_8,060.18a ketena śarman sacate suṣāmaṇy agne tubhyaṃ cikitvanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14199: RV_8,060.18c iṣaṇyayā naḥ pururūpam ā bhara vājaṃ nediṣṭham ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:14200: RV_8,060.19a agne jaritar viśpatis tepāno deva rakṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14201: RV_8,060.19c aproṣivān gṛhapatir mahāṃ asi divas pāyur duroṇayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14202: RV_8,060.20a mā no rakṣa ā veśīd āghṛṇīvaso mā yātur yātumāvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14203: RV_8,060.20c parogavyūty anirām apa kṣudham agne sedha rakṣasvinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14204: RV_8,061.01a ubhayaṃ śṛṇavac ca na indro arvāg idaṃ vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14205: RV_8,061.01c satrācyā maghavā somapītaye dhiyā śaviṣṭha ā gamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14206: RV_8,061.02a taṃ hi svarājaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tam ojase dhiṣaṇe niṣṭatakṣatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14207: RV_8,061.02c utopamānām prathamo ni ṣīdasi somakāmaṃ hi te manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14209: RV_8,061.03c vidmā hi tvā harivaḥ pṛtsu sāsahim adhṛṣṭaṃ cid dadhṛṣvaṇim //
GV01rvh1-10u:14210: RV_8,061.04a aprāmisatya maghavan tathed asad indra kratvā yathā vaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14211: RV_8,061.04c sanema vājaṃ tava śiprinn avasā makṣū cid yanto adrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14212: RV_8,061.05a śagdhy ū ṣu śacīpata indra viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14213: RV_8,061.05c bhagaṃ na hi tvā yaśasaṃ vasuvidam anu śūra carāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14214: RV_8,061.06a pauro aśvasya purukṛd gavām asy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14215: RV_8,061.06c nakir hi dānam parimardhiṣat tve yad-yad yāmi tad ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:14216: RV_8,061.07a tvaṃ hy ehi cerave vidā bhagaṃ vasuttaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14217: RV_8,061.07c ud vāvṛṣasva maghavan gaviṣṭaya ud indrāśvamiṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:14218: RV_8,061.08a tvam purū sahasrāṇi śatāni ca yūthā dānāya maṃhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14219: RV_8,061.08c ā purandaraṃ cakṛma vipravacasa indraṃ gāyanto 'vase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14220: RV_8,061.09a avipro vā yad avidhad vipro vendra te vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14221: RV_8,061.09c sa pra mamandat tvāyā śatakrato prācāmanyo ahaṃsana //
GV01rvh1-10u:14222: RV_8,061.10a ugrabāhur mrakṣakṛtvā purandaro yadi me śṛṇavad dhavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14223: RV_8,061.10c vasūyavo vasupatiṃ śatakratuṃ stomair indraṃ havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14224: RV_8,061.11a na pāpāso manāmahe nārāyāso na jaḷhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14225: RV_8,061.11c yad in nv indraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sacā sute sakhāyaṃ kṛṇavāmahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:14226: RV_8,061.12a ugraṃ yuyujma pṛtanāsu sāsahim ṛṇakātim adābhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14227: RV_8,061.12c vedā bhṛmaṃ cit sanitā rathītamo vājinaṃ yam id ū naśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14228: RV_8,061.13a yata indra bhayāmahe tato no abhayaṃ kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14229: RV_8,061.13c maghavañ chagdhi tava tan na ūtibhir vi dviṣo vi mṛdho jahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14230: RV_8,061.14a tvaṃ hi rādhaspate rādhaso mahaḥ kṣayasyāsi vidhataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14231: RV_8,061.14c taṃ tvā vayam maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ sutāvanto havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14232: RV_8,061.15a indra spaḷ uta vṛtrahā paraspā no vareṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14233: RV_8,061.15c sa no rakṣiṣac caramaṃ sa madhyamaṃ sa paścāt pātu naḥ puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14234: RV_8,061.16a tvaṃ naḥ paścād adharād uttarāt pura indra ni pāhi viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14235: RV_8,061.16c āre asmat kṛṇuhi daivyam bhayam āre hetīr adevīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14236: RV_8,061.17a adyādyā śvaḥ-śva indra trāsva pare ca naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14237: RV_8,061.17c viśvā ca no jaritṝn satpate ahā divā naktaṃ ca rakṣiṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14238: RV_8,061.18a prabhaṅgī śūro maghavā tuvīmaghaḥ sammiślo viryāya kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14239: RV_8,061.18c ubhā te bāhū vṛṣaṇā śatakrato ni yā vajram mimikṣatuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14240: RV_8,062.01a pro asmā upastutim bharatā yaj jujoṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14241: RV_8,062.01c ukthair indrasya māhinaṃ vayo vardhanti somino bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14242: RV_8,062.02a ayujo asamo nṛbhir ekaḥ kṛṣṭīr ayāsyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14243: RV_8,062.02c pūrvīr ati pra vāvṛdhe viśvā jātāny ojasā bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14244: RV_8,062.03a ahitena cid arvatā jīradānuḥ siṣāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14245: RV_8,062.03c pravācyam indra tat tava vīryāṇi kariṣyato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14246: RV_8,062.04a ā yāhi kṛṇavāma ta indra brahmāṇi vardhanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14247: RV_8,062.04c yebhiḥ śaviṣṭha cākano bhadram iha śravasyate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14248: RV_8,062.05a dhṛṣataś cid dhṛṣan manaḥ kṛṇoṣīndra yat tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14249: RV_8,062.05c tīvraiḥ somaiḥ saparyato namobhiḥ pratibhūṣato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14250: RV_8,062.06a ava caṣṭa ṛcīṣamo 'vatāṃ iva mānuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14251: RV_8,062.06c juṣṭvī dakṣasya sominaḥ sakhāyaṃ kṛṇute yujam bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14252: RV_8,062.07a viśve ta indra vīryaṃ devā anu kratuṃ daduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14253: RV_8,062.07c bhuvo viśvasya gopatiḥ puruṣṭuta bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14254: RV_8,062.08a gṛṇe tad indra te śava upamaṃ devatātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14255: RV_8,062.08c yad dhaṃsi vṛtram ojasā śacīpate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14256: RV_8,062.09a samaneva vapuṣyataḥ kṛṇavan mānuṣā yugā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14257: RV_8,062.09c vide tad indraś cetanam adha śruto bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14258: RV_8,062.10a uj jātam indra te śava ut tvām ut tava kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:14259: RV_8,062.10c bhūrigo bhūri vāvṛdhur maghavan tava śarmaṇi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14260: RV_8,062.11a ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahan saṃ yujyāva sanibhya ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14261: RV_8,062.11c arātīvā cid adrivo 'nu nau śūra maṃsate bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14262: RV_8,062.12a satyam id vā u taṃ vayam indraṃ stavāma nānṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14263: RV_8,062.12c mahāṃ asunvato vadho bhūri jyotīṃṣi sunvato bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14264: RV_8,063.01a sa pūrvyo mahānāṃ venaḥ kratubhir ānaje /
GV01rvh1-10u:14265: RV_8,063.01c yasya dvārā manuṣ pitā deveṣu dhiya ānaje //
GV01rvh1-10u:14266: RV_8,063.02a divo mānaṃ not sadan somapṛṣṭhāso adrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14268: RV_8,063.03a sa vidvāṃ aṅgirobhya indro gā avṛṇod apa /
GV01rvh1-10u:14270: RV_8,063.04a sa pratnathā kavivṛdha indro vākasya vakṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14271: RV_8,063.04c śivo arkasya homany asmatrā gantv avase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14272: RV_8,063.05a ād ū nu te anu kratuṃ svāhā varasya yajyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14273: RV_8,063.05c śvātram arkā anūṣatendra gotrasya dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:14274: RV_8,063.06a indre viśvāni vīryā kṛtāni kartvāni ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:14276: RV_8,063.07a yat pāñcajanyayā viśendre ghoṣā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14277: RV_8,063.07c astṛṇād barhaṇā vipo 'ryo mānasya sa kṣayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14278: RV_8,063.08a iyam u te anuṣṭutiś cakṛṣe tāni pauṃsyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14280: RV_8,063.09a asya vṛṣṇo vyodana uru kramiṣṭa jīvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14281: RV_8,063.09c yavaṃ na paśva ā dade //
GV01rvh1-10u:14282: RV_8,063.10a tad dadhānā avasyavo yuṣmābhir dakṣapitaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14284: RV_8,063.11a baḷ ṛtviyāya dhāmna ṛkvabhiḥ śūra nonumaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14286: RV_8,063.12a asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14287: RV_8,063.12c yaḥ śaṃsate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmāṃ avantu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14288: RV_8,064.01a ut tvā mandantu stomāḥ kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14290: RV_8,064.02a padā paṇīṃr arādhaso ni bādhasva mahāṃ asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14291: RV_8,064.02c nahi tvā kaś cana prati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14292: RV_8,064.03a tvam īśiṣe sutānām indra tvam asutānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14294: RV_8,064.04a ehi prehi kṣayo divy āghoṣañ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14296: RV_8,064.05a tyaṃ cit parvataṃ giriṃ śatavantaṃ sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14298: RV_8,064.06a vayam u tvā divā sute vayaṃ naktaṃ havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14300: RV_8,064.07a kva sya vṛṣabho yuvā tuvigrīvo anānataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14302: RV_8,064.08a kasya svit savanaṃ vṛṣā jujuṣvāṃ ava gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14303: RV_8,064.08c indraṃ ka u svid ā cake //
GV01rvh1-10u:14304: RV_8,064.09a kaṃ te dānā asakṣata vṛtrahan kaṃ suvīryā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14305: RV_8,064.09c ukthe ka u svid antamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14306: RV_8,064.10a ayaṃ te mānuṣe jane somaḥ pūruṣu sūyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14308: RV_8,064.11a ayaṃ te śaryaṇāvati suṣomāyām adhi priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14310: RV_8,064.12a tam adya rādhase mahe cārum madāya ghṛṣvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14312: RV_8,065.01a yad indra prāg apāg udaṅ nyag vā hūyase nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14314: RV_8,065.02a yad vā prasravaṇe divo mādayāse svarṇare /
GV01rvh1-10u:14316: RV_8,065.03a ā tvā gīrbhir mahām uruṃ huve gām iva bhojase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14318: RV_8,065.04a ā ta indra mahimānaṃ harayo deva te mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14320: RV_8,065.05a indra gṛṇīṣa u stuṣe mahāṃ ugra īśānakṛt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14322: RV_8,065.06a sutāvantas tvā vayam prayasvanto havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14324: RV_8,065.07a yac cid dhi śaśvatām asīndra sādhāraṇas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14326: RV_8,065.08a idaṃ te somyam madhv adhukṣann adribhir naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14328: RV_8,065.09a viśvāṃ aryo vipaścito 'ti khyas tūyam ā gahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14330: RV_8,065.10a dātā me pṛṣatīnāṃ rājā hiraṇyavīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14332: RV_8,065.11a sahasre pṛṣatīnām adhi ścandram bṛhat pṛthu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14334: RV_8,065.12a napāto durgahasya me sahasreṇa surādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14336: RV_8,066.01a tarobhir vo vidadvasum indraṃ sabādha ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14337: RV_8,066.01c bṛhad gāyantaḥ sutasome adhvare huve bharaṃ na kāriṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14338: RV_8,066.02a na yaṃ dudhrā varante na sthirā muro made suśipram andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14339: RV_8,066.02c ya ādṛtyā śaśamānāya sunvate dātā jaritra ukthyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14340: RV_8,066.03a yaḥ śakro mṛkṣo aśvyo yo vā kījo hiraṇyayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14341: RV_8,066.03c sa ūrvasya rejayaty apāvṛtim indro gavyasya vṛtrahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14342: RV_8,066.04a nikhātaṃ cid yaḥ purusambhṛtaṃ vasūd id vapati dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14343: RV_8,066.04c vajrī suśipro haryaśva it karad indraḥ kratvā yathā vaśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14344: RV_8,066.05a yad vāvantha puruṣṭuta purā cic chūra nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14345: RV_8,066.05c vayaṃ tat ta indra sam bharāmasi yajñam ukthaṃ turaṃ vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14346: RV_8,066.06a sacā someṣu puruhūta vajrivo madāya dyukṣa somapāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14347: RV_8,066.06c tvam id dhi brahmakṛte kāmyaṃ vasu deṣṭhaḥ sunvate bhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14348: RV_8,066.07a vayam enam idā hyo 'pīpemeha vajriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14349: RV_8,066.07c tasmā u adya samanā sutam bharā nūnam bhūṣata śrute //
GV01rvh1-10u:14350: RV_8,066.08a vṛkaś cid asya vāraṇa urāmathir ā vayuneṣu bhūṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14351: RV_8,066.08c semaṃ na stomaṃ jujuṣāṇa ā gahīndra pra citrayā dhiyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14352: RV_8,066.09a kad ū nv asyākṛtam indrasyāsti pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14353: RV_8,066.09c keno nu kaṃ śromatena na śuśruve januṣaḥ pari vṛtrahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14354: RV_8,066.10a kad ū mahīr adhṛṣṭā asya taviṣīḥ kad u vṛtraghno astṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14355: RV_8,066.10c indro viśvān bekanāṭāṃ ahardṛśa uta kratvā paṇīṃr abhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14356: RV_8,066.11a vayaṃ ghā te apūrvyendra brahmāṇi vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:14357: RV_8,066.11c purūtamāsaḥ puruhūta vajrivo bhṛtiṃ na pra bharāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14358: RV_8,066.12a pūrvīś cid dhi tve tuvikūrminn āśaso havanta indrotayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14359: RV_8,066.12c tiraś cid aryaḥ savanā vaso gahi śaviṣṭha śrudhi me havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14360: RV_8,066.13a vayaṃ ghā te tve id v indra viprā api ṣmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14361: RV_8,066.13c nahi tvad anyaḥ puruhūta kaś cana maghavann asti marḍitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14362: RV_8,066.14a tvaṃ no asyā amater uta kṣudho 'bhiśaster ava spṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14363: RV_8,066.14c tvaṃ na ūtī tava citrayā dhiyā śikṣā śaciṣṭha gātuvit //
GV01rvh1-10u:14364: RV_8,066.15a soma id vaḥ suto astu kalayo mā bibhītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:14365: RV_8,066.15c aped eṣa dhvasmāyati svayaṃ ghaiṣo apāyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14366: RV_8,067.01a tyān nu kṣatriyāṃ ava ādityān yāciṣāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14368: RV_8,067.02a mitro no aty aṃhatiṃ varuṇaḥ parṣad aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14370: RV_8,067.03a teṣāṃ hi citram ukthyaṃ varūtham asti dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14372: RV_8,067.04a mahi vo mahatām avo varuṇa mitrāryaman /
GV01rvh1-10u:14374: RV_8,067.05a jīvān no abhi dhetanādityāsaḥ purā hathāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14376: RV_8,067.06a yad vaḥ śrāntāya sunvate varūtham asti yac chardiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14378: RV_8,067.07a asti devā aṃhor urv asti ratnam anāgasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14380: RV_8,067.08a mā naḥ setuḥ siṣed ayam mahe vṛṇaktu nas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:14381: RV_8,067.08c indra id dhi śruto vaśī //
GV01rvh1-10u:14382: RV_8,067.09a mā no mṛcā ripūṇāṃ vṛjinānām aviṣyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14384: RV_8,067.10a uta tvām adite mahy ahaṃ devy upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:14386: RV_8,067.11a parṣi dīne gabhīra āṃ ugraputre jighāṃsataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14388: RV_8,067.12a aneho na uruvraja urūci vi prasartave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14390: RV_8,067.13a ye mūrdhānaḥ kṣitīnām adabdhāsaḥ svayaśasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14392: RV_8,067.14a te na āsno vṛkāṇām ādityāso mumocata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14394: RV_8,067.15a apo ṣu ṇa iyaṃ śarur ādityā apa durmatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14396: RV_8,067.16a śaśvad dhi vaḥ sudānava ādityā ūtibhir vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14398: RV_8,067.17a śaśvantaṃ hi pracetasaḥ pratiyantaṃ cid enasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14400: RV_8,067.18a tat su no navyaṃ sanyasa ādityā yan mumocati /
GV01rvh1-10u:14402: RV_8,067.19a nāsmākam asti tat tara ādityāso atiṣkade /
GV01rvh1-10u:14404: RV_8,067.20a mā no hetir vivasvata ādityāḥ kṛtrimā śaruḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14406: RV_8,067.21a vi ṣu dveṣo vy aṃhatim ādityāso vi saṃhitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14408: RV_8,068.01a ā tvā rathaṃ yathotaye sumnāya vartayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14409: RV_8,068.01c tuvikūrmim ṛtīṣaham indra śaviṣṭha satpate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14410: RV_8,068.02a tuviśuṣma tuvikrato śacīvo viśvayā mate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14412: RV_8,068.03a yasya te mahinā mahaḥ pari jmāyantam īyatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14414: RV_8,068.04a viśvānarasya vas patim anānatasya śavasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14415: RV_8,068.04c evaiś ca carṣaṇīnām ūtī huve rathānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14416: RV_8,068.05a abhiṣṭaye sadāvṛdhaṃ svarmīḷheṣu yaṃ naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14418: RV_8,068.06a paromātram ṛcīṣamam indram ugraṃ surādhasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14420: RV_8,068.07a taṃ-tam id rādhase maha indraṃ codāmi pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14421: RV_8,068.07c yaḥ pūrvyām anuṣṭutim īśe kṛṣṭīnāṃ nṛtuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14422: RV_8,068.08a na yasya te śavasāna sakhyam ānaṃśa martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14424: RV_8,068.09a tvotāsas tvā yujāpsu sūrye mahad dhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14426: RV_8,068.10a taṃ tvā yajñebhir īmahe taṃ gīrbhir girvaṇastama /
GV01rvh1-10u:14427: RV_8,068.10c indra yathā cid āvitha vājeṣu purumāyyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14428: RV_8,068.11a yasya te svādu sakhyaṃ svādvī praṇītir adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14430: RV_8,068.12a uru ṇas tanve tana uru kṣayāya nas kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14432: RV_8,068.13a uruṃ nṛbhya uruṃ gava uruṃ rathāya panthām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14434: RV_8,068.14a upa mā ṣaḍ dvā-dvā naraḥ somasya harṣyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14436: RV_8,068.15a ṛjrāv indrota ā dade harī ṛkṣasya sūnavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14440: RV_8,068.17a ṣaḷ aśvāṃ ātithigva indrote vadhūmataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14442: RV_8,068.18a aiṣu cetad vṛṣaṇvaty antar ṛjreṣv aruṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:14444: RV_8,068.19a na yuṣme vājabandhavo ninitsuś cana martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14446: RV_8,069.01a pra-pra vas triṣṭubham iṣam mandadvīrāyendave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14447: RV_8,069.01c dhiyā vo medhasātaye purandhyā vivāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:14448: RV_8,069.02a nadaṃ va odatīnāṃ nadaṃ yoyuvatīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14449: RV_8,069.02c patiṃ vo aghnyānāṃ dhenūnām iṣudhyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14450: RV_8,069.03a tā asya sūdadohasaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14451: RV_8,069.03c janman devānāṃ viśas triṣv ā rocane divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14452: RV_8,069.04a abhi pra gopatiṃ girendram arca yathā vide /
GV01rvh1-10u:14454: RV_8,069.05a ā harayaḥ sasṛjrire 'ruṣīr adhi barhiṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14456: RV_8,069.06a indrāya gāva āśiraṃ duduhre vajriṇe madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14458: RV_8,069.07a ud yad bradhnasya viṣṭapaṃ gṛham indraś ca ganvahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14459: RV_8,069.07c madhvaḥ pītvā sacevahi triḥ sapta sakhyuḥ pade //
GV01rvh1-10u:14461: RV_8,069.08c arcantu putrakā uta puraṃ na dhṛṣṇv arcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:14462: RV_8,069.09a ava svarāti gargaro godhā pari saniṣvaṇat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14463: RV_8,069.09c piṅgā pari caniṣkadad indrāya brahmodyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14464: RV_8,069.10a ā yat patanty enyaḥ sudughā anapasphuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14465: RV_8,069.10c apasphuraṃ gṛbhāyata somam indrāya pātave //
GV01rvh1-10u:14466: RV_8,069.11a apād indro apād agnir viśve devā amatsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14467: RV_8,069.11c varuṇa id iha kṣayat tam āpo abhy anūṣata vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:14468: RV_8,069.12a sudevo asi varuṇa yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14469: RV_8,069.12c anukṣaranti kākudaṃ sūrmyaṃ suṣirām iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:14470: RV_8,069.13a yo vyatīṃr aphāṇayat suyuktāṃ upa dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14471: RV_8,069.13c takvo netā tad id vapur upamā yo amucyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:14472: RV_8,069.14a atīd u śakra ohata indro viśvā ati dviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14473: RV_8,069.14c bhinat kanīna odanam pacyamānam paro girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14474: RV_8,069.15a arbhako na kumārako 'dhi tiṣṭhan navaṃ ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:14475: RV_8,069.15c sa pakṣan mahiṣam mṛgam pitre mātre vibhukratum //
GV01rvh1-10u:14476: RV_8,069.16a ā tū suśipra dampate rathaṃ tiṣṭhā hiraṇyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14477: RV_8,069.16c adha dyukṣaṃ sacevahi sahasrapādam aruṣaṃ svastigām anehasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14478: RV_8,069.17a taṃ ghem itthā namasvina upa svarājam āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14479: RV_8,069.17c arthaṃ cid asya sudhitaṃ yad etava āvartayanti dāvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:14481: RV_8,069.18c pūrvām anu prayatiṃ vṛktabarhiṣo hitaprayasa āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:14482: RV_8,070.01a yo rājā carṣaṇīnāṃ yātā rathebhir adhriguḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14483: RV_8,070.01c viśvāsāṃ tarutā pṛtanānāṃ jyeṣṭho yo vṛtrahā gṛṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14484: RV_8,070.02a indraṃ taṃ śumbha puruhanmann avase yasya dvitā vidhartari /
GV01rvh1-10u:14485: RV_8,070.02c hastāya vajraḥ prati dhāyi darśato maho dive na sūryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14486: RV_8,070.03a nakiṣ ṭaṃ karmaṇā naśad yaś cakāra sadāvṛdham /
GV01rvh1-10u:14487: RV_8,070.03c indraṃ na yajñair viśvagūrtam ṛbhvasam adhṛṣṭaṃ dhṛṣṇvojasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14488: RV_8,070.04a aṣāḷham ugram pṛtanāsu sāsahiṃ yasmin mahīr urujrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14489: RV_8,070.04c saṃ dhenavo jāyamāne anonavur dyāvaḥ kṣāmo anonavuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14490: RV_8,070.05a yad dyāva indra te śataṃ śatam bhūmīr uta syuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14491: RV_8,070.05c na tvā vajrin sahasraṃ sūryā anu na jātam aṣṭa rodasī //
GV01rvh1-10u:14492: RV_8,070.06a ā paprātha mahinā vṛṣṇyā vṛṣan viśvā śaviṣṭha śavasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14493: RV_8,070.06c asmāṃ ava maghavan gomati vraje vajriñ citrābhir ūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14494: RV_8,070.07a na sīm adeva āpad iṣaṃ dīrghāyo martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14495: RV_8,070.07c etagvā cid ya etaśā yuyojate harī indro yuyojate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14496: RV_8,070.08a taṃ vo maho mahāyyam indraṃ dānāya sakṣaṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14497: RV_8,070.08c yo gādheṣu ya āraṇeṣu havyo vājeṣv asti havyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14498: RV_8,070.09a ud ū ṣu ṇo vaso mahe mṛśasva śūra rādhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14499: RV_8,070.09c ud ū ṣu mahyai maghavan maghattaya ud indra śravase mahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14500: RV_8,070.10a tvaṃ na indra ṛtayus tvānido ni tṛmpasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14501: RV_8,070.10c madhye vasiṣva tuvinṛmṇorvor ni dāsaṃ śiśnatho hathaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14503: RV_8,070.11c ava svaḥ sakhā dudhuvīta parvataḥ sughnāya dasyum parvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14504: RV_8,070.12a tvaṃ na indrāsāṃ haste śaviṣṭha dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:14505: RV_8,070.12c dhānānāṃ na saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayur dviḥ saṃ gṛbhāyāsmayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14506: RV_8,070.13a sakhāyaḥ kratum icchata kathā rādhāma śarasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14507: RV_8,070.13c upastutim bhojaḥ sūrir yo ahrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14508: RV_8,070.14a bhūribhiḥ samaha ṛṣibhir barhiṣmadbhi staviṣyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14509: RV_8,070.14c yad ittham ekam-ekam ic chara vatsān parādadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14510: RV_8,070.15a karṇagṛhyā maghavā śauradevyo vatsaṃ nas tribhya ānayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14512: RV_8,071.01a tvaṃ no agne mahobhiḥ pāhi viśvasyā arāteḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14514: RV_8,071.02a nahi manyuḥ pauruṣeya īśe hi vaḥ priyajāta /
GV01rvh1-10u:14516: RV_8,071.03a sa no viśvebhir devebhir ūrjo napād bhadraśoce /
GV01rvh1-10u:14518: RV_8,071.04a na tam agne arātayo martaṃ yuvanta rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14520: RV_8,071.05a yaṃ tvaṃ vipra medhasātāv agne hinoṣi dhanāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14522: RV_8,071.06a tvaṃ rayim puruvīram agne dāśuṣe martāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14523: RV_8,071.06c pra ṇo naya vasyo accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:14524: RV_8,071.07a uruṣyā ṇo mā parā dā aghāyate jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14526: RV_8,071.08a agne mākiṣ ṭe devasya rātim adevo yuyota /
GV01rvh1-10u:14528: RV_8,071.09a sa no vasva upa māsy ūrjo napān māhinasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14530: RV_8,071.10a acchā naḥ śīraśociṣaṃ giro yantu darśatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14531: RV_8,071.10c acchā yajñāso namasā purūvasum purupraśastam ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:14532: RV_8,071.11a agniṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ dānāya vāryāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14533: RV_8,071.11c dvitā yo bhūd amṛto martyeṣv ā hotā mandratamo viśi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14534: RV_8,071.12a agniṃ vo devayajyayāgnim prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:14535: RV_8,071.12c agniṃ dhīṣu prathamam agnim arvaty agniṃ kṣaitrāya sādhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14536: RV_8,071.13a agnir iṣāṃ sakhye dadātu na īśe yo vāryāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14537: RV_8,071.13c agniṃ toke tanaye śaśvad īmahe vasuṃ santaṃ tanūpām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14539: RV_8,071.14c agniṃ rāye purumīḷha śrutaṃ naro 'gniṃ sudītaye chardiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14540: RV_8,071.15a agniṃ dveṣo yotavai no gṛṇīmasy agniṃ śaṃ yoś ca dātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14541: RV_8,071.15c viśvāsu vikṣv aviteva havyo bhuvad vastur ṛṣūṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14542: RV_8,072.01a haviṣ kṛṇudhvam ā gamad adhvaryur vanate punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14544: RV_8,072.02a ni tigmam abhy aṃśuṃ sīdad dhotā manāv adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14546: RV_8,072.03a antar icchanti taṃ jane rudram paro manīṣayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14548: RV_8,072.04a jāmy atītape dhanur vayodhā aruhad vanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14550: RV_8,072.05a caran vatso ruśann iha nidātāraṃ na vindate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14552: RV_8,072.06a uto nv asya yan mahad aśvāvad yojanam bṛhad /
GV01rvh1-10u:14554: RV_8,072.07a duhanti saptaikām upa dvā pañca sṛjataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14556: RV_8,072.08a ā daśabhir vivasvata indraḥ kośam acucyavīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14558: RV_8,072.09a pari tridhātur adhvaraṃ jūrṇir eti navīyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:14562: RV_8,072.11a abhyāram id adrayo niṣiktam puṣkare madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14564: RV_8,072.12a gāva upāvatāvatam mahī yajñasya rapsudā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14566: RV_8,072.13a ā sute siñcata śriyaṃ rodasyor abhiśriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14568: RV_8,072.14a te jānata svam okyaṃ saṃ vatsāso na mātṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14570: RV_8,072.15a upa srakveṣu bapsataḥ kṛṇvate dharuṇaṃ divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14572: RV_8,072.16a adhukṣat pipyuṣīm iṣam ūrjaṃ saptapadīm ariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14574: RV_8,072.17a somasya mitrāvaruṇoditā sūra ā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:14576: RV_8,072.18a uto nv asya yat padaṃ haryatasya nidhānyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14578: RV_8,073.01a ud īrāthām ṛtāyate yuñjāthām aśvinā ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:14579: RV_8,073.01c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14580: RV_8,073.02a nimiṣaś cij javīyasā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14581: RV_8,073.02c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14582: RV_8,073.03a upa stṛṇītam atraye himena gharmam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14583: RV_8,073.03c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14584: RV_8,073.04a kuha sthaḥ kuha jagmathuḥ kuha śyeneva petathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14585: RV_8,073.04c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14586: RV_8,073.05a yad adya karhi karhi cic chuśrūyātam imaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14587: RV_8,073.05c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14588: RV_8,073.06a aśvinā yāmahūtamā nediṣṭhaṃ yāmy āpyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14589: RV_8,073.06c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14590: RV_8,073.07a avantam atraye gṛhaṃ kṛṇutaṃ yuvam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14591: RV_8,073.07c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14592: RV_8,073.08a varethe agnim ātapo vadate valgv atraye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14593: RV_8,073.08c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14594: RV_8,073.09a pra saptavadhrir āśasā dhārām agner aśāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14595: RV_8,073.09c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14596: RV_8,073.10a ihā gataṃ vṛṣaṇvasū śṛṇutam ma imaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14597: RV_8,073.10c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14598: RV_8,073.11a kim idaṃ vām purāṇavaj jarator iva śasyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14599: RV_8,073.11c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14600: RV_8,073.12a samānaṃ vāṃ sajātyaṃ samāno bandhur aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14601: RV_8,073.12c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14602: RV_8,073.13a yo vāṃ rajāṃsy aśvinā ratho viyāti rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:14603: RV_8,073.13c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14604: RV_8,073.14a ā no gavyebhir aśvyaiḥ sahasrair upa gacchatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14605: RV_8,073.14c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14606: RV_8,073.15a mā no gavyebhir aśvyaiḥ sahasrebhir ati khyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14607: RV_8,073.15c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14608: RV_8,073.16a aruṇapsur uṣā abhūd akar jyotir ṛtāvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:14609: RV_8,073.16c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14610: RV_8,073.17a aśvinā su vicākaśad vṛkṣam paraśumāṃ iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:14611: RV_8,073.17c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14612: RV_8,073.18a puraṃ na dhṛṣṇav ā ruja kṛṣṇayā bādhito viśā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14613: RV_8,073.18c anti ṣad bhūtu vām avaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14614: RV_8,074.01a viśo-viśo vo atithiṃ vājayantaḥ purupriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14615: RV_8,074.01c agniṃ vo duryaṃ vaca stuṣe śūṣasya manmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14616: RV_8,074.02a yaṃ janāso haviṣmanto mitraṃ na sarpirāsutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14618: RV_8,074.03a panyāṃsaṃ jātavedasaṃ yo devatāty udyatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14620: RV_8,074.04a āganma vṛtrahantamaṃ jyeṣṭham agnim ānavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14621: RV_8,074.04c yasya śrutarvā bṛhann ārkṣo anīka edhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:14622: RV_8,074.05a amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ tiras tamāṃsi darśatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14624: RV_8,074.06a sabādho yaṃ janā ime 'gniṃ havyebhir īḷate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14626: RV_8,074.07a iyaṃ te navyasī matir agne adhāyy asmad ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14628: RV_8,074.08a sā te agne śantamā caniṣṭhā bhavatu priyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14630: RV_8,074.09a sā dyumnair dyumninī bṛhad upopa śravasi śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14632: RV_8,074.10a aśvam id gāṃ rathaprāṃ tveṣam indraṃ na satpatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14633: RV_8,074.10c yasya śravāṃsi tūrvatha panyam-panyaṃ ca kṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14634: RV_8,074.11a yaṃ tvā gopavano girā caniṣṭhad agne aṅgiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14636: RV_8,074.12a yaṃ tvā janāsa īḷate sabādho vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14638: RV_8,074.13a ahaṃ huvāna ārkṣe śrutarvaṇi madacyuti /
GV01rvh1-10u:14639: RV_8,074.13c śardhāṃsīva stukāvinām mṛkṣā śīrṣā caturṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14640: RV_8,074.14a māṃ catvāra āśavaḥ śaviṣṭhasya dravitnavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14641: RV_8,074.14c surathāso abhi prayo vakṣan vayo na tugryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14642: RV_8,074.15a satyam it tvā mahenadi paruṣṇy ava dediśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14643: RV_8,074.15c nem āpo aśvadātaraḥ śaviṣṭhād asti martyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14644: RV_8,075.01a yukṣvā hi devahūtamāṃ aśvāṃ agne rathīr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:14646: RV_8,075.02a uta no deva devāṃ acchā voco viduṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14648: RV_8,075.03a tvaṃ ha yad yaviṣṭhya sahasaḥ sūnav āhuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:14650: RV_8,075.04a ayam agniḥ sahasriṇo vājasya śatinas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14652: RV_8,075.05a taṃ nemim ṛbhavo yathā namasva sahūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14654: RV_8,075.06a tasmai nūnam abhidyave vācā virūpa nityayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14656: RV_8,075.07a kam u ṣvid asya senayāgner apākacakṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14658: RV_8,075.08a mā no devānāṃ viśaḥ prasnātīr ivosrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14660: RV_8,075.09a mā naḥ samasya dūḍhyaḥ paridveṣaso aṃhatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14661: RV_8,075.09c ūrmir na nāvam ā vadhīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:14662: RV_8,075.10a namas te agna ojase gṛṇanti deva kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14664: RV_8,075.11a kuvit su no gaviṣṭaye 'gne saṃveṣiṣo rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14666: RV_8,075.12a mā no asmin mahādhane parā varg bhārabhṛd yathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14668: RV_8,075.13a anyam asmad bhiyā iyam agne siṣaktu ducchunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14670: RV_8,075.14a yasyājuṣan namasvinaḥ śamīm adurmakhasya vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14672: RV_8,075.15a parasyā adhi saṃvato 'varāṃ abhy ā tara /
GV01rvh1-10u:14674: RV_8,075.16a vidmā hi te purā vayam agne pitur yathāvasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14676: RV_8,076.01a imaṃ nu māyinaṃ huva indram īśānam ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14678: RV_8,076.02a ayam indro marutsakhā vi vṛtrasyābhinac chiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14680: RV_8,076.03a vāvṛdhāno marutsakhendro vi vṛtram airayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14682: RV_8,076.04a ayaṃ ha yena vā idaṃ svar marutvatā jitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14686: RV_8,076.06a indram pratnena manmanā marutvantaṃ havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14688: RV_8,076.07a marutvāṃ indra mīḍhvaḥ pibā somaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14690: RV_8,076.08a tubhyed indra marutvate sutāḥ somāso adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14692: RV_8,076.09a pibed indra marutsakhā sutaṃ somaṃ diviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14694: RV_8,076.10a uttiṣṭhann ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14696: RV_8,076.11a anu tvā rodasī ubhe krakṣamāṇam akṛpetām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14698: RV_8,076.12a vācam aṣṭāpadīm ahaṃ navasraktim ṛtaspṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14700: RV_8,077.01a jajñāno nu śatakratur vi pṛcchad iti mātaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:14701: RV_8,077.01c ka ugrāḥ ke ha śṛṇvire //
GV01rvh1-10u:14702: RV_8,077.02a ād īṃ śavasy abravīd aurṇavābham ahīśuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14704: RV_8,077.03a sam it tān vṛtrahākhidat khe arāṃ iva khedayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14706: RV_8,077.04a ekayā pratidhāpibat sākaṃ sarāṃsi triṃśatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14708: RV_8,077.05a abhi gandharvam atṛṇad abudhneṣu rajassv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14710: RV_8,077.06a nir āvidhyad giribhya ā dhārayat pakvam odanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14712: RV_8,077.07a śatabradhna iṣus tava sahasraparṇa eka it /
GV01rvh1-10u:14714: RV_8,077.08a tena stotṛbhya ā bhara nṛbhyo nāribhyo attave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14716: RV_8,077.09a etā cyautnāni te kṛtā varṣiṣṭhāni parīṇasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14718: RV_8,077.10a viśvet tā viṣṇur ābharad urukramas tveṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14719: RV_8,077.10c śatam mahiṣān kṣīrapākam odanaṃ varāham indra emuṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14720: RV_8,077.11a tuvikṣaṃ te sukṛtaṃ sūmayaṃ dhanuḥ sādhur bundo hiraṇyayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14721: RV_8,077.11c ubhā te bāhū raṇyā susaṃskṛta ṛdūpe cid ṛdūvṛdhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14722: RV_8,078.01a puroḷāśaṃ no andhasa indra sahasram ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:14724: RV_8,078.02a ā no bhara vyañjanaṃ gām aśvam abhyañjanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14726: RV_8,078.03a uta naḥ karṇaśobhanā purūṇi dhṛṣṇav ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:14728: RV_8,078.04a nakīṃ vṛdhīka indra te na suṣā na sudā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:14730: RV_8,078.05a nakīm indro nikartave na śakraḥ pariśaktave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14732: RV_8,078.06a sa manyum martyānām adabdho ni cikīṣate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14734: RV_8,078.07a kratva it pūrṇam udaraṃ turasyāsti vidhataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14736: RV_8,078.08a tve vasūni saṃgatā viśvā ca soma saubhagā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14738: RV_8,078.09a tvām id yavayur mama kāmo gavyur hiraṇyayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14740: RV_8,078.10a taved indrāham āśasā haste dātraṃ canā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:14741: RV_8,078.10c dinasya vā maghavan sambhṛtasya vā pūrdhi yavasya kāśinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14742: RV_8,079.01a ayaṃ kṛtnur agṛbhīto viśvajid udbhid it somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14744: RV_8,079.02a abhy ūrṇoti yan nagnam bhiṣakti viśvaṃ yat turam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14745: RV_8,079.02c prem andhaḥ khyan niḥ śroṇo bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:14748: RV_8,079.04a tvaṃ cittī tava dakṣair diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣin /
GV01rvh1-10u:14750: RV_8,079.05a arthino yanti ced arthaṃ gacchān id daduṣo rātim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14752: RV_8,079.06a vidad yat pūrvyaṃ naṣṭam ud īm ṛtāyum īrayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14754: RV_8,079.07a suśevo no mṛḷayākur adṛptakratur avātaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14755: RV_8,079.07c bhavā naḥ soma śaṃ hṛde //
GV01rvh1-10u:14756: RV_8,079.08a mā naḥ soma saṃ vīvijo mā vi bībhiṣathā rājan /
GV01rvh1-10u:14757: RV_8,079.08c mā no hārdi tviṣā vadhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14758: RV_8,079.09a ava yat sve sadhasthe devānāṃ durmatīr īkṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14759: RV_8,079.09c rājann apa dviṣaḥ sedha mīḍhvo apa sridhaḥ sedha //
GV01rvh1-10u:14760: RV_8,080.01a nahy anyam baḷākaram marḍitāraṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14762: RV_8,080.02a yo naḥ śaśvat purāvithāmṛdhro vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14763: RV_8,080.02c sa tvaṃ na indra mṛḷaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:14764: RV_8,080.03a kim aṅga radhracodanaḥ sunvānasyāvited asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14765: RV_8,080.03c kuvit sv indra ṇaḥ śakaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14766: RV_8,080.04a indra pra ṇo ratham ava paścāc cit santam adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14768: RV_8,080.05a hanto nu kim āsase prathamaṃ no rathaṃ kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14770: RV_8,080.06a avā no vājayuṃ rathaṃ sukaraṃ te kim it pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:14772: RV_8,080.07a indra dṛhyasva pūr asi bhadrā ta eti niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14774: RV_8,080.08a mā sīm avadya ā bhāg urvī kāṣṭhā hitaṃ dhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14776: RV_8,080.09a turīyaṃ nāma yajñiyaṃ yadā karas tad uśmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14777: RV_8,080.09c ād it patir na ohase //
GV01rvh1-10u:14778: RV_8,080.10a avīvṛdhad vo amṛtā amandīd ekadyūr devā uta yāś ca devīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14779: RV_8,080.10c tasmā u rādhaḥ kṛṇuta praśastam prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:14780: RV_8,081.01a ā tū na indra kṣumantaṃ citraṃ grābhaṃ saṃ gṛbhāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14782: RV_8,081.02a vidmā hi tvā tuvikūrmiṃ tuvideṣṇaṃ tuvīmagham /
GV01rvh1-10u:14784: RV_8,081.03a nahi tvā śūra devā na martāso ditsantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14786: RV_8,081.04a eto nv indraṃ stavāmeśānaṃ vasvaḥ svarājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14788: RV_8,081.05a pra stoṣad upa gāsiṣac chravat sāma gīyamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14790: RV_8,081.06a ā no bhara dakṣiṇenābhi savyena pra mṛśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:14791: RV_8,081.06c indra mā no vasor nir bhāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:14792: RV_8,081.07a upa kramasvā bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣṇo janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14794: RV_8,081.08a indra ya u nu te asti vājo viprebhiḥ sanitvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14796: RV_8,081.09a sadyojuvas te vājā asmabhyaṃ viśvaścandrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14798: RV_8,082.01a ā pra drava parāvato 'rvāvataś ca vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:14800: RV_8,082.02a tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahi sutāso mādayiṣṇavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14802: RV_8,082.03a iṣā mandasvād u te 'raṃ varāya manyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14803: RV_8,082.03c bhuvat ta indra śaṃ hṛde //
GV01rvh1-10u:14804: RV_8,082.04a ā tv aśatrav ā gahi ny ukthāni ca hūyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14806: RV_8,082.05a tubhyāyam adribhiḥ suto gobhiḥ śrīto madāya kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14808: RV_8,082.06a indra śrudhi su me havam asme sutasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14810: RV_8,082.07a ya indra camaseṣv ā somaś camūṣu te sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14812: RV_8,082.08a yo apsu candramā iva somaś camūṣu dadṛśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14814: RV_8,082.09a yaṃ te śyenaḥ padābharat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14816: RV_8,083.01a devānām id avo mahat tad ā vṛṇīmahe vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14818: RV_8,083.02a te naḥ santu yujaḥ sadā varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14820: RV_8,083.03a ati no viṣpitā puru naubhir apo na parṣatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:14822: RV_8,083.04a vāmaṃ no astv aryaman vāmaṃ varuṇa śaṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14824: RV_8,083.05a vāmasya hi pracetasa īśānāśo riśādasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14826: RV_8,083.06a vayam id vaḥ sudānavaḥ kṣiyanto yānto adhvann ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14828: RV_8,083.07a adhi na indraiṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:14830: RV_8,083.08a pra bhrātṛtvaṃ sudānavo 'dha dvitā samānyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14832: RV_8,083.09a yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānava indrajyeṣṭhā abhidyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14833: RV_8,083.09c adhā cid va uta bruve //
GV01rvh1-10u:14834: RV_8,084.01a preṣṭhaṃ vo atithiṃ stuṣe mitram iva priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14836: RV_8,084.02a kavim iva pracetasaṃ yaṃ devāso adha dvitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14838: RV_8,084.03a tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṝṃḥ pāhi śṛṇudhī giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14840: RV_8,084.04a kayā te agne aṅgira ūrjo napād upastutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:14842: RV_8,084.05a dāśema kasya manasā yajñasya sahaso yaho /
GV01rvh1-10u:14843: RV_8,084.05c kad u voca idaṃ namaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14844: RV_8,084.06a adhā tvaṃ hi nas karo viśvā asmabhyaṃ sukṣitīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14846: RV_8,084.07a kasya nūnam parīṇaso dhiyo jinvasi dampate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14848: RV_8,084.08a tam marjayanta sukratum puroyāvānam ājiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14850: RV_8,084.09a kṣeti kṣemebhiḥ sādhubhir nakir yaṃ ghnanti hanti yaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14852: RV_8,085.01a ā me havaṃ nāsatyāśvinā gacchataṃ yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14854: RV_8,085.02a imam me stomam aśvinemam me śṛṇutaṃ havam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14856: RV_8,085.03a ayaṃ vāṃ kṛṣṇo aśvinā havate vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:14858: RV_8,085.04a śṛṇutaṃ jaritur havaṃ kṛṣṇasya stuvato narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14860: RV_8,085.05a chardir yantam adābhyaṃ viprāya stuvate narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14862: RV_8,085.06a gacchataṃ dāśuṣo gṛham itthā stuvato aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14864: RV_8,085.07a yuñjāthāṃ rāsabhaṃ rathe vīḍvaṅge vṛṣaṇvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:14866: RV_8,085.08a trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathenā yātam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14868: RV_8,085.09a nū me giro nāsatyāśvinā prāvataṃ yuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14870: RV_8,086.01a ubhā hi dasrā bhiṣajā mayobhuvobhā dakṣasya vacaso babhūvathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14871: RV_8,086.01c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14872: RV_8,086.02a kathā nūnaṃ vāṃ vimanā upa stavad yuvaṃ dhiyaṃ dadathur vasyaiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14873: RV_8,086.02c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14874: RV_8,086.03a yuvaṃ hi ṣmā purubhujemam edhatuṃ viṣṇāpve dadathur vasyaiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14875: RV_8,086.03c tā vāṃ viśvako havate tanūkṛthe mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14876: RV_8,086.04a uta tyaṃ vīraṃ dhanasām ṛjīṣiṇaṃ dūre cit santam avase havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14877: RV_8,086.04c yasya svādiṣṭhā sumatiḥ pitur yathā mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14878: RV_8,086.05a ṛtena devaḥ savitā śamāyata ṛtasya śṛṅgam urviyā vi paprathe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14879: RV_8,086.05c ṛtaṃ sāsāha mahi cit pṛtanyato mā no vi yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā mumocatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14880: RV_8,087.01a dyumnī vāṃ stomo aśvinā krivir na seka ā gatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14881: RV_8,087.01c madhvaḥ sutasya sa divi priyo narā pātaṃ gaurāv iveriṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14882: RV_8,087.02a pibataṃ gharmam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14883: RV_8,087.02c tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā ni pātaṃ vedasā vayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14884: RV_8,087.03a ā vāṃ viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ priyamedhā ahūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14885: RV_8,087.03c tā vartir yātam upa vṛktabarhiṣo juṣṭaṃ yajñaṃ diviṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:14886: RV_8,087.04a pibataṃ somam madhumantam aśvinā barhiḥ sīdataṃ sumat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14887: RV_8,087.04c tā vāvṛdhānā upa suṣṭutiṃ divo gantaṃ gaurāv iveriṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14888: RV_8,087.05a ā nūnaṃ yātam aśvināśvebhiḥ pruṣitapsubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14889: RV_8,087.05c dasrā hiraṇyavartanī śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14890: RV_8,087.06a vayaṃ hi vāṃ havāmahe vipanyavo viprāso vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14891: RV_8,087.06c tā valgū dasrā purudaṃsasā dhiyāśvinā śruṣṭy ā gatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14892: RV_8,088.01a taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14893: RV_8,088.01c abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14894: RV_8,088.02a dyukṣaṃ sudānuṃ taviṣībhir āvṛtaṃ giriṃ na purubhojasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14895: RV_8,088.02c kṣumantaṃ vājaṃ śatinaṃ sahasriṇam makṣū gomantam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:14896: RV_8,088.03a na tvā bṛhanto adrayo varanta indra vīḷavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14897: RV_8,088.03c yad ditsasi stuvate māvate vasu nakiṣ ṭad ā mināti te //
GV01rvh1-10u:14898: RV_8,088.04a yoddhāsi kratvā śavasota daṃsanā viśvā jātābhi majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14899: RV_8,088.04c ā tvāyam arka ūtaye vavartati yaṃ gotamā ajījanan //
GV01rvh1-10u:14900: RV_8,088.05a pra hi ririkṣa ojasā divo antebhyas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:14901: RV_8,088.05c na tvā vivyāca raja indra pārthivam anu svadhāṃ vavakṣitha //
GV01rvh1-10u:14902: RV_8,088.06a nakiḥ pariṣṭir maghavan maghasya te yad dāśuṣe daśasyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14903: RV_8,088.06c asmākam bodhy ucathasya coditā maṃhiṣṭho vājasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:14904: RV_8,089.01a bṛhad indrāya gāyata maruto vṛtrahantamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14905: RV_8,089.01c yena jyotir ajanayann ṛtāvṛdho devaṃ devāya jāgṛvi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14906: RV_8,089.02a apādhamad abhiśastīr aśastihāthendro dyumny ābhavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14907: RV_8,089.02c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudgaṇa //
GV01rvh1-10u:14908: RV_8,089.03a pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14909: RV_8,089.03c vṛtraṃ hanati vṛtrahā śatakratur vajreṇa śataparvaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14910: RV_8,089.04a abhi pra bhara dhṛṣatā dhṛṣanmanaḥ śravaś cit te asad bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14911: RV_8,089.04c arṣantv āpo javasā vi mātaro hano vṛtraṃ jayā svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14912: RV_8,089.05a yaj jāyathā apūrvya maghavan vṛtrahatyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14913: RV_8,089.05c tat pṛthivīm aprathayas tad astabhnā uta dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:14914: RV_8,089.06a tat te yajño ajāyata tad arka uta haskṛtiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14915: RV_8,089.06c tad viśvam abhibhūr asi yaj jātaṃ yac ca jantvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14916: RV_8,089.07a āmāsu pakvam airaya ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14917: RV_8,089.07c gharmaṃ na sāman tapatā suvṛktibhir juṣṭaṃ girvaṇase bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:14918: RV_8,090.01a ā no viśvāsu havya indraḥ samatsu bhūṣatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:14919: RV_8,090.01c upa brahmāṇi savanāni vṛtrahā paramajyā ṛcīṣamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14920: RV_8,090.02a tvaṃ dātā prathamo rādhasām asy asi satya īśānakṛt /
GV01rvh1-10u:14921: RV_8,090.02c tuvidyumnasya yujyā vṛṇīmahe putrasya śavaso mahaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14922: RV_8,090.03a brahmā ta indra girvaṇaḥ kriyante anatidbhutā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14923: RV_8,090.03c imā juṣasva haryaśva yojanendra yā te amanmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14924: RV_8,090.04a tvaṃ hi satyo maghavann anānato vṛtrā bhūri nyṛñjase /
GV01rvh1-10u:14925: RV_8,090.04c sa tvaṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśuṣe 'rvāñcaṃ rayim ā kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14926: RV_8,090.05a tvam indra yaśā asy ṛjīṣī śavasas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:14927: RV_8,090.05c tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi haṃsy apratīny eka id anuttā carṣaṇīdhṛtā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14928: RV_8,090.06a tam u tvā nūnam asura pracetasaṃ rādho bhāgam ivemahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:14929: RV_8,090.06c mahīva kṛttiḥ śaraṇā ta indra pra te sumnā no aśnavan //
GV01rvh1-10u:14930: RV_8,091.01a kanyā vār avāyatī somam api srutāvidat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14931: RV_8,091.01c astam bharanty abravīd indrāya sunavai tvā śakrāya sunavai tvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:14932: RV_8,091.02a asau ya eṣi vīrako gṛhaṃ-gṛhaṃ vicākaśad /
GV01rvh1-10u:14933: RV_8,091.02c imaṃ jambhasutam piba dhānāvantaṃ karambhiṇam apūpavantam ukthinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14934: RV_8,091.03a ā cana tvā cikitsāmo 'dhi cana tvā nemasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14935: RV_8,091.03c śanair iva śanakair ivendrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:14936: RV_8,091.04a kuvic chakat kuvit karat kuvin no vasyasas karat /
GV01rvh1-10u:14937: RV_8,091.04c kuvit patidviṣo yatīr indreṇa saṃgamāmahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:14938: RV_8,091.05a imāni trīṇi viṣṭapā tānīndra vi rohaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:14939: RV_8,091.05c śiras tatasyorvarām ād idam ma upodare //
GV01rvh1-10u:14940: RV_8,091.06a asau ca yā na urvarād imāṃ tanvam mama /
GV01rvh1-10u:14941: RV_8,091.06c atho tatasya yac chiraḥ sarvā tā romaśā kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:14942: RV_8,091.07a khe rathasya khe 'nasaḥ khe yugasya śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:14943: RV_8,091.07c apālām indra triṣ pūtvy akṛṇoḥ sūryatvacam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14944: RV_8,092.01a pāntam ā vo andhasa indram abhi pra gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14948: RV_8,092.03a indra in no mahānāṃ dātā vājānāṃ nṛtuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14950: RV_8,092.04a apād u śipry andhasaḥ sudakṣasya prahoṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14952: RV_8,092.05a tam v abhi prārcatendraṃ somasya pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:14953: RV_8,092.05c tad id dhy asya vardhanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:14954: RV_8,092.06a asya pītvā madānāṃ devo devasyaujasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14956: RV_8,092.07a tyam u vaḥ satrāsāhaṃ viśvāsu gīrṣv āyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14958: RV_8,092.08a yudhmaṃ santam anarvāṇaṃ somapām anapacyutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:14960: RV_8,092.09a śikṣā ṇa indra rāya ā puru vidvāṃ ṛcīṣama /
GV01rvh1-10u:14962: RV_8,092.10a ataś cid indra ṇa upā yāhi śatavājayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14964: RV_8,092.11a ayāma dhīvato dhiyo 'rvadbhiḥ śakra godare /
GV01rvh1-10u:14966: RV_8,092.12a vayam u tvā śatakrato gāvo na yavaseṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14970: RV_8,092.14a tve su putra śavaso 'vṛtran kāmakātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14972: RV_8,092.15a sa no vṛṣan saniṣṭhayā saṃ ghorayā dravitnvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:14974: RV_8,092.16a yas te nūnaṃ śatakratav indra dyumnitamo madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14976: RV_8,092.17a yas te citraśravastamo ya indra vṛtrahantamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14978: RV_8,092.18a vidmā hi yas te adrivas tvādattaḥ satya somapāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14980: RV_8,092.19a indrāya madvane sutam pari ṣṭobhantu no giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14982: RV_8,092.20a yasmin viśvā adhi śriyo raṇanti sapta saṃsadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14984: RV_8,092.21a trikadrukeṣu cetanaṃ devāso yajñam atnata /
GV01rvh1-10u:14985: RV_8,092.21c tam id vardhantu no giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:14986: RV_8,092.22a ā tvā viśantv indavaḥ samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14988: RV_8,092.23a vivyaktha mahinā vṛṣan bhakṣaṃ somasya jāgṛve /
GV01rvh1-10u:14990: RV_8,092.24a araṃ ta indra kukṣaye somo bhavatu vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:14992: RV_8,092.25a aram aśvāya gāyati śrutakakṣo araṃ gave /
GV01rvh1-10u:14994: RV_8,092.26a araṃ hi ṣma suteṣu ṇaḥ someṣv indra bhūṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:14996: RV_8,092.27a parākāttāc cid adrivas tvāṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:14998: RV_8,092.28a evā hy asi vīrayur evā śūra uta sthiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15000: RV_8,092.29a evā rātis tuvīmagha viśvebhir dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15001: RV_8,092.29c adhā cid indra me sacā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15002: RV_8,092.30a mo ṣu brahmeva tandrayur bhuvo vājānām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15004: RV_8,092.31a mā na indrābhy ādiśaḥ sūro aktuṣv ā yaman /
GV01rvh1-10u:15006: RV_8,092.32a tvayed indra yujā vayam prati bruvīmahi spṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15008: RV_8,092.33a tvām id dhi tvāyavo 'nunonuvataś carān /
GV01rvh1-10u:15010: RV_8,093.01a ud ghed abhi śrutāmaghaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15012: RV_8,093.02a nava yo navatim puro bibheda bāhvojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15014: RV_8,093.03a sa na indraḥ śivaḥ sakhāśvāvad gomad yavamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15016: RV_8,093.04a yad adya kac ca vṛtrahann udagā abhi sūrya /
GV01rvh1-10u:15017: RV_8,093.04c sarvaṃ tad indra te vaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:15018: RV_8,093.05a yad vā pravṛddha satpate na marā iti manyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:15019: RV_8,093.05c uto tat satyam it tava //
GV01rvh1-10u:15020: RV_8,093.06a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:15022: RV_8,093.07a tam indraṃ vājayāmasi mahe vṛtrāya hantave /
GV01rvh1-10u:15024: RV_8,093.08a indraḥ sa dāmane kṛta ojiṣṭhaḥ sa made hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15026: RV_8,093.09a girā vajro na sambhṛtaḥ sabalo anapacyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15028: RV_8,093.10a durge cin naḥ sugaṃ kṛdhi gṛṇāna indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15030: RV_8,093.11a yasya te nū cid ādiśaṃ na minanti svarājyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15032: RV_8,093.12a adhā te apratiṣkutaṃ devī śuṣmaṃ saparyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15034: RV_8,093.13a tvam etad adhārayaḥ kṛṣṇāsu rohiṇīṣu ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:15036: RV_8,093.14a vi yad aher adha tviṣo viśve devāso akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15038: RV_8,093.15a ād u me nivaro bhuvad vṛtrahādiṣṭa pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15040: RV_8,093.16a śrutaṃ vo vṛtrahantamam pra śardhaṃ carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15042: RV_8,093.17a ayā dhiyā ca gavyayā puruṇāman puruṣṭuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:15044: RV_8,093.18a bodhinmanā id astu no vṛtrahā bhūryāsutiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15046: RV_8,093.19a kayā tvaṃ na ūtyābhi pra mandase vṛṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:15048: RV_8,093.20a kasya vṛṣā sute sacā niyutvān vṛṣabho raṇat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15050: RV_8,093.21a abhī ṣu ṇas tvaṃ rayim mandasānaḥ sahasriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15052: RV_8,093.22a patnīvantaḥ sutā ima uśanto yanti vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15054: RV_8,093.23a iṣṭā hotrā asṛkṣatendraṃ vṛdhāso adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:15056: RV_8,093.24a iha tyā sadhamādyā harī hiraṇyakeśyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15058: RV_8,093.25a tubhyaṃ somāḥ sutā ime stīrṇam barhir vibhāvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:15060: RV_8,093.26a ā te dakṣaṃ vi rocanā dadhad ratnā vi dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15062: RV_8,093.27a ā te dadhāmīndriyam ukthā viśvā śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:15064: RV_8,093.28a bhadram-bhadraṃ na ā bhareṣam ūrjaṃ śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:15066: RV_8,093.29a sa no viśvāny ā bhara suvitāni śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:15068: RV_8,093.30a tvām id vṛtrahantama sutāvanto havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15070: RV_8,093.31a upa no haribhiḥ sutaṃ yāhi madānām pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15072: RV_8,093.32a dvitā yo vṛtrahantamo vida indraḥ śatakratuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15074: RV_8,093.33a tvaṃ hi vṛtrahann eṣām pātā somānām asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15076: RV_8,093.34a indra iṣe dadātu na ṛbhukṣaṇam ṛbhuṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15078: RV_8,094.01a gaur dhayati marutāṃ śravasyur mātā maghonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15080: RV_8,094.02a yasyā devā upasthe vratā viśve dhārayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:15082: RV_8,094.03a tat su no viśve arya ā sadā gṛṇanti kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15084: RV_8,094.04a asti somo ayaṃ sutaḥ pibanty asya marutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15086: RV_8,094.05a pibanti mitro aryamā tanā pūtasya varuṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15088: RV_8,094.06a uto nv asya joṣam āṃ indraḥ sutasya gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15090: RV_8,094.07a kad atviṣanta sūrayas tira āpa iva sridhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15092: RV_8,094.08a kad vo adya mahānāṃ devānām avo vṛṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15094: RV_8,094.09a ā ye viśvā pārthivāni paprathan rocanā divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15096: RV_8,094.10a tyān nu pūtadakṣaso divo vo maruto huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15098: RV_8,094.11a tyān nu ye vi rodasī tastabhur maruto huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15100: RV_8,094.12a tyaṃ nu mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ giriṣṭhāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15102: RV_8,095.01a ā tvā giro rathīr ivāsthuḥ suteṣu girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15103: RV_8,095.01c abhi tvā sam anūṣatendra vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15104: RV_8,095.02a ā tvā śukrā acucyavuḥ sutāsa indra girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15105: RV_8,095.02c pibā tv asyāndhasa indra viśvāsu te hitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15106: RV_8,095.03a pibā somam madāya kam indra śyenābhṛtaṃ sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15107: RV_8,095.03c tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām patī rājā viśām asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15108: RV_8,095.04a śrudhī havaṃ tiraścyā indra yas tvā saparyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15109: RV_8,095.04c suvīryasya gomato rāyas pūrdhi mahāṃ asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15110: RV_8,095.05a indra yas te navīyasīṃ giram mandrām ajījanat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15111: RV_8,095.05c cikitvinmanasaṃ dhiyam pratnām ṛtasya pipyuṣīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:15112: RV_8,095.06a tam u ṣṭavāma yaṃ gira indram ukthāni vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15113: RV_8,095.06c purūṇy asya pauṃsyā siṣāsanto vanāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:15114: RV_8,095.07a eto nv indraṃ stavāma śuddhaṃ śuddhena sāmnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15115: RV_8,095.07c śuddhair ukthair vāvṛdhvāṃsaṃ śuddha āśīrvān mamattu //
GV01rvh1-10u:15116: RV_8,095.08a indra śuddho na ā gahi śuddhaḥ śuddhābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15117: RV_8,095.08c śuddho rayiṃ ni dhāraya śuddho mamaddhi somyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15118: RV_8,095.09a indra śuddho hi no rayiṃ śuddho ratnāni dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15119: RV_8,095.09c śuddho vṛtrāṇi jighnase śuddho vājaṃ siṣāsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15120: RV_8,096.01a asmā uṣāsa ātiranta yāmam indrāya naktam ūrmyāḥ suvācaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15121: RV_8,096.01c asmā āpo mātaraḥ sapta tasthur nṛbhyas tarāya sindhavaḥ supārāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15122: RV_8,096.02a atividdhā vithureṇā cid astrā triḥ sapta sānu saṃhitā girīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15123: RV_8,096.02c na tad devo na martyas tuturyād yāni pravṛddho vṛṣabhaś cakāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:15124: RV_8,096.03a indrasya vajra āyaso nimiśla indrasya bāhvor bhūyiṣṭham ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15125: RV_8,096.03c śīrṣann indrasya kratavo nireka āsann eṣanta śrutyā upāke //
GV01rvh1-10u:15126: RV_8,096.04a manye tvā yajñiyaṃ yajñiyānām manye tvā cyavanam acyutānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15127: RV_8,096.04c manye tvā satvanām indra ketum manye tvā vṛṣabhaṃ carṣaṇīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:15128: RV_8,096.05a ā yad vajram bāhvor indra dhatse madacyutam ahaye hantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:15129: RV_8,096.05c pra parvatā anavanta pra gāvaḥ pra brahmāṇo abhinakṣanta indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:15130: RV_8,096.06a tam u ṣṭavāma ya imā jajāna viśvā jātāny avarāṇy asmāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:15131: RV_8,096.06c indreṇa mitraṃ didhiṣema gīrbhir upo namobhir vṛṣabhaṃ viśema //
GV01rvh1-10u:15132: RV_8,096.07a vṛtrasya tvā śvasathād īṣamāṇā viśve devā ajahur ye sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15133: RV_8,096.07c marudbhir indra sakhyaṃ te astv athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15134: RV_8,096.08a triḥ ṣaṣṭis tvā maruto vāvṛdhānā usrā iva rāśayo yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15135: RV_8,096.08c upa tvemaḥ kṛdhi no bhāgadheyaṃ śuṣmaṃ ta enā haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:15136: RV_8,096.09a tigmam āyudham marutām anīkaṃ kas ta indra prati vajraṃ dadharṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:15137: RV_8,096.09c anāyudhāso asurā adevāś cakreṇa tāṃ apa vapa ṛjīṣin //
GV01rvh1-10u:15138: RV_8,096.10a maha ugrāya tavase suvṛktim preraya śivatamāya paśvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15139: RV_8,096.10c girvāhase gira indrāya pūrvīr dhehi tanve kuvid aṅga vedat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15140: RV_8,096.11a ukthavāhase vibhve manīṣāṃ druṇā na pāram īrayā nadīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15141: RV_8,096.11c ni spṛśa dhiyā tanvi śrutasya juṣṭatarasya kuvid aṅga vedat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15142: RV_8,096.12a tad viviḍḍhi yat ta indro jujoṣat stuhi suṣṭutiṃ namasā vivāsa /
GV01rvh1-10u:15143: RV_8,096.12c upa bhūṣa jaritar mā ruvaṇyaḥ śrāvayā vācaṃ kuvid aṅga vedat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15144: RV_8,096.13a ava drapso aṃśumatīm atiṣṭhad iyānaḥ kṛṣṇo daśabhiḥ sahasraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15145: RV_8,096.13c āvat tam indraḥ śacyā dhamantam apa snehitīr nṛmaṇā adhatta //
GV01rvh1-10u:15146: RV_8,096.14a drapsam apaśyaṃ viṣuṇe carantam upahvare nadyo aṃśumatyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15147: RV_8,096.14c nabho na kṛṣṇam avatasthivāṃsam iṣyāmi vo vṛṣaṇo yudhyatājau //
GV01rvh1-10u:15148: RV_8,096.15a adha drapso aṃśumatyā upasthe 'dhārayat tanvaṃ titviṣāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15149: RV_8,096.15c viśo adevīr abhy ācarantīr bṛhaspatinā yujendraḥ sasāhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:15150: RV_8,096.16a tvaṃ ha tyat saptabhyo jāyamāno 'śatrubhyo abhavaḥ śatrur indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:15151: RV_8,096.16c gūḷhe dyāvāpṛthivī anv avindo vibhumadbhyo bhuvanebhyo raṇaṃ dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15152: RV_8,096.17a tvaṃ ha tyad apratimānam ojo vajreṇa vajrin dhṛṣito jaghantha /
GV01rvh1-10u:15153: RV_8,096.17c tvaṃ śuṣṇasyāvātiro vadhatrais tvaṃ gā indra śacyed avindaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15154: RV_8,096.18a tvaṃ ha tyad vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnāṃ ghano vṛtrāṇāṃ taviṣo babhūtha /
GV01rvh1-10u:15155: RV_8,096.18c tvaṃ sindhūṃr asṛjas tastabhānān tvam apo ajayo dāsapatnīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15156: RV_8,096.19a sa sukratū raṇitā yaḥ suteṣv anuttamanyur yo aheva revān /
GV01rvh1-10u:15157: RV_8,096.19c ya eka in nary apāṃsi kartā sa vṛtrahā pratīd anyam āhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15158: RV_8,096.20a sa vṛtrahendraś carṣaṇīdhṛt taṃ suṣṭutyā havyaṃ huvema /
GV01rvh1-10u:15159: RV_8,096.20c sa prāvitā maghavā no 'dhivaktā sa vājasya śravasyasya dātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15160: RV_8,096.21a sa vṛtrahendra ṛbhukṣāḥ sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:15161: RV_8,096.21c kṛṇvann apāṃsi naryā purūṇi somo na pīto havyaḥ sakhibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15162: RV_8,097.01a yā indra bhuja ābharaḥ svarvāṃ asurebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15163: RV_8,097.01c stotāram in maghavann asya vardhaya ye ca tve vṛktabarhiṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15164: RV_8,097.02a yam indra dadhiṣe tvam aśvaṃ gām bhāgam avyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15165: RV_8,097.02c yajamāne sunvati dakṣiṇāvati tasmin taṃ dhehi mā paṇau //
GV01rvh1-10u:15166: RV_8,097.03a ya indra sasty avrato 'nuṣvāpam adevayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15167: RV_8,097.03c svaiḥ ṣa evair mumurat poṣyaṃ rayiṃ sanutar dhehi taṃ tataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15168: RV_8,097.04a yac chakrāsi parāvati yad arvāvati vṛtrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:15169: RV_8,097.04c atas tvā gīrbhir dyugad indra keśibhiḥ sutāvāṃ ā vivāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:15170: RV_8,097.05a yad vāsi rocane divaḥ samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15171: RV_8,097.05c yat pārthive sadane vṛtrahantama yad antarikṣa ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15172: RV_8,097.06a sa naḥ someṣu somapāḥ suteṣu śavasas pate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15173: RV_8,097.06c mādayasva rādhasā sūnṛtāvatendra rāyā parīṇasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15174: RV_8,097.07a mā na indra parā vṛṇag bhavā naḥ sadhamādyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15175: RV_8,097.07c tvaṃ na ūtī tvam in na āpyam mā na indra parā vṛṇak //
GV01rvh1-10u:15176: RV_8,097.08a asme indra sacā sute ni ṣadā pītaye madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:15177: RV_8,097.08c kṛdhī jaritre maghavann avo mahad asme indra sacā sute //
GV01rvh1-10u:15178: RV_8,097.09a na tvā devāsa āśata na martyāso adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15179: RV_8,097.09c viśvā jātāni śavasābhibhūr asi na tvā devāsa āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:15180: RV_8,097.10a viśvāḥ pṛtanā abhibhūtaraṃ naraṃ sajūs tatakṣur indraṃ jajanuś ca rājase /
GV01rvh1-10u:15181: RV_8,097.10c kratvā variṣṭhaṃ vara āmurim utogram ojiṣṭhaṃ tavasaṃ tarasvinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15182: RV_8,097.11a sam īṃ rebhāso asvarann indraṃ somasya pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15183: RV_8,097.11c svarpatiṃ yad īṃ vṛdhe dhṛtavrato hy ojasā sam ūtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15184: RV_8,097.12a nemiṃ namanti cakṣasā meṣaṃ viprā abhisvarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15185: RV_8,097.12c sudītayo vo adruho 'pi karṇe tarasvinaḥ sam ṛkvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15186: RV_8,097.13a tam indraṃ johavīmi maghavānam ugraṃ satrā dadhānam apratiṣkutaṃ śavāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15187: RV_8,097.13c maṃhiṣṭho gīrbhir ā ca yajñiyo vavartad rāye no viśvā supathā kṛṇotu vajrī //
GV01rvh1-10u:15188: RV_8,097.14a tvam pura indra cikid enā vy ojasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:15189: RV_8,097.14c tvad viśvāni bhuvanāni vajrin dyāvā rejete pṛthivī ca bhīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15190: RV_8,097.15a tan ma ṛtam indra śūra citra pātv apo na vajrin duritāti parṣi bhūri /
GV01rvh1-10u:15191: RV_8,097.15c kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyer viśvapsnyasya spṛhayāyyasya rājan //
GV01rvh1-10u:15192: RV_8,098.01a indrāya sāma gāyata viprāya bṛhate bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15194: RV_8,098.02a tvam indrābhibhūr asi tvaṃ sūryam arocayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15196: RV_8,098.03a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15197: RV_8,098.03c devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:15198: RV_8,098.04a endra no gadhi priyaḥ satrājid agohyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15199: RV_8,098.04c girir na viśvatas pṛthuḥ patir divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15200: RV_8,098.05a abhi hi satya somapā ubhe babhūtha rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:15201: RV_8,098.05c indrāsi sunvato vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15202: RV_8,098.06a tvaṃ hi śaśvatīnām indra dartā purām asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15203: RV_8,098.06c hantā dasyor manor vṛdhaḥ patir divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15204: RV_8,098.07a adhā hīndra girvaṇa upa tvā kāmān mahaḥ sasṛjmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15206: RV_8,098.08a vār ṇa tvā yavyābhir vardhanti śūra brahmāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15208: RV_8,098.09a yuñjanti harī iṣirasya gāthayorau ratha uruyuge /
GV01rvh1-10u:15210: RV_8,098.10a tvaṃ na indrā bharaṃ ojo nṛmṇaṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15212: RV_8,098.11a tvaṃ hi naḥ pitā vaso tvam mātā śatakrato babhūvitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:15214: RV_8,098.12a tvāṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayantam upa bruve śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:15216: RV_8,099.01a tvām idā hyo naro 'pīpyan vajrin bhūrṇayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15217: RV_8,099.01c sa indra stomavāhasām iha śrudhy upa svasaram ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15218: RV_8,099.02a matsvā suśipra harivas tad īmahe tve ā bhūṣanti vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15219: RV_8,099.02c tava śravāṃsy upamāny ukthyā suteṣv indra girvaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15220: RV_8,099.03a śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśved indrasya bhakṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15221: RV_8,099.03c vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima //
GV01rvh1-10u:15222: RV_8,099.04a anarśarātiṃ vasudām upa stuhi bhadrā indrasya rātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15223: RV_8,099.04c so asya kāmaṃ vidhato na roṣati mano dānāya codayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:15224: RV_8,099.05a tvam indra pratūrtiṣv abhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15225: RV_8,099.05c aśastihā janitā viśvatūr asi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15226: RV_8,099.06a anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15227: RV_8,099.06c viśvās te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yad indra tūrvasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15228: RV_8,099.07a ita ūtī vo ajaram prahetāram aprahitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15229: RV_8,099.07c āśuṃ jetāraṃ hetāraṃ rathītamam atūrtaṃ tugryāvṛdham //
GV01rvh1-10u:15230: RV_8,099.08a iṣkartāram aniṣkṛtaṃ sahaskṛtaṃ śatamūtiṃ śatakratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:15231: RV_8,099.08c samānam indram avase havāmahe vasavānaṃ vasūjuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15232: RV_8,100.01a ayaṃ ta emi tanvā purastād viśve devā abhi mā yanti paścāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:15233: RV_8,100.01c yadā mahyaṃ dīdharo bhāgam indrād in mayā kṛṇavo vīryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15234: RV_8,100.02a dadhāmi te madhuno bhakṣam agre hitas te bhāgaḥ suto astu somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15235: RV_8,100.02c asaś ca tvaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ sakhā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri //
GV01rvh1-10u:15236: RV_8,100.03a pra su stomam bharata vājayanta indrāya satyaṃ yadi satyam asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:15237: RV_8,100.03c nendro astīti nema u tva āha ka īṃ dadarśa kam abhi ṣṭavāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:15238: RV_8,100.04a ayam asmi jaritaḥ paśya meha viśvā jātāny abhy asmi mahnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15239: RV_8,100.04c ṛtasya mā pradiśo vardhayanty ādardiro bhuvanā dardarīmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15240: RV_8,100.05a ā yan mā venā aruhann ṛtasyaṃ ekam āsīnaṃ haryatasya pṛṣṭhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15241: RV_8,100.05c manaś cin me hṛda ā praty avocad acikradañ chiśumantaḥ sakhāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15242: RV_8,100.06a viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā yā cakartha maghavann indra sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15243: RV_8,100.06c pārāvataṃ yat purusambhṛtaṃ vasv apāvṛṇoḥ śarabhāya ṛṣibandhave //
GV01rvh1-10u:15244: RV_8,100.07a pra nūnaṃ dhāvatā pṛthaṅ neha yo vo avāvarīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:15245: RV_8,100.07c ni ṣīṃ vṛtrasya marmaṇi vajram indro apīpatat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15246: RV_8,100.08a manojavā ayamāna āyasīm atarat puram /
GV01rvh1-10u:15247: RV_8,100.08c divaṃ suparṇo gatvāya somaṃ vajriṇa ābharat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15248: RV_8,100.09a samudre antaḥ śayata udnā vajro abhīvṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15249: RV_8,100.09c bharanty asmai saṃyataḥ puraḥprasravaṇā balim //
GV01rvh1-10u:15250: RV_8,100.10a yad vāg vadanty avicetanāni rāṣṭrī devānāṃ niṣasāda mandrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15251: RV_8,100.10c catasra ūrjaṃ duduhe payāṃsi kva svid asyāḥ paramaṃ jagāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:15252: RV_8,100.11a devīṃ vācam ajanayanta devās tāṃ viśvarūpāḥ paśavo vadanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:15253: RV_8,100.11c sā no mandreṣam ūrjaṃ duhānā dhenur vāg asmān upa suṣṭutaitu //
GV01rvh1-10u:15254: RV_8,100.12a sakhe viṣṇo vitaraṃ vi kramasva dyaur dehi lokaṃ vajrāya viṣkabhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15255: RV_8,100.12c hanāva vṛtraṃ riṇacāva sindhūn indrasya yantu prasave visṛṣṭāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15256: RV_8,101.01a ṛdhag itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15257: RV_8,101.01c yo nūnam mitrāvaruṇāv abhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:15258: RV_8,101.02a varṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucakṣasā narā rājānā dīrghaśruttamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15259: RV_8,101.02c tā bāhutā na daṃsanā ratharyataḥ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15260: RV_8,101.03a pra yo vām mitrāvaruṇājiro dūto adravat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15262: RV_8,101.04a na yaḥ sampṛcche na punar havītave na saṃvādāya ramate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15263: RV_8,101.04c tasmān no adya samṛter uruṣyatam bāhubhyāṃ na uruṣyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15264: RV_8,101.05a pra mitrāya prāryamṇe sacathyam ṛtāvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:15265: RV_8,101.05c varūthyaṃ varuṇe chandyaṃ vaca stotraṃ rājasu gāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:15266: RV_8,101.06a te hinvire aruṇaṃ jenyaṃ vasv ekam putraṃ tisṝṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15267: RV_8,101.06c te dhāmāny amṛtā martyānām adabdhā abhi cakṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:15268: RV_8,101.07a ā me vacāṃsy udyatā dyumattamāni kartvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15269: RV_8,101.07c ubhā yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣasā prati havyāni vītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:15270: RV_8,101.08a rātiṃ yad vām arakṣasaṃ havāmahe yuvābhyāṃ vājinīvasū /
GV01rvh1-10u:15271: RV_8,101.08c prācīṃ hotrām pratirantāv itaṃ narā gṛṇānā jamadagninā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15272: RV_8,101.09a ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15273: RV_8,101.09c antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yaṃ śukro ayāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:15274: RV_8,101.10a vety adhvaryuḥ pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ prati havyāni vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15275: RV_8,101.10c adhā niyutva ubhayasya naḥ piba śuciṃ somaṃ gavāśiram //
GV01rvh1-10u:15276: RV_8,101.11a baṇ mahāṃ asi sūrya baḷ āditya mahāṃ asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15277: RV_8,101.11c mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahāṃ asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15278: RV_8,101.12a baṭ sūrya śravasā mahāṃ asi satrā deva mahāṃ asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15279: RV_8,101.12c mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15280: RV_8,101.13a iyaṃ yā nīcy arkiṇī rūpā rohiṇyā kṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15281: RV_8,101.13c citreva praty adarśy āyaty antar daśasu bāhuṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:15282: RV_8,101.14a prajā ha tisro atyāyam īyur ny anyā arkam abhito viviśre /
GV01rvh1-10u:15283: RV_8,101.14c bṛhad dha tasthau bhuvaneṣv antaḥ pavamāno harita ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:15284: RV_8,101.15a mātā rudrāṇāṃ duhitā vasūnāṃ svasādityānām amṛtasya nābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15285: RV_8,101.15c pra nu vocaṃ cikituṣe janāya mā gām anāgām aditiṃ vadhiṣṭa //
GV01rvh1-10u:15286: RV_8,101.16a vacovidaṃ vācam udīrayantīṃ viśvābhir dhībhir upatiṣṭhamānām /
