GV01rvh1-10u:15287: RV_8,101.16c devīṃ devebhyaḥ pary eyuṣīṃ gām ā māvṛkta martyo dabhracetāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15288: RV_8,102.01a tvam agne bṛhad vayo dadhāsi deva dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15290: RV_8,102.02a sa na īḷānayā saha devāṃ agne duvasyuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15292: RV_8,102.03a tvayā ha svid yujā vayaṃ codiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya /
GV01rvh1-10u:15294: RV_8,102.04a aurvabhṛguvac chucim apnavānavad ā huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15296: RV_8,102.05a huve vātasvanaṃ kavim parjanyakrandyaṃ sahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15298: RV_8,102.06a ā savaṃ savitur yathā bhagasyeva bhujiṃ huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15300: RV_8,102.07a agniṃ vo vṛdhantam adhvarāṇām purūtamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15302: RV_8,102.08a ayaṃ yathā na ābhuvat tvaṣṭā rūpeva takṣyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15304: RV_8,102.09a ayaṃ viśvā abhi śriyo 'gnir deveṣu patyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15305: RV_8,102.09c ā vājair upa no gamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15306: RV_8,102.10a viśveṣām iha stuhi hotṝṇāṃ yaśastamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15308: RV_8,102.11a śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ jyeṣṭho yo dameṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15310: RV_8,102.12a tam arvantaṃ na sānasiṃ gṛṇīhi vipra śuṣmiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15312: RV_8,102.13a upa tvā jāmayo giro dediśatīr haviṣkṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15314: RV_8,102.14a yasya tridhātv avṛtam barhis tasthāv asaṃdinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15315: RV_8,102.14c āpaś cin ni dadhā padam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15318: RV_8,102.16a agne ghṛtasya dhītibhis tepāno deva śociṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15319: RV_8,102.16c ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:15320: RV_8,102.17a taṃ tvājananta mātaraḥ kaviṃ devāso aṅgiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15322: RV_8,102.18a pracetasaṃ tvā kave 'gne dūtaṃ vareṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15324: RV_8,102.19a nahi me asty aghnyā na svadhitir vananvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15326: RV_8,102.20a yad agne kāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15328: RV_8,102.21a yad atty upajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15329: RV_8,102.21c sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15330: RV_8,102.22a agnim indhāno manasā dhiyaṃ saceta martyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15332: RV_8,103.01a adarśi gātuvittamo yasmin vratāny ādadhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15333: RV_8,103.01c upo ṣu jātam āryasya vardhanam agniṃ nakṣanta no giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15334: RV_8,103.02a pra daivodāso agnir devāṃ acchā na majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15335: RV_8,103.02c anu mātaram pṛthivīṃ vi vāvṛte tasthau nākasya sānavi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15336: RV_8,103.03a yasmād rejanta kṛṣṭayaś carkṛtyāni kṛṇvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15337: RV_8,103.03c sahasrasām medhasātāv iva tmanāgniṃ dhībhiḥ saparyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:15338: RV_8,103.04a pra yaṃ rāye ninīṣasi marto yas te vaso dāśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15339: RV_8,103.04c sa vīraṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsinaṃ tmanā sahasrapoṣiṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:15340: RV_8,103.05a sa dṛḷhe cid abhi tṛṇatti vājam arvatā sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15341: RV_8,103.05c tve devatrā sadā purūvaso viśvā vāmāni dhīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:15342: RV_8,103.06a yo viśvā dayate vasu hotā mandro janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:15343: RV_8,103.06c madhor na pātrā prathamāny asmai pra stomā yanty agnaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:15344: RV_8,103.07a aśvaṃ na gīrbhī rathyaṃ sudānavo marmṛjyante devayavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15345: RV_8,103.07c ubhe toke tanaye dasma viśpate parṣi rādho maghonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:15346: RV_8,103.08a pra maṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata ṛtāvne bṛhate śukraśociṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15348: RV_8,103.09a ā vaṃsate maghavā vīravad yaśaḥ samiddho dyumny āhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15349: RV_8,103.09c kuvin no asya sumatir navīyasy acchā vājebhir āgamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:15350: RV_8,103.10a preṣṭham u priyāṇāṃ stuhy āsāvātithim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15352: RV_8,103.11a uditā yo niditā veditā vasv ā yajñiyo vavartati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15353: RV_8,103.11c duṣṭarā yasya pravaṇe normayo dhiyā vājaṃ siṣāsataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15354: RV_8,103.12a mā no hṛṇītām atithir vasur agniḥ purupraśasta eṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15356: RV_8,103.13a mo te riṣan ye acchoktibhir vaso 'gne kebhiś cid evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15357: RV_8,103.13c kīriś cid dhi tvām īṭṭe dūtyāya rātahavyaḥ svadhvaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15358: RV_8,103.14a āgne yāhi marutsakhā rudrebhiḥ somapītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15359: RV_8,103.14c sobharyā upa suṣṭutim mādayasva svarṇare //
GV01rvh1-10u:15362: RV_9,001.01a svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15364: RV_9,001.02a rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇir abhi yonim ayohatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15368: RV_9,001.04a abhy arṣa mahānāṃ devānāṃ vītim andhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15370: RV_9,001.05a tvām acchā carāmasi tad id arthaṃ dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:15372: RV_9,001.06a punāti te parisrutaṃ somaṃ sūryasya duhitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15374: RV_9,001.07a tam īm aṇvīḥ samarya ā gṛbhṇanti yoṣaṇo daśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:15376: RV_9,001.08a tam īṃ hinvanty agruvo dhamanti bākuraṃ dṛtim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15378: RV_9,001.09a abhīmam aghnyā uta śrīṇanti dhenavaḥ śiśum /
GV01rvh1-10u:15380: RV_9,001.10a asyed indro madeṣv ā viśvā vṛtrāṇi jighnate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15382: RV_9,002.01a pavasva devavīr ati pavitraṃ soma raṃhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15384: RV_9,002.02a ā vacyasva mahi psaro vṛṣendo dyumnavattamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15386: RV_9,002.03a adhukṣata priyam madhu dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15388: RV_9,002.04a mahāntaṃ tvā mahīr anv āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15390: RV_9,002.05a samudro apsu māmṛje viṣṭambho dharuṇo divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15392: RV_9,002.06a acikradad vṛṣā harir mahān mitro na darśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15394: RV_9,002.07a giras ta inda ojasā marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15396: RV_9,002.08a taṃ tvā madāya ghṛṣvaya u lokakṛtnum īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15398: RV_9,002.09a asmabhyam indav indrayur madhvaḥ pavasva dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15400: RV_9,002.10a goṣā indo nṛṣā asy aśvasā vājasā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:15402: RV_9,003.01a eṣa devo amartyaḥ parṇavīr iva dīyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15404: RV_9,003.02a eṣa devo vipā kṛto 'ti hvarāṃsi dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15406: RV_9,003.03a eṣa devo vipanyubhiḥ pavamāna ṛtāyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15408: RV_9,003.04a eṣa viśvāni vāryā śūro yann iva satvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15410: RV_9,003.05a eṣa devo ratharyati pavamāno daśasyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15412: RV_9,003.06a eṣa viprair abhiṣṭuto 'po devo vi gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15414: RV_9,003.07a eṣa divaṃ vi dhāvati tiro rajāṃsi dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15416: RV_9,003.08a eṣa divaṃ vy āsarat tiro rajāṃsy aspṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15418: RV_9,003.09a eṣa pratnena janmanā devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15420: RV_9,003.10a eṣa u sya puruvrato jajñāno janayann iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15422: RV_9,004.01a sanā ca soma jeṣi ca pavamāna mahi śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15424: RV_9,004.02a sanā jyotiḥ sanā svar viśvā ca soma saubhagā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15426: RV_9,004.03a sanā dakṣam uta kratum apa soma mṛdho jahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15428: RV_9,004.04a pavītāraḥ punītana somam indrāya pātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:15430: RV_9,004.05a tvaṃ sūrye na ā bhaja tava kratvā tavotibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15432: RV_9,004.06a tava kratvā tavotibhir jyok paśyema sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15434: RV_9,004.07a abhy arṣa svāyudha soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15436: RV_9,004.08a abhy arṣānapacyuto rayiṃ samatsu sāsahiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15438: RV_9,004.09a tvāṃ yajñair avīvṛdhan pavamāna vidharmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15440: RV_9,004.10a rayiṃ naś citram aśvinam indo viśvāyum ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:15442: RV_9,005.01a samiddho viśvatas patiḥ pavamāno vi rājati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15444: RV_9,005.02a tanūnapāt pavamānaḥ śṛṅge śiśāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15446: RV_9,005.03a īḷenyaḥ pavamāno rayir vi rājati dyumān /
GV01rvh1-10u:15448: RV_9,005.04a barhiḥ prācīnam ojasā pavamāna stṛṇan hariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15450: RV_9,005.05a ud ātair jihate bṛhad dvāro devīr hiraṇyayīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15452: RV_9,005.06a suśilpe bṛhatī mahī pavamāno vṛṣaṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15454: RV_9,005.07a ubhā devā nṛcakṣasā hotārā daivyā huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15457: RV_9,005.08c imaṃ no yajñam ā gaman tisro devīḥ supeśasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15458: RV_9,005.09a tvaṣṭāram agrajāṃ gopām puroyāvānam ā huve /
GV01rvh1-10u:15459: RV_9,005.09c indur indro vṛṣā hariḥ pavamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15460: RV_9,005.10a vanaspatim pavamāna madhvā sam aṅgdhi dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15462: RV_9,005.11a viśve devāḥ svāhākṛtim pavamānasyā gata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15463: RV_9,005.11c vāyur bṛhaspatiḥ sūryo 'gnir indraḥ sajoṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15464: RV_9,006.01a mandrayā soma dhārayā vṛṣā pavasva devayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15466: RV_9,006.02a abhi tyam madyam madam indav indra iti kṣara /
GV01rvh1-10u:15468: RV_9,006.03a abhi tyam pūrvyam madaṃ suvāno arṣa pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15470: RV_9,006.04a anu drapsāsa indava āpo na pravatāsaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:15472: RV_9,006.05a yam atyam iva vājinam mṛjanti yoṣaṇo daśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:15474: RV_9,006.06a taṃ gobhir vṛṣaṇaṃ rasam madāya devavītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15476: RV_9,006.07a devo devāya dhārayendrāya pavate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15478: RV_9,006.08a ātmā yajñasya raṃhyā suṣvāṇaḥ pavate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15480: RV_9,006.09a evā punāna indrayur madam madiṣṭha vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15482: RV_9,007.01a asṛgram indavaḥ pathā dharmann ṛtasya suśriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15484: RV_9,007.02a pra dhārā madhvo agriyo mahīr apo vi gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15486: RV_9,007.03a pra yujo vāco agriyo vṛṣāva cakradad vane /
GV01rvh1-10u:15488: RV_9,007.04a pari yat kāvyā kavir nṛmṇā vasāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15490: RV_9,007.05a pavamāno abhi spṛdho viśo rājeva sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15492: RV_9,007.06a avyo vāre pari priyo harir vaneṣu sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15494: RV_9,007.07a sa vāyum indram aśvinā sākam madena gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15496: RV_9,007.08a ā mitrāvaruṇā bhagam madhvaḥ pavanta ūrmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15498: RV_9,007.09a asmabhyaṃ rodasī rayim madhvo vājasya sātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15500: RV_9,008.01a ete somā abhi priyam indrasya kāmam akṣaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:15502: RV_9,008.02a punānāsaś camūṣado gacchanto vāyum aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15504: RV_9,008.03a indrasya soma rādhase punāno hārdi codaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:15506: RV_9,008.04a mṛjanti tvā daśa kṣipo hinvanti sapta dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15508: RV_9,008.05a devebhyas tvā madāya kaṃ sṛjānam ati meṣyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15510: RV_9,008.06a punānaḥ kalaśeṣv ā vastrāṇy aruṣo hariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15512: RV_9,008.07a maghona ā pavasva no jahi viśvā apa dviṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15514: RV_9,008.08a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pari srava dyumnam pṛthivyā adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15515: RV_9,008.08c saho naḥ soma pṛtsu dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15516: RV_9,008.09a nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā vayam indrapītaṃ svarvidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15518: RV_9,009.01a pari priyā divaḥ kavir vayāṃsi naptyor hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15520: RV_9,009.02a pra-pra kṣayāya panyase janāya juṣṭo adruhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15522: RV_9,009.03a sa sūnur mātarā śucir jāto jāte arocayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15524: RV_9,009.04a sa sapta dhītibhir hito nadyo ajinvad adruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15526: RV_9,009.05a tā abhi santam astṛtam mahe yuvānam ā dadhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15528: RV_9,009.06a abhi vahnir amartyaḥ sapta paśyati vāvahiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15530: RV_9,009.07a avā kalpeṣu naḥ pumas tamāṃsi soma yodhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15532: RV_9,009.08a nū navyase navīyase sūktāya sādhayā pathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15534: RV_9,009.09a pavamāna mahi śravo gām aśvaṃ rāsi vīravat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15536: RV_9,010.01a pra svānāso rathā ivārvanto na śravasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15538: RV_9,010.02a hinvānāso rathā iva dadhanvire gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15540: RV_9,010.03a rājāno na praśastibhiḥ somāso gobhir añjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15542: RV_9,010.04a pari suvānāsa indavo madāya barhaṇā girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15544: RV_9,010.05a āpānāso vivasvato jananta uṣaso bhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15546: RV_9,010.06a apa dvārā matīnām pratnā ṛṇvanti kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15550: RV_9,010.08a nābhā nābhiṃ na ā dade cakṣuś cit sūrye sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15552: RV_9,010.09a abhi priyā divas padam adhvaryubhir guhā hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15556: RV_9,011.02a abhi te madhunā payo 'tharvāṇo aśiśrayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15558: RV_9,011.03a sa naḥ pavasva śaṃ gave śaṃ janāya śam arvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15562: RV_9,011.05a hastacyutebhir adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam punītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:15564: RV_9,011.06a namased upa sīdata dadhned abhi śrīṇītana /
GV01rvh1-10u:15566: RV_9,011.07a amitrahā vicarṣaṇiḥ pavasva soma śaṃ gave /
GV01rvh1-10u:15568: RV_9,011.08a indrāya soma pātave madāya pari ṣicyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:15570: RV_9,011.09a pavamāna suvīryaṃ rayiṃ soma rirīhi naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15572: RV_9,012.01a somā asṛgram indavaḥ sutā ṛtasya sādane /
GV01rvh1-10u:15574: RV_9,012.02a abhi viprā anūṣata gāvo vatsaṃ na mātaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15576: RV_9,012.03a madacyut kṣeti sādane sindhor ūrmā vipaścit /
GV01rvh1-10u:15578: RV_9,012.04a divo nābhā vicakṣaṇo 'vyo vāre mahīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15580: RV_9,012.05a yaḥ somaḥ kalaśeṣv āṃ antaḥ pavitra āhitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15582: RV_9,012.06a pra vācam indur iṣyati samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15584: RV_9,012.07a nityastotro vanaspatir dhīnām antaḥ sabardughaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15586: RV_9,012.08a abhi priyā divas padā somo hinvāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15588: RV_9,012.09a ā pavamāna dhāraya rayiṃ sahasravarcasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15590: RV_9,013.01a somaḥ punāno arṣati sahasradhāro atyaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15592: RV_9,013.02a pavamānam avasyavo vipram abhi pra gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15596: RV_9,013.04a uta no vājasātaye pavasva bṛhatīr iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15598: RV_9,013.05a te naḥ sahasriṇaṃ rayim pavantām ā suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15600: RV_9,013.06a atyā hiyānā na hetṛbhir asṛgraṃ vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15602: RV_9,013.07a vāśrā arṣantīndavo 'bhi vatsaṃ na dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15604: RV_9,013.08a juṣṭa indrāya matsaraḥ pavamāna kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15608: RV_9,014.01a pari prāsiṣyadat kaviḥ sindhor ūrmāv adhi śritaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15610: RV_9,014.02a girā yadī sabandhavaḥ pañca vrātā apasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15612: RV_9,014.03a ād asya śuṣmiṇo rase viśve devā amatsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15614: RV_9,014.04a niriṇāno vi dhāvati jahac charyāṇi tānvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15616: RV_9,014.05a naptībhir yo vivasvataḥ śubhro na māmṛje yuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15618: RV_9,014.06a ati śritī tiraścatā gavyā jigāty aṇvyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15620: RV_9,014.07a abhi kṣipaḥ sam agmata marjayantīr iṣas patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15622: RV_9,014.08a pari divyāni marmṛśad viśvāni soma pārthivā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15624: RV_9,015.01a eṣa dhiyā yāty aṇvyā śūro rathebhir āśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15626: RV_9,015.02a eṣa purū dhiyāyate bṛhate devatātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15628: RV_9,015.03a eṣa hito vi nīyate 'ntaḥ śubhrāvatā pathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15630: RV_9,015.04a eṣa śṛṅgāṇi dodhuvac chiśīte yūthyo vṛṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15632: RV_9,015.05a eṣa rukmibhir īyate vājī śubhrebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15634: RV_9,015.06a eṣa vasūni pibdanā paruṣā yayivāṃ ati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15636: RV_9,015.07a etam mṛjanti marjyam upa droṇeṣv āyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15638: RV_9,015.08a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sapta dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15640: RV_9,016.01a pra te sotāra oṇyo rasam madāya ghṛṣvaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:15642: RV_9,016.02a kratvā dakṣasya rathyam apo vasānam andhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15644: RV_9,016.03a anaptam apsu duṣṭaraṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja /
GV01rvh1-10u:15646: RV_9,016.04a pra punānasya cetasā somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15648: RV_9,016.05a pra tvā namobhir indava indra somā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15650: RV_9,016.06a punāno rūpe avyaye viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15652: RV_9,016.07a divo na sānu pipyuṣī dhārā sutasya vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15654: RV_9,016.08a tvaṃ soma vipaścitaṃ tanā punāna āyuṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:15656: RV_9,017.01a pra nimneneva sindhavo ghnanto vṛtrāṇi bhūrṇayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15658: RV_9,017.02a abhi suvānāsa indavo vṛṣṭayaḥ pṛthivīm iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:15660: RV_9,017.03a atyūrmir matsaro madaḥ somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15662: RV_9,017.04a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati pavitre pari ṣicyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15664: RV_9,017.05a ati trī soma rocanā rohan na bhrājase divam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15666: RV_9,017.06a abhi viprā anūṣata mūrdhan yajñasya kāravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15668: RV_9,017.07a tam u tvā vājinaṃ naro dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15670: RV_9,017.08a madhor dhārām anu kṣara tīvraḥ sadhastham āsadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15672: RV_9,018.01a pari suvāno giriṣṭhāḥ pavitre somo akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15674: RV_9,018.02a tvaṃ vipras tvaṃ kavir madhu pra jātam andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15676: RV_9,018.03a tava viśve sajoṣaso devāsaḥ pītim āśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15678: RV_9,018.04a ā yo viśvāni vāryā vasūni hastayor dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15680: RV_9,018.05a ya ime rodasī mahī sam mātareva dohate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15682: RV_9,018.06a pari yo rodasī ubhe sadyo vājebhir arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15684: RV_9,018.07a sa śuṣmī kalaśeṣv ā punāno acikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15686: RV_9,019.01a yat soma citram ukthyaṃ divyam pārthivaṃ vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:15687: RV_9,019.01c tan naḥ punāna ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:15688: RV_9,019.02a yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svarpatī indraś ca soma gopatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:15690: RV_9,019.03a vṛṣā punāna āyuṣu stanayann adhi barhiṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15694: RV_9,019.05a kuvid vṛṣaṇyantībhyaḥ punāno garbham ādadhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15696: RV_9,019.06a upa śikṣāpatasthuṣo bhiyasam ā dhehi śatruṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:15698: RV_9,019.07a ni śatroḥ soma vṛṣṇyaṃ ni śuṣmaṃ ni vayas tira /
GV01rvh1-10u:15699: RV_9,019.07c dūre vā sato anti vā //
GV01rvh1-10u:15700: RV_9,020.01a pra kavir devavītaye 'vyo vārebhir arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15702: RV_9,020.02a sa hi ṣmā jaritṛbhya ā vājaṃ gomantam invati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15704: RV_9,020.03a pari viśvāni cetasā mṛśase pavase matī /
GV01rvh1-10u:15705: RV_9,020.03c sa naḥ soma śravo vidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:15706: RV_9,020.04a abhy arṣa bṛhad yaśo maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15708: RV_9,020.05a tvaṃ rājeva suvrato giraḥ somā viveśitha /
GV01rvh1-10u:15710: RV_9,020.06a sa vahnir apsu duṣṭaro mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15712: RV_9,020.07a krīḷur makho na maṃhayuḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15714: RV_9,021.01a ete dhāvantīndavaḥ somā indrāya ghṛṣvayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15718: RV_9,021.03a vṛthā krīḷanta indavaḥ sadhastham abhy ekam it /
GV01rvh1-10u:15720: RV_9,021.04a ete viśvāni vāryā pavamānāsa āśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15722: RV_9,021.05a āsmin piśaṅgam indavo dadhātā venam ādiśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15724: RV_9,021.06a ṛbhur na rathyaṃ navaṃ dadhātā ketam ādiśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15726: RV_9,021.07a eta u tye avīvaśan kāṣṭhāṃ vājino akrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15728: RV_9,022.01a ete somāsa āśavo rathā iva pra vājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15730: RV_9,022.02a ete vātā ivoravaḥ parjanyasyeva vṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15732: RV_9,022.03a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15734: RV_9,022.04a ete mṛṣṭā amartyāḥ sasṛvāṃso na śaśramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15736: RV_9,022.05a ete pṛṣṭhāni rodasor viprayanto vy ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15738: RV_9,022.06a tantuṃ tanvānam uttamam anu pravata āśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:15740: RV_9,022.07a tvaṃ soma paṇibhya ā vasu gavyāni dhārayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15742: RV_9,023.01a somā asṛgram āśavo madhor madasya dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15744: RV_9,023.02a anu pratnāsa āyavaḥ padaṃ navīyo akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15746: RV_9,023.03a ā pavamāna no bharāryo adāśuṣo gayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15748: RV_9,023.04a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15750: RV_9,023.05a somo arṣati dharṇasir dadhāna indriyaṃ rasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15752: RV_9,023.06a indrāya soma pavase devebhyaḥ sadhamādyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15754: RV_9,023.07a asya pītvā madānām indro vṛtrāṇy aprati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15756: RV_9,024.01a pra somāso adhanviṣuḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15758: RV_9,024.02a abhi gāvo adhanviṣur āpo na pravatā yatīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15760: RV_9,024.03a pra pavamāna dhanvasi somendrāya pātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:15762: RV_9,024.04a tvaṃ soma nṛmādanaḥ pavasva carṣaṇīsahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15764: RV_9,024.05a indo yad adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavitram paridhāvasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15768: RV_9,024.07a śuciḥ pāvaka ucyate somaḥ sutasya madhvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15770: RV_9,025.01a pavasva dakṣasādhano devebhyaḥ pītaye hare /
GV01rvh1-10u:15772: RV_9,025.02a pavamāna dhiyā hito 'bhi yoniṃ kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15774: RV_9,025.03a saṃ devaiḥ śobhate vṛṣā kavir yonāv adhi priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15776: RV_9,025.04a viśvā rūpāṇy āviśan punāno yāti haryataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15778: RV_9,025.05a aruṣo janayan giraḥ somaḥ pavata āyuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:15780: RV_9,025.06a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:15782: RV_9,026.01a tam amṛkṣanta vājinam upasthe aditer adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15784: RV_9,026.02a taṃ gāvo abhy anūṣata sahasradhāram akṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15786: RV_9,026.03a taṃ vedhām medhayāhyan pavamānam adhi dyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15788: RV_9,026.04a tam ahyan bhurijor dhiyā saṃvasānaṃ vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15790: RV_9,026.05a taṃ sānāv adhi jāmayo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15792: RV_9,026.06a taṃ tvā hinvanti vedhasaḥ pavamāna girāvṛdham /
GV01rvh1-10u:15794: RV_9,027.01a eṣa kavir abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitre adhi tośate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15796: RV_9,027.02a eṣa indrāya vāyave svarjit pari ṣicyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15798: RV_9,027.03a eṣa nṛbhir vi nīyate divo mūrdhā vṛṣā sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15800: RV_9,027.04a eṣa gavyur acikradat pavamāno hiraṇyayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15802: RV_9,027.05a eṣa sūryeṇa hāsate pavamāno adhi dyavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15804: RV_9,027.06a eṣa śuṣmy asiṣyadad antarikṣe vṛṣā hariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15806: RV_9,028.01a eṣa vājī hito nṛbhir viśvavin manasas patiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15808: RV_9,028.02a eṣa pavitre akṣarat somo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15810: RV_9,028.03a eṣa devaḥ śubhāyate 'dhi yonāv amartyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15812: RV_9,028.04a eṣa vṛṣā kanikradad daśabhir jāmibhir yataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15814: RV_9,028.05a eṣa sūryam arocayat pavamāno vicarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15816: RV_9,028.06a eṣa śuṣmy adābhyaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15818: RV_9,029.01a prāsya dhārā akṣaran vṛṣṇaḥ sutasyaujasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15820: RV_9,029.02a saptim mṛjanti vedhaso gṛṇantaḥ kāravo girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15822: RV_9,029.03a suṣahā soma tāni te punānāya prabhūvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:15824: RV_9,029.04a viśvā vasūni saṃjayan pavasva soma dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15826: RV_9,029.05a rakṣā su no araruṣaḥ svanāt samasya kasya cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:15828: RV_9,029.06a endo pārthivaṃ rayiṃ divyam pavasva dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15830: RV_9,030.01a pra dhārā asya śuṣmiṇo vṛthā pavitre akṣaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:15832: RV_9,030.02a indur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15834: RV_9,030.03a ā naḥ śuṣmaṃ nṛṣāhyaṃ vīravantam puruspṛham /
GV01rvh1-10u:15836: RV_9,030.04a pra somo ati dhārayā pavamāno asiṣyadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15838: RV_9,030.05a apsu tvā madhumattamaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15840: RV_9,030.06a sunotā madhumattamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15842: RV_9,031.01a pra somāsaḥ svādhyaḥ pavamānāso akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15844: RV_9,031.02a divas pṛthivyā adhi bhavendo dyumnavardhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15846: RV_9,031.03a tubhyaṃ vātā abhipriyas tubhyam arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15848: RV_9,031.04a ā pyāyasva sam etu te viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15850: RV_9,031.05a tubhyaṃ gāvo ghṛtam payo babhro duduhre akṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15852: RV_9,031.06a svāyudhasya te sato bhuvanasya pate vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15854: RV_9,032.01a pra somāso madacyutaḥ śravase no maghonaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15856: RV_9,032.02a ād īṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15858: RV_9,032.03a ād īṃ haṃso yathā gaṇaṃ viśvasyāvīvaśan matim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15860: RV_9,032.04a ubhe somāvacākaśan mṛgo na takto arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15862: RV_9,032.05a abhi gāvo anūṣata yoṣā jāram iva priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15864: RV_9,032.06a asme dhehi dyumad yaśo maghavadbhyaś ca mahyaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:15866: RV_9,033.01a pra somāso vipaścito 'pāṃ na yanty ūrmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15868: RV_9,033.02a abhi droṇāni babhravaḥ śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15870: RV_9,033.03a sutā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15872: RV_9,033.04a tisro vāca ud īrate gāvo mimanti dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15874: RV_9,033.05a abhi brahmīr anūṣata yahvīr ṛtasya mātaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15876: RV_9,033.06a rāyaḥ samudrāṃś caturo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15878: RV_9,034.01a pra suvāno dhārayā tanendur hinvāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15880: RV_9,034.02a suta indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15882: RV_9,034.03a vṛṣāṇaṃ vṛṣabhir yataṃ sunvanti somam adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15884: RV_9,034.04a bhuvat tritasya marjyo bhuvad indrāya matsaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15886: RV_9,034.05a abhīm ṛtasya viṣṭapaṃ duhate pṛśnimātaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15888: RV_9,034.06a sam enam ahrutā imā giro arṣanti sasrutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15890: RV_9,035.01a ā naḥ pavasva dhārayā pavamāna rayim pṛthum /
GV01rvh1-10u:15894: RV_9,035.03a tvayā vīreṇa vīravo 'bhi ṣyāma pṛtanyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15896: RV_9,035.04a pra vājam indur iṣyati siṣāsan vājasā ṛṣiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15898: RV_9,035.05a taṃ gīrbhir vācamīṅkhayam punānaṃ vāsayāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15900: RV_9,035.06a viśvo yasya vrate jano dādhāra dharmaṇas pateḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15902: RV_9,036.01a asarji rathyo yathā pavitre camvoḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15904: RV_9,036.02a sa vahniḥ soma jāgṛviḥ pavasva devavīr ati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15906: RV_9,036.03a sa no jyotīṃṣi pūrvya pavamāna vi rocaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:15910: RV_9,036.05a sa viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somo divyāni pārthivā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15912: RV_9,036.06a ā divas pṛṣṭham aśvayur gavyayuḥ soma rohasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:15914: RV_9,037.01a sa sutaḥ pītaye vṛṣā somaḥ pavitre arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15916: RV_9,037.02a sa pavitre vicakṣaṇo harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15918: RV_9,037.03a sa vājī rocanā divaḥ pavamāno vi dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15920: RV_9,037.04a sa tritasyādhi sānavi pavamāno arocayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15922: RV_9,037.05a sa vṛtrahā vṛṣā suto varivovid adābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15924: RV_9,037.06a sa devaḥ kavineṣito 'bhi droṇāni dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15926: RV_9,038.01a eṣa u sya vṛṣā ratho 'vyo vārebhir arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15928: RV_9,038.02a etaṃ tritasya yoṣaṇo hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15930: RV_9,038.03a etaṃ tyaṃ harito daśa marmṛjyante apasyuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15932: RV_9,038.04a eṣa sya mānuṣīṣv ā śyeno na vikṣu sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:15934: RV_9,038.05a eṣa sya madyo raso 'va caṣṭe divaḥ śiśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15936: RV_9,038.06a eṣa sya pītaye suto harir arṣati dharṇasiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15938: RV_9,039.01a āśur arṣa bṛhanmate pari priyeṇa dhāmnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15940: RV_9,039.02a pariṣkṛṇvann aniṣkṛtaṃ janāya yātayann iṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15942: RV_9,039.03a suta eti pavitra ā tviṣiṃ dadhāna ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15944: RV_9,039.04a ayaṃ sa yo divas pari raghuyāmā pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15946: RV_9,039.05a āvivāsan parāvato atho arvāvataḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15948: RV_9,039.06a samīcīnā anūṣata hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15950: RV_9,040.01a punāno akramīd abhi viśvā mṛdho vicarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15952: RV_9,040.02a ā yonim aruṇo ruhad gamad indraṃ vṛṣā sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15954: RV_9,040.03a nū no rayim mahām indo 'smabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15956: RV_9,040.04a viśvā soma pavamāna dyumnānīndav ā bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:15958: RV_9,040.05a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ stotre suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15960: RV_9,040.06a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:15962: RV_9,041.01a pra ye gāvo na bhūrṇayas tveṣā ayāso akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15966: RV_9,041.03a śṛṇve vṛṣṭer iva svanaḥ pavamānasya śuṣmiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15968: RV_9,041.04a ā pavasva mahīm iṣaṃ gomad indo hiraṇyavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:15970: RV_9,041.05a sa pavasva vicarṣaṇa ā mahī rodasī pṛṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:15972: RV_9,041.06a pari ṇaḥ śarmayantyā dhārayā soma viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15974: RV_9,042.01a janayan rocanā divo janayann apsu sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15976: RV_9,042.02a eṣa pratnena manmanā devo devebhyas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:15980: RV_9,042.04a duhānaḥ pratnam it payaḥ pavitre pari ṣicyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:15982: RV_9,042.05a abhi viśvāni vāryābhi devāṃ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15984: RV_9,042.06a goman naḥ soma vīravad aśvāvad vājavat sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15986: RV_9,043.01a yo atya iva mṛjyate gobhir madāya haryataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15988: RV_9,043.02a taṃ no viśvā avasyuvo giraḥ śumbhanti pūrvathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15990: RV_9,043.03a punāno yāti haryataḥ somo gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:15992: RV_9,043.04a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma suśriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:15994: RV_9,043.05a indur atyo na vājasṛt kanikranti pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:15996: RV_9,043.06a pavasva vājasātaye viprasya gṛṇato vṛdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:15998: RV_9,044.01a pra ṇa indo mahe tana ūrmiṃ na bibhrad arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16000: RV_9,044.02a matī juṣṭo dhiyā hitaḥ somo hinve parāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16002: RV_9,044.03a ayaṃ deveṣu jāgṛviḥ suta eti pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16004: RV_9,044.04a sa naḥ pavasva vājayuś cakrāṇaś cārum adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16006: RV_9,044.05a sa no bhagāya vāyave vipravīraḥ sadāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16008: RV_9,044.06a sa no adya vasuttaye kratuvid gātuvittamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16010: RV_9,045.01a sa pavasva madāya kaṃ nṛcakṣā devavītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16012: RV_9,045.02a sa no arṣābhi dūtyaṃ tvam indrāya tośase /
GV01rvh1-10u:16014: RV_9,045.03a uta tvām aruṇaṃ vayaṃ gobhir añjmo madāya kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16015: RV_9,045.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16016: RV_9,045.04a aty ū pavitram akramīd vājī dhuraṃ na yāmani /
GV01rvh1-10u:16018: RV_9,045.05a sam ī sakhāyo asvaran vane krīḷantam atyavim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16020: RV_9,045.06a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā pīto vicakṣase /
GV01rvh1-10u:16026: RV_9,046.03a ete somāsa indavaḥ prayasvantaś camū sutāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16028: RV_9,046.04a ā dhāvatā suhastyaḥ śukrā gṛbhṇīta manthinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16030: RV_9,046.05a sa pavasva dhanañjaya prayantā rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16032: RV_9,046.06a etam mṛjanti marjyam pavamānaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16034: RV_9,047.01a ayā somaḥ sukṛtyayā mahaś cid abhy avardhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16036: RV_9,047.02a kṛtānīd asya kartvā cetante dasyutarhaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16038: RV_9,047.03a āt soma indriyo raso vajraḥ sahasrasā bhuvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16040: RV_9,047.04a svayaṃ kavir vidhartari viprāya ratnam icchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16042: RV_9,047.05a siṣāsatū rayīṇāṃ vājeṣv arvatām iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16044: RV_9,048.01a taṃ tvā nṛmṇāni bibhrataṃ sadhastheṣu maho divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16048: RV_9,048.03a atas tvā rayim abhi rājānaṃ sukrato divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16050: RV_9,048.04a viśvasmā it svar dṛśe sādhāraṇaṃ rajasturam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16052: RV_9,048.05a adhā hinvāna indriyaṃ jyāyo mahitvam ānaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16054: RV_9,049.01a pavasva vṛṣṭim ā su no 'pām ūrmiṃ divas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:16056: RV_9,049.02a tayā pavasva dhārayā yayā gāva ihāgaman /
GV01rvh1-10u:16058: RV_9,049.03a ghṛtam pavasva dhārayā yajñeṣu devavītamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16060: RV_9,049.04a sa na ūrje vy avyayam pavitraṃ dhāva dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16064: RV_9,050.01a ut te śuṣmāsa īrate sindhor ūrmer iva svanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16066: RV_9,050.02a prasave ta ud īrate tisro vāco makhasyuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16068: RV_9,050.03a avyo vāre pari priyaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16070: RV_9,050.04a ā pavasva madintama pavitraṃ dhārayā kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16072: RV_9,050.05a sa pavasva madintama gobhir añjāno aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16074: RV_9,051.01a adhvaryo adribhiḥ sutaṃ somam pavitra ā sṛja /
GV01rvh1-10u:16076: RV_9,051.02a divaḥ pīyūṣam uttamaṃ somam indrāya vajriṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16078: RV_9,051.03a tava tya indo andhaso devā madhor vy aśnate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16080: RV_9,051.04a tvaṃ hi soma vardhayan suto madāya bhūrṇaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16082: RV_9,051.05a abhy arṣa vicakṣaṇa pavitraṃ dhārayā sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16084: RV_9,052.01a pari dyukṣaḥ sanadrayir bharad vājaṃ no andhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16086: RV_9,052.02a tava pratnebhir adhvabhir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16088: RV_9,052.03a carur na yas tam īṅkhayendo na dānam īṅkhaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16090: RV_9,052.04a ni śuṣmam indav eṣām puruhūta janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16092: RV_9,052.05a śataṃ na inda ūtibhiḥ sahasraṃ vā śucīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16094: RV_9,053.01a ut te śuṣmāso asthū rakṣo bhindanto adrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16096: RV_9,053.02a ayā nijaghnir ojasā rathasaṃge dhane hite /
GV01rvh1-10u:16098: RV_9,053.03a asya vratāni nādhṛṣe pavamānasya dūḍhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16100: RV_9,053.04a taṃ hinvanti madacyutaṃ hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16102: RV_9,054.01a asya pratnām anu dyutaṃ śukraṃ duduhre ahrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16104: RV_9,054.02a ayaṃ sūrya ivopadṛg ayaṃ sarāṃsi dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16106: RV_9,054.03a ayaṃ viśvāni tiṣṭhati punāno bhuvanopari /
GV01rvh1-10u:16108: RV_9,054.04a pari ṇo devavītaye vājāṃ arṣasi gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16110: RV_9,055.01a yavaṃ-yavaṃ no andhasā puṣṭam-puṣṭam pari srava /
GV01rvh1-10u:16112: RV_9,055.02a indo yathā tava stavo yathā te jātam andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16114: RV_9,055.03a uta no govid aśvavit pavasva somāndhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16116: RV_9,055.04a yo jināti na jīyate hanti śatrum abhītya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16118: RV_9,056.01a pari soma ṛtam bṛhad āśuḥ pavitre arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16120: RV_9,056.02a yat somo vājam arṣati śataṃ dhārā apasyuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16122: RV_9,056.03a abhi tvā yoṣaṇo daśa jāraṃ na kanyānūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16124: RV_9,056.04a tvam indrāya viṣṇave svādur indo pari srava /
GV01rvh1-10u:16126: RV_9,057.01a pra te dhārā asaścato divo na yanti vṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16128: RV_9,057.02a abhi priyāṇi kāvyā viśvā cakṣāṇo arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16130: RV_9,057.03a sa marmṛjāna āyubhir ibho rājeva suvrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16132: RV_9,057.04a sa no viśvā divo vasūto pṛthivyā adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16134: RV_9,058.01a tarat sa mandī dhāvati dhārā sutasyāndhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16136: RV_9,058.02a usrā veda vasūnām martasya devy avasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16138: RV_9,058.03a dhvasrayoḥ puruṣantyor ā sahasrāṇi dadmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16140: RV_9,058.04a ā yayos triṃśataṃ tanā sahasrāṇi ca dadmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16142: RV_9,059.01a pavasva gojid aśvajid viśvajit soma raṇyajit /
GV01rvh1-10u:16146: RV_9,059.03a tvaṃ soma pavamāno viśvāni duritā tara /
GV01rvh1-10u:16148: RV_9,059.04a pavamāna svar vido jāyamāno 'bhavo mahān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16150: RV_9,060.01a pra gāyatreṇa gāyata pavamānaṃ vicarṣaṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16152: RV_9,060.02a taṃ tvā sahasracakṣasam atho sahasrabharṇasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16154: RV_9,060.03a ati vārān pavamāno asiṣyadat kalaśāṃ abhi dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16156: RV_9,060.04a indrasya soma rādhase śam pavasva vicarṣaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16158: RV_9,061.01a ayā vītī pari srava yas ta indo madeṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16160: RV_9,061.02a puraḥ sadya itthādhiye divodāsāya śambaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16162: RV_9,061.03a pari ṇo aśvam aśvavid gomad indo hiraṇyavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16164: RV_9,061.04a pavamānasya te vayam pavitram abhyundataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16166: RV_9,061.05a ye te pavitram ūrmayo 'bhikṣaranti dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16168: RV_9,061.06a sa naḥ punāna ā bhara rayiṃ vīravatīm iṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16170: RV_9,061.07a etam u tyaṃ daśa kṣipo mṛjanti sindhumātaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16172: RV_9,061.08a sam indreṇota vāyunā suta eti pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16174: RV_9,061.09a sa no bhagāya vāyave pūṣṇe pavasva madhumān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16176: RV_9,061.10a uccā te jātam andhaso divi ṣad bhūmy ā dade /
GV01rvh1-10u:16178: RV_9,061.11a enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16180: RV_9,061.12a sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16182: RV_9,061.13a upo ṣu jātam apturaṃ gobhir bhaṅgam pariṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16184: RV_9,061.14a tam id vardhantu no giro vatsaṃ saṃśiśvarīr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16186: RV_9,061.15a arṣā ṇaḥ soma śaṃ gave dhukṣasva pipyuṣīm iṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16188: RV_9,061.16a pavamāno ajījanad divaś citraṃ na tanyatum /
GV01rvh1-10u:16190: RV_9,061.17a pavamānasya te raso mado rājann aducchunaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16192: RV_9,061.18a pavamāna rasas tava dakṣo vi rājati dyumān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16194: RV_9,061.19a yas te mado vareṇyas tenā pavasvāndhasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16196: RV_9,061.20a jaghnir vṛtram amitriyaṃ sasnir vājaṃ dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:16198: RV_9,061.21a sammiślo aruṣo bhava sūpasthābhir na dhenubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16199: RV_9,061.21c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16200: RV_9,061.22a sa pavasva ya āvithendraṃ vṛtrāya hantave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16202: RV_9,061.23a suvīrāso vayaṃ dhanā jayema soma mīḍhvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16204: RV_9,061.24a tvotāsas tavāvasā syāma vanvanta āmuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16206: RV_9,061.25a apaghnan pavate mṛdho 'pa somo arāvṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16208: RV_9,061.26a maho no rāya ā bhara pavamāna jahī mṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16210: RV_9,061.27a na tvā śataṃ cana hruto rādho ditsantam ā minan /
GV01rvh1-10u:16212: RV_9,061.28a pavasvendo vṛṣā sutaḥ kṛdhī no yaśaso jane /
GV01rvh1-10u:16214: RV_9,061.29a asya te sakhye vayaṃ tavendo dyumna uttame /
GV01rvh1-10u:16216: RV_9,061.30a yā te bhīmāny āyudhā tigmāni santi dhūrvaṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16218: RV_9,062.01a ete asṛgram indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16220: RV_9,062.02a vighnanto duritā puru sugā tokāya vājinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16222: RV_9,062.03a kṛṇvanto varivo gave 'bhy arṣanti suṣṭutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16224: RV_9,062.04a asāvy aṃśur madāyāpsu dakṣo giriṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16226: RV_9,062.05a śubhram andho devavātam apsu dhūto nṛbhiḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16228: RV_9,062.06a ād īm aśvaṃ na hetāro 'śūśubhann amṛtāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16230: RV_9,062.07a yās te dhārā madhuścuto 'sṛgram inda ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16232: RV_9,062.08a so arṣendrāya pītaye tiro romāṇy avyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16234: RV_9,062.09a tvam indo pari srava svādiṣṭho aṅgirobhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16236: RV_9,062.10a ayaṃ vicarṣaṇir hitaḥ pavamānaḥ sa cetati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16238: RV_9,062.11a eṣa vṛṣā vṛṣavrataḥ pavamāno aśastihā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16240: RV_9,062.12a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16242: RV_9,062.13a eṣa sya pari ṣicyate marmṛjyamāna āyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16244: RV_9,062.14a sahasrotiḥ śatāmagho vimāno rajasaḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16246: RV_9,062.15a girā jāta iha stuta indur indrāya dhīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16248: RV_9,062.16a pavamānaḥ suto nṛbhiḥ somo vājam ivāsarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16250: RV_9,062.17a taṃ tripṛṣṭhe trivandhure rathe yuñjanti yātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16252: RV_9,062.18a taṃ sotāro dhanaspṛtam āśuṃ vājāya yātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16254: RV_9,062.19a āviśan kalaśaṃ suto viśvā arṣann abhi śriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16256: RV_9,062.20a ā ta indo madāya kam payo duhanty āyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16258: RV_9,062.21a ā naḥ somam pavitra ā sṛjatā madhumattamam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16260: RV_9,062.22a ete somā asṛkṣata gṛṇānāḥ śravase mahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16262: RV_9,062.23a abhi gavyāni vītaye nṛmṇā punāno arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16264: RV_9,062.24a uta no gomatīr iṣo viśvā arṣa pariṣṭubhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16266: RV_9,062.25a pavasva vāco agriyaḥ soma citrābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16268: RV_9,062.26a tvaṃ samudriyā apo 'griyo vāca īrayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:16270: RV_9,062.27a tubhyemā bhuvanā kave mahimne soma tasthire /
GV01rvh1-10u:16272: RV_9,062.28a pra te divo na vṛṣṭayo dhārā yanty asaścataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16276: RV_9,062.30a pavamāna ṛtaḥ kaviḥ somaḥ pavitram āsadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16278: RV_9,063.01a ā pavasva sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ soma suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16280: RV_9,063.02a iṣam ūrjaṃ ca pinvasa indrāya matsarintamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16282: RV_9,063.03a suta indrāya viṣṇave somaḥ kalaśe akṣarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16284: RV_9,063.04a ete asṛgram āśavo 'ti hvarāṃsi babhravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16286: RV_9,063.05a indraṃ vardhanto apturaḥ kṛṇvanto viśvam āryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16288: RV_9,063.06a sutā anu svam ā rajo 'bhy arṣanti babhravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16290: RV_9,063.07a ayā pavasva dhārayā yayā sūryam arocayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16292: RV_9,063.08a ayukta sūra etaśam pavamāno manāv adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16294: RV_9,063.09a uta tyā harito daśa sūro ayukta yātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16296: RV_9,063.10a parīto vāyave sutaṃ gira indrāya matsaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16298: RV_9,063.11a pavamāna vidā rayim asmabhyaṃ soma duṣṭaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16300: RV_9,063.12a abhy arṣa sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16302: RV_9,063.13a somo devo na sūryo 'dribhiḥ pavate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16304: RV_9,063.14a ete dhāmāny āryā śukrā ṛtasya dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16306: RV_9,063.15a sutā indrāya vajriṇe somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16308: RV_9,063.16a pra soma madhumattamo rāye arṣa pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16310: RV_9,063.17a tam ī mṛjanty āyavo hariṃ nadīṣu vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16312: RV_9,063.18a ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvāvat soma vīravat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16314: RV_9,063.19a pari vāje na vājayum avyo vāreṣu siñcata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16316: RV_9,063.20a kavim mṛjanti marjyaṃ dhībhir viprā avasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16318: RV_9,063.21a vṛṣaṇaṃ dhībhir apturaṃ somam ṛtasya dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16320: RV_9,063.22a pavasva devāyuṣag indraṃ gacchatu te madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16322: RV_9,063.23a pavamāna ni tośase rayiṃ soma śravāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16324: RV_9,063.24a apaghnan pavase mṛdhaḥ kratuvit soma matsaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16326: RV_9,063.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata somāḥ śukrāsa indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16328: RV_9,063.26a pavamānāsa āśavaḥ śubhrā asṛgram indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16330: RV_9,063.27a pavamānā divas pary antarikṣād asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16332: RV_9,063.28a punānaḥ soma dhārayendo viśvā apa sridhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16334: RV_9,063.29a apaghnan soma rakṣaso 'bhy arṣa kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16336: RV_9,063.30a asme vasūni dhāraya soma divyāni pārthivā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16338: RV_9,064.01a vṛṣā soma dyumāṃ asi vṛṣā deva vṛṣavrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16340: RV_9,064.02a vṛṣṇas te vṛṣṇyaṃ śavo vṛṣā vanaṃ vṛṣā madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16342: RV_9,064.03a aśvo na cakrado vṛṣā saṃ gā indo sam arvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16343: RV_9,064.03c vi no rāye duro vṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16344: RV_9,064.04a asṛkṣata pra vājino gavyā somāso aśvayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16348: RV_9,064.06a te viśvā dāśuṣe vasu somā divyāni pārthivā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16350: RV_9,064.07a pavamānasya viśvavit pra te sargā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16352: RV_9,064.08a ketuṃ kṛṇvan divas pari viśvā rūpābhy arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16354: RV_9,064.09a hinvāno vācam iṣyasi pavamāna vidharmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16356: RV_9,064.10a induḥ paviṣṭa cetanaḥ priyaḥ kavīnām matī /
GV01rvh1-10u:16358: RV_9,064.11a ūrmir yas te pavitra ā devāvīḥ paryakṣarat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16360: RV_9,064.12a sa no arṣa pavitra ā mado yo devavītamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16362: RV_9,064.13a iṣe pavasva dhārayā mṛjyamāno manīṣibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16364: RV_9,064.14a punāno varivas kṛdhy ūrjaṃ janāya girvaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16366: RV_9,064.15a punāno devavītaya indrasya yāhi niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16368: RV_9,064.16a pra hinvānāsa indavo 'cchā samudram āśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16370: RV_9,064.17a marmṛjānāsa āyavo vṛthā samudram indavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16372: RV_9,064.18a pari ṇo yāhy asmayur viśvā vasūny ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16374: RV_9,064.19a mimāti vahnir etaśaḥ padaṃ yujāna ṛkvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16376: RV_9,064.20a ā yad yoniṃ hiraṇyayam āśur ṛtasya sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16382: RV_9,064.23a taṃ tvā viprā vacovidaḥ pari ṣkṛṇvanti vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16384: RV_9,064.24a rasaṃ te mitro aryamā pibanti varuṇaḥ kave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16386: RV_9,064.25a tvaṃ soma vipaścitam punāno vācam iṣyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16388: RV_9,064.26a uto sahasrabharṇasaṃ vācaṃ soma makhasyuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16390: RV_9,064.27a punāna indav eṣām puruhūta janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16394: RV_9,064.29a hinvāno hetṛbhir yata ā vājaṃ vājy akramīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:16396: RV_9,064.30a ṛdhak soma svastaye saṃjagmāno divaḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16398: RV_9,065.01a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ svasāro jāmayas patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16400: RV_9,065.02a pavamāna rucā-rucā devo devebhyas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:16402: RV_9,065.03a ā pavamāna suṣṭutiṃ vṛṣṭiṃ devebhyo duvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16404: RV_9,065.04a vṛṣā hy asi bhānunā dyumantaṃ tvā havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16406: RV_9,065.05a ā pavasva suvīryam mandamānaḥ svāyudha /
GV01rvh1-10u:16407: RV_9,065.05c iho ṣv indav ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16408: RV_9,065.06a yad adbhiḥ pariṣicyase mṛjyamāno gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16410: RV_9,065.07a pra somāya vyaśvavat pavamānāya gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16412: RV_9,065.08a yasya varṇam madhuścutaṃ hariṃ hinvanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16414: RV_9,065.09a tasya te vājino vayaṃ viśvā dhanāni jigyuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16416: RV_9,065.10a vṛṣā pavasva dhārayā marutvate ca matsaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16418: RV_9,065.11a taṃ tvā dhartāram oṇyoḥ pavamāna svardṛśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16420: RV_9,065.12a ayā citto vipānayā hariḥ pavasva dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16422: RV_9,065.13a ā na indo mahīm iṣam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16424: RV_9,065.14a ā kalaśā anūṣatendo dhārābhir ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16426: RV_9,065.15a yasya te madyaṃ rasaṃ tīvraṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16428: RV_9,065.16a rājā medhābhir īyate pavamāno manāv adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16430: RV_9,065.17a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ gavām poṣaṃ svaśvyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16432: RV_9,065.18a ā naḥ soma saho juvo rūpaṃ na varcase bhara /
GV01rvh1-10u:16434: RV_9,065.19a arṣā soma dyumattamo 'bhi droṇāni roruvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16435: RV_9,065.19c sīdañ chyeno na yonim ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16436: RV_9,065.20a apsā indrāya vāyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16438: RV_9,065.21a iṣaṃ tokāya no dadhad asmabhyaṃ soma viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16440: RV_9,065.22a ye somāsaḥ parāvati ye arvāvati sunvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:16442: RV_9,065.23a ya ārjīkeṣu kṛtvasu ye madhye pastyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16444: RV_9,065.24a te no vṛṣṭiṃ divas pari pavantām ā suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16446: RV_9,065.25a pavate haryato harir gṛṇāno jamadagninā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16448: RV_9,065.26a pra śukrāso vayojuvo hinvānāso na saptayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16450: RV_9,065.27a taṃ tvā suteṣv ābhuvo hinvire devatātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16452: RV_9,065.28a ā te dakṣam mayobhuvaṃ vahnim adyā vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16454: RV_9,065.29a ā mandram ā vareṇyam ā vipram ā manīṣiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16456: RV_9,065.30a ā rayim ā sucetunam ā sukrato tanūṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16460: RV_9,066.02a tābhyāṃ viśvasya rājasi ye pavamāna dhāmanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:16462: RV_9,066.03a pari dhāmāni yāni te tvaṃ somāsi viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16464: RV_9,066.04a pavasva janayann iṣo 'bhi viśvāni vāryā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16466: RV_9,066.05a tava śukrāso arcayo divas pṛṣṭhe vi tanvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16468: RV_9,066.06a taveme sapta sindhavaḥ praśiṣaṃ soma sisrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16470: RV_9,066.07a pra soma yāhi dhārayā suta indrāya matsaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16472: RV_9,066.08a sam u tvā dhībhir asvaran hinvatīḥ sapta jāmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16474: RV_9,066.09a mṛjanti tvā sam agruvo 'vye jīrāv adhi ṣvaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16476: RV_9,066.10a pavamānasya te kave vājin sargā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16478: RV_9,066.11a acchā kośam madhuścutam asṛgraṃ vāre avyaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16480: RV_9,066.12a acchā samudram indavo 'staṃ gāvo na dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16482: RV_9,066.13a pra ṇa indo mahe raṇa āpo arṣanti sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16484: RV_9,066.14a asya te sakhye vayam iyakṣantas tvotayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16486: RV_9,066.15a ā pavasva gaviṣṭaye mahe soma nṛcakṣase /
GV01rvh1-10u:16488: RV_9,066.16a mahāṃ asi soma jyeṣṭha ugrāṇām inda ojiṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16490: RV_9,066.17a ya ugrebhyaś cid ojīyāñ chūrebhyaś cic chūrataraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16492: RV_9,066.18a tvaṃ soma sūra eṣas tokasya sātā tanūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16494: RV_9,066.19a agna āyūṃṣi pavasa ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16496: RV_9,066.20a agnir ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16498: RV_9,066.21a agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16500: RV_9,066.22a pavamāno ati sridho 'bhy arṣati suṣṭutim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16502: RV_9,066.23a sa marmṛjāna āyubhiḥ prayasvān prayase hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16504: RV_9,066.24a pavamāna ṛtam bṛhac chukraṃ jyotir ajījanat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16506: RV_9,066.25a pavamānasya jaṅghnato hareś candrā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16510: RV_9,066.27a pavamāno vy aśnavad raśmibhir vājasātamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16512: RV_9,066.28a pra suvāna indur akṣāḥ pavitram aty avyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16514: RV_9,066.29a eṣa somo adhi tvaci gavāṃ krīḷaty adribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16516: RV_9,066.30a yasya te dyumnavat payaḥ pavamānābhṛtaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16518: RV_9,067.01a tvaṃ somāsi dhārayur mandra ojiṣṭho adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:16520: RV_9,067.02a tvaṃ suto nṛmādano dadhanvān matsarintamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16522: RV_9,067.03a tvaṃ suṣvāṇo adribhir abhy arṣa kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16524: RV_9,067.04a indur hinvāno arṣati tiro vārāṇy avyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16526: RV_9,067.05a indo vy avyam arṣasi vi śravāṃsi vi saubhagā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16528: RV_9,067.06a ā na indo śatagvinaṃ rayiṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16530: RV_9,067.07a pavamānāsa indavas tiraḥ pavitram āśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16532: RV_9,067.08a kakuhaḥ somyo rasa indur indrāya pūrvyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16534: RV_9,067.09a hinvanti sūram usrayaḥ pavamānam madhuścutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16536: RV_9,067.10a avitā no ajāśvaḥ pūṣā yāmani-yāmani /
GV01rvh1-10u:16538: RV_9,067.11a ayaṃ somaḥ kapardine ghṛtaṃ na pavate madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:16540: RV_9,067.12a ayaṃ ta āghṛṇe suto ghṛtaṃ na pavate śuci /
GV01rvh1-10u:16542: RV_9,067.13a vāco jantuḥ kavīnām pavasva soma dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16544: RV_9,067.14a ā kalaśeṣu dhāvati śyeno varma vi gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16546: RV_9,067.15a pari pra soma te raso 'sarji kalaśe sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16548: RV_9,067.16a pavasva soma mandayann indrāya madhumattamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16549: RV_9,067.17a asṛgran devavītaye vājayanto rathā iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:16550: RV_9,067.18a te sutāso madintamāḥ śukrā vāyum asṛkṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16551: RV_9,067.19a grāvṇā tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitraṃ soma gacchasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16553: RV_9,067.20a eṣa tunno abhiṣṭutaḥ pavitram ati gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16555: RV_9,067.21a yad anti yac ca dūrake bhayaṃ vindati mām iha /
GV01rvh1-10u:16557: RV_9,067.22a pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16558: RV_9,067.22c yaḥ potā sa punātu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16559: RV_9,067.23a yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antar ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16561: RV_9,067.24a yat te pavitram arcivad agne tena punīhi naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16563: RV_9,067.25a ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:16565: RV_9,067.26a tribhiṣ ṭvaṃ deva savitar varṣiṣṭhaiḥ soma dhāmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16567: RV_9,067.27a punantu māṃ devajanāḥ punantu vasavo dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16568: RV_9,067.27c viśve devāḥ punīta mā jātavedaḥ punīhi mā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16569: RV_9,067.28a pra pyāyasva pra syandasva soma viśvebhir aṃśubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16571: RV_9,067.29a upa priyam panipnataṃ yuvānam āhutīvṛdham /
GV01rvh1-10u:16573: RV_9,067.30a alāyyasya paraśur nanāśa tam ā pavasva deva soma /
GV01rvh1-10u:16574: RV_9,067.30c ākhuṃ cid eva deva soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:16575: RV_9,067.31a yaḥ pāvamānīr adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16576: RV_9,067.31c sarvaṃ sa pūtam aśnāti svaditam mātariśvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16577: RV_9,067.32a pāvamānīr yo adhyety ṛṣibhiḥ sambhṛtaṃ rasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16578: RV_9,067.32c tasmai sarasvatī duhe kṣīraṃ sarpir madhūdakam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16579: RV_9,068.01a pra devam acchā madhumanta indavo 'siṣyadanta gāva ā na dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16580: RV_9,068.01c barhiṣado vacanāvanta ūdhabhiḥ parisrutam usriyā nirṇijaṃ dhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:16581: RV_9,068.02a sa roruvad abhi pūrvā acikradad upāruhaḥ śrathayan svādate hariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16582: RV_9,068.02c tiraḥ pavitram pariyann uru jrayo ni śaryāṇi dadhate deva ā varam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16583: RV_9,068.03a vi yo mame yamyā saṃyatī madaḥ sākaṃvṛdhā payasā pinvad akṣitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16584: RV_9,068.03c mahī apāre rajasī vivevidad abhivrajann akṣitam pāja ā dade //
GV01rvh1-10u:16585: RV_9,068.04a sa mātarā vicaran vājayann apaḥ pra medhiraḥ svadhayā pinvate padam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16586: RV_9,068.04c aṃśur yavena pipiśe yato nṛbhiḥ saṃ jāmibhir nasate rakṣate śiraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16587: RV_9,068.05a saṃ dakṣeṇa manasā jāyate kavir ṛtasya garbho nihito yamā paraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16588: RV_9,068.05c yūnā ha santā prathamaṃ vi jajñatur guhā hitaṃ janima nemam udyatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16589: RV_9,068.06a mandrasya rūpaṃ vividur manīṣiṇaḥ śyeno yad andho abharat parāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16590: RV_9,068.06c tam marjayanta suvṛdhaṃ nadīṣv āṃ uśantam aṃśum pariyantam ṛgmiyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16591: RV_9,068.07a tvām mṛjanti daśa yoṣaṇaḥ sutaṃ soma ṛṣibhir matibhir dhītibhir hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16592: RV_9,068.07c avyo vārebhir uta devahūtibhir nṛbhir yato vājam ā darṣi sātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:16593: RV_9,068.08a pariprayantaṃ vayyaṃ suṣaṃsadaṃ somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16594: RV_9,068.08c yo dhārayā madhumāṃ ūrmiṇā diva iyarti vācaṃ rayiṣāḷ amartyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16595: RV_9,068.09a ayaṃ diva iyarti viśvam ā rajaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16596: RV_9,068.09c adbhir gobhir mṛjyate adribhiḥ sutaḥ punāna indur varivo vidat priyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16597: RV_9,068.10a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāno vayo dadhac citratamam pavasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16598: RV_9,068.10c adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:16599: RV_9,069.01a iṣur na dhanvan prati dhīyate matir vatso na mātur upa sarjy ūdhani /
GV01rvh1-10u:16600: RV_9,069.01c urudhāreva duhe agra āyaty asya vrateṣv api soma iṣyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16601: RV_9,069.02a upo matiḥ pṛcyate sicyate madhu mandrājanī codate antar āsani /
GV01rvh1-10u:16602: RV_9,069.02c pavamānaḥ saṃtaniḥ praghnatām iva madhumān drapsaḥ pari vāram arṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16603: RV_9,069.03a avye vadhūyuḥ pavate pari tvaci śrathnīte naptīr aditer ṛtaṃ yate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16604: RV_9,069.03c harir akrān yajataḥ saṃyato mado nṛmṇā śiśāno mahiṣo na śobhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16605: RV_9,069.04a ukṣā mimāti prati yanti dhenavo devasya devīr upa yanti niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16606: RV_9,069.04c aty akramīd arjunaṃ vāram avyayam atkaṃ na niktam pari somo avyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16607: RV_9,069.05a amṛktena ruśatā vāsasā harir amartyo nirṇijānaḥ pari vyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16608: RV_9,069.05c divas pṛṣṭham barhaṇā nirṇije kṛtopastaraṇaṃ camvor nabhasmayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16609: RV_9,069.06a sūryasyeva raśmayo drāvayitnavo matsarāsaḥ prasupaḥ sākam īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16610: RV_9,069.06c tantuṃ tatam pari sargāsa āśavo nendrād ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:16611: RV_9,069.07a sindhor iva pravaṇe nimna āśavo vṛṣacyutā madāso gātum āśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:16612: RV_9,069.07c śaṃ no niveśe dvipade catuṣpade 'sme vājāḥ soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16613: RV_9,069.08a ā naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad aśvāvad gomad yavamat suvīryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16614: RV_9,069.08c yūyaṃ hi soma pitaro mama sthana divo mūrdhānaḥ prasthitā vayaskṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16615: RV_9,069.09a ete somāḥ pavamānāsa indraṃ rathā iva pra yayuḥ sātim accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:16616: RV_9,069.09c sutāḥ pavitram ati yanty avyaṃ hitvī vavriṃ harito vṛṣṭim accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:16617: RV_9,069.10a indav indrāya bṛhate pavasva sumṛḷīko anavadyo riśādāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16618: RV_9,069.10c bharā candrāṇi gṛṇate vasūni devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16619: RV_9,070.01a trir asmai sapta dhenavo duduhre satyām āśiram pūrvye vyomani /
GV01rvh1-10u:16620: RV_9,070.01c catvāry anyā bhuvanāni nirṇije cārūṇi cakre yad ṛtair avardhata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16621: RV_9,070.02a sa bhikṣamāṇo amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe dyāvā kāvyenā vi śaśrathe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16622: RV_9,070.02c tejiṣṭhā apo maṃhanā pari vyata yadī devasya śravasā sado viduḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16623: RV_9,070.03a te asya santu ketavo 'mṛtyavo 'dābhyāso januṣī ubhe anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:16624: RV_9,070.03c yebhir nṛmṇā ca devyā ca punata ād id rājānam mananā agṛbhṇata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16625: RV_9,070.04a sa mṛjyamāno daśabhiḥ sukarmabhiḥ pra madhyamāsu mātṛṣu prame sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16626: RV_9,070.04c vratāni pāno amṛtasya cāruṇa ubhe nṛcakṣā anu paśyate viśau //
GV01rvh1-10u:16627: RV_9,070.05a sa marmṛjāna indriyāya dhāyasa obhe antā rodasī harṣate hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16628: RV_9,070.05c vṛṣā śuṣmeṇa bādhate vi durmatīr ādediśānaḥ śaryaheva śurudhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16629: RV_9,070.06a sa mātarā na dadṛśāna usriyo nānadad eti marutām iva svanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16630: RV_9,070.06c jānann ṛtam prathamaṃ yat svarṇaram praśastaye kam avṛṇīta sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16631: RV_9,070.07a ruvati bhīmo vṛṣabhas taviṣyayā śṛṅge śiśāno hariṇī vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16632: RV_9,070.07c ā yoniṃ somaḥ sukṛtaṃ ni ṣīdati gavyayī tvag bhavati nirṇig avyayī //
GV01rvh1-10u:16633: RV_9,070.08a śuciḥ punānas tanvam arepasam avye harir ny adhāviṣṭa sānavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16634: RV_9,070.08c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave tridhātu madhu kriyate sukarmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16635: RV_9,070.09a pavasva soma devavītaye vṛṣendrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:16636: RV_9,070.09c purā no bādhād duritāti pāraya kṣetravid dhi diśa āhā vipṛcchate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16637: RV_9,070.10a hito na saptir abhi vājam arṣendrasyendo jaṭharam ā pavasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16638: RV_9,070.10c nāvā na sindhum ati parṣi vidvāñ chūro na yudhyann ava no nida spaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16639: RV_9,071.01a ā dakṣiṇā sṛjyate śuṣmy āsadaṃ veti druho rakṣasaḥ pāti jāgṛviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16640: RV_9,071.01c harir opaśaṃ kṛṇute nabhas paya upastire camvor brahma nirṇije //
GV01rvh1-10u:16641: RV_9,071.02a pra kṛṣṭiheva śūṣa eti roruvad asuryaṃ varṇaṃ ni riṇīte asya tam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16642: RV_9,071.02c jahāti vavrim pitur eti niṣkṛtam upaprutaṃ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ tanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16643: RV_9,071.03a adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavate gabhastyor vṛṣāyate nabhasā vepate matī /
GV01rvh1-10u:16644: RV_9,071.03c sa modate nasate sādhate girā nenikte apsu yajate parīmaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16645: RV_9,071.04a pari dyukṣaṃ sahasaḥ parvatāvṛdham madhvaḥ siñcanti harmyasya sakṣaṇim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16646: RV_9,071.04c ā yasmin gāvaḥ suhutāda ūdhani mūrdhañ chrīṇanty agriyaṃ varīmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16647: RV_9,071.05a sam ī rathaṃ na bhurijor aheṣata daśa svasāro aditer upastha ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16648: RV_9,071.05c jigād upa jrayati gor apīcyam padaṃ yad asya matuthā ajījanan //
GV01rvh1-10u:16649: RV_9,071.06a śyeno na yoniṃ sadanaṃ dhiyā kṛtaṃ hiraṇyayam āsadaṃ deva eṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16650: RV_9,071.06c e riṇanti barhiṣi priyaṃ girāśvo na devāṃ apy eti yajñiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16651: RV_9,071.07a parā vyakto aruṣo divaḥ kavir vṛṣā tripṛṣṭho anaviṣṭa gā abhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16652: RV_9,071.07c sahasraṇītir yatiḥ parāyatī rebho na pūrvīr uṣaso vi rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16653: RV_9,071.08a tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute varṇo asya sa yatrāśayat samṛtā sedhati sridhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16654: RV_9,071.08c apsā yāti svadhayā daivyaṃ janaṃ saṃ suṣṭutī nasate saṃ goagrayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16655: RV_9,071.09a ukṣeva yūthā pariyann arāvīd adhi tviṣīr adhita sūryasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16656: RV_9,071.09c divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣata kṣāṃ somaḥ pari kratunā paśyate jāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16657: RV_9,072.01a harim mṛjanty aruṣo na yujyate saṃ dhenubhiḥ kalaśe somo ajyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16658: RV_9,072.01c ud vācam īrayati hinvate matī puruṣṭutasya kati cit paripriyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16659: RV_9,072.02a sākaṃ vadanti bahavo manīṣiṇa indrasya somaṃ jaṭhare yad āduhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16660: RV_9,072.02c yadī mṛjanti sugabhastayo naraḥ sanīḷābhir daśabhiḥ kāmyam madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:16661: RV_9,072.03a aramamāṇo aty eti gā abhi sūryasya priyaṃ duhitus tiro ravam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16662: RV_9,072.03c anv asmai joṣam abharad vinaṅgṛsaḥ saṃ dvayībhiḥ svasṛbhiḥ kṣeti jāmibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16663: RV_9,072.04a nṛdhūto adriṣuto barhiṣi priyaḥ patir gavām pradiva indur ṛtviyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16664: RV_9,072.04c purandhivān manuṣo yajñasādhanaḥ śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te //
GV01rvh1-10u:16665: RV_9,072.05a nṛbāhubhyāṃ codito dhārayā suto 'nuṣvadham pavate soma indra te /
GV01rvh1-10u:16666: RV_9,072.05c āprāḥ kratūn sam ajair adhvare matīr ver na druṣac camvor āsadad dhariḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16667: RV_9,072.06a aṃśuṃ duhanti stanayantam akṣitaṃ kaviṃ kavayo 'paso manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16668: RV_9,072.06c sam ī gāvo matayo yanti saṃyata ṛtasya yonā sadane punarbhuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16669: RV_9,072.07a nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divo 'pām ūrmau sindhuṣv antar ukṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16670: RV_9,072.07c indrasya vajro vṛṣabho vibhūvasuḥ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16671: RV_9,072.08a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ raja stotre śikṣann ādhūnvate ca sukrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:16672: RV_9,072.08c mā no nir bhāg vasunaḥ sādanaspṛśo rayim piśaṅgam bahulaṃ vasīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16673: RV_9,072.09a ā tū na indo śatadātv aśvyaṃ sahasradātu paśumad dhiraṇyavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16674: RV_9,072.09c upa māsva bṛhatī revatīr iṣo 'dhi stotrasya pavamāna no gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16675: RV_9,073.01a srakve drapsasya dhamataḥ sam asvarann ṛtasya yonā sam aranta nābhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16676: RV_9,073.01c trīn sa mūrdhno asuraś cakra ārabhe satyasya nāvaḥ sukṛtam apīparan //
GV01rvh1-10u:16677: RV_9,073.02a samyak samyañco mahiṣā aheṣata sindhor ūrmāv adhi venā avīvipan /
GV01rvh1-10u:16678: RV_9,073.02c madhor dhārābhir janayanto arkam it priyām indrasya tanvam avīvṛdhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:16679: RV_9,073.03a pavitravantaḥ pari vācam āsate pitaiṣām pratno abhi rakṣati vratam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16680: RV_9,073.03c mahaḥ samudraṃ varuṇas tiro dadhe dhīrā ic chekur dharuṇeṣv ārabham //
GV01rvh1-10u:16681: RV_9,073.04a sahasradhāre 'va te sam asvaran divo nāke madhujihvā asaścataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16682: RV_9,073.04c asya spaśo na ni miṣanti bhūrṇayaḥ pade-pade pāśinaḥ santi setavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16683: RV_9,073.05a pitur mātur adhy ā ye samasvarann ṛcā śocantaḥ saṃdahanto avratān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16684: RV_9,073.05c indradviṣṭām apa dhamanti māyayā tvacam asiknīm bhūmano divas pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:16685: RV_9,073.06a pratnān mānād adhy ā ye samasvarañ chlokayantrāso rabhasasya mantavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16686: RV_9,073.06c apānakṣāso badhirā ahāsata ṛtasya panthāṃ na taranti duṣkṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16687: RV_9,073.07a sahasradhāre vitate pavitra ā vācam punanti kavayo manīṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16688: RV_9,073.07c rudrāsa eṣām iṣirāso adruha spaśaḥ svañcaḥ sudṛśo nṛcakṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16689: RV_9,073.08a ṛtasya gopā na dabhāya sukratus trī ṣa pavitrā hṛdy antar ā dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16690: RV_9,073.08c vidvān sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paśyaty avājuṣṭān vidhyati karte avratān //
GV01rvh1-10u:16691: RV_9,073.09a ṛtasya tantur vitataḥ pavitra ā jihvāyā agre varuṇasya māyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16692: RV_9,073.09c dhīrāś cit tat saminakṣanta āśatātrā kartam ava padāty aprabhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16693: RV_9,074.01a śiśur na jāto 'va cakradad vane svar yad vājy aruṣaḥ siṣāsati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16694: RV_9,074.01c divo retasā sacate payovṛdhā tam īmahe sumatī śarma saprathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16695: RV_9,074.02a divo ya skambho dharuṇaḥ svātata āpūrṇo aṃśuḥ paryeti viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16696: RV_9,074.02c seme mahī rodasī yakṣad āvṛtā samīcīne dādhāra sam iṣaḥ kaviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16697: RV_9,074.03a mahi psaraḥ sukṛtaṃ somyam madhūrvī gavyūtir aditer ṛtaṃ yate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16698: RV_9,074.03c īśe yo vṛṣṭer ita usriyo vṛṣāpāṃ netā ya itaūtir ṛgmiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16699: RV_9,074.04a ātmanvan nabho duhyate ghṛtam paya ṛtasya nābhir amṛtaṃ vi jāyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16700: RV_9,074.04c samīcīnāḥ sudānavaḥ prīṇanti taṃ naro hitam ava mehanti peravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16701: RV_9,074.05a arāvīd aṃśuḥ sacamāna ūrmiṇā devāvyam manuṣe pinvati tvacam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16702: RV_9,074.05c dadhāti garbham aditer upastha ā yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:16703: RV_9,074.06a sahasradhāre 'va tā asaścatas tṛtīye santu rajasi prajāvatīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16704: RV_9,074.06c catasro nābho nihitā avo divo havir bharanty amṛtaṃ ghṛtaścutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16705: RV_9,074.07a śvetaṃ rūpaṃ kṛṇute yat siṣāsati somo mīḍhvāṃ asuro veda bhūmanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16706: RV_9,074.07c dhiyā śamī sacate sem abhi pravad divas kavandham ava darṣad udriṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16707: RV_9,074.08a adha śvetaṃ kalaśaṃ gobhir aktaṃ kārṣmann ā vājy akramīt sasavān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16708: RV_9,074.08c ā hinvire manasā devayantaḥ kakṣīvate śatahimāya gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:16709: RV_9,074.09a adbhiḥ soma papṛcānasya te raso 'vyo vāraṃ vi pavamāna dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16710: RV_9,074.09c sa mṛjyamānaḥ kavibhir madintama svadasvendrāya pavamāna pītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:16711: RV_9,075.01a abhi priyāṇi pavate canohito nāmāni yahvo adhi yeṣu vardhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16712: RV_9,075.01c ā sūryasya bṛhato bṛhann adhi rathaṃ viṣvañcam aruhad vicakṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16713: RV_9,075.02a ṛtasya jihvā pavate madhu priyaṃ vaktā patir dhiyo asyā adābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16714: RV_9,075.02c dadhāti putraḥ pitror apīcyaṃ nāma tṛtīyam adhi rocane divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16715: RV_9,075.03a ava dyutānaḥ kalaśāṃ acikradan nṛbhir yemānaḥ kośa ā hiraṇyaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:16716: RV_9,075.03c abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣatādhi tripṛṣṭha uṣaso vi rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16717: RV_9,075.04a adribhiḥ suto matibhiś canohitaḥ prarocayan rodasī mātarā śuciḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16718: RV_9,075.04c romāṇy avyā samayā vi dhāvati madhor dhārā pinvamānā dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:16719: RV_9,075.05a pari soma pra dhanvā svastaye nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vāsayāśiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16720: RV_9,075.05c ye te madā āhanaso vihāyasas tebhir indraṃ codaya dātave magham //
GV01rvh1-10u:16721: RV_9,076.01a dhartā divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso dakṣo devānām anumādyo nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16722: RV_9,076.01c hariḥ sṛjāno atyo na satvabhir vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣv ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16723: RV_9,076.02a śūro na dhatta āyudhā gabhastyoḥ svaḥ siṣāsan rathiro gaviṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:16724: RV_9,076.02c indrasya śuṣmam īrayann apasyubhir indur hinvāno ajyate manīṣibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16725: RV_9,076.03a indrasya soma pavamāna ūrmiṇā taviṣyamāṇo jaṭhareṣv ā viśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:16726: RV_9,076.03c pra ṇaḥ pinva vidyud abhreva rodasī dhiyā na vājāṃ upa māsi śaśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16727: RV_9,076.04a viśvasya rājā pavate svardṛśa ṛtasya dhītim ṛṣiṣāḷ avīvaśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16728: RV_9,076.04c yaḥ sūryasyāsireṇa mṛjyate pitā matīnām asamaṣṭakāvyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16729: RV_9,076.05a vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣasy apām upasthe vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16730: RV_9,076.05c sa indrāya pavase matsarintamo yathā jeṣāma samithe tvotayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16731: RV_9,077.01a eṣa pra kośe madhumāṃ acikradad indrasya vajro vapuṣo vapuṣṭaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16732: RV_9,077.01c abhīm ṛtasya sudughā ghṛtaścuto vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16733: RV_9,077.02a sa pūrvyaḥ pavate yaṃ divas pari śyeno mathāyad iṣitas tiro rajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16734: RV_9,077.02c sa madhva ā yuvate vevijāna it kṛśānor astur manasāha bibhyuṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16735: RV_9,077.03a te naḥ pūrvāsa uparāsa indavo mahe vājāya dhanvantu gomate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16736: RV_9,077.03c īkṣeṇyāso ahyo na cāravo brahma-brahma ye jujuṣur havir-haviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16737: RV_9,077.04a ayaṃ no vidvān vanavad vanuṣyata induḥ satrācā manasā puruṣṭutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16738: RV_9,077.04c inasya yaḥ sadane garbham ādadhe gavām urubjam abhy arṣati vrajam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16739: RV_9,077.05a cakrir divaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso mahāṃ adabdho varuṇo hurug yate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16740: RV_9,077.05c asāvi mitro vṛjaneṣu yajñiyo 'tyo na yūthe vṛṣayuḥ kanikradat //
GV01rvh1-10u:16741: RV_9,078.01a pra rājā vācaṃ janayann asiṣyadad apo vasāno abhi gā iyakṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16742: RV_9,078.01c gṛbhṇāti ripram avir asya tānvā śuddho devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16743: RV_9,078.02a indrāya soma pari ṣicyase nṛbhir nṛcakṣā ūrmiḥ kavir ajyase vane /
GV01rvh1-10u:16744: RV_9,078.02c pūrvīr hi te srutayaḥ santi yātave sahasram aśvā harayaś camūṣadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16745: RV_9,078.03a samudriyā apsaraso manīṣiṇam āsīnā antar abhi somam akṣaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:16746: RV_9,078.03c tā īṃ hinvanti harmyasya sakṣaṇiṃ yācante sumnam pavamānam akṣitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16747: RV_9,078.04a gojin naḥ somo rathajid dhiraṇyajit svarjid abjit pavate sahasrajit /
GV01rvh1-10u:16748: RV_9,078.04c yaṃ devāsaś cakrire pītaye madaṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ drapsam aruṇam mayobhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16749: RV_9,078.05a etāni soma pavamāno asmayuḥ satyāni kṛṇvan draviṇāny arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16750: RV_9,078.05c jahi śatrum antike dūrake ca ya urvīṃ gavyūtim abhayaṃ ca nas kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16751: RV_9,079.01a acodaso no dhanvantv indavaḥ pra suvānāso bṛhaddiveṣu harayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16752: RV_9,079.01c vi ca naśan na iṣo arātayo 'ryo naśanta saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16753: RV_9,079.02a pra ṇo dhanvantv indavo madacyuto dhanā vā yebhir arvato junīmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16754: RV_9,079.02c tiro martasya kasya cit parihvṛtiṃ vayaṃ dhanāni viśvadhā bharemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16755: RV_9,079.03a uta svasyā arātyā arir hi ṣa utānyasyā arātyā vṛko hi ṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16756: RV_9,079.03c dhanvan na tṛṣṇā sam arīta tāṃ abhi soma jahi pavamāna durādhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16757: RV_9,079.04a divi te nābhā paramo ya ādade pṛthivyās te ruruhuḥ sānavi kṣipaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16758: RV_9,079.04c adrayas tvā bapsati gor adhi tvacy apsu tvā hastair duduhur manīṣiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16759: RV_9,079.05a evā ta indo subhvaṃ supeśasaṃ rasaṃ tuñjanti prathamā abhiśriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16760: RV_9,079.05c nidaṃ-nidam pavamāna ni tāriṣa āvis te śuṣmo bhavatu priyo madaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16761: RV_9,080.01a somasya dhārā pavate nṛcakṣasa ṛtena devān havate divas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:16762: RV_9,080.01c bṛhaspate ravathenā vi didyute samudrāso na savanāni vivyacuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16763: RV_9,080.02a yaṃ tvā vājinn aghnyā abhy anūṣatāyohataṃ yonim ā rohasi dyumān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16764: RV_9,080.02c maghonām āyuḥ pratiran mahi śrava indrāya soma pavase vṛṣā madaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16765: RV_9,080.03a endrasya kukṣā pavate madintama ūrjaṃ vasānaḥ śravase sumaṅgalaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16766: RV_9,080.03c pratyaṅ sa viśvā bhuvanābhi paprathe krīḷan harir atyaḥ syandate vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16767: RV_9,080.04a taṃ tvā devebhyo madhumattamaṃ naraḥ sahasradhāraṃ duhate daśa kṣipaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16768: RV_9,080.04c nṛbhiḥ soma pracyuto grāvabhiḥ suto viśvān devāṃ ā pavasvā sahasrajit //
GV01rvh1-10u:16769: RV_9,080.05a taṃ tvā hastino madhumantam adribhir duhanty apsu vṛṣabhaṃ daśa kṣipaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16770: RV_9,080.05c indraṃ soma mādayan daivyaṃ janaṃ sindhor ivormiḥ pavamāno arṣasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16771: RV_9,081.01a pra somasya pavamānasyormaya indrasya yanti jaṭharaṃ supeśasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16772: RV_9,081.01c dadhnā yad īm unnītā yaśasā gavāṃ dānāya śūram udamandiṣuḥ sutāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16773: RV_9,081.02a acchā hi somaḥ kalaśāṃ asiṣyadad atyo na voḷhā raghuvartanir vṛṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16774: RV_9,081.02c athā devānām ubhayasya janmano vidvāṃ aśnoty amuta itaś ca yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:16775: RV_9,081.03a ā naḥ soma pavamānaḥ kirā vasv indo bhava maghavā rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16776: RV_9,081.03c śikṣā vayodho vasave su cetunā mā no gayam āre asmat parā sicaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16777: RV_9,081.04a ā naḥ pūṣā pavamānaḥ surātayo mitro gacchantu varuṇaḥ sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16778: RV_9,081.04c bṛhaspatir maruto vāyur aśvinā tvaṣṭā savitā suyamā sarasvatī //
GV01rvh1-10u:16779: RV_9,081.05a ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaminve aryamā devo aditir vidhātā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16780: RV_9,081.05c bhago nṛśaṃsa urv antarikṣaṃ viśve devāḥ pavamānaṃ juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:16781: RV_9,082.01a asāvi somo aruṣo vṛṣā harī rājeva dasmo abhi gā acikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16782: RV_9,082.01c punāno vāram pary ety avyayaṃ śyeno na yoniṃ ghṛtavantam āsadam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16783: RV_9,082.02a kavir vedhasyā pary eṣi māhinam atyo na mṛṣṭo abhi vājam arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16784: RV_9,082.02c apasedhan duritā soma mṛḷaya ghṛtaṃ vasānaḥ pari yāsi nirṇijam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16785: RV_9,082.03a parjanyaḥ pitā mahiṣasya parṇino nābhā pṛthivyā giriṣu kṣayaṃ dadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16786: RV_9,082.03c svasāra āpo abhi gā utāsaran saṃ grāvabhir nasate vīte adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:16787: RV_9,082.04a jāyeva patyāv adhi śeva maṃhase pajrāyā garbha śṛṇuhi bravīmi te /
GV01rvh1-10u:16788: RV_9,082.04c antar vāṇīṣu pra carā su jīvase 'nindyo vṛjane soma jāgṛhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16789: RV_9,082.05a yathā pūrvebhyaḥ śatasā amṛdhraḥ sahasrasāḥ paryayā vājam indo /
GV01rvh1-10u:16790: RV_9,082.05c evā pavasva suvitāya navyase tava vratam anv āpaḥ sacante //
GV01rvh1-10u:16791: RV_9,083.01a pavitraṃ te vitatam brahmaṇas pate prabhur gātrāṇi pary eṣi viśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16792: RV_9,083.01c ataptatanūr na tad āmo aśnute śṛtāsa id vahantas tat sam āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16793: RV_9,083.02a tapoṣ pavitraṃ vitataṃ divas pade śocanto asya tantavo vy asthiran /
GV01rvh1-10u:16794: RV_9,083.02c avanty asya pavītāram āśavo divas pṛṣṭham adhi tiṣṭhanti cetasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16795: RV_9,083.03a arūrucad uṣasaḥ pṛśnir agriya ukṣā bibharti bhuvanāni vājayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16796: RV_9,083.03c māyāvino mamire asya māyayā nṛcakṣasaḥ pitaro garbham ā dadhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16797: RV_9,083.04a gandharva itthā padam asya rakṣati pāti devānāṃ janimāny adbhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16798: RV_9,083.04c gṛbhṇāti ripuṃ nidhayā nidhāpatiḥ sukṛttamā madhuno bhakṣam āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16799: RV_9,083.05a havir haviṣmo mahi sadma daivyaṃ nabho vasānaḥ pari yāsy adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16800: RV_9,083.05c rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhaḥ sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayasi śravo bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:16801: RV_9,084.01a pavasva devamādano vicarṣaṇir apsā indrāya varuṇāya vāyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16802: RV_9,084.01c kṛdhī no adya varivaḥ svastimad urukṣitau gṛṇīhi daivyaṃ janam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16803: RV_9,084.02a ā yas tasthau bhuvanāny amartyo viśvāni somaḥ pari tāny arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16804: RV_9,084.02c kṛṇvan saṃcṛtaṃ vicṛtam abhiṣṭaya induḥ siṣakty uṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16805: RV_9,084.03a ā yo gobhiḥ sṛjyata oṣadhīṣv ā devānāṃ sumna iṣayann upāvasuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16806: RV_9,084.03c ā vidyutā pavate dhārayā suta indraṃ somo mādayan daivyaṃ janam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16807: RV_9,084.04a eṣa sya somaḥ pavate sahasrajid dhinvāno vācam iṣirām uṣarbudham /
GV01rvh1-10u:16808: RV_9,084.04c induḥ samudram ud iyarti vāyubhir endrasya hārdi kalaśeṣu sīdati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16809: RV_9,084.05a abhi tyaṃ gāvaḥ payasā payovṛdhaṃ somaṃ śrīṇanti matibhiḥ svarvidam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16810: RV_9,084.05c dhanañjayaḥ pavate kṛtvyo raso vipraḥ kaviḥ kāvyenā svarcanāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16811: RV_9,085.01a indrāya soma suṣutaḥ pari sravāpāmīvā bhavatu rakṣasā saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:16812: RV_9,085.01c mā te rasasya matsata dvayāvino draviṇasvanta iha santv indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16813: RV_9,085.02a asmān samarye pavamāna codaya dakṣo devānām asi hi priyo madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16814: RV_9,085.02c jahi śatrūṃr abhy ā bhandanāyataḥ pibendra somam ava no mṛdho jahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16815: RV_9,085.03a adabdha indo pavase madintama ātmendrasya bhavasi dhāsir uttamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16816: RV_9,085.03c abhi svaranti bahavo manīṣiṇo rājānam asya bhuvanasya niṃsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16817: RV_9,085.04a sahasraṇīthaḥ śatadhāro adbhuta indrāyenduḥ pavate kāmyam madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:16818: RV_9,085.04c jayan kṣetram abhy arṣā jayann apa uruṃ no gātuṃ kṛṇu soma mīḍhvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16819: RV_9,085.05a kanikradat kalaśe gobhir ajyase vy avyayaṃ samayā vāram arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16820: RV_9,085.05c marmṛjyamāno atyo na sānasir indrasya soma jaṭhare sam akṣaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16821: RV_9,085.06a svāduḥ pavasva divyāya janmane svādur indrāya suhavītunāmne /
GV01rvh1-10u:16822: RV_9,085.06c svādur mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave bṛhaspataye madhumāṃ adābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16823: RV_9,085.07a atyam mṛjanti kalaśe daśa kṣipaḥ pra viprāṇām matayo vāca īrate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16824: RV_9,085.07c pavamānā abhy arṣanti suṣṭutim endraṃ viśanti madirāsa indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16825: RV_9,085.08a pavamāno abhy arṣā suvīryam urvīṃ gavyūtim mahi śarma saprathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16826: RV_9,085.08c mākir no asya pariṣūtir īśatendo jayema tvayā dhanaṃ-dhanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16827: RV_9,085.09a adhi dyām asthād vṛṣabho vicakṣaṇo 'rūrucad vi divo rocanā kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16828: RV_9,085.09c rājā pavitram aty eti roruvad divaḥ pīyūṣaṃ duhate nṛcakṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16829: RV_9,085.10a divo nāke madhujihvā asaścato venā duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16830: RV_9,085.10c apsu drapsaṃ vāvṛdhānaṃ samudra ā sindhor ūrmā madhumantam pavitra ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16831: RV_9,085.11a nāke suparṇam upapaptivāṃsaṃ giro venānām akṛpanta pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16832: RV_9,085.11c śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ hiraṇyayaṃ śakunaṃ kṣāmaṇi sthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:16833: RV_9,085.12a ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthād viśvā rūpā praticakṣāṇo asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16834: RV_9,085.12c bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā vy adyaut prārūrucad rodasī mātarā śuciḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16835: RV_9,086.01a pra ta āśavaḥ pavamāna dhījavo madā arṣanti raghujā iva tmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16836: RV_9,086.01c divyāḥ suparṇā madhumanta indavo madintamāsaḥ pari kośam āsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16837: RV_9,086.02a pra te madāso madirāsa āśavo 'sṛkṣata rathyāso yathā pṛthak /
GV01rvh1-10u:16838: RV_9,086.02c dhenur na vatsam payasābhi vajriṇam indram indavo madhumanta ūrmayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16839: RV_9,086.03a atyo na hiyāno abhi vājam arṣa svarvit kośaṃ divo adrimātaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16840: RV_9,086.03c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avyaye somaḥ punāna indriyāya dhāyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:16841: RV_9,086.04a pra ta āśvinīḥ pavamāna dhījuvo divyā asṛgran payasā dharīmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16842: RV_9,086.04c prāntar ṛṣaya sthāvirīr asṛkṣata ye tvā mṛjanty ṛṣiṣāṇa vedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16843: RV_9,086.05a viśvā dhāmāni viśvacakṣa ṛbhvasaḥ prabhos te sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16844: RV_9,086.05c vyānaśiḥ pavase soma dharmabhiḥ patir viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16845: RV_9,086.06a ubhayataḥ pavamānasya raśmayo dhruvasya sataḥ pari yanti ketavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16846: RV_9,086.06c yadī pavitre adhi mṛjyate hariḥ sattā ni yonā kalaśeṣu sīdati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16847: RV_9,086.07a yajñasya ketuḥ pavate svadhvaraḥ somo devānām upa yāti niṣkṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16848: RV_9,086.07c sahasradhāraḥ pari kośam arṣati vṛṣā pavitram aty eti roruvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:16849: RV_9,086.08a rājā samudraṃ nadyo vi gāhate 'pām ūrmiṃ sacate sindhuṣu śritaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16850: RV_9,086.08c adhy asthāt sānu pavamāno avyayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā dharuṇo maho divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16851: RV_9,086.09a divo na sānu stanayann acikradad dyauś ca yasya pṛthivī ca dharmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16852: RV_9,086.09c indrasya sakhyam pavate vivevidat somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sīdati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16853: RV_9,086.10a jyotir yajñasya pavate madhu priyam pitā devānāṃ janitā vibhūvasuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16854: RV_9,086.10c dadhāti ratnaṃ svadhayor apīcyam madintamo matsara indriyo rasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16855: RV_9,086.11a abhikrandan kalaśaṃ vājy arṣati patir divaḥ śatadhāro vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16856: RV_9,086.11c harir mitrasya sadaneṣu sīdati marmṛjāno 'vibhiḥ sindhubhir vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16857: RV_9,086.12a agre sindhūnām pavamāno arṣaty agre vāco agriyo goṣu gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16858: RV_9,086.12c agre vājasya bhajate mahādhanaṃ svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyate vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16859: RV_9,086.13a ayam matavāñ chakuno yathā hito 'vye sasāra pavamāna ūrmiṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16860: RV_9,086.13c tava kratvā rodasī antarā kave śucir dhiyā pavate soma indra te //
GV01rvh1-10u:16861: RV_9,086.14a drāpiṃ vasāno yajato divispṛśam antarikṣaprā bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16862: RV_9,086.14c svar jajñāno nabhasābhy akramīt pratnam asya pitaram ā vivāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16863: RV_9,086.15a so asya viśe mahi śarma yacchati yo asya dhāma prathamaṃ vyānaśe /
GV01rvh1-10u:16864: RV_9,086.15c padaṃ yad asya parame vyomany ato viśvā abhi saṃ yāti saṃyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16865: RV_9,086.16a pro ayāsīd indur indrasya niṣkṛtaṃ sakhā sakhyur na pra mināti saṃgiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:16866: RV_9,086.16c marya iva yuvatibhiḥ sam arṣati somaḥ kalaśe śatayāmnā pathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16867: RV_9,086.17a pra vo dhiyo mandrayuvo vipanyuvaḥ panasyuvaḥ saṃvasaneṣv akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16868: RV_9,086.17c somam manīṣā abhy anūṣata stubho 'bhi dhenavaḥ payasem aśiśrayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16869: RV_9,086.18a ā naḥ soma saṃyatam pipyuṣīm iṣam indo pavasva pavamāno asridham /
GV01rvh1-10u:16870: RV_9,086.18c yā no dohate trir ahann asaścuṣī kṣumad vājavan madhumat suvīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16871: RV_9,086.19a vṛṣā matīnām pavate vicakṣaṇaḥ somo ahnaḥ pratarītoṣaso divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16872: RV_9,086.19c krāṇā sindhūnāṃ kalaśāṃ avīvaśad indrasya hārdy āviśan manīṣibhiḥ //
