GV01rvh1-10u:16873: RV_9,086.20a manīṣibhiḥ pavate pūrvyaḥ kavir nṛbhir yataḥ pari kośāṃ acikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16874: RV_9,086.20c tritasya nāma janayan madhu kṣarad indrasya vāyoḥ sakhyāya kartave //
GV01rvh1-10u:16875: RV_9,086.21a ayam punāna uṣaso vi rocayad ayaṃ sindhubhyo abhavad u lokakṛt /
GV01rvh1-10u:16876: RV_9,086.21c ayaṃ triḥ sapta duduhāna āśiraṃ somo hṛde pavate cāru matsaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16877: RV_9,086.22a pavasva soma divyeṣu dhāmasu sṛjāna indo kalaśe pavitra ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16878: RV_9,086.22c sīdann indrasya jaṭhare kanikradan nṛbhir yataḥ sūryam ārohayo divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16879: RV_9,086.23a adribhiḥ sutaḥ pavase pavitra āṃ indav indrasya jaṭhareṣv āviśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:16880: RV_9,086.23c tvaṃ nṛcakṣā abhavo vicakṣaṇa soma gotram aṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇor apa //
GV01rvh1-10u:16881: RV_9,086.24a tvāṃ soma pavamānaṃ svādhyo 'nu viprāso amadann avasyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16882: RV_9,086.24c tvāṃ suparṇa ābharad divas parīndo viśvābhir matibhiḥ pariṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16883: RV_9,086.25a avye punānam pari vāra ūrmiṇā hariṃ navante abhi sapta dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16884: RV_9,086.25c apām upasthe adhy āyavaḥ kavim ṛtasya yonā mahiṣā aheṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:16885: RV_9,086.26a induḥ punāno ati gāhate mṛdho viśvāni kṛṇvan supathāni yajyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:16886: RV_9,086.26c gāḥ kṛṇvāno nirṇijaṃ haryataḥ kavir atyo na krīḷan pari vāram arṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:16887: RV_9,086.27a asaścataḥ śatadhārā abhiśriyo hariṃ navante 'va tā udanyuvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16888: RV_9,086.27c kṣipo mṛjanti pari gobhir āvṛtaṃ tṛtīye pṛṣṭhe adhi rocane divaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16889: RV_9,086.28a tavemāḥ prajā divyasya retasas tvaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16890: RV_9,086.28c athedaṃ viśvam pavamāna te vaśe tvam indo prathamo dhāmadhā asi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16891: RV_9,086.29a tvaṃ samudro asi viśvavit kave tavemāḥ pañca pradiśo vidharmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16892: RV_9,086.29c tvaṃ dyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe tava jyotīṃṣi pavamāna sūryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16893: RV_9,086.30a tvam pavitre rajaso vidharmaṇi devebhyaḥ soma pavamāna pūyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:16894: RV_9,086.30c tvām uśijaḥ prathamā agṛbhṇata tubhyemā viśvā bhuvanāni yemire //
GV01rvh1-10u:16895: RV_9,086.31a pra rebha ety ati vāram avyayaṃ vṛṣā vaneṣv ava cakradad dhariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16896: RV_9,086.31c saṃ dhītayo vāvaśānā anūṣata śiśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16897: RV_9,086.32a sa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ pari vyata tantuṃ tanvānas trivṛtaṃ yathā vide /
GV01rvh1-10u:16898: RV_9,086.32c nayann ṛtasya praśiṣo navīyasīḥ patir janīnām upa yāti niṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16899: RV_9,086.33a rājā sindhūnām pavate patir diva ṛtasya yāti pathibhiḥ kanikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:16900: RV_9,086.33c sahasradhāraḥ pari ṣicyate hariḥ punāno vācaṃ janayann upāvasuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16901: RV_9,086.34a pavamāna mahy arṇo vi dhāvasi sūro na citro avyayāni pavyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16902: RV_9,086.34c gabhastipūto nṛbhir adribhiḥ suto mahe vājāya dhanyāya dhanvasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16903: RV_9,086.35a iṣam ūrjam pavamānābhy arṣasi śyeno na vaṃsu kalaśeṣu sīdasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16904: RV_9,086.35c indrāya madvā madyo madaḥ suto divo viṣṭambha upamo vicakṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16905: RV_9,086.36a sapta svasāro abhi mātaraḥ śiśuṃ navaṃ jajñānaṃ jenyaṃ vipaścitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16906: RV_9,086.36c apāṃ gandharvaṃ divyaṃ nṛcakṣasaṃ somaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya rājase //
GV01rvh1-10u:16907: RV_9,086.37a īśāna imā bhuvanāni vīyase yujāna indo haritaḥ suparṇyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16908: RV_9,086.37c tās te kṣarantu madhumad ghṛtam payas tava vrate soma tiṣṭhantu kṛṣṭayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16909: RV_9,086.38a tvaṃ nṛcakṣā asi soma viśvataḥ pavamāna vṛṣabha tā vi dhāvasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16910: RV_9,086.38c sa naḥ pavasva vasumad dhiraṇyavad vayaṃ syāma bhuvaneṣu jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:16911: RV_9,086.39a govit pavasva vasuvid dhiraṇyavid retodhā indo bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16912: RV_9,086.39c tvaṃ suvīro asi soma viśvavit taṃ tvā viprā upa girema āsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16913: RV_9,086.40a un madhva ūrmir vananā atiṣṭhipad apo vasāno mahiṣo vi gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16914: RV_9,086.40c rājā pavitraratho vājam āruhat sahasrabhṛṣṭir jayati śravo bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:16915: RV_9,086.41a sa bhandanā ud iyarti prajāvatīr viśvāyur viśvāḥ subharā ahardivi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16916: RV_9,086.41c brahma prajāvad rayim aśvapastyam pīta indav indram asmabhyaṃ yācatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:16917: RV_9,086.42a so agre ahnāṃ harir haryato madaḥ pra cetasā cetayate anu dyubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16918: RV_9,086.42c dvā janā yātayann antar īyate narā ca śaṃsaṃ daivyaṃ ca dhartari //
GV01rvh1-10u:16919: RV_9,086.43a añjate vy añjate sam añjate kratuṃ rihanti madhunābhy añjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:16920: RV_9,086.43c sindhor ucchvāse patayantam ukṣaṇaṃ hiraṇyapāvāḥ paśum āsu gṛbhṇate //
GV01rvh1-10u:16921: RV_9,086.44a vipaścite pavamānāya gāyata mahī na dhārāty andho arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16922: RV_9,086.44c ahir na jūrṇām ati sarpati tvacam atyo na krīḷann asarad vṛṣā hariḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16923: RV_9,086.45a agrego rājāpyas taviṣyate vimāno ahnām bhuvaneṣv arpitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16924: RV_9,086.45c harir ghṛtasnuḥ sudṛśīko arṇavo jyotīrathaḥ pavate rāya okyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16925: RV_9,086.46a asarji skambho diva udyato madaḥ pari tridhātur bhuvanāny arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:16926: RV_9,086.46c aṃśuṃ rihanti matayaḥ panipnataṃ girā yadi nirṇijam ṛgmiṇo yayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16927: RV_9,086.47a pra te dhārā aty aṇvāni meṣyaḥ punānasya saṃyato yanti raṃhayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16928: RV_9,086.47c yad gobhir indo camvoḥ samajyasa ā suvānaḥ soma kalaśeṣu sīdasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16929: RV_9,086.48a pavasva soma kratuvin na ukthyo 'vyo vāre pari dhāva madhu priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16930: RV_9,086.48c jahi viśvān rakṣasa indo atriṇo bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16931: RV_9,087.01a pra tu drava pari kośaṃ ni ṣīda nṛbhiḥ punāno abhi vājam arṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:16932: RV_9,087.01c aśvaṃ na tvā vājinam marjayanto 'cchā barhī raśanābhir nayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:16933: RV_9,087.02a svāyudhaḥ pavate deva indur aśastihā vṛjanaṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16934: RV_9,087.02c pitā devānāṃ janitā sudakṣo viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16935: RV_9,087.03a ṛṣir vipraḥ puraetā janānām ṛbhur dhīra uśanā kāvyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:16936: RV_9,087.03c sa cid viveda nihitaṃ yad āsām apīcyaṃ guhyaṃ nāma gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:16937: RV_9,087.04a eṣa sya te madhumāṃ indra somo vṛṣā vṛṣṇe pari pavitre akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16938: RV_9,087.04c sahasrasāḥ śatasā bhūridāvā śaśvattamam barhir ā vājy asthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:16939: RV_9,087.05a ete somā abhi gavyā sahasrā mahe vājāyāmṛtāya śravāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16940: RV_9,087.05c pavitrebhiḥ pavamānā asṛgrañ chravasyavo na pṛtanājo atyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16941: RV_9,087.06a pari hi ṣmā puruhūto janānāṃ viśvāsarad bhojanā pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16942: RV_9,087.06c athā bhara śyenabhṛta prayāṃsi rayiṃ tuñjāno abhi vājam arṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:16943: RV_9,087.07a eṣa suvānaḥ pari somaḥ pavitre sargo na sṛṣṭo adadhāvad arvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:16944: RV_9,087.07c tigme śiśāno mahiṣo na śṛṅge gā gavyann abhi śūro na satvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16945: RV_9,087.08a eṣā yayau paramād antar adreḥ kūcit satīr ūrve gā viveda /
GV01rvh1-10u:16946: RV_9,087.08c divo na vidyut stanayanty abhraiḥ somasya te pavata indra dhārā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16947: RV_9,087.09a uta sma rāśim pari yāsi gonām indreṇa soma saratham punānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16948: RV_9,087.09c pūrvīr iṣo bṛhatīr jīradāno śikṣā śacīvas tava tā upaṣṭut //
GV01rvh1-10u:16949: RV_9,088.01a ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunve tubhyam pavate tvam asya pāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:16950: RV_9,088.01c tvaṃ ha yaṃ cakṛṣe tvaṃ vavṛṣa indum madāya yujyāya somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:16951: RV_9,088.02a sa īṃ ratho na bhuriṣāḷ ayoji mahaḥ purūṇi sātaye vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:16952: RV_9,088.02c ād īṃ viśvā nahuṣyāṇi jātā svarṣātā vana ūrdhvā navanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:16953: RV_9,088.03a vāyur na yo niyutvāṃ iṣṭayāmā nāsatyeva hava ā śambhaviṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16954: RV_9,088.03c viśvavāro draviṇodā iva tman pūṣeva dhījavano 'si soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:16955: RV_9,088.04a indro na yo mahā karmāṇi cakrir hantā vṛtrāṇām asi soma pūrbhit /
GV01rvh1-10u:16956: RV_9,088.04c paidvo na hi tvam ahināmnāṃ hantā viśvasyāsi soma dasyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16957: RV_9,088.05a agnir na yo vana ā sṛjyamāno vṛthā pājāṃsi kṛṇute nadīṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:16958: RV_9,088.05c jano na yudhvā mahata upabdir iyarti somaḥ pavamāna ūrmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:16959: RV_9,088.06a ete somā ati vārāṇy avyā divyā na kośāso abhravarṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16960: RV_9,088.06c vṛthā samudraṃ sindhavo na nīcīḥ sutāso abhi kalaśāṃ asṛgran //
GV01rvh1-10u:16961: RV_9,088.07a śuṣmī śardho na mārutam pavasvānabhiśastā divyā yathā viṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16962: RV_9,088.07c āpo na makṣū sumatir bhavā naḥ sahasrāpsāḥ pṛtanāṣāṇ na yajñaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16963: RV_9,088.08a rājño nu te varuṇasya vratāni bṛhad gabhīraṃ tava soma dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:16964: RV_9,088.08c śuciṣ ṭvam asi priyo na mitro dakṣāyyo aryamevāsi soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:16965: RV_9,089.01a pro sya vahniḥ pathyābhir asyān divo na vṛṣṭiḥ pavamāno akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16966: RV_9,089.01c sahasradhāro asadan ny asme mātur upasthe vana ā ca somaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16967: RV_9,089.02a rājā sindhūnām avasiṣṭa vāsa ṛtasya nāvam āruhad rajiṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:16968: RV_9,089.02c apsu drapso vāvṛdhe śyenajūto duha īm pitā duha īm pitur jām //
GV01rvh1-10u:16969: RV_9,089.03a siṃhaṃ nasanta madhvo ayāsaṃ harim aruṣaṃ divo asya patim /
GV01rvh1-10u:16970: RV_9,089.03c śūro yutsu prathamaḥ pṛcchate gā asya cakṣasā pari pāty ukṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:16971: RV_9,089.04a madhupṛṣṭhaṃ ghoram ayāsam aśvaṃ rathe yuñjanty urucakra ṛṣvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:16972: RV_9,089.04c svasāra īṃ jāmayo marjayanti sanābhayo vājinam ūrjayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:16973: RV_9,089.05a catasra īṃ ghṛtaduhaḥ sacante samāne antar dharuṇe niṣattāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16974: RV_9,089.05c tā īm arṣanti namasā punānās tā īṃ viśvataḥ pari ṣanti pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16975: RV_9,089.06a viṣṭambho divo dharuṇaḥ pṛthivyā viśvā uta kṣitayo haste asya /
GV01rvh1-10u:16976: RV_9,089.06c asat ta utso gṛṇate niyutvān madhvo aṃśuḥ pavata indriyāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:16977: RV_9,089.07a vanvann avāto abhi devavītim indrāya soma vṛtrahā pavasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16978: RV_9,089.07c śagdhi mahaḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:16979: RV_9,090.01a pra hinvāno janitā rodasyo ratho na vājaṃ saniṣyann ayāsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:16980: RV_9,090.01c indraṃ gacchann āyudhā saṃśiśāno viśvā vasu hastayor ādadhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16981: RV_9,090.02a abhi tripṛṣṭhaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vayodhām āṅgūṣāṇām avāvaśanta vāṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16982: RV_9,090.02c vanā vasāno varuṇo na sindhūn vi ratnadhā dayate vāryāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:16983: RV_9,090.03a śūragrāmaḥ sarvavīraḥ sahāvāñ jetā pavasva sanitā dhanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:16984: RV_9,090.03c tigmāyudhaḥ kṣipradhanvā samatsv aṣāḷhaḥ sāhvān pṛtanāsu śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:16985: RV_9,090.04a urugavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvan samīcīne ā pavasvā purandhī /
GV01rvh1-10u:16986: RV_9,090.04c apaḥ siṣāsann uṣasaḥ svar gāḥ saṃ cikrado maho asmabhyaṃ vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:16987: RV_9,090.05a matsi soma varuṇam matsi mitram matsīndram indo pavamāna viṣṇum /
GV01rvh1-10u:16988: RV_9,090.05c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi mahām indram indo madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:16989: RV_9,090.06a evā rājeva kratumāṃ amena viśvā ghanighnad duritā pavasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:16990: RV_9,090.06c indo sūktāya vacase vayo dhā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16991: RV_9,091.01a asarji vakvā rathye yathājau dhiyā manotā prathamo manīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:16992: RV_9,091.01c daśa svasāro adhi sāno avye 'janti vahniṃ sadanāny accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:16993: RV_9,091.02a vītī janasya divyasya kavyair adhi suvāno nahuṣyebhir induḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16994: RV_9,091.02c pra yo nṛbhir amṛto martyebhir marmṛjāno 'vibhir gobhir adbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:16995: RV_9,091.03a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe roruvad aṃśur asmai pavamāno ruśad īrte payo goḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:16996: RV_9,091.03c sahasram ṛkvā pathibhir vacovid adhvasmabhiḥ sūro aṇvaṃ vi yāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:16997: RV_9,091.04a rujā dṛḷhā cid rakṣasaḥ sadāṃsi punāna inda ūrṇuhi vi vājān /
GV01rvh1-10u:16998: RV_9,091.04c vṛścopariṣṭāt tujatā vadhena ye anti dūrād upanāyam eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:16999: RV_9,091.05a sa pratnavan navyase viśvavāra sūktāya pathaḥ kṛṇuhi prācaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17000: RV_9,091.05c ye duḥṣahāso vanuṣā bṛhantas tāṃs te aśyāma purukṛt purukṣo //
GV01rvh1-10u:17001: RV_9,091.06a evā punāno apaḥ svar gā asmabhyaṃ tokā tanayāni bhūri /
GV01rvh1-10u:17002: RV_9,091.06c śaṃ naḥ kṣetram uru jyotīṃṣi soma jyoṅ naḥ sūryaṃ dṛśaye rirīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17003: RV_9,092.01a pari suvāno harir aṃśuḥ pavitre ratho na sarji sanaye hiyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17004: RV_9,092.01c āpac chlokam indriyam pūyamānaḥ prati devāṃ ajuṣata prayobhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17005: RV_9,092.02a acchā nṛcakṣā asarat pavitre nāma dadhānaḥ kavir asya yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17006: RV_9,092.02c sīdan hoteva sadane camūṣūpem agmann ṛṣayaḥ sapta viprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17007: RV_9,092.03a pra sumedhā gātuvid viśvadevaḥ somaḥ punānaḥ sada eti nityam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17008: RV_9,092.03c bhuvad viśveṣu kāvyeṣu rantānu janān yatate pañca dhīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17009: RV_9,092.04a tava tye soma pavamāna niṇye viśve devās traya ekādaśāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17010: RV_9,092.04c daśa svadhābhir adhi sāno avye mṛjanti tvā nadyaḥ sapta yahvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17011: RV_9,092.05a tan nu satyam pavamānasyāstu yatra viśve kāravaḥ saṃnasanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:17012: RV_9,092.05c jyotir yad ahne akṛṇod u lokam prāvan manuṃ dasyave kar abhīkam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17013: RV_9,092.06a pari sadmeva paśumānti hotā rājā na satyaḥ samitīr iyānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17014: RV_9,092.06c somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśāṃ ayāsīt sīdan mṛgo na mahiṣo vaneṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17015: RV_9,093.01a sākamukṣo marjayanta svasāro daśa dhīrasya dhītayo dhanutrīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17016: RV_9,093.01c hariḥ pary adravaj jāḥ sūryasya droṇaṃ nanakṣe atyo na vājī //
GV01rvh1-10u:17017: RV_9,093.02a sam mātṛbhir na śiśur vāvaśāno vṛṣā dadhanve puruvāro adbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17018: RV_9,093.02c maryo na yoṣām abhi niṣkṛtaṃ yan saṃ gacchate kalaśa usriyābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17019: RV_9,093.03a uta pra pipya ūdhar aghnyāyā indur dhārābhiḥ sacate sumedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17020: RV_9,093.03c mūrdhānaṃ gāvaḥ payasā camūṣv abhi śrīṇanti vasubhir na niktaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17021: RV_9,093.04a sa no devebhiḥ pavamāna radendo rayim aśvinaṃ vāvaśānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17022: RV_9,093.04c rathirāyatām uśatī purandhir asmadryag ā dāvane vasūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17023: RV_9,093.05a nū no rayim upa māsva nṛvantam punāno vātāpyaṃ viśvaścandram /
GV01rvh1-10u:17024: RV_9,093.05c pra vanditur indo tāry āyuḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17025: RV_9,094.01a adhi yad asmin vājinīva śubha spardhante dhiyaḥ sūrye na viśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17026: RV_9,094.01c apo vṛṇānaḥ pavate kavīyan vrajaṃ na paśuvardhanāya manma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17027: RV_9,094.02a dvitā vyūrṇvann amṛtasya dhāma svarvide bhuvanāni prathanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:17028: RV_9,094.02c dhiyaḥ pinvānāḥ svasare na gāva ṛtāyantīr abhi vāvaśra indum //
GV01rvh1-10u:17029: RV_9,094.03a pari yat kaviḥ kāvyā bharate śūro na ratho bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17030: RV_9,094.03c deveṣu yaśo martāya bhūṣan dakṣāya rāyaḥ purubhūṣu navyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17031: RV_9,094.04a śriye jātaḥ śriya ā nir iyāya śriyaṃ vayo jaritṛbhyo dadhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17032: RV_9,094.04c śriyaṃ vasānā amṛtatvam āyan bhavanti satyā samithā mitadrau //
GV01rvh1-10u:17033: RV_9,094.05a iṣam ūrjam abhy arṣāśvaṃ gām uru jyotiḥ kṛṇuhi matsi devān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17034: RV_9,094.05c viśvāni hi suṣahā tāni tubhyam pavamāna bādhase soma śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:17035: RV_9,095.01a kanikranti harir ā sṛjyamānaḥ sīdan vanasya jaṭhare punānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17036: RV_9,095.01c nṛbhir yataḥ kṛṇute nirṇijaṃ gā ato matīr janayata svadhābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17037: RV_9,095.02a hariḥ sṛjānaḥ pathyām ṛtasyeyarti vācam ariteva nāvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17038: RV_9,095.02c devo devānāṃ guhyāni nāmāviṣ kṛṇoti barhiṣi pravāce //
GV01rvh1-10u:17039: RV_9,095.03a apām ived ūrmayas tarturāṇāḥ pra manīṣā īrate somam accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17040: RV_9,095.03c namasyantīr upa ca yanti saṃ cā ca viśanty uśatīr uśantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17041: RV_9,095.04a tam marmṛjānam mahiṣaṃ na sānāv aṃśuṃ duhanty ukṣaṇaṃ giriṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17042: RV_9,095.04c taṃ vāvaśānam matayaḥ sacante trito bibharti varuṇaṃ samudre //
GV01rvh1-10u:17043: RV_9,095.05a iṣyan vācam upavakteva hotuḥ punāna indo vi ṣyā manīṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17044: RV_9,095.05c indraś ca yat kṣayathaḥ saubhagāya suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17045: RV_9,096.01a pra senānīḥ śūro agre rathānāṃ gavyann eti harṣate asya senā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17046: RV_9,096.01c bhadrān kṛṇvann indrahavān sakhibhya ā somo vastrā rabhasāni datte //
GV01rvh1-10u:17047: RV_9,096.02a sam asya hariṃ harayo mṛjanty aśvahayair aniśitaṃ namobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17048: RV_9,096.02c ā tiṣṭhati ratham indrasya sakhā vidvāṃ enā sumatiṃ yāty accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:17049: RV_9,096.03a sa no deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarasa indrapānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17050: RV_9,096.03c kṛṇvann apo varṣayan dyām utemām uror ā no varivasyā punānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17051: RV_9,096.04a ajītaye 'hataye pavasva svastaye sarvatātaye bṛhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17052: RV_9,096.04c tad uśanti viśva ime sakhāyas tad ahaṃ vaśmi pavamāna soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17053: RV_9,096.05a somaḥ pavate janitā matīnāṃ janitā divo janitā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17054: RV_9,096.05c janitāgner janitā sūryasya janitendrasya janitota viṣṇoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17055: RV_9,096.06a brahmā devānām padavīḥ kavīnām ṛṣir viprāṇām mahiṣo mṛgāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17056: RV_9,096.06c śyeno gṛdhrāṇāṃ svadhitir vanānāṃ somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17057: RV_9,096.07a prāvīvipad vāca ūrmiṃ na sindhur giraḥ somaḥ pavamāno manīṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17058: RV_9,096.07c antaḥ paśyan vṛjanemāvarāṇy ā tiṣṭhati vṛṣabho goṣu jānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17059: RV_9,096.08a sa matsaraḥ pṛtsu vanvann avātaḥ sahasraretā abhi vājam arṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:17060: RV_9,096.08c indrāyendo pavamāno manīṣy aṃśor ūrmim īraya gā iṣaṇyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17061: RV_9,096.09a pari priyaḥ kalaśe devavāta indrāya somo raṇyo madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17062: RV_9,096.09c sahasradhāraḥ śatavāja indur vājī na saptiḥ samanā jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17063: RV_9,096.10a sa pūrvyo vasuvij jāyamāno mṛjāno apsu duduhāno adrau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17064: RV_9,096.10c abhiśastipā bhuvanasya rājā vidad gātum brahmaṇe pūyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17065: RV_9,096.11a tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17066: RV_9,096.11c vanvann avātaḥ paridhīṃr aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17067: RV_9,096.12a yathāpavathā manave vayodhā amitrahā varivovid dhaviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17068: RV_9,096.12c evā pavasva draviṇaṃ dadhāna indre saṃ tiṣṭha janayāyudhāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:17069: RV_9,096.13a pavasva soma madhumāṃ ṛtāvāpo vasāno adhi sāno avye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17070: RV_9,096.13c ava droṇāni ghṛtavānti sīda madintamo matsara indrapānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17071: RV_9,096.14a vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ śatadhāraḥ pavasva sahasrasā vājayur devavītau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17072: RV_9,096.14c saṃ sindhubhiḥ kalaśe vāvaśānaḥ sam usriyābhiḥ pratiran na āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17073: RV_9,096.15a eṣa sya somo matibhiḥ punāno 'tyo na vājī taratīd arātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17074: RV_9,096.15c payo na dugdham aditer iṣiram urv iva gātuḥ suyamo na voḷhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17075: RV_9,096.16a svāyudhaḥ sotṛbhiḥ pūyamāno 'bhy arṣa guhyaṃ cāru nāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17076: RV_9,096.16c abhi vājaṃ saptir iva śravasyābhi vāyum abhi gā deva soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17077: RV_9,096.17a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ haryatam mṛjanti śumbhanti vahnim maruto gaṇena /
GV01rvh1-10u:17078: RV_9,096.17c kavir gīrbhiḥ kāvyenā kaviḥ san somaḥ pavitram aty eti rebhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17079: RV_9,096.18a ṛṣimanā ya ṛṣikṛt svarṣāḥ sahasraṇīthaḥ padavīḥ kavīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17080: RV_9,096.18c tṛtīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣaḥ siṣāsan somo virājam anu rājati ṣṭup //
GV01rvh1-10u:17081: RV_9,096.19a camūṣac chyenaḥ śakuno vibhṛtvā govindur drapsa āyudhāni bibhrat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17082: RV_9,096.19c apām ūrmiṃ sacamānaḥ samudraṃ turīyaṃ dhāma mahiṣo vivakti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17083: RV_9,096.20a maryo na śubhras tanvam mṛjāno 'tyo na sṛtvā sanaye dhanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17084: RV_9,096.20c vṛṣeva yūthā pari kośam arṣan kanikradac camvor ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:17085: RV_9,096.21a pavasvendo pavamāno mahobhiḥ kanikradat pari vārāṇy arṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:17086: RV_9,096.21c krīḷañ camvor ā viśa pūyamāna indraṃ te raso madiro mamattu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17087: RV_9,096.22a prāsya dhārā bṛhatīr asṛgrann akto gobhiḥ kalaśāṃ ā viveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:17088: RV_9,096.22c sāma kṛṇvan sāmanyo vipaścit krandann ety abhi sakhyur na jāmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:17089: RV_9,096.23a apaghnann eṣi pavamāna śatrūn priyāṃ na jāro abhigīta induḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17090: RV_9,096.23c sīdan vaneṣu śakuno na patvā somaḥ punānaḥ kalaśeṣu sattā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17091: RV_9,096.24a ā te rucaḥ pavamānasya soma yoṣeva yanti sudughāḥ sudhārāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17092: RV_9,096.24c harir ānītaḥ puruvāro apsv acikradat kalaśe devayūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17093: RV_9,097.01a asya preṣā hemanā pūyamāno devo devebhiḥ sam apṛkta rasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17094: RV_9,097.01c sutaḥ pavitram pary eti rebhan miteva sadma paśumānti hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17095: RV_9,097.02a bhadrā vastrā samanyā vasāno mahān kavir nivacanāni śaṃsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17096: RV_9,097.02c ā vacyasva camvoḥ pūyamāno vicakṣaṇo jāgṛvir devavītau //
GV01rvh1-10u:17097: RV_9,097.03a sam u priyo mṛjyate sāno avye yaśastaro yaśasāṃ kṣaito asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:17098: RV_9,097.03c abhi svara dhanvā pūyamāno yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17099: RV_9,097.04a pra gāyatābhy arcāma devān somaṃ hinota mahate dhanāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17100: RV_9,097.04c svāduḥ pavāte ati vāram avyam ā sīdāti kalaśaṃ devayur naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17101: RV_9,097.05a indur devānām upa sakhyam āyan sahasradhāraḥ pavate madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17102: RV_9,097.05c nṛbhi stavāno anu dhāma pūrvam agann indram mahate saubhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17103: RV_9,097.06a stotre rāye harir arṣā punāna indram mado gacchatu te bharāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17104: RV_9,097.06c devair yāhi sarathaṃ rādho acchā yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17105: RV_9,097.07a pra kāvyam uśaneva bruvāṇo devo devānāṃ janimā vivakti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17106: RV_9,097.07c mahivrataḥ śucibandhuḥ pāvakaḥ padā varāho abhy eti rebhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17107: RV_9,097.08a pra haṃsāsas tṛpalam manyum acchāmād astaṃ vṛṣagaṇā ayāsuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17108: RV_9,097.08c āṅgūṣyam pavamānaṃ sakhāyo durmarṣaṃ sākam pra vadanti vāṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17109: RV_9,097.09a sa raṃhata urugāyasya jūtiṃ vṛthā krīḷantam mimate na gāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17110: RV_9,097.09c parīṇasaṃ kṛṇute tigmaśṛṅgo divā harir dadṛśe naktam ṛjraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17111: RV_9,097.10a indur vājī pavate gonyoghā indre somaḥ saha invan madāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17112: RV_9,097.10c hanti rakṣo bādhate pary arātīr varivaḥ kṛṇvan vṛjanasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17113: RV_9,097.11a adha dhārayā madhvā pṛcānas tiro roma pavate adridugdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17114: RV_9,097.11c indur indrasya sakhyaṃ juṣāṇo devo devasya matsaro madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17115: RV_9,097.12a abhi priyāṇi pavate punāno devo devān svena rasena pṛñcan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17116: RV_9,097.12c indur dharmāṇy ṛtuthā vasāno daśa kṣipo avyata sāno avye //
GV01rvh1-10u:17117: RV_9,097.13a vṛṣā śoṇo abhikanikradad gā nadayann eti pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17118: RV_9,097.13c indrasyeva vagnur ā śṛṇva ājau pracetayann arṣati vācam emām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17119: RV_9,097.14a rasāyyaḥ payasā pinvamāna īrayann eṣi madhumantam aṃśum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17120: RV_9,097.14c pavamānaḥ saṃtanim eṣi kṛṇvann indrāya soma pariṣicyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17121: RV_9,097.15a evā pavasva madiro madāyodagrābhasya namayan vadhasnaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17122: RV_9,097.15c pari varṇam bharamāṇo ruśantaṃ gavyur no arṣa pari soma siktaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17123: RV_9,097.16a juṣṭvī na indo supathā sugāny urau pavasva varivāṃsi kṛṇvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17124: RV_9,097.16c ghaneva viṣvag duritāni vighnann adhi ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye //
GV01rvh1-10u:17125: RV_9,097.17a vṛṣṭiṃ no arṣa divyāṃ jigatnum iḷāvatīṃ śaṅgayīṃ jīradānum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17126: RV_9,097.17c stukeva vītā dhanvā vicinvan bandhūṃr imāṃ avarāṃ indo vāyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:17127: RV_9,097.18a granthiṃ na vi ṣya grathitam punāna ṛjuṃ ca gātuṃ vṛjinaṃ ca soma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17128: RV_9,097.18c atyo na krado harir ā sṛjāno maryo deva dhanva pastyāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17129: RV_9,097.19a juṣṭo madāya devatāta indo pari ṣṇunā dhanva sāno avye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17130: RV_9,097.19c sahasradhāraḥ surabhir adabdhaḥ pari srava vājasātau nṛṣahye //
GV01rvh1-10u:17131: RV_9,097.20a araśmāno ye 'rathā ayuktā atyāso na sasṛjānāsa ājau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17132: RV_9,097.20c ete śukrāso dhanvanti somā devāsas tāṃ upa yātā pibadhyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:17133: RV_9,097.21a evā na indo abhi devavītim pari srava nabho arṇaś camūṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17134: RV_9,097.21c somo asmabhyaṃ kāmyam bṛhantaṃ rayiṃ dadātu vīravantam ugram //
GV01rvh1-10u:17135: RV_9,097.22a takṣad yadī manaso venato vāg jyeṣṭhasya vā dharmaṇi kṣor anīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:17136: RV_9,097.22c ād īm āyan varam ā vāvaśānā juṣṭam patiṃ kalaśe gāva indum //
GV01rvh1-10u:17137: RV_9,097.23a pra dānudo divyo dānupinva ṛtam ṛtāya pavate sumedhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17138: RV_9,097.23c dharmā bhuvad vṛjanyasya rājā pra raśmibhir daśabhir bhāri bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17139: RV_9,097.24a pavitrebhiḥ pavamāno nṛcakṣā rājā devānām uta martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17140: RV_9,097.24c dvitā bhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām ṛtam bharat subhṛtaṃ cārv induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17141: RV_9,097.25a arvāṃ iva śravase sātim acchendrasya vāyor abhi vītim arṣa /
GV01rvh1-10u:17142: RV_9,097.25c sa naḥ sahasrā bṛhatīr iṣo dā bhavā soma draviṇovit punānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17143: RV_9,097.26a devāvyo naḥ pariṣicyamānāḥ kṣayaṃ suvīraṃ dhanvantu somāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17144: RV_9,097.26c āyajyavaḥ sumatiṃ viśvavārā hotāro na diviyajo mandratamāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17145: RV_9,097.27a evā deva devatāte pavasva mahe soma psarase devapānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17146: RV_9,097.27c mahaś cid dhi ṣmasi hitāḥ samarye kṛdhi suṣṭhāne rodasī punānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17147: RV_9,097.28a aśvo no krado vṛṣabhir yujānaḥ siṃho na bhīmo manaso javīyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17148: RV_9,097.28c arvācīnaiḥ pathibhir ye rajiṣṭhā ā pavasva saumanasaṃ na indo //
GV01rvh1-10u:17149: RV_9,097.29a śataṃ dhārā devajātā asṛgran sahasram enāḥ kavayo mṛjanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17150: RV_9,097.29c indo sanitraṃ diva ā pavasva puraetāsi mahato dhanasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17151: RV_9,097.30a divo na sargā asasṛgram ahnāṃ rājā na mitram pra mināti dhīraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17152: RV_9,097.30c pitur na putraḥ kratubhir yatāna ā pavasva viśe asyā ajītim //
GV01rvh1-10u:17153: RV_9,097.31a pra te dhārā madhumatīr asṛgran vārān yat pūto atyeṣy avyān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17154: RV_9,097.31c pavamāna pavase dhāma gonāṃ jajñānaḥ sūryam apinvo arkaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17155: RV_9,097.32a kanikradad anu panthām ṛtasya śukro vi bhāsy amṛtasya dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17156: RV_9,097.32c sa indrāya pavase matsaravān hinvāno vācam matibhiḥ kavīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17157: RV_9,097.33a divyaḥ suparṇo 'va cakṣi soma pinvan dhārāḥ karmaṇā devavītau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17158: RV_9,097.33c endo viśa kalaśaṃ somadhānaṃ krandann ihi sūryasyopa raśmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:17159: RV_9,097.34a tisro vāca īrayati pra vahnir ṛtasya dhītim brahmaṇo manīṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17160: RV_9,097.34c gāvo yanti gopatim pṛcchamānāḥ somaṃ yanti matayo vāvaśānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17161: RV_9,097.35a somaṃ gāvo dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ somaṃ viprā matibhiḥ pṛcchamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17162: RV_9,097.35c somaḥ sutaḥ pūyate ajyamānaḥ some arkās triṣṭubhaḥ saṃ navante //
GV01rvh1-10u:17163: RV_9,097.36a evā naḥ soma pariṣicyamāna ā pavasva pūyamānaḥ svasti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17164: RV_9,097.36c indram ā viśa bṛhatā raveṇa vardhayā vācaṃ janayā purandhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:17165: RV_9,097.37a ā jāgṛvir vipra ṛtā matīnāṃ somaḥ punāno asadac camūṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17166: RV_9,097.37c sapanti yam mithunāso nikāmā adhvaryavo rathirāsaḥ suhastāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17167: RV_9,097.38a sa punāna upa sūre na dhātobhe aprā rodasī vi ṣa āvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17168: RV_9,097.38c priyā cid yasya priyasāsa ūtī sa tū dhanaṃ kāriṇe na pra yaṃsat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17169: RV_9,097.39a sa vardhitā vardhanaḥ pūyamānaḥ somo mīḍhvāṃ abhi no jyotiṣāvīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17170: RV_9,097.39c yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñāḥ svarvido abhi gā adrim uṣṇan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17171: RV_9,097.40a akrān samudraḥ prathame vidharmañ janayan prajā bhuvanasya rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17172: RV_9,097.40c vṛṣā pavitre adhi sāno avye bṛhat somo vāvṛdhe suvāna induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17173: RV_9,097.41a mahat tat somo mahiṣaś cakārāpāṃ yad garbho 'vṛṇīta devān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17174: RV_9,097.41c adadhād indre pavamāna ojo 'janayat sūrye jyotir induḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17175: RV_9,097.42a matsi vāyum iṣṭaye rādhase ca matsi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17176: RV_9,097.42c matsi śardho mārutam matsi devān matsi dyāvāpṛthivī deva soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17177: RV_9,097.43a ṛjuḥ pavasva vṛjinasya hantāpāmīvām bādhamāno mṛdhaś ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:17178: RV_9,097.43c abhiśrīṇan payaḥ payasābhi gonām indrasya tvaṃ tava vayaṃ sakhāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17179: RV_9,097.44a madhvaḥ sūdam pavasva vasva utsaṃ vīraṃ ca na ā pavasvā bhagaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:17180: RV_9,097.44c svadasvendrāya pavamāna indo rayiṃ ca na ā pavasvā samudrāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17181: RV_9,097.45a somaḥ suto dhārayātyo na hitvā sindhur na nimnam abhi vājy akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17182: RV_9,097.45c ā yoniṃ vanyam asadat punānaḥ sam indur gobhir asarat sam adbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17183: RV_9,097.46a eṣa sya te pavata indra somaś camūṣu dhīra uśate tavasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17184: RV_9,097.46c svarcakṣā rathiraḥ satyaśuṣmaḥ kāmo na yo devayatām asarji //
GV01rvh1-10u:17185: RV_9,097.47a eṣa pratnena vayasā punānas tiro varpāṃsi duhitur dadhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17186: RV_9,097.47c vasānaḥ śarma trivarūtham apsu hoteva yāti samaneṣu rebhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17187: RV_9,097.48a nū nas tvaṃ rathiro deva soma pari srava camvoḥ pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17188: RV_9,097.48c apsu svādiṣṭho madhumāṃ ṛtāvā devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17189: RV_9,097.49a abhi vāyuṃ vīty arṣā gṛṇāno 'bhi mitrāvaruṇā pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17190: RV_9,097.49c abhī naraṃ dhījavanaṃ ratheṣṭhām abhīndraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:17191: RV_9,097.50a abhi vastrā suvasanāny arṣābhi dhenūḥ sudughāḥ pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17192: RV_9,097.50c abhi candrā bhartave no hiraṇyābhy aśvān rathino deva soma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17193: RV_9,097.51a abhī no arṣa divyā vasūny abhi viśvā pārthivā pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17194: RV_9,097.51c abhi yena draviṇam aśnavāmābhy ārṣeyaṃ jamadagnivan naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17195: RV_9,097.52a ayā pavā pavasvainā vasūni māṃścatva indo sarasi pra dhanva /
GV01rvh1-10u:17196: RV_9,097.52c bradhnaś cid atra vāto na jūtaḥ purumedhaś cit takave naraṃ dāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17197: RV_9,097.53a uta na enā pavayā pavasvādhi śrute śravāyyasya tīrthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17198: RV_9,097.53c ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā naiguto vasūni vṛkṣaṃ na pakvaṃ dhūnavad raṇāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17199: RV_9,097.54a mahīme asya vṛṣanāma śūṣe māṃścatve vā pṛśane vā vadhatre /
GV01rvh1-10u:17200: RV_9,097.54c asvāpayan nigutaḥ snehayac cāpāmitrāṃ apācito acetaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17201: RV_9,097.55a saṃ trī pavitrā vitatāny eṣy anv ekaṃ dhāvasi pūyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17202: RV_9,097.55c asi bhago asi dātrasya dātāsi maghavā maghavadbhya indo //
GV01rvh1-10u:17203: RV_9,097.56a eṣa viśvavit pavate manīṣī somo viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17204: RV_9,097.56c drapsāṃ īrayan vidatheṣv indur vi vāram avyaṃ samayāti yāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17205: RV_9,097.57a induṃ rihanti mahiṣā adabdhāḥ pade rebhanti kavayo na gṛdhrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17206: RV_9,097.57c hinvanti dhīrā daśabhiḥ kṣipābhiḥ sam añjate rūpam apāṃ rasena //
GV01rvh1-10u:17207: RV_9,097.58a tvayā vayam pavamānena soma bhare kṛtaṃ vi cinuyāma śaśvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17208: RV_9,097.58c tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17209: RV_9,098.01a abhi no vājasātamaṃ rayim arṣa puruspṛham /
GV01rvh1-10u:17211: RV_9,098.02a pari ṣya suvāno avyayaṃ rathe na varmāvyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17212: RV_9,098.02c indur abhi druṇā hito hiyāno dhārābhir akṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17213: RV_9,098.03a pari ṣya suvāno akṣā indur avye madacyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17214: RV_9,098.03c dhārā ya ūrdhvo adhvare bhrājā naiti gavyayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17215: RV_9,098.04a sa hi tvaṃ deva śaśvate vasu martāya dāśuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17216: RV_9,098.04c indo sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ śatātmānaṃ vivāsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17217: RV_9,098.05a vayaṃ te asya vṛtrahan vaso vasvaḥ puruspṛhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17218: RV_9,098.05c ni nediṣṭhatamā iṣaḥ syāma sumnasyādhrigo //
GV01rvh1-10u:17219: RV_9,098.06a dvir yam pañca svayaśasaṃ svasāro adrisaṃhatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17220: RV_9,098.06c priyam indrasya kāmyam prasnāpayanty ūrmiṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17221: RV_9,098.07a pari tyaṃ haryataṃ harim babhrum punanti vāreṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:17222: RV_9,098.07c yo devān viśvāṃ it pari madena saha gacchati //
GV01rvh1-10u:17223: RV_9,098.08a asya vo hy avasā pānto dakṣasādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17224: RV_9,098.08c yaḥ sūriṣu śravo bṛhad dadhe svar ṇa haryataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17225: RV_9,098.09a sa vāṃ yajñeṣu mānavī indur janiṣṭa rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17226: RV_9,098.09c devo devī giriṣṭhā asredhan taṃ tuviṣvaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17227: RV_9,098.10a indrāya soma pātave vṛtraghne pari ṣicyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:17228: RV_9,098.10c nare ca dakṣiṇāvate devāya sadanāsade //
GV01rvh1-10u:17229: RV_9,098.11a te pratnāso vyuṣṭiṣu somāḥ pavitre akṣaran /
GV01rvh1-10u:17230: RV_9,098.11c apaprothantaḥ sanutar huraścitaḥ prātas tāṃ apracetasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17231: RV_9,098.12a taṃ sakhāyaḥ purorucaṃ yūyaṃ vayaṃ ca sūrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17233: RV_9,099.01a ā haryatāya dhṛṣṇave dhanus tanvanti pauṃsyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17234: RV_9,099.01c śukrāṃ vayanty asurāya nirṇijaṃ vipām agre mahīyuvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17235: RV_9,099.02a adha kṣapā pariṣkṛto vājāṃ abhi pra gāhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17236: RV_9,099.02c yadī vivasvato dhiyo hariṃ hinvanti yātave //
GV01rvh1-10u:17237: RV_9,099.03a tam asya marjayāmasi mado ya indrapātamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17238: RV_9,099.03c yaṃ gāva āsabhir dadhuḥ purā nūnaṃ ca sūrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17239: RV_9,099.04a taṃ gāthayā purāṇyā punānam abhy anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17240: RV_9,099.04c uto kṛpanta dhītayo devānāṃ nāma bibhratīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17241: RV_9,099.05a tam ukṣamāṇam avyaye vāre punanti dharṇasim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17242: RV_9,099.05c dūtaṃ na pūrvacittaya ā śāsate manīṣiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17243: RV_9,099.06a sa punāno madintamaḥ somaś camūṣu sīdati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17244: RV_9,099.06c paśau na reta ādadhat patir vacasyate dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17245: RV_9,099.07a sa mṛjyate sukarmabhir devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17246: RV_9,099.07c vide yad āsu saṃdadir mahīr apo vi gāhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:17247: RV_9,099.08a suta indo pavitra ā nṛbhir yato vi nīyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:17248: RV_9,099.08c indrāya matsarintamaś camūṣv ā ni ṣīdasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17249: RV_9,100.01a abhī navante adruhaḥ priyam indrasya kāmyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17250: RV_9,100.01c vatsaṃ na pūrva āyuni jātaṃ rihanti mātaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17251: RV_9,100.02a punāna indav ā bhara soma dvibarhasaṃ rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17252: RV_9,100.02c tvaṃ vasūni puṣyasi viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17253: RV_9,100.03a tvaṃ dhiyam manoyujaṃ sṛjā vṛṣṭiṃ na tanyatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17254: RV_9,100.03c tvaṃ vasūni pārthivā divyā ca soma puṣyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17255: RV_9,100.04a pari te jigyuṣo yathā dhārā sutasya dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17256: RV_9,100.04c raṃhamāṇā vy avyayaṃ vāraṃ vājīva sānasiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17257: RV_9,100.05a kratve dakṣāya naḥ kave pavasva soma dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17258: RV_9,100.05c indrāya pātave suto mitrāya varuṇāya ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:17259: RV_9,100.06a pavasva vājasātamaḥ pavitre dhārayā sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17260: RV_9,100.06c indrāya soma viṣṇave devebhyo madhumattamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17261: RV_9,100.07a tvāṃ rihanti mātaro harim pavitre adruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17262: RV_9,100.07c vatsaṃ jātaṃ na dhenavaḥ pavamāna vidharmaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17263: RV_9,100.08a pavamāna mahi śravaś citrebhir yāsi raśmibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17264: RV_9,100.08c śardhan tamāṃsi jighnase viśvāni dāśuṣo gṛhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17265: RV_9,100.09a tvaṃ dyāṃ ca mahivrata pṛthivīṃ cāti jabhriṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17266: RV_9,100.09c prati drāpim amuñcathāḥ pavamāna mahitvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17267: RV_9,101.01a purojitī vo andhasaḥ sutāya mādayitnave /
GV01rvh1-10u:17268: RV_9,101.01c apa śvānaṃ śnathiṣṭana sakhāyo dīrghajihvyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17269: RV_9,101.02a yo dhārayā pāvakayā pariprasyandate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17271: RV_9,101.03a taṃ duroṣam abhī naraḥ somaṃ viśvācyā dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17273: RV_9,101.04a sutāso madhumattamāḥ somā indrāya mandinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17274: RV_9,101.04c pavitravanto akṣaran devān gacchantu vo madāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17275: RV_9,101.05a indur indrāya pavata iti devāso abruvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17276: RV_9,101.05c vācas patir makhasyate viśvasyeśāna ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17278: RV_9,101.06c somaḥ patī rayīṇāṃ sakhendrasya dive-dive //
GV01rvh1-10u:17279: RV_9,101.07a ayam pūṣā rayir bhagaḥ somaḥ punāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17280: RV_9,101.07c patir viśvasya bhūmano vy akhyad rodasī ubhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17281: RV_9,101.08a sam u priyā anūṣata gāvo madāya ghṛṣvayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17282: RV_9,101.08c somāsaḥ kṛṇvate pathaḥ pavamānāsa indavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17283: RV_9,101.09a ya ojiṣṭhas tam ā bhara pavamāna śravāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17284: RV_9,101.09c yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīr abhi rayiṃ yena vanāmahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:17286: RV_9,101.10c mitrāḥ suvānā arepasaḥ svādhyaḥ svarvidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17287: RV_9,101.11a suṣvāṇāso vy adribhiś citānā gor adhi tvaci /
GV01rvh1-10u:17288: RV_9,101.11c iṣam asmabhyam abhitaḥ sam asvaran vasuvidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17289: RV_9,101.12a ete pūtā vipaścitaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17290: RV_9,101.12c sūryāso na darśatāso jigatnavo dhruvā ghṛte //
GV01rvh1-10u:17291: RV_9,101.13a pra sunvānasyāndhaso marto na vṛta tad vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17292: RV_9,101.13c apa śvānam arādhasaṃ hatā makhaṃ na bhṛgavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17293: RV_9,101.14a ā jāmir atke avyata bhuje na putra oṇyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17294: RV_9,101.14c saraj jāro na yoṣaṇāṃ varo na yonim āsadam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17295: RV_9,101.15a sa vīro dakṣasādhano vi yas tastambha rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17296: RV_9,101.15c hariḥ pavitre avyata vedhā na yonim āsadam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17297: RV_9,101.16a avyo vārebhiḥ pavate somo gavye adhi tvaci /
GV01rvh1-10u:17298: RV_9,101.16c kanikradad vṛṣā harir indrasyābhy eti niṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17299: RV_9,102.01a krāṇā śiśur mahīnāṃ hinvann ṛtasya dīdhitim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17300: RV_9,102.01c viśvā pari priyā bhuvad adha dvitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17301: RV_9,102.02a upa tritasya pāṣyor abhakta yad guhā padam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17302: RV_9,102.02c yajñasya sapta dhāmabhir adha priyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17303: RV_9,102.03a trīṇi tritasya dhārayā pṛṣṭheṣv erayā rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17304: RV_9,102.03c mimīte asya yojanā vi sukratuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17305: RV_9,102.04a jajñānaṃ sapta mātaro vedhām aśāsata śriye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17306: RV_9,102.04c ayaṃ dhruvo rayīṇāṃ ciketa yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17307: RV_9,102.05a asya vrate sajoṣaso viśve devāso adruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17308: RV_9,102.05c spārhā bhavanti rantayo juṣanta yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17309: RV_9,102.06a yam ī garbham ṛtāvṛdho dṛśe cārum ajījanan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17311: RV_9,102.07a samīcīne abhi tmanā yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17312: RV_9,102.07c tanvānā yajñam ānuṣag yad añjate //
GV01rvh1-10u:17313: RV_9,102.08a kratvā śukrebhir akṣabhir ṛṇor apa vrajaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17315: RV_9,103.01a pra punānāya vedhase somāya vaca udyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17316: RV_9,103.01c bhṛtiṃ na bharā matibhir jujoṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:17317: RV_9,103.02a pari vārāṇy avyayā gobhir añjāno arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17318: RV_9,103.02c trī ṣadhasthā punānaḥ kṛṇute hariḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17319: RV_9,103.03a pari kośam madhuścutam avyaye vāre arṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17320: RV_9,103.03c abhi vāṇīr ṛṣīṇāṃ sapta nūṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:17321: RV_9,103.04a pari ṇetā matīnāṃ viśvadevo adābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17322: RV_9,103.04c somaḥ punānaś camvor viśad dhariḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17323: RV_9,103.05a pari daivīr anu svadhā indreṇa yāhi saratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:17325: RV_9,103.06a pari saptir na vājayur devo devebhyaḥ sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17327: RV_9,104.01a sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata punānāya pra gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17328: RV_9,104.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ pari bhūṣata śriye //
GV01rvh1-10u:17329: RV_9,104.02a sam ī vatsaṃ na mātṛbhiḥ sṛjatā gayasādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17331: RV_9,104.03a punātā dakṣasādhanaṃ yathā śardhāya vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17333: RV_9,104.04a asmabhyaṃ tvā vasuvidam abhi vāṇīr anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17334: RV_9,104.04c gobhiṣ ṭe varṇam abhi vāsayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17335: RV_9,104.05a sa no madānām pata indo devapsarā asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17337: RV_9,104.06a sanemi kṛdhy asmad ā rakṣasaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17338: RV_9,104.06c apādevaṃ dvayum aṃho yuyodhi naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17339: RV_9,105.01a taṃ vaḥ sakhāyo madāya punānam abhi gāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17340: RV_9,105.01c śiśuṃ na yajñaiḥ svadayanta gūrtibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17341: RV_9,105.02a saṃ vatsa iva mātṛbhir indur hinvāno ajyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17343: RV_9,105.03a ayaṃ dakṣāya sādhano 'yaṃ śardhāya vītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17345: RV_9,105.04a goman na indo aśvavat sutaḥ sudakṣa dhanva /
GV01rvh1-10u:17346: RV_9,105.04c śuciṃ te varṇam adhi goṣu dīdharam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17347: RV_9,105.05a sa no harīṇām pata indo devapsarastamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17348: RV_9,105.05c sakheva sakhye naryo ruce bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17349: RV_9,105.06a sanemi tvam asmad āṃ adevaṃ kaṃ cid atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17350: RV_9,105.06c sāhvāṃ indo pari bādho apa dvayum //
GV01rvh1-10u:17351: RV_9,106.01a indram accha sutā ime vṛṣaṇaṃ yantu harayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17353: RV_9,106.02a ayam bharāya sānasir indrāya pavate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17354: RV_9,106.02c somo jaitrasya cetati yathā vide //
GV01rvh1-10u:17355: RV_9,106.03a asyed indro madeṣv ā grābhaṃ gṛbhṇīta sānasim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17356: RV_9,106.03c vajraṃ ca vṛṣaṇam bharat sam apsujit //
GV01rvh1-10u:17357: RV_9,106.04a pra dhanvā soma jāgṛvir indrāyendo pari srava /
GV01rvh1-10u:17358: RV_9,106.04c dyumantaṃ śuṣmam ā bharā svarvidam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17359: RV_9,106.05a indrāya vṛṣaṇam madam pavasva viśvadarśataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17363: RV_9,106.07a pavasva devavītaya indo dhārābhir ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17364: RV_9,106.07c ā kalaśam madhumān soma naḥ sadaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17365: RV_9,106.08a tava drapsā udapruta indram madāya vāvṛdhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17366: RV_9,106.08c tvāṃ devāso amṛtāya kam papuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17367: RV_9,106.09a ā naḥ sutāsa indavaḥ punānā dhāvatā rayim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17369: RV_9,106.10a somaḥ punāna ūrmiṇāvyo vāraṃ vi dhāvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17371: RV_9,106.11a dhībhir hinvanti vājinaṃ vane krīḷantam atyavim /
GV01rvh1-10u:17372: RV_9,106.11c abhi tripṛṣṭham matayaḥ sam asvaran //
GV01rvh1-10u:17373: RV_9,106.12a asarji kalaśāṃ abhi mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17375: RV_9,106.13a pavate haryato harir ati hvarāṃsi raṃhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17377: RV_9,106.14a ayā pavasva devayur madhor dhārā asṛkṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17378: RV_9,106.14c rebhan pavitram pary eṣi viśvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17379: RV_9,107.01a parīto ṣiñcatā sutaṃ somo ya uttamaṃ haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17380: RV_9,107.01c dadhanvāṃ yo naryo apsv antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17381: RV_9,107.02a nūnam punāno 'vibhiḥ pari sravādabdhaḥ surabhintaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17382: RV_9,107.02c sute cit tvāpsu madāmo andhasā śrīṇanto gobhir uttaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:17383: RV_9,107.03a pari suvānaś cakṣase devamādanaḥ kratur indur vicakṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17384: RV_9,107.04a punānaḥ soma dhārayāpo vasāno arṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17385: RV_9,107.04c ā ratnadhā yonim ṛtasya sīdasy utso deva hiraṇyayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17386: RV_9,107.05a duhāna ūdhar divyam madhu priyam pratnaṃ sadhastham āsadat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17387: RV_9,107.05c āpṛcchyaṃ dharuṇaṃ vājy arṣati nṛbhir dhūto vicakṣaṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17388: RV_9,107.06a punānaḥ soma jāgṛvir avyo vāre pari priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17389: RV_9,107.06c tvaṃ vipro abhavo 'ṅgirastamo madhvā yajñam mimikṣa naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17390: RV_9,107.07a somo mīḍhvān pavate gātuvittama ṛṣir vipro vicakṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17391: RV_9,107.07c tvaṃ kavir abhavo devavītama ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17392: RV_9,107.08a soma u ṣuvāṇaḥ sotṛbhir adhi ṣṇubhir avīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17393: RV_9,107.08c aśvayeva haritā yāti dhārayā mandrayā yāti dhārayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17394: RV_9,107.09a anūpe gomān gobhir akṣāḥ somo dugdhābhir akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17395: RV_9,107.09c samudraṃ na saṃvaraṇāny agman mandī madāya tośate //
GV01rvh1-10u:17396: RV_9,107.10a ā soma suvāno adribhis tiro vārāṇy avyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17397: RV_9,107.10c jano na puri camvor viśad dhariḥ sado vaneṣu dadhiṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17398: RV_9,107.11a sa māmṛje tiro aṇvāni meṣyo mīḷhe saptir na vājayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17399: RV_9,107.11c anumādyaḥ pavamāno manīṣibhiḥ somo viprebhir ṛkvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17400: RV_9,107.12a pra soma devavītaye sindhur na pipye arṇasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17401: RV_9,107.12c aṃśoḥ payasā madiro na jāgṛvir acchā kośam madhuścutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17402: RV_9,107.13a ā haryato arjune atke avyata priyaḥ sūnur na marjyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17403: RV_9,107.13c tam īṃ hinvanty apaso yathā rathaṃ nadīṣv ā gabhastyoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17404: RV_9,107.14a abhi somāsa āyavaḥ pavante madyam madam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17405: RV_9,107.14c samudrasyādhi viṣṭapi manīṣiṇo matsarāsaḥ svarvidaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17406: RV_9,107.15a tarat samudram pavamāna ūrmiṇā rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17407: RV_9,107.15c arṣan mitrasya varuṇasya dharmaṇā pra hinvāna ṛtam bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17408: RV_9,107.16a nṛbhir yemāno haryato vicakṣaṇo rājā devaḥ samudriyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17409: RV_9,107.17a indrāya pavate madaḥ somo marutvate sutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17410: RV_9,107.17c sahasradhāro aty avyam arṣati tam ī mṛjanty āyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17411: RV_9,107.18a punānaś camū janayan matiṃ kaviḥ somo deveṣu raṇyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17412: RV_9,107.18c apo vasānaḥ pari gobhir uttaraḥ sīdan vaneṣv avyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:17413: RV_9,107.19a tavāhaṃ soma rāraṇa sakhya indo dive-dive /
GV01rvh1-10u:17414: RV_9,107.19c purūṇi babhro ni caranti mām ava paridhīṃr ati tāṃ ihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17415: RV_9,107.20a utāhaṃ naktam uta soma te divā sakhyāya babhra ūdhani /
GV01rvh1-10u:17416: RV_9,107.20c ghṛṇā tapantam ati sūryam paraḥ śakunā iva paptima //
GV01rvh1-10u:17417: RV_9,107.21a mṛjyamānaḥ suhastya samudre vācam invasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17418: RV_9,107.21c rayim piśaṅgam bahulam puruspṛham pavamānābhy arṣasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17419: RV_9,107.22a mṛjāno vāre pavamāno avyaye vṛṣāva cakrado vane /
GV01rvh1-10u:17420: RV_9,107.22c devānāṃ soma pavamāna niṣkṛtaṃ gobhir añjāno arṣasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17422: RV_9,107.23c tvaṃ samudram prathamo vi dhārayo devebhyaḥ soma matsaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17423: RV_9,107.24a sa tū pavasva pari pārthivaṃ rajo divyā ca soma dharmabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17424: RV_9,107.24c tvāṃ viprāso matibhir vicakṣaṇa śubhraṃ hinvanti dhītibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17425: RV_9,107.25a pavamānā asṛkṣata pavitram ati dhārayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17426: RV_9,107.25c marutvanto matsarā indriyā hayā medhām abhi prayāṃsi ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:17427: RV_9,107.26a apo vasānaḥ pari kośam arṣatīndur hiyānaḥ sotṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17428: RV_9,107.26c janayañ jyotir mandanā avīvaśad gāḥ kṛṇvāno na nirṇijam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17429: RV_9,108.01a pavasva madhumattama indrāya soma kratuvittamo madaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17431: RV_9,108.02a yasya te pītvā vṛṣabho vṛṣāyate 'sya pītā svarvidaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17432: RV_9,108.02c sa supraketo abhy akramīd iṣo 'cchā vājaṃ naitaśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17433: RV_9,108.03a tvaṃ hy aṅga daivyā pavamāna janimāni dyumattamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17435: RV_9,108.04a yenā navagvo dadhyaṅṅ aporṇute yena viprāsa āpire /
GV01rvh1-10u:17436: RV_9,108.04c devānāṃ sumne amṛtasya cāruṇo yena śravāṃsy ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17437: RV_9,108.05a eṣa sya dhārayā suto 'vyo vārebhiḥ pavate madintamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17439: RV_9,108.06a ya usriyā apyā antar aśmano nir gā akṛntad ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17440: RV_9,108.06c abhi vrajaṃ tatniṣe gavyam aśvyaṃ varmīva dhṛṣṇav ā ruja //
GV01rvh1-10u:17441: RV_9,108.07a ā sotā pari ṣiñcatāśvaṃ na stomam apturaṃ rajasturam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17443: RV_9,108.08a sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabham payovṛdham priyaṃ devāya janmane /
GV01rvh1-10u:17444: RV_9,108.08c ṛtena ya ṛtajāto vivāvṛdhe rājā deva ṛtam bṛhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17445: RV_9,108.09a abhi dyumnam bṛhad yaśa iṣas pate didīhi deva devayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17447: RV_9,108.10a ā vacyasva sudakṣa camvoḥ suto viśāṃ vahnir na viśpatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17448: RV_9,108.10c vṛṣṭiṃ divaḥ pavasva rītim apāṃ jinvā gaviṣṭaye dhiyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17449: RV_9,108.11a etam u tyam madacyutaṃ sahasradhāraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ divo duhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17451: RV_9,108.12a vṛṣā vi jajñe janayann amartyaḥ pratapañ jyotiṣā tamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17452: RV_9,108.12c sa suṣṭutaḥ kavibhir nirṇijaṃ dadhe tridhātv asya daṃsasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17453: RV_9,108.13a sa sunve yo vasūnāṃ yo rāyām ānetā ya iḷānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17455: RV_9,108.14a yasya na indraḥ pibād yasya maruto yasya vāryamaṇā bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17456: RV_9,108.14c ā yena mitrāvaruṇā karāmaha endram avase mahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17457: RV_9,108.15a indrāya soma pātave nṛbhir yataḥ svāyudho madintamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17459: RV_9,108.16a indrasya hārdi somadhānam ā viśa samudram iva sindhavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17460: RV_9,108.16c juṣṭo mitrāya varuṇāya vāyave divo viṣṭambha uttamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17461: RV_9,109.01a pari pra dhanvendrāya soma svādur mitrāya pūṣṇe bhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17462: RV_9,109.02a indras te soma sutasya peyāḥ kratve dakṣāya viśve ca devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17463: RV_9,109.03a evāmṛtāya mahe kṣayāya sa śukro arṣa divyaḥ pīyūṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17464: RV_9,109.04a pavasva soma mahān samudraḥ pitā devānāṃ viśvābhi dhāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17465: RV_9,109.05a śukraḥ pavasva devebhyaḥ soma dive pṛthivyai śaṃ ca prajāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:17466: RV_9,109.06a divo dhartāsi śukraḥ pīyūṣaḥ satye vidharman vājī pavasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:17467: RV_9,109.07a pavasva soma dyumnī sudhāro mahām avīnām anu pūrvyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17468: RV_9,109.08a nṛbhir yemāno jajñānaḥ pūtaḥ kṣarad viśvāni mandraḥ svarvit //
GV01rvh1-10u:17469: RV_9,109.09a induḥ punānaḥ prajām urāṇaḥ karad viśvāni draviṇāni naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17470: RV_9,109.10a pavasva soma kratve dakṣāyāśvo na nikto vājī dhanāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17471: RV_9,109.11a taṃ te sotāro rasam madāya punanti somam mahe dyumnāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17472: RV_9,109.12a śiśuṃ jajñānaṃ harim mṛjanti pavitre somaṃ devebhya indum //
GV01rvh1-10u:17473: RV_9,109.13a induḥ paviṣṭa cārur madāyāpām upasthe kavir bhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17474: RV_9,109.14a bibharti cārv indrasya nāma yena viśvāni vṛtrā jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:17475: RV_9,109.15a pibanty asya viśve devāso gobhiḥ śrītasya nṛbhiḥ sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17476: RV_9,109.16a pra suvāno akṣāḥ sahasradhāras tiraḥ pavitraṃ vi vāram avyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17477: RV_9,109.17a sa vājy akṣāḥ sahasraretā adbhir mṛjāno gobhiḥ śrīṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17478: RV_9,109.18a pra soma yāhīndrasya kukṣā nṛbhir yemāno adribhiḥ sutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17479: RV_9,109.19a asarji vājī tiraḥ pavitram indrāya somaḥ sahasradhāraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17480: RV_9,109.20a añjanty enam madhvo rasenendrāya vṛṣṇa indum madāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17481: RV_9,109.21a devebhyas tvā vṛthā pājase 'po vasānaṃ harim mṛjanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17482: RV_9,109.22a indur indrāya tośate ni tośate śrīṇann ugro riṇann apaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17483: RV_9,110.01a pary ū ṣu pra dhanva vājasātaye pari vṛtrāṇi sakṣaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17484: RV_9,110.01c dviṣas taradhyā ṛṇayā na īyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17485: RV_9,110.02a anu hi tvā sutaṃ soma madāmasi mahe samaryarājye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17486: RV_9,110.02c vājāṃ abhi pavamāna pra gāhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17487: RV_9,110.03a ajījano hi pavamāna sūryaṃ vidhāre śakmanā payaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17489: RV_9,110.04a ajījano amṛta martyeṣv āṃ ṛtasya dharmann amṛtasya cāruṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17491: RV_9,110.05a abhy-abhi hi śravasā tatardithotsaṃ na kaṃ cij janapānam akṣitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17493: RV_9,110.06a ād īṃ ke cit paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ vasuruco divyā abhy anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17494: RV_9,110.06c vāraṃ na devaḥ savitā vy ūrṇute //
GV01rvh1-10u:17495: RV_9,110.07a tve soma prathamā vṛktabarhiṣo mahe vājāya śravase dhiyaṃ dadhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17496: RV_9,110.07c sa tvaṃ no vīra vīryāya codaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17497: RV_9,110.08a divaḥ pīyūṣam pūrvyaṃ yad ukthyam maho gāhād diva ā nir adhukṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17498: RV_9,110.08c indram abhi jāyamānaṃ sam asvaran //
GV01rvh1-10u:17499: RV_9,110.09a adha yad ime pavamāna rodasī imā ca viśvā bhuvanābhi majmanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17500: RV_9,110.09c yūthe na niṣṭhā vṛṣabho vi tiṣṭhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17501: RV_9,110.10a somaḥ punāno avyaye vāre śiśur na krīḷan pavamāno akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17503: RV_9,110.11a eṣa punāno madhumāṃ ṛtāvendrāyenduḥ pavate svādur ūrmiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17505: RV_9,110.12a sa pavasva sahamānaḥ pṛtanyūn sedhan rakṣāṃsy apa durgahāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17507: RV_9,111.01a ayā rucā hariṇyā punāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi tarati svayugvabhiḥ sūro na svayugvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17508: RV_9,111.01d dhārā sutasya rocate punāno aruṣo hariḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17509: RV_9,111.01f viśvā yad rūpā pariyāty ṛkvabhiḥ saptāsyebhir ṛkvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17510: RV_9,111.02a tvaṃ tyat paṇīnāṃ vido vasu sam mātṛbhir marjayasi sva ā dama ṛtasya dhītibhir dame /
GV01rvh1-10u:17511: RV_9,111.02d parāvato na sāma tad yatrā raṇanti dhītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17512: RV_9,111.02f tridhātubhir aruṣībhir vayo dadhe rocamāno vayo dadhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17513: RV_9,111.03a pūrvām anu pradiśaṃ yāti cekitat saṃ raśmibhir yatate darśato ratho daivyo darśato rathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17514: RV_9,111.03d agmann ukthāni pauṃsyendraṃ jaitrāya harṣayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17515: RV_9,111.03f vajraś ca yad bhavatho anapacyutā samatsv anapacyutā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17516: RV_9,112.01a nānānaṃ vā u no dhiyo vi vratāni janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17517: RV_9,112.01c takṣā riṣṭaṃ rutam bhiṣag brahmā sunvantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17519: RV_9,112.02c kārmāro aśmabhir dyubhir hiraṇyavantam icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17520: RV_9,112.03a kārur ahaṃ tato bhiṣag upalaprakṣiṇī nanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17521: RV_9,112.03c nānādhiyo vasūyavo 'nu gā iva tasthimendrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17522: RV_9,112.04a aśvo voḷhā sukhaṃ rathaṃ hasanām upamantriṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17523: RV_9,112.04c śepo romaṇvantau bhedau vār in maṇḍūka icchatīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17524: RV_9,113.01a śaryaṇāvati somam indraḥ pibatu vṛtrahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17525: RV_9,113.01c balaṃ dadhāna ātmani kariṣyan vīryam mahad indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17526: RV_9,113.02a ā pavasva diśām pata ārjīkāt soma mīḍhvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17527: RV_9,113.02c ṛtavākena satyena śraddhayā tapasā suta indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17528: RV_9,113.03a parjanyavṛddham mahiṣaṃ taṃ sūryasya duhitābharat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17529: RV_9,113.03c taṃ gandharvāḥ praty agṛbhṇan taṃ some rasam ādadhur indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17530: RV_9,113.04a ṛtaṃ vadann ṛtadyumna satyaṃ vadan satyakarman /
GV01rvh1-10u:17531: RV_9,113.04c śraddhāṃ vadan soma rājan dhātrā soma pariṣkṛta indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17532: RV_9,113.05a satyamugrasya bṛhataḥ saṃ sravanti saṃsravāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17533: RV_9,113.05c saṃ yanti rasino rasāḥ punāno brahmaṇā hara indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17534: RV_9,113.06a yatra brahmā pavamāna chandasyāṃ vācaṃ vadan /
GV01rvh1-10u:17535: RV_9,113.06c grāvṇā some mahīyate somenānandaṃ janayann indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17536: RV_9,113.07a yatra jyotir ajasraṃ yasmiṃl loke svar hitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17537: RV_9,113.07c tasmin māṃ dhehi pavamānāmṛte loke akṣita indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17538: RV_9,113.08a yatra rājā vaivasvato yatrāvarodhanaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17539: RV_9,113.08c yatrāmūr yahvatīr āpas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17540: RV_9,113.09a yatrānukāmaṃ caraṇaṃ trināke tridive divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17541: RV_9,113.09c lokā yatra jyotiṣmantas tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17542: RV_9,113.10a yatra kāmā nikāmāś ca yatra bradhnasya viṣṭapam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17543: RV_9,113.10c svadhā ca yatra tṛptiś ca tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17544: RV_9,113.11a yatrānandāś ca modāś ca mudaḥ pramuda āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17545: RV_9,113.11c kāmasya yatrāptāḥ kāmās tatra mām amṛtaṃ kṛdhīndrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17546: RV_9,114.01a ya indoḥ pavamānasyānu dhāmāny akramīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17547: RV_9,114.01c tam āhuḥ suprajā iti yas te somāvidhan mana indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17548: RV_9,114.02a ṛṣe mantrakṛtāṃ stomaiḥ kaśyapodvardhayan giraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17549: RV_9,114.02c somaṃ namasya rājānaṃ yo jajñe vīrudhām patir indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17550: RV_9,114.03a sapta diśo nānāsūryāḥ sapta hotāra ṛtvijaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17551: RV_9,114.03c devā ādityā ye sapta tebhiḥ somābhi rakṣa na indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17552: RV_9,114.04a yat te rājañ chṛtaṃ havis tena somābhi rakṣa naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17553: RV_9,114.04c arātīvā mā nas tārīn mo ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamad indrāyendo pari srava //
GV01rvh1-10u:17556: RV_10,001.01a agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamaso jyotiṣāgāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17557: RV_10,001.01c agnir bhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jāto viśvā sadmāny aprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17558: RV_10,001.02a sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17559: RV_10,001.02c citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāṃsy aktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17560: RV_10,001.03a viṣṇur itthā paramam asya vidvāñ jāto bṛhann abhi pāti tṛtīyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17561: RV_10,001.03c āsā yad asya payo akrata svaṃ sacetaso abhy arcanty atra //
GV01rvh1-10u:17562: RV_10,001.04a ata u tvā pitubhṛto janitrīr annāvṛdham prati caranty annaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17563: RV_10,001.04c tā īm praty eṣi punar anyarūpā asi tvaṃ vikṣu mānuṣīṣu hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17564: RV_10,001.05a hotāraṃ citraratham adhvarasya yajñasya-yajñasya ketuṃ ruśantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17565: RV_10,001.05c pratyardhiṃ devasya-devasya mahnā śriyā tv agnim atithiṃ janānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17566: RV_10,001.06a sa tu vastrāṇy adha peśanāni vasāno agnir nābhā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17567: RV_10,001.06c aruṣo jātaḥ pada iḷāyāḥ purohito rājan yakṣīha devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17568: RV_10,001.07a ā hi dyāvāpṛthivī agna ubhe sadā putro na mātarā tatantha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17569: RV_10,001.07c pra yāhy acchośato yaviṣṭhāthā vaha sahasyeha devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17570: RV_10,002.01a piprīhi devāṃ uśato yaviṣṭha vidvāṃ ṛtūṃr ṛtupate yajeha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17571: RV_10,002.01c ye daivyā ṛtvijas tebhir agne tvaṃ hotṝṇām asy āyajiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17572: RV_10,002.02a veṣi hotram uta potraṃ janānām mandhātāsi draviṇodā ṛtāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17573: RV_10,002.02c svāhā vayaṃ kṛṇavāmā havīṃṣi devo devān yajatv agnir arhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17574: RV_10,002.03a ā devānām api panthām aganma yac chaknavāma tad anu pravoḷhum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17575: RV_10,002.03c agnir vidvān sa yajāt sed u hotā so adhvarān sa ṛtūn kalpayāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17576: RV_10,002.04a yad vo vayam pramināma vratāni viduṣāṃ devā aviduṣṭarāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17577: RV_10,002.04c agniṣ ṭad viśvam ā pṛṇāti vidvān yebhir devāṃ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17578: RV_10,002.05a yat pākatrā manasā dīnadakṣā na yajñasya manvate martyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17579: RV_10,002.05c agniṣ ṭad dhotā kratuvid vijānan yajiṣṭho devāṃ ṛtuśo yajāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17580: RV_10,002.06a viśveṣāṃ hy adhvarāṇām anīkaṃ citraṃ ketuṃ janitā tvā jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:17581: RV_10,002.06c sa ā yajasva nṛvatīr anu kṣā spārhā iṣaḥ kṣumatīr viśvajanyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17582: RV_10,002.07a yaṃ tvā dyāvāpṛthivī yaṃ tvāpas tvaṣṭā yaṃ tvā sujanimā jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:17583: RV_10,002.07c panthām anu pravidvān pitṛyāṇaṃ dyumad agne samidhāno vi bhāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17584: RV_10,003.01a ino rājann aratiḥ samiddho raudro dakṣāya suṣumāṃ adarśi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17585: RV_10,003.01c cikid vi bhāti bhāsā bṛhatāsiknīm eti ruśatīm apājan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17586: RV_10,003.02a kṛṣṇāṃ yad enīm abhi varpasā bhūj janayan yoṣām bṛhataḥ pitur jām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17587: RV_10,003.02c ūrdhvam bhānuṃ sūryasya stabhāyan divo vasubhir aratir vi bhāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17588: RV_10,003.03a bhadro bhadrayā sacamāna āgāt svasāraṃ jāro abhy eti paścāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17589: RV_10,003.03c supraketair dyubhir agnir vitiṣṭhan ruśadbhir varṇair abhi rāmam asthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17590: RV_10,003.04a asya yāmāso bṛhato na vagnūn indhānā agneḥ sakhyuḥ śivasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17591: RV_10,003.04c īḍyasya vṛṣṇo bṛhataḥ svāso bhāmāso yāmann aktavaś cikitre //
GV01rvh1-10u:17592: RV_10,003.05a svanā na yasya bhāmāsaḥ pavante rocamānasya bṛhataḥ sudivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17593: RV_10,003.05c jyeṣṭhebhir yas tejiṣṭhaiḥ krīḷumadbhir varṣiṣṭhebhir bhānubhir nakṣati dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17594: RV_10,003.06a asya śuṣmāso dadṛśānapaver jehamānasya svanayan niyudbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17595: RV_10,003.06c pratnebhir yo ruśadbhir devatamo vi rebhadbhir aratir bhāti vibhvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17596: RV_10,003.07a sa ā vakṣi mahi na ā ca satsi divaspṛthivyor aratir yuvatyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17597: RV_10,003.07c agniḥ sutukaḥ sutukebhir aśvai rabhasvadbhī rabhasvāṃ eha gamyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17598: RV_10,004.01a pra te yakṣi pra ta iyarmi manma bhuvo yathā vandyo no haveṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17599: RV_10,004.01c dhanvann iva prapā asi tvam agna iyakṣave pūrave pratna rājan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17600: RV_10,004.02a yaṃ tvā janāso abhi saṃcaranti gāva uṣṇam iva vrajaṃ yaviṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17601: RV_10,004.02c dūto devānām asi martyānām antar mahāṃś carasi rocanena //
GV01rvh1-10u:17602: RV_10,004.03a śiśuṃ na tvā jenyaṃ vardhayantī mātā bibharti sacanasyamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17603: RV_10,004.03c dhanor adhi pravatā yāsi haryañ jigīṣase paśur ivāvasṛṣṭaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17604: RV_10,004.04a mūrā amūra na vayaṃ cikitvo mahitvam agne tvam aṅga vitse /
GV01rvh1-10u:17605: RV_10,004.04c śaye vavriś carati jihvayādan rerihyate yuvatiṃ viśpatiḥ san //
GV01rvh1-10u:17606: RV_10,004.05a kūcij jāyate sanayāsu navyo vane tasthau palito dhūmaketuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17607: RV_10,004.05c asnātāpo vṛṣabho na pra veti sacetaso yam praṇayanta martāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17608: RV_10,004.06a tanūtyajeva taskarā vanargū raśanābhir daśabhir abhy adhītām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17609: RV_10,004.06c iyaṃ te agne navyasī manīṣā yukṣvā rathaṃ na śucayadbhir aṅgaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17610: RV_10,004.07a brahma ca te jātavedo namaś ceyaṃ ca gīḥ sadam id vardhanī bhūt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17611: RV_10,004.07c rakṣā ṇo agne tanayāni tokā rakṣota nas tanvo aprayucchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17612: RV_10,005.01a ekaḥ samudro dharuṇo rayīṇām asmad dhṛdo bhūrijanmā vi caṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17613: RV_10,005.01c siṣakty ūdhar niṇyor upastha utsasya madhye nihitam padaṃ veḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17614: RV_10,005.02a samānaṃ nīḷaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasānāḥ saṃ jagmire mahiṣā arvatībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17615: RV_10,005.02c ṛtasya padaṃ kavayo ni pānti guhā nāmāni dadhire parāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17616: RV_10,005.03a ṛtāyinī māyinī saṃ dadhāte mitvā śiśuṃ jajñatur vardhayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17617: RV_10,005.03c viśvasya nābhiṃ carato dhruvasya kaveś cit tantum manasā viyantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17618: RV_10,005.04a ṛtasya hi vartanayaḥ sujātam iṣo vājāya pradivaḥ sacante /
GV01rvh1-10u:17619: RV_10,005.04c adhīvāsaṃ rodasī vāvasāne ghṛtair annair vāvṛdhāte madhūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17620: RV_10,005.05a sapta svasṝr aruṣīr vāvaśāno vidvān madhva uj jabhārā dṛśe kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17621: RV_10,005.05c antar yeme antarikṣe purājā icchan vavrim avidat pūṣaṇasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17622: RV_10,005.06a sapta maryādāḥ kavayas tatakṣus tāsām ekām id abhy aṃhuro gāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17623: RV_10,005.06c āyor ha skambha upamasya nīḷe pathāṃ visarge dharuṇeṣu tasthau //
GV01rvh1-10u:17624: RV_10,005.07a asac ca sac ca parame vyoman dakṣasya janmann aditer upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17625: RV_10,005.07c agnir ha naḥ prathamajā ṛtasya pūrva āyuni vṛṣabhaś ca dhenuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17626: RV_10,006.01a ayaṃ sa yasya śarmann avobhir agner edhate jaritābhiṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17627: RV_10,006.01c jyeṣṭhebhir yo bhānubhir ṛṣūṇām paryeti parivīto vibhāvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17628: RV_10,006.02a yo bhānubhir vibhāvā vibhāty agnir devebhir ṛtāvājasraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17629: RV_10,006.02c ā yo vivāya sakhyā sakhibhyo 'parihvṛto atyo na saptiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17630: RV_10,006.03a īśe yo viśvasyā devavīter īśe viśvāyur uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17631: RV_10,006.03c ā yasmin manā havīṃṣy agnāv ariṣṭaratha skabhnāti śūṣaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17632: RV_10,006.04a śūṣebhir vṛdho juṣāṇo arkair devāṃ acchā raghupatvā jigāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17633: RV_10,006.04c mandro hotā sa juhvā yajiṣṭhaḥ sammiślo agnir ā jigharti devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17634: RV_10,006.05a tam usrām indraṃ na rejamānam agniṃ gīrbhir namobhir ā kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17635: RV_10,006.05c ā yaṃ viprāso matibhir gṛṇanti jātavedasaṃ juhvaṃ sahānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17636: RV_10,006.06a saṃ yasmin viśvā vasūni jagmur vāje nāśvāḥ saptīvanta evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17637: RV_10,006.06c asme ūtīr indravātatamā arvācīnā agna ā kṛṇuṣva //
GV01rvh1-10u:17638: RV_10,006.07a adhā hy agne mahnā niṣadyā sadyo jajñāno havyo babhūtha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17639: RV_10,006.07c taṃ te devāso anu ketam āyann adhāvardhanta prathamāsa ūmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17640: RV_10,007.01a svasti no divo agne pṛthivyā viśvāyur dhehi yajathāya deva /
GV01rvh1-10u:17641: RV_10,007.01c sacemahi tava dasma praketair uruṣyā ṇa urubhir deva śaṃsaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17642: RV_10,007.02a imā agne matayas tubhyaṃ jātā gobhir aśvair abhi gṛṇanti rādhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17643: RV_10,007.02c yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḍ vaso dadhāno matibhiḥ sujāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17644: RV_10,007.03a agnim manye pitaram agnim āpim agnim bhrātaraṃ sadam it sakhāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17645: RV_10,007.03c agner anīkam bṛhataḥ saparyaṃ divi śukraṃ yajataṃ sūryasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17646: RV_10,007.04a sidhrā agne dhiyo asme sanutrīr yaṃ trāyase dama ā nityahotā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17647: RV_10,007.04c ṛtāvā sa rohidaśvaḥ purukṣur dyubhir asmā ahabhir vāmam astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17648: RV_10,007.05a dyubhir hitam mitram iva prayogam pratnam ṛtvijam adhvarasya jāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:17649: RV_10,007.05c bāhubhyām agnim āyavo 'jananta vikṣu hotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17650: RV_10,007.06a svayaṃ yajasva divi deva devān kiṃ te pākaḥ kṛṇavad apracetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17651: RV_10,007.06c yathāyaja ṛtubhir deva devān evā yajasva tanvaṃ sujāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17652: RV_10,007.07a bhavā no agne 'vitota gopā bhavā vayaskṛd uta no vayodhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17653: RV_10,007.07c rāsvā ca naḥ sumaho havyadātiṃ trāsvota nas tanvo aprayucchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17654: RV_10,008.01a pra ketunā bṛhatā yāty agnir ā rodasī vṛṣabho roravīti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17655: RV_10,008.01c divaś cid antāṃ upamāṃ ud ānaḷ apām upasthe mahiṣo vavardha //
GV01rvh1-10u:17656: RV_10,008.02a mumoda garbho vṛṣabhaḥ kakudmān asremā vatsaḥ śimīvāṃ arāvīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17657: RV_10,008.02c sa devatāty udyatāni kṛṇvan sveṣu kṣayeṣu prathamo jigāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17658: RV_10,008.03a ā yo mūrdhānam pitror arabdha ny adhvare dadhire sūro arṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17659: RV_10,008.03c asya patmann aruṣīr aśvabudhnā ṛtasya yonau tanvo juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17660: RV_10,008.04a uṣa-uṣo hi vaso agram eṣi tvaṃ yamayor abhavo vibhāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17661: RV_10,008.04c ṛtāya sapta dadhiṣe padāni janayan mitraṃ tanve svāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:17662: RV_10,008.05a bhuvaś cakṣur maha ṛtasya gopā bhuvo varuṇo yad ṛtāya veṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17663: RV_10,008.05c bhuvo apāṃ napāj jātavedo bhuvo dūto yasya havyaṃ jujoṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17664: RV_10,008.06a bhuvo yajñasya rajasaś ca netā yatrā niyudbhiḥ sacase śivābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17665: RV_10,008.06c divi mūrdhānaṃ dadhiṣe svarṣāṃ jihvām agne cakṛṣe havyavāham //
GV01rvh1-10u:17666: RV_10,008.07a asya tritaḥ kratunā vavre antar icchan dhītim pitur evaiḥ parasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17667: RV_10,008.07c sacasyamānaḥ pitror upasthe jāmi bruvāṇa āyudhāni veti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17668: RV_10,008.08a sa pitryāṇy āyudhāni vidvān indreṣita āptyo abhy ayudhyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17669: RV_10,008.08c triśīrṣāṇaṃ saptaraśmiṃ jaghanvān tvāṣṭrasya cin niḥ sasṛje trito gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17670: RV_10,008.09a bhūrīd indra udinakṣantam ojo 'vābhinat satpatir manyamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17671: RV_10,008.09c tvāṣṭrasya cid viśvarūpasya gonām ācakrāṇas trīṇi śīrṣā parā vark //
GV01rvh1-10u:17672: RV_10,009.01a āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:17674: RV_10,009.02a yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17676: RV_10,009.03a tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17678: RV_10,009.04a śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:17679: RV_10,009.04c śaṃ yor abhi sravantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17682: RV_10,009.06a apsu me somo abravīd antar viśvāni bheṣajā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17684: RV_10,009.07a āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama /
GV01rvh1-10u:17686: RV_10,009.08a idam āpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritam mayi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17687: RV_10,009.08c yad vāham abhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17688: RV_10,009.09a āpo adyānv acāriṣaṃ rasena sam agasmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17689: RV_10,009.09c payasvān agna ā gahi tam mā saṃ sṛja varcasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17690: RV_10,010.01a o cit sakhāyaṃ sakhyā vavṛtyāṃ tiraḥ purū cid arṇavaṃ jaganvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17691: RV_10,010.01c pitur napātam ā dadhīta vedhā adhi kṣami prataraṃ dīdhyānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17692: RV_10,010.02a na te sakhā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭy etat salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17693: RV_10,010.02c mahas putrāso asurasya vīrā divo dhartāra urviyā pari khyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17694: RV_10,010.03a uśanti ghā te amṛtāsa etad ekasya cit tyajasam martyasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17695: RV_10,010.03c ni te mano manasi dhāyy asme janyuḥ patis tanvam ā viviśyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17696: RV_10,010.04a na yat purā cakṛmā kad dha nūnam ṛtā vadanto anṛtaṃ rapema /
GV01rvh1-10u:17697: RV_10,010.04c gandharvo apsv apyā ca yoṣā sā no nābhiḥ paramaṃ jāmi tan nau //
GV01rvh1-10u:17698: RV_10,010.05a garbhe nu nau janitā dampatī kar devas tvaṣṭā savitā viśvarūpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17699: RV_10,010.05c nakir asya pra minanti vratāni veda nāv asya pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17700: RV_10,010.06a ko asya veda prathamasyāhnaḥ ka īṃ dadarśa ka iha pra vocat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17701: RV_10,010.06c bṛhan mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma kad u brava āhano vīcyā nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:17702: RV_10,010.07a yamasya mā yamyaṃ kāma āgan samāne yonau sahaśeyyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17703: RV_10,010.07c jāyeva patye tanvaṃ riricyāṃ vi cid vṛheva rathyeva cakrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17704: RV_10,010.08a na tiṣṭhanti na ni miṣanty ete devānāṃ spaśa iha ye caranti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17705: RV_10,010.08c anyena mad āhano yāhi tūyaṃ tena vi vṛha rathyeva cakrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17706: RV_10,010.09a rātrībhir asmā ahabhir daśasyet sūryasya cakṣur muhur un mimīyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17707: RV_10,010.09c divā pṛthivyā mithunā sabandhū yamīr yamasya bibhṛyād ajāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17708: RV_10,010.10a ā ghā tā gacchān uttarā yugāni yatra jāmayaḥ kṛṇavann ajāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17709: RV_10,010.10c upa barbṛhi vṛṣabhāya bāhum anyam icchasva subhage patim mat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17710: RV_10,010.11a kim bhrātāsad yad anātham bhavāti kim u svasā yan nirṛtir nigacchāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17711: RV_10,010.11c kāmamūtā bahv etad rapāmi tanvā me tanvaṃ sam pipṛgdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17712: RV_10,010.12a na vā u te tanvā tanvaṃ sam papṛcyām pāpam āhur yaḥ svasāraṃ nigacchāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17713: RV_10,010.12c anyena mat pramudaḥ kalpayasva na te bhrātā subhage vaṣṭy etat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17714: RV_10,010.13a bato batāsi yama naiva te mano hṛdayaṃ cāvidāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17715: RV_10,010.13c anyā kila tvāṃ kakṣyeva yuktam pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17716: RV_10,010.14a anyam ū ṣu tvaṃ yamy anya u tvām pari ṣvajāte libujeva vṛkṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17717: RV_10,010.14c tasya vā tvam mana icchā sa vā tavādhā kṛṇuṣva saṃvidaṃ subhadrām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17718: RV_10,011.01a vṛṣā vṛṣṇe duduhe dohasā divaḥ payāṃsi yahvo aditer adābhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17719: RV_10,011.01c viśvaṃ sa veda varuṇo yathā dhiyā sa yajñiyo yajatu yajñiyāṃ ṛtūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:17720: RV_10,011.02a rapad gandharvīr apyā ca yoṣaṇā nadasya nāde pari pātu me manaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17721: RV_10,011.02c iṣṭasya madhye aditir ni dhātu no bhrātā no jyeṣṭhaḥ prathamo vi vocati //
GV01rvh1-10u:17722: RV_10,011.03a so cin nu bhadrā kṣumatī yaśasvaty uṣā uvāsa manave svarvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17723: RV_10,011.03c yad īm uśantam uśatām anu kratum agniṃ hotāraṃ vidathāya jījanan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17724: RV_10,011.04a adha tyaṃ drapsaṃ vibhvaṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ vir ābharad iṣitaḥ śyeno adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:17725: RV_10,011.04c yadī viśo vṛṇate dasmam āryā agniṃ hotāram adha dhīr ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:17726: RV_10,011.05a sadāsi raṇvo yavaseva puṣyate hotrābhir agne manuṣaḥ svadhvaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17727: RV_10,011.05c viprasya vā yac chaśamāna ukthyaṃ vājaṃ sasavāṃ upayāsi bhūribhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17728: RV_10,011.06a ud īraya pitarā jāra ā bhagam iyakṣati haryato hṛtta iṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:17729: RV_10,011.06c vivakti vahniḥ svapasyate makhas taviṣyate asuro vepate matī //
GV01rvh1-10u:17730: RV_10,011.07a yas te agne sumatim marto akṣat sahasaḥ sūno ati sa pra śṛṇve /
GV01rvh1-10u:17731: RV_10,011.07c iṣaṃ dadhāno vahamāno aśvair ā sa dyumāṃ amavān bhūṣati dyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:17732: RV_10,011.08a yad agna eṣā samitir bhavāti devī deveṣu yajatā yajatra /
GV01rvh1-10u:17733: RV_10,011.08c ratnā ca yad vibhajāsi svadhāvo bhāgaṃ no atra vasumantaṃ vītāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17734: RV_10,011.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17735: RV_10,011.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17736: RV_10,012.01a dyāvā ha kṣāmā prathame ṛtenābhiśrāve bhavataḥ satyavācā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17737: RV_10,012.01c devo yan martān yajathāya kṛṇvan sīdad dhotā pratyaṅ svam asuṃ yan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17738: RV_10,012.02a devo devān paribhūr ṛtena vahā no havyam prathamaś cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17739: RV_10,012.02c dhūmaketuḥ samidhā bhāṛjīko mandro hotā nityo vācā yajīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17740: RV_10,012.03a svāvṛg devasyāmṛtaṃ yadī gor ato jātāso dhārayanta urvī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17741: RV_10,012.03c viśve devā anu tat te yajur gur duhe yad enī divyaṃ ghṛtaṃ vāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17742: RV_10,012.04a arcāmi vāṃ vardhāyāpo ghṛtasnū dyāvābhūmī śṛṇutaṃ rodasī me /
GV01rvh1-10u:17743: RV_10,012.04c ahā yad dyāvo 'sunītim ayan madhvā no atra pitarā śiśītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17744: RV_10,012.05a kiṃ svin no rājā jagṛhe kad asyāti vrataṃ cakṛmā ko vi veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:17745: RV_10,012.05c mitraś cid dhi ṣmā juhurāṇo devāñ chloko na yātām api vājo asti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17746: RV_10,012.06a durmantv atrāmṛtasya nāma salakṣmā yad viṣurūpā bhavāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17747: RV_10,012.06c yamasya yo manavate sumantv agne tam ṛṣva pāhy aprayucchan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17748: RV_10,012.07a yasmin devā vidathe mādayante vivasvataḥ sadane dhārayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:17749: RV_10,012.07c sūrye jyotir adadhur māsy aktūn pari dyotaniṃ carato ajasrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17750: RV_10,012.08a yasmin devā manmani saṃcaranty apīcye na vayam asya vidma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17751: RV_10,012.08c mitro no atrāditir anāgān savitā devo varuṇāya vocat //
GV01rvh1-10u:17752: RV_10,012.09a śrudhī no agne sadane sadhasthe yukṣvā ratham amṛtasya dravitnum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17753: RV_10,012.09c ā no vaha rodasī devaputre mākir devānām apa bhūr iha syāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17754: RV_10,013.01a yuje vām brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhir vi śloka etu pathyeva sūreḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17755: RV_10,013.01c śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17756: RV_10,013.02a yame iva yatamāne yad aitam pra vām bharan mānuṣā devayantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17757: RV_10,013.02c ā sīdataṃ svam u lokaṃ vidāne svāsasthe bhavatam indave naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17758: RV_10,013.03a pañca padāni rupo anv arohaṃ catuṣpadīm anv emi vratena /
GV01rvh1-10u:17759: RV_10,013.03c akṣareṇa prati mima etām ṛtasya nābhāv adhi sam punāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17760: RV_10,013.04a devebhyaḥ kam avṛṇīta mṛtyum prajāyai kam amṛtaṃ nāvṛṇīta /
GV01rvh1-10u:17761: RV_10,013.04c bṛhaspatiṃ yajñam akṛṇvata ṛṣim priyāṃ yamas tanvam prārirecīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17762: RV_10,013.05a sapta kṣaranti śiśave marutvate pitre putrāso apy avīvatann ṛtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17763: RV_10,013.05c ubhe id asyobhayasya rājata ubhe yatete ubhayasya puṣyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17764: RV_10,014.01a pareyivāṃsam pravato mahīr anu bahubhyaḥ panthām anupaspaśānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17765: RV_10,014.01c vaivasvataṃ saṃgamanaṃ janānāṃ yamaṃ rājānaṃ haviṣā duvasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17766: RV_10,014.02a yamo no gātum prathamo viveda naiṣā gavyūtir apabhartavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:17767: RV_10,014.02c yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyur enā jajñānāḥ pathyā anu svāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17768: RV_10,014.03a mātalī kavyair yamo aṅgirobhir bṛhaspatir ṛkvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17769: RV_10,014.03c yāṃś ca devā vāvṛdhur ye ca devān svāhānye svadhayānye madanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17770: RV_10,014.04a imaṃ yama prastaram ā hi sīdāṅgirobhiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17771: RV_10,014.04c ā tvā mantrāḥ kaviśastā vahantv enā rājan haviṣā mādayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:17772: RV_10,014.05a aṅgirobhir ā gahi yajñiyebhir yama vairūpair iha mādayasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:17773: RV_10,014.05c vivasvantaṃ huve yaḥ pitā te 'smin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17774: RV_10,014.06a aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17775: RV_10,014.06c teṣāṃ vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17776: RV_10,014.07a prehi prehi pathibhiḥ pūrvyebhir yatrā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pareyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17777: RV_10,014.07c ubhā rājānā svadhayā madantā yamam paśyāsi varuṇaṃ ca devam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17778: RV_10,014.08a saṃ gacchasva pitṛbhiḥ saṃ yameneṣṭāpūrtena parame vyoman /
GV01rvh1-10u:17779: RV_10,014.08c hitvāyāvadyam punar astam ehi saṃ gacchasva tanvā suvarcāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17780: RV_10,014.09a apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāto 'smā etam pitaro lokam akran /
GV01rvh1-10u:17781: RV_10,014.09c ahobhir adbhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadāty avasānam asmai //
GV01rvh1-10u:17782: RV_10,014.10a ati drava sārameyau śvānau caturakṣau śabalau sādhunā pathā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17783: RV_10,014.10c athā pitṝn suvidatrāṃ upehi yamena ye sadhamādam madanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17784: RV_10,014.11a yau te śvānau yama rakṣitārau caturakṣau pathirakṣī nṛcakṣasau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17785: RV_10,014.11c tābhyām enam pari dehi rājan svasti cāsmā anamīvaṃ ca dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17786: RV_10,014.12a urūṇasāv asutṛpā udumbalau yamasya dūtau carato janāṃ anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17787: RV_10,014.12c tāv asmabhyaṃ dṛśaye sūryāya punar dātām asum adyeha bhadram //
GV01rvh1-10u:17788: RV_10,014.13a yamāya somaṃ sunuta yamāya juhutā haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17789: RV_10,014.13c yamaṃ ha yajño gacchaty agnidūto araṅkṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17790: RV_10,014.14a yamāya ghṛtavad dhavir juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:17791: RV_10,014.14c sa no deveṣv ā yamad dīrgham āyuḥ pra jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17792: RV_10,014.15a yamāya madhumattamaṃ rājñe havyaṃ juhotana /
GV01rvh1-10u:17793: RV_10,014.15c idaṃ nama ṛṣibhyaḥ pūrvajebhyaḥ pūrvebhyaḥ pathikṛdbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17794: RV_10,014.16a trikadrukebhiḥ patati ṣaḷ urvīr ekam id bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17795: RV_10,014.16c triṣṭub gāyatrī chandāṃsi sarvā tā yama āhitā //
