GV01rvh1-10u:17796: RV_10,015.01a ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17797: RV_10,015.01c asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17798: RV_10,015.02a idam pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17799: RV_10,015.02c ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣattā ye vā nūnaṃ suvṛjanāsu vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17800: RV_10,015.03a āham pitṝn suvidatrāṃ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17801: RV_10,015.03c barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17802: RV_10,015.04a barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17803: RV_10,015.04c ta ā gatāvasā śantamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17804: RV_10,015.05a upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17805: RV_10,015.05c ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantv adhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17806: RV_10,015.06a ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:17807: RV_10,015.06c mā hiṃsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:17808: RV_10,015.07a āsīnāso aruṇīnām upasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17809: RV_10,015.07c putrebhyaḥ pitaras tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata ta ihorjaṃ dadhāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:17810: RV_10,015.08a ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāso 'nūhire somapīthaṃ vasiṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17811: RV_10,015.08c tebhir yamaḥ saṃrarāṇo havīṃṣy uśann uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17812: RV_10,015.09a ye tātṛṣur devatrā jehamānā hotrāvida stomataṣṭāso arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17813: RV_10,015.09c āgne yāhi suvidatrebhir arvāṅ satyaiḥ kavyaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17814: RV_10,015.10a ye satyāso havirado haviṣpā indreṇa devaiḥ sarathaṃ dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17815: RV_10,015.10c āgne yāhi sahasraṃ devavandaiḥ paraiḥ pūrvaiḥ pitṛbhir gharmasadbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17816: RV_10,015.11a agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gacchata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17817: RV_10,015.11c attā havīṃṣi prayatāni barhiṣy athā rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:17818: RV_10,015.12a tvam agna īḷito jātavedo 'vāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17819: RV_10,015.12c prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā havīṃṣi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17820: RV_10,015.13a ye ceha pitaro ye ca neha yāṃś ca vidma yāṃ u ca na pravidma /
GV01rvh1-10u:17821: RV_10,015.13c tvaṃ vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhir yajñaṃ sukṛtaṃ juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:17822: RV_10,015.14a ye agnidagdhā ye anagnidagdhā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:17823: RV_10,015.14c tebhiḥ svarāḷ asunītim etāṃ yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ kalpayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:17824: RV_10,016.01a mainam agne vi daho mābhi śoco māsya tvacaṃ cikṣipo mā śarīram /
GV01rvh1-10u:17825: RV_10,016.01c yadā śṛtaṃ kṛṇavo jātavedo 'them enam pra hiṇutāt pitṛbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17826: RV_10,016.02a śṛtaṃ yadā karasi jātavedo 'them enam pari dattāt pitṛbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17827: RV_10,016.02c yadā gacchāty asunītim etām athā devānāṃ vaśanīr bhavāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:17828: RV_10,016.03a sūryaṃ cakṣur gacchatu vātam ātmā dyāṃ ca gaccha pṛthivīṃ ca dharmaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17829: RV_10,016.03c apo vā gaccha yadi tatra te hitam oṣadhīṣu prati tiṣṭhā śarīraiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17830: RV_10,016.04a ajo bhāgas tapasā taṃ tapasva taṃ te śocis tapatu taṃ te arciḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17831: RV_10,016.04c yās te śivās tanvo jātavedas tābhir vahainaṃ sukṛtām u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17832: RV_10,016.05a ava sṛja punar agne pitṛbhyo yas ta āhutaś carati svadhābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17833: RV_10,016.05c āyur vasāna upa vetu śeṣaḥ saṃ gacchatāṃ tanvā jātavedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17834: RV_10,016.06a yat te kṛṣṇaḥ śakuna ātutoda pipīlaḥ sarpa uta vā śvāpadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17835: RV_10,016.06c agniṣ ṭad viśvād agadaṃ kṛṇotu somaś ca yo brāhmaṇāṃ āviveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:17836: RV_10,016.07a agner varma pari gobhir vyayasva sam prorṇuṣva pīvasā medasā ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:17837: RV_10,016.07c net tvā dhṛṣṇur harasā jarhṛṣāṇo dadhṛg vidhakṣyan paryaṅkhayāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:17838: RV_10,016.08a imam agne camasam mā vi jihvaraḥ priyo devānām uta somyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17839: RV_10,016.08c eṣa yaś camaso devapānas tasmin devā amṛtā mādayante //
GV01rvh1-10u:17840: RV_10,016.09a kravyādam agnim pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājño gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17841: RV_10,016.09c ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17842: RV_10,016.10a yo agniḥ kravyāt praviveśa vo gṛham imam paśyann itaraṃ jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17843: RV_10,016.10c taṃ harāmi pitṛyajñāya devaṃ sa gharmam invāt parame sadhasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:17844: RV_10,016.11a yo agniḥ kravyavāhanaḥ pitṝn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17845: RV_10,016.11c pred u havyāni vocati devebhyaś ca pitṛbhya ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17846: RV_10,016.12a uśantas tvā ni dhīmahy uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17847: RV_10,016.12c uśann uśata ā vaha pitṝn haviṣe attave //
GV01rvh1-10u:17848: RV_10,016.13a yaṃ tvam agne samadahas tam u nir vāpayā punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17849: RV_10,016.13c kiyāmbv atra rohatu pākadūrvā vyalkaśā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17851: RV_10,016.14c maṇḍūkyā su saṃ gama imaṃ sv agniṃ harṣaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17852: RV_10,017.01a tvaṣṭā duhitre vahatuṃ kṛṇotītīdaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ sam eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17853: RV_10,017.01c yamasya mātā paryuhyamānā maho jāyā vivasvato nanāśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:17854: RV_10,017.02a apāgūhann amṛtām martyebhyaḥ kṛtvī savarṇām adadur vivasvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17855: RV_10,017.02c utāśvināv abharad yat tad āsīd ajahād u dvā mithunā saraṇyūḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17856: RV_10,017.03a pūṣā tvetaś cyāvayatu pra vidvān anaṣṭapaśur bhuvanasya gopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17857: RV_10,017.03c sa tvaitebhyaḥ pari dadat pitṛbhyo 'gnir devebhyaḥ suvidatriyebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17858: RV_10,017.04a āyur viśvāyuḥ pari pāsati tvā pūṣā tvā pātu prapathe purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17859: RV_10,017.04c yatrāsate sukṛto yatra te yayus tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17860: RV_10,017.05a pūṣemā āśā anu veda sarvāḥ so asmāṃ abhayatamena neṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17861: RV_10,017.05c svastidā āghṛṇiḥ sarvavīro 'prayucchan pura etu prajānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17862: RV_10,017.06a prapathe pathām ajaniṣṭa pūṣā prapathe divaḥ prapathe pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17863: RV_10,017.06c ubhe abhi priyatame sadhasthe ā ca parā ca carati prajānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:17864: RV_10,017.07a sarasvatīṃ devayanto havante sarasvatīm adhvare tāyamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:17865: RV_10,017.07c sarasvatīṃ sukṛto ahvayanta sarasvatī dāśuṣe vāryaṃ dāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17866: RV_10,017.08a sarasvati yā sarathaṃ yayātha svadhābhir devi pitṛbhir madantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:17867: RV_10,017.08c āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayasvānamīvā iṣa ā dhehy asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:17868: RV_10,017.09a sarasvatīṃ yām pitaro havante dakṣiṇā yajñam abhinakṣamāṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17869: RV_10,017.09c sahasrārgham iḷo atra bhāgaṃ rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17870: RV_10,017.10a āpo asmān mātaraḥ śundhayantu ghṛtena no ghṛtapvaḥ punantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17871: RV_10,017.10c viśvaṃ hi ripram pravahanti devīr ud id ābhyaḥ śucir ā pūta emi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17872: RV_10,017.11a drapsaś caskanda prathamāṃ anu dyūn imaṃ ca yonim anu yaś ca pūrvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17873: RV_10,017.11c samānaṃ yonim anu saṃcarantaṃ drapsaṃ juhomy anu sapta hotrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17874: RV_10,017.12a yas te drapsa skandati yas te aṃśur bāhucyuto dhiṣaṇāyā upasthāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17875: RV_10,017.12c adhvaryor vā pari vā yaḥ pavitrāt taṃ te juhomi manasā vaṣaṭkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17876: RV_10,017.13a yas te drapsa skanno yas te aṃśur avaś ca yaḥ paraḥ srucā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17877: RV_10,017.13c ayaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ saṃ taṃ siñcatu rādhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17878: RV_10,017.14a payasvatīr oṣadhayaḥ payasvan māmakaṃ vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17879: RV_10,017.14c apām payasvad it payas tena mā saha śundhata //
GV01rvh1-10u:17880: RV_10,018.01a param mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas te sva itaro devayānāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:17881: RV_10,018.01c cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajāṃ rīriṣo mota vīrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:17882: RV_10,018.02a mṛtyoḥ padaṃ yopayanto yad aita drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17883: RV_10,018.02c āpyāyamānāḥ prajayā dhanena śuddhāḥ pūtā bhavata yajñiyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17884: RV_10,018.03a ime jīvā vi mṛtair āvavṛtrann abhūd bhadrā devahūtir no adya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17885: RV_10,018.03c prāñco agāma nṛtaye hasāya drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17886: RV_10,018.04a imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17887: RV_10,018.04c śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīr antar mṛtyuṃ dadhatām parvatena //
GV01rvh1-10u:17888: RV_10,018.05a yathāhāny anupūrvam bhavanti yatha ṛtava ṛtubhir yanti sādhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17889: RV_10,018.05c yathā na pūrvam aparo jahāty evā dhātar āyūṃṣi kalpayaiṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17890: RV_10,018.06a ā rohatāyur jarasaṃ vṛṇānā anupūrvaṃ yatamānā yati ṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:17891: RV_10,018.06c iha tvaṣṭā sujanimā sajoṣā dīrgham āyuḥ karati jīvase vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17892: RV_10,018.07a imā nārīr avidhavāḥ supatnīr āñjanena sarpiṣā saṃ viśantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:17893: RV_10,018.07c anaśravo 'namīvāḥ suratnā ā rohantu janayo yonim agre //
GV01rvh1-10u:17894: RV_10,018.08a ud īrṣva nāry abhi jīvalokaṃ gatāsum etam upa śeṣa ehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17895: RV_10,018.08c hastagrābhasya didhiṣos tavedam patyur janitvam abhi sam babhūtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:17896: RV_10,018.09a dhanur hastād ādadāno mṛtasyāsme kṣatrāya varcase balāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17897: RV_10,018.09c atraiva tvam iha vayaṃ suvīrā viśvā spṛdho abhimātīr jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:17898: RV_10,018.10a upa sarpa mātaram bhūmim etām uruvyacasam pṛthivīṃ suśevām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17899: RV_10,018.10c ūrṇamradā yuvatir dakṣiṇāvata eṣā tvā pātu nirṛter upasthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:17900: RV_10,018.11a uc chvañcasva pṛthivi mā ni bādhathāḥ sūpāyanāsmai bhava sūpavañcanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17901: RV_10,018.11c mātā putraṃ yathā sicābhy enam bhūma ūrṇuhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:17902: RV_10,018.12a ucchvañcamānā pṛthivī su tiṣṭhatu sahasram mita upa hi śrayantām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17903: RV_10,018.12c te gṛhāso ghṛtaścuto bhavantu viśvāhāsmai śaraṇāḥ santv atra //
GV01rvh1-10u:17904: RV_10,018.13a ut te stabhnāmi pṛthivīṃ tvat parīmaṃ logaṃ nidadhan mo ahaṃ riṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17905: RV_10,018.13c etāṃ sthūṇām pitaro dhārayantu te 'trā yamaḥ sādanā te minotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17906: RV_10,018.14a pratīcīne mām ahanīṣvāḥ parṇam ivā dadhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17907: RV_10,018.14c pratīcīṃ jagrabhā vācam aśvaṃ raśanayā yathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17908: RV_10,019.01a ni vartadhvam mānu gātāsmān siṣakta revatīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17909: RV_10,019.01c agnīṣomā punarvasū asme dhārayataṃ rayim //
GV01rvh1-10u:17910: RV_10,019.02a punar enā ni vartaya punar enā ny ā kuru /
GV01rvh1-10u:17911: RV_10,019.02c indra eṇā ni yacchatv agnir enā upājatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:17912: RV_10,019.03a punar etā ni vartantām asmin puṣyantu gopatau /
GV01rvh1-10u:17913: RV_10,019.03c ihaivāgne ni dhārayeha tiṣṭhatu yā rayiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17914: RV_10,019.04a yan niyānaṃ nyayanaṃ saṃjñānaṃ yat parāyaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17915: RV_10,019.04c āvartanaṃ nivartanaṃ yo gopā api taṃ huve //
GV01rvh1-10u:17916: RV_10,019.05a ya udānaḍ vyayanaṃ ya udānaṭ parāyaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17917: RV_10,019.05c āvartanaṃ nivartanam api gopā ni vartatām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17918: RV_10,019.06a ā nivarta ni vartaya punar na indra gā dehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:17920: RV_10,019.07a pari vo viśvato dadha ūrjā ghṛtena payasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17921: RV_10,019.07c ye devāḥ ke ca yajñiyās te rayyā saṃ sṛjantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17922: RV_10,019.08a ā nivartana vartaya ni nivartana vartaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17923: RV_10,019.08c bhūmyāś catasraḥ pradiśas tābhya enā ni vartaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17924: RV_10,020.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17925: RV_10,020.02a agnim īḷe bhujāṃ yaviṣṭhaṃ śāsā mitraṃ durdharītum /
GV01rvh1-10u:17926: RV_10,020.02c yasya dharman svar enīḥ saparyanti mātur ūdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17927: RV_10,020.03a yam āsā kṛpanīḷam bhāsāketuṃ vardhayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17929: RV_10,020.04a aryo viśāṃ gātur eti pra yad ānaḍ divo antān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17931: RV_10,020.05a juṣad dhavyā mānuṣasyordhvas tasthāv ṛbhvā yajñe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17933: RV_10,020.06a sa hi kṣemo havir yajñaḥ śruṣṭīd asya gātur eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:17935: RV_10,020.07a yajñāsāhaṃ duva iṣe 'gnim pūrvasya śevasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17937: RV_10,020.08a naro ye ke cāsmad ā viśvet te vāma ā syuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17939: RV_10,020.09a kṛṣṇaḥ śveto 'ruṣo yāmo asya bradhna ṛjra uta śoṇo yaśasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:17941: RV_10,020.10a evā te agne vimado manīṣām ūrjo napād amṛtebhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17942: RV_10,020.10c gira ā vakṣat sumatīr iyāna iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17943: RV_10,021.01a āgniṃ na svavṛktibhir hotāraṃ tvā vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:17944: RV_10,021.01c yajñāya stīrṇabarhiṣe vi vo made śīram pāvakaśociṣaṃ vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17945: RV_10,021.02a tvām u te svābhuvaḥ śumbhanty aśvarādhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17946: RV_10,021.02c veti tvām upasecanī vi vo mada ṛjītir agna āhutir vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17947: RV_10,021.03a tve dharmāṇa āsate juhūbhiḥ siñcatīr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:17948: RV_10,021.03c kṛṣṇā rūpāṇy arjunā vi vo made viśvā adhi śriyo dhiṣe vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17949: RV_10,021.04a yam agne manyase rayiṃ sahasāvann amartya /
GV01rvh1-10u:17950: RV_10,021.04c tam ā no vājasātaye vi vo made yajñeṣu citram ā bharā vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17951: RV_10,021.05a agnir jāto atharvaṇā vidad viśvāni kāvyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17952: RV_10,021.05c bhuvad dūto vivasvato vi vo made priyo yamasya kāmyo vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17953: RV_10,021.06a tvāṃ yajñeṣv īḷate 'gne prayaty adhvare /
GV01rvh1-10u:17954: RV_10,021.06c tvaṃ vasūni kāmyā vi vo made viśvā dadhāsi dāśuṣe vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17955: RV_10,021.07a tvāṃ yajñeṣv ṛtvijaṃ cārum agne ni ṣedire /
GV01rvh1-10u:17956: RV_10,021.07c ghṛtapratīkam manuṣo vi vo made śukraṃ cetiṣṭham akṣabhir vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17957: RV_10,021.08a agne śukreṇa śociṣoru prathayase bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17958: RV_10,021.08c abhikrandan vṛṣāyase vi vo made garbhaṃ dadhāsi jāmiṣu vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:17959: RV_10,022.01a kuha śruta indraḥ kasminn adya jane mitro na śrūyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:17960: RV_10,022.01c ṛṣīṇāṃ vā yaḥ kṣaye guhā vā carkṛṣe girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17961: RV_10,022.02a iha śruta indro asme adya stave vajry ṛcīṣamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17962: RV_10,022.02c mitro na yo janeṣv ā yaśaś cakre asāmy ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17963: RV_10,022.03a maho yas patiḥ śavaso asāmy ā maho nṛmṇasya tūtujiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17964: RV_10,022.03c bhartā vajrasya dhṛṣṇoḥ pitā putram iva priyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17965: RV_10,022.04a yujāno aśvā vātasya dhunī devo devasya vajrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17966: RV_10,022.04c syantā pathā virukmatā sṛjāna stoṣy adhvanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17967: RV_10,022.05a tvaṃ tyā cid vātasyāśvāgā ṛjrā tmanā vahadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:17968: RV_10,022.05c yayor devo na martyo yantā nakir vidāyyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17969: RV_10,022.06a adha gmantośanā pṛcchate vāṃ kadarthā na ā gṛham /
GV01rvh1-10u:17970: RV_10,022.06c ā jagmathuḥ parākād divaś ca gmaś ca martyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17971: RV_10,022.07a ā na indra pṛkṣase 'smākam brahmodyatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:17972: RV_10,022.07c tat tvā yācāmahe 'vaḥ śuṣṇaṃ yad dhann amānuṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17973: RV_10,022.08a akarmā dasyur abhi no amantur anyavrato amānuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17974: RV_10,022.08c tvaṃ tasyāmitrahan vadhar dāsasya dambhaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:17975: RV_10,022.09a tvaṃ na indra śūra śūrair uta tvotāso barhaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:17976: RV_10,022.09c purutrā te vi pūrtayo navanta kṣoṇayo yathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17977: RV_10,022.10a tvaṃ tān vṛtrahatye codayo nṝn kārpāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17978: RV_10,022.10c guhā yadī kavīnāṃ viśāṃ nakṣatraśavasām //
GV01rvh1-10u:17979: RV_10,022.11a makṣū tā ta indra dānāpnasa ākṣāṇe śūra vajrivaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17980: RV_10,022.11c yad dha śuṣṇasya dambhayo jātaṃ viśvaṃ sayāvabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17981: RV_10,022.12a mākudhryag indra śūra vasvīr asme bhūvann abhiṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17982: RV_10,022.12c vayaṃ-vayaṃ ta āsāṃ sumne syāma vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17983: RV_10,022.13a asme tā ta indra santu satyāhiṃsantīr upaspṛśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17984: RV_10,022.13c vidyāma yāsām bhujo dhenūnāṃ na vajrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17985: RV_10,022.14a ahastā yad apadī vardhata kṣāḥ śacībhir vedyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17986: RV_10,022.14c śuṣṇam pari pradakṣiṇid viśvāyave ni śiśnathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17987: RV_10,022.15a pibā-pibed indra śūra somam mā riṣaṇyo vasavāna vasuḥ san /
GV01rvh1-10u:17988: RV_10,022.15c uta trāyasva gṛṇato maghono mahaś ca rāyo revatas kṛdhī naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17989: RV_10,023.01a yajāmaha indraṃ vajradakṣiṇaṃ harīṇāṃ rathyaṃ vivratānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:17990: RV_10,023.01c pra śmaśru dodhuvad ūrdhvathā bhūd vi senābhir dayamāno vi rādhasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:17991: RV_10,023.02a harī nv asya yā vane vide vasv indro maghair maghavā vṛtrahā bhuvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:17992: RV_10,023.02c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣāḥ patyate śavo 'va kṣṇaumi dāsasya nāma cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:17993: RV_10,023.03a yadā vajraṃ hiraṇyam id athā rathaṃ harī yam asya vahato vi sūribhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:17994: RV_10,023.03c ā tiṣṭhati maghavā sanaśruta indro vājasya dīrghaśravasas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17995: RV_10,023.04a so cin nu vṛṣṭir yūthyā svā sacāṃ indraḥ śmaśrūṇi haritābhi pruṣṇute /
GV01rvh1-10u:17996: RV_10,023.04c ava veti sukṣayaṃ sute madhūd id dhūnoti vāto yathā vanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:17997: RV_10,023.05a yo vācā vivāco mṛdhravācaḥ purū sahasrāśivā jaghāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:17998: RV_10,023.05c tat-tad id asya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasi piteva yas taviṣīṃ vāvṛdhe śavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:17999: RV_10,023.06a stomaṃ ta indra vimadā ajījanann apūrvyam purutamaṃ sudānave /
GV01rvh1-10u:18000: RV_10,023.06c vidmā hy asya bhojanam inasya yad ā paśuṃ na gopāḥ karāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18001: RV_10,023.07a mākir na enā sakhyā vi yauṣus tava cendra vimadasya ca ṛṣeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18002: RV_10,023.07c vidmā hi te pramatiṃ deva jāmivad asme te santu sakhyā śivāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:18003: RV_10,024.01a indra somam imam piba madhumantaṃ camū sutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18004: RV_10,024.01c asme rayiṃ ni dhāraya vi vo made sahasriṇam purūvaso vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18005: RV_10,024.02a tvāṃ yajñebhir ukthair upa havyebhir īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18006: RV_10,024.02c śacīpate śacīnāṃ vi vo made śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryaṃ vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18007: RV_10,024.03a yas patir vāryāṇām asi radhrasya coditā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18008: RV_10,024.03c indra stotṝṇām avitā vi vo made dviṣo naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18009: RV_10,024.04a yuvaṃ śakrā māyāvinā samīcī nir amanthatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18010: RV_10,024.04c vimadena yad īḷitā nāsatyā niramanthatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18011: RV_10,024.05a viśve devā akṛpanta samīcyor niṣpatantyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18012: RV_10,024.05c nāsatyāv abruvan devāḥ punar ā vahatād iti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18013: RV_10,024.06a madhuman me parāyaṇam madhumat punar āyanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18014: RV_10,024.06c tā no devā devatayā yuvam madhumatas kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18015: RV_10,025.01a bhadraṃ no api vātaya mano dakṣam uta kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:18016: RV_10,025.01c adhā te sakhye andhaso vi vo made raṇan gāvo na yavase vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18017: RV_10,025.02a hṛdispṛśas ta āsate viśveṣu soma dhāmasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18018: RV_10,025.02c adhā kāmā ime mama vi vo made vi tiṣṭhante vasūyavo vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18019: RV_10,025.03a uta vratāni soma te prāham mināmi pākyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18020: RV_10,025.03c adhā piteva sūnave vi vo made mṛḷā no abhi cid vadhād vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18021: RV_10,025.04a sam u pra yanti dhītayaḥ sargāso 'vatāṃ iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:18022: RV_10,025.04c kratuṃ naḥ soma jīvase vi vo made dhārayā camasāṃ iva vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18023: RV_10,025.05a tava tye soma śaktibhir nikāmāso vy ṛṇvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:18024: RV_10,025.05c gṛtsasya dhīrās tavaso vi vo made vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinaṃ vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18025: RV_10,025.06a paśuṃ naḥ soma rakṣasi purutrā viṣṭhitaṃ jagat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18026: RV_10,025.06c samākṛṇoṣi jīvase vi vo made viśvā sampaśyan bhuvanā vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18027: RV_10,025.07a tvaṃ naḥ soma viśvato gopā adābhyo bhava /
GV01rvh1-10u:18028: RV_10,025.07c sedha rājann apa sridho vi vo made mā no duḥśaṃsa īśatā vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18029: RV_10,025.08a tvaṃ naḥ soma sukratur vayodheyāya jāgṛhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18030: RV_10,025.08c kṣetravittaro manuṣo vi vo made druho naḥ pāhy aṃhaso vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18031: RV_10,025.09a tvaṃ no vṛtrahantamendrasyendo śivaḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18032: RV_10,025.09c yat sīṃ havante samithe vi vo made yudhyamānās tokasātau vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18033: RV_10,025.10a ayaṃ gha sa turo mada indrasya vardhata priyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18034: RV_10,025.10c ayaṃ kakṣīvato maho vi vo made matiṃ viprasya vardhayad vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18035: RV_10,025.11a ayaṃ viprāya dāśuṣe vājāṃ iyarti gomataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18036: RV_10,025.11c ayaṃ saptabhya ā varaṃ vi vo made prāndhaṃ śroṇaṃ ca tāriṣad vivakṣase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18037: RV_10,026.01a pra hy acchā manīṣā spārhā yanti niyutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18038: RV_10,026.01c pra dasrā niyudrathaḥ pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18039: RV_10,026.02a yasya tyan mahitvaṃ vātāpyam ayaṃ janaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18040: RV_10,026.02c vipra ā vaṃsad dhītibhiś ciketa suṣṭutīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18041: RV_10,026.03a sa veda suṣṭutīnām indur na pūṣā vṛṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18042: RV_10,026.03c abhi psuraḥ pruṣāyati vrajaṃ na ā pruṣāyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:18043: RV_10,026.04a maṃsīmahi tvā vayam asmākaṃ deva pūṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18044: RV_10,026.04c matīnāṃ ca sādhanaṃ viprāṇāṃ cādhavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18046: RV_10,026.05c ṛṣiḥ sa yo manurhito viprasya yāvayatsakhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18047: RV_10,026.06a ādhīṣamāṇāyāḥ patiḥ śucāyāś ca śucasya ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:18049: RV_10,026.07a ino vājānām patir inaḥ puṣṭīnāṃ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18050: RV_10,026.07c pra śmaśru haryato dūdhod vi vṛthā yo adābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18051: RV_10,026.08a ā te rathasya pūṣann ajā dhuraṃ vavṛtyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18053: RV_10,026.09a asmākam ūrjā ratham pūṣā aviṣṭu māhinaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18054: RV_10,026.09c bhuvad vājānāṃ vṛdha imaṃ naḥ śṛṇavad dhavam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18055: RV_10,027.01a asat su me jaritaḥ sābhivego yat sunvate yajamānāya śikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18056: RV_10,027.01c anāśīrdām aham asmi prahantā satyadhvṛtaṃ vṛjināyantam ābhum //
GV01rvh1-10u:18057: RV_10,027.02a yadīd ahaṃ yudhaye saṃnayāny adevayūn tanvā śūśujānān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18058: RV_10,027.02c amā te tumraṃ vṛṣabham pacāni tīvraṃ sutam pañcadaśaṃ ni ṣiñcam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18059: RV_10,027.03a nāhaṃ taṃ veda ya iti bravīty adevayūn samaraṇe jaghanvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18060: RV_10,027.03c yadāvākhyat samaraṇam ṛghāvad ād id dha me vṛṣabhā pra bruvanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18061: RV_10,027.04a yad ajñāteṣu vṛjaneṣv āsaṃ viśve sato maghavāno ma āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18062: RV_10,027.04c jināmi vet kṣema ā santam ābhum pra taṃ kṣiṇām parvate pādagṛhya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18063: RV_10,027.05a na vā u māṃ vṛjane vārayante na parvatāso yad aham manasye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18064: RV_10,027.05c mama svanāt kṛdhukarṇo bhayāta eved anu dyūn kiraṇaḥ sam ejāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18065: RV_10,027.06a darśan nv atra śṛtapāṃ anindrān bāhukṣadaḥ śarave patyamānān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18066: RV_10,027.06c ghṛṣuṃ vā ye niniduḥ sakhāyam adhy ū nv eṣu pavayo vavṛtyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18067: RV_10,027.07a abhūr v aukṣīr vy u āyur ānaḍ darṣan nu pūrvo aparo nu darṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18068: RV_10,027.07c dve pavaste pari taṃ na bhūto yo asya pāre rajaso viveṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:18069: RV_10,027.08a gāvo yavam prayutā aryo akṣan tā apaśyaṃ sahagopāś carantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18070: RV_10,027.08c havā id aryo abhitaḥ sam āyan kiyad āsu svapatiś chandayāte //
GV01rvh1-10u:18071: RV_10,027.09a saṃ yad vayaṃ yavasādo janānām ahaṃ yavāda urvajre antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18072: RV_10,027.09c atrā yukto 'vasātāram icchād atho ayuktaṃ yunajad vavanvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18073: RV_10,027.10a atred u me maṃsase satyam uktaṃ dvipāc ca yac catuṣpāt saṃsṛjāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:18074: RV_10,027.10c strībhir yo atra vṛṣaṇam pṛtanyād ayuddho asya vi bhajāni vedaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18075: RV_10,027.11a yasyānakṣā duhitā jātv āsa kas tāṃ vidvāṃ abhi manyāte andhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18076: RV_10,027.11c kataro menim prati tam mucāte ya īṃ vahāte ya īṃ vā vareyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18077: RV_10,027.12a kiyatī yoṣā maryato vadhūyoḥ pariprītā panyasā vāryeṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:18078: RV_10,027.12c bhadrā vadhūr bhavati yat supeśāḥ svayaṃ sā mitraṃ vanute jane cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:18079: RV_10,027.13a patto jagāra pratyañcam atti śīrṣṇā śiraḥ prati dadhau varūtham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18080: RV_10,027.13c āsīna ūrdhvām upasi kṣiṇāti nyaṅṅ uttānām anv eti bhūmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:18081: RV_10,027.14a bṛhann acchāyo apalāśo arvā tasthau mātā viṣito atti garbhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18082: RV_10,027.14c anyasyā vatsaṃ rihatī mimāya kayā bhuvā ni dadhe dhenur ūdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18083: RV_10,027.15a sapta vīrāso adharād ud āyann aṣṭottarāttāt sam ajagmiran te /
GV01rvh1-10u:18084: RV_10,027.15c nava paścātāt sthivimanta āyan daśa prāk sānu vi tiranty aśnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18085: RV_10,027.16a daśānām ekaṃ kapilaṃ samānaṃ taṃ hinvanti kratave pāryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:18086: RV_10,027.16c garbham mātā sudhitaṃ vakṣaṇāsv avenantaṃ tuṣayantī bibharti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18087: RV_10,027.17a pīvānam meṣam apacanta vīrā nyuptā akṣā anu dīva āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18088: RV_10,027.17c dvā dhanum bṛhatīm apsv antaḥ pavitravantā carataḥ punantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18089: RV_10,027.18a vi krośanāso viṣvañca āyan pacāti nemo nahi pakṣad ardhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18090: RV_10,027.18c ayam me devaḥ savitā tad āha drvanna id vanavat sarpirannaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18091: RV_10,027.19a apaśyaṃ grāmaṃ vahamānam ārād acakrayā svadhayā vartamānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18092: RV_10,027.19c siṣakty aryaḥ pra yugā janānāṃ sadyaḥ śiśnā pramināno navīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18093: RV_10,027.20a etau me gāvau pramarasya yuktau mo ṣu pra sedhīr muhur in mamandhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18094: RV_10,027.20c āpaś cid asya vi naśanty arthaṃ sūraś ca marka uparo babhūvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18095: RV_10,027.21a ayaṃ yo vajraḥ purudhā vivṛtto 'vaḥ sūryasya bṛhataḥ purīṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:18096: RV_10,027.21c śrava id enā paro anyad asti tad avyathī jarimāṇas taranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18097: RV_10,027.22a vṛkṣe-vṛkṣe niyatā mīmayad gaus tato vayaḥ pra patān pūruṣādaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18098: RV_10,027.22c athedaṃ viśvam bhuvanam bhayāta indrāya sunvad ṛṣaye ca śikṣat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18099: RV_10,027.23a devānām māne prathamā atiṣṭhan kṛntatrād eṣām uparā ud āyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18100: RV_10,027.23c trayas tapanti pṛthivīm anūpā dvā bṛbūkaṃ vahataḥ purīṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18101: RV_10,027.24a sā te jīvātur uta tasya viddhi mā smaitādṛg apa gūhaḥ samarye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18102: RV_10,027.24c āviḥ svaḥ kṛṇute gūhate busaṃ sa pādur asya nirṇijo na mucyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18103: RV_10,028.01a viśvo hy anyo arir ājagāma mamed aha śvaśuro nā jagāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:18104: RV_10,028.01c jakṣīyād dhānā uta somam papīyāt svāśitaḥ punar astaṃ jagāyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18105: RV_10,028.02a sa roruvad vṛṣabhas tigmaśṛṅgo varṣman tasthau varimann ā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18106: RV_10,028.02c viśveṣv enaṃ vṛjaneṣu pāmi yo me kukṣī sutasomaḥ pṛṇāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18107: RV_10,028.03a adriṇā te mandina indra tūyān sunvanti somān pibasi tvam eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18108: RV_10,028.03c pacanti te vṛṣabhāṃ atsi teṣām pṛkṣeṇa yan maghavan hūyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18109: RV_10,028.04a idaṃ su me jaritar ā cikiddhi pratīpaṃ śāpaṃ nadyo vahanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18110: RV_10,028.04c lopāśaḥ siṃham pratyañcam atsāḥ kroṣṭā varāhaṃ nir atakta kakṣāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18111: RV_10,028.05a kathā ta etad aham ā ciketaṃ gṛtsasya pākas tavaso manīṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18112: RV_10,028.05c tvaṃ no vidvāṃ ṛtuthā vi voco yam ardhaṃ te maghavan kṣemyā dhūḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18113: RV_10,028.06a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ vardhayanti divaś cin me bṛhata uttarā dhūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18114: RV_10,028.06c purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi sākam aśatruṃ hi mā janitā jajāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:18115: RV_10,028.07a evā hi māṃ tavasaṃ jajñur ugraṃ karman-karman vṛṣaṇam indra devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18116: RV_10,028.07c vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ vajreṇa mandasāno 'pa vrajam mahinā dāśuṣe vam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18117: RV_10,028.08a devāsa āyan paraśūṃr abibhran vanā vṛścanto abhi viḍbhir āyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18118: RV_10,028.08c ni sudrvaṃ dadhato vakṣaṇāsu yatrā kṛpīṭam anu tad dahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18119: RV_10,028.09a śaśaḥ kṣuram pratyañcaṃ jagārādriṃ logena vy abhedam ārāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:18120: RV_10,028.09c bṛhantaṃ cid ṛhate randhayāni vayad vatso vṛṣabhaṃ śūśuvānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18121: RV_10,028.10a suparṇa itthā nakham ā siṣāyāvaruddhaḥ paripadaṃ na siṃhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18122: RV_10,028.10c niruddhaś cin mahiṣas tarṣyāvān godhā tasmā ayathaṃ karṣad etat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18123: RV_10,028.11a tebhyo godhā ayathaṃ karṣad etad ye brahmaṇaḥ pratipīyanty annaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18124: RV_10,028.11c sima ukṣṇo 'vasṛṣṭāṃ adanti svayam balāni tanvaḥ śṛṇānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18125: RV_10,028.12a ete śamībhiḥ suśamī abhūvan ye hinvire tanvaḥ soma ukthaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18126: RV_10,028.12c nṛvad vadann upa no māhi vājān divi śravo dadhiṣe nāma vīraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18127: RV_10,029.01a vane na vā yo ny adhāyi cākañ chucir vāṃ stomo bhuraṇāv ajīgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18128: RV_10,029.01c yasyed indraḥ purudineṣu hotā nṛṇāṃ naryo nṛtamaḥ kṣapāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18129: RV_10,029.02a pra te asyā uṣasaḥ prāparasyā nṛtau syāma nṛtamasya nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18130: RV_10,029.02c anu triśokaḥ śatam āvahan nṝn kutsena ratho yo asat sasavān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18131: RV_10,029.03a kas te mada indra rantyo bhūd duro giro abhy ugro vi dhāva /
GV01rvh1-10u:18132: RV_10,029.03c kad vāho arvāg upa mā manīṣā ā tvā śakyām upamaṃ rādho annaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18133: RV_10,029.04a kad u dyumnam indra tvāvato nṝn kayā dhiyā karase kan na āgan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18134: RV_10,029.04c mitro na satya urugāya bhṛtyā anne samasya yad asan manīṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18135: RV_10,029.05a preraya sūro arthaṃ na pāraṃ ye asya kāmaṃ janidhā iva gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:18136: RV_10,029.05c giraś ca ye te tuvijāta pūrvīr nara indra pratiśikṣanty annaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18137: RV_10,029.06a mātre nu te sumite indra pūrvī dyaur majmanā pṛthivī kāvyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:18138: RV_10,029.06c varāya te ghṛtavantaḥ sutāsaḥ svādman bhavantu pītaye madhūni //
GV01rvh1-10u:18139: RV_10,029.07a ā madhvo asmā asicann amatram indrāya pūrṇaṃ sa hi satyarādhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18140: RV_10,029.07c sa vāvṛdhe varimann ā pṛthivyā abhi kratvā naryaḥ pauṃsyaiś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:18141: RV_10,029.08a vy ānaḷ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā āsmai yatante sakhyāya pūrvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18142: RV_10,029.08c ā smā rathaṃ na pṛtanāsu tiṣṭha yam bhadrayā sumatyā codayāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:18143: RV_10,030.01a pra devatrā brahmaṇe gātur etv apo acchā manaso na prayukti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18144: RV_10,030.01c mahīm mitrasya varuṇasya dhāsim pṛthujrayase rīradhā suvṛktim //
GV01rvh1-10u:18145: RV_10,030.02a adhvaryavo haviṣmanto hi bhūtācchāpa itośatīr uśantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18146: RV_10,030.02c ava yāś caṣṭe aruṇaḥ suparṇas tam āsyadhvam ūrmim adyā suhastāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18147: RV_10,030.03a adhvaryavo 'pa itā samudram apāṃ napātaṃ haviṣā yajadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18148: RV_10,030.03c sa vo dadad ūrmim adyā supūtaṃ tasmai somam madhumantaṃ sunota //
GV01rvh1-10u:18149: RV_10,030.04a yo anidhmo dīdayad apsv antar yaṃ viprāsa īḷate adhvareṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18150: RV_10,030.04c apāṃ napān madhumatīr apo dā yābhir indro vāvṛdhe vīryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18151: RV_10,030.05a yābhiḥ somo modate harṣate ca kalyāṇībhir yuvatibhir na maryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18152: RV_10,030.05c tā adhvaryo apo acchā parehi yad āsiñcā oṣadhībhiḥ punītāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18153: RV_10,030.06a eved yūne yuvatayo namanta yad īm uśann uśatīr ety accha /
GV01rvh1-10u:18154: RV_10,030.06c saṃ jānate manasā saṃ cikitre 'dhvaryavo dhiṣaṇāpaś ca devīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18155: RV_10,030.07a yo vo vṛtābhyo akṛṇod u lokaṃ yo vo mahyā abhiśaster amuñcat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18156: RV_10,030.07c tasmā indrāya madhumantam ūrmiṃ devamādanam pra hiṇotanāpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18157: RV_10,030.08a prāsmai hinota madhumantam ūrmiṃ garbho yo vaḥ sindhavo madhva utsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18158: RV_10,030.08c ghṛtapṛṣṭham īḍyam adhvareṣv āpo revatīḥ śṛṇutā havam me //
GV01rvh1-10u:18159: RV_10,030.09a taṃ sindhavo matsaram indrapānam ūrmim pra heta ya ubhe iyarti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18160: RV_10,030.09c madacyutam auśānaṃ nabhojām pari tritantuṃ vicarantam utsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18161: RV_10,030.10a āvarvṛtatīr adha nu dvidhārā goṣuyudho na niyavaṃ carantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18162: RV_10,030.10c ṛṣe janitrīr bhuvanasya patnīr apo vandasva savṛdhaḥ sayonīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18163: RV_10,030.11a hinotā no adhvaraṃ devayajyā hinota brahma sanaye dhanānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18164: RV_10,030.11c ṛtasya yoge vi ṣyadhvam ūdhaḥ śruṣṭīvarīr bhūtanāsmabhyam āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18165: RV_10,030.12a āpo revatīḥ kṣayathā hi vasvaḥ kratuṃ ca bhadram bibhṛthāmṛtaṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:18166: RV_10,030.12c rāyaś ca stha svapatyasya patnīḥ sarasvatī tad gṛṇate vayo dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18167: RV_10,030.13a prati yad āpo adṛśram āyatīr ghṛtam payāṃsi bibhratīr madhūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:18168: RV_10,030.13c adhvaryubhir manasā saṃvidānā indrāya somaṃ suṣutam bharantīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18169: RV_10,030.14a emā agman revatīr jīvadhanyā adhvaryavaḥ sādayatā sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18170: RV_10,030.14c ni barhiṣi dhattana somyāso 'pāṃ naptrā saṃvidānāsa enāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18171: RV_10,030.15a āgmann āpa uśatīr barhir edaṃ ny adhvare asadan devayantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18172: RV_10,030.15c adhvaryavaḥ sunutendrāya somam abhūd u vaḥ suśakā devayajyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18173: RV_10,031.01a ā no devānām upa vetu śaṃso viśvebhis turair avase yajatraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18174: RV_10,031.01c tebhir vayaṃ suṣakhāyo bhavema taranto viśvā duritā syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:18175: RV_10,031.02a pari cin marto draviṇam mamanyād ṛtasya pathā namasā vivāset /
GV01rvh1-10u:18176: RV_10,031.02c uta svena kratunā saṃ vadeta śreyāṃsaṃ dakṣam manasā jagṛbhyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18177: RV_10,031.03a adhāyi dhītir asasṛgram aṃśās tīrthe na dasmam upa yanty ūmāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18178: RV_10,031.03c abhy ānaśma suvitasya śūṣaṃ navedaso amṛtānām abhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:18179: RV_10,031.04a nityaś cākanyāt svapatir damūnā yasmā u devaḥ savitā jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:18180: RV_10,031.04c bhago vā gobhir aryamem anajyāt so asmai cāruś chadayad uta syāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18181: RV_10,031.05a iyaṃ sā bhūyā uṣasām iva kṣā yad dha kṣumantaḥ śavasā samāyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18182: RV_10,031.05c asya stutiṃ jaritur bhikṣamāṇā ā naḥ śagmāsa upa yantu vājāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18183: RV_10,031.06a asyed eṣā sumatiḥ paprathānābhavat pūrvyā bhūmanā gauḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18184: RV_10,031.06c asya sanīḷā asurasya yonau samāna ā bharaṇe bibhramāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18185: RV_10,031.07a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18186: RV_10,031.07c saṃtasthāne ajare itaūtī ahāni pūrvīr uṣaso jaranta //
GV01rvh1-10u:18187: RV_10,031.08a naitāvad enā paro anyad asty ukṣā sa dyāvāpṛthivī bibharti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18188: RV_10,031.08c tvacam pavitraṃ kṛṇuta svadhāvān yad īṃ sūryaṃ na harito vahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18189: RV_10,031.09a stego na kṣām aty eti pṛthvīm mihaṃ na vāto vi ha vāti bhūma /
GV01rvh1-10u:18190: RV_10,031.09c mitro yatra varuṇo ajyamāno 'gnir vane na vy asṛṣṭa śokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18191: RV_10,031.10a starīr yat sūta sadyo ajyamānā vyathir avyathīḥ kṛṇuta svagopā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18192: RV_10,031.10c putro yat pūrvaḥ pitror janiṣṭa śamyāṃ gaur jagāra yad dha pṛcchān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18193: RV_10,031.11a uta kaṇvaṃ nṛṣadaḥ putram āhur uta śyāvo dhanam ādatta vājī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18194: RV_10,031.11c pra kṛṣṇāya ruśad apinvatodhar ṛtam atra nakir asmā apīpet //
GV01rvh1-10u:18195: RV_10,032.01a pra su gmantā dhiyasānasya sakṣaṇi varebhir varāṃ abhi ṣu prasīdataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18196: RV_10,032.01c asmākam indra ubhayaṃ jujoṣati yat somyasyāndhaso bubodhati //
GV01rvh1-10u:18197: RV_10,032.02a vīndra yāsi divyāni rocanā vi pārthivāni rajasā puruṣṭuta /
GV01rvh1-10u:18198: RV_10,032.02c ye tvā vahanti muhur adhvarāṃ upa te su vanvantu vagvanāṃ arādhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18199: RV_10,032.03a tad in me chantsad vapuṣo vapuṣṭaram putro yaj jānam pitror adhīyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:18200: RV_10,032.03c jāyā patiṃ vahati vagnunā sumat puṃsa id bhadro vahatuḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18201: RV_10,032.04a tad it sadhastham abhi cāru dīdhaya gāvo yac chāsan vahatuṃ na dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18202: RV_10,032.04c mātā yan mantur yūthasya pūrvyābhi vāṇasya saptadhātur ij janaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18203: RV_10,032.05a pra vo 'cchā ririce devayuṣ padam eko rudrebhir yāti turvaṇiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18204: RV_10,032.05c jarā vā yeṣv amṛteṣu dāvane pari va ūmebhyaḥ siñcatā madhu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18205: RV_10,032.06a nidhīyamānam apagūḷham apsu pra me devānāṃ vratapā uvāca /
GV01rvh1-10u:18206: RV_10,032.06c indro vidvāṃ anu hi tvā cacakṣa tenāham agne anuśiṣṭa āgām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18207: RV_10,032.07a akṣetravit kṣetravidaṃ hy aprāṭ sa praiti kṣetravidānuśiṣṭaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18208: RV_10,032.07c etad vai bhadram anuśāsanasyota srutiṃ vindaty añjasīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18209: RV_10,032.08a adyed u prāṇīd amamann imāhāpīvṛto adhayan mātur ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18210: RV_10,032.08c em enam āpa jarimā yuvānam aheḷan vasuḥ sumanā babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:18211: RV_10,032.09a etāni bhadrā kalaśa kriyāma kuruśravaṇa dadato maghāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:18212: RV_10,032.09c dāna id vo maghavānaḥ so astv ayaṃ ca somo hṛdi yam bibharmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18213: RV_10,033.01a pra mā yuyujre prayujo janānāṃ vahāmi sma pūṣaṇam antareṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:18214: RV_10,033.01c viśve devāso adha mām arakṣan duḥśāsur āgād iti ghoṣa āsīt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18215: RV_10,033.02a sam mā tapanty abhitaḥ sapatnīr iva parśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18216: RV_10,033.02c ni bādhate amatir nagnatā jasur ver na vevīyate matiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18217: RV_10,033.03a mūṣo na śiśnā vy adanti mādhya stotāraṃ te śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:18218: RV_10,033.03c sakṛt su no maghavann indra mṛḷayādhā piteva no bhava //
GV01rvh1-10u:18221: RV_10,033.05a yasya mā harito rathe tisro vahanti sādhuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18223: RV_10,033.06a yasya prasvādaso gira upamaśravasaḥ pituḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18225: RV_10,033.07a adhi putropamaśravo napān mitrātither ihi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18227: RV_10,033.08a yad īśīyāmṛtānām uta vā martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18229: RV_10,033.09a na devānām ati vrataṃ śatātmā cana jīvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:18231: RV_10,034.01a prāvepā mā bṛhato mādayanti pravātejā iriṇe varvṛtānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18232: RV_10,034.01c somasyeva maujavatasya bhakṣo vibhīdako jāgṛvir mahyam acchān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18233: RV_10,034.02a na mā mimetha na jihīḷa eṣā śivā sakhibhya uta mahyam āsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:18234: RV_10,034.02c akṣasyāham ekaparasya hetor anuvratām apa jāyām arodham //
GV01rvh1-10u:18235: RV_10,034.03a dveṣṭi śvaśrūr apa jāyā ruṇaddhi na nāthito vindate marḍitāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:18236: RV_10,034.03c aśvasyeva jarato vasnyasya nāhaṃ vindāmi kitavasya bhogam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18237: RV_10,034.04a anye jāyām pari mṛśanty asya yasyāgṛdhad vedane vājy akṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18238: RV_10,034.04c pitā mātā bhrātara enam āhur na jānīmo nayatā baddham etam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18239: RV_10,034.05a yad ādīdhye na daviṣāṇy ebhiḥ parāyadbhyo 'va hīye sakhibhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18240: RV_10,034.05c nyuptāś ca babhravo vācam akrataṃ emīd eṣāṃ niṣkṛtaṃ jāriṇīva //
GV01rvh1-10u:18241: RV_10,034.06a sabhām eti kitavaḥ pṛcchamāno jeṣyāmīti tanvā śūśujānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18242: RV_10,034.06c akṣāso asya vi tiranti kāmam pratidīvne dadhata ā kṛtāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:18243: RV_10,034.07a akṣāsa id aṅkuśino nitodino nikṛtvānas tapanās tāpayiṣṇavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18244: RV_10,034.07c kumāradeṣṇā jayataḥ punarhaṇo madhvā sampṛktāḥ kitavasya barhaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18245: RV_10,034.08a tripañcāśaḥ krīḷati vrāta eṣāṃ deva iva savitā satyadharmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18246: RV_10,034.08c ugrasya cin manyave nā namante rājā cid ebhyo nama it kṛṇoti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18247: RV_10,034.09a nīcā vartanta upari sphuranty ahastāso hastavantaṃ sahante /
GV01rvh1-10u:18248: RV_10,034.09c divyā aṅgārā iriṇe nyuptāḥ śītāḥ santo hṛdayaṃ nir dahanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18249: RV_10,034.10a jāyā tapyate kitavasya hīnā mātā putrasya carataḥ kva svit /
GV01rvh1-10u:18250: RV_10,034.10c ṛṇāvā bibhyad dhanam icchamāno 'nyeṣām astam upa naktam eti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18251: RV_10,034.11a striyaṃ dṛṣṭvāya kitavaṃ tatāpānyeṣāṃ jāyāṃ sukṛtaṃ ca yonim /
GV01rvh1-10u:18252: RV_10,034.11c pūrvāhṇe aśvān yuyuje hi babhrūn so agner ante vṛṣalaḥ papāda //
GV01rvh1-10u:18253: RV_10,034.12a yo vaḥ senānīr mahato gaṇasya rājā vrātasya prathamo babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:18254: RV_10,034.12c tasmai kṛṇomi na dhanā ruṇadhmi daśāham prācīs tad ṛtaṃ vadāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18255: RV_10,034.13a akṣair mā dīvyaḥ kṛṣim it kṛṣasva vitte ramasva bahu manyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18256: RV_10,034.13c tatra gāvaḥ kitava tatra jāyā tan me vi caṣṭe savitāyam aryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18257: RV_10,034.14a mitraṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ khalu mṛḷatā no mā no ghoreṇa caratābhi dhṛṣṇu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18258: RV_10,034.14c ni vo nu manyur viśatām arātir anyo babhrūṇām prasitau nv astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18259: RV_10,035.01a abudhram u tya indravanto agnayo jyotir bharanta uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18260: RV_10,035.01c mahī dyāvāpṛthivī cetatām apo 'dyā devānām ava ā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18261: RV_10,035.02a divaspṛthivyor ava ā vṛṇīmahe mātṝn sindhūn parvatāñ charyaṇāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18262: RV_10,035.02c anāgāstvaṃ sūryam uṣāsam īmahe bhadraṃ somaḥ suvāno adyā kṛṇotu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18263: RV_10,035.03a dyāvā no adya pṛthivī anāgaso mahī trāyetāṃ suvitāya mātarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18264: RV_10,035.03c uṣā ucchanty apa bādhatām aghaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18265: RV_10,035.04a iyaṃ na usrā prathamā sudevyaṃ revat sanibhyo revatī vy ucchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18266: RV_10,035.04c āre manyuṃ durvidatrasya dhīmahi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18267: RV_10,035.05a pra yāḥ sisrate sūryasya raśmibhir jyotir bharantīr uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18268: RV_10,035.05c bhadrā no adya śravase vy ucchata svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18269: RV_10,035.06a anamīvā uṣasa ā carantu na ud agnayo jihatāṃ jyotiṣā bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18270: RV_10,035.06c āyukṣātām aśvinā tūtujiṃ rathaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18271: RV_10,035.07a śreṣṭhaṃ no adya savitar vareṇyam bhāgam ā suva sa hi ratnadhā asi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18272: RV_10,035.07c rāyo janitrīṃ dhiṣaṇām upa bruve svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18273: RV_10,035.08a pipartu mā tad ṛtasya pravācanaṃ devānāṃ yan manuṣyā amanmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18274: RV_10,035.08c viśvā id usrā spaḷ ud eti sūryaḥ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18275: RV_10,035.09a adveṣo adya barhiṣa starīmaṇi grāvṇāṃ yoge manmanaḥ sādha īmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18276: RV_10,035.09c ādityānāṃ śarmaṇi sthā bhuraṇyasi svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18277: RV_10,035.10a ā no barhiḥ sadhamāde bṛhad divi devāṃ īḷe sādayā sapta hotṝn /
GV01rvh1-10u:18278: RV_10,035.10c indram mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18279: RV_10,035.11a ta ādityā ā gatā sarvatātaye vṛdhe no yajñam avatā sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18280: RV_10,035.11c bṛhaspatim pūṣaṇam aśvinā bhagaṃ svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18281: RV_10,035.12a tan no devā yacchata supravācanaṃ chardir ādityāḥ subharaṃ nṛpāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18282: RV_10,035.12c paśve tokāya tanayāya jīvase svasty agniṃ samidhānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18283: RV_10,035.13a viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantv agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18284: RV_10,035.13c viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇaṃ vājo asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:18285: RV_10,035.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ trāyadhve yam pipṛthāty aṃhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18286: RV_10,035.14c yo vo gopīthe na bhayasya veda te syāma devavītaye turāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18287: RV_10,036.01a uṣāsānaktā bṛhatī supeśasā dyāvākṣāmā varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18288: RV_10,036.01c indraṃ huve marutaḥ parvatāṃ apa ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18289: RV_10,036.02a dyauś ca naḥ pṛthivī ca pracetasa ṛtāvarī rakṣatām aṃhaso riṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18290: RV_10,036.02c mā durvidatrā nirṛtir na īśata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18291: RV_10,036.03a viśvasmān no aditiḥ pātv aṃhaso mātā mitrasya varuṇasya revataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18292: RV_10,036.03c svarvaj jyotir avṛkaṃ naśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18293: RV_10,036.04a grāvā vadann apa rakṣāṃsi sedhatu duṣṣvapnyaṃ nirṛtiṃ viśvam atriṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18294: RV_10,036.04c ādityaṃ śarma marutām aśīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18295: RV_10,036.05a endro barhiḥ sīdatu pinvatām iḷā bṛhaspatiḥ sāmabhir ṛkvo arcatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18296: RV_10,036.05c supraketaṃ jīvase manma dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18297: RV_10,036.06a divispṛśaṃ yajñam asmākam aśvinā jīrādhvaraṃ kṛṇutaṃ sumnam iṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18298: RV_10,036.06c prācīnaraśmim āhutaṃ ghṛtena tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18299: RV_10,036.07a upa hvaye suhavam mārutaṃ gaṇam pāvakam ṛṣvaṃ sakhyāya śambhuvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18300: RV_10,036.07c rāyas poṣaṃ sauśravasāya dhīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18301: RV_10,036.08a apām peruṃ jīvadhanyam bharāmahe devāvyaṃ suhavam adhvaraśriyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18302: RV_10,036.08c suraśmiṃ somam indriyaṃ yamīmahi tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18303: RV_10,036.09a sanema tat susanitā sanitvabhir vayaṃ jīvā jīvaputrā anāgasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18304: RV_10,036.09c brahmadviṣo viṣvag eno bharerata tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18305: RV_10,036.10a ye sthā manor yajñiyās te śṛṇotana yad vo devā īmahe tad dadātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:18306: RV_10,036.10c jaitraṃ kratuṃ rayimad vīravad yaśas tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18307: RV_10,036.11a mahad adya mahatām ā vṛṇīmahe 'vo devānām bṛhatām anarvaṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18308: RV_10,036.11c yathā vasu vīrajātaṃ naśāmahai tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18309: RV_10,036.12a maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇy anāgā mitre varuṇe svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18310: RV_10,036.12c śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18311: RV_10,036.13a ye savituḥ satyasavasya viśve mitrasya vrate varuṇasya devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18312: RV_10,036.13c te saubhagaṃ vīravad gomad apno dadhātana draviṇaṃ citram asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:18313: RV_10,036.14a savitā paścātāt savitā purastāt savitottarāttāt savitādharāttāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:18314: RV_10,036.14c savitā naḥ suvatu sarvatātiṃ savitā no rāsatāṃ dīrgham āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18315: RV_10,037.01a namo mitrasya varuṇasya cakṣase maho devāya tad ṛtaṃ saparyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:18316: RV_10,037.01c dūredṛśe devajātāya ketave divas putrāya sūryāya śaṃsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18317: RV_10,037.02a sā mā satyoktiḥ pari pātu viśvato dyāvā ca yatra tatanann ahāni ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:18318: RV_10,037.02c viśvam anyan ni viśate yad ejati viśvāhāpo viśvāhod eti sūryaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18319: RV_10,037.03a na te adevaḥ pradivo ni vāsate yad etaśebhiḥ patarai ratharyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18320: RV_10,037.03c prācīnam anyad anu vartate raja ud anyena jyotiṣā yāsi sūrya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18321: RV_10,037.04a yena sūrya jyotiṣā bādhase tamo jagac ca viśvam udiyarṣi bhānunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18322: RV_10,037.04c tenāsmad viśvām anirām anāhutim apāmīvām apa duṣṣvapnyaṃ suva //
GV01rvh1-10u:18323: RV_10,037.05a viśvasya hi preṣito rakṣasi vratam aheḷayann uccarasi svadhā anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18324: RV_10,037.05c yad adya tvā sūryopabravāmahai taṃ no devā anu maṃsīrata kratum //
GV01rvh1-10u:18325: RV_10,037.06a taṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī tan na āpa indraḥ śṛṇvantu maruto havaṃ vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18326: RV_10,037.06c mā śūne bhūma sūryasya saṃdṛśi bhadraṃ jīvanto jaraṇām aśīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18327: RV_10,037.07a viśvāhā tvā sumanasaḥ sucakṣasaḥ prajāvanto anamīvā anāgasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18328: RV_10,037.07c udyantaṃ tvā mitramaho dive-dive jyog jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18329: RV_10,037.08a mahi jyotir bibhrataṃ tvā vicakṣaṇa bhāsvantaṃ cakṣuṣe-cakṣuṣe mayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18330: RV_10,037.08c ārohantam bṛhataḥ pājasas pari vayaṃ jīvāḥ prati paśyema sūrya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18331: RV_10,037.09a yasya te viśvā bhuvanāni ketunā pra cerate ni ca viśante aktubhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18332: RV_10,037.09c anāgāstvena harikeśa sūryāhnāhnā no vasyasā-vasyasod ihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18333: RV_10,037.10a śaṃ no bhava cakṣasā śaṃ no ahnā śam bhānunā śaṃ himā śaṃ ghṛṇena /
GV01rvh1-10u:18334: RV_10,037.10c yathā śam adhvañ cham asad duroṇe tat sūrya draviṇaṃ dhehi citram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18335: RV_10,037.11a asmākaṃ devā ubhayāya janmane śarma yacchata dvipade catuṣpade /
GV01rvh1-10u:18336: RV_10,037.11c adat pibad ūrjayamānam āśitaṃ tad asme śaṃ yor arapo dadhātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:18337: RV_10,037.12a yad vo devāś cakṛma jihvayā guru manaso vā prayutī devaheḷanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18338: RV_10,037.12c arāvā yo no abhi ducchunāyate tasmin tad eno vasavo ni dhetana //
GV01rvh1-10u:18339: RV_10,038.01a asmin na indra pṛtsutau yaśasvati śimīvati krandasi prāva sātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18340: RV_10,038.01c yatra goṣātā dhṛṣiteṣu khādiṣu viṣvak patanti didyavo nṛṣāhye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18341: RV_10,038.02a sa naḥ kṣumantaṃ sadane vy ūrṇuhi goarṇasaṃ rayim indra śravāyyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18342: RV_10,038.02c syāma te jayataḥ śakra medino yathā vayam uśmasi tad vaso kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18343: RV_10,038.03a yo no dāsa āryo vā puruṣṭutādeva indra yudhaye ciketati /
GV01rvh1-10u:18344: RV_10,038.03c asmābhiṣ ṭe suṣahāḥ santu śatravas tvayā vayaṃ tān vanuyāma saṃgame //
GV01rvh1-10u:18345: RV_10,038.04a yo dabhrebhir havyo yaś ca bhūribhir yo abhīke varivovin nṛṣāhye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18346: RV_10,038.04c taṃ vikhāde sasnim adya śrutaṃ naram arvāñcam indram avase karāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18347: RV_10,038.05a svavṛjaṃ hi tvām aham indra śuśravānānudaṃ vṛṣabha radhracodanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18348: RV_10,038.05c pra muñcasva pari kutsād ihā gahi kim u tvāvān muṣkayor baddha āsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18349: RV_10,039.01a yo vām parijmā suvṛd aśvinā ratho doṣām uṣāso havyo haviṣmatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18350: RV_10,039.01c śaśvattamāsas tam u vām idaṃ vayam pitur na nāma suhavaṃ havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18351: RV_10,039.02a codayataṃ sūnṛtāḥ pinvataṃ dhiya ut purandhīr īrayataṃ tad uśmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18352: RV_10,039.02c yaśasam bhāgaṃ kṛṇutaṃ no aśvinā somaṃ na cārum maghavatsu nas kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18353: RV_10,039.03a amājuraś cid bhavatho yuvam bhago 'nāśoś cid avitārāpamasya cit /
GV01rvh1-10u:18354: RV_10,039.03c andhasya cin nāsatyā kṛśasya cid yuvām id āhur bhiṣajā rutasya cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:18355: RV_10,039.04a yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ sanayaṃ yathā ratham punar yuvānaṃ carathāya takṣathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18356: RV_10,039.04c niṣ ṭaugryam ūhathur adbhyas pari viśvet tā vāṃ savaneṣu pravācyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18357: RV_10,039.05a purāṇā vāṃ vīryā pra bravā jane 'tho hāsathur bhiṣajā mayobhuvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18358: RV_10,039.05c tā vāṃ nu navyāv avase karāmahe 'yaṃ nāsatyā śrad arir yathā dadhat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18359: RV_10,039.06a iyaṃ vām ahve śṛṇutam me aśvinā putrāyeva pitarā mahyaṃ śikṣatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18360: RV_10,039.06c anāpir ajñā asajātyāmatiḥ purā tasyā abhiśaster ava spṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18361: RV_10,039.07a yuvaṃ rathena vimadāya śundhyuvaṃ ny ūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣaṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18362: RV_10,039.07c yuvaṃ havaṃ vadhrimatyā agacchataṃ yuvaṃ suṣutiṃ cakrathuḥ purandhaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18363: RV_10,039.08a yuvaṃ viprasya jaraṇām upeyuṣaḥ punaḥ kaler akṛṇutaṃ yuvad vayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18364: RV_10,039.08c yuvaṃ vandanam ṛśyadād ud ūpathur yuvaṃ sadyo viśpalām etave kṛthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18365: RV_10,039.09a yuvaṃ ha rebhaṃ vṛṣaṇā guhā hitam ud airayatam mamṛvāṃsam aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18366: RV_10,039.09c yuvam ṛbīsam uta taptam atraya omanvantaṃ cakrathuḥ saptavadhraye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18367: RV_10,039.10a yuvaṃ śvetam pedave 'śvināśvaṃ navabhir vājair navatī ca vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18368: RV_10,039.10c carkṛtyaṃ dadathur drāvayatsakham bhagaṃ na nṛbhyo havyam mayobhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18369: RV_10,039.11a na taṃ rājānāv adite kutaś cana nāṃho aśnoti duritaṃ nakir bhayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18370: RV_10,039.11c yam aśvinā suhavā rudravartanī purorathaṃ kṛṇuthaḥ patnyā saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:18371: RV_10,039.12a ā tena yātam manaso javīyasā rathaṃ yaṃ vām ṛbhavaś cakrur aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18372: RV_10,039.12c yasya yoge duhitā jāyate diva ubhe ahanī sudine vivasvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18373: RV_10,039.13a tā vartir yātaṃ jayuṣā vi parvatam apinvataṃ śayave dhenum aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18374: RV_10,039.13c vṛkasya cid vartikām antar āsyād yuvaṃ śacībhir grasitām amuñcatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18375: RV_10,039.14a etaṃ vāṃ stomam aśvināv akarmātakṣāma bhṛgavo na ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18376: RV_10,039.14c ny amṛkṣāma yoṣaṇāṃ na marye nityaṃ na sūnuṃ tanayaṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18377: RV_10,040.01a rathaṃ yāntaṃ kuha ko ha vāṃ narā prati dyumantaṃ suvitāya bhūṣati /
GV01rvh1-10u:18378: RV_10,040.01c prātaryāvāṇaṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe vastor-vastor vahamānaṃ dhiyā śami //
GV01rvh1-10u:18379: RV_10,040.02a kuha svid doṣā kuha vastor aśvinā kuhābhipitvaṃ karataḥ kuhoṣatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18380: RV_10,040.02c ko vāṃ śayutrā vidhaveva devaram maryaṃ na yoṣā kṛṇute sadhastha ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18381: RV_10,040.03a prātar jarethe jaraṇeva kāpayā vastor-vastor yajatā gacchatho gṛham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18382: RV_10,040.03c kasya dhvasrā bhavathaḥ kasya vā narā rājaputreva savanāva gacchathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18383: RV_10,040.04a yuvām mṛgeva vāraṇā mṛgaṇyavo doṣā vastor haviṣā ni hvayāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18384: RV_10,040.04c yuvaṃ hotrām ṛtuthā juhvate nareṣaṃ janāya vahathaḥ śubhas patī //
GV01rvh1-10u:18385: RV_10,040.05a yuvāṃ ha ghoṣā pary aśvinā yatī rājña ūce duhitā pṛcche vāṃ narā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18386: RV_10,040.05c bhūtam me ahna uta bhūtam aktave 'śvāvate rathine śaktam arvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18387: RV_10,040.06a yuvaṃ kavī ṣṭhaḥ pary aśvinā rathaṃ viśo na kutso jaritur naśāyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18388: RV_10,040.06c yuvor ha makṣā pary aśvinā madhv āsā bharata niṣkṛtaṃ na yoṣaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18389: RV_10,040.07a yuvaṃ ha bhujyuṃ yuvam aśvinā vaśaṃ yuvaṃ śiñjāram uśanām upārathuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18390: RV_10,040.07c yuvo rarāvā pari sakhyam āsate yuvor aham avasā sumnam ā cake //
GV01rvh1-10u:18391: RV_10,040.08a yuvaṃ ha kṛśaṃ yuvam aśvinā śayuṃ yuvaṃ vidhantaṃ vidhavām uruṣyathaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18392: RV_10,040.08c yuvaṃ sanibhya stanayantam aśvināpa vrajam ūrṇuthaḥ saptāsyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18393: RV_10,040.09a janiṣṭa yoṣā patayat kanīnako vi cāruhan vīrudho daṃsanā anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18394: RV_10,040.09c āsmai rīyante nivaneva sindhavo 'smā ahne bhavati tat patitvanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18395: RV_10,040.10a jīvaṃ rudanti vi mayante adhvare dīrghām anu prasitiṃ dīdhiyur naraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18396: RV_10,040.10c vāmam pitṛbhyo ya idaṃ samerire mayaḥ patibhyo janayaḥ pariṣvaje //
GV01rvh1-10u:18397: RV_10,040.11a na tasya vidma tad u ṣu pra vocata yuvā ha yad yuvatyāḥ kṣeti yoniṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18398: RV_10,040.11c priyosriyasya vṛṣabhasya retino gṛhaṃ gamemāśvinā tad uśmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18399: RV_10,040.12a ā vām agan sumatir vājinīvasū ny aśvinā hṛtsu kāmā ayaṃsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:18400: RV_10,040.12c abhūtaṃ gopā mithunā śubhas patī priyā aryamṇo duryāṃ aśīmahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18401: RV_10,040.13a tā mandasānā manuṣo duroṇa ā dhattaṃ rayiṃ sahavīraṃ vacasyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:18402: RV_10,040.13c kṛtaṃ tīrthaṃ suprapāṇaṃ śubhas patī sthāṇum patheṣṭhām apa durmatiṃ hatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18403: RV_10,040.14a kva svid adya katamāsv aśvinā vikṣu dasrā mādayete śubhas patī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18404: RV_10,040.14c ka īṃ ni yeme katamasya jagmatur viprasya vā yajamānasya vā gṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:18405: RV_10,041.01a samānam u tyam puruhūtam ukthyaṃ rathaṃ tricakraṃ savanā ganigmatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18406: RV_10,041.01c parijmānaṃ vidathyaṃ suvṛktibhir vayaṃ vyuṣṭā uṣaso havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18407: RV_10,041.02a prātaryujaṃ nāsatyādhi tiṣṭhathaḥ prātaryāvāṇam madhuvāhanaṃ ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18408: RV_10,041.02c viśo yena gacchatho yajvarīr narā kīreś cid yajñaṃ hotṛmantam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18409: RV_10,041.03a adhvaryuṃ vā madhupāṇiṃ suhastyam agnidhaṃ vā dhṛtadakṣaṃ damūnasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18410: RV_10,041.03c viprasya vā yat savanāni gacchatho 'ta ā yātam madhupeyam aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18411: RV_10,042.01a asteva su prataraṃ lāyam asyan bhūṣann iva pra bharā stomam asmai /
GV01rvh1-10u:18412: RV_10,042.01c vācā viprās tarata vācam aryo ni rāmaya jaritaḥ soma indram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18413: RV_10,042.02a dohena gām upa śikṣā sakhāyam pra bodhaya jaritar jāram indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:18414: RV_10,042.02c kośaṃ na pūrṇaṃ vasunā nyṛṣṭam ā cyāvaya maghadeyāya śūram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18415: RV_10,042.03a kim aṅga tvā maghavan bhojam āhuḥ śiśīhi mā śiśayaṃ tvā śṛṇomi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18416: RV_10,042.03c apnasvatī mama dhīr astu śakra vasuvidam bhagam indrā bharā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18417: RV_10,042.04a tvāṃ janā mamasatyeṣv indra saṃtasthānā vi hvayante samīke /
GV01rvh1-10u:18418: RV_10,042.04c atrā yujaṃ kṛṇute yo haviṣmān nāsunvatā sakhyaṃ vaṣṭi śūraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18419: RV_10,042.05a dhanaṃ na syandram bahulaṃ yo asmai tīvrān somāṃ āsunoti prayasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18420: RV_10,042.05c tasmai śatrūn sutukān prātar ahno ni svaṣṭrān yuvati hanti vṛtram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18421: RV_10,042.06a yasmin vayaṃ dadhimā śaṃsam indre yaḥ śiśrāya maghavā kāmam asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:18422: RV_10,042.06c ārāc cit san bhayatām asya śatrur ny asmai dyumnā janyā namantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18423: RV_10,042.07a ārāc chatrum apa bādhasva dūram ugro yaḥ śambaḥ puruhūta tena /
GV01rvh1-10u:18424: RV_10,042.07c asme dhehi yavamad gomad indra kṛdhī dhiyaṃ jaritre vājaratnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18425: RV_10,042.08a pra yam antar vṛṣasavāso agman tīvrāḥ somā bahulāntāsa indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:18426: RV_10,042.08c nāha dāmānam maghavā ni yaṃsan ni sunvate vahati bhūri vāmam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18427: RV_10,042.09a uta prahām atidīvyā jayāti kṛtaṃ yac chvaghnī vicinoti kāle /
GV01rvh1-10u:18428: RV_10,042.09c yo devakāmo na dhanā ruṇaddhi sam it taṃ rāyā sṛjati svadhāvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18429: RV_10,042.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18430: RV_10,042.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:18431: RV_10,042.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18432: RV_10,042.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18433: RV_10,043.01a acchā ma indram matayaḥ svarvidaḥ sadhrīcīr viśvā uśatīr anūṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:18434: RV_10,043.01c pari ṣvajante janayo yathā patim maryaṃ na śundhyum maghavānam ūtaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18435: RV_10,043.02a na ghā tvadrig apa veti me manas tve it kāmam puruhūta śiśraya /
GV01rvh1-10u:18436: RV_10,043.02c rājeva dasma ni ṣado 'dhi barhiṣy asmin su some 'vapānam astu te //
GV01rvh1-10u:18437: RV_10,043.03a viṣūvṛd indro amater uta kṣudhaḥ sa id rāyo maghavā vasva īśate /
GV01rvh1-10u:18438: RV_10,043.03c tasyed ime pravaṇe sapta sindhavo vayo vardhanti vṛṣabhasya śuṣmiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18439: RV_10,043.04a vayo na vṛkṣaṃ supalāśam āsadan somāsa indram mandinaś camūṣadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18440: RV_10,043.04c praiṣām anīkaṃ śavasā davidyutad vidat svar manave jyotir āryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18441: RV_10,043.05a kṛtaṃ na śvaghnī vi cinoti devane saṃvargaṃ yan maghavā sūryaṃ jayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18442: RV_10,043.05c na tat te anyo anu vīryaṃ śakan na purāṇo maghavan nota nūtanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18443: RV_10,043.06a viśaṃ-viśam maghavā pary aśāyata janānāṃ dhenā avacākaśad vṛṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18444: RV_10,043.06c yasyāha śakraḥ savaneṣu raṇyati sa tīvraiḥ somaiḥ sahate pṛtanyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18445: RV_10,043.07a āpo na sindhum abhi yat samakṣaran somāsa indraṃ kulyā iva hradam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18446: RV_10,043.07c vardhanti viprā maho asya sādane yavaṃ na vṛṣṭir divyena dānunā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18447: RV_10,043.08a vṛṣā na kruddhaḥ patayad rajassv ā yo aryapatnīr akṛṇod imā apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18448: RV_10,043.08c sa sunvate maghavā jīradānave 'vindaj jyotir manave haviṣmate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18449: RV_10,043.09a uj jāyatām paraśur jyotiṣā saha bhūyā ṛtasya sudughā purāṇavat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18450: RV_10,043.09c vi rocatām aruṣo bhānunā śuciḥ svar ṇa śukraṃ śuśucīta satpatiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18451: RV_10,043.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18452: RV_10,043.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:18453: RV_10,043.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18454: RV_10,043.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18455: RV_10,044.01a ā yātv indraḥ svapatir madāya yo dharmaṇā tūtujānas tuviṣmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18456: RV_10,044.01c pratvakṣāṇo ati viśvā sahāṃsy apāreṇa mahatā vṛṣṇyena //
GV01rvh1-10u:18457: RV_10,044.02a suṣṭhāmā rathaḥ suyamā harī te mimyakṣa vajro nṛpate gabhastau /
GV01rvh1-10u:18458: RV_10,044.02c śībhaṃ rājan supathā yāhy arvāṅ vardhāma te papuṣo vṛṣṇyāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:18459: RV_10,044.03a endravāho nṛpatiṃ vajrabāhum ugram ugrāsas taviṣāsa enam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18460: RV_10,044.03c pratvakṣasaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ satyaśuṣmam em asmatrā sadhamādo vahantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18461: RV_10,044.04a evā patiṃ droṇasācaṃ sacetasam ūrja skambhaṃ dharuṇa ā vṛṣāyase /
GV01rvh1-10u:18462: RV_10,044.04c ojaḥ kṛṣva saṃ gṛbhāya tve apy aso yathā kenipānām ino vṛdhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18463: RV_10,044.05a gamann asme vasūny ā hi śaṃsiṣaṃ svāśiṣam bharam ā yāhi sominaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18464: RV_10,044.05c tvam īśiṣe sāsminn ā satsi barhiṣy anādhṛṣyā tava pātrāṇi dharmaṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18465: RV_10,044.06a pṛthak prāyan prathamā devahūtayo 'kṛṇvata śravasyāni duṣṭarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18466: RV_10,044.06c na ye śekur yajñiyāṃ nāvam āruham īrmaiva te ny aviśanta kepayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18467: RV_10,044.07a evaivāpāg apare santu dūḍhyo 'śvā yeṣāṃ duryuja āyuyujre /
GV01rvh1-10u:18468: RV_10,044.07c itthā ye prāg upare santi dāvane purūṇi yatra vayunāni bhojanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18469: RV_10,044.08a girīṃr ajrān rejamānāṃ adhārayad dyauḥ krandad antarikṣāṇi kopayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18470: RV_10,044.08c samīcīne dhiṣaṇe vi ṣkabhāyati vṛṣṇaḥ pītvā mada ukthāni śaṃsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:18471: RV_10,044.09a imam bibharmi sukṛtaṃ te aṅkuśaṃ yenārujāsi maghavañ chaphārujaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18472: RV_10,044.09c asmin su te savane astv okyaṃ suta iṣṭau maghavan bodhy ābhagaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18473: RV_10,044.10a gobhiṣ ṭaremāmatiṃ durevāṃ yavena kṣudham puruhūta viśvām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18474: RV_10,044.10c vayaṃ rājabhiḥ prathamā dhanāny asmākena vṛjanenā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:18475: RV_10,044.11a bṛhaspatir naḥ pari pātu paścād utottarasmād adharād aghāyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18476: RV_10,044.11c indraḥ purastād uta madhyato naḥ sakhā sakhibhyo varivaḥ kṛṇotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18477: RV_10,045.01a divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnir asmad dvitīyam pari jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18478: RV_10,045.01c tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇā ajasram indhāna enaṃ jarate svādhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18479: RV_10,045.02a vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18480: RV_10,045.02c vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ājagantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:18481: RV_10,045.03a samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsv antar nṛcakṣā īdhe divo agna ūdhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18482: RV_10,045.03c tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāṃsam apām upasthe mahiṣā avardhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18483: RV_10,045.04a akrandad agni stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18484: RV_10,045.04c sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akhyad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18485: RV_10,045.05a śrīṇām udāro dharuṇo rayīṇām manīṣāṇām prārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18486: RV_10,045.05c vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājā vi bhāty agra uṣasām idhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18487: RV_10,045.06a viśvasya ketur bhuvanasya garbha ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18488: RV_10,045.06c vīḷuṃ cid adrim abhinat parāyañ janā yad agnim ayajanta pañca //
GV01rvh1-10u:18489: RV_10,045.07a uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā marteṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18490: RV_10,045.07c iyarti dhūmam aruṣam bharibhrad uc chukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18491: RV_10,045.08a dṛśāno rukma urviyā vy adyaud durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18492: RV_10,045.08c agnir amṛto abhavad vayobhir yad enaṃ dyaur janayat suretāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18493: RV_10,045.09a yas te adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantam agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:18494: RV_10,045.09c pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo acchābhi sumnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yaviṣṭha //
GV01rvh1-10u:18495: RV_10,045.10a ā tam bhaja sauśravaseṣv agna uktha-uktha ā bhaja śasyamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:18496: RV_10,045.10c priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāty uj jātena bhinadad uj janitvaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18497: RV_10,045.11a tvām agne yajamānā anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18498: RV_10,045.11c tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānā vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18499: RV_10,045.12a astāvy agnir narāṃ suśevo vaiśvānara ṛṣibhiḥ somagopāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18500: RV_10,045.12c adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18501: RV_10,046.01a pra hotā jāto mahān nabhovin nṛṣadvā sīdad apām upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18502: RV_10,046.01c dadhir yo dhāyi sa te vayāṃsi yantā vasūni vidhate tanūpāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18503: RV_10,046.02a imaṃ vidhanto apāṃ sadhasthe paśuṃ na naṣṭam padair anu gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:18504: RV_10,046.02c guhā catantam uśijo namobhir icchanto dhīrā bhṛgavo 'vindan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18505: RV_10,046.03a imaṃ trito bhūry avindad icchan vaibhūvaso mūrdhany aghnyāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18506: RV_10,046.03c sa śevṛdho jāta ā harmyeṣu nābhir yuvā bhavati rocanasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18507: RV_10,046.04a mandraṃ hotāram uśijo namobhiḥ prāñcaṃ yajñaṃ netāram adhvarāṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18508: RV_10,046.04c viśām akṛṇvann aratim pāvakaṃ havyavāhaṃ dadhato mānuṣeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18509: RV_10,046.05a pra bhūr jayantam mahāṃ vipodhām mūrā amūram purāṃ darmāṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18510: RV_10,046.05c nayanto garbhaṃ vanāṃ dhiyaṃ dhur hiriśmaśruṃ nārvāṇaṃ dhanarcam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18511: RV_10,046.06a ni pastyāsu trita stabhūyan parivīto yonau sīdad antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18512: RV_10,046.06c ataḥ saṃgṛbhyā viśāṃ damūnā vidharmaṇāyantrair īyate nṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:18513: RV_10,046.07a asyājarāso damām aritrā arcaddhūmāso agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18514: RV_10,046.07c śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāso bhuraṇyavo vanarṣado vāyavo na somāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18515: RV_10,046.08a pra jihvayā bharate vepo agniḥ pra vayunāni cetasā pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18516: RV_10,046.08c tam āyavaḥ śucayantam pāvakam mandraṃ hotāraṃ dadhire yajiṣṭham //
GV01rvh1-10u:18517: RV_10,046.09a dyāvā yam agnim pṛthivī janiṣṭām āpas tvaṣṭā bhṛgavo yaṃ sahobhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18518: RV_10,046.09c īḷenyam prathamam mātariśvā devās tatakṣur manave yajatram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18519: RV_10,046.10a yaṃ tvā devā dadhire havyavāham puruspṛho mānuṣāso yajatram /
GV01rvh1-10u:18520: RV_10,046.10c sa yāmann agne stuvate vayo dhāḥ pra devayan yaśasaḥ saṃ hi pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18521: RV_10,047.01a jagṛbhmā te dakṣiṇam indra hastaṃ vasūyavo vasupate vasūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18522: RV_10,047.01c vidmā hi tvā gopatiṃ śūra gonām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18523: RV_10,047.02a svāyudhaṃ svavasaṃ sunīthaṃ catuḥsamudraṃ dharuṇaṃ rayīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18524: RV_10,047.02c carkṛtyaṃ śaṃsyam bhūrivāram asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18525: RV_10,047.03a subrahmāṇaṃ devavantam bṛhantam uruṃ gabhīram pṛthubudhnam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:18526: RV_10,047.03c śrutaṛṣim ugram abhimātiṣāham asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18527: RV_10,047.04a sanadvājaṃ vipravīraṃ tarutraṃ dhanaspṛtaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ sudakṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18528: RV_10,047.04c dasyuhanam pūrbhidam indra satyam asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18529: RV_10,047.05a aśvāvantaṃ rathinaṃ vīravantaṃ sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ vājam indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:18530: RV_10,047.05c bhadravrātaṃ vipravīraṃ svarṣām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18531: RV_10,047.06a pra saptagum ṛtadhītiṃ sumedhām bṛhaspatim matir acchā jigāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18532: RV_10,047.06c ya āṅgiraso namasopasadyo 'smabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18533: RV_10,047.07a vanīvāno mama dūtāsa indraṃ stomāś caranti sumatīr iyānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18534: RV_10,047.07c hṛdispṛśo manasā vacyamānā asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18535: RV_10,047.08a yat tvā yāmi daddhi tan na indra bṛhantaṃ kṣayam asamaṃ janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18536: RV_10,047.08c abhi tad dyāvāpṛthivī gṛṇītām asmabhyaṃ citraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rayiṃ dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18537: RV_10,048.01a aham bhuvaṃ vasunaḥ pūrvyas patir ahaṃ dhanāni saṃ jayāmi śaśvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18538: RV_10,048.01c māṃ havante pitaraṃ na jantavo 'haṃ dāśuṣe vi bhajāmi bhojanam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18539: RV_10,048.02a aham indro rodho vakṣo atharvaṇas tritāya gā ajanayam aher adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18540: RV_10,048.02c ahaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pari nṛmṇam ā dade gotrā śikṣan dadhīce mātariśvane //
GV01rvh1-10u:18541: RV_10,048.03a mahyaṃ tvaṣṭā vajram atakṣad āyasam mayi devāso 'vṛjann api kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:18542: RV_10,048.03c mamānīkaṃ sūryasyeva duṣṭaram mām āryanti kṛtena kartvena ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:18543: RV_10,048.04a aham etaṃ gavyayam aśvyam paśum purīṣiṇaṃ sāyakenā hiraṇyayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18544: RV_10,048.04c purū sahasrā ni śiśāmi dāśuṣe yan mā somāsa ukthino amandiṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18545: RV_10,048.05a aham indro na parā jigya id dhanaṃ na mṛtyave 'va tasthe kadā cana /
GV01rvh1-10u:18546: RV_10,048.05c somam in mā sunvanto yācatā vasu na me pūravaḥ sakhye riṣāthana //
GV01rvh1-10u:18547: RV_10,048.06a aham etāñ chāśvasato dvā-dvendraṃ ye vajraṃ yudhaye 'kṛṇvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:18548: RV_10,048.06c āhvayamānāṃ ava hanmanāhanaṃ dṛḷhā vadann anamasyur namasvinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18549: RV_10,048.07a abhīdam ekam eko asmi niṣṣāḷ abhī dvā kim u trayaḥ karanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18550: RV_10,048.07c khale na parṣān prati hanmi bhūri kim mā nindanti śatravo 'nindrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18551: RV_10,048.08a ahaṃ guṅgubhyo atithigvam iṣkaram iṣaṃ na vṛtraturaṃ vikṣu dhārayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18552: RV_10,048.08c yat parṇayaghna uta vā karañjahe prāham mahe vṛtrahatye aśuśravi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18553: RV_10,048.09a pra me namī sāpya iṣe bhuje bhūd gavām eṣe sakhyā kṛṇuta dvitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18554: RV_10,048.09c didyuṃ yad asya samitheṣu maṃhayam ād id enaṃ śaṃsyam ukthyaṃ karam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18555: RV_10,048.10a pra nemasmin dadṛśe somo antar gopā nemam āvir asthā kṛṇoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18556: RV_10,048.10c sa tigmaśṛṅgaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ yuyutsan druhas tasthau bahule baddho antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18557: RV_10,048.11a ādityānāṃ vasūnāṃ rudriyāṇāṃ devo devānāṃ na mināmi dhāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:18558: RV_10,048.11c te mā bhadrāya śavase tatakṣur aparājitam astṛtam aṣāḷham //
GV01rvh1-10u:18559: RV_10,049.01a ahaṃ dāṃ gṛṇate pūrvyaṃ vasv aham brahma kṛṇavam mahyaṃ vardhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18560: RV_10,049.01c aham bhuvaṃ yajamānasya coditāyajvanaḥ sākṣi viśvasmin bhare //
GV01rvh1-10u:18561: RV_10,049.02a māṃ dhur indraṃ nāma devatā divaś ca gmaś cāpāṃ ca jantavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18562: RV_10,049.02c ahaṃ harī vṛṣaṇā vivratā raghū ahaṃ vajraṃ śavase dhṛṣṇv ā dade //
GV01rvh1-10u:18563: RV_10,049.03a aham atkaṃ kavaye śiśnathaṃ hathair ahaṃ kutsam āvam ābhir ūtibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18564: RV_10,049.03c ahaṃ śuṣṇasya śnathitā vadhar yamaṃ na yo rara āryaṃ nāma dasyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:18565: RV_10,049.04a aham piteva vetasūṃr abhiṣṭaye tugraṃ kutsāya smadibhaṃ ca randhayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18566: RV_10,049.04c aham bhuvaṃ yajamānasya rājani pra yad bhare tujaye na priyādhṛṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18567: RV_10,049.05a ahaṃ randhayam mṛgayaṃ śrutarvaṇe yan mājihīta vayunā canānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:18568: RV_10,049.05c ahaṃ veśaṃ namram āyave 'karam ahaṃ savyāya paḍgṛbhim arandhayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18569: RV_10,049.06a ahaṃ sa yo navavāstvam bṛhadrathaṃ saṃ vṛtreva dāsaṃ vṛtrahārujam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18570: RV_10,049.06c yad vardhayantam prathayantam ānuṣag dūre pāre rajaso rocanākaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18571: RV_10,049.07a ahaṃ sūryasya pari yāmy āśubhiḥ praitaśebhir vahamāna ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18572: RV_10,049.07c yan mā sāvo manuṣa āha nirṇija ṛdhak kṛṣe dāsaṃ kṛtvyaṃ hathaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18573: RV_10,049.08a ahaṃ saptahā nahuṣo nahuṣṭaraḥ prāśrāvayaṃ śavasā turvaśaṃ yadum /
GV01rvh1-10u:18574: RV_10,049.08c ahaṃ ny anyaṃ sahasā sahas karaṃ nava vrādhato navatiṃ ca vakṣayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18575: RV_10,049.09a ahaṃ sapta sravato dhārayaṃ vṛṣā dravitnvaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sīrā adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18576: RV_10,049.09c aham arṇāṃsi vi tirāmi sukratur yudhā vidam manave gātum iṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18577: RV_10,049.10a ahaṃ tad āsu dhārayaṃ yad āsu na devaś cana tvaṣṭādhārayad ruśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18578: RV_10,049.10c spārhaṃ gavām ūdhassu vakṣaṇāsv ā madhor madhu śvātryaṃ somam āśiram //
GV01rvh1-10u:18579: RV_10,049.11a evā devāṃ indro vivye nṝn pra cyautnena maghavā satyarādhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18580: RV_10,049.11c viśvet tā te harivaḥ śacīvo 'bhi turāsaḥ svayaśo gṛṇanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18581: RV_10,050.01a pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve /
GV01rvh1-10u:18582: RV_10,050.01c indrasya yasya sumakhaṃ saho mahi śravo nṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18583: RV_10,050.02a so cin nu sakhyā narya ina stutaś carkṛtya indro māvate nare /
GV01rvh1-10u:18584: RV_10,050.02c viśvāsu dhūrṣu vājakṛtyeṣu satpate vṛtre vāpsv abhi śūra mandase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18585: RV_10,050.03a ke te nara indra ye ta iṣe ye te sumnaṃ sadhanyam iyakṣān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18586: RV_10,050.03c ke te vājāyāsuryāya hinvire ke apsu svāsūrvarāsu pauṃsye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18587: RV_10,050.04a bhuvas tvam indra brahmaṇā mahān bhuvo viśveṣu savaneṣu yajñiyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18588: RV_10,050.04c bhuvo nṝṃś cyautno viśvasmin bhare jyeṣṭhaś ca mantro viśvacarṣaṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18589: RV_10,050.05a avā nu kaṃ jyāyān yajñavanaso mahīṃ ta omātrāṃ kṛṣṭayo viduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18590: RV_10,050.05c aso nu kam ajaro vardhāś ca viśved etā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18591: RV_10,050.06a etā viśvā savanā tūtumā kṛṣe svayaṃ sūno sahaso yāni dadhiṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18592: RV_10,050.06c varāya te pātraṃ dharmaṇe tanā yajño mantro brahmodyataṃ vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18593: RV_10,050.07a ye te vipra brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā vasūnāṃ ca vasunaś ca dāvane /
GV01rvh1-10u:18594: RV_10,050.07c pra te sumnasya manasā pathā bhuvan made sutasya somyasyāndhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18595: RV_10,051.01a mahat tad ulbaṃ sthaviraṃ tad āsīd yenāviṣṭitaḥ praviveśithāpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18596: RV_10,051.01c viśvā apaśyad bahudhā te agne jātavedas tanvo deva ekaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18597: RV_10,051.02a ko mā dadarśa katamaḥ sa devo yo me tanvo bahudhā paryapaśyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18598: RV_10,051.02c kvāha mitrāvaruṇā kṣiyanty agner viśvāḥ samidho devayānīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18599: RV_10,051.03a aicchāma tvā bahudhā jātavedaḥ praviṣṭam agne apsv oṣadhīṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18600: RV_10,051.03c taṃ tvā yamo acikec citrabhāno daśāntaruṣyād atirocamānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18601: RV_10,051.04a hotrād ahaṃ varuṇa bibhyad āyaṃ ned eva mā yunajann atra devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18602: RV_10,051.04c tasya me tanvo bahudhā niviṣṭā etam arthaṃ na ciketāham agniḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18603: RV_10,051.05a ehi manur devayur yajñakāmo 'raṅkṛtyā tamasi kṣeṣy agne /
GV01rvh1-10u:18604: RV_10,051.05c sugān pathaḥ kṛṇuhi devayānān vaha havyāni sumanasyamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18605: RV_10,051.06a agneḥ pūrve bhrātaro artham etaṃ rathīvādhvānam anv āvarīvuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18606: RV_10,051.06c tasmād bhiyā varuṇa dūram āyaṃ gauro na kṣepnor avije jyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18607: RV_10,051.07a kurmas ta āyur ajaraṃ yad agne yathā yukto jātavedo na riṣyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18608: RV_10,051.07c athā vahāsi sumanasyamāno bhāgaṃ devebhyo haviṣaḥ sujāta //
GV01rvh1-10u:18609: RV_10,051.08a prayājān me anuyājāṃś ca kevalān ūrjasvantaṃ haviṣo datta bhāgam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18610: RV_10,051.08c ghṛtaṃ cāpām puruṣaṃ cauṣadhīnām agneś ca dīrgham āyur astu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18611: RV_10,051.09a tava prayājā anuyājāś ca kevala ūrjasvanto haviṣaḥ santu bhāgāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18612: RV_10,051.09c tavāgne yajño 'yam astu sarvas tubhyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18613: RV_10,052.01a viśve devāḥ śāstana mā yatheha hotā vṛto manavai yan niṣadya /
GV01rvh1-10u:18614: RV_10,052.01c pra me brūta bhāgadheyaṃ yathā vo yena pathā havyam ā vo vahāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:18615: RV_10,052.02a ahaṃ hotā ny asīdaṃ yajīyān viśve devā maruto mā junanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18616: RV_10,052.02c ahar-ahar aśvinādhvaryavaṃ vām brahmā samid bhavati sāhutir vām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18617: RV_10,052.03a ayaṃ yo hotā kir u sa yamasya kam apy ūhe yat samañjanti devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18618: RV_10,052.03c ahar-ahar jāyate māsi-māsy athā devā dadhire havyavāham //
GV01rvh1-10u:18619: RV_10,052.04a māṃ devā dadhire havyavāham apamluktam bahu kṛcchrā carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18620: RV_10,052.04c agnir vidvān yajñaṃ naḥ kalpayāti pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum //
GV01rvh1-10u:18621: RV_10,052.05a ā vo yakṣy amṛtatvaṃ suvīraṃ yathā vo devā varivaḥ karāṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18622: RV_10,052.05c ā bāhvor vajram indrasya dheyām athemā viśvāḥ pṛtanā jayāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18623: RV_10,052.06a trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ triṃśac ca devā nava cāsaparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18624: RV_10,052.06c aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:18625: RV_10,053.01a yam aicchāma manasā so 'yam āgād yajñasya vidvān paruṣaś cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18626: RV_10,053.01c sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān ni hi ṣatsad antaraḥ pūrvo asmat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18627: RV_10,053.02a arādhi hotā niṣadā yajīyān abhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni hi khyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18628: RV_10,053.02c yajāmahai yajñiyān hanta devāṃ īḷāmahā īḍyāṃ ājyena //
GV01rvh1-10u:18629: RV_10,053.03a sādhvīm akar devavītiṃ no adya yajñasya jihvām avidāma guhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18630: RV_10,053.03c sa āyur āgāt surabhir vasāno bhadrām akar devahūtiṃ no adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:18631: RV_10,053.04a tad adya vācaḥ prathamam masīya yenāsurāṃ abhi devā asāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:18632: RV_10,053.04c ūrjāda uta yajñiyāsaḥ pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18633: RV_10,053.05a pañca janā mama hotraṃ juṣantāṃ gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18634: RV_10,053.05c pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātv aṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātv asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18635: RV_10,053.06a tantuṃ tanvan rajaso bhānum anv ihi jyotiṣmataḥ patho rakṣa dhiyā kṛtān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18636: RV_10,053.06c anulbaṇaṃ vayata joguvām apo manur bhava janayā daivyaṃ janam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18637: RV_10,053.07a akṣānaho nahyatanota somyā iṣkṛṇudhvaṃ raśanā ota piṃśata /
GV01rvh1-10u:18638: RV_10,053.07c aṣṭāvandhuraṃ vahatābhito rathaṃ yena devāso anayann abhi priyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18639: RV_10,053.08a aśmanvatī rīyate saṃ rabhadhvam ut tiṣṭhata pra taratā sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18640: RV_10,053.08c atrā jahāma ye asann aśevāḥ śivān vayam ut taremābhi vājān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18641: RV_10,053.09a tvaṣṭā māyā ved apasām apastamo bibhrat pātrā devapānāni śantamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18642: RV_10,053.09c śiśīte nūnam paraśuṃ svāyasaṃ yena vṛścād etaśo brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18643: RV_10,053.10a sato nūnaṃ kavayaḥ saṃ śiśīta vāśībhir yābhir amṛtāya takṣatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:18644: RV_10,053.10c vidvāṃsaḥ padā guhyāni kartana yena devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18645: RV_10,053.11a garbhe yoṣām adadhur vatsam āsany apīcyena manasota jihvayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18646: RV_10,053.11c sa viśvāhā sumanā yogyā abhi siṣāsanir vanate kāra ij jitim //
GV01rvh1-10u:18647: RV_10,054.01a tāṃ su te kīrtim maghavan mahitvā yat tvā bhīte rodasī ahvayetām /
