GV01rvh1-10u:18648: RV_10,054.01c prāvo devāṃ ātiro dāsam ojaḥ prajāyai tvasyai yad aśikṣa indra //
GV01rvh1-10u:18649: RV_10,054.02a yad acaras tanvā vāvṛdhāno balānīndra prabruvāṇo janeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18650: RV_10,054.02c māyet sā te yāni yuddhāny āhur nādya śatruṃ nanu purā vivitse //
GV01rvh1-10u:18651: RV_10,054.03a ka u nu te mahimanaḥ samasyāsmat pūrva ṛṣayo 'ntam āpuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18652: RV_10,054.03c yan mātaraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca sākam ajanayathās tanvaḥ svāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18653: RV_10,054.04a catvāri te asuryāṇi nāmādābhyāni mahiṣasya santi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18654: RV_10,054.04c tvam aṅga tāni viśvāni vitse yebhiḥ karmāṇi maghavañ cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:18655: RV_10,054.05a tvaṃ viśvā dadhiṣe kevalāni yāny āvir yā ca guhā vasūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:18656: RV_10,054.05c kāmam in me maghavan mā vi tārīs tvam ājñātā tvam indrāsi dātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18657: RV_10,054.06a yo adadhāj jyotiṣi jyotir antar yo asṛjan madhunā sam madhūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:18658: RV_10,054.06c adha priyaṃ śūṣam indrāya manma brahmakṛto bṛhadukthād avāci //
GV01rvh1-10u:18659: RV_10,055.01a dūre tan nāma guhyam parācair yat tvā bhīte ahvayetāṃ vayodhai /
GV01rvh1-10u:18660: RV_10,055.01c ud astabhnāḥ pṛthivīṃ dyām abhīke bhrātuḥ putrān maghavan titviṣāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18661: RV_10,055.02a mahat tan nāma guhyam puruspṛg yena bhūtaṃ janayo yena bhavyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18662: RV_10,055.02c pratnaṃ jātaṃ jyotir yad asya priyam priyāḥ sam aviśanta pañca //
GV01rvh1-10u:18663: RV_10,055.03a ā rodasī apṛṇād ota madhyam pañca devāṃ ṛtuśaḥ sapta-sapta /
GV01rvh1-10u:18664: RV_10,055.03c catustriṃśatā purudhā vi caṣṭe sarūpeṇa jyotiṣā vivratena //
GV01rvh1-10u:18665: RV_10,055.04a yad uṣa aucchaḥ prathamā vibhānām ajanayo yena puṣṭasya puṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18666: RV_10,055.04c yat te jāmitvam avaram parasyā mahan mahatyā asuratvam ekam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18667: RV_10,055.05a vidhuṃ dadrāṇaṃ samane bahūnāṃ yuvānaṃ santam palito jagāra /
GV01rvh1-10u:18668: RV_10,055.05c devasya paśya kāvyam mahitvādyā mamāra sa hyaḥ sam āna //
GV01rvh1-10u:18669: RV_10,055.06a śākmanā śāko aruṇaḥ suparṇa ā yo mahaḥ śūraḥ sanād anīḷaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18670: RV_10,055.06c yac ciketa satyam it tan na moghaṃ vasu spārham uta jetota dātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18671: RV_10,055.07a aibhir dade vṛṣṇyā pauṃsyāni yebhir aukṣad vṛtrahatyāya vajrī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18672: RV_10,055.07c ye karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya mahna ṛtekarmam udajāyanta devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18673: RV_10,055.08a yujā karmāṇi janayan viśvaujā aśastihā viśvamanās turāṣāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18674: RV_10,055.08c pītvī somasya diva ā vṛdhānaḥ śūro nir yudhādhamad dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:18675: RV_10,056.01a idaṃ ta ekam para ū ta ekaṃ tṛtīyena jyotiṣā saṃ viśasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:18676: RV_10,056.01c saṃveśane tanvaś cārur edhi priyo devānām parame janitre //
GV01rvh1-10u:18677: RV_10,056.02a tanūṣ ṭe vājin tanvaṃ nayantī vāmam asmabhyaṃ dhātu śarma tubhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18678: RV_10,056.02c ahruto maho dharuṇāya devān divīva jyotiḥ svam ā mimīyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18679: RV_10,056.03a vājy asi vājinenā suvenīḥ suvita stomaṃ suvito divaṃ gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18680: RV_10,056.03c suvito dharma prathamānu satyā suvito devān suvito 'nu patma //
GV01rvh1-10u:18681: RV_10,056.04a mahimna eṣām pitaraś caneśire devā deveṣv adadhur api kratum /
GV01rvh1-10u:18682: RV_10,056.04c sam avivyacur uta yāny atviṣur aiṣāṃ tanūṣu ni viviśuḥ punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18683: RV_10,056.05a sahobhir viśvam pari cakramū rajaḥ pūrvā dhāmāny amitā mimānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18684: RV_10,056.05c tanūṣu viśvā bhuvanā ni yemire prāsārayanta purudha prajā anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18685: RV_10,056.06a dvidhā sūnavo 'suraṃ svarvidam āsthāpayanta tṛtīyena karmaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18686: RV_10,056.06c svām prajām pitaraḥ pitryaṃ saha āvareṣv adadhus tantum ātatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18687: RV_10,056.07a nāvā na kṣodaḥ pradiśaḥ pṛthivyāḥ svastibhir ati durgāṇi viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18688: RV_10,056.07c svām prajām bṛhaduktho mahitvāvareṣv adadhād ā pareṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18689: RV_10,057.01a mā pra gāma patho vayam mā yajñād indra sominaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18691: RV_10,057.02a yo yajñasya prasādhanas tantur deveṣv ātataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18693: RV_10,057.03a mano nv ā huvāmahe nārāśaṃsena somena /
GV01rvh1-10u:18695: RV_10,057.04a ā ta etu manaḥ punaḥ kratve dakṣāya jīvase /
GV01rvh1-10u:18697: RV_10,057.05a punar naḥ pitaro mano dadātu daivyo janaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18699: RV_10,057.06a vayaṃ soma vrate tava manas tanūṣu bibhrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18701: RV_10,058.01a yat te yamaṃ vaivasvatam mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18702: RV_10,058.01c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18703: RV_10,058.02a yat te divaṃ yat pṛthivīm mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18704: RV_10,058.02c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18705: RV_10,058.03a yat te bhūmiṃ caturbhṛṣṭim mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18706: RV_10,058.03c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18707: RV_10,058.04a yat te catasraḥ pradiśo mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18708: RV_10,058.04c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18709: RV_10,058.05a yat te samudram arṇavam mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18710: RV_10,058.05c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18711: RV_10,058.06a yat te marīcīḥ pravato mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18712: RV_10,058.06c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18713: RV_10,058.07a yat te apo yad oṣadhīr mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18714: RV_10,058.07c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18715: RV_10,058.08a yat te sūryaṃ yad uṣasam mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18716: RV_10,058.08c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18717: RV_10,058.09a yat te parvatān bṛhato mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18718: RV_10,058.09c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18719: RV_10,058.10a yat te viśvam idaṃ jagan mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18720: RV_10,058.10c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18721: RV_10,058.11a yat te parāḥ parāvato mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18722: RV_10,058.11c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18723: RV_10,058.12a yat te bhūtaṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca mano jagāma dūrakam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18724: RV_10,058.12c tat ta ā vartayāmasīha kṣayāya jīvase //
GV01rvh1-10u:18725: RV_10,059.01a pra tāry āyuḥ prataraṃ navīya sthātāreva kratumatā rathasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:18726: RV_10,059.01c adha cyavāna ut tavīty artham parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18727: RV_10,059.02a sāman nu rāye nidhiman nv annaṃ karāmahe su purudha śravāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18728: RV_10,059.02c tā no viśvāni jaritā mamattu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18729: RV_10,059.03a abhī ṣv aryaḥ pauṃsyair bhavema dyaur na bhūmiṃ girayo nājrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18730: RV_10,059.03c tā no viśvāni jaritā ciketa parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18731: RV_10,059.04a mo ṣu ṇaḥ soma mṛtyave parā dāḥ paśyema nu sūryam uccarantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18732: RV_10,059.04c dyubhir hito jarimā sū no astu parātaraṃ su nirṛtir jihītām //
GV01rvh1-10u:18733: RV_10,059.05a asunīte mano asmāsu dhāraya jīvātave su pra tirā na āyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18734: RV_10,059.05c rārandhi naḥ sūryasya saṃdṛśi ghṛtena tvaṃ tanvaṃ vardhayasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:18735: RV_10,059.06a asunīte punar asmāsu cakṣuḥ punaḥ prāṇam iha no dhehi bhogam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18736: RV_10,059.06c jyok paśyema sūryam uccarantam anumate mṛḷayā naḥ svasti //
GV01rvh1-10u:18737: RV_10,059.07a punar no asum pṛthivī dadātu punar dyaur devī punar antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18738: RV_10,059.07c punar naḥ somas tanvaṃ dadātu punaḥ pūṣā pathyāṃ yā svastiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18739: RV_10,059.08a śaṃ rodasī subandhave yahvī ṛtasya mātarā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18740: RV_10,059.08c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18741: RV_10,059.09a ava dvake ava trikā divaś caranti bheṣajā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18742: RV_10,059.09c kṣamā cariṣṇv ekakam bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18743: RV_10,059.10a sam indreraya gām anaḍvāhaṃ ya āvahad uśīnarāṇyā anaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18744: RV_10,059.10c bharatām apa yad rapo dyauḥ pṛthivi kṣamā rapo mo ṣu te kiṃ canāmamat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18745: RV_10,060.01a ā janaṃ tveṣasaṃdṛśam māhīnānām upastutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18747: RV_10,060.02a asamātiṃ nitośanaṃ tveṣaṃ niyayinaṃ ratham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18749: RV_10,060.03a yo janān mahiṣāṃ ivātitasthau pavīravān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18751: RV_10,060.04a yasyekṣvākur upa vrate revān marāyy edhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:18755: RV_10,060.06a agastyasya nadbhyaḥ saptī yunakṣi rohitā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18756: RV_10,060.06c paṇīn ny akramīr abhi viśvān rājann arādhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18757: RV_10,060.07a ayam mātāyam pitāyaṃ jīvātur āgamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18758: RV_10,060.07c idaṃ tava prasarpaṇaṃ subandhav ehi nir ihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18759: RV_10,060.08a yathā yugaṃ varatrayā nahyanti dharuṇāya kam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18760: RV_10,060.08c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18761: RV_10,060.09a yatheyam pṛthivī mahī dādhāremān vanaspatīn /
GV01rvh1-10u:18762: RV_10,060.09c evā dādhāra te mano jīvātave na mṛtyave 'tho ariṣṭatātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18763: RV_10,060.10a yamād ahaṃ vaivasvatāt subandhor mana ābharam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18765: RV_10,060.11a nyag vāto 'va vāti nyak tapati sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18766: RV_10,060.11c nīcīnam aghnyā duhe nyag bhavatu te rapaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18767: RV_10,060.12a ayam me hasto bhagavān ayam me bhagavattaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18769: RV_10,061.01a idam itthā raudraṃ gūrtavacā brahma kratvā śacyām antar ājau /
GV01rvh1-10u:18770: RV_10,061.01c krāṇā yad asya pitarā maṃhaneṣṭhāḥ parṣat pakthe ahann ā sapta hotṝn //
GV01rvh1-10u:18771: RV_10,061.02a sa id dānāya dabhyāya vanvañ cyavānaḥ sūdair amimīta vedim /
GV01rvh1-10u:18772: RV_10,061.02c tūrvayāṇo gūrtavacastamaḥ kṣodo na reta itaūti siñcat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18773: RV_10,061.03a mano na yeṣu havaneṣu tigmaṃ vipaḥ śacyā vanutho dravantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18774: RV_10,061.03c ā yaḥ śaryābhis tuvinṛmṇo asyāśrīṇītādiśaṃ gabhastau //
GV01rvh1-10u:18775: RV_10,061.04a kṛṣṇā yad goṣv aruṇīṣu sīdad divo napātāśvinā huve vām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18776: RV_10,061.04c vītam me yajñam ā gatam me annaṃ vavanvāṃsā neṣam asmṛtadhrū //
GV01rvh1-10u:18777: RV_10,061.05a prathiṣṭa yasya vīrakarmam iṣṇad anuṣṭhitaṃ nu naryo apauhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18778: RV_10,061.05c punas tad ā vṛhati yat kanāyā duhitur ā anubhṛtam anarvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18779: RV_10,061.06a madhyā yat kartvam abhavad abhīke kāmaṃ kṛṇvāne pitari yuvatyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18780: RV_10,061.06c manānag reto jahatur viyantā sānau niṣiktaṃ sukṛtasya yonau //
GV01rvh1-10u:18781: RV_10,061.07a pitā yat svāṃ duhitaram adhiṣkan kṣmayā retaḥ saṃjagmāno ni ṣiñcat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18782: RV_10,061.07c svādhyo 'janayan brahma devā vāstoṣ patiṃ vratapāṃ nir atakṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18783: RV_10,061.08a sa īṃ vṛṣā na phenam asyad ājau smad ā paraid apa dabhracetāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18784: RV_10,061.08c sarat padā na dakṣiṇā parāvṛṅ na tā nu me pṛśanyo jagṛbhre //
GV01rvh1-10u:18785: RV_10,061.09a makṣū na vahniḥ prajāyā upabdir agniṃ na nagna upa sīdad ūdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18786: RV_10,061.09c sanitedhmaṃ sanitota vājaṃ sa dhartā jajñe sahasā yavīyut //
GV01rvh1-10u:18787: RV_10,061.10a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navagvā ṛtaṃ vadanta ṛtayuktim agman /
GV01rvh1-10u:18788: RV_10,061.10c dvibarhaso ya upa gopam āgur adakṣiṇāso acyutā dudukṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18789: RV_10,061.11a makṣū kanāyāḥ sakhyaṃ navīyo rādho na reta ṛtam it turaṇyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18790: RV_10,061.11c śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ paya usriyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18791: RV_10,061.12a paśvā yat paścā viyutā budhanteti bravīti vaktarī rarāṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18792: RV_10,061.12c vasor vasutvā kāravo 'nehā viśvaṃ viveṣṭi draviṇam upa kṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18793: RV_10,061.13a tad in nv asya pariṣadvāno agman purū sadanto nārṣadam bibhitsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18794: RV_10,061.13c vi śuṣṇasya saṃgrathitam anarvā vidat puruprajātasya guhā yat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18795: RV_10,061.14a bhargo ha nāmota yasya devāḥ svar ṇa ye triṣadhasthe niṣeduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18796: RV_10,061.14c agnir ha nāmota jātavedāḥ śrudhī no hotar ṛtasya hotādhruk //
GV01rvh1-10u:18797: RV_10,061.15a uta tyā me raudrāv arcimantā nāsatyāv indra gūrtaye yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:18798: RV_10,061.15c manuṣvad vṛktabarhiṣe rarāṇā mandū hitaprayasā vikṣu yajyū //
GV01rvh1-10u:18799: RV_10,061.16a ayaṃ stuto rājā vandi vedhā apaś ca vipras tarati svasetuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18800: RV_10,061.16c sa kakṣīvantaṃ rejayat so agniṃ nemiṃ na cakram arvato raghudru //
GV01rvh1-10u:18801: RV_10,061.17a sa dvibandhur vaitaraṇo yaṣṭā sabardhuṃ dhenum asvaṃ duhadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:18802: RV_10,061.17c saṃ yan mitrāvaruṇā vṛñja ukthair jyeṣṭhebhir aryamaṇaṃ varūthaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18803: RV_10,061.18a tadbandhuḥ sūrir divi te dhiyandhā nābhānediṣṭho rapati pra venan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18804: RV_10,061.18c sā no nābhiḥ paramāsya vā ghāhaṃ tat paścā katithaś cid āsa //
GV01rvh1-10u:18805: RV_10,061.19a iyam me nābhir iha me sadhastham ime me devā ayam asmi sarvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18806: RV_10,061.19c dvijā aha prathamajā ṛtasyedaṃ dhenur aduhaj jāyamānā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18807: RV_10,061.20a adhāsu mandro aratir vibhāvāva syati dvivartanir vaneṣāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18808: RV_10,061.20c ūrdhvā yac chreṇir na śiśur dan makṣū sthiraṃ śevṛdhaṃ sūta mātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18809: RV_10,061.21a adhā gāva upamātiṃ kanāyā anu śvāntasya kasya cit pareyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18810: RV_10,061.21c śrudhi tvaṃ sudraviṇo nas tvaṃ yāḷ āśvaghnasya vāvṛdhe sūnṛtābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18811: RV_10,061.22a adha tvam indra viddhy asmān maho rāye nṛpate vajrabāhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18812: RV_10,061.22c rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn anehasas te harivo abhiṣṭau //
GV01rvh1-10u:18813: RV_10,061.23a adha yad rājānā gaviṣṭau sarat saraṇyuḥ kārave jaraṇyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18814: RV_10,061.23c vipraḥ preṣṭhaḥ sa hy eṣām babhūva parā ca vakṣad uta parṣad enān //
GV01rvh1-10u:18815: RV_10,061.24a adhā nv asya jenyasya puṣṭau vṛthā rebhanta īmahe tad ū nu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18816: RV_10,061.24c saraṇyur asya sūnur aśvo vipraś cāsi śravasaś ca sātau //
GV01rvh1-10u:18817: RV_10,061.25a yuvor yadi sakhyāyāsme śardhāya stomaṃ jujuṣe namasvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:18818: RV_10,061.25c viśvatra yasminn ā giraḥ samīcīḥ pūrvīva gātur dāśat sūnṛtāyai //
GV01rvh1-10u:18819: RV_10,061.26a sa gṛṇāno adbhir devavān iti subandhur namasā sūktaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18820: RV_10,061.26c vardhad ukthair vacobhir ā hi nūnaṃ vy adhvaiti payasa usriyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18821: RV_10,061.27a ta ū ṣu ṇo maho yajatrā bhūta devāsa ūtaye sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18822: RV_10,061.27c ye vājāṃ anayatā viyanto ye sthā nicetāro amūrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18823: RV_10,062.01a ye yajñena dakṣiṇayā samaktā indrasya sakhyam amṛtatvam ānaśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:18824: RV_10,062.01c tebhyo bhadram aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18825: RV_10,062.02a ya udājan pitaro gomayaṃ vasv ṛtenābhindan parivatsare valam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18826: RV_10,062.02c dīrghāyutvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18827: RV_10,062.03a ya ṛtena sūryam ārohayan divy aprathayan pṛthivīm mātaraṃ vi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18828: RV_10,062.03c suprajāstvam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18829: RV_10,062.04a ayaṃ nābhā vadati valgu vo gṛhe devaputrā ṛṣayas tac chṛṇotana /
GV01rvh1-10u:18830: RV_10,062.04c subrahmaṇyam aṅgiraso vo astu prati gṛbhṇīta mānavaṃ sumedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18831: RV_10,062.05a virūpāsa id ṛṣayas ta id gambhīravepasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18832: RV_10,062.05c te aṅgirasaḥ sūnavas te agneḥ pari jajñire //
GV01rvh1-10u:18833: RV_10,062.06a ye agneḥ pari jajñire virūpāso divas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:18834: RV_10,062.06c navagvo nu daśagvo aṅgirastamo sacā deveṣu maṃhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18835: RV_10,062.07a indreṇa yujā niḥ sṛjanta vāghato vrajaṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18836: RV_10,062.07c sahasram me dadato aṣṭakarṇyaḥ śravo deveṣv akrata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18837: RV_10,062.08a pra nūnaṃ jāyatām ayam manus tokmeva rohatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18838: RV_10,062.08c yaḥ sahasraṃ śatāśvaṃ sadyo dānāya maṃhate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18839: RV_10,062.09a na tam aśnoti kaś cana diva iva sānv ārabham /
GV01rvh1-10u:18840: RV_10,062.09c sāvarṇyasya dakṣiṇā vi sindhur iva paprathe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18841: RV_10,062.10a uta dāsā pariviṣe smaddiṣṭī goparīṇasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18843: RV_10,062.11a sahasradā grāmaṇīr mā riṣan manuḥ sūryeṇāsya yatamānaitu dakṣiṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18844: RV_10,062.11c sāvarṇer devāḥ pra tirantv āyur yasminn aśrāntā asanāma vājam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18845: RV_10,063.01a parāvato ye didhiṣanta āpyam manuprītāso janimā vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18846: RV_10,063.01c yayāter ye nahuṣyasya barhiṣi devā āsate te adhi bruvantu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18847: RV_10,063.02a viśvā hi vo namasyāni vandyā nāmāni devā uta yajñiyāni vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18848: RV_10,063.02c ye stha jātā aditer adbhyas pari ye pṛthivyās te ma iha śrutā havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18849: RV_10,063.03a yebhyo mātā madhumat pinvate payaḥ pīyūṣaṃ dyaur aditir adribarhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18850: RV_10,063.03c ukthaśuṣmān vṛṣabharān svapnasas tāṃ ādityāṃ anu madā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18851: RV_10,063.04a nṛcakṣaso animiṣanto arhaṇā bṛhad devāso amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18852: RV_10,063.04c jyotīrathā ahimāyā anāgaso divo varṣmāṇaṃ vasate svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18853: RV_10,063.05a samrājo ye suvṛdho yajñam āyayur aparihvṛtā dadhire divi kṣayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18854: RV_10,063.05c tāṃ ā vivāsa namasā suvṛktibhir maho ādityāṃ aditiṃ svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18855: RV_10,063.06a ko va stomaṃ rādhati yaṃ jujoṣatha viśve devāso manuṣo yati ṣṭhana /
GV01rvh1-10u:18856: RV_10,063.06c ko vo 'dhvaraṃ tuvijātā araṃ karad yo naḥ parṣad aty aṃhaḥ svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18857: RV_10,063.07a yebhyo hotrām prathamām āyeje manuḥ samiddhāgnir manasā sapta hotṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18858: RV_10,063.07c ta ādityā abhayaṃ śarma yacchata sugā naḥ karta supathā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18859: RV_10,063.08a ya īśire bhuvanasya pracetaso viśvasya sthātur jagataś ca mantavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18860: RV_10,063.08c te naḥ kṛtād akṛtād enasas pary adyā devāsaḥ pipṛtā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18861: RV_10,063.09a bhareṣv indraṃ suhavaṃ havāmahe 'ṃhomucaṃ sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ janam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18862: RV_10,063.09c agnim mitraṃ varuṇaṃ sātaye bhagaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī marutaḥ svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18863: RV_10,063.10a sutrāmāṇam pṛthivīṃ dyām anehasaṃ suśarmāṇam aditiṃ supraṇītim /
GV01rvh1-10u:18864: RV_10,063.10c daivīṃ nāvaṃ svaritrām anāgasam asravantīm ā ruhemā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18865: RV_10,063.11a viśve yajatrā adhi vocatotaye trāyadhvaṃ no durevāyā abhihrutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18866: RV_10,063.11c satyayā vo devahūtyā huvema śṛṇvato devā avase svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18867: RV_10,063.12a apāmīvām apa viśvām anāhutim apārātiṃ durvidatrām aghāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18868: RV_10,063.12c āre devā dveṣo asmad yuyotanoru ṇaḥ śarma yacchatā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18869: RV_10,063.13a ariṣṭaḥ sa marto viśva edhate pra prajābhir jāyate dharmaṇas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:18870: RV_10,063.13c yam ādityāso nayathā sunītibhir ati viśvāni duritā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18871: RV_10,063.14a yaṃ devāso 'vatha vājasātau yaṃ śūrasātā maruto hite dhane /
GV01rvh1-10u:18872: RV_10,063.14c prātaryāvāṇaṃ ratham indra sānasim ariṣyantam ā ruhemā svastaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18873: RV_10,063.15a svasti naḥ pathyāsu dhanvasu svasty apsu vṛjane svarvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:18874: RV_10,063.15c svasti naḥ putrakṛtheṣu yoniṣu svasti rāye maruto dadhātana //
GV01rvh1-10u:18875: RV_10,063.16a svastir id dhi prapathe śreṣṭhā rekṇasvaty abhi yā vāmam eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:18876: RV_10,063.16c sā no amā so araṇe ni pātu svāveśā bhavatu devagopā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18877: RV_10,063.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18878: RV_10,063.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena //
GV01rvh1-10u:18879: RV_10,064.01a kathā devānāṃ katamasya yāmani sumantu nāma śṛṇvatām manāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18880: RV_10,064.01c ko mṛḷāti katamo no mayas karat katama ūtī abhy ā vavartati //
GV01rvh1-10u:18881: RV_10,064.02a kratūyanti kratavo hṛtsu dhītayo venanti venāḥ patayanty ā diśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18882: RV_10,064.02c na marḍitā vidyate anya ebhyo deveṣu me adhi kāmā ayaṃsata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18883: RV_10,064.03a narā vā śaṃsam pūṣaṇam agohyam agniṃ deveddham abhy arcase girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18884: RV_10,064.03c sūryāmāsā candramasā yamaṃ divi tritaṃ vātam uṣasam aktum aśvinā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18885: RV_10,064.04a kathā kavis tuvīravān kayā girā bṛhaspatir vāvṛdhate suvṛktibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18886: RV_10,064.04c aja ekapāt suhavebhir ṛkvabhir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani //
GV01rvh1-10u:18887: RV_10,064.05a dakṣasya vādite janmani vrate rājānā mitrāvaruṇā vivāsasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:18888: RV_10,064.05c atūrtapanthāḥ pururatho aryamā saptahotā viṣurūpeṣu janmasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18889: RV_10,064.06a te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājino mitadravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18890: RV_10,064.06c sahasrasā medhasātāv iva tmanā maho ye dhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire //
GV01rvh1-10u:18891: RV_10,064.07a pra vo vāyuṃ rathayujam purandhiṃ stomaiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sakhyāya pūṣaṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18892: RV_10,064.07c te hi devasya savituḥ savīmani kratuṃ sacante sacitaḥ sacetasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18893: RV_10,064.08a triḥ sapta sasrā nadyo mahīr apo vanaspatīn parvatāṃ agnim ūtaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18894: RV_10,064.08c kṛśānum astṝn tiṣyaṃ sadhastha ā rudraṃ rudreṣu rudriyaṃ havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18895: RV_10,064.09a sarasvatī sarayuḥ sindhur ūrmibhir maho mahīr avasā yantu vakṣaṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18896: RV_10,064.09c devīr āpo mātaraḥ sūdayitnvo ghṛtavat payo madhuman no arcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18897: RV_10,064.10a uta mātā bṛhaddivā śṛṇotu nas tvaṣṭā devebhir janibhiḥ pitā vacaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18898: RV_10,064.10c ṛbhukṣā vājo rathaspatir bhago raṇvaḥ śaṃsaḥ śaśamānasya pātu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18899: RV_10,064.11a raṇvaḥ saṃdṛṣṭau pitumāṃ iva kṣayo bhadrā rudrāṇām marutām upastutiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18900: RV_10,064.11c gobhiḥ ṣyāma yaśaso janeṣv ā sadā devāsa iḷayā sacemahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:18901: RV_10,064.12a yām me dhiyam maruta indra devā adadāta varuṇa mitra yūyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18902: RV_10,064.12c tām pīpayata payaseva dhenuṃ kuvid giro adhi rathe vahātha //
GV01rvh1-10u:18903: RV_10,064.13a kuvid aṅga prati yathā cid asya naḥ sajātyasya maruto bubodhatha /
GV01rvh1-10u:18904: RV_10,064.13c nābhā yatra prathamaṃ saṃnasāmahe tatra jāmitvam aditir dadhātu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18905: RV_10,064.14a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī mātarā mahī devī devāñ janmanā yajñiye itaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18906: RV_10,064.14c ubhe bibhṛta ubhayam bharīmabhiḥ purū retāṃsi pitṛbhiś ca siñcataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18907: RV_10,064.15a vi ṣā hotrā viśvam aśnoti vāryam bṛhaspatir aramatiḥ panīyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18908: RV_10,064.15c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad avīvaśanta matibhir manīṣiṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18909: RV_10,064.16a evā kavis tuvīravāṃ ṛtajñā draviṇasyur draviṇasaś cakānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18910: RV_10,064.16c ukthebhir atra matibhiś ca vipro 'pīpayad gayo divyāni janma //
GV01rvh1-10u:18911: RV_10,064.17a evā plateḥ sūnur avīvṛdhad vo viśva ādityā adite manīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:18912: RV_10,064.17c īśānāso naro amartyenāstāvi jano divyo gayena //
GV01rvh1-10u:18913: RV_10,065.01a agnir indro varuṇo mitro aryamā vāyuḥ pūṣā sarasvatī sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18914: RV_10,065.01c ādityā viṣṇur marutaḥ svar bṛhat somo rudro aditir brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18915: RV_10,065.02a indrāgnī vṛtrahatyeṣu satpatī mitho hinvānā tanvā samokasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18916: RV_10,065.02c antarikṣam mahy ā paprur ojasā somo ghṛtaśrīr mahimānam īrayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18917: RV_10,065.03a teṣāṃ hi mahnā mahatām anarvaṇāṃ stomāṃ iyarmy ṛtajñā ṛtāvṛdhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:18918: RV_10,065.03c ye apsavam arṇavaṃ citrarādhasas te no rāsantām mahaye sumitryāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18919: RV_10,065.04a svarṇaram antarikṣāṇi rocanā dyāvābhūmī pṛthivīṃ skambhur ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18920: RV_10,065.04c pṛkṣā iva mahayantaḥ surātayo devā stavante manuṣāya sūrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18921: RV_10,065.05a mitrāya śikṣa varuṇāya dāśuṣe yā samrājā manasā na prayucchataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18922: RV_10,065.05c yayor dhāma dharmaṇā rocate bṛhad yayor ubhe rodasī nādhasī vṛtau //
GV01rvh1-10u:18923: RV_10,065.06a yā gaur vartanim paryeti niṣkṛtam payo duhānā vratanīr avārataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18924: RV_10,065.06c sā prabruvāṇā varuṇāya dāśuṣe devebhyo dāśad dhaviṣā vivasvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:18925: RV_10,065.07a divakṣaso agnijihvā ṛtāvṛdha ṛtasya yoniṃ vimṛśanta āsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:18926: RV_10,065.07c dyāṃ skabhitvy apa ā cakrur ojasā yajñaṃ janitvī tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18927: RV_10,065.08a parikṣitā pitarā pūrvajāvarī ṛtasya yonā kṣayataḥ samokasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18928: RV_10,065.08c dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇāya savrate ghṛtavat payo mahiṣāya pinvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18929: RV_10,065.09a parjanyāvātā vṛṣabhā purīṣiṇendravāyū varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18930: RV_10,065.09c devāṃ ādityāṃ aditiṃ havāmahe ye pārthivāso divyāso apsu ye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18931: RV_10,065.10a tvaṣṭāraṃ vāyum ṛbhavo ya ohate daivyā hotārā uṣasaṃ svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18932: RV_10,065.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛtrakhādaṃ sumedhasam indriyaṃ somaṃ dhanasā u īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:18933: RV_10,065.11a brahma gām aśvaṃ janayanta oṣadhīr vanaspatīn pṛthivīm parvatāṃ apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18934: RV_10,065.11c sūryaṃ divi rohayantaḥ sudānava āryā vratā visṛjanto adhi kṣami //
GV01rvh1-10u:18935: RV_10,065.12a bhujyum aṃhasaḥ pipṛtho nir aśvinā śyāvam putraṃ vadhrimatyā ajinvatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:18936: RV_10,065.12c kamadyuvaṃ vimadāyohathur yuvaṃ viṣṇāpvaṃ viśvakāyāva sṛjathaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18937: RV_10,065.13a pāvīravī tanyatur ekapād ajo divo dhartā sindhur āpaḥ samudriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18938: RV_10,065.13c viśve devāsaḥ śṛṇavan vacāṃsi me sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18939: RV_10,065.14a viśve devāḥ saha dhībhiḥ purandhyā manor yajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18940: RV_10,065.14c rātiṣāco abhiṣācaḥ svarvidaḥ svar giro brahma sūktaṃ juṣerata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18941: RV_10,065.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18942: RV_10,065.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18943: RV_10,066.01a devān huve bṛhacchravasaḥ svastaye jyotiṣkṛto adhvarasya pracetasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18944: RV_10,066.01c ye vāvṛdhuḥ prataraṃ viśvavedasa indrajyeṣṭhāso amṛtā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18945: RV_10,066.02a indraprasūtā varuṇapraśiṣṭā ye sūryasya jyotiṣo bhāgam ānaśuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18946: RV_10,066.02c marudgaṇe vṛjane manma dhīmahi māghone yajñaṃ janayanta sūrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18947: RV_10,066.03a indro vasubhiḥ pari pātu no gayam ādityair no aditiḥ śarma yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:18948: RV_10,066.03c rudro rudrebhir devo mṛḷayāti nas tvaṣṭā no gnābhiḥ suvitāya jinvatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18949: RV_10,066.04a aditir dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtam mahad indrāviṣṇū marutaḥ svar bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18950: RV_10,066.04c devāṃ ādityāṃ avase havāmahe vasūn rudrān savitāraṃ sudaṃsasam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18951: RV_10,066.05a sarasvān dhībhir varuṇo dhṛtavrataḥ pūṣā viṣṇur mahimā vāyur aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18952: RV_10,066.05c brahmakṛto amṛtā viśvavedasaḥ śarma no yaṃsan trivarūtham aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18953: RV_10,066.06a vṛṣā yajño vṛṣaṇaḥ santu yajñiyā vṛṣaṇo devā vṛṣaṇo haviṣkṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18954: RV_10,066.06c vṛṣaṇā dyāvāpṛthivī ṛtāvarī vṛṣā parjanyo vṛṣaṇo vṛṣastubhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18955: RV_10,066.07a agnīṣomā vṛṣaṇā vājasātaye purupraśastā vṛṣaṇā upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:18956: RV_10,066.07c yāv ījire vṛṣaṇo devayajyayā tā naḥ śarma trivarūthaṃ vi yaṃsataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18957: RV_10,066.08a dhṛtavratāḥ kṣatriyā yajñaniṣkṛto bṛhaddivā adhvarāṇām abhiśriyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18958: RV_10,066.08c agnihotāra ṛtasāpo adruho 'po asṛjann anu vṛtratūrye //
GV01rvh1-10u:18959: RV_10,066.09a dyāvāpṛthivī janayann abhi vratāpa oṣadhīr vanināni yajñiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18960: RV_10,066.09c antarikṣaṃ svar ā paprur ūtaye vaśaṃ devāsas tanvī ni māmṛjuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18961: RV_10,066.10a dhartāro diva ṛbhavaḥ suhastā vātāparjanyā mahiṣasya tanyatoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18962: RV_10,066.10c āpa oṣadhīḥ pra tirantu no giro bhago rātir vājino yantu me havam //
GV01rvh1-10u:18963: RV_10,066.11a samudraḥ sindhū rajo antarikṣam aja ekapāt tanayitnur arṇavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18964: RV_10,066.11c ahir budhnyaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me viśve devāsa uta sūrayo mama //
GV01rvh1-10u:18965: RV_10,066.12a syāma vo manavo devavītaye prāñcaṃ no yajñam pra ṇayata sādhuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18966: RV_10,066.12c ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sudānava imā brahma śasyamānāni jinvata //
GV01rvh1-10u:18967: RV_10,066.13a daivyā hotārā prathamā purohita ṛtasya panthām anv emi sādhuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:18968: RV_10,066.13c kṣetrasya patim prativeśam īmahe viśvān devāṃ amṛtāṃ aprayucchataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18969: RV_10,066.14a vasiṣṭhāsaḥ pitṛvad vācam akrata devāṃ īḷānā ṛṣivat svastaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:18970: RV_10,066.14c prītā iva jñātayaḥ kāmam etyāsme devāso 'va dhūnutā vasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:18971: RV_10,066.15a devān vasiṣṭho amṛtān vavande ye viśvā bhuvanābhi pratasthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18972: RV_10,066.15c te no rāsantām urugāyam adya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18973: RV_10,067.01a imāṃ dhiyaṃ saptaśīrṣṇīm pitā na ṛtaprajātām bṛhatīm avindat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18974: RV_10,067.01c turīyaṃ svij janayad viśvajanyo 'yāsya uktham indrāya śaṃsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18975: RV_10,067.02a ṛtaṃ śaṃsanta ṛju dīdhyānā divas putrāso asurasya vīrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18976: RV_10,067.02c vipram padam aṅgiraso dadhānā yajñasya dhāma prathamam mananta //
GV01rvh1-10u:18977: RV_10,067.03a haṃsair iva sakhibhir vāvadadbhir aśmanmayāni nahanā vyasyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:18978: RV_10,067.03c bṛhaspatir abhikanikradad gā uta prāstaud uc ca vidvāṃ agāyat //
GV01rvh1-10u:18979: RV_10,067.04a avo dvābhyām para ekayā gā guhā tiṣṭhantīr anṛtasya setau /
GV01rvh1-10u:18980: RV_10,067.04c bṛhaspatis tamasi jyotir icchann ud usrā ākar vi hi tisra āvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18981: RV_10,067.05a vibhidyā puraṃ śayathem apācīṃ nis trīṇi sākam udadher akṛntat /
GV01rvh1-10u:18982: RV_10,067.05c bṛhaspatir uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām arkaṃ viveda stanayann iva dyauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18983: RV_10,067.06a indro valaṃ rakṣitāraṃ dughānāṃ kareṇeva vi cakartā raveṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:18984: RV_10,067.06c svedāñjibhir āśiram icchamāno 'rodayat paṇim ā gā amuṣṇāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:18985: RV_10,067.07a sa īṃ satyebhiḥ sakhibhiḥ śucadbhir godhāyasaṃ vi dhanasair adardaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18986: RV_10,067.07c brahmaṇas patir vṛṣabhir varāhair gharmasvedebhir draviṇaṃ vy ānaṭ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18987: RV_10,067.08a te satyena manasā gopatiṃ gā iyānāsa iṣaṇayanta dhībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18988: RV_10,067.08c bṛhaspatir mithoavadyapebhir ud usriyā asṛjata svayugbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18989: RV_10,067.09a taṃ vardhayanto matibhiḥ śivābhiḥ siṃham iva nānadataṃ sadhasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:18990: RV_10,067.09c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ śūrasātau bhare-bhare anu madema jiṣṇum //
GV01rvh1-10u:18991: RV_10,067.10a yadā vājam asanad viśvarūpam ā dyām arukṣad uttarāṇi sadma /
GV01rvh1-10u:18992: RV_10,067.10c bṛhaspatiṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vardhayanto nānā santo bibhrato jyotir āsā //
GV01rvh1-10u:18993: RV_10,067.11a satyām āśiṣaṃ kṛṇutā vayodhai kīriṃ cid dhy avatha svebhir evaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18994: RV_10,067.11c paścā mṛdho apa bhavantu viśvās tad rodasī śṛṇutaṃ viśvaminve //
GV01rvh1-10u:18995: RV_10,067.12a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vi mūrdhānam abhinad arbudasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:18996: RV_10,067.12c ahann ahim ariṇāt sapta sindhūn devair dyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:18997: RV_10,068.01a udapruto na vayo rakṣamāṇā vāvadato abhriyasyeva ghoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:18998: RV_10,068.01c giribhrajo normayo madanto bṛhaspatim abhy arkā anāvan //
GV01rvh1-10u:18999: RV_10,068.02a saṃ gobhir āṅgiraso nakṣamāṇo bhaga ived aryamaṇaṃ nināya /
GV01rvh1-10u:19000: RV_10,068.02c jane mitro na dampatī anakti bṛhaspate vājayāśūṃr ivājau //
GV01rvh1-10u:19001: RV_10,068.03a sādhvaryā atithinīr iṣirā spārhāḥ suvarṇā anavadyarūpāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19002: RV_10,068.03c bṛhaspatiḥ parvatebhyo vitūryā nir gā ūpe yavam iva sthivibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19003: RV_10,068.04a āpruṣāyan madhuna ṛtasya yonim avakṣipann arka ulkām iva dyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19004: RV_10,068.04c bṛhaspatir uddharann aśmano gā bhūmyā udneva vi tvacam bibheda //
GV01rvh1-10u:19005: RV_10,068.05a apa jyotiṣā tamo antarikṣād udnaḥ śīpālam iva vāta ājat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19006: RV_10,068.05c bṛhaspatir anumṛśyā valasyābhram iva vāta ā cakra ā gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19007: RV_10,068.06a yadā valasya pīyato jasum bhed bṛhaspatir agnitapobhir arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19008: RV_10,068.06c dadbhir na jihvā pariviṣṭam ādad āvir nidhīṃr akṛṇod usriyāṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19009: RV_10,068.07a bṛhaspatir amata hi tyad āsāṃ nāma svarīṇāṃ sadane guhā yat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19010: RV_10,068.07c āṇḍeva bhittvā śakunasya garbham ud usriyāḥ parvatasya tmanājat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19011: RV_10,068.08a aśnāpinaddham madhu pary apaśyan matsyaṃ na dīna udani kṣiyantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19012: RV_10,068.08c niṣ ṭaj jabhāra camasaṃ na vṛkṣād bṛhaspatir viraveṇā vikṛtya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19013: RV_10,068.09a soṣām avindat sa svaḥ so agniṃ so arkeṇa vi babādhe tamāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19014: RV_10,068.09c bṛhaspatir govapuṣo valasya nir majjānaṃ na parvaṇo jabhāra //
GV01rvh1-10u:19015: RV_10,068.10a himeva parṇā muṣitā vanāni bṛhaspatinākṛpayad valo gāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19016: RV_10,068.10c anānukṛtyam apunaś cakāra yāt sūryāmāsā mitha uccarātaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19017: RV_10,068.11a abhi śyāvaṃ na kṛśanebhir aśvaṃ nakṣatrebhiḥ pitaro dyām apiṃśan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19018: RV_10,068.11c rātryāṃ tamo adadhur jyotir ahan bṛhaspatir bhinad adriṃ vidad gāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19019: RV_10,068.12a idam akarma namo abhriyāya yaḥ pūrvīr anv ānonavīti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19020: RV_10,068.12c bṛhaspatiḥ sa hi gobhiḥ so aśvaiḥ sa vīrebhiḥ sa nṛbhir no vayo dhāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19021: RV_10,069.01a bhadrā agner vadhryaśvasya saṃdṛśo vāmī praṇītiḥ suraṇā upetayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19022: RV_10,069.01c yad īṃ sumitrā viśo agra indhate ghṛtenāhuto jarate davidyutat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19023: RV_10,069.02a ghṛtam agner vadhryaśvasya vardhanaṃ ghṛtam annaṃ ghṛtam v asya medanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19024: RV_10,069.02c ghṛtenāhuta urviyā vi paprathe sūrya iva rocate sarpirāsutiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19025: RV_10,069.03a yat te manur yad anīkaṃ sumitraḥ samīdhe agne tad idaṃ navīyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19026: RV_10,069.03c sa revac choca sa giro juṣasva sa vājaṃ darṣi sa iha śravo dhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19027: RV_10,069.04a yaṃ tvā pūrvam īḷito vadhryaśvaḥ samīdhe agne sa idaṃ juṣasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19028: RV_10,069.04c sa na stipā uta bhavā tanūpā dātraṃ rakṣasva yad idaṃ te asme //
GV01rvh1-10u:19029: RV_10,069.05a bhavā dyumnī vādhryaśvota gopā mā tvā tārīd abhimātir janānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19030: RV_10,069.05c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavanaḥ sumitraḥ pra nu vocaṃ vādhryaśvasya nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:19031: RV_10,069.06a sam ajryā parvatyā vasūni dāsā vṛtrāṇy āryā jigetha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19032: RV_10,069.06c śūra iva dhṛṣṇuś cyavano janānāṃ tvam agne pṛtanāyūṃr abhi ṣyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19033: RV_10,069.07a dīrghatantur bṛhadukṣāyam agniḥ sahasrastarīḥ śatanītha ṛbhvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19034: RV_10,069.07c dyumān dyumatsu nṛbhir mṛjyamānaḥ sumitreṣu dīdayo devayatsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19035: RV_10,069.08a tve dhenuḥ sudughā jātavedo 'saścateva samanā sabardhuk /
GV01rvh1-10u:19036: RV_10,069.08c tvaṃ nṛbhir dakṣiṇāvadbhir agne sumitrebhir idhyase devayadbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19037: RV_10,069.09a devāś cit te amṛtā jātavedo mahimānaṃ vādhryaśva pra vocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19038: RV_10,069.09c yat sampṛccham mānuṣīr viśa āyan tvaṃ nṛbhir ajayas tvāvṛdhebhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19039: RV_10,069.10a piteva putram abibhar upasthe tvām agne vadhryaśvaḥ saparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19040: RV_10,069.10c juṣāṇo asya samidhaṃ yaviṣṭhota pūrvāṃ avanor vrādhataś cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:19041: RV_10,069.11a śaśvad agnir vadhryaśvasya śatrūn nṛbhir jigāya sutasomavadbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19042: RV_10,069.11c samanaṃ cid adahaś citrabhāno 'va vrādhantam abhinad vṛdhaś cit //
GV01rvh1-10u:19043: RV_10,069.12a ayam agnir vadhryaśvasya vṛtrahā sanakāt preddho namasopavākyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19044: RV_10,069.12c sa no ajāmīṃr uta vā vijāmīn abhi tiṣṭha śardhato vādhryaśva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19045: RV_10,070.01a imām me agne samidhaṃ juṣasveḷas pade prati haryā ghṛtācīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:19046: RV_10,070.01c varṣman pṛthivyāḥ sudinatve ahnām ūrdhvo bhava sukrato devayajyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19047: RV_10,070.02a ā devānām agrayāveha yātu narāśaṃso viśvarūpebhir aśvaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19048: RV_10,070.02c ṛtasya pathā namasā miyedho devebhyo devatamaḥ suṣūdat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19049: RV_10,070.03a śaśvattamam īḷate dūtyāya haviṣmanto manuṣyāso agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19050: RV_10,070.03c vahiṣṭhair aśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathenā devān vakṣi ni ṣadeha hotā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19051: RV_10,070.04a vi prathatāṃ devajuṣṭaṃ tiraścā dīrghaṃ drāghmā surabhi bhūtv asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:19052: RV_10,070.04c aheḷatā manasā deva barhir indrajyeṣṭhāṃ uśato yakṣi devān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19053: RV_10,070.05a divo vā sānu spṛśatā varīyaḥ pṛthivyā vā mātrayā vi śrayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19054: RV_10,070.05c uśatīr dvāro mahinā mahadbhir devaṃ rathaṃ rathayur dhārayadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19055: RV_10,070.06a devī divo duhitarā suśilpe uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19056: RV_10,070.06c ā vāṃ devāsa uśatī uśanta urau sīdantu subhage upasthe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19057: RV_10,070.07a ūrdhvo grāvā bṛhad agniḥ samiddhaḥ priyā dhāmāny aditer upasthe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19058: RV_10,070.07c purohitāv ṛtvijā yajñe asmin viduṣṭarā draviṇam ā yajethām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19059: RV_10,070.08a tisro devīr barhir idaṃ varīya ā sīdata cakṛmā vaḥ syonam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19060: RV_10,070.08c manuṣvad yajñaṃ sudhitā havīṃṣīḷā devī ghṛtapadī juṣanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19061: RV_10,070.09a deva tvaṣṭar yad dha cārutvam ānaḍ yad aṅgirasām abhavaḥ sacābhūḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19062: RV_10,070.09c sa devānām pātha upa pra vidvāṃ uśan yakṣi draviṇodaḥ suratnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19063: RV_10,070.10a vanaspate raśanayā niyūyā devānām pātha upa vakṣi vidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19064: RV_10,070.10c svadāti devaḥ kṛṇavad dhavīṃṣy avatāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī havam me //
GV01rvh1-10u:19065: RV_10,070.11a āgne vaha varuṇam iṣṭaye na indraṃ divo maruto antarikṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19066: RV_10,070.11c sīdantu barhir viśva ā yajatrāḥ svāhā devā amṛtā mādayantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19067: RV_10,071.01a bṛhaspate prathamaṃ vāco agraṃ yat prairata nāmadheyaṃ dadhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19068: RV_10,071.01c yad eṣāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yad aripram āsīt preṇā tad eṣāṃ nihitaṃ guhāviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19069: RV_10,071.02a saktum iva titaunā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācam akrata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19070: RV_10,071.02c atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃ lakṣmīr nihitādhi vāci //
GV01rvh1-10u:19071: RV_10,071.03a yajñena vācaḥ padavīyam āyan tām anv avindann ṛṣiṣu praviṣṭām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19072: RV_10,071.03c tām ābhṛtyā vy adadhuḥ purutrā tāṃ sapta rebhā abhi saṃ navante //
GV01rvh1-10u:19073: RV_10,071.04a uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vācam uta tvaḥ śṛṇvan na śṛṇoty enām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19074: RV_10,071.04c uto tvasmai tanvaṃ vi sasre jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19075: RV_10,071.05a uta tvaṃ sakhye sthirapītam āhur nainaṃ hinvanty api vājineṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19076: RV_10,071.05c adhenvā carati māyayaiṣa vācaṃ śuśruvāṃ aphalām apuṣpām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19077: RV_10,071.06a yas tityāja sacividaṃ sakhāyaṃ na tasya vācy api bhāgo asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19078: RV_10,071.06c yad īṃ śṛṇoty alakaṃ śṛṇoti nahi praveda sukṛtasya panthām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19079: RV_10,071.07a akṣaṇvantaḥ karṇavantaḥ sakhāyo manojaveṣv asamā babhūvuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19080: RV_10,071.07c ādaghnāsa upakakṣāsa u tve hradā iva snātvā u tve dadṛśre //
GV01rvh1-10u:19081: RV_10,071.08a hṛdā taṣṭeṣu manaso javeṣu yad brāhmaṇāḥ saṃyajante sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19082: RV_10,071.08c atrāha tvaṃ vi jahur vedyābhir ohabrahmāṇo vi caranty u tve //
GV01rvh1-10u:19083: RV_10,071.09a ime ye nārvāṅ na paraś caranti na brāhmaṇāso na sutekarāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19084: RV_10,071.09c ta ete vācam abhipadya pāpayā sirīs tantraṃ tanvate aprajajñayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19085: RV_10,071.10a sarve nandanti yaśasāgatena sabhāsāhena sakhyā sakhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19086: RV_10,071.10c kilbiṣaspṛt pituṣaṇir hy eṣām araṃ hito bhavati vājināya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19087: RV_10,071.11a ṛcāṃ tvaḥ poṣam āste pupuṣvān gāyatraṃ tvo gāyati śakvarīṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19088: RV_10,071.11c brahmā tvo vadati jātavidyāṃ yajñasya mātrāṃ vi mimīta u tvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19089: RV_10,072.01a devānāṃ nu vayaṃ jānā pra vocāma vipanyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19090: RV_10,072.01c uktheṣu śasyamāneṣu yaḥ paśyād uttare yuge //
GV01rvh1-10u:19091: RV_10,072.02a brahmaṇas patir etā saṃ karmāra ivādhamat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19092: RV_10,072.02c devānām pūrvye yuge 'sataḥ sad ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19093: RV_10,072.03a devānāṃ yuge prathame 'sataḥ sad ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19094: RV_10,072.03c tad āśā anv ajāyanta tad uttānapadas pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:19095: RV_10,072.04a bhūr jajña uttānapado bhuva āśā ajāyanta /
GV01rvh1-10u:19096: RV_10,072.04c aditer dakṣo ajāyata dakṣād v aditiḥ pari //
GV01rvh1-10u:19097: RV_10,072.05a aditir hy ajaniṣṭa dakṣa yā duhitā tava /
GV01rvh1-10u:19098: RV_10,072.05c tāṃ devā anv ajāyanta bhadrā amṛtabandhavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19099: RV_10,072.06a yad devā adaḥ salile susaṃrabdhā atiṣṭhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19100: RV_10,072.06c atrā vo nṛtyatām iva tīvro reṇur apāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19101: RV_10,072.07a yad devā yatayo yathā bhuvanāny apinvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19102: RV_10,072.07c atrā samudra ā gūḷham ā sūryam ajabhartana //
GV01rvh1-10u:19103: RV_10,072.08a aṣṭau putrāso aditer ye jātās tanvas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:19104: RV_10,072.08c devāṃ upa prait saptabhiḥ parā mārtāṇḍam āsyat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19105: RV_10,072.09a saptabhiḥ putrair aditir upa prait pūrvyaṃ yugam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19106: RV_10,072.09c prajāyai mṛtyave tvat punar mārtāṇḍam ābharat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19107: RV_10,073.01a janiṣṭhā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭho bahulābhimānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19108: RV_10,073.01c avardhann indram marutaś cid atra mātā yad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19109: RV_10,073.02a druho niṣattā pṛśanī cid evaiḥ purū śaṃsena vāvṛdhuṣ ṭa indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19110: RV_10,073.02c abhīvṛteva tā mahāpadena dhvāntāt prapitvād ud aranta garbhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19111: RV_10,073.03a ṛṣvā te pādā pra yaj jigāsy avardhan vājā uta ye cid atra /
GV01rvh1-10u:19112: RV_10,073.03c tvam indra sālāvṛkān sahasram āsan dadhiṣe aśvinā vavṛtyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19113: RV_10,073.04a samanā tūrṇir upa yāsi yajñam ā nāsatyā sakhyāya vakṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19114: RV_10,073.04c vasāvyām indra dhārayaḥ sahasrāśvinā śūra dadatur maghāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:19115: RV_10,073.05a mandamāna ṛtād adhi prajāyai sakhibhir indra iṣirebhir artham /
GV01rvh1-10u:19116: RV_10,073.05c ābhir hi māyā upa dasyum āgān mihaḥ pra tamrā avapat tamāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19117: RV_10,073.06a sanāmānā cid dhvasayo ny asmā avāhann indra uṣaso yathānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19118: RV_10,073.06c ṛṣvair agacchaḥ sakhibhir nikāmaiḥ sākam pratiṣṭhā hṛdyā jaghantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19119: RV_10,073.07a tvaṃ jaghantha namucim makhasyuṃ dāsaṃ kṛṇvāna ṛṣaye vimāyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19120: RV_10,073.07c tvaṃ cakartha manave syonān patho devatrāñjaseva yānān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19121: RV_10,073.08a tvam etāni papriṣe vi nāmeśāna indra dadhiṣe gabhastau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19122: RV_10,073.08c anu tvā devāḥ śavasā madanty uparibudhnān vaninaś cakartha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19123: RV_10,073.09a cakraṃ yad asyāpsv ā niṣattam uto tad asmai madhv ic cacchadyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19124: RV_10,073.09c pṛthivyām atiṣitaṃ yad ūdhaḥ payo goṣv adadhā oṣadhīṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19125: RV_10,073.10a aśvād iyāyeti yad vadanty ojaso jātam uta manya enam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19126: RV_10,073.10c manyor iyāya harmyeṣu tasthau yataḥ prajajña indro asya veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:19127: RV_10,073.11a vayaḥ suparṇā upa sedur indram priyamedhā ṛṣayo nādhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19128: RV_10,073.11c apa dhvāntam ūrṇuhi pūrdhi cakṣur mumugdhy asmān nidhayeva baddhān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19129: RV_10,074.01a vasūnāṃ vā carkṛṣa iyakṣan dhiyā vā yajñair vā rodasyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19130: RV_10,074.01c arvanto vā ye rayimantaḥ sātau vanuṃ vā ye suśruṇaṃ suśruto dhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19131: RV_10,074.02a hava eṣām asuro nakṣata dyāṃ śravasyatā manasā niṃsata kṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19132: RV_10,074.02c cakṣāṇā yatra suvitāya devā dyaur na vārebhiḥ kṛṇavanta svaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19133: RV_10,074.03a iyam eṣām amṛtānāṃ gīḥ sarvatātā ye kṛpaṇanta ratnam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19134: RV_10,074.03c dhiyaṃ ca yajñaṃ ca sādhantas te no dhāntu vasavyam asāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19135: RV_10,074.04a ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantābhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantaṃ titṛtsān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19136: RV_10,074.04c sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrām mahīṃ sahasradhārām bṛhatīṃ dudukṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19137: RV_10,074.05a śacīva indram avase kṛṇudhvam anānataṃ damayantam pṛtanyūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:19138: RV_10,074.05c ṛbhukṣaṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim bhartā yo vajraṃ naryam purukṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19139: RV_10,074.06a yad vāvāna purutamam purāṣāḷ ā vṛtrahendro nāmāny aprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19140: RV_10,074.06c aceti prāsahas patis tuviṣmān yad īm uśmasi kartave karat tat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19141: RV_10,075.01a pra su va āpo mahimānam uttamaṃ kārur vocāti sadane vivasvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19142: RV_10,075.01c pra sapta-sapta tredhā hi cakramuḥ pra sṛtvarīṇām ati sindhur ojasā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19143: RV_10,075.02a pra te 'radad varuṇo yātave pathaḥ sindho yad vājāṃ abhy adravas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19144: RV_10,075.02c bhūmyā adhi pravatā yāsi sānunā yad eṣām agraṃ jagatām irajyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19145: RV_10,075.03a divi svano yatate bhūmyopary anantaṃ śuṣmam ud iyarti bhānunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19146: RV_10,075.03c abhrād iva pra stanayanti vṛṣṭayaḥ sindhur yad eti vṛṣabho na roruvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19147: RV_10,075.04a abhi tvā sindho śiśum in na mātaro vāśrā arṣanti payaseva dhenavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19148: RV_10,075.04c rājeva yudhvā nayasi tvam it sicau yad āsām agram pravatām inakṣasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19149: RV_10,075.05a imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri stomaṃ sacatā paruṣṇy ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19150: RV_10,075.05c asiknyā marudvṛdhe vitastayārjīkīye śṛṇuhy ā suṣomayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19151: RV_10,075.06a tṛṣṭāmayā prathamaṃ yātave sajūḥ susartvā rasayā śvetyā tyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19152: RV_10,075.06c tvaṃ sindho kubhayā gomatīṃ krumum mehatnvā sarathaṃ yābhir īyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:19153: RV_10,075.07a ṛjīty enī ruśatī mahitvā pari jrayāṃsi bharate rajāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19154: RV_10,075.07c adabdhā sindhur apasām apastamāśvā na citrā vapuṣīva darśatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19155: RV_10,075.08a svaśvā sindhuḥ surathā suvāsā hiraṇyayī sukṛtā vājinīvatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19156: RV_10,075.08c ūrṇāvatī yuvatiḥ sīlamāvaty utādhi vaste subhagā madhuvṛdham //
GV01rvh1-10u:19157: RV_10,075.09a sukhaṃ rathaṃ yuyuje sindhur aśvinaṃ tena vājaṃ saniṣad asminn ājau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19158: RV_10,075.09c mahān hy asya mahimā panasyate 'dabdhasya svayaśaso virapśinaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19159: RV_10,076.01a ā va ṛñjasa ūrjāṃ vyuṣṭiṣv indram maruto rodasī anaktana /
GV01rvh1-10u:19160: RV_10,076.01c ubhe yathā no ahanī sacābhuvā sadaḥ-sado varivasyāta udbhidā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19161: RV_10,076.02a tad u śreṣṭhaṃ savanaṃ sunotanātyo na hastayato adriḥ sotari /
GV01rvh1-10u:19162: RV_10,076.02c vidad dhy aryo abhibhūti pauṃsyam maho rāye cit tarute yad arvataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19163: RV_10,076.03a tad id dhy asya savanaṃ viver apo yathā purā manave gātum aśret /
GV01rvh1-10u:19164: RV_10,076.03c goarṇasi tvāṣṭre aśvanirṇiji prem adhvareṣv adhvarāṃ aśiśrayuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19165: RV_10,076.04a apa hata rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvata skabhāyata nirṛtiṃ sedhatāmatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19166: RV_10,076.04c ā no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ sunotana devāvyam bharata ślokam adrayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19167: RV_10,076.05a divaś cid ā vo 'mavattarebhyo vibhvanā cid āśvapastarebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19168: RV_10,076.05c vāyoś cid ā somarabhastarebhyo 'gneś cid arca pitukṛttarebhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19169: RV_10,076.06a bhurantu no yaśasaḥ sotv andhaso grāvāṇo vācā divitā divitmatā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19170: RV_10,076.06c naro yatra duhate kāmyam madhv āghoṣayanto abhito mithasturaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19171: RV_10,076.07a sunvanti somaṃ rathirāso adrayo nir asya rasaṃ gaviṣo duhanti te /
GV01rvh1-10u:19172: RV_10,076.07c duhanty ūdhar upasecanāya kaṃ naro havyā na marjayanta āsabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19173: RV_10,076.08a ete naraḥ svapaso abhūtana ya indrāya sunutha somam adrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19174: RV_10,076.08c vāmaṃ-vāmaṃ vo divyāya dhāmne vasu-vasu vaḥ pārthivāya sunvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19175: RV_10,077.01a abhrapruṣo na vācā pruṣā vasu haviṣmanto na yajñā vijānuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19176: RV_10,077.01c sumārutaṃ na brahmāṇam arhase gaṇam astoṣy eṣāṃ na śobhase //
GV01rvh1-10u:19177: RV_10,077.02a śriye maryāso añjīṃr akṛṇvata sumārutaṃ na pūrvīr ati kṣapaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19178: RV_10,077.02c divas putrāsa etā na yetira ādityāsas te akrā na vāvṛdhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19179: RV_10,077.03a pra ye divaḥ pṛthivyā na barhaṇā tmanā riricre abhrān na sūryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19180: RV_10,077.03c pājasvanto na vīrāḥ panasyavo riśādaso na maryā abhidyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19181: RV_10,077.04a yuṣmākam budhne apāṃ na yāmani vithuryati na mahī śratharyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19182: RV_10,077.04c viśvapsur yajño arvāg ayaṃ su vaḥ prayasvanto na satrāca ā gata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19183: RV_10,077.05a yūyaṃ dhūrṣu prayujo na raśmibhir jyotiṣmanto na bhāsā vyuṣṭiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19184: RV_10,077.05c śyenāso na svayaśaso riśādasaḥ pravāso na prasitāsaḥ paripruṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19185: RV_10,077.06a pra yad vahadhve marutaḥ parākād yūyam mahaḥ saṃvaraṇasya vasvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19186: RV_10,077.06c vidānāso vasavo rādhyasyārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyota //
GV01rvh1-10u:19187: RV_10,077.07a ya udṛci yajñe adhvareṣṭhā marudbhyo na mānuṣo dadāśat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19188: RV_10,077.07c revat sa vayo dadhate suvīraṃ sa devānām api gopīthe astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19189: RV_10,077.08a te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmā ādityena nāmnā śambhaviṣṭhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19190: RV_10,077.08c te no 'vantu rathatūr manīṣām mahaś ca yāmann adhvare cakānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19191: RV_10,078.01a viprāso na manmabhiḥ svādhyo devāvyo na yajñaiḥ svapnasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19192: RV_10,078.01c rājāno na citrāḥ susaṃdṛśaḥ kṣitīnāṃ na maryā arepasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19193: RV_10,078.02a agnir na ye bhrājasā rukmavakṣaso vātāso na svayujaḥ sadyaūtayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19194: RV_10,078.02c prajñātāro na jyeṣṭhāḥ sunītayaḥ suśarmāṇo na somā ṛtaṃ yate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19195: RV_10,078.03a vātāso na ye dhunayo jigatnavo 'gnīnāṃ na jihvā virokiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19196: RV_10,078.03c varmaṇvanto na yodhāḥ śimīvantaḥ pitṝṇāṃ na śaṃsāḥ surātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19197: RV_10,078.04a rathānāṃ na ye 'rāḥ sanābhayo jigīvāṃso na śūrā abhidyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19198: RV_10,078.04c vareyavo na maryā ghṛtapruṣo 'bhisvartāro arkaṃ na suṣṭubhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19199: RV_10,078.05a aśvāso na ye jyeṣṭhāsa āśavo didhiṣavo na rathyaḥ sudānavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19200: RV_10,078.05c āpo na nimnair udabhir jigatnavo viśvarūpā aṅgiraso na sāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19201: RV_10,078.06a grāvāṇo na sūrayaḥ sindhumātara ādardirāso adrayo na viśvahā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19202: RV_10,078.06c śiśūlā na krīḷayaḥ sumātaro mahāgrāmo na yāmann uta tviṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19203: RV_10,078.07a uṣasāṃ na ketavo 'dhvaraśriyaḥ śubhaṃyavo nāñjibhir vy aśvitan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19204: RV_10,078.07c sindhavo na yayiyo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ parāvato na yojanāni mamire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19205: RV_10,078.08a subhāgān no devāḥ kṛṇutā suratnān asmān stotṝn maruto vāvṛdhānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19206: RV_10,078.08c adhi stotrasya sakhyasya gāta sanād dhi vo ratnadheyāni santi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19207: RV_10,079.01a apaśyam asya mahato mahitvam amartyasya martyāsu vikṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19208: RV_10,079.01c nānā hanū vibhṛte sam bharete asinvatī bapsatī bhūry attaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19209: RV_10,079.02a guhā śiro nihitam ṛdhag akṣī asinvann atti jihvayā vanāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:19210: RV_10,079.02c atrāṇy asmai paḍbhiḥ sam bharanty uttānahastā namasādhi vikṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19211: RV_10,079.03a pra mātuḥ prataraṃ guhyam icchan kumāro na vīrudhaḥ sarpad urvīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19212: RV_10,079.03c sasaṃ na pakvam avidac chucantaṃ ririhvāṃsaṃ ripa upasthe antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19213: RV_10,079.04a tad vām ṛtaṃ rodasī pra bravīmi jāyamāno mātarā garbho atti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19214: RV_10,079.04c nāhaṃ devasya martyaś ciketāgnir aṅga vicetāḥ sa pracetāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19215: RV_10,079.05a yo asmā annaṃ tṛṣv ādadhāty ājyair ghṛtair juhoti puṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19216: RV_10,079.05c tasmai sahasram akṣabhir vi cakṣe 'gne viśvataḥ pratyaṅṅ asi tvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19217: RV_10,079.06a kiṃ deveṣu tyaja enaś cakarthāgne pṛcchāmi nu tvām avidvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19218: RV_10,079.06c akrīḷan krīḷan harir attave 'dan vi parvaśaś cakarta gām ivāsiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19219: RV_10,079.07a viṣūco aśvān yuyuje vanejā ṛjītibhī raśanābhir gṛbhītān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19220: RV_10,079.07c cakṣade mitro vasubhiḥ sujātaḥ sam ānṛdhe parvabhir vāvṛdhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19221: RV_10,080.01a agniḥ saptiṃ vājambharaṃ dadāty agnir vīraṃ śrutyaṃ karmaniṣṭhām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19222: RV_10,080.01c agnī rodasī vi carat samañjann agnir nārīṃ vīrakukṣim purandhim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19223: RV_10,080.02a agner apnasaḥ samid astu bhadrāgnir mahī rodasī ā viveśa /
GV01rvh1-10u:19224: RV_10,080.02c agnir ekaṃ codayat samatsv agnir vṛtrāṇi dayate purūṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19225: RV_10,080.03a agnir ha tyaṃ jarataḥ karṇam āvāgnir adbhyo nir adahaj jarūtham /
GV01rvh1-10u:19226: RV_10,080.03c agnir atriṃ gharma uruṣyad antar agnir nṛmedham prajayāsṛjat sam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19227: RV_10,080.04a agnir dād draviṇaṃ vīrapeśā agnir ṛṣiṃ yaḥ sahasrā sanoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19228: RV_10,080.04c agnir divi havyam ā tatānāgner dhāmāni vibhṛtā purutrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19229: RV_10,080.05a agnim ukthair ṛṣayo vi hvayante 'gniṃ naro yāmani bādhitāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19230: RV_10,080.05c agniṃ vayo antarikṣe patanto 'gniḥ sahasrā pari yāti gonām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19231: RV_10,080.06a agniṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yā agnim manuṣo nahuṣo vi jātāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19232: RV_10,080.06c agnir gāndharvīm pathyām ṛtasyāgner gavyūtir ghṛta ā niṣattā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19233: RV_10,080.07a agnaye brahma ṛbhavas tatakṣur agnim mahām avocāmā suvṛktim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19234: RV_10,080.07c agne prāva jaritāraṃ yaviṣṭhāgne mahi draviṇam ā yajasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19235: RV_10,081.01a ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣir hotā ny asīdat pitā naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19236: RV_10,081.01c sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarāṃ ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:19237: RV_10,081.02a kiṃ svid āsīd adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇaṃ katamat svit kathāsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19238: RV_10,081.02c yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19239: RV_10,081.03a viśvataścakṣur uta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhur uta viśvataspāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19240: RV_10,081.03c sam bāhubhyāṃ dhamati sam patatrair dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19241: RV_10,081.04a kiṃ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19242: RV_10,081.04c manīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated u tad yad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19243: RV_10,081.05a yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamā viśvakarmann utemā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19244: RV_10,081.05c śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥ svayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19245: RV_10,081.06a viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19246: RV_10,081.06c muhyantv anye abhito janāsa ihāsmākam maghavā sūrir astu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19247: RV_10,081.07a vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyā huvema /
GV01rvh1-10u:19248: RV_10,081.07c sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūr avase sādhukarmā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19249: RV_10,082.01a cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtam ene ajanan nannamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:19250: RV_10,082.01c yaded antā adadṛhanta pūrva ād id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19251: RV_10,082.02a viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk /
GV01rvh1-10u:19252: RV_10,082.02c teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā saptaṛṣīn para ekam āhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19253: RV_10,082.03a yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19254: RV_10,082.03c yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva taṃ sampraśnam bhuvanā yanty anyā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19255: RV_10,082.04a ta āyajanta draviṇaṃ sam asmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro na bhūnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19256: RV_10,082.04c asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvann imāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:19257: RV_10,082.05a paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhir asurair yad asti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19258: RV_10,082.05c kaṃ svid garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta viśve //
GV01rvh1-10u:19259: RV_10,082.06a tam id garbham prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:19260: RV_10,082.06c ajasya nābhāv adhy ekam arpitaṃ yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19261: RV_10,082.07a na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānānyad yuṣmākam antaram babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19262: RV_10,082.07c nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaś caranti //
GV01rvh1-10u:19263: RV_10,083.01a yas te manyo 'vidhad vajra sāyaka saha ojaḥ puṣyati viśvam ānuṣak /
GV01rvh1-10u:19264: RV_10,083.01c sāhyāma dāsam āryaṃ tvayā yujā sahaskṛtena sahasā sahasvatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19265: RV_10,083.02a manyur indro manyur evāsa devo manyur hotā varuṇo jātavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19266: RV_10,083.02c manyuṃ viśa īḷate mānuṣīr yāḥ pāhi no manyo tapasā sajoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19267: RV_10,083.03a abhīhi manyo tavasas tavīyān tapasā yujā vi jahi śatrūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:19268: RV_10,083.03c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhā ca viśvā vasūny ā bharā tvaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19269: RV_10,083.04a tvaṃ hi manyo abhibhūtyojāḥ svayambhūr bhāmo abhimātiṣāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19270: RV_10,083.04c viśvacarṣaṇiḥ sahuriḥ sahāvān asmāsv ojaḥ pṛtanāsu dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19271: RV_10,083.05a abhāgaḥ sann apa pareto asmi tava kratvā taviṣasya pracetaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19272: RV_10,083.05c taṃ tvā manyo akratur jihīḷāhaṃ svā tanūr baladeyāya mehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19273: RV_10,083.06a ayaṃ te asmy upa mehy arvāṅ pratīcīnaḥ sahure viśvadhāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19274: RV_10,083.06c manyo vajrinn abhi mām ā vavṛtsva hanāva dasyūṃr uta bodhy āpeḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19275: RV_10,083.07a abhi prehi dakṣiṇato bhavā me 'dhā vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanāva bhūri /
GV01rvh1-10u:19276: RV_10,083.07c juhomi te dharuṇam madhvo agram ubhā upāṃśu prathamā pibāva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19277: RV_10,084.01a tvayā manyo saratham ārujanto harṣamāṇāso dhṛṣitā marutvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19278: RV_10,084.01c tigmeṣava āyudhā saṃśiśānā abhi pra yantu naro agnirūpāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19279: RV_10,084.02a agnir iva manyo tviṣitaḥ sahasva senānīr naḥ sahure hūta edhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19280: RV_10,084.02c hatvāya śatrūn vi bhajasva veda ojo mimāno vi mṛdho nudasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19281: RV_10,084.03a sahasva manyo abhimātim asme rujan mṛṇan pramṛṇan prehi śatrūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:19282: RV_10,084.03c ugraṃ te pājo nanv ā rurudhre vaśī vaśaṃ nayasa ekaja tvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19283: RV_10,084.04a eko bahūnām asi manyav īḷito viśaṃ-viśaṃ yudhaye saṃ śiśādhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19284: RV_10,084.04c akṛttaruk tvayā yujā vayaṃ dyumantaṃ ghoṣaṃ vijayāya kṛṇmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19285: RV_10,084.05a vijeṣakṛd indra ivānavabravo 'smākam manyo adhipā bhaveha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19286: RV_10,084.05c priyaṃ te nāma sahure gṛṇīmasi vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ābabhūtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19287: RV_10,084.06a ābhūtyā sahajā vajra sāyaka saho bibharṣy abhibhūta uttaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19288: RV_10,084.06c kratvā no manyo saha medy edhi mahādhanasya puruhūta saṃsṛji //
GV01rvh1-10u:19289: RV_10,084.07a saṃsṛṣṭaṃ dhanam ubhayaṃ samākṛtam asmabhyaṃ dattāṃ varuṇaś ca manyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19290: RV_10,084.07c bhiyaṃ dadhānā hṛdayeṣu śatravaḥ parājitāso apa ni layantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19292: RV_10,085.01c ṛtenādityās tiṣṭhanti divi somo adhi śritaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19293: RV_10,085.02a somenādityā balinaḥ somena pṛthivī mahī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19294: RV_10,085.02c atho nakṣatrāṇām eṣām upasthe soma āhitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19295: RV_10,085.03a somam manyate papivān yat sampiṃṣanty oṣadhim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19296: RV_10,085.03c somaṃ yam brahmāṇo vidur na tasyāśnāti kaś cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:19297: RV_10,085.04a ācchadvidhānair gupito bārhataiḥ soma rakṣitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19298: RV_10,085.04c grāvṇām ic chṛṇvan tiṣṭhasi na te aśnāti pārthivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19299: RV_10,085.05a yat tvā deva prapibanti tata ā pyāyase punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19300: RV_10,085.05c vāyuḥ somasya rakṣitā samānām māsa ākṛtiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19301: RV_10,085.06a raibhy āsīd anudeyī nārāśaṃsī nyocanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19302: RV_10,085.06c sūryāyā bhadram id vāso gāthayaiti pariṣkṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19303: RV_10,085.07a cittir ā upabarhaṇaṃ cakṣur ā abhyañjanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19304: RV_10,085.07c dyaur bhūmiḥ kośa āsīd yad ayāt sūryā patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19305: RV_10,085.08a stomā āsan pratidhayaḥ kurīraṃ chanda opaśaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19306: RV_10,085.08c sūryāyā aśvinā varāgnir āsīt purogavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19307: RV_10,085.09a somo vadhūyur abhavad aśvināstām ubhā varā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19308: RV_10,085.09c sūryāṃ yat patye śaṃsantīm manasā savitādadāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19309: RV_10,085.10a mano asyā ana āsīd dyaur āsīd uta cchadiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19310: RV_10,085.10c śukrāv anaḍvāhāv āstāṃ yad ayāt sūryā gṛham //
GV01rvh1-10u:19311: RV_10,085.11a ṛksāmābhyām abhihitau gāvau te sāmanāv itaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19312: RV_10,085.11c śrotraṃ te cakre āstāṃ divi panthāś carācāraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19313: RV_10,085.12a śucī te cakre yātyā vyāno akṣa āhataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19314: RV_10,085.12c ano manasmayaṃ sūryārohat prayatī patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19315: RV_10,085.13a sūryāyā vahatuḥ prāgāt savitā yam avāsṛjat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19316: RV_10,085.13c aghāsu hanyante gāvo 'rjunyoḥ pary uhyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19317: RV_10,085.14a yad aśvinā pṛcchamānāv ayātaṃ tricakreṇa vahatuṃ sūryāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19318: RV_10,085.14c viśve devā anu tad vām ajānan putraḥ pitarāv avṛṇīta pūṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19319: RV_10,085.15a yad ayātaṃ śubhas patī vareyaṃ sūryām upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:19320: RV_10,085.15c kvaikaṃ cakraṃ vām āsīt kva deṣṭrāya tasthathuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19321: RV_10,085.16a dve te cakre sūrye brahmāṇa ṛtuthā viduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19322: RV_10,085.16c athaikaṃ cakraṃ yad guhā tad addhātaya id viduḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19323: RV_10,085.17a sūryāyai devebhyo mitrāya varuṇāya ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:19324: RV_10,085.17c ye bhūtasya pracetasa idaṃ tebhyo 'karaṃ namaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19325: RV_10,085.18a pūrvāparaṃ carato māyayaitau śiśū krīḷantau pari yāto adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19326: RV_10,085.18c viśvāny anyo bhuvanābhicaṣṭa ṛtūṃr anyo vidadhaj jāyate punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19327: RV_10,085.19a navo-navo bhavati jāyamāno 'hnāṃ ketur uṣasām ety agram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19328: RV_10,085.19c bhāgaṃ devebhyo vi dadhāty āyan pra candramās tirate dīrgham āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19329: RV_10,085.20a sukiṃśukaṃ śalmaliṃ viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyavarṇaṃ suvṛtaṃ sucakram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19330: RV_10,085.20c ā roha sūrye amṛtasya lokaṃ syonam patye vahatuṃ kṛṇuṣva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19331: RV_10,085.21a ud īrṣvātaḥ pativatī hy eṣā viśvāvasuṃ namasā gīrbhir īḷe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19332: RV_10,085.21c anyām iccha pitṛṣadaṃ vyaktāṃ sa te bhāgo januṣā tasya viddhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19333: RV_10,085.22a ud īrṣvāto viśvāvaso namaseḷā mahe tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19334: RV_10,085.22c anyām iccha prapharvyaṃ saṃ jāyām patyā sṛja //
GV01rvh1-10u:19335: RV_10,085.23a anṛkṣarā ṛjavaḥ santu panthā yebhiḥ sakhāyo yanti no vareyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19336: RV_10,085.23c sam aryamā sam bhago no ninīyāt saṃ jāspatyaṃ suyamam astu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19337: RV_10,085.24a pra tvā muñcāmi varuṇasya pāśād yena tvābadhnāt savitā suśevaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19338: RV_10,085.24c ṛtasya yonau sukṛtasya loke 'riṣṭāṃ tvā saha patyā dadhāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19339: RV_10,085.25a preto muñcāmi nāmutaḥ subaddhām amutas karam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19340: RV_10,085.25c yatheyam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrā subhagāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:19341: RV_10,085.26a pūṣā tveto nayatu hastagṛhyāśvinā tvā pra vahatāṃ rathena /
GV01rvh1-10u:19342: RV_10,085.26c gṛhān gaccha gṛhapatnī yathāso vaśinī tvaṃ vidatham ā vadāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19343: RV_10,085.27a iha priyam prajayā te sam ṛdhyatām asmin gṛhe gārhapatyāya jāgṛhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19344: RV_10,085.27c enā patyā tanvaṃ saṃ sṛjasvādhā jivrī vidatham ā vadāthaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19345: RV_10,085.28a nīlalohitam bhavati kṛtyāsaktir vy ajyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19346: RV_10,085.28c edhante asyā jñātayaḥ patir bandheṣu badhyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19347: RV_10,085.29a parā dehi śāmulyam brahmabhyo vi bhajā vasu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19348: RV_10,085.29c kṛtyaiṣā padvatī bhūtvy ā jāyā viśate patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19349: RV_10,085.30a aśrīrā tanūr bhavati ruśatī pāpayāmuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19350: RV_10,085.30c patir yad vadhvo vāsasā svam aṅgam abhidhitsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19351: RV_10,085.31a ye vadhvaś candraṃ vahatuṃ yakṣmā yanti janād anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19352: RV_10,085.31c punas tān yajñiyā devā nayantu yata āgatāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19353: RV_10,085.32a mā vidan paripanthino ya āsīdanti dampatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19354: RV_10,085.32c sugebhir durgam atītām apa drāntv arātayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19355: RV_10,085.33a sumaṅgalīr iyaṃ vadhūr imāṃ sameta paśyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19356: RV_10,085.33c saubhāgyam asyai dattvāyāthāstaṃ vi paretana //
GV01rvh1-10u:19357: RV_10,085.34a tṛṣṭam etat kaṭukam etad apāṣṭhavad viṣavan naitad attave /
GV01rvh1-10u:19358: RV_10,085.34c sūryāṃ yo brahmā vidyāt sa id vādhūyam arhati //
GV01rvh1-10u:19360: RV_10,085.35c sūryāyāḥ paśya rūpāṇi tāni brahmā tu śundhati //
GV01rvh1-10u:19361: RV_10,085.36a gṛbhṇāmi te saubhagatvāya hastam mayā patyā jaradaṣṭir yathāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19362: RV_10,085.36c bhago aryamā savitā purandhir mahyaṃ tvādur gārhapatyāya devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19363: RV_10,085.37a tām pūṣañ chivatamām erayasva yasyām bījam manuṣyā vapanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19364: RV_10,085.37c yā na ūrū uśatī viśrayāte yasyām uśantaḥ praharāma śepam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19365: RV_10,085.38a tubhyam agre pary avahan sūryāṃ vahatunā saha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19366: RV_10,085.38c punaḥ patibhyo jāyāṃ dā agne prajayā saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19367: RV_10,085.39a punaḥ patnīm agnir adād āyuṣā saha varcasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19368: RV_10,085.39c dīrghāyur asyā yaḥ patir jīvāti śaradaḥ śatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19369: RV_10,085.40a somaḥ prathamo vivide gandharvo vivida uttaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19370: RV_10,085.40c tṛtīyo agniṣ ṭe patis turīyas te manuṣyajāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19371: RV_10,085.41a somo dadad gandharvāya gandharvo dadad agnaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19372: RV_10,085.41c rayiṃ ca putrāṃś cādād agnir mahyam atho imām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19373: RV_10,085.42a ihaiva stam mā vi yauṣṭaṃ viśvam āyur vy aśnutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19374: RV_10,085.42c krīḷantau putrair naptṛbhir modamānau sve gṛhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19375: RV_10,085.43a ā naḥ prajāṃ janayatu prajāpatir ājarasāya sam anaktv aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19376: RV_10,085.43c adurmaṅgalīḥ patilokam ā viśa śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:19377: RV_10,085.44a aghoracakṣur apatighny edhi śivā paśubhyaḥ sumanāḥ suvarcāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19378: RV_10,085.44c vīrasūr devakāmā syonā śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:19379: RV_10,085.45a imāṃ tvam indra mīḍhvaḥ suputrāṃ subhagāṃ kṛṇu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19380: RV_10,085.45c daśāsyām putrān ā dhehi patim ekādaśaṃ kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19381: RV_10,085.46a samrājñī śvaśure bhava samrājñī śvaśrvām bhava /
GV01rvh1-10u:19382: RV_10,085.46c nanāndari samrājñī bhava samrājñī adhi devṛṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19383: RV_10,085.47a sam añjantu viśve devāḥ sam āpo hṛdayāni nau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19384: RV_10,085.47c sam mātariśvā saṃ dhātā sam u deṣṭrī dadhātu nau //
GV01rvh1-10u:19385: RV_10,086.01a vi hi sotor asṛkṣata nendraṃ devam amaṃsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19386: RV_10,086.01c yatrāmadad vṛṣākapir aryaḥ puṣṭeṣu matsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19387: RV_10,086.02a parā hīndra dhāvasi vṛṣākaper ati vyathiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19388: RV_10,086.02c no aha pra vindasy anyatra somapītaye viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19389: RV_10,086.03a kim ayaṃ tvāṃ vṛṣākapiś cakāra harito mṛgaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19390: RV_10,086.03c yasmā irasyasīd u nv aryo vā puṣṭimad vasu viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19391: RV_10,086.04a yam imaṃ tvaṃ vṛṣākapim priyam indrābhirakṣasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19392: RV_10,086.04c śvā nv asya jambhiṣad api karṇe varāhayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19393: RV_10,086.05a priyā taṣṭāni me kapir vyaktā vy adūduṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19394: RV_10,086.05c śiro nv asya rāviṣaṃ na sugaṃ duṣkṛte bhuvaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19395: RV_10,086.06a na mat strī subhasattarā na suyāśutarā bhuvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19396: RV_10,086.06c na mat praticyavīyasī na sakthy udyamīyasī viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19397: RV_10,086.07a uve amba sulābhike yathevāṅga bhaviṣyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19398: RV_10,086.07c bhasan me amba sakthi me śiro me vīva hṛṣyati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19399: RV_10,086.08a kiṃ subāho svaṅgure pṛthuṣṭo pṛthujāghane /
GV01rvh1-10u:19400: RV_10,086.08c kiṃ śūrapatni nas tvam abhy amīṣi vṛṣākapiṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19401: RV_10,086.09a avīrām iva mām ayaṃ śarārur abhi manyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19402: RV_10,086.09c utāham asmi vīriṇīndrapatnī marutsakhā viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19403: RV_10,086.10a saṃhotraṃ sma purā nārī samanaṃ vāva gacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19404: RV_10,086.10c vedhā ṛtasya vīriṇīndrapatnī mahīyate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19405: RV_10,086.11a indrāṇīm āsu nāriṣu subhagām aham aśravam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19406: RV_10,086.11c nahy asyā aparaṃ cana jarasā marate patir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19407: RV_10,086.12a nāham indrāṇi rāraṇa sakhyur vṛṣākaper ṛte /
GV01rvh1-10u:19408: RV_10,086.12c yasyedam apyaṃ haviḥ priyaṃ deveṣu gacchati viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19409: RV_10,086.13a vṛṣākapāyi revati suputra ād u susnuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19410: RV_10,086.13c ghasat ta indra ukṣaṇaḥ priyaṃ kācitkaraṃ havir viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19411: RV_10,086.14a ukṣṇo hi me pañcadaśa sākam pacanti viṃśatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19412: RV_10,086.14c utāham admi pīva id ubhā kukṣī pṛṇanti me viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19413: RV_10,086.15a vṛṣabho na tigmaśṛṅgo 'ntar yūtheṣu roruvat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19414: RV_10,086.15c manthas ta indra śaṃ hṛde yaṃ te sunoti bhāvayur viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19415: RV_10,086.16a na seśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19416: RV_10,086.16c sed īśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19417: RV_10,086.17a na seśe yasya romaśaṃ niṣeduṣo vijṛmbhate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19418: RV_10,086.17c sed īśe yasya rambate 'ntarā sakthyā kapṛd viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19419: RV_10,086.18a ayam indra vṛṣākapiḥ parasvantaṃ hataṃ vidat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19420: RV_10,086.18c asiṃ sūnāṃ navaṃ carum ād edhasyāna ācitaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19421: RV_10,086.19a ayam emi vicākaśad vicinvan dāsam āryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19422: RV_10,086.19c pibāmi pākasutvano 'bhi dhīram acākaśaṃ viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19423: RV_10,086.20a dhanva ca yat kṛntatraṃ ca kati svit tā vi yojanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19424: RV_10,086.20c nedīyaso vṛṣākape 'stam ehi gṛhāṃ upa viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19425: RV_10,086.21a punar ehi vṛṣākape suvitā kalpayāvahai /
GV01rvh1-10u:19426: RV_10,086.21c ya eṣa svapnanaṃśano 'stam eṣi pathā punar viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19427: RV_10,086.22a yad udañco vṛṣākape gṛham indrājagantana /
GV01rvh1-10u:19428: RV_10,086.22c kva sya pulvagho mṛgaḥ kam agañ janayopano viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19429: RV_10,086.23a parśur ha nāma mānavī sākaṃ sasūva viṃśatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19430: RV_10,086.23c bhadram bhala tyasyā abhūd yasyā udaram āmayad viśvasmād indra uttaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19431: RV_10,087.01a rakṣohaṇaṃ vājinam ā jigharmi mitram prathiṣṭham upa yāmi śarma /
GV01rvh1-10u:19432: RV_10,087.01c śiśāno agniḥ kratubhiḥ samiddhaḥ sa no divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19433: RV_10,087.02a ayodaṃṣṭro arciṣā yātudhānān upa spṛśa jātavedaḥ samiddhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19434: RV_10,087.02c ā jihvayā mūradevān rabhasva kravyādo vṛktvy api dhatsvāsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19435: RV_10,087.03a ubhobhayāvinn upa dhehi daṃṣṭrā hiṃsraḥ śiśāno 'varam paraṃ ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:19436: RV_10,087.03c utāntarikṣe pari yāhi rājañ jambhaiḥ saṃ dhehy abhi yātudhānān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19437: RV_10,087.04a yajñair iṣūḥ saṃnamamāno agne vācā śalyāṃ aśanibhir dihānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19438: RV_10,087.04c tābhir vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān pratīco bāhūn prati bhaṅdhy eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19439: RV_10,087.05a agne tvacaṃ yātudhānasya bhindhi hiṃsrāśanir harasā hantv enam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19440: RV_10,087.05c pra parvāṇi jātavedaḥ śṛṇīhi kravyāt kraviṣṇur vi cinotu vṛkṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19441: RV_10,087.06a yatredānīm paśyasi jātavedas tiṣṭhantam agna uta vā carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19442: RV_10,087.06c yad vāntarikṣe pathibhiḥ patantaṃ tam astā vidhya śarvā śiśānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19443: RV_10,087.07a utālabdhaṃ spṛṇuhi jātaveda ālebhānād ṛṣṭibhir yātudhānāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19444: RV_10,087.07c agne pūrvo ni jahi śośucāna āmādaḥ kṣviṅkās tam adantv enīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19445: RV_10,087.08a iha pra brūhi yatamaḥ so agne yo yātudhāno ya idaṃ kṛṇoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19446: RV_10,087.08c tam ā rabhasva samidhā yaviṣṭha nṛcakṣasaś cakṣuṣe randhayainam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19447: RV_10,087.09a tīkṣṇenāgne cakṣuṣā rakṣa yajñam prāñcaṃ vasubhyaḥ pra ṇaya pracetaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19448: RV_10,087.09c hiṃsraṃ rakṣāṃsy abhi śośucānam mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā nṛcakṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19449: RV_10,087.10a nṛcakṣā rakṣaḥ pari paśya vikṣu tasya trīṇi prati śṛṇīhy agrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19450: RV_10,087.10c tasyāgne pṛṣṭīr harasā śṛṇīhi tredhā mūlaṃ yātudhānasya vṛśca //
GV01rvh1-10u:19451: RV_10,087.11a trir yātudhānaḥ prasitiṃ ta etv ṛtaṃ yo agne anṛtena hanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19452: RV_10,087.11c tam arciṣā sphūrjayañ jātavedaḥ samakṣam enaṃ gṛṇate ni vṛṅdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19453: RV_10,087.12a tad agne cakṣuḥ prati dhehi rebhe śaphārujaṃ yena paśyasi yātudhānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19454: RV_10,087.12c atharvavaj jyotiṣā daivyena satyaṃ dhūrvantam acitaṃ ny oṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:19455: RV_10,087.13a yad agne adya mithunā śapāto yad vācas tṛṣṭaṃ janayanta rebhāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19456: RV_10,087.13c manyor manasaḥ śaravyā jāyate yā tayā vidhya hṛdaye yātudhānān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19457: RV_10,087.14a parā śṛṇīhi tapasā yātudhānān parāgne rakṣo harasā śṛṇīhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19458: RV_10,087.14c parārciṣā mūradevāñ chṛṇīhi parāsutṛpo abhi śośucānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19459: RV_10,087.15a parādya devā vṛjinaṃ śṛṇantu pratyag enaṃ śapathā yantu tṛṣṭāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19460: RV_10,087.15c vācāstenaṃ śarava ṛcchantu marman viśvasyaitu prasitiṃ yātudhānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19461: RV_10,087.16a yaḥ pauruṣeyeṇa kraviṣā samaṅkte yo aśvyena paśunā yātudhānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19462: RV_10,087.16c yo aghnyāyā bharati kṣīram agne teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇi harasāpi vṛśca //
GV01rvh1-10u:19463: RV_10,087.17a saṃvatsarīṇam paya usriyāyās tasya māśīd yātudhāno nṛcakṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19464: RV_10,087.17c pīyūṣam agne yatamas titṛpsāt tam pratyañcam arciṣā vidhya marman //
GV01rvh1-10u:19465: RV_10,087.18a viṣaṃ gavāṃ yātudhānāḥ pibantv ā vṛścyantām aditaye durevāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19466: RV_10,087.18c parainān devaḥ savitā dadātu parā bhāgam oṣadhīnāṃ jayantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19467: RV_10,087.19a sanād agne mṛṇasi yātudhānān na tvā rakṣāṃsi pṛtanāsu jigyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19468: RV_10,087.19c anu daha sahamūrān kravyādo mā te hetyā mukṣata daivyāyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19469: RV_10,087.20a tvaṃ no agne adharād udaktāt tvam paścād uta rakṣā purastāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19470: RV_10,087.20c prati te te ajarāsas tapiṣṭhā aghaśaṃsaṃ śośucato dahantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19471: RV_10,087.21a paścāt purastād adharād udaktāt kaviḥ kāvyena pari pāhi rājan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19472: RV_10,087.21c sakhe sakhāyam ajaro jarimṇe 'gne martāṃ amartyas tvaṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19473: RV_10,087.22a pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipraṃ sahasya dhīmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19475: RV_10,087.23a viṣeṇa bhaṅgurāvataḥ prati ṣma rakṣaso daha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19476: RV_10,087.23c agne tigmena śociṣā tapuragrābhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19477: RV_10,087.24a praty agne mithunā daha yātudhānā kimīdinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19478: RV_10,087.24c saṃ tvā śiśāmi jāgṛhy adabdhaṃ vipra manmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19479: RV_10,087.25a praty agne harasā haraḥ śṛṇīhi viśvataḥ prati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19480: RV_10,087.25c yātudhānasya rakṣaso balaṃ vi ruja vīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19481: RV_10,088.01a haviṣ pāntam ajaraṃ svarvidi divispṛśy āhutaṃ juṣṭam agnau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19482: RV_10,088.01c tasya bharmaṇe bhuvanāya devā dharmaṇe kaṃ svadhayā paprathanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19483: RV_10,088.02a gīrṇam bhuvanaṃ tamasāpagūḷham āviḥ svar abhavaj jāte agnau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19484: RV_10,088.02c tasya devāḥ pṛthivī dyaur utāpo 'raṇayann oṣadhīḥ sakhye asya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19485: RV_10,088.03a devebhir nv iṣito yajñiyebhir agniṃ stoṣāṇy ajaram bṛhantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19486: RV_10,088.03c yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām ātatāna rodasī antarikṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19487: RV_10,088.04a yo hotāsīt prathamo devajuṣṭo yaṃ samāñjann ājyenā vṛṇānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19488: RV_10,088.04c sa patatrītvaraṃ sthā jagad yac chvātram agnir akṛṇoj jātavedāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19489: RV_10,088.05a yaj jātavedo bhuvanasya mūrdhann atiṣṭho agne saha rocanena /
GV01rvh1-10u:19490: RV_10,088.05c taṃ tvāhema matibhir gīrbhir ukthaiḥ sa yajñiyo abhavo rodasiprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19491: RV_10,088.06a mūrdhā bhuvo bhavati naktam agnis tataḥ sūryo jāyate prātar udyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19492: RV_10,088.06c māyām ū tu yajñiyānām etām apo yat tūrṇiś carati prajānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19493: RV_10,088.07a dṛśenyo yo mahinā samiddho 'rocata diviyonir vibhāvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19494: RV_10,088.07c tasminn agnau sūktavākena devā havir viśva ājuhavus tanūpāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19495: RV_10,088.08a sūktavākam prathamam ād id agnim ād id dhavir ajanayanta devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19496: RV_10,088.08c sa eṣāṃ yajño abhavat tanūpās taṃ dyaur veda tam pṛthivī tam āpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19497: RV_10,088.09a yaṃ devāso 'janayantāgniṃ yasminn ājuhavur bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19498: RV_10,088.09c so arciṣā pṛthivīṃ dyām utemām ṛjūyamāno atapan mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19499: RV_10,088.10a stomena hi divi devāso agnim ajījanañ chaktibhī rodasiprām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19500: RV_10,088.10c tam ū akṛṇvan tredhā bhuve kaṃ sa oṣadhīḥ pacati viśvarūpāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19501: RV_10,088.11a yaded enam adadhur yajñiyāso divi devāḥ sūryam āditeyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19502: RV_10,088.11c yadā cariṣṇū mithunāv abhūtām ād it prāpaśyan bhuvanāni viśvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19503: RV_10,088.12a viśvasmā agnim bhuvanāya devā vaiśvānaraṃ ketum ahnām akṛṇvan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19504: RV_10,088.12c ā yas tatānoṣaso vibhātīr apo ūrṇoti tamo arciṣā yan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19505: RV_10,088.13a vaiśvānaraṃ kavayo yajñiyāso 'gniṃ devā ajanayann ajuryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19506: RV_10,088.13c nakṣatram pratnam aminac cariṣṇu yakṣasyādhyakṣaṃ taviṣam bṛhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19507: RV_10,088.14a vaiśvānaraṃ viśvahā dīdivāṃsam mantrair agniṃ kavim acchā vadāmaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19508: RV_10,088.14c yo mahimnā paribabhūvorvī utāvastād uta devaḥ parastāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19509: RV_10,088.15a dve srutī aśṛṇavam pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19510: RV_10,088.15c tābhyām idaṃ viśvam ejat sam eti yad antarā pitaram mātaraṃ ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:19511: RV_10,088.16a dve samīcī bibhṛtaś carantaṃ śīrṣato jātam manasā vimṛṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19512: RV_10,088.16c sa pratyaṅ viśvā bhuvanāni tasthāv aprayucchan taraṇir bhrājamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19513: RV_10,088.17a yatrā vadete avaraḥ paraś ca yajñanyoḥ kataro nau vi veda /
