GV01rvh1-10u:19514: RV_10,088.17c ā śekur it sadhamādaṃ sakhāyo nakṣanta yajñaṃ ka idaṃ vi vocat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19515: RV_10,088.18a katy agnayaḥ kati sūryāsaḥ katy uṣāsaḥ katy u svid āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19516: RV_10,088.18c nopaspijaṃ vaḥ pitaro vadāmi pṛcchāmi vaḥ kavayo vidmane kam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19517: RV_10,088.19a yāvanmātram uṣaso na pratīkaṃ suparṇyo vasate mātariśvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19518: RV_10,088.19c tāvad dadhāty upa yajñam āyan brāhmaṇo hotur avaro niṣīdan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19519: RV_10,089.01a indraṃ stavā nṛtamaṃ yasya mahnā vibabādhe rocanā vi jmo antān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19520: RV_10,089.01c ā yaḥ paprau carṣaṇīdhṛd varobhiḥ pra sindhubhyo riricāno mahitvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19521: RV_10,089.02a sa sūryaḥ pary urū varāṃsy endro vavṛtyād rathyeva cakrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19522: RV_10,089.02c atiṣṭhantam apasyaṃ na sargaṃ kṛṣṇā tamāṃsi tviṣyā jaghāna //
GV01rvh1-10u:19523: RV_10,089.03a samānam asmā anapāvṛd arca kṣmayā divo asamam brahma navyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19524: RV_10,089.03c vi yaḥ pṛṣṭheva janimāny arya indraś cikāya na sakhāyam īṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19525: RV_10,089.04a indrāya giro aniśitasargā apaḥ prerayaṃ sagarasya budhnāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19526: RV_10,089.04c yo akṣeṇeva cakriyā śacībhir viṣvak tastambha pṛthivīm uta dyām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19527: RV_10,089.05a āpāntamanyus tṛpalaprabharmā dhuniḥ śimīvāñ charumāṃ ṛjīṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19528: RV_10,089.05c somo viśvāny atasā vanāni nārvāg indram pratimānāni debhuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19529: RV_10,089.06a na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī na dhanva nāntarikṣaṃ nādrayaḥ somo akṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19530: RV_10,089.06c yad asya manyur adhinīyamānaḥ śṛṇāti vīḷu rujati sthirāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19531: RV_10,089.07a jaghāna vṛtraṃ svadhitir vaneva ruroja puro aradan na sindhūn /
GV01rvh1-10u:19532: RV_10,089.07c bibheda giriṃ navam in na kumbham ā gā indro akṛṇuta svayugbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19533: RV_10,089.08a tvaṃ ha tyad ṛṇayā indra dhīro 'sir na parva vṛjinā śṛṇāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19534: RV_10,089.08c pra ye mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma yujaṃ na janā minanti mitram //
GV01rvh1-10u:19535: RV_10,089.09a pra ye mitram prāryamaṇaṃ durevāḥ pra saṃgiraḥ pra varuṇam minanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19536: RV_10,089.09c ny amitreṣu vadham indra tumraṃ vṛṣan vṛṣāṇam aruṣaṃ śiśīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19537: RV_10,089.10a indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apām indra it parvatānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19538: RV_10,089.10c indro vṛdhām indra in medhirāṇām indraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19539: RV_10,089.11a prāktubhya indraḥ pra vṛdho ahabhyaḥ prāntarikṣāt pra samudrasya dhāseḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19540: RV_10,089.11c pra vātasya prathasaḥ pra jmo antāt pra sindhubhyo ririce pra kṣitibhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19541: RV_10,089.12a pra śośucatyā uṣaso na ketur asinvā te vartatām indra hetiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19542: RV_10,089.12c aśmeva vidhya diva ā sṛjānas tapiṣṭhena heṣasā droghamitrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19543: RV_10,089.13a anv aha māsā anv id vanāny anv oṣadhīr anu parvatāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19544: RV_10,089.13c anv indraṃ rodasī vāvaśāne anv āpo ajihata jāyamānam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19545: RV_10,089.14a karhi svit sā ta indra cetyāsad aghasya yad bhinado rakṣa eṣat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19546: RV_10,089.14c mitrakruvo yac chasane na gāvaḥ pṛthivyā āpṛg amuyā śayante //
GV01rvh1-10u:19547: RV_10,089.15a śatrūyanto abhi ye nas tatasre mahi vrādhanta ogaṇāsa indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:19548: RV_10,089.15c andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantāṃ sujyotiṣo aktavas tāṃ abhi ṣyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19549: RV_10,089.16a purūṇi hi tvā savanā janānām brahmāṇi mandan gṛṇatām ṛṣīṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19550: RV_10,089.16c imām āghoṣann avasā sahūtiṃ tiro viśvāṃ arcato yāhy arvāṅ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19551: RV_10,089.17a evā te vayam indra bhuñjatīnāṃ vidyāma sumatīnāṃ navānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19552: RV_10,089.17c vidyāma vastor avasā gṛṇanto viśvāmitrā uta ta indra nūnam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19553: RV_10,089.18a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19554: RV_10,089.18c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19556: RV_10,090.01c sa bhūmiṃ viśvato vṛtvāty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19557: RV_10,090.02a puruṣa evedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhavyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19559: RV_10,090.03a etāvān asya mahimāto jyāyāṃś ca pūruṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19560: RV_10,090.03c pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19561: RV_10,090.04a tripād ūrdhva ud ait puruṣaḥ pādo 'syehābhavat punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19562: RV_10,090.04c tato viṣvaṅ vy akrāmat sāśanānaśane abhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19563: RV_10,090.05a tasmād virāḷ ajāyata virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19564: RV_10,090.05c sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19565: RV_10,090.06a yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19566: RV_10,090.06c vasanto asyāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19567: RV_10,090.07a taṃ yajñam barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agrataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19568: RV_10,090.07c tena devā ayajanta sādhyā ṛṣayaś ca ye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19569: RV_10,090.08a tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19570: RV_10,090.08c paśūn tāṃś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyān grāmyāś ca ye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19571: RV_10,090.09a tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire /
GV01rvh1-10u:19572: RV_10,090.09c chandāṃsi jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19573: RV_10,090.10a tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ke cobhayādataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19574: RV_10,090.10c gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19575: RV_10,090.11a yat puruṣaṃ vy adadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19576: RV_10,090.11c mukhaṃ kim asya kau bāhū kā ūrū pādā ucyete //
GV01rvh1-10u:19577: RV_10,090.12a brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19578: RV_10,090.12c ūrū tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyāṃ śūdro ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19579: RV_10,090.13a candramā manaso jātaś cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19580: RV_10,090.13c mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19581: RV_10,090.14a nābhyā āsīd antarikṣaṃ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19582: RV_10,090.14c padbhyām bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokāṃ akalpayan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19583: RV_10,090.15a saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19584: RV_10,090.15c devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣam paśum //
GV01rvh1-10u:19585: RV_10,090.16a yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19586: RV_10,090.16c te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19587: RV_10,091.01a saṃ jāgṛvadbhir jaramāṇa idhyate dame damūnā iṣayann iḷas pade /
GV01rvh1-10u:19588: RV_10,091.01c viśvasya hotā haviṣo vareṇyo vibhur vibhāvā suṣakhā sakhīyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19589: RV_10,091.02a sa darśataśrīr atithir gṛhe-gṛhe vane-vane śiśriye takvavīr iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19590: RV_10,091.02c janaṃ-janaṃ janyo nāti manyate viśa ā kṣeti viśyo viśaṃ-viśam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19591: RV_10,091.03a sudakṣo dakṣaiḥ kratunāsi sukratur agne kaviḥ kāvyenāsi viśvavit /
GV01rvh1-10u:19592: RV_10,091.03c vasur vasūnāṃ kṣayasi tvam eka id dyāvā ca yāni pṛthivī ca puṣyataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19593: RV_10,091.04a prajānann agne tava yonim ṛtviyam iḷāyās pade ghṛtavantam āsadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19594: RV_10,091.04c ā te cikitra uṣasām ivetayo 'repasaḥ sūryasyeva raśmayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19595: RV_10,091.05a tava śriyo varṣyasyeva vidyutaś citrāś cikitra uṣasāṃ na ketavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19596: RV_10,091.05c yad oṣadhīr abhisṛṣṭo vanāni ca pari svayaṃ cinuṣe annam āsye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19597: RV_10,091.06a tam oṣadhīr dadhire garbham ṛtviyaṃ tam āpo agniṃ janayanta mātaraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19598: RV_10,091.06c tam it samānaṃ vaninaś ca vīrudho 'ntarvatīś ca suvate ca viśvahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19599: RV_10,091.07a vātopadhūta iṣito vaśāṃ anu tṛṣu yad annā veviṣad vitiṣṭhase /
GV01rvh1-10u:19600: RV_10,091.07c ā te yatante rathyo yathā pṛthak chardhāṃsy agne ajarāṇi dhakṣataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19601: RV_10,091.08a medhākāraṃ vidathasya prasādhanam agniṃ hotāram paribhūtamam matim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19602: RV_10,091.08c tam id arbhe haviṣy ā samānam it tam in mahe vṛṇate nānyaṃ tvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19603: RV_10,091.09a tvām id atra vṛṇate tvāyavo hotāram agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19604: RV_10,091.09c yad devayanto dadhati prayāṃsi te haviṣmanto manavo vṛktabarhiṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19605: RV_10,091.10a tavāgne hotraṃ tava potram ṛtviyaṃ tava neṣṭraṃ tvam agnid ṛtāyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19606: RV_10,091.10c tava praśāstraṃ tvam adhvarīyasi brahmā cāsi gṛhapatiś ca no dame //
GV01rvh1-10u:19607: RV_10,091.11a yas tubhyam agne amṛtāya martyaḥ samidhā dāśad uta vā haviṣkṛti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19608: RV_10,091.11c tasya hotā bhavasi yāsi dūtyam upa brūṣe yajasy adhvarīyasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19609: RV_10,091.12a imā asmai matayo vāco asmad āṃ ṛco giraḥ suṣṭutayaḥ sam agmata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19610: RV_10,091.12c vasūyavo vasave jātavedase vṛddhāsu cid vardhano yāsu cākanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19611: RV_10,091.13a imām pratnāya suṣṭutiṃ navīyasīṃ voceyam asmā uśate śṛṇotu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19612: RV_10,091.13c bhūyā antarā hṛdy asya nispṛśe jāyeva patya uśatī suvāsāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19613: RV_10,091.14a yasminn aśvāsa ṛṣabhāsa ukṣaṇo vaśā meṣā avasṛṣṭāsa āhutāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19614: RV_10,091.14c kīlālape somapṛṣṭhāya vedhase hṛdā matiṃ janaye cārum agnaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19615: RV_10,091.15a ahāvy agne havir āsye te srucīva ghṛtaṃ camvīva somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19616: RV_10,091.15c vājasaniṃ rayim asme suvīram praśastaṃ dhehi yaśasam bṛhantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19617: RV_10,092.01a yajñasya vo rathyaṃ viśpatiṃ viśāṃ hotāram aktor atithiṃ vibhāvasum /
GV01rvh1-10u:19618: RV_10,092.01c śocañ chuṣkāsu hariṇīṣu jarbhurad vṛṣā ketur yajato dyām aśāyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19619: RV_10,092.02a imam añjaspām ubhaye akṛṇvata dharmāṇam agniṃ vidathasya sādhanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19620: RV_10,092.02c aktuṃ na yahvam uṣasaḥ purohitaṃ tanūnapātam aruṣasya niṃsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19621: RV_10,092.03a baḷ asya nīthā vi paṇeś ca manmahe vayā asya prahutā āsur attave /
GV01rvh1-10u:19622: RV_10,092.03c yadā ghorāso amṛtatvam āśatād ij janasya daivyasya carkiran //
GV01rvh1-10u:19623: RV_10,092.04a ṛtasya hi prasitir dyaur uru vyaco namo mahy aramatiḥ panīyasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19624: RV_10,092.04c indro mitro varuṇaḥ saṃ cikitrire 'tho bhagaḥ savitā pūtadakṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19625: RV_10,092.05a pra rudreṇa yayinā yanti sindhavas tiro mahīm aramatiṃ dadhanvire /
GV01rvh1-10u:19626: RV_10,092.05c yebhiḥ parijmā pariyann uru jrayo vi roruvaj jaṭhare viśvam ukṣate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19627: RV_10,092.06a krāṇā rudrā maruto viśvakṛṣṭayo divaḥ śyenāso asurasya nīḷayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19628: RV_10,092.06c tebhiś caṣṭe varuṇo mitro aryamendro devebhir arvaśebhir arvaśaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19629: RV_10,092.07a indre bhujaṃ śaśamānāsa āśata sūro dṛśīke vṛṣaṇaś ca pauṃsye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19630: RV_10,092.07c pra ye nv asyārhaṇā tatakṣire yujaṃ vajraṃ nṛṣadaneṣu kāravaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19631: RV_10,092.08a sūraś cid ā harito asya rīramad indrād ā kaś cid bhayate tavīyasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19632: RV_10,092.08c bhīmasya vṛṣṇo jaṭharād abhiśvaso dive-dive sahuri stann abādhitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19633: RV_10,092.09a stomaṃ vo adya rudrāya śikvase kṣayadvīrāya namasā didiṣṭana /
GV01rvh1-10u:19634: RV_10,092.09c yebhiḥ śivaḥ svavāṃ evayāvabhir divaḥ siṣakti svayaśā nikāmabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19635: RV_10,092.10a te hi prajāyā abharanta vi śravo bṛhaspatir vṛṣabhaḥ somajāmayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19636: RV_10,092.10c yajñair atharvā prathamo vi dhārayad devā dakṣair bhṛgavaḥ saṃ cikitrire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19637: RV_10,092.11a te hi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūriretasā narāśaṃsaś caturaṅgo yamo 'ditiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19638: RV_10,092.11c devas tvaṣṭā draviṇodā ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ pra rodasī maruto viṣṇur arhire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19639: RV_10,092.12a uta sya na uśijām urviyā kavir ahiḥ śṛṇotu budhnyo havīmani /
GV01rvh1-10u:19640: RV_10,092.12c sūryāmāsā vicarantā divikṣitā dhiyā śamīnahuṣī asya bodhatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19641: RV_10,092.13a pra naḥ pūṣā carathaṃ viśvadevyo 'pāṃ napād avatu vāyur iṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19642: RV_10,092.13c ātmānaṃ vasyo abhi vātam arcata tad aśvinā suhavā yāmani śrutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19643: RV_10,092.14a viśām āsām abhayānām adhikṣitaṃ gīrbhir u svayaśasaṃ gṛṇīmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19644: RV_10,092.14c gnābhir viśvābhir aditim anarvaṇam aktor yuvānaṃ nṛmaṇā adhā patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19645: RV_10,092.15a rebhad atra januṣā pūrvo aṅgirā grāvāṇa ūrdhvā abhi cakṣur adhvaram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19646: RV_10,092.15c yebhir vihāyā abhavad vicakṣaṇaḥ pāthaḥ sumekaṃ svadhitir vananvati //
GV01rvh1-10u:19647: RV_10,093.01a mahi dyāvāpṛthivī bhūtam urvī nārī yahvī na rodasī sadaṃ naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19648: RV_10,093.01c tebhir naḥ pātaṃ sahyasa ebhir naḥ pātaṃ śūṣaṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19649: RV_10,093.02a yajñe-yajñe sa martyo devān saparyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:19650: RV_10,093.02c yaḥ sumnair dīrghaśruttama āvivāsaty enān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19651: RV_10,093.03a viśveṣām irajyavo devānāṃ vār mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19652: RV_10,093.03c viśve hi viśvamahaso viśve yajñeṣu yajñiyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19653: RV_10,093.04a te ghā rājāno amṛtasya mandrā aryamā mitro varuṇaḥ parijmā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19654: RV_10,093.04c kad rudro nṛṇāṃ stuto marutaḥ pūṣaṇo bhagaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19655: RV_10,093.05a uta no naktam apāṃ vṛṣaṇvasū sūryāmāsā sadanāya sadhanyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19656: RV_10,093.05c sacā yat sādy eṣām ahir budhneṣu budhnyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19657: RV_10,093.06a uta no devāv aśvinā śubhas patī dhāmabhir mitrāvaruṇā uruṣyatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19658: RV_10,093.06c mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate 'ti dhanveva duritā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19659: RV_10,093.07a uta no rudrā cin mṛḷatām aśvinā viśve devāso rathaspatir bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19660: RV_10,093.07c ṛbhur vāja ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ parijmā viśvavedasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19661: RV_10,093.08a ṛbhur ṛbhukṣā ṛbhur vidhato mada ā te harī jūjuvānasya vājinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19662: RV_10,093.08c duṣṭaraṃ yasya sāma cid ṛdhag yajño na mānuṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19663: RV_10,093.09a kṛdhī no ahrayo deva savitaḥ sa ca stuṣe maghonām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19664: RV_10,093.09c saho na indro vahnibhir ny eṣāṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ cakraṃ raśmiṃ na yoyuve //
GV01rvh1-10u:19665: RV_10,093.10a aiṣu dyāvāpṛthivī dhātam mahad asme vīreṣu viśvacarṣaṇi śravaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19666: RV_10,093.10c pṛkṣaṃ vājasya sātaye pṛkṣaṃ rāyota turvaṇe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19667: RV_10,093.11a etaṃ śaṃsam indrāsmayuṣ ṭvaṃ kūcit santaṃ sahasāvann abhiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19668: RV_10,093.11c sadā pāhy abhiṣṭaye medatāṃ vedatā vaso //
GV01rvh1-10u:19669: RV_10,093.12a etam me stomaṃ tanā na sūrye dyutadyāmānaṃ vāvṛdhanta nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19671: RV_10,093.13a vāvarta yeṣāṃ rāyā yuktaiṣāṃ hiraṇyayī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19672: RV_10,093.13c nemadhitā na pauṃsyā vṛtheva viṣṭāntā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19673: RV_10,093.14a pra tad duḥśīme pṛthavāne vene pra rāme vocam asure maghavatsu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19674: RV_10,093.14c ye yuktvāya pañca śatāsmayu pathā viśrāvy eṣām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19675: RV_10,093.15a adhīn nv atra saptatiṃ ca sapta ca /
GV01rvh1-10u:19676: RV_10,093.15b sadyo didiṣṭa tānvaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa pārthyaḥ sadyo didiṣṭa māyavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19677: RV_10,094.01a praite vadantu pra vayaṃ vadāma grāvabhyo vācaṃ vadatā vadadbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19678: RV_10,094.01c yad adrayaḥ parvatāḥ sākam āśavaḥ ślokaṃ ghoṣam bharathendrāya sominaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19679: RV_10,094.02a ete vadanti śatavat sahasravad abhi krandanti haritebhir āsabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19680: RV_10,094.02c viṣṭvī grāvāṇaḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā hotuś cit pūrve haviradyam āśata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19681: RV_10,094.03a ete vadanty avidann anā madhu ny ūṅkhayante adhi pakva āmiṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19682: RV_10,094.03c vṛkṣasya śākhām aruṇasya bapsatas te sūbharvā vṛṣabhāḥ prem arāviṣuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19683: RV_10,094.04a bṛhad vadanti madireṇa mandinendraṃ krośanto 'vidann anā madhu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19684: RV_10,094.04c saṃrabhyā dhīrāḥ svasṛbhir anartiṣur āghoṣayantaḥ pṛthivīm upabdibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19685: RV_10,094.05a suparṇā vācam akratopa dyavy ākhare kṛṣṇā iṣirā anartiṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19686: RV_10,094.05c nyaṅ ni yanty uparasya niṣkṛtam purū reto dadhire sūryaśvitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19687: RV_10,094.06a ugrā iva pravahantaḥ samāyamuḥ sākaṃ yuktā vṛṣaṇo bibhrato dhuraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19688: RV_10,094.06c yac chvasanto jagrasānā arāviṣuḥ śṛṇva eṣām prothatho arvatām iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19690: RV_10,094.07c daśābhīśubhyo arcatājarebhyo daśa dhuro daśa yuktā vahadbhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19691: RV_10,094.08a te adrayo daśayantrāsa āśavas teṣām ādhānam pary eti haryatam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19692: RV_10,094.08c ta ū sutasya somyasyāndhaso 'ṃśoḥ pīyūṣam prathamasya bhejire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19693: RV_10,094.09a te somādo harī indrasya niṃsate 'ṃśuṃ duhanto adhy āsate gavi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19694: RV_10,094.09c tebhir dugdham papivān somyam madhv indro vardhate prathate vṛṣāyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:19695: RV_10,094.10a vṛṣā vo aṃśur na kilā riṣāthaneḷāvantaḥ sadam it sthanāśitāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19696: RV_10,094.10c raivatyeva mahasā cārava sthana yasya grāvāṇo ajuṣadhvam adhvaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:19697: RV_10,094.11a tṛdilā atṛdilāso adrayo 'śramaṇā aśṛthitā amṛtyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19698: RV_10,094.11c anāturā ajarā sthāmaviṣṇavaḥ supīvaso atṛṣitā atṛṣṇajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19699: RV_10,094.12a dhruvā eva vaḥ pitaro yuge-yuge kṣemakāmāsaḥ sadaso na yuñjate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19700: RV_10,094.12c ajuryāso hariṣāco haridrava ā dyāṃ raveṇa pṛthivīm aśuśravuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19701: RV_10,094.13a tad id vadanty adrayo vimocane yāmann añjaspā iva ghed upabdibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19702: RV_10,094.13c vapanto bījam iva dhānyākṛtaḥ pṛñcanti somaṃ na minanti bapsataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19703: RV_10,094.14a sute adhvare adhi vācam akratā krīḷayo na mātaraṃ tudantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19704: RV_10,094.14c vi ṣū muñcā suṣuvuṣo manīṣāṃ vi vartantām adrayaś cāyamānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19705: RV_10,095.01a haye jāye manasā tiṣṭha ghore vacāṃsi miśrā kṛṇavāvahai nu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19706: RV_10,095.01c na nau mantrā anuditāsa ete mayas karan paratare canāhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19707: RV_10,095.02a kim etā vācā kṛṇavā tavāham prākramiṣam uṣasām agriyeva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19708: RV_10,095.02c purūravaḥ punar astam parehi durāpanā vāta ivāham asmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19709: RV_10,095.03a iṣur na śriya iṣudher asanā goṣāḥ śatasā na raṃhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19710: RV_10,095.03c avīre kratau vi davidyutan norā na māyuṃ citayanta dhunayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19711: RV_10,095.04a sā vasu dadhatī śvaśurāya vaya uṣo yadi vaṣṭy antigṛhāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19712: RV_10,095.04c astaṃ nanakṣe yasmiñ cākan divā naktaṃ śnathitā vaitasena //
GV01rvh1-10u:19713: RV_10,095.05a triḥ sma māhnaḥ śnathayo vaitasenota sma me 'vyatyai pṛṇāsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19714: RV_10,095.05c purūravo 'nu te ketam āyaṃ rājā me vīra tanvas tad āsīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19715: RV_10,095.06a yā sujūrṇiḥ śreṇiḥ sumnaāpir hradecakṣur na granthinī caraṇyuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19716: RV_10,095.06c tā añjayo 'ruṇayo na sasruḥ śriye gāvo na dhenavo 'navanta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19717: RV_10,095.07a sam asmiñ jāyamāna āsata gnā utem avardhan nadyaḥ svagūrtāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19718: RV_10,095.07c mahe yat tvā purūravo raṇāyāvardhayan dasyuhatyāya devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19719: RV_10,095.08a sacā yad āsu jahatīṣv atkam amānuṣīṣu mānuṣo niṣeve /
GV01rvh1-10u:19720: RV_10,095.08c apa sma mat tarasantī na bhujyus tā atrasan rathaspṛśo nāśvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19721: RV_10,095.09a yad āsu marto amṛtāsu nispṛk saṃ kṣoṇībhiḥ kratubhir na pṛṅkte /
GV01rvh1-10u:19722: RV_10,095.09c tā ātayo na tanvaḥ śumbhata svā aśvāso na krīḷayo dandaśānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19723: RV_10,095.10a vidyun na yā patantī davidyod bharantī me apyā kāmyāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:19724: RV_10,095.10c janiṣṭo apo naryaḥ sujātaḥ prorvaśī tirata dīrgham āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19725: RV_10,095.11a jajñiṣa itthā gopīthyāya hi dadhātha tat purūravo ma ojaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19726: RV_10,095.11c aśāsaṃ tvā viduṣī sasminn ahan na ma āśṛṇoḥ kim abhug vadāsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19727: RV_10,095.12a kadā sūnuḥ pitaraṃ jāta icchāc cakran nāśru vartayad vijānan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19728: RV_10,095.12c ko dampatī samanasā vi yūyod adha yad agniḥ śvaśureṣu dīdayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19729: RV_10,095.13a prati bravāṇi vartayate aśru cakran na krandad ādhye śivāyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:19730: RV_10,095.13c pra tat te hinavā yat te asme parehy astaṃ nahi mūra māpaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19731: RV_10,095.14a sudevo adya prapated anāvṛt parāvatam paramāṃ gantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:19732: RV_10,095.14c adhā śayīta nirṛter upasthe 'dhainaṃ vṛkā rabhasāso adyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19733: RV_10,095.15a purūravo mā mṛthā mā pra papto mā tvā vṛkāso aśivāsa u kṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19734: RV_10,095.15c na vai straiṇāni sakhyāni santi sālāvṛkāṇāṃ hṛdayāny etā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19735: RV_10,095.16a yad virūpācaram martyeṣv avasaṃ rātrīḥ śaradaś catasraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19736: RV_10,095.16c ghṛtasya stokaṃ sakṛd ahna āśnāṃ tād evedaṃ tātṛpāṇā carāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19737: RV_10,095.17a antarikṣaprāṃ rajaso vimānīm upa śikṣāmy urvaśīṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19738: RV_10,095.17c upa tvā rātiḥ sukṛtasya tiṣṭhān ni vartasva hṛdayaṃ tapyate me //
GV01rvh1-10u:19739: RV_10,095.18a iti tvā devā ima āhur aiḷa yathem etad bhavasi mṛtyubandhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19740: RV_10,095.18c prajā te devān haviṣā yajāti svarga u tvam api mādayāse //
GV01rvh1-10u:19741: RV_10,096.01a pra te mahe vidathe śaṃsiṣaṃ harī pra te vanve vanuṣo haryatam madam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19742: RV_10,096.01c ghṛtaṃ na yo haribhiś cāru secata ā tvā viśantu harivarpasaṃ giraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19743: RV_10,096.02a hariṃ hi yonim abhi ye samasvaran hinvanto harī divyaṃ yathā sadaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19744: RV_10,096.02c ā yam pṛṇanti haribhir na dhenava indrāya śūṣaṃ harivantam arcata //
GV01rvh1-10u:19745: RV_10,096.03a so asya vajro harito ya āyaso harir nikāmo harir ā gabhastyoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19746: RV_10,096.03c dyumnī suśipro harimanyusāyaka indre ni rūpā haritā mimikṣire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19747: RV_10,096.04a divi na ketur adhi dhāyi haryato vivyacad vajro harito na raṃhyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19748: RV_10,096.04c tudad ahiṃ hariśipro ya āyasaḥ sahasraśokā abhavad dharimbharaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19749: RV_10,096.05a tvaṃ-tvam aharyathā upastutaḥ pūrvebhir indra harikeśa yajvabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19750: RV_10,096.05c tvaṃ haryasi tava viśvam ukthyam asāmi rādho harijāta haryatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19751: RV_10,096.06a tā vajriṇam mandinaṃ stomyam mada indraṃ rathe vahato haryatā harī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19752: RV_10,096.06c purūṇy asmai savanāni haryata indrāya somā harayo dadhanvire //
GV01rvh1-10u:19753: RV_10,096.07a araṃ kāmāya harayo dadhanvire sthirāya hinvan harayo harī turā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19754: RV_10,096.07c arvadbhir yo haribhir joṣam īyate so asya kāmaṃ harivantam ānaśe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19755: RV_10,096.08a hariśmaśārur harikeśa āyasas turaspeye yo haripā avardhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19756: RV_10,096.08c arvadbhir yo haribhir vājinīvasur ati viśvā duritā pāriṣad dharī //
GV01rvh1-10u:19757: RV_10,096.09a sruveva yasya hariṇī vipetatuḥ śipre vājāya hariṇī davidhvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19758: RV_10,096.09c pra yat kṛte camase marmṛjad dharī pītvā madasya haryatasyāndhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19759: RV_10,096.10a uta sma sadma haryatasya pastyor atyo na vājaṃ harivāṃ acikradat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19760: RV_10,096.10c mahī cid dhi dhiṣaṇāharyad ojasā bṛhad vayo dadhiṣe haryataś cid ā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19761: RV_10,096.11a ā rodasī haryamāṇo mahitvā navyaṃ-navyaṃ haryasi manma nu priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19762: RV_10,096.11c pra pastyam asura haryataṃ gor āviṣ kṛdhi haraye sūryāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19763: RV_10,096.12a ā tvā haryantam prayujo janānāṃ rathe vahantu hariśipram indra /
GV01rvh1-10u:19764: RV_10,096.12c pibā yathā pratibhṛtasya madhvo haryan yajñaṃ sadhamāde daśoṇim //
GV01rvh1-10u:19765: RV_10,096.13a apāḥ pūrveṣāṃ harivaḥ sutānām atho idaṃ savanaṃ kevalaṃ te /
GV01rvh1-10u:19766: RV_10,096.13c mamaddhi somam madhumantam indra satrā vṛṣañ jaṭhara ā vṛṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19767: RV_10,097.01a yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātā devebhyas triyugam purā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19768: RV_10,097.01c manai nu babhrūṇām ahaṃ śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:19769: RV_10,097.02a śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni sahasram uta vo ruhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19770: RV_10,097.02c adhā śatakratvo yūyam imam me agadaṃ kṛta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19771: RV_10,097.03a oṣadhīḥ prati modadhvam puṣpavatīḥ prasūvarīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19772: RV_10,097.03c aśvā iva sajitvarīr vīrudhaḥ pārayiṣṇvaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19773: RV_10,097.04a oṣadhīr iti mātaras tad vo devīr upa bruve /
GV01rvh1-10u:19774: RV_10,097.04c saneyam aśvaṃ gāṃ vāsa ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:19775: RV_10,097.05a aśvatthe vo niṣadanam parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19776: RV_10,097.05c gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19777: RV_10,097.06a yatrauṣadhīḥ samagmata rājānaḥ samitāv iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19778: RV_10,097.06c vipraḥ sa ucyate bhiṣag rakṣohāmīvacātanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19780: RV_10,097.07c āvitsi sarvā oṣadhīr asmā ariṣṭatātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19781: RV_10,097.08a uc chuṣmā oṣadhīnāṃ gāvo goṣṭhād iverate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19782: RV_10,097.08c dhanaṃ saniṣyantīnām ātmānaṃ tava pūruṣa //
GV01rvh1-10u:19783: RV_10,097.09a iṣkṛtir nāma vo mātātho yūyaṃ stha niṣkṛtīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19784: RV_10,097.09c sīrāḥ patatriṇī sthana yad āmayati niṣ kṛtha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19785: RV_10,097.10a ati viśvāḥ pariṣṭhā stena iva vrajam akramuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19786: RV_10,097.10c oṣadhīḥ prācucyavur yat kiṃ ca tanvo rapaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19787: RV_10,097.11a yad imā vājayann aham oṣadhīr hasta ādadhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19788: RV_10,097.11c ātmā yakṣmasya naśyati purā jīvagṛbho yathā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19790: RV_10,097.12c tato yakṣmaṃ vi bādhadhva ugro madhyamaśīr iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:19791: RV_10,097.13a sākaṃ yakṣma pra pata cāṣeṇa kikidīvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19792: RV_10,097.13c sākaṃ vātasya dhrājyā sākaṃ naśya nihākayā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19793: RV_10,097.14a anyā vo anyām avatv anyānyasyā upāvata /
GV01rvh1-10u:19794: RV_10,097.14c tāḥ sarvāḥ saṃvidānā idam me prāvatā vacaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19795: RV_10,097.15a yāḥ phalinīr yā aphalā apuṣpā yāś ca puṣpiṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19796: RV_10,097.15c bṛhaspatiprasūtās tā no muñcantv aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19797: RV_10,097.16a muñcantu mā śapathyād atho varuṇyād uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:19798: RV_10,097.16c atho yamasya paḍbīśāt sarvasmād devakilbiṣāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19799: RV_10,097.17a avapatantīr avadan diva oṣadhayas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:19800: RV_10,097.17c yaṃ jīvam aśnavāmahai na sa riṣyāti pūruṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19801: RV_10,097.18a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr bahvīḥ śatavicakṣaṇāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19802: RV_10,097.18c tāsāṃ tvam asy uttamāraṃ kāmāya śaṃ hṛde //
GV01rvh1-10u:19803: RV_10,097.19a yā oṣadhīḥ somarājñīr viṣṭhitāḥ pṛthivīm anu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19804: RV_10,097.19c bṛhaspatiprasūtā asyai saṃ datta vīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19805: RV_10,097.20a mā vo riṣat khanitā yasmai cāhaṃ khanāmi vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19806: RV_10,097.20c dvipac catuṣpad asmākaṃ sarvam astv anāturam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19807: RV_10,097.21a yāś cedam upaśṛṇvanti yāś ca dūram parāgatāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19808: RV_10,097.21c sarvāḥ saṃgatya vīrudho 'syai saṃ datta vīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19809: RV_10,097.22a oṣadhayaḥ saṃ vadante somena saha rājñā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19810: RV_10,097.22c yasmai kṛṇoti brāhmaṇas taṃ rājan pārayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19811: RV_10,097.23a tvam uttamāsy oṣadhe tava vṛkṣā upastayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19812: RV_10,097.23c upastir astu so 'smākaṃ yo asmāṃ abhidāsati //
GV01rvh1-10u:19813: RV_10,098.01a bṛhaspate prati me devatām ihi mitro vā yad varuṇo vāsi pūṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19814: RV_10,098.01c ādityair vā yad vasubhir marutvān sa parjanyaṃ śantanave vṛṣāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19815: RV_10,098.02a ā devo dūto ajiraś cikitvān tvad devāpe abhi mām agacchat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19816: RV_10,098.02c pratīcīnaḥ prati mām ā vavṛtsva dadhāmi te dyumatīṃ vācam āsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19817: RV_10,098.03a asme dhehi dyumatīṃ vācam āsan bṛhaspate anamīvām iṣirām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19818: RV_10,098.03c yayā vṛṣṭiṃ śantanave vanāva divo drapso madhumāṃ ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:19819: RV_10,098.04a ā no drapsā madhumanto viśantv indra dehy adhirathaṃ sahasram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19820: RV_10,098.04c ni ṣīda hotram ṛtuthā yajasva devān devāpe haviṣā saparya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19821: RV_10,098.05a ārṣṭiṣeṇo hotram ṛṣir niṣīdan devāpir devasumatiṃ cikitvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19822: RV_10,098.05c sa uttarasmād adharaṃ samudram apo divyā asṛjad varṣyā abhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19823: RV_10,098.06a asmin samudre adhy uttarasminn āpo devebhir nivṛtā atiṣṭhan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19824: RV_10,098.06c tā adravann ārṣṭiṣeṇena sṛṣṭā devāpinā preṣitā mṛkṣiṇīṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19825: RV_10,098.07a yad devāpiḥ śantanave purohito hotrāya vṛtaḥ kṛpayann adīdhet /
GV01rvh1-10u:19826: RV_10,098.07c devaśrutaṃ vṛṣṭivaniṃ rarāṇo bṛhaspatir vācam asmā ayacchat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19827: RV_10,098.08a yaṃ tvā devāpiḥ śuśucāno agna ārṣṭiṣeṇo manuṣyaḥ samīdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19828: RV_10,098.08c viśvebhir devair anumadyamānaḥ pra parjanyam īrayā vṛṣṭimantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19829: RV_10,098.09a tvām pūrva ṛṣayo gīrbhir āyan tvām adhvareṣu puruhūta viśve /
GV01rvh1-10u:19830: RV_10,098.09c sahasrāṇy adhirathāny asme ā no yajñaṃ rohidaśvopa yāhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19831: RV_10,098.10a etāny agne navatir nava tve āhutāny adhirathā sahasrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19832: RV_10,098.10c tebhir vardhasva tanvaḥ śūra pūrvīr divo no vṛṣṭim iṣito rirīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19833: RV_10,098.11a etāny agne navatiṃ sahasrā sam pra yaccha vṛṣṇa indrāya bhāgam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19834: RV_10,098.11c vidvān patha ṛtuśo devayānān apy aulānaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:19835: RV_10,098.12a agne bādhasva vi mṛdho vi durgahāpāmīvām apa rakṣāṃsi sedha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19836: RV_10,098.12c asmāt samudrād bṛhato divo no 'pām bhūmānam upa naḥ sṛjeha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19837: RV_10,099.01a kaṃ naś citram iṣaṇyasi cikitvān pṛthugmānaṃ vāśraṃ vāvṛdhadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:19838: RV_10,099.01c kat tasya dātu śavaso vyuṣṭau takṣad vajraṃ vṛtraturam apinvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19839: RV_10,099.02a sa hi dyutā vidyutā veti sāma pṛthuṃ yonim asuratvā sasāda /
GV01rvh1-10u:19840: RV_10,099.02c sa sanīḷebhiḥ prasahāno asya bhrātur na ṛte saptathasya māyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19841: RV_10,099.03a sa vājaṃ yātāpaduṣpadā yan svarṣātā pari ṣadat saniṣyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19842: RV_10,099.03c anarvā yac chatadurasya vedo ghnañ chiśnadevāṃ abhi varpasā bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19843: RV_10,099.04a sa yahvyo 'vanīr goṣv arvā juhoti pradhanyāsu sasriḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19844: RV_10,099.04c apādo yatra yujyāso 'rathā droṇyaśvāsa īrate ghṛtaṃ vāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19845: RV_10,099.05a sa rudrebhir aśastavāra ṛbhvā hitvī gayam āreavadya āgāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19846: RV_10,099.05c vamrasya manye mithunā vivavrī annam abhītyārodayan muṣāyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19847: RV_10,099.06a sa id dāsaṃ tuvīravam patir dan ṣaḷakṣaṃ triśīrṣāṇaṃ damanyat /
GV01rvh1-10u:19848: RV_10,099.06c asya trito nv ojasā vṛdhāno vipā varāham ayoagrayā han //
GV01rvh1-10u:19849: RV_10,099.07a sa druhvaṇe manuṣa ūrdhvasāna ā sāviṣad arśasānāya śarum /
GV01rvh1-10u:19850: RV_10,099.07c sa nṛtamo nahuṣo 'smat sujātaḥ puro 'bhinad arhan dasyuhatye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19851: RV_10,099.08a so abhriyo na yavasa udanyan kṣayāya gātuṃ vidan no asme /
GV01rvh1-10u:19852: RV_10,099.08c upa yat sīdad induṃ śarīraiḥ śyeno 'yopāṣṭir hanti dasyūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:19853: RV_10,099.09a sa vrādhataḥ śavasānebhir asya kutsāya śuṣṇaṃ kṛpaṇe parādāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:19854: RV_10,099.09c ayaṃ kavim anayac chasyamānam atkaṃ yo asya sanitota nṛṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19855: RV_10,099.10a ayaṃ daśasyan naryebhir asya dasmo devebhir varuṇo na māyī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19856: RV_10,099.10c ayaṃ kanīna ṛtupā avedy amimītāraruṃ yaś catuṣpāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19857: RV_10,099.11a asya stomebhir auśija ṛjiśvā vrajaṃ darayad vṛṣabheṇa piproḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19858: RV_10,099.11c sutvā yad yajato dīdayad gīḥ pura iyāno abhi varpasā bhūt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19859: RV_10,099.12a evā maho asura vakṣathāya vamrakaḥ paḍbhir upa sarpad indram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19860: RV_10,099.12c sa iyānaḥ karati svastim asmā iṣam ūrjaṃ sukṣitiṃ viśvam ābhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19861: RV_10,100.01a indra dṛhya maghavan tvāvad id bhuja iha stutaḥ sutapā bodhi no vṛdhe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19862: RV_10,100.01c devebhir naḥ savitā prāvatu śrutam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19863: RV_10,100.02a bharāya su bharata bhāgam ṛtviyam pra vāyave śucipe krandadiṣṭaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19864: RV_10,100.02c gaurasya yaḥ payasaḥ pītim ānaśa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19865: RV_10,100.03a ā no devaḥ savitā sāviṣad vaya ṛjūyate yajamānāya sunvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:19866: RV_10,100.03c yathā devān pratibhūṣema pākavad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19867: RV_10,100.04a indro asme sumanā astu viśvahā rājā somaḥ suvitasyādhy etu naḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19868: RV_10,100.04c yathā-yathā mitradhitāni saṃdadhur ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19869: RV_10,100.05a indra ukthena śavasā parur dadhe bṛhaspate pratarītāsy āyuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19870: RV_10,100.05c yajño manuḥ pramatir naḥ pitā hi kam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19871: RV_10,100.06a indrasya nu sukṛtaṃ daivyaṃ saho 'gnir gṛhe jaritā medhiraḥ kaviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19872: RV_10,100.06c yajñaś ca bhūd vidathe cārur antama ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19873: RV_10,100.07a na vo guhā cakṛma bhūri duṣkṛtaṃ nāviṣṭyaṃ vasavo devaheḷanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19874: RV_10,100.07c mākir no devā anṛtasya varpasa ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19875: RV_10,100.08a apāmīvāṃ savitā sāviṣan nyag varīya id apa sedhantv adrayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19876: RV_10,100.08c grāvā yatra madhuṣud ucyate bṛhad ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19877: RV_10,100.09a ūrdhvo grāvā vasavo 'stu sotari viśvā dveṣāṃsi sanutar yuyota /
GV01rvh1-10u:19878: RV_10,100.09c sa no devaḥ savitā pāyur īḍya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19879: RV_10,100.10a ūrjaṃ gāvo yavase pīvo attana ṛtasya yāḥ sadane kośe aṅgdhve /
GV01rvh1-10u:19880: RV_10,100.10c tanūr eva tanvo astu bheṣajam ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19881: RV_10,100.11a kratuprāvā jaritā śaśvatām ava indra id bhadrā pramatiḥ sutāvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19882: RV_10,100.11c pūrṇam ūdhar divyaṃ yasya siktaya ā sarvatātim aditiṃ vṛṇīmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:19883: RV_10,100.12a citras te bhānuḥ kratuprā abhiṣṭiḥ santi spṛdho jaraṇiprā adhṛṣṭāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19884: RV_10,100.12c rajiṣṭhayā rajyā paśva ā gos tūtūrṣati pary agraṃ duvasyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19885: RV_10,101.01a ud budhyadhvaṃ samanasaḥ sakhāyaḥ sam agnim indhvam bahavaḥ sanīḷāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19886: RV_10,101.01c dadhikrām agnim uṣasaṃ ca devīm indrāvato 'vase ni hvaye vaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19887: RV_10,101.02a mandrā kṛṇudhvaṃ dhiya ā tanudhvaṃ nāvam aritraparaṇīṃ kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19888: RV_10,101.02c iṣkṛṇudhvam āyudhāraṃ kṛṇudhvam prāñcaṃ yajñam pra ṇayatā sakhāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19889: RV_10,101.03a yunakta sīrā vi yugā tanudhvaṃ kṛte yonau vapateha bījam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19890: RV_10,101.03c girā ca śruṣṭiḥ sabharā asan no nedīya it sṛṇyaḥ pakvam eyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19891: RV_10,101.04a sīrā yuñjanti kavayo yugā vi tanvate pṛthak /
GV01rvh1-10u:19893: RV_10,101.05a nir āhāvān kṛṇotana saṃ varatrā dadhātana /
GV01rvh1-10u:19894: RV_10,101.05c siñcāmahā avatam udriṇaṃ vayaṃ suṣekam anupakṣitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19897: RV_10,101.07a prīṇītāśvān hitaṃ jayātha svastivāhaṃ ratham it kṛṇudhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19898: RV_10,101.07c droṇāhāvam avatam aśmacakram aṃsatrakośaṃ siñcatā nṛpāṇam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19899: RV_10,101.08a vrajaṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ sa hi vo nṛpāṇo varma sīvyadhvam bahulā pṛthūni /
GV01rvh1-10u:19900: RV_10,101.08c puraḥ kṛṇudhvam āyasīr adhṛṣṭā mā vaḥ susroc camaso dṛṃhatā tam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19901: RV_10,101.09a ā vo dhiyaṃ yajñiyāṃ varta ūtaye devā devīṃ yajatāṃ yajñiyām iha /
GV01rvh1-10u:19902: RV_10,101.09c sā no duhīyad yavaseva gatvī sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19903: RV_10,101.10a ā tū ṣiñca harim īṃ dror upasthe vāśībhis takṣatāśmanmayībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19904: RV_10,101.10c pari ṣvajadhvaṃ daśa kakṣyābhir ubhe dhurau prati vahniṃ yunakta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19905: RV_10,101.11a ubhe dhurau vahnir āpibdamāno 'ntar yoneva carati dvijāniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19906: RV_10,101.11c vanaspatiṃ vana āsthāpayadhvaṃ ni ṣū dadhidhvam akhananta utsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19907: RV_10,101.12a kapṛn naraḥ kapṛtham ud dadhātana codayata khudata vājasātaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:19908: RV_10,101.12c niṣṭigryaḥ putram ā cyāvayotaya indraṃ sabādha iha somapītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:19909: RV_10,102.01a pra te ratham mithūkṛtam indro 'vatu dhṛṣṇuyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19910: RV_10,102.01c asminn ājau puruhūta śravāyye dhanabhakṣeṣu no 'va //
GV01rvh1-10u:19911: RV_10,102.02a ut sma vāto vahati vāso 'syā adhirathaṃ yad ajayat sahasram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19912: RV_10,102.02c rathīr abhūn mudgalānī gaviṣṭau bhare kṛtaṃ vy aced indrasenā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19913: RV_10,102.03a antar yaccha jighāṃsato vajram indrābhidāsataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19914: RV_10,102.03c dāsasya vā maghavann āryasya vā sanutar yavayā vadham //
GV01rvh1-10u:19915: RV_10,102.04a udno hradam apibaj jarhṛṣāṇaḥ kūṭaṃ sma tṛṃhad abhimātim eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19916: RV_10,102.04c pra muṣkabhāraḥ śrava icchamāno 'jiram bāhū abharat siṣāsan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19917: RV_10,102.05a ny akrandayann upayanta enam amehayan vṛṣabham madhya ājeḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19918: RV_10,102.05c tena sūbharvaṃ śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pradhane jigāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19919: RV_10,102.06a kakardave vṛṣabho yukta āsīd avāvacīt sārathir asya keśī /
GV01rvh1-10u:19920: RV_10,102.06c dudher yuktasya dravataḥ sahānasa ṛcchanti ṣmā niṣpado mudgalānīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:19921: RV_10,102.07a uta pradhim ud ahann asya vidvān upāyunag vaṃsagam atra śikṣan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19922: RV_10,102.07c indra ud āvat patim aghnyānām araṃhata padyābhiḥ kakudmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:19923: RV_10,102.08a śunam aṣṭrāvy acarat kapardī varatrāyāṃ dārv ānahyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19924: RV_10,102.08c nṛmṇāni kṛṇvan bahave janāya gāḥ paspaśānas taviṣīr adhatta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19925: RV_10,102.09a imaṃ tam paśya vṛṣabhasya yuñjaṃ kāṣṭhāyā madhye drughaṇaṃ śayānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19926: RV_10,102.09c yena jigāya śatavat sahasraṃ gavām mudgalaḥ pṛtanājyeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19927: RV_10,102.10a āre aghā ko nv itthā dadarśa yaṃ yuñjanti tam v ā sthāpayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:19928: RV_10,102.10c nāsmai tṛṇaṃ nodakam ā bharanty uttaro dhuro vahati pradediśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:19929: RV_10,102.11a parivṛkteva patividyam ānaṭ pīpyānā kūcakreṇeva siñcan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19930: RV_10,102.11c eṣaiṣyā cid rathyā jayema sumaṅgalaṃ sinavad astu sātam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19931: RV_10,102.12a tvaṃ viśvasya jagataś cakṣur indrāsi cakṣuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19932: RV_10,102.12c vṛṣā yad ājiṃ vṛṣaṇā siṣāsasi codayan vadhriṇā yujā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19933: RV_10,103.01a āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:19934: RV_10,103.01c saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śataṃ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19935: RV_10,103.02a saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19936: RV_10,103.02c tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19937: RV_10,103.03a sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī saṃsraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena /
GV01rvh1-10u:19938: RV_10,103.03c saṃsṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā //
GV01rvh1-10u:19939: RV_10,103.04a bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrāṃ apabādhamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19940: RV_10,103.04c prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayann asmākam edhy avitā rathānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19941: RV_10,103.05a balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19942: RV_10,103.05c abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govit //
GV01rvh1-10u:19943: RV_10,103.06a gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19944: RV_10,103.06c imaṃ sajātā anu vīrayadhvam indraṃ sakhāyo anu saṃ rabhadhvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:19945: RV_10,103.07a abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19946: RV_10,103.07c duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḷ ayudhyo 'smākaṃ senā avatu pra yutsu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19947: RV_10,103.08a indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19948: RV_10,103.08c devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnām maruto yantv agram //
GV01rvh1-10u:19949: RV_10,103.09a indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānām marutāṃ śardha ugram /
GV01rvh1-10u:19950: RV_10,103.09c mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:19951: RV_10,103.10a ud dharṣaya maghavann āyudhāny ut satvanām māmakānām manāṃsi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19952: RV_10,103.10c ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājināny ud rathānāṃ jayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19953: RV_10,103.11a asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19954: RV_10,103.11c asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmāṃ u devā avatā haveṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:19955: RV_10,103.12a amīṣāṃ cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi /
GV01rvh1-10u:19956: RV_10,103.12c abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19957: RV_10,103.13a pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:19958: RV_10,103.13c ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:19959: RV_10,104.01a asāvi somaḥ puruhūta tubhyaṃ haribhyāṃ yajñam upa yāhi tūyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19960: RV_10,104.01c tubhyaṃ giro vipravīrā iyānā dadhanvira indra pibā sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:19961: RV_10,104.02a apsu dhūtasya harivaḥ pibeha nṛbhiḥ sutasya jaṭharam pṛṇasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:19962: RV_10,104.02c mimikṣur yam adraya indra tubhyaṃ tebhir vardhasva madam ukthavāhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19963: RV_10,104.03a progrām pītiṃ vṛṣṇa iyarmi satyām prayai sutasya haryaśva tubhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:19964: RV_10,104.03c indra dhenābhir iha mādayasva dhībhir viśvābhiḥ śacyā gṛṇānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19965: RV_10,104.04a ūtī śacīvas tava vīryeṇa vayo dadhānā uśija ṛtajñāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19966: RV_10,104.04c prajāvad indra manuṣo duroṇe tasthur gṛṇantaḥ sadhamādyāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19967: RV_10,104.05a praṇītibhiṣ ṭe haryaśva suṣṭoḥ suṣumnasya pururuco janāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19968: RV_10,104.05c maṃhiṣṭhām ūtiṃ vitire dadhānā stotāra indra tava sūnṛtābhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19969: RV_10,104.06a upa brahmāṇi harivo haribhyāṃ somasya yāhi pītaye sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:19970: RV_10,104.06c indra tvā yajñaḥ kṣamamāṇam ānaḍ dāśvāṃ asy adhvarasya praketaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19971: RV_10,104.07a sahasravājam abhimātiṣāhaṃ suteraṇam maghavānaṃ suvṛktim /
GV01rvh1-10u:19972: RV_10,104.07c upa bhūṣanti giro apratītam indraṃ namasyā jarituḥ pananta //
GV01rvh1-10u:19973: RV_10,104.08a saptāpo devīḥ suraṇā amṛktā yābhiḥ sindhum atara indra pūrbhit /
GV01rvh1-10u:19974: RV_10,104.08c navatiṃ srotyā nava ca sravantīr devebhyo gātum manuṣe ca vindaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19975: RV_10,104.09a apo mahīr abhiśaster amuñco 'jāgar āsv adhi deva ekaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19976: RV_10,104.09c indra yās tvaṃ vṛtratūrye cakartha tābhir viśvāyus tanvam pupuṣyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19977: RV_10,104.10a vīreṇyaḥ kratur indraḥ suśastir utāpi dhenā puruhūtam īṭṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:19978: RV_10,104.10c ārdayad vṛtram akṛṇod u lokaṃ sasāhe śakraḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:19979: RV_10,104.11a śunaṃ huvema maghavānam indram asmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau /
GV01rvh1-10u:19980: RV_10,104.11c śṛṇvantam ugram ūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:19981: RV_10,105.01a kadā vaso stotraṃ haryata āva śmaśā rudhad vāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19983: RV_10,105.02a harī yasya suyujā vivratā ver arvantānu śepā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19984: RV_10,105.02c ubhā rajī na keśinā patir dan //
GV01rvh1-10u:19985: RV_10,105.03a apa yor indraḥ pāpaja ā marto na śaśramāṇo bibhīvān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19987: RV_10,105.04a sacāyor indraś carkṛṣa āṃ upānasaḥ saparyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:19989: RV_10,105.05a adhi yas tasthau keśavantā vyacasvantā na puṣṭyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:19991: RV_10,105.06a prāstaud ṛṣvaujā ṛṣvebhis tatakṣa śūraḥ śavasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:19993: RV_10,105.07a vajraṃ yaś cakre suhanāya dasyave hirīmaśo hirīmān /
GV01rvh1-10u:19995: RV_10,105.08a ava no vṛjinā śiśīhy ṛcā vanemānṛcaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:19996: RV_10,105.08c nābrahmā yajña ṛdhag joṣati tve //
GV01rvh1-10u:19997: RV_10,105.09a ūrdhvā yat te tretinī bhūd yajñasya dhūrṣu sadman /
GV01rvh1-10u:19999: RV_10,105.10a śriye te pṛśnir upasecanī bhūc chriye darvir arepāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20000: RV_10,105.10c yayā sve pātre siñcasa ut //
GV01rvh1-10u:20001: RV_10,105.11a śataṃ vā yad asurya prati tvā sumitra itthāstaud durmitra itthāstaut /
GV01rvh1-10u:20002: RV_10,105.11c āvo yad dasyuhatye kutsaputram prāvo yad dasyuhatye kutsavatsam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20003: RV_10,106.01a ubhā u nūnaṃ tad id arthayethe vi tanvāthe dhiyo vastrāpaseva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20004: RV_10,106.01c sadhrīcīnā yātave prem ajīgaḥ sudineva pṛkṣa ā taṃsayethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20005: RV_10,106.02a uṣṭāreva pharvareṣu śrayethe prāyogeva śvātryā śāsur ethaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20006: RV_10,106.02c dūteva hi ṣṭho yaśasā janeṣu māpa sthātam mahiṣevāvapānāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20007: RV_10,106.03a sākaṃyujā śakunasyeva pakṣā paśveva citrā yajur ā gamiṣṭam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20008: RV_10,106.03c agnir iva devayor dīdivāṃsā parijmāneva yajathaḥ purutrā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20009: RV_10,106.04a āpī vo asme pitareva putrogreva rucā nṛpatīva turyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:20010: RV_10,106.04c iryeva puṣṭyai kiraṇeva bhujyai śruṣṭīvāneva havam ā gamiṣṭam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20011: RV_10,106.05a vaṃsageva pūṣaryā śimbātā mitreva ṛtā śatarā śātapantā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20012: RV_10,106.05c vājevoccā vayasā gharmyeṣṭhā meṣeveṣā saparyā purīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20013: RV_10,106.06a sṛṇyeva jarbharī turpharītū naitośeva turpharī parpharīkā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20014: RV_10,106.06c udanyajeva jemanā maderū tā me jarāyv ajaram marāyu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20015: RV_10,106.07a pajreva carcaraṃ jāram marāyu kṣadmevārtheṣu tartarītha ugrā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20016: RV_10,106.07c ṛbhū nāpat kharamajrā kharajrur vāyur na parpharat kṣayad rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20017: RV_10,106.08a gharmeva madhu jaṭhare sanerū bhagevitā turpharī phārivāram /
GV01rvh1-10u:20018: RV_10,106.08c patareva cacarā candranirṇiṅ manaṛṅgā mananyā na jagmī //
GV01rvh1-10u:20019: RV_10,106.09a bṛhanteva gambhareṣu pratiṣṭhām pādeva gādhaṃ tarate vidāthaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20020: RV_10,106.09c karṇeva śāsur anu hi smarātho 'ṃśeva no bhajataṃ citram apnaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20021: RV_10,106.10a āraṅgareva madhv erayethe sāragheva gavi nīcīnabāre /
GV01rvh1-10u:20022: RV_10,106.10c kīnāreva svedam āsiṣvidānā kṣāmevorjā sūyavasāt sacethe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20023: RV_10,106.11a ṛdhyāma stomaṃ sanuyāma vājam ā no mantraṃ sarathehopa yātam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20024: RV_10,106.11c yaśo na pakvam madhu goṣv antar ā bhūtāṃśo aśvinoḥ kāmam aprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20025: RV_10,107.01a āvir abhūn mahi māghonam eṣāṃ viśvaṃ jīvaṃ tamaso nir amoci /
GV01rvh1-10u:20026: RV_10,107.01c mahi jyotiḥ pitṛbhir dattam āgād uruḥ panthā dakṣiṇāyā adarśi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20027: RV_10,107.02a uccā divi dakṣiṇāvanto asthur ye aśvadāḥ saha te sūryeṇa /
GV01rvh1-10u:20028: RV_10,107.02c hiraṇyadā amṛtatvam bhajante vāsodāḥ soma pra tiranta āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20029: RV_10,107.03a daivī pūrtir dakṣiṇā devayajyā na kavāribhyo nahi te pṛṇanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20030: RV_10,107.03c athā naraḥ prayatadakṣiṇāso 'vadyabhiyā bahavaḥ pṛṇanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20031: RV_10,107.04a śatadhāraṃ vāyum arkaṃ svarvidaṃ nṛcakṣasas te abhi cakṣate haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20032: RV_10,107.04c ye pṛṇanti pra ca yacchanti saṃgame te dakṣiṇāṃ duhate saptamātaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20033: RV_10,107.05a dakṣiṇāvān prathamo hūta eti dakṣiṇāvān grāmaṇīr agram eti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20034: RV_10,107.05c tam eva manye nṛpatiṃ janānāṃ yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇām āvivāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20035: RV_10,107.06a tam eva ṛṣiṃ tam u brahmāṇam āhur yajñanyaṃ sāmagām ukthaśāsam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20036: RV_10,107.06c sa śukrasya tanvo veda tisro yaḥ prathamo dakṣiṇayā rarādha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20037: RV_10,107.07a dakṣiṇāśvaṃ dakṣiṇā gāṃ dadāti dakṣiṇā candram uta yad dhiraṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20038: RV_10,107.07c dakṣiṇānnaṃ vanute yo na ātmā dakṣiṇāṃ varma kṛṇute vijānan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20039: RV_10,107.08a na bhojā mamrur na nyartham īyur na riṣyanti na vyathante ha bhojāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20040: RV_10,107.08c idaṃ yad viśvam bhuvanaṃ svaś caitat sarvaṃ dakṣiṇaibhyo dadāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20041: RV_10,107.09a bhojā jigyuḥ surabhiṃ yonim agre bhojā jigyur vadhvaṃ yā suvāsāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20042: RV_10,107.09c bhojā jigyur antaḥpeyaṃ surāyā bhojā jigyur ye ahūtāḥ prayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20043: RV_10,107.10a bhojāyāśvaṃ sam mṛjanty āśum bhojāyāste kanyā śumbhamānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20044: RV_10,107.10c bhojasyedam puṣkariṇīva veśma pariṣkṛtaṃ devamāneva citram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20045: RV_10,107.11a bhojam aśvāḥ suṣṭhuvāho vahanti suvṛd ratho vartate dakṣiṇāyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20046: RV_10,107.11c bhojaṃ devāso 'vatā bhareṣu bhojaḥ śatrūn samanīkeṣu jetā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20047: RV_10,108.01a kim icchantī saramā predam ānaḍ dūre hy adhvā jaguriḥ parācaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20048: RV_10,108.01c kāsmehitiḥ kā paritakmyāsīt kathaṃ rasāyā ataraḥ payāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20049: RV_10,108.02a indrasya dūtīr iṣitā carāmi maha icchantī paṇayo nidhīn vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20050: RV_10,108.02c atiṣkado bhiyasā tan na āvat tathā rasāyā ataram payāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20051: RV_10,108.03a kīdṛṅṅ indraḥ sarame kā dṛśīkā yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaraḥ parākāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20052: RV_10,108.03c ā ca gacchān mitram enā dadhāmāthā gavāṃ gopatir no bhavāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20053: RV_10,108.04a nāhaṃ taṃ veda dabhyaṃ dabhat sa yasyedaṃ dūtīr asaram parākāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20054: RV_10,108.04c na taṃ gūhanti sravato gabhīrā hatā indreṇa paṇayaḥ śayadhve //
GV01rvh1-10u:20055: RV_10,108.05a imā gāvaḥ sarame yā aicchaḥ pari divo antān subhage patantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20056: RV_10,108.05c kas ta enā ava sṛjād ayudhvy utāsmākam āyudhā santi tigmā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20057: RV_10,108.06a asenyā vaḥ paṇayo vacāṃsy aniṣavyās tanvaḥ santu pāpīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20058: RV_10,108.06c adhṛṣṭo va etavā astu panthā bṛhaspatir va ubhayā na mṛḷāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20059: RV_10,108.07a ayaṃ nidhiḥ sarame adribudhno gobhir aśvebhir vasubhir nyṛṣṭaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20060: RV_10,108.07c rakṣanti tam paṇayo ye sugopā reku padam alakam ā jagantha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20061: RV_10,108.08a eha gamann ṛṣayaḥ somaśitā ayāsyo aṅgiraso navagvāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20062: RV_10,108.08c ta etam ūrvaṃ vi bhajanta gonām athaitad vacaḥ paṇayo vamann it //
GV01rvh1-10u:20063: RV_10,108.09a evā ca tvaṃ sarama ājagantha prabādhitā sahasā daivyena /
GV01rvh1-10u:20064: RV_10,108.09c svasāraṃ tvā kṛṇavai mā punar gā apa te gavāṃ subhage bhajāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20065: RV_10,108.10a nāhaṃ veda bhrātṛtvaṃ no svasṛtvam indro vidur aṅgirasaś ca ghorāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20066: RV_10,108.10c gokāmā me acchadayan yad āyam apāta ita paṇayo varīyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20067: RV_10,108.11a dūram ita paṇayo varīya ud gāvo yantu minatīr ṛtena /
GV01rvh1-10u:20068: RV_10,108.11c bṛhaspatir yā avindan nigūḷhāḥ somo grāvāṇa ṛṣayaś ca viprāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20069: RV_10,109.01a te 'vadan prathamā brahmakilbiṣe 'kūpāraḥ salilo mātariśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20070: RV_10,109.01c vīḷuharās tapa ugro mayobhūr āpo devīḥ prathamajā ṛtena //
GV01rvh1-10u:20071: RV_10,109.02a somo rājā prathamo brahmajāyām punaḥ prāyacchad ahṛṇīyamānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20072: RV_10,109.02c anvartitā varuṇo mitra āsīd agnir hotā hastagṛhyā nināya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20073: RV_10,109.03a hastenaiva grāhya ādhir asyā brahmajāyeyam iti ced avocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20074: RV_10,109.03c na dūtāya prahye tastha eṣā tathā rāṣṭraṃ gupitaṃ kṣatriyasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20075: RV_10,109.04a devā etasyām avadanta pūrve saptaṛṣayas tapase ye niṣeduḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20076: RV_10,109.04c bhīmā jāyā brāhmaṇasyopanītā durdhāṃ dadhāti parame vyoman //
GV01rvh1-10u:20077: RV_10,109.05a brahmacārī carati veviṣad viṣaḥ sa devānām bhavaty ekam aṅgam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20078: RV_10,109.05c tena jāyām anv avindad bṛhaspatiḥ somena nītāṃ juhvaṃ na devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20079: RV_10,109.06a punar vai devā adaduḥ punar manuṣyā uta /
GV01rvh1-10u:20080: RV_10,109.06c rājānaḥ satyaṃ kṛṇvānā brahmajāyām punar daduḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20081: RV_10,109.07a punardāya brahmajāyāṃ kṛtvī devair nikilbiṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20083: RV_10,110.01a samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20084: RV_10,110.01c ā ca vaha mitramahaś cikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavir asi pracetāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20085: RV_10,110.02a tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadayā sujihva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20086: RV_10,110.02c manmāni dhībhir uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhy adhvaraṃ naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20087: RV_10,110.03a ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaś cā yāhy agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20088: RV_10,110.03c tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20089: RV_10,110.04a prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastor asyā vṛjyate agre ahnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20090: RV_10,110.04c vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditaye syonam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20091: RV_10,110.05a vyacasvatīr urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyo na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20092: RV_10,110.05c devīr dvāro bṛhatīr viśvaminvā devebhyo bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20093: RV_10,110.06a ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /
GV01rvh1-10u:20094: RV_10,110.06c divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyaṃ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne //
GV01rvh1-10u:20095: RV_10,110.07a daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñam manuṣo yajadhyai /
GV01rvh1-10u:20096: RV_10,110.07c pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20097: RV_10,110.08a ā no yajñam bhāratī tūyam etv iḷā manuṣvad iha cetayantī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20098: RV_10,110.08c tisro devīr barhir edaṃ syonaṃ sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20099: RV_10,110.09a ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpair apiṃśad bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20100: RV_10,110.09c tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20101: RV_10,110.10a upāvasṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pātha ṛtuthā havīṃṣi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20102: RV_10,110.10c vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena //
GV01rvh1-10u:20103: RV_10,110.11a sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20104: RV_10,110.11c asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtaṃ havir adantu devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20105: RV_10,111.01a manīṣiṇaḥ pra bharadhvam manīṣāṃ yathā-yathā matayaḥ santi nṛṇām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20106: RV_10,111.01c indraṃ satyair erayāmā kṛtebhiḥ sa hi vīro girvaṇasyur vidānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20107: RV_10,111.02a ṛtasya hi sadaso dhītir adyaut saṃ gārṣṭeyo vṛṣabho gobhir ānaṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20108: RV_10,111.02c ud atiṣṭhat taviṣeṇā raveṇa mahānti cit saṃ vivyācā rajāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20109: RV_10,111.03a indraḥ kila śrutyā asya veda sa hi jiṣṇuḥ pathikṛt sūryāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20110: RV_10,111.03c ān menāṃ kṛṇvann acyuto bhuvad goḥ patir divaḥ sanajā apratītaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20111: RV_10,111.04a indro mahnā mahato arṇavasya vratāminād aṅgirobhir gṛṇānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20112: RV_10,111.04c purūṇi cin ni tatānā rajāṃsi dādhāra yo dharuṇaṃ satyatātā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20113: RV_10,111.05a indro divaḥ pratimānam pṛthivyā viśvā veda savanā hanti śuṣṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20114: RV_10,111.05c mahīṃ cid dyām ātanot sūryeṇa cāskambha cit kambhanena skabhīyān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20115: RV_10,111.06a vajreṇa hi vṛtrahā vṛtram astar adevasya śūśuvānasya māyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20116: RV_10,111.06c vi dhṛṣṇo atra dhṛṣatā jaghanthāthābhavo maghavan bāhvojāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20117: RV_10,111.07a sacanta yad uṣasaḥ sūryeṇa citrām asya ketavo rām avindan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20118: RV_10,111.07c ā yan nakṣatraṃ dadṛśe divo na punar yato nakir addhā nu veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:20119: RV_10,111.08a dūraṃ kila prathamā jagmur āsām indrasya yāḥ prasave sasrur āpaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20120: RV_10,111.08c kva svid agraṃ kva budhna āsām āpo madhyaṃ kva vo nūnam antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20121: RV_10,111.09a sṛjaḥ sindhūṃr ahinā jagrasānāṃ ād id etāḥ pra vivijre javena /
GV01rvh1-10u:20122: RV_10,111.09c mumukṣamāṇā uta yā mumucre 'dhed etā na ramante nitiktāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20123: RV_10,111.10a sadhrīcīḥ sindhum uśatīr ivāyan sanāj jāra āritaḥ pūrbhid āsām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20124: RV_10,111.10c astam ā te pārthivā vasūny asme jagmuḥ sūnṛtā indra pūrvīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20125: RV_10,112.01a indra piba pratikāmaṃ sutasya prātaḥsāvas tava hi pūrvapītiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20126: RV_10,112.01c harṣasva hantave śūra śatrūn ukthebhiṣ ṭe vīryā pra bravāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20127: RV_10,112.02a yas te ratho manaso javīyān endra tena somapeyāya yāhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20128: RV_10,112.02c tūyam ā te harayaḥ pra dravantu yebhir yāsi vṛṣabhir mandamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20129: RV_10,112.03a haritvatā varcasā sūryasya śreṣṭhai rūpais tanvaṃ sparśayasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20130: RV_10,112.03c asmābhir indra sakhibhir huvānaḥ sadhrīcīno mādayasvā niṣadya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20131: RV_10,112.04a yasya tyat te mahimānam madeṣv ime mahī rodasī nāviviktām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20132: RV_10,112.04c tad oka ā haribhir indra yuktaiḥ priyebhir yāhi priyam annam accha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20133: RV_10,112.05a yasya śaśvat papivāṃ indra śatrūn anānukṛtyā raṇyā cakartha /
GV01rvh1-10u:20134: RV_10,112.05c sa te purandhiṃ taviṣīm iyarti sa te madāya suta indra somaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20135: RV_10,112.06a idaṃ te pātraṃ sanavittam indra pibā somam enā śatakrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:20136: RV_10,112.06c pūrṇa āhāvo madirasya madhvo yaṃ viśva id abhiharyanti devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20137: RV_10,112.07a vi hi tvām indra purudhā janāso hitaprayaso vṛṣabha hvayante /
GV01rvh1-10u:20138: RV_10,112.07c asmākaṃ te madhumattamānīmā bhuvan savanā teṣu harya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20139: RV_10,112.08a pra ta indra pūrvyāṇi pra nūnaṃ vīryā vocam prathamā kṛtāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:20140: RV_10,112.08c satīnamanyur aśrathāyo adriṃ suvedanām akṛṇor brahmaṇe gām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20141: RV_10,112.09a ni ṣu sīda gaṇapate gaṇeṣu tvām āhur vipratamaṃ kavīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20142: RV_10,112.09c na ṛte tvat kriyate kiṃ canāre mahām arkam maghavañ citram arca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20143: RV_10,112.10a abhikhyā no maghavan nādhamānān sakhe bodhi vasupate sakhīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20144: RV_10,112.10c raṇaṃ kṛdhi raṇakṛt satyaśuṣmābhakte cid ā bhajā rāye asmān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20145: RV_10,113.01a tam asya dyāvāpṛthivī sacetasā viśvebhir devair anu śuṣmam āvatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20146: RV_10,113.01c yad ait kṛṇvāno mahimānam indriyam pītvī somasya kratumāṃ avardhata //
GV01rvh1-10u:20147: RV_10,113.02a tam asya viṣṇur mahimānam ojasāṃśuṃ dadhanvān madhuno vi rapśate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20148: RV_10,113.02c devebhir indro maghavā sayāvabhir vṛtraṃ jaghanvāṃ abhavad vareṇyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20149: RV_10,113.03a vṛtreṇa yad ahinā bibhrad āyudhā samasthithā yudhaye śaṃsam āvide /
GV01rvh1-10u:20150: RV_10,113.03c viśve te atra marutaḥ saha tmanāvardhann ugra mahimānam indriyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20151: RV_10,113.04a jajñāna eva vy abādhata spṛdhaḥ prāpaśyad vīro abhi pauṃsyaṃ raṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20152: RV_10,113.04c avṛścad adrim ava sasyadaḥ sṛjad astabhnān nākaṃ svapasyayā pṛthum //
GV01rvh1-10u:20153: RV_10,113.05a ād indraḥ satrā taviṣīr apatyata varīyo dyāvāpṛthivī abādhata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20154: RV_10,113.05c avābharad dhṛṣito vajram āyasaṃ śevam mitrāya varuṇāya dāśuṣe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20155: RV_10,113.06a indrasyātra taviṣībhyo virapśina ṛghāyato araṃhayanta manyave /
GV01rvh1-10u:20156: RV_10,113.06c vṛtraṃ yad ugro vy avṛścad ojasāpo bibhrataṃ tamasā parīvṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20157: RV_10,113.07a yā vīryāṇi prathamāni kartvā mahitvebhir yatamānau samīyatuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20158: RV_10,113.07c dhvāntaṃ tamo 'va dadhvase hata indro mahnā pūrvahūtāv apatyata //
GV01rvh1-10u:20159: RV_10,113.08a viśve devāso adha vṛṣṇyāni te 'vardhayan somavatyā vacasyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20160: RV_10,113.08c raddhaṃ vṛtram ahim indrasya hanmanāgnir na jambhais tṛṣv annam āvayat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20161: RV_10,113.09a bhūri dakṣebhir vacanebhir ṛkvabhiḥ sakhyebhiḥ sakhyāni pra vocata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20162: RV_10,113.09c indro dhuniṃ ca cumuriṃ ca dambhayañ chraddhāmanasyā śṛṇute dabhītaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:20163: RV_10,113.10a tvam purūṇy ā bharā svaśvyā yebhir maṃsai nivacanāni śaṃsan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20164: RV_10,113.10c sugebhir viśvā duritā tarema vido ṣu ṇa urviyā gādham adya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20165: RV_10,114.01a gharmā samantā trivṛtaṃ vy āpatus tayor juṣṭim mātariśvā jagāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:20166: RV_10,114.01c divas payo didhiṣāṇā aveṣan vidur devāḥ sahasāmānam arkam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20167: RV_10,114.02a tisro deṣṭrāya nirṛtīr upāsate dīrghaśruto vi hi jānanti vahnayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20168: RV_10,114.02c tāsāṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo nidānam pareṣu yā guhyeṣu vrateṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20169: RV_10,114.03a catuṣkapardā yuvatiḥ supeśā ghṛtapratīkā vayunāni vaste /
GV01rvh1-10u:20170: RV_10,114.03c tasyāṃ suparṇā vṛṣaṇā ni ṣedatur yatra devā dadhire bhāgadheyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20171: RV_10,114.04a ekaḥ suparṇaḥ sa samudram ā viveśa sa idaṃ viśvam bhuvanaṃ vi caṣṭe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20172: RV_10,114.04c tam pākena manasāpaśyam antitas tam mātā reḷhi sa u reḷhi mātaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20173: RV_10,114.05a suparṇaṃ viprāḥ kavayo vacobhir ekaṃ santam bahudhā kalpayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20174: RV_10,114.05c chandāṃsi ca dadhato adhvareṣu grahān somasya mimate dvādaśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:20175: RV_10,114.06a ṣaṭtriṃśāṃś ca caturaḥ kalpayantaś chandāṃsi ca dadhata ādvādaśam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20176: RV_10,114.06c yajñaṃ vimāya kavayo manīṣa ṛksāmābhyām pra rathaṃ vartayanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20177: RV_10,114.07a caturdaśānye mahimāno asya taṃ dhīrā vācā pra ṇayanti sapta /
GV01rvh1-10u:20178: RV_10,114.07c āpnānaṃ tīrthaṃ ka iha pra vocad yena pathā prapibante sutasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20179: RV_10,114.08a sahasradhā pañcadaśāny ukthā yāvad dyāvāpṛthivī tāvad it tat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20180: RV_10,114.08c sahasradhā mahimānaḥ sahasraṃ yāvad brahma viṣṭhitaṃ tāvatī vāk //
GV01rvh1-10u:20181: RV_10,114.09a kaś chandasāṃ yogam ā veda dhīraḥ ko dhiṣṇyām prati vācam papāda /
GV01rvh1-10u:20182: RV_10,114.09c kam ṛtvijām aṣṭamaṃ śūram āhur harī indrasya ni cikāya kaḥ svit //
GV01rvh1-10u:20183: RV_10,114.10a bhūmyā antam pary eke caranti rathasya dhūrṣu yuktāso asthuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20184: RV_10,114.10c śramasya dāyaṃ vi bhajanty ebhyo yadā yamo bhavati harmye hitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20185: RV_10,115.01a citra ic chiśos taruṇasya vakṣatho na yo mātarāv apyeti dhātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:20186: RV_10,115.01c anūdhā yadi jījanad adhā ca nu vavakṣa sadyo mahi dūtyaṃ caran //
GV01rvh1-10u:20187: RV_10,115.02a agnir ha nāma dhāyi dann apastamaḥ saṃ yo vanā yuvate bhasmanā datā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20188: RV_10,115.02c abhipramurā juhvā svadhvara ino na prothamāno yavase vṛṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20189: RV_10,115.03a taṃ vo viṃ na druṣadaṃ devam andhasa indum prothantam pravapantam arṇavam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20190: RV_10,115.03c āsā vahniṃ na śociṣā virapśinam mahivrataṃ na sarajantam adhvanaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20191: RV_10,115.04a vi yasya te jrayasānasyājara dhakṣor na vātāḥ pari santy acyutāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20192: RV_10,115.04c ā raṇvāso yuyudhayo na satvanaṃ tritaṃ naśanta pra śiṣanta iṣṭaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:20193: RV_10,115.05a sa id agniḥ kaṇvatamaḥ kaṇvasakhāryaḥ parasyāntarasya taruṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20194: RV_10,115.05c agniḥ pātu gṛṇato agniḥ sūrīn agnir dadātu teṣām avo naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20195: RV_10,115.06a vājintamāya sahyase supitrya tṛṣu cyavāno anu jātavedase /
GV01rvh1-10u:20196: RV_10,115.06c anudre cid yo dhṛṣatā varaṃ sate mahintamāya dhanvaned aviṣyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20197: RV_10,115.07a evāgnir martaiḥ saha sūribhir vasu ṣṭave sahasaḥ sūnaro nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20198: RV_10,115.07c mitrāso na ye sudhitā ṛtāyavo dyāvo na dyumnair abhi santi mānuṣān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20199: RV_10,115.08a ūrjo napāt sahasāvann iti tvopastutasya vandate vṛṣā vāk /
GV01rvh1-10u:20200: RV_10,115.08c tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20201: RV_10,115.09a iti tvāgne vṛṣṭihavyasya putrā upastutāsa ṛṣayo 'vocan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20202: RV_10,115.09c tāṃś ca pāhi gṛṇataś ca sūrīn vaṣaḍ vaṣaḷ ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan namo nama ity ūrdhvāso anakṣan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20203: RV_10,116.01a pibā somam mahata indriyāya pibā vṛtrāya hantave śaviṣṭha /
GV01rvh1-10u:20204: RV_10,116.01c piba rāye śavase hūyamānaḥ piba madhvas tṛpad indrā vṛṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20205: RV_10,116.02a asya piba kṣumataḥ prasthitasyendra somasya varam ā sutasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20206: RV_10,116.02c svastidā manasā mādayasvārvācīno revate saubhagāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20207: RV_10,116.03a mamattu tvā divyaḥ soma indra mamattu yaḥ sūyate pārthiveṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20208: RV_10,116.03c mamattu yena varivaś cakartha mamattu yena niriṇāsi śatrūn //
GV01rvh1-10u:20209: RV_10,116.04a ā dvibarhā amino yātv indro vṛṣā haribhyām pariṣiktam andhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20210: RV_10,116.04c gavy ā sutasya prabhṛtasya madhvaḥ satrā khedām aruśahā vṛṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20211: RV_10,116.05a ni tigmāni bhrāśayan bhrāśyāny ava sthirā tanuhi yātujūnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20212: RV_10,116.05c ugrāya te saho balaṃ dadāmi pratītyā śatrūn vigadeṣu vṛśca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20213: RV_10,116.06a vy arya indra tanuhi śravāṃsy oja sthireva dhanvano 'bhimātīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20214: RV_10,116.06c asmadryag vāvṛdhānaḥ sahobhir anibhṛṣṭas tanvaṃ vāvṛdhasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20215: RV_10,116.07a idaṃ havir maghavan tubhyaṃ rātam prati samrāḷ ahṛṇāno gṛbhāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20216: RV_10,116.07c tubhyaṃ suto maghavan tubhyam pakvo 'ddhīndra piba ca prasthitasya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20217: RV_10,116.08a addhīd indra prasthitemā havīṃṣi cano dadhiṣva pacatota somam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20218: RV_10,116.08c prayasvantaḥ prati haryāmasi tvā satyāḥ santu yajamānasya kāmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20219: RV_10,116.09a prendrāgnibhyāṃ suvacasyām iyarmi sindhāv iva prerayaṃ nāvam arkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20220: RV_10,116.09c ayā iva pari caranti devā ye asmabhyaṃ dhanadā udbhidaś ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20221: RV_10,117.01a na vā u devāḥ kṣudham id vadhaṃ dadur utāśitam upa gacchanti mṛtyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20222: RV_10,117.01c uto rayiḥ pṛṇato nopa dasyaty utāpṛṇan marḍitāraṃ na vindate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20223: RV_10,117.02a ya ādhrāya cakamānāya pitvo 'nnavān san raphitāyopajagmuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20224: RV_10,117.02c sthiram manaḥ kṛṇute sevate puroto cit sa marḍitāraṃ na vindate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20225: RV_10,117.03a sa id bhojo yo gṛhave dadāty annakāmāya carate kṛśāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20226: RV_10,117.03c aram asmai bhavati yāmahūtā utāparīṣu kṛṇute sakhāyam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20227: RV_10,117.04a na sa sakhā yo na dadāti sakhye sacābhuve sacamānāya pitvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20228: RV_10,117.04c apāsmāt preyān na tad oko asti pṛṇantam anyam araṇaṃ cid icchet //
GV01rvh1-10u:20229: RV_10,117.05a pṛṇīyād in nādhamānāya tavyān drāghīyāṃsam anu paśyeta panthām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20230: RV_10,117.05c o hi vartante rathyeva cakrānyam-anyam upa tiṣṭhanta rāyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20231: RV_10,117.06a mogham annaṃ vindate apracetāḥ satyam bravīmi vadha it sa tasya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20232: RV_10,117.06c nāryamaṇam puṣyati no sakhāyaṃ kevalāgho bhavati kevalādī //
GV01rvh1-10u:20233: RV_10,117.07a kṛṣann it phāla āśitaṃ kṛṇoti yann adhvānam apa vṛṅkte caritraiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20234: RV_10,117.07c vadan brahmāvadato vanīyān pṛṇann āpir apṛṇantam abhi ṣyāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20235: RV_10,117.08a ekapād bhūyo dvipado vi cakrame dvipāt tripādam abhy eti paścāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20236: RV_10,117.08c catuṣpād eti dvipadām abhisvare sampaśyan paṅktīr upatiṣṭhamānaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20237: RV_10,117.09a samau cid dhastau na samaṃ viviṣṭaḥ sammātarā cin na samaṃ duhāte /
GV01rvh1-10u:20238: RV_10,117.09c yamayoś cin na samā vīryāṇi jñātī cit santau na samam pṛṇītaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20239: RV_10,118.01a agne haṃsi ny atriṇaṃ dīdyan martyeṣv ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20241: RV_10,118.02a ut tiṣṭhasi svāhuto ghṛtāni prati modase /
GV01rvh1-10u:20243: RV_10,118.03a sa āhuto vi rocate 'gnir īḷenyo girā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20245: RV_10,118.04a ghṛtenāgniḥ sam ajyate madhupratīka āhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20247: RV_10,118.05a jaramāṇaḥ sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana /
GV01rvh1-10u:20249: RV_10,118.06a tam martā amartyaṃ ghṛtenāgniṃ saparyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20251: RV_10,118.07a adābhyena śociṣāgne rakṣas tvaṃ daha /
GV01rvh1-10u:20253: RV_10,118.08a sa tvam agne pratīkena praty oṣa yātudhānyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20255: RV_10,118.09a taṃ tvā gīrbhir urukṣayā havyavāhaṃ sam īdhire /
GV01rvh1-10u:20257: RV_10,119.01a iti vā iti me mano gām aśvaṃ sanuyām iti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20259: RV_10,119.02a pra vātā iva dodhata un mā pītā ayaṃsata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20261: RV_10,119.03a un mā pītā ayaṃsata ratham aśvā ivāśavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20263: RV_10,119.04a upa mā matir asthita vāśrā putram iva priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20265: RV_10,119.05a ahaṃ taṣṭeva vandhuram pary acāmi hṛdā matim /
GV01rvh1-10u:20267: RV_10,119.06a nahi me akṣipac canācchāntsuḥ pañca kṛṣṭayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20269: RV_10,119.07a nahi me rodasī ubhe anyam pakṣaṃ cana prati /
GV01rvh1-10u:20271: RV_10,119.08a abhi dyām mahinā bhuvam abhīmām pṛthivīm mahīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:20273: RV_10,119.09a hantāham pṛthivīm imāṃ ni dadhānīha veha vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20275: RV_10,119.10a oṣam it pṛthivīm ahaṃ jaṅghanānīha veha vā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20277: RV_10,119.11a divi me anyaḥ pakṣo 'dho anyam acīkṛṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20281: RV_10,119.13a gṛho yāmy araṅkṛto devebhyo havyavāhanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20283: RV_10,120.01a tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20284: RV_10,120.01c sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20285: RV_10,120.02a vāvṛdhānaḥ śavasā bhūryojāḥ śatrur dāsāya bhiyasaṃ dadhāti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20286: RV_10,120.02c avyanac ca vyanac ca sasni saṃ te navanta prabhṛtā madeṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20287: RV_10,120.03a tve kratum api vṛñjanti viśve dvir yad ete trir bhavanty ūmāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20288: RV_10,120.03c svādoḥ svādīyaḥ svādunā sṛjā sam adaḥ su madhu madhunābhi yodhīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20289: RV_10,120.04a iti cid dhi tvā dhanā jayantam made-made anumadanti viprāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20290: RV_10,120.04c ojīyo dhṛṣṇo sthiram ā tanuṣva mā tvā dabhan yātudhānā durevāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20291: RV_10,120.05a tvayā vayaṃ śāśadmahe raṇeṣu prapaśyanto yudhenyāni bhūri /
GV01rvh1-10u:20292: RV_10,120.05c codayāmi ta āyudhā vacobhiḥ saṃ te śiśāmi brahmaṇā vayāṃsi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20293: RV_10,120.06a stuṣeyyam puruvarpasam ṛbhvam inatamam āptyam āptyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20294: RV_10,120.06c ā darṣate śavasā sapta dānūn pra sākṣate pratimānāni bhūri //
GV01rvh1-10u:20295: RV_10,120.07a ni tad dadhiṣe 'varam paraṃ ca yasminn āvithāvasā duroṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20296: RV_10,120.07c ā mātarā sthāpayase jigatnū ata inoṣi karvarā purūṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20297: RV_10,120.08a imā brahma bṛhaddivo vivaktīndrāya śūṣam agriyaḥ svarṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20298: RV_10,120.08c maho gotrasya kṣayati svarājo duraś ca viśvā avṛṇod apa svāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20299: RV_10,120.09a evā mahān bṛhaddivo atharvāvocat svāṃ tanvam indram eva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20300: RV_10,120.09c svasāro mātaribhvarīr ariprā hinvanti ca śavasā vardhayanti ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20301: RV_10,121.01a hiraṇyagarbhaḥ sam avartatāgre bhūtasya jātaḥ patir eka āsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20302: RV_10,121.01c sa dādhāra pṛthivīṃ dyām utemāṃ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20303: RV_10,121.02a ya ātmadā baladā yasya viśva upāsate praśiṣaṃ yasya devāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20304: RV_10,121.02c yasya chāyāmṛtaṃ yasya mṛtyuḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20305: RV_10,121.03a yaḥ prāṇato nimiṣato mahitvaika id rājā jagato babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20306: RV_10,121.03c ya īśe asya dvipadaś catuṣpadaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20307: RV_10,121.04a yasyeme himavanto mahitvā yasya samudraṃ rasayā sahāhuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20308: RV_10,121.04c yasyemāḥ pradiśo yasya bāhū kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20309: RV_10,121.05a yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḷhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20310: RV_10,121.05c yo antarikṣe rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20311: RV_10,121.06a yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhy aikṣetām manasā rejamāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:20312: RV_10,121.06c yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20313: RV_10,121.07a āpo ha yad bṛhatīr viśvam āyan garbhaṃ dadhānā janayantīr agnim /
GV01rvh1-10u:20314: RV_10,121.07c tato devānāṃ sam avartatāsur ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20315: RV_10,121.08a yaś cid āpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānā janayantīr yajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20316: RV_10,121.08c yo deveṣv adhi deva eka āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20317: RV_10,121.09a mā no hiṃsīj janitā yaḥ pṛthivyā yo vā divaṃ satyadharmā jajāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:20318: RV_10,121.09c yaś cāpaś candrā bṛhatīr jajāna kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20319: RV_10,121.10a prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā jātāni pari tā babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20320: RV_10,121.10c yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20321: RV_10,122.01a vasuṃ na citramahasaṃ gṛṇīṣe vāmaṃ śevam atithim adviṣeṇyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20322: RV_10,122.01c sa rāsate śurudho viśvadhāyaso 'gnir hotā gṛhapatiḥ suvīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20323: RV_10,122.02a juṣāṇo agne prati harya me vaco viśvāni vidvān vayunāni sukrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:20324: RV_10,122.02c ghṛtanirṇig brahmaṇe gātum eraya tava devā ajanayann anu vratam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20325: RV_10,122.03a sapta dhāmāni pariyann amartyo dāśad dāśuṣe sukṛte māmahasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20326: RV_10,122.03c suvīreṇa rayiṇāgne svābhuvā yas ta ānaṭ samidhā taṃ juṣasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20327: RV_10,122.04a yajñasya ketum prathamam purohitaṃ haviṣmanta īḷate sapta vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20328: RV_10,122.04c śṛṇvantam agniṃ ghṛtapṛṣṭham ukṣaṇam pṛṇantaṃ devam pṛṇate suvīryam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20329: RV_10,122.05a tvaṃ dūtaḥ prathamo vareṇyaḥ sa hūyamāno amṛtāya matsva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20330: RV_10,122.05c tvām marjayan maruto dāśuṣo gṛhe tvāṃ stomebhir bhṛgavo vi rurucuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20331: RV_10,122.06a iṣaṃ duhan sudughāṃ viśvadhāyasaṃ yajñapriye yajamānāya sukrato /
GV01rvh1-10u:20332: RV_10,122.06c agne ghṛtasnus trir ṛtāni dīdyad vartir yajñam pariyan sukratūyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:20333: RV_10,122.07a tvām id asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭiṣu dūtaṃ kṛṇvānā ayajanta mānuṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20334: RV_10,122.07c tvāṃ devā mahayāyyāya vāvṛdhur ājyam agne nimṛjanto adhvare //
GV01rvh1-10u:20335: RV_10,122.08a ni tvā vasiṣṭhā ahvanta vājinaṃ gṛṇanto agne vidatheṣu vedhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20336: RV_10,122.08c rāyas poṣaṃ yajamāneṣu dhāraya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20337: RV_10,123.01a ayaṃ venaś codayat pṛśnigarbhā jyotirjarāyū rajaso vimāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:20338: RV_10,123.01c imam apāṃ saṃgame sūryasya śiśuṃ na viprā matibhī rihanti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20339: RV_10,123.02a samudrād ūrmim ud iyarti veno nabhojāḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ haryatasya darśi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20340: RV_10,123.02c ṛtasya sānāv adhi viṣṭapi bhrāṭ samānaṃ yonim abhy anūṣata vrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20341: RV_10,123.03a samānam pūrvīr abhi vāvaśānās tiṣṭhan vatsasya mātaraḥ sanīḷāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20342: RV_10,123.03c ṛtasya sānāv adhi cakramāṇā rihanti madhvo amṛtasya vāṇīḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20343: RV_10,123.04a jānanto rūpam akṛpanta viprā mṛgasya ghoṣam mahiṣasya hi gman /
GV01rvh1-10u:20344: RV_10,123.04c ṛtena yanto adhi sindhum asthur vidad gandharvo amṛtāni nāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20345: RV_10,123.05a apsarā jāram upasiṣmiyāṇā yoṣā bibharti parame vyoman /
GV01rvh1-10u:20346: RV_10,123.05c carat priyasya yoniṣu priyaḥ san sīdat pakṣe hiraṇyaye sa venaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20347: RV_10,123.06a nāke suparṇam upa yat patantaṃ hṛdā venanto abhy acakṣata tvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20348: RV_10,123.06c hiraṇyapakṣaṃ varuṇasya dūtaṃ yamasya yonau śakunam bhuraṇyum //
GV01rvh1-10u:20349: RV_10,123.07a ūrdhvo gandharvo adhi nāke asthāt pratyaṅ citrā bibhrad asyāyudhāni /
GV01rvh1-10u:20350: RV_10,123.07c vasāno atkaṃ surabhiṃ dṛśe kaṃ svar ṇa nāma janata priyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20351: RV_10,123.08a drapsaḥ samudram abhi yaj jigāti paśyan gṛdhrasya cakṣasā vidharman /
GV01rvh1-10u:20352: RV_10,123.08c bhānuḥ śukreṇa śociṣā cakānas tṛtīye cakre rajasi priyāṇi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20353: RV_10,124.01a imaṃ no agna upa yajñam ehi pañcayāmaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum /
GV01rvh1-10u:20354: RV_10,124.01c aso havyavāḷ uta naḥ purogā jyog eva dīrghaṃ tama āśayiṣṭhāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20355: RV_10,124.02a adevād devaḥ pracatā guhā yan prapaśyamāno amṛtatvam emi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20356: RV_10,124.02c śivaṃ yat santam aśivo jahāmi svāt sakhyād araṇīṃ nābhim emi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20357: RV_10,124.03a paśyann anyasyā atithiṃ vayāyā ṛtasya dhāma vi mime purūṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20358: RV_10,124.03c śaṃsāmi pitre asurāya śevam ayajñiyād yajñiyam bhāgam emi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20359: RV_10,124.04a bahvīḥ samā akaram antar asminn indraṃ vṛṇānaḥ pitaraṃ jahāmi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20360: RV_10,124.04c agniḥ somo varuṇas te cyavante paryāvard rāṣṭraṃ tad avāmy āyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20361: RV_10,124.05a nirmāyā u tye asurā abhūvan tvaṃ ca mā varuṇa kāmayāse /
GV01rvh1-10u:20362: RV_10,124.05c ṛtena rājann anṛtaṃ viviñcan mama rāṣṭrasyādhipatyam ehi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20363: RV_10,124.06a idaṃ svar idam id āsa vāmam ayam prakāśa urv antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20364: RV_10,124.06c hanāva vṛtraṃ nirehi soma haviṣ ṭvā santaṃ haviṣā yajāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20365: RV_10,124.07a kaviḥ kavitvā divi rūpam āsajad aprabhūtī varuṇo nir apaḥ sṛjat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20366: RV_10,124.07c kṣemaṃ kṛṇvānā janayo na sindhavas tā asya varṇaṃ śucayo bharibhrati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20367: RV_10,124.08a tā asya jyeṣṭham indriyaṃ sacante tā īm ā kṣeti svadhayā madantīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20368: RV_10,124.08c tā īṃ viśo na rājānaṃ vṛṇānā bībhatsuvo apa vṛtrād atiṣṭhan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20369: RV_10,124.09a bībhatsūnāṃ sayujaṃ haṃsam āhur apāṃ divyānāṃ sakhye carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20370: RV_10,124.09c anuṣṭubham anu carcūryamāṇam indraṃ ni cikyuḥ kavayo manīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20371: RV_10,125.01a ahaṃ rudrebhir vasubhiś carāmy aham ādityair uta viśvadevaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20372: RV_10,125.01c aham mitrāvaruṇobhā bibharmy aham indrāgnī aham aśvinobhā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20373: RV_10,125.02a ahaṃ somam āhanasam bibharmy ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram uta pūṣaṇam bhagam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20374: RV_10,125.02c ahaṃ dadhāmi draviṇaṃ haviṣmate suprāvye yajamānāya sunvate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20375: RV_10,125.03a ahaṃ rāṣṭrī saṃgamanī vasūnāṃ cikituṣī prathamā yajñiyānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20376: RV_10,125.03c tām mā devā vy adadhuḥ purutrā bhūristhātrām bhūry āveśayantīm //
GV01rvh1-10u:20377: RV_10,125.04a mayā so annam atti yo vipaśyati yaḥ prāṇiti ya īṃ śṛṇoty uktam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20378: RV_10,125.04c amantavo māṃ ta upa kṣiyanti śrudhi śruta śraddhivaṃ te vadāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20379: RV_10,125.05a aham eva svayam idaṃ vadāmi juṣṭaṃ devebhir uta mānuṣebhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20380: RV_10,125.05c yaṃ kāmaye taṃ-tam ugraṃ kṛṇomi tam brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20381: RV_10,125.06a ahaṃ rudrāya dhanur ā tanomi brahmadviṣe śarave hantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:20382: RV_10,125.06c ahaṃ janāya samadaṃ kṛṇomy ahaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī ā viveśa //
GV01rvh1-10u:20383: RV_10,125.07a ahaṃ suve pitaram asya mūrdhan mama yonir apsv antaḥ samudre /
GV01rvh1-10u:20384: RV_10,125.07c tato vi tiṣṭhe bhuvanānu viśvotāmūṃ dyāṃ varṣmaṇopa spṛśāmi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20385: RV_10,125.08a aham eva vāta iva pra vāmy ārabhamāṇā bhuvanāni viśvā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20386: RV_10,125.08c paro divā para enā pṛthivyaitāvatī mahinā sam babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20387: RV_10,126.01a na tam aṃho na duritaṃ devāso aṣṭa martyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20388: RV_10,126.01c sajoṣaso yam aryamā mitro nayanti varuṇo ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20389: RV_10,126.02a tad dhi vayaṃ vṛṇīmahe varuṇa mitrāryaman /
GV01rvh1-10u:20390: RV_10,126.02c yenā nir aṃhaso yūyam pātha nethā ca martyam ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20391: RV_10,126.03a te nūnaṃ no 'yam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20392: RV_10,126.03c nayiṣṭhā u no neṣaṇi parṣiṣṭhā u naḥ parṣaṇy ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20393: RV_10,126.04a yūyaṃ viśvam pari pātha varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20394: RV_10,126.04c yuṣmākaṃ śarmaṇi priye syāma supraṇītayo 'ti dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20395: RV_10,126.05a ādityāso ati sridho varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20396: RV_10,126.05c ugram marudbhī rudraṃ huvemendram agniṃ svastaye 'ti dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20397: RV_10,126.06a netāra ū ṣu ṇas tiro varuṇo mitro aryamā /
