GV01rvh1-10u:20398: RV_10,126.06c ati viśvāni duritā rājānaś carṣaṇīnām ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20399: RV_10,126.07a śunam asmabhyam ūtaye varuṇo mitro aryamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20400: RV_10,126.07c śarma yacchantu sapratha ādityāso yad īmahe ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20401: RV_10,126.08a yathā ha tyad vasavo gauryaṃ cit padi ṣitām amuñcatā yajatrāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20402: RV_10,126.08c evo ṣv asman muñcatā vy aṃhaḥ pra tāry agne prataraṃ na āyuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20403: RV_10,127.01a rātrī vy akhyad āyatī purutrā devy akṣabhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20405: RV_10,127.02a orv aprā amartyā nivato devy udvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20407: RV_10,127.03a nir u svasāram askṛtoṣasaṃ devy āyatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20409: RV_10,127.04a sā no adya yasyā vayaṃ ni te yāmann avikṣmahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20411: RV_10,127.05a ni grāmāso avikṣata ni padvanto ni pakṣiṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20413: RV_10,127.06a yāvayā vṛkyaṃ vṛkaṃ yavaya stenam ūrmye /
GV01rvh1-10u:20415: RV_10,127.07a upa mā pepiśat tamaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vyaktam asthita /
GV01rvh1-10u:20417: RV_10,127.08a upa te gā ivākaraṃ vṛṇīṣva duhitar divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20419: RV_10,128.01a mamāgne varco vihaveṣv astu vayaṃ tvendhānās tanvam puṣema /
GV01rvh1-10u:20420: RV_10,128.01c mahyaṃ namantām pradiśaś catasras tvayādhyakṣeṇa pṛtanā jayema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20421: RV_10,128.02a mama devā vihave santu sarva indravanto maruto viṣṇur agniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20422: RV_10,128.02c mamāntarikṣam urulokam astu mahyaṃ vātaḥ pavatāṃ kāme asmin //
GV01rvh1-10u:20423: RV_10,128.03a mayi devā draviṇam ā yajantām mayy āśīr astu mayi devahūtiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20424: RV_10,128.03c daivyā hotāro vanuṣanta pūrve 'riṣṭāḥ syāma tanvā suvīrāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20425: RV_10,128.04a mahyaṃ yajantu mama yāni havyākūtiḥ satyā manaso me astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20426: RV_10,128.04c eno mā ni gāṃ katamac canāhaṃ viśve devāso adhi vocatā naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20427: RV_10,128.05a devīḥ ṣaḷ urvīr uru naḥ kṛṇota viśve devāsa iha vīrayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20428: RV_10,128.05c mā hāsmahi prajayā mā tanūbhir mā radhāma dviṣate soma rājan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20429: RV_10,128.06a agne manyum pratinudan pareṣām adabdho gopāḥ pari pāhi nas tvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20430: RV_10,128.06c pratyañco yantu nigutaḥ punas te 'maiṣāṃ cittam prabudhāṃ vi neśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20431: RV_10,128.07a dhātā dhātṝṇām bhuvanasya yas patir devaṃ trātāram abhimātiṣāham /
GV01rvh1-10u:20432: RV_10,128.07c imaṃ yajñam aśvinobhā bṛhaspatir devāḥ pāntu yajamānaṃ nyarthāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20433: RV_10,128.08a uruvyacā no mahiṣaḥ śarma yaṃsad asmin have puruhūtaḥ purukṣuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20434: RV_10,128.08c sa naḥ prajāyai haryaśva mṛḷayendra mā no rīriṣo mā parā dāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20435: RV_10,128.09a ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān /
GV01rvh1-10u:20436: RV_10,128.09c vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśam mograṃ cettāram adhirājam akran //
GV01rvh1-10u:20437: RV_10,129.01a nāsad āsīn no sad āsīt tadānīṃ nāsīd rajo no vyomā paro yat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20438: RV_10,129.01c kim āvarīvaḥ kuha kasya śarmann ambhaḥ kim āsīd gahanaṃ gabhīram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20439: RV_10,129.02a na mṛtyur āsīd amṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahna āsīt praketaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20440: RV_10,129.02c ānīd avātaṃ svadhayā tad ekaṃ tasmād dhānyan na paraḥ kiṃ canāsa //
GV01rvh1-10u:20441: RV_10,129.03a tama āsīt tamasā gūḷham agre 'praketaṃ salilaṃ sarvam ā idam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20442: RV_10,129.03c tucchyenābhv apihitaṃ yad āsīt tapasas tan mahinājāyataikam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20443: RV_10,129.04a kāmas tad agre sam avartatādhi manaso retaḥ prathamaṃ yad āsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20444: RV_10,129.04c sato bandhum asati nir avindan hṛdi pratīṣyā kavayo manīṣā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20445: RV_10,129.05a tiraścīno vitato raśmir eṣām adhaḥ svid āsī3d upari svid āsī3t /
GV01rvh1-10u:20446: RV_10,129.05c retodhā āsan mahimāna āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20447: RV_10,129.06a ko addhā veda ka iha pra vocat kuta ājātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20448: RV_10,129.06c arvāg devā asya visarjanenāthā ko veda yata ābabhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20449: RV_10,129.07a iyaṃ visṛṣṭir yata ābabhūva yadi vā dadhe yadi vā na /
GV01rvh1-10u:20450: RV_10,129.07c yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman so aṅga veda yadi vā na veda //
GV01rvh1-10u:20451: RV_10,130.01a yo yajño viśvatas tantubhis tata ekaśataṃ devakarmebhir āyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20452: RV_10,130.01c ime vayanti pitaro ya āyayuḥ pra vayāpa vayety āsate tate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20453: RV_10,130.02a pumāṃ enaṃ tanuta ut kṛṇatti pumān vi tatne adhi nāke asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:20454: RV_10,130.02c ime mayūkhā upa sedur ū sadaḥ sāmāni cakrus tasarāṇy otave //
GV01rvh1-10u:20455: RV_10,130.03a kāsīt pramā pratimā kiṃ nidānam ājyaṃ kim āsīt paridhiḥ ka āsīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20456: RV_10,130.03c chandaḥ kim āsīt praugaṃ kim ukthaṃ yad devā devam ayajanta viśve //
GV01rvh1-10u:20457: RV_10,130.04a agner gāyatry abhavat sayugvoṣṇihayā savitā sam babhūva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20458: RV_10,130.04c anuṣṭubhā soma ukthair mahasvān bṛhaspater bṛhatī vācam āvat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20459: RV_10,130.05a virāṇ mitrāvaruṇayor abhiśrīr indrasya triṣṭub iha bhāgo ahnaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20460: RV_10,130.05c viśvān devāñ jagaty ā viveśa tena cākḷpra ṛṣayo manuṣyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20461: RV_10,130.06a cākḷpre tena ṛṣayo manuṣyā yajñe jāte pitaro naḥ purāṇe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20462: RV_10,130.06c paśyan manye manasā cakṣasā tān ya imaṃ yajñam ayajanta pūrve //
GV01rvh1-10u:20463: RV_10,130.07a sahastomāḥ sahachandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20464: RV_10,130.07c pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhire rathyo na raśmīn //
GV01rvh1-10u:20465: RV_10,131.01a apa prāca indra viśvāṃ amitrān apāpāco abhibhūte nudasva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20466: RV_10,131.01c apodīco apa śūrādharāca urau yathā tava śarman madema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20467: RV_10,131.02a kuvid aṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20468: RV_10,131.02c ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namovṛktiṃ na jagmuḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20469: RV_10,131.03a nahi sthūry ṛtuthā yātam asti nota śravo vivide saṃgameṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20470: RV_10,131.03c gavyanta indraṃ sakhyāya viprā aśvāyanto vṛṣaṇaṃ vājayantaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20471: RV_10,131.04a yuvaṃ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20472: RV_10,131.04c vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20473: RV_10,131.05a putram iva pitarāv aśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyair daṃsanābhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20474: RV_10,131.05c yat surāmaṃ vy apibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak //
GV01rvh1-10u:20475: RV_10,131.06a indraḥ sutrāmā svavāṃ avobhiḥ sumṛḷīko bhavatu viśvavedāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20476: RV_10,131.06c bādhatāṃ dveṣo abhayaṃ kṛṇotu suvīryasya patayaḥ syāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20477: RV_10,131.07a tasya vayaṃ sumatau yajñiyasyāpi bhadre saumanase syāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:20478: RV_10,131.07c sa sutrāmā svavāṃ indro asme ārāc cid dveṣaḥ sanutar yuyotu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20479: RV_10,132.01a ījānam id dyaur gūrtāvasur ījānam bhūmir abhi prabhūṣaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20480: RV_10,132.01c ījānaṃ devāv aśvināv abhi sumnair avardhatām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20481: RV_10,132.02a tā vām mitrāvaruṇā dhārayatkṣitī suṣumneṣitatvatā yajāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20482: RV_10,132.02c yuvoḥ krāṇāya sakhyair abhi ṣyāma rakṣasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20483: RV_10,132.03a adhā cin nu yad didhiṣāmahe vām abhi priyaṃ rekṇaḥ patyamānāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20484: RV_10,132.03c dadvāṃ vā yat puṣyati rekṇaḥ sam v āran nakir asya maghāni //
GV01rvh1-10u:20485: RV_10,132.04a asāv anyo asura sūyata dyaus tvaṃ viśveṣāṃ varuṇāsi rājā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20487: RV_10,132.05a asmin sv etac chakapūta eno hite mitre nigatān hanti vīrān /
GV01rvh1-10u:20488: RV_10,132.05c avor vā yad dhāt tanūṣv avaḥ priyāsu yajñiyāsv arvā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20489: RV_10,132.06a yuvor hi mātāditir vicetasā dyaur na bhūmiḥ payasā pupūtani /
GV01rvh1-10u:20490: RV_10,132.06c ava priyā didiṣṭana sūro ninikta raśmibhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20491: RV_10,132.07a yuvaṃ hy apnarājāv asīdataṃ tiṣṭhad rathaṃ na dhūrṣadaṃ vanarṣadam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20492: RV_10,132.07c tā naḥ kaṇūkayantīr nṛmedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ sumedhas tatre aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20493: RV_10,133.01a pro ṣv asmai puroratham indrāya śūṣam arcata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20494: RV_10,133.01c abhīke cid u lokakṛt saṃge samatsu vṛtrahāsmākam bodhi coditā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20495: RV_10,133.02a tvaṃ sindhūṃr avāsṛjo 'dharāco ahann ahim /
GV01rvh1-10u:20496: RV_10,133.02c aśatrur indra jajñiṣe viśvam puṣyasi vāryaṃ taṃ tvā pari ṣvajāmahe nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20497: RV_10,133.03a vi ṣu viśvā arātayo 'ryo naśanta no dhiyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20498: RV_10,133.03c astāsi śatrave vadhaṃ yo na indra jighāṃsati yā te rātir dadir vasu nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20499: RV_10,133.04a yo na indrābhito jano vṛkāyur ādideśati /
GV01rvh1-10u:20500: RV_10,133.04c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi vibādho asi sāsahir nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20501: RV_10,133.05a yo na indrābhidāsati sanābhir yaś ca niṣṭyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20502: RV_10,133.05c ava tasya balaṃ tira mahīva dyaur adha tmanā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20503: RV_10,133.06a vayam indra tvāyavaḥ sakhitvam ā rabhāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20504: RV_10,133.06c ṛtasya naḥ pathā nayāti viśvāni duritā nabhantām anyakeṣāṃ jyākā adhi dhanvasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20505: RV_10,133.07a asmabhyaṃ su tvam indra tāṃ śikṣa yā dohate prati varaṃ jaritre /
GV01rvh1-10u:20506: RV_10,133.07c acchidrodhnī pīpayad yathā naḥ sahasradhārā payasā mahī gauḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20507: RV_10,134.01a ubhe yad indra rodasī āpaprāthoṣā iva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20508: RV_10,134.01c mahāntaṃ tvā mahīnāṃ samrājaṃ carṣaṇīnāṃ devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20509: RV_10,134.02a ava sma durhaṇāyato martasya tanuhi sthiram /
GV01rvh1-10u:20510: RV_10,134.02c adhaspadaṃ tam īṃ kṛdhi yo asmāṃ ādideśati devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20511: RV_10,134.03a ava tyā bṛhatīr iṣo viśvaścandrā amitrahan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20512: RV_10,134.03c śacībhiḥ śakra dhūnuhīndra viśvābhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20513: RV_10,134.04a ava yat tvaṃ śatakratav indra viśvāni dhūnuṣe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20514: RV_10,134.04c rayiṃ na sunvate sacā sahasriṇībhir ūtibhir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20515: RV_10,134.05a ava svedā ivābhito viṣvak patantu didyavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20516: RV_10,134.05c dūrvāyā iva tantavo vy asmad etu durmatir devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20517: RV_10,134.06a dīrghaṃ hy aṅkuśaṃ yathā śaktim bibharṣi mantumaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20518: RV_10,134.06c pūrveṇa maghavan padājo vayāṃ yathā yamo devī janitry ajījanad bhadrā janitry ajījanat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20519: RV_10,134.07a nakir devā minīmasi nakir ā yopayāmasi mantraśrutyaṃ carāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20520: RV_10,134.07c pakṣebhir apikakṣebhir atrābhi saṃ rabhāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20521: RV_10,135.01a yasmin vṛkṣe supalāśe devaiḥ sampibate yamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20522: RV_10,135.01c atrā no viśpatiḥ pitā purāṇāṃ anu venati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20524: RV_10,135.02c asūyann abhy acākaśaṃ tasmā aspṛhayam punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20525: RV_10,135.03a yaṃ kumāra navaṃ ratham acakram manasākṛṇoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20526: RV_10,135.03c ekeṣaṃ viśvataḥ prāñcam apaśyann adhi tiṣṭhasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20527: RV_10,135.04a yaṃ kumāra prāvartayo rathaṃ viprebhyas pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:20528: RV_10,135.04c taṃ sāmānu prāvartata sam ito nāvy āhitam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20529: RV_10,135.05a kaḥ kumāram ajanayad rathaṃ ko nir avartayat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20530: RV_10,135.05c kaḥ svit tad adya no brūyād anudeyī yathābhavat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20531: RV_10,135.06a yathābhavad anudeyī tato agram ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20532: RV_10,135.06c purastād budhna ātataḥ paścān nirayaṇaṃ kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20533: RV_10,135.07a idaṃ yamasya sādanaṃ devamānaṃ yad ucyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20534: RV_10,135.07c iyam asya dhamyate nāḷīr ayaṃ gīrbhiḥ pariṣkṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20535: RV_10,136.01a keśy agniṃ keśī viṣaṃ keśī bibharti rodasī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20536: RV_10,136.01c keśī viśvaṃ svar dṛśe keśīdaṃ jyotir ucyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20537: RV_10,136.02a munayo vātaraśanāḥ piśaṅgā vasate malā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20538: RV_10,136.02c vātasyānu dhrājiṃ yanti yad devāso avikṣata //
GV01rvh1-10u:20539: RV_10,136.03a unmaditā mauneyena vātāṃ ā tasthimā vayam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20540: RV_10,136.03c śarīred asmākaṃ yūyam martāso abhi paśyatha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20542: RV_10,136.04c munir devasya-devasya saukṛtyāya sakhā hitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20543: RV_10,136.05a vātasyāśvo vāyoḥ sakhātho deveṣito muniḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20544: RV_10,136.05c ubhau samudrāv ā kṣeti yaś ca pūrva utāparaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20545: RV_10,136.06a apsarasāṃ gandharvāṇām mṛgāṇāṃ caraṇe caran /
GV01rvh1-10u:20546: RV_10,136.06c keśī ketasya vidvān sakhā svādur madintamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20547: RV_10,136.07a vāyur asmā upāmanthat pinaṣṭi smā kunannamā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20548: RV_10,136.07c keśī viṣasya pātreṇa yad rudreṇāpibat saha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20549: RV_10,137.01a uta devā avahitaṃ devā un nayathā punaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20550: RV_10,137.01c utāgaś cakruṣaṃ devā devā jīvayathā punaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20551: RV_10,137.02a dvāv imau vātau vāta ā sindhor ā parāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20552: RV_10,137.02c dakṣaṃ te anya ā vātu parānyo vātu yad rapaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20553: RV_10,137.03a ā vāta vāhi bheṣajaṃ vi vāta vāhi yad rapaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20554: RV_10,137.03c tvaṃ hi viśvabheṣajo devānāṃ dūta īyase //
GV01rvh1-10u:20555: RV_10,137.04a ā tvāgamaṃ śantātibhir atho ariṣṭatātibhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20556: RV_10,137.04c dakṣaṃ te bhadram ābhārṣam parā yakṣmaṃ suvāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20557: RV_10,137.05a trāyantām iha devās trāyatām marutāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20558: RV_10,137.05c trāyantāṃ viśvā bhūtāni yathāyam arapā asat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20559: RV_10,137.06a āpa id vā u bheṣajīr āpo amīvacātanīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20560: RV_10,137.06c āpaḥ sarvasya bheṣajīs tās te kṛṇvantu bheṣajam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20561: RV_10,137.07a hastābhyāṃ daśaśākhābhyāṃ jihvā vācaḥ purogavī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20562: RV_10,137.07c anāmayitnubhyāṃ tvā tābhyāṃ tvopa spṛśāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20563: RV_10,138.01a tava tya indra sakhyeṣu vahnaya ṛtam manvānā vy adardirur valam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20564: RV_10,138.01c yatrā daśasyann uṣaso riṇann apaḥ kutsāya manmann ahyaś ca daṃsayaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20565: RV_10,138.02a avāsṛjaḥ prasvaḥ śvañcayo girīn ud āja usrā apibo madhu priyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20566: RV_10,138.02c avardhayo vanino asya daṃsasā śuśoca sūrya ṛtajātayā girā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20567: RV_10,138.03a vi sūryo madhye amucad rathaṃ divo vidad dāsāya pratimānam āryaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20568: RV_10,138.03c dṛḷhāni pipror asurasya māyina indro vy āsyac cakṛvāṃ ṛjiśvanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20569: RV_10,138.04a anādhṛṣṭāni dhṛṣito vy āsyan nidhīṃr adevāṃ amṛṇad ayāsyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20570: RV_10,138.04c māseva sūryo vasu puryam ā dade gṛṇānaḥ śatrūṃr aśṛṇād virukmatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20571: RV_10,138.05a ayuddhaseno vibhvā vibhindatā dāśad vṛtrahā tujyāni tejate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20572: RV_10,138.05c indrasya vajrād abibhed abhiśnathaḥ prākrāmac chundhyūr ajahād uṣā anaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20573: RV_10,138.06a etā tyā te śrutyāni kevalā yad eka ekam akṛṇor ayajñam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20574: RV_10,138.06c māsāṃ vidhānam adadhā adhi dyavi tvayā vibhinnam bharati pradhim pitā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20575: RV_10,139.01a sūryaraśmir harikeśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotir ud ayāṃ ajasram /
GV01rvh1-10u:20576: RV_10,139.01c tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20577: RV_10,139.02a nṛcakṣā eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20578: RV_10,139.02c sa viśvācīr abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīr antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum //
GV01rvh1-10u:20579: RV_10,139.03a rāyo budhnaḥ saṃgamano vasūnāṃ viśvā rūpābhi caṣṭe śacībhiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20580: RV_10,139.03c deva iva savitā satyadharmendro na tasthau samare dhanānām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20581: RV_10,139.04a viśvāvasuṃ soma gandharvam āpo dadṛśuṣīs tad ṛtenā vy āyan /
GV01rvh1-10u:20582: RV_10,139.04c tad anvavaid indro rārahāṇa āsām pari sūryasya paridhīṃr apaśyat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20583: RV_10,139.05a viśvāvasur abhi tan no gṛṇātu divyo gandharvo rajaso vimānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20584: RV_10,139.05c yad vā ghā satyam uta yan na vidma dhiyo hinvāno dhiya in no avyāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20585: RV_10,139.06a sasnim avindac caraṇe nadīnām apāvṛṇod duro aśmavrajānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20586: RV_10,139.06c prāsāṃ gandharvo amṛtāni vocad indro dakṣam pari jānād ahīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20587: RV_10,140.01a agne tava śravo vayo mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvaso /
GV01rvh1-10u:20588: RV_10,140.01c bṛhadbhāno śavasā vājam ukthyaṃ dadhāsi dāśuṣe kave //
GV01rvh1-10u:20589: RV_10,140.02a pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā anūnavarcā ud iyarṣi bhānunā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20590: RV_10,140.02c putro mātarā vicarann upāvasi pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20591: RV_10,140.03a ūrjo napāj jātavedaḥ suśastibhir mandasva dhītibhir hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20592: RV_10,140.03c tve iṣaḥ saṃ dadhur bhūrivarpasaś citrotayo vāmajātāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20593: RV_10,140.04a irajyann agne prathayasva jantubhir asme rāyo amartya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20594: RV_10,140.04c sa darśatasya vapuṣo vi rājasi pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratum //
GV01rvh1-10u:20595: RV_10,140.05a iṣkartāram adhvarasya pracetasaṃ kṣayantaṃ rādhaso mahaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20596: RV_10,140.05c rātiṃ vāmasya subhagām mahīm iṣaṃ dadhāsi sānasiṃ rayim //
GV01rvh1-10u:20597: RV_10,140.06a ṛtāvānam mahiṣaṃ viśvadarśatam agniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20598: RV_10,140.06c śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā yugā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20599: RV_10,141.01a agne acchā vadeha naḥ pratyaṅ naḥ sumanā bhava /
GV01rvh1-10u:20600: RV_10,141.01c pra no yaccha viśas pate dhanadā asi nas tvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20601: RV_10,141.02a pra no yacchatv aryamā pra bhagaḥ pra bṛhaspatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20602: RV_10,141.02c pra devāḥ prota sūnṛtā rāyo devī dadātu naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20603: RV_10,141.03a somaṃ rājānam avase 'gniṃ gīrbhir havāmahe /
GV01rvh1-10u:20604: RV_10,141.03c ādityān viṣṇuṃ sūryam brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim //
GV01rvh1-10u:20606: RV_10,141.04c yathā naḥ sarva ij janaḥ saṃgatyāṃ sumanā asat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20607: RV_10,141.05a aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20608: RV_10,141.05c vātaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca vājinam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20609: RV_10,141.06a tvaṃ no agne agnibhir brahma yajñaṃ ca vardhaya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20610: RV_10,141.06c tvaṃ no devatātaye rāyo dānāya codaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20611: RV_10,142.01a ayam agne jaritā tve abhūd api sahasaḥ sūno nahy anyad asty āpyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20612: RV_10,142.01c bhadraṃ hi śarma trivarūtham asti ta āre hiṃsānām apa didyum ā kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20613: RV_10,142.02a pravat te agne janimā pitūyataḥ sācīva viśvā bhuvanā ny ṛñjase /
GV01rvh1-10u:20614: RV_10,142.02c pra saptayaḥ pra saniṣanta no dhiyaḥ puraś caranti paśupā iva tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20615: RV_10,142.03a uta vā u pari vṛṇakṣi bapsad bahor agna ulapasya svadhāvaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20616: RV_10,142.03c uta khilyā urvarāṇām bhavanti mā te hetiṃ taviṣīṃ cukrudhāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20617: RV_10,142.04a yad udvato nivato yāsi bapsat pṛthag eṣi pragardhinīva senā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20618: RV_10,142.04c yadā te vāto anuvāti śocir vapteva śmaśru vapasi pra bhūma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20619: RV_10,142.05a praty asya śreṇayo dadṛśra ekaṃ niyānam bahavo rathāsaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20620: RV_10,142.05c bāhū yad agne anumarmṛjāno nyaṅṅ uttānām anveṣi bhūmim //
GV01rvh1-10u:20621: RV_10,142.06a ut te śuṣmā jihatām ut te arcir ut te agne śaśamānasya vājāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20622: RV_10,142.06c uc chvañcasva ni nama vardhamāna ā tvādya viśve vasavaḥ sadantu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20623: RV_10,142.07a apām idaṃ nyayanaṃ samudrasya niveśanam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20624: RV_10,142.07c anyaṃ kṛṇuṣvetaḥ panthāṃ tena yāhi vaśāṃ anu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20625: RV_10,142.08a āyane te parāyaṇe dūrvā rohantu puṣpiṇīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20626: RV_10,142.08c hradāś ca puṇḍarīkāṇi samudrasya gṛhā ime //
GV01rvh1-10u:20627: RV_10,143.01a tyaṃ cid atrim ṛtajuram artham aśvaṃ na yātave /
GV01rvh1-10u:20628: RV_10,143.01c kakṣīvantaṃ yadī punā rathaṃ na kṛṇutho navam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20629: RV_10,143.02a tyaṃ cid aśvaṃ na vājinam areṇavo yam atnata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20630: RV_10,143.02c dṛḷhaṃ granthiṃ na vi ṣyatam atriṃ yaviṣṭham ā rajaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20631: RV_10,143.03a narā daṃsiṣṭhāv atraye śubhrā siṣāsataṃ dhiyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20632: RV_10,143.03c athā hi vāṃ divo narā puna stomo na viśase //
GV01rvh1-10u:20633: RV_10,143.04a cite tad vāṃ surādhasā rātiḥ sumatir aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20634: RV_10,143.04c ā yan naḥ sadane pṛthau samane parṣatho narā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20635: RV_10,143.05a yuvam bhujyuṃ samudra ā rajasaḥ pāra īṅkhitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20636: RV_10,143.05c yātam acchā patatribhir nāsatyā sātaye kṛtam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20637: RV_10,143.06a ā vāṃ sumnaiḥ śaṃyū iva maṃhiṣṭhā viśvavedasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20638: RV_10,143.06c sam asme bhūṣataṃ narotsaṃ na pipyuṣīr iṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20639: RV_10,144.01a ayaṃ hi te amartya indur atyo na patyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20641: RV_10,144.02a ayam asmāsu kāvya ṛbhur vajro dāsvate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20642: RV_10,144.02c ayam bibharty ūrdhvakṛśanam madam ṛbhur na kṛtvyam madam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20643: RV_10,144.03a ghṛṣuḥ śyenāya kṛtvana āsu svāsu vaṃsagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20645: RV_10,144.04a yaṃ suparṇaḥ parāvataḥ śyenasya putra ābharat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20647: RV_10,144.05a yaṃ te śyenaś cārum avṛkam padābharad aruṇam mānam andhasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20648: RV_10,144.05c enā vayo vi tāry āyur jīvasa enā jāgāra bandhutā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20649: RV_10,144.06a evā tad indra indunā deveṣu cid dhārayāte mahi tyajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20650: RV_10,144.06c kratvā vayo vi tāry āyuḥ sukrato kratvāyam asmad ā sutaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20651: RV_10,145.01a imāṃ khanāmy oṣadhiṃ vīrudham balavattamām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20652: RV_10,145.01c yayā sapatnīm bādhate yayā saṃvindate patim //
GV01rvh1-10u:20654: RV_10,145.02c sapatnīm me parā dhama patim me kevalaṃ kuru //
GV01rvh1-10u:20656: RV_10,145.03c athā sapatnī yā mamādharā sādharābhyaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20657: RV_10,145.04a nahy asyā nāma gṛbhṇāmi no asmin ramate jane /
GV01rvh1-10u:20658: RV_10,145.04c parām eva parāvataṃ sapatnīṃ gamayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20659: RV_10,145.05a aham asmi sahamānātha tvam asi sāsahiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20660: RV_10,145.05c ubhe sahasvatī bhūtvī sapatnīm me sahāvahai //
GV01rvh1-10u:20661: RV_10,145.06a upa te 'dhāṃ sahamānām abhi tvādhāṃ sahīyasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20662: RV_10,145.06c mām anu pra te mano vatsaṃ gaur iva dhāvatu pathā vār iva dhāvatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20663: RV_10,146.01a araṇyāny araṇyāny asau yā preva naśyasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20664: RV_10,146.01c kathā grāmaṃ na pṛcchasi na tvā bhīr iva vindatī3ṃ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20665: RV_10,146.02a vṛṣāravāya vadate yad upāvati ciccikaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20666: RV_10,146.02c āghāṭibhir iva dhāvayann araṇyānir mahīyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20667: RV_10,146.03a uta gāva ivādanty uta veśmeva dṛśyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20668: RV_10,146.03c uto araṇyāniḥ sāyaṃ śakaṭīr iva sarjati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20669: RV_10,146.04a gām aṅgaiṣa ā hvayati dārv aṅgaiṣo apāvadhīt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20670: RV_10,146.04c vasann araṇyānyāṃ sāyam akrukṣad iti manyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20671: RV_10,146.05a na vā araṇyānir hanty anyaś cen nābhigacchati /
GV01rvh1-10u:20672: RV_10,146.05c svādoḥ phalasya jagdhvāya yathākāmaṃ ni padyate //
GV01rvh1-10u:20674: RV_10,146.06c prāham mṛgāṇām mātaram araṇyānim aśaṃsiṣam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20675: RV_10,147.01a śrat te dadhāmi prathamāya manyave 'han yad vṛtraṃ naryaṃ viver apaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20676: RV_10,147.01c ubhe yat tvā bhavato rodasī anu rejate śuṣmāt pṛthivī cid adrivaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20677: RV_10,147.02a tvam māyābhir anavadya māyinaṃ śravasyatā manasā vṛtram ardayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20678: RV_10,147.02c tvām in naro vṛṇate gaviṣṭiṣu tvāṃ viśvāsu havyāsv iṣṭiṣu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20679: RV_10,147.03a aiṣu cākandhi puruhūta sūriṣu vṛdhāso ye maghavann ānaśur magham /
GV01rvh1-10u:20680: RV_10,147.03c arcanti toke tanaye pariṣṭiṣu medhasātā vājinam ahraye dhane //
GV01rvh1-10u:20681: RV_10,147.04a sa in nu rāyaḥ subhṛtasya cākanan madaṃ yo asya raṃhyaṃ ciketati /
GV01rvh1-10u:20682: RV_10,147.04c tvāvṛdho maghavan dāśvadhvaro makṣū sa vājam bharate dhanā nṛbhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20683: RV_10,147.05a tvaṃ śardhāya mahinā gṛṇāna uru kṛdhi maghavañ chagdhi rāyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20684: RV_10,147.05c tvaṃ no mitro varuṇo na māyī pitvo na dasma dayase vibhaktā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20685: RV_10,148.01a suṣvāṇāsa indra stumasi tvā sasavāṃsaś ca tuvinṛmṇa vājam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20686: RV_10,148.01c ā no bhara suvitaṃ yasya cākan tmanā tanā sanuyāma tvotāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20687: RV_10,148.02a ṛṣvas tvam indra śūra jāto dāsīr viśaḥ sūryeṇa sahyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20688: RV_10,148.02c guhā hitaṃ guhyaṃ gūḷham apsu bibhṛmasi prasravaṇe na somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20689: RV_10,148.03a aryo vā giro abhy arca vidvān ṛṣīṇāṃ vipraḥ sumatiṃ cakānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20690: RV_10,148.03c te syāma ye raṇayanta somair enota tubhyaṃ rathoḷha bhakṣaiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20691: RV_10,148.04a imā brahmendra tubhyaṃ śaṃsi dā nṛbhyo nṛṇāṃ śūra śavaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20692: RV_10,148.04c tebhir bhava sakratur yeṣu cākann uta trāyasva gṛṇata uta stīn //
GV01rvh1-10u:20693: RV_10,148.05a śrudhī havam indra śūra pṛthyā uta stavase venyasyārkaiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20694: RV_10,148.05c ā yas te yoniṃ ghṛtavantam asvār ūrmir na nimnair dravayanta vakvāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20695: RV_10,149.01a savitā yantraiḥ pṛthivīm aramṇād askambhane savitā dyām adṛṃhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20696: RV_10,149.01c aśvam ivādhukṣad dhunim antarikṣam atūrte baddhaṃ savitā samudram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20697: RV_10,149.02a yatrā samudra skabhito vy aunad apāṃ napāt savitā tasya veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:20698: RV_10,149.02c ato bhūr ata ā utthitaṃ rajo 'to dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20699: RV_10,149.03a paścedam anyad abhavad yajatram amartyasya bhuvanasya bhūnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20700: RV_10,149.03c suparṇo aṅga savitur garutmān pūrvo jātaḥ sa u asyānu dharma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20701: RV_10,149.04a gāva iva grāmaṃ yūyudhir ivāśvān vāśreva vatsaṃ sumanā duhānā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20702: RV_10,149.04c patir iva jāyām abhi no ny etu dhartā divaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20703: RV_10,149.05a hiraṇyastūpaḥ savitar yathā tvāṅgiraso juhve vāje asmin /
GV01rvh1-10u:20704: RV_10,149.05c evā tvārcann avase vandamānaḥ somasyevāṃśum prati jāgarāham //
GV01rvh1-10u:20705: RV_10,150.01a samiddhaś cit sam idhyase devebhyo havyavāhana /
GV01rvh1-10u:20706: RV_10,150.01c ādityai rudrair vasubhir na ā gahi mṛḷīkāya na ā gahi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20707: RV_10,150.02a imaṃ yajñam idaṃ vaco jujuṣāṇa upāgahi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20708: RV_10,150.02c martāsas tvā samidhāna havāmahe mṛḷīkāya havāmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20709: RV_10,150.03a tvām u jātavedasaṃ viśvavāraṃ gṛṇe dhiyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20710: RV_10,150.03c agne devāṃ ā vaha naḥ priyavratān mṛḷīkāya priyavratān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20711: RV_10,150.04a agnir devo devānām abhavat purohito 'gnim manuṣyā ṛṣayaḥ sam īdhire /
GV01rvh1-10u:20712: RV_10,150.04c agnim maho dhanasātāv ahaṃ huve mṛḷīkaṃ dhanasātaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:20713: RV_10,150.05a agnir atrim bharadvājaṃ gaviṣṭhiram prāvan naḥ kaṇvaṃ trasadasyum āhave /
GV01rvh1-10u:20714: RV_10,150.05c agniṃ vasiṣṭho havate purohito mṛḷīkāya purohitaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20715: RV_10,151.01a śraddhayāgniḥ sam idhyate śraddhayā hūyate haviḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20716: RV_10,151.01c śraddhām bhagasya mūrdhani vacasā vedayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20717: RV_10,151.02a priyaṃ śraddhe dadataḥ priyaṃ śraddhe didāsataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20718: RV_10,151.02c priyam bhojeṣu yajvasv idam ma uditaṃ kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20719: RV_10,151.03a yathā devā asureṣu śraddhām ugreṣu cakrire /
GV01rvh1-10u:20720: RV_10,151.03c evam bhojeṣu yajvasv asmākam uditaṃ kṛdhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20721: RV_10,151.04a śraddhāṃ devā yajamānā vāyugopā upāsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20722: RV_10,151.04c śraddhāṃ hṛdayyayākūtyā śraddhayā vindate vasu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20723: RV_10,151.05a śraddhām prātar havāmahe śraddhām madhyandinam pari /
GV01rvh1-10u:20724: RV_10,151.05c śraddhāṃ sūryasya nimruci śraddhe śrad dhāpayeha naḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20725: RV_10,152.01a śāsa itthā mahāṃ asy amitrakhādo adbhutaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20726: RV_10,152.01c na yasya hanyate sakhā na jīyate kadā cana //
GV01rvh1-10u:20727: RV_10,152.02a svastidā viśas patir vṛtrahā vimṛdho vaśī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20728: RV_10,152.02c vṛṣendraḥ pura etu naḥ somapā abhayaṅkaraḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20729: RV_10,152.03a vi rakṣo vi mṛdho jahi vi vṛtrasya hanū ruja /
GV01rvh1-10u:20730: RV_10,152.03c vi manyum indra vṛtrahann amitrasyābhidāsataḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20731: RV_10,152.04a vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20732: RV_10,152.04c yo asmāṃ abhidāsaty adharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20733: RV_10,152.05a apendra dviṣato mano 'pa jijyāsato vadham /
GV01rvh1-10u:20734: RV_10,152.05c vi manyoḥ śarma yaccha varīyo yavayā vadham //
GV01rvh1-10u:20735: RV_10,153.01a īṅkhayantīr apasyuva indraṃ jātam upāsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20737: RV_10,153.02a tvam indra balād adhi sahaso jāta ojasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20739: RV_10,153.03a tvam indrāsi vṛtrahā vy antarikṣam atiraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20741: RV_10,153.04a tvam indra sajoṣasam arkam bibharṣi bāhvoḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20743: RV_10,153.05a tvam indrābhibhūr asi viśvā jātāny ojasā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20745: RV_10,154.01a soma ekebhyaḥ pavate ghṛtam eka upāsate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20746: RV_10,154.01c yebhyo madhu pradhāvati tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20747: RV_10,154.02a tapasā ye anādhṛṣyās tapasā ye svar yayuḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20748: RV_10,154.02c tapo ye cakrire mahas tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20749: RV_10,154.03a ye yudhyante pradhaneṣu śūrāso ye tanūtyajaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20750: RV_10,154.03c ye vā sahasradakṣiṇās tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20751: RV_10,154.04a ye cit pūrva ṛtasāpa ṛtāvāna ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20752: RV_10,154.04c pitṝn tapasvato yama tāṃś cid evāpi gacchatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20753: RV_10,154.05a sahasraṇīthāḥ kavayo ye gopāyanti sūryam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20754: RV_10,154.05c ṛṣīn tapasvato yama tapojāṃ api gacchatāt //
GV01rvh1-10u:20755: RV_10,155.01a arāyi kāṇe vikaṭe giriṃ gaccha sadānve /
GV01rvh1-10u:20756: RV_10,155.01c śirimbiṭhasya satvabhis tebhiṣ ṭvā cātayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20757: RV_10,155.02a catto itaś cattāmutaḥ sarvā bhrūṇāny āruṣī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20758: RV_10,155.02c arāyyam brahmaṇas pate tīkṣṇaśṛṇgodṛṣann ihi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20759: RV_10,155.03a ado yad dāru plavate sindhoḥ pāre apūruṣam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20760: RV_10,155.03c tad ā rabhasva durhaṇo tena gaccha parastaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20761: RV_10,155.04a yad dha prācīr ajagantoro maṇḍūradhāṇikīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20762: RV_10,155.04c hatā indrasya śatravaḥ sarve budbudayāśavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20763: RV_10,155.05a parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata /
GV01rvh1-10u:20764: RV_10,155.05c deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imāṃ ā dadharṣati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20765: RV_10,156.01a agniṃ hinvantu no dhiyaḥ saptim āśum ivājiṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20767: RV_10,156.02a yayā gā ākarāmahe senayāgne tavotyā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20769: RV_10,156.03a āgne sthūraṃ rayim bhara pṛthuṃ gomantam aśvinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20771: RV_10,156.04a agne nakṣatram ajaram ā sūryaṃ rohayo divi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20773: RV_10,156.05a agne ketur viśām asi preṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭha upasthasat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20775: RV_10,157.01a imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20776: RV_10,157.02a yajñaṃ ca nas tanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityair indraḥ saha cīkḷpāti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20777: RV_10,157.03a ādityair indraḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmākam bhūtv avitā tanūnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20778: RV_10,157.04a hatvāya devā asurān yad āyan devā devatvam abhirakṣamāṇāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20779: RV_10,157.05a pratyañcam arkam anayañ chacībhir ād it svadhām iṣirām pary apaśyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20780: RV_10,158.01a sūryo no divas pātu vāto antarikṣāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20782: RV_10,158.02a joṣā savitar yasya te haraḥ śataṃ savāṃ arhati /
GV01rvh1-10u:20784: RV_10,158.03a cakṣur no devaḥ savitā cakṣur na uta parvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20786: RV_10,158.04a cakṣur no dhehi cakṣuṣe cakṣur vikhyai tanūbhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20787: RV_10,158.04c saṃ cedaṃ vi ca paśyema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20788: RV_10,158.05a susaṃdṛśaṃ tvā vayam prati paśyema sūrya /
GV01rvh1-10u:20790: RV_10,159.01a ud asau sūryo agād ud ayam māmako bhagaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20791: RV_10,159.01c ahaṃ tad vidvalā patim abhy asākṣi viṣāsahiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20792: RV_10,159.02a ahaṃ ketur aham mūrdhāham ugrā vivācanī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20793: RV_10,159.02c mamed anu kratum patiḥ sehānāyā upācaret //
GV01rvh1-10u:20794: RV_10,159.03a mama putrāḥ śatruhaṇo 'tho me duhitā virāṭ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20795: RV_10,159.03c utāham asmi saṃjayā patyau me śloka uttamaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20796: RV_10,159.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20797: RV_10,159.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnā kilābhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20799: RV_10,159.05c āvṛkṣam anyāsāṃ varco rādho astheyasām iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20800: RV_10,159.06a sam ajaiṣam imā ahaṃ sapatnīr abhibhūvarī /
GV01rvh1-10u:20801: RV_10,159.06c yathāham asya vīrasya virājāni janasya ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20802: RV_10,160.01a tīvrasyābhivayaso asya pāhi sarvarathā vi harī iha muñca /
GV01rvh1-10u:20803: RV_10,160.01c indra mā tvā yajamānāso anye ni rīraman tubhyam ime sutāsaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20804: RV_10,160.02a tubhyaṃ sutās tubhyam u sotvāsas tvāṃ giraḥ śvātryā ā hvayanti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20805: RV_10,160.02c indredam adya savanaṃ juṣāṇo viśvasya vidvāṃ iha pāhi somam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20806: RV_10,160.03a ya uśatā manasā somam asmai sarvahṛdā devakāmaḥ sunoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20807: RV_10,160.03c na gā indras tasya parā dadāti praśastam ic cārum asmai kṛṇoti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20808: RV_10,160.04a anuspaṣṭo bhavaty eṣo asya yo asmai revān na sunoti somam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20809: RV_10,160.04c nir aratnau maghavā taṃ dadhāti brahmadviṣo hanty anānudiṣṭaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20810: RV_10,160.05a aśvāyanto gavyanto vājayanto havāmahe tvopagantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:20811: RV_10,160.05c ābhūṣantas te sumatau navāyāṃ vayam indra tvā śunaṃ huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20812: RV_10,161.01a muñcāmi tvā haviṣā jīvanāya kam ajñātayakṣmād uta rājayakṣmāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20813: RV_10,161.01c grāhir jagrāha yadi vaitad enaṃ tasyā indrāgnī pra mumuktam enam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20814: RV_10,161.02a yadi kṣitāyur yadi vā pareto yadi mṛtyor antikaṃ nīta eva /
GV01rvh1-10u:20815: RV_10,161.02c tam ā harāmi nirṛter upasthād aspārṣam enaṃ śataśāradāya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20816: RV_10,161.03a sahasrākṣeṇa śataśāradena śatāyuṣā haviṣāhārṣam enam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20817: RV_10,161.03c śataṃ yathemaṃ śarado nayātīndro viśvasya duritasya pāram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20818: RV_10,161.04a śataṃ jīva śarado vardhamānaḥ śataṃ hemantāñ chatam u vasantān /
GV01rvh1-10u:20819: RV_10,161.04c śatam indrāgnī savitā bṛhaspatiḥ śatāyuṣā haviṣemam punar duḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20820: RV_10,161.05a āhārṣaṃ tvāvidaṃ tvā punar āgāḥ punarnava /
GV01rvh1-10u:20821: RV_10,161.05c sarvāṅga sarvaṃ te cakṣuḥ sarvam āyuś ca te 'vidam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20822: RV_10,162.01a brahmaṇāgniḥ saṃvidāno rakṣohā bādhatām itaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20823: RV_10,162.01c amīvā yas te garbhaṃ durṇāmā yonim āśaye //
GV01rvh1-10u:20824: RV_10,162.02a yas te garbham amīvā durṇāmā yonim āśaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:20825: RV_10,162.02c agniṣ ṭam brahmaṇā saha niṣ kravyādam anīnaśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20826: RV_10,162.03a yas te hanti patayantaṃ niṣatsnuṃ yaḥ sarīsṛpam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20827: RV_10,162.03c jātaṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20828: RV_10,162.04a yas ta ūrū viharaty antarā dampatī śaye /
GV01rvh1-10u:20829: RV_10,162.04c yoniṃ yo antar āreḷhi tam ito nāśayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20830: RV_10,162.05a yas tvā bhrātā patir bhūtvā jāro bhūtvā nipadyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20831: RV_10,162.05c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20832: RV_10,162.06a yas tvā svapnena tamasā mohayitvā nipadyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20833: RV_10,162.06c prajāṃ yas te jighāṃsati tam ito nāśayāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20834: RV_10,163.01a akṣībhyāṃ te nāsikābhyāṃ karṇābhyāṃ chubukād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20835: RV_10,163.01c yakṣmaṃ śīrṣaṇyam mastiṣkāj jihvāyā vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20836: RV_10,163.02a grīvābhyas ta uṣṇihābhyaḥ kīkasābhyo anūkyāt /
GV01rvh1-10u:20837: RV_10,163.02c yakṣmaṃ doṣaṇyam aṃsābhyām bāhubhyāṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20838: RV_10,163.03a āntrebhyas te gudābhyo vaniṣṭhor hṛdayād adhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20839: RV_10,163.03c yakṣmam matasnābhyāṃ yaknaḥ plāśibhyo vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20840: RV_10,163.04a ūrubhyāṃ te aṣṭhīvadbhyām pārṣṇibhyām prapadābhyām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20841: RV_10,163.04c yakṣmaṃ śroṇibhyām bhāsadād bhaṃsaso vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20842: RV_10,163.05a mehanād vanaṅkaraṇāl lomabhyas te nakhebhyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20843: RV_10,163.05c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20845: RV_10,163.06c yakṣmaṃ sarvasmād ātmanas tam idaṃ vi vṛhāmi te //
GV01rvh1-10u:20846: RV_10,164.01a apehi manasas pate 'pa krāma paraś cara /
GV01rvh1-10u:20847: RV_10,164.01c paro nirṛtyā ā cakṣva bahudhā jīvato manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20848: RV_10,164.02a bhadraṃ vai varaṃ vṛṇate bhadraṃ yuñjanti dakṣiṇam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20849: RV_10,164.02c bhadraṃ vaivasvate cakṣur bahutrā jīvato manaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20850: RV_10,164.03a yad āśasā niḥśasābhiśasopārima jāgrato yat svapantaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20851: RV_10,164.03c agnir viśvāny apa duṣkṛtāny ajuṣṭāny āre asmad dadhātu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20852: RV_10,164.04a yad indra brahmaṇas pate 'bhidrohaṃ carāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20853: RV_10,164.04c pracetā na āṅgiraso dviṣatām pātv aṃhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20855: RV_10,164.05c jāgratsvapnaḥ saṃkalpaḥ pāpo yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ sa ṛcchatu yo no dveṣṭi tam ṛcchatu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20856: RV_10,165.01a devāḥ kapota iṣito yad icchan dūto nirṛtyā idam ājagāma /
GV01rvh1-10u:20857: RV_10,165.01c tasmā arcāma kṛṇavāma niṣkṛtiṃ śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
GV01rvh1-10u:20858: RV_10,165.02a śivaḥ kapota iṣito no astv anāgā devāḥ śakuno gṛheṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20859: RV_10,165.02c agnir hi vipro juṣatāṃ havir naḥ pari hetiḥ pakṣiṇī no vṛṇaktu //
GV01rvh1-10u:20860: RV_10,165.03a hetiḥ pakṣiṇī na dabhāty asmān āṣṭryām padaṃ kṛṇute agnidhāne /
GV01rvh1-10u:20861: RV_10,165.03c śaṃ no gobhyaś ca puruṣebhyaś cāstu mā no hiṃsīd iha devāḥ kapotaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20862: RV_10,165.04a yad ulūko vadati mogham etad yat kapotaḥ padam agnau kṛṇoti /
GV01rvh1-10u:20863: RV_10,165.04c yasya dūtaḥ prahita eṣa etat tasmai yamāya namo astu mṛtyave //
GV01rvh1-10u:20864: RV_10,165.05a ṛcā kapotaṃ nudata praṇodam iṣam madantaḥ pari gāṃ nayadhvam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20865: RV_10,165.05c saṃyopayanto duritāni viśvā hitvā na ūrjam pra patāt patiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20866: RV_10,166.01a ṛṣabham mā samānānāṃ sapatnānāṃ viṣāsahim /
GV01rvh1-10u:20867: RV_10,166.01c hantāraṃ śatrūṇāṃ kṛdhi virājaṃ gopatiṃ gavām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20868: RV_10,166.02a aham asmi sapatnahendra ivāriṣṭo akṣataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20869: RV_10,166.02c adhaḥ sapatnā me pador ime sarve abhiṣṭhitāḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20870: RV_10,166.03a atraiva vo 'pi nahyāmy ubhe ārtnī iva jyayā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20871: RV_10,166.03c vācas pate ni ṣedhemān yathā mad adharaṃ vadān //
GV01rvh1-10u:20872: RV_10,166.04a abhibhūr aham āgamaṃ viśvakarmeṇa dhāmnā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20873: RV_10,166.04c ā vaś cittam ā vo vratam ā vo 'haṃ samitiṃ dade //
GV01rvh1-10u:20874: RV_10,166.05a yogakṣemaṃ va ādāyāham bhūyāsam uttama ā vo mūrdhānam akramīm /
GV01rvh1-10u:20875: RV_10,166.05d adhaspadān ma ud vadata maṇḍūkā ivodakān maṇḍūkā udakād iva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20876: RV_10,167.01a tubhyedam indra pari ṣicyate madhu tvaṃ sutasya kalaśasya rājasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20877: RV_10,167.01c tvaṃ rayim puruvīrām u nas kṛdhi tvaṃ tapaḥ paritapyājayaḥ svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20878: RV_10,167.02a svarjitam mahi mandānam andhaso havāmahe pari śakraṃ sutāṃ upa /
GV01rvh1-10u:20879: RV_10,167.02c imaṃ no yajñam iha bodhy ā gahi spṛdho jayantam maghavānam īmahe //
GV01rvh1-10u:20880: RV_10,167.03a somasya rājño varuṇasya dharmaṇi bṛhaspater anumatyā u śarmaṇi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20881: RV_10,167.03c tavāham adya maghavann upastutau dhātar vidhātaḥ kalaśāṃ abhakṣayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20882: RV_10,167.04a prasūto bhakṣam akaraṃ carāv api stomaṃ cemam prathamaḥ sūrir un mṛje /
GV01rvh1-10u:20883: RV_10,167.04c sute sātena yady āgamaṃ vām prati viśvāmitrajamadagnī dame //
GV01rvh1-10u:20884: RV_10,168.01a vātasya nu mahimānaṃ rathasya rujann eti stanayann asya ghoṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20885: RV_10,168.01c divispṛg yāty aruṇāni kṛṇvann uto eti pṛthivyā reṇum asyan //
GV01rvh1-10u:20886: RV_10,168.02a sam prerate anu vātasya viṣṭhā ainaṃ gacchanti samanaṃ na yoṣāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20887: RV_10,168.02c tābhiḥ sayuk sarathaṃ deva īyate 'sya viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20888: RV_10,168.03a antarikṣe pathibhir īyamāno na ni viśate katamac canāhaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20889: RV_10,168.03c apāṃ sakhā prathamajā ṛtāvā kva svij jātaḥ kuta ā babhūva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20890: RV_10,168.04a ātmā devānām bhuvanasya garbho yathāvaśaṃ carati deva eṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20891: RV_10,168.04c ghoṣā id asya śṛṇvire na rūpaṃ tasmai vātāya haviṣā vidhema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20892: RV_10,169.01a mayobhūr vāto abhi vātūsrā ūrjasvatīr oṣadhīr ā riśantām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20893: RV_10,169.01c pīvasvatīr jīvadhanyāḥ pibantv avasāya padvate rudra mṛḷa //
GV01rvh1-10u:20894: RV_10,169.02a yāḥ sarūpā virūpā ekarūpā yāsām agnir iṣṭyā nāmāni veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:20895: RV_10,169.02c yā aṅgirasas tapaseha cakrus tābhyaḥ parjanya mahi śarma yaccha //
GV01rvh1-10u:20896: RV_10,169.03a yā deveṣu tanvam airayanta yāsāṃ somo viśvā rūpāṇi veda /
GV01rvh1-10u:20897: RV_10,169.03c tā asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ prajāvatīr indra goṣṭhe rirīhi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20898: RV_10,169.04a prajāpatir mahyam etā rarāṇo viśvair devaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20899: RV_10,169.04c śivāḥ satīr upa no goṣṭham ākas tāsāṃ vayam prajayā saṃ sadema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20900: RV_10,170.01a vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyam madhv āyur dadhad yajñapatāv avihrutam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20901: RV_10,170.01c vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20902: RV_10,170.02a vibhrāḍ bṛhat subhṛtaṃ vājasātamaṃ dharman divo dharuṇe satyam arpitam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20903: RV_10,170.02c amitrahā vṛtrahā dasyuhantamaṃ jyotir jajñe asurahā sapatnahā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20904: RV_10,170.03a idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir uttamaṃ viśvajid dhanajid ucyate bṛhat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20905: RV_10,170.03c viśvabhrāḍ bhrājo mahi sūryo dṛśa uru paprathe saha ojo acyutam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20906: RV_10,170.04a vibhrājañ jyotiṣā svar agaccho rocanaṃ divaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20907: RV_10,170.04c yenemā viśvā bhuvanāny ābhṛtā viśvakarmaṇā viśvadevyāvatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20908: RV_10,171.01a tvaṃ tyam iṭato ratham indra prāvaḥ sutāvataḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20910: RV_10,171.02a tvam makhasya dodhataḥ śiro 'va tvaco bharaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20912: RV_10,171.03a tvaṃ tyam indra martyam āstrabudhnāya venyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20914: RV_10,171.04a tvaṃ tyam indra sūryam paścā santam puras kṛdhi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20916: RV_10,172.01a ā yāhi vanasā saha gāvaḥ sacanta vartaniṃ yad ūdhabhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20917: RV_10,172.02a ā yāhi vasvyā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭho jārayanmakhaḥ sudānubhiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20918: RV_10,172.03a pitubhṛto na tantum it sudānavaḥ prati dadhmo yajāmasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20919: RV_10,172.04a uṣā apa svasus tamaḥ saṃ vartayati vartaniṃ sujātatā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20920: RV_10,173.01a ā tvāhārṣam antar edhi dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācaliḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20921: RV_10,173.01c viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20922: RV_10,173.02a ihaivaidhi māpa cyoṣṭhāḥ parvata ivāvicācaliḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20923: RV_10,173.02c indra iveha dhruvas tiṣṭheha rāṣṭram u dhāraya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20924: RV_10,173.03a imam indro adīdharad dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20925: RV_10,173.03c tasmai somo adhi bravat tasmā u brahmaṇas patiḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20926: RV_10,173.04a dhruvā dyaur dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvāsaḥ parvatā ime /
GV01rvh1-10u:20927: RV_10,173.04c dhruvaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagad dhruvo rājā viśām ayam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20928: RV_10,173.05a dhruvaṃ te rājā varuṇo dhruvaṃ devo bṛhaspatiḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20929: RV_10,173.05c dhruvaṃ ta indraś cāgniś ca rāṣṭraṃ dhārayatāṃ dhruvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20930: RV_10,173.06a dhruvaṃ dhruveṇa haviṣābhi somam mṛśāmasi /
GV01rvh1-10u:20931: RV_10,173.06c atho ta indraḥ kevalīr viśo balihṛtas karat //
GV01rvh1-10u:20933: RV_10,174.01c tenāsmān brahmaṇas pate 'bhi rāṣṭrāya vartaya //
GV01rvh1-10u:20934: RV_10,174.02a abhivṛtya sapatnān abhi yā no arātayaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20935: RV_10,174.02c abhi pṛtanyantaṃ tiṣṭhābhi yo na irasyati //
GV01rvh1-10u:20936: RV_10,174.03a abhi tvā devaḥ savitābhi somo avīvṛtat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20937: RV_10,174.03c abhi tvā viśvā bhūtāny abhīvarto yathāsasi //
GV01rvh1-10u:20938: RV_10,174.04a yenendro haviṣā kṛtvy abhavad dyumny uttamaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20939: RV_10,174.04c idaṃ tad akri devā asapatnaḥ kilābhuvam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20941: RV_10,174.05c yathāham eṣām bhūtānāṃ virājāni janasya ca //
GV01rvh1-10u:20942: RV_10,175.01a pra vo grāvāṇaḥ savitā devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20944: RV_10,175.02a grāvāṇo apa ducchunām apa sedhata durmatim /
GV01rvh1-10u:20946: RV_10,175.03a grāvāṇa upareṣv ā mahīyante sajoṣasaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20948: RV_10,175.04a grāvāṇaḥ savitā nu vo devaḥ suvatu dharmaṇā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20950: RV_10,176.01a pra sūnava ṛbhūṇām bṛhan navanta vṛjanā /
GV01rvh1-10u:20951: RV_10,176.01c kṣāmā ye viśvadhāyaso 'śnan dhenuṃ na mātaram //
GV01rvh1-10u:20952: RV_10,176.02a pra devaṃ devyā dhiyā bharatā jātavedasam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20954: RV_10,176.03a ayam u ṣya pra devayur hotā yajñāya nīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:20955: RV_10,176.03c ratho na yor abhīvṛto ghṛṇīvāñ cetati tmanā //
GV01rvh1-10u:20956: RV_10,176.04a ayam agnir uruṣyaty amṛtād iva janmanaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20957: RV_10,176.04c sahasaś cit sahīyān devo jīvātave kṛtaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20958: RV_10,177.01a pataṅgam aktam asurasya māyayā hṛdā paśyanti manasā vipaścitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20959: RV_10,177.01c samudre antaḥ kavayo vi cakṣate marīcīnām padam icchanti vedhasaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20960: RV_10,177.02a pataṅgo vācam manasā bibharti tāṃ gandharvo 'vadad garbhe antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20961: RV_10,177.02c tāṃ dyotamānāṃ svaryam manīṣām ṛtasya pade kavayo ni pānti //
GV01rvh1-10u:20962: RV_10,177.03a apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20963: RV_10,177.03c sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20964: RV_10,178.01a tyam ū ṣu vājinaṃ devajūtaṃ sahāvānaṃ tarutāraṃ rathānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20965: RV_10,178.01c ariṣṭanemim pṛtanājam āśuṃ svastaye tārkṣyam ihā huvema //
GV01rvh1-10u:20966: RV_10,178.02a indrasyeva rātim ājohuvānāḥ svastaye nāvam ivā ruhema /
GV01rvh1-10u:20967: RV_10,178.02c urvī na pṛthvī bahule gabhīre mā vām etau mā paretau riṣāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20968: RV_10,178.03a sadyaś cid yaḥ śavasā pañca kṛṣṭīḥ sūrya iva jyotiṣāpas tatāna /
GV01rvh1-10u:20969: RV_10,178.03c sahasrasāḥ śatasā asya raṃhir na smā varante yuvatiṃ na śaryām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20970: RV_10,179.01a ut tiṣṭhatāva paśyatendrasya bhāgam ṛtviyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20971: RV_10,179.01c yadi śrāto juhotana yady aśrāto mamattana //
GV01rvh1-10u:20972: RV_10,179.02a śrātaṃ havir o ṣv indra pra yāhi jagāma sūro adhvano vimadhyam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20973: RV_10,179.02c pari tvāsate nidhibhiḥ sakhāyaḥ kulapā na vrājapatiṃ carantam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20974: RV_10,179.03a śrātam manya ūdhani śrātam agnau suśrātam manye tad ṛtaṃ navīyaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20975: RV_10,179.03c mādhyandinasya savanasya dadhnaḥ pibendra vajrin purukṛj juṣāṇaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20976: RV_10,180.01a pra sasāhiṣe puruhūta śatrūñ jyeṣṭhas te śuṣma iha rātir astu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20977: RV_10,180.01c indrā bhara dakṣiṇenā vasūni patiḥ sindhūnām asi revatīnām //
GV01rvh1-10u:20978: RV_10,180.02a mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthā parasyāḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20979: RV_10,180.02c sṛkaṃ saṃśāya pavim indra tigmaṃ vi śatrūn tāḷhi vi mṛdho nudasva //
GV01rvh1-10u:20980: RV_10,180.03a indra kṣatram abhi vāmam ojo 'jāyathā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20981: RV_10,180.03c apānudo janam amitrayantam uruṃ devebhyo akṛṇor u lokam //
GV01rvh1-10u:20982: RV_10,181.01a prathaś ca yasya saprathaś ca nāmānuṣṭubhasya haviṣo havir yat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20983: RV_10,181.01c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇo rathantaram ā jabhārā vasiṣṭhaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20984: RV_10,181.02a avindan te atihitaṃ yad āsīd yajñasya dhāma paramaṃ guhā yat /
GV01rvh1-10u:20985: RV_10,181.02c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor bharadvājo bṛhad ā cakre agneḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20986: RV_10,181.03a te 'vindan manasā dīdhyānā yaju ṣkannam prathamaṃ devayānam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20987: RV_10,181.03c dhātur dyutānāt savituś ca viṣṇor ā sūryād abharan gharmam ete //
GV01rvh1-10u:20988: RV_10,182.01a bṛhaspatir nayatu durgahā tiraḥ punar neṣad aghaśaṃsāya manma /
GV01rvh1-10u:20989: RV_10,182.01c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20990: RV_10,182.02a narāśaṃso no 'vatu prayāje śaṃ no astv anuyājo haveṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:20991: RV_10,182.02c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20992: RV_10,182.03a tapurmūrdhā tapatu rakṣaso ye brahmadviṣaḥ śarave hantavā u /
GV01rvh1-10u:20993: RV_10,182.03c kṣipad aśastim apa durmatiṃ hann athā karad yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:20994: RV_10,183.01a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā cekitānaṃ tapaso jātaṃ tapaso vibhūtam /
GV01rvh1-10u:20995: RV_10,183.01c iha prajām iha rayiṃ rarāṇaḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāma //
GV01rvh1-10u:20996: RV_10,183.02a apaśyaṃ tvā manasā dīdhyānāṃ svāyāṃ tanū ṛtvye nādhamānām /
GV01rvh1-10u:20997: RV_10,183.02c upa mām uccā yuvatir babhūyāḥ pra jāyasva prajayā putrakāme //
GV01rvh1-10u:20998: RV_10,183.03a ahaṃ garbham adadhām oṣadhīṣv ahaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣv antaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:20999: RV_10,183.03c aham prajā ajanayam pṛthivyām ahaṃ janibhyo aparīṣu putrān //
GV01rvh1-10u:21000: RV_10,184.01a viṣṇur yoniṃ kalpayatu tvaṣṭā rūpāṇi piṃśatu /
GV01rvh1-10u:21001: RV_10,184.01c ā siñcatu prajāpatir dhātā garbhaṃ dadhātu te //
GV01rvh1-10u:21002: RV_10,184.02a garbhaṃ dhehi sinīvāli garbhaṃ dhehi sarasvati /
GV01rvh1-10u:21003: RV_10,184.02c garbhaṃ te aśvinau devāv ā dhattām puṣkarasrajā //
GV01rvh1-10u:21004: RV_10,184.03a hiraṇyayī araṇī yaṃ nirmanthato aśvinā /
GV01rvh1-10u:21005: RV_10,184.03c taṃ te garbhaṃ havāmahe daśame māsi sūtave //
GV01rvh1-10u:21006: RV_10,185.01a mahi trīṇām avo 'stu dyukṣam mitrasyāryamṇaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21008: RV_10,185.02a nahi teṣām amā cana nādhvasu vāraṇeṣu /
GV01rvh1-10u:21010: RV_10,185.03a yasmai putrāso aditeḥ pra jīvase martyāya /
GV01rvh1-10u:21012: RV_10,186.01a vāta ā vātu bheṣajaṃ śambhu mayobhu no hṛde /
GV01rvh1-10u:21014: RV_10,186.02a uta vāta pitāsi na uta bhrātota naḥ sakhā /
GV01rvh1-10u:21016: RV_10,186.03a yad ado vāta te gṛhe 'mṛtasya nidhir hitaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21018: RV_10,187.01a prāgnaye vācam īraya vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām /
GV01rvh1-10u:21019: RV_10,187.01c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21020: RV_10,187.02a yaḥ parasyāḥ parāvatas tiro dhanvātirocate /
GV01rvh1-10u:21021: RV_10,187.02c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21022: RV_10,187.03a yo rakṣāṃsi nijūrvati vṛṣā śukreṇa śociṣā /
GV01rvh1-10u:21023: RV_10,187.03c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21024: RV_10,187.04a yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati /
GV01rvh1-10u:21025: RV_10,187.04c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21026: RV_10,187.05a yo asya pāre rajasaḥ śukro agnir ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:21027: RV_10,187.05c sa naḥ parṣad ati dviṣaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21028: RV_10,188.01a pra nūnaṃ jātavedasam aśvaṃ hinota vājinam /
GV01rvh1-10u:21030: RV_10,188.02a asya pra jātavedaso vipravīrasya mīḷhuṣaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21032: RV_10,188.03a yā ruco jātavedaso devatrā havyavāhanīḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21034: RV_10,189.01a āyaṃ gauḥ pṛśnir akramīd asadan mātaram puraḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21036: RV_10,189.02a antaś carati rocanāsya prāṇād apānatī /
GV01rvh1-10u:21038: RV_10,189.03a triṃśad dhāma vi rājati vāk pataṅgāya dhīyate /
GV01rvh1-10u:21040: RV_10,190.01a ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ cābhīddhāt tapaso 'dhy ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:21041: RV_10,190.01c tato rātry ajāyata tataḥ samudro arṇavaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21042: RV_10,190.02a samudrād arṇavād adhi saṃvatsaro ajāyata /
GV01rvh1-10u:21043: RV_10,190.02c ahorātrāṇi vidadhad viśvasya miṣato vaśī //
GV01rvh1-10u:21045: RV_10,190.03c divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣam atho svaḥ //
GV01rvh1-10u:21046: RV_10,191.01a saṃ-sam id yuvase vṛṣann agne viśvāny arya ā /
GV01rvh1-10u:21047: RV_10,191.01c iḷas pade sam idhyase sa no vasūny ā bhara //
GV01rvh1-10u:21048: RV_10,191.02a saṃ gacchadhvaṃ saṃ vadadhvaṃ saṃ vo manāṃsi jānatām /
GV01rvh1-10u:21049: RV_10,191.02c devā bhāgaṃ yathā pūrve saṃjānānā upāsate //
GV01rvh1-10u:21050: RV_10,191.03a samāno mantraḥ samitiḥ samānī samānam manaḥ saha cittam eṣām /
GV01rvh1-10u:21051: RV_10,191.03c samānam mantram abhi mantraye vaḥ samānena vo haviṣā juhomi //
GV01rvh1-10u:21052: RV_10,191.04a samānī va ākūtiḥ samānā hṛdayāni vaḥ /
GV01rvh1-10u:21053: RV_10,191.04c samānam astu vo mano yathā vaḥ susahāsati //
